GS24pmbhasuu:0: (Pas_1) KA_I,1.1-5 Ro_I,1-4 atha śabdānuśāsanam . atha iti ayam śabdaḥ adhikārārthaḥ prayujyate . śabdānuśāsanam śāstram adhikṛtam veditavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1_0: keṣām śabdānām . laukikānām vaidikānām ca . tatra laukikāḥ tāvat : gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1_1: hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . vaidikāḥ khalu api : śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye
GS24pmbhasuu:1_2: . iṣe tvā ūrje tvā . agnim īḷe purohitam . agne ayāhi vītaye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2: (Pas_2) KA_I,1.6-13 Ro_I,5-7 atha gauḥ iti atra kaḥ śabdaḥ . kim yat tat sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇi artharūpam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:3: dravyam nāma tat . yat tarhi tat iṅgitam ceṣṭitam nimiṣitam saḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4: na iti āha . kriyā nāma sā . yat tarhi tat śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kapilaḥ kapotaḥ iti saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha . guṇaḥ nāma saḥ . yat tarhi tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5: bhinneṣu abhinnam chinneṣu acchinnam sāmānyabhūtam saḥ śabdaḥ . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:6_0: . ākṛtiḥ nāma sā . kaḥ tarhi śabdaḥ . yena uccāritena sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇinām
GS24pmbhasuu:6_1: sampratyayaḥ bhavati saḥ śabdaḥ . atha vā pratītapadārthakaḥ loke dhvaniḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6_2: iti ucyate . tat yathā śabdam kuru mā śabdam kārṣīḥ śabdakārī ayam māṇavakaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9_0: prayojanāni . rakṣohāgamalaghvasandehāḥ proyojanam . rakṣārtham vedānām adhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9_1: vyākaraṇam . lopāgamavarṇavikārajñaḥ hi samyak vedān paripālayiṣyati . ūhaḥ khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:9_2: api. na sarvaiḥ liṅgaiḥ na ca sarvābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10_0: vibhaktibhiḥ vede mantrāḥ nigaditāḥ. te ca avaśyam yajñagatena yathāyatham vipariṇamayitavyāḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:10_1: tān na avaiyākaraṇaḥ śaknoti yathāyatham vipariṇamayitum. tasmāt adhyeyam vyākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11: brāhmaṇena niṣkāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgaḥ vedaḥ adhyeyaḥ jñeyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12: pradhānam ca ṣaṭsu aṅgeṣu vyākaraṇam . pradhāne ca kṛtaḥ yatnaḥ phalavān bhavati . laghvartham ca adhyeyam vyākaraṇam. brāhmaṇena avaśyam śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13: jñeyāḥ iti . na ca antareṇa vyākaraṇam laghunā upāyena śabdāḥ śakyāḥ jñātum . asandehārtham ca adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14: sthūlapṛṣatīm āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta iti . tasyām sandehaḥ sthūlā
GS24pmbhasuu:15: ca asau pṛṣatī ca sthūlapṛṣatī sthūlāni pṛṣanti yasyāḥ sā sthūlapṛṣatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:16: tām na avaiyākaraṇaḥ svarataḥ adhyavasyati . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ. atha antodāttatvam tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:18: (Pas_4.1) KA_I,2.3-9 Ro_I,11-12 imāni ca bhūyaḥ śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanāni . te asurāḥ , duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ , yat adhītam , yaḥ tu prayuṅkte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:19: avidvāṃsaḥ , vibhaktim kurvanti , yaḥ vai imām , catvāri , uta tvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:20_0: saktum iva , sārasvatīm , daśamyām putrasya , sudevaḥ asi varuṇa iti . te asurāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20_1: . te asurāḥ helayaḥ helayaḥ iti kurvantaḥ parā babhūvuḥ . tasmāt brāhmaṇena na mlecchitavai
GS24pmbhasuu:20_2: na apabhāṣitavai . mlecchaḥ ha vai eṣaḥ yat apaśabdaḥ . mlecchāḥ mā bhūma iti adhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:20_3: vyākaraṇam . te asurāḥ (Pas_4.2) KA_I,2.10-14 Ro_I,12-13 duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ . duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:20_4: svarataḥ varṇataḥ vā mithyā prayuktaḥ na tam artham āha . saḥ vāgvajraḥ yajamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:20_5: hinasti yathā indraśatruḥ svarataḥ aparādhāt . duṣṭān śabdān mā
GS24pmbhasuu:21: prayukṣmahi iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:22: (Pas_4.3) KA_I,2.14-17 Ro_I,3 yat adhītam . yat adhītam avijñātam
GS24pmbhasuu:23: nigadena eva śabdyate anagnau iva śuṣkaidhaḥ na tat jvalati karhi cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:24: tasmāt anarthakam mā adhigīṣmahi iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam. yat adhītam .
GS24pmbhasuu:25: (Pas_4.4) KA_I,2.18-3.5 Ro_I,13-15 yaḥ tu prayuṅkte . yaḥ tu prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:26_0: kuśalaḥ viśeṣe śabdān yathāvat vyavahārakāle saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit
GS24pmbhasuu:26_1: duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ . kaḥ . vāgyogavit eva . kutaḥ etat . yaḥ hi śabdān jānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:26_2: apaśabdān api asau jānāti . yathā eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:27: śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ . atha vā bhūyān
GS24pmbhasuu:28_0: adharmaḥ prāpnoti . bhūyāṃsaḥ apaśabdāḥ alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya hi śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:28_1: bahavaḥ apaśabdāḥ . tat yathā gauḥ iti asya śabdasya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:29: ajñānam tasya śaraṇam . na atyantāya ajñānam śaraṇam bhavitum arhati . yaḥ hi ajānan vai brāhmaṇam hanyāt surām vā pibet saḥ api manye patitaḥ syāt.
GS24pmbhasuu:30_0: evam tarhi saḥ anantam āpnoti jayam paratra vāgyogavit duṣyati ca apaśabdaiḥ . kaḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:30_1: avāgyogavit eva . atha yaḥ vāgyogavit . vijñānam tasya śaraṇam . kva punaḥ idam paṭhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:30_2: . bhrājāḥ nāma ślokāḥ . kim ca bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:31: ślokāḥ api pramāṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pramāṇam ayam api ślokaḥ pramāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:32_0: bhavitum arhati . yat udumbaravarṇānām ghaṭīnām maṇḍalam mahat pītam na svargam gamayet
GS24pmbhasuu:32_1: kim tat kratugatam nayet iti . pramattagītaḥ eṣaḥ tatrabhavataḥ . yaḥ tu apramattagītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:33_0: (Pas_4.5) KA_I,3.6-9 Ro_I,15 avidvāṃsaḥ . avidvāṃsaḥ pratyabhivāde nāmnaḥ ye plutim
GS24pmbhasuu:33_1: na viduḥ kāmam teṣu tu viproṣya strīṣu iva ayam aham vadet . abhivāde strīvat mā
GS24pmbhasuu:34_0: (Pas_4.6) KA_I,3.10-11 Ro_I,16 vibhaktim kurvanti . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti : prayājāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:34_1: savibhaktikāḥ kāryāḥ iti . na ca antareṇa vyākaraṇam prayājāḥ savibhaktikāḥ śakyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:35: (Pas_4.7) KA_I,3.12-13 Ro_I,16 yaḥ vai imām . yaḥ vai imām padaśaḥ svaraśaḥ akṣaraśaḥ vācam vidadhāti saḥ ārtvijīnaḥ . ārtvijīnāḥ syāma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:37: (Pas_4.8) KA_I,3.14-29 Ro_I,16-18 catvāri . catvari śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya padā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:38_0: devaḥ martyān a viveśa . catvāri śṛṅgāni catvāri padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:38_1: ca . trayaḥ asya pādāḥ trayaḥ kālāḥ bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ . dve śīrṣe dvau śabdātmānau
GS24pmbhasuu:39_0: sapta hastāsaḥ asya sapta vibhaktayaḥ . tridhā baddhaḥ triṣu sthāneṣu baddhaḥ urasi
GS24pmbhasuu:39_1: kaṇṭhe śirasi iti . vṛṣabhaḥ varṣaṇāt . roravīti śabdam karoti . kutaḥ etat . rautiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:39_2: śabdakarmā . mahaḥ devaḥ martyān āviveśa iti . mahān devaḥ śabdaḥ . martyāḥ maraṇadharmāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:40: mahatā devena naḥ sāmyam yathā syāt iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:41: catvari vak parimitā padani tani viduḥ brāhmaṇa ye manīṣiṇaḥ guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ vadanti . catvāri vāk parimitā
GS24pmbhasuu:42_0: padāni . catvāri padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ ca . tāni viduḥ brāhmaṇāḥ ye
GS24pmbhasuu:42_1: manīṣiṇaḥ . manasaḥ īṣiṇaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ . guhā trīṇi nihitā na iṅgayanti . guhāyām trīṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:42_2: nihitāni na iṅgayanti . na ceṣṭante . na nimiṣanti iti arthaḥ . turīyam vācaḥ manuṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:43: etat vācaḥ yat manuṣyeṣu vartate . caturtham iti arthaḥ . catvāri .
GS24pmbhasuu:44_0: (Pas_4.9) KA_I,4.5-8 Ro_I,18-19 uta tvaḥ . uta tvaḥ paśyan na dadarśa vacam uta tvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:44_1: śrṇvan na śṛṇoti enām uto tvasmai tanvam visasre jāya iva patye uśatī suvasāḥ . api
GS24pmbhasuu:44_2: khalu ekaḥ paśyan api na paśyati vācam . api khalu ekaḥ śrṇvan api na śrṇoti enām
GS24pmbhasuu:44_3: . avidvāṃsam āha ardham . uto tvasmai tanvam visasre . tanum vivṛṇute . jāyā iva
GS24pmbhasuu:44_4: patye uśatī suvāsāḥ . tad yathā jāyā patye kāmayamānā suvāsāḥ svam ātmānam vivṛṇute
GS24pmbhasuu:44_5: evam vāk vāgvide svātmānam vivṛṇute . vāk naḥ vivṛṇuyāt ātmānam iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:46: (Pas_4.10) KA_I,4.9-18 Ro_I,19-20 saktum iva . saktum iva titaunā
GS24pmbhasuu:47: punantaḥ yatra dhīrāḥ manasā vacam akrata atrā sakhāyaḥ sakhyani jānate bhadra eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci . saktuḥ sacateḥ durdhāvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:48_0: kasateḥ vā viparītāt vikasito bhavati . titau paripavanam bhavati tatavat vā tunnavat
GS24pmbhasuu:48_1: vā . dhīrāḥ dhyānavantaḥ manasā prajñānena vācam akrata vācam akṛṣata . atrā sakhāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:48_2: sakhyāni jānate . sāyujyāni jānate . kva . yaḥ eṣaḥ durghaḥ mārgaḥ ekagamyaḥ vāgviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:49: kutaḥ etat . bhadrā eṣām lakṣmīḥ nihitā adhi vāci . eṣām vāci bhadrā
GS24pmbhasuu:50: lakṣmīḥ nihitā bhavati . lakṣmīḥ lakṣaṇāt bhāsanāt parivṛḍhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:53: āhitāgniḥ apaśabdam prayujya prāyaścittīyām sārasvatīm iṣṭim nirvapet iti . prāyaścittīyāḥ mā bhūma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . sārasvatīm .
GS24pmbhasuu:54: (Pas_4.12) KA_I,4.22-25 Ro_I,21 daśamyām putrasya . yājñikāḥ paṭhanti : daśamyuttarakālam putrasya jātasya nāma vidadhyāt ghoṣavadādi
GS24pmbhasuu:55_0: antarantaḥstham avṛddham tripuruṣānūkam anaripratiṣṭhitam . tat hi pratiṣṭhitatamam
GS24pmbhasuu:55_1: bhavati . dvyakṣaram caturakṣaram vā nāma kṛtam kuryāt na taddhitam iti . na ca antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:55_2: vyākaraṇam kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ vā śakyāḥ vijñātum . daśamyām putrasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:56: (Pas_4.13) KA_I,4.26-5.4 Ro_I,21-22 sudevaḥ asi . sudevaḥ asi varuṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:57: yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ anukṣaranti kākudam sūrmyam suṣiram iva . sudevaḥ asi varuṇa satyadevaḥ asi yasya te sapta sindhavaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:58: anukṣaranti kākudam . kākudam tālu . kākuḥ jihvā sā asmin udyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:59: kākudam . sūrmyam suṣirām iva . tad yathā śobhanām ūrmīm suṣirām agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:60: antaḥ praviśya dahati evam tava sapta sindhavaḥ sapta vibhaktayaḥ tālu anukṣaranti . tena asi satyadevaḥ . satyadevāḥ syāma iti adhyeyam vyākaraṇam . sudevaḥ asi .
GS24pmbhasuu:61: (Pas_5) KA_I,5.5-11 Ro_I,22-23 kim punaḥ idam vyākaranam eva adhijigāṃsamānebhyaḥ prayojanam anvākhyāyate na punaḥ anyat api kim cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:62_0: om iti uktvā vṛttāntaśaḥ śam iti evamādīn śabdān paṭhanti . purākalpe etat āsīt :
GS24pmbhasuu:62_1: saṃskārottarakālam brāhmaṇāḥ vyākaraṇam sma adhīyate . tebhyaḥ tatra sthānakaraṇānupradānajñebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:62_2: vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ upadiśyante . tat adyatve na tathā . vedam adhītya tvaritāḥ vaktāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:62_3: bhavanti : vedāt naḥ vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ siddhāḥ lokāt ca laukikāḥ . anarthakam vyākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:63: tebhyaḥ vipratipannabuddhibhyaḥ adhyetṛbhyaḥ ācāryaḥ idam śāstram anvācaṣṭe : imāni prayojanāni adhyeyam vyākaraṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:64: (Pas_6) KA_I,5.11-22 Ro_I,23-24 uktaḥ śabdaḥ . svarūpam api uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:65: prayojanāni api uktāni . śabdānuśāsanam idānīm kartavyam . tat katham kartavyam . kim śabdopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ āhosvit apaśabdopadeśaḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:66: ubhayopadeśaḥ iti . anyataropadeśena kṛtam syāt . tat yathā bhakṣyaniyamena abhakṣyapratiṣedho gamyate . pañca pañcanakhāḥ bhakṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:67_0: iti ukte gamyate etat : ataḥ anye abhakṣyāḥ iti . abhakṣyapratiṣedhena vā bhakṣyaniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:67_1: . tat yathā abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ukte gamyate etat
GS24pmbhasuu:67_2: : āraṇyaḥ bhakṣyaḥ iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:68: : yadi tāvat śabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gauḥ iti etasmin upadiṣṭe gamyate etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:69: gāvyādayaḥ apaśabdāḥ iti . atha apaśabdopadeśaḥ kriyate gāvyādiṣu upadiṣṭeṣu gamyate etat : gauḥ iti eṣaḥ śabdaḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:70: . laghutvāt śabdopadeśaḥ . laghīyān śabdopadeśaḥ garīyān apaśabdopadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:71: ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . tat yathā . gauḥ iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:72: śabdasya gāvīgoṇīgotāgopotalikādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . iṣṭānvākhyānam khalu api bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:73_0: (Pas_7) KA_I,5.23-6.7 Ro_I,24-25 atha etasmin śabdopadeśe sati kim śabdānām pratipattau
GS24pmbhasuu:73_1: pratipadapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ : gauḥ aśvaḥ puruṣaḥ hastī śakuniḥ mṛgaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:73_2: evamādayaḥ śabdāḥ paṭhitavyāḥ . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:74: anabhyupāyaḥ eṣaḥ śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ . evam hi śrūyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:75_0: bṛhaspatiḥ indrāya divyam varṣasahasram pratipadoktānām śabdānām śabdapārāyaṇam provāca
GS24pmbhasuu:75_1: na antam jagāma . bṛhaspatiḥ ca pravaktā indraḥ ca adhyetā divyam varṣasahasram adhyayanakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:75_2: na ca antam jagāma . kim punaḥ adyatve . yaḥ sarvathā ciram jīvati saḥ varṣaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:75_3: jīvati . caturbhiḥ ca prakāraiḥ vidyā upayuktā bhavati āgamakālena svādhyāyakālena
GS24pmbhasuu:76_0: pravacanakālena vyavahārakālena iti . tatra ca āgamakālena eva āyuḥ paryupayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:76_1: syāt . tasmāt anabhyupāyaḥ śabdānām pratipattau pratipadapāṭhaḥ . katham tarhi ime
GS24pmbhasuu:76_2: śabdāḥ pratipattavyāḥ . kim cit sāmanyaviśeṣavat lakṣaṇam pravartyam yena alpena
GS24pmbhasuu:76_3: yatnena mahataḥ mahataḥ śabdaughān pratipadyeran . kim punaḥ tat . utsargāpavādau
GS24pmbhasuu:76_4: . kaḥ cit utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ kaḥ cit apavādaḥ . kathañjātīyakaḥ punaḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:77: kartavyaḥ kathañjātīyakaḥ apavādaḥ . sāmanyena utsargaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā karmaṇi aṇ . tasya viśeṣeṇa apavādaḥ . tat yathā . ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:78_0: (Pas_8) KA_I,6.8-11 Ro_I,25-26 kim punaḥ ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ āhosvit dravyam . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:78_1: iti āha . katham jñāyate . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa sūtrāṇi paṭhitāni . ākṛtim padārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:79: anyatarasyām iti ucyate . dravyam padārtham matvā sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:80: (Pas_9) KA_I,6.12-14 Ro_I,26-27 kim punaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvit kāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:81: . saṅgrahe etat prādhānyena parīkṣitam nityaḥ vā syāt kāryaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:82: tatra uktāḥ doṣāḥ prayojanāni api uktāni . tatra tu eṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ yadi eva
GS24pmbhasuu:83: nityaḥ atha api kāryaḥ ubhayathā api lakṣaṇam pravartyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:84_0: (Pas_10.1) KA_I,6.14-7.7 Ro_I,27-30 katham punaḥ idam bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya
GS24pmbhasuu:84_1: lakṣaṇam pravṛttam . siddhe śabdārthasambandhe . siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:85: nityaparyāyavācī siddhaśabdaḥ . katham jñāyate . yat kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:86: bhāveṣu vartate . tat yathā siddhā dyauḥ , siddhā pṛthivī siddham ākāśam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ kāryeṣu api vartate . tat yathā siddhaḥ odanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:87: siddhaḥ sūpaḥ siddhā yavāgūḥ iti . yāvatā kāryeṣu api vartate tatra kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:88: etat nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam na punaḥ kārye yaḥ siddhaśabdaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:89: saṅgrahe tāvat kāryapratidvandvibhāvāt manyāmahe nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti . iha api tat eva . atha vā santi ekapadāni api avadhāraṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:90_0: . tat yathā : abbhakṣaḥ vāyubhakṣaḥ iti . apaḥ eva bhakṣayati vāyum eva bhakṣayati
GS24pmbhasuu:90_1: iti gamyate . evam iha api siddhaḥ eva na sādhyaḥ iti . atha vā pūrvapadalopaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:90_2: draṣṭavyaḥ : atyantasiddhaḥ siddhaḥ iti . tat yathā devadattaḥ dattaḥ , satyabhāmā
GS24pmbhasuu:91: viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti nityaparyāyavācinaḥ grahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ anena varṇyena . kim na mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:92: kaṇṭhena nityaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ yasmin upādīyamāne asandehaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:93_0: maṅgalārtham . māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham siddhaśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:93_1: āditaḥ prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:93_2: ca . adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . ayam khalu api nityaśabdaḥ na avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:94: kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu bhāveṣu vartate . kim tarhi . ābhīkṣṇye api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:95: tat yathā nityaprahasitaḥ nityaprajalpitaḥ iti . yāvatā ābhīkṣṇye api
GS24pmbhasuu:96: vartate tatra api anyena eva arthaḥ syāt vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ maṅgalārthaḥ ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:97: siddhaśabdaḥ āditaḥ prayuktaḥ bhaviṣyati śakṣyāmi ca enam nityaparyāyavācinam varṇayitum iti . ataḥ siddhaśabdaḥ eva upāttaḥ na nityaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:98: (Pas_10.2) KA_I,7.8-8.1 Ro_I,30-32 atha kam punaḥ padārtham matvā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:99: vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . ākṛtim iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:100: kutaḥ etat . ākṛtiḥ hi nityā . dravyam anityam . atha dravye padārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:101: katham vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ . siddhe śabde arthasambandhe ca iti . nityaḥ hi arthavatām arthaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ . atha vā dravye eva padārthe eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:102: vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti. dravyam hi nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:103: ākṛtiḥ anityā . katham jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate loke . mṛt kayā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:104: ākṛtyā yuktā piṇḍaḥ bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim upamṛdya ghaṭikāḥ kiryante .
GS24pmbhasuu:105_0: ghaṭikākṛtim upamṛdya kuṇḍikāḥ kriyante . tathā suvarṇam kayā cit ākṛtyā yuktam piṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:105_1: bhavati . piṇḍākṛtim upamṛdya rucakāḥ kriyante . rucakākṛtim upamṛdya kaṭakāḥ kriyante
GS24pmbhasuu:105_2: . kaṭakākṛtim upmṛdya svastikāḥ kriyante . punaḥ āvṛttaḥ suvarṇapiṇḍaḥ punaḥ aparayā
GS24pmbhasuu:105_3: ākṛtyā yuktaḥ khadirāgārasavarṇe kuṇḍale bhavataḥ . ākṛtiḥ anyā ca anyā ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:106_0: ākṛtyupamardena dravyam eva avaśiṣyate . ākṛtau api padārthe eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ nyāyyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:106_1: siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe ca iti . nanu ca uktam ākṛtiḥ anityā iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:106_2: . nityā ākṛtiḥ . katham . na kva cit uparatā iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:107: sarvatra uparatā bhavati . dravyāntarasthā tu upalabhyate . atha vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:108_0: idam eva nityalakṣaṇam dhruvam kūṭastham avicāli anapāyopajanavikāri anutpatti avṛddhi
GS24pmbhasuu:108_1: avyayayogi iti tan nityam iti . tat api nityam yasmin tattvam na vihanyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:108_2: punaḥ tattvam . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . ākṛtau api tattvam na vihanyate . atha vā kim
GS24pmbhasuu:108_3: naḥ etena idam nityam idam anityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:109_0: . yat nityam tam padārtham matvā eṣaḥ vigrahaḥ kriyate siddhe śabde arthe sambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:109_1: ca iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate siddhaḥ śabdaḥ arthaḥ sambandhaḥ ca iti . lokataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:109_2: yat loke artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate . na eṣām nirvṛttau yatnam kurvanti . ye
GS24pmbhasuu:109_3: punaḥ kāryāḥ bhāvāḥ nirvṛttau tāvat teṣām yatnaḥ kriyate . tat yathā . ghaṭena kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:109_4: kariṣyan kumbhakārakulam gatvā āha kuru ghaṭam . kāryam anena kariṣyāmi iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:110: prayokṣyamāṇaḥ vaiyākaraṇakulam gatvā āha . kuru śabdān . prayokṣye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:111: tāvati eva artham upādāya śabdān prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:112: (Pas_11) KA_I,8.1-22 Ro_I,32-35 yadi tarhi lokaḥ eṣu pramāṇam kim
GS24pmbhasuu:113_0: śāstreṇa kriyate . lokataḥ arthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ . lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:113_1: arthaprayukte śabdaprayoge śāstreṇa dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . kim idam dharmaniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:114: dharmārthaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ dharmaprayojanaḥ vā niyamaḥ dharmaniyamaḥ . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . priyataddhitāḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:115: yathā loke vede ca iti prayoktavye yathā laukikavaidikeṣu iti prayuñjate .
GS24pmbhasuu:116: atha vā yuktaḥ eva taddhitārthaḥ . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:117: bhakṣyam ca nāma kṣutpratīghātārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca anena
GS24pmbhasuu:118: śvamāṃsādibhiḥ api kṣut pratihantum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . idam bhakṣyam . idam abhakṣyam iti . tathā khedāt strīṣu pravṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:119: samānaḥ ca khedavigamaḥ gamyāyām ca agamyāyām ca . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:120: iyam gamyā iyam agamyā iti . vede khalu api payovrataḥ brāhmaṇaḥ yavāgūvrataḥ rājanyaḥ āmikṣāvrataḥ vaiśyaḥ iti ucyate . vratam ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:121: abhyavahārārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca anena śālimāṃsādīni api vratayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:122: . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate . tathā bailvaḥ khādiraḥ vā yūpaḥ syāt iti ucyate . yūpaḥ ca nāma paśvanubandhārtham upādīyate . śakyam ca anena kim cit eva
GS24pmbhasuu:123: kāṣṭham ucchritya anucchritya vā paśuḥ anubanddhum . tatra niyamaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:124_0: . tathā agnau kapālāni adhiśritya abhimantrayate . bhṛgūṇām aṅgirasām gharmasya tapasā
GS24pmbhasuu:124_1: tapyadhvam iti . antareṇa api mantram agniḥ dahanakarmā kapālāni santāpayati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:124_2: niyamaḥ kriyate . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti . evam iha api samānāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:124_3: arthagatau śabdena ca apaśabdena ca dharmaniyamaḥ kriyate . śabdena eva arthaḥ abhidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:124_4: na apaśabdena iti . evam kriyamāṇam abhyudayakāri bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:125: (Pas_12) KA_I,8.23-10.3 Ro_I,35-39 asti aprayuktaḥ . santi vai śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:126_0: aprayuktāḥ . tat yathā ūṣa tera cakra peca iti . kim ataḥ yat santi aprayuktāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:126_1: prayogāt hi bhavān śabdānām sādhutvam adhyavasyati . ye idānīm aprayuktāḥ na amī
GS24pmbhasuu:126_2: sādhavaḥ syuḥ . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate santi vai śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:126_3: yadi santi na aprayuktāḥ . atha aprayuktāḥ na santi . santi ca aprayuktāḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:127_0: prayuñjānaḥ eva khalu bhavān āha santi śabdāḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:127_1: bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ śabdānām prayoge sādhuḥ syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:127_2: iti tāvat brūmaḥ yat etān śāstravidaḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . aprayuktāḥ iti brūmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:127_3: yat loke aprayuktāḥ iti . yat api ucyate kaḥ ca idānīm anyaḥ bhavajjātīyakaḥ puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:127_4: śabdānām prayoge sādhuḥ syāt iti . na brūmaḥ asmābhiḥ aprayuktāḥ iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:127_5: . loke aprayuktāḥ iti . nanu ca bhavān api abhyantaraḥ loke . abhyantaraḥ aham loke
GS24pmbhasuu:127_6: na tu aham lokaḥ . asti aprayuktaḥ iti cet na arthe śabdaprayogāt . asti aprayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:127_7: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . arthe śabdaprayogāt . arthe śabdāḥ prayujyante . santi
GS24pmbhasuu:127_8: ca eṣām śabdānām arthāḥ yeṣu artheṣu prayujyante . aprayogaḥ prayogānyatvāt . aprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:127_9: khalu eṣāṃ śabdānām nyāyyaḥ . kutaḥ . prayogānyatvāt . yat eteṣām śabdānām arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:128: prayuñjate . tat yathā . ūṣa iti etasya śabdasya arthe kva yūyam uṣitāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:129: tera iti asya arthe kim yūyam tīrṇāḥ . cakra iti asya arthe kim yūyam
GS24pmbhasuu:130: kṛtavantaḥ . peca iti asya arthe kim yūyam pakvavantaḥ iti . aprayukte dīrghasattravat . yadi api aprayuktāḥ avaśyam dīrghasattravat lakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:131: anuvidheyāḥ . tat yathā . dīrghasattrāṇi vārṣaśatikāni vārṣasahasrikāṇi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:132: . na ca adyatve kaḥ cit api vyavaharati . kevalam ṛṣisampradāyaḥ dharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:133_0: iti kṛtvā yājñikāḥ śāstreṇa anuvidadhate . sarve deśāntare . sarve khalu api ete
GS24pmbhasuu:133_1: śabdāḥ deśāntare prayujyante . na ca ete upalabhyante . upalabdhau yatnaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:133_2: . mahān hi śabdasya prayogaviṣayaḥ . saptadvīpā vasumatī trayaḥ lokāḥ catvāraḥ vedāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:134_0: adhvaryuśākhāḥ sahasravartmā sāmavedaḥ ekaviṃsatidhā bāhvṛcyam navadhā ātharvaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:134_1: vedaḥ vākovākyam itihāsaḥ purāṇam vaidyakam iti etāvān śabdasya prayogaviṣayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:134_2: etāvantam śabdasya prayogaviṣayam ananuniśamya santi aprayuktāḥ iti vacanam kevalam
GS24pmbhasuu:135: prayogaviṣaye te te śabdāḥ tatra tatra niyataviṣayāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā . śavatiḥ gatikarmā kambojeṣu eva bhāṣitaḥ bhavati . vikāre enam āryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:136: bhāṣante śavaḥ iti . hammatiḥ surāṣṭreṣu raṃhatiḥ prācyamadhyeṣu gamim eva
GS24pmbhasuu:137: tu āryāḥ prayuñjate . dātiḥ lavanārthe prācyeṣu dātram udīcyeṣu . ye ca api ete bhavataḥ aprayuktāḥ abhimatāḥ śabdāḥ eteṣām api prayogaḥ dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:138: kva . vede . yat vaḥ revatīḥ revatyam tat ūṣa . yat me naraḥ śrutyam brahma cakra . yatra naḥ cakra jarasam tanunām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:139_0: (Pas_13) KA_I,10.4-11.14 Ro_I,39-42 kim punaḥ śabdasya jñāne dharmaḥ āhosvit prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:139_1: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ . jñāne dharmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:139_2: cet tathā adharmaḥ prāpnoti . yaḥ hi śabdān
GS24pmbhasuu:140: jānāti apaśabdān api asau jānāti . yathā eva śabdajñāne dharmaḥ evam apaśabdajñāne api adharmaḥ . atha vā bhūyān adharmaḥ prāpnoti .bhūyāṃsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:141: apaśabdāḥ alpīyāṃsaḥ śabdāḥ . ekaikasya śabdasya bahavaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ . tat yathā . gauḥ iti asya gāvī goṇī gotā gopotalikā iti evamādayaḥ apabhraṃśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:142: . ācāre niyamaḥ . ācāre punaḥ ṛṣiḥ niyamam vedayate . te asurāḥ helayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:143_0: helayaḥ iti kurvantaḥ parābabhūvuḥ iti . astu tarhi prayoge . prayoge sarvalokasya
GS24pmbhasuu:143_1: . yadi prayoge dharmaḥ sarvaḥ lokaḥ abhyudayena yujyeta . kaḥ ca idānīm bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:143_2: matsaraḥ yadi sarvaḥ lokaḥ abhyudayena yujyeta . na khalu kaḥ cit matsaraḥ . prayatnānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:144: prayatnena bhavitavyam na ca prayatnaḥ phalāt vyatirecyaḥ . nanu ca ye
GS24pmbhasuu:145: kṛtaprayatnāḥ te sādhīyaḥ śabdān prayokṣyante . te eva sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:146_0: abhyudayena yokṣyante . vyatirekaḥ api vai lakṣyate . dṛśyante hi kṛtaprayatnāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:146_1: apravīṇāḥ akṛtaprayatnāḥ ca pravīṇāḥ . tatra phalavyatirekaḥ api syāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:146_2: na api jñāne eva dharmaḥ na api
GS24pmbhasuu:147: prayoge eva . kim tarhi śāstrapūrvake prayoge abhyudayaḥ tat tulyam vedaśabdena . śāstrapūrvakam yaḥ śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:148_0: . tat tulyam vedaśabdena . vedaśabdāḥ api evam abhivadanti . yaḥ agniṣṭomena yajate
GS24pmbhasuu:148_1: yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . yaḥ agnim nāciketam cinute yaḥ u ca enam evam veda . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:148_2: āha : tat tulyam vedaśabdena iti . yathā vedaśabdāḥ niyamapūrvam adhītāḥ phalavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:148_3: bhavanti evam yaḥ śāstrapūrvakam śabdān prayuṅkte saḥ abhyudayena yujyate iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:148_4: vā punaḥ astu jñāne eva dharmaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam jñāne dharmaḥ iti cet tathā adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:148_5: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabdapramāṇakāḥ vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:148_6: . śabdaḥ ca śabdajñāne dharmam āha na
GS24pmbhasuu:149: apaśabdajñāne adharmam . yat ca punaḥ aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na abhyudayāya . tat yathā . hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni na eva
GS24pmbhasuu:150: doṣāya bhavanti na api abhyudayāya . atha vā abhyupāyaḥ eva apaśabdajñānam śabdajñāne . yaḥ apaśabdān jānāti śabdān api asau jānāti . tat evam jñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:151_0: dharmaḥ iti bruvataḥ arthāt āpannam bhavati apaśabdajñānapūrvake śabdajñāne dharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:151_1: iti . atha vā kūpakhānakavat etat bhavati . tat yathā kūpakhānakaḥ khanan yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:151_2: mṛdā pāṃsubhiḥ ca avakīrṇaḥ bhavati saḥ apsu sañjātāsu tataḥ eva tam guṇam āsādayati
GS24pmbhasuu:151_3: yena saḥ ca doṣaḥ nirhaṇyate bhūyasā ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhavati evam iha api yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:151_4: api apaśabdajñāne adharmaḥ tathā api yaḥ tu asau śabdajñāne dharmaḥ tena saḥ ca doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:152: nirghāniṣyate bhūyasā ca abhyudayena yogaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:153_0: ācāre niyamaḥ iti yājñe karmaṇi saḥ niyamaḥ . evam hi śrūyate . yarvāṇaḥ tarvāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:153_1: nāma ṛṣayaḥ babhūvuḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇaḥ parāparajñāḥ viditaveditavyāḥ adhigatayāthātathyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:153_2: . te tatrabhavantaḥ yat vā naḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:154: vā naḥ iti proyoktavye yar vā ṇaḥ tar vā ṇaḥ iti prayuñjate yājñe punaḥ karmaṇi na apabhāṣante . taiḥ punaḥ asuraiḥ yājñe karmaṇi apabhāṣitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:156_0: (Pas_14) KA_I,11.14-12.27 Ro_I,42-47 atha vyākaraṇam iti asya śabdasya kaḥ padārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:156_1: . sūtram . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ anupapannaḥ . sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:156_2: na upapadyate vyākaraṇasya sūtram iti . kim hi tat
GS24pmbhasuu:157: anyat sūtrāt vyākaraṇam yasya adaḥ sūtram syāt . śabdāpratipattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:158: śabdānām ca apratipattiḥ prāpnoti vyākaraṇāt śabdān pratipadyāmahe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:159: na hi sūtrataḥ eva śabdān pratipadyante . kim tarhi . vyākhyānataḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:160_0: nanu ca tat eva sūtram vigṛhītam vyākhyānam bhavati . na kevalāni carcāpadāni vyākhyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:160_1: vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . kim tarhi . udāharaṇam pratyudāharaṇam vākyādhyāhāraḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:161_0: evam tarhi śabdaḥ . śabde lyuḍarthaḥ . yadi śabdaḥ vyākaraṇam lyuḍarthaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:161_1: vyākriyate anena iti vyākaraṇam . na hi śabdena kim cit vyākriyate . kena tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:161_2: sūtreṇa . bhave . bhave ca taddhitaḥ na upapadyate vyākaraṇe bhavaḥ yogaḥ vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:161_3: iti . na hi śabde bhavaḥ yogaḥ . kva tarhi . sūtre . proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ . proktādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:161_4: ca taddhitāḥ na upapadyante pāṇininā proktam pāṇinīyam , āpiśalam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:162: kāśakṛtsnam iti . na hi pāṇininā śabdāḥ proktāḥ . kim tarhi . sūtram .
GS24pmbhasuu:163: kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate bhave proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti na proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti eva bhave api taddhitaḥ coditaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:164_0: purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam bhave taddhitaḥ iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:164_1: idam dṛṣṭam proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti tat api paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:164_2: sūtrāṇi kṛtvā nivartayanti . ayam tāvat adoṣaḥ yat ucyate śabde lyuḍarthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:164_3: na avaśyam karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ eva lyuṭ vidhīyate kim tarhi anyeṣu api kārakeṣu kṛtyalyuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:164_4: bahulam iti . tat yathā praskandanam prapatanam iti . atha vā śabdaiḥ api śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:165: . tat yathā gauḥ iti ukte sarve sandehāḥ nivartante na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:166: iti . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ bhave proktādayaḥ ca taddhitāḥ iti . evam tarhi lakṣyalakṣaṇe vyākaraṇam . lakṣyam ca lakṣaṇam ca etat samuditam
GS24pmbhasuu:167: vyākaraṇam bhavati . kim punaḥ lakṣyam lakṣaṇam ca . śabdaḥ lakṣyam sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:168_0: lakṣaṇam . evam api ayam doṣaḥ samudāye vyākaraṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayave na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:168_1: . sūtrāṇi ca adhīyānaḥ iṣyate vaiyākaraṇaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyeṣu hi śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:168_2: pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante . tat yathā pūrve pañcālāḥ , uttare pañcālāḥ , tailam
GS24pmbhasuu:169_0: śuklaḥ , nīlaḥ , kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam samudāye vyākaraṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayave
GS24pmbhasuu:169_1: api vartate . atha vā punaḥ astu sūtram . nanu ca uktam sūtre vyākaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:170_0: vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate śabdāpratipattiḥ iti na hi sūtrataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:170_1: eva śabdān pratipadyante kim tarhi vyākhyānataḥ ca iti parihṛtam etat tat eva sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:170_2: vigṛhītam vyākhyānam bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam na kevalāni carcāpadāni vyākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:170_3: vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti kim tarhi udāharaṇam pratyudāharaṇam vākyādhyāhāraḥ iti etat samuditam
GS24pmbhasuu:171: avijānataḥ etat evam bhavati . sūtrataḥ eva hi śabdān pratipadyante . ātaḥ ca sūtrataḥ eva yaḥ hi utsūtram kathayet na adaḥ gṛhyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:172: (Pas_15) KA_I,13.1-14.22 Ro_I,47-53 atha kimarthaḥ varṇānām upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:174_0: kartavyaḥ . kim idam vṛttisamavayārthaḥ iti . vṛttaye samavāyaḥ vṛttisamavāyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:174_1: vṛttyarthaḥ vā samavāyaḥ vṛttisamavāyaḥ , vṛttiprayojanaḥ vā vṛttisamavayaḥ . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:174_2: punaḥ vṛttiḥ . śāstrapravṛttiḥ . atha kaḥ samavayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:175: . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa sanniveśaḥ . atha kaḥ upadeśaḥ . uccāraṇam . kutaḥ etat . diśiḥ uccāraṇakriyaḥ . uccārya hi varṇān āha : upadiṣṭāḥ ime varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:176_0: iti . anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca . anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca varṇānām upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:176_1: . anubandhān āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na hi anupadiśya varṇān anubandhāḥ śakyāḥ āsaṅktum
GS24pmbhasuu:176_2: . saḥ eṣaḥ varṇānām upadeśaḥ vṛttisamavāyārthaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:177: anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca . vṛttisamavāyaḥ ca anubandhakaraṇārthaḥ ca pratyāhārārtham . pratyāhāraḥ vṛttyarthaḥ . iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:178: iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca varṇānām upadeśaḥ . iṣṭān varṇān bhotsye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:179: iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca iti cet udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikdīrghaplutānām api upadeśaḥ . iṣṭabuddhyarthaḥ ca iti cet udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikdīrghaplutānām api upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:180_0: evaṅguṇāḥ api hi varṇāḥ iṣyante . ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham . ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:180_1: . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sarvam avarṇakulam grahīṣyati . tathā ivarṇakulākṛtiḥ . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:180_2: uvarṇakulākṛtiḥ . ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham iti cet saṃvṛtādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . ākṛtyupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:180_3: siddham iti cet saṃvṛtādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ saṃvṛtādayaḥ . saṃvṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:181_0: eṇīkṛtaḥ ambūkṛtaḥ ardhakaḥ grastaḥ nirastaḥ pragītaḥ upagītaḥ kṣviṇṇaḥ romaśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:181_1: . aparaḥ āha : grastam nirastam avilambitam nirhatam ambūkṛtam dhmātam atho vikampitam
GS24pmbhasuu:181_2: sandaṣṭam eṇīkṛtam ardhakam drutam vikīrṇam etāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:182: svaradoṣabhāvanāḥ iti . ataḥ anye vyañjanadoṣāḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:183_0: gargādibidādipāṭhāt saṃvṛtādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat gargādibidādipāṭhe
GS24pmbhasuu:183_1: prayojanam . kim . samudāyānām sādhutvam yathā syāt iti . evam tarhi aṣṭādaśadhā
GS24pmbhasuu:183_2: bhinnām nivṛttakalādikām avarṇasya pratyāpattim vakṣyāmi . sā tarhi vaktavyā . liṅgārthā
GS24pmbhasuu:183_3: tu pratyāpattiḥ . liṅgārtha sā tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:184_0: etarhi anubandhaśatam na uccāryam itsañjñā ca na vaktavyā lopaḥ ca na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:184_1: yat anubandhaiḥ kriyate tat kalādibhiḥ kariṣyati . sidhyati evam apāṇinīyam tu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:184_2: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:185: ākṛtyupadeśāt siddham iti cet saṃvṛtādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ iti .parihṛtam etat gargādibidādipāṭhāt saṃvṛtādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:186: gargādibidādipāṭhe prayojanam uktam . kim . samudāyānām sādhutvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:187: syāt iti . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate kalādayaḥ ca nivartyante . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:188: labhyam iti āha . katham . dvigatāḥ api hetavaḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:189_0: āmrāḥ ca siktāḥ pitaraḥ ca prīṇitāḥ iti . tathā vākyāni api ḍviṣṭhāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:189_1: śvetaḥ dhāvati , alambusānām yātā iti . atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . kve
GS24pmbhasuu:189_2: ime saṃvṛtādayaḥ śrūyeran iti . āgameṣu . āgamāḥ śuddhāḥ paṭhyante . vikāreṣu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:189_3: . vikārāḥ śuddhāḥ paṭhyante . pratyayeṣu tarhi . pratyayāḥ śuddhāḥ paṭhyante . dhātuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:190: paṭhyante . prātipadikeṣu tarhi . prātipadikāni api śuddhāni paṭhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:191: yāni tarhi agrahaṇāni prātipadikāni . eteṣām api svaravarṇānupūrvījñānārthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . śaśaḥ ṣaṣaḥ iti mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:192: palāśaḥ palāṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . mañcakaḥ mañjakaḥ iti mā bhūt . āgamāḥ ca vikārāḥ ca pratyayāḥ saha dhātubhiḥ uccāryante tataḥ teṣu na ime prāptāḥ kalādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:193: (Śs_1.1) KA_I,15.2-16.18 Ro_I,54-60 akārasya vivṛtopadeśaḥ ākāragrahaṇārthaḥ . akārasya vivṛtopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:194: ākāragrahaṇārthaḥ . akāraḥ savarṇagragaṇena ākāram api yathā gṛhṇīyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:195: kim ca kāraṇam na gṛhṇīyāt . vivārabhedāt . kim ucyate vivārabhedāt iti na punaḥ kālabhedād api . yathā eva hi vivārabhinnaḥ evam kālabhinnaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:196: satyam etat . vakṣyati tulyāsyaprayatnam savarṇam iti atra āsyagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:197_0: prayojanam āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ prayatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñakāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:197_1: . bāhyaḥ ca punaḥ āsyāt kālaḥ . tena syāt eva kālabhinnasya grahaṇam na punaḥ vivārabhinnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:197_2: . kim punaḥ idam vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyate āhosvit saṃvṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:197_3: upadiśyamānasya vivṛtopadeśaḥ codyate . vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:198_0: . katham jñāyate . yat ayam a* a iti akārasya vivṛtasya saṃvṛtatāpratyāpattim śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:198_1: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . atikhaṭvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:198_2: , atimālaḥ iti atra āntaryataḥ vivṛtasya vivṛtaḥ prāpnoti . saṃvṛtaḥ syāt iti evamarthā
GS24pmbhasuu:198_3: pratyāpattiḥ . na etat asti . na eva loke na ca vede akāro vivṛtaḥ asti . kaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:199_0: saṃvṛtaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati . tat etat pratyāpattivacanam jñāpakam eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:199_1: vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyate iti . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ vivṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:199_2: upadiśyamānasya prayojanam anvākhyāyeta saṃvṛtasya upadiśyamānasya vā vivṛtopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:199_3: codyeta iti . na khalu kaḥ cid viśeṣaḥ . āhopuruṣikāmātram tu bhavān āha saṃvṛtasya
GS24pmbhasuu:200_0: vivṛtopadeśaḥ codyate iti . vayam tu brūmaḥ vivṛtasya upadiśyamānasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:200_1: anvākhyāyate iti. tasya vivṛtopadeśāt anyatra api vivṛtopadeśaḥ savarṇagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:200_2: . tasya etasya ākṣarasamāmnāyikasya vivṛtopadeśāt anyatra api vivṛtopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:202: savarṇagrahaṇārthaḥ . ākṣarasamāmnāyikena asya grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . vivārabhedāt eva . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:203_0: ākṣarasamāmnāyikena dhātvādisthasya grahaṇam iti yat ayam akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:203_1: pratyāhāre akaḥ grahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi dvayoḥ ākṣarasamāmnāyikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:203_2: yugapat samavasthānam asti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:204_0: jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim. yasya ākṣarasamāmnāyikena
GS24pmbhasuu:204_1: grahaṇam asti tadartham etat syāt . khaṭvāḍhakam mālāḍhakam iti . sati prayojane
GS24pmbhasuu:204_2: na jñāpakam bhavati . tasmāt vivṛtopadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate vivṛtopadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:204_3: nāma . vivṛtaḥ vā upadiśyeta saṃvṛtaḥ vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . saḥ eṣaḥ sarvaḥ evamarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:204_4: yatnaḥ yāni etāni prātipadikāni agrahaṇāni teṣām etena abhyupāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:205: upadeśaḥ codyate . tat guru bhavati . tasmāt vaktavyam dhātvādisthaḥ ca vivṛtaḥ iti . dīrghaplutavacane ca saṃvṛtanivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:207_0: dīrghaplutau saṃvṛtau mā bhūtām iti . vṛkṣābhyām devadattā iti . na eva loke na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:207_1: vede dīrghaplutau saṃvṛtau staḥ . kau tarhi . vivṛtau . yau staḥ tau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:207_2: . sthānī prakalpayet etau anusvāraḥ yathā yaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:208: saṃvṛtaḥ sthānī saṃvṛtau dīrghaplutau prakalpayet anusvāraḥ yathā yaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:209_0: tat yathā sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ yalṃ lokam talṃ lokam iti . ansvāraḥ sthānī yaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:209_1: anunāsikam prakalpayati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam yat sataḥ tatra prakḷptiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:209_2: . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca . dīrghaplutau punaḥ na eva loke na
GS24pmbhasuu:209_3: ca veda saṃvṛtau staḥ . kau tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:210_0: vivṛtau . yau staḥ tau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api kutaḥ etat tulyasthānau prayatnabhinnau
GS24pmbhasuu:210_1: bhaviṣyataḥ na punaḥ tulyaprayatnau sthānabhinnau syātām īkāraḥ ūkāraḥ vā iti . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:210_2: sthāne antaratamaḥ iti atra sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānegrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:211: tatra sthānataḥ eva āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:212_0: (Śs_1.2) KA_I,16.19-19.8 Ro_I,60-69 tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇāgrahaṇam anaṇtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:212_1: . tatra anuvṛttinirdeśe savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti . asya cvau yasya īti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:212_2: . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . na hi ete
GS24pmbhasuu:213_0: aṇaḥ ye anuvṛttau . ke tarhi . ye akṣarasamāmnaye upadiśyante . ekatvāt akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:213_1: siddham . ekaḥ ayam akāraḥ yaḥ ca akṣarasamāmnaye yaḥ ca anuvṛttau yaḥ ca dhātvādisthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:213_2: . anubandhasaṅkaraḥ tu . anubandhasaṅkaraḥ tu prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ , ātaḥ anupasarge
GS24pmbhasuu:213_3: kaḥ iti ke api ṇitkṛtam prāpnoti . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca anupapattiḥ . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:213_4: ca anupapattiḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . kiriṇā giriṇā iti atra ekājlakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:213_5: antodāttatvam prāpnoti . iha ca ghaṭena tarati ghaṭika iti
GS24pmbhasuu:214_0: dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ṭhan na prāpnoti . dravyavat ca upacārāḥ . dravyavat ca upacārāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:214_1: . tat yathā . dravyeṣu na ekena ghaṭena anekaḥ yugapat kāryam karoti . evam imam
GS24pmbhasuu:215_0: viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakāraṇāt siddham . yat ayam viṣaye viṣaye nānāliṅgam akāram karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:215_1: karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti tena jñāyate nānubandhasaṅkaraḥ asti iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:215_2: hi syāt nānāliṅgakaraṇam anarthakam syāt . ekam eva ayam sarvaguṇam uccārayet . na
GS24pmbhasuu:215_3: etat asti jñapakam itsañjñāprakḷptyartham etat syāt . na hi ayam anubandhaiḥ śalyakavat
GS24pmbhasuu:215_4: śakyaḥ upacetum . itsañjñayām hi doṣaḥ syāt . āyamya hi dvayoḥ itsañjñā syāt . kayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:215_5: . ādyantayoḥ . evam tarhi viṣayeṇa tu punaḥ liṅgakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:216_0: siddham . yat ayam viṣaye viṣaye punaḥ liṅgam akāram karoti prāk dīvyataḥ aṇ , śivādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:216_1: aṇ iti tena jñāyate na anubandhasaṅkaraḥ asti iti . yadi hi syāt punaḥ liṅgakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:216_2: anarthakam syāt . atha vā punaḥ astu viṣayeṇa tu nānāliṅgakāraṇāt siddham iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:216_3: . nanu ca uktam itsañjñāprakḷptyartham etat syāt iti . na eṣa doṣaḥ . lokataḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:216_4: siddham . tat yathā : loke kaḥ cit devadattam āha : iha muṇḍo bhava , iha jaṭī bhava
GS24pmbhasuu:217: iti . yalliṅgaḥ yatra ucyate talliṅgaḥ tatra upatiṣṭhate . evam akāraḥ yalliṅgaḥ yatra ucyate talliṅgaḥ tatra upasthāsyate . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:218_0: ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca anupapattiḥ iti . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca āvṛttisaṅkhyānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:218_1: . ekājanekājgrahaṇeṣu ca āvṛtteḥ saṅkhyānāt anekāctvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā saptadaśa
GS24pmbhasuu:218_2: sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti iti triḥ prathamam anvāha triḥ uttamam iti āvṛttitaḥ saptadaśatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:219_0: āvṛttitaḥ anekāctvam bhaviṣyati . bhaved āvṛttitaḥ kāryam parihṛtam . iha tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:219_1: kiriṇā giriṇā iti ekājlakṣaṇam antodāttatvam prāpnoti eva . etat api siddham . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:219_2: . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke ṛṣisahasram ekām kapilām
GS24pmbhasuu:220: ekaikaśaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ dattvā tayā sarve te sahasradakṣiṇaḥ saṃpannāḥ evam iha api anekāctvam bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate dravyavat ca upacārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:221: prāpnuvanti iti . bhavet yat asambhavi kāryam tat na anekaḥ yugapat kuryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:222_0: . yat tu khalu sambhavi kāryam anekaḥ api tat yugapat karoti . tat yathā ghaṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:222_1: darśanam sparśanam vā . sambhavi ca idam kāryam akārasya uccāraṇam nāma anekaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:222_2: tat yugapat kariṣyati . ānyabhāvyam tu kālaśabdavyavāyāt . ānyabhāvyam tu akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:222_3: . kutaḥ . kālaśabdavyavāyāt kālavyavāyāt śabdavyavāyāt ca . kālavyāvāyāt : daṇḍa
GS24pmbhasuu:223: śabdavyavāyāt : daṇḍaḥ . na ca ekasya ātmanaḥ vyavāyena bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:224_0: bhavati cet bhavati ānyabhāvyam akārasya . yugapat ca deśapṛthaktvadarśanāt . yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:224_1: ca deśapṛthaktvadarśanāt manyāmahe ānyabhāvyam akārasya iti . yat ayam yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:225_0: aśvaḥ , arkaḥ , arthaḥ iti . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne ca bhavati mathurāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:225_1: ca . yadi punaḥ ime varṇāḥ śakunivat syuḥ . tat yathā śakunayaḥ āśugamitvāt purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:225_2: utpatitāḥ paścāt dṛśyante evam ayam akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:226_0: da iti atra dṛṣṭaḥ ṇḍa iti atra dṛśyate . na evam śakyam . anityatvam evam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:226_1: nityāḥ ca śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:226_2: anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ . yadi ca ayam da iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:227: dṛṣṭaḥ ṇḍa iti atra dṛśyeta na ayam kūṭasthaḥ syāt . yadi punaḥ ime varṇāḥ ādityavat syuḥ . tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇsthaḥ yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:228_0: deśapṛthaktveṣu upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham
GS24pmbhasuu:228_1: yugapat deśapṛthaktveṣu upalabhate . akāram punaḥ upalabhate . akāram api na upalabhate
GS24pmbhasuu:228_2: . kim kāraṇam . śrotropalabdhiḥ buddhinirgrāhyaḥ prayogeṇa abhijvalitaḥ ākāśadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:229: ākāśadeśāḥ api bahavaḥ . yāvatā bahavaḥ tasmāt ānyabhāvyam akārasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:230_0: ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham . avarṇākṛtiḥ upadiṣṭā sarvam avarṇakulam grahīṣyati . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:230_1: ivarṇākṛtiḥ . tathā uvarṇākṛtiḥ . tadvat ca taparakaraṇam . evam ca kṛtvā taparāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:230_2: kriyante . ākṛtigrahaṇena atiprasaktam iti . nanu ca savarṇagrahaṇena atiprasaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:230_3: iti kṛtvā taparāḥ kriyeran . pratyākhyāyate tat : savarṇe aṇgrahaṇam aparibhāṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:231: halgrahaṇeṣu ca . kim . ākṛtigrahaṇāt siddham iti eva . jhalo jhali :
GS24pmbhasuu:232: avāttām avāttam avātta yatra etat na asti : aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:233: rūpasāmanyāt vā . rūpasāmānyāt vā siddham . tat yathā : tān eva śāṭakān
GS24pmbhasuu:234: ācchādayāmaḥ ye mathurāyām , tān eva śālīn bhuñjmahe ye magadheṣu , tat eva idam bhavataḥ kārṣāpaṇam yat mathurāyām gṛhītam . anyasmin ca anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:235: ca rūpasāmānyāt tat eva idam iti bhavati . evam iha api rūpasāmānyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:236_0: (Śs_2) KA_I,19.10-21.28 Ro_I,70-79 ḷkāropadeśaḥ kimarthaḥ . kim viśeṣeṇa ḷkāropadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:236_1: codyate na punaḥ anyeṣām api varṇānām upadeśaḥ codyate . yadi kim cit anyeṣām api
GS24pmbhasuu:237_0: ḷkāropadeśasya api tat bhavitum arhati . kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . asya
GS24pmbhasuu:237_1: hi ḷkārasya alpīyān ca eva prayogaviṣayaḥ yaḥ ca api prayogaviṣayaḥ saḥ api kḷpisthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:237_2: . kḷpeḥ ca latvam asiddham . tasya asiddhatvāt ṛkārasya eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:237_3: . na arthaḥ ḷkāropadeśena ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : ḷkāropadeśaḥ yadṛcchāśaktijānukaraṇaplutyādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:237_4: . ḷkāropadeśaḥ kriyate yadṛcchāśabdārthaḥ aśaktijānukaraṇārthaḥ plutyādyarthaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:237_5: . yadṛcchāśabdārthaḥ tāvat . yadṛcchayā kaḥ cit ḷtakaḥ nāma tasmin ackāryāṇi yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:237_6: syuḥ . dadhi ḷtaka dehi . madhu ḷtaka dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:238: udaṅ ḷtakaḥ agamat . pratyaṅ ḷtakaḥ agamat . catuṣṭayī śabdānām pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_0: aśaktijānukaraṇārthaḥ . aśaktyā kayā cit brāhmaṇyā ṛtakaḥ iti prayoktavye ḷtakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:240_1: iti prayuktam . tasya anukaraṇam : brāhmaṇī ḷtakaḥ iti āha . kumārī ḷtakaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:240_2: iti . plutādyarthaḥ ca ḷkāropadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ke punaḥ plutādayaḥ . plutidvirvacanasvaritāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:241: plutyādiṣu kāryeṣu kḷpeḥ latvam siddham . tasya siddhatvāt ackāryāṇi na sidhyanti . tasmāt ḷkāropadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:242: nyāyyabhāvāt kalpanam sañjñādiṣu . nyāyyasya ṛtakaśabdasya bhāvāt kalpanam sañjñādiṣu sādhu manyante . ṛtakaḥ eva asau na ḷtakaḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:243: nyāyyaḥ ṛtakaśabdaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ asti . saḥ kalpayitavyaḥ sādhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:244: sañjñādiṣu . ṛtakaḥ eva asau na ḷtakaḥ . ayam tarhi yadṛcchāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:245: aparihāryaḥ . ḷphiḍaḥ ḷphiḍḍaḥ . eṣaḥ api ṛphiḍaḥ ṛphiḍḍaḥ ca . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:246: artipravṛttiḥ ca eva loke lakṣyate phiḍiphiḍḍau auṇādikau pratyayau .
GS24pmbhasuu:247: trayī ca śabdānām pravṛttiḥ . jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ kriyāśabdāḥ iti . na santi yadṛcchāśabdāḥ . anyathā kṛtvā prayojanam uktam anyathā kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:248: parihāraḥ . santi yadṛcchāśabdāḥ iti kṛtvā prayojanam uktam . na santi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:249: parihāraḥ . samāne ca arthe śāstrānvitaḥ aśāstrānvitasya nivartakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:250_0: bhavati . tat yathā . devadattaśabdaḥ devadiṇṇaśabdaṃ nivartayati na gāvyādīn . na
GS24pmbhasuu:250_1: eṣa doṣaḥ . pakṣāntaraiḥ api parihārāḥ bhavanti . anukaraṇam śiṣṭāśiṣṭāpratiṣiddheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:251_0: sādhu bhavati . aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddhasya vā na eva tat doṣāya bhavati na abhyudayāya
GS24pmbhasuu:251_1: . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:251_2: yaḥ evam asau dadāti yaḥ evam asau yajate yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:252: evam asau adhīte iti tasya anukurvan dadyāt ca yajeta ca adhīyīta ca saḥ abhyudayena yujyate . vede api : ye evam viśvasṛjaḥ sattrāṇi adhyāsate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:253: teṣām anukurvan tadvat sattrāṇi adhyāsīta saḥ api abhyudayena yujyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:254_0: aśiṣṭāpratiṣiddham . yaḥ evam asau hikkati yaḥ evam asau hasati yaḥ evam asau kaṇḍūyati
GS24pmbhasuu:254_1: iti tasya anukurvan hikket ca haset ca kaṇḍūyet ca na eva tat doṣāya syāt na abhyudayāya
GS24pmbhasuu:254_2: . yaḥ tu khalu evam asau brāhmaṇam hanti evam asau surām pibati iti tasya anukurvan
GS24pmbhasuu:254_3: brāhmaṇam hanyāt surām vā pibet saḥ api manye patitaḥ syāt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:254_4: yaḥ ca evam hanti yaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:255_0: anuhanti ubhau tau hataḥ . yaḥ ca pibati yaḥ ca anupibati ubhau tau pibataḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_1: tu khalu evam asau brāhmaṇam hanti evam asau surām pibati iti tasya anukurvan snātānuliptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_2: mālyaguṇakaṇṭhaḥ kadalīstambham chindyāt payaḥ vā pibet na sa manye patitaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:255_3: iha api yaḥ evam asau apaśabdam prayuṅkte iti tasya anukurvan apaśabdam prayuñjīta
GS24pmbhasuu:255_4: saḥ api apaśabdabhāk syāt . ayam tu anyaḥ apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_5: kartavyaḥ . na ca apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ apaśabdaḥ bhavati . avaśyam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:255_6: evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyeta apaśabdapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ apaśabdaḥ bhavati iti apaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:255_7: iti eva tasya apaśabdaḥ syāt . na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:256: apaśabdaḥ . ayam khalu api bhūyaḥ anukaraṇaśabdaḥ aparihāryaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . sādhu ḷkāram adhīte . madhu ḷkāram adhīte iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:257_0: kvasthasya punaḥ etat anukaraṇam . kḷpisthasya . yadi kḷpisthasya kḷpeḥ ca latvam
GS24pmbhasuu:257_1: asiddham tasya asiddhatvāt ṛkāre eva ackāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . bhavet tadarthena na
GS24pmbhasuu:257_2: arthaḥ syāt . ayam tu anyaḥ kḷpisthapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ yadarthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:258: prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti . kim prayojanam . dviḥ pacantu iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:259: . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . agnī iti āha . īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iti pragṛhyasañjñā yathā syāt . yadi prakṛtivat anukaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:260: bhavati iti ucyate apaśabdaḥ eva asau bhavati kumārīḷtakaḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:261: brahmaṇī ḷtakaḥ iti āha . apaśabdaḥ hi asya prakṛtiḥ . na cāpaśabdaḥ prakṛtiḥ . na hi apaśabdāḥ upadiśyante . na ca anupadiṣṭā prakṛtiḥ asti.
GS24pmbhasuu:262: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt plutyādayaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:263: iti plutyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yadi ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti ucyate rājñaḥ ka ca rājakīyam allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:264_0: ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya iti vakṣyāmi . yadi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:264_1: iti ucyate kḷptaśikha iti plutaḥ na prāpnoti . na hi atra ṛkāraḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:264_2: . kaḥ tarhi . rephaḥ . ṛkāraḥ api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:265: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kṛpa uḥ raḥ laḥ kṛpo ro
GS24pmbhasuu:266: laḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam . rājñaḥ ka ca
GS24pmbhasuu:267_0: rājakīyam allopaḥ anaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti iti . vakṣyati etat . śvādīnām prasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:267_1: nakārāntagrahaṇam anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:267_2: . allopaḥ anaḥ nakārāntasya iti . iha tarhi kḷptaśikha iti anṛtaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:268_0: ravatpratiṣedhāt ca etat sidhyati . guroḥ aravataḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aravataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:268_1: ucyate hotṛ-ṛkāra , hotṝṛkāra , atra na prāpnoti . guroḥ aravataḥ hrasvasya iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:268_2: . saḥ eṣaḥ sūtrabhedena ḷkāraḥ plutyādyarthaḥ san pratyākhyāyate . sā eṣā mahataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:269: (Śs_3-4.1) KA_I,22.2-23.23 Ro_I,79-84 idam vicāryate . imāni sandhyakṣarāṇi taparāṇi vā upadiśyeran . et , ot , ṅ . ait , aut , c iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:270: ataparāṇi vā yathānyāsam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ cet taparoccāraṇam . sandhyakṣareṣu taparopadeśaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:271: taparoccāraṇam kartavyam . plutyādiṣu ajvidhiḥ . plutyādiṣu ajāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati . gotrāta nautrāta iti atra anaci ca iti acaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:272_0: yaraḥ dve bhavataḥ iti dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . iha ca pratyaṅ aitikayana udaṅ aupagava
GS24pmbhasuu:272_1: iti aci iti ṅamuṭ na prāpnoti . plutasañjñā ca . plutasañjñā ca na sidhyati . aitikayana
GS24pmbhasuu:272_2: aupagava . ūkalaḥ ac hrasvadīrghaplutaḥ iti plutasañjñā na prāpnoti . santu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:273_0: hrasvādeśe . yadi ataparāṇi ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:273_1: hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti . nanu ca yasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:273_2: taparāṇi tena api etat vaktavyam . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau mātrā avarṇasya mātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:273_3: ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvādeśaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:273_4: . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti . pratyākhyāyate etat : aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:274_0: . yadi pratyākhyānapakṣaḥ idam api pratyākhyāyate : siddham eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:274_1: . nanu ca eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ ca . na tau staḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:274_2: hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:275_0: chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca adhīyate : sujāte
GS24pmbhasuu:275_1: eśvasūnṛte , adhvaryo odribhiḥ sutam , śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:275_2: eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva hi loke na anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:276: vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . ekādeśe dīrghagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:277: ekādeśe dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . āt guṇaḥ dīrghaḥ . vṛddhiḥ eci dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:278: iti . kim prayojanam . āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninām
GS24pmbhasuu:279: trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti. khaṭvā , indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:280: khaṭvā , udakam khaṭvodakam , khaṭvā , īṣā khaṭveṣā , khaṭvā , ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā , khaṭvā , elakā khaṭvailakā , khaṭvā , odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:281_0: khaṭvā , aitikāyanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvā , aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:281_1: dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . akaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:282: dīrghaḥ ca sa bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ iti evam nirdiṣṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:283: iha api tarhi prāpnoti . paśum , viddham , pacanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:284_0: iha tāvat paśum iti ami ekaḥ iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:284_1: karoti tasya etat prayojanam yathājātīyakaḥ pūrvaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ ubhayoḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:284_2: iti . viddham iti pūrvaḥ iti eva anuvartate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:284_3: anena samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:284_4: dīrghatvam śāsti . pacanti iti ataḥ guṇe paraḥ iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:285_0: siddhe sati yat rūpagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yathājātīyakam parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:285_1: rūpam tathājātīyakam ubhayoḥ yathā syāt iti . iha tarhi khaṭvarśyaḥ mālarśyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:285_2: dīrghavacanāt akāraḥ na ānantaryāt ekākaukārau na . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vigṛhītasya
GS24pmbhasuu:286_0: kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:286_1: iti . kva ca kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhīḥ āt aic dīrghaḥ . at eṅ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:287: kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt eva āntaryataḥ trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninam trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . tapare guṇavṛddhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:288: nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:289_0: yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:289_1: . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:289_2: dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:290: (Śs_3-4.2) KA_I,23.24-26.27 Ro_I,84-93 idam vicāryate . ye ete varṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:291: varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇāntarasamānākṛtayaḥ eteṣām avayavagrahaṇena grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . iha samudāyāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:292: upadiśyante avayavāḥ api . abhyantaraḥ ca samudāye avayavaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:293: vṛkṣaḥ pracalan saha avayavaiḥ pracalati . tatra samudāyasthasya avayavasya avayavagrahaṇena grahaṇam syāt vā na vā iti jāyate vicāraṇā .
GS24pmbhasuu:294_0: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena cet sandhyakṣre samānākṣaravidhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:294_1: . varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena iti cet sandhyakṣare samānākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:295: indram . vāyo , udakam . akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:296: dīrghe hrasvavidhipratiṣedhaḥ . dīrghe hrasvākṣarāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:297: sa pratiṣedhyaḥ . grāmaṇīḥ , ālūya , pralūya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:298: dīrghe hrasvāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam dīrghāt che tukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:299: na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:300: padāntāt vā iti vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti . yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:301: itarathā hi dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti eva brūyāt . iha tarhi khaṭvābhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:302: mālābhiḥ , ataḥ bihsaḥ ais , iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:303_0: taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi yātā vātā , ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:303_1: iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca atra api taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt eva na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:303_2: . asti hi anyat taparakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . sarvasya lopaḥ mā bhūt iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:303_3: kriyamāṇe api tapare parasya lope kṛte pūrvasya kasmāt na bhavati . paralopasya sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:303_4: asiddhatvāt ca . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:303_5: bhavati iti yat ayam ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:303_6: jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam kiti iti ākārlopaḥ yathā syāt iti . yadi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:304: kitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . parasya akārasya lope kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:305: pararūpe hi siddham rūpam syāt: godaḥ , kambaladaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ nākārasthasya akārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ kakāram anubandham
GS24pmbhasuu:306_0: karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . tundaśokayoḥ parimṛjāpanudoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:306_1: iti . yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham kakāram anubandham karoti . ekavarṇavat
GS24pmbhasuu:306_2: ca . ekavarṇavat ca dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . vācā tarati
GS24pmbhasuu:306_3: iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ṭhan mā bhūt iti . iha ca vācaḥ nimittam , tasya nimittam saṃyogotpāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:306_4: iti dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ yat mā bhūt iti . atra api gonaugrahaṇam jñāpakam dīrghāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:306_5: vidhiḥ na bhavati iti . ayam tu sarveṣām parihāraḥ : na avyapavṛktasya avayave tadvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:306_6: yathā dravyeṣu . na avyapavṛktasya avayavsya avayavāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhavati yathā dravyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:307_0: : saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ bhavanti iti na saptadaśāratnimātram kāṣṭham agnau abhyādhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:307_1: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . pratyṛcam ca eva hi tat karma codyate asambhavaḥ ca agnau vedyām
GS24pmbhasuu:307_2: ca . yathā tarhi saptadaśa prādeśamātrīḥ aśvatthīḥ samidhaḥ abhyādadhīta iti na saptadaśaprādeśamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:307_3: kāṣṭham abhyādhīyate . atra api pratipravaṇam ca etat karma codyate tulyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:308_0: asambhavaḥ agnau vedyām ca . yathā tarhi tailam na vikretavyam , māṃsam na vikretavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:308_1: iti . vyapavṛtkam ca na vikrīyate , avyapavṛktam ca gāvaḥ ca sarṣapāḥ ca vikriyante
GS24pmbhasuu:308_2: . tathā lomanakham spṛṣṭvā śaucam kartavyam iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:309: vyapavṛktam spṛṣṭvā niyogataḥ kartavyam avyapavṛkte kāmacāraḥ . yatra tarhi vyapavargaḥ asti . kva ca vyapavargaḥ asti . sandhyakṣareṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:310: sandhyakṣareṣu vivṛtatvāt . yat atra avarṇam vivṛtataram tat anyasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:311: avarṇāt . ye*api ivarṇovarṇe vivṛtatare te*anyābhyām ivarṇovarṇābhyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:312: athavā punaḥ na gṛhyante . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:313_0: ṛkāragrahaṇam . agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu ṛkārasya grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:313_1: . tasmāt nuṭ dvihalaḥ , ṛkāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : ānṛdhatuḥ , ānṛdhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:313_2: iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante dvihalaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:314: tasya siddham . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:315: dvihalgrahaṇam na kariṣyate . tasmāt nuṭ bhavati iti eva . yadi na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:316: āṭatuḥ , āṭuḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . aśnotigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aśnoteḥ eva avarṇopadhasya na anyasya avarṇopadhasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:317: lādeśe ca ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛpaḥ raḥ laḥ , ṛkārasya ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:318_0: vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : kḷptaḥ , kḷptavān iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante raḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:318_1: eva tasya siddham . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . ṛkāraḥ api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:319_0: kṛpa , uḥ , raḥ , laḥ kṛpo ro laḥ iti . atha vā ubhayataḥ sphoṭamātram nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:319_1: . raśruteḥ laśrutiḥ bhavati iti . vināme ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . raṣābhyām naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:319_2: ṇaḥ samānapade , ṛkārāt ca iti vaktayvam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:320: yathā syāt : mātṝṇām , pitṝṇām iti . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante raṣābhyām iti eva tasya siddham . na sidhyati . yat tat rephāt param bhakteḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:321: vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . aḍvyavāye iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . varṇaikadeśāḥ ke varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante . ye vyapavṛktāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:322_0: varṇāḥ bhavanti . yat ca api rephāt param bhakteḥ na tat kva cit api vyapavṛktam
GS24pmbhasuu:322_1: dṛśyate . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:322_2: vyavāye . vyavāye ca raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:323_0: . tataḥ aṭkupvāṅnumbhiḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . etaiḥ eva ākṣarasamamnāyikaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:323_1: vyavāye na anyaiḥ iti . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:323_2: jñāpayati bhavati ṛkārāt naḥ ṇatvam iti yat ayam kṣubhādiṣu nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:324: jñāpakam . vṛddhyartham etat syāt : nārnamaniḥ . yat tarhi tṛpnotiśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:325_0: paṭhati . yat ca api nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati . nanu ca uktam vṛddhyartham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:325_1: iti . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ṇatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:325_2: vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṛto naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati . tataḥ chandasi avagrahāt
GS24pmbhasuu:325_3: . ṛtaḥ iti eva . plutau aicaḥ idutau . etat ca vaktavyam . yasya punaḥ gṛhyante guroḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:325_4: ṭeḥ iti eva plutyā tasya siddham . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:325_5: . kriyate etat nyāse eva . tulyarūpe saṃyoge dvivyañjanavidhiḥ . tulyarūpe saṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:325_6: dvivyañjanāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ na sidhyati : kukkuṭaḥ , pippalaḥ , pittam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:326: yasya punaḥ gṛhyante tasya dvau kakārau dvau pakārau dvau takārau . yasya api na gṛhyante tasya api dvau kakārau dvau pakārau dvau takārau . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:327_0: . mātrākālaḥ atra gamyate . na ca mātrikam vyañjanam asti . anupadiṣṭam sat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:327_1: śakyam vijñātum . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra etat na asti aṇ savarṇān
GS24pmbhasuu:327_2: gṛhṇāti iti iha tu katham sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:328: yalṃ lokam talṃ lokam iti yatra etat asti aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . atra api mātrākalaḥ gṛhyate na ca mātrikam vyañjanam asti . anupadiṣṭam sat katham śakyam pratipattum .
GS24pmbhasuu:329_0: (Śs_5.1) KA_I,27.2-20 Ro_I,93-94 sarve varṇāḥ sakṛt upadiṣṭāḥ . ayam hakāraḥ dviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:329_1: upadiśyate pūrvaḥ ca paraḥ ca . yadi punaḥ pūrvaḥ eva upadiśyeta paraḥ eva vā . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:329_2: ca atra viśeṣaḥ . hakārasya paropadeśe aḍgrahaṇeṣu hagrahaṇam . hakārasya paropadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:329_3: aḍgrahaṇeṣu hagrahaṇam kartavyam . ātaḥ aṭi nityam , śaḥ chaḥ aṭi , dīrghāt aṭi samānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:330: hakāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : mahāṃ hi saḥ . uttve ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:331: uttve ca hakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . ataḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute , haśi ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:332_0: hakāre ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : puruṣaḥ hasati , brāhmaṇaḥ hasati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:332_1: . astu tarhi pūrvopadeśaḥ . pūrvopadeśe kittvakseḍvidhayaḥ jhalgrahaṇāni ca . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:332_2: pūrvopadeśaḥ kittvam vidheyam . snihitvā snehitvā sisnihiṣati sisnehiṣati . ralaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:332_3: vyupadhāt halādeḥ iti kittvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:333: . ksavidhiḥ . ksaḥ ca vidheyaḥ . adhukṣat alikṣat . śalaḥ igupadhāt aniṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:334: ksaḥ iti ksaḥ na prāpnoti . iḍvidhiḥ . iṭ ca vidheyaḥ . rudihi svapihi .
GS24pmbhasuu:335: valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ na prāpnoti. jhalgrahaṇāni ca . kim . ahakārāṇi syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:336: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalaḥ jhali iti iha na syāt : adāgdhām adāgdham .
GS24pmbhasuu:337: tasmāt pūrvaḥ ca upadeṣṭavyaḥ paraḥ ca . yadi ca kim cit anyatra api
GS24pmbhasuu:338: upadeśe prayojanam asti tatra api upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:339: (Śs_5.2) KA_I,27.21-28.15 Ro_I,95-97 idam vicāryate : ayam rephaḥ yakāravakārābhyām pūrvaḥ eva upadiśyeta ha ra ya vaṭ iti paraḥ eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:340_0: yathānyāsam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:340_1: . rephasya paropadeśe anunāsikadvirvacanaparasavarṇānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:340_2: svaḥ nayati , prātaḥ nayati iti yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ vā iti anunāsikaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:341: iti dvirvacanam prāpnoti . parasavarṇasya : kuṇḍam rathena , vanam rathena . anusvārasya yayi iti parasavarṇaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvopadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:342_0: pūrvopadeśe kittvapratiṣedhaḥ vyalopavacanam ca . yadi pūrvopadeśaḥ kittvam pratiṣedhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:342_1: . devitvā dideviṣati . ralaḥ vyupadhāt iti kittvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:342_2: evam vijñāyate ralaḥ vyupadhāt iti . kim tarhi . ralaḥ avvyupadhāt iti . kim idam
GS24pmbhasuu:342_3: avvyupadhāt iti . avakārāntāt vyuvpadhāt avvyupadhāt iti . vyalopavacanam ca . vyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:343: gaudheraḥ , paceran yajeran . jīveḥ radānuk : jīradānuḥ . vali iti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:344: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rephaḥ api atra nirdiśyate . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali
GS24pmbhasuu:345: iti rephe ca vali ca iti . atha vā punaḥ astu paropadeśaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:347: anunāsikaparasavarṇayoḥ tāvat pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . rephoṣmaṇām savarṇāḥ na santi . dvirvacane api na imau rahau kāryiṇau dvirvacanasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:348: kim tarhi . nimittam imau rahau dvirvacanasya . tat yathā . brāhmaṇāḥ bhojyantām . māṭharakauṇḍinyau pariveviṣṭām iti. na idānīm tau bhuñjāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:349: (Śs_5.3) KA_I,28.16-29.28 Ro_I,97-101 idam vicāryate . ime ayogavāhāḥ na kva cit upadiśyante śrūyante ca . teṣām kāryārthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:351: visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyānusvārānunāsikyayamāḥ . katham punaḥ ayogavāhāḥ . yat ayuktāḥ vahanti anupadiṣṭāḥ ca śrūyante . kva punaḥ eṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:352: upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . ayogavāhānām aṭsu ṇatvam . ayogavāhānām aṭsu upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:353: kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ṇatvam . uraḥkeṇa , uraḥpeṇa : aḍvyavāye iti ṇatvam siddham bhavati . śarṣu jaśbhāvaṣatve . śarṣu upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:354: kim prayojanam . jaśbhāvaṣatve . ayam ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:355: tasya jaśtve kṛte ubjitā ubjitum iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . yadi ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate ubjijiṣati iti upadhmānīyādeḥ eva dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:356: prāpnoti. dakāropadhe punaḥ nandrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti pratiṣedhasḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi dakāropadhaḥ paṭhyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ : ubjitā ubjitum iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:357: asiddhe bhaḥ udjeḥ . idam asti stoḥ ścunā ścuḥ iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi bhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:358_0: udjeḥ . udjeḥ ścunā sannipāte bhaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:358_1: . nipātanāt eva siddham . kim nipātanam . bhujanyubjau paṇyupatapayoḥ iti . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:359_0: akutvaviṣaye tat nipātanam . atha vā na etat ubjeḥ rūpam . gameḥ dvyuparsargāt ḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:359_1: vidhīyate . abhyudgataḥ abhyudgaḥ . samudgataḥ samudgaḥ iti . ṣatvam ca prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:360_0: siddham bhavati . numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye api iti visarjanīyagrahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:360_1: bhavati . numaḥ ca api tarhi grahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham sarpīṃṣi dhanūṃṣi .
GS24pmbhasuu:360_2: anusvāre kṛte śarvyavāye iti eva siddham . avaśyam numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam anusvāraviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:361_0: tatra yathā syāt iha mā bhūt : puṃsu iti . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:361_2: . aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogasañjñā prayojanam . ūbjaka . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ iti saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:361_3: saṃyoge guru iti gurusañjñā guroḥ iti plutaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:362: upadhāsañjñā ca prayojanam . duṣkṛtam , niṣkṛtam , niṣpītam , duṣpītam .
GS24pmbhasuu:363: idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti ṣatvam siddham bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:364: prayojanam . na idudupadhagrahaṇanena visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:365: sakāraḥ viśeṣyate . idudupadhasya sakārasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . atha vā upadhāgrahaṇam na kariṣyate . idudbhyām tu visarjanīyam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:366: idudbhyām uttarasya visarjanīyasya iti . alaḥ antyavidhiḥ prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:367: vṛkṣaḥ tarati . plakṣaḥ tarati . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:368: antyasya satvam siddham bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:369: nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti visarjanīyasya eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:370: dvirvacanam prayojanam . uraḥkaḥ , uraḥpaḥ . anaci ca . acaḥ uttarasya yaraḥ dve bhavataḥ iti dvirvacanam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:371: sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati uraḥkeṇa ,
GS24pmbhasuu:372: uraḥpeṇa iti aḍvyavāye api iti ṇatvam evam iha api sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti vyūḍhoraskena mahoraskena iti . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:373: (Śs_5.4) KA_I,30.1-32.11 Ro_I,101-106 kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ . arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām
GS24pmbhasuu:374: ekavarṇānām arthadarśanāt . dhātavaḥ ekavarṇāḥ arthavantaḥ dṛśyante : eti
GS24pmbhasuu:375: , adhyeti , adhīte iti . prātipadikani ekavarṇāni arthavanti : ābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:376: ebhiḥ , eṣu . pratyayāḥ ekavarṇāḥ arthavantaḥ : aupagavaḥ , kāpaṭavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:377: nipātāḥ ekavarṇāḥ arthavantaḥ : a*apehi . i*indram paśya . u*uttiṣṭha .
GS24pmbhasuu:378: dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām arthadarśanāt manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:379: varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:380: kūpaḥ , sūpaḥ , yūpaḥ iti . kūpaḥ iti sakakāreṇa kaḥ cit arthaḥ gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:381_0: sūpaḥ iti kakārāpāye sakāropajane ca arthāntaram gamyate . yūpaḥ iti kakārasakārāpāye
GS24pmbhasuu:381_1: yakāropajane ca arthāntatam gamyate . te manyāmahe : yaḥ kūpe kūpārthaḥ saḥ kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:381_2: . yaḥ sūpe sūpārthaḥ saḥ sakārasya . yaḥ yūpe yūpārthaḥ saḥ yakārasya iti . varṇānupalabdhau
GS24pmbhasuu:381_3: ca anarthagateḥ varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:382: , ṛkṣaḥ , kāṇḍīraḥ , āṇḍīraḥ . vṛkṣaḥ iti sakakāreṇa kaḥ cit arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:383: gamyate . ṛkṣaḥ iti vakārāpāye saḥ arthaḥ na gamyate . kāṇḍīraḥ iti sakakāreṇa kaḥ cit arthaḥ gamyate . āṇḍīraḥ iti kakārāpāye saḥ arthaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:384_0: gamyate . kim tarhi ucyate anarthagateḥ iti . na sādhīyaḥ hi atra arthasya gatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:384_1: bhavati . evam tarhi idam paṭhitavyam syāt . varṇānupalabdhau ca atadarthagateḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:384_2: kim idam atadarthagateḥ iti . tasya arthaḥ tadarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:385: tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ . na tadarthagatiḥ atadarthagatiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:386_0: atadarthagateḥ iti . atha vā saḥ arthaḥ tadarthaḥ . tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:386_1: . na tadarthagatiḥ atadarthagatiḥ . atadarthagateḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:386_2: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā: uṣṭramukham
GS24pmbhasuu:386_3: iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ kharamukham iva mukham asya kharamukhaḥ . evam atadarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:387: . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca manyāmahe arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ iti . yeṣām saṅghātāḥ arthavantaḥ avayavāḥ api teṣām arthavantaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:388: yeṣām punaḥ avayavāḥ anarthakāḥ samudāyāḥ api teṣām anarthakāḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:389: yathā: ekaḥ cakṣuṣmān darśane samarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca śatam api samartham . ekaḥ ca tilaḥ tailadāne samarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca khārī api
GS24pmbhasuu:390_0: samarthā . yeṣām punaḥ avayavāḥ anarthakāḥ samudāyāḥ api teṣām anarthakāḥ . tat yathā:
GS24pmbhasuu:390_1: ekaḥ andhaḥ darśane asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca śatam api asamartham . ekā ca sikatā
GS24pmbhasuu:390_2: tailadāne asamarthā tatsamudāyaḥ ca khārīśatam api asamartham . yadi tarhi ime varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:391_0: prāpnuvanti . kāni . arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā prātipadikāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:391_1: svādyutpattiḥ subantam padam iti padasañjñā . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . padasya iti nalopādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:392: saṅghātasya aikārthyāt subabhāvaḥ varṇāt . saṅghātasya ekatvam arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:393: tena varṇāt subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . anarthakāḥ tu prativarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:394_0: arthānupalabdheḥ . anarthakāḥ tu varṇāḥ . kutaḥ . prativarṇam arthānupalabdheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:394_1: na hi prativarṇam arthāḥ upalabhyante . kim idam prativarṇam iti . varṇam varṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:396: varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu arthadarśanāt manyāmahe anarthakāḥ varṇāḥ iti . varṇavyatyaye: kṛteḥ tarkuḥ , kaseḥ sikatāḥ , hiṃseḥ siṃhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:397: varṇavyatyayaḥ na arthavyatyayaḥ . apāyaḥ lopaḥ . ghnanti , ghantu ,
GS24pmbhasuu:398: aghnan . varṇāpāyaḥ nārthāpāyaḥ . upajanaḥ āgamaḥ . lavitā , lavitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:399: varṇopajanaḥ na arthopajanaḥ . vikāraḥ ādeśaḥ . ghātayati , ghātakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:400: varṇavikāraḥ na arthavikāraḥ . yathā eva varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:401: bhavanti tadvat arthavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāraiḥ bhavitavyam . na ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:402: tadvat . ataḥ manyāmahe anarthakāḥ varṇāḥ iti . ubhayam idam varṇeṣu uktam arthavantaḥ anarthakāḥ iti ca . kim atra nyāyyam . ubhayam iti āha . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:403: . svabhāvataḥ . tat yathā: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:404_0: arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:404_1: śakyam bhavitum , kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:404_2: śakyam kartum . yat dhātupratyayaprātipadikanipātāḥ ekavarṇāḥ arthavantaḥ ataḥ anye
GS24pmbhasuu:404_3: anarthakāḥ iti svābhāvikam etat . katham yaḥ eṣaḥ bhavatā varṇānām arthavattāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:405_0: hetuḥ upadiṣṭaḥ arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām ekavarṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:405_1: arthadarśanāt varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt varṇānupalabdhau ca anarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:406: saṅghātāntarāṇi eva etāni evañjātīyakāni arthāntareṣu vartante: kūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:407_0: sūpaḥ , yūpaḥ iti . yadi hi varṇavyatyayakṛtam arthāntaragamanam syāt bhūyiṣṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:407_1: kūpārthaḥ sūpe syāt sūpārthaḥ ca kūpe kūpārthaḥ ca yūpe yūpārthaḥ ca kūpe sūpārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:407_2: ca yūpe yūpārthaḥ ca sūpe . yataḥ tu khalu na kaḥ cit kūpasya vā sūpe sūpasya vā
GS24pmbhasuu:407_3: kūpe kūpasya vā yūpe yūpasya vā kūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:408_0: sūpasya vā yūpe yūpasya vā sūpe ataḥ manyāmahe saṅghātāntarāṇi eva etāni evañjātīyakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:408_1: arthāntareṣu vartante iti . idam khalu api bhavatā varṇānām arthavattām bruvatā sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:408_2: anarthakatvam dyotitam . yaḥ manyate yaḥ kūpe kūpārthaḥ saḥ kakārasya sūpe sūpārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:408_3: saḥ sakārasya yūpe yūpārthaḥ saḥ yakārasya iti ūpaśabdaḥ tasya anarthakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:409: saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . etasya api prātipadikasñjñāyām vakṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:411: auc . pratyāhāre anubandhānām katham ajgrahaṇeṣu na . ye ete akṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:412_0: pratyāhārārthāḥ anubandhāḥ kriyante eteṣām ajgrahaṇeṣu grahaṇam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:412_1: . kim ca syāt . dadhi ṇakārīyati madhu ṇakārīyati iti . ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:412_2: prasajyeta . ācārāt . kim idam ācārāt iti . ācāryāṇām upacārāt . na eteṣu ācāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:413: apradhānatvāt ca . na khalu api eteṣām akṣu prādhānyena upadeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:414: kva tarhi . halṣu . kutaḥ etat . eṣā hi ācāryasya śailī lakṣyate yat
GS24pmbhasuu:415_0: tulyajātīyān tulyajātīyeṣu upadiśati . acaḥ akṣu halaḥ halṣu . lopaḥ ca balavattaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:415_1: . lopaḥ khalu api tāvat bhavati . ūkālaḥ ac iti vā yogaḥ tatkālānām yathā bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:415_2: acām grahaṇam ackāryam tena eteṣām na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:416: atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ūkālaḥ ac . u ū u3 iti evaṅkālaḥ ac
GS24pmbhasuu:417: bhavati . tataḥ hrasvadīrghaplutaḥ . hrasvadīrghaplutasañjñaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:418: ūkālaḥ ac . evam api kukkuṭaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt pūrvoktaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:419: parihāraḥ . eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ. aparaḥ āha : hrasvādīnām vacanāt prāk yāvat tāvat eva yogaḥ astu ackāryāṇi yathā syuḥ tatkāleṣu akṣu kāryāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:420: (Śs_5.6) KA_I,33.5-34.2 Ro_I,108-110 atha kimartham antaḥsthānām aṇsu upadeśaḥ kriyate . iha sayṃyṃyantā savṃvṃvatsaraḥ yalṃ lṃlokam talṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:421: lṃlokam iti parasavarṇasya asiddhatvāt anusvārasya eva dvirvacanam . tatra parasya parasavarṇe kṛte tasya yaygrahaṇena grahaṇāt pūrvasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:422: parasavarṇaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:423_0: dvirvacane parasavarṇatvam siddham vaktavyam iti . yāvatā siddhatvam ucyate parasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:423_1: eva tāvad bhavati . parasavarṇe tarhi kṛte tasya yargrahaṇeṇa grahaṇāt dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:423_2: yathā syāt . mā bhūt dvirvacanam . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati. sati dvirvacane triyakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:424: . na asti bhedaḥ . sati api dvirvacane dviyakāram eva . katham . halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ iti evam ekasya lopena bhavitavyam . evam api bhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:425: sati dvirvacane kadā cit dviyakāram kadā cit triyakāram . saḥ eṣaḥ katham
GS24pmbhasuu:426_0: bhedaḥ na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā ca saḥ lopaḥ . yathā abhedaḥ tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:426_1: astu . anuvartate vibhāṣā śaraḥ aci yat vārayati ayam dvitvam . yat ayam śaraḥ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:427: ācāryaḥ anuvartate vibhāṣā iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . nitye hi tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:428_0: lope pratiṣedhārthaḥ na kaḥ cit syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt pratiṣedhavacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:428_1: syāt . astu atra dvirvacanam . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:428_2: tu ācāryaḥ vibhāṣā saḥ lopaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:429_0: tataḥ dvirvacanapratiṣedham śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . nitye api tasya lope
GS24pmbhasuu:429_1: saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ avaśyam vaktavyaḥ . yat etat acaḥ rahābhyām iti dvirvacanam lopāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:429_2: saḥ vijñāyate . katham . yaraḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:430: etāvantaḥ ca yaraḥ yat uta jharaḥ vā yamaḥ vā . yadi ca atra nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt dvirvacanam anarthakam syāt . kim tarhi tayoḥ yogayoḥ udāharaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:431: yat akṛte dvirvacane trivyañjanaḥ saṃyogaḥ . pratttam , avatttam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:432_0: ādityyaḥ . iha idānīm karttā , harttā iti dvirvacanasāmarthyāt lopaḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:432_1: evam iha api lopaḥ na syāt:: karṣati varṣati iti . tasmāt nitye api lope avaśyam
