GS24pmbhasuu:432_2: saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tat etat atyantam sandigdham vartate ācāryāṇām vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:433: (Śs_6) KA_I,34.4-35.18 Ro_I,111-115 ayam ṇakāraḥ dviḥ anubadhyate pūrvaḥ ca paraḥ ca . tatra aṇgrahaṇeṣu iṇgrahaṇeṣu ca sandehaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:434: pūrveṇa vā syuḥ pareṇa vā iti . katarasmin tāvat aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:435: ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ aṇaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi ḍhralope pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti :
GS24pmbhasuu:436_0: ātṛḍham āvṛḍham iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi pareṇa syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:436_1: aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti eva brūyāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:436_2: vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ hi etat bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti . asmin tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:437: asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa . kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi ke pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti . gokā naukā iti . evam tarhi sāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:438_0: pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . ke acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:438_1: eva brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ hi etat bhavati hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:438_2: iti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . asandigdham
GS24pmbhasuu:439_0: parābhāvāt . na hi padāntāḥ pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam asti kartṛ hartṛ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:439_1: evam tarhi sāmarthyāt pūrveṇa na pareṇa . yadi hi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:439_2: syāt .acaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:440: atha vā etat api na brūyāt . acaḥ eva hi pragṛhyāḥ bhavanti . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ iti . asandigdham pūrveṇa na pareṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:441: kutaḥ etat . parābhāvāt . na hi uḥ sthāne pare aṇaḥ santi . nanu ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:442: asti kartrartham hartrartham iti . kim ca syāt . yadi atra raparatvam syāt dvayoḥ rephayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:443: ekasya atra lopaḥ bhavati. vibhāṣā saḥ lopaḥ . vibhāṣā śravaṇam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:444_0: . ayam tarhi nityaḥ lopaḥ raḥ ri iti . padāntasya iti evam saḥ . na śakyaḥ padāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:444_1: vijñātum . iha hi lopaḥ na syāt jargṛdheḥ laṅ ajarghāḥ pāspardheḥ apāspāḥ iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:445: prasajyeta . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na atra raparatvam bhavati iti yat ayam ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti dhātugrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:446: dhātugrahaṇasya etat prayojanam . iha mā bhūt : mātṝṇām , pitṝṇām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:447_0: yadi ca atra raparatvam syāt dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . raparatve kṛte anantyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:447_1: ittvam na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na atra raparatvam bhavati iti tataḥ dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:447_2: karoti . iha api tarhi ittvam na prāpnoti cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:447_3: . upadhāyāḥ ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti mātṝṇām , pitṝṇām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:447_4: . tasmāt tatra dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . evam tarhi aṇgrahaṇasāmarthyāt pūrveṇa na
GS24pmbhasuu:448: . yadi pareṇa syāt aṇgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . uḥ ac raparaḥ iti eva brūyāt . asmin tarhi aṇgrahaṇe sandehaḥ : aṇuditsavarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:449: iti . asandigdham pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti. kutaḥ etat . savarṇe aṇ taparam
GS24pmbhasuu:450: hi uḥ ṛt . yat ayam uḥ ṛt iti ṛkāram taparam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa . iṇgrahaṇeṣu tarhi sandehaḥ . asandigdham pareṇa na
GS24pmbhasuu:451: pūrveṇa iti. kutaḥ etat . yvoḥ anyatra pareṇa iṇ syāt . yatra icchati pūrveṇa sammṛdya grahaṇam tatra karoti yvoḥ iti . tat ca guru bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:452_0: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tatra vibhaktinirdeśe sammṛdya grahaṇe ardhacatasraḥ mātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:452_1: . pratyāhāragrahaṇe punaḥ tisraḥ mātrāḥ . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:452_2: sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pareṇa na pūrveṇa iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:452_3: kim punaḥ varṇotsattau iva ṇakāraḥ dviḥ anubadhyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:453: vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:454: aṇuditsavarṇam parihāya pūrveṇa aṇgrahaṇam pareṇa iṇgrahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:455: (Śs_7-8.1) KA_I,35.20-36.4 Ro_I,115-116 kimartham imau mukhanāsikāvacanau varṇau ubhau api anubadhyete na ñakāra eva anubadhyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:456: . katham yāni makāreṇa grahaṇāni halaḥ yamām yami lopaḥ iti . santu ñakāreṇa halaḥ yañām yañi lopaḥ iti . na evam śakyam.
GS24pmbhasuu:457: jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ api hi jhakārabhakāryoḥ lopaḥ prasajyeta . na jhakārabhakārau jhakārabhakārayoḥ staḥ . katham pumaḥ khayyi ampare iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:458: etat api astu ñakāreṇa pumaḥ khayyi añpare iti . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:459: jhakārabhakārapare hi khayyi ruḥ prasajyeta . na jhakārabhakāraparaḥ khay
GS24pmbhasuu:460: asti .katham ṅamaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅamuṭ nityam iti . etat api astu ñakāreṇa ṅañaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅañuṭ nityam iti . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:461: jhakārabhakāraparayoḥ api hi padāntayoḥ jhakārabhakārau āgamau syātām . na jhakārabhakārau padāntau staḥ . evam api pañca āgamāḥ trayaḥ āgaminau
GS24pmbhasuu:462: vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . santu tāvat yeṣām āgamānām āgaminaḥ santi . jhakārabhakārau padāntau na staḥ iti kṛtvā āgamau api na
GS24pmbhasuu:464: (Śs_7-8.2) KA_I,36.5-11 Ro_I,117 atha kim idam akṣaram iti . akṣaram na kṣaram vidyāt . na kṣīyate na kṣarati iti vā akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā saraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:465: akṣaram . aśnoteḥ vā punaḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ saranpratyayaḥ . varṇam vā āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:466: pūrvasūtre . atha vā pūrvasūtre varṇasya akṣaram iti sañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:467: (Śs_7-8.3) KA_I,36.12-18 Ro_I,118-120 kimartham idam upadiśyate . atha kimartham idam upadiśyate . varṇajñānam vāgviṣayaḥ yatra brahma vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:468_0: tadartham iṣṭadbuddhyartham laghvartham ca upadiśyate . saḥ ayam akṣarasamāmnāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:468_1: vāksamāmnāyaḥ puṣpitaḥ phalitaḥ candratārakavat pratimaṇḍitaḥ veditavyaḥ brahmarāśiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:469: jñāne bhavati . mātāpitarau ca asya svarge loke mahīyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:470: (P_1,1.1.1) KA_I,37.2-7 Ro_I,121-123 kutvam kasmāt na bhavati coḥ kuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:471: padasya iti . bhatvāt . katham bhasañjñā . ayasmayādīni chandasi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:472: chandasi iti ucyate . na ca idam chandaḥ . chandovat sūtrāṇi bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:473: yadi bhasañjñā vṛddhiḥ ād aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti jaśtvam api na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:474: ubhayasañjñāni api chandāṃsi dṛśyante . tat yathā . saḥ suṣṭubhā saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:475: ṛkvatā gaṇena . padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt jaśvtam na bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:478_0: tadbhāvitagrahaṇam : vṛddhiḥ iti evam ye ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante teṣām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:478_1: āhosvit ādaijmātrasya . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tadbhāvitagrahaṇam śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:478_2: vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ chaḥ na prāpnoti . āmramayam śālamayam vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ mayaṭ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:478_3: . āmraguptāyaniḥ śālaguptayaniḥ vṛddhalakṣaṇaḥ phiñ na prāpnoti . atha aijmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:478_4: grahaṇam sarvaḥ bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:479: iha ca tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ yāvadbhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi aijmātrasya . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:480_0: sarvaḥ bhāsaḥ sarvabhāsaḥ iti uttarapadapadavṛddhau sarvam ca iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:480_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate uttarapadasya vṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:480_2: iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya iti evam prakṛtya yā vṛddhiḥ tadvati uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:481_0: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . tadbhāvitagrahaṇe sati api iha prasajyeta : sarvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:481_1: kārakaḥ sarvakārakaḥ iti . yad api ucyate iha tāvatī bhāryā asya tāvadbhāryaḥ yāvadbhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:482_0: prāpnoti iti na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate vṛddheḥ nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:482_1: iti . katham tarhi . vṛddheḥ nimittam yasmin saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:483: nimittam. yaḥ asau kakāraḥ ṇakāraḥ ñakāraḥ vā . atha vā yaḥ kṛtsnāyāḥ vṛddheḥ nimittam . kaḥ ca kṛtsnāyāḥ vṛddheḥ nimittam . yaḥ trayāṇām ākāraikāraukārāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:484: (P_1,1.1.3) KA_I,37.25-40.17 Ro_I,125-133 sañjñādhikāraḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . atha sañjñā iti prakṛtya vṛddhyādayaḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:485_0: paṭhitavyāḥ . kim prayojanam . sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ . vṛddhyādīnām śabdānām sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:485_1: iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt . itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā loke . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:485_2: hi sañjñādhikāre vṛddhyādīnām sañjñā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ na syāt . idam idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:485_3: bahusūtram anarthakam syāt anarthakam iti āha . katham . yathā loke . loke hi arthavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:485_4: ca anarthakāni ca vākyāni dṛśyante . arthavanti tāvat : devadatta gām abhyāja
GS24pmbhasuu:486_0: śuklām daṇḍena . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . anarthakāni ca . daśa dāḍimāni
GS24pmbhasuu:486_1: ṣaṭ apūpāḥ kuṇḍam ajājinam palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ sphaiyakṛtasya pitā
GS24pmbhasuu:486_2: pratiśīnaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ ca . kriyamāṇe api sañjñādhikāre sañjñāsañjñinoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:487_0: vṛddhiśabdaḥ sañjñā ādaicaḥ sañjñinaḥ iti . na punaḥ ādaicaḥ sañjñā vṛddhiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:487_1: sañjñī iti . yat tāvat ucyate sañjñādhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:488_0: ācāryācārāt sañjñāsiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kim idam ācāryācārāt . ācāryāṇām upacārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:488_1: . yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . tat yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:488_2: : mātāpitarau putrasya jātasya saṃvṛte avakāśe nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:489: kurvāte devadattaḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . tayoḥ upacārāt anye api jānanti iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:490: asya sañjñā iti . vede : yājñikāḥ sañjñām kurvanti sphyaḥ yūpaḥ caṣālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:491: iti . tatrabhavatām upacārāt anye api jānanti iyam asya sañjñā iti . apare punaḥ sici vṛddhiḥ iti uktvā ākāraikāraukārān udāharanti . te manyāmahe :
GS24pmbhasuu:492_0: yayā pratyāyyante sā sañjñā ye pratīyante te sañjñinaḥ iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:492_1: api sañjñādhikāre sañjñāsañjñinoḥ asandehaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . sañjñāsañjñyasandehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:493: ācāryācārāt eva . uktaḥ ācāryācāraḥ . anākṛtiḥ . atha vā anākṛtiḥ sañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:494: ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke api hi ākrtimataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:495: iti sañjñā kriyate . liṅgena vā . atha vā kim cit liṅgam āsajya vakṣyāmi itthaṃliṅgā sañjñā iti . vṛddhiśabde ca tat liṅgam kariṣyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:496_0: ādaicchabde . idam tāvat ayuktam yat ucyate ācāryācārāt iti . kim atra ayuktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:496_1: tam eva upālabhya agamakam te sūtram iti tasya eva punaḥ pramāṇīkaraṇam iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:496_2: ayuktam . aparituṣyan khalu api bhavān anena parihāreṇa ākṛtiḥ liṅgena vā iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:496_3: . tat ca api vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi itsañjñā na vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:497: sañjñāliṅgam anubandheṣu kariṣyate . na ca sañjñāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:498: svabhāvataḥ sañjñāḥ sañjñinaḥ pratyāyya nivartante . tena anubandhānām api
GS24pmbhasuu:499_0: nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . sidhyati evam . apāṇinīyam tu bhavati . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:499_1: . nanu ca uktam sañjñādhikāraḥ sañjñāsampratyayārthaḥ itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:499_2: loke iti . na yathā loke tathā vyākaraṇe .
GS24pmbhasuu:500_0: pramāṇabhūtaḥ ācāryaḥ darbhapavitrapāṇiḥ śucau avakāśe prāṅmukhaḥ upaviśya mahatā
GS24pmbhasuu:500_1: yatnena sūtram praṇayati sma . tatra aśakyam varṇena api anarthakena bhavitum kim
GS24pmbhasuu:500_2: punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa . kim ataḥ yat aśakyam . ataḥ sañjñāsañjñinau eva . kutaḥ nu
GS24pmbhasuu:500_3: khalu etat sañjñāsañjñinau eva iti na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:501: sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre sādhutvam anena kiryate . kṛtam anayoḥ sādhutvam . katham . vṛdhiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ prakṛtipāṭhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:502: tasmāt ktinpratyayaḥ . ādaicaḥ api akṣarasamāmnāye upadiṣṭāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:503: prayoganiyamārtham tarhi idam syāt . vṛddhiśabdāt paraḥ ādaicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:504: prayoktavyāḥ iti . na iha prayoganiyamaḥ ārabhyate . kim tarhi . saṃskṛtya saṃskṛtya padāni utsṛjyante . teṣām yatheṣṭham abhisambandhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:505: tat yathā : āhara pātram , pātram āhara iti . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:506: vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:507: ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . āgamāḥ tarhi ime syuḥ . vṛddhiśabdasya ādaicaḥ āgamāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:508_0: āgamāḥ api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya eva ucyante liṅgena ca . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:508_1: api āgamaliṅgam paśyāmaḥ . idam khalu api bhūyaḥ sāmanādhikaraṇyam ekavibhaktikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:508_2: ca . dvayoḥ ca etat bhavati . kayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:509_0: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ vā sañjñāsañjñinoḥ vā . tatra etat syāt viśeṣaṇaviśeṣye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:509_1: tat ca na . dvayoḥ hi pratītpadārthakayoḥ loke viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:509_2: ca ādaicchabdaḥ pratītapadārthakaḥ . tasmāt sañjñāsañjñinau eva . tatra tu etāvān
GS24pmbhasuu:509_3: sandedhaḥ kaḥ sañjñī kā sañjñā iti . saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhe samānākṣare
GS24pmbhasuu:509_4: . yatra tu anyatarat laghu yat laghu sā sañjñā . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:509_5: . tatra api ayam na avaśyam gurulaghutām eva upalakṣayitum arhati . kim tarhi . anākṛtitām
GS24pmbhasuu:509_6: api . anākṛtiḥ sañjñā . ākṛtimantaḥ sañjñinaḥ . loke hi ākṛtimataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:510_0: māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . atha vā āvartinyaḥ sañjñāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:510_1: . vṛddhiśabdaḥ ca āvartate na ādaicchabdaḥ . tat yathā . itaratra api devadattaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:510_2: āvartate na māṃsapiṇḍaḥ . atha vā pūrvoccāritaḥ sañjñī paroccāritā sañjñā . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:510_3: etat . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:511: tat yathā . itaratra api sataḥ māṃsapiṇḍasya devadattaḥ iti sañjñā kriyate . katham vṛddhiḥ āt aic iti . etat ekam ācāryasya maṅgalārtham mṛṣyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:512_0: māṅgalikaḥ ācāryaḥ mahataḥ śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vṛddhiśabam āditaḥ prayuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:512_1: . maṅgalādīni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:512_2: ca . adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . sarvatra eva hi vyākaraṇe pūrvoccāritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:512_3: sañjñī paroccāritā sañjñā . at eṅ guṇaḥ iti yathā . doṣavān khalu api sañjñādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:512_4: . aṣṭame api hi sañjñā kriyate tasya param āmreḍitam iti . tatra api idam anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:512_5: syāt . atha vā asthāne ayam yatnaḥ kriyate . na hi idam lokāt bhidyate . yadi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:513: bhidyeta tataḥ yatnārham syāt . tat yathā agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati ayam gauḥ iti . na ca asmai ācaṣṭe iyam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:514: sañjñā iti . bhavati ca asya sampratyayaḥ . tatra etat syāt kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ iti . iha api kṛtaḥ pūrvaiḥ abhisambandhaḥ . kaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:515: ācāryaiḥ . tatra etat syāt . yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:516: loke api yasmai samprati upadiśati tasya akṛtaḥ . atha tatra kṛtaḥ iha api kṛtaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:517_0: (P_1,1.1.4) KA_I,40.18-41.4 Ro_I,133-134 sataḥ vṛddhyādiṣu sañjñābhāvāt tadāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:517_1: itaretarāśrayatvāt asiddhiḥ . sataḥ sañjñinaḥ sañjñābhāvāt sañjñāśraye sañjñini vṛddhyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:517_2: itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . kā iteretarāśrayatā . satām ādaicām sañjñayā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:517_3: sañjñayā ca ādaicaḥ bhāvyante . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:518: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . tat yathā . nauḥ nāvi baddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:519: na itaratrāṇāya bhavati. nanu ca bhoḥ itaretarāśrayāṇi api kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:520: dṛśyante . tat yathā . nauḥ śakaṭam vahati śakaṭam ca nāvam vahati . anyat api tatra kim cit bhavati jalam sthalam vā . sthale śakaṭam nāvam vahati .
GS24pmbhasuu:521: jale nauḥ śakaṭam vahati . yathā tari triviṣṭabdhakam . tatra api antataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:522: sūtrakam bhavati . idam punaḥ itaretarāśrayam eva . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt . siddham etat . katham . nityaśabdatvāt . nityāḥ śabdāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:523: nityeṣu śabdeṣu satām ādaicām sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā ādaicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:524_0: bhāvyante . yadi tarhi nityāḥ śabdāḥ kimartham śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:524_1: nivartakatvāt siddham . nivartakam śāstram . katham . mṛjiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:524_2: . tasya sarvatra mṛjibuddhiḥ prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . mṛjeḥ akṅitsu
GS24pmbhasuu:526_0: (P_1,1.1.5) KA_I,41.5-16 Ro_I,134-136 pratyekam vṛddhiguṇasañjñe bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:526_1: . kim prayojanam . samudāye mā bhūtām iti . anyatra sahavacanāt samudāye sañjñāprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:527: vṛddhiguṇasañjñayoḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . yatra icchati sahabhūtānām kāryam karoti tatra sahagrahaṇam . tat yathā . saha supā . ubhe abhyastam saha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:528: pratyavayavam ca vākyaparisamāpteḥ . pratyavayavam ca vākyaparisamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:529: dṛśyate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāḥ bhojyantām iti . na ca ucyate pratyekam iti . pratyekam ca bhujiḥ parisamāpyate . nanu ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:530_0: api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām
GS24pmbhasuu:530_1: iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:531: kriyate iha api pratyekam iti vaktavyam . atha tatra antareṇa sahagrahaṇam sahabhūtānām kāryam bhavati iha api na arthaḥ pratyekam iti vacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:533_0: taparaḥ kriyate . ākārasya taparakaraṇam savarṇārtham . ākārasya taparakaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:533_1: . kim prayojanam . savarṇārtham . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti tatkālānām grahaṇam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:534: kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bhedakatvāt svarasya . bhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:535: katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . yaḥ udātte kartavye anudāttam karoti khaṇḍikopādhyāyaḥ tasmai capeṭām dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:536: anyat tvam karoṣi iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . bhedakatvāt guṇasya iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ānunāsikyam nāma guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:537_0: tadbhinnasya api yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bhedakatvāt guṇasya . bhedakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:537_1: guṇāḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . ekaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:537_2: ātmā udakam nāma . tasya guṇabhedāt anyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:538_0: bhavati : anyat idam śītam anyat idam ūṣṇam iti . nanu ca bhoḥ abhedakāḥ api guṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:538_1: dṛśyante . tat yathā . devadattaḥ muṇḍī api jaṭī api śikhī api svām ākhyām na jahāti
GS24pmbhasuu:538_2: . tathā bālaḥ yuvā vṛddhaḥ vatsaḥ damyaḥ balīvardaḥ iti . ubhayam idam guṇeṣu uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:538_3: bhedakāḥ abhedakāḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:539_0: nyāyyam . abhedakāḥ guṇāḥ iti eva nyāyyam . kutaḥ etat . yat ayam asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:539_1: anaṅ udāttaḥ iti udāttagrahaṇam karoti . yadi bhedakāḥ guṇāḥ syuḥ udāttam eva uccārayet
GS24pmbhasuu:539_2: . yadi tarhi abhedakāḥ guṇāḥ anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate tat svaritādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:539_3: svaritāntāt ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āśrīyamāṇaḥ guṇaḥ bhedakaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:539_4: yathā . śuklam ālabheta . kṛṣṇam ālabheta . tatra yaḥ śukle ālabdhavye kṛṣṇam ālabheta
GS24pmbhasuu:539_5: na hi tena yathoktam kṛtam bhavati . asandehārthaḥ tarhi takāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:540: . aic iti ucyamane sandehaḥ syāt . kim imau aicau eva āhosvit ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:541: upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:542: trayāṇām grahaṇam iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . anyatra api hi ayam evañjātīyakeṣu sandeheṣu na kam cid yatnam karoti . tat yathā . autaḥ amśasoḥ iti .idam
GS24pmbhasuu:544: trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti : khaṭvā* indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:545: khaṭvā* udakam khaṭvodakam , khaṭvā* īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā* ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā* elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā* odanaḥ , khaṭvaudanaḥ , khaṭvā*
GS24pmbhasuu:546: aitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvā* aupagavaḥ , khaṭvaupagavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:547: atha kriyamāṇe api takāre kasmāt eva trimātracaturnātrāṇām sthāninam trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ na bhavanti . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:548: nanu taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:549: taparaḥ iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt . yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:550: dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:552: iggrahaṇam ātsandhyakṣaravyañjananivṛttyartham . iggrahaṇam kriyate ākāranivṛttyartham sandhyakṣaranivṛttyartham vyañjananivṛttyartham ca.
GS24pmbhasuu:553: ākāranivṛttyartham tāvat . yātā vātā . ākārasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:554: iggrahaṇāt na bhavati . sandhyakṣaranivṛttyartham . glāyati mlāyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:555: sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti . iggrahaṇāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:556: vyañjananivṛttyartham . umbhitā , umbhitum umbhitavyam . vyañjanasya guṇaḥ prāpnoti . iggrahaṇāt na bhavati . ākāranivṛttyarthena tāvat nārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:557: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ākārasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:558_0: kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam kiti iti ākāralopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca ākārasya guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:558_1: syāt kitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:558_2: syāt godaḥ , kambaladaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:559: na ākārasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ kakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:560: sandhyakṣarārthena api na arthaḥ . upadeśasāmarthyāt sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:561: na bhaviṣyati . vyañjananivṛttyarthena api na arthaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam janeḥ ḍam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:562_0: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ḍitkaraṇe etat prayojanam ḍiti iti ṭilopaḥ yathā syāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:562_1: vyañjansya guṇaḥ syāt ḍitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:562_2: siddham rūpam syāt : upasarajaḥ , mandurajaḥ iti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na vyañjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:562_3: guṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ janeḥ ḍam śāsti. na etāni santi prayojanāni . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:562_4: ucyate kitkaraṇam jñāpakam ākārasya guṇaḥ na bhavati iti . uttarārtham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:563: tundaśokayoḥ parimṛjāpanudoḥ iti . yat tarhi gāpoḥ ṭhak iti ananyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:564_0: kakāram anubandham karoti . yat api ucyate upadeśasāmarthyāt sandhyakṣarasya guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:564_1: na bhavati iti . yadi yat yat sandhyakṣarasya prāpnoti tat tat upadeśasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:564_2: bādhyate āyādayaḥ api tarhi na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:565: vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . guṇam ca prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ āyādīnām punaḥ nimittam eva . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:566_0: janeḥ ḍavacanam jñāpakam na vyañjanasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:566_1: jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati . na ca janeḥ guṇena sidhyati . kutaḥ hi etat janeḥ guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:566_2: akāraḥ bhavati na punaḥ ekāraḥ vā syāt okāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:567: vā iti . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya mātrikaḥ akāraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:568_0: . evam api anunāsikaḥ prāpnoti . pararūpeṇa śuddhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi gameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:568_1: api ayam ḍaḥ vaktavyaḥ . gameḥ ca guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ āntaryataḥ okāraḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:569: dyauḥ , panthāḥ , saḥ , imam ite ete api ikaḥ prāpnuvanti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante teṣu niyamaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:570: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . guṇavṛddhigrahaṇasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:571: katham punaḥ antareṇa guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī syātām . prakṛtam guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . vṛddhiḥ āt aic at eṅ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:572_0: iti . yadi tat anuvartate at eṅ guṇaḥ vṛddhiḥ ca iti adeṅām api vṛddhisañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:572_1: . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . vṛddhiḥ āt aic . at eṅ guṇaḥ vṛddhiḥ āt aic . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:572_2: ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī iti . guṇavṛddhigrahaṇam anuvartate ādaijgrahaṇam nivṛttam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:572_3: vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:572_4: . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate vṛddhiḥ āt aic at eṅ guṇaḥ iti . tataḥ iko guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:573_0: iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:573_1: vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . anyasyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:574: prakṛtāyāḥ vṛddhisañjñāyāḥ guṇasañjña bādhikā bhaviṣyati yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:575: anuvartante ca nāma vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva bhavanti . kim tarhi yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam . tat apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:576_0: (P_1,1.3.2) KA_I,44.15-47.13 Ro_I,146-155 kim punaḥ ayam alontyaśeṣaḥ āhosvit alontyāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:576_1: . katham ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt katham vā tadapavādaḥ . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:576_2: ca alaḥ : antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* alaḥ antyasya iti tataḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:576_3: taccheṣaḥ . atha nānā vākyam : alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti , ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī*
GS24pmbhasuu:576_4: antyasya ca anantyasya ca iti tataḥ ayam tadapavādaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:577_0: vṛddhiguṇau alaḥ antyasya iti cet midipugantalaghūpadharcchidṛśikṣiprakṣudreṣu iggrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:577_2: iggrahaṇam kartavyam . mideḥ guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:578: pugantalaghūpadhasya guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:579: . ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:580: ṛdṛsaḥ aṅi guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:581: kṣiprakṣudrayoḥ guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt hi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:582_0: sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ ca anigantasya . sarvādeśaḥ ca guṇaḥ ca anigantasya prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:582_1: yātā vātā . kim kāraṇam . alaḥ antyasya iti ṣaṣṭhī ca eva hi antyam ikam upasaṅkrāntā
GS24pmbhasuu:582_2: , aṅgasya iti ca sthānaṣaṣṭhī . tat yat idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:583_0: anigantam aṅgam tasya guṇaḥ sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva hi alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:583_1: antyasya iti ṣaṣṭhī antyam ikam upasaṅkrāntā evam aṅgasya iti api sthānaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:583_2: tat yad idānīm anigantam aṅgam , tatra ṣaṣṭhī eva na asti kutaḥ guṇaḥ kutaḥ sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:583_3: . evam tarhi na ayam doṣasamuccayaḥ kim tarhi . pūrvāpekṣaḥ ayam doṣaḥ , hyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:584_1: iti . mideḥ guṇaḥ ikaḥ iti vacanāt antyasya na . antyasya iti vacanāt ikaḥ na . ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:584_2: tu guṇaḥ . saḥ sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . evam sarvatra . astu tarhi tadapavādaḥ . igmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:586: igmātrasya iti cet jusisārvadhātukārdhadhātukahrasvādyoḥ guṇeṣu anantyapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jusi guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:587: ajuhavuḥ , abibhayuḥ , evam anenijuḥ , paryaviviṣuḥ , atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:588: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati : kartā hartā nayati tarati bhavati , evam īhitā , īhitum iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:589: hrasvasya guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati : he agne he vāyo , evam he agnicit , he somasut iti atra api prāpnoti . jasi guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:590_0: bhavati agnayaḥ , vāyavaḥ iti evam agnicitaḥ , somasutaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:590_1: ṛto ṅisarvanāmasthānayoḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā iha bhavati kartari kartārau kartāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:590_2: iti evam sukṛti sukṛtau sukṛtaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti .gheḥ ṅiti guṇaḥ . saḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:590_3: iha bhavati agnaye vāyave evam agnicite somasute iti atra api prāpnoti . oḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:590_4: . saḥ yathā iha bhavati bābhravyaḥ , māṇḍavyaḥ iti evam suśrut , sauśrutaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:593: pugantalaghūpadhasya eva anantyasya na anyasya anantyasya iti . prakṛtasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt . kim ca prakṛtam . sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:594: tena bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt īhitā , īhitum , īhitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:595: hrasvādyoḥ guṇaḥ tu aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api prāpnoti . atha api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:596: niyamaḥ syāt . pugantalaghūpadhasya sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:597: evam api sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:598: prāpnoti : īhitā , īhitum īhitavyam iti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt : pugantalaghūpadhasya eva sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:599: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ eva pugantalaghūpadhasya iti , evam api ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:600: jusi guṇaḥ aniyataḥ . saḥ anantyasya api prāpnoti : anenijuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:601_0: paryaviviṣuḥ iti . evam tarhi na ayam taccheṣaḥ na api tadapavādaḥ . anyat eva idam
GS24pmbhasuu:601_1: paribhāṣāntaram asambaddham anayā paribhāṣayā . paribhāṣāntaram iti ca matvā kroṣṭrīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:601_2: paṭhanti : niyamāt ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena iti . yadi ca ayam taccheṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:602: vipratiṣedhaḥ . atha api tadapavādaḥ utsargāpavādayoḥ api ayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:603: vipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra niyamasya avakāśaḥ : rājñaḥ ka ca , rājakīyam . ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:604_0: guṇavṛddhī* iti asya avakāśaḥ : cayanam , cāyakaḥ , lavanam , lāvakaḥ iti . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:604_1: prāpnoti : medyati mārṣṭi iti . ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:604_2: . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe hi param iti ucyate , pūrvaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:604_3: yogaḥ paraḥ niyamaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:605: vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim tarhi.
GS24pmbhasuu:606: asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca asti atra asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asmbhavaḥ . iha tāvat : vṛkṣebhyaḥ , plakṣebhyaḥ iti ekaḥ sthānī dvau ādeśau . na ca asti
GS24pmbhasuu:607: sambhavaḥ yat ekasya sthāninaḥ dvau ādeśau syātām . iha idānīm medyati
GS24pmbhasuu:608_0: medyataḥ medyanti iti dvau sthāninau ekaḥ ādeśaḥ . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:608_1: sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ syāt iti eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ . satyam etasmin asambhave yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:608_2: vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvayoḥ hi sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:609: yogaḥ . nanu ca idānīm eva asya avakāśaḥ prakḷptaḥ : cayanam , cāyakaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:610: lavanam , lāvakaḥ iti . atra api niyamaḥ prāpnoti . yāvatā na aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:611: niyame ayam yogaḥ ārabhyate ataḥ tadapavādaḥ ayam yogaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:612: utsargāpavādayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . atha api katham cit ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti asya avakāśaḥ syāt , evam api yathā iha vipratiṣedhāt ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:613: guṇaḥ bhavati : medyati medyataḥ medyanti , evam iha api syāt : anenijuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:614: paryaveviṣuḥ iti . evam tarhi vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati iti yatra brūyāt ikaḥ iti etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:615: dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī prāduḥ bhāvyate . tatra kāmacāraḥ : gṛhyamāṇena vā ikam
GS24pmbhasuu:616: viśeṣayitum ikā vā gṛhyamāṇam . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:617: midipugantalaghūpadharcchidṛśikṣiprakṣudreṣu gṛhyamāṇena ikam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ : eteṣām yaḥ ik iti . iha idānīm :
GS24pmbhasuu:618_0: jusisārvadhātukārdhadhātukahrasvādyoḥ guṇeṣu ikā gṛhyamāṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ : eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:618_1: guṇaḥ bhavati ikaḥ . igantānām iti . atha vā sarvatra eva sthānī nirdiśyate . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:618_2: tāvat : mideḥ iti , avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ : mida , eḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:619: mideḥ , mideḥ iti . atha vā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati midaḥ iḥ , midiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:620_0: mideḥ iti . pugantalaghūpadhasya iti na evam vijñāyate : pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:620_1: ca iti . katham tarhi . puki antaḥ pugantaḥ , laghvī upadhā laghūpadhā , pugantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:620_2: ca laghūpadhā ca pugantalaghūpadham pugantalaghūpadhasya iti . avaśyam ca etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:620_3: vijñeyam . aṅgaviśeṣaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta : bhinatti chinatti iti . ṛccheḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:621: ayam . ṛcchati , ṛ , ṛ , ṝtām ṛcchatyṝtām iti . dṛśeḥ api yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:622_0: kariṣyate . uḥ aṅi guṇaḥ . uḥ aṅi guṇaḥ bhavati . tataḥ dṛśeḥ . dṛśeḥ ca aṅi guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:622_1: bhavati . uḥ iti eva. kṣiprakṣudrayoḥ api yaṇādiparam guṇa iti iyatā siddham . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:622_2: ayam evam siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:623: etat prayojanam ikaḥ yathā syāt anikaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:624_0: (P_1,1.3.3) KA_I,47.14-49.21 Ro_I,155-161 atha vṛddhigrahaṇam kimartham . kim viśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:624_1: vṛddhigrahaṇam codyate na punaḥ guṇagrahaṇam api . yadi kim cit guṇagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:625: bhavitum arhati . kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . guṇavidhau na kva
GS24pmbhasuu:626_0: cit sthānī nirdiśyate . tatra avaśyam sthāninirdeśārtham guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:626_1: vṛddhividhau punaḥ sarvatra eva sthānī nirdiśyate . acaḥ ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ taddhiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:626_2: acām ādeḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:627: vṛddhigrahaṇam uttarārtham . vṛddhigrahaṇam kriyate uttarārtham . kṅiti iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ vṛddheḥ api yathā syāt . kaḥ ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:628: kṅitpratyayeṣu vṛddheḥ prasaṅgaḥ yāvatā ñṇiti iti ucyate . tat ca mṛjyartham . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā kṅiti mā bhūt : mṛṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:629: mṛṣṭavān iti . ihārtham ca api mṛjyartham vṛddhigrahaṇam kartavyam . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā ikaḥ yathā syāt . anikāḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:630: mṛjyartham iti cet yogavibhāgāt siddham . mṛjyartham iti cet yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ . tataḥ ñṇiti . ñiti ṇiti ca vṛddhiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:631: acaḥ iti eva . yadi acaḥ vṛddhiḥ ucyate nyamārṭ : aṭaḥ api vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:632: prāpnoti . aṭi ca uktam . kim uktam. anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:633_0: bhavati iti . vṛddhipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ tu ikprakaraṇāt . vṛddheḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:633_1: na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . ikprakaraṇāt . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:633_2: na ca evam sati mṛjeḥ iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:634_0: tasmāt mṛjeḥ iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ eṣitavyā . evam tarhi iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ mṛjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:634_1: ajādau saṅkrame vibhāṣā vṛddhim ārabhante : parimṛjanti parimārjanti parimṛjantu
GS24pmbhasuu:634_2: parimārjantu parimamṛjatuḥ , parimamārjatuḥ ityādyartham . tat iha api sādhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:634_3: tasmin sādhye yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ acaḥ bhavati . tataḥ aci kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:634_4: . ajādau ca kṅiti mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:635_0: parimārjanti parimārjantu . kimartham idam . niyamārtham : ajādau eva kṅiti na anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:635_1: . kva anyatra mā bhūt . mṛṣṭaḥ , mṛṣṭavān iti . tataḥ vā . vā aci kṅiti mṛjeḥ vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:636_0: parimamṛjatuḥ , parimamārjatuḥ iti . ihārtham eva sijartham vṛddhigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:636_1: . sici vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā ikaḥ yathā syāt , anikaḥ mā bhūt iti . kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:636_2: punaḥ anikaḥ prāpnoti . akārasya : acikīrṣīt , ajihīrṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:637: . na etat asti . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārasya tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:638: : ayāsīt , avāsīt . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vṛddhau asatyām vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:639: sandhyakṣarasya tarhi prāpnoti . na eva sandhyakṣaram antyam asti . nanu ca idam asti ḍhalope kṛte udavoḍhām udavoḍham udavoḍha iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:640: . asiddhaḥ ḍhalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na etat antyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:641: vyañjanasya tarhi prāpnoti : abhaitsīt , acchaitsīt . halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ bādhikā bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sā pratiṣidhyate : akoṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:642: amoṣīt . sici vṛddheḥ api eṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . katham . lakṣaṇam hi nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:643: dhvanati bhramati muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhate . atha vā sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu iti sici vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . tasyāḥ halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:644: bādhikā . tasyāḥ api na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ . asti punaḥ kva cid anyatra api apavāde pratiṣiddhe utsargaḥ api na bhavati . asti iti āha . sujāte*
GS24pmbhasuu:645: aśvasūnṛte , adhvaryo* adribhiḥ sutam , śukram te* anyat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:646: pūrvarūpatve pratiṣiddhe ayādayaḥ api na bhavanti . uttarārtham eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:647: sijartham vṛddhigrahaṇam kartavyam . sici vṛddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa ucyate . sā kṅiti mā bhūt nyanuvīt , nyadhuvīt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:648_0: antaraṅgatvāt atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:648_1: sici antaraṅgam bhavati , akārṣīt , ahārṣīt : guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anantyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:648_2: vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . halantasya iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:649: bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : nyastārīt , vyadārīt : guṇe raparatve ca
GS24pmbhasuu:650: anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . halantalakṣaṇāyāḥ ca na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ . mā bhūt evam . rlāntasya iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:651: alāvīt apāvīt : guṇe kṛte avādeśe ca anantyatvāt vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:652_0: halantalakṣaṇāyāḥ ca na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ . mā bhūt evam . rlāntasya iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:652_1: . rlāntasya iti ucyate na ca idam rlāntam . rlāntasya iti atra vakāraḥ api nirdiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:652_2: . kim vakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣtaḥ vakāraḥ . yadi evam mā bhavān mavīt : atra
GS24pmbhasuu:652_3: api prāpnoti . avimavyoḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tat vaktavyam . ṇiśvibhyām tau nimātavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:653_0: ucyate atha vā etarhi ṇiśvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . guṇe kṛte ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:653_1: ca yāntānam na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:653_2: na sici antaraṅgam bhavati iti yat ayam ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti akāragrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:653_3: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam akāragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt : akoṣīt , amoṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:653_4: . yadi sici antaraṅgam syāt akāragrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . guṇe kṛte alaghutvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:654: vṛddhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na sici antaraṅgam bhavati iti . tataḥ akāragrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti anyat etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:655: vacane prayojanam . kim . yatra guṇaḥ pratiṣidhyate tadartham etat syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:656: nyakuṭīt , nyapuṭīt iti . yat tarhi ṇiśvyoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti tena na iha antaraṅgam asti iti darśayati . yat ca karoti akāragrahaṇam laghoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:657: kṛte api . tasmāt iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . tasmāt iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ āstheyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:658: (P_1,1.3.4) KA_I,49.24-50.16 Ro_I,161-163 ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogatvāt ignivṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogatvāt sarveṣām ikām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:659: asya api prāpnoti : dadhi madhu . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:661: sārvadhādukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ eva iti . prasāraṇe ca . prasāraṇe ca sarveṣam yaṇām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : yātā vātā .
GS24pmbhasuu:662: punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . viṣayārtham punarvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:663: viṣayārtham etat syāt . vacisvapiyajādīnām kiti eva iti . uḥ aṇ rapare ca
GS24pmbhasuu:664: . uḥ aṇ rapare ca sarvarkārāṇām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:665: kartṛ hartṛ . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:666_0: ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ime yogāḥ kartavyāḥ . ekaḥ tāvat kriyate tatra eva . imau api yogau
GS24pmbhasuu:666_1: ṣaṣṭhadhikāram anuvartiṣyete . atha vā ṣaṣṭhadhikāre imau yogau apekṣiṣyāmahe . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:667_0: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ bhavati iti iha kasmāt na bhavati : yātā vātā .
GS24pmbhasuu:667_1: idam tatra apekṣiṣyate ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti . yathā eva tarhi idam tatra apekṣiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:667_2: evam iha api tad apekṣiṣyāmahe sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ ikaḥ guṇavṛddhī* iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:668: (P_1,1.4.1) KA_I,51.2-13 Ro_I,164-166 dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt: lūñ lavitā lavitum pūñ pavitā pavitum . ārdhadhātuke iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:669_0: tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti . kim punaḥ idam ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam lopaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:669_1: : ārdhadhātukanimitte lope sati ye guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ te na bhavataḥ iti , āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:669_2: guṇavṛddhiviśeṣaṇam ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam dhātulope sati ārdhadhātukanimitte ye guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:669_3: prāpnutaḥ te na bhavataḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi lopaviśeṣaṇam upeddhaḥ preddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:670: . atha guṇavṛddhiviśeṣaṇam knopayati iti atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu lopaviśeṣaṇam . katham upeddhaḥ preddhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:671: bahiraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ antaraṅgaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:672: yadi evam na arthaḥ dhātugrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati: lūñ lavitā lavitum . ārdhadhātukanimitte lope pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:673_0: ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ lopaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu guṇavṛddhiviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:673_1: knopayati iti atra api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:675: yaṅyakkyavalope pratiṣedhaḥ . yaṅyakkyavalope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yaṅ:
GS24pmbhasuu:676_0: bebhiditā marīmṛjaḥ . yak: kuṣubhitā magadhakaḥ . kya: samidhitā dṛṣadakaḥ . valope
GS24pmbhasuu:676_1: : jīradānuḥ . kim prayojanam . numlopasrivyanubandhalope apratiṣedhārtham . numlope
GS24pmbhasuu:676_2: srivyanubandhalope ca pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:677: numlope: abhāji rāgaḥ upabarhaṇam . sriveḥ : āsremāṇam . anubandhalope :
GS24pmbhasuu:678: lūñ lavitā lavitum . yadi parigaṇanam kriyate syadaḥ, praśrathaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:679: himaśrathaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . vakṣyati etat nipātanāt syadādiṣu iti . tat tarhi parigaṇanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . numlope kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:680: bhavati . ikprakaraṇāt numlope vṛddhiḥ . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . yadi iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:681_0: pratiṣedhaḥ syadaḥ, praśrathaḥ, himaśrathaḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . iha ca prāpnoti:
GS24pmbhasuu:681_1: avodaḥ, edhaḥ, odmaḥ iti . nipātanāt syadādiṣu . nipātanāt syadādiṣu pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:681_2: bhaviṣyati na ca bhaviṣyati . yadi iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ srivyanubandhalope
GS24pmbhasuu:681_3: katham sriveḥ āsremāṇam lūñ lavitā . pratyayāśrayatvāt anyatra siddham . ārdhadhātukanimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:681_4: lope pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣaḥ ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ lopaḥ . yadi ārdhadhātukanimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:681_5: lope pratiṣedhaḥ jīradānuḥ atra na prāpnoti . raki jyaḥ prasāraṇam . na etat jīveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:681_6: rūpam . raki etat jyaḥ prasāraṇam . yāvatā ca idānīm raki jīveḥ api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:681_7: . katham upabarhaṇam . bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:682: lopaḥ ucyate anajādau api dṛśyate: nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ca ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:683: iḍādau api dṛśyate: nibarhitā nibarhitum iti . ajādau api na dṛśyate:
GS24pmbhasuu:684: bṛṃhayati bṛṃhakaḥ . tasmāt na arthaḥ parigaṇanena . yadi parigaṇanam na
GS24pmbhasuu:685_0: kriyate bhedyate chedyate atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dhātulope iti na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:685_1: vijñāyate: dhātoḥ lopaḥ dhātulopaḥ, dhātulope iti . katham tarhi . dhātoḥ lopaḥ asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:685_2: tat idam dhātulopam, dhātulope iti . tasmāt iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:686: guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pāpacakaḥ, pāpaṭhakaḥ, magadhakaḥ, dṛṣadakaḥ atra na prāpnoti . allopasya sthānivatvāt . akāralope kṛte tasya sthānivatvāt guṇavṛddhī na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:687_0: (P_1,1.4.3) KA_I,52.21-53.15 Ro_I,169-171 anārambhaḥ vā . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:687_1: yogasya nyāyyaḥ . katham bebhiditā, marīmṛjakaḥ, kuṣubhitā samidhitā iti . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:687_2: akāralope kṛte tasya sthānivatvāt guṇavṛddhī na bhaviṣyataḥ . yatra tarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:687_3: na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva ca sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti . yatra halacoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:687_4: ādeśaḥ: loluvaḥ popuvaḥ marīmṛjaḥ sarīsṛpaḥ iti . atra api akāralope kṛte tasya sthānivatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:687_5: guṇavṛddhī na bhaviṣyataḥ . luki kṛte na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam: luk kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:687_6: allopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt allopaḥ . nityaḥ luk . kṛte api allope
GS24pmbhasuu:687_7: prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . luk api anityaḥ . katham . anyasya kṛte allope prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:688: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . anavakāśaḥ tarhi luk.
GS24pmbhasuu:689: sāvakāśaḥ luk . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . avaśiṣṭaḥ . atham katham cit anavakāśaḥ luk syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . allope yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate : ataḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:690: tataḥ yasya : yasya ca lopaḥ bhavati . ataḥ iti eva . kimartham idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:691: lukam vakṣyati tadbādhanārtham . tato halaḥ . halaḥ uttarasya ca yasya lopaḥ bhavati iti . iha api paratvāt yogavibhāgāt va lopaḥ lukam bādheta:
GS24pmbhasuu:692: kṛṣṇaḥ nonāva vṛṣabhaḥ yadi idam . nonūyateḥ nonāva . samānāśrayaḥ luk lopena bādhyate . kaḥ ca samānāśrayaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ . atra ca prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:693: eva pratyayotpatteḥ luk bhavati . katham syadaḥ, praśrathaḥ, himaśrathaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:694: jīradānuḥ, nikucitaḥ iti . uktam śeṣe . kim uktam . nipātanāt syadādiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:695: pratyayāśratvāt anyatra siddham . raki jyaḥ prasāraṇam iti . nikucite api uktam sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:696: (P_1,1.5.1) KA_I,53.17-54.13 Ro_I,171-174 kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam . kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:697: kṅinnimitte ye guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ te na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . upadhāroravītyartham . upadhārtham roravītyartham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:698: upadhārtham tāvat : bhinnaḥ , bhinnavān iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . kṅiti iti ucyate . tena yatra kṅiti anantaraḥ guṇabhāvī asti
GS24pmbhasuu:699: tatra eva syāt: citam stutam . iha tu na syāt: bhinnaḥ , bhinnavān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:700: nanu ca yasya guṇaḥ ucyate tat kṅitparatvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:701: pugantalaghūpadhasya ca guṇaḥ ucyate tat ca atra kṅitparam .
GS24pmbhasuu:702_0: pugantalaghūpadhasya iti na evam vijñāyate : pugantasya aṅgasya laghūpadhasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:702_1: iti . katham tarhi . puki antaḥ pugantaḥ , laghvī upadhā laghūpadhā , pugantaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:703_0: pugantalaghūpadhasya iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . aṅgaviśeṣaṇe hi sati iha
GS24pmbhasuu:703_1: prasajyeta : bhinatti chinatti iti . roravītyartham ca . tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:703_2: roravīti iti . yadi tannimittagrahaṇam kriyate śacaṅante doṣaḥ . riyati piyati dhiyati
GS24pmbhasuu:705: kṛtayoḥ anupadhātvāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam kriyate ca idam tannimittagrahaṇam na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ bhavati . imāni ca bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:706: tannimittagrahaṇasya prayojanāni : hataḥ , hathaḥ , upoyate , auyata ,
GS24pmbhasuu:707: lauyamāniḥ , pauyamāniḥ , nenikte iti . na etāni santi prayojanāni . iha tāvat hataḥ , hathaḥ iti . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:708_0: nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum atra ca dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva akāraḥ . iha ca upoyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:708_1: auyata , lauyamāniḥ , pauyamāniḥ iti . bahiraṅge guṇavṛddhī antaraṅgaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:708_2: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . nenikte iti pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:709: (P_1,1.5.2) KA_I,54.13-55.5 Ro_I,175-177 upadhārthena tāvat na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:710_0: . dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātum kṅitparatvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . yadi dhātuḥ viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:710_1: vikaraṇasya na prāpnoti : cinutaḥ , sunutaḥ , lunītaḥ , punītaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:711_0: iti . dhātoḥ eva tarhi na prāpnoti . na evam vijñāyate dhātoḥ vihitasya kṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:711_1: . katham tarhi . dhātoḥ vihite kṅiti iti . atha vā kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:711_2: . yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . pugantalaghūpadhasya guṇaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:711_3: idam bhavati kṅiti na iti . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:712: etasmin yoge kṅidgrahaṇam tad anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:713_0: na bhaviṣyataḥ . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati upadhālakṣaṇasya guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:713_1: pratiṣedhaḥ iti yat ayam trasigṛdhidhṛṣikṣipeḥ knuḥ ikaḥ jhal halantāt ca iti knusanau
GS24pmbhasuu:713_2: kitau karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . kitkaraṇe etat prayojanam guṇaḥ katham na
GS24pmbhasuu:713_3: syāt iti . yadi ca atra guṇapratiṣedhaḥ na syāt kitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt . paśyati
GS24pmbhasuu:713_4: tu ācāryaḥ bhavati upadhālakṣaṇasya guṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ iti . tataḥ knusanau kitau
GS24pmbhasuu:713_5: karoti . roravītyarthena api na arthaḥ . kṅiti iti ucyate . na ca atra kṅitam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:713_6: . pratyayalakṣaṇena prāpnoti . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:713_7: atha api na lumatā aṅgasya iti ucyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . na lumatā lupte
GS24pmbhasuu:713_8: aṅgādhikāraḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim tarhi . yaḥ asau lumatā lupyate tasmin yat aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:714: bhavati iti . atha api āṅgādhikāraḥ pratinirdiśyate evam api na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:715: katham . kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:716_0: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ guṇaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam idam bhavati kṅiti na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:716_1: . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati . atha vā bahiraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:716_2: guṇaḥ antaraṅgaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:717: . atha vā pūrvasmin yoge yad ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam tat anavakāśam . tasya anavakāśatvāt guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:718: (P_1,1.5.3) KA_I,55.6-18 Ro_I,177-180 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:719: laigavāyanaḥ , kāmayate . taddhitakāmyoḥ ikprakaraṇāt . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca ete iglakṣaṇe . lakārasya ṅittvāt ādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:720: sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . lakārasya ṅittvāt ādeśeṣu sthānivadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti : acinavam asunavam akaravam . lakārasya ṅittvāt ādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:721_0: sthānivadbhāvaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanāt siddham . yat ayam yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:721_1: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ṅidādeśāḥ ṅitaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi etat jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:721_2: katham nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca iti . ṅitaḥ yat kāryam tat bhavati ṅiti yat kāryam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:721_3: na bhavati iti . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:722: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . yāsuṭaḥ eva ṅidvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:723: aparyāptaḥ ca eva hi yāsuṭ samudāyasya ṅittve ṅitam ca enam karoti . tasya etat prayojanam ṅitaḥ yat kāryam tat yathā syāt ṅiti yat kāryam tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:725: guṇavṛddhī mā bhūtām iti : ādīdhyanam ādīdhyakaḥ , āvevyanam āvevyakaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:726_0: . ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ akartum . katham . dīdhīvevyoḥ chandoviṣayatvāt dṛṣṭānuvidhitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:726_1: ca chandasaḥ adīdhet adīdhayuḥ iti ca guṇadarśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . dīdhīvevyoḥ chandoviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:727: dṛṣṭānuvidhitvāt ca chandasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:728: adīdhet , adīdhayuḥ iti ca guṇadarśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . prajapatiḥ vai yat kim cana manasā adīdhet .
GS24pmbhasuu:729_0: hotraya vṛtaḥ kṛpayan adīdhet . adīdhayuḥ dāśarājñe vṛtasaḥ . bhavet idam yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:729_1: udāharaṇam : adīdhet iti . idam tu ayuktam : adīdhayuḥ iti . ayam jusi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:730: kṅiti na iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam imam api bādhate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jusi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyamāṇaḥ tulyajātīyam pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:731: bādhate . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:732: prakṛtyāśrayaḥ ca ayam . atha vā yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:733_0: na ca aprāpte kṅiti na iti etasmin pratiṣedhe jusi guṇaḥ ārabhyate . asmin punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:733_1: prāpte ca aprāpte ca . yadi tarhi ayam yogaḥ na ārabhyate katham dīdhyat iti . dīdhyat
GS24pmbhasuu:733_2: iti śyanvyatyayena . dīdhyat iti śyan eṣaḥ vyatyayena bhaviṣyati . iṭaḥ ca api grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:733_3: śakyam akartum . katham akaṇiṣam araṇiṣam , kaṇitā śvaḥ , raṇitā śvaḥ iti . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:733_4: iṭ valādeḥ iti atra iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam iṭ eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:733_5: yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:734: guṇaḥ . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate pipaṭhiṣateḥ apratyayaḥ pipaṭḥīḥ : dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅgam yat kāryam tat niyamyate . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:735: āṅgam . atha vā asiddham dīrghatvam . tasya asiddhatvāt niyamaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:736_0: (P_1,1.7.1) KA_I,56.18-23 Ro_I,182-183 anantarāḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate : avidyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:736_1: antaram eṣām iti āhosvit avidyamānāḥ antarā eṣām iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:736_2: avidyamānam antaram eṣām iti avagrahe saṃyogasañjñā na prāpnoti apsu iti ap-su iti
GS24pmbhasuu:736_3: . vidyate hi atra antaram atha vijñāyate avidyamānāḥ antarā eṣām iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:736_4: . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . atha vā punaḥ astu avidyamānam antaram eṣām iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:736_5: ca uktam avagrahe saṃyogasañjñā na prāpnoti ap-su iti apsu iti . vidyate hi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:736_6: antaram iti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:737_0: (P_1,1.7.2) KA_I,56.24-57.26 Ro_I,183-186 saṃyogasañjñāyām sahavacanam yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:737_1: . saṃyogasañjñāyām sahavacanam kartavyam . halaḥ anantarāḥ saṃyogaḥ saha iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:737_2: . kim prayojanam . sahabhūtānām saṃyogasañjñā yathā syāt ekaikasya mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:737_3: yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra api yatra icchati sahabūtānām kāryam karoti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:738: saha supā . ubhe abhyastam saha iti . kim ca syāt yadi ekaikasya halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:739: saṃyogasañjñā syāt . iha niryāyāt , nirvāyāt , vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam prasajyeta . iha ca saṃhṛṣīṣṭa iti ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:740: prasajyeta . iha ca saṃhriyate iti guṇaḥ artisaṃyogādyoḥ iti guṇaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca dṛṣat karoti samit karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:741: prasajyeta . iha ca śaktā vastā iti skoḥ saṃyogādyoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:742: . iha ca niryātaḥ , nirvātaḥ saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:743_0: niṣṭhānatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate iha tāvat niryāyāt , nirvāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:743_1: vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:743_2: yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ , saṃyogādeḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:744: katham tarhi . saṃyogau ādī yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ , saṃyogādeḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:745: evam tāvat sarvam āṅgam parihṛtam . yat api ucyate iha ca dṛṣat karoti samit karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:746_0: saṃyogaḥ antaḥ yasya tat idam saṃyogāntam , saṃyogāntasya iti . katham tarhi . saṃyogau
GS24pmbhasuu:746_1: antau asya tad idam saṃyogāntam , saṃyogāntasya iti . yat api ucyate iha ca śaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:746_2: vastā iti skoḥ saṃyogādyoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogau
GS24pmbhasuu:746_3: ādī saṃyodādī saṃyogādyoḥ iti . katham tarhi . saṃyogayoḥ ādī saṃyogādī saṃyogādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:746_4: iti . yat api ucyate iha ca niryātaḥ , nirvātaḥ saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:746_5: niṣṭhānatvam prasajyeta iti . na evam vijñāyate saṃyogaḥ ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:747: , saṃyogādeḥ iti . katham tarhi . saṃyogau ādī yasya saḥ ayam saṃyogādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:748: saṃyogādeḥ iti . katham kṛtvā ekaikasya saṃyogasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā . tat yathā . vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:749_0: . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ : samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:749_1: gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam
GS24pmbhasuu:749_2: daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:750: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam vṛddhiguṇasañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:751_0: (P_1,1.7.3) KA_I,57.27-59.2 Ro_I,186-190 atha yatra bahūnām ānantaryam kim tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:751_1: dvayoḥ dvayoḥ saṃyogasñjñā bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samudāye
GS24pmbhasuu:751_2: saṃyogādilopaḥ masjeḥ . samudāye saṃyogādilopaḥ masjeḥ na sidhyati . maṅktā maṅktum
GS24pmbhasuu:752_0: nirmleyāt , nirmlāyāt : vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam na prāpnoti . iha ca saṃsvariṣīṣṭa
GS24pmbhasuu:752_1: iti ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iṭ na prāpnoti . iha ca saṃsvaryate iti guṇaḥ artisaṃyogādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:752_2: iti guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca gomān
GS24pmbhasuu:753_0: karoti yavamān karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca nirglānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:753_1: , nirmlānaḥ iti saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam na prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:753_2: tarhi dvayoḥ dvayoḥ . dvayoḥ haloḥ saṃyogaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . dvayoḥ haloḥ saṃyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:754: na sidhyati . indram icchati indrīyati . indrīyateḥ san : indidrīyiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:755_0: na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti dakārasya dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . na vā ajvidheḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:755_1: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ajvidheḥ . ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ na dviḥ ucyante . ajādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:755_2: iti vartate . atha yadi eva bahūnām saṃyogasñjñā atha api dvayoḥ dvayoḥ kim gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:755_3: etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:755_4: āha . katham . yada tāvat bahūnām saṃyogasñjñā tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate : avidyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:755_5: antaram eṣām iti . yadā dvayoḥ dvayoḥ tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate : avidyamānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:755_6: antarā eṣām iti . dvayoḥ ca eva antarā kaḥ cit vidyate na vā . evam api bahūnām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:755_7: prāpnoti . yān hi bhavān ṣaṣṭhyā pratinirdiśati eteṣām anyena vyavāye na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:755_8: . astu tarhi samudāye sañjñā . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:756: samudāye saṃyogādilopaḥ masjeḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:757_0: antyāt pūrvaḥ masjeḥ mit anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham iti . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa saṃyogasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:757_1: vijñāsyate dvayoḥ api bahūnām api . tatra dvayoḥ yā saṃyogasñjñā tadāśrayaḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:757_2: bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate iha ca nirgleyāt , nirglāyāt , nirmleyāt , nirmlāyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:757_3: : vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti ettvam na prāpnoti iti aṅgena saṃyogādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:757_4: . aṅgasya saṃyogādeḥ iti . evam tāvat sarvam āṅgam parihṛtam . yat api ucyate iha
GS24pmbhasuu:757_5: ca gomān karoti yavamān karoti iti saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:757_6: padena saṃyogāntam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . padasya saṃyogāntasya . yat api ucyate iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:757_7: nirglānaḥ , nirmlānaḥ iti saṃyogādeḥ ātaḥ dhātoḥ yaṇvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:758: iti niṣṭhānatvam na prāpnoti iti dhātuna saṃyogādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:760_1: halaḥ saṃyogasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . vyavahitānām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:760_2: . pacati panasam . nanu ca anantarāḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:761_0: tena vyavahitānām na bhaviṣyati . dṛṣṭam ānantaryam vyavahite . vyavahite api anantaraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:761_1: dṛśyate . tat yathā : anantarau imau grāmau iti ucyate . tayoḥ ca eva antarā nadyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:761_2: ca parvatāḥ ca bhavanti . yadi tarhi vyavahite api anantaraśabdaḥ bhavati ānantaryavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:761_3: idānīm kimartham syāt . ānantaryavacanam kimartham iti cet ekapratiṣedhārtham . ekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:761_4: halaḥ saṃyogasañjñā mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt yadi ekasya halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:762: saṃyogasañjñā syāt . iyeṣa , uvoṣa . ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām
GS24pmbhasuu:763: prasajyeta . na vā atajjātīyavyavāyāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:764: atajjātīyasya vyavāyāt . atajjātīyakam hi loke vyavadhāyakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:765: katham punaḥ jñāyate atajjātīyakam loke vyavadhāyakam bhavati iti . evam hi kam cit kaḥ cit pṛcchati . anantare* ete brāhmaṇakule* iti . saḥ āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:766: na anantare . vṛṣalakulam anayoḥ antarā iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam kva cit atajjātīyakam vyavadhāyakam bhavati kva cit na . sarvatra eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:767: atajjātīyakam vyavadhāyakam bhavati . katham anantarau imau grāmau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:768: grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva śālāsamudāye vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe vartate . tat yathā grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:769_0: praviṣṭaḥ . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ gataḥ , grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:769_1: asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ labdhaḥ iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:769_2: yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate : anantarau
GS24pmbhasuu:769_3: imau grāmau iti . sarvatra eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:772: iti . mukham ca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikam . mukhanāsikam vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . yadi evam mukhanāsikavacanaḥ iti prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:773: nipātanāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā mukhanāsikam āvacanam asya saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:774: ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . kim idam āvacanam iti . īṣadvacanam āvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:775: kim cit mukhavacanam kim cit nāsikāvacanam . mukhadvitīyā vā nāsikā
GS24pmbhasuu:776: vacanam asya saḥ ayam mukhanāsikāvacanaḥ . mukhopasaṃhitā vā nāsikā
GS24pmbhasuu:779_0: nāsikāvacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne yamānusvārāṇām eva prasajyeta . mukhagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:779_1: punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha nāsikāgrahaṇam kimartham . mukhavacanaḥ anunāsikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:779_2: iti iyati ucyamāne kacaṭatapānām eva prasajyeta . nāsikāgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:779_3: doṣaḥ bhavati mukhagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm ubhayavacanānām bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:780: prāsādavāsinyāyena . tat yathā . ke cit prāsādavāsinaḥ ke cit bhūmivāsinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:781: ke cit ubhayavāsinaḥ . ye prāsādavāsinaḥ gṛhyante te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena . ye bhūmivāsinaḥ gṛhyante te bhūmivāsinyāyena . ye ubhayavāsinaḥ gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:782_0: te prāsādavāsigrahaṇena bhūmivāsinyāyena ca . evam iha api ke cit mukhavacanāḥ ke
GS24pmbhasuu:782_1: cit nāsikāvacanāḥ ke cit ubhayavacanāḥ . tatra ye mukhavacanāḥ gṛhyante te mukhagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:782_2: . ye nāsikāvacanāḥ gṛhyante te nāsikāgrahaṇena . ye ubhayavacanāḥ gṛhyante eva te
GS24pmbhasuu:783: nāsikāgrahaṇena ca. bhavet ubhayavacanānām siddham . yamānusvārāṇām api prāpnoti . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:784: (P_1,1.8.3) KA_I,60.17-26 Ro_I,194-195 itaretarāśrayam tu bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sataḥ anunāsikasya sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:785: nāma anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . anunāsikasañjñāyām itaretarāśraye uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:786: siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:787_0: anunāsikasya sañjñā kriyate . na sañjñayā anunāsikaḥ bhāvyate . yadi tarhi nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:787_1: śabdāḥ kimartham śāstram . kimartham śāstram iti cet nivartakatvāt siddham . nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:787_2: śāstram . katham . āṅ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ ananunāsikaḥ . tasya sarvatra ananunāsikabuddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:787_3: prasaktā . tatra anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . chandasi aci parataḥ āṅaḥ ananunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:789_0: (P_1,1.9.1) KA_I,61.2-7 Ro_I,195-197 tulayā sammitam tulyam . āsyam ca prayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:789_1: ca āsyaprayatnam . tulyāsyam tulyaprayatnam ca savarṇasañjñam bhavati . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:789_2: āsyam . laukikam āsyam oṣṭhāt prabhṛti prāk kākalakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:790: . katham punaḥ āsyam . asyanti anena varṇān iti āsyam . annam etat āsyandate iti vā āsyam . atha kaḥ prayatnaḥ . prayatanam prayatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:791: prapūrvāt yatateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ naṅpratyayaḥ . yadi laukikam āsyam kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam bhavati . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:793: (P_1,1.9.2) KA_I,61.8-62.14 Ro_I,197-202 savarṇasañjñāyām bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt . savarṇasañjñāyām bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:794: bhavati jabagaḍadaśām . kim kāraṇam . prayatnasāmānyāt . eteṣām hi samānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:795: prayatnaḥ . siddham tu āsye tulyadeśaprayatnam savarṇam . siddham etat.
GS24pmbhasuu:796: katham . āsye yeṣām tulyaḥ deśaḥ yatnaḥ ca te savarṇasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . evam api kim āsyopādāne prayojanam . sarveṣām hi tat tulyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:797_0: prayatnaviśeṣaṇam āsyopādānam . santi hi āsyāt bāhyāḥ prayatnāḥ . te hāpitāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:797_1: . teṣu satsu asatsu api savarṇasañjñā sidhyati . ke punaḥ te . vivārasaṃvārau śvāsanādau
GS24pmbhasuu:797_2: ghoṣavadaghoṣatā alpaprāṇatā mahāprāṇatā iti . tatra vargāṇām prathamadvitīyāḥ vivṛtakaṇṭhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:797_3: śvāsānupradānāḥ aghoṣāḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . tṛtīyacaturthāḥ saṃvṛtakaṇṭhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:797_4: nādānupradānāḥ ghoṣavantaḥ . eke alpaprāṇāḥ apare mahāprāṇāḥ . yathā tṛtīyāḥ tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:797_5: pañcamāḥ ānunāsikyavarjam . ānunāsikyam teṣām adhikaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:798_0: . evam api avarṇasya savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . bāhyam hi āsyāt sthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:798_1: avarṇasya . sarvamukhasthānam avarṇam eke icchanti . evam api vyapadeśaḥ na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:799_0: vyapadeśivadbhāvena vyapadeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:799_1: eva astu . nanu ca uktam savarṇasañjñayām bhinnadeśeṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ prayatnasāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:799_2: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi laukikam āsyam . kim tarhi . taddhitāntam āsyam : āsye
GS24pmbhasuu:799_3: bhavam āsyam śarīrāvayavāt yat . kim punaḥ āsye bhavam . sthānam karaṇam ca . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:799_4: api prayatnaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . prayatnaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . na hi prayatanam
GS24pmbhasuu:799_5: prayatnaḥ . kim tarhi . prārambhaḥ yatnasya prayatnaḥ . yadi prārambhaḥ yatnasya
GS24pmbhasuu:799_6: prayatnaḥ evam api avarṇasya eṅoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . praśliṣṭavarṇau etau
GS24pmbhasuu:799_7: . avarṇasya tarhi aicoḥ ca savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . vivṛtatarāvarṇau etau . etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:799_8: eva tarhi mithaḥ savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . na etau tulyasthānau . udāttādīnām tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:799_9: savarṇasañjñā na prāpnoti . abhedakāḥ udāttādayaḥ . atha vā kim naḥ etena prārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:800: yatnasya prayatnaḥ iti .prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ . tat eva ca taddhitāntam āsyam . yat samānam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . kim sati bhede . sati iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:801: sati eva hi bhede savarṇasañjñayā bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:802: bhedādhiṣṭhānā hi savarṇasañjñā . yadi hi yatra sarvam samānam tatra syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . yadi tarhi sati bhede kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:803_0: samānam iti kṛtva savarṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati śakārachakārayoḥ ṣakāraṭhakārahoḥ sakārathakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_1: savarṇasañjñā prāpnoti . eteṣām hi sarvam anyat samānam karaṇavarjam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:803_2: prayatanam eva prayatnaḥ tat eva taddhitāntam āsyam na tu ayam dvandvaḥ : āsyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:803_3: prayatnaḥ ca āsyaprayatnam iti . kim tarhi . tripadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ : tulyaḥ āsye prayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_4: eṣām iti . atha vā pūrvaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ : tulyaḥ āsye tulyāsyaḥ , tulyāsyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_5: prayatnaḥ eṣām iti . atha vā paraḥ tatpuruṣaḥ tataḥ bahuvrīhiḥ : āsye yatnaḥ āsyayatnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:803_6: , tulyaḥ āsyayatnaḥ eṣām iti (P_1,1.9.3) KA_I,62.15-26 Ro_I,202-203 tasya . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:804: . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ tasya savarṇasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:805: yathā syāt . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:806: tasya avacanam vacanaprāmāṇyāt . tasya iti na vaktavyam . anyasya tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:808: tulyāsyaprayatnaḥ saḥ anyasya savarṇasañjñaḥ syāt savarṇasañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:809: tulyam etat . tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ : mātari vartitavyam , pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti
GS24pmbhasuu:810_0: sambandhāt ca etat gamyate yā yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api tulyāsyaprayatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:810_1: savarṇam iti atra sambandiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam : yat prati
GS24pmbhasuu:810_2: yat tulyāsyaprayatnam tat prati tat savarṇasañjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:811_1: savarṇasañjñā vidheyā . hotṛ , ḷkāraḥ , hotṝḷkāraḥ . kim prayojanam . akaḥ savarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:811_2: dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:812: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . savarṇadīrghatve ṛti , rṛvāvacanam ḷti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:813: lḷvāvacanam iti . tat savarṇe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : dadhi , ḷkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:814_0: madhu , ḷkāraḥ iti . yat etat savarṇadīrghatve ṛti iti etat ṛtaḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:814_1: ḷti . ḷti ca vā lḷ bhavati . ṛtaḥ iti eva . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:814_2: vaktavyam . ūkālaḥ ac hrasvardīrghaplutasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca rṛkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:815: asti . rṛkārasya , lḷkārasya ca actvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam plutaḥ yathā syāt : hotṛ , ṛkāraḥ hotṝkāraḥ , hotṛ3kāraḥ , hotṛ , ḷkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:816: hotḷkāraḥ , hotḷ3kāraḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . savarṇasañjñāvacanam eva jyāyaḥ . dīrghatvam ca eva hi siddham bhavati. api ca ṛkāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:817: ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati . yathā iha bhavati : ṛti akaḥ: khaṭva ṛśyaḥ , māla ṛśyaḥ idam api saṅgṛhītam bahavati : khaṭva , ḷkāraḥ, māla ,
GS24pmbhasuu:818: ḷkāraḥ iti . vā supi āpiśaleḥ : uparkārīyati , upārkārīyati , idam api siddham bhavati : upalkārīyati, upālkārīyati iti . yadi tarhi ṛkāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:819: ḷkāragrahaṇam sannihitam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ , ḷkārasya api raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:820_0: prāpnoti . ḷkārasya laparatvam vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam asatyām savarṇasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:820_1: vidhyartham . tat eva satyām rephabādhanārtham bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi raṣābhyām naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:820_2: ṇaḥ samānapade iti ṛkāragrahaṇam coditam mātṝṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:821: , pitṝṇām iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti : kḷpyamānam paśya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:822_0: atha asatyām api savarṇasañjñāyām iha kasmāt na bhavati : prakḷpyamānam paśya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:822_1: . cuṭutulaśarvyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi . aparaḥ āha : tribhiḥ ca madhyamaiḥ vargaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:822_2: laśasaiḥ ca vyavāye na iti vakṣyāmi iti . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:822_3: iti yaḥ asau ḷkāre lakāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi evam na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:823: ṛkāragrahaṇena . varṇaikadeśāḥ ca varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante iti yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam ṇatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:824_0: (P_1,1.10) KA_I,63.25-65.6 Ro_I,207-211 ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ ajjhaltvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:824_1: . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:824_2: kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva hi śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:824_3: savarṇagrahaṇena śakāram api gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:825: . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:826: siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham anactvam . spṛṣṭam sparśānām karaṇam . īṣatspṛṣṭam antaḥsthānām . vivṛtam ūṣmaṇām . īṣat iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:827: . svarāṇām vivṛtam . īṣat iti nivṛttam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:828: vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā siddham etat . kim idam vākyāparisamāpteḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:829_0: varṇānām upadeśaḥ tāvat . upadeśottarakālā itsañjñā . itsañjñottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena
GS24pmbhasuu:829_1: saha itā iti pratyāhāraḥ . pratyāhārottarakālā savarṇasañjñā . savarṇasañjñottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:829_2: aṇ udit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ iti savarṇagrahaṇam . etena sarveṇa samuditena vākyena
GS24pmbhasuu:830: grahaṇam bhavati . ca ca atra ikāraḥ śakāram gṛhṇāti . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:831: ikāraḥ śakāram na gṛhṇāti evam īkāram api na gṛhṇīyāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:832: kumārī , īhate kumārīhate . akaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti pratyāhāragrahaṇam tata ikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:833_0: īkāram gṛhṇāti . śakāram na gṛhṇāti . aparaḥ āha : ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:833_1: ajhaltvāt . ajjhaloḥ pratiṣedhe śakārasya śakāreṇa savarṇasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:833_2: . kim kāraṇam . ajjhaltvāt . ac ca eva śakāraḥ hal ca . katham tāvat actvam . ikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:834_0: api gṛhṇāti iti actvam . halṣu upadeśāt haltvam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:834_1: doṣaḥ . tatra savarṇalope doṣaḥ bhavati . paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:834_2: iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham anactvāt . siddham etat . katham . anactvāt . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:834_3: anactvam . vākyāparisamāpteḥ vā . uktā vākyāparisamāptiḥ . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:834_4: asamarthitam bhavati . etat ca samarthitam . katham . astu vā śakārasya śakāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:834_5: savarṇasañjñā mā vā bhūt . nanu ca uktam : paraśśatāni kāryāṇi . jharaḥ jhari savarṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:835: prāpnoti iti . mā bhūt lopaḥ . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . sati lope dviśakāram asati lope triśakāram . na asti bhedaḥ . asati api lope
GS24pmbhasuu:836: dviśakāram eva . katham . vibhāṣā dvirvacanam . evam api bhedaḥ . asati lope kadā cit dviśakāram kadā cit triśakāram sati lope dviśakāram eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:837: saḥ eṣaḥ katham bhedaḥ na syāt . yadi nityaḥ lopaḥ syāt . vibhāṣā tu saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:840_0: pragṛhyasañjñā ucyate . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti tatkālānām savarṇānām grahaṇam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:840_1: syāt . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . plutānām
GS24pmbhasuu:840_2: tu pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . atatkālatvāt . na hi plutāḥ tatkālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:841: tasyāsiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:842: katham jñāyate siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:843_0: aci iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:843_1: kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . aplutāt aplute iti etat na
GS24pmbhasuu:843_2: vaktavyam bhavati . kim ataḥ yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . sañjñāvidhau asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:843_3: . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti . sañjñāvidhau ca siddhaḥ . katham . kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:843_4: sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:844_0: upasthitam idam bhavati īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iti . kim punaḥ plutasya pragṛhyasañjñāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:844_1: prayojanam . pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam . plutaḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:844_2: iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . upasthite hi doṣaḥ syāt . aplutavat upasthithe
GS24pmbhasuu:844_3: iti atra paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : vadvacanam plutakāryapratiṣedhārtham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:845: plutapratiṣedhe hi pragṛhyplutapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ anyena vihitatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:846_0: tasmāt plutasya pragṛhyasañjñā eṣitavyā pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:846_1: yadi punaḥ dīrghāṇām ataparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyeta . evam api ekāraḥ eva ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:846_2: savarṇān gṛhṇīyāt . īkārokārau na gṛhṇīyātām . kim kāraṇam . anaṇtvāt . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:846_3: hrasvānām ataparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:847_0: tasmāt dīrghāṇām eva taparāṇām pragṛhyasañjñā vaktavyā . dīrghāṇām ca ucyamānā plutānām
GS24pmbhasuu:847_1: na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kim naḥ etena yatnena yat siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:847_2: . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt tatkālāḥ eva bhavanti iti . katham yat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:848: aci iti. plutabhāvī prakṛtyā iti evam etat vijñāyate . katham yat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:849: prayojanam uktam . kriyate tat nyāse eva aplutāt aplute iti . evam api yat
GS24pmbhasuu:850_0: siddhe pragṛhyakāryam tat plutasya na prāpnoti . aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:850_1: . evam tarhi kim naḥ etena kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti . yathoddeśam eva sañjñāparibhāṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:852: (P_1,1.11.2) KA_I,67.3-68.7 Ro_I,217-220 katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:853: īdādayaḥ yat dvivacanam iti āhosvit īdādyantam yat dvivacanam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . īdādayaḥ dvivacanam pragṛhyāḥ iti cet antyasya vidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:854: īdādayaḥ dvivacanam pragṛhyāḥ iti cet antyasya pragṛhyasañjñā vidheyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:855: pacete* iti , pacethe* iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:856: kim . khaṭve* iti , māle* iti . astu tarhi īdādyantam yat dvivacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:857_0: īdādyantam iti cet ekasya vidhiḥ . īdādyantam iti cet ekasya pragṛhyasañjñā vidheyā
GS24pmbhasuu:857_1: . khaṭve* iti , māle* iti . na vā ādyantatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:857_2: ādyantatvāt . ādyantavat ekasmin iti ekasya api bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:858: . īdādyantam dvivacanāntam iti cet luki pratiṣedhaḥ . īdādyantam dvivacanāntam iti cet luki pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kumāryoḥ agāram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:859_0: kumāryagāram vadhvoḥ agāram , vadhvagāram . etat hi īdādyantam ca śrūyate dvivacanāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:859_1: ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena . saptamyām arthagrahaṇam jñāpakam pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:859_2: . yat ayam īdūtau ca saptamyarthe iti arthagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:859_3: na pragṛhyasañjñāyām pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti . tat tarhi jñāpkārtham arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:859_4: kartavyam . na kartavyam . īdādibhiḥ dvivacanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:860_0: īdādiviśiṣṭena ca dvivacanena tadantavidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . īdādyantam yat dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:860_1: tadantam īdādyantam iti . evam api aśukle vastre śukle sampadyetām , śuklī āstām
GS24pmbhasuu:860_2: vastre* iti atra prāpnoti . atra hi īdādi
GS24pmbhasuu:861_0: dvivacanam tadantam ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena . atra api akṛte śībhāve luk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:861_1: . idam iha sampradhāryam . luk kriyatām śībhāvaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:861_2: śībhāvaḥ . nityaḥ luk . kṛte api śībhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:862: prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityaḥ luk . anyasya kṛte śībhāve prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:863_0: .śībhāvaḥ api anityaḥ . na hi kṛte luki prāpnoti . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt śībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:863_1: śībhāve kṛte luk . atha api katham cit nityaḥ luk syāt evam api doṣaḥ . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:864: sañjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhipratiṣedhārtham iti. idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:865: pratyayagrahaṇam ayam ca api sañjñāvidhiḥ . avaśyam khalu etasmin api pakṣe ādyantavadbhāvaḥ eṣitavyaḥ . tasmāt astu saḥ eva madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:867_0: asiddhatvāt ayāvekādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . māt pragṛhyasañjñāyām tasya īttvasya ūttvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:867_1: ca asiddhatvāt ayāvekādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . amī* atra
GS24pmbhasuu:867_2: , amī* āsate , amū* atra , amū* āsāte . nanu ca pragṛhyasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt ayādayaḥ
