GS24pmbhasuu:867_3: na bhaviṣyanti . vacanārthaḥ hi siddhe . na idam vacanāt labhyam . asti hi anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:868: . kim . yat siddhe pragṛhyasañjñākāryam tadartham etat syāt . aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ iti . na ekam prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:869: yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ adasaḥ na iti . vipratiṣedhāt vā . atha vā pragṛhyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:870_0: kriyatām ayādayaḥ vā . pragṛhyasañjñā bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:870_1: vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvā ca pragṛhyasañjñā pare ayādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:871: sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi parā eva pragṛhyasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:872: katham . kāryakālam hi sañjñāparibhāṣam . yatra kāryam tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti etat upasthitam bhavati adasaḥ māt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:873: . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . katham . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:874: . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . ecām ayādayaḥ . īdūtoḥ pragṛhyasñjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:875: na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim tarhi . asambhavaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:876_0: saḥ ca asti atra asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ . pragṛhyasañjñā abhinirvartamānā
GS24pmbhasuu:876_1: ayādīn bādhate , ayādayaḥ abhinirvartamanāḥ pragṛhyasañjñānimittam vighnanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:876_2: eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:876_3: . satoḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati . na ca atra īttvottve staḥ na api makāraḥ . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:876_4: asiddham . āśrayāt siddhatvam ca yathā roḥ uttve . āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:876_5: . tat yathā ruḥ uttve āśrayāt siddhaḥ bhavati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ruḥ uttve āśrayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:876_6: siddhaḥ bhavati na punaḥ yatra eva ruḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:877: tatra eva uttvam api ucyate . na evam śakyam . asiddhe hi uttve
GS24pmbhasuu:878: ādguṇāprasiddhiḥ . asiddhe hi uttve ādguṇāprasiddhiḥ syāt . vṛkṣaḥ atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:879_0: plakṣaḥ atra . tasmāt tatra āśrayāt siddhatvam eṣitavyam . tatra yathā āśrayāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:879_1: bhavati evam iha api bhaviṣyati . atha vā pragṛhyasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt ayādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:879_2: ādeśāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . adasaḥ . adasaḥ īdādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:880_0: . tataḥ māt . māt ca pare īdādayaḥ pragṛhyasañjñāḥ bhavanti . adasaḥ iti eva . kimarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:880_1: yogavibhāgaḥ . ekaḥ yat tat siddhe pragṛhyakāryam tadarthaḥ . aparaḥ yat asiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:880_2: . iha api tarhi prāpnoti : amuyā , amuyoḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi pragṛhyasañjñā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:880_3: . pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . padāntaprakaraṇe prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:881: padāntaḥ . evam api amuke atra atra api prāpnoti . dvivacanam iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:882: . yadi dvivacanam iti vartate amī* atra iti na prāpnoti . evam tarhi edantam iti nivṛttam . atha vā āha ayam adasaḥ māt iti . na ca īttvottve
GS24pmbhasuu:883: staḥ na api makāraḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ mārthāt īdādyarthānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:884_0: uktam vā . kim uktam . adasaḥ īttvottve svare bahiṣpadalakṣaṇe pragṛhyasañjāyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:884_1: siddhe vaktavye iti . tatra saki doṣaḥ . tatra sakakāre doṣaḥ bhavati . amuke atra
GS24pmbhasuu:884_2: . na vā grahaṇaviśeṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . grahaṇaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:884_3: . na mādgrahaṇena īdādyantam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . īdādayaḥ viśeṣyante . māt pare
GS24pmbhasuu:886_0: (P_1,1.13) KA_I,70.5-10 Ro_I,226-227 iha kasmāt na bhavati : kāśe kuśe vaṃśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:886_1: . śe arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavataḥ śeśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca ayam arthavān . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:886_2: api hariśe babhruśe iti atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:886_3: eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:887: iti . ekaḥ atra vibhaktyarthena arthavān aparaḥ taddhitārthena . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:888_0: (P_1,1.14) KA_I,70.12-71.7 Ro_I,227-230 nipātaḥ iti kimartham . cakāra atra , jahāra
GS24pmbhasuu:888_1: atra . ekāc iti kimartham . pra idam brahma , pra idam kṣatram . ekāc iti api ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:888_2: atra api prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi ekāc .
GS24pmbhasuu:889_0: ekāc iti na ayam bahuvrīhiḥ : ekaḥ ac asmin saḥ ayam ekāc iti . kim tarhi . tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:889_1: ayam samānādhikaraṇaḥ : ekaḥ ac ekāc . yadi tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:889_2: ekagrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati : pra idam brahma , pra idam kṣatram . ac eva
GS24pmbhasuu:889_3: yaḥ nipātaḥ iti evam vijñāsyate . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:890: . yadi hi yat ca ac ca anyat ca tatra syāt ajgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:891: asti anyat ajgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim. ajantasya yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:892: halantasya mā bhūt . na eva doṣaḥ na prayojanam . evam api kutaḥ etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ ādyantavat ekasmin iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:893: yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti ca iyam iha paribhāṣā bhaviṣyati ādyantavat ekasmin iti iyam na bhaviṣyati yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:894_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati ādyantavat ekasmin iti iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:894_1: na bhavati yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti yat ayam anāṅ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:894_2: tarhi siddhe sati yat ajgrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:895_0: bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:895_1: siddham iti yat uktam tat upapannam bhavati . anāṅ iti kimartham . ā , udakāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:895_2: odakāntāt . iha kasmāt na bhavati: ā* evam nu manyase , ā* evam kila tat iti . sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:896: ca atra ākāraḥ . kva punaḥ ayam sānubandhakaḥ kva niranubandhakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:897: īṣadarthe kriyāyoge maryādābhividhau ca yaḥ etam ātam ṅitam vidyāt vākyasmaraṇayoḥ aṅit .

GS24pmbhasuu:899: utāho* iti . na etat asti prayojanam . nipātasamāhāraḥ ayam : āha , u :
GS24pmbhasuu:900: āho* iti, uta , āha , u : utāho* iti . tatra nipātaḥ ekāc anāṅ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:901: siddham . evam tarhi ekanipātāḥ ime . atha vā pratiṣiddhārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ : o ṣu yātam marutaḥ , oṣu yātam bṛhatī śakvarī ca , o cit sakhāyam sakhya vavṛtyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:902: (P_1,1.15.2) KA_I,71.14-21 Ro_I,231-233 otaḥ cvipratiṣedhaḥ . odantaḥ nipātaḥ iti atra cvyantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anadaḥ , adaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:903_0: abhavat : adobhavat , tirobhavat . na vaktavyam . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:903_1: eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati . evam api agauḥ gauḥ sampadyate gobhavat : atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:903_2: . evam tarhi gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye kāryasamprayayaḥ iti . tat yathā : gauḥ anubandhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:903_3: ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:903_4: : gauḥ tiṣthati . gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:903_5: śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve .
GS24pmbhasuu:904: (P_1,1.17-18.1) KA_I,71.23-72.6 Ro_I,233-234 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:905_0: āho* iti , utāho* iti . uñaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra uñam paśyāmaḥ . uñaḥ ayam anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:905_1: saha ekādeśaḥ uñgrahaṇena gṛhyate . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na uñekādeśaḥ uñgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:905_2: gṛhyate iti yat ayam ot iti odantasya nipātasya pragṛhyasañjñām śāsti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:905_3: jñāpakam . uktam etat pratiṣiddhārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . doṣaḥ khalu api syāt yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:906: uñgrahaṇena na gṛhyeta : jānu , u . asya rujati jānū* asya rujati jānvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:907: rujati . mayaḥ uñaḥ vaḥ vā iti vatvam na syāt . evam tarhi ekanipātāḥ ime
GS24pmbhasuu:908: . atha vā dvau ukārau imau ekaḥ ananubandhakaḥ aparaḥ sānubandhakaḥ . tat yaḥ ananubandhakaḥ tasya eṣaḥ ekādeśaḥ .
