GS24pmbhasuu:909_3: anunāsikaḥ pragṛhyasañjñakaḥ ca uṃ iti . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ . uṃ vā śākalyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:909_4: . śākalyasya ācāryasya matena uṃ vibhāṣā yathā syāt : ūṃ iti , u* iti . anyeṣām ācāryāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:910: (P_1,1.19) KA_I,72.15-73.18 Ro_I,235-238 īdūtau saptamī iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:911: īdūtau saptamī iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ arthagrahaṇena . lupte arthagrahaṇāt bhavet . luptāyam saptamyām pragṛhyasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:912: . somo gaurī adhi śritaḥ . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:913: yatnam na sidhyati iti evamartham arthagrahaṇam . na atra saptamī lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:914_0: . kim tarhi . pūrvasavarṇaḥ atra bhavati . pūrvasya cet savarṇaḥ asau āḍāmbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:914_1: prasajyate . yadi pūrvasavarṇaḥ āṭ āmbhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam īdūtau
GS24pmbhasuu:914_2: saptamī iti na sa asti saptamī īdūtau . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:915: asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . yatra saptamyāḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:916_0: ucyate : dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam iti . sati prayojane iha na prāpnoti somo
GS24pmbhasuu:916_1: gaurī adhi śritaḥ iti . tatra api sarasī yadi . tatra api siddham . katham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:916_2: sarasīśabdasya pravṛttiḥ asti . asti ca loke
GS24pmbhasuu:917: sarasīśabdasya pravṛttiḥ . katham . dakṣiṇāpathe hi mahānti sarāṃsi sarasyaḥ iti ucyante . jñāpakam syāt tadantatve . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:918_0: ācāryaḥ na pragṛhyasañjñāyām pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:918_1: . kumāryoḥ agāram kumāryagāram , vadhvoḥ agāram vadhvagāram . pratyayalakṣaṇena pragṛhyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:918_2: na bhavati . mā vā pūrvapadasya bhūt . atha vā pūrvapadasya mā bhūt iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:918_3: arthagrahaṇam : vāpyām aśvaḥ vāpyaśvaḥ , nadyām ātiḥ nadyātiḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:918_4: arthagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ iti . atha ajahatsvārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:918_5: vṛttau doṣaḥ eva . ajahatsvārthāyām ca na doṣaḥ . samudāyārthaḥ abhidhīyate . īdutau
GS24pmbhasuu:918_6: saptamī iti eva lupte arthagrahaṇāt bhavet pūrvasya cet savarṇaḥ asau āḍāmbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:918_7: prasajyate vacanāt yatra dīrghatvam tatra api sarasī yadi jñāpakam syāt tadantatve
GS24pmbhasuu:919: (P_1,1.20.1) KA_I,73.20-74.22 Ro_I,239-241 ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam śidartham. ghusañjñāyām prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:920: dādhāprakṛtayaḥ ghusañjñā bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:921_0: āttvabhūtānām iyam sañjñā kriyate . sā āttvabhūtānām eva syāt anāttvabhūtānām na
GS24pmbhasuu:921_1: syāt . nanu ca bhūyiṣthāni ghusañjñākāryāṇi ārdhadhātuke tatra ca ete āttvabhūtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:921_2: dṛśyante . śidartham . śidartham prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . śiti āttvam pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:922: praṇidayate praṇidhayati iti . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti ghusañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:924: kim prayojanam . śidartham vikṛtārtham ca . śiti udāhṛtam . vikṛtārtham khalu api : praṇidātā praṇidhātā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:925_0: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam ye āttvabhūtāḥ teṣām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:925_1: syāt . lakṣaṇena ye āttvabhūtāḥ teṣām na syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:925_2: katham idam vijñāyate . dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:926_0: dādhām prakṛtayaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:926_1: doṣaḥ . āttvabhūtānām eva syāt anāttvabhūtānām na syāt . atha vijñāyate dādhām prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:926_2: iti anāttvabhūtānām eva syāt āttvabhūtānām na syāt . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:926_3: dādhāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti na api dādhām prakṛtayaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dādhāḥ ghusañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:926_4: bhavanti prakṛtayaḥ ca eṣām iti . tat tarhi prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:926_5: . idam prakṛtam arthagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . īdūtau ca saptamyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:927: iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi dādhāḥ ghu adāp . arthe iti . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:928: dadātinā samānārthān rātirāsatidāśatimaṃhatiprīṇātiprabhṛtīn āhuḥ . eteṣām api ghusañjñā prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam
GS24pmbhasuu:929: prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . śidarthena tāvat na arthaḥ prakṛtigrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:930: avaśyam tatra mārtham prakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam praṇimayate praṇyamayata iti evamartham . tat purastāt apakrakṣyate : ghuprakṛtau māprakṛtau ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:931: . yadi prakṛtigrahaṇam kriyate praniminoti pranimīnāti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:932: atha akriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati : pranimātā pranimātum iti . ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:933: akriyamāṇe prakṛtigrahaṇe ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate evam kriyamāṇe api prakṛtigrahaṇe ākārāntasya ṅitaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:934: vikṛtārthena ca api na arthaḥ . doṣaḥ eva etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti gāmādāgrahaṇeṣu aviśeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:937_0: dādhāḥ ghusañjñāḥ bhavanti iti ghusañjñā prāpnoti . samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ arthavadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:937_1: . samānaśabdānām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . ghusañjñā kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:937_2: na bhavati . arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavatoḥ dādhoḥ grahaṇam . na ca etau arthavantau
GS24pmbhasuu:937_3: . anupasargāt vā . atha vā yatkriyāyuktās prādayaḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:938_0: dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ . yadi evam iha api tarhi na prāpnoti praṇidāpayati praṇidhāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:938_1: . atra api na etau dādhau arthavantau na api etau dādhau prati kriyāyogaḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:939: tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:940: arthavataḥ āgamaḥ tadguṇībhūtaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:941: tat yathā . anyatra api arthavataḥ āgamaḥ arthavadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . kva anyatra . lavitā cikīrṣitā iti . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:942_0: āgamaśāsanam syāt na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:942_1: . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:943: śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:944: sarve sarvapadādeśāḥ dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre hi nityatvam na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:946: ittve . dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve vaktavyaḥ . upādāsta asya svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:947: śikṣakasya iti . mīnātiminoti iti āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it ca iti ittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:948: prāpnoti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam doṣaḥ jāyate . kim prakṛtigrahaṇāt āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:949: rūpagrahaṇāt . rūpagrahaṇāt iti āha . iha khalu prakṛtigrahaṇāt doṣaḥ jāyate : upadidīṣate . sani mīmāghurabhalabha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:950: dāprakṛtiḥ iti ucyate . na ca iyam dāprakṛtiḥ . ākārāntānām ejantāḥ prakṛtayaḥ ejantānām api īkārāntāḥ . na ca prakṛtiprakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:951: prakṛtigrahaṇena gṛhyate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ghusañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:954_0: anejantatvāt . dāppratiṣedhe daipi pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti : avadātam mukham . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:954_1: ca āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:954_2: . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:954_3: . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ pitpratiṣedhāt vā . atha vā dādhāḥ ghu apit iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:955: vaktavyam . adāp iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta : praṇidāpayati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:956_0: śakyam tāvat anena adāp iti bruvatā bāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vijñātum . sūtram tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:956_1: bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam dappratiṣedhe na daipi iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:956_2: etat siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt iti . atha ekānteṣu doṣaḥ eva . ekānteṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:956_3: na doṣaḥ . āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:957_0: pakāralope kṛte bhaviṣyati . na hi ayam tadā dāp bhavati . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:957_1: . etat ca atra yuktam yat sarveṣu eva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:957_2: . anaimittikaḥ hi anubandhalopaḥ tāvati eva bhavati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:957_3: na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:957_4: āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti . atha vā dāp eva ayam na daip asti . katham avadāyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:957_5: iti . śyan vikaraṇaḥ bhaviṣyati (P_1,1.21.1) KA_I,76.16-78.2 Ro_I,247-252 kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:957_6: idam ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam . sati anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:958: pūrvam na asti param asti saḥ ādiḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin yasmāt param na asti pūrvam asti saḥ antaḥ iti ucyate . sati anyasmin ādyantavadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:959_0: etasmāt kāraṇāt ekasmin ādyantāpadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi na sidhyanti . iṣyante ca syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:959_1: . tāni antareṇa yatnam na sidhyanti iti ekasmin ādyantavadvacanam . evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:959_2: ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:959_3: vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:959_4: . kim prayojanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham . vakṣyati ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:960: . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva : syāt papāca papāṭha . iyāya , āra iti atra na syāt . vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:961: ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . vakṣyati ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:962: avayavaṣaṣṭhī eva iti . etasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt : kariṣyati hariṣyati . iha na syāt : indraḥ mā vakṣat , saḥ devan yakṣat .
GS24pmbhasuu:963_0: vyapdeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:963_1: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham . antareṇa eva vacanam lokavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:964: loke śālāsamudāyaḥ grāmaḥ iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . grāmaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:965_0: asti eva śālāsamudāye vartate . tat yathā grāmaḥ dagdhaḥ iti . asti vāṭaparikṣepe
GS24pmbhasuu:965_1: vartate . tat yathā grāmam praviṣṭaḥ . asti manuṣyeṣu vartate . tat yathā . grāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:965_2: gataḥ , grāmaḥ āgataḥ iti . asti sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:965_3: grāmaḥ labdhaḥ iti . tat yaḥ sāraṇyake sasīmake sasthaṇḍilake vartate tam abhisamīkṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:965_4: etat prayujyate : ekaśālaḥ grāmaḥ iti . yathā tarhi varṇasamudāyaḥ padam padasamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:966: ṛksamudāyaḥ sūktam iti ucyate . bhavati ca etat ekasmin api ekavarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:967: padam ekapadā ṛk ekarcam sūktam iti . atra api arthena yuktaḥ vyapadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:968_0: padam nāma arthaḥ sūktam nama arthaḥ . yathā tarhi bahuṣu putreṣu etat upapannam
GS24pmbhasuu:968_1: : bhavati ayam me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam eva me madhyamaḥ ayam eva me kanīyān iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:968_2: ca etat ekasmin api ayam eva me jyeṣṭhaḥ ayam me madhyamaḥ ayam me kanīyān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:968_3: tathā asūtāyām asoṣyamāṇāyām ca bhavati prathamagarbheṇa hatā iti . tathā anetya
GS24pmbhasuu:969: prathamam āgamanam iti . ādyantavadbhāvaḥ ca śakyaḥ avaktum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:970: apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt ādyantayoḥ siddham ekasmin . apūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ādiḥ anuttaralakṣaṇaḥ antaḥ . etat ca ekasmin api bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:971: apūrvānuttaralakṣaṇatvāt etasmāt kāraṇāt ekasmin api ādyantāpadiṣṭani kāryāṇi bhaviṣyanti . na arthaḥ ādyantavadbhāvena . gonardīyaḥ tu āha
GS24pmbhasuu:972: satyam etat sati tu anyasmin iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:973_0: (P_1,1.21.2) KA_I,78.3-79.10 Ro_I,252-254 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . ādivattve
GS24pmbhasuu:973_1: prayojanam pratyayañnidādyudāttatve . pratyayasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:974: aupagavaḥ , kāpaṭavaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:975: syāt : ahicumbakāyaniḥ , agniveśyaḥ . gargyaḥ , kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:976: valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:977: ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iha eva : syāt kariṣyati hariṣyati . joṣiṣat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:978: manidṣat iti atra na syāt . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve . yasmin vidhiḥ tadāditve prayojanam . vakṣyati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:979: tasmin kriyamāṇe aci śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iha eva syāt : śriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:980: , bhruvaḥ . śriyau bhruvau iti atra na syāt . ajādyāṭtve . ajādyāṭtve prayojanam . āṭ ajādīnām iha eva syāt : aihiṣṭa , aikṣiṣṭa . ait ,
GS24pmbhasuu:981: adhyaiṣṭa iti atra na syāt . atha antavattve kāni prayojanāni . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve . antavat dvivacanāntapragṛhyatve prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:982: īdūdet dvivacanam pragṛhyam iha eva syāt : pacete* iti pacethe* iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:983: khaṭve* iti māle* iti iti atra na syāt . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ prayojanam . iha eva syāt : kuṇḍāni vanāni . tāni yāni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:984: atra na syāt . acaḥ antyādi ṭi . acaḥ antyādi ṭi prayojanam . ṭitaḥ ātmanepadānām ṭeḥ e iti iha eva syāt : kurvāte kurvāthe . kurute kurve iti
GS24pmbhasuu:985_0: atra na syāt . alaḥ antyasya . alaḥ antyasya prayojanam . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi
GS24pmbhasuu:985_1: ca iha eva syāt : ghaṭābhyam , paṭābhyām . ābhyām iti atra na syāt . yena vidiḥ tadantatve
GS24pmbhasuu:985_2: . yena vidiḥ tadantatve prayojanam . acaḥ yat iha eva syāt : ceyam , jeyam . eyam
GS24pmbhasuu:985_3: adhyeyam iti atra na syāt . ādyantavat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti atra api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:986_0: (P_1,1.22) KA_I,79.12-80.2 Ro_I,255-256 ghasañjñāyām nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:986_1: nadītare pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nadyāḥ taraḥ nadītaraḥ iti . ghasañjñāyām nadītare
GS24pmbhasuu:986_2: apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . ghasañjñā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:986_3: . tarabgrahaṇam hi aupadeśikam . aupadeśikasya tarapaḥ grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:986_4: tarapśabdaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:987: iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣu eva sānubandhakeṣu grahaṇeṣu rūpam āśrīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:988: yatra etat rūpam iti . rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam .
GS24pmbhasuu:989_0: tasmin ca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:989_1: upāsyate . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . na ca eṣaḥ upadeśe tarapśabdaḥ . atha vā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:989_2: asya ghasañjñā . kaḥ doṣaḥ . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:990: evam tat . yadā tarhi sā eva nadī saḥ eva taraḥ tadā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:991: strīliṅgeṣu eva ghādiṣu iti evam tat . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:992: samānādhikaraṇeṣu ghādiṣu iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta mahiṣī rūpam iva brāhmaṇī rūpam iva
GS24pmbhasuu:993: (P_1,1.23.1) KA_I,80.4-82.9 Ro_I,256-263 saṅkhyāsañjñāyām saṅkhyāgrahaṇam . saṅkhyāsañjñāyām saṅkhyāgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:994: bahugaṇvatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñāḥ bhavanti . saṅkhyā ca saṅkhyāsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:995: bhavati iti vaktavvyam . kim prayojanam . saṅkhyāsampratyayārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:996_0: ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyā iti eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:996_1: nanu ca ekādikā saṅkhyā loke saṅkhyā iti pratītā . tena asyāḥ saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:997: itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke . akriyamāṇe hi saṅkhyāgrahaṇe ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ saṅkhyā iti sampratyayaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:998_0: kim kāraṇam . akṛtrimatvāt . bahvādīnām kṛtrimā sañjñā . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime
GS24pmbhasuu:998_1: kāryasampratyayaḥ bhavati yathā loke . tat yathā loke gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:998_2: iti yasya eṣā sañjñā bhavati saḥ ānīyate na yaḥ gāḥ pālayati yaḥ vā kaṭe jātaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:998_3: yadi tarhi kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati nadīpaurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:998_4: iti atra api prasajyeta . paurṇamāsyāgrahāyaṇīgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . tadviśeṣebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:998_5: tarhi prāpnoti : gaṅgā yamunā iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tadviśeṣebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:998_6: bhavati iti yat ayam vipāṭśabdam śaratprabhṛtiṣu paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:999: . iha tarhi prāpnoti : nadībhiḥ ca iti . bahuvacananirdeśāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1000: . svarūpavidhiḥ tarhi prāpnoti . bahuvacananirdeśāt eva na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1001: evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ . uttarārtham ca . uttarārtham ca saṅkhyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1002_0: kartavyam . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ . ṣakāranakārāntāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ṣaṭsañjñā yathā syāt . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1002_1: mā bhūt : pāmānaḥ , vipruṣaḥ iti . ihārthena tāvat na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:1002_2: ca uktam itarathā hi asampratyayaḥ akṛtrimatvāt yathā loke iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1002_3: arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1003_0: evaṃsaṅjñakena bhavati prakṛtam vā tatra bhavati idam evaṃsaṅjñakena kartavyam iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:1003_1: ātaḥ ca arthāt prakaraṇāt vā . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsurapādam aprakaraṇajñam
GS24pmbhasuu:1003_2: āgatam bravītu gopālakam ānaya kaṭajakam ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:1004_0: iti . ubhayagatiḥ tasya bhavati sādhīyaḥ vā yaṣṭihastam gamiṣyati . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1004_1: arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati evam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1004_2: api prāpnoti . jānāti hi asau bahvādīnām iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . na yathā loke tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_0: anyatra api na avaśyam iha eva . tat yathā : kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti kṛtrimā
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_1: sañjñā . karmapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . karmaṇi dvitīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_2: kartari karmavyatihāre iti akṛtrimasya . tathā sādhakatamam karaṇam iti kṛtrimā karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_3: . karaṇapradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ tṛtīyā iti kṛtrimasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_4: śabdavairakalahābhrakaṇvameghebhyaḥ karaṇe iti akṛtrimasya . tathā ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1005_5: iti kṛtrimā adhikaraṇasañjñā . adhikaraṇepradeśeṣu ca ubhayagatiḥ bhavati . saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_0: vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti akṛtrimasya . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_1: . tadvadatideśaḥ ayam : bahugaṇavatuḍatayaḥ saṅkhyāvat bhavanti iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_2: kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1006_3: . tat yathā : eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:1007: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api asaṅkhyām saṅkhyā iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_0: saṅkhyāvat iti gamyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ekādikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_1: saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu saṅkhyāsampratyayaḥ iti yat ayam saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_2: tiśadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi kṛtrimā tyantā śadantā
GS24pmbhasuu:1008_3: vā saṅkhyā asti . nanu ca iyam asti ḍatiḥ . yat tarhi śadantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:1009: tyantāyāḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . nanu ca uktam ḍatyartham etat syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_0: arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti arthavataḥ tiśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca ḍateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_1: tiśabdaḥ arthavān. atha vā mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1010_2: . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1011: saṅkhyāyate anayā saṅkhyā iti . ekādikayā ca api saṅkhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_0: uttarārthena ca api na arthaḥ saṅkhyāgrahaṇena . idam prakṛtam anuvartiṣyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_1: vai sañjñārtham uttaratra ca sañjñiviśeṣaṇārthaḥ . na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1012_2: bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā sarpantī
GS24pmbhasuu:1013: yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . tat yathā : śālyartham kulyāḥ praṇīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1014: tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante . yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā
GS24pmbhasuu:1015: sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_0: śabdaḥ tu khalu yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_1: . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te saṅkhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_2: eva apekṣiṣyāmahe (P_1,1.23.2) KA_I,82.10-83.8 Ro_I,263-265 adhyardhagrahaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1016_3: samāsakanvidhyartham . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1019: . luki ca agrahaṇam . luki ca adhyardhagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1020: adhyardhapūrvadvigoḥ luk asañjñāyām iti . dvigoḥ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1021: ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ . ardhapūrvapadaḥ ca pūraṇapratyayāntaḥ saṅkhyāsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1025: adhikagrahaṇam ca aluki kartavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1028: uttarapadavṛddhyartham adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ , adhikasāptatikaḥ . aluki iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1029: artham . adhikaṣāṣṭhikaḥ , adhikasāptatikaḥ . bahuvrīhau ca agrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1030: bahuvrīhau ca adhikaśabdasya grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati : saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . saṅkhyā iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_0: bahvādīnām agrahaṇam . bahvādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum . kena idānīm saṅkhyāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_1: saṅkhyasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . jñāpakāt siddham . kim jñāpakam . yat ayam vatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_2: iṭ vā iti saṅkhyāyāḥ vihitasya kanaḥ vatvantāt iṭam śāsti . vatoḥ eva tat jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1031_3: syāt . na iti āha . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1033: ṣaṭsañjñāyām upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . upadeśe ṣakāranakārāntā saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1034: ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śatādyaṣṭanoḥ numnuḍartham . śatāni sahasrāṇi . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti ṣaṭsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1035: prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt na bhavati . aṣṭānām iti atra ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā na prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇāt bhavati . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1036: iha tāvat śatāni sahasrāṇi iti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_0: tadvighātasya iti . aṣṭanaḥ api uktam . kim uktam . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_1: ākārāntasya nuḍartham iti . atha vā ākāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . ṣakārāntā nakārāntā
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_2: ākārāntā ca saṅkhyā ṣaṭsañjñā bhavati iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti : sadhamadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_3: dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ ekāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1037_4: saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ , dvau , bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1038_0: ekahalāni , ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . asahāyaiḥ iti arthaḥ . asti anyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:1038_1: vartate . tat yathā : prajam ekā rakṣati urjam ekā iti . anyā iti arthaḥ . sadhamadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1038_2: dyumnaḥ ekāḥ taḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:1039_0: vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ . iha tarhi prāpnoti : dvabhyām iṣṭaye viṃśatya ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1039_1: . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . tataḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ : ṣaḍbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1039_2: ca yat uktam aṣṭābhyaḥ api tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1040: tataḥ luk : luk ca bhavati ṣaḍbhyaḥ iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṣṭanaḥ ā vibhaktau . tataḥ rāyaḥ : rāyaḥ ca vibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:1041: ākārādeśaḥ bhavati . hali iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . yadi evam priyāṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:1042: priyāṣṭāḥ iti na sidhyati priyāṣṭānau priyāṣṭānaḥ iti ca prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1044_0: (P_1,1.25) KA_I,84.9-12 Ro_I,269 idam ḍatigrahaṇam dviḥ kriyate saṅkhyāsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1044_1: ṣaṭsañjñāyām ca . ekam śakyam akartum . katham . yadi tāvat saṅkhyāsañjñāyām kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1044_2: ṣaṭsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . katham . ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ iti atra ḍati iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1045: saṅkhyāsañjñāyām na kariṣyate . ḍati ca iti atra saṅkhyāsañjñā anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1046: (P_1,1.26) KA_I,84.14-85.17 Ro_I,270-272 niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1047: kartavyaḥ . lotaḥ gartaḥ iti . niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1048: niṣṭhāsañjñāyām samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāsañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1049: anubandhaḥ kriyate . saḥ anyatvam kariṣyati . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1050: cet na lopāt . anubandhaḥ anyatvakaraḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1051: lopāt . lupyate atra anubandhaḥ . lupte atra anubandhe na anyatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā : katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau
GS24pmbhasuu:1052: kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati . evam iha api lupte anubandhe naṣṭaḥ pratyayaḥ bhavati . yadi api lupyate jānāti tu asau
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_0: sānubandhakasya iyam sañjñā kṛtā iti . tat yathā itaratra api : katarat devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_1: gṛham . adaḥ yatra asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_2: antataḥ tam uddeśam jānāti . siddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . siddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_3: jānāti sandehaḥ tasya bhavati : ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ lotaḥ gartaḥ iti ayam saḥ taśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_4: lūnaḥ gīrṇaḥ iti . tat yathā itaratra api : katarat devadattasya gṛham . adaḥ yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_5: asau kākaḥ iti . utpatite kāke yadi api naṣṭam tat gṛham bhavati antataḥ tam uddeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:1053_6: jānāti . sandehaḥ tu tasya bhavati : idam tat gṛham idam tat gṛham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1054: evam tarhi . kārakakālaviśeṣāt siddham . kārakakālaviśeṣau upādeyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:1055: bhūte yaḥ taśabdaḥ kartari karmaṇi bhāve ca iti . tat yathā itaratra api .
GS24pmbhasuu:1056_0: yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ adhruveṇa nimittena dhruvam nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1056_1: upādatte vedikām puṇḍarīkam vā . evam api prākīrṣṭa iti atra prāpnoti . luṅi sijādidarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1056_2: . luṅi sijādidarśanāt na bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sijādayaḥ na dṛśyante prābhitta
GS24pmbhasuu:1057: kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . yathā eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1058: anupadiṣṭān kārakakālaviśeṣān avagacchati evam etat api avagantum arhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1060: (P_1,1.27.1) KA_I,86.2-8 Ro_I,273-274 sarvādīni iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1061: bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . sarvaśabdaḥ ādiḥ yeṣām tāni imāni iti . yadi evam sarvaśabdasya sarvanāmasañjñā na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1062: anyapadārthatvāt bahuvrīheḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ ayam anyapadārthe vartate . tena yat anyat sarvaśabdāt tasya sarvanāmasñjñā prāpnoti . tat yathā citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1063_0: ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ bhavanti sa ānīyate na gāvaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1063_1: bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā : citravāsam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1063_2: ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_0: pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_1: nipātanāt ṇatvābhāvaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām nipātanāt ṇatvam na bhaviṣyati . kim etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_2: nipātanam nāma . atha kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ nāma . aviśeṣeṇa kim cit uktvā viśeṣeṇa na
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_3: iti ucyate . tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate : idam na bhavati iti . nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1065_4: api evañjātīyakam eva . aviśeṣeṇa ṇatvam uktvā viśeṣeṇa nipātanam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_0: tatra vyaktam ācāryasya abhiprāyaḥ gamyate : idam na bhavati iti . nanu ca nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_1: ca aṇatvam syāt yathāprāptam ca ṇatvam . kim anye api evam vidhayaḥ bhavanti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_2: ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti vacanāt ca yaṇ syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca ik śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1066_3: asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyā atra nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_0: kriyate . ṣaṣṭhī ca punaḥ sthāninam nivartayati . iha tarhi : kartari śap divādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_1: śyan iti vacanāt ca śyan syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca śap śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_2: śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1067_3: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:1068: divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1069: tasmāt iti uttarasya . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1070: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha tarhi : avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:1071: ṭeḥ iti . vacanāt ca akac syāt yathāprāptaḥ ca kaḥ śrūyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1072_0: . na aprāpte hi ke akac ārabhyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . nipātanam api evañjātīyakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1072_1: eva . na aprāpte ṇatve nipātanam ārabhyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1073: samaḥ tate doṣaḥ bhavati . iha anye vaiyākaraṇāḥ samaḥ tate vibhāṣā lopam ārabhante : samaḥ hi tatayoḥ vā iti . satatam , santatam , sahitam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1074: saṃhitam iti . iha punaḥ bhavān nipātanāt ca malopam icchati aparasparāḥ kriyāsātatye iti yathāprāptam ca alopam santatam iti . etat na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1075: kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . bādhakāni eva hi nipātanāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1077: sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām sarvādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvaḥ nāma kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1078: cit . tasmai sarvāya dehi . atisarvāya dehi . saḥ katham kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1079: pāṭhāt paryudāsaḥ paṭhitānām sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhāt eva paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1080_0: kartavyaḥ . śuddhānām paṭhitānām sañjñā kartavyā . sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1080_1: . sañjñopasarjanībhūtāni na sarvādīni . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . viśeṣeṇa ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1080_2: . kim prayojanam sarvādyānantaryakāryārtham . sarvādīnām ānantaryeṇa yat ucyate kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:1081_0: api sañjñopasarjanībhūtānām mā bhūt iti . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ḍatarādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:1081_1: adbhāve . ḍatarādīnām adbhāve prayojanam . atikrāntam idam bṛāhmaṇakulam katarat
GS24pmbhasuu:1082_0: tyadādividhau ca prayojanam . atikrāntaḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ tam atitat brāhmaṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1082_1: . sañjāpratiṣedhaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvaparāvaradakṣiṇottarāparādharāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:1082_2: vyavasthāyām . tataḥ asañjñāyām iti . sarvādīni iti evam yāni anukrāntāni asañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1083: tāni draṣṭavyāni . upasarjanapratiṣedhaḥ ca na kartavyaḥ . anupasarjanāt iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate . tam evam abhisambhantsyāmaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1084: anupasarjana* a* at iti . kim idam a* at iti . akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . yadi evam atiyuṣmat atyasmat iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1085: . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam : anupasarjana* a* a* at iti . akārāntāt akārātkārau śiṣyamāṇau anupasarjanasya draṣṭavyau . atha vā aṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:1086: yat ucyate gṛhyamāṇavibhakteḥ tat bhavati . yadi evam paramapañca
GS24pmbhasuu:1087: paramasapta ṣaḍbhyaḥ luk iti luk na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1088: ṣaṭpradhānaḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ . iha tarhi priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena anaṅ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1089: prāpnoti . saptamīnirdiṣṭe yat ucyate prakṛtavibhaktau tat bhavati . yadi evam atitat , atitadau , atitadaḥ iti atvam prāpnoti . tat ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:1090: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adḍ ḍatarādibhyaḥ pañcabhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1091: pañcamī aṅgasya iti ṣaṣṭhī . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum . tatra kim anyat śakyam viśeṣayitum anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:1092_0: ataḥ vihitāt pratyayāt . ḍatarādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . iha idānīm asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:1092_1: anaṅ udāttaḥ iti tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti asthyādīnām iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1092_2: api tyadādīnām iti api ṣaṣṭhī aṅgasya iti api . tatra kāmacāraḥ : gṛhyamāṇena vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1092_3: vibhaktim viśeṣayitum aṅgena vā . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ iha tāvat asthidadhisakhthyakṣṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:1093_0: udāttaḥ iti aṅgena vibhaktim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ asthyādibhiḥ anaṅam : aṅgasya vibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:1093_1: anaṅ bhavati asthyādīnām iti . iha idānīm tyadādīnām aḥ bhavati iti gṛhyamāṇena vibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:1093_2: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ aṅgena akāram : tyadādīnām vibhaktau aḥ bhavati aṅgasya iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_0: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tyadādipradhānaḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ . atha vā na idam sañjñākaraṇam . pāṭhaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_1: idam : sarveṣām yāni nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_2: . yadi evam sañjñāśrayam yat kāryam tat na sidhyati : sarvanāmnaḥ smai , āmi sarvanāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1094_3: suṭ iti anvarthagrahaṇam tatra vijñāsyate : sarveṣām yat nāma tat sarvanāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:1095: sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya ṅeḥ smai bhavati . sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ suṭ bhavati . yadi evam sakalam , kṛtsnam , jagat iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1096: eteṣām ca api śabdānām ekaikasya saḥ saḥ viṣayaḥ . tasmin tasmin viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:1097_0: yaḥ yaḥ śabdaḥ vartate tasya tasya tasmin tasmin vartamānasya sarvanāmakāryam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1097_1: . evam tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . pāṭhaḥ ca eva viśeṣyate sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1098: labhyam iti āha . katham. ekaśeṣanirdeśāt . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1099: sarvādīni ca sarvādīni ca sarvādīni . sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni ca sarvanāmāni . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti . sarveṣām yāni ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1100_0: nāmāni tāni sarvādīni . sañjñopasarjane ca viśeṣe avatiṣṭhete . atha vā mahatī iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1100_1: sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1100_2: . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1100_3: . sarvādīni sarvanānasañjñāni bhavanti sarveṣām nāmāni iti ca ataḥ sarvanāmāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:1101: (P_1,1.27.4) KA_I,89.4-90.3 Ro_I,286-289 atha ubhasya sarvanāmatve kaḥ arthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ . ubhasya sarvanāmatve akajarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_0: pāṭhaḥ kriyate : ubhakau . kim ucyate akajarthaḥ iti na punaḥ anyāni api sarvanāmakāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_1: . anyābhāvaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt . anyeṣām sarvanāmkāryāṇām abhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1102_2: . dvivacanaṭābviṣayatvāt ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ . anyāni ca sarvanāmakāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:1103: ekavacanabahuvacaneṣu ucyante . yadā punaḥ ayam ubhaśabdaḥ dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ kaḥ idānīm asya anyatra bhavati . ubhayaḥ anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1104: ubhayaśabdaḥ asya anyatra bahvati . ubhaye devamanuṣyāḥ , ubhayaḥ maṇiḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra akac na syāt . kaḥ prasajyeta . kaḥ ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_0: kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ubhaśabdaḥ ayam dvivacanaṭābviṣayaḥ iti uktam . tatra akaci sati
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_1: akacaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt śakyate etat vaktum : dvivacanaparaḥ ayam iti . ke punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_2: sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra dvivacanaparatā vaktavyā . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1105_3: ke sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ evam āpi api sati na ayam dvivacanaparaḥ syāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1106_0: vaktavyā . avacanāt api tatparavijñānam . antareṇa api vacanam āpi dvivacanaparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1106_1: ayam bhaviṣyati . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:1107: avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api tulyam . avacanāt āpi tatparavijñānam iti cet ke api antareṇa vacanam dvivacanaparaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1108: . katham . svārthikāḥ pratyayāḥ prakṛtitaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1109_0: prakṛtigrahaṇena svārthikānām api grahaṇam bhavati . atha bhavataḥ sarvanāmatve kāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1109_1: projanāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni . bhavataḥ akaccheṣātvāni prayojanāni . akac
GS24pmbhasuu:1109_2: : bhavakān . śeṣaḥ : saḥ ca bhavān ca bhavantau . ātvam : bhavādṛk iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1109_3: idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . tṛtīyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1110: sarvanāmnaḥ tṛtīyā ca : bhavatā hetunā , bhavataḥ hetoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1111: (P_1,1.28) KA_I,90.5-26 Ro_I,289-291 diggrahaṇam kimartham . na bahuvrīhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tatra na jñāyate kva vibhāṣā kva
GS24pmbhasuu:1112: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1113: digupadiṣṭe vibhāṣā anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ . atha samāsagrahaṇam kimartham.
GS24pmbhasuu:1114_0: samāsaḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1114_1: tatra mā bhūt iti : dakṣiṇadakṣiṇasyai dehi iti . atha bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1115_0: na etat asti prayojanam . dvandve ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:1115_1: iyam paribhāṣā ārabhyate . sā yathā eva bahuvrīhau iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1115_2: dvandve ca iti etam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1115_3: bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte na bahuvrīhau iti etasmin pratiṣedhe iyam paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1115_4: ārabhyate . dvandve ca iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1115_5: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā na bahuvrīhau iti etam
GS24pmbhasuu:1116: pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate dvandve ca iti etam pratiṣedham na bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1117: atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati : yā pūrvā sā
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_0: uttarā asya unmugdhasya saḥ ayam pūrvottaraḥ unmugdhaḥ , tasmai pūrvottarāya dehi
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_1: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ bahuvrīhigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_2: . dvandve kasmāt na bhavati lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_3: tarhi bahuvrīhigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate tatra eva bahuvrīhau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1118_4: . dvitīyam kartavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ eva yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1119: . bahuvrīhivadbhāvena yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tatra mā bhūt iti : ekaikasmai dehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1120: etat api na asti prayojanam. samāse iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ : samāsaḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1121: avayavabhūtasya api bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:1122: vastram antaram eṣām te ime vastrāntarāḥ vasanam antaram eṣām te ime vasanāntarāḥ vastrāntarāḥ ca vasanāntarāḥ ca vastrāntaravasanāntarāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1124: na etat asti prayojanam . sarvādyantasya bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:1125: bhavitavyam . vakṣyati ca etat : bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam iti . tatra viśvapriyāya iti bhavitavyam . idam tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1126_0: dvyanyāya tryanyāya . nanu ca atra api sarvanāmnaḥ eva pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1126_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati etat : saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ paratvāt tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1126_2: saṅkhyāyāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam priyaviśvāya . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:1127: iti . vakṣyati etat : vā priyasya iti . na khalu api avaśyam sarvādyantasya eva bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1128: asarvādyantasya api bhavitavyam . kim prayojanam . akac mā bhūt . kim ca syāt yadi akac syāt . kaḥ na syāt . kaḥ ca idānīm kākacoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1129: vyañjanānteṣu viśeṣaḥ . ahakam pitā asya makatpitṛkaḥ , tvakam pitā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:1130: tvakatpitṛkaḥ iti prāpnoti , matkapitṛkaḥ tvatkapitṛkaḥ iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1131: katham punaḥ icchatā api bhavatā bahiraṅgena pratiṣedhena antaraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ śakhyaḥ bādhitum . antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ vidhiḥ bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:1132: gomatpriyaḥ iti yathā . kriyate tatra yatnaḥ : pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1133: . nanu ca iha api kriyate : na bahuvrīhau iti . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . priyaviśvāya . upasarjanapratiṣedhena api etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1134: . ayam khalu api bahuvrīhiḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1135: aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1136: bahuvrīhyarthāni padāni bahuvrīhiḥ iti . tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam grahaṇam . gonardīyaḥ āha akacsvarau tu kartavyau pratyaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1137: muktasaṃśayau . tvakatpitṛkaḥ makatpitṛkaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1138_1: . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ āḍhyapūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1138_2: , āḍhyapūrvāya dehi iti . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānānarthakyam pūrvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:1138_3: vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pratiṣedhe bhūtapūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam narthakam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1138_4: kāraṇam . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām iti vacanāt . pūrvādīnām vyavasthāyām sarvanāmasñjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_0: (P_1,1.30) KA_I,92. 7-14 Ro_I,294 samāse iti vartamāne punaḥ samāsagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_1: . ayam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ asti eva prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam aikasvaryam aikavibhaktikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_2: ca . asti tādarthyāt tācchabdyam : tṛtīyāsamāsārthāni padāni tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_3: tat yat tādarthyāt tācchabdyam tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā samase iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_4: punaḥ samāsagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam : yogāṅgam yathā upajāyeta . sati yogāṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1140_5: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tṛtīyā . tṛtīyāsamāse sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1141: tataḥ asamāse . asamāse ca tṛtīyāyāḥ sarvādīni sarvanāmasañjñāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:1143: (P_1,1.32) KA_I,92.16 Ro_I,295 jasaḥ kāryam prati vibhāṣā , akac hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:1145_0: (P_1,1.34) KA_I,92.19-93.6 Ro_I,295-297 avarādīnām ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1145_1: gaṇe paṭhitatvāt . avarādīnām ca punaḥ sūtrapāṭhe grahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1146: paṭhyante . katham punaḥ jñāyate saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1147_0: tāni hi pūrvādīni imāni avarādīni . imāni api pūrvādīni . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1147_1: jñāpayati saḥ pūrvaḥ pāṭhaḥ ayam punaḥ pāṭhaḥ iti yat ayam pūrvādibhyaḥ navabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1147_2: vā iti navagrahaṇam karoti . nava eva pūrvādīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_0: idam tarhi prayojanam : vyavasthāyām asañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_1: prayojanam . evaṃviśiṣṭāni eva etāni gaṇe paṭhyante . idam tarhi prayojanam dvyādiparyudāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:1148_2: paryudāsaḥ mā bhūt iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:1149: asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na eṣām dvyādiparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam pūrvatra asiddham iti nipātanam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1150: vārttikakāraḥ ca paṭhati : jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra abhāvāt apavādaprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam jasi vibhāṣām vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1152: jñātidhanaparyāyavācī yaḥ svaśabdaḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : sve putrāḥ svāḥ putrāḥ sve gāvaḥ svāḥ gāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1153: (P_1,1.36.1) KA_I,93.11-17 Ro_I,298-299 upasaṃvyānagrahaṇam anarthakam bahiryogeṇa kṛtatvāt . upasaṃvyānagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1154: bahiryogeṇa kṛtatvāt . bahiryoge iti eva siddham . na vā śāṭakayugādyartham . na vā anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . śāṭakayugādyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1155: śāṭakayugādyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam yatra etat na jñāyate kim antarīyam kim uttarīyam iti. atra api yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī
GS24pmbhasuu:1156: bhavati nirjñātam tasya bhavati idam antarīyam idam uttarīyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1157: (P_1,1.36.2) KA_I,93.18-23 Ro_I,299 apuri iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:1158: : antarāyām puri vasati iti . vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1159: vāprakaraṇe tīyasya ṅitsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : dvitīyāyai dvitīyasyai tṛtīyāyai tṛtīyasyai . vibhāṣā dvitīyātṛtīyābhyām iti etat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1160: bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . upasaṅkhyānam eva atra jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati : dvitīyāya dvitīyasmai tṛtīyāya tṛtīyasmai .
GS24pmbhasuu:1162: svarādīnām kriyate na cādiṣu eva paṭhyeran . cādīnām vai asattvavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1163: nipātasañjñā svarādīnām punaḥ sattvavacanānām asattvavacanānām ca . atha kimartham ubhe sañjñe kriyete na nipātsañjñā eva syāt . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_0: nipātaḥ ekāc anāṅ iti pragṛhyasañjñā uktā . sā svarādīnām api ekācām prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_1: evam tarhi avyayasañjñā eva astu . tat ca aśakyam . vakṣyati etat : avyaye nañkunipātānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_2: iti . tat garīyasā nyāsena parigaṇanam kartavyam syāt . tasmāt pṛthak grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_3: ubhe ca sañjñe kartavye (P_1,1.38.1) KA_I,94.10-19 Ro_I,300-301 asarvavibhaktau avibhaktinimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_4: upasaṅkhyānam . asarvavibhaktau avibhaktinimittasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : nānā
GS24pmbhasuu:1164_5: vinā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1165: sarvavibhaktiḥ hi aviśeṣāt. sarvavibhaktiḥ hi eṣaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1166: aviśeṣāt . aviśeṣeṇa vihitatvāt . tralādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . tralādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tatra yatra tataḥ yataḥ . nanu ca viśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:1167: ete vidhīyante : pañcamyāḥ tasil saptamyāḥ tral iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1170_0: śabdaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyeta . avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1170_1: . avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ sañjñāyāḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . sati
GS24pmbhasuu:1171: avibhaktitvam bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati , itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . aliṅgam asaṅkhyam iti vā . atha vā aliṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1172: asaṅkhyam avyayam iti vaktavyam . evam api itaretarāśrayam eva bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1173: kā itaretarāśrayatā . sati aliṅgāsaṅkhyatve sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca aliṅgāsaṅkhyatvam bhāvyate . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1174_0: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1174_1: ca . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā : samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1174_2: ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . tatra kim asmābhiḥ kartum śakyam . svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:1174_3: etat . tat tarhi vaktavyam aliṅgam asaṅkhyam iti . na vaktavyam . siddham tu pāṭhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1175: katham pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . tasilādayaḥ prāk pāsapaḥ , śasprabhṛtayaḥ prāk samāsāntebhyaḥ , māntaḥ , kṛtvorthaḥ , tasivatī , nānāñau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1176_0: (P_1,1.38.3) KA_I,95.12-22 Ro_I,303-304 atha vā punaḥ astu avibhaktiḥ śabdaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1176_1: bhavati iti eva . nanu ca uktam avibhaktau itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1177: praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi api vaiyākaraṇāḥ vibhaktilopam ārabhamāṇāḥ avibhaktikān
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_0: śabdāñ prayuñjate ye tu ete vaiyākaraṇebhyaḥ anye manuṣyāḥ katham te avibhaktikān
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_1: śabdān prayuñjate iti . abhijñāḥ ca punaḥ laukikāḥ ekatvādīnām arthānām . ātaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_2: abhijñāḥ : anyena hi vasnena ekam gām krīṇanti , anyena dvau , anyena trīn . abhijñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1178_3: ca na ca prayuñjate . tat etat evam sandṛśyatām : artharūpam etat evañjātīyakam yena
GS24pmbhasuu:1179_0: na bhavati iti . tat ca api etat evam anugamyamānam dṛśyatām : kim cit avyayam vibhaktyarthapradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:1179_1: kim cit kriyāpradhānam . uccaiḥ , nīcaiḥ iti vibhaktyarthapradhānam , hiruk pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:1179_2: iti kriyāpradhānam . taddhitaḥ ca api kaḥ cit vibhaktyarthapradhānaḥ kaḥ cit kriyāpradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1179_3: . tatra yatra iti vibhaktyarthapradhānaḥ , nānā vina iti kriyāpradhānaḥ . na ca etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1181: (P_1,1.38.4) KA_I,95.23-96.5 Ro_I,304-307 atha api asarvavibhaktiḥ iti ucyate evam api na doṣaḥ . katham . idam ca api adyatve atibahu kriyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1182: ekasmin ekavacanam , dvayoḥ dvivacanam , bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . katham tarhi . ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ arthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1183_0: dvivacanabahuvacane bādhake bhaviṣyataḥ . na ca api evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate : na
GS24pmbhasuu:1183_1: sarvāḥ asarvāḥ , asarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ asmāt iti . katham tarhi . na sarvā asarvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1183_2: asarvā vibhaktiḥ asmāt iti . trikam punaḥ vibhaktisañjñam . evam gate kṛti api tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1184: na tatra . tataḥ pare ca abhimatāḥ kāryāḥ trayaḥ kṛdarthāḥ grahaṇena yogāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1185: . kṛttaddhitānām grahaṇam tu kāryam saṅkhyāviśeṣam hi abhiniśritāḥ ye .
GS24pmbhasuu:1186: teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : ekaḥ , dvau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1187: bahavaḥ iti . tasmāt svarādigrahaṇam ca kāryam kṛttaddhitānām ca pāṭhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1189: kriyate . sā iha na prāpnoti : paramoccaiḥ , paramanīcaiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_0: tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnoti : atyuccaiḥ atyuccaisau atyuccaisaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_1: iti . upasarjanasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_2: . na vaktavyaḥ . sarvanāmasañjñāyām prakṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iha anuvartiṣyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1190_3: vai tatra pratyākhyāyate . yathā saḥ tatra pratyākhyāyate iha api tathā śakyaḥ pratyākhyātum
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_0: pratyākhyāyate . mahatī iyam sañjñā kriyate . iyam api ca mahatī sañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1191_1: sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1192: anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta : na vyeti iti avyayam iti . kva punaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1193: vyeti . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca . etān arthān ke cit viyanti ke cit na viyanti . ye na viyanti tad avyayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1194: sadṛśam triṣu liṅgeṣu sarvāsu ca vibhaktiṣu vacaneṣu ca sarveṣu yat na vyeti tat avyayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_0: (P_1,1.39.1) KA_I,96.19-97.2 Ro_I,308-310 katham idam vijñāyate : kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_1: iti āhosvit kṛdantam yat māntam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_2: iti kārayām cakāra hārayām cakāra iti atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate kṛdantam
GS24pmbhasuu:1195_3: yat māntam iti pratāmau pratāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1196: atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat kṛt yaḥ māntaḥ iti . katham kārayām cakāra hārayām cakāra iti . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1197: avyayasañjñayā prārthyate . avyayāt iti luk yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1198: āmaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ligrahaṇam tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1199: ligrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate pratyayamātrasya luk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1200_0: iṣyate ca pratyayamātrasya . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha : kṛñ ca anuprayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1200_1: liṭi iti . yadi ca pratyayamātrasya luk bhavati tataḥ etat upapannam bhavati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1200_2: vā punaḥ astu kṛdantam yat māntam iti . katham pratāmau pratāmaḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1200_3: jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena avyayasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam praśānśabdam svarādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1202: anikārokāraprakṛtiḥ . kṛt mejantaḥ ca anikārokāraprakṛtiḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1203: iha mā bhūt : ādhaye , ādheḥ , cikīrṣave , cikīrṣoḥ iti . ananyaprakṛtiḥ iti vā . atha vā ananyaprakṛtiḥ kṛt avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1204: kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . ananyaprakṛtivacanam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1205: bhavati : kumbhakārebhyaḥ , nagarakārebhyaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1206: kim kāraṇam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_0: paribhāṣā kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyeta ananyaprakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_1: iti vā ucyeta . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_2: . kāni punaḥ tāni . prayojanam hrasvatam tugvidheḥ grāmaṇikulam . grāmaṇikulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_3: senānikulam iti atra hrasvatve kṛte hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1207_4: . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_0: prayojanam . bahiraṅgam hrasvatvam . antaraṅgaḥ tuk . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_1: . nalopaḥ vṛtrahabhiḥ . vṛtrhabhiḥ , bhrūṇhabhiḥ iti atra nalope kṛte hrasvasya piti
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_2: kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1208_3: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1209: udupadhatvam akittvasya nikucite . udupadhatvam akittvasya animittam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:1210: . nikucite . nikucitaḥ iti atra nalope kṛte udupadhāt bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ anyatarasyām iti akittvam prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1211: tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . astu atra akittvam . na dhātulope ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1212: nābhāvaḥ yañi dīrghatvasya amunā . nābhāvaḥ yañi dīrghatvasya asnimittam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1213: kva . amunā . nābhāve kṛte ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1214: prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat : na mu ṭādeśe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1215_0: āttvam kittvasya upādāsta . āttvam kittvasya animittam . kva . upādāsta asya svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1215_1: śikṣakasya iti . āttve kṛte sthāghvoḥ it ca iti ittvam prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1215_2: vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1215_3: . uktam etat : dīṅaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ sthāghvoḥ ittve iti . tisṛcatasṛtvam ṅībvidheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1215_4: tisṛcatasṛtvam ṅībvidheḥ animittam . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . tisṛcatasṛbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:1215_5: kṛte ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp iti ṅīp prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1216: tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1217_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tisṛcatasṛbhāve kṛte ṅīp bhavati iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ
GS24pmbhasuu:1217_1: iti nāmi dīrghatvapratiṣedham śāsti . imāni tarhi prayojanāni : śatāni sahasrāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:1217_2: . numi kṛte ṣṇāntā ṣaṭ it ṣaṭsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1218: prāpnoti . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . śakaṭau paddhatau . attve kṛte ataḥ iti ṭāp prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1219: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1220: iyeṣa , uvoṣa . guṇe kṛte ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1221: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1222: tasya doṣaḥ varṇāśrayaḥ pratyayaḥ varṇavicālasya . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1223: doṣaḥ varṇāśrayaḥ pratyayaḥ varṇavicālasya animittam syāt . kva . ata iñ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1224: dākṣiḥ , plākṣiḥ . na pratyayaḥ sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ . aṅgasañjñā tarhi animittam syāt . āttvam pugvidheḥ krāpayati . āttvam pugvidheḥ animittam
GS24pmbhasuu:1225: syāt . kva . krāpayati iti . pug hrasvatvasya adīdapat . puk hrasvatvasya animittam syāt . kva . adīdapat iti . tyadādyakāraḥ ṭābvidheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1226: tyadādyakāraḥ ṭābvidheḥ animittam syāt . kva . yā sā . iḍvidhiḥ ākāralopasya papivān . iḍvidhiḥ ākāralopasya animittam syāt . kva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1228: matubvibhaktyudāttatvam pūrvanighātasya animittam syāt . kva . agnimān vāyumān paramavācā paramavāce . nadīhrasvratvam sambuddhilopasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1229: nadīhrasvratvam sambuddhilopasya animittam syāt . kva . nadi kumāri kiśori
GS24pmbhasuu:1230: brāhmaṇi brahmabandhu . hrasvatve kṛte eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . ṅyantāt iti evam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1231: dīrghāt iti ucyate . hrasvāntāt ca na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1232: hrasvatvam kriyatām sambuddhilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt hrasvatvam . nityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . kṛte api hrasvatve prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:1233: . anityaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . na hi kṛte hrasvatve prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1234: sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1235_0: bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā . na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1235_1: na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na adhiśrīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:1235_2: na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavāḥ na upyante . doṣāḥ khalu api sākalyena parigaṇitāḥ prayojanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1235_3: udāharaṇamātram . kutaḥ etat . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti . tasmāt yāni etasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1235_4: paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā pratividheyam ca doṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1236: (P_1,1.41) KA_I,100.6-26 Ro_I,318-320 avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanam lugmukhsvaropacārāḥ . avyayībhāvasya avyayatve prayojanam kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:1237_0: lugmukhsvaropacārāḥ . luk : upāgni pratyagni . avyayāt iti luk siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1238: . upacāraḥ : upapayaḥkāraḥ , upapayaḥkāmaḥ iti . ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbhapātrakuśākarṇīṣu anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1239_0: bhavati . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . parigaṇanam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:1239_1: . api khalu api āhuḥ . yat anyat avyayībhāvasya avyayakṛtam prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1240_0: parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ . parāṅgavadbhāve avyayapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1240_1: adhīyāna iti evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti : upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna
GS24pmbhasuu:1241: nīcakaiḥ iti evamartham . tat iha api prāpnoti : upāgnikam , pratyagnikam iti . mumi avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate doṣāmanyam ahaḥ , divāmanyā rātriḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1242: evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti : aupakumbhammanyaḥ , upamaṇikammanyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1243: asya cvau avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ucyate doṣābhūtam ahaḥ , divābhūtā rātriḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1244_0: evamartham . saḥ iha api prāpnoti : upakumbhībhūtam upamaṇikībhūtam . yadi parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1244_1: kriyate na arthaḥ avyayībhāvasya avyayasañjñayā . katham yāni avyayībhāvasya avyayatve
GS24pmbhasuu:1244_2: prayojanāni . na etāni santi . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1245: luk iti : ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati avyayībhāvāt luk iti yad ayam na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . upacāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1246_0: anuttarapadasthasya iti vartate . tatra mukhasvaraḥ ekaḥ prayojayati . na ca ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:1246_1: prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1248: anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ . śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:1249: anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śeḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti : kuṇḍāni tiṣṭhanti vanāni tiṣṭhanti . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ anapuṃsakasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1250_0: na hi nañaḥ napuṃsakena sāmarthyam. kena tarhi . bhavatinā : na bhavati napuṃsakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1250_1: iti . yat tāvat ucyate śi sarvanāmasthānam suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti cet jasi śipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1250_2: iti . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : napuṃsakasya na iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1251_0: yat anyat napuṃsakāt iti . napuṃsake avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1251_1: . pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1251_2: . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:1251_3: . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:1251_4: satī bādhitum . yat api ucyate . asamarthasamāsaḥ ca ayam draṣṭavyaḥ iti yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1252: api vaktavyaḥ atha vā etarhi bahūni prayojanāni . kāni . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni , apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ , aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1253: (P_1,1.44.1) KA_I,101.18-102.10 Ro_I,322-323 na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasañjñākaraṇam . na vā iti vibhāṣāyām arthasya sañjñā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1254: navāśabdasya yaḥ arthaḥ tasya sañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . śabdasañjñāyām hi arthāsampratyayaḥ yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1255: śabdasañjñāyām hi satyām arthasya asampratyayaḥ syāt yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_0: anyatra api śabdasañjñāyām śabdasya sampratyayaḥ bhavati na arthasya . kva anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_1: . dādhāḥ ghu adāp taraptamapau ghaḥ iti ghugrahaṇeṣu ghagrahaṇeṣu ca śabdasya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_2: bhavati na arthasya . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1256_3: . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . saḥ arthanirdeśārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim gatam etat itinā āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:1257: arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke gauḥ ayam iti āha iti gośabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ gośabdam svasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1258: padārthāt pracyāvayati . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau arthapadārthakatā tasyāḥ śabdapadārthakaḥ sampadyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1259_0: navāśabdāt itikaraṇaḥ paraḥ prayujyamānaḥ navāśabdam svasmāt padārthāt pracyāvayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1259_1: . saḥ asau svasmāt padārthāt pracyutaḥ yā asau śabdapadārthakatā tasyāḥ laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:1259_2: artham sampratyāyayati . na vā iti yat gamyate na vā iti yat pratīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1261: samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : navā kuṇḍikā navā ghaṭikā iti . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api vibhāṣāsañjñā syāt . vibhāṣā diksamāse bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1262: : dakṣiṇapūrvasyām śālāyām . acirakṛtāyām sampratyayaḥ syāt . na vā vidhipūrvakatvāt pratiṣedhasamapratyayaḥ yathā loke . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_0: kim kāraṇam . vidhipūrvakatvāt . vidhāya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena pratiṣedhavācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_1: samapratyayaḥ bhavati . tat yathā loke : grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ na vā . na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_2: gamyate . asti kārṇam yena loke pratiṣedhavācinaḥ samapratyayaḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1263_3: . viliṅgam hi bhavān loke nirdeśam karoti . āṅga hi samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:1264: sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā : grāmaḥ bhavatā gantavyaḥ navaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1265: pratyagraḥ iti gamyate . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ : kva cit vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1266_0: samānaliṅgaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate iti . api ca kāmacāraḥ prayoktuḥ śabdānām abhisambandhe
GS24pmbhasuu:1266_1: . tat yathā : yavāgūḥ bhavatā bhoktavyā navā . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ bhujinā abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1266_2: bhujiḥ navāśabdena tadā pratiṣedhavācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati : yavāgūḥ bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1267: na iti gamyate . yadā yavāgūśabdaḥ navāśabdena abhisambadhyate na bhujinā
GS24pmbhasuu:1268: tadā pratyagravācinaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati : yavāgūḥ navā bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:1269_0: bhoktavyā . pratyagrā iti gamyate . na ca iha vayam vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sarvādīni abhisambadhnīmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1269_1: : diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni vibhāṣā bhavanti iti . kim tarhi . bhavatiḥ abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1269_2: : diksamāse bahuvrīhau sarvādīni bhavanti vibhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1270: (P_1,1.44.3) KA_I,103.3-104.7 Ro_I,325-328 vidhyanityatvam anupapannam pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . vidhyanityatvam na upapadyate : śuśāva ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1271: śuśuvatuḥ , śuśuvuḥ , śiśvāya , śiśviyatuḥ , śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1272_0: pratiṣedhasañjñākaraṇāt . pratiṣedhasya iyam sañjñā kriyate . tena vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1272_1: pratiṣedhasya eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1272_2: . katham . prasajyapratiṣedhāt prasajya kim cit na vā iti ucyate . tena ubhayam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1273: vipratiṣiddham tu . vipratiṣiddham tu bhavati . atra na jñāyate : kena abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . na vā prasaṅgasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1274: anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1275: prasaṅgasāmarthyāt . prasaṅgasāmarthyāt ca vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra pratiṣedhaviṣayāt pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1276: vidhiviṣayāt . tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yā aprāpte vibhāṣā . yā hi prāpte kṛtasāmarthyaḥ tatra pūrveṇa vidhiḥ iti kṛtvā pratiṣedhasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1277: sampratyayaḥ syāt . etat api siddham . katham . vibhāṣā iti mahatīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_0: kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_1: . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam ubhayoḥ sañjñā yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_2: : na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra yā tāvat aprāpte vibhāṣā tatra pratiṣedhyam na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1278_3: iti kṛtvā vā iti anena vikalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1279: bhaviṣyati . yā hi prāpte vibhāṣā tatra ubhayam upasthitam bhavati : na iti ca vā iti ca . tatra na iti anena pratiṣiddhe vā iti anena vikalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1281: vipratiṣedhayoḥ yugapadvacanam na upapadyate : śuśāva śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_0: śiśvāya śiśviyatuḥ śiśviyuḥ . kim kāraṇam . bhavati iti cet na pratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1282_1: iti cet pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na iti cet na vidhiḥ . na it cet vidhiḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1283: siddham etat. katham . pūrvavidhim uttarvidhiḥ bādhate . itikaraṇaḥ arthanirdeśāṛthaḥ iti uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1285_0: vibhāṣā tasya sādhutvam . sādhvanuśāsane asmin śāstre yasya vibhāṣā kriyate saḥ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:1285_1: sādhuḥ syāt . samāsaḥ ca eva hi vibhāṣā . tena samāsasya eva vibhāṣā sādhutvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1286: asādhuḥ na prayokṣyate . na ca eva hi kadā cit rājapuruṣaḥ iti asyām
GS24pmbhasuu:1287_0: avasthāyām asādhutvam iṣyate . api ca dvedhāpratipattiḥ . dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1287_1: . icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ vibhāṣāpradeśeṣu dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1288: śabdāḥ vibhāṣā asau samāsam nirvartayati . yasya api nityāḥ śabdāḥ tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena sādhutvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_0: . kim tarhi . samāsasañjñā abhisambadhyate : samāsaḥ iti eṣā sañjñā vibhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_1: iti . tat yathā : medhyaḥ paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_2: etat vicāryate : anaḍvān na anaḍvān iti . kim tarhi ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_3: . kārye yugapadanvācayayaugapadyam kāryeṣu śabdeṣu yugapat anvācayena ca yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1289_4: tasya yugapadvacanatā prāpnoti : tavyattavyānīyaraḥ , ḍhak ca maṇḍūkāt iti . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1290_0: śabdāḥ prayuktānām asau sādhutvam anvācaṣṭe . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ tasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:1290_1: eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1290_2: anekasya pratyayasya yugapat paratvena sambhavaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1291_0: . na api brūmaḥ pratyayamālā prāpnoti . kim tarhi . kartavyam iti prayoktavye yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:1291_1: dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca prayogaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1292: śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1293: prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ācāryadeśaśīlane ca tadviṣayatā . ācāryadeśaśīlanena yat ucyate tasya tadviṣayatā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_0: ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iti gālavāḥ eva hrasvān
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_1: prayuñjīran prākṣu ca eva hi phin syāt . tat yathā : jamadagniḥ vai etat pañcamam
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_2: avadānam avādyat tasmāt na ajāmadagnyaḥ pañcāvattam juhoti . yasya punaḥ nityāḥ śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_3: gālavagrahaṇam tasya pūjārtham deśagrahaṇam ca kīrtyartham . nanu ca yasya api kāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_4: tasya api pūjārtham gālavagrahaṇam syāt deśagraham ca kīrtyartham . tatkīrtane ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1294_5: dvedhāpratipattiḥ . tatkīrtane ca dvaidham śabdānām apratipattiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1295: icchāmaḥ ca punaḥ ācāryagrahaṇeṣu deśagrahaṇeṣu ca dvaidham śabdānām pratipattiḥ syāt iti tat ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1297: aśiṣyaḥ vā punaḥ ayam yogaḥ . kim kāraṇam . viditatvāt . yat anena yogena
GS24pmbhasuu:1298: prārthyate tasya arthasya viditatvāt . ye api hi etām sañjñām na ārabhante te api vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . yājñikāḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_0: sañjñām anārabhamāṇāḥ vibhāṣā iti ukte anityatvam avagacchanti . tat yathā . medhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_1: paśuḥ vibhāṣitaḥ . medhyaḥ anaḍvān vibhāṣitaḥ iti . ālabdhavyaḥ na ālabdhavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_2: gamyate . ācāryaḥ khalu api sañjñām ārabhamāṇaḥ bhūyiṣṭham anyaiḥ api śabdaiḥ etam
GS24pmbhasuu:1299_3: artham sampratyāyayati bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1300_0: (P_1,1.44.6) KA_I,105.21-108.7 Ro_I,333-339 aprāpte trisaṃśayāḥ . itaḥ uttaram yāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1300_1: vibhāṣāḥ anukramiṣyāmaḥ aprāpte tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti : prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1300_2: aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . dvandve ca vibhāṣā jasi :
GS24pmbhasuu:1301_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1301_1: vā ubhayatra . ubhayaśabdaḥ sarvādiṣu paṭhyate tayapaḥ ca ayajādeśaḥ kriyate . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:1301_2: vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1302: iti . aprāpte . ayac pratyayāntaram . yadi pratyayāntaram ubhayī iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . mātracaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1303: . mātrac iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1304: kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . mātraśabdāt prabhṛti ā āyacaḥ cakārāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_0: yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam kati tiṣṭhanti : atra api prāpnoti . ataḥ iti vartate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:1305_1: api tailamātrā ghrtamātrā iti atra api prāpnoti . sadṛśasya api asanniviṣṭasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:1306_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1306_1: vā ubhayatra . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1306_2: vā iti . aprāpte . anyat hi kittvam anyat ṅittvam . ekam cet ṅitkitau . yadi ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:1306_3: ṅitkitau tataḥ asti sandehaḥ atha hi nānā na asti sandehaḥ . yadi api nānā evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:1307: praurṇuvi iti . sārvadhātukam apit iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1308: ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vibhāṣā upayamane : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1309: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1310: gandhane iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:1311: . gandhane iti nivṛttam . anupasargāt vā : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1312: vṛttisargatāyaneṣu kramaḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte . vṛttyādiṣu iti nivṛttam . vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛgādīnām :
GS24pmbhasuu:1313_0: prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:1313_1: vā ubhayatra . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā
GS24pmbhasuu:1313_2: iti . aprāpte . jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1314: uṣavidajāgṛbhyaḥ anyatarasyām : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1315: katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra . pratyayāntāt iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti . aprāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:1316: pratyayāntāḥ dhātvantarāṇi . dīpādīnām vibhāṣā : prāpte aprāpte ubhayatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1317: vā iti sandehaḥ . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte katham vā ubhayatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1318: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte ubhayatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1319: aprāpte . kartari iti vartate . evam api sandehaḥ : nyāyye vā kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:1320: karmakartari vā iti . na asti sandehaḥ . sakarmakasya kartā karmavat
GS24pmbhasuu:1321_0: bhavati akarmakāḥ ca dīpādayaḥ . akarmakāḥ api vai sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti

GS24pmbhasuu:1342_1: anukramiṣyāmaḥ ubhayatra tāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ . trisaṃśayāḥ tu bhavanti : prāpte aprāpte
