GS24pmbhasuu:1356: samprasāraṇasañjñā kriyate : ik yaṇaḥ iti etat vākyam samprasāraṇasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:1357: bhavati iti , āhosvit varṇasya : ik yaḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne saḥ samprasāraṇasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1358: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ . samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ na sidhyati : samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1359: bhavati , samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . na hi vākyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1360: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām satyām eṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyate na api etayoḥ kāryayoḥ sambhavaḥ asti . astu tarhi varṇasya . varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1361_0: . varṇasañjñā cet nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati : ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti . saḥ eva hi tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:1361_1: ik durlabhaḥ yasya sañjñā kriyate . atha api katham cit labhyeta kena asu yaṇaḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1361_2: syāt . anena eva hi asau vyavasthāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_0: tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati , itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1362_1: tu jñāpakaḥ ubhayasañjñātvasya . yat ayam vibhaktiviśeṣaiḥ nirdeśam karoti samprasāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1363: samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti tena jñāyate ubhayoḥ sañjñā bhavati iti . yat tāvat āha samprasāraṇāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1364_0: bhavati samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti tena jñāyate varṇasya bhavati iti . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:1364_1: api āha ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam iti tena jñāyate vākyasya api sañjñā bhavati iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1364_2: vā punaḥ astu vākyasya eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1365: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām vākyasañjñā cet varṇavidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1366: yathā kākāt jātaḥ kākaḥ , śyenāt jātaḥ śyenaḥ evam samprasāraṇāt jātam
GS24pmbhasuu:1367_0: samprasāraṇam . yat tat samprasāraṇāt jātam samprasāraṇam tasmāt paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1367_1: tasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . atha vā dṛśyante hi vākyeṣu vākyaikadeśān prayuñjānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1367_2: padeṣu ca padaikadeśān . vākyeṣu tāvat vākyaikadeśān : praviśa piṇḍīm , praviśa tarparṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1367_3: . padeṣu padaikadeśān devadattaḥ dattaḥ , satyabhāmā bhāmā iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1368_0: samprasāraṇanirvṛttāt samprasāraṇanirvṛttasya iti etasya vākyasya arthe samprasāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1368_1: samprasāraṇasya iti vākyaikadeśaḥ prayujyate . tena nirvṛttasya vidhim vijñāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1368_2: . samprasāraṇanirvṛttāt samprasāraṇanirvṛttasya iti . atha vā āha ayam samprasāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1368_3: paraḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati samprasāraṇasya dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . na ca vākyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_0: samprasāraṇasañjñāyām satyām eṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ upapadyate na api etayoḥ kāryayoḥ sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_1: asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu varṇasya . nanu ca uktam varṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1369_2: cet nirvṛttiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1370_0: itaretarāśrayamātram etat coditam . sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1370_1: siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1370_2: kim cit ucyate asya sthāne ye
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_0: ākāraikāraukārāḥ bhāvyante te vṛddhisañjñāḥ bhavanti iti . iha punaḥ ucyate ik yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_1: yaṇaḥ sthāne saḥ samprasāraṇasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . evam tarhi bhāvinī iyam sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_2: vijñāsyate . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya
GS24pmbhasuu:1371_3: iti . saḥ paśyati : yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1372: vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1373: yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ yaṇaḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1374: bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya samprasāraṇam iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1375_0: atha vā ijādiyajādipravṛttiḥ ca eva hi loke lakṣyate . yajādyupadeśāt tu ijādinivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1375_1: prasaktā . prayuñjate ca punaḥ lokāḥ iṣṭam uptam iti . te manyāmahe : asya yaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1375_2: sthāne imam ikam prayuñjate iti . tatra tasya asādhvabhimatasya śāstreṇa sādhutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_0: (P_1,1.46.1) KA_I,112.19-22 Ro_I, 346 samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam . tatra na jñāyate kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_1: ādiḥ kaḥ antaḥ iti . tat yathā : ajāvidhanau devadattayajñadattau iti ukte na jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1377_2: kasya ajāḥ dhanam kasya avayaḥ iti . yadi api tāvat loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1378: nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti ca iha kaḥ cit puruṣārambhaḥ . asti iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1381: ādyantau bhavataḥ . āgamau iti āha . yuktam punaḥ yat nityeṣu nāma śabdeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1382_0: āgamaśāsanam syāt na nityeṣu śabdeṣu kūṭasthaiḥ avicālibhiḥ varṇaiḥ bhavitavyam anapāyopajanavikāribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1382_1: . āgamaḥ ca nāma apūrvaḥ śabdopajanaḥ . atha yuktam yat nityeṣu śabdeṣu ādeśāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1383: śabdāntaraiḥ iha bhavitavyam . tatra śabdāntarāt śabdāntarasya pratipattiḥ yuktā . ādeśāḥ tarhi ime bhaviṣyanti anāgamakānām sāgamakāḥ . tat katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1384: sañjñādhikāraḥ ayam . ādyantau ca iha saṅkīrtyete . ṭakārkakārau itau udāhriyete . tatra ādyantayoḥ ṭakārakakārau itau sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1385: tatra ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti upasthitam idam bhavati : ādiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1386: tena ikārādiḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . etāvat iha sūtram iṭ iti . katham punaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa ikārādiḥ ādeśaḥ labhyaḥ . labhyaḥ iti āha . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:1387: bahuvrīhinirdeśāt . bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ ayam : ikāraḥ ādiḥ asya iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vakutm iha katham : luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu aṭ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1388: iti yatra aśakyam udāttagrahaṇena akāraḥ viśeṣayitum . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1389: aṅgasya udāttatvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tripadaḥ ayam bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1390: tatra vākye eva udāttagrahaṇena akāraḥ viśeṣyate : akāraḥ udāttaḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1391_0: asya iti . yatra tarhi anuvṛttyā etat bhavati : āṭ ajādīnām iti . vakṣyati etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:1391_1: ajādīnām aṭā siddham iti . atha vā yat tāvat ayam sāmānyena śaknoti upadeṣṭum tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1391_2: tāvat upadiśati prakṛtim tataḥ valādi ārdhadhātukam tataḥ paścāt ikāram . tena ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1392: tat yathā khadiraburburayoḥ : khadiraburburau gaurakāṇḍau sūkṣmaparṇau .
GS24pmbhasuu:1393: tataḥ paścāt āha kaṇṭakavān khadiraḥ iti . tena asau viśeṣeṇa dravyāntaram samudāyam pratipadyate . atha vā etayā ānupūrvyā ayam śabdāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:1394: upadiśati : prakṛtim tataḥ valādi ārdhadhātukam tataḥ paścāt ikāram yasmin tasya āgamabuddhiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1395_1: . ṭakitoḥ ādyantavidhāne pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pratyayaḥ ādiḥ antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1395_2: vā mā bhūt : careḥ ṭaḥ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti . paravacanāt siddham . paravacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1396_0: bhaviṣyati . paravacanāt siddham iti cet na apavādatvāt . paravacanāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1396_1: cet na . kim kāraṇam . apavādatvāt . apavādaḥ ayam yogaḥ . tat yathā mit acaḥ antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1396_2: paraḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ sthāneyogatvasya pratyayaparatvasya ca apavādaḥ . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1397_0: anavakāśam mitkaraṇam sthāneyogatvam pratyayaparatvam ca bādhate . iha punaḥ ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1397_1: sāvakāsam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ṭitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ : ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1397_2: kitkaraṇasya avakāśaḥ : kiti iti ākāralopaḥ yathā syāt . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1397_3: yat niyogataḥ syāt . yadi ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1398: niyogataḥ paraḥ syāt tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ nu khalu etat ṭitkaraṇāt ayam paraḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ādiḥ iti kitkaraṇāt ca paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_0: bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antaḥ iti . ṭitaḥ khalu api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ yatra na asti sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_1: yat paraḥ ca syāt ādiḥ ca . kitaḥ tu aparihāraḥ . asti hi sambhavaḥ yat paraḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1399_2: syāt antaḥ ca . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . upasarge ghoḥ kiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1400: : ādhyoḥ , pradhyoḥ . noṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:1401_0: aparihāraḥ . syāt eva hi ayam ṭitkaraṇāt ādiḥ na punaḥ paraḥ . kva tarhi idānīm idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1401_1: syāt : ṭitaḥ īkāraḥ bhavati iti . yaḥ ubhayavān : gāpoḥ ṭak iti . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:1402: ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ karatvyaḥ : ādyantau ṭakitau ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1403_0: iti . ādyantayoḥ vā ṣaṣthyarthatvāt tadabhāve asampratyayaḥ . ādyantayoḥ vā ṣaṣthyarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1403_1: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ abhāve asampratyayaḥ . ādiḥ antaḥ vā na bhaviṣyati . yuktam punaḥ yat śabdanimittakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1403_2: nāma arthaḥ syāt na arthanimittakena śabdena bhavitavyam . arthanimittakaḥ eva śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1403_3: . tat katham . ādyantau ṣaṣṭhyarthau . na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . te manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:1403_4: : ādyantau eva atra na staḥ . tayoḥ abhāve ṣaṣṭhī api na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1405_0: (P_1,1.47.1) KA_I,114.18-115.4 Ro_I,352 kimartham idam ucyate . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1405_1: iti sthānaparapratyayāpavādaḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti ucyate sthāneyogatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1406: sthāneyogatvasya tāvat : kuṇḍāni vanāni payāṃsi yaśāṃsi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_0: pratyayaparatvasya : bhinatti chinatti . bhavet idam yuktam udāharaṇam kuṇḍāni vanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_1: yatra na asti sambhavaḥ yat ayam acaḥ anytāt paraḥ ca syāt sthāne ca iti . idam tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_2: ayuktam payāṃsi yaśāṃsi . asti hi sambhavaḥ yat acaḥ anytāt paraḥ ca syāt sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_3: ca . etat api yuktam . katham . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpayati na api dharmasūtrakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_4: paṭhanti apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyantām iti . kim tarhi . laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_5: . loke hi sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā : dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:1407_6: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:1408: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave acām antyāt paratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1411_0: anuṣaṅgasaṃyogādilopārtham . antyāt pūrvaḥ masjeḥ mit vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1412: saṃyogādilopārtham maṅktā maṅktum , maṅktavyam . bharjimarcyoḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:1413: bharjimarcyoḥ ca antyāt pūrvaḥ mit vaktavyaḥ . bharūjā marīcayaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1415_0: (P_1,1.47.3) KA_I,115.13-117.2 Ro_I,353-357 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1415_1: āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1415_2: . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1416_0: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghanalopasvaraṇatvānusvāraśībhāvāḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1416_1: dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1417: nalopa : nalopaḥ ca na sidhyati : agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā , ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa .
GS24pmbhasuu:1418: svara : svaraḥ ca na sidhyati : sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi . sarvasya supi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1419: ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . svara . ṇatva : ṇatvam ca na sidhyati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1420: māṣavāpāṇi vrīhivāpāṇi . pūrvānte prātipadikāntanakārasya iti siddham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1421: parādau vibhaktinakārasya , abhakte numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva : prātipadikāntanumvibhaktiṣu iti . ṇatva .
GS24pmbhasuu:1422_0: anusvāra : anusvāraḥ ca na sidhyati : dviṣantapaḥ , parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali
GS24pmbhasuu:1422_1: iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ ca apadāntasya jhali iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1423: vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ , abhraṃlihaḥ vāyuḥ . anusvāra . śībhāva : śībhāvaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:1424: sidhyati : trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . napuṃsakāt uttarasya auṅaḥ śībhāvaḥ bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . śībhāva . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1426: yadi parādiḥ guṇaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ : trapuṇe jatune tumburuṇe . gheḥ ṅiti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1427_0: guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . vṛddhi : vṛddhiḥ pratiṣedhyā : atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1427_1: . sakhyuḥ asambuddhau iti ṇittve acaḥ ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . vṛddhi . auttva
GS24pmbhasuu:1427_2: : auttvam ca pratiṣedhyam : trapuṇi jatuni tumburuṇi . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1428: dīrgha : dīrghatvam ca na sidhyati : kuṇḍāni vanāni . nopadhāyāḥ sarvanāmasthāne ca asambuddhau iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1429: ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : asthīni dadhīni priyasakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni . dīrgha . nalopa : nalopaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_0: sidhyati : agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā , ta tā piṇḍānām . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_1: iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . nalopa . anusvāra : anusvāraḥ ca na sidhyati : dviṣantapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1430_2: , parantapaḥ . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1431: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na jhalparaḥ : vahaṃlihaḥ gauḥ , abhraṃlihaḥ vāyuḥ . anusvāra . śībhāvenakārapratiṣedhaḥ : śībhāve nakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_0: vaktavyaḥ : trapuṇī jatunī tumburuṇī . sanumkasya śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_1: . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_2: na prāpnoti . kasmāt . numā vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_3: napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvantaḥ kriyate napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_4: dvigusvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam : ārāśastriṇī dhānāśaṣkulinī
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_5: niṣkauśāmbinī nirvārāṇasinī . dvigusvara : pañcāratninī daśāratninī . numi kṛte anantyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1432_6: ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnunvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1433_0: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ num , antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:1433_1: antaraṅge . dvigusvare bhūyān parihāraḥ : saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1433_2: igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā dvigusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1434_0: (P_1,1.48) KA_I,117.4-118.4 Ro_I,357-359 kimartham idam ucyate . ecaḥ ik savarṇākāranivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1434_1: . ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ucyate savarṇanivṛttyartham akāranivṛttyartham ca . savarṇnivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1435: eṅaḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu ardhaḥ ekāraḥ ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1436: akāranivṛttyartham ca . imau aicau samāhāravarṇau . mātrā avarṇasya mātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:1437_0: ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . tayoḥ hrasvaśāsaneṣu kadā cit avarṇaḥ syāt kadā cit ivarṇovarṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:1437_1: . mā kadā cit avarṇam bhūt iti evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1437_2: tarhi iti . dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . dīrghāḥ tu ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1438: prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca hrasvādeśe iti ucyate . tena dīrghāḥ na bhaviṣyanti . viṣyārtham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1439: . ecaḥ hrasvaprasaṅge ik bhavati iti . dīrghāprasaṅgaḥ tu nivartakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1440: dīrghāṇām tu ikām aprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . nivartakatvāt . na anena ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_0: nirvartyante . kim tarhi . anikaḥ nivartyante . siddhāḥ eva hrasvāḥ ikaḥ ca anikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_1: ca . tatra anena anikaḥ nivartyante . savarṇanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_2: eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt . siddham etat . katham . eṅaḥ sasthānatvāt ikārokārau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1441_3: . ardhaḥ ekāraḥ aradhaḥ okāraḥ vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:1442: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca eṅaḥ sasthānatarau ardhaḥ ekāraukārau . na tau staḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1443_0: yadi hi tau syātām tau eva ayam upadiśet . nanu ca bhoḥ chandogānām sātyamugrirāṇāyanīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1443_1: ardham ekāram ardham okāram ca adhīyate : sujāte eśvasūnṛte , adhvaryo odribhiḥ sutam
GS24pmbhasuu:1443_2: , śukram te enyat yajatam te enyat
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_0: iti . pārṣadakṛtiḥ eṣā tatrabhavatām . na eva loke na anyasmin vede ardhaḥ ekāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_1: ardhaḥ okāraḥ vā asti . akāranivṛttyarthena api na arthaḥ . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1444_2: . aicoḥ ca uttarabhūyastvāt avarṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1445: bhūyasī mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ alpīyasī avarṇasya . bhūyasaḥ eva grahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1446: bhaviṣyanti . tat yathā brāhmaṇagrāmaḥ ānīyatām iti ucyate tatra ca avarataḥ pañcakārukī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_0: (P_1,1.49.1) KA_I,118.6-7 Ro_I,360 kim idam sthāneyogā iti . sthāne yogaḥ asyāḥ sā
GS24pmbhasuu:1447_1: iyam sthāneyogā . saptamyalopaḥ nipātanāt . tṛtiyāyā vā etvam : sthānena yogaḥ asyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1449_0: ucyate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . niyamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . ekaśatam
GS24pmbhasuu:1449_1: ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca vyākaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1449_2: yā ṣaṣṭhī sā sthāneyogā eva syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1450_0: tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sthāneyogavacanam niyamārtham . evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1450_1: idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1451: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ tu na sidhyanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1452: iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti gohaḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_0: yogasya asandigdhatvāt . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca niyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_1: . yogasya asandigdhatvāt . sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_2: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate. laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāṇtaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1453_3: yathā loke : kam cit kaḥ cit pṛcchati : grāmāntaram gamiṣyāmi panthānam me bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_0: . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . amuṣmin avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ amuṣmin avakāśe hastavāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_1: iti . yaḥ tu atra tiryakpathaḥ bhavati na tasmin sandehaḥ iti kṛtvā na asau upadiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_2: . evam iha api sandehe niyamaḥ na ca avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu sandehaḥ . atha vā sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1454_3: ayogā sthāneyogā kim idam ayogā iti . avyaktayogā ayogā . atha vā yogavatī yogā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_0: . yasyāḥ bahavaḥ yogāḥ . kutaḥ etat . bhūmni hi matup bhavati . viśiṣṭā vā ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_1: sthāneyogā . atha vā kim cid liṅgam āsajya vakṣyāmi : itthaṃliṅgā ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_2: bhavati iti . na tat liṅgam avayavaṣaṣṭhyādiṣu kariṣyate . yadi evam śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_3: śā hau śāsigrahaṇam kartavyam sthāneyogārtham liṅgam āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_4: . yat eva adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat
GS24pmbhasuu:1455_5: sthāneyogārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma triprakāraḥ . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_0: sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ supravijvalitaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_1: . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham anukṛṣyate tadvat anukṛṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_2: cakāreṇa . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_3: . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti tadā hi yat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_4: adaḥ purastāt avayavaṣaṣṭhyartham prakaṛtam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat sthāneyogārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_5: bhaviṣyati . sampratyayamātram etat bhavati . na hi anuccārya śabdam liṅgam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_6: āsaṅktum . evam tarhi ādeśe tat liṅgam kariṣyate tat prakṛtim āskantsyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_7: niyamaḥ kriyate yatra ekā ṣaṣṭhī anekam ca viśeṣyam tatra na sidhyati : aṅgasya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_8: halaḥ , aṇaḥ , samprasāraṇasya iti . hal api viśeṣyaḥ aṇ api viśeṣyaḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1456_9: api viśeṣyam . asati punaḥ niyame kāmacāraḥ ekayā ṣaṣthyā anekam viśeṣayitum . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_0: devadattasya putraḥ pāṇiḥ kambalaḥ iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ niyamena . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_1: ekaśatam ṣaṣṭhyarthāḥ yāvantaḥ vā te sarve ṣaṣṭhyām uccāritāyām prāpnuvanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_2: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadi api loke bahavaḥ abhisambandhāḥ ārthāḥ yaunāḥ maukhāḥ srauvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1457_3: ca śabdasya tu śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ sthānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1458: anantarādayaḥ abhisambandhāḥ . asteḥ bhūḥ bhavati iti sandehaḥ : sthāne anantare samīpe iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1459: upatiṣṭhate : vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1460: . sthāne iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1461_0: vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhyantam sthānena yathā yujyeta yataḥ ṣaṣṭhī uccāritā
GS24pmbhasuu:1461_1: . kim kṛtam bhavati . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1461_2: bhavati (P_1,1.50.1) KA_I,120.2-13 Ro_I,364-366 kim udāharaṇam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:1462: : dadhi atra madhu atra : tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1463: oṣṭhasthānaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . saṅkhyātānudeśena api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1464: siddham . idam tarhi : tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahuvarthaḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1465: api saṅkhyātānudeśena eva siddham . idam tarhi : akaḥ savarṇe dīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1466: : daṇḍāgram , kṣupāgram , dadhi indraḥ , madhu uṣṭraḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1467_0: kaṇṭhasthānayoḥ kaṇṭhasthānaḥ tālusthānayoḥ tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānayoḥ oṣṭhasthānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1467_1: yathā syāt iti . atha sthāne iti vartamāne punaḥ sthānagrahaṇam kimartham . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1468_0: āntaryam balīyaḥ yathā syāt . kim punaḥ tat . cetā stotā : pramāṇataḥ akāraḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1468_1: prāpnoti sthānataḥ ekāraukārau . punaḥ sthānagrahaṇāt ekāraukārau bhavataḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1468_2: tamabgrahaṇam kimartham . jhayaḥ haḥ anyatarasyām iti atra soṣmaṇaḥ soṣmāṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1469: nādavantaḥ iti tṛtīyāḥ . tamapgrahaṇena soṣmāṇaḥ nādavantaḥ ca te bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1470: caturthāḥ : vāg ghasati triṣṭub bhasati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1472: ucyate . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt sthānentaratamavacanam . sthānī ekatvena nirdiśyate : akaḥ iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1473_0: anekaḥ ca punaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate : dīrghaḥ iti . sthāninaḥ ekatvanirdeśāt anekādeśanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1473_1: ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve sarvatra prāpnuvanti . iṣyate ca antaratamāḥ eva syuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1473_2: . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati . tasmāt sthāne antaratamaḥ iti vacanam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:1474_0: evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathā punaḥ iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1474_1: antaratamanirvṛtttiḥ sā kim prakṛtitaḥ bhavati : sthānini antaratame ṣaṣṭhī , āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:1475: ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . kutaḥ punaḥ iyam vicāraṇā . ubhayathā api tulyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1476_0: saṃhitā : sthānentaratama , uraṇ raparaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prakṛtitaḥ : ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1476_1: yaṇ aci : yaṇām ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1476_2: iti iha eva syāt : dadhi atra madhu atra .
GS24pmbhasuu:1477_0: kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1477_1: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1478_0: guṇavṛddhyoḥ ye antaratamāḥ ikaḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1478_1: iti iha eva syāt : netā lavitā nāyakaḥ lāvakaḥ . cetā stotā cāyakaḥ stāvakaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1478_2: atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1479_0: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1479_1: bhavati . tathā ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge guṇavṛddhyoḥ yat antaratamam ṛvarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1479_2: tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1480: iha eva syāt : kartā hartā , āstārakaḥ , nipārakaḥ . āstaritā niparitā kārakaḥ , hārakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ādeśataḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1481: satyām sarvatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti sarvatra siddham bhavati . atha ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ayam doṣaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1482: vāntaḥ yi pratyaye : sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam ekāraikārayoḥ mā bhūt iti . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1483: satyām vāntādeśasya yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa sthāninirdeśam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1484: ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . katham . vāntagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yi pratyaye ecaḥ ayādayaḥ bhavanti iti eva. yadi na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1485: ceyam , jeyam iti atra api prāpnoti . kṣayyajayyau śakyārthe iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1486: anyatra api prāpnoti : kṣeyam pāpam jeyaḥ vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate : kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ anayoḥ ca śakyāṛthe eva iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1487: niyamāt na prāpnoti : lavyam , pavyam avaśyalāvyam avaśyapāvyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1488: tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec .
GS24pmbhasuu:1489: kathañjātīyakaḥ kṣijyoḥ ec . ekāraḥ . evam api rāyam icchati raiyati atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1490: api prāpnoti . rāyiḥ chāndasaḥ . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1491_0: ūdupadhayāḥ gohaḥ : ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1491_1: . prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām ūkārasya gohaḥ yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1491_2: tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1492: antareṇa upadhāgrahaṇam siddham bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:1493: satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_0: pūrvasya ca daḥ : ādeśataḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām takāragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_1: prakṛtitaḥ punaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau satyām nakārasya niṣṭhāyām yā antaratamā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_2: tatra ṣaṣṭhī , yatra ṣaṣṭhī tatra ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa takāragrahaṇam siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1494_3: bhavati . ādeśataḥ api antaratamanirvṛttau satyām na doṣaḥ . kriyate etat nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1495: (P_1,1.50.3) KA_I,122.1-20 Ro_I,370-372 kim punaḥ idam nirvartakam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_0: antaratamāḥ anena nirvartyante , āhosvit pratipādakam : anyena nirvṛttānām anena
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_1: pratipattiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . sthāne antaratamanirvatake sthāninivṛttiḥ . sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_2: antaratamanirvatake sarvasthāninām nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_3: madhu . astu . na kaḥ cit anyaḥ ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra āntaryataḥ dadhiśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_4: dadhiśabdaḥ eva madhuśabdasya madhuśabdaḥ eva ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi ca evam kva
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_5: cit vairūpyam tatra doṣaḥ syāt : bisam bisam , musalam musalam . iṇkoḥ iti ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1496_6: prāpnoti . api ca iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . tat yathā tapte
GS24pmbhasuu:1497_0: bhrāṣṭre tilāḥ kṣiptāḥ muhūrtam api na avatiṣṭhante evam ime varṇāḥ muhūrtam api
GS24pmbhasuu:1497_1: na avatiṣṭheran . astu tarhi pratipādakam : anyena nirvṛttānām anena pratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1497_2: . nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttapratipattau nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:1498_0: kim tarhi ucyate nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati iti . na sādhīyaḥ nirvṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1498_1: . na brūmaḥ nirvṛttiḥ na sidhyati iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:1498_2: . na sarve sarvatra iṣyante . idam idānīm kimartham syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1499_0: anarthakam ca . anarthakam etat syāt . yaḥ hi bhuktavantam brūyāt mā bhukthāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1499_1: kim tena kṛtam syāt . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre vacanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1499_2: . ṣaṣṭhyadhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartvyaḥ : sthāne antaratamaḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1501: pratyātmam iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . yaḥ yasya antaratamaḥ sa tasya sthāne yathā syāt anyasya antaratamaḥ anyasya sthāne mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1503: kim kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1504: samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ucyate . na ca ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1505: pratyātmam iti pratyātmam ca āsate . antaratamavacanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:1506: antaratamavacanam ca aśiṣyam . yogaḥ ca api ayam aśiṣyaḥ . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1507: svabhāvasiddhatvāt eva . tat yathā : samājeṣu samāśeṣu samavāyeṣu ca āsyatām iti ukte na eva kṛśāḥ kṛśaiḥ saha āsata na pāṇḍavaḥ pāṇḍubhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1508_0: yeṣām eva kim cit arthakṛtam āntaryam taiḥ eva saḥ āsate . tathā gāvaḥ divasam caritavatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1508_1: yaḥ yasyāḥ prasavaḥ bhavati tena saha śerate . tathā yāni etāni goyuktakāni saṅghuṣṭakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1509_0: sabdam kurvanti . evam tāvat cetanāvatsu . acetaneṣu api . loṣṭaḥ kṣiptaḥ bāhuvegam
GS24pmbhasuu:1509_1: gatvā na eva tiryak gacchati na ūrdhvam ārohati pṛthivīvikāraḥ pṛthivīm gacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:1509_2: āntaryataḥ . tathā yā etāḥ āntarikṣyaḥ sūkṣmāḥ āpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1510: tāsām vikāraḥ dhūmaḥ saḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati abvikāraḥ apaḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ . tathā jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1511: arciḥ ākāśadeśe nivāte suprajvalitaḥ na eva tiryak gacchati na avāk avarohati jyotiṣaḥ vikāraḥ jyotiḥ eva gacchati āntaryataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1512_1: . vyañjanavyatikrame svaravyatikrame ca tatkālatā prāpnoti . vyañjanavyatikrame :
GS24pmbhasuu:1512_2: iṣṭam uptam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya ardhamātrikaḥ ik prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1512_3: na eva loke na ca vede
GS24pmbhasuu:1513: ardhamātrikaḥ ik asti . kaḥ tarhi . mātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1514_0: svaravyatikrame : dadhi atra madhu atra kumārī atra brahmabandhvartham iti . āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1514_1: mātrikasya dvimātrikasya ikaḥ mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ prāpnoti . na eva loke
GS24pmbhasuu:1514_2: na ca vede mātrikaḥ dvimātrikaḥ vā yaṇ asti .kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1515: tarhi . ardhamātrikaḥ . yaḥ asti saḥ bhaviṣyati . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1516_0: . akṣu ca anekavarṇādeśeṣu tatkālatā prāpnoti . idamaḥ iś : āntaryataḥ ardhtṛtīyamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1516_1: idamaḥ sthāne ardhtṛtīyamātram ivarṇam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvyamānena savarṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:1516_2: grahaṇam na iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1517: guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu ca . guṇavṛddhyejbhāveṣu ca tatkālatā prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1518: khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ khaṭvā udakam khaṭvodakam khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1519: , khaṭvā aitikayanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ , khaṭvā aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_0: iti . āntaryataḥ trimātrcaturmātrāṇām sthāninām trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . tapare guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca taḥ paraḥ yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_2: na iti āha . tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1520_3: syāt : yavaḥ , stavaḥ . lavaḥ , pavaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1521: na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . kim dakāre prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1522: atha kim takāre prayojanam . yadi asandehārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . atha mukhasukhārthaḥ takāraḥ dakāraḥ api . ejbhāve : kurvāte kurvāthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1523: āntaryataḥ ardhatṛtīyamātrasya ṭisañjñakasya ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1524_0: . na eva loke na ca vede ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ eḥ asti . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:1524_1: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . ṛvarṇasya guṇavṛddhiprasaṅge sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarve guṇavṛddhisañjñakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1525_0: kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakaḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1525_1: ṛvarṇasya sthāne bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . na vā ṛvarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1526_0: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṛvarṇasya sthāne raparaprasaṅgāt . uḥ sthāne aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:1526_1: prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . tatra ṛvarṇasya āntaryataḥ rephavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1527_0: sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu anekāltvāt . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ ṛvarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1527_1: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvāt . anekāl śit sarvasya iti . na vā anekāltvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1527_2: tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya avighātaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anekāltvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1528: yadā ayam uḥ sthāne tadā anekāl . anekāltvasya tadāśrayatvāt ṛvarṇādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1529: vighātaḥ na bhaviṣyati . athavā anāntaryam eva etayoḥ āntaryam . ekasya api antaratamā prakṛtiḥ na asti aparasya api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1530: etat eva etayoḥ āntaryam . samprayogaḥ vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat . atha vā naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat samprayogaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : tava aśvaḥ naṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_0: mama api rathaḥ dagdhaḥ . ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . evam iha api : tava api antaratamā
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_1: prakṛtiḥ na asti mama api antaratamaḥ ādeśaḥ na asti . astu nau samprayogaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_2: viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . cetanāvatsu arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke samprayogaḥ bhavati . varṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1531_3: ca punaḥ acetanāḥ . tatra kiṅkṛtaḥ samprayogaḥ . yadi api varṇāḥ acetanāḥ yaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:1532: . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . ejavarṇayoḥ ādeśe avarṇam prāpnoti :khaṭvā elakā , mālā aupagavaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1533_0: sthāninaḥ avarṇapradhānatvāt . sthānī hi atra avarṇapradhānaḥ . siddham tu ubhayāntaryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1533_1: . siddham etat . katham . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena bhavitavyam . na ca avarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_0: (P_1,1.51.1) KA_I,125.17-126.19 Ro_I,378-381 kim idam uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_1: : uḥ sthāne aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti , āhosvit raparatvam anena vidhīyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_2: uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_3: anyanivṛttyartham cet udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ . uraṇraparavacanam anyanivṛttyartham cet
GS24pmbhasuu:1534_4: udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . ke punaḥ udāttādayaḥ . udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1535: kṛtiḥ , hṛtiḥ , kṛtam , hṛtam , prakṛtam , prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi . astu tarhi uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca aṇ tu raparaḥ iti . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1536: cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . yaḥ uḥ sthāne saḥ raparaḥ iti cet guṇavṛddhyoḥ avarṇāpratipattiḥ . kartā hartā vārṣagaṇyaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1537: ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ eṅaicau . pūrvasmin api pakṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:1538: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim hi sādhīyaḥ tatra api ṛvarṇasya asavarṇe yat avarṇam syāt na punaḥ ivarṇovarṇau . atha matam etat uḥ sthāne aṇaḥ ca anaṇaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_0: prasaṅge aṇ eva bhavati raparaḥ ca iti siddhā pūrvasmin pakṣe avarṇasya pratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_1: . yat tu tat uktam udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati iti iha saḥ doṣaḥ jāyate . na jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_2: . jāyate saḥ doṣaḥ . katham . udāttaḥ iti anena aṇaḥ api pratinirdiśyante anaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1539_3: api . yadi api pratinirdiśyante na tu prāpnuvanti . kim kāraṇam . sthāne antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1540_0: dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ sthāne antaratamaḥ uḥ aṇ raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1540_1: iti ca sthāne antaratamaḥ iti anayā paribhāṣayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ uḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1540_2: aṇ raparaḥ iti . ataḥ kim . ataḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1541: : udāttādiṣu doṣaḥ iti . ye ca api ete ṛvarṇasya sthāne pratipadam ādeśāḥ ucyante teṣu raparatvam na prāpnoti : ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ ut oṣṭhyapūrvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1542_0: . siddham tu prasaṅge raparatvāt . siddham etat . katham . prasaṅge raparatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1542_1: uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:1542_2: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . sthāne iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:1543: sthānaśabdaḥ ca prasaṅgavācī . yadi evam ādeśaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1544: ādeśaḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . dvitīyam sthānagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:1545: anuvartate. tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate : uḥ sthāne aṇ sthāne iti . uḥ prasaṅge aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1546_0: (P_1,1.51.2) KA_I,126.20-127.3 Ro_I,382 atha aṇgrahaṇam kimartham na uḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1546_1: eva ucyeta . uḥ raparaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm raparaḥ syāt . yaḥ uḥ sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1546_2: bhavati . kaḥ ca uḥ sthāne bhavati . ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1547: ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti cet rīrividhiṣu raparapratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśaḥ raparaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1548: cet rīrividhiṣu raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ rīrividhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1550: . ānaṅ : hotāpotārau . anaṅ : kartā hartā . rīṅ : mātrīyati pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1551: riṅ : kriyate hriyate . udāttādiṣu ca . kim . raparatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛtiḥ , hṛtiḥ , kṛtam , hṛtam , prakṛtam , prahṛtam nṝṃḥ pāhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1554_0: ekādeśasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1554_1: na sidhyati . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajyamānaḥ eva raparaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1554_2: uḥ eva sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . kim tarhi . uḥ ca anyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1555: . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . yat atra ṛvarṇam tadāśrayam raparatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā māṣāḥ na bhoktavyāḥ iti miśrāḥ api na bhujyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_0: avayavagrahaṇāt siddham iti cet ādeśe rāntapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayavagrahaṇāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_1: iti cet ādeśe rāntasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : hotāpotārau . yathā eva uḥ ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_2: ca sthāne aṇ raparaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ uḥ sthāne aṇ ca anaṇ ca saḥ api raparaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_3: . yadi punaḥ ṛvarṇāntasya sthāninaḥ raparatvam ucyeta : khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_4: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : kartā hartā kirati girati . ṛvarṇāntasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1556_5: ucyate . na ca etat ṛvarṇāntam . nanu ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena ṛvarṇāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:1557: arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ na ca eṣaḥ arthavān . tasmāt na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1558: na cet evam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca raparatvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1559_0: vaktavyaḥ : mātuḥ , pituḥ iti . ubhayam na vaktavyam . katham . iha yaḥ dvayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1559_1: prasaṅge bhavati labhate asau anyatarataḥ vyapadeśam . tat yathā devadattasya putraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1560: katham mātuḥ pituḥ iti . astu atra raparatvam . kā rūpasiddiḥ . rāt sasya iti sakārasya lopaḥ rephasya visarjanīyaḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi mātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1561: karoti , pituḥ karoti iti apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ṣatvam prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:1562: apratyayasvisarjanīyasya iti ucyate . pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1563: lupyate atra pratyayaḥ rāt sasya iti . evam tarhi bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1564: jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:1565: bhrātuṣputraśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimitttāt ṣatvam bhavati iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:1566_0: (P_1,1.51.4) KA_I,127.25-130.2 Ro_I,385-391 kim punaḥ ayam pūrvāntaḥ āhosvit parādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1566_1: āhosvit abhaktaḥ . katham ca ayam pūrvāntaḥ syāt katham vā parādiḥ katham vā abhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1566_2: . yadi antaḥ iti vartate tataḥ pūrvāntaḥ . atha ādiḥ iti vartate tataḥ parādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1567: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhakte dīrghalatvayagabhyastasvarahalādiśeṣavisarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ pratyayāvyavasthā ca . yadi abhaktaḥ dīrghatvam na prāpnoti : gīḥ , pūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1568: rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1569: rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate na punaḥ padam viśeṣyate rephavakārāntasya padasya iti . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1570: agniḥ , vāyuḥ iti . evam tarhi rephavakārābhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ dhātunā ikam : rephavakārāntasya padasya ikaḥ dhātoḥ iti . evam api priyam
GS24pmbhasuu:1571: grāmaṇi kulam asya priyagrāmaṇiḥ , priyasenāniḥ atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātuḥ eva viśeṣyate . dhātau ca viśeṣyamāṇe iha dīrghatvam na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1572_0: gīḥ , pūḥ . dīrgha . latva : latvam ca na sidhyati : nijegilyate . graḥ yaṅi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1572_1: latvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . graḥ iti anantarayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:1572_2: svaḥ jegilyate iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:1573: ānantaryam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . atha vā graḥ iti pañcamī . latva . yaksvara :
GS24pmbhasuu:1574_0: yaksvaraḥ ca na sidhyati . gīryate svayam eva , puryate svayam eva . acaḥ kartṛyaki
GS24pmbhasuu:1574_1: iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1575_0: yaksvara . abhyastasvara : abhyastasvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : ma hi sma te piparuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1575_1: ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau lasārvadhātuke iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1575_2: eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti repheṇa vyavahitatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaravidhau vyañjamam
GS24pmbhasuu:1576: abhyastasvara . halādiśeṣa : halādiśeṣaḥ ca na sidhyati : vavṛte vavṛdhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:1577: abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . halādiśeṣa . visarjanīya :
GS24pmbhasuu:1578: visarjanīyasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : nārkuṭaḥ , nārpatyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1579: kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . visarjanīya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1580: pratyayāvyavasthā : pratyaye vyavasthā na prakalpate : kirataḥ , girataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1581: rephaḥ api abhaktaḥ pratyayaḥ api . tatra vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte rvavadhāraṇam visarjanīyapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1582_0: yaksvaraḥ ca . yadi pūrvāntaḥ roḥ avadhāraṇam kartavyam : roḥ supi . roḥ eva supi
GS24pmbhasuu:1582_1: na anyasya rephasya : sarpiṣṣu dhanuṣṣu . iha mā bhūt : gīrṣu pūrṣu . parādau api
GS24pmbhasuu:1582_2: sati avadhāraṇam kartavyam caturṣu iti evam artham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_0: nārkuṭaḥ , nārpatyaḥ . kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti . parādau
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_1: api visarjanīyasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ nārkalpiḥ iti evamartham . kalpipadasaṅghātabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_2: asau na utsahate avayavasya padāntatām vihantum iti kṛtvā visarjanīyaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_3: yaksvaraḥ yaksvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : gīryate svayam eva , puryate svayam eva . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_4: kartṛyaki iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1584_5: vā punaḥ astu parādiḥ . parādau akāralopautvapukpratiṣedhaḥ caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1585_0: dīrghatvam ca . yadi parādiḥ akāralopaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ : kartā hartā : ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:1585_1: iti akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate . yadi upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1585_2: vartate dhinutaḥ , kṛṇutaḥ atra lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1586: ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate . ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1587: akāralopa . autva : autvam ca pratiṣedhyam : cakāra jahāra . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1588: iti autvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1589: rephena vyavahitatvāt . autva . pukpratiṣedhaḥ : puk ca pratiṣedhyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1590: kārayati hārayati . ātām puk iti puk prāpnoti . pukpratiṣedhaḥ . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam ca na sidhyati : acīkarat ajīharat . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1591_0: hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . caṅi upadhāhrasvatvam . iṭaḥ avyavasthā : iṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1591_1: ca vyavasthā na prakalpate : āstaritā niparitā . iṭ api parādiḥ rephaḥ api . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1592_0: abhyāsalopaḥ : abhyāsalopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ : vavṛte vavṛdhe . abhyāsasya iti halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1592_1: na prāpnoti . abhyāsalopaḥ . abhyastasvara : abhyastasvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : ma hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1592_2: sma te piparuḥ , ma hi sma te bibharuḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:1592_3: lasārvadhātuke iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1593_0: abhyastasvara . tādisvaraḥ : tādisvaraḥ ca na sidhyati : prakartā prakartum , prahartā
GS24pmbhasuu:1593_1: prahartum . tādau ca niti kṛti atau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1594: iḍartham iti . tādisvaraḥ . dīrghatvam : dīrghatvam ca na sidhyati : gīḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1595: pūḥ . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1597_0: antyaviśeṣaṇam āhosvit ādeśaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi antyaviśeṣaṇam ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1597_1: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . anekāl api ādeśaḥ antyasya prasajyeta . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:1597_2: punaḥ al antyasya iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1597_3: na vaktavyam bhavati . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : al eva antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1598: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vākyasya api padasya api antyasya prasajyeta . yadi khalu api eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ tat na kriyeta iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1599: antyaviśeṣaṇe api sati tat na kariṣyate . katham . ṅit ca alaḥ antyasya iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : ṅit eva anekāl antyasya bhavati na anyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1600: (P_1,1.52.2) KA_I,130.12-20 Ro_I,392-394 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_0: alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ . alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_1: anusaṃhāraḥ kriyate sthāne prasaktasya . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1601_2: aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ prasajyeta . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam yogaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1602: aniṣṭam prasajyete . ṭitkinmitaḥ api antyasya syuḥ . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:1603: : alaḥ antyasya iti sthāne vijñātasya anusaṃhāraḥ itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1604_0: (P_1,1.53) KA_I,130.21-131.7 Ro_I,394-395 tātaṅ antyasya kasmāt na bhavati . ṅit
GS24pmbhasuu:1604_1: ca alaḥ antyasya iti prāpnoti . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1605: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . tātaṅi ṅitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . prayojanam nāma tat
GS24pmbhasuu:1606: vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ syāt . yadi ca ayam niyogataḥ sarvādeśaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1607: tataḥ etat prayojanam syāt . kutaḥ nu khalu etat ṅitkaraṇāt ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:1608: sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antyasya syāt iti . evam tarhi etat eva jñāpayati na tātaṅ antyasya sthāne bhavati iti yat etam ṅitam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1609: itarathā hi loṭaḥ eruprakaraṇe eva brūyāt tihyoḥ tāt āśiṣi anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_0: (P_1,1.54) KA_I,131.9-17 Ro_I,395-396 alaḥ antyasya adeḥ parasya anekāl śit sarvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1610_1: iti apavādavipratiṣedhāt sarvādeśaḥ . alaḥ antyasya iti utsargaḥ . tasya ādeḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_0: apavādavipratiṣedhāt tu sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_1: apaḥ īt : dvīpam anvīpam . anekālśit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ asteḥ bhūḥ : bhavitā
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_2: bhavitum . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : ataḥ bhisaḥ ais . anekālśit sarvasya iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1611_3: vipratiṣedhena . śit sarvasya iti asya avakāśaḥ idamaḥ iś : itaḥ , iha .
GS24pmbhasuu:1612: ādeḥ parasya iti asya avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . śit sarvasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:1613_0: (P_1,1.55) KA_I,131.19-132.7 Ro_I,396-397 śit sarvasya iti kim udāharaṇam . idamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1613_1: iś : itaḥ , iha . na etat asti prayojanam . śitkaraṇāt eva atra sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1613_2: . idam tarhi : aṣṭābhyaḥ auś . nanu ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1614: api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : jasaḥ śī jaśśasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1615: śiḥ . nanu ca atra api śitkaraṇāt eva sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat śitkaraṇe prayojanam . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1616: śi sarvanāmasthānam vibhāṣā ṅiśyoḥ iti . śit sarvasya iti śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:1617: katham . antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyām pratyayasañjñāyām itsañjñā na syāt . asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1618: asati lope anekāl . yadā anekāl tadā sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tada
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_0: pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_1: siddhe sati yat śit sarvasya iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti eṣā paribhāṣā : na
GS24pmbhasuu:1619_2: anubandhakṛtam anekāltvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:1621: anākārāntatvāt iti uktam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1622_0: (P_1,1.56.1) KA_I,133.2-16 Ro_I,398-401 vatkaraṇam kimartham . sthānī ādeśaḥ analvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1622_1: iti iyati ucyamāne sañjñādhikaraḥ ayam tatra sthānī ādeśasya sañjñā syāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1623: bhavati iti vadheḥ eva syāt . hanteḥ na syāt . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1624: na doṣaḥ bhavati . sthānikāryam ādeśe atidiśyate guruvat guruputraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1625: yathā . atha ādeśagrahaṇam kimartham . sthānivat analvidhau iti iyati ucyamāne kaḥ idānīm sthānivat syāt . yaḥ sthāne bhavati . kaḥ ca sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1626: bhavati . ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ādeśamātram sthānivat yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1627: . ekadeśavikṛtasya upasaṅkhyānam codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1628: atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham. sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ yathā vijñāyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1629: alaḥ parasya vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ , alaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ , ali vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1630: , alā vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prātipadikarnirdeśaḥ ayam . prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:1631_0: prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:1631_1: āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam : uttarapadalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1632: alāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ alvidhiḥ iti . yatra prādhānyena al āśrīyate tatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:1633: pratiṣedhaḥ syāt . yatra viśeṣaṇatvena al āśrīyate tatra pratiṣedhaḥ na syāt . kim prayojanam . pradīvya prasīvya iti valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1635_0: ucyate . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt ādeśe sthānivadanudeśaḥ guruvat guruputre iti yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1635_1: . anyaḥ sthānī anyaḥ ādeśaḥ . sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt etasmāt kāraṇāt sthānikāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:1635_2: ādeśe na prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati iti hanteḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:1637: sthānivadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate . guruvat guruputraḥ iti yathā

GS24pmbhasuu:1638_3: . tat yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ yājyakulāni gatvā agrāsanādīni labhate . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:1638_4: tāvat loke eṣaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāntasya api tu puruṣārambhaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . asti

GS24pmbhasuu:1639: yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktau kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat ādeśe syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1640: paśyati tu ācāryaḥ sthānivat ādeśaḥ bhavati iti . ataḥ ādeśe pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:1641: śāsti . idam tarhi prayojanam : analvidhau iti pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1642: iha mā bhūt : dyauḥ , panthāḥ , saḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1643: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati alvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhavati iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ lyap ti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1646_0: yoge alvidhau pratiṣedhe aviśeṣaṇe aprāptiḥ tasya adarśanāt . alvidhau pratiṣedhe

GS24pmbhasuu:1647: kriyate : anyasya kāryam ucyamānam anyasya yathā syāt iti . satyam evamarthaḥ na tu prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyātideśe viśeṣānatideśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1648: sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne viśeṣaḥ na atidiṣṭaḥ bhavati . tat yathā :

GS24pmbhasuu:1649_1: atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam iha api sāmānyam

GS24pmbhasuu:1649_3: evam agrahīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sicaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . analvidhau iti punaḥ ucyamāne

GS24pmbhasuu:1654_1: atra valāditvam bhaviṣyati . na etat vivadāmahe valādiḥ na valādiḥ iti . kim tarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:1656_1: bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa ādeśe ādeśini ca . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe

GS24pmbhasuu:1660_1: kartavyam . sup : vṛkṣāya plakṣāya . sthānivadbhāvāt supsañjñā svāśrayam ca yañāditvam

GS24pmbhasuu:1664_1: guruputre vartitavyam anyatra ucchiṣṭabhojanāt pādopasaṅgrahaṇāc ca iti . yadi ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1664_2: guruputraḥ api guruḥ bhavati tat api kartavyam . astu tarhi ādeśini ali āśrīyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:1665_0: ādeśyalvidhipratiṣedhe kuruvadhapibām guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:1666_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . pacatu pacantu . tiṅgrahaṇena grahaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:1674_0: alvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . āśrayaḥ iti cet alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1674_1: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam sati kaḥ cit api analvidhiḥ syāt . ucyate ca idam

GS24pmbhasuu:1679: vināśaḥ syāt asataḥ vā prādurbhāvaḥ iti . siddham tu yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:1680: laukikavaidikeṣu abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaprayogāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:1681_0: katham . yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu abhūtapūrve api sthānaśabdaḥ vartate

GS24pmbhasuu:1681_2: bhavati . vede api : somasya sthāne pūtīkatṛṇāni abhiṣuṇuyāt iti ucyate na ca tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:1682: . kāryavipariṇāmāt vā siddham . atha vā kāryavipariṇāmāt siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:1683_0: kim idam kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . kāryā buddhiḥ . sā vipariṇamyate . nanu ca kāryāvipariṇāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1683_1: iti bhavitavyam . santi ca eva hi auttarpadikāni hrasvatvāni . api ca buddhiḥ sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1683_2: iti anarthāntaram . kāryā buddhiḥ kāryaḥ sampratyayaḥ kāryasya sampratyayasya vipariṇāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1683_3: kāryavipariṇāmaḥ kāryavipariṇāmāt iti . parihārantaram eva idam matvā paṭhitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1683_4: katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi bhūtapūrve sthānaśabdaḥ vartate . bhūtapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:1684_0: buddhyā . tat yathā kaḥ cit kasmai cit upadiśati prācīnam grāmāt āmrāḥ iti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1684_1: sarvatra āmrabuddhiḥ prasaktā . tataḥ paścāt aha ye kṣīriṇaḥ avarohavantaḥ pṛthuparṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1684_2: te nyagrodhāḥ iti. saḥ tatra āmrabuddhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1685: nyagrodhabuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā āmrān ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1686: apakṛṣyamāṇān nyagrodhān ca ādhīyamānān . nityāḥ eva ca svasmin viṣaye āmrāḥ nityāḥ ca nyagrodhāḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:1687: astiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ . tasya sarvatra astibuddhiḥ prasaktā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1688_0: saḥ asteḥ bhūḥ iti astibuddhyāḥ bhavatibuddhim pratipadyate . saḥ tataḥ paśyati buddhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:1688_1: astim ca apakṛṣyamāṇam bhavatim ca ādhīyamānam . nityaḥ eva svasmin viṣaye astiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1688_2: nityaḥ bhavatiḥ . buddhiḥ tu asya vipariṇamyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:1692: . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśaḥ sthānivat iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate .

GS24pmbhasuu:1708: ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . sa nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:1709: nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta :
GS24pmbhasuu:1710: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1711: anavasthiteṣu pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte sati śiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārāntāt nukṣukpratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:1712: ākārāntāt nukṣukoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vilāpayati bhāpayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1713: lībhīgrahaṇena grahaṇāt nukṣukau prāpnutaḥ . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . lībhiyoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam : lī* ī* īkārāntasya bhī* ī*
GS24pmbhasuu:1715: loḍādeśe eṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiṣṭāt , hatāt , bhintāt , kurutāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1716: stāt . loḍādeśe kṛte śābhāvaḥ jabhāvaḥ dhitvam hilopaḥ ettvam iti ete
GS24pmbhasuu:1717_0: vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam : loḍādeśaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:1717_1: ete vidhayaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt loḍādeśaḥ . atha idānīm loḍādeśe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:1717_2: punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt kasmāt ete vidhayaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:1718: . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti kṛtvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:1719: trayādeśe srantapratiṣedhaḥ . trayādeśe srantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_0: tisṛṇām . tisṛbhāve kṛte treḥ trayaḥ iti trayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_1: iha sampradhāryam : tisṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām trayādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_2: tisṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm tisṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt trayādeśaḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_3: bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . āmvidhau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_4: . āmvidhau ca srantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . catasṛbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_5: kṛte caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_6: : catasṛbhāvaḥ kriyatām caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ iti ām iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1720_7: paratvāt catasṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm catasṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ām kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1721_0: bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . svare vasvādeśe . svare vasvādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1721_1: : viduṣaḥ paśya . śatuḥ anumaḥ nadyajādī antodāttāt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1722: bhaviṣyati . anumaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra numam paśyāmaḥ . anumaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:1723_0: idam āgamagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1723_1: . ukārāt prabhṛti ā numaḥ makārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam lunata punata atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:1724: kim tarhi . śatā eva viśeṣyate : śatā yaḥ anumkaḥ iti . avaśyam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1725: evam vijñeyam . āgamagrahaṇe hi sati iha prasajyeta : muñcatā muñcataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1727_0: vaktavyaḥ : citragvagram , śabalagvagram . sarvatra vibhāṣā goḥ iti vibhāṣā pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1727_1: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . eṅaḥ iti vartate . tatra analvidhau iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1727_2: . evam api he citrago agram atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1728_0: prāpnoti . ṇittvam : citraguḥ , citragū citragavaḥ . goto ṇit iti ṇittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1728_1: . ātvam : citragum paśya śabalagum paśya . ā otaḥ iti ātvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1728_2: . taparakaraṇāt siddham . taparakaraṇasāmārthyāt ṇittvātve na bhaviṣyataḥ . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:1729: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . karotipibyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : kuru piba iti . sthānivadbhāvāt laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1730: uktam vā . kim uktam . karotau taparakaraṇanirdeśāt siddham , pibatiḥ adantaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1732: praśnaḥ , dyūtvā , ākrāṣṭām āgatya . praśnaḥ , viśnaḥ iti atra chakārasya śakāraḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt che ca iti tuk prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1733: acaḥ iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:1734: ajgrahaṇe avaśyam atra tugabhāve yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt hi tuk
GS24pmbhasuu:1735: prāpnoti . idam tarhi : dyūtvā . vakārasya ūṭh paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt aci iti yaṇādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1736_0: etat api na asti prayojanam . svāśrayam atra actvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1736_1: ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1736_2: ākrāṣṭām . sicaḥ lopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam
GS24pmbhasuu:1737: bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .vakṣyati etat : pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti . idam tarhi prayojanam : āgatya , abhigatya .
GS24pmbhasuu:1738: anunāsikalopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt hrasvasya iti tuk na
GS24pmbhasuu:1739: prāpnoti . acaḥ iti vacanāt bhavati . atha parasmin iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1740_0: yuvajāniḥ , dvipadikā , vaiyāghrapadyaḥ , ādīdhye . yuvajāniḥ , vadhūjāniḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:1740_1: jāyāyāḥ niṅ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt vali iti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1740_2: . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1741: prayojanam . svāśrayam atra valtam bhaviṣyati . atha vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1742: asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1743: dvipadikā tripadikā . pādasya lopaḥ na paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt padbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1744: etat api na asti prayojanam . punarlopavacanasāmarthyāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:1745_0: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam : vaiyāghrapadyaḥ . nanu ca atra api punarvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1745_1: eva na bhaviṣyati . asti hi anyat punarlopavacane prayojanam . kim . yatra bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:1745_2: na : vyāghrapāt , śyenapāt iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam : ādīdhye , āvevye . ikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1746: tasya sthānivadbhāvāt yīvarṇayoḥ dīdhīvevyoḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parasmin iti vacanāt bhavati . atha pūrvavidhau iti kim artham . he gauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1747_0: bābhravīyāḥ , naidheyaḥ . he gauḥ iti aukāraḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1747_1: eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:1747_2: etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sambuddhilope sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1747_3: bhavati iti yat ayam eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1748: iti eṅgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti jñāpakam . gortham etat syāt . yat tarhi pratyāhāragrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi ohrasvāt iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1749_0: idam tarhi prayojanam : bābhravīyāḥ , mādhavīyāḥ . vāntādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1749_1: sthānivadbhāvāt halaḥ taddhitasya iti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1749_2: na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . svāśrayam atra haltvam bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:1749_3: vā yaḥ atra ādeśaḥ na asau āśrīyate yaḥ ca āśrīyate na asau ādeśaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:1750_0: naidheyaḥ . ākāralopaḥ paranimittakaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt dvyajlakṣaṇaḥ ḍhak
GS24pmbhasuu:1750_1: na prāpnoti . pūrvavidhau iti vacanāt na bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:1751: pūrvasya vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ , pūrvasmāt vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ iti . kāni punaḥ pūrvasmāt vidhau sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . bebhiditā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1752: māthitikaḥ , apīpacan . bebhiditā , cecchiditā iti akāralope kṛte ekājlakṣaṇaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1753: māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt kaḥ iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1754_0: sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . apīpacan iti ekādeśe kṛte abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1754_1: iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . na etāni santi prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1755: prātipadikarnirdeśāḥ ca arthatantrāḥ bhavanti . na kāṃ cit prādhānyena vibhaktim āśrayanti . tatra prātipadikārthe nirdiṣṭe yām yām vibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:1756: āśrayitum buddhiḥ upajāyate sā sā āśrayitavyā . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:1757: vidhimātre sthānivat yathā syāt anāśrīyamāṇāyām api prakṛtau : vāyvoḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1758: adhvaryvoḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti yalapaḥ mā bhūt iti . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparavidhau iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1759: svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ yathā syāt . kāni punaḥ svavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1760: sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . āyan , āsan , dhinvanti kṛṇvanti dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:1761: atra , madhu atra cakratuḥ , cakruḥ . iha tāvat : āyan , āsan iti iṇastyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1762: yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ ajādīnām iti āṭ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1763: sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . dhinvanti kṛṇvanti iti yaṇādeśe kṛte valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . dadhi atra madhu
GS24pmbhasuu:1764_0: atra iti yaṇādeśe kṛte saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . cakratuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1764_1: , cakruḥ iti yaṇādeśe kṛte anactvāt dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1764_2: . yadi tarhi svavidhau api sthānivadbhāvaḥ bhavati dvābhyām , deyam , lavanam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:1765: dvābhyām iti atra atvasya sthānivadbhāvāt dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . deyam iti īttvasya sthānivadbhāvāt guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . lavanam iti guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1766: sthānivadbhāvāt avādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svāśrayāḥ atra ete
GS24pmbhasuu:1767: vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . tat tarhi vaktavyam aparavidhau iti . na vaktavyam . pūrvavidhau iti eva siddham . katham . na pūrvgrahaṇena ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1768: abhisambadhyate : ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1769: bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . ādeśāt iti . kim tarhi . nimittam abhisambadhyate : ajādeśaḥ paranimittakaḥ pūrvasya vidhim prati sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:1770: bhavati . kutaḥ pūrvasya . nimittāt iti . atha nimitte abhisambadhyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:1771: yat tat asya yogasya mūrdhābhiṣiktam udāharaṇam tat api saṅgṛhītam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:1772_0: . kim punaḥ tat . paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . bāḍham saṅgṛhītam . nanu ca īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1772_1: na asau nimittāt pūrvaḥ bhavati . vyavahite api pūrvaśabdaḥ vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:1773: atha vā ādeśaḥ eva abhisambadhyate . katham yāni svavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:1774: sthānivadbhāvasya prayojanāni . na etāni santi . iha tāvat āyan , āsan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:1775: dhinvanti kṛṇvanti iti . ayam vidhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:1776: vidhīyate vidhiḥ . asti bhāvasādhanaḥ : vidhānam vidhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1777_0: karmasādhanasya vidhiśabdasya upādāne na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā bhāvasādhanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:1777_1: vidhiśabdasya upādānam vijñāsyate : pūrvasya vidhānam prati pūrvasya bhāvam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:1777_2: pūrvaḥ syāt iti sthānivat bhavati iti evam āṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:1778: bhaviṣyati iṭ ca na bhaviṣyati . dadhi atra madhu atra cakratuḥ cakruḥ iti parihāram vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:1779_0: (P_1,1.57.2) KA_I,144.18-146.5 Ro_I,431-435 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:1779_1: stoṣyāmi aham pādikam audavāhim tataḥ śvobhūte śātanīm pātanīm ca . netārau āgacchatam
GS24pmbhasuu:1779_2: dhāraṇim rāvaṇim ca tataḥ paścāt sraṃsyate dhvaṃsyate ca . iha tāvat pādikam audavāhim
GS24pmbhasuu:1779_3: śātanīm pātanīm dhāraṇim rāvaṇim iti akāralope kṛte padbhāvaḥ ūṭh allopaḥ ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1780_0: prāpnuvanti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavanti . sraṃsyate dhvaṃsyate : ṇilope kṛte aniditām
GS24pmbhasuu:1780_1: halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti nalopaḥ prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati . na etāni
GS24pmbhasuu:1780_2: santi prayojanāni . asiddhavat atra ā bhāt iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:1781: api etāni siddhāni . idam tarhi prayojanam : yājyate vāpyate . ṇilope kṛte yajādīnām kiti iti samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1782: etat api na asti prayojanam . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ yajādīnām yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:1783: . idam tarhi prayojanam : paṭvyā mṛdvyā iti . parasya yaṇādeśe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:1784: pūrvasya na prāpnoti īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1785: kim punaḥ kāraṇam parasya tāvat bhavati na punaḥ pūrvasya . nityatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:1786: nityaḥ parayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_0: . nityatvāt parayaṇādeśe kṛte pūrvasya na prāpnoti . sthānivadbhāvāt bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_1: api na asti prayojanam . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_3: avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā svarārtham kartrya hartrya iti udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_4: iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . anena api siddhaḥ svaraḥ . katham . ārabhyamāṇe nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_5: asau . ārabhyamāṇe tu asmin yoge nityaḥ pūrvayaṇādeśaḥ . kṛte api parayaṇādeśe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_6: akṛte api . parayaṇādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api pūrvayaṇādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_7: . paraḥ ca asau vyavasthā . vyavasthayā ca asau paraḥ . yugapatsambhavaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_8: . na ca asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . katham ca sidhyati . bahiraṅgeṇa sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:1787_9: asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti anena sidhyati . evam tarhi yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1788: atra udāttayaṇ tadāśrayaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . īkārayaṇā vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:1789_0: prāpnoti . svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti na asti vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:1789_1: sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā : asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:1789_2: antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . bahuprayojanā eṣā paribhāṣā . avaśyam eṣā kartavyā . sā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:1790_0: pratyaṅgavartī lokaḥ lakṣyate . tat yathā : puruṣaḥ ayam prātaḥ utthāya yāni asya
GS24pmbhasuu:1790_1: pratiśarīram kāryāṇi tāni tāvat karoti tataḥ suhṛdām tataḥ sambandhinām . prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:1790_2: ca api upadiṣṭam sāmānyabhūte arthe vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:1791: sāmanye vartamānasya vyaktiḥ upajāyate . vyaktasya sataḥ liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām

GS24pmbhasuu:1872: : vare yalopavidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti . katham tarhi . vare ayalopavidhim prati iti . kim idam ayalopavidhim prati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:1873: avarṇalopavidhim prati yalopavidhim ca prati iti . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:1874: kariṣyate : vare luptam na sthānivat . tataḥ yalopavidhim ca prati na sthānivat iti . yalope kim udāharaṇam . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:1878: bhavitavyam . idam tarhi : kaṇḍūyateḥ ktic : brāhmaṇakaṇḍūtiḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:1885: abhisambandhaḥ śakyate kartum . na ca etani ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:1886: anānupūrvyeṇa api sanniviṣṭānām yatheṣtam abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : anaḍvāham udahāri yā tvam harasi śirasā kumbham bhagini sācīnam
GS24pmbhasuu:1887: abhidhāvantam adrākṣīḥ iti . tasya yatheṣtam abhisambandhaḥ bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:1888: udahāri bhagini yā tvam kumbham harasi śirasā anaḍvāham sācīnam abhidhāvantam adrākṣīḥ iti
