GS24pmbhasuu:2047: codayiṣyati iha mā bhūt : bhadram karoṣi gauḥ iti , tasmin kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_0: bhaviṣyati . vākyapadayoḥ antyasya iti evam tat . iha tarhi : dadhisecau dadhisecaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_1: : sātpadādyoḥ iti padādilakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam : padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_2: ādiḥ padādiḥ , padādeḥ na iti . katham tarhi . padāt ādiḥ padādiḥ , padādeḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_3: evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : ṛkṣu vākṣu tvakṣu kumārīṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_4: kiśorīṣu iti . sātpratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ svādiṣu padatvena yeṣām padasañjñā na tebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_5: pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti . iha tarhi : bahusecau , bahusecaḥ : bahuc ayam pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_6: . atra padāt ādiḥ padādiḥ , padādeḥ na iti ucyamāne api na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_7: uttarapadatve ca padādividhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam bhavati iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_8: . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : padādividhau eva na padāntavidhau iti . katham bahusecau
GS24pmbhasuu:2048_9: bahusecaḥ . bahucpūrvasya ca padādividhau na padāntavidhau iti . dvandve antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2049: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti vaktavyam . vāksraktvacam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2051: pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . sicaḥ usaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2052: ākāraprakaraṇāt . sicaḥ usaḥ aprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ākāraprakaraṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2053: ātaḥ iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : ātaḥ eva sijlugantāt na anyasmāt sijlugantāt iti . iha : iti yuṣmatputraḥ dadāti , iti asmatputraḥ dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:2054_0: iti atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ ṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayoḥ vāmnāvau iti vāmnāvādayaḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2054_1: . yuṣmadasmadoḥ sthagrahaṇāt . sthagrahaṇam tatra kriyate . tat śrūyamāṇavibhaktiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2054_2: vijñāsyate . asti anyat sthagrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . savibhaktikasya vāmnāvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2054_3: yathā syuḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . padasya iti vartate vibhaktyantam ca padam
GS24pmbhasuu:2055_0: . tatra antareṇa api sthagrahaṇam savibhaktikasya eva grahaṇam bhaviṣyati . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:2055_1: siddham yatra vibhaktyantam padam . yatra tu khalu vibhaktau padam tatra na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2055_2: : grāmaḥ vām dīyate , grāmaḥ nau dīyate janapadaḥ vām dīyate , janapadaḥ nau dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2056: . tena savibhaktikasya eva bhaviṣyati . iha : cakṣuṣkāmam yājayām cakāra
GS24pmbhasuu:2057_0: iti tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti . tasya ca nighātaḥ tasmāt ca anighātaḥ prāpnoti . āmi lilopāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2057_1: tasya ca anighātaḥ tasmāt ca nighātaḥ . āmi lilopāt tasya ca anighātaḥ tasmāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2057_2: nighātaḥ siddhaḥ bhaviṣyati . aṅgādhikāre iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau . aṅgādhikāre iṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2058: jigamiṣa saṃvivṛtsa . aṅgasya iti iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau na prāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2059: krameḥ dīrghatvam ca . kim ca . iṭaḥ ca vidhipratiṣedhau . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:2060: adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . krameḥ ca dīrghatvam : utkrāma saṅkrāma iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2061: (P_1,1.63.4) KA_I,168.24-169.14 Ro_I,500-502 iha kim cit aṅgādhikāre lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavati kim cit ca anyatra na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2062: yadi punaḥ na lumatā tasmin iti ucyeta . atha na lumatā tasmin iti ucyamāne kim siddham etat bhavati iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau krameḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2063: ca . bāḍham siddham . na iṭaḥ ividhipratiṣedhau parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2064: . katham tarhi . sakārādau iti . tadviśeṣaṇam parasmaipadagrahaṇam . na khalu api krameḥ dīrghatvam parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_0: śiti iti . tadviśeṣaṇam parasmaipadagrahaṇam . na lumatā tasmin iti cet haniṇiṅādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_1: talope . na lumatā tasmin iti cet haniṇiṅādeśāḥ talope na sidhyanti : avadhi bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_2: dasyuḥ , agāyi bhavatā grāmaḥ , adhyagāyi bhavatā anuvākaḥ . talope kṛte luṅi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_3: haniṇiṅādeśāḥ na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na luṅi iti haniṇiṅādeśāḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_4: . kim tarhi . ārdhadhātuke iti . tadviśeṣaṇam luṅgrahaṇam . iha ca : sarvastomaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_5: , sarvapṛṣṭhaḥ sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . tat ca api vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2065_6: . na vaktavyam . na lumatā aṅgasya iti eva siddham . katham . na lumatā lupte
GS24pmbhasuu:2066: aṅgādhikāraḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim tarhi . yaḥ asau lumatā lupyate tasmin yat aṅgam tasya yat kāryam tat na bhavati . evam api sarvasvaraḥ na sidhyati . kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_0: antyaviśeṣaṇam . evam bhavitum arhati . upadhāsañjñāyām algrahaṇam antyanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_1: cet saṅghātapratiṣedhaḥ . upadhāsañjñāyām algrahaṇam antyanirdeśaḥ cet saṅghātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saṅghātasya upadhāsañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_3: it aṅhaloḥ : śiṣṭvā śiṣṭaḥ : saṅghātasya ittvam prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ al antyāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2068_4: ucyeta . evam api antyaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅghātāt api pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2069: upadhāsañjñā prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ : śiṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2070_0: śiṣṭavān : śakārasya ittvam prasajyeta . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2070_1: . nanu ca uktam upadhāsañjñāyām algrahaṇam antyanirdeśaḥ cet saṅghātapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2070_2: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . antyavijñānāt siddham . siddham etat . katham . alaḥ antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2072: cet na anarthake alontyavidhiḥ anabhyāsavikāre . antyavijñānāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2073: cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . na anarthake alontyavidhiḥ anabhyāsavikāre .
GS24pmbhasuu:2074: anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . anabhyāsavikāre . abhyāsavikārān varjayitvā . bhṛñām it ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2075_0: artipipartyoḥ ca iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam avyaktānukaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2075_1: ataḥ itau . antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2076: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na antyasya pararūpam bhavati iti yat ayam na āmreḍitasya antyasya tu vā iti āha . ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2077_0: ghvasoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2077_1: bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . punarlopavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2078_0: lopaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi śakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2078_1: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . dviśakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ : ghvasoḥ et
GS24pmbhasuu:2078_2: hau abhyāsalopaśśca iti . āpi lopaḥ akaḥ anaci .
GS24pmbhasuu:2079_0: tiṣṭhati sūtram . anyathā vyākhyāyate : āpi hali lopaḥ iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake
GS24pmbhasuu:2079_1: alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2079_2: eva lopam vakṣyāmi . tat anaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2080: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . an āpi akaḥ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtena ca iha arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2081: hali iti eṣā saptamī an iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya . atra lopaḥ abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2082_0: iti antyasya prāpnoti . anarthake alontyavidhiḥ na bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2082_1: etat api na asti prayojanam . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . asti anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:2082_2: atragrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . sanadhikāraḥ apekṣyate , iha mā bhūt : dadhau dadau
GS24pmbhasuu:2083: sanadhikāram apekṣiṣyāmahe . san tarhi sakārādiḥ apekṣyate sani sakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:2084_0: iti , iha mā bhūt : jijñāpayiṣati . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam sanam sakārādim apekṣiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2084_1: . prakṛtayaḥ tarhi apekṣyante . etāsām prakṛtīnām lopaḥ yathā syāt , iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2084_2: : pipakṣati yiyakṣati . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam etāḥ prakṛtīḥ apekṣiṣyāmahe . viṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2084_3: tarhi apekṣyate . mucaḥ akarmakasya guṇaḥ vā iti iha mā bhūt : mumukṣati gām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2084_4: . antareṇa api atragrahaṇam viṣayam apekṣiṣyāmahe . katham . akarmakasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2085: tena yatra eva ayam muciḥ akarmakaḥ tatra eva bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā
GS24pmbhasuu:2086: (P_1,1.65.3) KA_I,171.10-16 Ro_I,506 alaḥ antyāt pūrvaḥ al upadhā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2087_0: vā . atha vā vyaktam eva pathitavyam alaḥ antyāt pūrvaḥ al upadhāsañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2087_1: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2087_2: api vacanam lokavijñānāt siddham etat . katham . loke amīṣām brāhmaṇānām antyāt pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2087_3: ānīyatām iti ukte yathājātīyakaḥ antyaḥ tathājātīyakaḥ antyāt pūrvaḥ ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2088: (P_1,1.66-67.1) KA_I,171.18-172.17 Ro_I,507-511 kim udāharaṇam . iha tāvat : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti : ikaḥ yaṇ aci : dadhi atra madhu
GS24pmbhasuu:2089: atra . iha : tasmāt iti uttarasya iti : dvayantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_0: dvīpam antarīpam samīpam . anyathājātīyakena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate anyathājātīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_1: udāhriyate . kim punaḥ udāharaṇam . iha tāvat : tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_2: : tasmin aṇi ca yuṣmākāsmākau iti . tasmāt iti uttarasya iti : tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_3: iti . idam ca api udāharaṇam : ikaḥ yaṇ aci dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_4: . sarvanāmnā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate sarvanāma ca sāmānyavāci . tatra sāmānye nirdiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_5: viśeṣāḥ api udāharaṇāni bhavanti . kim punaḥ sāmānyam kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ . gauḥ sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_6: kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . na tarhi idānīm kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyam bhavati gauḥ viśeṣaḥ bhavati . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2090_7: ca . yadi sāmānyam api viśeṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2091: sāmānyam sāmānyaviśeṣau na prakalpete . prakalpete ca . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2092: vivakṣātaḥ . yadā asya gauḥ sāmānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣatvena tadā gauḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ . yadā kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:2093: vivakṣitaḥ bhavati gauḥ viśeṣatvena tadā kṛṣṇaḥ sāmānyam kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_0: aparaḥ āha : prakalpete ca . katham . pitāputravat . tat yathā saḥ eva kam cit prati
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_1: pitā bhavati kam cit prati putraḥ bhavati evam iha api saḥ eva kam cit prati sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_2: kam cit prati viśeṣaḥ . ete khalu api nairdeśikānām vārttatarakāḥ bhavanti ye sarvanāmnā
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_3: nirdeśāḥ kriyante . etaiḥ hi bahutarakam vyāpyate . atha kimartham upasargeṇa nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_4: kriyate . śabde saptamyā nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya kāryam yathā syāt arthe mā bhūt : janapade
GS24pmbhasuu:2094_5: atiśāyane iti . kim gatam etat upasargeṇa āhosvit śabdādhikyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2095_0: arthādhikyam . gatam iti āha . katham . niḥ ayam bahirbhāve vartate . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2095_1: niṣkrāntaḥ deśāt nirdeśaḥ . bahirdeśaḥ iti gamyate . śabdaḥ ca śabdāt bahirbhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2097: . ānantaryamātre kāryam yathā syāt . ikaḥ yaṇ aci : dadhi atra madhu atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2098: . iha mā bhūt :samidhau samidhaḥ , dṛṣadau dṛṣadaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2100_0: ucyate . tasmin tasmāt iti pūrvottarayoḥ yogayoḥ aviśeṣāt niyamārtham vacanam dadhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2100_1: udakam pacati odanam . tasmin tasmāt iti pūrvottarayoḥ yogayoḥ aviśeṣāt niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2100_2: ayam ārambhaḥ . grāme devadattaḥ . pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti sandehaḥ . grāmāt devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2100_3: . pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti sandehaḥ . evam iha api : ikaḥ yaṇ aci . dadhi udakam , pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:2101: acau . aci pūrvasya aci parasya iti sandehaḥ . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti atiṅaḥ pūrvasya atiṅaḥ parasya iti sandehaḥ . iṣyate ca atra aci pūrvasya syāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2102: atiṅaḥ parasya iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . atha yatra ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2103: nirdiśyate kim tatra pūrvasya kāryam bhavati āhosvit parasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2104_0: ubhayanirdeśe vipratiṣedhāt pañcamīnirdeśaḥ . ubhayanirdeśe vipratiṣedhāt pañcamīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2104_1: bhaviṣyati . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ataḥ lasārvadhātukanudāttatve . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2105: saptamīnirdeśaḥ abhyastasijarthaḥ iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe tāsyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2106: parasya lasārvadhātukasya lasārvadhātuke parataḥ tāsyādīnām iti sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2107_0: tāsyādibhyaḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya . bahoḥ iṣṭhādīnām ādilopaḥ . bahoḥ uttareṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2107_1: iṣṭhemeyasām iṣṭhemayaḥsu parataḥ bahoḥ iti sandehaḥ . bahoḥ uttareṣām iṣṭhemeyasām
GS24pmbhasuu:2108_0: sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ gotaḥ iti sandehaḥ . gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya . rudādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2108_1: sārvadhātuke . rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya sārvadhātuke parataḥ rudādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2108_2: iti sandehaḥ . rudādibhyaḥ parasya sārvadhātukasya . āne muk īt āsaḥ . āsaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2108_3: ānasya , āne parataḥ āsaḥ iti sandehaḥ . āsaḥ uttarasya ānasya . āmi sarvanāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2109: sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya āmaḥ āmi parataḥ sarvanāmnaḥ iti sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2110_0: sarvanāmnaḥ uttarasya . gheḥ ṅiti āṭ nadyāḥ . nadyāḥ uttareṣām ṅitām ṅitsu parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2110_1: nadyāḥ iti sandehaḥ . nadyāḥ uttareṣām ṅitām . yāṭ āpaḥ . āpaḥ uttarasya ṅitaḥ ṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:2110_2: parataḥ āpaḥ iti sandehaḥ . āpaḥ uttarasya ṅitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2111: ṅamaḥ hrasvāt aci ṅamuṭ nityam . ṅamaḥ uttarasya acaḥ aci parataḥ ṅamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2112_0: iti sandehaḥ . ṅamaḥ uttarasya acaḥ . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśānavakāśatvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2112_1: . vibhaktiviśeṣanirdeśasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ ayam vipratiṣedhaḥ . sarvatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_0: (P_1,1.66-67.3) KA_I,174.6-175.18 Ro_I,515-518 yathārtham vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ . yathārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_1: vā ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . yatra pūrvasya kāryam iṣyate tatra pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_2: kartavyā . yatra parasya kāryam iṣyate tatra parasya ṣaṣṭhī kartavyā . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_3: tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . anena eva prakḷptiḥ bhaviṣyati : tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2114_4: iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya ṣaṣṭhī . tasmāt iti nirdiṣṭe parasya ṣaṣṭhī . tat tarhi ṣaṣṭhīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2115: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṣaṣṭhī sthāneyogā iti . prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ . prakalpakam iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2116: niyamasya abhāvaḥ . uktam ca etat : niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2117: pratyayavidhau khalu api pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2118: guptijkibhyaḥ san iti eṣā pañcamī san iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . astu . na kaḥ cit ādeśaḥ pratinirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2119: tatra āntaryataḥ sanaḥ san eva bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . itsañjñā na prakalpeta . upadeśe iti itsañjñā ucyate . prakṛtivikārāvyavasthā ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2120: prakṛtivikārayoḥ ca vyavasthā na prakalpeta . ikaḥ yaṇ aci : aci iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2121: saptamī yaṇ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2122: ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ . saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra eva ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:2123: prāpnoti . tāsyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī lasārvadhātuke iti asyāḥ saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . tathā lasārvadhātuke iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2124: eṣā saptamī tāsyādibhyaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayet tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ubhayoḥ kāryam tatra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2125: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate : prakalpakam iti cet niyamābhāvaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:2158: idamaḥ iś : iha , itaḥ . ṭiti . lavitā lavitum . kiti . babhūva . miti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2159: he anaḍvan . ṭitaḥ parihāraḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ṭitaḥ savarṇānām grahaṇam bhavati iti yat ayam grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2160: na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt : grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghaḥ eva iti . yat tarhi vṝtaḥ vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti . sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2161_0: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam bhaviṣyati . pratyaye bhūyān parihāraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:2171: . upadeśottarakālaḥ ādiḥ antyena saha itā iti pratyāhāraḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:2188_0: tatkālaḥ kālaḥ yasya saḥ ayam tatkālakālaḥ , tatkālakālasya iti . saḥ tarhi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2188_1: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham
GS24pmbhasuu:2189: kharamukhaḥ . evam tatkālakālaḥ tatkālaḥ , tatkālasya iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kālasahacaritaḥ varṇaḥ api kālaḥ eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:2191: niyamārtham āhosvit prāpakam . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2192: prāpakam . yadi atra aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate tataḥ niyamārtham . atha nivṛttam tataḥ prāpakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2193: niyamāṛtham iti cet dīrghagrahaṇe svarabhinnāgrahaṇam . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti niyamāṛtham iti cet dīrghagrahaṇe svarabhinnānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2194: . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānām . astu tarhi prāpakam . prāpakam iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_0: hrasvagrahaṇe dīrghaplutapratiṣedhaḥ . prāpakam iti cet hrasvagrahaṇe dīrghaplutayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_1: tu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vipratiṣedhāt siddham . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti etat astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_2: taparaḥ tatkālasya iti vā . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_3: aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti asya avakāśaḥ hrasvāḥ ataparāḥ aṇaḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_4: iti asya avakāśaḥ dīrghāḥ taparāḥ . hrasveṣu tapareṣu ubhayam prāpnoti . taparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_5: tatkālasya iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_6: upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2195_7: kartavyam tathā madhyamāyām drutavilambitayoḥ tathā vilambitāyām drutamadhyamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2196: na sidhyati . kālabhedāt . ye hi drutāyām vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te madhyamāyām . ye madhyamāyām varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te vilambitāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2197: siddham tu avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:2198: siddham etat . katham . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ drutamadhyamavilambitāsu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2199: kiṅkṛtaḥ tu vṛttiviśeṣaḥ . vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:2200: vaktā kaḥ cit āśvabhidhāyī bhavati , āśu varṇān abhidhatte . kaḥ cit cireṇa kaḥ cit ciratareṇa . tat yathā : tam eva adhvānam kaḥ cit āśu
GS24pmbhasuu:2201: gacchati kaḥ cit cireṇa gacchati kaḥ cit ciratareṇa gacchati . rathikaḥ āśu gacchati āśvikaḥ cireṇa padātiḥ ciratareṇa . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2202: adhikaraṇam atra adhvā vrajikriyāyāḥ . tatra ayuktam yat adhikaraṇasya vṛddhihrāsau syātām . evam tarhi sphoṭaḥ śabdaḥ dhvaniḥ śabdaguṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2203_0: katham . bheryāghātavat . tat yathā bheryāghātaḥ bherīm āhatya kaḥ cit viṃśati padāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2203_1: gacchati kaḥ cit triṃśat kaḥ cit catvāriṃśat . sphoṭaḥ ca tāvān eva bhavati . dhvanikṛtā
GS24pmbhasuu:2203_2: vṛddhiḥ . dhvaniḥ sphoṭaḥ ca śabdānām dhvaniḥ tu khalu lakṣyate |
GS24pmbhasuu:2204: alpaḥ mahān ca keṣām cit ubhayam tat svabhāvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2205: (P_1,1.71) KA_I,182.2-13 Ro_I,541-542 ādiḥ antyena saha iti asampratyayaḥ sañjñinaḥ anirdeśāt . ādiḥ antyena saha iti asampratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2206_0: kim kāraṇam . sañjñinaḥ anirdeśāt . na hi sañjñinaḥ nirdiśyante . siddham tu ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2206_1: itā saha tanmadhyasya iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiḥ antyena saha itā
GS24pmbhasuu:2206_2: gṛhyamāṇaḥ svasya ca rūpasya grāhakaḥ tanmadhyānām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2207: vaktavyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam . sambandhiśabdaiḥ vā tulyam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2208: tat yathā sambandhiśabdāḥ : mātari vartitavyam , pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2209: . na ca ucyate svasyām mātari svasmin pitari iti sambandhāt ca gamyate yā
GS24pmbhasuu:2210: yasya mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api ādiḥ antyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2211: sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam : yam prati ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2212: antyaḥ iti ca bhavati tasya grahaṇam bhavati svasya ca rūpasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2213: (P_1,1.72.1) KA_I,182.15-183.2 Ro_I,542-544 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2214: ikaḥ yaṇ aci : dadhi atra madhu atra . astu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2215: bhavanti iti antyasya bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . ye anekālaḥ ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2216_0: teṣu doṣaḥ syāt : ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prakṛtitaḥ tadantavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2216_1: bhavati evam ādeśataḥ api bhaviṣyati . tatra ejantasya ayādyantā ādeśāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2216_2: . yadi ca evam kva cit vairūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2217: tatra doṣaḥ syāt . api ca antaraṅgabahiraṅge na prakalpyeyātām . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . syonaḥ , syonā : antaraṅgalakṣaṇasya yaṇādeśasya bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2218: guṇaḥ bādhakaḥ prasajyeta . ūnaśabdam hi āśritya yaṇādeśaḥ naśabdam āśritya guṇaḥ . alvidhiḥ ca na prakalpeta : dyauḥ , panthāḥ , saḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2219: tasmāt prakṛte tadantavidhiḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yena iti karaṇe eṣā tṛtīyā anyena ca anyasya vidhiḥ bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2220: devadattasya samāśam śarāvaiḥ odanena ca yajñadattaḥ pratividhatte , tathā saṅgrāmam hastyaśvarathapadātibhiḥ . evam iha api acā dhātoḥ yatam
GS24pmbhasuu:2222_0: (P_1,1.72.2) KA_I,183.3-16 Ro_I,544-546 yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti cet grahaṇopādhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2222_1: tadantopādhiprasaṅgaḥ . yena vidhiḥ tadantasya iti cet grahaṇopādhīnām tadantopādhitāprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2222_2: . ye grahaṇopādhayaḥ te api tadantopādhayaḥ syuḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . utaḥ ca pratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2222_3: asaṃyogapūrvāt iti asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇam ukārāntviśeṣaṇam syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2223: asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena iha eva paryudāsaḥ syāt:: akṣṇuhi takṣṇuhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2224: iha na syāt : āpnuhi śaknuhi iti . tathā ut oṣthyapūrvasya iti oṣṭhyapūrvagrahaṇam ṝkārāntaviśeṣaṇam syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2225: oṣṭhyapūrvagrahaṇena iha ca prasajyeta : saṅkīrṇam iti . iha ca na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2226_0: nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ iti . siddham tu viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yatheṣṭatvāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2226_1: katham . yatheṣṭam viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ yogaḥ bhavati . yāvatā yatheṣṭam iha tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2226_2: : utaḥ ca pratyayāt asaṃyogapūrvāt iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:2227_0: asaṃyogapūrvagrahaṇena ukārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ukāraḥ eva viśeṣyate : ukāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2227_1: yaḥ asaṃyogapūrvaḥ tadantāt pratyayāt iti . tathā ut oṣthyapūrvasya iti na oṣṭhapūrvagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2227_2: ṝkārāntam viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ṝkāraḥ eva viśeṣyate : ṝkāraḥ yaḥ oṣṭhyapūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2228: (P_1,1.72.3) KA_I,183.17-184.25 Ro_I,546-550 samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedhaḥ . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2229: samāsavidhau tāvat : dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ samasyate : kaṣṭaśritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2230: narakaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam paramaśrita iti atra mā bhūt . pratyayavidhau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2231: naḍasya apatyam nāḍāyanaḥ . iha na bhavati : sūtranaḍasya apatyam sautranāḍiḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . ugidvarṇagrahaṇavarjam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2232: ugidgrahaṇam varṇagrahaṇam ca varjayitvā . ugidgrahaṇam : bhavatī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2233: atibhavatī mahatī , atimahatī . varṇagrahaṇam : ataḥ iñ : dākṣiḥ , plākṣiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2234: . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit kevalaḥ akāraḥ prātipadikam yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . atateḥ ḍaḥ : aḥ , tasya apatyam : ataḥ iñ iḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2235: akacśnamvataḥ sarvanāmāvyayadhātuvidhau upasaṅkhyānam . akacvataḥ sarvanāmāvyayavidhau śnamvataḥ dhātuvidhau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2236: akacvataḥ : sarvake viśvake . avyayavidhau : uccakaiḥ nīcakaiḥ . śnamvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2237: : bhinatti chinatti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . iha tasya vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2238: grahaṇam bhavati tadantasya vā . na ca idam tat na api tadantam . siddham tu tadantāntavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tadantāntavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2239: tadantāntasya iti vaktavyam . kim idam tadantāntasya iti . tasya antaḥ tadantaḥ , tadantaḥ antaḥ yasya tat idam tadantāntam , tadantāntasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2240: saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā : uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya : uṣṭramukhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2241: kharamukhaḥ . evam iha api tadantaḥ antaḥ yasya tadantasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2242: tadekadeśavijñānāt vā siddham . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā punaḥ siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2243: tadekadeśabhūtaḥ tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . tat yathā gaṅgā yamunā devadattā iti . anekā nadī gaṅgām yamunām ca praviṣṭā gaṅgāyamunāgrahaṇena gṛhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2244: tathā devadattāsthaḥ garbhaḥ devadattāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . iha ke cit śabdāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām vācakāḥ bhavanti ye
GS24pmbhasuu:2245_0: ete saṅkhyāśabdāḥ parimāṇaśabdāḥ ca . pañca sapta iti : ekena api apāye na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2245_1: . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti : na eva adhike bhavanti na nyūne . ke cit yāvat eva tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2245_2: bhavati tāvat eva āhuḥ ye ete jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2246: tailam ghṛtam iti : khāryām api bhavanti droṇe api . śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2247: iti : himavati api bhavati vaṭakaṇikāmātre api dravye . imāḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:2248_0: sañjñāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām kriyante . tāḥ kena adhikasya syuḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2248_1: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti yat ayam na idamadasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2248_2: akoḥ iti sakakārayoḥ idamadasoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2249: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . idamadasoḥ kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:2250: sakakārayoḥ syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti . tataḥ sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2251_0: (P_1,1.72.4) KA_I,184.26-186.24 Ro_I,550-554 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2254: , āḍhyaṅkaraṇam , khāḍyaṅkaraṇam . ṅībvidhau ugidgrahaṇam . ṅībvidhau ugidgrahaṇam prayojanam : bhavatī , atibhavatī mahatī , atimahatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:2256: svasā paramasvasā duhitā paramaduhitā . aparimāṇabistādigrahaṇam ca pratiṣedhe . aparimāṇabistādigrahaṇam ca pratiṣedhe prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2257_0: aparimāṇabistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki : dvibistā dviparamabistā tribistā
GS24pmbhasuu:2257_1: triparamabistā dvyācitā dviparamācitā . diti . ditigrahaṇam ca prayojanam . diteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2258: dityadityāditya iti aditigrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . roṇyāḥ aṇ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2259: roṇyāḥ aṇgrahaṇam ca prayojanam : ājakaroṇaḥ , saiṃhakaroṇaḥ . tasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2260: tasya ca iti vaktavyam : rauṇaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tadantāt ca tadantavidhinā siddham kevalāt ca vyapdeśivadbhāvena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2261: vyapdeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vyapdeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena . iha : sūtrāntāt ṭhak bhavati daśāntāt ḍaḥ bhavati iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2262: kevalāt utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra tadantāt ca tadantavidhinā kevalāt ca vyapdeśivadbhāvena . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2263: siddhe sati yat antagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ sūtrāntāt eva daśāntāt eva iti . na atra tadantāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . idānīm eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2264: uktam : samāsapratyayavidhau pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vyapdeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2265: aprātipadikena iti yat ayam pūrvāt iniḥ sapūrvāt ca iti āha . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2266_0: prayojanam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . sapūrvāt pūrvāt inim
GS24pmbhasuu:2266_1: vakṣyāmi iti . yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti . itarathā hi pūrvāt sapūrvāt iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2266_2: brūyāt . kim punaḥ ayam asya eva śeṣaḥ : tasya ca iti . na iti āha . yat ca anukrāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:2266_3: yat ca anukraṃsayte sarvasya eva śeṣaḥ tasya ca iti . rathasītāhalebhyaḥ yadvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:2266_4: . rathasītāhalebhyaḥ yadvidhau prayojanam : rathyaḥ , paramarathyaḥ , sītyam , paramasītyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2269: sumāgadhakaḥ . su . sarva : sarvapāñcālakaḥ , sarvamāgadhakaḥ . sarva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2271: pūrvapāñcālakaḥ , pūrvamāgadhakaḥ . ṛtoḥ vṛddhimadvidhau avayavānām . ṛtoḥ vṛddhimadvidhau avayavānām prayojanam : pūrvaśāradam , aparaśāradam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2272: pūrvanaidāgham , aparanaidāgham . ṭhañvidhau saṅkhyāyāḥ . ṭhañvidhau saṅkhyāyāḥ prayojanam : dviṣāṣṭikam , pañcaṣāṣṭikam . dharmāt nañaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2273: dharmāt nañaḥ prayojanam : dharmam carati dhārmikaḥ , adharmam carati ādharmikaḥ . adharmāt ca iti na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2275: taduttarapadasya ca . padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2276: vaktavyam . padādhikāre kim prayojanam . prayojanam iṣṭikeṣīkāmālānām citatūlabhāriṣu : iṣṭakacitam cinvīta , pakveṣṭikcitam cinvīta ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2277: iṣīkatūlena muñjeṣīkatūlena mālabhāriṇī kanyā , utpalamālabhāriṇī kanyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2279: mahadapsvasṛtṝṇām dīrghavidhau prayojanam : mahān , paramamahān . mahat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2280: ap : āpaḥ tiṣṭhanti , svāpaḥ tiṣṭhanti . ap . svasṛ : svasā svasārau svasāraḥ , paramasvasā paramasvasārau paramasvasāraḥ . svasṛ . naptṛ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2281: naptā naptārau naptāraḥ . evam paramanaptā paramanaptārau paramanaptāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2282_0: padyuṣmadasmadasthyādyanḍuhaḥ num . padbhāvaḥ prayojanam : divpadaḥ paśya . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2282_1: ca idānīm kaḥ cit kevalaḥ pācchabhdaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . na asti iti āha . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2282_2: tarhi aṅgādhikāre prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā padādhikārasya idam prayojanam uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2282_3: : himakāṣihatiṣu ca : yathā patkāṣiṇau patkāṣiṇaḥ evam paramapatkāṣiṇau paramapatkāṣiṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2282_4: . yadi tarhi padādhikāre pādasya tadantavidhiḥ bhavati pādasya pada ājyatigopahateṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2283: yathā iha bhavati : pādena upahatam padopahatam atra api syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_0: digdhapādena upahatam digdhapādopahatam . evam tarhi aṅgādhikāre eva prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_1: nanu ca uktam na asti kevalaḥ pācchabdaḥ iti . ayam asti pādayateḥ apratyayaḥ pāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_2: : padā pade . pad . yuṣmat asmat : yūyam , vayam atiyūyam ativayam . asthyādi : asthnā
GS24pmbhasuu:2284_3: dadhnā sakthnā parmāsthnā paramadadhnā paramasakthnā . anaḍuhaḥ num : anaḍvān , paramānaḍvān
GS24pmbhasuu:2287_0: , panthāḥ , supanthāḥ , manthāḥ , sumanthāḥ , paramamanthāḥ , pumān paramapumān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2287_1: gauḥ , sugauḥ , sakhā sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ , susakhā susakhāyau susakhāyaḥ , paramasakhā
GS24pmbhasuu:2287_2: paramasakhāyau paramasakhāyaḥ , catvāraḥ paramacatvāraḥ , anaḍvāhaḥ , parmānaḍvāhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2287_4: ca prayojanam : saḥ , atisaḥ , bhastrakā bhastrikā nirbhastrakā
GS24pmbhasuu:2288: nirbhastrikā bahubhastrakā bahubhastrikā . strīgrahaṇam ca prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2289: striyau striyaḥ rājastriyau rājastriyaḥ . varṇagrahaṇam ca sarvatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:2290: varṇagrahaṇam ca sarvatra prayojanam . kva sarvatra . aṅgādhikāre ca anyatra ca . anyatra udāhṛtam . āngādhikāre : ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca :
GS24pmbhasuu:2291_0: iha eva syāt : ābhyām . ghaṭābhyām iti atra na syāt . pratyayagrahaṇam ca apañcamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2291_1: . pratyayagrahaṇam ca apañcamyāḥ prayojanam : yañiñoḥ phak bhavati . gārgyāyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2292: apañcamyāḥ iti kimartham . dṛṣattīrṇā pariṣattīrṇā . alā eva anarthakena
GS24pmbhasuu:2293_0: na anyena anarthakena iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . hangrahaṇe plīhangrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2293_1: mā bhūt . udgrahaṇe garmudgrahaṇam . strīgrahaṇe śastrīgrahaṇam . saṅgrahaṇe pāyasam
GS24pmbhasuu:2293_2: karoti iti mā bhūt . kimartham idam ucyate na padāṅgādhikāre tasya ca taduttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2293_3: ca iti eva siddham . na ca idam tat na api taduttarapadam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2293_4: . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . tadantavidhiḥ eva jyāyān . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2294: paramātimahān . etat hi na eva tat na api taduttarapadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2295: aninasmangrahaṇāni ca arthavatā ca anarthakena ca tadantavidhim prayojayanti . an : rājñā iti arthavatā sāmnā iti anarthakena . an . in :
GS24pmbhasuu:2296: daṇḍī* iti arthavatā vāgmī* iti anarthakena . in . as : supayāḥ iti arthavatā susrotāḥ iti anarthakena . as . man : suśarmā iti arthavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:2299_0: algrahaṇe . algrahaṇeṣu yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . aci
GS24pmbhasuu:2299_1: śnudhātubhruvām yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti iha eva syāt : śriyau bhruvau . śriyaḥ , bhruvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2301: yasya acām ādiḥ tat vṛddham iti iyati ucyamāne dāttāḥ , rākṣitāḥ atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:2302_0: prasajyeta . vṛddhigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha yasyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2302_1: kimartham . yasya iti vyapadeśāya . atha ajgrahaṇam kimartham . vṛddhiḥ yasya ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2302_2: tat vṛddham iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt : aitikāyanīyāḥ , aupagavīyāḥ . iha na
GS24pmbhasuu:2303: ajgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2304_0: vṛddhiḥ yasya acām tat vṛddham iti iyati ucyamāne sabhāsannayane bhavaḥ sābhasannayanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2304_1: iti atra prasajyeta . ādigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . vṛddhasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2304_2: ajasanniveśāt anāditvam . vṛddhasañjñāyām ajasanniveśāt ādiḥ iti etat na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2305_0: nanu ca evam vijñāyate : ac eva ādiḥ ajādiḥ . na evam śakyam . iha eva prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2305_1: : aupagavīyāḥ . iha na syāt : gārgīyāḥ iti . ekāntāditvam tarhi vijñāyate . ekāntāditve
GS24pmbhasuu:2306: sabhāsannayane bhavaḥ sābhasannayanaḥ iti . siddham ajākṛtinirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2307: siddham etat . katham . ajākṛtiḥ nirdiśyate . evam api vyañjanaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2308: vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . vyañjanasya avidyamānatvam yathā anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:2309: vyañjanasya avidyamānavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ yathā anyatra api bhavati vyañjanasya avidyamānavadbhāvaḥ . kva anyatra . svare .
GS24pmbhasuu:2310: (P_1,1.73.2) KA_I,189.23-190.10 Ro_I,565-566 vā nāmadheyasya . vā nāmadheyasya vṛddhasañjñā vaktavyā : devadattīyāḥ , daivadattāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2311: yajñadattīyāḥ , yājñadattāḥ . gotrottarapadasya ca . gotrottarapadasya ca vṛddhasañjñā vaktavyā : kambalacārāyaṇīyāḥ , odanapāṇinīyāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2312: ghṛtarauḍhīyāḥ . gotrāntāt vā asamastavat . gotrāntāt vā asamastavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2313: pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam : etāni eva udāharaṇāni . kim aviśeṣeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:2314: na iti āha . jihvākātyaharitakātyavarjam . jihvākātyam haritakātyam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2315: varjayitvā : jaihavākātāḥ , hāritakātāḥ . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2316: gotrāntāt vā asamastavat iti eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2318_0: (P_1,1.74) KA_I,190.12-18 Ro_I,566-567 yasyācāmādigrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na .
GS24pmbhasuu:2318_1: kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate iha ca prasajyeta : tvatputrasya chāttrāḥ tvātputrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2318_2: , mātputrāḥ iha ca na syāt : tvadīyaḥ , madīyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2319: atha nivṛttam eṅ prācām deśe yasyācāmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . evam tarhi anuvartate . katham tvāputrāḥ , mātputrāḥ iti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2320: vṛddhiḥ yasya acām ādiḥ tat vṛddham . tyadādīni ca vṛddhasañjñāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:2321: . vṛddhiḥ yasya acām ādiḥ tat vṛddham . eṅ prācām deśe .
GS24pmbhasuu:2322: yasyācāmādigrahaṇam anuvartate . vṛddhigrahaṇam nivṛttam . tat yathā kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2323: cit kāntāre samupasthite sārtham upādatte . saḥ yadā niṣkāntārībhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2325: (P_1,1.75) KA_I,190.20-21 Ro_I,567-568 eṅ prācām deśe śaiṣikeṣu iti vaktavyam : saipurikī saipurikā skaunagarikī skaunagarikā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2327: aprasiddhiḥ . ṅitkidvacane tayoḥ abhāvāt , ṅakārakakārayoḥ abhāvāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2328: ṅittvakittvayoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . satā hi abhisambandhaḥ śakyate kartum na ca atra ṅakārakakārau itau paśyāmaḥ . tat yathā citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2329: yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ santi saḥ eva tābhyām śabdābhyām śakyate abhisambandhum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2330: bhāvyete tarhi anena . gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅit bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kit bhavati iti . bhavati iti cet ādeśapratiṣedhaḥ . bhavati iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2331: ādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ṅakārakakārau itau ādeśau prāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2332: katham punaḥ itsañjñaḥ nāma ādeśaḥ syāt . kim hi vacanāt na bhavati . evam tarhi ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2333: gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī añṇit iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . sañjñākaraṇam tarhi idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2334: gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅitsañjñaḥ bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kitsañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2335: bhavati iti . sañjñākaraṇe kṅidgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ śabdabhedāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2336: sañjñākaraṇe kṅidgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . śabdabhedāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2337: anyaḥ hi śabdaḥ kṅiti iti anyaḥ kiti iti ṅiti iti ca . tathā kidgrahaṇeṣu ṅidgrahaṇeṣu ca anayoḥ eva sampratyayaḥ syāt . tadvadatideśaḥ tarhi ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2338: gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅidvat bhavati iti . asaṃyogāt liṭ kidvat bhavati iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2339: . antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā : eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2340: abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aṅitam ṅit iti āha . ṅidvat iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2341: akitam kit iti āha . kidvat iti gamyate . tadvadatideśe akidvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tadvadatideśe akidvidhiḥ api prāpnoti . sṛjidṛśoḥ jhali am akiti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2342: sisṛkṣati didṛkṣate : akillakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu prasajyapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_0: kriyate : kiti na iti . sarvatra sanantāt ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_1: sanantāt ātmanepadam prāpnoti . uccukuṭiṣati nicukuṭiṣati : ṅiti iti ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_2: prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2343_3: etat . katham . pūrvasya yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2344: saptamyarthe api vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā : mathurāyām iva mathurāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2345: pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat evam ṅiti iva ṅidvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2347: ṅitkitau kriyete na sarvam kit eva vā syāt ṅit eva vā . pṛthaganubandhatve prayojanam vacisvapiyajādīnām asamprasāraṇam sārvadhātukacaṅādiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2348: pṛthaganubandhatve prayojanam vacisvapiyajādīnām asamprasāraṇam sārvadhātuke caṅādiṣu ca. sārvadhātuke prayojanam : yathā iha bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2349: suptaḥ , suptavān iti evam svapitaḥ , svapithaḥ : atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2350: caṅādiṣu prayojanam . ke punaḥ caṅādayaḥ . caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2351: caṅ : yathā iha bhavati śūnaḥ , śūnavān iti evam aśiśviyat : atra api prāpnoti . aṅ : yathā iha bhavati śūnaḥ , uktaḥ iti evam aśvat , avocat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2352: atra api prāpnoti . najiṅ : yathā iha bhavati suptaḥ iti evam svapnak :
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_0: atra api prāpnoti . ṅvanip : yathā iha bhavati iṣṭaḥ iti evam yajvā : atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_1: . athaṅ : yathā iha bhavati uṣitaḥ iti evam āvasathaḥ : atra api prāpnoti . naṅ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_2: yathā iha bhavati iṣṭam evam yajñaḥ : atra api prāpnoti . jāgraḥ aguṇavidhiḥ . jāgarteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2353_3: aguṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgṛtaḥ , jāgṛthaḥ iti aṅiti iti paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2354: jāgaritavān iti atra api prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha : jāgraḥ guṇavidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2355: jāgarteḥ guṇavidhiḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati jāgaritaḥ , jāgaritavān evam jāgṛtaḥ jāgṛthaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2356: kuṭādīnām iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2357: kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ evam nuvitā dhuvitā : atra api prāpnoti . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca prayojanam . kim ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2358: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . na iti āha . adeśe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām ca kitpratiṣedhaḥ iti . yathā iha bhavati devitvā sevitvā na ktvā seṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2359: pratiṣedhaḥ evam kuṭitvā puṭitvā : atra api prāpnoti . atha vā deśe eva ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . ktvāyām kitpratiṣedhaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2360_0: iṭpratiṣedhaḥ : yathā iha bhavati lūtvā pūtvā śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2360_1: nuvitvā dhuvitvā : atra api prāpnoti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi atra niyogataḥ ātideśikena
GS24pmbhasuu:2360_2: ṅittvena aupadeśikam kittvam bādhyeta . sati api tu ṅittve kit eva eṣaḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2361: (P_1,2.4.1) KA_I,193.15-22 Ro_II,10-11 sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kimartham . apit iti iyati ucyamāne ārdhadhātukasya api apitaḥ ṅittvam prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:2362_0: kartā hartā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2362_1: ṅittvam bhavati iti yat ayam ārdhadhātukīyān kān cit ṅitaḥ karoti : caṅaṅnajiṅṅvanibathaṅnaṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2362_2: . sārvadhātuke api etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2364_0: ārdhadhātukāḥ . yadi etat asti tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam iti caṅaṅau luṅvikaraṇānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2364_1: jñāpakau syātām najiṅ vartamānakālānām ṅvanip bhūtakālānām athaṅśabdaḥ auṇādikānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2365: (P_1,2.4.2) KA_I,193.23-194.7 Ro_II,11-12 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2366_0: yat anyat pitaḥ , āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ : pit na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2366_1: . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . apit ṅit iti cet śabdekādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2366_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : cyavante plavante . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pidapitoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2366_3: ekādeśaḥ apitaḥ ādivat syāt . asti anyat pitaḥ iti kṛtvā ṅittvam prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2366_4: tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : pit na iti . na pit ṅit iti cet uttamaikādeśapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2366_5: . pit na iti cet uttamaikādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti : tudāni likhāni . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2367_0: ādivattvāt eva . pidapitoḥ ekādeśaḥ pitaḥ ādivat syāt . tatra pit na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2367_1: prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . nanu ca uktam ubhayathā api doṣaḥ iti . ubhayathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2367_2: api na doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:2369: (P_1,2.5) KA_I,194.9-16 Ro_II,12-13 ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt vipratiṣedhena . ṛdupadhebhyaḥ liṭaḥ kittvam guṇāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:2370_0: : vavṛte vavṛdhe . uktam vā . kim uktam . na vā ksasya anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2370_1: iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra yat anavakāśam kitkaraṇam guṇam bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2371_0: avakāśaḥ: ījatuḥ ījuḥ . guṇasya avakāśaḥ : vartitvā vardhitvā . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2371_1: : vavṛte vavṛdhe . paratvāt guṇaḥ prāpnoti . idam tarhi uktam : iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2371_2: . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati itI
GS24pmbhasuu:2372: (P_1,2.6) KA_I,194.18-195.2 Ro_II,14 kimartham idam ucyate . indheḥ samyogārtham vacanam bhavateḥ pidartham . ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2373: katham . indheḥ chandoviṣayatvāt bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt tābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2374_0: kidvacanānarthakyam . indheḥ chandoviṣayaḥ liṭ . na hi antareṇa chandaḥ indheḥ anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2374_1: liṭ labhyaḥ . āmā bhāṣāyām bhavitavyam . bhuvaḥ vukaḥ nityatvāt . bhavateḥ api nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2374_2: vuk . kṛte api prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:2377: (P_1,2.7) KA_I,195.4-12 Ro_II,15 kimartham mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate . kit eva hi ktvā . na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_0: tadbādhanārtham . yadi tarhi mṛḍādibhyaḥ parasya ktvaḥ kittvam ucyate na arthaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_1: ktvā seṭ iti anena kittvapratiṣedhena . idam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : mṛḍādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_2: eva parasya ktvaḥ kittvam bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_3: tarhi niyamān na prāpnoti : lūtvā pūtvā . atra api akittvam prāpnoti . tulyajātīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_4: niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakaḥ mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā . kathañjātīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_5: mṛḍādibhyaḥ paraḥ ktvā . seṭ . evam api asti atra kaḥ cit vibhāṣiteṭ . saḥ aniṭām
GS24pmbhasuu:2378_6: niyāmakaḥ syāt . astu tāvat ye seṭaḥ teṣām grahaṇam niyamāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2379: yaḥ idānīm vibhāṣiteṭ tasya grahaṇam vidhyartham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2380: (P_1,2.8) KA_I,195.14 Ro_II,16 svapipracchyoḥ sanartham grahaṇam kit eva hi ktvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2381_0: (P_1,2.9) KA_I,195.16-197.11 Ro_II,16-21 kimartham ikaḥ parasya sanaḥ kittvam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2381_1: . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt . ikaḥ kittvam ucyate guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti : cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:2382: dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . kṛte bhavet . kṛte khalu dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:2383_0: guṇaḥ prāpnoti . anarthakam tu . anarthakam evam sati dīrghatvam syāt . na anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2383_1: . hrasvārtham . hrasvānām dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . bhavet hrasvānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_0: dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate . dīrghāṇām tu khalu guṇaḥ prāpnoti . nanu ca dīrghāṇām api
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_1: dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na dīrghāṇām dīrghāḥ prāpnuvanti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_2: kāraṇam . na hi bhuktavān punaḥ bhuṅkte na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2384_3: . nanu ca punaḥ pravṛttiḥ api dṛṣṭā bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_0: sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam . sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_1: śilpiviśeṣāt vā . dīrghāṇām punaḥ dīrghatvavacane na kim cit prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_2: khalu api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ yad adagdham tat dahati . dīrghāṇām api
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_3: dīrghavacane etat prayojanam guṇaḥ mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2385_4: . tat yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣati . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2386: dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt guṇaḥ na bhavati evam ṝdittvam api na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2387: cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti. ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam . na akṛte dīrghe
GS24pmbhasuu:2388: ṝdittvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṝtaḥ iti ucyate . bhavet hrasvānām na
GS24pmbhasuu:2389_0: akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam syāt dīrghāṇām tu khalu akṛte api dīrghatve ṝdittvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2389_1: . dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe . dīrghāṇām api na akṛte dīrghe ṝdittvam prāpnoti . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_0: ṝdittvam bhavati . ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam : ṇilopaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_1: syāt iti : jñīpsati . kva astāḥ kva nipatitāḥ kva kittvam kva ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_2: yat sati kittve ṇilopaḥ syāt asati na syāt . eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ yat sati kittve
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_3: sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt ṇilopaḥ bādhate . asati punaḥ kittve anavakāśam dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_4: yathā eva guṇam bādhate evam ṇilopam api bādheta . tatra ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ : kāraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:2390_5: hāraṇā . dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ : cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2391: : jñīpsati . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . asati api kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2392_0: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . isbhāvaḥ . nimitsati pramitsati . mīnātiminotyoḥ dīrghatve kṛte mīgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2392_1: grahaṇam yathā syāt . yathā eva tarhi asati kittve sāvakāśam dīrghatvam paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2392_2: ṇilopaḥ bādhate evam guṇaḥ api bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:2393: tasmāt kittvam vaktavyam . ikaḥ kittvam guṇaḥ mā bhūt dīrghārambhāt kṛte bhavet |
GS24pmbhasuu:2394: anarthakam tu hrasvārtham dīrghāṇām tu prasajyate || sāmarthyāt hi punaḥ bhāvyam ṝdittvam dīrghasaṃśrayam dīrghāṇām na akṛte dīrghe ṇilopaḥ tu prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2395: (P_1,2.10) KA_I,197.13-22 Ro_II,22-23 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . katham hi ikaḥ nāma hal antaḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2396: kartavyaḥ . igvataḥ halaḥ iti . yadi evam yiyakṣati atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2397_0: evam tarhi igupadhāt halantāt iti vakṣyāmi . evam api dambheḥ na prāpnoti . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:2397_1: ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2397_2: ayuktaḥ . antaśabdaḥ ayam asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā vastrāntaḥ , vasanāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2398_0: . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā udakāntam gataḥ iti . udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2398_1: . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam . evam api dambheḥ na sidhyati . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2398_2: atra iksamīpe hal na tasmāt uttaraḥ san . yasmāt uttaraḥ san na asau iksamīpe hal
GS24pmbhasuu:2398_3: . evam tarhi dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt siddham . haljātiḥ nirdiśyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:2400: ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti āhosvit ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2401_0: . kim ca ataḥ. yadi vijñāyate ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti liṅ viśeṣitaḥ sic aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2401_1: . atha vijñāyate ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2401_2: . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ātmanepadam yau liṅsicau iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2402_0: aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sic ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadam sic na asti iti kṛtvā ātmanepadapare
GS24pmbhasuu:2402_1: sici kāryam vijñāsyate . atha vā punaḥ astu ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ yau liṅsicau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2402_2: . nanu ca uktam sic viśeṣitaḥ liṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:2403_0: aviśeṣitaḥ iti . liṅ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ātmanepadeṣu parataḥ liṅ na asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2403_1: kṛtvā ātmanepade liṅi kāryam vijñāsyate . na eva vā punaḥ arthaḥ liṅviśeṣaṇena ātmanepadagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:2404: ātmanepadeṣu ca eva liṅ jhalādiḥ na parasmaipadeṣu . tat etat sijviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2405_0: ātmanepadagrahaṇam . atha sijviśeṣaṇe ātmanepadagrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2405_1: mā bhūt : ayākṣīt , avātsīt . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api anaiṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:2405_2: , acaiṣīt : atra api prāpnoti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:2406_0: asti prayojanam . halantāt iti vartate . evam api akoṣīt , amoṣīt : atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2406_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . jhal iti vartate . evam api abhaitsīt , acchaitsīt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2406_2: atra api prāpnoti . na etat asti . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2406_3: iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam : iha mā bhūt : adrākṣīt , asrākṣīt . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2408: (P_1,2.17) KA_I,198.18-199.4 Ro_II,25-27 it ca kasya takārettvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2409: kasya hetoḥ ikāraḥ taparaḥ kriyate . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt . dīrghaḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2410: . ṛte api saḥ . antareṇa api ārambham siddhaḥ atra dīrghaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2411: ghumāsthāgāpājahāti iti . anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2412: : anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt iti . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantarārthe ārambhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2413: hrasvaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ plutaḥ iti . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . viṣaye khalu plutaḥ ucyate . yadā ca saḥ viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam eva tadā plutena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2414: it ca kasya takārettvam dīrghaḥ mā bhūt ṛte api saḥ |
GS24pmbhasuu:2415: anantare plutaḥ mā bhūt plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2416: (P_1,2.18) KA_I,199.6-200.24 Ro_II,27-31 na seṭ iti kṛte akittve . na seṭ iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ ktvāgrahaṇena . niṣṭhāyam api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2417_0: prāpnoti : gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt . niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2417_1: na bhaviṣyati . kim avadhāraṇam . niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ iti . parokṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2418: papiva papima : kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2419_0: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : jagmiva jaghniva . kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na syāt . jñāpakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2419_1: na parokṣāyām . jñāpakāt parokṣāyām na bhaviṣyati . kim jñāpakam . sani jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2419_2: viduḥ . yat ayam ikaḥ jhal iti jhalgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2420: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ na ātideśikasya iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . jhalgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2421_0: : iha mā bhūt : śiśayiṣate iti . yadi ca atra ātideśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2421_1: syāt jhalgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . astu atra kittvam . na seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2421_2: . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ na ātideśikasya iti . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2422: prayojanam . uttarārtham etat syāt . sthāghvoḥ it ca jhalādau yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2423: iha mā bhūt : upāsthāyiṣātām upāsthāyiṣata . ittvam kitsanniyogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2424: kitsanniyogena ittvam ucyate . tena asati kittve ittvam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2425_0: reṇa tulyam sudhīvani . tat yathā sudhīvā supīvā : ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ asati
GS24pmbhasuu:2425_1: ṅīpi na bhavati . atha vā astu atra ittvam . kā rūpasiddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām āyādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2426: vasvartham tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam . vasau hi aupadeśikam kittvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2427_0: kim ca syāt . papivān papimān : kṅiti iti ākāralopaḥ na syāt . mā bhūt evam . iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:2427_1: iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : jagmivān , jaghnivān : kṅiti iti upadhālopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2427_2: syāt . kidatīdeśāt . astu atra aupadeśikasya kittvasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ātideśikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2428: pratiṣidhyate : añjeḥ ājivān iti . evam tarhi chāndasḥ kvasuḥ liṭ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2429_0: chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati . tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:2429_1: upadhālopaḥ bhaviṣyati . nigṛhītiḥ . nigṛhītiḥ prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2429_2: : iha mā bhūt : nigṛhītiḥ , upasannihitiḥ , nikucitiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2430: tat tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ktvā ca vigrahāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2431: upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate : na seṭ niṣṭhā śīṅsvidimidikṣvididhṛṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2432_0: . mṛṣaḥ titikṣāyām . udupadhāt bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ anyatarasyām . tataḥ pūṅaḥ . pūṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2432_1: niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati . tataḥ ktvā . ktvā ca seṭ na kit bhavati . pūṅ iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:2432_2: . na seṭ iti kṛte akittve niṣṭhāyām avadhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2433: | jñāpakāt na parokṣāyām sani jhalgrahaṇam viduḥ || ittvam kitsanniyogena reṇa tulyam sudhīvani
GS24pmbhasuu:2434: vasvartham kidatīdeśāt nigṛhītiḥ ktvā ca vigrahāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2435: (P_1,2.21) KA_I,201.2-4 Ro_II,31 iha kasmāt na bhavati . gudhitaḥ gudhitavān iti . udupadhāt śapaḥ . śabvikaraṇebhyaḥ iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_0: vāprasaṅgaḥ seṭprakaraṇāt . pūṅaḥ ktvāniṣṭhayoḥ iṭi vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_1: . seṭprakaraṇāt . seṭ iti vartate . na vā seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt aniṭi vā kittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_2: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt . akidāśrayam seṭtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_3: . yadā akittvam tadā iṭā bhavitavyam . seṭtvasya akidāśrayatvāt aniṭi eva vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_4: kittvam bhaviṣyati . iḍvidhau pūṅaḥ grahaṇam kriyate . tena vacanāt iṭ seṭprakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_5: ca iṭi eva vibhāṣā kittvam prāpnoti . iḍvidhau hi agrahaṇam . iḍvidhau hi pūṅaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2437_6: na kartavyam bhavati . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti : nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2438: ktvāgrahaṇam uttarārtham . nityam akittvam iḍādyoḥ siddham . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:2439: vibhāṣāmadhye ayam yogaḥ kriyate . vibhāṣāmadhye ca ye vidhayaḥ te nityāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2440: bhavanti . kimartham tarhi ktvāgrahaṇam . ktvāgrahaṇam uttarārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2441: uttarārtham ktvāgrahaṇam kriyate : nopadhāt thapāntāt vā vañciluñcyṛtaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2443: kāśyapagrahaṇam pūjārtham . vā iti eva hi vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2444_0: (P_1,2.26) KA_I,202.2-7 Ro_II,33 kim idam ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:2444_1: pratiṣidhyate . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vidhīyate ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_0: anarthakam . akit eva hi san . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : ralaḥ ktvāsanoḥ kittvam . ralaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_1: ktvāsanoḥ kittvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam : ktvāgrahaṇam anarthakam . kit eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2445_2: ktvā iti . na anarthakam . na ktvā seṭ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2446: (P_1,2.27.1) KA_I,202.9-15 Ro_II,34 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . ū iti anena kālaḥ pratinirdiśyate ū iti ayam ca varṇaḥ . tatra ayuktam varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2447: kālena saha sāmanādhikaraṇyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2448: ūkālakālasya iti . kim idam ūkālakālasya iti . ū iti etasya kālaḥ ūkālaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2449_0: ūkālaḥ kālaḥ asya ūkālakālaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2449_1: . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā uṣṭramukham mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2449_2: , kharamukhaḥ evam ūkālakālaḥ ūkālaḥ iti . atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2450_1: . hrasvādiṣu samasaṅkhyatvasya aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . nirdeśavaiṣamyāt . tisraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2451: vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu samasṅkhyatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2452: siddham etat . katham . samasaṅkhyatvāt . katham samasaṅkhyatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2453_0: trayāṇām hi vikāranirdeśaḥ . trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2453_1: trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti . tisṛṇām sañjñānām karaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi api
GS24pmbhasuu:2454: jñāyate trayāṇām ayam praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat : etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . ādau mātrikaḥ tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2455_0: dvimātraḥ tataḥ trimātraḥ iti . na punaḥ mātrikaḥ madhye vā ante vā syāt tathā dvimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2455_1: ādau vā ante vā syāt tathā trimātraḥ ādau vā madhye vā syāt . ayam tāvat trimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2455_2: aśakyaḥ ādau vā madhye vā kartum . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2456_0: plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ api ghyantam pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2456_1: nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate ayam tāvat trimātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2456_2: aśakyaḥ ādau vā madhye vā kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2457_0: plutāśrayaḥ hi prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta iti . plutāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ plutasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2457_1: ca anena eva . yadi ca trimātraḥ ādau vā madhye vā syāt plutasañjñā eva asya na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_0: mātrikadvimātrikayoḥ api ghyantam pūrvam nipatati iti mātrikasya pūrvanipātaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_1: iti . hrasvāśrayā hi ghisañjñā hrasvasañjñā ca anena eva. yadi ca mātrikaḥ madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_2: vā ante vā syāt hrasvasañjñā eva asya na syāt kutaḥ ghisañjñā kutaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_3: . evam eṣā vyavasthā na prakalpate . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2458_4: ante bhavati iti yat ayam vibhāṣā pṛṣṭaprativacane heḥ iti mātrikasya plutam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:2459: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2460: ante syāt plutasañjñā asya syāt. tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2461: anarthakam syāt . madhye tarhi syāt iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2462: jñāpayati na mātrikaḥ madhye bhavati iti yat ayam ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca it dīrghatvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ madhye saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2463: dīrghasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca mātrikaḥ madhye syāt dīrghasañjñā asya syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2464: tatra mātrākālasya mātrākālavacanam anarthakam syāt . dvimātraḥ tarhi ante
GS24pmbhasuu:2465: syāt . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dvimātraḥ ante bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2466_0: yat ayam om abhyādāne iti dvimātrikasya plutam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2466_1: ante saḥ plutasañjñakaḥ . yadi ca dvimātrikaḥ ante syāt plutasañjñā asya syāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2467: anarthakam syāt . mātrikeṇa ca asya pūrvanipātaḥ bādhitaḥ iti kṛtvā kva anyatra utsahate bhavitum anyat ataḥ madhyāt . evam eṣā vyavasthā prakḷptā
GS24pmbhasuu:2468: . bhavet vyavasthā prakḷptā . dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2469: dīrghaplutayoḥ api pūrvasañjñā prāpnoti . kā . hrasvasañjñā . kim kāraṇam . aṇ savarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . siddham tu taparanirdeśāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2470: katham . taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ : udūkālaḥ iti . yadi evam drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_0: taparakaraṇe madhyamavilambitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutādiṣu ca uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_1: kim utktam . siddham tu . avasthitāḥ varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_2: iti . saḥ tarhi taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha kālagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_3: . yāvat ca taparakaraṇam tāvat kālagrahaṇam . pratyekam ca kālaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_4: : ukālaḥ ūkālaḥ ū3kālaḥ iti . atha vā ekasañjñādhikāre ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_5: ekā sañjñā bhavati yā parā anavakāśā ca iti evam hi dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:2471_6: bhaviṣyati . atha vā svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā iti ayam yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2472_0: pratyākhyāyate . tatra yat etat aśabdasañjñā iti etat yayā vibhaktyā nirdiśyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2472_1: arthavat bhavati tayā nirdiṣṭam anuvartiṣyate : aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ aśabdasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2472_2: iti . atha vā hrasvasañjñāvacanasāmarthyāt dīrghaplutayoḥ pūrvasañjñā na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2473: nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt : sañjñayā vidhāne niyamam vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_0: hrasvasañjñayā yat ucyate tat acaḥ sthāne yathā syāt iti . syāt etat prayojanam yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_1: kiñcitkarāṇi hrasvaśāsanāni syuḥ . yataḥ tu khalu yāvat ajgrahaṇam tāvat hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_2: ataḥ akiñcitkarāṇi hrasvaśāsanāni . idam tarhi prayojanam : ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_3: vakṣyāmi iti . anucyamāne hi etasmin hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_4: syāt . hrasvaḥ napuṃsake prātipadikasya ecaḥ ik bhavati iti . ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_5: hrasvaḥ ecaḥ ik bhavati iti . hrasvaḥ halādiḥ śeṣaḥ ecaḥ ik bhavati iti . sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_6: ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam laghīyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_7: triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu ecaḥ ik bhavati iti na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2474_8: ecaḥ ik bhavati iti ṣaṭ grahaṇāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:2475: sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ aṣṭau . hrasvasañjñā vaktavyā . triḥ hrasvapradeśeṣu hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ hrasvaḥ iti . ecaḥ ik hrasvādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2476: iti . saḥ ayam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:2477: ārabhate tasya etat prayojanam dīrghaplutayoḥ tu pūrvasañjñā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2479: āhosvit alontyāpavādaḥ . katham ca ayam taccheṣaḥ syāt katham vā tadapavādaḥ . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca : alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2480_0: bhavanti acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya iti tataḥ ayam taccheśaḥ . atha nānā vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2480_1: : alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti , acaḥ hrasvadīrghaplutāḥ antyasya anantyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2480_2: iti tataḥ ayam tadapavādaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_0: hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu ajgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_1: . hrasvādividhiḥ alaḥ antyasya iti cet vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_2: ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . vacipracchyoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:2481_3: prāpnoti . śamādīnām dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2482: . hanigamyoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ iti vaktavyam . anantyatvāt na prāpnoti . astu tarhi tadapavādaḥ . acaḥ cet napuṃsakahrasvākṛtsārvadhātukanāmidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2484: anantyapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hrasvaḥ napuṃsake prātipadikasya : yathā iha bhavati : rai : atiri nau : atinau evam suvāk brāhmaṇakulam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2485: api prāpnoti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ : yathā iha bhavati : cīyate stūyate evam bhidyate atra api prāpnoti . nāmi dīrghaḥ : yathā iha bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2486: : agnīnām , vāyūnām evam atra api prāpnoti : ṣaṇṇām . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2487: nopadhyāyāḥ iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . prakṛtasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2488: syāt. kim ca prakṛtam . nāmi iti . tena bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2489: ṣaṇṇām . anyate tanyate atra api prāpnoti . atha api evam niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2490: nopadhāyāḥ nāmi eva iti evam api bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt : anyate tanyate . ṣaṇṇām iti atra prāpnoti . atha api ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2491_0: nopadhāyāḥ eva nāmi nāmi eva nopadadhyāyāḥ iti evam api bhidyate suvāk brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:2491_1: ita atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2491_2: etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī prāduḥ bhāvyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2491_3: . tatra kāmacāraḥ : gṛhyamāṇena vā acam viśeṣayitum acā vā gṛhyamāṇaḥ . yāvatā kāmacāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2491_4: iha tāvat vacipracchiśamādiprabhṛtihanigamidīrgheṣu gṛhyamāṇena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2491_5: : eṣām acaḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati iti . iha idānīm napuṃsakahrasvākṛtsārvadhātukanāmidīrgheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2492: napuṃsakasya hrasvaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti . akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ dīrghaḥ acaḥ . ajantasya iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati acaḥ . ajantasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2493: (P_1,2.28.2) KA_I,206.3-12 Ro_II,41-43 iha kasmāt na bhavati : dyauḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2494_0: panthāḥ , saḥ iti . sañjñayā vidhāne niyamaḥ . sañjñayā ye vidhīyante teṣu niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2494_1: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . ac iti vartate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2494_2: evam abhisambandhaḥ kariṣyate : acaḥ ac bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2495: hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti evam bhāvyamanaḥ iti . atha pūrvasmin yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:2496: ajgrahaṇe sati kim prayojanam . ajgrahaṇam saṃyogācsamudāyanivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2498: saṃyognivṛttyartham tāvat : pratakṣya prarakṣya . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk iti tuk mā bhūt iti . acsamudāyanivṛttyartham : titaucchatram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2499: titaucchāyā . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti vibhāṣā mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_0: (P_1,2.29-30.1) KA_I,206.14-25 Ro_II,43-45 kim ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2500_1: utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_0: katham halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . evam tarhi nivṛttam . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_1: prayojanāni . atha prathamānirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2501_2: anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi ete vyañjanasya api guṇāḥ lakṣyante . nanu ca pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_0: na ete vyañjanasya guṇāḥ . acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam api tadguṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_1: upalabhyate . tat yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ madhye śuklam vastram tadguṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_2: upalabhyate badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate . kutaḥ nu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_3: etat acaḥ ete guṇāḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu vyañjanam api tadguṇam upalabhyate iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_4: punaḥ vyañjanasya ete guṇāḥ syuḥ . tatsāmīpyāt tu ac api tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_5: . antareṇa api vyañjanam acaḥ eva ete guṇāḥ lakṣyante . na punaḥ antareṇa acam vyañjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2502_6: uccāraṇam api bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam svayam rājante svarāḥ . anvak
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_1: . idam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam . tat eva hi kam cit prati uccaiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_2: kam cit prati nīcaiḥ . evam kam cit kaḥ cit adhīyānam āha : kim uccaiḥ rorūyase .
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_3: atha nīcaiḥ vartatām iti . tam eva tathā adhīyānam aparaḥ āha : kim antardantakena
GS24pmbhasuu:2503_4: adhīṣe . uccaiḥ vartatām iti . evam uccanīcam anavasthitapadarthakam . tasya anavasthānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_0: aprasiddhiḥ . evam tarhi lakṣaṇam kariṣyate : āyāmaḥ dāruṇyam aṇutā khasya iti uccaiḥkarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_1: śabdasya . āyāmaḥ gātrāṇām nigrahaḥ . dāruṇyam svarasya dāruṇatā rūkṣatā . aṇutā
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_2: khasya kaṇṭhasya saṃvṛtatā . uccaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . atha nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_3: anvavasargaḥ mārdavam urutā khasya iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . anvavasargaḥ gātrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_4: śithilatā . mārdavam svarasya mṛdutā snigdhatā . urutā khasya mahattā kaṇṭhasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:2504_5: iti nīcaiḥkarāṇi śabdasya . etat api anaikāntikam . yat alpaprāṇasya sarvoccaiḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2505: . siddham etat . katham . samāne prakrame iti vaktavyam . kaḥ punaḥ prakramaḥ . uraḥ kaṇṭhaḥ śiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2506: (P_1,2.31) KA_I,207.16-208.9 Ro_II,46-48 samāhāraḥ svaritaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2507_0: . kasya samāhāraḥ svaritasañjñaḥ bhavati . acoḥ iti āha . samāhāraḥ acoḥ cet na abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2507_1: . samāhāraḥ acoḥ cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt . na hi acoḥ samāhāraḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2507_2: nanu ayam asti gāṅgenūpe iti . na eṣaḥ acoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2508: samāhāraḥ . anyaḥ ayam udāttānudāttayoḥ sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate . evam tarhi guṇayoḥ . guṇayoḥ cet na acprakaraṇāt . guṇayoḥ samahāraḥ iti cet tat na .
GS24pmbhasuu:2509: kim kāraṇam . acprakaraṇāt . ac iti vartate . siddham tu acsamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2510: abhāvāt tadguṇe sampratyayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . acsamudāyaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_0: iti kṛtvā tadguṇasya acaḥ samāhāraguṇasya sampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_1: samāhāraḥ iti anena ac śakyaḥ pratinirdeṣṭum . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_2: puṣpakāḥ eṣām te puṣpakāḥ , kālakāḥ eṣām te kālakāḥ iti evam samāhāravān samāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_3: . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ , ghāṭaḥ iti . yadi evam traisvaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2511_4: na prakalpate . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . traisvaryam adhīmahe iti etat na upapadyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2512: kim tarhi . ajapekṣam . traisvaryam adhīmahe : triprakāraiḥ ajbhiḥ adhīmahe kaiḥ cit udāttaguṇaiḥ kaiḥ cit anudāttaguṇaiḥ kaiḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2513: ubhayaguṇaiḥ . tat yathā : śuklaguṇaḥ śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ . yaḥ idānīm ubhayaguṇaḥ saḥ tṛtīyām ākhyām labhate kalmāṣaḥ iti vā sāraṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2514: vā . evam iha api udāttaguṇaḥ udāttaḥ anudāttaguṇaḥ anudāttaḥ . yaḥ idānīm ubhayavān sa tṛtīyām ākhyām labhate svaritaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2516: tatra dīrghaplutayoḥ na prāpnoti . kanyā śaktike3 śaktike . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2517: . mātracaḥ atra lopaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . ardhahrasvamātram ardhahrasvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2518: kimartham idam ucyate . āmiśrībhūtam iva idam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2519: kṣīrodake sampṛkte* āmiśrībhūtatvāt na jñāyate : kiyat kṣīram kiyat udakam kasmin avakāśe kṣīram kasmin avakāśe udakam iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2520: āmiśrībhūtatvāt na jñāyate : kiyat udāttam kiyat anudāttam kasmin avakāśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2521: udāttam kasmin avakāśe anudāttam iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe : iyat udāttam iyat anudāttam asmin avakāśe udāttam asmin avakāśe
GS24pmbhasuu:2522: anudāttam iti . yadi ayam evam suhṛt kim anyāni api evañjātīyakāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_0: upadiśati . kāni punaḥ tāni . sthānakaraṇānupradānāni . vyākaraṇam nāma iyam uttarā
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_1: vidyā . saḥ asau chandaḥśāstreṣu abhivinītaḥ upalabdhyā avagantum utsahate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2523_2: evam na arthaḥ anena . idam api upalabdhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2524: gamiṣyati . sañjñākaraṇam tarhi idam : tasya svaritasya āditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2525: ardhahrasvam udāttasañjñam iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati : udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2526: udāttasvaritayoḥ yaṇaḥ svaritaḥ anudāttasya na udāttasvaritodayam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2527_0: sañjñākaraṇam hi nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2527_1: . laghīyaḥ ca triḥ udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇam na punaḥ sañjñākaraṇam . triḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2527_2: udāttapradeśeṣu svaritagrahaṇe nava akṣarāṇi sañjñākaraṇe punaḥ ekādaśa . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2528: ca sañjñā ca . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . anvarthagrahaṇam vijñāsyate : tasya svaritasya āditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2529: ardhahrasvram udāttasañjñam bhavati iti . ūrdhvam āttam iti ca ataḥ udāttam . yadi tarhi sañjñākaraṇam udāttādeḥ yat ucyate tat svaritādeḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2530: prāpnoti . anvākhyānam eva tarhi idam mandabuddheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2531_1: ūrdhvam udāttādanudāttasyasvaritāt kāryam svaritāt iti siddhyartham . svaritasyārdhahrasvodāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2531_2: ā udāttasvaritaparasyasannataraḥ iti etasmāt sūtrāt idam sūtrakāṇḍam ūrdhvam udāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2531_3: anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti ataḥ kāryam . kim prayojanam . svaritāt iti siddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2531_4: . svaritāt iti siddhiḥ yathā syāt . svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti : imam me
GS24pmbhasuu:2531_5: gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . kva tarhi syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2532_0: . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ : kāryam devadattayajñadattau . svaritodāttārtham ca . svaritodāttārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:2532_1: ca tatra eva kartavyam . na subrahmaṇyāyām svaritasya tu udāttaḥ : indra agaccha
GS24pmbhasuu:2532_2: . kva tarhi syāt . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ : subrahmaṇyom indra agaccha . svaritodāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2532_3: ca asvaritārtham svaritodāttāt ca asvaritārtham tatra eva kartavyam . indra agaccha
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_0: agaccha . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca . svaritaparasannatarārtham ca tatra eva kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_1: . udāttasvaritaparasya sannataraḥ : maṇavaka jaṭilakādhyāpaka nyaṅ . kva tarhi syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_2: . yaḥ siddhaḥ svaritaḥ : maṇavaka jaṭilakābhirūpaka kva . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_3: vaktavyam . devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam jñāpakam svaritāt iti siddhatvasya . devabrahmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2533_4: anudāttavacanam jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha svaritaḥ iti . yadi etat jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2534: svaritodāttaparasya anudāttasya svaritatvam prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttavacanam jñāpakam siddhaḥ iha svaritaḥ iti . kim tarhi . param etat kāṇḍam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2535_0: (P_1,2.33.1) KA_I,210.2-4 Ro_II,53 kim idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ sambuddheḥ grahaṇam : ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2535_1: sambuddhiḥ āhosvit anvarthagrahaṇam : sambodhanam sambuddhiḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2535_2: yadi pāribhāṣikyāḥ devāḥ brahmāṇaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2536: na prāpnoti . atha anvarthagrahaṇam na doṣaḥ . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:2537_0: (P_1,2.33.2) KA_I,210.5-17 Ro_II,53-54 kim punaḥ iyam ekaśrutiḥ udāttā āhosvit anudāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:2537_1: . na udāttā . katham jñāyate . yat ayam uccaistarām vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ iti āha . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2537_2: kṛtvā jñāpakam . atantram taranirdeśaḥ . yāvat uccaiḥ tāvat uccaistarām iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2537_3: tarhi na udāttā anudāttā . anudāttā ca na . katham jñāyate . yat ayam udāttasvaritaparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2538: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . atantram taranirdeśaḥ . yāvat sannaḥ tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:2539: sannataraḥ iti . sā eṣā jñāpakābhyām udāttānudāttayoḥ madhyam ekaśrutiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2540: antarālam hriyate . aparaḥ āha : kim punaḥ iyam ekaśrutiḥ udāttā uta
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_0: anudāttā . udāttā . katham jñāyate . yat ayam uccaistarām vā vaṣaṭkāraḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_1: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tantram taranirdeśaḥ . uccaiḥ dṛṣṭvā uccaistarām iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2541_2: bhavati . yadi tarhi udāttā na anudāttā . anudāttā ca . katham jñāyate . yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2542: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . tantram taranirdeśaḥ . sannam dṛṣṭvā sannataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2543: iti etat bhavati . te ete tantre taranirdeśe sapta svarāḥ bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2544: udāttaḥ , udāttataraḥ , anudāttaḥ , anudāttaraḥ , svaritaḥ , svarite yaḥ udāttaḥ saḥ anyena viśiṣtaḥ , ekaśrutiḥ saptamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2545_0: (P_1,2.37) KA_I,210.19-211.14 Ro_II,55-56 subrahmaṇyāyam okāraḥ udāttaḥ . subrahmaṇyāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2545_1: okāraḥ udāttaḥ bhavati : subrahmaṇyom . ākāraḥ ākhyāte parādiḥ ca . ākāraḥ ākhyāte
GS24pmbhasuu:2545_2: parādiḥ ca udāttaḥ bhavati : indra agaccha . harivaḥ agaccha . vākyādau ca dve dve
GS24pmbhasuu:2545_3: . vākyādau ca dve dve udātte bhavataḥ : indra agaccha . harivaḥ agaccha . maghavanvarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:2546: agaccha maghavan . sutyāparāṇām antaḥ . sutyāparāṇām antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2547_0: : dvyahe sutyam . tryahe sutyam . asau iti antaḥ . asau iti antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2547_1: : gārgyaḥ yajate . vātsyaḥ yajate . amuṣya iti antaḥ . amuṣya iti antaḥ : dākṣeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2547_2: pita yajate . syāntasya upottamam ca . syāntasya upottamam udāttam bhavati antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2547_3: ca . gārgyasya pita yajate . vātsyasya pita yajate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2548: vā nāmadheyasya . vā nāmadheyasya syāntasya upottamam udāttam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2549: devadattasya pita yajate . devadattasya pita yajate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2551: devabrahmaṇoḥ anudāttatvam eke icchanti : devāḥ brahmāṇaḥ . devāḥ brahmāṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2552_0: (P_1,2.39) KA_I,211.19-212.17 Ro_II,57-59 svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2552_1: dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyavacanam . svaritāt saṃhitāyām anudāttānām iti cet dvyekayoḥ aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_0: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . tena bahūnām aikaśrutyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_1: syāt dvyekayoḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2553_2: tena eva nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram
GS24pmbhasuu:2554: syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra bahuvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:2555: nirdeśaḥ kriyate : avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . tat yathā : kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam sapalālam satuṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:2556: āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2557: utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān sakaṇṭakān saśakalān āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2558: evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt bahuvacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam iti cet vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2559: aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam iti cet vyavahitānām aikaśrutyam na prāpnoti : imam me gaṅge yamune sarasvati śutudri . anekam api iti tu vacanāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_0: anekam api ekam api svaritāt param saṃhitāyām ekaśruti bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2560_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam : svaritāt saṃhitāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2561: aikaśrutyavacanam . aviśeṣeṇa aikaśrutyam vyavahitānām aprasiddhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2562: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam anudāttasya ca : anudāttayoḥ ca anudāttānām ca anudāttānām iti . evam api ṣaṭprabhṛtīnām eva prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2563: ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:2565: (P_1,2.41) KA_I,212.19-213.24 Ro_II,59-62 apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2566: ekahal pratyayaḥ apṛktasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2567: svādilope halaḥ agrahaṇārtham . svādilope halaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati : halṅyābbhyaḥ dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti apṛktasya iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2568: siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham algrahaṇam . aṇiñoḥ lugartham algrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2569: kartavyam . kim prayojanam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_0: ṇyakṣatriyārṣañitaḥ yūni luk aṇiñoḥ iti apṛktasya iti eva siddham . aṇiñoḥ lugartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2570_1: iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ . aṇiñoḥ lugartham iti cet ṇe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2571_0: pḥāṇṭāhṛtaḥ iti . ṇavacanasāmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2571_1: vacanam . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet phagnivṛttyartham etat syāt : phak ataḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2571_2: iti . pailādiṣu vacanāt siddham . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt pailādiṣu eva pāṭham
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_0: api phakaḥ nivṛttiḥ bhavati . evam siddhe sati yat ayam ṇam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2572_1: na asya luk bhavati iti . tāni etāni trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām halgrahaṇam
