GS24pmbhasuu:2572_2: kartavyam . svādilope halaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2573_0: kriyamāṇe tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . apṛktasañjñāyām algrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2573_1: . svādilope halaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . aṇiñoḥ luki grahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2573_2: . apṛktagrahaṇam kartavyam . tatra na asti lāghavakṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2573_3: : algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati darviḥ , jāgṛviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2573_4: . al eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2574: . yadi yaḥ al ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt algrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2575: halgrahaṇe api kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2576: darviḥ jāgṛviḥ . hal eva yaḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2577: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . halgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi yaḥ hal ca anyaḥ ca tatra syāt halgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . asti anyat halgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2578_0: prayojanam . kim . halantasya yathā syāt alantasya mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2578_1: sati yat algrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ekagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra varṇagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2578_2: jātigrahaṇam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:2579: prayojanam . dambheḥ halgrahaṇasya jātivācakatvāt siddham iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2580_0: (P_1,2.42) KA_I,214.2-11 Ro_II,62-63 tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2580_1: cet samāsaikārthatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2580_2: cet samāsasya ekārthatvāt sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2580_3: anekārthāśrayam ca sāmānādhikaraṇyam . siddham tu padasāmānādhikaraṇyāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_0: katham . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇapadaḥ karmadhārayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_1: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2581_2: samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti cet samāsaikārthatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2582_0: prāthamakalpikaḥ yasmin aikapadyam aikasvaryam ekavibhaktikatvam ca . asti tādarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2582_1: tācchabdyam ; tatpuruṣārthāni padāni tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tat yaḥ tādarthyāt tācchabdyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2582_2: tasya iha grahaṇam (P_1,2.43.1) KA_I,214.13-22 Ro_II,63-64 prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:2582_3: upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2583: .prathamānirdiṣṭam samāse upasajanam iti cet anirdeśāt prathamāyāḥ samāse sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kaṣṭādīnām samāse prathamām paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2584_0: siddham tu samāsavidhāne vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . samāsavidhāne prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:2584_1: upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā tādarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2584_2: tācchabdyam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2585: tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhavati. samāsārtham śāstram samāsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2587_0: tataḥ anyatra api upasarjanasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . yasya vidhau prathamānirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2587_1: tataḥ anyatra api tasya upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti : rajñaḥ kumārīm rājakumārīm śritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2587_2: . śritādisamāse dvitīyāntam prathamānirdiṣṭam . tasya ṣaṣṭhīsamāse api upasarjanasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2588: siddham tu yasya vidhau tam prati iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_0: yasya vidhau yat prathamānirdiṣṭam tam prati tat upasarjanasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . upasarjanam iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2589_2: ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2590: laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . apradhānam upasarjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2591: pradhānam upasarjanam iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau . tatra sambandhāt etat
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_0: gantavyam : yam prati yat apradhānam tam prati tat upasarjanasñjñam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2592_1: atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante kasmāt tatra pradhānasya upasarjanasañjñā na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2593: ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ upasarjanatve uktam . kim uktam . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ iti . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_0: upsarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_1: . yadi api tāvat etat upasarjanakāryam parihṛtam idam aparam prāpnoti . rājñaḥ kumāryāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_2: rājakumāryāḥ . gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2594_3: . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2597: upasarjanasañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra apūrvanipāte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2598: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2599: pūrvanipāte na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam : yat anyat pūrvanipātāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2600: iti . pūrvanipāte avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena cit prāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2601: pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . tena bhaviṣyati . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2603: ekavibhaktau aṣaṣṭhyantānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : ardham pippalyāḥ ardhapippalī iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2604: śabdaśardārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam . ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2605: (P_1,2.44.3) KA_I,216.12-16 Ro_II,68 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam dviguprāptāpannālampūrvopasargāḥ ktārthe . dviguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2606_0: : pañcabhiḥ gobhiḥ krītaḥ pañcaguḥ . prāptāpanna : prāptaḥ jivikām prāptajīvikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2606_1: . āpannaḥ jīvikām āpannajīvikaḥ . alampūrva : alam kumāryai alaṅkumāriḥ . upasargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2608: varṇānām ca mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vanam , dhanam iti nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_0: prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . adhātuḥ iti kimartham . ahan vṛtram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_1: . adhātuḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati ahan vṛtram iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_2: jñāpayati na dhātoḥ prātipadikasañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2609_3: iti dhātugrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2610: jñāpakam . pratiṣiddhārtham etat syāt : api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2611: apratyayaḥ iti kimartham . kāṇḍe kuḍye . apratyayaḥ iti śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2612: kasmāt na bhavati kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti . kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2613_1: prātipadikasañjñāyām anekasya api padasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti : daśa dāḍimāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2614: palalapiṇḍaḥ adhorukam etat kumāryāḥ sphaiyakṛtasya pitā pratiśīnaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2615_0: samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavārthavattvāt samudāyārthavattvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2615_1: yathā loke . samudāyaḥ anarthakaḥ iti cet avayavaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ samudāyāḥ api arthavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2615_2: bhavanti yathā loke . tat yathā loke āḍhyam idam nagaram , gomat idam nagaram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2616: āḍhyāḥ bhavanti sarve vā gomantaḥ . yathā loke iti ucyate loke ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na samudāyaḥ . ātaḥ ca avayavāḥ eva arthavantaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2617: samudāyaḥ . yasya hi tat dravyam bhavati saḥ tena kāryam karoti yasya ca gāvaḥ santi saḥ tāsām kṣīram ghṛtam ca upabhuṅkte . anyaiḥ etat draṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:2618_0: api aśakyam . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ : āḍhyam idam nagaram , gomat idam iti . eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:2618_1: eṣā vācoyuktiḥ : iha tāvat āḍhyam idam nagaram iti akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ : āḍhyāḥ asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2618_2: santi iti tat idam āḍhyam iti . gomat idam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2619: matvantāt matvarthīyaḥ lupyate . evam api vākyapratiṣedhaḥ arthavattvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2620: vākyasya prātipadikasñjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : devadatta gām abhyāja
GS24pmbhasuu:2621: śuklām . devadatta gām abhyāja kṛṣṇām iti . kim kāraṇam . arthavattvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_0: arthavat hi etat vākyam bhavati . na vai padārthāt anyasya arthasya upalabdhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_1: vākye . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_2: . padārthāt anyasya anupalabdhiḥ iti cet evam ucyate : padārthābhisambandhasya upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_3: bhavati vākye . iha devadatta iti ukte kartā nirdiṣṭaḥ karma kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:2622_4: . gām iti ukte karma nirdiṣṭam kartā kriyāguṇau ca anirdiṣṭau . abhyāja iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_0: kriyā nirdiṣṭā kartṛkarmaṇī guṇaḥ ca anirdiṣṭaḥ . śuklām iti ukte guṇaḥ nirdiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_1: kartṛkarmaṇī kriyā ca anirdiṣṭā . iha idānīm devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_2: sarvam nirdiṣṭam bhavati : devadattaḥ eva kartā na anyaḥ . gauḥ eva karma na anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:2623_3: . abhyājiḥ eva kriyā na anyā . śuklām eva na kṛṣṇām iti . eteṣām padānām sāmānye
GS24pmbhasuu:2624: saḥ vākyārthaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_0: arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : samāsaḥ eva arthavatām
GS24pmbhasuu:2625_1: samudāyāyānām prātipadikasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2626_0: bahupaṭavaḥ , uccakaiḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2626_1: iti svādyutpattiḥ yathā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva atra aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2626_2: na bhavati evam luk api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_0: . tatra yā eva antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ tasyāḥ eva śravaṇam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_1: . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . bahupaṭavaḥ iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_2: iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ : citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . tasyām punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_3: luptāyam yā anyā vibhaktiḥ utpadyate tasyāḥ prakṛtyanekadeśatvāt antodāttatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_4: bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_5: prātipadikasañjñā iti yat ayam aprayayaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . saḥ ca tadantapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2627_6: . saḥ tarhi jñāpakārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca ayam prāptyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2628: kṛttaddhitagrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : kṛttaddhitāntasya eva pratyayāntasya prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati na anyasya pratyayāntasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2629_0: . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ pratyayapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2629_1: prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā . ubhayam na vaktavyam . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2631: suptiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā ārabhyate : jahi karmaṇā bahulam ābhīkṣṇye kartāram ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2632: abhidadhāti iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : etasya eva suptiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_0: tiṅsamudāyasya tarhi prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti . tiṅsamudāyasya api prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_1: ārabhyate : ākhyātam ākhyātena kriyāsātatye iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati : etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2633_2: eva tiṅsamudāyasya prātipadikasañjñā bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2635: kevalena avacanāt . arthavattā na upapadyate vṛkṣaśabdasya . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2636: kevalena avacanāt . na kevalena vṛkṣaśabdena arthaḥ gamyate . kena tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_0: sapratyayakena . na vā pratyayena nityasambandhāt kevalasya aprayogaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2637_1: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratyayena nityasambandhāt . nityasambandhau etau arthau prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_0: aprayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati . anyat bhavān pṛṣṭaḥ anyat ācaṣṭe . āmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārān
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_1: ācaṣṭe . arthavattā na upapadyate kevalena avacanāt iti bhavān asmābhiḥ coditaḥ kevalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_2: aprayoge hetum āha . evam ca kila nāma kṛtvā codyate : samudāyasya arthe prayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2638_3: avayavānām aprasiddhiḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2639: kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ śrūyate : vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ sakārāntaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2640: cit gamyate : mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān ekatvam ca . vṛkṣau iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : sakāraḥ hīyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_0: aukāraḥ upajāyate vṛkṣaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ anvayī . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_1: upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : ekatvam hīyate dvitvam upajāyate mūlaskandhaphalapalāśavān
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_2: anvayī . te manyāmahe : yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2641_3: śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2642: viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2643: indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ , kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na
GS24pmbhasuu:2644: sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na brūmaḥ arthavattā na sidhyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_0: .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat : ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_1: ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_2: . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_3: viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cid
GS24pmbhasuu:2645_4: arthe pratītiḥ upajāyate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_0: (P_1,2.45.4) KA_I,220.9-24 Ro_II,79-80 kim punaḥ ime varṇāḥ arthavantaḥ āhosvit anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_1: . varṇasya arthavadanarthakatve uktam . kim uktam . arthavantaḥ varṇāḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_2: ekavarṇānām arthadarśanāt . varṇavyatyaye ca arthāntaragamanāt . varṇānupalabdhau
GS24pmbhasuu:2646_3: ca anarthagateḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt subabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2648: varṇavyatyayāpāyopajanavikāreṣu arthadarśanāt iti . tatra idam aparihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2649: : saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti . tasya parihāraḥ . saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ hiatadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2650: saṅghātārthavattvāt ca iti cet dṛśyate hi punaḥ atadarthena guṇena guṇinaḥ arthabhāvaḥ . tat yathā . ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_0: kambalaḥ samarthaḥ . ekaḥ taṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca vardhatikam
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_1: samarthaḥ . ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane asamarthaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ ca rajjuḥ samarthā
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_2: bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca arthamātrā . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_3: hi kim cit prati ekaḥ tantuḥ tvaktrāṇe samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca taṇḍulaḥ kṣutpratighāte
GS24pmbhasuu:2651_4: samarthaḥ ekaḥ ca balvajaḥ bandhane samarthaḥ . ime punaḥ varṇāḥ atyantāya eva anarthakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2652: yathā tarhi rathāṅgāni vihṛtāni pratyekam vrajikriyām prati asamarthāni bhavanti tatsamudāyaḥ ca rathaḥ samarthaḥ evam eṣām varṇānām samudāyāḥ arthavantaḥ avayavāḥ anarthakāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2653: (P_1,2.45.5) KA_I,220.25-221.10 Ro_II,81-82 nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikasañjñā vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2654: khañjati nikhañjati lambate pralambate . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_0: prātipadikasañjñayā prārthyate . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ , subantam padam
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_1: iti padasañjñā , padasya padāt iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_2: . satyām api prātipadikasañjñāyām svādyutpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:2655_3: prātipadikasañjñāyām eva svādyutpattiḥ pratibaddhā . kim tarhi . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2656: eṣām ekatvādayaḥ santi . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa utpadyante . utpannānām niyamaḥ kriyate . atha vā prakṛtārthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_0: ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva arthe ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_1: na ekasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva artheṣu bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2657_2: atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati anarthakānām api
GS24pmbhasuu:2658: eteṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti yat ayam adhiparī* anarthakau iti anarthakayoḥ gatyupasargasañjābādhikām karmapravacanīyasañjñām śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2659: (P_1,2.45.6) KA_I,221.11-222.7 Ro_II,82-85 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2660: yat anyat pratyayāt āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ : pratyayaḥ na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_0: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt . apratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_1: iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : kāṇḍe kuḍye . kim kāraṇam . antavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_2: . tibatipoḥ ekādeśaḥ atipaḥ antavat syāt . asti anyat tipaḥ iti kṛtvā prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_3: prāpnoti . astu tarhi prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ : pratyayaḥ na iti . na pratyayaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2661_4: ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt . na pratyayaḥ iti cet ūṅekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_0: prāpnoti : brahmabandhūḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādivattvāt . pratyayāpratyayayoḥ pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_1: ādivat syāt . tatra pratyayaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_2: jñāpayati utpadyante ūṅantāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_3: pratiṣedham śāśti . atha vā dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe : avayavasya api samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_4: api . tatra avayavasya yā prātipadikasañjñā tayā antavadbhāvāt svādyutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_5: . sublope ca pratyayalakṣaṇatvāt . sublope ca pratyayalakṣaṇena pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2662_6: : rājā takṣā . pratyayalakṣaṇena pratyayaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_0: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na pratyayalakṣaṇena pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_1: iti yat ayam na ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_2: . nanu ca uktam : apratyayaḥ iti cet tibekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ antavattvāt iti . prasajyapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_3: api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe : avayavasya api samudāyasya api .
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_4: gṛhyate ca prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ ekādeśaḥ prātipadikagrahaṇena . tasmāt ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2663_5: api vaktavyam syāt : hrasvaḥ napuṃsake yat tasya iti . kim ca napuṃsake .
GS24pmbhasuu:2664: napuṃsakam yasya guṇaḥ . kasya ca napuṃsakam guṇaḥ . prātipadikasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:2666: samāsagrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . arthavatsamudāyānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2667: (P_1,2.47.1) KA_I,222.13-223.11 Ro_II,85-88 prātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . napuṃsakahrasvatve prātipadikagrahaṇam tibnivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2669: tibantasya hrasvatvam mā bhūt : kāṇḍe kuḍye . ramate brāhmaṇakulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2670_0: avyayapratiṣedhaḥ . avyayānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : doṣā brāhmaṇakulam divā brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:2670_1: iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra avyayam napuṃsake vartate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2671: napuṃsakasya . iha tarhi prāpnoti : kāṇḍībhūtam vṛṣalakulam , kuḍyībhūtam vṛṣalakulam iti . na vā liṅgābhāvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2672: liṅgābhāvāt . aliṅgam avyayam . kim punaḥ ayam avyayasya eva parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2673: āhosvit tibantasya api . tibantasya api iti āha . katham . avyayam hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:2674: cit vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . uccaiḥ, nīcaiḥ iti vibhaktyarthapradhānam , hiruk pṛthak iti kriyāpradhānam . tibantam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_0: kim cit vibhaktyarthapradhānam kim cit kriyāpradhānam . kāṇḍe kuḍye* iti vibhaktarthyapradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_1: , ramate brāhmaṇakulam iti kriyāpradhānam . na ca etayoḥ arthayoḥ liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_2: yogaḥ asti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . kriyamāṇe api hi prātipadikagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2675_3: iha prasajyeta : kāṇḍe kuḍye . dve hi atra prātipadikasañjñe avayavasya api samudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2677: tasmāt ubhābhyām api vaktavyam syāt : hrasvaḥ napuṃsake yat tasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2678: kim ca napuṃsake . napuṃsakam yasya guṇaḥ . kasya ca napuṃsakam guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2680: (P_1,2.47.2) KA_I,223.12-16 Ro_II,88 yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2682: yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . bahiraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:2684: upasarjanahrasvatve ca . kim . yañekādeśadīrghaittveṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : atikhaṭvāya atikhaṭvārtham atikhaṭvebhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2685: upasarjanahrasvatve ca . kim . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2686: bahiraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:2687: (P_1,2.48.2) KA_I,223.22-225.14 Ro_II,89-94 goṭāṅgrahaṇam kṛnnivṛttyartham . goṭāṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim idam ṭāṅ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2688: pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . ṭāpaḥ prabhṛti ā
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_0: ṣyaṅaḥ ṅakārāt . kim prayojanam . kṛnnivṛttyartham . kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_1: mā bhūt iti : atitantrīḥ , atiśrīḥ , atilakṣmīḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2689_2: . strīgrahaṇam svaryate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati . striyām iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2690: teṣām grahaṇam vijñāsyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2691: bhavati . yadi evam pratyayagrahaṇam idam bhavati . tatra pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti : atirājakumāriḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2692_0: atisenānīkumāriḥ iti . astrīpratyayena iti evam tat . īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2692_1: . īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahvyaḥ śreyasyaḥ asya bahuśreyasī vidyamānaśreyasī
GS24pmbhasuu:2693_0: gosamāsanivṛttyartham . pūrvapadasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_0: samāsanivṛttyartham : rājakumārīputraḥ , senānīkumārīputraḥ iti . kim ucyate samāsanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2694_1: iti na punaḥ asamāsaḥ api kim cit pūrvapadam yadarthaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt . stryantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2695: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca antareṇa samāsam stryantam prātipadikam upasarjanam asti . nanu ca idam asti : khaṭvāpādaḥ , mālāpādaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2696: ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2697: gonivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ . gontasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2698: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate na ca etat gontam . nanu ca etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena gontam . vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2699_0: samāsanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ . stryantasya prātipadikasya upasarjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2699_1: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . pradhānam upasarjanam iti ca sambandhiśabdau etau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2699_2: tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam : yam prati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_0: apradhānam tasya cet saḥ antaḥ bhavati iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_1: api hi pratiṣedhe iha prasajyeta : pañca kumāryaḥ priyāḥ asya pañcakumārīpriyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2700_2: daśakumārīpriyaḥ iti . kapi ca . kapi ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_0: vaktavyaḥ : bahukumārīkaḥ , bahuvṛṣalīkaḥ . dvandve ca . dvandve ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_1: : kukkuṭamayūryau . uktam vā . kim uktam . kapi tāvat uktam : na kapi iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_2: iti . na etat asti uktam . ke aṇaḥ iti yā hrasvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_3: etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_4: . yaḥ hi manyate yā ca yāvatīca hrasvaprāptiḥ tasyāḥ sarvasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_5: api tasya pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta : priyam grāmaṇi brāhmaṇakulam asya priyagrāmaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_6: . idam tarhi uktam : kapi kṛte anantyatvāt hrasvatvam na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_7: : kap kriyatām hrasvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kap . antaraṅgam hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_8: . antaraṅgataraḥ kap . nanu ca ayam kap samāsāntaḥ ici ucyate . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_9: bhaviṣyati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ na tāvat teṣām anyat bhavati . kapam tāvat pratīkṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:2701_10: . dvandve api uktam . kim uktam . paravat liṅgam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2702: śabdaśabdārthau iti . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2703_0: (P_1,2.49) KA_I,225.16-23 Ro_II,95 taddhitaluki avantyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:2703_1: avantyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : avantī kuntī kurūḥ . taddhitaluki avantyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_0: taddhitaluki avantyādīnām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . luk
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_1: kasmāt na bhavati . alukparatvāt . luki iti ucyate . na ca atra lukam paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2704_2: luki iti na eṣā parasaptamī śakyā vijñātum . na hi lukā paurvāparyam asti . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2705: satsaptamī cet prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . upasarjanasya iti vartate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2706: (P_1,2.50) KA_I,226.2-18 Ro_II,96-98 it goṇyāḥ na iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2707: goṇyāḥ na iti eva vaktavyam . na arthaḥ ittvena . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2708: pañcagoṇiḥ , daśagoṇiḥ . hrasvatā hi vidhīyate . hrasvatvam atra vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_0: : gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti . iti vā vacane tāvat . it iti vā ucyeta na iti vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_1: kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . mātrārtham vā kṛtam bhavet . atha vā mātrārtham idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2709_2: : goṇīmātram idam goṇiḥ . aparaḥ āha : goṇyāḥ ittvam prakaraṇāt . aśiṣyam goṇyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2710_0: prakṛtam hrasvatvam . hrasvaḥ iti vartate . nanu sūcyāḥ . sūcyādyartham atha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2710_1: vā . sūcyādyartham idam draṣṭavyam : pañcasūciḥ , daśasūcīḥ . it goṇyāḥ na iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2710_2: hrasvatā hi vidhīyate iti vā vacane tāvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2711: mātrārtham vā kṛtam bhavet || goṇyāḥ ittvam prakaraṇāt . sūcyādyartham atha api vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2712: (P_1,2.51.1) KA_I,226.20-227.10 Ro_II,98-100 vyaktivacane iti kimartham . śirīṣāṇām adūrabhavaḥ grāmaḥ śirīṣāḥ . tasya grāmasya vanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2713: śirīṣavanam . kim ca syāt . vibhāṣā oṣadhivanaspatibhyaḥ iti ṇatvam prasajyeta . aparaḥ āha : kaṭubadaryāḥ adūrabhavaḥ grāmaḥ kaṭubadarī .
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_0: ṣaṣṭhī yuktavadbhāvena mā bhūt iti . atha vyaktivacane iti api ucyamāne kasmāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_1: atra na bhavati . ṣaṣṭhī api hi vacanam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_2: . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam : ucyate vacanam iti . evam api ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2714_3: ṣaṣṭhī api hi ucyate . lupā uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2715_0: aprayogaḥ iti . ātideśikī tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi prāk api vṛtteḥ yuktam vṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:2715_1: ca api . iha yāvatā yuktam vaktuḥ ca kāmacāraḥ prāk vṛtteḥ liṅgasaṅkhye ye . prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:2715_2: api vṛtteḥ yuktam vanaspatibhiḥ nagaram vṛttam ca api yuktam vanaspatibhiḥ nagaram
GS24pmbhasuu:2716: kāmacāraḥ ca prayoktuḥ prāk vṛtteḥ ye liṅgasaṅkhye te* atideṣṭum vṛttasya vā ye liṅgasaṅkhye . yāvatā kārmacāraḥ vṛttasya ye liṅgasaṅkhye te*
GS24pmbhasuu:2718: (P_1,2.51.2) KA_I,227.11-26 Ro_II,100-102 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2719: . anyatra abhidheyavyaktivacanabhāvāt lupi yuktavadanudeśaḥ . anyatra abhidheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . kva anyatra . luki : lavaṇaḥ supaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2720: lavaṇā yavāguḥ , lavaṇam śākam iti . anyatra abhidheyavat liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2721: bhavanti luki. iha api anyatra abhidheyavat liṅgavacanāni prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2722: iṣyante ca abhidhānavat syuḥ iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti lupi yuktavadanudeśaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:2723: kim tarhi iti . lupaḥ adarśanasañjñitvāt arthagatiḥ na upapadyate . lup nāma iyam adarśanasya sañjñā kriyate . na ca adarśanasya liṅgasaṅkhye
GS24pmbhasuu:2724: śakyete* atideṣṭum . lupaḥ adarśanasañjñitvāt arthagatiḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2725: na vā adarśanasya aśakyatvāt arthagatiḥ sāhacaryāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2726: kim kāraṇam . adarśanasya aśakyatvāt . adarśanasya liṅgasaṅkhye* aśakye*
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_0: atideṣṭum iti kṛtvā adarśanasahacaritaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_1: . yogābhāvāt ca anyasya . adarśanena ca yogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā adarśanasahacaritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2727_2: yaḥ arthaḥ tasya gatiḥ bhaviṣyati sāhacaryāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2729: lupaḥ . samāse uttarapadasya bahuvacanasya lupaḥ yuktavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2730: : madhurāpañcālāḥ . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . samāse uttarapadasya eva . kva mā bhūt . pañcālamadhure* iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2731_0: (P_1,2.52.1) KA_I,228.5-10 Ro_II,102-103 katham idam vijñāyate : jātiḥ yat viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2731_1: iti āhosvit jāteḥ yāni viśeṣaṇāni iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate jātiḥ yat viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2732_0: subhikṣaḥ sampannapānīyaḥ bahumālyaphalaḥ iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate jāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2732_1: yāni viśeṣaṇāni iti siddham subhikṣaḥ sampannapānīyaḥ bahumālyaphalaḥ iti . pañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2732_2: janapadaḥ iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:2733: evam vijñāyate jātiḥ yat viśeṣaṇam iti na api jāteḥ yāni viśeṣaṇāni iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2734: katham tarhi . viśeṣaṇānām yuktavadbhāvaḥ bhavati ā jātiprayogāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2735: (P_1,2.52.2) KA_I,228.11-21 Ro_II,103-104 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2736: . viśeṣaṇānām vacanam jātinivṛttyartham . jātinivṛttyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2737: . kim ucyate jātinivṛttyarthaḥ iti na punaḥ viśeṣaṇānām api yuktavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2738_0: yathā syāt iti . samānādhikaraṇatvāt siddham . samānādhikaraṇatvāt viśeṣaṇānām yuktavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2738_1: bhaviṣyati . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . lupaḥ anyatra api jāteḥ yuktavadbhāvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2738_2: bhavati . kva anyatra . badarī sūkṣmakaṇṭakā madhurā vṛkṣaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2739_0: yuktavadbhāvaḥ na bhavati . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:2739_1: ā vināśāt na tat liṅgam jahāti . na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2739_2: ca . kim prayojanam . idam tatra tatra ucyate guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2742: harītakyādiṣu vyaktiḥ bhavati yuktavadbhāvena : harītakyāḥ phalāni harītakyaḥ phalāni . khalatikādiṣu vacanam . khalatikādiṣu vacanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2743: yuktavadbhāvena : khalatikasya parvatasya adūrabhavāni vanāni khalatikam vanāni . manuṣyalupi pratiṣedhaḥ . manuṣyalupi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:2745: (P_1,2.53) KA_I,229.7-8 Ro_II,106 kim yāḥ etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighubhādisañjñāḥ tatprāmāṇyāt aśiṣyam . na iti āha . sañjñānam sañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:2746_0: (P_1,2.58) KA_I,229.10-230.21 Ro_II,106-109 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2746_1: . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . tat yat ekavacane śāsitavye bahuvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2746_2: śiṣyate etat ayuktam . bahuṣu ekavacanam iti nāma vaktavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:2746_3: : jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam . jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2746_4: bhaviṣyati . yat tat vrīhau vrīhitvam yave yavatvam gārgye gārgyatvam tat ekam tac
GS24pmbhasuu:2746_5: ca vivakṣitam . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . iṣyate ca bahuvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2747: syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti jātyākhyāyam ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_0: bahuvacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_1: ekavacanādeśe uktam . kim uktam . vrīhibhyaḥ āgataḥ iti atra gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2748_2: prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthātideśāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2749_0: arthātideśaḥ ayam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2749_1: : ucyate vacanam . bahūnām arthānām vacanam bahuvacanam iti . yāvat brūyāt ekaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2750_0: bahuvacanam iti . saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ . saṅkhyāprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2750_1: . ekaḥ vrīhiḥ sampannaḥ subhikṣam karoti . asmadaḥ nāmayuvapratyayayoḥ ca . asmadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2750_2: nāmaprayoge yuvapratyayaprayoge ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nāmaprayoge : aham devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2750_3: bravīmi . aham yajñadattaḥ bravīmi . yuvapratyayaprayoge : ahaṃ gārgyāyaṇaḥ bravīmi
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_0: aham vātsyāyanaḥ bravīmi . yuvagrahaṇena nārthaḥ . asmadaḥ nāmapratyayaprayoge na
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_1: iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati : aham gārgyaḥ bravīmi . aham vātsyaḥ bravīmi
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_2: . aparaḥ āha : asmadaḥ saviśeṣaṇasya prayoge na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_3: : aham paṭuḥ bravīmi . aham paṇḍitaḥ bravīmi . aśiṣyam vā bahuvat pṛthakttvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2751_4: . aśiṣyaḥ vā bahuvadbhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pṛthaktvābhidhānāt . pṛthaktvena hi dravyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:2752_0: abhidhīyante . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam . kim ucyate pṛthaktvābhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2752_1: iti yāvatā idānīm eva uktam : jātyākhyāyām sāmānyābhidhānāt aikārthyam iti . jātiśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:2753: jātiśabdena hi dravyam api abhidhīyate jātiḥ api . katham punaḥ jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2754: jātiśabdena dravyam api abhidhīyate iti . evam hi kaḥ cit mahati gomaṇḍale
GS24pmbhasuu:2755: gopālakam āsīnam pṛcchati : asti atra kām cid gām paśyasi iti . saḥ paśyati : paśyati ca ayam gāḥ pṛcchati ca kām cid atra gām paśyasi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2756: nūnam asya dravyam vivakṣitam iti . tat yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā sāmānyābhidhānam tadā ekavacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_0: (P_1,2.59) KA_I,230.23-231.2 Ro_II,109-110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_1: aham bravīmi , āvām brūvaḥ , vayam brūmaḥ . imāni indriyāṇi kadā cit svātantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_2: vivakṣitāni bhavanti . tat yathā : idam me akṣi suṣṭhu paśyati . ayam me karṇaḥ suṣṭhu
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_3: śṛṇoti iti . kadā cit pāratantryeṇa anena akṣṇā suṣṭhu paśyāmi . anena karṇena suṣṭhu
GS24pmbhasuu:2757_4: śṛṇomi iti . tat yadā svātantryeṇa vivakṣā tadā bahuvacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā pāratantryeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2758: (P_1,2.60) KA_I,231.4-7 Ro_II,110 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_0: katham udite pūrve phalgunyau , uditāḥ pūrvāḥ phalgunyaḥ , udite pūrve proṣṭhapade
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_1: , uditāḥ pūrvāḥ proṣṭhapadāḥ . phalgunīsampīpagate candramasi phalgunīśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:2759_2: . bahavaḥ te arthāḥ . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2760: yadā tayoḥ eva abhidhānam tadā dvivacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2761: (P_1,2.61-62) KA_I,231.10-12 Ro_II,110 imau api yogau śakyau avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2762: katham . punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2763: punarvasuviśākhayoḥ supām sulukpūrvasavarṇa iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_0: . kṛttikārohiṇyaḥ . nakṣatra iti kimartham . tiṣyaḥ ca māṇavakaḥ punarvasū maṇavakau
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_1: tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ . atha nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_2: . ayam tiṣyapunarvasuśabdaḥ asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . asti ca kālavācī . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_3: : bahavaḥ tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ atikrāntāḥ . katareṇa tiṣyeṇa gataḥ iti . tat yaḥ jyotiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_4: vartate tasya idam grahaṇam . atha vā nakṣatre iti vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatragrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2765_5: etat prayojanam : videśastham api tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ kāryam tat api
GS24pmbhasuu:2766: nakṣatrasya eva yathā syāt : tiṣyapuṣyayoḥ nakṣatrāṇi yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti nakṣatragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atha vā atha vā nakṣatre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2767: vartamāne punaḥ nakṣatra grahaṇasya etat prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_0: tiṣyapunarvasuparyāyavācinām api yathā syāt : puṣyapunarvasū sidhyapunarvasū . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2768_1: dvandve iti kimartham . yaḥ tiṣyaḥ tau punarvasū yeṣām te ime tiṣyapunarvasavaḥ unmugdhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2769_0: uditam tiṣyapunarvasū . katham ca atra ekavacanam . jātidvandvaḥ ekavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2769_1: . aprāṇinām iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat bahuvacanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2769_2: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ : sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā ekavat bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2770: bābhravaśālaṅkāyanam bābhravaśālaṅkāyanāḥ iti etat siddham bhavati . atha vā na atra bhavantaḥ prāṇināḥ . prāṇāḥ eva atra bhavantaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2772: samānānām ekaśeṣa ekavibhaktau iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva sarvam samānam śabdaḥ arthaḥ ca tatra eva syāt : vṛkṣāḥ , plakṣāḥ iti . iha na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2773: akṣāḥ ,. pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti . rūpagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2774_0: . rūpam nimittatvena āśrīyate śrutau ca rūpagrahaṇam . atha ekagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2774_1: . sarūpāṇām śeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti iyati ucyamāne dvibahvoḥ api śeṣaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2774_2: . ekagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śeṣagrahaṇam kimartham . sarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2775: ādeśaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . aśvaḥ ca asvaḥ ca aśvau :
GS24pmbhasuu:2776: āntaryataḥ dvyudāttavataḥ sthāninaḥ dvyudāttavān ādeśaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:2777: lopyalopitā ca na prakalpeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . gargāḥ , vatsāḥ , bidāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2778: urvāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2779: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt. : kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2780: ekavibhaktau iti kimartham . payaḥ payaḥ jarayati . vāsaḥ vāsaḥ chādayati
GS24pmbhasuu:2781: . brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2783: ucyate . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2784_0: pratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante . kim idam pratyartham iti . artham artham prati
GS24pmbhasuu:2784_1: pratyartham . pratyartham śābdaniveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt na ekena śabdena anekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2784_2: arthasya abhidhānam prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_0: tatra anekārthābhidhāne anekaśabdatvam . tatra anekārthābhidhāne anekaśabdatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_1: . iṣyate ca ekena api anekasya abhidhānam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2785_2: . tasmāt ekaśeṣaḥ . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2786_0: śabdāḥ abhiniveśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2786_1: apratyartham śabdāḥ abhiniviśante iti etam dṛṣṭāntam āsthāya virūpāṇām anekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2786_2: ārabhyate . tatra etat syāt : laghīyasī sarūpanivṛttirḥ garīyasī virūpapratipattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2786_3: iti . tat ca na . laghīyasī virūpapratipattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . yatra hi bahūnām sarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2787: tatra avarataḥ dvayoḥ sarūpayoḥ nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā syāt . evam api etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2788: sati kim cit ācāryaḥ sukaratarakam manyate . sukaratarakam ca ekaśeṣārambham manyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2790: ekavibhaktau ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . ekavibhaktau iti cet na abhāvād vibhakteḥ . ekavibhaktau iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2791: abhāvāt vibhakteḥ . na hi samudāyāt parā vibhaktiḥ asti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2792: aprātipadikatvāt . nanu ca arthavat prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2793: bhaviṣyati . niyamāt na prāpnoti . arthavatsamudayānām samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām vibhaktiparāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2794_0: ucyeta . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ tadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2794_1: . pṛthak sarveṣām iti cet ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ prāpnoti . kim ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2794_2: ekaśeṣe pṛthak vibhaktyupalabdhiḥ iti yāvatā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ : na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_0: tadāśrayatvāt prāpnoti . yatra hi prakṛtinimittā pratyayanivṛttiḥ tatra apratyayikāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_1: prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ bhavati agnicit somasut iti yathā . yatra ca pratyayanimittā prakṛtinivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2795_2: tatra aprakṛtikasya pratyayasya prayogaḥ bhavati adhunā , iyān iti yathā . astu saṃyogāntalopena
GS24pmbhasuu:2796_0: kutaḥ nu khalu etat parayoḥ vṛkṣaśabdayoḥ nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ pūrvayoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2796_1: . tatra etat syāt : pūrvanivṛttav api satyām saṃyogādilopena siddham iti . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2796_2: . tatra avarataḥ dvayoḥ sakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta. yatra ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:2796_3: asti tatra ca na sidhyati . kva ca saṃyogāntalopaḥ na asti . dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_0: ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:2797_1: tarhi samāsagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2798: dvivacanam nityam iti . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . samāse iti cet svarasamāsānteṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . svara : aśvaḥ ca aśvaḥ ca aśvau.
GS24pmbhasuu:2799: samāsāntodāttatve kṛte ekaśeṣaḥ prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2800: samāsāntodāttattvam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samāsāntodāttatvam . samāsāntodāttatve ca doṣaḥ bhavati . svara .
GS24pmbhasuu:2801_0: samāsānta : ṛk ca ṛk ca ṛcau . samāsānte kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2801_1: iha sampradhāryam : samāsāntaḥ kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2802: aṅgāśraye ca ekaśeṣavacanam . aṅgāśraye ca kārye ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2803_0: svasā ca svasārau ca svasāraḥ . aṅgāśraye kṛte asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2803_1: iha sampradhāryam : aṅgāśrayam kriyatām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2804: tiṅsamāse tiṅsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekam tiṅgrahaṇam anarthakam . samāse tiṅsamāsaḥ iti eva siddham . na anarthakam . tiṅsamāse prakṛte tiṅsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2805: vaktavyaḥ . tiṅvidhipratiṣedhaḥ ca . tiṅ ca kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ kaḥ cit pratiṣedhyaḥ . pacati ca pacati ca pacataḥ : taḥśabdaḥ vidheyaḥ tiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2806: pratiṣedhyaḥ . yadi punaḥ asamāse ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . asamāse vacanalopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2807_0: yadi asamāse vacanalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca utpatatā eva vacanalopam coditāḥ smaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2807_1: . dvivacanabahuvacanavidhim dvandvapratiṣedham ca vakṣyati tadartham punaḥ codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_0: dvivacanabahuvacanāni vidheyāni : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_1: vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca . dvandvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_2: : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . cārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_3: dvandvaḥ iti dvandvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_4: . sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . yadi punaḥ pṛthak sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_5: vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2808_6: bhavati . vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣe vibhaktyantānām eva tu
GS24pmbhasuu:2809: pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . ekavibhaktyantānām iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . pṛthagvibhaktipratiṣedhārtham . pṛthagvibhaktyantānām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:2810: : brāhmaṇābhyām ca kṛtam brāhmaṇābhyām ca dehi . na vā arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2811: yugapadvacanābhāvaḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthavipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2812: . vipratiṣiddhau etau arthau kartā saṃpradānam iti aśakyau yugapat nirdeṣṭum . tayoḥ vipratiṣiddhatvāt yugapadvacanam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2813: anekārthāśrayaḥ ca punaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate . tasmāt na ekaśabdatvam . tasmāt ekaśabdatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2814: bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ : kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2815_0: dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . yadi punaḥ prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2815_1: ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vacanalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ bhavati . prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:2816: prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : mātā ca janayitrī mātārau ca dhānyasya mātṛmātāraḥ . kim kāraṇam . sarūpatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2817_0: sarūpāṇi hi etāni prātipadikāni . kim ucyate prātipadikānām ekaśeṣe mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2817_1: vaktavyaḥ iti na punaḥ yasya api vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ tena api mātṛmātroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2818: etāni kva cit vibhaktyantāni sarūpāṇi : mātṛbhyām ca mātṛbhyāṃ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2819: atha matam etat vibhaktyantānām sārūpye bhavitavyam eva ekaśeṣeṇa iti prātipadikānām eva ekaśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā codyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2822: haritasya strī hariṇī hariṇasya api hariṇī , hariṇī ca hariṇī ca hariṇyau . śyetasya strī śyenī śyenasya api śyenī , śyenī ca śyenī ca śyenyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_0: rohitasya strī rohiṇī rohiṇasya api rohiṇī , rohiṇī ca rohiṇī ca rohiṇyau . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_1: padasya arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_2: . padam arthe prayujyate vibhaktyantam ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate . rūpanirgrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2823_3: ca śabdasya na antareṇa laukikam prayogam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2824: tasmin ca laukike prayoge sarūpāṇi etāni . aparaḥ āha : na vā padasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2825: arthe prayogāt . na vā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ eva asti prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2826: kim kārāṇam . padasya arthe prayogāt . padam arthe prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_0: vibhaktyantam ca padam . rūpam ca iha āśrīyate rūpanirgrahaḥ ca śabdasya na antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_1: laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca laukike prayoge prātipadikānām prayogaḥ na asti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_2: anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt : prātipadikānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . kim vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2827_3: etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_0: ekavibhaktau iti . katham . vibhaktiḥ sārūpyeṇa āśrīyate . anaimittikaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_1: . ekavibhaktau yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . kva . yatra vā tatra vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_2: . atha anena pakṣeṇa arthaḥ syāt : vibhaktyantānām ekaśeṣaḥ iti . bāḍham arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_3: kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api etena eva abhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_4: sūtreṇa sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti . katham . na idam pāribhāṣikyāḥ vibhakteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2828_5: grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam : vibhāgaḥ vibhaktiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2829_0: ekavibhāge yāni sarūpāṇi teṣām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca uktaṃ : kaḥ cit vacanalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2829_1: dvivacanabahuvacanavidhiḥ dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2830_1: bhavitavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣau , vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2830_2: ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . na etat sahavivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_0: bhavati . atha api nidarśayitum buddhiḥ evam nidarśayitavyam : vṛkṣau ca vṛkṣau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_1: vṛkṣau , vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ ca vṛkṣāḥ iti . yat api ucyate dvandvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_2: ca vaktavyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśaḥ ekaśeṣḥ dvandvam bādhiṣyate . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2831_3: ca uktam sāvakāśaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ iti . na tiṅantāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2832_0: prayojayanti . kim kāṛaṇam . yathājātīyakānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2832_1: asti tathājātīyakānām ekaśeṣaḥ . na ca tiṅantānām dvitīyasya padasya prayoge sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2832_2: asti . kim kāraṇam . ekā hi kriyā . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2833: aprayogaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na sidhyanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2834: pacataḥ pacanti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi . sādhanāpekṣāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:2835: atha vā punaḥ astu ekavibhaktau iti . nanu ca uktam ekavibhaktau iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_0: na abhāvāt vibhakteḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parihṛtam etat : arthavat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_1: iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam niyamāt na prāpnoti arthavatsamudāyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_2: samāsagrahaṇam niyamārtham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tulyajātīyasya niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2836_3: tulyajātīyaḥ . yathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . kathañjātīyakānām samāsaḥ . subantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2837: (P_1,2.64.4) KA_I,238.18-239.11 Ro_II,133-136 sarvatra apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu apatyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_0: bhikṣāṇām samūhaḥ bhaikṣam iti . sarvatra iti ucyate prātipadikāṇām ca ekaśeṣe siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_1: . apatyādiṣu iti ucyate bahavaḥ ca apatyādayaḥ : gargasya apatyam bahavaḥ gargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_2: . ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2838_3: eva bahavaḥ yañaḥ evam prakṛtayaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:2839: bahvyaḥ syuḥ . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : gargāḥ , vatsāḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2840_0: bidāḥ , urvāḥ iti . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2840_1: mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2840_2: ca uktam : na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:2841_0: kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2841_1: na ca etat laukikam gotram . atha vā punaḥ astu ekā prakṛtiḥ bahavaḥ ca yañaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:2841_2: ca uktam : asārūpyāt ekaśeṣaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu samānārthānām ekaśeṣavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2842: samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi samānārthānām ekaśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2843: ucyate katham akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti . nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2844: nānārthānām api sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣḥ vaktavyaḥ . ekārthānām api virūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2845: ekārthānām api virūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : vakradaṇḍaḥ ca kuṭiladaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2846_0: ca vakradaṇḍau kuṭiladaṇḍāu iti vā . svarabhinnānām yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ . svarabhinnānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2846_1: yasya uttarasvaravidhiḥ tasya ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akṣaḥ ca akṣaḥ ca akṣau , mīmaṃsakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2847: (P_1,2.64.5) KA_I,239.12-240.11 Ro_II,136-139 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_0: ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca , dvau ca dvau ca iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt anyapadārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_1: ca anekaśeṣaḥ . saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hi ekau
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_2: iti anena arthaḥ gamyate . anyapadārthatvāt ca saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2848_3: . ekaḥ ca ekaḥ ca iti asya dvau iti arthaḥ . dvau ca dvau ca iti asya catvāraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2849: parihārau . yat tāvat ucyate saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2850: arthāsampratyaye api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . gārgyaḥ ca gārgyāyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2851_0: ca gārgyau . na ca ucyate vṛddhayuvānau iti bhavati ca ekaśeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2851_1: : anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . anyapadārthe api ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : viṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2851_2: ca viṃśatiḥ ca viṃśatī iti . tayoḥ catvāriṃśat iti arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2852_0: . evam tarhi na imau pṛthak parihārau . ekaparihāraḥ ayam : saṅkhyāyāḥ arthāsampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2852_1: anyapadārthatvāt ca iti . yatra hi arthāsampratyayaḥ eva vā anyapadārthatā eva vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2852_2: bhavati tatra ekaśeṣaḥ gārgyau viṃśatī iti yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:2853: . atha vā na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . yadi tarhi na ime ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ samudāyaśabdāḥ tarhi bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . ekavacanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2854: ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā yūtham , śatam , vanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2855: santu tarhi ekaśeṣaśabdāḥ . kiṅkṛtam sārūpyam . anyonyakṛtam sārūpyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2856_0: santi punaḥ ke cit anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ . santi iti āha . tad
GS24pmbhasuu:2856_1: yathā mātā pitā bhrātā iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2856_2: api vartante . iha punaḥ ekena api apāye na
GS24pmbhasuu:2857: bhavati catvāraḥ iti . anyat idānīm etat ucyate sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . yat tu bhavān asmān codayati santi punaḥ ke cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2858_0: anye api śabdāḥ yeṣām anyonyakṛtḥ bhāvaḥ iti tatra ete asmābhiḥ upanyastāḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2858_1: etat bhavān āha sakṛt ete śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ apāyeṣu api vartante iti . etat ca vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:2858_2: . ekaikaḥ na udyantum bhāram śaknoti yat katham tatra |
GS24pmbhasuu:2859: ekaikaḥ kartā syāt sarve vā syuḥ katham yuktam || kāraṇam udyamanam cet na udyacchati ca antareṇa tat tulyam |
GS24pmbhasuu:2860: tasmāt pṛthak pṛthak te kartāraḥ savyapekṣāḥ tu ||
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_1: . prathamamadhyamottamānām ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : pacati ca pacasi ca pacathaḥ , pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:2861_2: ca pacāmi ca pacāvaḥ , pacati ca pacasi ca pacāmi ca pacāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2863: dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ ca aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam avaśiṣyate . tena anena tadarthena bhavitavyam . kimarthena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2864: yadarthaḥ ekaḥ . kimarthaḥ ca ekaḥ . ekaḥ ekārthaḥ . na aikārthyam . na ayam ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi . dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . na aikārthyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2865: cet ārambhānarthakyam . na aikārthyam iti cet ekaśeṣārambhaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2866: syāt . iha hi śabdasya svābhāvikī vā anekārthatā syāt vācanikī vā . tat yadi tāvat svābhāvikī aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt . aśiṣyaḥ ekaśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_0: kim kāraṇam . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_1: aprayogaḥ iti . atha vācanikī tat vaktavyam : ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate saḥ ca dvyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_2: bhavati bahvarthaḥ ca iti . na vaktavyam . siddham ekaśeṣaḥ iti eva . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_3: ekaḥ ayam aviśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā śakyā labdhum . tat ca ekaśeṣakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2867_4: . na hi antareṇa tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_0: paśyāmaḥ ca punaḥ antareṇa api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_1: bhavati iti agnicit somasut iti yathā . te manyāmahe : lopakṛtam etat yena atra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:2868_2: api tadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam tasya arthasya gatiḥ bhavatiti . evam iha api ekaśeṣakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2869: avaśiṣyate iti anena dvyarthatā bahvarthatā vā bhavati . ucyeta tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:2870: tu gamyeta . yaḥ hi gām aśvaḥ iti brūyāt aśvam vā gauḥ iti na jātu cit sampratyayaḥ syāt . tena anekārthābhidhāne yatnam kurvatā avaśyam lokaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2871: pṛṣṭhataḥ anugantavyaḥ : keṣu artheṣu laukikāḥ kān śabdān prayuñjate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2872: loke ca ekasmin vṛkṣaḥ iti prayuñjate dvayoḥ vṛkṣau iti bahuṣu vṛkṣāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2873: . yadi tarhi lokaḥ avaśyam śabdeṣu pramāṇam kimartham ekaśeṣaḥ ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2874: atha kimartham lopaḥ ārabhyate . pratyayalakṣaṇam ācāryaḥ prārthayamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2875: lopam ārabhate . ekaśeṣārambhe punaḥ asya na kim cit prayojanam asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2876: nanu ca uktam : pratyartham śabdaniveśāt na ekena anekasya abhidhānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_0: . yadi ca ekena śabdena anekasya arthasya abhidhānam syāt na pratyartham śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_1: kṛtaḥ syāt . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasya abhidhānāt apratyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2877_2: cet tat api pratyartham eva . pratyartham śabdaniveśāt ekena anekasyābhidhānāt apratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_0: yat api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_1: arthau prati tat api pratyartham eva . yat api hi arthān arthān prati tat api pratyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_2: eva . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām arthānām abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2878_3: tāvatām śabdānām prayogaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_0: cet ekena api anekasya abhidhānam . yāvatām abhidhānam tāvatām prayogaḥ nyāyyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_1: cet evam ucyate : eṣaḥ api nyāyyaḥ eva yat api ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2879_2: . yadi tarhi ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2880: plakṣanyagrodhau : ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2881_0: uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2881_1: anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2882: nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate . katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2883: sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na virūpāṇām . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sarūpāṇām ekena api anekasya abhidhānam bhavati na punaḥ virūpāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:2884_0: . abhidhānam punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam . ubhayadarśanāt ca . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2884_1: khalu api dṛśyate : virūpāṇām api ekena anekasya abhidhānam bhavati . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2884_2: dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai pṛthivī namete iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2885: . virūpāṇām kila nāma ekena anekasya abhidhānam syāt kim punaḥ sarūpāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2887: vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ . ākṛtyabhidhānāt vā ekam śabdam vibhaktau vājapyāyanaḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2888: katham punaḥ jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ sā ca abhidhīyate iti . prakhyāviśeṣāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:2889: na hi gauḥ iti ukte viśeṣaḥ prakhyāyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2890: yadi api tāvat prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ekā ākṛtiḥ iti kutaḥ tu etat sā abhidhīyate iti . avyapavargagateḥ ca . avyapavargagateḥ ca manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2891: ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti . na hi gauḥ iti ukte vyapavargaḥ gamyate śuklā nīlā kapilā kapotikā iti . jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam . jñāyate khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_0: ekopadiṣṭam . gauḥ asya kadā cit upadiṣṭaḥ bhavati . saḥ tam anyasmin deśe anyasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_1: kāle anyasyām ca vayovasthāyām dṛṣṭvā jānāti ayam gauḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asya viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2892_2: prakhyāviśeṣāt iti ataḥ . tasya eva upodbalakam etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:2893: prakhyāviśeṣāt jñāyate ca ekopadiṣṭam iti . dharmaśāstram ca tathā . evam ca kṛtvā dharmaśāstram pravṛttam : brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_0: iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram ca na pīyate . yadi dravyam padārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_1: syāt ekam brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . kaḥ punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2894_2: asya viśeṣaḥ avyapavargagateḥ ca iti ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2895_0: tasya eva upodbalakam etat : avyapavargagateḥ ca dharmaśāstram ca tathā iti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:2895_1: ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . asti khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:2895_2: upalabhyate . kim . ādityaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_0: ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_1: ādityam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhate . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2896_2: tat yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2897: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2898: iti. na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat iti cet tathā ekaśeṣe . yaḥ hi manyate na ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapad upalabhyate iti ekaśeṣe tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2899: doṣaḥ syāt . ekaśeṣe api na ekaḥ vṛkṣaśabdaḥ anekam artham yugapat abhidadhīta . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam ākṛtiḥ abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2900: dravyābhidhāne hi ākṛtyasampratyayaḥ . dravyābhidhāne sati ākṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_0: asampratyayaḥ syāt . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ . tatra asarvadravyagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_1: prāpnoti . asarvadravyagatau kaḥ doṣaḥ . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_2: ekaḥ śāstroktam kurvīta aparaḥ aśāstroktam . aśāstrokte ca kriyamāṇe viguṇam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:2901_3: bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . nanu ca yasya api ākṛtiḥ padārthaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2902: anavayavena codyate na ca anubadhyate viguṇam karma bhavati . viguṇe ca karmaṇi phalānavāptiḥ . ekā ākṛtiḥ iti ca pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya
GS24pmbhasuu:2903: pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi anavayavena codyate pratyekam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2904_0: parisamāpyate yathā ādityaḥ . nanu ca yasya api dravyam padārthaḥ tasya api anavayavena
GS24pmbhasuu:2904_1: codyate pratyekam ca parisamāpyate . ekaśeṣaḥ tvayā vaktavyaḥ . tvayā api tarhi dvivacanabahuvacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2904_2: sādhyāni . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ . codanāyām ca ekasya upādhivṛtteḥ manyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:2905: abhidhīyate iti . āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet : ekam nirupya dvitīyas
GS24pmbhasuu:2906: tṛtīyaḥ ca nirupyate . yadi ca dravyam padārthaḥ syāt ekam nirupya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca nirvapaṇam na prakalpeta . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2907: jāticodanayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekā nirvṛttena aparā nirvartyena .
GS24pmbhasuu:2909: dravyābhidhānam vyāḍiḥ ācāryaḥ nyāyyam manyate : dravyam abhidhīyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_0: tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti : brāhmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_1: brāhmaṇaḥ , brāhmaṇau brāhmaṇāḥ iti . codanāsu ca tasya ārambhāt . codanāsu ca tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2910_2: ārambhāt manyāmahe dravyam abhidhīyate iti . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_0: anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_1: . na hi ekaḥ devadattaḥ yugapat srughne bhavati mathurāyām ca . vināśe prādurbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_2: ca sarvam tathā syāt . kim . vinaśyet ca prāduḥ ṣyāt ca . śvā mṛtaḥ iti śvā nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:2912_3: loke na pracaret . gauḥ jātaḥ iti sarvam gobhūtam anavakāśam syāt . asti ca vairūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_0: vairūpyam : gauḥ ca gauḥ ca khaṇḍaḥ muṇḍaḥ iti . tathā ca vigrahaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_1: vigrahaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati : gauḥ ca gauḥ ca iti . vyartheṣu ca muktasaṃśayam . vyartheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:2913_2: ca muktasaṃśayam bhavati . ākṛtau api padārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:2914: ekaśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ : akṣāḥ , pādāḥ , māṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_1: . liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti . kutaḥ . guṇasya anityatvāt . anityāḥ guṇāḥ apāyinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2915_2: upāyinaḥ ca . kim ye ete śuklādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2916: na iti āha . strīpuṃnapuṃsakāni sattvaguṇāḥ ekatvadvitvabahutvāni ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_0: kadā cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_1: kadā cit puṃstvena kadācit napuṃsakatvena . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2917_2: tu na upapadyate . yadi hi kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:2918_0: cit ākṛtiḥ ekatvena yujyate kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ iti pratijñā
GS24pmbhasuu:2918_1: hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2918_2: saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2919: . kutaḥ . guṇavivakṣāyāḥ anityatvāt . anityā guṇavivakṣā . kadā cit ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_0: ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena kadā cit strītvena
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_1: kadā cit puṃstvena kadā cit napuṃsakatvena . bhavet liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2920_2: tu na upapadyate . yadi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_0: ākṛtiḥ ekatvena vivakṣitā bhavati kadā cit dvitvena kadā cit bahutvena ekā ākṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_1: iti pratijñā hīyeta . yat ca asya pakṣasya upādāne prayojanam uktam ekaśeṣaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_2: iti saḥ ca idānīm vaktavyaḥ bhavati . liṅgaparihāraḥ ca api na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_3: . āviṣṭaliṅgā jātiḥ yat liṅgam upādāya pravartate utpattiprabhṛti ā vināśāt tat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:2921_4: na jahāti . tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2922: svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2923: saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2924: saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ : strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān . nanu ca loke
GS24pmbhasuu:2925: api styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān . adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī :
GS24pmbhasuu:2926: styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān : sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam : styānam pravṛttiḥ ca . kasya punaḥ styānam
GS24pmbhasuu:2927: strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām . keṣām . śabdasparśarūparasagandhānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_0: sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_1: . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ : śabdaḥ sparśaḥ rūpam iti . rasagandhau
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_2: na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā . na hi iha kaḥ cit api svasmin ātmani muhūrtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_3: api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate yāvat anena vardhitavyam apacayena vā yujyate . tat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2928_4: ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra kutaḥ vyavasthā . vivakṣātaḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:2929_0: saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ api avivakṣāyām napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:2929_1: . tatra liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ guṇavivakṣānityatvāt iti liṅgaparihāraḥ upapannaḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2930: vacanaparihāraḥ ca api upapannaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ : atha yasya dravyam padārthaḥ katham tasya ekavacanadvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2931: . evam saḥ vakṣyati : ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti . yadi tasya api vācanikāni na svābhāvikāni aham api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:2932: vakṣyāmi : ekasmin ekavacanam dvayoḥ dvivacanam bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_0: na hi ākṛtipadārthikasya dravyam na padārthaḥ dvavyapadārthikasya vā ākṛtiḥ na padārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_1: . ubhayoḥ ubhayam padārthaḥ . kasya cit tu kim cit pradhānabhūtam kim cit guṇabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_2: . ākṛtipadārthikasya ākṛtiḥ pradhānabhūtā dravyam guṇabhūtam . dravyapadārthikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_3: dravyam pradhānabhūtam ākṛtiḥ guṇabhūtā . guṇavacanavat vā . guṇavacanavat vā liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_4: bhaviṣyanti . tat yathā guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:2933_5: śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2934: śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:2935: yat asau dravyam śritā ākṛtiḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat ākṛteḥ api bhaviṣyati . adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_0: na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye ārambhaṇādīni bhaviṣyanti . na ca ekam anekādhikaraṇastham
GS24pmbhasuu:2936_1: yugapat iti ādityavat viṣayaḥ . na khalu api ekam anekādhikaraṇastham yugapat upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:2937: tat yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ anekādhikaraṇasthaḥ yugapat upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na ekaḥ draṣṭā anekādhikaraṇastham ādityam yugapat upalabhate
GS24pmbhasuu:2938: . evam tarhi itīndravat viṣayaḥ . tad yathā ekaḥ indraḥ anekasmin kratuśate āhūtaḥ yugapat sarvatra bhavati evam ākṛtiḥ yugapat sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:2939: bhaviṣyati . avināśaḥ anāśritatvāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2940: . anāśritatvāt . anāśritā ākṛtiḥ dravyam . kim ucyate anāśritatvāt iti yat idānīm eva uktam adhikaraṇagatiḥ sāhacaryāt iti . evam tarhi avināśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_0: anaikātmyāt . dravyavināśe ākṛteḥ avināśaḥ . kutaḥ . anaikātmyāt . anekaḥ ātmā ākṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_1: dravyasya ca . tat yathā vṛkṣasthaḥ avatānaḥ vṛkṣe chinne api na vinaśyati . vairūpyavigrahau
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_2: dravyabhedāt . vairūpyavigrahau api dravyabhedāt bhaviṣyataḥ . vyartheṣu ca sāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_3: siddham . vibhinnārtheṣu ca sāmānyāt siddham sarvam . aśnoteḥ akṣaḥ . padyateḥ pādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2941_4: . mimīteḥ māṣaḥ . tatra kriyāsāmānyāt siddham . aparaḥ tu āha . purākalpe etat āsīt
GS24pmbhasuu:2942: ṣoḍaśa māṣāḥ kārṣāpaṇam ṣoḍaśaphalāḥca māṣaśambaṭyaḥ . tatra saṃkhyāsāmānyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:2943: (P_1,2.65) KA_I,247.18-20 Ro_II,160 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ajaḥ ca barkaraḥ ca , aśvaḥ ca kiśoraḥ ca , uṣṭraḥ ca karabhaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2944: tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2945: . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2947: vicāryate : strīgrahaṇe strīpratyayagrahaṇam vā syāt stryarthagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2948: strīśabdagrahaṇam vā iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pratyayagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:2949: śabdagrahaṇam vā gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargāḥ : kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:2950: . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . iha ca gārgī ca gārgyāyaṇau ca gargān paśya : tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti natvam na prāpnoti . atha arthagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:2951: doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:2952: (P_1,2.66.2) KA_I,248.4-6 Ro_II,161 iha kasmāt na bhavati : ajā ca barkaraḥ ca , vaḍavā ca kiśoraḥ ca , uṣṭrī ca karabhaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2953: tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2954_0: (P_1,2.67) KA_I,248.8-10 Ro_II,162 iha kasmāt na bhavati : haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca kacchapaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2954_1: ca ḍulī ca , rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:2954_2: ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2955_0: (P_1,2.68.1) KA_I,248.12-18 Ro_II,162 kimartham idam ucyate na pumān striyā iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2955_1: siddham . na sidhyati . tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti ucyate . na ca atra tallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2955_2: eva viśeṣaḥ . tallakṣaṇaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ yat samānāyām ākṛtau śabdabhedaḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2955_3: siddhe sati yat imam yogam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ : yatra ūrdhvam prakṛteḥ tallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2956_0: tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . haṃsaḥ ca varaṭā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2956_1: , kacchapaḥ ca ḍulī ca , rśyaḥ ca rohit ca iti atra ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati . pūrvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2956_2: yogayoḥ bhūyān parihāraḥ . yāvat brūyāt gotram yūnā iti tāvat vṛddhaḥ yūnā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2956_3: pūrvasūtre gotrasya vṛddham iti sañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:2957: (P_1,2.68.2) KA_I,248.19-249.20 Ro_II,163-165 asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2958: vivakṣitatvāt siddham . asarūpāṇām yuvasthavirastrīpuṃsānām viśeṣaḥ ca avivakṣitaḥ sāmānyam ca vivakṣitam . viśeṣasya avivakṣitatvāt sāmānyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:2959: ca vivakṣitatvāt sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti eva siddham . pumān striyā iha kasmāt na bhavati : brāhmaṇavatsā ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_1: na bhaviṣyati . yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2961_2: . na atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_0: yadi tarhi yatra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva viśeṣavācakam tatra ekaśeṣaḥ bhavati iha
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_1: na prāpnoti : kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . na hi atra liṅgam vibhaktiparam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_2: viśeṣavācakam . katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate : śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_3: viśeṣaḥ iti āhosvit arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2962_4: . yadi vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham kārakaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:2963: idam tu na sidhyati : gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . atha vijñāyate arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2964_0: yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti siddham gomān ca gomatī ca gomantau . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:2964_1: tu na sidhyati : kārakaḥ ca kārikā ca kārakau . ubhayathā api paṭuḥ ca paṭvī ca paṭū*
GS24pmbhasuu:2964_2: iti etat na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate śabdaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2964_3: eva viśeṣaḥ iti na api arthaḥ yā strī tallakṣaṇaḥ cet eva viśeṣaḥ iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_0: tatsadbhāvena ca tallakṣaṇaḥ viśeṣaḥ āśrīyate . evam ca kṛtvā iha api prāptiḥ : brāhmaṇavatsā
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_1: ca brāhmaṇīvatsaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati
GS24pmbhasuu:2965_2: . kim . tat iti anuvartate . tat iti anena prakṛtau strīpuṃsau pratinirdiśyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:2966: . pradhānam yā śabdastrī pradhānam yā arthastrī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2967: (P_1,2.69) KA_I,249.22-250.10 Ro_II,166-167 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:2968_0: . katham śuklaḥ ca kambalaḥ śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam , te* ime śukle , śuklaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2968_1: ca kambalaḥ śuklā ca bṛhatikā śuklam ca vastram tat idam śuklam , tāni imani śuklāni
GS24pmbhasuu:2968_2: . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt śeṣaḥ . pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:2969: katham punaḥ jñāyate napuṃsakam pradhānam iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke :
GS24pmbhasuu:2970: anirjñāte arthe guṇasandehe ca napuṃsakaliṅgam prayujyate . kim jātam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:2971: ucyate . dvayam ca eva hi jāyate strī vā pumān vā . tathā vidūre avyaktam
GS24pmbhasuu:2972: ārūpam dṛṣṭvā vaktāraḥ bhavanti mahiṣīrūpam iva brāhmaṇīrūpam iva .
GS24pmbhasuu:2973: pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt napuṃsakasya śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam : ekavat ca asya anyatarasyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:2974: asti prayojanam . ākṛtivācitvāt ekavacanam . ākṛtivācitvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . yadā dravyābhidhānam tadā dvivacanabahuvacane bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2976: na pumān striyā iti eva siddham . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇāt dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:2977: śabdaniveśaḥ . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ bhavati . bhrātṛputrapitṛśvaśurāṇām kāraṇād dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:2978_0: tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . yadi tāvat bibharti iti bhrātā svasari api etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2978_1: . tathā yadi punāti prīṇāti iti vā putraḥ duhitari api etat bhavati . tathā yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:2978_2: pāti pālayati iti vā pitā mātari api etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_0: tathā yadi āśu āptavyaḥ śvaśuraḥ śvaśrvām api etat bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_1: na hi svasari bhrātṛśabdaḥ dṛśyate . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2979_2: iti cet tulyam etat bhavati . svasari api bhrātṛśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2980: dṛśyatām . tulyam hi kāraṇam . na vai eṣaḥ loke sampratyayaḥ . na hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:2981: bhrātā ānīyatām iti ukte svasā ānīyate . tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam bhavati : svasari bhrātṛtvam . kiṃviṣayam . ekaśeṣaviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:2982: . yuktam punaḥ yat niyataviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ syuḥ . bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt . anyatra api tadviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_0: samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ lohitaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti . samāne ca kāle varṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:2983_1: gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:2984: (P_1,2.72.1) KA_I,251.9-14 Ro_II,169-170 tyadāditaḥ śeṣe punnapuṃsakataḥ liṅgavacanāni . tyadāditaḥ śeṣe punnapuṃsakataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2985: liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . sā ca devadattaḥ ca tau sā ca kuṇḍe ca tāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:2987: . iha mā bhūt . saḥ ca kukkuṭaḥ sā ca mayūrī kukkuṭamayūryau te . ardham pippalyāḥ tat ardhapippalī ca sā ardhapippalyau te .
GS24pmbhasuu:2988: (P_1,2.72.2) KA_I,251.15-252.11 Ro_II,170-171 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt . tyadādīnām sāmānyam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2989: . ātaḥ ca sāmānyam . devadatte api hi saḥ iti etat bhavati yajñadatte api
GS24pmbhasuu:2990: . tyadādīnām sāmānyārthatvāt śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:2991_0: parasya śeṣam vakṣyāmi iti . parasya ca ubhayavācitvāt . ubhayavāci param . pūrvaśeṣadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2991_1: ca . pūrvasya khalu api śeṣaḥ dṛśyate : saḥ ca yaḥ ca tau ānaya , yau ānaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2991_2: idam tarhi prayojanam :dvandvaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:2992: etat api na asti prayojanam . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:2993: siddham . sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ ca dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ dvandvaḥ na bhavati iti ucyate śūdrābhīram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:2994_0: gobalīvardam , tṛṇolapam iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha tāvat śūdrābhīram
GS24pmbhasuu:2994_1: iti : ābhīrāḥ jātyantarāṇi . gobalīvardam iti : gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya
GS24pmbhasuu:2995: tṛṇolapam iti : apām ulapam iti nāmadheyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . sāmānyena uktatvāt viśeṣasya prayogaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:2996_0: sāmānyena uktatvāt tasya arthasya viśeṣasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2996_1: . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : tam brāhmaṇam ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:2996_2: gārgyam iti . bhavati yadā niyogataḥ tasya eva ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_0: bhavati . evam tarhi yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati tam brāhmaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:2997_1: ānaya gārgyam iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt sāmānyaviśeṣavācinoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:2998: (P_1,2.73) KA_I,252.13-23 Ro_II,172 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:2999: katham gāvaḥ imāḥ caranti , ajāḥ imāḥ caranti . gāvaḥ utkālitapuṃskāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . striyaḥ eva avaśiṣyante . idam tarhi prayojanam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3000: grāmyeṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : nyaṅkavaḥ ime , śūkarāḥ ime iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3001: . kaḥ punaḥ arhati agrāmyāṇām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye grahītum aśakyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3002_0: kutaḥ eva vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . idam tarhi prayojanam : paśuṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3002_1: . iha mā bhūt : brāhmaṇāḥ ime , vṛṣalāḥ ime . kaḥ punaḥ arhati apaśūnām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3002_2: ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_0: idam tarhi prayojanam : saṅgheṣu iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : etau gāvaḥ carataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_1: . kaḥ punaḥ arhati nirjñāte arthe anyathā prayoktum . idam tarhi prayojanam : ataruṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_2: iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt : uraṇakāḥ ime , barkarāḥ ime iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3003_3: taruṇānām puṃsaḥ utkālayitum ye aśakyāḥ vāhāya ca vikrayāya ca . anekaśapheṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3005_0: (P_1,3.1.1) KA_I,253.2-254.12 Ro_II,173-178 kutaḥ ayam vakāraḥ . yadi tāvat saṃhitayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3005_1: nirdeśaḥ kriyate bhvādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha asaṃhitayā bhū-ādayaḥ iti bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3005_2: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : bhūvādīnām vakāraḥ ayam maṅgalārthaḥ prayujyate . māṅgalikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_0: śāstraughasya maṅgalārtham vakāram āgamam prayuṅkte . maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_1: maṅgalāntāni hi śāstrāṇi prathante vīrapuruṣāṇi ca bhavanti āyuṣmatpuruṣāṇi ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3006_2: adhyetāraḥ ca siddhārthāḥ yathā syuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3007: atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . yadi tāvat paṭhyante na arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3008: anyatra api hi ayam paṭhan ādigrahaṇam na karoti . kva anyatra .
GS24pmbhasuu:3009: mṛḍamṛdagudhakuṣakliśavadavasaḥ ktvā iti . atha na paṭhyante natarām arthaḥ ādigrahaṇena . na hi apaṭhitāḥ śakyāḥ ādigrahaṇena viśeṣayitum .
