GS24pmbhasuu:3010_0: evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ādigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti ca pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3010_1: bāhyaḥ ca sūtrāt iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3010_2: upapannam bhavati . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . pāṭhena dhātusañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3010_3: samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yā iti dhātuḥ yā iti ābantaḥ . vā iti dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_0: nu iti dhātuḥ nu iti pratyayaḥ ca nipātaḥ ca . div iti dhātuḥ div iti prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_1: . kim ca syāt yadi eteṣām api dhātusañjñā syāt . dhātoḥ iti tavyādīnām utpattiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sādhane tavyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_3: sādhanābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3011_4: iha tarhi : yāḥ paśya : ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3012: anāpaḥ iti evam saḥ . asya tarhi vāśabdasya nipātasya adhātuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3013_0: prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3013_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam . tatra anarthakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3013_2: na kariṣyate : nipātaḥ prātipadikam iti eva . iha tarhi : trasnū iti : aci śnudhātubhruvām
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_0: iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅādeśaḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3014_1: na pratyayasya uvaṅādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tatra śnugrahaṇam karoti . asya tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3015_0: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . aprātipadikatvāt svādyutpattiḥ na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3015_1: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati utpadyante divśabdāt svādayaḥ iti yat ayam divaḥ sau auttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3015_2: śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3016: etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . divśabdaḥ yat prātipadikam tadartham etat syāt : akṣadyūḥ iti . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:3017_0: sidhyati . evam tarhi ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:3017_1: bhaviṣyati . evam api ananubandhakaḥ divśabdaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3018: parimāṇagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iyān avadhiḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam kutaḥ hi etat bhūśabdaḥ dhātusañjñaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3021: dhātuḥ iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . kā punaḥ kriyā . īhā . kā punaḥ īhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3022: ceṣṭā . kā punaḥ ceṣṭā . vyāpāraḥ . sarvathā bhavān śabdena eva śabdān ācaṣṭe . na kim cid arthajātam nidarśayati : evañjātīyikā kriyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3023_0: kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā . aśakyā kriyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3023_1: nirluṭhitaḥ . sā asau anumānagamyā . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ . iha sarveṣu sādhaneṣu sannihiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3023_2: kadā cit pacati iti etat bhavati kadācit na
GS24pmbhasuu:3024: bhavati . yasmin sādhane sannihite pacati iti etat bhavati sā nūnam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3025: . atha vā yayā devadattaḥ iha bhūtvā pāṭaliputre bhavati sā nūnam kriyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3026: katham punaḥ jñāyate kriyāvacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām karotinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3027: sāmānādhikaraṇyam : kim karoti . pacati . kim kariṣyati . pakṣyati . kim akārṣīt . apākṣīt iti . tatra kriyāvacane upasargapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3028: kriyāvacane dhātau upasargapratyayayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacati prapacati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam prāpnoti . saṅghātena arthagateḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3029: saṅghātena hi arthaḥ gamyate saprakṛtikena sapratyayakena sopasargeṇa ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3030: astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam . astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā vaktavyā . yathā hi bhavatā karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3031: nidarśitam na tathā astyādīnām nidarśyate . na hi bhavati kim karoti asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_0: iti . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu . pratyayārthasya avyatirekāt prakṛtyantareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_1: manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . pacati paṭhati : prakṛtyarthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_2: ca . pratyayārthaḥ saḥ eva . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt pratyayāntareṣu . dhātoḥ ca arthābhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3032_3: pratyayāntareṣu manyāmahe dhātuḥ eva kriyām āha iti . paktā pacanam pākaḥ iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_0: pratyayārthaḥ anyaḥ ca anyaḥ ca bhavati . prakṛtyarthaḥ saḥ eva. katham punaḥ jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_1: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti . siddham tu anvayavyatirekābhyām . anvayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_2: vyatirekāt ca . kaḥ asau anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā . iha pacati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_3: śrūyate : pacśabdaḥ cakārāntaḥ atiśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . arthaḥ api kaḥ cit gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_4: : viklittiḥ kartṛtvam ekatvam ca . paṭhati iti ukte kaḥ cit śabdaḥ hīyate kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3033_5: upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : pacśabdaḥ hīyate paṭhśabdaḥ upajāyate atiśabdaḥ anvayī
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_0: arthaḥ api kaḥ cit hīyate kaḥ cit upajāyate kaḥ cit anvayī : viklittiḥ hīyate paṭhikriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_1: upajāyate kartṛtvam ca ekatvam ca anvayī . te manyāmahe : yaḥ śabdaḥ hīyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_2: asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ hīyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ upajāyate tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3034_3: upajāyate . yaḥ śabdaḥ anvayī tasya asau arthaḥ yaḥ arthaḥ anvayī . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3035: ekārthāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā : indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_0: kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . ekaḥ ca śabdaḥ bahvarthaḥ . tat yathā : akṣāḥ pādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_1: māṣāḥ iti . ataḥ kim na sādhīyaḥ arthavattā siddhā bhavati . na api brūmaḥ arthavattā
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_2: na sidhyati iti .varṇitā arthavattā anvayavyatirekābhyām eva . tatra kutaḥ etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:3036_3: ayam prakṛtyarthaḥ ayam pratyayārthaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_0: punaḥ prakṛtiḥ eva ubhau arthau brūyāt pratyayaḥ eva vā . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_1: syuḥ . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa prakaraṇam viśeṣam vā viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_2: yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ pacati iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin cit viśeṣe pacatiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3037_3: vartate ataḥ manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3038: pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe . kriyāviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ . pacati iti kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3039_0: gamyate . tām praḥ viśinaṣṭi . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra dhātuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3039_1: upasargam vyabhicarati yatra na khalu tam vyabhicarati tatra katham : adhyeti , adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:3039_2: iti . yadi api atra dhātuḥ upasargam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_0: vyabhicarati upasargaḥ tu dhātum vyabhicarati . te manyāmahe : yaḥ eva asya adheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_1: anyatra arthaḥ sa iha api iti . kaḥ punaḥ anyatra adheḥ arthaḥ . adhiḥ uparibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3040_2: vartate . iha tarhi vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3041: tiṣṭhati pratiṣṭhate iti . tiṣṭhati iti vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttiḥ pratiṣṭhate iti vrajikriyā gamyate . te manyāmahe upasargakṛtam etat yena atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_0: vrajikriyā gamyate . praḥ ayam dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ ādikarmaṇi vartate . na ca idam na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_1: bahvarthāḥ api dhātavaḥ bhavanti iti . tat yathā : vapiḥ prakiraṇe ḍṛṣṭaḥ chedane
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_2: api vartate : keśaśmaśru vapati iti . īḍiḥ stuticodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ preraṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:3042_3: vartate : agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti iti . karotiḥ abhūtaprādurbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_0: nirmalīkaraṇe api vartate : pṛṣṭham kuru pācau , kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_1: ca api vartate : kaṭe kuru , ghaṭe kuru , aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_2: . evam iha api tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyām āha tiṣṭhatiḥ eva vrajikriyāyāḥ nivṛttim
GS24pmbhasuu:3043_3: . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ astibhavatividyatīnām dhātutvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3045: dhātuḥ iti evam lakṣaṇam kriyeta . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhāvavacanāḥ pacādayaḥ iti . yat eṣām bhavatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam : bhavati pacati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_0: bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhāvaḥ . bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_1: bhavanam bhāvaḥ iti . yadi bhavateḥ svapadārthaḥ bhavanam bhāvaḥ vipratiṣiddhānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_2: dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : bhedaḥ , chedaḥ . anyaḥ hi bhāvaḥ anyaḥ hi abhāvaḥ . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_3: ca anyaḥ bhāvaḥ anyaḥ abhāvaḥ iti . yaḥ hi yasya bhāvam icchati saḥ na tasya abhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3046_4: yasya ca abhāvam na tasya bhāvam . pacādīnām ca dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . yathā hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_0: kriyāvacane dhātau karotinā pacādīnām sāmānādhikaraṇyam nidarśitam na tathā bhāvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_1: dhātau nidarśyate . karotiḥ pacācīnām sarvān kālān sarvān puruṣān sarvāṇi ca vacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_2: anuvartate . bhavatiḥ punaḥ vartamānakālam ca eva ekatvam ca . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3047_3: : bhavati pacati , bhavati pakṣyati , bhavati apākṣīt iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3048: pacādayaḥ kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3049_0: atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā yatra khalu sā eva kriyā tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3049_1: katham : bhavet api bhavet , syāt api syāt iti . atra api anyatvam asti . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3049_2: kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3050: bhavatiḥ sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3051: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . yāvatā atra api anyatvam asti pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3052_0: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ iti . kim kṛtam bhavati . vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3052_1: bhavati . bhavet vipratiṣiddhānām dhātusañjñā siddhā syāt prātipadikānām api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3052_2: : vṛkṣaḥ , plakṣaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . etāni api hi bhavanti . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_0: bhāvaḥ iti . kriyā ca eva hi bhāvyate svabhāvasiddham tu dravyam . evam api bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_1: keṣām cit na syāt yāni na bhāvyante . ye tu ete sambandhiśabdāḥ teṣām prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_2: mātā pitā bhrātā iti . sarvathā vayam prātipadikaparyudāsāt na mucyāmahe . paṭhiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_3: hi ācāryaḥ : bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ iti . yāvatā paṭhiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3053_4: pacādayaḥ ca kriyāḥ bhavatikriyāyāḥ kartryaḥ bhavanti iti astu ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3054: bhavati iti bhāvaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etena eva abhihitam sūtreṇa bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3055: na idam ādigrahaṇam . vadeḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ iñ kartṛsādhanaḥ : bhuvam vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ iti . bhāvavacane tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3056: bhāvavacane dhātau tadarthasya pratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : śiśye iti . kim ca syāt . aśiti iti āttvam prasajyeta . tat hi dhātoḥ vihitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3057: itaretarāśrayam ca pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_0: itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3058_1: ca pratyayaḥ . utpanne hi pratyaye bhāvavacanatvam gamyate saḥ ca tāvat bhāvavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3059: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3060: anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ . siddham etat . katham . nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu ca śabdeṣu anāśritya bhāvavacanatvam pratyayaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_0: prathamam yaḥ bhāvam āha iti . kutaḥ punaḥ prāthamyam . kim śabdataḥ āhosvit arthataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdataḥ sanādīnām dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti : putrīyati vastrīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_2: iti . atha arthataḥ siddhā sanādīnām dhātusañjñā saḥ eva tu doṣaḥ bhavati : bhāvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_3: tadarthapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na eva arthataḥ na eva śabdataḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3062_4: tarhi . abhidhānataḥ . sumadhyame abhidhāne yaḥ prathamam bhāvam āha.
GS24pmbhasuu:3063_0: (P_1,3.1.4) KA_I,258.7-21 Ro_II,193-196 iha ye eva bhāvavacane dhātau doṣāḥ te eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3063_1: kriyāvacane api . tatra te eva parihārāḥ . tatra idam aparihṛtam : astibhavatividyatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3063_2: dhātutvam iti . tasya parihāraḥ . kām punaḥ kriyām bhavān matvā āha astibhavatividyatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3064_0: prāpnoti iti . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3064_1: brūmaḥ kārakāṇi kriyā iti . kim tarhi . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . anyathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3064_2: ca kārakāṇi śuṣkaudane pravartante anyathā ca māṃsaudane .
GS24pmbhasuu:3065: yadi evam siddhā astibhavatividyatīnām dhātusañjñā . anyathā hi kārakāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3066: astau pravartante anyathā hi mriyatau . ṣaṭ bhāvavikārāḥ iti ha sma āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_0: bhagavān vārṣyāyaṇiḥ : jāyate asti vipariṇamate vardhate apakṣīyate vinaśyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_1: . sarvathā sthitaḥ iti atra dhātusañjñā na prāpnoti . bāhyaḥ hi ebhyaḥ tiṣṭhatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_2: . evam tarhi kriyāyāḥ kriyā nivartikā bhavati dravyam dravyasya nivartakam . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3067_3: hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kimavasthaḥ devadattasya vyādhiḥ iti . saḥ āha : vardhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3068_0: apakṣīyate iti . aparaḥ āha : sthitaḥ iti . sthitaḥ iti ukte vardhateḥ ca apakṣīyateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3068_1: ca nivṛttiḥ bhavati . atha vā na antareṇa kriyām bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3069: bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānāḥ kālāḥ vyajyante . atha vā na anyat prṣṭena anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3070: ākhyeyam . tena na bhaviṣyati kim karoti asti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3072: kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ atha api bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3073: gatam iti āha . katham . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3074: tat yathā : devadattādīn samupaviṣṭān āha : devadattādayaḥ ānīyantām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3075: te utthāpya ānīyante . asti prakāre vartate . tat yathā : devadattādayaḥ āḍhyāḥ abhirūpāḥ darśanīyāḥ pakṣavantaḥ . devadattaprakārāḥ iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3076: pratyekam ca ādiśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . bhvādayaḥ iti ca vādayaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3077: tat yadā tāvat kriyāvacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ tadā bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām vartate vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ prakāre .
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_0: bhū iti evamādayaḥ vā iti evamprakārāḥ iti . yadā tu bhāvavacanaḥ dhātuḥ iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_1: pakṣaḥ tadā vā iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ saḥ vyavasthāyām bhū iti atra yaḥ ādiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3078_2: saḥ prakāre . vā iti evamādayaḥ bhū iti evamprakārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3079: iti . yadi tarhi lakṣaṇam kriyate na idānīm pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kartavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . bhūvādipāṭhaḥ prātipadikāṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3081_1: ca . ke punaḥ āṇapayatyādayaḥ . āṇapayati vaṭṭati vaḍḍhati iti . svarānubandhajñāpanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3081_2: ca . svarānubandhajñāpanāya ca pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ : svarān anubandhān ca jñāsyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_0: pātham svarāḥ anubandhāḥ vā śakyāḥ vijñātum . ye tu ete nyāyyavikaraṇāḥ udāttāḥ ananubandhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3082_1: paṭhyante eteṣām pāṭhaḥ śakyaḥ akartum . eteṣām api avaśyam āṇapayatyādinivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3083: śiṣṭaprayogāt āṇapayatyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3084: śiṣṭaprayogaḥ upāsyaḥ ye api paṭhyante teṣām api viparyāsanivṛttyarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3085: loke hi kṛṣyarthe kasim prayuñjate dṛśyarthe ca diśim .
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_0: (P_1,3.2.1) KA_I,259.16-23 Ro_II,198-199 upadeśe iti kimartham . abhre āṃ apaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_1: uddeśe yaḥ anunāsikaḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ uddeśopadeśayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_2: ākhyānam upadeśaḥ , guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_3: . tat yathā : agojñāya kaḥ cit gām sakhthani karṇe vā gṛhītvā upadiśati : ayam gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3086_4: iti . saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me gauḥ iti . guṇaiḥ prāpaṇam uddeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3087: . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : devadattam me bhavān uddiśatu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3088: saḥ ihasthaḥ pāṭaliputrastham devadattam uddiśati : aṅgadī kuṇḍalī kirīṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:3089: vyūḍhoraskaḥ vṛttabāhuḥ lohitākṣaḥ tuṅganāsaḥ citrābharaṇaḥ īdṛśaḥ devadattaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me devadattaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3090: (P_1,3.2.2) KA_I,259.24-261.3 Ro_II,199-202 itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt . itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_0: prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : abhre āṃ apaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_1: cit viśeṣaḥ : upādīyate evañjātīyakasya anunāsikasya itsañjñā bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_2: viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . kim ucyate anupādīyamāne viśeṣe iti . katham na nāma upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_3: yadā upadeśe iti ucyate . lakṣaṇena hi upadeśaḥ . saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . pratyakṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:3091_4: ākhyānam uddeśaḥ guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . pratyakṣam tāvat ākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3092: uddeśaḥ . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha : anuvākam me bhavān uddiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe : iṣetvakam adhīṣva . śannodevīyam adhīṣva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3093: saḥ pratyakṣam ākhyātam āha : uddiṣṭaḥ me anuvākaḥ . tam adhyeṣye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3094: guṇaiḥ ca prāpaṇam upadeśaḥ . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:3095_0: grāmantaram gamiṣyāmi . panthānam me bhavān upadiśatu iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe : amuṣmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3095_1: avakāśe hastadakṣiṇaḥ grahītavyaḥ , amuṣmin hastavāmaḥ iti . saḥ guṇaiḥ prāpyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3095_2: āha : upadiṣṭaḥ me panthāḥ iti . evam etau saṅkīrṇau uddeśopadeśau . evam tarhi itkāryābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3096: . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam syāt . akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3097: dvyarthaḥ upadeśaḥ . kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3098: kāryam ca iha na asti . kārye ca asati yadi śravaṇam api na syāt upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3099: anarthakaḥ syāt . idam asti itkāryam : abhre āṃ aṭitaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:3100: anantaralakṣaṇāyām itsañjñāyām satyām āditaḥ ca iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . siddham tu upadeśane anunāsikavacanāt . siddham etat katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3101_0: upadeśane yaḥ anunāsikaḥ saḥ itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ upadeśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3101_1: . śāstram . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3101_2: itsañjñāyām sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . upadeśaḥ iti ghañ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3101_3: karaṇasādhanaḥ . na sidhyati . paratvāt lyuṭ prāpnoti . na brūmaḥ akartari ca kārake
GS24pmbhasuu:3102: halaḥ ca iti . tatra api sañjñāyām iti vartate . na ca eṣā sañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3103_0: prāyavacanāt asañjñāyām api bhaviṣyati . prāyavacanāt sañjñāyām eva syāt vā na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3103_1: . na hi upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam . yadi na upādheḥ upādhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3103_2: bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam kalyāṇyādīnām inaṅ kulaṭāyāḥ vā inaṅ vibhāṣā na
GS24pmbhasuu:3103_3: prāpnoti . inaṅ eva atra pradhānam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3103_4: tarhi : vākinādīnām kuk ca putrāt anyatarasyām iti kuk vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3104: vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3105: na upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti na ca kaḥ cit doṣaḥ bhavati . evam ca kṛtvā ghañ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi kṛtyalyuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3106: bahulam iti evam atra ghañ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3107: (P_1,3.3.1) KA_I,261.5-15 Ro_II,202-203 halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ sarvāntyatvāt . halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya halaḥ itsañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3108: . kim kāraṇam . sarvāntyatvāt . sarvaḥ hi hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati . siddham tu vyavasitāntyatvāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3109: vyavasitāntyatvāt . vyavasitāntyaḥ hal itsañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3111_0: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam halantye sarvprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3111_1: sarvāntyatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āha ayam hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati iti . sarvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3111_2: ca hal tam tam avadhim prati antyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3112: . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ antyaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ vyavasitāntyaḥ . atha vā sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3113: na ca anyat kim cit apekṣyam asti . te vyavasitam eva apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:3114_1: . lakārasya anubandhatvena ajñāpitatvāt halgrahaṇāprasiddhiḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3114_2: bhavati iti ucyate . lakārasya eva tāvat itsañjñā na prāpnoti . siddham tu lakāranirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3114_3: . siddham etat . katham . lakāranirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . hal antyam itsañjñam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3114_4: lakāraḥ ca iti vaktavyam . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3115: atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . hal ca hal ca hal . hal antyam itsañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3116: bhavati iti . atha vā ḷkārasya eva idam guṇabhūtasya grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe ac anunāsika it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3117: jñāpayati bhavati lakārasya itsañjñā iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3118: (P_1,3.3.3) KA_I,262.4-17 Ro_II,205-207 prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ akṛttaddhite . akṛttaddhitāntasya prātipadikasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3119_0: udaśvit śakrṭ iti . akṛttaddhitāntasya iti kimartham . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ aupagavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3119_1: kāpaṭavaḥ . idarthābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjña na bhaviṣyati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3119_2: asti itkāryam titsvaritam iti svaritatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti . pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3120: . idam tarhi : rājā takṣā . ñniti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . ñniti iti ucyate . tatra vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi svaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_0: upottamam riti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . svaritakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . nyaṅsvarau
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_1: svritau iti . iha tarhi antaḥ . uttamaśabdaḥ triprabhṛtiṣu vartate . na ca atra triprabhṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_2: santi . iha tarhi sanutaḥ . upottamam riti iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . antodāttanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_3: kariṣyate . saḥ ca nipātasvaraḥ ritsvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . etat ca atra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3121_4: yat itkāryābhāvāt itsañjñā na syāt . yatra itkāryam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3122: bhavati tatra itsañjñā . tat yathā āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ agastikuṇḍinac .
GS24pmbhasuu:3123_1: . vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kimaḥ at kve
GS24pmbhasuu:3123_2: prepsan dīpyase kva ardhamāsāḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_0: vibhaktau taddhite pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam idamaḥ thamuḥ iti makārasye itsañjñāparitrāṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_1: ukāram anubandham karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate idānīm iti atra api prāpnoti . itkāryābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_2: atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_3: paraḥ yathā syāt . iśbhāve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve
GS24pmbhasuu:3124_4: pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . saḥ eva tāvat iśbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_0: kim kāraṇam . prāk diśaḥ pratyayeṣu iti ucyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati iśbhāvam prāg diśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_1: pratyayeṣu vaktum . kim tarhi . prāk diśaḥ artheṣu iśbhāvaḥ kiṃsarvanāmabahubhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_2: advyādibhyaḥ pratyayotpattiḥ . evam tarhi tadaḥ api ayam vaktavyaḥ . tadaḥ ca mit
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_3: acaḥ antyāt paratvena na sidhyati . nanu ca atra api atve kṛte na asti viśeṣaḥ mit
GS24pmbhasuu:3125_4: acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . tat hi attvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3126: vibhaktau iti ucyate . evam tarhi yakārāntaḥ dānīm kariṣyate . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3128: cuñcupcaṇapoḥ cakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . keśacuñcuḥ keśacaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3129: itkāryābhāvāt siddham . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_0: pitkaraṇam idānīm kimartham syāt . pitkaraṇam kimartham iti cet paryāyārtham . pitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3130_1: kimartham iti cet paryāyārtham etat syāt . evam tarhi yakārādī cuñcupcaṇapau . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3131_0: (P_1,3.7.2) KA_I,263.19-264.10 Ro_II,210-211 iraḥ upasaṅkhyānam . iraḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3131_1: kartavyam : rudhir : arudhat , arautsīt . avayavagrahaṇāt siddham . rephasya atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3131_2: halantyam iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati ikārasya upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ iti . avayavagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3131_3: iti cet ididvidhiprasaṅgaḥ avayavagrahaṇāt iti cet ididvidhiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3132: iditaḥ num dhātoḥ iti num prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ ayam ididvidhiḥ kumbhīdhānyanyāyena vijñāyeta . tat yathā . kumbhīdhānyaḥ śrotriyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3133: ucyate . yasya kumbhyām eva dhānyam saḥ kumbhīdhānyaḥ . yasya punaḥ kumbhyām ca anyatra ca na asau kumbhīdhānyaḥ . na ayam ididvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3134: kumbhīdhānyanyāyena śakyaḥ vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . ṭunadi nandathuḥ iti . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate ikāraḥ it yasya saḥ ayam idit tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_0: iditaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ikāraḥ eva it idit ididantasya iti . atha vā ṝkārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_1: eva idam irtvabhūtasya grahaṇam . tatra upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ it iti itsañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3135_2: . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na evañjātīyakānām ididvidhiḥ bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3136: numanuṣaktān paṭhati . ubundir niśāmane . skandir gatiśoṣaṇayoḥ . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati irśabdasya itsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam iritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3137: vā iti āha . atha vā ante iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3139: itsañjñakaḥ pratinirdiśyate . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam it iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3140_0: vartate . kva prakṛtam . upadeśe ac anunāsikaḥ it iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3140_1: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3140_2: . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3141: hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3142_0: evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3142_1: tarhi prayojanam . ye anekālaḥ itsañjñāḥ teṣām lopaḥ sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3142_2: kriyamāṇe api ca tasyagrahaṇe katham iva lopaḥ sarvādeśaḥ labhyaḥ . labhyaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3144_0: upasaṅkhyānam itpratiṣedhāt . itaḥ lope ṇalktvāniṣṭhāsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3144_1: ṇal . aham papaca . ktvā . devitvā sevitvā . niṣṭhā . śayitaḥ śayitavān . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3144_2: kāraṇam na sidhyati . itpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra itsañjñā . ṇal uttamaḥ ṇit
GS24pmbhasuu:3144_3: vā bhavati . ktvā seṭ na kit bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3145: niṣṭhā seṭ na kit bhavati iti . siddham tu ṇalādīnām grahaṇapratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3146: siddham etat . katham . ṇalādīnām grahaṇāni pratiṣidhante . ṇal uttamaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3147: ṇidgrahaṇena gṛhyate . ktvā seṭ na kidgrahaṇena gṛhyate . niṣṭhā seṭ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3148: kidgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti . nirdiṣṭalopāt vā . nirdiṣṭalopāt vā siddham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3149_0: . atha vā nirdiṣṭasya ayam lopaḥ kriyate . tasmāt siddham etat . tatra tusmānām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3149_1: . tatra tusmānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt tasmin yasmāt yasmin vṛkṣāḥ plakṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3149_2: acinavam asunavam akaravam . na vā uccāraṇasāmarthyāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3149_3: . uccāraṇasāmarthyāt atra lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . anubandhalope bhāvābhāvayoḥ vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3150_0: aprasiddhiḥ . anubandhalope bhāvābhāvayoḥ virodhāt aprasiddhiḥ . na jñāyate kena
GS24pmbhasuu:3150_1: abhiprāyeṇa prasajati kena nivṛttim karoti iti . siddham tu apavādanyāyena . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3150_2: etat . katham . apavādanyāyena . kim punaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3151: tathā yathā utsargāpavādau . bhāvaḥ hi kāryāṛthaḥ nanyārthaḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3152: kāryam kariṣyāmi iti anubandhaḥ āsajyate kāryād anyan mā bhūt iti lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3154_0: āsajyate kim saḥ tasya ekāntaḥ bhavati āhosvit anekāntaḥ . ekāntaḥ tatra upalabdheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3154_1: . ekāntaḥ iti āha . kutaḥ . tatra upalabdheḥ . tatrasthaḥ hi asau upalabhyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3156: tatra asarūpavidhau doṣaḥ bhavati . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3157: kaṇviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti . sarvādeśe ca doṣaḥ bhavati . divaḥ aut sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . dāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3158: adābdaipau iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anākārāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_0: . nanu ca āttve kṛte bhaviṣyati . tat hi āttvam na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anejantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_1: . astu tarhi anekāntaḥ . anekānte vṛttiviśeṣaḥ . yadi anekāntaḥ vṛttiviśeṣaḥ na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3159_2: . kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi na sidhyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3160: kim hi saḥ tasya it bhavati yena itkṛtam syāt . evam tarhi anantaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3161: anantaraḥ iti cet pūrvaparayoḥ itkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ . anantaraḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3162: pūrvaparayoḥ itkṛtam prāpnoti . vuñchaṇ . siddham tu vyavasitapāṭhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3163: siddham etat . katham . vyavasitapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . vuñ chaṇ . saḥ ca avaśyam vyavasitapāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . itarathā hi ekānte api sandehaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3164: akriyamāṇe vyavasitapāṭhe ekānte api sandehaḥ syāt . tatra na jñāyate kim ayam pūrvasya bhavati āhosvit parasya iti . sandehamātram etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3165_0: sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3165_1: alakṣaṇam iti . pūrvasya iti vyākhyāsyamaḥ . vṛttāt vā . vṛttāt vā punaḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3165_2: etat . vṛddhimantam ādyudāttam dṛṣṭvā ñit iti vyavaseyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3166_0: . antodāttam dṛṣṭvā kit iti . yuktam punaḥ yat vṛttinimittakaḥ anubandhaḥ syāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:3166_1: anubandhanimittakena nāma vṛttena bhavitavyam . vṛttinimittakaḥ eva anubandhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3166_2: vṛttijñaḥ hi ācāryaḥ anubandhān āsajati . ubhayam idam anubandheṣu uktam ekāntāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3166_3: anekāntāḥ iti . kim atra nyāyyam . ekāntāḥ iti nyāyyam . kutaḥ etat . atra hi hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3166_4: vyapadiṣṭaḥ . yat ca nāma sahetukam tat nyāyyam . nanu ca uktam tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3166_5: pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti . asarūpavidhau tāvat na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3167_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati iti yat ayam dadātidadhātyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3167_1: vibhāṣā iti vibhāṣā śam śāsti . yat api uktam sarvādeśe iti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3167_2: jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anekāltvam bhavati iti yat ayam śit sarvasya iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:3167_3: . yat api uktam dāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3167_4: jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam bhavati iti yat ayam udīcām māṅaḥ vyatīhāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3167_5: iti meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3168: (P_1,3.10.1) KA_I,267.8-13 Ro_II,218 kim iha udāharaṇam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci
GS24pmbhasuu:3169: . dadhi atra madhu atra . na etat asti . sthāne antaratamena api etat siddham . kutaḥ āntaryam . tālusthānasya tālusthānaḥ oṣṭhasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3170: oṣṭhasthānaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . idam tarhi . tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3171: . nanu ca etat api sthāne antaratamena eva siddham . kutaḥ āntaryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3172: ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . idam tarhi tūdīśalātruavarmatīkūcavārāt ḍhakchaṇḍhañyakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3175: yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham . sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_1: sarvasya uddeśasya sarvaḥ anudeśaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca samasaṅkhyam yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_2: . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti tatra yathāsaṅkhyavacanam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_3: evamartham idam ucyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sañjñayā samāsaiḥ ca nirdeśāḥ kriyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_5: ca nirdeśāḥ kriyantepṛthak vibhaktīḥ sañjñinaḥ ca mā uccicīram iti . prakaraṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3178_6: sarvasampratyayārthaḥ . prakaraṇe ca sarveṣām sampratyayaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3180: (P_1,3.10.3) KA_I,268.3-271.17 Ro_II,220-227 kim punaḥ śabdataḥ sāmye saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ bhavati āhosvit arthataḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3181: saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya ayavāyāvaḥ ecaḥ iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3182: parasmaipadānām ṇalatususthalathusaṇalvamāḥ iti ṇalādayaḥ bahavaḥ parasmaipadānām iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3183: ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya . ḍāraurasaḥ bahavaḥ prathamasya iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3184: vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . ecaḥ ayavāyāvaḥ . ayavāyāvaḥ bahavaḥ ecaḥ iti ekaḥ śabdaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3185: astu tarhi arthataḥ . arthataḥ cet lṛluṭornandyarīhaṇasindhutakṣaśilādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3187: syatāsīlṛluṭoḥ . syatāsī dvau lṛluṭoḥ iti asya trayaḥ arthāḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . nandigrahipacādibhyaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3188: nandyādayaḥ bahavaḥ lyuṇinyacaḥ trayaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3189: prāpnoti . arīhaṇādayaḥ bahavaḥ vuñādayaḥ saptadaśa . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhutakṣaśilādibhyaḥ aṇañau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3190: sindhutakṣaśilādayaḥ bahavaḥ aṇañau dvau . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3193: ātmanepadavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3194_0: anudāttaṅitau dvau ātmanepadam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3194_1: . niṣṭhā . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . rephadakārau dvau niṣṭhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3194_2: iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . sārvadhātukadvigrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3195_0: śnasoḥ allopaḥ śnamastī dvau sārvadhātukam iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3195_1: prāpnoti . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅaḥ pūrvatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . eṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3195_2: padāntāt ati ṅasiṅasoḥ ca . ṅasiṅasau dvau eṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:3196_0: iti asya dvau arthau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi śabdataḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3196_1: ca uktam saṅkhyāsāmyam śabdataḥ cet ṇalādayaḥ parasmaipadānām ḍāraurasaḥ prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_0: na eṣaḥ doṣāḥ . sthāne antaratamaḥ iti anena vyavasthā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ āntaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3197_1: . ekārthasya ekārthaḥ dvyarthasya dvyarthaḥ bahvarthasya bahvarthaḥ . saṃvṛtāvarṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3198_0: atiprasaṅgaḥ guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe kṅiti . atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati guṇavṛddhipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3198_1: kṅiti . guṇavṛddhī dve kṅitau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3199: tat gakāragrahaṇam api kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3200: kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . giti kiti ṅiti iti . udi kūle rujivahoḥ . udikūle dve rujivahau dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3201: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi . viśeṣaṇam rujivahoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3202: utpūrvābhyām rujivahibhyām kūle upapade iti . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu . tacchīlādiṣu dhātutrigrahaṇeṣu doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3203: vidibhidicchideḥ kurac . vidibhidicchidayaḥ trayaḥ tacchīlādayaḥ trayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3204: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu . ghañādiṣu dvigrahaṇeṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . nirabhyoḥ pūlvoḥ . nirabhī dvau pūlvau dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3205: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iṣyate ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3206: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ : niṣpāvaḥ , abhilāvaḥ iti . evam tarhi akartari ca kārake bhāve ca iti dvau pūlvau ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3207: . ave tṝstroḥ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ . tṝstrau dvau karaṇādhikaraṇe dve .
GS24pmbhasuu:3208_0: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ca bhūkṛñoḥ . kartṛkarmaṇī dve bhūkṛñau
GS24pmbhasuu:3208_1: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . anavakḷptyamarṣayoḥ akiṃvṛtte api . anavakḷptyamarṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:3208_2: dvau kiṃvṛttākiṃvṛtte dve . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . kṛbhvoḥ ktvāṇamulau
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_0: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . adhīyānaviduṣoḥ chandobrāhmaṇāni . chandobrāhmaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_1: iti dve adhīte veda iti ca dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ropadhetoḥ pathidūtayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_2: . ropadhetoḥ prācām tat gacchati pathidūtayoḥ . ropadhetau dvau pathidūtau dvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3209_3: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . tatra bhavataḥ tasya vyākhyānaḥ kratuyajñebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3210: tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . saṅghādiṣu añprabhṛtayaḥ ṣaṅghādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3211: añprabhṛtayaḥ saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_0: ghoṣagrahaṇam atra kartavyam . veśoyaśāadeḥ bhagāt yalkhau . veśoyaśāadī dvau yalkhau
GS24pmbhasuu:3212_1: dvau . tatra saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ prāpnoti . ṅasiṅasoḥ khyatyāt parasya . ṅasiṅasau dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3213: na vā samānayogavacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_0: samānayogavacanāt . samānayoge saṅkhyātānudeśam vakṣyāmi . tasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_1: vā . tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ vidaḥ laṭaḥ vā iti saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_2: . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca . dhmādhetṭoḥ nāḍīmuṣṭyoḥ ca saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3214_3: . khalagorathāt initrakaṭyacaḥ ca . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . sindhvapakarābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3215_0: saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ . yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3215_1: saṅkhyātānudeśena na sidhyanti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tām āsthāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3215_2: pratividheyam doṣeṣu . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_0: yathāsaṅkhyam anudeśaḥ samānām svaritena . tataḥ adhikāraḥ . adhikāraḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3216_1: svaritena iti . evam api svaritam dṛṣṭvā sandehaḥ syāt . na jñāyate kim ayam samasaṅkhyārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3217: sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti samasaṅkhyārthaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3219: adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ . adhikāraḥ kriyate pratiyogam
GS24pmbhasuu:3220: tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti . kim idam pratiyogam iti . yogam yogam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:3221_0: pratiyogam . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3221_1: . gatam iti āha . kutaḥ . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikṛtaḥ asau grāme adhikṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3221_2: asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra vyāpāram gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3222_0: śabdena ca api adhikṛtena kaḥ anyaḥ vyāpāraḥ śakyaḥ avagantum anyat ataḥ yoge yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:3222_1: upasthānāt . na vā nirdiśyamānādhikṛtatvāt yathā loke . na vā etat prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3223: nirdiśyamānam adhikṛtam gamyate . tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3224: yajñadattāya viṣṇumitrāya iti . gauḥ iti gamyate . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3225: padarujaviśaspṛśaḥ ghañ sṛ sthire bhāve . ghañ iti gamyate . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā . anyanirdeśaḥ tu loke nivartakaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3226: tat yathā . devadattāya gauḥ dīyatām yajñadattāya kambalaḥ viṣṇumitrāya ca iti . kambalaḥ gonivartakaḥ bhavati . evam iha api abhividhau bhāve inuṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:3227: ghañaḥ nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3228_1: tu bhavati . na jñāyate kiyantam avadhim adhikāraḥ anuvartate iti . adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3229: adhikāraparimāṇajñānārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_0: adhikāraparimāṇam jñāsyāmi iti . katham punaḥ svaritena adhikāraḥ iti anena adhikāraparimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_1: śakyam vijñātum . evam vakṣyāmi svarite na adhikāraḥ iti . svaritam dṛṣṭvā adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_2: na bhavati iti . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ . na adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3230_3: iti cet uktam kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ tasmāt paribhāṣā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3231: adhikārārtham eva tarhi ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3232: adhikāraparimāṇājñānam tu iti . yāvatithaḥ al anubandhaḥ tāvataḥ yogān iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3233: vacanāt siddham . yāvatithaḥ al anubadhyate tāvataḥ yogān adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3234: anuvartate iti vaktavyam . atha idānīm yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ alaḥ bhūyasaḥ ca yogān adhikāraḥ anuvartate katham tatra kartavyam . bhūyasi prāgvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_0: bhūyasi prāgvacanam kartavyam . prāk amutaḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_1: na vaktavyam . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_2: viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti . prāk amutaḥ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_3: yadi evam na arthaḥ anena . kena idānīm adhikāraḥ bhaviṣyati . laukikaḥ adhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_4: . nanu ca uktam na adhikāraḥ iti cet uktam . kim uktam . anyanirdeśaḥ tu nivartakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3235_5: tasmāt paribhāṣā . sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3236: upatiṣṭhate vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3237: inuṇ ghañ iti sandehe ghañ iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3238: (P_1,3.11.3) KA_I,273.6-25 Ro_II,230-232 na tarhi idānīm ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim prayojanam . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3239: vijñāyeta , adhikam kāryam , adhikaḥ kāraḥ . adhikāragatiḥ : gostriyoḥ upasarjanam iti atra goṭāṅgrahaṇam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_0: strīgrahaṇam svarayiṣyate . svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_1: prakṛtya ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām grahaṇam vijñāsyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3240_2: bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . adhikam kāryam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3241_0: apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra prāpya nivṛttiḥ . tena iha eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3241_1: : grāmāt āgacchati . nagarāt āgacchati . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3241_2: iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3242: bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . tathā adhikaraṇam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā vyāptaḥ bhavati . tena iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3243: syāt : tileṣu tailam . dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ . kūpe gargakulam iti atra na syāt . svaritena adhikarm kāryam bhavati iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_0: api siddham bhavati . adhikam kāryam . adhikaḥ kāraḥ : pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_2: nuṭ iti . numnuṭau svarayiṣyete . tatra svaritena adhikaḥ kāraḥ bhavati iti numnuṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_3: bhaviṣyataḥ . katham punaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ iti anena pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ śakya na paṭhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_4: . lokataḥ . tat yathā loke adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam durbalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3244_5: san balavadbhiḥ saha bhāram vahati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3245: adhikam ayam kāram karoti iti ucyate yaḥ ayam pūrvaḥ san param bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3246: adhikāragatiḥ stryarthā viśeṣāya adhikam kāryam . atha yaḥ anyaḥ adhikaḥ kāraḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhārthaḥ saḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3247: (P_1,3.12.1) KA_I,274.2-11 Ro_II,233 vikaraṇebhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ sunutaḥ lunītaḥ punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3248: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya saḥ ayam ṅit
GS24pmbhasuu:3249: ṅitaḥ iti . katham tarhi . ṅakāraḥ eva it ṅit ṅitaḥ . atha vā upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā uktam etat siddham tu pūrvasya kāryātideśāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3250: sarvathā caṅaṅbhyām prāpnoti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3251: pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3252: tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi . āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3253_0: devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3253_1: ca bhavati . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:3253_2: bhaviṣyati (P_1,3.12.2) KA_I,274.11-275.15 Ro_II,233-237 kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_0: ucyate . ātmanepadavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_1: ayam iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api syāt . lavidhānāt vihitam . lavidhānāt hi ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_2: parasmaipadam ca vihitam . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_3: niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām niyamaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_4: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vikaraṇāḥ . nityāḥ khalu api vikaraṇāḥ . kṛte api niyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3254_5: prāpnuvanti akṛte api prāpnuvanti . nityatvāt paratvāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_0: vikaraṇeṣu kṛteṣu vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_1: anavakāśaḥ niyamaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_2: liṅliṭau ca . yadi punaḥ iyam paribhāṣā vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . kāryakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_3: sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . lasya tibādayaḥ bhavanti iti upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_4: idam bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3255_5: itaretarāśrayam bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . abhinirvṛttānām lasya sthāne tibādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_0: tibādayaḥ bhāvyante . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi kāryāṇi ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_1: prakalpante . parasmaipadeṣu tāvat na itaretarāśrayam bhavati . parasmaipadānukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_2: na kariṣyate . avaśyam kartavyam anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . nanu ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_3: api ātmanepadānukramaṇe eva kariṣye . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhipraye kriyāphale ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3256_4: bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ na iti . ātmanepadeṣu ca api na itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3257_0: sūtraśāṭakavat . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3257_1: vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3257_2: vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham. bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3257_3: yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti . evam iha api saḥ lasya sthāne kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3257_4: lyasya abhinirvṛttasya ātmanepadam iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:3257_5: niyamaḥ . nanu ca utkam vikaraṇaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt niyamaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3258: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti yat ayam vikaraṇavidhau ātmanepadaparasmaipadāni āśrayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3259: puṣādidyutādḷrditaḥ parasmaipadeṣu ātmanepadeṣu anyatarasyām iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . abhinirvṛttāni hi lasya sthāne ātmanepadāni parasmaipadāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3260: ca . yat tarhi anupasargāt vā iti vibhāṣām śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3262_0: pratyayaniyamaḥ : anudāttaṅitaḥ eva ātmanepadam bhavati , bhāvakarmaṇoḥ eva ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3262_1: bhavati iti . āhosvit prakṛtyarthaniyamaḥ : anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam eva , bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3262_2: ātmanepadam eva . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3263_0: tatra pratyayaniyame śeṣavacanam parasmaipadasya anivṛttatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3263_1: śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3264: pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ prakṛtyarthau aniyatau . tatra parasmaipadam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3265: tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam parasmaipadaniyamārtham . śeṣāt eva parasmaipadam bhavati na anyataḥ iti . kyaṣaḥ ātmanepadavacanam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3266: anyatra niyamāt . kyaṣaḥ ātmanepadam vaktavyam . lohitāyati lohitāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3267: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tasya anyatra niyamāt . tat hi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_0: niyamyate . ucyate ca na ca prāpnoti . tat vacanāt bhaviṣyati . astu tarhi prakṛtyarthaniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_1: . prakṛtyarthaniyame anyābhāvaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame anyeṣām pratyayānām abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_2: . anudāttaṅitaḥ tṛjādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśāḥ tṛjādayaḥ ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_3: ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti sāvakāśāḥ tṛjādayaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . parasmaipadinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_4: avakāśaḥ . tatra api niyamāt na prāpnuvanti . tavyādayaḥ tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_5: na prāpnuvanti . tavyādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . ciṇ tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3268_6: niyamāt na prāpnoti . ciṇ api vacanāt bhaviṣyati ghañ tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3269: karmagrahaṇam . kva prakṛtam . aṇ karmaṇi ca iti . tat vai tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3270: upapadaviśeṣaṇam abhidheyaviśeṣaṇena ca iha arthaḥ . na ca anyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_0: prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati . na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_1: . na hi godhā sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate na ca anyārtham prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_2: anyārtham bhavati iti anyārtham api prakṛtam anyārtham bhavati ṭat yathā . śālyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_3: kulyāḥ praṇīyante tābhyaḥ ca pāṇīyam pīyate upaśpṛśyate ca śālayaḥ ca bhāvyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_4: yad api ucyate na khalu api anyat prakṛtam anuvartanāt anyat bhavati . na hi godhā
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_5: sarpantī sarpaṇāt ahiḥ bhavati iti . bhavet dravyeṣu etat evam syāt . śabdaḥ tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3271_6: yena yena viśeṣeṇa abhisambadhyate tasya tasya viśeṣakaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3272: śeṣavacanam ca . śeṣagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3273_0: iti . kim prayojanam . śeṣaniyamārtham . prakṛtarthau niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3273_1: . te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3273_2: eva na anyat iti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_0: parasmaipadapratiṣedhārtham dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . śeṣāt śeṣe iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3275_1: . iha mā bhūt . bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . katarasmin pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . prakṛtyarthaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3276: . prakṛtyarthau niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tatra na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3277: kartṛgrahaṇena kartṛgrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ . pratyayaniyame tarhi ayam doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3278: pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ . prakṛtyarthau aniyatau . tatra kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3279: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ nivṛttyartham . kartṛgrahaṇāt ca eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3280: prakṛtyarthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . prakṛtayarthau niyatau . pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi parasmaipadam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3281: tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . yatra parasmaipadam ca anyat ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3282: tatra parasmaipadam eva bhavati iti . tat tarhi pratyayaniyame dvitīyam śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3283_0: anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3283_1: bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ karkmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3283_2: nivṛttam . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi kartari bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3284: evam bhāve api kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ . na asya kim cit rujati iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_0: tataḥ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi . karmaṇi ca ātmanepadam bhavati . tataḥ kartari . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_1: ca ātmanepadam bhavati . karmaṇi iti anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam . tataḥ karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_2: . kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti nivṛttam . evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam anuparābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3285_3: kṛñaḥ iti evamartham . iha mā bhūt anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_0: nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt eva siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_1: yogavibhāgena śakyā bādhitum . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_2: vā iti . parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā . tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām
GS24pmbhasuu:3286_3: prāptim bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . evam tarhi kartari karmavyatihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3287: kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate . tat prakṛtam uttaratra anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3288: śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kimartham idam kartari kartari iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3289: . tataḥ anuparābhyām kṛñaḥ . kartari kartari iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3290: (P_1,3.14.1) KA_I,277.20-278.6 Ro_II,244-245 kriyāvyatirhāre iti vaktavyam . karmavyatirhāre iti ucyamāne iha prasajyeta devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_0: dhānyam vyatilunanti iti iha ca na syāt vyatilunate vyatipunate iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_1: . na vaktavyam . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām kriyām kariṣyasi . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3291_2: karma kariṣyasi iti . evam api kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3292: kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kriyā api kṛtrimam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3293: . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate . katham ca kriyā nāma kriyepsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyepsitatamā bhavati . kayā kriyayā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3294: sampaśyatikriyayā prārthayatikriyayā adhyavasyatikriyayā vā . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_0: manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati salḥ buddhyā tāvat kam cit artham sampaśyati . sandṛṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_1: prārthanā prārthite adhyavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_2: phalāvaptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api ubhayoḥ kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_3: ubhayagatiḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt kriyāvyatihāre iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3295_4: kartari vyatihāre iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat karmagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3296: etat prayojanam kriyāvyatihāre yathā syāt karmavyatihāre mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3299: karmavyatihārādiṣu kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ anena ātmanepadam mā bhūt iti . itarathā hi tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3300: akriyamāṇe kartṛgrahaṇe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api ātmanepadam prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_0: tatra pratiṣedhe bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api anena ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . vyatigamyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_1: grāmāḥ vyatihanyante dasyavaḥ iti . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_2: . kim kāraṇam . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat ātmanepadavidhānam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_3: pratiṣedhāt . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . pūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3301_4: prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3302: . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . uttarārtham tarhi kartṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3303: kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate tatra eva śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3304: iti . dvitīyam kartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . kartā eva yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3305: kartā tatra yathā syāt . karta ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3306: (P_1,3.15) KA_I,278.23-279.3 Ro_II,247 pratiṣedhe hasādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe hasādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3308: harivahyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . sampraharante rājānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3309: saṃvivahante gargaiḥ iti . na vahiḥ gatyarthaḥ . deśāntaraprāpaṇakriyaḥ vahiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3311: prarasparopapadāt ca iti vaktavyam . parasparasya vyatilunanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3314: parā jayati senā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3315_0: ayam parāśabdaḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ upasargaḥ ca anupasargaḥ ca ayam tu khalu viśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3315_1: upasargaḥ eva . tasya asya kaḥ dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3315_2: . tat yathā asya goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3316: iti gauḥ eva upādīyate na aśvaḥ na gardabhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_0: āṅaḥ daḥ avyasanakriyasya iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . vipādikām vyādadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_1: . kūlam vyādadāti iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha āṅaḥ daḥ anāsye
GS24pmbhasuu:3318_2: iti iyatā siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3319: viharaṇagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam āsyaviharaṇasamānakriyāt api yathā syāt . yathājātīyakā ca āsyaviharaṇakriyā tathājātīyakā atra api .
GS24pmbhasuu:3320: svāṅgakarmāt ca . svāṅgakarmāt ca iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . vyādadate pipīlikāḥ pataṅgamukham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3322: iha mā bhūt . anu krīḍati māṇavakam . samaḥ akūjane . samaḥ akūjane iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3323_0: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . saṅkrīḍanti śakaṭāni . āgameḥ kṣamāyām . āgameḥ kṣamāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3323_1: upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . āgamayasva tāvat māṇavka . śikṣeḥ jijñāsāyām . śikṣeḥ jijñāsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_0: dhanuṣi śikṣate . kirateḥ harṣajīvikākulāyakaraṇeṣu . kirateḥ harṣajīvikākulāyakaraṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3324_1: upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . apaskirate vṛṣabhaḥ hṛṣṭaḥ . apaskirate kukkuṭaḥ bhakṣārthī
GS24pmbhasuu:3325: harateḥ gatatācchīlye . harateḥ gatatācchīlye upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3326: paitṛkam aśvāḥ anuharante . mātṛkam gāvaḥ anuharante . āṅi nupracchyoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3327: āṅi nupracchyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . ānute śṛgālaḥ . āpṛcchate gurum . āśiṣi nāthaḥ . āśiṣi nāthaḥ upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . sarpiṣaḥ nāthate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3328: madhunaḥ nāthate . śapaḥ upalambhane . śapaḥ upalambhane upasaṅkhyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3330_0: (P_1,3.22) KA_I,280.22-24 Ro_II,253 āṅaḥ sthaḥ pratijñāne . āṅaḥ sthaḥ pratijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3330_1: iti vaktavyam . astim sakāram ātiṣṭhate . āgamau guṇavṛddhī ātiṣṭhate . vikārau guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:3331: (P_1,3.24) KA_I,281.2-3 Ro_II,253 udaḥ īhāyām . udaḥ īhāyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3332: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . uttiṣṭhati senā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_0: (P_1,3.25) KA_I, 281.5-17 Ro_II,254 upāt pūjāsaṅgatakaraṇayoḥ . upāt pūjāsaṅgatakaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_1: iti vaktavyam . ādityam upatiṣṭhate . candramasam upatiṣṭhate . saṅgatakaraṇe . rathikān
GS24pmbhasuu:3333_2: upatiṣṭhate . aśvārohān upatiṣṭhate . bahūnām api acittānām ekaḥ bhavati cittavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_0: yat arkam upatiṣṭhate . mā evam maṃsthāḥ sacittaḥ ayam eṣaḥ api yathā vayam . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_1: api asya kāpeyam yat arkam upatiṣṭhati . aparaḥ āha : upāt devapūjāsaṅgatakaraṇamitrakaraṇapathiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_2: iti vaktavyam . saṅgatakaraṇe udāhṛtam . mitrakaraṇe . rathikān upatiṣṭhate . aśvārohān
GS24pmbhasuu:3334_3: upatiṣṭhate pathi. ayam panthāḥ srughnam upatiṣṭhate . ayam panthāḥ sāketam
GS24pmbhasuu:3335: upatiṣthate . vā lipsāyām . vā lipsāyām iti vaktavyam . bhikṣukaḥ brāhmaṇakulam upatiṣṭhate . bhikṣukaḥ brāhmaṇakulam upatiṣṭhati vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3336: (P_1,3.27) KA_I,281.19-282.5 Ro_II,255-256 akarmakāt iti eva . ut tapati suvarṇam suvarṇakāraḥ . svāṅgakarmakāt ca . svāṅgakarmakāt ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3337: vaktavyam . uttapate pāṇī . vitapate pāṇī . uttapate pṛṣṭham . vitapate pṛṣṭham . atha udbhibhyām iti atra kim pratyudāhriyate . niṣṭapyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3338_0: kim punaḥ kāraṇam ātmanepadam eva udāhriyate na parasmaipadam pratyudāhāryam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3338_1: . tapiḥ ayam akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ ca api sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3339: bhavanti . yat ucyate na ca antareṇa karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ akarmakāḥ bhavanti iti antareṇa api karmakartāram sakarmakāḥ akarmakāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3340: tat yathā . nadīvahati iti akarmakaḥ . bhāram vahati iti sakarmakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3342: (P_1,3.28) KA_I,282.7-9 Ro_II,256 akarmakāt iti eva . āyacchati rajjum kūpāt . āhanti vṛṣalam pādena . svāṅgakarmakāt ca . svāṅgakarmakāt ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3343: vaktavyam . āyacchate pāṇī . āhate udaram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_0: (P_1,3.29) KA_I,282.11-18 Ro_II,256-257 samaḥ gamyādiṣu vidipracchisvaratīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_1: . samaḥ gamyādiṣu vidipracchisvaratīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . saṃvitte sampṛcchate
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_2: saṃsvarate . artiśrudṛśibhyaḥ ca . artiśrudṛśibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . ma samṛta
GS24pmbhasuu:3344_3: mā samṛṣātām mā samṛṣata . arti . śru . saṃśrṇute . dṛśi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3345: sampaśyate . upasargāt asyatyūhyoḥ vāvacanam . upasargāt astyūhyoḥ vā iti vaktavyam . nirasyati nirasyate . samūhati samūhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3346: (P_1,3.40) KA_I,282.20-21 Ro_II,257 jyotiṣām udgamane. jyotiṣām udgamane iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ākrāmati dhūmaḥ harmyatalam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3348_0: varatanu sampravadanti kukkuṭāḥ . vyaktavācām iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . ete
GS24pmbhasuu:3348_1: api hi vyaktavācaḥ . ātaḥ ca vyaktavācaḥ kukkuṭena udite ucyate kukkuṭaḥ vadati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3348_2: . evam tarhi vyaktavācām iti ucyate . sarve eva hi vyaktavācaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3349_0: iti . ke ca sādhīyaḥ . yeṣām vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . na ca eteṣām vāci
GS24pmbhasuu:3349_1: akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . eteṣām api vāci akārādayaḥ varṇāḥ vyajyante . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3349_2: ca vyajyante evam hi āhuḥ kukkuṭāḥ kukkuṭ iti . na evam te āhuḥ . anukaraṇam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3349_3: teṣām . atha vā na evam vijñāyate vyaktā
GS24pmbhasuu:3350: vāk yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti . katham tarhi . vyaktā vāci varṇāḥ yeṣām te ime vyaktavācaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3351: (P_1,3.51) KA_I,283.13-15 Ro_II,258 avād graḥ girateḥ . avād graḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3352: atra girateḥ iti vaktavyam . gṛṇāteḥ mā bhūt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam prayogābhāvāt . avāt graḥ iti ucyate na ca āpūrvasya gṛṇāteḥ prayogaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3354: ubhau lokau cañcarasi imam ca amum ca devala . tṛtīyāyuktāt iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:3355: api atra prāpnoti . atra api hi tṛtīyayā yogaḥ . evam tarhi tṛtīyāyuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3356: iti ucyate sarvatra ca tṛtīyayā yogaḥ . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:3357: sādhīyaḥ yatra tṛtīyayā yogaḥ iti . kva ca sādhīyaḥ . yatra tṛtīyayā yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3359_0: (P_1,3.55) KA_I,284.2-8 Ro_II,259-260 sā cet tṛtīyā caturthyarthe iti ucyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3359_1: nāma tṛtīyā caturthyarthe syāt . evam tarhi aśiṣṭavyavahāre anena tṛtīyā ca vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3359_2: ātmanepadam ca . dāsyā samprayacchate . vṛṣalyā sampracchate . yaḥ hi śiṣṭavyavahāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3360: brāhmaṇībhyaḥ samprayacchati iti eva tatra bhavitavyam . yadi evam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3361: arthaḥ anena yogena . kena idānīm tṛtīyā bhaviṣyati ātmanepadam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3362: sahayukte tṛtīyā syāt vyatihāre taṅaḥ vidhiḥ . sahayukte apradhāne iti eva tṛtīyā bhaviṣyati . kartari karmavyatihāre iti ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3363: (P_1,3.56) KA_I,284.10-12 Ro_II,260 iha kasmāt na bhavati . svam śāṭakāntam upayacchati iti . asvam yadā svam karoti tadā bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3364: yadi evam svīkaraṇe iti prāpnoti . vicitrāḥ taddhitavṛttayaḥ . na ataḥ taddhitaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_0: sakarmakavacanam . anoḥ jñaḥ pratiṣedhe sakarmakagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha ma bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3366_1: . auṣadhasya anujijñāsate iti . na vā akarmakasya uttareṇa vidhānāt . na vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3367: akarmakāt janāteḥ uttareṇa yogena ātmanepadam vidhīyate pūrvavat sanaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3368: . pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvasya ca . pūrvasya ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . saḥ ca sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate pūrvaysa ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3369: iti . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate sakarmakārthaḥ ārambhaḥ iti . akarmakāt jānāteḥ sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3370: ātmanepadavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakarmakārthaḥ vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3371: (P_1,3.60.1) KA_I,285.4-21 Ro_II,261-263 śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_0: ātmanepadasya abhāvaḥ . śīyate śīyete śīyante . kim ca bhoḥ śadeḥ śit parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3372_1: iti ucyate . na khalu parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate parasmaipadeṣu tu vijñāyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_0: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam iti etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_1: . evam na ca parasmaipadeṣu ucyate parasmaipadeṣu ca vijñāyate . kaḥ punaḥ arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:3373_2: etau dvau yogau uktvā śeṣāt kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3374: parasmaipadam vaktum . kim tarhi . aviśeṣeṇa sarvam ātmanepadaprakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3375_0: anukramya śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti ucyate . evam api parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3375_1: . katham . idam tāvad ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi idam na ucyeta kim iha syāt iti . parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3375_2: iti āha . parasmaipadam iti cet parasmaipadāśrayaḥ bhavati . siddham tu laḍādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3376: ātmanepadavacanam . siddham etat . katham . śadeḥ laḍādīnām ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_0: bhavati iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_1: nanu ca uktam śadeḥ śitaḥ parasmaipadāśrayatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3377_2: . śitaḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3378: sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . śitaḥ yaḥ śadiḥ . kaḥ ca śitaḥ śadiḥ . prakṛtiḥ . śadeḥ śitprakṛteḥ iti . atha vā āha ayam śadeḥ śitaḥ iti na ca śadiḥ śit asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3379: te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ śadeḥ śidviṣayāt iti . atha vā yadi api tāvat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3380: anyatra bhavati vikaraṇebhyaḥ niyamaḥ balīyān iti iha etat na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3381: vikaraṇaḥ hi iha āśrīyate śitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3382_1: . upasargapūrvasya niyame aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nyaviśata vyakrīṇīta
GS24pmbhasuu:3382_2: . kim punaḥ kāraṇāt na sidhyati . aṭā vyavahitatvāt . nanu ca ayam aṭ dhātubhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3382_3: dhātugrahaṇena grahīṣyate na sidhyati . aṅgasya hi aṭ ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3382_4: . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ na śakyaḥ dhātugrahaṇena grahītum . evam tarhi idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3382_5: sampradhāryam : aṭ kriyatām vikaraṇaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3382_6: . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ . kṛte api aṭi prāpnuvanti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:3383: prāpnuvanti . aṭ api nityaḥ . kṛteṣu api vikaraṇeṣu prāpnoti akṛteṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:3384: prāpnoti . anityaḥ aṭ . anyasya kṛteṣu vikaraṇeṣu prāpnoti anyasya akṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3385_0: . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3385_1: . aṭ kriyatām lādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṭ āgamaḥ . nityaḥ lādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3385_2: . kṛte api aṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3386: nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ bhaviṣyati . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade aṭ āgamaḥ iti cet aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3387: ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . nityatvāt lādeśasya ātmanepade eva aḍāgamaḥ iti cet evam ucyate . aṭ api nityanimittaḥ . kṛte api ladeśe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:3388: prāpnoti . aṭaḥ nityanimittatvāt ātmanepadābhāvaḥ . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3389: tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi lādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3390: na etat vivadāmahe antaraṅgaḥ na antaraṅgaḥ iti . astu ayam nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3391: antaraṅgaḥ ca . atra khalu lādeśe kṛte trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat prāpnuvanti :
GS24pmbhasuu:3392: vikaraṇāḥ aṭ āgamaḥ niyamaḥ iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ niyamaḥ labhyeta kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:3393: syāt . tat tu na labhyam . atha api vikaraṇāt aṭ iti aṭ labhyeta evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:3394: kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3395_0: eṣitavyāḥ tarataḥ , taranti iti evamartham . aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam eṣitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3395_1: upārcchati iti evamartham . tatra hi āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:3395_2: ca ṛcchibhāve kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3396_0: avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ eṣitavyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3396_1: tarataḥ taranti iti evamartham iti . bhavet siddham yatra vikaraṇāḥ nityāḥ āṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3396_2: anityam tatra āṅgāt pūrvam vikaraṇāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3397: yatra tu khalu ubhayam nityam paratvāt tatra āṅgam tāvat bhavati . yat api ucyate aḍāḍbhyām api anyat āṅgam pūrvam eṣitavyam upārcchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3398: evamartham iti . astu atra āṭ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ṛcchibhāve kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ āṭ iti kṛtvā punaḥ āṭ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_0: punaḥ ṛcchibhāvaḥ punaḥ āṭ iti cakrakam avyavasthā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakrakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_1: iṣṭataḥ vyavasthā . atha vā neḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3399_2: neḥ yaḥ viśiḥ . kaḥ ca neḥ viśiḥ . viśeṣyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3400: vyavahitaḥ ca api śakyate viśeṣayitum . atha vā niḥ api padam viśiḥ api padam .padavidhiḥ ca samarthāmām . vyavahite api sāmarthyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3402_0: sanapekṣam . prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadm uktam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ api bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3402_1: iti . āhosvit yogāpekṣam . prāk etasmāt yogāt yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam uktam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3402_2: ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sanapekṣam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3402_3: . pūrvavat sanaḥ na jñāyate kimantāt bhavitavyam . atha yogāpekṣam uttaratra vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_0: bubhukṣate upayuyukṣate iti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat sanapekṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_1: nanu ca uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati . nimittam ca viśeṣitam . katham . sanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_2: eva atra nimittatvena apekṣiṣyāmahe . pūrvavat sanaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_3: sanaḥ iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogāpekṣam . nanu ca uktam uttaratra vidhiḥ na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:3403_4: . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . uttaratra api pūrvavat sanaḥ iti eva anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3405: ucyate . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti śadimriyatyartham . śadimriyatyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3406_0: itarathā hi tābhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ . itarathā hi anucyamāne asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3406_1: tābhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . śiśitsati mumūrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:3406_2: . katham punaḥ pūrvavat sanaḥ iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3407: śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3408_0: vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3408_1: uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi
GS24pmbhasuu:3408_2: . evam iha api pūrvavat bhavati na bhavati iti . na bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_0: ātmanepadam na bhavati evam iha api śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_1: bhavati iti . yadi tarhi śadimriyatyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ vidhiḥ na prakalpate . āsisiṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:3409_2: śiśayiṣate . atha vidhyarthaḥ śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3410: astu . astu tāvat pratiṣedhārthaḥ . nanu ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_0: . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . etat eva jñāpayati sanantāt ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_1: iti yat ayam śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadasya pratiṣedham śāsti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:3411_2: vā punaḥ astu vidhyarthaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3412: śadimriyatibhyām sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3413_0: prakṛtam sanaḥ na iti anuvartiṣyate . kva prakṛtam . jñāśrusmṛdṛśām sanaḥ na anoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3413_1: jñaḥ . sakarmakāt sanaḥ na . pratyāṅbhyām śruvaḥ sanaḥ na . śadeḥ śitaḥ sanaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:3413_2: . mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca sanaḥ na iti . iha idānīm pūrvavat
GS24pmbhasuu:3414: sanaḥ iti sanaḥ iti vartate na iti nivṛttam . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_0: bhavati yat uktam nimittam aviśeṣitam bhavati iti . na eva vā punaḥ atra śadimriyatibhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_1: sanantābhyām ātmanepadam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . śadeḥ śitaḥ iti ucyate na ca śadiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3415_2: eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim tarhi . śit api nimittam . atha api śadiḥ eva śitparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3416: sanparaḥ śitparaḥ bhavati . yatra tarhi śit na āśrīyate mriyateḥ luṅliṅoḥ ca iti . atra api na mriyatiḥ eva ātmanepadasya nimittam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3417: luṅliṅau api nimittam . atha api mriyatiḥ eva luṅliṅparaḥ tu nimittam . na ca ayam sanparaḥ luṅliṅparaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3418: (P_1,3.62.3) KA_I,288.18-289.8 Ro_II,271-272 kim punaḥ pūrvasya yat ātmanepadadarśanam tat sanantasya api atidiśyate . evam bhavitum arhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_0: pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_1: . pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3419_2: . gupādīnām na prāpnoti . jugupsate mīmāṃsate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3420: . na hi etebhyaḥ prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_0: siddham tu pūrvasya liṅgātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvasya yat ātmanepadaliṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_1: tat sanantasya api atidiśyate . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñādiṣu tu liṅgapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_2: vaktavyaḥ . anucikīrṣati parācikīrṣati iti . astu tarhi prāk sanaḥ yebhyaḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_3: dṛṣṭam tebhyaḥ sanantebhyaḥ api bahvati iti . nanu ca uktam pūrvasya ātmanepadadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_4: sanantāt ātmanepadabhāvaḥ iti cet gupādiṣu aprasiddhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3421_5: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3422: sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsāyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3423: iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayave kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati
GS24pmbhasuu:3424: . sanam ca na vyabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati . tat yathā goḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3425: sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_0: pratyayasya grahaṇam kartavyam . pūrvavat pratyayāt iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_1: . ṇijartham . ṇijantāt api yathā syāt iti . ākusmayate vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_2: iti. tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra hetumaṇṇicaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_3: vaktavyaḥ . āsayati śāyayati . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3427_4: ākusmayate vikusmayate hṛṇīyate mahīyate iti. anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3428: atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . tat yathā goḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3429: sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati hṛṇīyayati mahīyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3430: atra api prāpnoti . avayave kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3431: bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati . yakam ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:3432: vyabhicarati . ṇicam tu vyabhicarati . tat yathā goḥ sakthani karṇe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3433: kṛtam liṅgam goḥ eva viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3434_0: (P_1,3.63) KA_I,289.23-290.6 Ro_II,274 kṛñgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . īhāmāsa
GS24pmbhasuu:3434_1: īhāmāsatuḥ īhāmāsuḥ . katham ca atra asteḥ anuprayogaḥ bhavati . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3434_2: tatra vijñāyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate tatra pratyāhāragrahaṇam iti . iha kṛñgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3435_0: na bhavati . iha eva kṛñgrahaṇāt . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . udumbhām cakāra udubjām
GS24pmbhasuu:3435_1: cakāra . nanu ca āmpratyayavat iti ucyate na ca atra āmpratyayāt ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3435_2: . na brūmaḥ anena iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3436_0: svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3436_1: iha niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . āmpratyayavat eva iti . yadi niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:3436_2: . īhām cakre ūhām cakre iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham pūrvavat iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3438: udyuṅkte anuyuṅkte . aparaḥ āha : svarādyantopasṛṣṭāt iti vaktayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3441: kriyate na samaḥ gamādiṣu eva ucyeta . samaḥ kṣṇuvaḥ sakarmakārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3442: sakarmakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . akarmakāt iti hi tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3444: iha api yathā syāt . prabhujati vāsasī nibhujati jānuśirasī iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yasya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam ca arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3445: tasya grahaṇam . na ca asya bhujeḥ avanam anavanam ca arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3446: (P_1,3.67.1) KA_I,290.19-292.8 Ro_II,276-284 ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne aṇyantasya karmaṇaḥ tatra upalabdhiḥ .ṇeḥ ātmanepadavidhāne aṇyantasya yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_0: karma yadā ṇyante tat eva karma bhavati tadā ātmanepadam bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_1: itarathā hi sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi sarvatra prasaṅgaḥ syāt . iha api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_2: : ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ . ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_3: tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam kasmāt na bhavati : ārohanti hastinam hastipakāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_4: ārohamāṇaḥ hastīsthalam ārohayati manuṣyān iti . evam vakṣyāmi . ṇeḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3447_5: bhavati . tataḥ aṇau yat karma ṇau cet . aṇyante yat karma ṇau yadi tat eva karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3448: . tataḥ saḥ kartā . kartā cet saḥ bhavati ṇau iti . yadi evam karmakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_0: bhavati . tatra karmakartṛtvāt siddham . karmakartṛtvāt siddham iti cet yakciṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_1: nivṛttyartham vacanam . karmakartṛtvāt siddham iti cet yakciṇoḥ nivṛttyartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_2: vaktavyam . karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti . na vā yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhāt . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_3: vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyete atra yakciṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_4: . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam iti . yaḥ tarhi na hetumaṇṇic
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_5: tadartham idam vaktavyam . tasya karmāpadiṣṭau yakciṇau mā bhūtām iti : utpucchayate
GS24pmbhasuu:3449_6: puccham svayam eva . udapuppucchata puccham svayam eva . atra api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_0: bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti tathā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena : yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3450_1: upsaṅkhyānam iti . saḥ ca avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi yatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3451_0: pratiṣedhaḥ . anucyamāne hi etasmin yatra niyamaḥ tataḥ anyatra tena yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3451_1: vaktavyaḥ syāt . gaṇayati gaṇam gopālakaḥ . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3452: vaktavyaḥ : gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva . ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3453: ātmanepadapratiṣedhārtham idam vaktavyam . gaṇayati gaṇaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3454: iṣyate eva atra ātmanepadam . kim iṣyate eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca . katham . aṇau it kasya idam ṇeḥ grahaṇam . yamāt ṇeḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3455: karma kartā vā vidyate . na ca etasmāt ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3456: idam tarhi prayojanam : anādhyāne iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . smarati vanagulmasya kokilaḥ . smarayati enam vanagulmaḥ svayam eva . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:3458: karmasthakriyāṇām bhavanti kartṛsthabhāvakaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_0: sati yat anādhyāne iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3459_1: ātmanepadam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . paśyanti bhṛtyāḥ rājānam . darśayate
