GS24pmbhasuu:3459_2: bhṛtyān rājā . darśayate bhṛtyaiḥ rājā . atra ātmanepadam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_0: ātmanaḥ karmatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hanti ātmānam . ghātayati ātmā iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_1: tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vā ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3461_2: . ṇyante anyasya kartṛtvāt . anyat atra aṇyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3462: karma anyaḥ ṇyantasya kartā . katham . dvau ātmanau antarātmā śarīrātmā ca . antarātmā tat karma karoti yena śarīrātmā sukhaduḥkhe anubhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3463: śarīrātmā tat karma karoti yena antarātmā sukhaduḥkhe anubhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3465_0: . yāti vāti drāti psāti . svaritañitaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati yāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3465_1: vāti drāti psāti iti . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti ucyate sarveṣām ca kartrabhiprāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3465_2: kriyāphalam asti . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . yeṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3465_3: kriyāphalam asti tebhyaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati iti . na ca eteṣām kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3465_4: ca kriyāphalam asti . tathājātīyakāḥ khalu ācāryeṇa svaritañitaḥ paṭhitāḥ yeṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:3466_0: kartrabhiprāyam akartrabhiprayam ca kriyāphalam asti . atha abhiprāyagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3466_1: . svaritañitaḥ kartrāye kriyāphale iti iyati ucyamāne yam eva samprati eti kriyāphalam
GS24pmbhasuu:3466_2: tatra eva syāt . lūñ lunīte pūñ
GS24pmbhasuu:3467: punīte . iha na syāt . yaj yajate vap vapate . abhiprayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate pra ādikarmaṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3468: tena yam ca abhipraiti yam ca abhipraiṣyati yam ca abhiprāgāt tatra sarvatra ābhimukhyamātre siddham bhavati . kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3469: kimartham . pacanti bhaktakārāḥ . kurvanti karmakārāḥ . yajanti yājakāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3470: kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3471: kriyāphalam kartāram abhipraiti . yājakāḥ yajanti gāḥ lapsyāmahe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_0: karmakarāḥ kurvanti pādikam ahaḥ lapsyāmahe iti . evam tarhi kartrabhipraye kriyāphale
GS24pmbhasuu:3472_1: iti ucyate sarvatra ca kartāram kriyāphalam abhipraiti . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3473: kriyāphalam abhipraiti iti . na ca antareṇa yajim yajiphalam vapim va vapiphalam labhante . yājakāḥ punaḥ antareṇa api yajim gāḥ labhante bhṛtakāḥ ca pādikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3474: (P_1,3.78) KA_I,293.11-25 Ro_II,291-292 śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe pratiṣedhaḥ . śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3475: bhidyate kuśūlaḥ svayam eva . chidyate rajjuḥ svayam eva . evam tarhi śeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:3476: iti vakṣyāmi . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ . saptamyā cet prakṛteḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āste śete cyavante plavante . siddham tu ubhayanirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3477: siddham etat . katham . ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . śeṣāt śeṣe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_0: vaktavyam . kartṛgrahaṇam idānīm kimartham syāt . kartṛgrahaṇam anuparādyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_1: anuparādyartham etat syāt . iha mā bhūt . anukriyate svayam eva . parākriyate svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3478_2: eva iti . sidhyati . sutram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3479_0: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam śeṣavacanam pañcamyā cet arthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3479_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kartari karmavyatihāre iti atra kartṛgrahaṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3479_2: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . śeṣāt kartari kartari iti . kim idam kartari kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:3479_3: iti . kartā eva yaḥ kartā tatra yathā syāt . kartā ca anyaḥ ca yaḥ kartā tatra mā
GS24pmbhasuu:3481: parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt kṛñādiṣu vidhānam . parasmaipadapratiṣedhāt kṛñādiṣu parasmaipadam vidhīyate . pratiṣidhyate tatra parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3482_0: svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati iti . asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3482_1: etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣiddhatvāt . tatra ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3482_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apratiṣiddhatvāt . na hi ātmanepadam pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3482_3: . kim tarhi parasmaipadam anena vidhīyate . na vā dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3483: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dyutādibhyaḥ vāvacanāt . yat ayam dyutādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_0: vāvacanam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na parasmaipadaviṣaye ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_1: iti . ātmanepadaniyame vā pratiṣedhaḥ . ātmanepadaniyame vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_2: . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale ātmanepadam bhavati kartari . anuparābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_3: kṛñaḥ na iti . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_4: uktam tatra ātmanepadapratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣiddhatvāt iti . parihṛtam etat na vā dyutādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_5: vāvacanāt . atha vā idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . svaritañitaḥ kartrabhiprāye kriyāphale
GS24pmbhasuu:3484_6: ātmanepadam bhavati iti parasmaipadam kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:3485: bhavati . ātmanepadena bādhyate . yathā eva tarhi ātmanepadena parasmaipadam bādhyate evam parasmaipadena ātmanepadam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3486: (P_1,3.86) KA_I,294.21 Ro_II,294 budhādiṣu ye akarmakāḥ teṣām grahaṇam kimartham . sakarmakārtham acittavatkartṛkārtham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_0: curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam . aṇau akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_1: parasmaipadam vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt : cetayamāṇam prayojayati cetayati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_2: . yadi tarhi atra api iṣyate aṇigrahaṇam idānīm kimartham syāt . akarmakagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_3: aṇyantaviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . atha akriyamāṇe aṇigrahaṇam kasya akarmakgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_4: viśeṣaṇam syāt . ṇeḥ iti vartate . ṇyantaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_5: : cetayamānam prayojayati cetayati iti . iha na syāt : āsayati śāyayati iti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3488_6: tu atasmin ṇau iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . atasmin ṇau yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3489: akarmakaḥ tatra iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3490_0: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam aṇav akarmakāt iti curādiṇicaḥ ṇyantāt parasmaipadavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3490_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṇau iti kasya idam ṇeḥ grahaṇam . yasmāṇ ṇeḥ prāk karma kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:3490_2: vā vidyate . na ca etasmāṇ ṇeaḥ prāk karma kartā vā vidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3492: pādiṣu dheṭaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dhāpayate śiśumeka samīcī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3493_0: (P_1,3.93) KA_I,295.16-19 Ro_II,296. kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . syasanoḥ iti etat anukṛṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3493_1: . yadi tarhi na antareṇa cakāram anuṅrttiḥ bhavati dyudbhyaḥ luṅi iti atra api cakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3493_2: kartavyaḥ vibhāṣā iti anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . atha idānīm antareṇa api cakāram anuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3493_3: bhavati iha api na arthaḥ cakāreṇa . evam sarve cakārāḥ pratyākhyāyante.
GS24pmbhasuu:3495_0: anyatra sañjñāsamāveśānniyamārtham vacanam . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśaḥ bhavati . kvānyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3495_1: . loke vyākaraṇe ca . loke tāvat . indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3495_2: kuśūlaḥ iti . ekasya dravyasya bahvyaḥ sañjñāḥ bhavanti . vyākaraṇe api kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3496: pratyayakṛtkṛtyasañjñānām samāveśaḥ bhavati . pāñcālaḥ vaidehaḥ vaidarbhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3497: iti atra pratyayataddhitatadrājasañjñānāṃ samāveśaḥ bhavati . anyatra sañjñāsamāveśāt etasmāt kāraṇāt ā kaḍārāt api sañjñānām samāveśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3498: . iṣyate ca ekā eva sañjñā syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3499: iti niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_0: (P_1,4.1.2) KA_I,296.11-299.20 Ro_II,298-308 katham tvetatsūtram paṭhitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_1: ā kaḍārāt ekā sañjñā iti āhosvit prāk kaḍārāt param kāryam iti . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3501_2: sandehaḥ . ubhayathā hi ācāryeṇa śiṣyāḥ sūtram pratipāditāḥ : kecit ā kaḍārāt ekā
GS24pmbhasuu:3502: param kāryam iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre tadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3503: . tatra ekasañjñādhikāre tat vaktavyam . kim . ekā sañjñā bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3504: nanu ca yasya api paraṅkāryatvam tena api paragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3505: parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . vipratiṣedhe ca iti . mama api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3506: ekagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati . sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣaḥ ekavibhaktau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3507: sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . tatra etāvat vācyam . ā kaḍārāt ekā . kim . ekā sañjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3508: iti . aṅgasañjñayā bhapadasañjñayoḥ asamāveśaḥ . aṇgasañjñayā bhapadasañjñayoḥ samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . sārpiṣkaḥ bārhiṣkaḥ yājuṣkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3509: dhānuṣkaḥ . bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavya iti . anavakāśe bhapadasañjñe aṅgasañjñāṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:3510_0: bādheyātām . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3510_1: niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrve tasya bhapadasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:3511: evam sa vakṣyati . yasmātpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi suptiṅantaṃ padam naḥ kye
GS24pmbhasuu:3512: siti ca . svādiṣu asarvanāmasthāne yaci bham . tasya ante pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3513: aṅgamiti . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāc ca bhapadasañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3514: aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api aṅgasañjñāpūrvike bhapadasañjñe . katham .anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3515: prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3516: karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam . karmadhārayatve tatpuruṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ karmadhārayaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3517: ekasañjñādhikāraḥ iti coditam . akriyamāṇe hi anavakāśā karmadhārayasañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3518: ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3519: parā tatpuruṣasañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3520_1: sarvam karmadhārayaprakaraṇam anukramya tasya ante śritādiḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3520_2: ārambhasāmarthyāt ca karmadhārayasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3520_3: . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā karmadhārayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3521: katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . tatpuruṣatve dvigucagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3522: tatpuruṣatve dvigucagrahaṇam kartavyam . tatpuruṣaḥ dviguḥ ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā dvigusañjñā tatpuruṣasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3523: bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupappateḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3524: katham . pūrvā tasya dvigusañjñā parā tatpuruṣasañjñā. katham . evaṃ sa vakṣyati . taddhitārthottarapadasamāhāre ca saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ dviguḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3525: evam sarvam dviguprakaraṇam anukramya tasya ante śritādiḥ tatpuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3526_0: tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca dvigusañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca tatpuruṣasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3526_1: . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api tatpuruṣasañjñāpūrvikā dvigusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3526_2: . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3527_1: . upasargāḥ kriyāyoge gatiśca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3527_2: pasargasañjñā gatisañjñām bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3528: niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya upasargasañjñā parā gatisañjñā . atra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3529: upasargasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca gatisañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya upasargasañjñāpūrvikā gatisañjñā . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3530: anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3531: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . gatisañjñā api anavakāśā sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3532: sāvakāśā gatisañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ūryādīni avakāśaḥ . prādīnāṃ yā gatisañjñā sā anavakāśā . gati . divaḥ karma . sādhakatamam karaṇam divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3533: karma ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre anavakāśā karmasañjñā karaṇasañjñām bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_0: ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3534_1: bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya karmasañjñā parā karaṇasañjñā . katham . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3535: tataḥ karaṇam . karaṇasañjñām ca bhavati sādhakatamam . diva iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:3536: . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ca karmasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥtasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_0: karaṇasañjñāpūrvikā karmasañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_1: . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . divaḥ karma . hetumat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3537_2: svatantraḥ kartā tatprayojako hetuḥ ca iti cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi cakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:3538: . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayorbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3539_0: katham . pūrvā tasya hetusañjñā parā kartṛsañjñā . katham . evam sa vakṣyati . svatantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3539_1: prayojakaḥ hetuḥ iti . tataḥ kartā . kartṛsañjñaḥ ca bhavati svatantraḥ . prayojakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3540: hetusañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api kartṛsañjñāpūrvikā hetusañjñā . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3541: anuvṛttiḥ kriyate . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:3542: yaugapadyena saṃbhavaḥ . gurulaghusañjñe nadīghisañjñe . gurulaghusañjñe nadīghisañjñe bādheyātām . gārgibandhuḥ vātsībandhuḥ vaitram viviniyya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3543: paravacane hi niyamānupatteḥ ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ . yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupatteḥ tasya ubhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3544_0: katham . pūrve tasya nadīghisañjñe pare gurulaghusañjñe . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3544_1: ca nadīghisañjñe paraṅkāryatvāt ca gurulaghusañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ . nanu ca yasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:3544_2: ekasañjñādhikāraḥ tasya api nadīghisaṃghisañjñāpūrvike gurulaghusañjñe . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_0: paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . parasmaipadasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_1: puruṣasañjñā . parasmaipadasañjñām puruṣasañjñā bādheta . paravacane hi niyamānupapatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_2: ubhayasañjñābhāvaḥ yasya punaḥ paraṅkāryatvam niyamānupapatteḥ tasyobhayoḥ sañjñayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3545_3: bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . pūrvā tasya puruṣasañjñā parā parasmaipadasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3546: katham . evaṃ sa vakṣyati . tiṅaḥ trīṇi trīṇi prathamamadhyottamāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3547: evam sarvam puruṣaniyamam anukramya tasya ante laḥ parasmaipadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3548: tatra ārambhasāmārthyāt ca puruṣasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca parasmaipadasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yasya api ekasañjñādhikaraḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3549: api parasmaipadasañjñāpūrvikā puruṣasañjñā . katham . anuvṛttiḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3550_0: paryāyaḥ prasajyeta. ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . parasmaipadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3550_1: api anavakāśā sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā parasmaipadasañjñā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3552: bham . paravacane siti padam bhasañjñamapi prāpnoti . ayam te yoniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3553: ṛtviyaḥ . prajam vindāma ṛtvijayām . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3554: paraṅkāryatvāt ca bhasañjñā prāpnoti . gatibuddhyādīnām ṇyantānām karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3555: kartṛsañjñam . gatibuddhyādīāṃ ṇyantānām karma kartṛsañjñam api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3556_0: ārambhasāmarthyāt ca karmasañjñā padasañjñā paraṅkāryatvāt ca kartṛsañjñā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3556_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na karmasañjñāyām kartṛsañjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3556_2: iti yat ayam hṛkroḥ anyatarasyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3558: śeṣagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . śeṣaḥ ghi asakhi iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_0: ghisāñjñānivṛttyartham . nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā mā bhūt iti . śakaṭyai paddhatyai
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_1: buddhayai dhenvai . itarathā hi paraṅkāryatvāt ca ghisañjñā ārambhasāmarthyāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3559_2: ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti nadīsañjñā . na vā asambhavāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3560: na vā asambhavāt . na vā kartavyam . nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . asambhavāt . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3561: ghisañjñāyām ca guṇaḥ . hrasvalakṣaṇā hi nadīsañjñā ghisañjñāyām ca guṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3562: bhavitavyam . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñābhāvaḥ . tatra vacanaprāmāṇyāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñā na bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3563: āśrayābhāvāt . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ iti cet yaṇādeśābhāvaḥ . āśrayābhāvāt nadīsañjñāyām ghisañjñānivṛttiḥ iti cet evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3564_0: ucyate yaṇādeśaḥ api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nadyāśrayatvāt yaṇādeśasya hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3564_1: nadīsañjñābhāvaḥ . nadyāśrayaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . yadā nadīsañjñayā ghisañjñā bādhitā tata
GS24pmbhasuu:3566: bahuvrīhyartham tu . bahvrīhipratiṣedhārtham tu śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3568_1: . upamāne . śastrīśyāmā kumudaśyenī . dvigu . pañcagavam daśagavam . kṛllope . niṣkauśāmbiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3569: saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ bhavati . saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇañsamāseṣu bahuvrīheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3570: prāpnoti . saṅkhyā . dvīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ trīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3571: samānādhikaraṇa . vīrpuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ . nañsamāse . abrāhmaṇakaḥ deśaḥ avṛṣalakaḥ deśaḥ . kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ na bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3572: kṛllope ca śeṣavacanāt prādibhiḥ na prāpnoti . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ prapatitapalāśaḥ prapalāśakaḥ iti . atha ekasañjñādhikāre katham sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3573_0: . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhād bahuvrīhiḥ . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3573_1: bhaviṣyati . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3573_2: . ekasañjñādhikāre vipratiṣedhāt bahuvrīhiḥ iti cet ktārthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3573_3: . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . tatpuruṣaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatpuruṣaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3574: anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tatpuruṣaḥ iti cet anyatra ktārthāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇakaḥ pratitatpalāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3575: prapalāśakaḥ iti . siddham tu prādīnām ktārthe tatpuruṣavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3576: siddhametat . katham . prādīnām ktārthe tatpuruṣaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3577_0: (P_1,4.1.4) KA_I,301.21-303.14 Ro_II,313-317 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3577_1: . prayojanam hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutau . hrasvasañjñām dīrghaplutasañjñe bādhete
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_0: tiṅaḥ sārvadhātukasañjñām liṅliṭoḥārdhadhātusañjñā bādhate . apatyam vṛddham yuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_1: . apatyam vṛddham yavusañjñā bādhate . ghim nadī . ghisañjñām nadīsañjñā bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_2: . laghu guru . laghusañjñām gurusañjñā bādhate . padam bham . padasañjñām bhasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_3: bādhate . apādādnam uttarāṇi dhanuṣā vidhyati kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte gām dogdhi dhanuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_4: vidhyati iti . apādānasañjñām uttarāṇi kārakāṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuṣā vidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_5: . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte . gām dogdhi . dhanuḥ vidhyati . dhanuṣā vidhyati iti apāyayuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_6: ca dhruvamapāye apādānam iti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti sādhakatamam karaṇam iti ca karaṇasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3578_7: . karaṇasañjñā parā sā bhavati . kaṃsapātryām bhuṅkte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3579: atra apāyuktatvāt ca dhruvamapāye apādānamiti apādānasañjñā prāpnoti ādhāraḥ adhikaraṇam iti ca adhikaraṇasañjñā . adhikaraṇasañjñā parā sā
GS24pmbhasuu:3580: bhavati . gām dogdhi iti atra apāyuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā prāpnoti karturīpsitatamam karma . iti ca karmasañjñā . karmasañjñā parā sā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_0: . dhanuḥ vidhyati iti atra apāyayuktatvāt ca apādānasañjñā prāpnoti svatantraḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:3581_1: iti ca . kartṛsañjñā parā sā bhavati . krudhadruhoḥ upsṛṣṭayoḥ karma saṃpradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3582: saṃpradānasañjñām bādhate . karaṇam parāṇi sādhu asiḥ chinatti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3583_0: karaṇasañjñām parāṇi āṇi bādhante . kva . dhanuḥ vidhyati . asiḥ chinatti iti . adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3583_1: karma geham praviśati . adhikaraṇasañjñām karmasañjñā bādhate . kva . geham praviśati
GS24pmbhasuu:3584: adhikaraṇasañjñām karmasañjñā bādhate . kva . sthālī pacati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3585: adhyupasṛṣṭam karma . adhyupasṛṣṭam karma adhikaraṇasañjñām bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3586: gatyupasargasañjñe karmapravacanīyasañjñā . gatyupasargasañjñe karmapravacanīyasañjñā bādhate . parasmaipadam ātmanepadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3588: samāsasañjñāḥ ca yāḥ yāḥ parāḥ anavakāśāḥ ca tāḥ tāḥ pūrvāḥ sāvakāśāḥ ca bādhante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3590: arthavat prātipadikasañjñam bhavati . guṇavacanam ca . guṇavacanasañjñam ca bhavati arthavat . samāsakṛttaddhitāvyayasarvanāma asarvaliṅgā jātiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3591: samāsasañjñā ca vaktavyā . kṛt . kṛtsañjñā ca vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3592: taddhita . taddhitasañjñā ca vaktavyā . avyaya . avyayasañjñā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3593_0: . sarvanāma . sarvanāmasañjñā ca vaktavyā . asarvaliṅgā jātiḥ iti etat ca vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3593_1: . saṅkhyā . saṅkhyāsañjñā ca vaktavyā . ḍu ca . ḍusañjñā ca vaktavyā . kā punaḥ ḍusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3594: ekadravyopaniveśinī sañjñā iti etat ca vaktavyam . kimartham idamucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3595: yathānyāse eva bhūyiṣṭhāḥ sañjñāḥ kriyante . santi ca eva atra kāḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3596: apūrvāḥ sañjñāḥ . api ca etena ānupūrvyeṇa sanniviṣṭānām bādhanam yathā syāt . guṇavacanasañjñāyāḥ ca etābhiḥ bādhanam yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3598: ayam śabdaḥ . vipratipūrvāt siddheḥ karmavyatihāre karmavyatihāre ghañ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3600_0: kaḥ punaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvau prasaṅgau anyārthau ekasmin saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3600_1: prasaṇgau yadā anyārthau bhavataḥ ekasmin ca yugapat prāptnutaḥ saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3600_2: . kva punaḥ anyārthau kva ca ekasmin yugapat prāpnutaḥ . vṛkṣābhyām , vṛkṣeṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3600_3: anyārthau vṛkṣebhyaḥ iti atra yugapat prāpnutaḥ . kim ca syāt . ekasmin yugapadasambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_0: ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ . ekasmin yugapadasambhavātpūrvasyāḥ ca parasyāḥ ca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3601_1: . idam vipratiṣiddham yat ucyate ekasmin yugapadasambhavātpūrvaparaprāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3602: ca nāma yugapadasambhavaḥ syāt pūrvasyāḥ ca parasyāḥca prāpteḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ ca syāt . na etat vipratiṣiddham . yat ucyate ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3603: yugapadasambhavāt iti kāryayoḥ yugapadasambhavaḥ śāstrayoḥ ubhayaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3604_0: . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:3604_1: bhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tṛjādayaḥ paryāyeṇa bhavanti . anavayaprasaṅgāt pratipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:3604_2: vidheḥ ca . anavayavena prasajyante pratipadam ca vidhīyante . apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3605: apratipattiḥ vā punaḥ ubhayoḥ śāstrayoḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam . tulyabalatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3606_0: . tulyabale hi ubhe śāstre . tat yathā . dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ ekaḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3606_1: . saḥ tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3606_2: ca kārye bhavataḥ tadā yadi asau avirodhārthī bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3606_3: punaḥ kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti yaugapadyāsambhavāt . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3606_4: . tatra pratipattyartham vacanam . tatra pratipattyartham idam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3607: tavyadādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ . tavyadādīnām tu kāryasya aprasiddhiḥ . na hi kim cit tavyadādiṣu niyamakāri śāstram ārabhyate yena tavyadādayaḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3608: yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anavakāśāḥ tavyadādayaḥ ucyante ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3609: . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . yaḥ ca bhavatā hetuḥ vyapadiṣṭaḥ tṛjādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3610: tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti tulyaḥ sa tavyadādiṣu . etāvat iha sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:3611_0: vipratiṣedhe param iti . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ sakṛdgatau virpratiṣedhe yat bādhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3611_1: tat bādhitam eva iti . punaḥ ca paṭhiṣyati punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt siddham iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_0: labhyam iti āha . katham . iha bhavatā dvau hetū vyapadiṣṭau . tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_1: paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti ca apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti ca . tat yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_2: tāvat eṣaḥ hetuḥ tṛjādibhiḥ tulyam paryāyaḥ prāpnoti iti tadā vipratiṣeḍhe param
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_3: iti anena kim kriyate . niyamaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param eva bhavati iti . tadā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_4: upapannam bhavati sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_5: tu eṣaḥ hetuḥ apratipattiḥ vā ubhayoḥ tulyabalatvāt iti tadā vipratiṣedhe param iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3612_6: anena kim kriyate . dvāram . vipratiṣedhe param tāvat bhavati tasmin krṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:3613_0: yadi pūrvam api prāpnoti tat api bhavati . tadā etat upapannam bhavati punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3613_1: siddham iti . vipratiṣedhe param iti uktvā aṅgādhikāre pūrvam iti vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3613_2: kṛtam bhavati . pūrvavipratiṣedhāḥ na paṭhitavyāḥ bhavanti . guṇavṛddhyautvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3613_3: num pūrvavipratiṣiddham . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ iti . katham ye paravipratiṣedhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3613_4: . ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:3614: . vipratiṣedhe param iti eva siddham . katham . paraśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3615: . asti eva vyavasthāyām vartate . tat yathā pūrvaḥ paraḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . paraputraḥ parabhāryā . anyaputraḥ anyabhāryā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3616: gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate . tat yathā param iyaṃ brāhmāṇī asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3617: kuṭumbe . pradhānam iti gamyate . asti iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3618: param dhāma gataḥ iti . iṣṭam dhāma iti gamyate . tat yaḥ iṣṭavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:3619: paraśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3621_0: antaraṅgam ca balīyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam yaṇekādeśettvottvāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3621_1: guṇavṛddhidvirvacanāllopasvarebhyaḥ . guṇāt yaṇādeśaḥ : syonaḥ , syonā . guṇaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3621_2: prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3622: yaṇādeśaḥ bhavatyantaraṅgataḥ . vṛddheḥ yaṇādeśaḥ . dyaukāmiḥ syaukāmiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3623_0: vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3623_1: . dvirvacanāt yaṇādeśaḥ . dudyūṣati susyūṣati . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3623_2: . nityatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . allopasya ca yaṇādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3623_3: ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . svarāt yaṇādeśaḥ . dyaukāmiḥ syaukāmiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3623_4: yaṇādeḥ ca . paratvāt svaraḥ syāt . yaṇādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . guṇāt ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3623_5: . kādraveyaḥ mantram apaśyat . guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3624: ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . vṛddheḥ ekādeśaḥ . vaikṣmāṇiḥ sausthitiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_0: vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_1: . dvirvacanāt ekādeśaḥ . jñāyā odanaḥ jñaudanaḥ . jñaudanam icchati jñaudanīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_2: . jñaudanīyateḥ san jujñaudanīyiṣati . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_3: dvirvacanam syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . allopāt ekādeśaḥ . śunā śune .
GS24pmbhasuu:3625_4: allopaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt allopaḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3626: prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:3627_0: vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3627_1: . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3628: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3629: na asti . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na lākṣaṇikasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3630: . kim tarhi . yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3631: pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti . bahhuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3632: iha api prasajyeta : kumārī iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati nodāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati iti yat ayam śvanśabdam gaurādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3633: paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham hi syān ṅīpā eva . svarāt ekādekādeśaḥ . sautthitiḥ vaikṣmāṇiḥ . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3634_0: paratvātsvaraḥ syāt . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . guṇasya ca ittvottvayoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3634_1: na asti sampradhāraṇā . vṛddheḥ ittvottve . staurṇiḥ paurtiḥ . vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_0: ittvottve bhavataḥ antaraṅgataḥ . dvirvacanāt ittvottve . ātestīryate āpopūryate
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_1: . dvirvacanam ca prāpnoti ittvottve ca . nityatvāt dvirvacanam syāt . ittvottve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3635_2: antaraṅgataḥ . allopasya ca ittvottvayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . svare nāsti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3636: savarṇadīrghatvāt . iṇṅiśīnām āt guṇaḥ savarṇadīrghatvāt prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3637: ayaje indram avape indram . vṛkṣe indram plakṣe indram . ye indram te
GS24pmbhasuu:3638_0: indram . āt guṇaḥ ca prāpnoti savarṇadīrghatvam ca . paratvāt savaraṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3638_1: syāt . āt guṇaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na vā savarṇadīrghatvasya anavakāśatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3638_2: na vā etat antaraṅgeṇa api sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3639_0: kim kāraṇam . savarṇadīrghatvasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśam savarṇadīrghatvam āt
GS24pmbhasuu:3639_1: guṇam bādheta . na etat antaraṅge asti anavakāśam param iti . iha api syonaḥ , syonā
GS24pmbhasuu:3639_2: iti śakyam vaktum na vā paratvāt guṇasya iti . ūṅāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ ītvalopābhyām . ūṅāpoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3639_3: ekādeśaḥ ītvalopābhyām bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . ītvāt ekādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3640: khaṭvīyati mālīyati . ītvam ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ītvam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3641: . ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . lopāt ekādeśaḥ . kāmaṇḍaleyaḥ bhādrabāheyaḥ . lopaḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3642: ekādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . atha kimartham ītvalopābhyām iti ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:3643: lopetvābhyāmiti eva ucyeta . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ mā bhūt iti . āpaḥ api ekādeśaḥ lope prayojayati . cauḍiḥ bālākiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3645_1: . veñ vānīyam śo śānīyam glai glānīyam mlai mlānīyam glācchattram clācchatram . āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3645_2: ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . āttvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3646_0: napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam ca prayojanam . atiri atra atinu atra atiricchattram
GS24pmbhasuu:3646_1: atinucchatram ārāśastri idam dhānāśaṣkuli idam niṣkauśāmbi idam nirvārāṇasi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_0: napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_3: . yaṇādeśāt . agnicit atra somasut atra . ekādeśāt . agnicit idam somasut udakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_4: . guṇāt . agnicite somasute . vṛddheḥ . praṛcchakaḥ prārcchakaḥ . auttvāt . agniciti
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_5: somasuti . dīrghatvāt . jagadbhyām janagadbhyām . ītvāt . jagatyati janagatyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_6: mumaḥ . agnicinmanyaḥ somasunmanyaḥ . etvāt . jagadbhyaḥ janagadbhyaḥ . rīvidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_7: . sukṛtyati pāpakrṭyati . anaṅānaṅbhyām ca iti vaktavyam . sukṛt sukṛtdduṣkrṭau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_8: tuk ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ . tuk bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_9: . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ guṇāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . dhiyati riyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3647_10: . iyaṅādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti guṇaḥ ca . paratvāt guṇaḥ syāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṇgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3648: . prādudruvat prāsusruvat . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam yaṇādeśāt . śveḥ samprasāraṇapūrvatvam yaṇādeśāt bhavati antaraṇgataḥ prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3649_0: śuśuvatuḥ śuśuvuḥ . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt yaṇādeśaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3649_1: . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṇgataḥ . hvaḥ ākāralopāt . hvaḥ ākāralopāt pūrvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3650_0: pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti ākāralopaḥ ca paratvāt ākāralopaḥ syāt . pūrvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3650_1: antaraṅgataḥ . svaraḥ lopāt . svaraḥ lopāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . aupagavī
GS24pmbhasuu:3650_2: saudāmanī . svaraḥ ca prāpnoti lopaḥ ca . paratvāt lopaḥ syāt . svaraḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3651: pratyayavidhiḥ ekādeśāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . agniḥ indraḥ vāyuḥ udakam . pratyayavidhiḥ ca prāpnoti ekādeśaḥ ca . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ syāt . |
GS24pmbhasuu:3652: pratyayavidhiḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . yaṇādeśāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_0: . agniḥ atra vāyuḥ atra . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_1: prayojanam . pacatu atra paṭhtu atra . lādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti yaṇādeśaḥ ca .paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3653_2: yaṇādeśaḥ syāt . lādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3654_0: tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarāt bhavati antaraṅgataḥ prayojanam . pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3654_1: aparaśālāpriyaḥ ṭatpuruṣāntodāttatvam ca prāpnoti pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:3654_2: paratvāt pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam syāt . tatpuruṣāntodāttatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3654_3: . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3656_0: iti eṣā paribhāṣā kriyate nanu ca iyam api kartavyā asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3656_1: iti . kim prayojanam . pacāvedam pacāmedam . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3656_2: antaraṇgalakṣaṇam aitvam mā bhūt iti . ubhe tarhi kartavye . na iti āha . anayā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3657: . iha api syonaḥ syonā iti asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya guṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśo bhaviṣyati . yadi asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_0: antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti ucyate akṣadyūḥ hiraṇyadyūḥ asiddhatvāt asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3658_1: ūṭhaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3659_0: vakṣyāmi na ajānantarye bahiṣṭvaprakḷptiḥ iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3659_1: na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3659_2: asiddhaḥ iti āha . iyam tarhi paribhāṣā kartavyā asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇamantaraṅgalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3660: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam vāhaḥ ūṭh iti ūṭham śāsti . tasya doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3661_0: tasya etasya lakṣaṇasya doṣaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ vṛddhisvarau ekādeśāt antaraṅgataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3661_1: abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ . pūrvaiṣukāmaśamaḥ aparaiṣukāmaśamaḥ guḍodakam tilodakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3662: pūrvottarapadayoḥ vyapavargābhāvāt na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3663_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3663_1: yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . indre
GS24pmbhasuu:3663_2: dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya īti ca iti lopena hriyate aparaḥ ekādeśena . tataḥ anackaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3663_3: indraḥ sampannaḥ . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ vṛddheḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ pūrvapadottarapadyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3663_4: tāvatkāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti tataḥ na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:3664_0: yaṇādeśāt iyuvau . yaṇādeśāt iyuvau antaraṅgataḥ abhinirvṛttāt na prāpnutaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3664_1: sauvaśvaḥ iti . lakṣaṇam hi bhavati yvoḥ vṛddhiprasaṅge iyuvau bhavataḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3665: aci iti ucyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam aci ti ucyate . iha mā bhūtām .
GS24pmbhasuu:3666: aitikāyanaḥ aupagavaḥ iti . stām atra iyuvau lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi lopaḥ na asti . praiyamedhaḥ praiyamgavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_0: usi pararūpāt ca . usi pararūpāt ca antaraṅgataḥ abhinirvṛttāt iyādeśaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_1: . paceyuḥ yajeyuḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate yā iti etasya iy bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_2: . katham tarhi . yās iti etasya iy bhavati iti . luk lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_3: . lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ luk balīyān iti vaktavyam . lopāt . gomān priyaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_4: gomatpriyaḥ yavamatpriyaḥ . gomān iva ācarati gomatyate yavamatyate . yaṇādeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_5: grāmaṇyaḥ kulam grāmaṇikulam senānyaḥ kulam senānikulam . ayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_6: gave hitam gohitam rāyaḥ kulam raikulam nāvaḥ kulam naukulam vṛkādbhayam vṛkabhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3667_7: . luk ca prāpnoti ete ca vidhayaḥ . paratvāt ete vidhayaḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3668: . luk balīyān iti vaktavyam luk yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3669_0: (P_1,4.3.1) KA_I,312.2-313.23 Ro_II,340-344 yū iti kimartham . khaṭvā mālā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:3669_1: ca syāt . khaṭvābandhuḥ mālābandhuḥ . nadī bandhuni iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:3669_2: iha ca bahukhaṭvakaḥ iti nadyṛtaḥ ca iti nityaḥ kap
GS24pmbhasuu:3670: prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na āpaḥ nadīsañjñā bhavati iti yat ayam ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ iti pṛthak ābgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3671: iha tarhi mātre mātuḥ iti āṭ nadyāḥ iti āṭ prasajyeta . kim punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3672: dīrghayoḥ grahaṇam āhosvid hrasvayoḥ . kim cātaḥ . yadi dīrghayoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3673: yū iti nirdeśaḥ na upapadyate . dīrghāt hi pūrvasavarṇaḥ pratiṣidhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3674: uttaratra ca viśeṣaṇam na prakalpeta yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na hrasvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:3675: atha hrasvau na yū . yū hrasvau ceti vipratiṣiddham . atha hrasvayoḥ he
GS24pmbhasuu:3676: śakaṭe atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avaśyam atra vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3677_0: nadīsañjñā eṣitavyā . ubhayam hi iṣyate : he śakaṭi he śakaṭe iti . iha tarhi śakaṭibandhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3677_1: iti nadī bandhuni iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . iha ca bahuśakaṭiḥ iti nadyṛtaḥ ceti
GS24pmbhasuu:3677_2: nityaḥ kap prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṅiti hrasvaḥ ca iti ayam niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3677_3: . ṅiti eva yū hrasvau nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ na nyatra iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_0: vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . nityā nadīsañjñā prāptā
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_1: sā vibhāṣā vidheyā . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_2: bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . atha ayam nityaḥ yogaḥ syāt prakalpeta niyamaḥ . bāḍham prakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_3: . nityaḥ tarthi bhaviṣyati tat katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti . yū stryākhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_4: nadī na iyaṅuvaṅsthānau astrī vāmi . tataḥ ṅiti . ṅiti ca iyaṅuvaṅsthānau yū vā astrī
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_5: nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau
GS24pmbhasuu:3678_6: bhavataḥ . iyaṅuvaṅsthānau vā na iti ca nivṛttam . yadi evam śakaṭaye atra guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3679_0: śeṣagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . katham . idam asti . yū stryākhyau nadī na iyaṅuvaṅsthānau
GS24pmbhasuu:3679_1: astrī vāmi . tataḥ ṅiti . ṅiti ca iyaṅuvaṅsthānau yū vā astrī nadīsañjñau na bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3679_2: . tataḥ hrasvau . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ . tataḥ hrasvau
GS24pmbhasuu:3679_3: . hrasvau ca yū stryākhyau ṅiti nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ . iyaṅuvaṅsthānau vā na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3680: ghisañjñau ca bhavataḥ stryākhyau yū hrasvau ṅiti . tataḥ asakhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3681: sakhivarjitau ca yū hrasvau ghisañjñau bhavataḥ . stryākhyau ṅiti iti ca nivṛttam . yadi tarhi śeṣagrahaṇam na kriyate na arthaḥ ekena api
GS24pmbhasuu:3682: yogavibhāgena . aviśeṣeṇa nadīsañjñā utsargaḥ . tasyāḥ hrasvayoḥ ghisañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3683: bādhikā . tasyām nityāyām prāptāyām ṅiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_0: astu dīrghayoḥ . nanu ca uktam nirdeśaḥ na upapadyate . dīrghāt hi pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_1: pratiṣidhyate . vā chandasi iti evam bhaviṣyati . chandasi iti ucyate na ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_2: chandaḥ . chandovat sūtrāṇi bhavanti iti . yat api ucyate uttaratra viśeṣeṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3684_3: prakalpeta yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_0: hrasvau atha hrasvau na yū . yū hrasvau iti vipratiṣiddham iti . na etat vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_1: . āha ayam yū hrasvau iti . yadi yū na hrasvau . atha hrasvau na yū . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3685_2: yvoḥ yau hrasvau iti . kau ca yvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_0: hrasvau . savarṇau . atha stryākhyau iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . striyam ācakṣāte stryākhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_1: . yadi evam stryākhyāyau iti prāpnoti . anupasarge hi kaḥ vidhīyate . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3686_2: idam bhavati yasmin daśa sahasrāṇi putre
GS24pmbhasuu:3687: jāte gavām dadau . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ priyākhyebhyaḥ saḥ ayam uñchena jīvati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3688: chandovat kavayaḥ kurvanti . na hi eṣā iṣṭiḥ . evam tarhi karmasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3689: bhaviṣyati : striyām ākhyāyete stryākhyau . yadi karmasādhanaḥ kṛtstriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_0: dhātustriyāḥ ca na sidhyati . tantryai lakṣmyai śriyai bhruvai . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_1: bhaviṣyati . striyām ākhyā anayoḥ stryākhyau . evam api kṛtstriyāḥ dhātustriyāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3690_2: na sidhyati . tantryai lakṣmyai śriyai bhruvai
GS24pmbhasuu:3691: . evam tarhi vic bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu kaḥ eva . striyam ācakṣāte stryākhyau iti . nanu ca uktam stryākhyāyau iti prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3692: anupasarge hi kaḥ vidhīyate . mūlavibhujādipāṭhāt kaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam yasmin daśa sahasrāṇi putre jāte
GS24pmbhasuu:3693: gavām dadau . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ priyākhyebhyaḥ saḥ ayam uñchena jīvati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3694_0: (P_1,4.3.2) KA_I,313.23-315.3 Ro_II,345-349 atha ākhyāgrahaṇam kimartham . nadīsañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3694_1: ākhyāgrahaṇam strīviṣayārtham . nadīsañjñāyām ākhyāgrahaṇam strīviṣayārtham . strīviṣayau
GS24pmbhasuu:3695: nadīsañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt grāmaṇye senānye striyai iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3697: prathamaliṅge yau stryākhau iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam kviblupsamāsāḥ . kumāryai brāhmaṇāya . lup . kharakuṭyai brāhmaṇāya .
GS24pmbhasuu:3698: atitantryai brāhmaṇāya atilakṣmyai brāhmaṇāya . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . avayavastrīviṣayatvāt siddham . avayavaḥ atra strīviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3699_0: tadāśrayā nadīsañjñā bhaviṣyati . avayavastrīviṣayatvāt siddham iti cet iyaṅuvaṅsthānapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:3699_2: siddham iti cet iyaṅuvaṅsthānapratiṣedhe yaṇsthānayoḥ api yvoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3700: ādhyai pradhyai brāhmaṇyai . kim kāraṇam . avayavasya iyaṅuvaṅsthānatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_0: avayavaḥ atra iyaṅuvaṅsthānaḥ . siddham tvaṅgarūpagrahaṇāt yasya aṅgasya iyuvau tatpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_1: . siddham etat . katham . aṅgarūpam gṛhyate . yasya aṅgasya iyuvau bhavataḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3701_2: idam grahaṇam . na ca etasya aṅgasya iyuvau bhavataḥ . hrasveyuvsthānapravṛttau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3702_0: ca pravṛttau ca prāk ca pravṛtteḥ strīvacanau eva nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3702_1: . śakaṭyai atiśakaṭyai brāmaṇāṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śakaṭaye atiśakaṭaye brāhmaṇāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3702_2: . dhenvai atidhenvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3703: dhenave atidhenave brāhmaṇāya . śriyai atiśriyai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3704: . śriye atiśriye brāhmaṇāya . bhruvai atibhruvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:3705: . bhruve atibhruve brāhmaṇāya . aparaḥ āha : hrasvau ca iyuvsthānau ca pravṛttau api strīvacanau eva nadīsañjñau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_0: śakaṭyai , atiśakaṭyai brāmaṇāṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śakaṭaye atiśakaṭaye brāhmaṇāya
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_1: . dhenvai atidhenvai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . dhenave atidhenave brāhmaṇāya . śriyai
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_2: atiśriyai brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . śriye atiśriye brāhmaṇāya . bhruvai atibhruvai
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_3: brāhmaṇyai . kva mā bhūt . bhruve atibhruve brāhmaṇāya . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_4: . prathamaliṅgagrahaṇam coditam . tat dveṣyam vijānīyāt : sarvam etat vikalpate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3706_5: . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe hrasvau ca iyuvsthānau ca pravṛttau ca prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:3708: ṣaṣthīyuktaḥ chandasi . ṣaṣthīyuktaḥ patiśabdaḥ chandasi ghisañjñaḥ bhavati . tataḥ vā . vā chandasi sarve vidhayo bhavati . supām vyatyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3710: puruṣavyatyayaḥ . ātmanepadavyatyayaḥ . parasmaipadavyatyayaḥ . supām vyatyayaḥ . yukta māta asīt dhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ . dakṣiṇāyām iti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:3711: tiṅām vyatyayaḥ . caṣalam ye aśvayūpaya takṣati . takṣanti iti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:3712: varṇavyatyayaḥ . triṣṭubhaujaḥ śubhitam ugravīram . suhitamiti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:3713: liṅgavyatyayaḥ . madhoḥ gṛhṇāti madhoḥ tṛptāḥ iva āsate . madhunaḥ iti prāpte . kālavyatyayaḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhāsyamānena śvaḥ somena yakṣamāṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3714: . śvaḥ ādhātā śvaḥ yaṣṭā iti prāpte . puruṣavyatyayaḥ . adhā saḥ vīraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3715: daśabhiḥ viyūyāḥ . viyūyāt iti prāpte . ātmanepadavyatyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3716: brahmacāriṇam icchate . icchati iti prāpte . parasmaipadavyatyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3718: anvīpam anyaḥ ūrmiḥ yudhyati . yudhyate iti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:3720: atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . yasmāt vidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3721: iyati ucyamāne strī iyatī strīyati iti atra api prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:3722_0: pratyayagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vidhigrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3722_1: yasmāt pratyayaḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne dadhi adhunā madhu adhunā
GS24pmbhasuu:3722_2: atrāpi prasajyeta . vidhigrahaṇeṇa punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . tat etat pratyayagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3722_3: vidhigrahaṇena ca samuditena kriyate sanniyogaḥ . yasmāt yaḥ pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3722_4: tadādi tasmin aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti . atha tadādigrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_0: aṅgasañjñāyām tadādivacanam syādinumartham . aṅgasañjñāyām tadādigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3723_1: syādyartham numartham ca . syādyartham tāvat . kariṣyāvaḥ kariṣyāmaḥ . numartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3724: mitvataḥ suḍvataḥ ca pasamkhyānam kartavyam . mitvataḥ . bhinatti chinatti abhinat acchinat . suḍvataḥ . sañcarakastu sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3725: na sidhyati . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_0: asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . vakṣyati etat saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_1: kṛñartham . yadi saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kriyate na arthaḥ saṃyogādigrahaṇena . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_2: api sasvaratuḥ sasvaruḥ iti saṃyogopadhasya iti eva siddham . bhavet evamarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_3: na arthaḥ . idam tu na sidhyati sañcakaratuḥ sañcaskaruḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_4: . iha tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadādeḥ vā na cedam tat na api tadādi . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_5: tadādyādivacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tadādyādi aṅgasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3726_6: . kim idam tadādyādi iti . tasya ādiḥ tadādiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:3727: tadādiḥ ādiḥ yasya tadidam tadādyādi iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:3728: uṣṭramukham iva mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ , kharamukhaḥ , evam tadādyādi tadādi iti . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā siddham . tadekadeśavijñānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3729_0: etat . tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate. tad yathā . gaṅgā yamunā devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:3729_1: iti . anekā nadī gaṅgām yamunām ca praviṣṭā gaṅgāyamunāgrahaṇena gṛhyate . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3730_0: viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . iha ke cit śabdāḥ aktaparimāṇānām arthānām vācakāḥ bhavanti ye
GS24pmbhasuu:3730_1: ete saṅkhyāśabdāḥ parimāṇaśabdāḥ ca . pañca sapta iti : ekena api apāye na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3730_2: . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti : naivā adhike bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_0: na ca nyūne . ke cit yāvat eva tat bhavati tāvat eva āhuḥ ye ete jātiśabdāḥ guṇaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_1: ca . tailam ghṛtam iti : khāryām api bhavanti droṇe api . śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3731_2: : himavati api bhavati vaṭakaṇikāmātre api dravye . aṅgasañjñā ca api aktaparimāṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3732: syāt . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:3733: gṛhyate iti yat ayam na idamadasoḥ akoḥ iti sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . idamadasoḥ kāryam ucyamānam kaḥ prasaṅgo yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3734: sakakārayoḥ syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ tadekadeśabhūtam tadgrahaṇena gṛhyate iti tataḥ sakakārayoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3735: (P_1,4.13.2) KA_I,317.5-318.4 Ro_II,356-359 atha dvitīyam pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . pratyayagrahaṇam padādau aprasaṅgārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3736: pratyayagrahaṇam kriyate padādau aṅgasañjñā mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3737: stryartham , śryartham , bhvartham : aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:3738: parimāṇārtham ca . parimāṇārtham ca dvitīyam pratyayagrahaṇam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_0: yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi aṅgam iti iyati ucyamāne dāśatayasya api aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3739_1: prasajyeta . tat tarhi kartavyam . na kartavyam . kena idānīm aṅgakāryam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3740_0: pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhīṣe prākarot upaihiṣṭa upasargāt pūrvau aḍāṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:3740_1: prāpnutaḥ . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_0: pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3741_1: . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā paribhāṣā kriyeta pratyayagrahaṇam vā . avaśyam eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3742: prayojanāni . prayojanam dhātuprātipadikapratyayasamāsataddhitavidhisvarāḥ . dhātu . devadattaḥ cikīrṣati . saṅghātasya dhātusañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3743: prātipadika . devadattḥ gārgyaḥ . saṅghātasya prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3744: pratyaya . mahāntam putram icchati . samghātāt pratyayotpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3745: samāsa . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samghātasya samāsasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3746_0: taddhitavidhi . devadattaḥ gārgyāyaṇaḥ . samghātāt taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti . svara
GS24pmbhasuu:3746_1: . devadattaḥ gārgyaḥ . samghātsya ñnityādiḥ nityam iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3746_2: yasmāt sa tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:3746_3: paribhāṣā kartavyā na kartavyā . evam vakṣyāmi : yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:3746_4: gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyate . tataḥ aṅgam . aṅgasañjñam ca bhavati yasmā tpratyayavidhiḥ tadādi
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_0: saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti ucyate avatapenakulasthitam te etat udakeviśīrṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_1: te etat sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_2: yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi : kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_3: api . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati ti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3748_4: . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam samāsataddhitavidhisvarāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3749: samāsa . avatapenakulasthitam te etat udakeviśīrṇam te etat sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . samāsa . taddhitavidhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:3750: sāṅkūṭinam vyāvakrośī . samghātāt taddhitopattiḥ siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3751_0: taddhitavidhi . svara . dūrāt āgataḥ dūrādāgataḥ iti . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3751_1: iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3751_2: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3752: eṣā paribhāṣa iti yat ayam gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti anantaragrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3754: suptiṅ padam iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantānām bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3755: tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . padasañjñāyām antavacanam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3756: sañjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhipratiṣedhārtham . padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3757_0: anyatra sañjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:3757_1: prayojanam . taraptamau ghaḥ . taraptamabantasya ghasañjñā na bhavati . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3758: bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi etat jñāpyate sanādyantāḥ dhātavaḥ iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3759: antagrahaṇam kartavyam . idam tṛtīyam jñāpakārtham . dve tāvat kriyete
GS24pmbhasuu:3760: nyāse eva . yat api ucyate kṛttaddhitasamāsāḥ ca iti antagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . arthavat iti vartate kṛttaddhāntam ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3761: arthavat na kevalāḥ kṛtaḥ taddhitāḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3762_0: (P_1,4.15) KA_I,319.8-9 Ro_II,363 kimartham idam ucyate na subantam padam iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3762_1: siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayamārambhaḥ . nāntameva kye padasañjñam bhavati na anyat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3764_0: tatra te rājā takṣā asarvanāmasthāne iti padasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:3764_1: apratiṣedhāt . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ sarvanāmasthāne na iti . kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3765: sarvanāmasthāne avyāpāraḥ . yadi kena citprāpnoti tena bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3766: pūrveṇa ca prāpnoti . aprāpteḥ vā . atha vā anantarā yā prāptiḥ sā
GS24pmbhasuu:3767: pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . antarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_0: iti . pūrvā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā tayā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ pūrvām prāptim
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_1: bādhate . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_2: . svādiṣu pūrvam padasañjñam bhavati . tataḥ sarvanāmasthāne ayacipūrvam padasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:3768_3: bhavati . tato bham . bhasañjñam ca bhavati yajādau asarvanāmasthāne iti . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3769: ecaḥ plutavikāre padāntagrahaṇam coditam iha mā bhūt bhadram karoṣi gauḥ iti tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti . vākyapadayoḥ antyasya iti evam tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:3770: bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadbhyaḥ etayoḥ padasañjñā vaktavyā . bhuvadvadbhyaḥ dhārayadvadbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_0: (P_1,4.18) KA_I,320.2-14 Ro_II,365-366 bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3771_1: . bhasañjñāyām uttarapadalope ṣaṣaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anukampitaḥ ṣaḍaḍguliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_0: siddham etat . katham . acaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt bhasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_1: prāpnoti . vāgāśīrdattaḥ vācikaḥ iti . vakṣyati etat : siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3772_2: uttarapadalopavacanāt iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti ṣaḍaḍguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_0: . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām vati upasamkhyānam . nabhoṅgiromanuṣām vati upasamkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_1: . nabhasvat aṅgirasvat manuṣvat . vṛṣaṇ vasvaśvayoḥ . vṛṣaṇ iti etasya vasvaśayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3773_2: bhasañjñā vaktavyā . vṛṣaṇvasuḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya yat śiraḥ vṛṣaṇaśvasya mene .
GS24pmbhasuu:3775_0: tasau matau iti eva ucyeta . tasau matau iti iyati ucyamāne ihaiva syāt payasvān
GS24pmbhasuu:3775_1: yaśasvān . iha na syāt payasvī yaśasvī . arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe matupi ca siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3775_2: bhavati yaḥ ca nyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ tasmin ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3776: . yadi arthagrahaṇam kriyate payasvān yaśasvān atra na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi matup matvarthe vartate . matup api matvarthe vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3777: tat yathā devadattaśālāyām brāhmaṇā ānīyantām iti ukte yadi devadattaḥ pi brāhmaṇaḥ bhavati saḥ api ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3778: (P_1,4.20) KA_I,320.23 Ro_II,367 ubhayasañjñānyapi iti vaktavyam . saḥ suṣṭhubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3779: (P_1,4.21.1) KA_I,321.2-27 Ro_II,368-372 bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3780: . keṣu bahuṣu . artheṣu . yadi evam vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3781_0: bahavaḥ te arthāḥ mūlam skandhaḥ phalam palāśam iti . evam tarhi ekavacanam dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3781_1: bahuvacanamiti śabdasañjñāḥ etāḥ . yeṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante teṣu bahuṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3782: karmādiṣu . na vai karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . ke tarhi . ekatvādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3783: ekatvādiṣu api vai vibhakyartheṣu avaśyam karmādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ . karmaṇaḥ ekatve karmaṇaḥ dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . saḥ tarhi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3784: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3785: nirdeśaḥ . iha ca : iti eke manyante , tat eke manyante iti paratvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti . bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ paraḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3786: sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . iha ca : bahuḥ odanaḥ , bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3787: paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate na hi antareṇa bhāvaprayayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ iti tan na .
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_0: antareṇa api bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati nirdeśaḥ . katham . iha kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_1: guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti . kadā cit ca guṇinā guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3788_2: vypadiśyate . paṭhasya śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3789: guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati paṭaḥ śuklaḥ iti tadā sāmānādhikaraṇyam guṇaguṇinoḥ . tadā na antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guṇapradhānaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_0: nirdeśaḥ . yadā tu guṇinā guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate paṭasya śuklaḥ iti svapradhānaḥ tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_1: guṇaḥ bhavati . tadā dravye ṣaṣṭhī . tadā antareṇa bhāvapratyayam guaṇapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_2: bhavati nirdeśaḥ . na ca iha vayam ekatvādibhiḥ karmādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3790_3: . karmādibhiḥ ekatvādīn viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . ekasmin ekavacanam . kasyaikasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3791: dvayoḥ dvivacanam . kayoḥ dvayoḥ . karmaṇoḥ . bahuṣu bahuvacanam . keṣām bahuṣu . karmaṇām iti . katham bahuṣu bahuvacanamiti . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:3792: ācāryaḥ nānādhikaraṇavācī yaḥ bahuśabdaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam na vaipulyavācinaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . yat uktam bahuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_0: odanaḥ bahuḥ sūpaḥ iti paratvāt bahuvacanam prāpnoti iti sa doṣaḥ na bhavati . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_1: apyucyate iti eke manyante tat eke manyanta iti paratvāt ekavacanam prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_2: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva samkhyāvācī . tat yathā ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_3: dvau bahavaḥ iti . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā ekāgnayaḥ ekahalāni ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_4: jitam iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3793_5: iti arthaḥ . tat yaḥ anyārthe vartate tasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3794: (P_1,4.21.2) KA_I,322.1-25 Ro_II,372-375 kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3795: suptiṅām aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣtaviprayogatvāt ca niyamārtham vacanam . supaḥ aviśeṣeṇa prātipadikamātrāt vidhīyante . tiṅaḥ aviśeṣeṇa dhātumātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3796: vidhīyante . tatra etat syāt yadi apyaviśeṣeṇa vidhīyante na eva viprayogaḥ lakṣyate iti . dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca . dṛśyate khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:3797: viprayogaḥ . tadyathā : akṣīṇi me darśanīyāni , pādāḥ me sukumārāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3798: suptiṅoḥ aviśeṣavidhānāt dṛṣṭaviprayogatvāt ca vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3799: iṣyate ca avyatikaraḥ syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti niyamārtham vacanam . evamartham idam ucyate . atha etasmin niyamārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_0: sati kim punaḥ ayam pratyayaniyamaḥ : ekasmin eva ekavacanam , dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_1: , bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam iti . āhosvit arthaniyamaḥ : ekasmin ekavacanam eva , dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_2: dvivacanam eva , bahuṣu bahuvacanam eva iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame
GS24pmbhasuu:3800_3: avyayānām padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt . tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām padasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3801: uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . asubantatvāt . arthaniyame siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3802: arthaniyame siddham bhavati . astu arthaniyamaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu pratyayaniyamaḥ . nanu ca uktam : tatra pratyayaniyame avyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3803: padasañjñābhāvaḥ asubantatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . supām karmādayaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:3804: arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3805: ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3806: niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_0: dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_1: iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati utpadyante avyayebhyaḥ svādayaḥ iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3807_2: avyayāt āpsupaḥ iti avyayāt lukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3808: (P_1,4.23.1) KA_I,323.2-324.5 Ro_II,376-379 kim idam kārake iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3809: sañjñānirdeśaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_0: . iha hi vyākaraṇe ye vā ete loke pratītapadārthakāḥ śabdāḥ taiḥ nirdeśāḥ kriyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_1: paśuḥ apatyam devatā iti yāḥ vā etāḥ kṛtrimāḥ ṭighughabhasañjñāḥ tābhiḥ . na ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:3810_2: loke dhruvādīnām pratītapadārthakaḥ śabdaḥ na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:3811: api kṛtrimā sañjñā anyatra avidhānāt . sañjñādhikāraḥ ca ayam . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . kārake iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_0: cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ . kārake iti sañjñānirdeśaḥ cetsañjñinaḥ api nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_1: . sādhakam nirvartakam kārakasañjñam bhavati iti vaktavyam . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_2: grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti akārakasya . itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . akārakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_3: api apādādanasañjñā prasajyeta . kva . grāmasya samīpāt āgacchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_4: . na atra grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ . kim tarhi . samīpam . yadā ca grāmaḥ apāyayuktaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3812_5: bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā . tat yathā grāmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3813: āgacchati iti . karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam pṛcchati iti . karmasañjñā ca prāpnoti akathitasya. kva .
GS24pmbhasuu:3814: brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam akathitaśabdaḥ asti eva saṅkīrtite vartate . tat yathā kaḥ cit kam cit
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_0: sañcakṣya āha asau atra akathitaḥ . asaṃkīrtitaḥ iti gamyate . asti aprādhānye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3815_1: . tat yathā akathitaḥ asau grāme akathitaḥ asau nagare iti ucyate yaḥ yatra apradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3816_0: akathitśabdaḥ vartate tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ akathitasya brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3816_1: putram panthānam pṛcchati iti . apādānam ca vṛkṣasya parṇam patati iti . apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3816_2: ca prāpnoti . kva . vṛkṣasya parṇam patati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3817: kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patati iti . nā vā apāyasyāvivakṣitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3818: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apāyasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3819_0: . kim tarhi . sambandhaḥ . yadā ca apāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ bhavati bhavati tadā apādānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3819_1: . tat yathā . vṛkṣāt parṇam patati iti . sambandhastu tadā na vivakṣitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3819_2: . na jñāyate kaṅkasya vā kurarasya vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3821: karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ ca akathitasya brāhmaṇasya putram panthānam pṛcchati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kārakaḥ iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:3822: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākāraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etatprayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:3823: karoti iti kārakam iti . anvartham iti cet akartari kartṛśabdānupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3824_0: anvartham iti cet akartari kartṛśabdaḥ na upapadyate . karaṇam kārakam adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3824_1: kārakam iti . siddham tu pratikārakam kriyābhedāt pacādīnām karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3825: kutaḥ . pratikārakam kriyābhedāt pacādīnām . pacādīnām hi pratikārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3826: kriyā bhidyate . kim idam pratikārakam iti . kārakam kārakam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:3827: pratikārakam . kaḥ asau pratikārakam kriyābhedaḥ pacādīnām .
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_0: devadattaḥ pacati iti ucyate . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3829_1: . etat pradhānakartuḥ kartṛtvam . droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati ti sambhavanakriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3830_0: droṇam pacati āḍhakam pacati iti sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kurvatī sthālī
GS24pmbhasuu:3830_1: pacati iti ucatye . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ dhikaraṇasya pākaḥ . etat adhikaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3830_2: kartṛtvam . edhāḥ pakṣyanti ā viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti jvalvanakriyā karaṇasya pākaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3830_3: . edhāḥ pakṣyanti viklitteḥ jvaliṣyanti iti kurvanti kāṣṭhāni pacanti iti ucyante
GS24pmbhasuu:3830_4: . tatra tadā paciḥ vartate . eṣaḥ karaṇasya pākaḥ .etat karaṇasya kartṛtvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_0: udyamananipātanāni kartuḥ chidikriyā . udyamananipātanāni kurvan devadattaḥ chinatti
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_1: iti ucyate . tatra tadā chidiḥ vartate . eṣaḥ pradhānakartuḥ chedaḥ . etat pradhānakartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_2: kartṛtvam . yat tat na tṛṇena tatparaśoḥ chedanam . yat tat samāne udyamane nipātane
GS24pmbhasuu:3831_3: ca paraśunā chidyate na tṛṇena tat paraśoḥ chedanam . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3832: itarathā hi asitṛṇayoḥ chedane aviśeṣaḥ syāt . yaḥ hi manyata
GS24pmbhasuu:3833: udyamananipātanāt eva etat bhavati chinatti iti asitṛṇayoḥ chedane na tasya viśeṣaḥ syāt . yat asinā chidyate tṛṇena api tat chidyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:3834: apādānādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ . apādānādīnām kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ . yathā hi bhavatā karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛtvam nirdarśitam na tathā apādānādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3835: kartṛtvam nidarśyate . na vā svatantraparatantratvāt tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3836: svatantraparatantratvāt . sarvatra eva atra svātantryam pāratantryam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3837_0: vivakṣitam . tayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam . tayoḥ svātantryapāratantryayoḥ paryāyeṇa vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3837_1: bhaviṣyati . vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . balāhakāt vidyotate .
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_0: . kim tarhi ucyate apādānādīnām tu aprasiddhiḥ iti . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ apādānādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_1: kartṛtvasya aprasiddhiḥ iti . paryāptam karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ kartṛtvam nidarśitam apādānīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_2: kartṛtvanirdarśanāya . paryāptaḥ hyekaḥ pulākaḥ sthālyāḥ nirdarśanāya . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_3: . sañjñāyāḥ aprasiddhiḥ . yāvatā sarvatra eva atra svātantryam vidyate pāratantryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3838_4: ca tatra paratvāt kartṛsañjñā eva prāpnoti . atra api na vā svatantryaparatantratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3839: paryāyeṇa vacanam vacanāśrayā ca sañjñā iti eva . yathā punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:3840: sthālyāḥ svātantryam nidarśitam sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca kurvatī sthālī svatantrā iti kva idānīm paratantrā syāt . yat tat prakṣālanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3841: parivartanam vā . na vai evamartham sthālī upādiyate prakṣālanam
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_0: parivartanam ca kariṣyāmi iti . katham tarhi . sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_1: kariṣyati iti . tatra ca sau svatantrā . kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi sthālīsthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3842_2: yatne kathyamāne sthālī svatantrā kartṛsthe yatne kathyamāne paratantrā . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3843_0: yatne kathyamāne sthālī sambhavanakriyām dhāraṇakriyām ca karoti . tatra asau svatantrā
GS24pmbhasuu:3843_1: . kva idānīm paratantrā . evam tarhi pradhānena samavāye sthālī paratantrā vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:3843_2: svatantrā . tat yathā amātyādīnām rājñā saha samavāye pāratantryam vyavāye svātantryam
GS24pmbhasuu:3844: .katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā pradhānam iti . yat sarveṣu sādhaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3845: samnihiteṣu kartā pravartayitā bhavati . nanu ca bhoḥ pradhānena api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_0: samavāye sthālyāḥ anenārthaḥ adhikaraṇam kārakam iti . na hi kārakam iti anena adhikaraṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_1: uktam adhikaraṇamiti vā kārakatvam . ubhau ca anyonyaviśeṣakau bhavataḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_2: . ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . tat yathā gārgyaḥ devadattaḥ iti . na hi gārgyaḥ iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_3: devadattatvam uktam devadattaḥ iti anena vā gārgyatvam . ubhau ca anyonyaviśeṣakau
GS24pmbhasuu:3846_4: bhavataḥ ekadravyasamavāyitvāt . evam tarhi sāmānyabhūtā kriyā vartate tasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3847: nirvartakam kārakam . atha vā yāvat brūyāt kriyāyāmiti tāvat kārake iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3848: evam ca kṛtvā nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati kārake iti . itarathā hi kārakeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3851: . grāmāt āgacchati śakaṭena . na etat asti . karaṇasañjñā atra bādhikā
GS24pmbhasuu:3852: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi grāmāt āgacchan kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam bhuṅkte iti . atra api adhikaraṇasañjñā bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi vṛkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3853: parṇam patati . kuḍyasya piṇḍaḥ patiti iti . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasamkhyānam . jugupsāvirāmapramādārthānām upasamkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3854: jugupsā . adharmāt jugupsate. adharmāt bībhatsate . virāma |
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_0: viramati. dharmāt nivartate . pramāda . dharmāt pramādyati . dharmāt muhyati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_1: ca upasamkhyānam kartavyam . sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3856_2: tarhi idam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat adharmāt jugupsate adharmāt bībhatsate
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_0: prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati duḥkhaḥ adharmaḥ na anena kṛtyam asti iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_1: buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvamapāye apādānam iti eva siddham . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_2: dharmāt viramati dharmāt nivartate iti dharmāt pramādyati dharmāt muhyati iti . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3857_3: eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ sambhinnabuddhiḥ bhavati saḥ paśyati na idam kim cit dharmaḥ nāma na
GS24pmbhasuu:3858_0: saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvamapāye apādānam iti eva siddham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3858_1: ca sāmkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti . yaḥ taiḥ sāmyam gatavān bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3858_2: saḥ etatprayuṅkte . gatiyukteṣu apādānasañjñā na papadyate adhruvatvāt . gatiyukteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:3858_3: apādānasañjñā na upapadyate . aśvāt trastāt patitaḥ . rathāt pravītāt patitaḥ . sārthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3859: kim kāraṇam . adhruvatvāt . na vā adhrauvyasya avivikṣitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3860: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . adhrauvyasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra adhrauvyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3861: vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . dhrauvyam . iha tāvat aśvāt trastāt patitaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_0: yat tadaśve aśvatvam āśugāmitvam tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam . rathāt pravītāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_1: patitaḥ iti yat tat rathe rathatvam ramante asmin rathaḥ iti tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:3862_2: . sārthāt gacchataḥ hīnaḥ iti yat tatsārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:3863: sārthatvam sahārthībhāvaḥ tat dhruvam tat ca vivakṣiktam . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3864: atra etat śakyate vaktum ye tu ete atyantagatiyuktāḥ tatra katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3865: dhāvataḥ patitaḥ . tvaramāṇāt patitaḥ iti . atra api na vā adhrauvyasya avivakṣitatvāt iti eva siddham . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avivakṣā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3866: sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3867: asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3868: (P_1,4.24.2) KA_I,327.23-328.3 Ro_II,392-393 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3869: . katham vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti caurebhyaḥ trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . iha tāvat vṛkebhyaḥ bibheti dasyubhyaḥ bibheti
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_0: iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi mām vṛkāḥ paśyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_1: dhruvaḥ me mṛtyuḥ iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_2: iti eva siddham . iha caurebhyaḥ trāyate dasyubhyaḥ trāyate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_3: prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ paśyati yadi imam paśyanti dhruvam asya vadhabandhaparikleśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3870_4: iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:3871: (P_1,4.26) KA_I,328.5-8 Ro_II,393 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_0: katham adhyayanāt parājayate iti . yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_1: paśyati duḥkham adhyayanam durdharam ca guravaḥ ca durupacārāḥ iti . saḥ buddhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3872_2: samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3873_0: (P_1,4.27) KA_I,328.10-24 Ro_II,393-395 kim udāharaṇam . māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3873_1: bhaved yasya māṣāḥ na gāvaḥ tasya māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ . yasya tu khalu gāvaḥ na māṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3873_2: katham tasya māṣāḥ īpsitāḥ syuḥ . tasya api māṣāḥ eva īpsitāḥ . ātaḥ ca īpsitāḥ yavebhyḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3874: vārayati iti kūpe apādānasañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi tasya kūpaḥ īpsitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3875: kaḥ tarhi . andhaḥ . tasya api kūpaḥ eva īpsitaḥ . paśyati ayam andhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3876: kūpam mā prāpat iti . atha vā yathā eva asya anyatra apaśyataḥ īpsā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:3877_0: kūpe api . iha agneḥ māṇavakam vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prāpnoti . karmasañjñātra
GS24pmbhasuu:3877_1: bādhikā bhaviṣyati . agnau api tarhi bādhikā syāt . tasmāt vaktavyam karmaṇaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:3878: vāraṇartheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti vacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3879_0: vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3879_1: vacanāt . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti eva siddham . ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:3879_2: . katham māṣebhyaḥ gāḥ vārayati iti . paśyati ayam yadi imāḥ gāvaḥ tatra gacchanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3880: ca eva rājabhayam ca . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3881: (P_1,4.28) KA_I,329.2-4 Ro_II,396 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3882: katham upādhyāyāt antardhatte iti . paśyati ayam yadi mām upādhyāyaḥ paśyati dhruvam preṣaṇam upālambhaḥ vā iti . saḥ buddhyā samprāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:3883: nivartate . tatra dhruvam apāye apādānam iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3884: (P_1,4.29) KA_I,329.6-22 Ro_II,396-398 upayoge iti kimartham . naṭasya śṛṇoti . granthikasya śṛṇoti . upayoge iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3885_0: eṣaḥ api hi upayogaḥ . ātaḥ ca upayogaḥ yat ārambhakāḥ raṅgam gacchanti naṭasya śroṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3885_1: , granthikasya śroṣyāmaḥ iti . evam tarhi upayoge iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca upayogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3885_2: tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ upayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3885_3: granthārthayoḥ . atha vā upayogaḥ kaḥ bhavitum arhati . yaḥ niyamapūrvakaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3885_4: yathā upayuktāḥ māṇavakāḥ iti ucyante ye ete niyamapūrvakam adhītavantaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:3886_0: anupayoge kārakam āhosvit akārakam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:3886_1: iti cet akathitvāt karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ . ākhyātā anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3886_2: karmasañjñā prāpnoti . astu tarhi akārakam . akārakam iti cet upayogavacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3886_3: . yadi akārakam upayogavacanam anarthakam . astu tarhi kārakam . nanu ca uktam ākhyātā
GS24pmbhasuu:3886_4: anupayoge kārakam iti cet akathitatvāt karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3887: ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham upādhyāyāt adhīte iti . apakrāmati tasmāt tadadhyayanam . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3888: sattatatvāt . atha vā jyotirvat jñānāni bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3889: (P_1,4.30) KA_I,329.24-330.2 Ro_II,399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3890: katham gomayāt vṛścikaḥ jāyate . golomāvilomabhyaḥ durvāḥ jāyante iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3891: apakrāmanti tāḥ tebhyaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3892: santatatvāt . atha vā anyāḥ canyāḥ ca prādurbhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3893: (P_1,4.31) KA_I,330.4-6 Ro_II,399 ayam api yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:3894: katham himavataḥ gaṅgā prabhavati iti . apakrāmanti tāḥ tasmāt āpaḥ . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . santatatvāt . atha vā anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3896: (P_1,4.32.1) KA_I,330.8-17 Ro_II,400-401 karmagrahaṇam kimartham . yam abhipraiti saḥ sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne karmaṇaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:3897: sampradānasañjñā prasajyeta . karmagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . karma nimittatvena āśrīyate . atha yamsagrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:3898_0: karmaṇā abhipraiti sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne abhiprayataḥ eva sampradānasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:3898_1: prasajyeta . yamsagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . yamsagrahaṇāt abhiprayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3898_2: sampradānasañjñā nirbhajyate . atha abhipragrahaṇam kimartham . karmaṇā yam eti sa
GS24pmbhasuu:3898_3: sampradānam iti iyati ucyamāne yam eva sampratyeti tatra eva syāt . upādhyāyāya gām
GS24pmbhasuu:3899: iha na syāt . upādhyāyāya gām adāt . upādhyāyāya gām dāsyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3900: abhipragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . abhiḥ ābhimukhye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:3901: praśabdaḥ ādikarmaṇi . tena yam ca abhipraiti yam ca abhipraiṣyati yam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:3903_0: (P_1,4.32.2) KA_I,330.18-331.4 Ro_II,401-403 kriyāgrahaṇam api kartavyam . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3903_1: yathā syāt . śrāddhāya nigarhate . yuddhāya sannahyate . patye śete iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:3903_2: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . katham . kriyām hi loke karma iti upacaranti . kām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:3904: . evam api kartavyam . kṛtrimākṛtrimayoḥ kṛtrime sampratyayaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3905: kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . na sidhyati . kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate katham ca nāma kriyayā kriyā īpsitatamā syāt . kriyā api kriyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3906_0: īpsitatamā bhavati . kayā kriyayā . sandarśanakriyayā vā prārthayatikriyayā vā adhyavasyatikriyayā
GS24pmbhasuu:3906_1: vā . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati saḥ buddhyā tāvat kamcidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:3907: prārthanā prārthanāyām adhavasāyaḥ adhyavasāye ārambhaḥ ārambhe nirvṛttiḥ nirvṛttau phalāvāptiḥ . evam kriyā api kṛtrimam karma . evam api karmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3908: karaṇasañjñā vaktavyā sampradānasya ca karmasañjñā . paśunā rudram yajate
GS24pmbhasuu:3909: . paśum rudrāya dadāti iti arthaḥ . agnau kila paśuḥ prakṣipyate tat rudrāya pahriyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3911: nānārthāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekārthāḥ kimartham pṛthak nirdiśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:3912: atha nānārthāḥ katham kupinā śakyante viśeṣayitum . evam tarhi nānārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3913: kupau tu eṣām sāmānyam asti . na hi akupitaḥ krudhyate na vā akupitaḥ druhyati na vā akupitaḥ īrṣyati na vā akupitaḥ asūyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3915: sādhakam karaṇam iti eva ucyeta ṣādhakam karaṇam iti iyati ucyamāne sarveṣām kārakāṇām karaṇasañjñā prasajyeta . sarvāṇi hi kārakāṇi sādhakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:3916: . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3917: pūrvāḥ tāvat sañjñāḥ apavādatvāt bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti parāḥ paratvāt ca anavakāśatvāt ca . iha tarhi dhanuṣā vidhyati apāyayuktatvāt ca
