GS24pmbhasuu:3918: apādānasañjñā sādhakatvāt ca karaṇasañjñā prāpnoti . tamagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi lokataḥ etat siddham . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3919_0: loke abhirūpāya udakamāneyam abhirūpāya kanyā deyā iti na ca anabhirūpe pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3919_1: asti . tatra abhirūpatamāya iti gamyate . evam iha api sādhakam karaṇam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3919_2: sarvāṇi ca kārakāṇi sādhakāni na ca asādhake pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_0: asti . tatra sādhakatamam iti vijñāsyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tamagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_1: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_2: jñāpane prayojanam . apādānam ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra samprāpya nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3920_3: . tena iha eva syāt grāmāt āgacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_0: nagarāt āgacchati iti . sāṅkāśyakebhyaḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_1: syāt . kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_2: ādhāram ācāryaḥ kim nyāyyam manyate . yatra kṛtsnaḥ ādhārātmā vyāptaḥ bhavati . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:3921_3: iha eva syāt tileṣu tailam dadhni sarpiḥ iti . gaṅgāyām gāvaḥ kūpe gargarkulam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3922: kārakasañjñāyām taratamayogaḥ na bhavati iti atra api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3924: vaseḥ aśyarthasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāma upavasati iti . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra upapūrvasya vaseḥ grāmaḥ adhikaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3925: kasya tarhi . anupasargasya . grāme asau vasan trirātram upavasati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_0: (P_1,4.49.1) KA_I,332.10-13 Ro_II,407 tamagrahaṇam kimartham . kartuḥ īpsitam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_1: iti iyati ucyamāne iha: agneḥ māṇavakam vārayati iti māṇavake apādānasañjñā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:3926_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karmasañjñā tatra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . agnau api tarhi bādhikā
GS24pmbhasuu:3927: kriyamāṇe tat upapannam bhavati yat uktam vāraṇārtheṣu karmagrahaṇānarthakyam kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti vacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3928: (P_1,4.49.2) KA_I,332.14-25 Ro_II,408-409 iha ucyate odanam pacati iti . yadi odanaḥ pacyeta dravyāntarama bhinirvarteta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3929_0: tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . odanārthāḥ taṇḍulāḥ odanaḥ iti . atha iha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:3929_1: bhavitavyam taṇḍulān odanam pacati iti āhosvit taṇḍulānām odanam pacati iti . ubhyathā
GS24pmbhasuu:3929_2: api bhavitavyam . katham . iha hi taṇḍulān
GS24pmbhasuu:3930_0: odanam pacati iti dvyarthaḥ paciḥ . taṇḍulān pacan odanam nirvartayati iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:3930_1: idanīm taṇḍulānām odanam pacati iti dvyarthaḥ ca eva paciḥ vikārayoge ca ṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:3930_2: taṇḍulavikāram odanam nirvartayati iti . iha kaḥ cit kam cidāmantrayate siddham bhujyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:3931: prabhūtam bhuktam asmābhiḥ iti . āmantrayamāṇaḥ āha dadhi khalu bhaviṣyati payaḥ khalu bhaviṣyati . āmantryamāṇaḥ āha dadhnā khalu bhuñjīya payasā
GS24pmbhasuu:3932_0: khalu bhuñjīya iti . atra karmasañjñā prāpnoti . tat hi tasya īpsitatamam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3932_1: . tasya api odanaḥ eva eva īpsitatamaḥ na tu guṇeṣu asya anurodhaḥ . tat yathā bhuñjīya
GS24pmbhasuu:3932_2: aham odanam yadi mṛduviśadaḥ syāt iti evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:3933: dadhiguṇam odanam bhuñjīya payoguṇamodanam bhuñjīya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3934_0: (P_1,4.49.3) KA_I,333.1-11 Ro_II,410-411 īpsitasya karmasañjñāyām nirvṛttasya kārakatve
GS24pmbhasuu:3934_1: karmasañjñāprasaṅgaḥ kriyepsitatvāt . īpsitasya karmasañjñāyām nirvṛttasya kārakatve
GS24pmbhasuu:3934_2: karmasañjñā na prāpnoti . guḍam bhakṣayati iti . kim kāraṇam . kriyepsitatvāt . kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:3934_3: tasya īpsitā . na vā ubhayepsitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ubhayepsitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:3935: ubhayam tasya īpsitam . ātaḥ ca ubhayam yasya hi guḍabhakṣaṇe buddhiḥ prasaktā bhavati na asau loṣṭam bhakṣayitvā kṛtī bhavati . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:3936: atra etat śakyate vaktum ye tu ete rājakarmiṇaḥ manuṣyāḥ teṣām kaḥ cit kam cit āha kaṭam kuru iti . sa āha na aham kaṭam kariṣyāmi ghaṭaḥ mayā āhṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3937: iti . tasya kriyāmātram īpsitam . yadi api tasya kriyāmātram īpsitam yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3938: tu asau preṣayati tasya ubhayam īpsitam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3939: (P_1,4.50) KA_I,333.13-23 Ro_II,411-412 kim udāharaṇam . viṣam bhakṣayati iti . na etat asti . pūrveṇa api etat sidhyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:3940: kartuḥ īpsitatamam karma iti ucyate kasya ca nāma viṣabhakṣaṇam īpsitam syāt . viṣabhakṣaṇam api kasya cit īpsitam bhavati . katham . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3941: manuṣyaḥ duḥkhārtaḥ bhavati saḥ anyāni duḥkhāni anuniśamya viṣabhakṣaṇam eva jyāyaḥ manyate . ātaḥ ca īpsitam yat tat bhakṣayati . yat tarthi anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_0: kariṣyāmi iti anyat karoti tat udāharaṇam . kim punaḥ tat . grāmāntaram ayam gacchan
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_1: caurān paśyati ahim laṅghayati kaṇṭakān mṛdnāti . iha īpsitasya api karmasañjñā ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_2: anīpsitasya api . yat idānīm na eva īpsitamam na api anīpsitam tatra katham bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_3: . grāmāntaram ayam gacchan vṛkṣamūlāni upasarpati kuḍyamūlāni upasarpati iti . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_4: api siddham . katham . anīpsitam iti na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ īpsitam na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3942_5: kim tarhi . paryudāsaḥ ayam yat anyat īpsitāt tat anīpsitam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3943: anyat ca etat īpsitāt yat na eva īpsitam na api anīpsitam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_0: duhiyācirudhiprachibhikṣiciñām upayoganimittam apūrvavidhau bruviśāsiguṇena ca yatsacate
GS24pmbhasuu:3946_1: tat akīrtitam ācaritam kavinā . duhi : gām dogdhi payaḥ . na etat asti . kathitā
GS24pmbhasuu:3947: yāci : idam tarhi pauravam gām yācate iti . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā apādansañjñā . na yācanāt eva apāyaḥ bhavati . yācitaḥ asau yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:3948: dadāti tataḥ apāyena yujyate . yāci . rudhi : anvavaruṇaddhi gām vrajam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3949: na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā adhikaraṇasañjñā . rudhi . pracchi :
GS24pmbhasuu:3950: māṇavakam panthānam pṛcchati . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3951_0: apādānasañjñā . na praśnāt eva apāyaḥ bhavati . pṛṣtaḥ asau yadi ācāṣṭe tataḥ apāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:3951_1: yujyate . pracchi. bhikṣi : pauravam gām bhikṣate . na etat asti . kathitā atra pūrvā
GS24pmbhasuu:3951_2: apādānasañjñā . na bhikṣaṇāt eva apāyaḥ bhavati . bhikṣitaḥ asau yadi dadāti tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3951_3: apāyena yujyate . bhikṣi . ciñ : vṛkṣam avacinoti phalāni . na etat asti . kathitā
GS24pmbhasuu:3951_4: atra pūrvā apādānasañjñā bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate tat akīrtitam ācaritam kavinā
GS24pmbhasuu:3952: bruviśāsiguṇena ca yat sacate sambadhyate tat ca dāharaṇam . kim punaḥ tat
GS24pmbhasuu:3953: . putram brūte dharmam . putram anuśāsti dharmam iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3954: kathitā atra pūrvā sampradānasañjñā . tasmāt trīṇi eva udāharaṇāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:3955: pauravam gām yācate . māṇavakam panthānam pṛcchati . pauravam gām bhikṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_0: dvikarmakāḥ teṣām kim kathite lādayaḥ bhavanti āhosvit akathite . kathite lādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_1: . kathite lādibhiḥ abhihite guṇamkarmaṇi kā kartavyā . kathite lādayaḥ cet syuḥ ṣaṣṭḥīm
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_2: kuryāt tadā guṇe . kathite lādayaḥ cet syuḥ ṣaṣṭhī guṇakarmaṇi tadā kartavyā . duhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3958_3: goḥ payaḥ . yācyate pauravasya kambalaḥ iti . katham . akārakam hyakathitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:3959: . kim kāraṇam . akathitatvāt . kārakam cet tu na akathā . atha kārakam na
GS24pmbhasuu:3960: akathitam . atha kārake sati kā kartavyā . kārakam cet vijānīyāt yām yām manyeta sā bhavet . kārakam cet vijānātīyāt yā yā prāpnoti sā kartavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_0: duhyate goḥ payaḥ . yācyate pauravāt kambalaḥ iti . kathite abhihite tvavidhiḥ tvamatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_1: guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiḥ sapare . kathite lādibhiḥ abhihite tvavidhiḥ eṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_2: . kim idam tvavidhiḥ iti . tava vidhiḥ tvavidhiḥ . tvamatiḥ . kimidam tvamatiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_3: . tava matiḥ tvamatiḥ . na evam anye manyante . katham tarhi anye manyante . guṇakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3961_4: lādividhiḥ sapare . guṇakarmaṇi lādividhiyaḥ bhavanti saha pareṇa yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3963: dhruvaceṣṭitayuktiṣu ca api aguṇe tat analpamateḥ vacanam smarata .
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_0: dhruvayuktiṣu ceṣṭitayuktiṣu ca api aguṇe karmaṇi lādayaḥ bhavanti . tat analpmateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3964_1: ācāryasya vacanam smaryatām . aparaḥ āha : pradhānakarmaṇi ākhyeye lādīn āhuḥ dvikarmaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_0: dhātūnām karmaṇi lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . ajām nayati grāmam . ajā nīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_1: grāmam . ajā nītā grāmam iti . apradhāne duhādīnām . apradhāne duhādīnām karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3965_2: lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . duhyate gauḥ payaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_0: ṇyante kartuḥ ca karmaṇaḥ . lādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . gamyate devadattaḥ grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_1: yajñadattena . ke punaḥ dhātūnām dvikarmakāḥ . nīvahyoḥ harateḥ ca api gatyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_2: tathā eva ca dvikarmakeṣu grahaṇam draṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ . ajām nayati grāmam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_3: bhāram vahati grāmam . bhāram harati grāmam . gatyarthānām . gamayati devadattam
GS24pmbhasuu:3966_4: grāmam . yāpayati devadattam grāmam . siddham vā apo anyakarmaṇaḥ . siddham vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3967: kutaḥ . anyakarmaṇaḥ . anyasya atra ajā karma anyasya grāmaḥ . ajām asau gṛhītvā grāmam nayati . anyakarma iti cet brūyāt lādīnām avidhiḥ bhavet .
GS24pmbhasuu:3968: anyakarma iti cet brūyāt lādīnām avidhiḥ ayam bhavet . ajā nīyate grāmam
GS24pmbhasuu:3969: iti . parasādhane utpadyamānena lena ajāyāḥ abhidhānam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3970: (P_1,4.51.3) KA_I,336.1-17 Ro_II,425-428 kālabhāvādhvagantavyāḥ karmasañjñā hi arkarmaṇām . kālabhāvādhvagantavyāḥ akarmakāṇām dhātūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:3971: karmasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kāla . māsam āste . māsam svapiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3972: bhāva . godoham āste . godoham svapiti . adhvagantavya . krośam āste .
GS24pmbhasuu:3973: krośam svapiti . deśaḥ ca akarmaṇām karmasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3974: kurūn svapiti . pañcālān svapiti . viparītam tu yat karma tat kalma
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_0: kavayaḥ viduḥ . kimidam kalma iti . aparisamāptam karma kalma . na vā asmin sarvāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_1: karmakāryāṇi kriyante . kim tarhi . dvitīyā eva . yasmin tu karmaṇi upajāyate anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_2: dhātvarthayogā api ca yatra ṣaṣṭhī tat karma kalma iti ca kalma na uktam dhātoḥ hi
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_3: vṛttiḥ na ralatvataḥ asti . etena karmasañjñā sarvā siddhā bhavati kathitena . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:3975_4: īpsitasya kim syāt prayojanam karmasañjñāyāḥ . yat tu kathitam purastāt īpsitatayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:3976: tasya siddhyartham . īpsitam eva tu yat syāt tasya bhaviṣyati kathitena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3977: atha iha katham bhavitavyam . netā aśvasya srughnam iti āhosvit netā
GS24pmbhasuu:3980: idam vijñāyate . śabdaḥ yeṣām kriyā iti āhosvit śabdaḥ yeṣām karma iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:3981: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . śabdakarmanirdeśe śabdakriyāṇām iti cet hvayatyādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . śabdakarmanirdeśe śabdakriyāṇāmiti ced
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_0: hvayadādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ hvayatādayaḥ . hvayati krandati śabdāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_1: . hvayati devadattaḥ . hvāyayati devadattena . krandati devadattaḥ . krandayati devadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_2: . śabdāyate devadattaḥ . śabdāyayati devadattena iti . śṛṇotyādīn ām ca upasamkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_3: aśabdakriyatvāt śṛṇotyādīnām ca upasamkhyānam kartavyam . ke punaḥ śṛṇotyādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3982_4: śṛṇoti vijānāti upalabhate . śṛṇoti devadattaḥ . śrāvayati devadattam . vijānāti
GS24pmbhasuu:3983: upalambhayati devadattam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . aśabdakriyatvād
GS24pmbhasuu:3984: . astu tarhi śabdaḥ yeṣām karma iti . śabdakarmaṇaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:3987: jalpati vilapati ābhāṣate . jalpati devadattaḥ . jalpayati devadattam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3988: vilapati devadattaḥ . vilāpayati devadattam . ābhāṣate devadattaḥ .ābhāṣayati devadattam . dṛśeḥ sarvatra . dṛśeḥ sarvatra upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:3989: kartavyam . paśyati rūpatarkaḥ kārṣāpaṇam . darśayati rūpatarkam kārṣāpaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3990: (P_1,4.52.2) KA_I,337.14-27 Ro_II,431-432 adikhādinīvahīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . adikhādinīvahīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atti devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3991_0: ādayate devadattena . aparaḥ āha : sarvam eva pratyavasānakāryam adeḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:3991_1: iti vaktavyam , parasmaipadam api . idam ekam iṣyate : ktaḥ adhikaraṇe ca drauvyagatipratyavasānārthebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:3992: . khādati devadattaḥ . khādayati devadattena . nī . nayati devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3993: nāyayati devadattena . vaheraniyantṛkartṛkasya . vaheḥ aniyantṛkartṛkasya iti vaktavyam . vahati bhāram devadattaḥ . vāhayati bhāram devadattena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3994: aniyantṛkartṛkasya iti kimartham . vahanti yavān balīvardāḥ . vāhayanti balīvardān yavān . bhakṣeḥ ahiṃsārthasya . bhakṣeḥ ahimsārthasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:3995: vaktavyam . bhakṣayati piṇḍīm devadattaḥ . bhakṣayati piṇḍīm devadattena .
GS24pmbhasuu:3996: ahimsārthasya iti kimartham . bhakṣayanti yavān balīvardāḥ . bhakṣayanti balīvardān yavān
GS24pmbhasuu:3997: (P_1,4.52.3) KA_I,338.1-9 Ro_II,432-435 akarmakagrahaṇe kālakarmakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam . akarmakagrahaṇe kālakarmakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:3998: māsam āste devadattaḥ . māsam āsayati devadattam . māsam śete devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:3999: māsam śāyayati devadattam . siddham tu kālakarmakāṇām akarmakavadvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4000: siddham etat . katham . kālakarmakāḥ akarmakavat bhavanti iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4001: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām iti ucyate na ca ke cit kadā cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ akarmakāḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . kva cit ye
GS24pmbhasuu:4002: akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā sakarmkāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4003: tena akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cit api akarmakaḥ . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4004: karma bhavati na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat karma kva cit api na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4007: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . abhivadati gurum devadattaḥ . abhivādayate gurum devadattam . abhivādayate gurum devadattena . paśyanti bhṛtyāḥ rājānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4008: darśayate bhṛtyān rājā . darśayate bhṛtyaiḥ rājā . katham ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4009: ātmanepadam . ekasya ṇeḥ aṇau i ti aparasya ṇicaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_0: (P_1,4.54.1) KA_I,338.17-20 Ro_II,435-436 kim yasya svam tantram saḥ svatantraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4010_1: kim ca ataḥ . tantuvāye prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tantraśabdaḥ asti eva vitāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4011_0: pretam tantram . vitānaḥ iti gamyate . asti prādhānye vartate . tat yathā svatantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4011_1: asau brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate . svapradhānaḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ prādhānye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_1: upasaṅkhyānam asvatrantvāt . svatantrasya kartṛsañjñāyām hetumati upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4012_2: . pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4013: asvatantratvāt . na vā svātrantryāt itarathā hi akurvati api kārayati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_0: syāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . svātantryāt . svatantraḥ asau bhavati . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_1: hi akurvati api kārayati iti syāt . yaḥ hi manyate na asau svatantraḥ akurvati api
GS24pmbhasuu:4014_2: tasya kārayati iti etat syāt . na akurvat i
GS24pmbhasuu:4015: iti cet svatantraḥ . na cet akurvati tasmin kārayati iti etat bhavati svatantraḥ asau bhavati . śakyam tāvat anena upasamkhyānam kurvatā vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:4016_0: kurvan svatantraḥ akurvan na iti . sādhīyaḥ jñāpakam bhavati . preṣite ca kila ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4016_1: kriyām ca akriyām ca dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati kurvan svatantraḥ akurvan na iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4016_2: ca preṣitaḥ asau na karoti svatantraḥ asau bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4018: (P_1,4.55) KA_I,339.11-21 Ro_II,438-439 praiṣe asvatantraprayojakatvāt hetusañjñāprasiddhiḥ . praiṣe asvatantraprayojakatvāt hetusañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4019: aprasiddhiḥ . svatantraprayojakaḥ hetusañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca asau svatantram prayojayati . svatantratvāt siddham . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4020: katham . svatantratvāt . svatantram asau prayojayati . svatantratvāt siddham iti cet svatantraparatantratvam vipratiṣiddam . yadi svatantraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4021_0: prayojyaḥ atha prayojyaḥ na svatantraḥ prayojyaḥ svatantraḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4021_1: . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā svātrantryāt itarathā hi akurvati
GS24pmbhasuu:4021_2: api kārayati iti syāt iti . aparam uktam . na vā sāmānyakṛtatvāt hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:4021_3: svatantraprayojakatvāt aprayojakaḥ iti cet muktamasamśayena tulyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4022: (P_1,4.56) KA_I,340.2-25 Ro_II,440-442 kimartham rephādhikaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ gṛhyate . rīśvarāt vīśvarāt mā bhūt . rīśvarāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4023_0: vīśvarāt mā bhūt . śaki ṇamulkamulau īśvare tosunkasunau iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4023_1: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati anantaraḥ yaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4023_2: kṛt mejantaḥ iti kṛtaḥ māntasya ejantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4024: avyayasañjñām śāsti . kṛt mejantaḥ paraḥ api saḥ . paraḥ api etasmāt kṛt māntaḥ ejantaḥ ca asti . tadartham etat syāt . yat tarhi avyayībhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4025: avyayasañjñām śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ nantaraḥ yaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam iti . samāseṣu avyayībhāvaḥ . samāsasya etat jñāpakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4026_0: avyayībhāvaḥ eva samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati na anyaḥ iti . evam tarhi lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4026_1: etat siddham . tat yathā loke ā vanāntāt ā udakāntāt priyam pānthaman uvrajet iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4026_2: yaḥ eva prathamaḥ vanāntaḥ udakāntaḥ ca tataḥ nuvrajati . laukikam ca ativartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4026_3: . dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca vanāntam udakāntam vā anuvrajati . tasmāt rephādikaḥ īśvaraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4027: atha prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacanam sañjñānivṛttyartham . prāgvacanam kriyate nipātasañjñāyāḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4029_0: tāḥ mā bādhiṣata iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha kriyamāṇe api prāgvacane yāvatā anavakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4029_1: etāḥ sañjñāḥ kasmāt eva na bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane satyām nipātasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4029_2: etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ ārabhyante . tatra vacanāt samāveśaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4030_0: (P_1,4.57) KA_I,341.2-9 Ro_II,442-444 ayam sattvaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4030_1: . tat yathā sattvam ayam brāhmaṇaḥ sattvamiyam brāhmaṇī iti . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4030_2: . sadbhāvaḥ sattvam iti . kasya idam grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4031: . dravyapadārthakasya . kutaḥ etat . evam hi kṛtvā vidhiḥ ca siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4032_0: bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ . yat anyat sattvavacanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4032_1: . āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . sattvavacane na iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4033: kriyādravyavacanaḥ ayam samghāto dravyāt anyaśca vidhinā āśrīyate . asti ca prādibhiḥ sāmānyam iti kṛtvā tadantavidhinā nipātasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4034: atha prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4036: prādayaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . prādayaḥ sattvavacanāḥ nipātasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4037: bhavanti . tataḥ upasargāḥ kriyāyoge iti . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4038_0: nipātasañjñārthaḥ . nipātasañjñā yathā syāt . ekayoge hi nipātasañjñābhāvaḥ . ekayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:4038_1: hi sati nipātasañjñāyā abhāvaḥ syāt . yasmin eva viśeṣe gatyupasargakarmapravacanīyasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4040: marucchabdasya upsaṅkhyānam kartavyam . maruddatto marutyaḥ . aca upasargāt iti tattvam yathā syāt . śracchabdasya upasamkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4042: (P_1,4.60.1) KA_I,342.2-6 Ro_II,446 kārikāśabdasya . kārikāśabdasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kārikākṛtya . punaścanasau chandasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4043: punaścanasau chandasi gatisañjñau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ deyam . punarniṣkṛtaḥ rathaḥ . uśik dūtaḥ canohitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4044_1: tam prati iti vacanam . gatyupasargasañjñāḥ kriyāyoge yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4044_2: bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam ghañ ṣaṭvaṇatve . ghañ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4045: pravṛddhaḥ bhāvaḥ prabhāvaḥ . anupasarge iti pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt . ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4046: . vigatāḥ secakāḥ asmāt grāmāt visecakaḥ grāmaḥ . upasargāt iti ṣatvam mā bhūt . ṇatvam . pragatāḥ nāyakāḥ asmāt grāmāt pranāyakaḥ grāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4047: upasargāditi ṇatvam mā bhūt . vṛddhividhau ca dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4048: vṛddhividhau ca dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4049: tatra dhātugrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt prarṣabham vanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4050: kriyamāṇe ca api dhātugrahaṇe prarcchaka iti atra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4051: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati iti vacanāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4052_0: vadvidhnabhāvābīttvasvāṅgādisvaraṇatveṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . vadvidhi. yat udvataḥ nivataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4052_1: yāsi bapsat . vadvidhi . nasbhāva . praṇasam mukham unnasam mukham . nasbhāva . abīttva
GS24pmbhasuu:4053: svāṅgādisvara . prasphik prodaraḥ . svāṅgādisvara . ṇatva . pra ṇaḥ śūdraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4054_0: pra ṇaḥ ācāryaḥ pra ṇaḥ rājā pra ṇaḥ vṛtrahā . upasargāt iti ete vidhayaḥ na prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4054_2: ete vidhayaḥ . te vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyanti . suduroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ numvidhitatvaṣatvaṇatveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4054_3: . suduroḥ pratiṣedhaḥ numvidhitatvaṣatvaṇatveṣu vaktavyaḥ . numvidhi : sulabham durlabham
GS24pmbhasuu:4054_4: . upasargāt iti num mā bhūt iti . na sudurbhyām kevalābhyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:4055_0: iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyate etat nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4055_1: . tatvam . sudattam . acaḥ upasargāt taḥ iti tatvam mā bhūt iti . ṣatvam . susiktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4055_2: ghaṭaśatena sustutam ślokaśatena . upasargāt iti ṣatvam mā bhūtiti . suḥ pūjāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4055_3: iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . kriyata etat nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4055_4: . ṇatvam . durnayam durnītamiti upasargāt iti ṇatvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4056_0: (P_1,4.61) KA_I,343.10-12 Ro_II,449 kṛbhvastiyoge iti vaktavyam . iha eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4056_1: . ūrīkṛtya ūrībhūya . iha mā bhūt . ūrī paktvā . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4056_2: . kriyāyoge iti anuvartate na ca anyayā kriyayā ūryādicviḍācām yogaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4057: (P_1,4.62.1) KA_I,343.14-22 Ro_II,449-450 katham idam vijñāyate . iteḥ param itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti āhosvit itiḥ paro yasmāt tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4058_0: idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyata iteḥ param
GS24pmbhasuu:4058_1: itiparam na itiparam anitiparam iti khāṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4058_2: . atha itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam
GS24pmbhasuu:4059: anitiparamiti śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4060: astu tāvat itiḥ paro yasmāt tat idam itiparam na itiparam anitiparamiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4061: nanu ca uktam śrauṣaṭ vauṣaṭ iti kṛtvā niraṣṭhīvat iti atra prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4062: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha te prāk dhātoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4063: katham gatimātrasya pūrvaprayogḥ bhavati . upoddharati iti . gatyākṛtiḥ pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi anukaraṇākṛtiḥ nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4067: aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ . aniṣṭhaśabdatā mā bhūt iti . idam vicārayiṣyati teprāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham vā syāt sañjñāniyamārtham vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4068: tat yadā prayoganiyamārtham tadā aniṣṭhaśabdanivṛttyartham idam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4069: . yadā hi sañjñāniyamārtham tadā na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4070: (P_1,4.63) KA_I,344.5-10 Ro_II,450-451 idam atibahu kriyate ādare anādare sat asat iti . ādāre sat iti eva siddham . katham asatkṛtya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4071: tadantividhinā bhaviṣyati . kena idānīm anādare bhaviṣyati . nañā ādarapratiṣedham vijñāsyāmaḥ . nādare anādare iti . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4072_0: ādaraprasaṅge eva hi syāt . anādaraprasaṅge na syāt . anādaragrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4072_1: bahuvrīhiḥ ayam vijñāyate . avidyamānādare anādare iti . tasmāt anādaragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4073_1: . antaḥśabdasya āṅkividhisamāsaṇatveṣu pasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṅ . antardhā . kividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4075: (P_1,4.74) KA_I,344.16-345.7 Ro_II,452-453 sākṣātprabhṛtiṣu cvyarthagrahaṇam . sākṣātprabhṛtiṣu cvyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4076_0: asākṣātsākṣātkṛtvā sākṣātkṛtya . yadā hi sākṣāt eva kim cit kriyate tadā mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4076_1: iti . makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyuktam . makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:4077: tatra cvyantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . lavaṇīkṛtya . na vā pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4078: kṛtatvāt ṇa vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . pūrveṇa kṛtatvāt . astu anena vibhāṣā . pūrveṇa nityaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4079: makārāntatvam ca gatisañjñāsanniyuktam iti uktam . tat cvyantasya mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . lavaṇaśabdasya ayam vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4080: lavaṇamśabda ādeśaḥ kriyate . yadi ca lavaṇī śabdasya api vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4081: lavaṇamśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati na kim cid duṣyati . traiśabdyam ca ha
GS24pmbhasuu:4083: tacca evam sati siddham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_1: : ete prāk eva dhātoḥ prayoktavyāḥ . āhosvit sañjñāniyamārtham : ete prāk ca akprāk
GS24pmbhasuu:4084_2: ca prayoktavyāḥ , prāk prayujyamānānām gatisañjñā bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4085_0: prāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham iti cet anukaraṇasya itikaraṇaparapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4085_1: aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ . prāgdhātuvacanam prayoganiyamārtham iti cet anukaraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4086: . kim prayojanam . aniṣṭaśabdanivṛttyarthaḥ . aniṣṭaśabatā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4087: chandasi paravyavahitavacanam ca . chandasi pare api vyavahitāḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4088: vaktavyam . sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame siddham etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4089: astu tarhi sañjñāniyamaḥ . ubhayoḥ anarthakam vacanam aniṣṭādarśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4090_0: ubhayoḥ api pakṣayoḥ vacanamanarthakam . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭādarśanāt . na hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4090_1: citprapacati iti prayoktavye pacatipra iti prayuṅkte . yadi ca aniṣṭam dṛśyeta tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4090_2: yatnārham syāt . upasarjanasannipāte tu pūrvaparavyavasthārtham . upasarjanasannipāte
GS24pmbhasuu:4091_0: etat vaktavyam . ṛṣabham kūlamudrujam ṛṣabham kūlamudvaham . atra gateḥ prāk dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4091_1: prayogaḥ yathā syāt . yadi upasarjanasannipāte pūrvaparavyavasthārtham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4091_2: sukaṭamkarāṇi vīraṇān i iti atra gateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4092: prāk dhātoḥ prayogaḥ prāpnoti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam īṣadduḥsuṣu kṛcchrākṛcchārtheṣu khal iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4093_0: khakāram anubandham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . khitkaraṇe etat prayojanam khiti
GS24pmbhasuu:4093_1: iti mum yathā syāt iti . yadi ca atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt khitkaraṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4093_2: syāt . astu atra mum . anavyayasya iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4093_3: na atra gateḥ prāk dhatoḥ prayogaḥ bhavati iti tataḥ khakāram anubandham karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4094: jñāpakam . yadi api atra gateḥ prākprayogaḥ syāt syātevātra mumāgamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4095: katham . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti . tasmāt na arthaḥ evamarthena prāgdhātuvacanena . katham ṛṣabham kūlamudrujam
GS24pmbhasuu:4096: ṛṣabham kūlamudvaham . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na eṣaḥ udiḥ upapadam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4097: viśeṣaṇam . udi kūle rujivahoḥ . utpūrvābhyām rujivahibhyām kūle upapade iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4099: kriyate . anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta . karma proktavantaḥ karmapravacanīyāḥ iti . ke punaḥ karma proktavantaḥ . ye samprati kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4100: na āhuḥ . ke ca samprati kriyām na āhuḥ . ye aprayujyamānasya kriyām āhuḥ te karmapravacanīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4102_0: karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4102_1: . śākalyasya samhitām anu prāvarṣat : gatiḥ gatau iti nighātaḥ prasajyeta . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4102_2: evam veḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñā vaktavyā . veḥ api nighātaḥ na iṣyate : prādeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:4102_3: prādeśam viparilikhati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ na atra veḥ likhim prati kriyāyogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4103: prādeśam prādeśam vimāya parilikhati iti . yadi evam anoḥ api karmapravacanīyasañjñayā na arthaḥ . anoḥ api hi na vṛṣim prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4104_0: . kim tarhi aprayujyamānam . śākalyena sukṛtām samhitām anuviśamya devaḥ prāvarṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:4104_1: . idam tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4105_0: sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena eva atra karmapravacanīyasañjñā bhaviṣyati lakṣaṇetthambhūtākhyānabhāgavīpsāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:4105_1: pratiparyanavaḥ iti . hetvartham tu vacanam . hetvartham idam vaktavyam . hetuḥ śākalyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4105_2: samhitā varṣasya na lakṣaṇam . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4105_3: lakṣaṇam hi nāma saḥ bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate na yaḥ sakṛdapi nimittatvāya
GS24pmbhasuu:4105_4: kalpate . sakṛt ca asau śākalyena sukṛtām samhitām anuśimya devaḥ prāvarṣat . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4105_5: tarhi tathā . nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ anuḥ hetau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4106_0: atha idānīm lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api vyāptaḥ na arthaḥ anena . lakṣaṇena hetuḥ api vyāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4106_1: . na hi avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4106_2: yat sakṛt api nimittvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat yathā api bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:4106_3: kamaṇḍulapāṇim chātram adrakṣīt iti . sakṛt āsau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ chātraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4106_4: tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati . tat eva tarhi prayojanam dvitīyā yathā syāt karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4107: . etat api na asti prayojanam . siddhā atra dvitīyā karmapravacanīyayukte iti eva . na sidhyati . paratvāt hetutvāśrayā tṛtīyā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4108: (P_1,4.89) KA_I,347.23-25 Ro_II,461 āṅ maryādābhividhyoḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4109: . iha api yathā syāt ākumāram yaśaḥ pāṇineḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . maryādāvacane iti eva siddham . eṣā asya yaśasaḥ maryādā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4111: nirdiśyante . vṛkṣādīnām . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:4113_1: ucyate . karmapravacanīyasañjñā yathā syāt . gatyupasargasañjñe mā bhūtām iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4114: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ anarthakau ca imau .
GS24pmbhasuu:4115_0: idam tarhi prayojanam pañcamī yathā syāt pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti . kutaḥ paryāgamyata
GS24pmbhasuu:4115_1: iti . siddhā atra pañcamī apādāne iti eva . ātaḥ ca apādānapañcamī eṣā . yatra api
GS24pmbhasuu:4115_2: adhiśabdena yoge pañcamī na vidhīyate tatra api śrūyate . kutaḥ adhyāgamyata iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4115_3: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat anarthakayoḥ gatyupasargasañjñābādhikām karmapravacanīyasañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:4115_4: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anarthakānām api eṣām bhavati arthavatkṛtam iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4115_5: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . nipātasya anarthakasya prātipadikatvam coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:4116_0: . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . atha vā na eva imau anarthakau . kim tarhi anarthakau
GS24pmbhasuu:4116_1: iti ucyate . anarthāntarvācinau anarthakau . dhātunā uktām kriyām āhatuḥ . tad aviśiṣṭam

GS24pmbhasuu:4116_3: na prāpnoti uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . uktārthānāmapi prayogaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā

GS24pmbhasuu:4119: (P_1,4.97) KA_I,349.6-9 Ro_II,466 adhirīśvaravacane uktam . kim uktam . yasya ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet avacanāt siddham .

GS24pmbhasuu:4122: (P_1,4.99) KA_I,349.11-19 Ro_II,466-467 lādeśe parasmaipadagrahaṇam puruṣabādhitatvāt . lādeśe parasmaipadagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4123: puruṣabādhitatvāt . iha vacane hi sañjñābādhanam . iha hi kriyamāṇe

GS24pmbhasuu:4124_2: avakāśaḥ . sici vṛddhau tu parasmaipadagrahaṇam jñāpakam puruṣābādhakatvasya . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4125: parasmaipadagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na puruṣasañjñā parasmaipadasañjñām bādhate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4128_0: ātmanepadānām ca prathamamadhyamottamasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4128_1: . samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi ātmanepadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4128_2: tisraḥ sañjñāḥ ṣaṭ sañjñinaḥ . vaiṣamyāt saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ na prāpnoti . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4128_3: api ca ātmanepadagrahaṇe ānupūrvyavacanam ca . ānupūrvyavacanam ca kartavyam . akriyamaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4129: cit eva trikasya prathamasañjñā syāt kasya cit eva madhyamasañjñā kasya cit eva uttamasañjñā . na vaikaśeṣanirdeśāt . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4130: ātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam samasaṅkhyārtham iti . tat na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4131: sañjñāḥ api ṣat eva nirdiśyante . katham . ekaśeṣanirdesāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4132: ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . atha etasmin ekaśeṣanirdeśe sati kim ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4133_0: kṛtaikaśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ . prathamaḥ ca prathamaḥ ca prathamau madhyamaḥ ca madhyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4133_1: ca madhyamau uttamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca uttamau prathamau ca madhyamau ca uttamau ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4133_2: iti . āhosvit kṛtadvandvānām ekaśeṣaḥ . prathamau ca madhyamaḥ ca uttamaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4135: ca prathamamadhyamottamāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi kṛtaikeśeṣāṇām dvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4136_0: prathamamadhyamayoḥ prathamasañjñā prāpnoti . uttamaprathamayoḥ madhyamasañjñā prāpnoti

GS24pmbhasuu:4136_2: . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . kim punaḥ atra nyāyyam . ubhayam iti āha . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4137: bahu śaktikiṭakam bahūni śaktikiṭakāni bahu sthālīpiṭharam bahūni sthālīpiṭharāṇi . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe api ātmanepadagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4138: ānurpūrvyavacanam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . lokataḥ etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4139: tat yathā loke vihavyasya dvābhyām dvābhyām agniḥ upstheyaḥ iti . na ca ucyate ānupūrvyeṇa iti ānupūrvyeṇa ca upasthīyata iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:4142: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4143: prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti atra pratyayayoḥ eva grahaṇam prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4144: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aci iti anuvartate . na cājādī prathamau pratyayau staḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:4147: (P_1,4.105,107-108.1) KA_I,351.13-353.27 Ro_II,471-476 kimartham idam ucyate . yuṣmadasmaccheṣavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_0: atha etasmin niyamārthe vijñāyamāne kim ayam upapadaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_1: asmadi uttamaḥ eva āhosvit puruṣaniyamaḥ yuṣmadi eva madhyamaḥ asmadi eva uttamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_2: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi puruṣaniyamaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣe prathamaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_3: . kim kāraṇam . madhyamottamau niyatau yuṣmadasmadī aniyate . tatra prathamaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_4: prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam prathamaniyamārtham . śeṣe eva prathamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_5: bhavati na anyatra iti . atha api upapadaniyamaḥ evam api śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_6: śeṣe prathamaḥ iti . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4148_7: . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam śeṣaniyamārtham . śeṣe prathamaḥ eva bhavati na anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4149_0: katham . yuṣmadasmadī niyate madhyamottamau aniyatau tau śeṣe api prāpnutaḥ . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4149_1: vakṣyāmi prathamaḥ bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . yatra prathamaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4149_2: anyaḥ ca prāpnoti tatra prathamaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4150: iti . tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt . tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvam ca devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4151: ca pacathaḥ . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śeṣatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4152: śeṣe prathamaḥ iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4153_0: pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt . śeṣe prathamḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4153_1: na iti vaktavyam . yuṣmadi madhyamāt asmadi uttamaḥ pratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4153_2: asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4153_3: tvam pacasi . asmadi uttamaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ aham pacāmi . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4154: ca pacāvaḥ . asmadi uttamaḥ iti etat bhavati virpratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktvayaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tyadādīnām yat yat param tat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4155: śiṣyate iti evam asmadaḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham tu . anekaśeṣabhāvārtham tu saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4156: vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na . kadā ca ekaśeṣaḥ na .
GS24pmbhasuu:4157_0: sahavivakṣāyām ekaśeṣaḥ . yadā na sahavivakṣā tada ekaśeṣaḥ na asti . na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4157_1: anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ . na vā arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4157_2: vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api
GS24pmbhasuu:4158: ekaśeṣena na bhavitavyam . tvam ca aham ca pacasi pacāmi ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_0: kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvadarśanam anumānam uttaratra anekaśeṣabhāvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_1: kriyāpṛthaktve ca dravyapṛthaktvam dṛśyate . tat yathā pacasi pacāmi ca tvam ca aham
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_2: ca iti . tat anumānam uttarayoḥ api kriyayoḥ ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati iti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4159_3: saḥ pi adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4160: tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt iti . tatra api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:4161: evam bhavitavyam tvam ca devadattaḥ ca pacasi pacati ca . aham ca devadattaḥ ca pacāmi pacati ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate na vā yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4162: anekaśeṣabhāvāt tadadhikaraṇānām api anekaśeṣabhāvāt avipratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_0: dṛśyate hi yuṣmadasmadoḥ cānekaśeṣaḥ tadadhikaraṇānām ca ekaśeṣaḥ . tat yathā tvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4163_1: ca aham ca vṛttrahan ubhau samprayujyāvahai iti . yat api ucyate kriyāpṛthaktve ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4164_0: anekaśeṣabhāvasya iti . kriyāpṛthaktve khalu api dravyaikaśeṣaḥ bhavati iti dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4164_1: . tat yathā akṣāḥ bhajyantām bhakṣyantām dīvyantām iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api doṣo
GS24pmbhasuu:4164_2: bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ śeṣatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4165: tu yuṣmadasmadoḥ pratiṣedhāt iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . śeṣe prathamaḥ vidhīyate . na hi śeṣaḥ ca anyaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4166: śeṣagrahaṇena gṛhyate . bhavet prathamaḥ na syān . madhyamottamau api na
GS24pmbhasuu:4167: prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau ucyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:4168: na ca yuṣmadasmadī anyaḥ ca yuṣmadasmadgrahaṇena gṛhyate . yat atra yuṣmat
GS24pmbhasuu:4169: yat ca asmat tattadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4170_0: yat atra yuṣmat yat ca smat tadāśrayau madhyamottamau bhavataḥ evam yaḥ atra śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4170_1: tadāśrayaḥ prathamaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi śeṣe upapade prathamaḥ vidhīyate . upoccāri
GS24pmbhasuu:4170_2: padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na saḥ śeṣaḥ yaḥ ca śeṣaḥ na tat upoccāri .
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_0: madhyamottamau api na prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_1: ucyete . upoccāri padam upapadam . yat ca atra upoccāri na te yuṣmadasmadī ye ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4171_2: yuṣmadasmadī na tat upoccāri . evam tarhi śeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4172: sāmānādhikaraṇye prathamaḥ vidhīyate . na ca atra śeṣeṇa eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . bhavet prathamaḥ na syāt . madhyamottamau api na
GS24pmbhasuu:4173: prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yuṣmadasmadbhyām sāmānādhikaraṇye madhyamottamau
GS24pmbhasuu:4174: ucyete na ca atra yuṣmadasmadbhyām eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam . evam tarhi tyadādīni sarvaiḥ nityam iti evam atra yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4175: tatra yuṣmadi madhyamaḥ asmadi uttamaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4176: sthānini api iti prathamaḥ prāpnoti . tyadādīnām khalu api yat yat param
GS24pmbhasuu:4177: tat tat śiṣyate iti yadā bhavataḥ śeṣaḥ tadā prathamaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_1: uttamaḥ iti eva ucyate. tau iha na prāpnutaḥ : paramatvam pacasi . paramāham pacāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:4178_2: iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4179: tadantavidhinā prāpnutaḥ : atitvam pacati . atyaham pacati iti . ye ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:4180_0: ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ tatra ca madhyamottamau na prāpnutaḥ : tvattaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4180_1: pacasi mattaraḥ pacāmi iti . tvadrūpaḥ pacasi madrūpaḥ pacāmi iti . tvatkalpaḥ pacasi
GS24pmbhasuu:4180_2: . matkalpaḥ pacāmi iti. evam tarhi yuṣmadvati
GS24pmbhasuu:4181: asmadvati iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi prāpnutaḥ : atitvam pacati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4182_0: atyaham pacati iti . evam tarhi yuṣmadi sādhane asmadi sādhane iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4182_1: . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam tatra yuṣmadasmadanyeṣu prathamapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4183_0: utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ upapadayoḥ madhyamottamau apavādau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4183_1: . tatra yuṣmadgandhaḥ ca asmadgandhaḥ ca asti iti kṛtvā madhyamottamau bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4183_2: . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . atvam tvam sampadyate tvadbhavati madbhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4183_3: . āhosvit tvadbhavasi madbhavāmi iti . tvadbhavati madbhavati iti evam bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4184: madhyamottamau kasmāt na bhavataḥ . gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4185: bhavati . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣhomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4186: gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye etat evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4187: śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve .
GS24pmbhasuu:4189: cet adrutāyām asaṃhitam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā cet adrutāyām vṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:4190: saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . drutāyām eva hi paraḥ sannikarṣo varṇānām na adrutāyām . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ . tulyaḥ samnikarṣaḥ varṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4192: varṇakālabhūyastvam tu . varṇānām tu kālabhūyastvam . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4193: hastimaśakayoḥ tulyaḥ sannikarṣaḥ prāṇibhūyastvam tu . yadi evam drutāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4194: taparakaraṇe madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kālabhedāt . drutāyām taparakaraṇe madhyamavilimbitayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4195_0: kālabhedāt . ye drutāyām vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāḥ te madhyamāyām ye madhyamāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4195_1: vṛttau varṇāḥ tribhāgādhikāste vilimbitāyām . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu avasthitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4195_2: varṇāḥ vaktuḥ cirāciravacanāt vṛttayaḥ viśiṣyante iti . atha vā śabdāvirāmaḥ saṃhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:4195_3: iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate . śabdāvirāme prativarṇam avasānam . śabdāvirāme prativarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4196: prāpnoti . kim idam prativarṇam iti . varṇam varṇam prati prativarṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4197_0: yena eva yatnena ekaḥ varṇaḥ uccyāryate vicchinne varṇe upasaṃhṛtya tam anyam upādāya
GS24pmbhasuu:4197_1: dvitīyaḥ prayujyate tathā tṛtīyaḥ tathā caturthaḥ . evam tarhi anavakāśā saṃhitāsañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4197_2: avasānasañjñām bādhiṣyate . atha vā avasānasañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4197_3: yaḥ virāmaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ virāmaḥ . atha vā hrādāvirāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4197_4: saṃhā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate . hrādāvirāme sparśāghoṣasaṃyoge asannidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_0: asaṃhitam . hrādāvirāme sparśānām aghoṣāṇām saṃyoge asamnidhānāt saṃhitāsañjñā na
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_1: prāpnoti . kukkuṭaḥ pippakā pittam iti . kim ucyate saṃyoge iti . atha yatra ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4198_2: pacati iti ekaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ hrādena pracchādyate . tad yathā . dvayoḥ raktayoḥ vastrayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_0: tadguṇam upalabhyate . badarapiṭake riktakaḥ lohakaṃsaḥ tadguṇaḥ upalabhyate . ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_1: tulyaḥ sannidhiḥ . yathā ekaḥ varṇaḥ hrādena pracchādyate evam anekaḥ api . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_2: vā paurvāparyam akālavyapetam saṃhitā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariṣyate. paurvāparyam akālavyapetam
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_3: saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt asaṃhitam . paurvāparyam akālavyapetam saṃhitā cet pūrvāparābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_4: saṃhitāsañjñā na prāpnoti . na hi varṇānām paurvāparyam asti . kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_5: vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_6: uccārayati . gauḥ iti yāvat gakāre vāk vartate na aukāre na visarjanīye . yāvat aukāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4199_7: na gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat visarjanīye na gakāre na aukāre .
GS24pmbhasuu:4201: uccaritaḥ pradhvastaḥ . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4202: sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi buddhau kṛtvā sarvāḥ ceṣṭhāḥ kartā dhīraḥ tatvannītiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4203: śabdena arthān vācyān dṛṣṭvā buddhau kuryāt paurvāparyam . buddhiviṣayam eva śabdānām paurvāparyam . iha yaḥ eṣaḥ manuṣyaḥ prekṣāpūrvakārī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4204: saḥ paśyati asamin arthe ayam śabdaḥ prayoktvayaḥ smin tāvat śabde ayam tāvat varṇaḥ tataḥ ayam tataḥ ayam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_0: avasānalakṣaṇam syād virāmaḥ vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . abhāve avasānalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_1: uparyabhāvavacanam . abhāveāvasānalakṣaṇe uparyabhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . upari yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4206_2: abhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam . purastāt api hi śabdasya abhāvaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4207_0: kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . astu tarhi virāmaḥ . virāme
GS24pmbhasuu:4207_1: virāmavacanam . yasya virāmaḥ virāmagrahaṇam tena kartavyam . nanu ca yasya api abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4208_0: parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4208_1: virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4208_2: iti vaktavyam . purastāt api śabdasya virāmaḥ tatra mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4209: kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . ārambhapūrvakaḥ mama virāmaḥ . atha vā na idam avasānalakṣaṇam vicāryate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4210: sañjñī . abhāvaḥ vasānasañjñī syāt virāmaḥ vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4211_0: abhāve avasānasañjñini uparyabhāvavacanam . abhāve avasānasañjñin yuparyabhāvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4211_1: kartavyam . upari yaḥ bhāvaḥ iti vaktavyam . purastāt api hi śabdasya abhāvaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4211_2: mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . rasaḥ rathaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4212: kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ iti visarjanīyaḥ prasajyeta . astu tarhi virāmaḥ avāsanam . virāme virāmavacanam . yasya virāmaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:4213: virāmagrahaṇam kartavyam . nanu ca yasya api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4214: tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4215_0: . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti . upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam . nanu ca yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4215_1: api abhāvaḥ tena api abhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . parārtham mama bhaviṣyati . abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4215_2: lopaḥ . tataḥ avasānam ca iti . mama api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4216: virāmagrahaṇam parārtham bhaviṣyati . virāmaḥ lopaḥ avasānam ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4217: upari yaḥ virāmaḥ iti vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam ārambhapūrvakaḥ iti . na avaśyam ayam ramiḥ pravṛttau eva vartate . kim tarhi . apravṛttau api .
GS24pmbhasuu:4218_0: tat yathā . uparatāni asmin kule vratāni . uparataḥ svādhyāyaḥ iti . na ca tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4218_1: svādhyāyaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ bhavati na api vratāni . bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt śabdasya vasānalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_0: na upapadyate . kim idam bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvāt iti . bhāvasya avirāmaḥ bhāvāvirāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_1: bhāvāvirāmeṇa bhavati iti bhāvāvirāmabhāvī bhāvāvirāmabhāvinaḥ bhāvo bhāvāvirāmabhāvitvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_2: . aparaḥ āha bhāvabhāvitvādavirāmabhāvitvāt ca śabdasya avasānalakṣaṇam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4219_3: iti . tatparaḥ iti vā varṇasya avasānam . virāmaparaḥ varṇaḥ vasānasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4220: bhavati iti vaktavyam . varṇaḥ antyaḥ vā avasānam . atha vā vyaktam eva paṭhitavyam antyaḥ varṇaḥ vasānasañjñaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4221_0: . na vaktavyam . saṃhitāvasānayoḥ lokaviditatvāt siddham . samhitā avasānam iti lokaviditau
GS24pmbhasuu:4221_1: etau arthau . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cid adhīyānam āha : śannodevīyam samhitayā adhīṣva
GS24pmbhasuu:4222: adhīte . aparaḥ āha : kena vasyasi iti . saḥ āha : akāreṇa ikāreṇa ukāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4223: iti . evam etau lokaviditatau arthau . tayoḥ lokaviditatvāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4224: (P_2,1.1.1) KA_I,359.2-20 Ro_II,491-496 vidhiḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4225: vipūrvāt dhāñaḥ karmasādhanaḥ ikāraḥ . vidhīyate vidhiḥ iti . kim punaḥ vidhīyate . samāsaḥ vibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca . kim punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4226: adhikāraḥ āhosvit paribhāṣā . kaḥ punaḥ adhikāraparibhāṣayoḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4227: adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4228: paribhāṣā punaḥ ekadeśasthā satī sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati pradīpavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4229: tat yathā pradīpaḥ suprajvalitaḥ ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam veśma abhijvalayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4230: kaḥ punaḥ atra prayatnaviśeṣaḥ . adhikāre sati svarayitavyam paribhāṣāyām punaḥ satyām sarvam apekṣyam . tathā idam aparam dvaitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_0: ekārthībhāvaḥ vā sāmarthyam syāt vyapekṣā vā iti . tatra ekārthībhāve sāmarthye adhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_1: ca sati samāsaḥ ekaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati bibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ca asaṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_2: . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye adhikāre ca sati bibhaktividhānam parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_3: ca saṅgṛhītaḥ samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . anyatra khalu api samarthagrahaṇāni yuktagrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4231_4: ca kartavyāni bhavanti . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye na
GS24pmbhasuu:4232: cavāhāhaivayukte iti . vyapekṣāyām punaḥ sāmarthye paribhāṣāyām ca satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_0: yāvān vyākaraṇe padagandhaḥ asti saḥ sarvaḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tu ekaḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_1: . tatra ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam paribhāṣā ca iti evam sūtram abhinnatarakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_2: . evam api kva cit akartavyam samarthagrahaṇam kriyate kva cit ca kartavyam na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_3: . akartavyam tāvat kriyate samarthānām prathamāt vā iti . kartavyam ca na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_4: karmaṇi aṇ samarthāt iti . nanu ca gamyate tatra sāmarthyam . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4233_5: iti . satyam gamyate utpanne tu pratyaye . saḥ eva tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4235_0: (P_2,1.1.2) KA_I,359.21-361.24 Ro_II,496-504 atha samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4235_1: dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ samasyate . kaṣṭaśritaḥ narakaśritaḥ iti . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4236: śritaḥ viṣṇumitraḥ gurukulam . tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇavacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4237_0: śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ kirikāṇaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . tiṣṭha tvam śaṅkulayā . khaṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4237_1: dhāvati musalena . caturthī tadarthārthabalihitasukharakṣitaiḥ . gohitam aśrahitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4237_2: . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . sukham gobhyaḥ . hitam devadattāya . pañcamī bhayena
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_0: vṛkabhayam dasyubhayam corabhayam . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . gaccha tvam mā vṛkebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4238_1: . bhayam devadattasya yajñadattāt . ṣaṣṭhī subantena samasyate : rājapuruṣaḥ , brāhmaṇakambalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4239: bhāryā rājñaḥ . puruṣaḥ devadattasya . saptamī śauṇḍaiḥ : akṣaśauṇḍaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4240: strīśauṇḍaḥ . samarthagrahaṇam kimartham . kuśalaḥ devadattaḥ akṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4241: śauṇḍaḥ pibati pānāgāre . atha kriyamāṇe api samarthagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . na vā bhavati mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_0: bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati : mahat kaṣṭam mahākaṣṭam , mahākaṣṭam śritaḥ mahākaṣṭaśritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_1: iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati : mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4242_2: ca prapnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4243: kasya kasmāt na bhavati . kim dvayoḥ āhosvit bahūnām . bahūnām kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4244: bhavati . sup supā iti vartate . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante
GS24pmbhasuu:4245: . tat yathā prātipadikāt iti vartamāne anyasmāt ca anyasmāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4246: prātipadikāt utpattiḥ bhavati . satyam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam
GS24pmbhasuu:4247: parisamāpyate . yāvati etat parisamāpyate prātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_0: utpattyā bhavitavyam . pratyekam ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_1: yāvati etat parisamāpyate sup supā iti tāvataḥ samāsena bhavitavyam . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_2: ca etat parisamāpyate na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . asāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_3: katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yadi sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4248_4: iti ucyate rājapuruṣaḥ abhirūpaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ darśanīyaḥ atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4249: pradhānam atra sāpekṣam . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4250: yatra tarhi apradhānam sāpekṣam bhavati tatra te vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4251: devadattasya gurukulam , devadattasya guruputraḥ , devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyapekṣā atra ṣaṣṭḥī sarvam gurukulam apekṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:4252: . yatra tarhi na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī tatra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti : kim odanaḥ śālīnām . saktvāḍhakam āpaṇīyānām . kutaḥ bhavān pāṭaliputrakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4253: iha ca api : devadattasya gurukulam , devadattasya guruputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4254_0: devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti : yadi eṣā samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī syāt na etat niyogataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4254_1: gamyeta devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ putraḥ iti . kim tarhi . anyasya api guruputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4254_2: devadattasya kim cit iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:4255: yataḥ tu niyogataḥ devadattasya yaḥ guruḥ tasya yaḥ putraḥ iti eṣaḥ arthaḥ gamyate ataḥ manyāmahe na samudāyapekṣā ṣaṣṭḥī iti . anyatra khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4256_0: samarthagrahaṇe sāpekṣasya api kāryam bhavati . kva anyatra . isusoḥ sāmarthye .
GS24pmbhasuu:4256_1: brāhamaṇasya sarpiḥ karoti iti . tasmāt na aeta śakyak vaktum sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4256_2: bhavati iti . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati mahat
GS24pmbhasuu:4257: kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti vaktavyam . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4258: viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate iti ucyate devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_0: agurukulaputrādīnām iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_1: vā viśeṣaṇam na prayujyate agurukulaputrādīnām iti . na vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_2: kasmāt na bhavati . agamakatvāt . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4259_3: . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena gamyate mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti na jātu cit samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_0: kaṣṭaśritaḥ iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_1: iti . yatra gamakaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā : devadattasya gurukulam
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_2: , devadattasya guruputraḥ , devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti . yadi agamakatvam hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4260_3: na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena . iha api bhāryā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ devadattasya iti yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4261: asau jātu cit samāsena asau gamyate bhārya rājapuruṣaḥ devadattasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4262_0: tasmāt na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena . idam tarhi prayojanam . asti asamarthasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4262_1: nañsamāsaḥ gamakaḥ . tasya sādhutvam mā bhūt . akiñcit kurvāṇam amāṣam haramāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4262_2: agādhāt utsṛṣṭam iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . avaśyam kasya cit nañsamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4263: . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni apunargeyāḥ ślokāḥ aśrāddhabhojī alavaṇabhojī
GS24pmbhasuu:4264_0: brāhmaṇaḥ . suṭ anapuṃsakasya etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva asamarthasamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4264_1: nañsamāsasya gamakasya sādhutvam bhavati na anyasya iti . tasmān na arthaḥ samarthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4265: samarthagrahaṇe samartham iti ucyate kim samartham nāma . pṛthagarthānām ekārthībhāvaḥ samarthavacanam . pṛthagarthānām padānam ekārthībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4266_0: samartham iti ucyate . vākye pṛthagarthāni rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ ekārthāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4266_1: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . kim ucyate pṛthagarthāni iti yāvatā rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ ānīyatām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4266_2: ukte rājapuruṣaḥ iti ca saḥ eva . na api brūmaḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati iti . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4267: . subalopaḥ vyavadhānam yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ svaraḥ . supaḥ alopaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse punaḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4268: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . vyavadhānam ca bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ ṛddhasya puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4269_0: iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . yatheṣṭam anyatareṇa abhisambandhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4269_1: vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati . rājapuruṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4269_2: dvau svarau bhavataḥ vākye . rajñaḥ puruṣaḥ . samāse punaḥ ekaḥ eva . rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4270: viśeṣāḥ . kim tarhi . vācanikāni etāni . āha hi bhagavān supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ upasarjanam pūrvam samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4271_0: . ime tarhi ekārthībhāvkṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ vyaktābhidānam lkupasarjanaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4271_1: cayogaḥ iti . saṅkhyāviśeṣaḥ bhavati vākye . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājñoḥ puruṣaḥ rājñām
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_0: rājapuruṣaḥ iti . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_1: śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga hi bhavān tam uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4272_2: ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma arthena bhavitavyam . arthakṛtena
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_0: bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām . artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_1: viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau
GS24pmbhasuu:4273_2: viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti iha tasya viśeṣaḥ gamyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_0: vyaktābhidhānam bhavati vākye . brāhmaṇasya kambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . samāse punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_1: avyaktam . brāhmaṇakambalaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . sandehaḥ bhavati sambuddhiḥ syāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4274_2: vā iti . eṣaḥ api aviśeṣaḥ . bhavati hi kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4275: cit vākye avyaktam tat ca samāse vyaktam . vākye tāvat avyaktam . ardham paśoḥ devadattasya iti . sandehaḥ bhavati paśuguṇasya vā devadattasya yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4276: ardham artha vā yaḥ asau sañjñībhūtaḥ paśuḥ nāma tasya yat ardham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4277: tat ca samāse vyaktam bhavati . ardhhapaśuḥ devadattasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_0: upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati vākye . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . samāse na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_1: . rājapuruṣaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api adoṣaḥ . samāse api upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_2: yathā devadattasya gurukulam devadattasya guruputraḥ devadattasya dāsabhāryā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4278_3: . cayogaḥ bhavati vākye . svacayogaḥ svāmicayogaḥ ca . svacayogaḥ rājñaḥ gauḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4279: puruṣaḥ ca iti . samāse na bhavati . rājñaḥ gavāśvapuruṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4280: svāmicayogaḥ devadattasya ca yajñadattasya ca viṣṇumitrasya ca gauḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_0: samāse na bhavati . devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrāṇām gauḥ iti . atha etasmin ekārthībhāvkṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_1: viśeṣe kim svābhāvikam śabdaiḥ arthābhidhānam āhosvit vācanikam . svābhāvikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_2: āha . kutaḥ etat . arthānādeśāt . na hi arthāḥ ādiśyante . katham punaḥ arthān ādiśan
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_3: evam brūyāt na arthāḥ ādiśyante it . yat āha bhavān anekam anyapadārthe cārthe dvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4281_4: apatye rakte nirvṛtte iti . na etāni arthādeśanāni . svabhāvataḥ eteṣām śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_0: eteṣu artheṣu abhiniviṣṭānām nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . tat yathā . kūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_1: hastadakṣiṇaḥ panthāḥ . abhre candramasam paśya iti . svabhāvataḥ tatrasthasya pathaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4282_2: candramasaḥ ca nimittatvena anvākhyānam kriyate . evam iha api cārthe yaḥ saḥ dvandvasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_0: . kim puna kāraṇam na ādiśyante . tat ca laghvartham . laghvartham hi arthāḥ na ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_1: . avaśyam hi anena arthān ādiśatā kena cit śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ syāt . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4283_2: ca tāvat kena kṛtaḥ yena asau kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_0: atha tasya kena cit kṛtaḥ tasya kena kṛtaḥ iti anavasthā . asambhavaḥ khalu api ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_1: tasya . kaḥ hi nāma samarthaḥ dhātuprātipadikapratyayanipātānām arthān ādeṣṭum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_2: na ca etat mantavyam pratyayārthe nirdiṣṭe prakṛtyarthaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_3: hi guṇābhidhāne guṇinaḥ sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_4: . sāmānyaśabdāḥ ete evam syuḥ . sāmanyaśabdāḥ ca na antareṇa viśeṣam prakaraṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_5: viśeṣeṣu avatiṣṭhante . yataḥ tu khalu niyogataḥ vṛkṣaḥ iti ukte svabhāvataḥ kasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4284_6: cit eva viśeṣe vṛkṣaśabdaḥ vartate ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4285: manyāmahe na ime sāmānyaśabdāḥ iti . na cet sāmānyaśabdāḥ prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate pratyayaḥ pratyayārthe vartate . apravṛttiḥ khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4286_0: arthādeśanasya . bahavaḥ hi śabdāḥ yeṣām arthāḥ na vijñāyante . jarbharī turpharītū
GS24pmbhasuu:4286_1: . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihāraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4286_2: ca . na khalu api nirjñātasya arthasya anvyākhyane kim cit prayojanam asti . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4287: paścāt astam eti madhuraḥ guḍaḥ kaṭukam śṛṅgaveram iti kim tena kṛtam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4288: (P_2,1.1.4) KA_I,364.1-5 Ro_II,516 vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanānarthakyam . kim kāraṇam . svabhāvasiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4289: . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4290: bhavati vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye samāse prapte vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4291: na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . tasmāt na arthaḥ vā vacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4292_0: (P_2,1.1.5) KA_I,364.6-365.14 Ro_II,517-525 atha ye vṛttim vartayanti kim te āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4292_1: . parārthābhidhānam vṛttiḥ iti āhuḥ . atha teṣām evam bruvatām kim jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4292_2: āhosvit ajahatsvārthā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi jahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ rājapuruṣam ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:4293_0: prāpnoti aupagavam ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya . atha ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4293_1: vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . kā punaḥ vṛttiḥ nyāyyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4294: jahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate loke .
GS24pmbhasuu:4295: puruṣaḥ ayam parakarmaṇi pravartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . tat yathā takṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4296_0: rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam karma jahāti . evam yuktam yat rājā puruṣārthe vartamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4296_1: svam artham jahyāt upaguḥ ca apartyārthe vartamānaḥ svam artham jahyāt . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4296_2: uktam rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte puruṣamātrasya ānayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4297: prāpnoti aupagavam ānaya iti ukte apatyamātrasya iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4298: jahat api asau svārtham na atyantāya jahāti . yaḥ parārthavirodhī svārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4299: tam jahāti . tat yathā takṣā rājakarmaṇi vartamānaḥ svam takṣakarma jahāti na hikkitahasitakaṇḍūyitāni . na ca ayam arthaḥ parārthavirodhī viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4300_0: nāma . tasmāt na hāsyati . atha vā anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . ghṛtaghaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4300_1: tailaghaṭaḥ iti niṣikte ghṛte taile vā anvyayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam ghṛtaghaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4300_2: ayam tailaghaṭaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bhavati hi tatra yā ca yāvatī ca arthamātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:4301: agnau niṣṭapya ghṛtaghaṭam tṛṇakūrcena prakṣālayatu . na gaṃsyate saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4302: viśeṣaḥ . yathā tarhi mallikāpuṭaḥ campakaputaḥ iti niṣkīrṇāsu api sumanaḥsu anvayāt viśeṣaṇam bhavati ayam mallikapuṭaḥ ayam campakapuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4303: iti . atha vā samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vṛttau kriyate . sāmartham nama bhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4304_0: saṃsargaḥ vā . aparaḥ āha : bhedasaṃsargau vā sāmarthyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ bhedaḥ saṃsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4304_1: vā . iha rājñaḥ iti ukte sarvam svam prasaktam puruṣaḥ iti ukte sarvaḥ svāmi prasaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4304_2: . iha idānīm rājapuruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā
GS24pmbhasuu:4305: puruṣam nivartayati anyebhyaḥ svāmibhyaḥ puruṣaḥ api rājānam anyebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ . evam etasmin ubhayataḥ vyavacchinne yadi jahāti kāmam jahātu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4306: na jātu cit puruṣamātrasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ . yuktam punaḥ yat ajahatsvārthā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_0: bāḍham yuktam . evam hi dṛśyate loke . bhikṣukaḥ ayam dvitīyām bhikṣām āsādya pūrvām
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_1: na jahāti sañcayāya pravartate . nanu ca uktam ubhayoḥ vidyamānasvārthayoḥ dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_2: dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti iti . kasyāḥ punaḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . prathāmāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4307_3: . na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tarhi . na ṣaṣṭhīsamarthaḥ puruṣaḥ . prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_0: prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam na prathamāsamarthaḥ rājā iti . abhinihitaḥ saḥ saḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_1: antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_2: eva dvivacanam prāpnoti . saṅghātasya aikārthyāt na avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_3: . saṅghātasya ekatvam arthaḥ . tena avayavasaṅkhyātaḥ subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4308_4: parasparavyapekṣā sāmarthyem eke . parasparavyapekṣā sāmarthyem eke icchanti . kā
GS24pmbhasuu:4309: vyapekṣā . na brūmaḥ śabdayoḥ iti . kim tarhi . arthayoḥ . iha rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ukte rājā puruṣam apekṣate mama ayam iti . puruṣaḥ api rājānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4310: apekṣate aham asya iti . tayoḥ abhisambandhasya ṣaṣṭhī vācikā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4311: tathā kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti kriyākārakayoḥ abhisambandhasya dvitīyā vācikā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4313: ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam atha api vyapekṣā sāmarthyam kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4314: . katham . samaḥ ayam arthaśabdena saha samāsaḥ . sam ca upasargaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4315_0: upasargāḥ ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:4315_1: āhuḥ . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyāvācī śabdaḥ prayujyate yena samaḥ sāmarthyam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4315_2: tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam nūnam atra kaḥ cit prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ na prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4315_3: yena samaḥ sāmarthyam iti . tat yathā . dhūmam dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4316: parivrājakaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau prayogārhaḥ śabdaḥ . ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4317_0: saṅgatārtham samartham saṃsṛṣṭārtham samartham samprekṣitam artham samartham sambaddhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4317_1: samartham iti . tat yadā tāvat ekārthībhāvaḥ sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4317_2: saṅgatārthaḥ saṃsṛṣṭārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . tat yathā saṅgatam ghṛtam saṅgatam tailam
GS24pmbhasuu:4318: ekībhūtam iti gamyate . yadā vyapekṣā sāmarthyam tadā evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4319_0: kariṣyate samprekṣitārthaḥ samarthaḥ sambaddhārthaḥ samarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4319_1: badhnātyarthaḥ . sambaddhaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ rajjvā ayasā vā kīle vyatiṣiktaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4319_2: . na avaśyam badhnātiḥ vyatiṣaṅge eva vartate . kim tarhi . ahānau api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4319_3: tat yathā sambaddhau imau damyau iti ucyete yau anyonyam na jahītaḥ . atha vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4320: vartate . tat yathā . asti naḥ gargaiḥ sambandhaḥ . asti naḥ vatsaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4321_0: sambandhaḥ . saṃyogaḥ iti arthaḥ . atha etasmin vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye yaḥ asau ekārthībhāvkṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4321_1: viśeṣaḥ sa vaktavyaḥ . tatra nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśepratiṣedhaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4321_2: etasmin vyapekṣāyām sāmarthye nānākārakāt nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4321_3: teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nighātaḥ . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . asti daṇḍasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4321_4: harateḥ ca vyapekṣā iti kṛtvā nighātaḥ prāpnoti . yuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ . odanam paca
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_0: tava bhaviṣyati . odanam paca mama bhaviṣyati . asti odanasya yuṣmadasmadoḥ ca vyapekṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_1: iti kṛtvā vāmnāvādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim ucyate nānākārakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_2: iti yadā tena eva āsajya hriyate . na api brūmaḥ anyena āsajya hriyate iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_3: tarhi śabdapramāṇakāḥ vayam . yat śabdaḥ āha tat asmākam pramāṇam . śabdaḥ ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_4: sattām āha . ayam daṇḍaḥ . asti iti gamyate . saḥ daṇḍaḥ kartā bhūtvā anyena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_5: abhisambadhyamānaḥ karaṇam sampadyate . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:4322_6: devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4323: . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam bhūtvā anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4324: pracaye samāsapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ gauḥ ca aśvaḥ ca puruṣaḥ ca rājagavāśvapuruṣāḥ iti . samarthatarāṇām vā . samarthatarāṇām vā padānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4325: samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kāni punaḥ samarthatarāṇi . yāni dvandvabhāvīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:4326: kutaḥ etat . eṣām hi āśutarā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā samarthataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4327: ayam māṇavakaḥ adhyayanāya iti ucyate . āśrutaragranthaḥ iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_0: aparaḥ āha : samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kāni punaḥ samarthatarāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_1: . yāni dvandvabhāvīni . kutaḥ etat . etāni samānavibhaktīni anyavibhaktiḥ rājā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4328_2: bhavati viśeṣaḥ svasmin bhrātari pitṛvyaputre ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4329: samudāyasāmarthyāt vā siddham ṣamudāyasāmarthyāt vā punaḥ siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4330: samudāyena rājñaḥ sāmarthyam bhavati na avayavena . aparaḥ āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:4331_0: samarthatarāṇām vā samudāyasāmarthyāt . samarthatarāṇām vā padānām samāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4331_1: . kutaḥ etat . samudāyasāmarthyāt eva . asmin pakṣe vā iti etat asamarthitam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4331_2: . etat ca samarthitam . katham . na eva vā punaḥ atra rājñaḥ aśvapuruṣau apekṣamāṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4331_3: gavā saha samāsaḥ bhavati . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4332: goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇasya āsvapuruṣābhyām samāsaḥ samāsaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4333: pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4334: (P_2,1.1.7) KA_I,367.10-368.24 Ro_II,532-537 ākhyātam sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇam vākyam . ākhyātam sāvyayam sakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4335: sakārakaviśeṣaṇam vākyasañjñam bhavati vaktavyam . sāvyayam . uccaiḥ paṭhati . nīcaiḥ paṭhati . sakārakam . odanam pacati . sakārakaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4336: odanam mṛdu viśadam pacati . sakriyāviśeṣaṇam ca iti vaktavyam . suṣṭhu pacati . duṣṭhu pacati . aparaḥ āha : ākhyātam saviśeṣaṇam iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:4337: sarvāṇi hi etāni kriyāviśeṣaṇāni . ekatiṅ . ekatiṅ vākyasañjñam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4339_0: samānavākye iti prakṛtya nighātayuṣmadasmadādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . kim prayojanam . nānāvākye
GS24pmbhasuu:4339_1: mā bhūvan nighātādayaḥ iti . ayam daṇḍaḥ . hara anena . odanam paca . tava bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_0: yoge pratiṣedhaḥ cādibhiḥ . cādibhiḥ yoge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāmaḥ tava ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_1: svam mama ca svam . kimartham icam ucyate . yathānyāsam eva cādibhiḥ yoge pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4340_2: ucyate . idam adya apūrvam kriyate vākyasañjñā samānavākyādhikāraḥ ca . tat dveṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_0: . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe cādibhiḥ yoge yathānyāsam eva bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4341_1: samarthanighāte hi samānādhikaraṇayuktayukteṣu upasaṅkhyānam asamarthatvāt . samarthanighāte
GS24pmbhasuu:4342: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt . samānādhikaraṇe . paṭave te dāsyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4343: mrdave te dāsyāmi . samānādhikaraṇe . yuktayukte . nadyāḥ tiṣṭhati kūle .
GS24pmbhasuu:4344: vṛkṣasya lambate śākhā . śālīnām te odanam dadāmi . śālīnām me odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4345: dadāti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt . rājagavīkṣīre dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4346: kim kāraṇam . dviṣaṣṭhībhāvāt . dve hi atra ṣaṣṭhyau . rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram
GS24pmbhasuu:4347: iti . kim ucyate dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti yāvatā sup saha supā iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4348: dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate dvayoḥ subantayoḥ samāsaprasaṅgaḥ dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . katham tarhi . dviprakārasya samāsasya prasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4349: dvisamāsaprasaṅgaḥ iti . rājagokṣīram iti api prāpnoti na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā etat vākyam bhavati goḥ kṣīram gokṣīram
GS24pmbhasuu:4350: rājñaḥ gokṣīram rājagokṣīram iti . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati rājñaḥ goḥ kṣīram iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4351: siddham tu rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ goḥ kṣīreṇa sāmarthyāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_0: rājaviśiṣṭāyāḥ goḥ kṣīreṇa saha samāsaḥ bhavati na kevalāyāḥ . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_1: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . yathā eva ayam gavi yatate na kṣīramātreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_2: santoṣam karoti evam rājani api yatate . rājñaḥ yā gauḥ tasyāḥ yat kṣīram iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4352_3: eva vā punaḥ atra goḥ rājānam apekṣamāṇāyāḥ kṣīreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4353: katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . katham tarhi goḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4354: kṣīram apekṣamāṇāyāḥ rājñā saha samāsaḥ bhavati . pradhānam atra tada gauḥ bhavati . bhavati ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4356: samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate . padavidhau samarthavacanam varṇāśraye śāstre
GS24pmbhasuu:4357: ānantaryavijñānāt. padavidhau samarthādhikāraḥ kriyate varṇāśraye śāstre ānantaryamātre kāryam yathā vijñāyeta . tiṣṭhatu dadhi aśāna tvam śākena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4358_0: tiṣṭhatu kumārī chatram hara devadatta iti . samarthādhikārasya vidheyasāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4358_1: nirdeśānarthakyam . samarthādhikāraḥ ayam vidheyena samānādhikaraṇaḥ . kim ca vidheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4358_2: . samāsaḥ . yāvat brūyāt samarthaḥ samāsaḥ iti tāvat samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4358_3: rājapuruṣaḥ iti etasyām avasthāyām samarthādhikāreṇa kim cit api śakyam pravartayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:4360: anarthakaḥ . siddham tu samarthānām iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4361_0: samarthānām padānām vidhiḥ iti vaktavyam . evam api dvyekayoḥ na prāpnoti . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4361_1: vā . atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam. samarthasya ca samarthayoḥ ca samarthānām ca samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4362: eva prāpnoti . ṣaṭprabhṛtiṣu hi ekaśeṣaḥ parisamāpyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_0: pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti dvyekayoḥ api bhaviṣyati . evam api vivibhaktīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_1: na prāpnoti . samarthāt samarthe padāt pade iti . evam tarhi samarthapadayoḥ vidhiśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_2: sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ : samarthasya vidhiḥ samarthavidhiḥ , samarthayoḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_3: samarthavidhiḥ , samarthāt vidhiḥ samarthavidhiḥ , samarthe vidhiḥ samarthvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_4: . padasya vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ , padayoḥ vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ , padānām vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_5: , padāt vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ , pade vidhiḥ padavidhiḥ . samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_6: ca samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ ca samarthavidhiḥ . padavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_7: ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ ca padavidhiḥ . samarthavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4363_8: ca padavidhiḥ ca samarthaḥ padavidhiḥ . pūrvaḥ samāsaḥ uttarapadalopī yādṛcchikīvibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4364: (P_2,1.1.9) KA_I,370.1-371.24 Ro_II,540-546 samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam asamarthatvāt . samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4365: vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asamarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4366: . katham asamarthatvam . dravyam padārthaḥ iti cet. yadi dravyam padārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4367: na bhavati tadā sāmarthyam . atha hi guṇaḥ padārthaḥ bhavati tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_0: sāmarthyam . anyaḥ hi vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ hi puruṣatvam . na anyatvam asti iti iyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_1: sāmarthyam bhavati . anyaḥ hi devadattaḥ gobhyaḥ aśvebhyaḥ ca na ca tasya etāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_2: sāmartham bhavati . kaḥ vā viśeṣaḥ yat guṇe padārthe sāmarthyam syāt dravye ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_3: syāt . eṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ . ekam tayoḥ adhikaraṇam anyaḥ ca vīratvam guṇaḥ anyaḥ puruṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_4: . dravyapadārthikasya api tarhi guṇabhedāt sāmarthyam bhaviṣyati . aśakyaḥ dravyapadārthikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_5: dravyasya guṇakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ pratijñātum . nanu ca abhyantaraḥ asau bhavati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_6: api abhyantaraḥ na tu gamyate . na hi guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuratvam gamyate śṛṅgaveram
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_7: iti vā kaṭukatvam . guṇapadārthikena api tarhi aśakyaḥ guṇasya dravyakṛtaḥ upakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4368_8: pratijñātum . atha guṇapadārthikaḥ pratijānīte dravyapadārthikaḥ api kasmāt na pratijānīte
GS24pmbhasuu:4369: evam anayoḥ sāmarthyam syāt vā na vā . kva ca tāvat idam syāt samānādhikaraṇena iti . yatra sarvam samāman : indraḥ śakraḥ puruhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4370: purandaraḥ . kanduḥ koṣṭhaḥ kuśūlaḥ iti . na evañjātīyakānām samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_0: bhavitavyam pratyayena vā utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_1: . artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_2: dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_3: tarhi idānīm idam bhavati bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ iti . na etau samānārthau . ekaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_4: śakyārthe kṛtyaḥ bhavati aparaḥ arhatyarthe : śakyaḥ bhartum bhṛtyaḥ . arhati bhṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:4371_5: bharaṇīyaḥ . bhṛtyaḥ bharaṇīyaḥ bhṛtyabharaṇīyaḥ iti . yadi tarhi yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4372: kim cit samānam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra bhavitavyam iha api tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4373_0: darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyamātā iti . atra api kim cit samānam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4373_1: kim punaḥ tat . sadbhāvānyabhāvau . na kva cit sadbhāvānyabhāvau na staḥ ucyate ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4374: yatra sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam . kva ca sādhīyaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4375_0: yatra sarvam samānam sadbhāvānyabhāvau dravyam ca. atha vā samānādhikaraṇena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4375_1: tat samānam āśrīyate yat samānam bhavati na ca bhavati . na ca etat samānam kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4375_2: api na bhavati . atha vā yāvat brūyāt samānadravyeṇa iti tāvat samānādhikaraṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4376_0: adhikaraṇam iti ucyate . tat yathā . ekasmin dravye vyuditam . ekasmin adhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4376_1: vyuditam iti . tathā vyākaraṇe vipratiṣiddham ca anadhikaraṇavāci iti adravyavāci
GS24pmbhasuu:4376_2: iti gamyate . evam api idam avaśyam kartavyam samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4377_0: sarpiḥ kālakam yajuḥ pītakam iti evamartham . yadi samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4377_1: bhavati iti ucyate sarpiḥ pīyate yajuḥ kriyate iti atra ṣatvam na prāpnoti . adhātvabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4377_2: iti evam tat . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4378: samānādhikaraṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vīraḥ pūruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4379_0: kim kāraṇam asamarthatvāt . na vā vacanaprāmāṇyāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam
