GS24pmbhasuu:4379_1: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt . vacanaprāmāṇyāt atra samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4380: luptākhyāteṣu ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4381: luptākhyāteṣu ca . kim . vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4382: kugatiprādayaḥ ca iti . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . surājā atirājā iti . na brūmaḥ vṛttisūtravacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_0: vārttikavacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . siddham tu kvāṅksvatidurgativacanāt prādayaḥ ktārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_1: iti . tadarthagateḥ vā . tadarthagateḥ vā punaḥ siddham etat . kim idam tadarthagateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_2: iti . tasya arthaḥ tadarthaḥ tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_3: yasya arthasya kauśāmbyā sāmarthyam saḥ nisā ucyate . atha vā saḥ arthaḥ tadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4383_4: tadarthasya gatiḥ tadarthagatiḥ tadarthagateḥ iti . yaḥ arthaḥ kauśāmbyā samarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4385: samāsaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ bhavati āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4386: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4387: samāsaḥ dvayoḥ dvayoḥ cet dvandve anekagrahaṇam kartavyam . carthe dvandvaḥ . anekam iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4388_0: plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . atra api dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4388_1: bhaviṣyati . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ samāsaḥ iti cet na bahuṣu dvitvābhāvāt . dvayoḥ dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4388_2: samāsaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . bahuṣu dvitvābhāvāt . na bahuṣu dvitvam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4388_3: . na avaśyam evam vigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ : plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4388_4: ca iti . kim tarhi evam vighrahaḥ kariṣyate : plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca plakṣanyagrodhau
GS24pmbhasuu:4388_5: khadiraḥ ca palāśaḥ ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhau ca khadirapalāśau plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4389: sidhyanti . hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti prāpnoti . na ca evam bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_0: bhavitavyam ca yadā evam vigrahaḥ kriyate hotā ca potā ca hotāpotārau neṣṭā ca udgātā
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_1: ca neṣṭodgātārau hotāpotārau ca neṣṭodgātārau ca hotāpotāneṣṭodgātāraḥ iti . hotṛpotṛneṣṭodgātāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4390_2: tu na sidhyanti samāsāntapratiṣedhaḥ ca . samāsāntasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4391: vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam iti . vāktvacasrugdṛṣadam iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4392_0: . atra api pareṇa pareṇa saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . sruk ca dṛṣadam ca srugdṛṣadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4392_1: tvak ca srugdṛṣadam ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam vāk ca tvaksrugdṛṣadam ca vāktvaksrugdṛṣadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_0: iha ca susukṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājivāsanā samantaśitirandhreṇa dvayoḥ vṛttau na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_1: . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . aviśeṣeṇa bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_2: bahuvrīhau anekapadaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4393_3: doṣaḥ . tatra svarasamāsāntapuṃvadbhāveṣu doṣaḥ bhavati . svara . pūrvaśālāpriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4394: puṃvadbhāva . khādiretaraśamyam rauravetarśamyam . na vā avayavatatpuruṣatvāt. na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_0: avayavatatpuruṣatvāt . avayavaḥ atra tatpuruṣasañjñaḥ tadāśrayau samāsāntapuṃvadbhāvau
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_1: bhaviṣyataḥ . svaraḥ katham . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt . antodāttatvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:4395_2: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaraḥ iti antodāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4396: vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvam ca antodāttatvam param pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam . na paravipratiṣedham brūmaḥ . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_0: antaraṅgavipratiṣedham . nimittisvarabalīyastvāt vā . atha vā nimittasvarāt nimittisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4397_1: balīyān iti vaktavyam . kim punaḥ nimittam kaḥ vā nimittī . bahuvrīhiḥ nimittam tatpuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4398: nimittasvarāt nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4399: ekaśitipātsvaravacanam tu jñāpakam nimittisvarabalīyastvasya . yat ayam yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4400_0: nimittasvarāt nimittisvaraḥ balīyān iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati yuktārohyādiṣu ekaśitipacchabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:4400_1: paṭhitum . evam kila nāma paṭhyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4400_2: . tat ca na . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ekaḥ śitiḥ eṣu te ime ekaśitayaḥ ekaśitayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4400_3: pādāḥ yasya iti . atha api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_0: vigrahaḥ kriyate ekaḥ śitiḥ ekaśitiḥ ekaḥ śitiḥ pādaḥ yasya iti evam api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4401_1: pāṭhena . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4402_0: sunatājivāsanā samantaśitirandhreṇa iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam vipratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4402_1: iti antodāttatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na idam bahuvrīhyavayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4403: kim tarhi . yasya bahuvrīhyavayavasya tatpuruṣasya tat lakṣaṇam asti tasya antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca asya api asti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4404_0: viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa bahulam iti. bahulavacanāt na bhaviṣyati . asya tarhi bahuvrīhyavayavasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4404_1: tatpuruṣañjñā prāpnoti . adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ iti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tasya antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4405: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4406: . yaḥ tarhi na igantaḥ adhikaśatavarṣaḥ iti . iha ca api adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ iti samāsantaḥ prāpnoti . ḍacprakaraṇe saṅkhyāyāḥ tatpuruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4407: upasaṅkhyānam nistriṃśādyartham iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avyayādeḥ iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4408_0: tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam avyayādeḥ iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt gotriṃśat gocatvāriṃśat
GS24pmbhasuu:4408_1: iti . bahuvrīhisañjñā tarhi prāpnoti. saṅkhyayā avyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅhyāḥ saṅkhyeye
GS24pmbhasuu:4409: vartayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4410: asya iti . yathā tarhi saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate tathā pūrveṇa prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_0: katham ca saḥ yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyā iva abhidhāyitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_1: iti . pratyākhyāte tasmin yoge saṅkhyām saṅkhyeye vartayiṣyāmaḥ . tatra evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_2: kariṣyate adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . sarvatha vayam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣāt na mucyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_3: . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ asti adhikā ṣaṣṭiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_4: varṣāṇām asya iti . yat tu tat uktam adhikaṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ na sidhyati iti saḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_5: bhavati . katham . yāvatā saḥ ca yogaḥ pratyākhyāyate ayam ca vigrahaḥ asti adhikā
GS24pmbhasuu:4411_6: ṣaṣṭiḥ varṣāṇi asya iti . adhikaśatavarṣaḥ tu na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4413_0: (P_2,1.2) KA_I,375.2-376.23 Ro_II,555-561 sup iti kimartham . karoṣi aṭan . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4413_1: asti . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4413_2: bhavati iti . idam tarhi . pīḍye pīḍyamāna . idam ca api udāharaṇam karoṣi aṭan .
GS24pmbhasuu:4413_3: nanu ca uktam asāmarthyāt atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:4414: bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4415_0: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat . āmantritasya parāṅgvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:4415_2: ca parasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4416: ṣaṣthyantam tāvat . madrāṇām rājan magadhānām rājan . āmantritakārakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_0: kuṇḍena aṭan . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ parāṅgavadbhāve sati asati vā . idam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_1: paraśunā vṛścan . tannimittagrahaṇam vā . tannimittagrahaṇam vā kartavyam. āmantritanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_2: parasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyam anyatarat vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_3: hi subantamātraprasaṅgaḥ anucyamāne hi etasmin subantramātrasya parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_4: prāpnoti . asya api prasajyeta . kṣtreṇa agne svāyuḥ saṃrabhasya mitreṇa agne mitradheye
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_5: yatasva . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . tannimittagrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4417_6: bhavati . goṣu svāmin aśveṣu svāmin . etat hi na eva ṣaṣthyantam na api āmantritakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4418: upasaṅkhyanam ananantaratvāt . subantasya parāṅgavadbhāve samānādhikaraṇasya upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . tīkṣṇayā sūcyā sīvyan
GS24pmbhasuu:4419: tīkṣṇena paraśunā vṛścan . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananantaratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_0: . nanu ca parasya parāṅgavadbhāve kṛte pūrvasya api bhaviṣyati . svare avadhāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_1: ca . svare avadhāraṇāt ca na sidhyati . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate na ānantarye .
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_2: param api chandasi . param api chandasi pūrvasya aṅgavat bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_3: ā te pitaḥ marutām sumnam etu . prati tvā duhitaḥ divaḥ . vṛṇīṣva duhitaḥ divaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4420_4: avyayapratiṣedhaḥ ca . avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccaiḥ adhīyāna nīcaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4421: anavyayībhāvasya . anavyayībhāvasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . upāgni adhīyāna pratyagni adhīyāna . atha kimartham svare avadhāraṇam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4422: svare avadhāraṇam subalopārtham . svare avadhāraṇam kriyate sublaḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:4423: iti . paraśunā vṛścan . na vā subantaikāntatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . subantaikāntatvāt . subantaikāntaḥ parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_0: prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu sublope . prātipadikaikāntaḥ tu bhavati sublope kṛte . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_1: subantaikāntatā syāt . tasmāt svare avadhāraṇam na kartavyam subalopārtham . prātipadikasthāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4424_2: supaḥ luk ucyate . tasmāt svaragrahaṇena na arthaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ṣatvaṇatve
GS24pmbhasuu:4425: . kūpe siñcan carma naman iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . iha tāvat kūpe siñcan iti svāśrayam padāditvam bhaviṣyati . carma naman iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4426_0: pūrvapadāt sañjñāyām agaḥ iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca samāse etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4426_1: bhavati pūrvapadam uttarapadam iti . na iti āha . aviśeṣeṇa etat bhavati . pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4426_2: padam pūrvapadam uttaram padam uttarapadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_0: anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane anavakāśāḥ avyayībhāvādayaḥ sañjñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4429_1: samāsasañjñām bādheran . tāḥ mā bādhiṣata iti prāgvacanam kriyate . atha kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4430: avyayībhāvādayaḥ sañjñāḥ kasmāt eva na bādhante . kriyamāṇe hi prāgvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_0: satyām samāsasañjñāyām etāḥ avayavasañjñāḥ ārabhyante . tatra vacanasamāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_1: . samāsasañjñā api anavakāśā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . sāvakāśā samāsasañjñā . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_2: avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭādīni avakāśaḥ . vispaṣṭam paṭuḥ vispaṣṭapaṭuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4431_3: avakāśaḥ . eṣā hi ācāryasya śailī lakṣyate yena eva avayavakāryam bhavati tena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4432: samudāyakāryam api bhavati . yena eva avayavakāryam svaraḥ tena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4433_0: samudākāryam api samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . vispaṣṭādīni guṇavacaneṣu iti . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4433_1: kākatālīyam ajākṛpāṇīyam . atra api yena eva avayavakāryam pratyayotpattiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4434: samāsāt ca tadviṣayāt . idam tarhi punārājaḥ punargavaḥ . atra api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4435_0: tatpuruṣasañjñā vaktavya tatpuruṣāśrayaḥ samāsāntaḥ yathā syāt . idam tarhi . punarādheyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4435_1: . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā gatikārakopapadāt kṛt iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4435_2: syāt . idam tarhi punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ deyam . atra api avaśyam gatisañjñā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4436: gatau iti nighātaḥ yathā syāt . yadi tat na asti punaścanasau chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:4437: iti. sati tasmin tena eva siddham . evam api ekā sañjñā iti vacanāt na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ . paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4439: sahavacanam pṛthak asamāsārtham . sahagrahaṇam kriyate sahabhūtayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4440: samāsañjñā yathā syāt ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . yadi ekaikasya samāsañjñā syāt iha ṛkpādaḥ iti samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca rājāśvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4441: iti dvau svarau syātām . katham ca kṛtvā ekaikasya sañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4442: pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_0: . tat yathā gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_1: na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin dṛṣṭānte yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4443_2: iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4444_0: pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇavṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ sahagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4444_1: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat sahagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4445: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . saha sup samasyate . kena saha . samarthena.
GS24pmbhasuu:4446: anuvyācalat anuprāviśat . tataḥ supā . supā ca saha sup samasyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_0: adhikāraḥ ca lakṣaṇam ca . yasya samāsasya anyat lakṣaṇam na asti idam tasya lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_1: bhaviṣyati . punarutsyūtam vāsaḥ deyam punarniṣkṛtaḥ rathaḥ iti . ivena vibhaktyalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4447_2: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ca . ivena saha samāsaḥ vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4448: (P_2,1.5) KA_I,378.17-19 Ro_II,569 kimartham mahatī sañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4449: anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñayeta . anavyayam avyayam bhavati iti avyayībhāvaḥ . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ avyayasañjñaḥ bhavati iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4450: (P_2,1.6) KA_I,378.23-379.5 Ro_II,569-570 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4451: sumadrāḥ sumagadhāḥ saputraḥ sacchātraḥ iti . samṛddhau sākalye iti ca prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4452: kaḥ cit uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit anyapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ . pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ avyayībhāvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_1: dvandvaḥ . na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . atha vā na ime samāsārthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4453_2: nirdiśyante . kim tarhi . avyayārthāḥ nirdiśyante ime . eteṣu artheṣu yat avyayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4454: (P_2,1.7) KA_I,379.7-12 Ro_II,570-572 asādṛśye iti kimartham . yathā devadattaḥ tathā yajñadattaḥ iti . asādṛśye iti ucyate . tatra idam na
GS24pmbhasuu:4455: sidhyati : yathāśakti yathābalam iti . kim kāraṇam . yathā iti ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_0: prakāravacane thāl saḥ ca sādṛśye vartate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam yathāśabdaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_1: eva avyutpannam prātipadikam vīpsāvācī . asti prakāravacane thāl . tat yat avyutpannam
GS24pmbhasuu:4456_2: prātipadikam vīpsāvāci tasya idam grahaṇam . atha yaḥ prakāravacane thāl tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4457: pūrveṇa prāpnoti sādṛśyasampatti iti . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4458: (P_2,1.9) KA_I,379.14-15 Ro_II,572 sup iti vartamāne punaḥ subgrahaṇam kimartham . avyayam iti evam tat abhūt submātre yathā syāt . māṣaprati sūpaprati odanaprati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4459: (P_2,1.10) KA_I,379.17-380.5 Ro_II,573-574 akṣādayaḥ tṛtīyāntāḥ pūrvoktasya yathā na tat . akṣādayaḥ tṛtīyāntāḥ pariṇā saha samasyante iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4460: vaktavyam . pūrvoktasya yathā na tat . ayathājātīyake dyotye . akṣeṇa na tathā vṛttam yathā pūrvam iti akṣapari śalākāpari . ekatve akṣaśalākayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4461: akṣaśalākayoḥ ca ekavacanāntayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . akṣābhyām vṛttam akṣaiḥ vṛttam . kitavavyavahāre ca . kitavavyavahāre iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4462: . iha mā bhūt . akṣeṇa idam na vṛttam śakaṭena yathā pūrvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4464: vibhāṣā iti ayam adhikāraḥ. tataḥ apaparibahirañcavaḥ pañcamyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4465: pañcamīgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . subantena iti vartate etaiḥ ca karmapravacanīyaiḥ yoge pañcamī vidhīyate . tatra antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:4466_0: pañcamīgrahaṇam pañcamyantena eva samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . bahiḥśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:4466_1: yoge pañcamī na vidhīyate . tatra api yathā syāt iti . bahirgrāmāt . atha kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4467: yoge pañcamī na vidhīyate katham eva etat sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4469: (P_2,1.13) KA_I,380.14-16 Ro_II,575 maryādābhividhigrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . pañcamyantena iti vartate āṅā ca karmapravacanīyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4470: pañcamī vidhīyate . etayoḥ ca eva arthayoḥ āṅ karmapravacanīyasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4472: (P_2,1.16) KA_I,380.18-23 Ro_II,575-576 kim udāharaṇam . anugaṅgam hāstinapuram anugaṅgam vārāṇasī anuśoṇam pāṭaliputram . yasya ca āyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4473: iti ucyate gaṅgā ca api āyatā vārāṇasī api āyatā . tatra kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4474: gaṅgayā saha samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ vārāṇasyā iti . evarm tarhi lakṣaṇena iti vartate gaṅgā ca eva hi lakṣaṇam na vārāṇasī . atha vā yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4475: ca āyāmaḥ iti ucyate gaṅgā ca api āyatā vārāṇasī api āyatā . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yasya āyāmaḥ iti . sādhīyaḥ ca gaṅgāyāḥ na vārāṇasyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4477: . tiṣṭhadguprabhṛtīni eva . kva mā bhūt . paramam tiṣṭhadgu . tiṣṭhadgu kālaviśeṣe . tiṣṭhadgu kālaviśeṣe iti vaktavyam . tiṣṭhanti gāvaḥ asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4478: kāle tiṣṭhadgu . vahadgu . khaleyavādīni prathamāntāni anyapadārthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:4479: khaleyavādīni prathamāntāni anyapadārthe samasyante . khaleyavam khalebusam lūnayavam lūyamānayavam pūtayavam pūyamānayavam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4481_0: vibhāṣā samāsaḥ yatha syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . pāram gaṅgāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4481_1: iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4481_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam avyayībhāvena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4482_0: yathā syāt . gaṅgāpāram iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ayam api vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4482_1: api . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4482_2: vāvacanam . pāre madhye ṣaṣṭhyā vā iti vaktavyam . avacane hi ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4482_3: yathā ekadeśipradhāne akriyamāṇe hi vāvacane ṣaṣṭhīsamāsasya abhāvaḥ syāt yathā ekadeśipradhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4482_4: . tat yatha ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekadeśisamāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4482_5: mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na bhavati . samāsataddhitānām vṛttiḥ vibhāṣā . vṛttiviṣaye nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4483: kriyamāṇe ekayā vṛttiḥ vibhāṣā aparayā vṛttiviṣaye vibhāṣāpavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4484: ekārāntanipātanam ca . ekārāntanipātanam ca kartavyam . pāregaṅgam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4485: na kartavyam . saptamyāḥ alukā siddham . bhavet siddham yadā saptamī yadā tu anyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ tadā na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_0: (P_2,1.20) KA_I,382.5-21 Ro_II,579-582 nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāsamāse anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4486_1: . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāsamāse anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dvīrāvatīkaḥ deśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4487_0: prāpnoti . na vaktavyaḥ . iha kaḥ cit samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4487_1: , kaḥ cit anyapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ . pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4489: ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ. na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . nanu ca yat yena ucyate saḥ tasya arthaḥ bhavati . atra ca vayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4490_0: etābhyām padābhyām etam artham ucyamānam paśyāmaḥ . etat eva ca jānīmaḥ yat yena
GS24pmbhasuu:4490_1: ucyate saḥ tasya arthaḥ iti . api ca anyapadārthatā na prakalpeta . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4490_2: iti . kim kāraṇam . atra api hi vayam etābhyām śabdābhyām etam artham ucyamānam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4490_3: . yadi api atra etābhyām śabdābhyām eṣaḥ arthaḥ ucyate anyapadārthaḥ api tu gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4490_4: . tatra anyapadārthāśrayaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi anyapadārthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4490_5: svapadārthaḥ api tu gamyate . tatra svapadārthāśrayaḥ avyayībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4491_0: prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām bahuvrīhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4491_1: . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . bhavet ekasañjñādhikāre siddham paraṅkāryatve
GS24pmbhasuu:4491_2: tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4492: doṣaḥ . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ . sarvam ekanadītare .
GS24pmbhasuu:4494: prayojanāni . dvigoḥ tatpuruṣatve samāsāntāḥ prayojanam . pañcagavam daśagavam pañcarājam daśarājam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4495_1: . śritādiṣu gamigāmyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . grāmam gamī gramagamī gramam
GS24pmbhasuu:4495_2: gāmī grāmagāmī . śritādibhiḥ ahīne dvitīyāsamāsavacanānarthakyam bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4495_3: . śritādibhiḥ ahīnavācinyāḥ dvitīyāyāḥ samāsavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4496: bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt . iha hi yaḥ kaṣṭam śritaḥ kaṣṭam anena śritam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4497: tatra bahuvrīhiṇā siddham . ahīne dvītīyāsvaravacanānarthakyam ca . ahīne dvitīyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti etat svaravacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4498_0: . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt eva . jātisvaraprasaṅgaḥ tu . jātisvaraḥ tu prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4498_1: . grāmatataḥ araṇyagataḥ . jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ anācchādanāt ktaḥ akṛtamitapratipannāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4498_2: iti . tatra jātādiṣu vāvacanāt siddham . yat etat vā jāte iti etat vā jātādiṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4499: . nanu ca bhedaḥ bhavati . bahuvrīhau sati samāsāntodāttatvena api bhavitavyam pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena api tatpuruṣatve sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4500: pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena eva . na asti bhedaḥ . yaḥ api tatpuruṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:4501_0: ārabhate na tasya daṇḍavāritaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . tatra tatpuruṣe sati dvau samāsau dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:4501_1: svarau . bahuvrīhau sati ekaḥ samāsaḥ dvisvaratvam . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tatpuruṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:4501_2: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samāne arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_0: kevalam vigrahabhedāt yatra tatpuruṣaḥ prāpnoti bahuvrīhiḥ ca tatra tatpuruṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_1: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . rājñaḥ sakhā rājasakhaḥ . rājā sakhā asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_2: bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyante iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_3: bādhakena anena bhavitavyam sāmānyavihitasya viśeṣavihitena . atha na sāmānyavihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_4: . yat ucyate bahuvrīhikṛtatvāt iti etat ayuktam . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_5: tatpuruṣasya ca . kim śabdakṛtaḥ atha arthakṛtaḥ . śabdakṛtaḥ va arthakṛtaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_6: śabdakṛtaḥ tāvat . bahuvrīhau sati kapā bhavitavyam tatpuruṣe sati na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4502_7: . arthakṛtaḥ . tatpuruṣe sati ruhādīnām ktaḥ kartari bhavati dhātvarthasya anapavarge
GS24pmbhasuu:4503: bahuvrīhau vyapavṛkte karmaṇi bhavati . ārūḍhaḥ vṛkṣaḥ devadattena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4504_0: anyathājātīyakaḥ khalu api pratyakṣeṇa arthasampratyayaḥ anyathājātīyakaḥ sambandhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4504_1: . rājñaḥ sakhā rājasakhā . sambandhāt etat gantavyam nūnam rāja api asya sakhā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4504_2: . ubhayam khalu api iṣyate : svasti somasakhā punaḥ ehi
GS24pmbhasuu:4506: (P_2,1.26) KA_I,384.10-12 Ro_II,587 kim udāharaṇam . khaṭvārūḍhaḥ jālmaḥ . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ kṣepaḥ nāma . adhītya snātvā gurubhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4507: anujñātena khaṭvā āroḍhavyā . yaḥ idānīm ataḥ anyatha karoti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4508: khaṭvārūḍhaḥ ayam jālmaḥ . na ativratavān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4509_0: (P_2,1.29) KA_I,384.14-20 Ro_II,588 atyantasaṃyoge samāsasya aviśeṣavacanāt ktena
GS24pmbhasuu:4509_1: samāsavacanānarthakyam . atyantasaṃyoge samāsasya aviśeṣavacanāt ktāntena ca aktāntena
GS24pmbhasuu:4510: anarthakam . atyantasaṃyoge iti eva siddham . anatyantasaṃyogārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:4511_0: anatyantasaṃyogārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . ṣaṭ muhūrtāḥ carācarāḥ . te kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4511_1: ahaḥ gacchanti kadā cit rātrim . tat ucyate ahargatāḥ rātrigatāḥ iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4511_2: . gatagrahaṇāt api etat siddham . idam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4513_0: (P_2,1.30) KA_I,384.22-385.22 Ro_II,589-592 tatkṛtārthena iti kimartham . dadhnā
GS24pmbhasuu:4513_1: paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ . na etat asti . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4513_2: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . na hi dadhnaḥ paṭunā sāmarthyam . kena tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4514_0: iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ kirikāṇaḥ iti . atra api na śaṅkulāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4514_1: khaṇḍena sāmarthyam . kena tarhi . karotinā . śaṅkulayā kṛtaḥ khaṇḍaḥ iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4514_2: bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt bhaviṣyati dadhnā paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ iti . tasmāt tatkṛtārthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4515: guṇavacanena iti kimartham . gobhiḥ vapāvān dhānyena dhanavān . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . śaṅkulākhaṇḍaḥ devadattaḥ iti . katham punaḥ guṇavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_0: samāsaḥ ucyamānaḥ dravyavacanena syāt . iha tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇena iti iyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_1: siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4516_2: evam yathā vijñāyeta guṇam uktavatā guṇavacanena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4517: . katham punaḥ ayam guṇavacanaḥ san dravyavacanaḥ sampadyate . ārabhyate tatra matublopaḥ guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk iti . tat yathā śuklaguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4518: śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ evam khaṇḍaguṇaḥ khaṇḍaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ kṛtārthagrahaṇena . bhavati hi śaṅkulāyāḥ khaṇḍena sāmarthyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4519: asāmarthyāt ca atra na bhaviṣyati dadhnā paṭuḥ ghṛtena paṭuḥ iti . tasmat na arthaḥ tatkṛtārthagrahaṇena . tṛtīyāsamāse arthagrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_0: arthagatiḥ hi avacanāt . tṛtīyāsamāse arthagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4520_1: hi avacanāt . antareṇa api vacanam arthagatiḥ bhaviṣyati . nirdeśyam iti cet tṛtīyārthanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4521_0: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti cet tṛtīyārthanirdeśaḥ api kartavyaḥ syāt . tṛtīyā tadarthakṛtārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:4521_1: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ayam arthanirdeśaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4521_2: tarhi . yogāṅgam idam nirdiśyate . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4522: tataḥ arthena . arthaśabdena ca tṛtīyā samasyate . dhānyāṛthaḥ vasanārthaḥ . pūrvasadṛśasamonārtha iti arthagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4523_0: (P_2,1.31) KA_I,385.24-386.3 Ro_II,592-593 pūrvādiṣu avarasya upasaṅkhyānam . pūrvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4523_1: avarasya upasaṅkhyānam . māsāvaraḥ ayam saṃvatsarāvaraḥ ayam . sadṛśagrahaṇe uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4523_2: . kim uktam . sadrśagrahaṇam anarthakam tṛtīyāsamāsavacanāt . ṣaṣṭhyartham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4525: (P_2,1.32) KA_I,386.5-8 Ro_II,593 kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā ktena . kartṛkaraṇe kṛtā ktena iti vaktavyam. ahihataḥ nakhanirbhinnaḥ dātralūnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4526: paraśucchinnaḥ . kṛtā ktena iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . dātreṇa lūnavān paraśunā chinnavān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulavacanāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4528: api dṛśyate .kṛtryaiḥ adhikārthavacane anyatra api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4529: busopendhyam tṛṇopendhyam ghanaghātyam . sādhanam kṛtā iti vā pādahārakādyartham . atha vā sādhanam kṛtā saha samasyate iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4530: kim prayojanam . pādahārakādyartham . pādābhyām hriyate pādahārakaḥ gale copyate galecopakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4531: (P_2,1.34-35) KA_I,386.18-388.4 Ro_II,595-597 annena vyañjanam bhakṣyeṇa miśrīkaraṇam iti asamarthasamāsaḥ . annena vyañjanam bhakṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4532: miśrīkaraṇam iti asamarthasamāsaḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_0: kārakāṇām kriyayā sāmarthyāt . kārakāṇām kriyayā sāmarthyam bhavati na teṣām anyonyena
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_1: . tat yathā niśrayaṇyā dvābhyām kāṣṭhābhyām sāmarthyam na teṣām anyonyena . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4533_2: tarhi āha ayam annena vyañjanam bhakṣyeṇa miśrīkaraṇam iti na ca asti sāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_0: . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet nānākārakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet nānākārakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tiṣṭhatu dadhnā odanaḥ bhujyate devadattena . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_2: samānādhikaraṇādhikāre ktaḥ tṛtīyāpūrvapadaḥ uttarapadalopaḥ ca ṣiddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_3: . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam ktaḥ tṛtīyāpūrvapadaḥ samasyatesupā uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_4: ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . dadhnā upasiktaḥ dadhyupasiktaḥ dadhyupasiktaḥ odanaḥ dadhyodanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_5: guḍena saṃsṛṣṭāḥ guḍasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ , guḍasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ dhānāḥ guḍadhānāḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_6: ca yuktapūrṇāntaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ ca yuktapūrṇāntaḥ samasyate uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4534_7: vaktavyaḥ . aśvānām yuktaḥ aśvayuktaḥ aśvayuktaḥ rathaḥ aśvarathaḥ . dadhnaḥ pūrṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4535: dadhipūrṇaḥ ghaṭaḥ dadhighaṭaḥ . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā asamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4536_0: adarśanāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . asamāse adarśanāt . yat hi asamāse dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4536_1: samāse ca na dṛśyate tat lopārambham prayojayati . na ca asamāse upasiktaśabdaḥ saṃsṛṣṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4536_2: pūrṇaśabdaḥ vā dṛśyate . katham tarhi sāmarthyam gamyate . yuktārthasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4536_3: ca sāmarthyam . dadhnā yuktārthatā sampratīyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate dadhnā yuktārthatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4536_4: sampratīyate iti . sampratyayāt ca tadarthādhyavasānam . sampratyayāt ca tadarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4536_5: adhyavasīyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4537: sampratīyamānārthalope hi anavasthā .yaḥ hi manyate sampratīyamānārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4538: śabdānām lopaḥ bhavati iti anavasthā tasya lopasya syāt . dadhi iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4539_0: bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante mandakam uttarakam nilīnakam iti tadvācinām śabdānām lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4539_1: vaktavyaḥ syāt . tathā guḍaḥ iti ukte madhuraśabdasya śṛṅgaveram iti ukte ca kaṭuśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4539_2: . antareṇa khalu api śabdaprayogam bahavaḥ arthāḥ gamyante akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihāraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4539_3: ca . tadvācinām śabdānām lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4540_0: (P_2,1.36) KA_I,388.6-390.19 Ro_II,598-603 kim caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4540_1: bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . caturthī tadarthamātreṇa cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4541_0: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ sarvasya caturthyantasya tadarthamātreṇa saha samāsaḥ prāpnoti . anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4541_1: api prāpnoti . randhanāya sthālī avahananāya ulūkhalam iti . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4541_2: . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4542: evañjātīyakasya caturthyantasya tadarthena saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4543: anupādīyamane viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . balirakṣitābhyām ca anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4544: vacanam . balirakṣitābhyām ca samāsavacanam anarthakam . yaḥ hi mahārājāya
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_0: baliḥ mahārājārthaḥ saḥ bhavati . tatra tadarthaḥ iti eva siddham . yadi punaḥ vikṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_1: caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti etat lakṣaṇam kriyeta . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_2: iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti cet aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_3: kartavyam . aśvaghāsaḥ śvaśrūsuram hastividhā iti . arthena nityasamāsavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_4: arthśabdena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brāhmaṇārtham kṣatriyārtham . kim vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā
GS24pmbhasuu:4545_5: prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti ataḥ arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha sarvathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_0: bhūt iti . sarvaliṅgatā ca . sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā . brāhmaṇārtham payaḥ brāhmaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_1: sūpaḥ brāhmaṇārthā yavāgūḥ iti . kim arthena nityasamāsaḥ ucyate iti ataḥ sarvaliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:4546_2: vaktavyā . na iti āha . sarvathā sarvaliṅgatā vaktavyā . kim kāraṇam . arthaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4547: uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ ca tatpuruṣaḥ . tena puṃliṅgasya eva samāsasya abhidhānam syāt strīnapuṃsakaliṅgasya na syāt . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4548: vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4549: arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4550: yat tāvat ucyate vikṛtiḥ prakṛtyā iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4551: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāyapati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate iti yat ayam balirakiṣitagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4552_0: yathājātīyakānām samāse balirakṣitagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām samāsaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4552_1: ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā saha samasyate na tadarthamātreṇa tataḥ balirakiṣitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4552_2: arthavat bhavati . yat api ucyate aśvaghāsādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_0: aśvaghāsādayaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāḥ bhaviṣyanti . yat hi yadartham bhavati ayam api tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_1: abhisambandhaḥ bhavati asya idam iti . tat yathā guroḥ idam gurvartham iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_2: ca svarabhedaḥ bhavati . caturthīsamāse sati pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4553_3: ṣaṣṭhīsamāse punaḥ antodāttatvena ṇa asti bhedaḥ . caturthīsamāse api sati antodāttatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4554: katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtisvarā bhavati na caturthīmātram iti yat ayam caturthī tadarthe arthe kte ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4555: arthagrahaṇam ktagrahaṇam ca karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4556_0: yathājātīyakānām arthagrahaṇena ktagrahaṇena ca arthaḥ tathājātīyakānām prakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4556_1: . yadi ca vikṛtiḥ caturthyantā prakṛtyā bhavati na caturthīmātram tataḥ arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4557: api ucyate arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4558: sarthappratyayaḥ kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na ca eva hi kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_0: vigrahaḥ bhavati . api ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . yadi sarthappratayaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_1: itsañjñā na prāpnoti . atha api katham cit itsañjñā syāt evam api śryartham bhvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_2: iti aṅgasya iti iyaṅuvaṅau syātām . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ bhavaiṣyati . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_3: bhavati . bhavati vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā śobhanam mukham
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_4: asyāḥ sumukhī iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi mahadartham iti āttvakapau prasajyetām
GS24pmbhasuu:4559_5: . evam tarhi tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4560_0: kariṣyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . na ca eva kadā cit ādeśena vigrahaḥ bhavati . api
GS24pmbhasuu:4560_1: ca sarvaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4561: tataḥ tadarthārtha . tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . iha api tarhi samāsaḥ prāpnoti chātrāya rucitam chātrāya svaditam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati tādarthye ya caturthī sā samasyate na caturthīmātram iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_1: yat ayam hitasukhagrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yathājātīyakānām samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_2: hitasukhagrahaṇena arthaḥ tathājātīyakānam samāsaḥ . yadi ca tādarthye yā caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:4562_3: sā samasyate na caturthīmātram tataḥ hitasukhagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_0: tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yūpāya dāru yūpadāru rathadāru
GS24pmbhasuu:4563_1: . vāvacanam vidhāsyate . iha api tarhi vibhāṣā prāprnoti . brāhmaṇāṛtham kṣatriyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_0: jñāpayati prakṛtivikṛtyoḥ yaḥ samāsaḥ tatra tadarthasya uttarapadasya arthaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_1: ādeśaḥ bhavati anyatra nityaḥ iti yat ayam balihitagrahaṇam karoti . evam tarhi udakārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_2: vīvadhaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt udabhāvaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4564_3: arthena nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ sarvaliṅgatā ca . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4565_0: atha iha brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti kā eṣā caturthī . tādarthye iti āha . yadi tādarthye caturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:4565_1: arthaśabdasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . samāsaḥ api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4566: . yat api ucyate sarvaliṅgatā ca vaktavyā iti . na vaktavyā . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4567: (P_2,1.37) KA_I,390.21-24 Ro_II,604 atyalpam idam ucyate bhayena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_0: bhayabhītabhītibhībhiḥ iti vaktavyam . vṛkāt bhayam vṛkabhayam vṛkāt bhītaḥ vṛkabhītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_1: vṛkāt bhītiḥ vṛkabhītiḥ vṛkāt bhīḥ vṛkabhīḥ iti . aparaḥ āha : bhayanirgatajugupsubhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4568_2: iti vaktavyam : vṛkabhayam grāmanirgataḥ adharmajugupsuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4570: iha api yathā syāt . akṣadhūrtaḥ strīdhūrtaḥ akṣakitavaḥ strīkitavaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4571: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt śauṇḍādibhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4574_0: dhvāṅkṣeṇa iti arthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt . tīrthakākaḥ iti . kṣepe
GS24pmbhasuu:4574_1: iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ nāma . yathā tīrthe kākāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4574_2: evam yaḥ gurukulāni gatvā na ciram tiṣṭhati sa ucyate tīrthakākaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_0: kṛtyaiḥ niyoge iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . pūrvāḥṇegeyam sāma prātaḥ adhyeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_1: anuvākaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . ṛṇe iti eva siddham . iha yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4576_2: yasya niyogataḥ kāryam ṛṇam tasya tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4577: tataḥ ṛṇe iti eva siddham . yagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4580: avataptenakulasthitam te etat . kṣepe iti ucyate . kaḥ iha kṣepaḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:4581_0: yathā avatapte nakulāḥ na ciram sthātāraḥ bhavanti evam kāryāṇi ārabhya yaḥ na ciram
GS24pmbhasuu:4581_1: tiṣṭhati sa ucyate avataptenakulasthitam te etat iti . kṣepe saptamyantam ktāntena
GS24pmbhasuu:4581_2: saha samasyate iti ucyate . tatra sagatikena sanakulena ca samāsaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4581_3: kṣepe gatikārakapūrve uktam . kim uktam . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4583: pātresamitādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramam pātresamitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4584: (P_2,1.49) KA_I,392.5-14 Ro_II,606-607 iha kasmāt avyayībhāvaḥ na bhavati . ekā nadī ekanadī . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyā iti prāpnoti . iha kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4585: samāsaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit anyapadārthapradhānaḥ , kaḥ cit ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4587: anyapadārthapradhānaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ , ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ dvandvaḥ. na ca atra pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam gamyate . athavā avyayībhāvaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_0: bahuvrīhiḥ iti . bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . bhavet ekasañjñādhikāre siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_1: paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati . ārambhasāmarthyāt ca avyayībhāvaḥ prāpnoti paraṅkāryatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_2: ca bahuvrīhiḥ . paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . nadībhiḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ samāhāre avyayībhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4588_3: vaktavyaḥ . saḥ ca avaśyam vaktavyaḥ . sarvam ekanadītare .
GS24pmbhasuu:4589_0: (P_2,1.51.1) KA_I,393.2-19 Ro_II,607-609 samāhāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samāṅpūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4589_1: harateḥ sarmasādhane ghañ . samāhriyate samāhāraḥ iti . yadi karmasādhanaḥ pañca
GS24pmbhasuu:4589_2: kumāryaḥ samahṛtāḥ pañcakumāri daśakumāri gostriyoḥ upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4589_3: na prāpnoti dviguḥ ekavacanam iti etat ca vaktavyam . evam tarhi bhāvasādhanaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4589_4: . samāharaṇam samāhāraḥ atha bhāvasādhane sati kim abhidhīyate . yat tat auttarādharyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4589_5: . kaḥ punaḥ gavām samāhāraḥ . yat tat arjanam krayaṇam bhiṣaṇam aparaharaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4590_0: . yadi evam vikṣipteṣu pūleṣu goṣu carantīṣu na sidhyati . evam tarhi samabhyāśīkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4590_1: samāhāraḥ . evam api pañcagrāmī ṣaṇṇagarī tripurī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4590_2: sam ekatvavācī āṅ ābhimukhye vartate haratiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4591: deśāntaraprāpaṇe . na avaśyam haratiḥ deśāntaraprāpaṇe eva vartate . kim tarhi . sādṛśye api vartate . tat yathā mātuḥ anuharati pituḥ anuharati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4592: atha vā pañcagrāmī ṣaṇṇagarī tripurī iti na eva idam iyati eva avatiṣṭhate
GS24pmbhasuu:4593_0: . avaśyam asau tataḥ kim cit ākāṅkṣati kriyām vā guṇam vā . yat ākāṅkṣata tat ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:4593_1: sa ca samāhāraḥ . ayam tarhi bhāvasādhane sati doṣaḥ . pañcapūlī ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane
GS24pmbhasuu:4593_2: codite dravyānayanam na prāpoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4594: iha tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4595: kriyante . asambhavāt . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4596: . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya dravyānayanam bhaviṣyati . atha vā avyatirekāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4599_0: pratyayottarapadayoḥ bhavati . evam bhavitum arhati . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4599_1: cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4599_2: aprasiddhiḥ . kā etaretarāśrayatā . dvigunimitte pratyayottarapade pratyayottarapadanimittā
GS24pmbhasuu:4600: ca dvigusañjñā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:4601: prakalpante . evam tarhi arthe it vakṣyāmi . arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4602: bahuvrīhivat . arthe cet taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . pāñcanāpitiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4603: dvimāturaḥ , traimāturaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dvigunā uktatvāt bahuvrīhivat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4604: tat yathā citraguḥ iti bahuvrīhiṇoktatvāt matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . evam tarhi samāsataddhitavidhau iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_0: samāsataddhitavidhau iti cet anyatra samāsasañjñā na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . svare
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_1: . pañcāratniḥ , daśāratniḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_2: tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pratyayottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_3: ca iti vacanāt . pratyayottarapadayoḥ dvigusañjñā bhavati iti vaktavyam . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_4: uktam dvigusañjñā pratyayottarapadayoḥ cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4606_5: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . itaretarāśrayamātram etat coditam sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_0: ekatvena parihṛtāni siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_1: . na hi sañjñā nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate . tat yathā : kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_2: kam cit tantuvāyam āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4607_3: na vātavyaḥ atha vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . bhāvinī
GS24pmbhasuu:4608: sañjñā abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4609: iti . evam iha api tasmin dviguḥ bhavati yasya abhinirvṛttasya pratyaya
GS24pmbhasuu:4610: uttarapadam iti ca ete sañjñe bhaviṣyataḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu arthe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4611: nanu ca uktam arthe cet taddhitānutpattiḥ bahuvrīhivat iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4612_0: . na avaśyam arthaśabdaḥ abhidheye eva vartate . kim tarhi . syādarthe api vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:4612_1: . tat yathā . dārārtham ghaṭāmahe . dhanārtham bhikṣāmahe . dārāḥ naḥ syuḥ . dhanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4612_2: naḥ syuḥ iti . evam iha api taddhitārthe dviguḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4613: taddhitaḥ syāt iti . dvigoḥ vā lugvacanam jñāpakam taddhitotpatteḥ . atha vā yat ayam dvigoḥ luk anapatye iti dvigoḥ uttarasya taddhitasya lukam
GS24pmbhasuu:4614: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ utpadyate dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:4615_1: taddhitārthena kṛtatvāt . samāhāraḥ samūhaḥ iti aviśiṣtau etau arthau . samāhārasamūhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4615_2: aviśeṣāt samāhāragrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . taddhitārthe kṛtatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4616: taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi taddhitārthe dviguḥ iti evam atra dviguḥ bhavati taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti . utpadyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:4617: . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti . kāni . pañcapūlī daśapūlī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4618: aparimāṇabistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_0: pañcagavam daśagavam . goḥ ataddhitaluki it ṭac na prapnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_1: dvigoḥ ṅīp bhavati iti uktvā samāhāre iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4619_2: samāhāre eva na anyatra iti . goḥ akāraḥ dvigoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4620: samāhāre . aviśeṣeṇa goḥ ṭac bhavati iti uktvā dvigoḥ samāhāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4621: vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . samāhāre eva na anyatra iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4622: abhidhānārtham tu . abhidhānārtham tu samāhāragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4623: samāhāreṇa abhidhānam yathā syāt taddhitārthena mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4624_0: . taddhitotpattiḥ prasajyeta . utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . lukkṛtāni prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4624_1: . sarvāṇi parihṛtāni . na sarvāṇi parihṛtāni . pañcakumāri daśakumāri . lik taddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_1: nityasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāgdṛṣadapriyaḥ chatropānahapriyaḥ pañcagavapriyaḥ daśagavapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_2: . kim prayojanam . samudāyavṛttau avayavānām mā kadā cit avṛttiḥ bhūt iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_3: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . yadā vṛttipakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4625_4: tadā sarveṣām eva vṛttiḥ . yadā tu avṛttiḥ tadā sarveṣām avṛttiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4626: uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dvimāsajātaḥ trimāsajātaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4627: na sidhyati . sup supā iti vartate . evam tarhi idam syāt : dvau māsau dvimāsam , dvimāsam jātasya iti . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4628: dvimāsajātaḥ iti prāpnoti dvimāsajātaḥ iti ca iṣyate . dvyāhnajātaḥ ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:4629: sidhyati . dvyahajāta iti prāpnoti na ca evam bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca yadā samāhāre dviguḥ . dvyahnajātaḥ tu na sidhyati . kim ucyate parimāṇinā
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_0: iti na punaḥ anyatra api . pañcagavapriyaḥ daśagavapriyaḥ . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4630_1: uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . anyatra samudāyabaḥ huvrīhisañjñḥ . anyatra samudāyabahuvrīhitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_0: uttarapade prasiddhe uttarapade iti dviguḥ bhaviṣyati . sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_1: . sarveṣu pakṣeṣu dvigusañjñāyāḥ matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4631_2: . pañcakhaṭvā daśakhaṭvā . dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt . pañcaguḥ daśaguḥ . goḥ ataddhitaluki
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_0: saṅkhyāpūrvaḥ saḥ dvigusañjñaḥ āhosvit pūrvamātre . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anantare yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_1: ekaśāṭī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . atha pūrvamātre akabhikṣā atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_2: . astu anantare . kamam ekaśāṭī . īkārāntena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ekā śāṭī ekaśāṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_3: . iha tarhi ekāpūpī dvigoḥ iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvamātre. katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_4: ekabhikṣā . ṭābantena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ekā bhikṣā ekabhikṣā . iha tarhi saptarṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4633_5: igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi anantare . katham ekāpūpī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4634_0: samāhāre iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ atra samāhāraḥ . yat taddānam sambhramaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4634_1: . iha tarhi pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prapnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_0: antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnām chandasi iti evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_1: anantare . katham pañcahotāraḥ daśahotāraḥ . ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:4635_2: iti eva siddham (P_2,1.53) KA_I,397.2-3 Ro_II,619 kim udāharaṇm . vaiyākaraṇakhasūciḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4636: . kim vyākaraṇam kutsitam āhosvit vaiyākaraṇaḥ . vaiyākaraṇaḥ kutsitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4637: tasmin kutsite tatstham api kutsitam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4638: (P_2,1.55) KA_I,397.5-398.19 Ro_II,619-627 upamānāni iti ucyate . kāni punaḥ upamānāni . kim yat eva upamānam tat eva upameyam āhosvit anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:4639: upamānam anyat upameyam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi yat eva upamānam tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4640: upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva gauḥ iti . atha anyat eva upamānam anyat upameyam kaḥ iha upamārthaḥ gauḥ iva aśvaḥ iti . evam tarhi yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4641: kim cit sāmānyam kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ tatra upamānopameye bhavataḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . mānam hi nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:4642_0: anirjñātajñānārtham upādīyate anirjñātam artham jñāsyāmi iti . tat samīpe yat na
GS24pmbhasuu:4642_1: atyantāya mimīte tat upamānam . gauḥ iva gavayaḥ iti . gauḥ nirjñātaḥ gavayaḥ anirjñātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4642_2: . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yasya gavayaḥ nirjñātaḥ syāt gauḥ anirjñātaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:4642_3: kartavyam syāt gavayaḥ iva gauḥ iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:4643: bāḍham kartavyam . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . śastrīśyāmā . kva punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4644: śyāmāśabdaḥ vartate . śatryām iti āha . kena idānīm devadattā abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4645: . samāsena. yadi evam śastrīśyāmo devadattaḥ iti na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_0: upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi upasarjanāni api evañjātīyakāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_1: bhavanti tittirikalmāṣī kumbhakapālalohinī anupasarjanalakṣaṇaḥ īkāraḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_2: . evam tarhi śastryām eva śastrīśabdaḥ vartate devadattāyām śyāmāśabdaḥ . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:4646_3: guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4647_0: anirdiśyamānasya api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī devadattā
GS24pmbhasuu:4647_1: iti . bahavaḥ candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . evam api samānādhikaraṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4647_2: iti vartate . vyadhikaraṇatvāt samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . kim hi vacanāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4647_3: yadi api tāvat vacanāt samāsaḥ syāt iha tu khalu mṛgī iva capalā mṛgacapalā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4647_4: puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi tasyām eva ubhayam vartate . etat ca atra yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4647_5: yat tasyām eva ubhayam vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4648: itarathā hi bahu apekṣyam syāt . yadi tāvat evam vigrahaḥ kriyate śastrī
GS24pmbhasuu:4649: iva śyāmā devadattā iti śastryām śyāmā iti etat apekṣyam . atha api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4650: vigrahaḥ kriyate yathā sāstrīśyāmā tadvat iyam devadattā iti evam api devadattāyām śyāmā iti apekṣyam syāt . evam api guṇaḥ anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4651: bahavaḥ śastryām guṇāḥ tīkṣṇā sūkṣmā pṛthuḥ iti . anirdiśyamānasya api guṇasya bhavati loke sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā candramukhī devadattā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4652_0: bahavaḥ candre guṇāḥ yā ca asau priyadarśanatā sā gamyate . upamānasamāse guṇavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4653: śastrīśyāmā . śyāmāśabdaḥ ayam śastrīśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . tatra sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4654_0: na vā śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4654_1: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śyāmatvasyo uhhayatra bhāvāt . ubhayatra eva śyāmatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4655_0: tadvācaktvāt ca śabdasya . sāmānyavacanaprasiddhiḥ tadvācakaḥ ca atra śyāmāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4655_1: prayujyate . kimvācakaḥ . ubhayavācakaḥ . śyāmatvasya ubhayatra bhāvāt tadvācakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4656_0: sāmānyavacane prasiddhe sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . na ca avaśyam saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4656_1: eva sāmānyavacanaḥ yaḥ bahūnām sāmānyam āha. dvayoḥ api sāmānyam āha saḥ api sāmānyavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4656_2: eva . atha vā sāmānyavacanaiḥ iti ucyate . sarvaḥ ca śabdaḥ anyena śabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4656_3: viśeṣavacanaḥ sampadyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ prāk abhisambandhāt sāmānyavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4657_0: (P_2,1.56) KA_I,398.21-399.2 Ro_II,627-628 sāmānyāprayoge iti kimartham . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:4657_1: bhūt . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ . puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān . sāmānyāprayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:4657_2: iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati puruṣaḥ ayam vyāghraḥ iva śūraḥ . puruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4657_3: ayam vyāghraḥ iva balavān iti . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4657_4: bhavati iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat sāmānyāprayoge iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4657_5: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati vai pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4659: (P_2,1.57) KA_I,399.4-26 Ro_II,628-632 viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjanāprasiddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_0: viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_1: . kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti kṛṣṇaśabdaḥ ayam tilaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_2: sampadyate . tathā tilaśabdaḥ kṛṣṇaśabdena abhisambadhyamānaḥ viśeṣaṇavacanaḥ sampadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_3: . tat ubhayam viśeṣaṇam bhavati ubhayam ca viśeṣyam . viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ ubhayaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_4: ubhayoḥ ca viśeṣyatvāt upasarjansya aprasiddhiḥ . na vā anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_5: tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya upasarjanaprasiddhiḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4660_6: . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt . anyatarat atra pradhānam . tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4661_0: tadviśeṣakam ca aparam . anyatarasya pradhānabhāvāt tadviśeṣakatvāt ca aparasya upasarjanasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:4661_1: bhaviṣyati . yadā asya tilāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti kṛṣṇaḥ viśeṣaṇatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:4662_0: viśeṣaṇam . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā yasya kṛṣṇāḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4662_1: tilāḥ viśeṣaṇatvena tena kartavyam tilakṛṣṇāḥ iti . na kartavyam . na hi ayam dvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4662_2: tilāḥ ca kṛṣṇāḥ ca iti . na khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4663: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ tilānām kṛṣṇāḥ iti . kim tarhi . dvau imau pradhānaśabdau
GS24pmbhasuu:4664_0: ekasmin arthe yugapat avarudhyete . na ca dvayoḥ pradhānaśabdayoḥ ekasmin arthe yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:4664_1: avarudhyamānayoḥ kim cit api prayojanam asti . tatra prayogāt etat gantavyam . nūnam
GS24pmbhasuu:4665: aparam iti . tatra tu etāvān sandehaḥ kim pradhānam kim viśeṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4666_0: saḥ ca api kva sandehaḥ . yatra ubhau guṇaśabdau . tat yathā kuñjakhañjakaḥ khañjakubjakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4666_1: iti . yatra hi anyatarat dravyam anyataraḥ guṇaḥ tatra yat dravyam tat pradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4666_2: . tat yathā śuklam ālabheta kṛṣṇam ālabheta iti na piṣṭapiṇḍīm ālabhya kṛtī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4666_3: . avaśyam tadguṇam dravyam ākāṅkṣati . katham tarhi imau dvau pradhānaśabdau ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:4666_4: arthe yugapat avarudhyete vṛkṣaḥ śiṃśipā iti . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4669: evamādi anukramaṇam kriyate na viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa bahulam iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4670_1: iti uttaratra anukramaṇam kriyate . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena kṛtam akṛtam tat . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4670_2: tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti . kṛtsnam ca kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:4671: ca sādhakam ca nirvartakam ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:4672: kimartham tarhi evamādi anukramaṇam kriyate . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu lakṣaṇam prapañcaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4673_0: kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati . avaśyam khalu asmābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4673_1: idam vaktavyam bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti . sarvavedapāṛiṣadam
GS24pmbhasuu:4673_2: hi idam śāstram . tatra na ekaḥ panthāḥ śakyaḥ āsthātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4674_0: (P_2,1.59) KA_I,400.13-18 Ro_II,635 śreṇyādayaḥ paṭhyante . kṛtādiḥ ākṛtigaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4674_1: śreṇyādiṣu cvyarthavacanam . śreṇyādiṣu cvyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . aśreṇayaḥ śreṇayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4674_2: kṛtāḥ śreṇikṛtāḥ . yadā hi śreṇayaḥ eva kim cit kriyante tadā mā bhūt . anyatra ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4674_3: cvyarthagrahaṇeṣu cvyantasya pratiṣedham śāsti . tat iha na tathā . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4674_4: anyatra pūrvam cvyantakāryam param cvyarthakāryam . iha punaḥ pūrvam cyvarthakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:4675_1: samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā būt . siddham ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ
GS24pmbhasuu:4675_2: iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena
GS24pmbhasuu:4675_3: ca . nuḍiḍadhikena ca samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha api yathā syāt . aśitānaśitena jīvati
GS24pmbhasuu:4676_0: kliṣṭākliśitena jīvati . kim ucyate samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam iti yadā nañviśiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:4676_1: iti ucyate . na ca atra nañkṛtaḥ eva viśeṣaḥ . kim tarhi . prakṛtikṛtaḥ api . ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4676_2: viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ asti eva avadhāraṇe vartate . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau
GS24pmbhasuu:4676_3: abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4677: gamyate . anye guṇāḥ samāḥ bhavanti . asti ādhikye vartate . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_0: devadattayajñadattau āḍhyau abhirūpau darśanīyau pakṣavantau devadattaḥ tu yajñadattāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_1: svādhyāyena viśiṣṭaḥ . svādhyāyena adhikaḥ anye guṇāḥ avivakṣitāḥ bhavanti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_2: yadā tāvat avadhāraṇe viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ tadā na eva arthaḥ samānaprakṛtigrahaṇena . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_3: iha bhaviṣyati . siddham ca abhuktam ca iti . na api anañ iti pratiṣedhena . na iha
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_4: bhaviṣyati kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena api tu tadā samāsaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_5: yadā ādhikye viśiṣṭaśabdaḥ tadā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt ṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4678_6: ca abhuktam ca iti . anañ iti ca pratiṣedhaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4679: kartavyam akṛtam iti . nuḍiḍadhikena api tu samāsadḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4680: tatra ādhikye viśiṣṭagrahaṇam matvā samānaprakṛtigrahaṇam codyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4681: avadhāraṇam nañā cet nuḍiḍviśiṣṭena na prakalpeta . atha cet adhikavivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4682: kāryam tulyaprakṛtikena iti . kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4683: kṛtāpakṛtādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . kṛtāpakṛtam bhuktavibhuktam pītavipītam
GS24pmbhasuu:4684_0: . siddham tu ktena visamāptau anañ . siddham etat . katham. ktāntena kriyāvisamāptau
GS24pmbhasuu:4684_1: anañ ktāntam samasyate iti vaktavyam . gatapratyāgatādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam . gatapratyāgatādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4685: gatapratyāgatam yātānuyātam puṭāpuṭikā krayākrayikā phalāphalikā mānonmānikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4687_0: samānādhikaraṇena iti vartate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yad vyadhikaraṇānām samāsaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4687_1: evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yathājātīyakam uktam uttarapadam tathājātīyakena pūrvapadena
GS24pmbhasuu:4687_2: samasyate iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4688: . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4689_0: (P_2,1.69.1) KA_I,402.7-403.6 Ro_II,639-641 idam vicāryate : varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4689_1: vā syāt : kṛṣṇena sāraṅgaḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaḥ samānādhikaraṇena vā : kṛṣṇaḥ sāraṅgaḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4689_2: iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . varṇena tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe varṇagrahaṇam . varṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4689_3: tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ etapratiṣedhe varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . tṛtīyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:4690: bhavati . anete varṇaḥ iti vaktavyam . atha dvitīyena varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4691_0: etaviśeṣaṇena arthaḥ . bāḍham arthaḥ yadi avarṇa etaśabdaḥ asti . nanu ca ayam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4691_1: : ā* itaḥ etaḥ , kṛṣṇetaḥ , lohitetaḥ iti . na arthaḥ evamarthena varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:4691_2: . yadi tāvat ayam kartari ktaḥ tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:4691_3: api kartari paratvāt kṛtsvareṇa bhavitavyam . atha samānādhikaraṇaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4692_0: samānādhikaraṇe dviḥ varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . varṇaḥ varṇeṣu anete iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4692_1: . ekam varṇagrahaṇam kartavyam iha mā bhūt . paramaśuklaḥ paramakṛṣṇaḥ iti . dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4693: kṛṣṇatilāḥ iti . ekam varṇagrahaṇam anakrthakam . anyataratra kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:4694: bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadikoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . evam sati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4695: tāni etāni trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . yasya api tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ tasya api tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:4696_0: bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . sāmānyena mama tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4696_1: tṛtīyā tatkṛtārthena guṇavacanena iti . avaśyam varṇena pratipadam samāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4697: kva ca tena na sidhyati . śukababhruḥ haritababhruḥ iti . tathā ca sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4698: tāni eva trīṇi varṇagrahaṇāni bhavanti samāsavidhau dve svaravidhau ca ekam . atha samānādhikaraṇaḥ sāmānyena siddhaḥ syāt . bāḍham siddhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4699: katham . viśeṣaṇam viśeṣyeṇa bahulam iti . evam api dve varṇagrahaṇe kartavye svaravidhau eva pratipadoktasya abhāvāt . tasmāt samānādhikaraṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:4700_1: param param vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre pradhānopasarjanānām param param
GS24pmbhasuu:4700_2: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . pradhānānām pradhānam upasarjanānām upasarjanam . pradhānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:4700_3: tāvat pradhānam vṛdārakanāgakuñjaraiḥ pūjyamānam iti asya avakāśaḥ govṛndārakaḥ aśvavṛndārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4700_4: . poṭāyuvatīnām avakāśaḥ ibhyayuvatiḥ āḍhyayuvatiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāgayuvatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4700_5: vṛndārakayuvatiḥ . pradhānānām param bhavati vipratiṣedhena . upasarjanānām param
GS24pmbhasuu:4701: sanmahatparamotkṛṣṭāḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ sadgavaḥ sadaśvaḥ . kṛtyatulyākhyā ajātyā iti asya avakāśaḥ tulyaśvetaḥ tulyakṛṣṇaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:4702: tulyasat tulyamahān . upasarjanānām param upasarjanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4704: samānādhikaraṇasamāsasya avakāśaḥ vīraḥ puruṣaḥ vīrapuruṣaḥ . bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ kaṇṭhekālaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : vīrapuruṣakaḥ grāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4705: bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_0: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati bahuvrīheḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_1: sarvadhanādyarthaḥ . sarvadhanī sarvabījī sarvakeśī naṭaḥ gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_2: vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . kim prayojanam . karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_3: matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_4: matvarthasya . yadi uktatvam hetuḥ karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na prāpnoti . na khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_5: api sañjñāśrayaḥ matvarthīyaḥ . kim tarhi arthāśrayaḥ . saḥ yathā eva bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_6: uktatvāt na bhavati evam karmadhārayeṇa api uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4706_7: syāt : sarvāṇi dhanāni sarvadhanāni sarvadhanāni asya saniti sarvadhanī . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4707_0: . nityam evam sati karmadhārayaḥ syāt . tatra yat uktam kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4707_1: etat ayuktam . evam tarhi bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kāryavat buddhim kṛtvā paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4707_2: kāryāḥ śabdāḥ iti . tadvat idam paṭhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:4708_0: samānādhikaraṇasamādāt bahuvrīhiḥ kartavyaḥ kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4708_1: iti . yad ucyate samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:4708_2: eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ karmadhārayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . svapadārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4709_0: bahuvrīhiḥ . astu . vibhāṣā karmadhārayaḥ . yadā na karmadhārayaḥ tadā bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4709_1: bhaviṣyati . evam api yadi atra kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ bhavati karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4709_2: matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam prāpnoti . sarvaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4710: evamarthaḥ yatnaḥ karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam mā bhūt iti . evam tarhi na idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe param iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4711: kim tarhi . iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā . samānādhikaraṇasamāsāt bahuvrīhiḥ iṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4712_0: kadā cit karmadhārayaḥ sarvadhanādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4712_1: . iha hi sarve manuṣyāḥ alpena yatnena mahataḥ arthān ākāṅkṣanti . ekena māṣeṇa śatasahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:4713: tatra karmadhārayaprakṛtibhiḥ matvarthīyaiḥ abhidhānam astu bahuvrīhiṇā iti bahuvrīhiṇā bhaviṣyati laghutvāt . katham sarvadhanī sarvabījī
GS24pmbhasuu:4714: sarvakeśī naṭaḥ iti . iniprakaraṇe sarvādeḥ inim vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4715: vaktavyam ṭhanaḥ bādhanārtham . katham gaurakharavat vanam gauramṛgavat vanam kṛṣṇasarpavān valmīkaḥ lohitaśālimān grāmaḥ . asti atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4716_0: jātyā atra abhisambandhaḥ kriyate . kṛṣṇasarpaḥ nāma sarpajātiḥ sā asmin valmīke
GS24pmbhasuu:4716_1: asti . yadā hi antareṇa jātim tadvatām abhisambandhaḥ kriyate kṛṣṇasarpaḥ valmīkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4716_2: iti evam tadā bhaviṣyati . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4716_3: . pūrvapadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4718: bahuvrīheḥ avakāśaḥ citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4719_0: sūkṣmavastrataraḥ tīkṣṇśṛṅgataraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4719_1: vipratiṣedhaḥ . virpatiṣedhe param iti ucyate . pūrvaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ paraḥ ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4720: iṣṭam tat bhavati . evam api ayuktaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ātiśāiyikaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . ṅyāpprātipadikāt ātiśāyikaḥ subantānām bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4721: ātiśāyikaḥ api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4722: sāmarthyam ca subantenta . evam api antaraṅgaḥ . katham . svapadārthe ātiśāyikaḥ anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ . evam api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4723: spardhāyām ātiśāyikaḥ bhavati . na ca antareṇa pratiyoginam spardhā bhavati . na eva vā atra ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4724_0: katham asāmarthyam. sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yāvatā vastrāṇi tadvantam apekṣante
GS24pmbhasuu:4724_1: tadvantam ca apekṣya vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat spardhā bhavati . nanu ca ayam ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4724_2: evamātmakaḥ satyām vyapekṣāyām vidhīyate . satyam evamātmakaḥ yām ca na anatareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4724_3: vyapekṣām pravṛttiḥ tasyam satyām bhavitavyam . kām ca na antareṇa vyapekṣām ātiśāyikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4725: pravṛttiḥ . yā hi pratiyoginam prati vyapekṣā . yā hi tadvantam prati na tasyām bhavitavyam . bahuvrīhiḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4726: asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4727_0: yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:4727_1: idam tasya yogasya udāharaṇam vipratiṣedhe param iti . kim tarhi . iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:4728: sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ iti . yadi iṣṭiḥ iyam paṭhitā na arthaḥ anena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_0: katham yā eṣā yuktiḥ uktā : yāvatā vastrāṇi vastrāntarāṇi apekṣante tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_1: iti . yadā hi antareṇa vastrāṇām vastraiḥ yugapat spardhām tadvatā ca abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_2: kriyate niṣpratidvandvaḥ tadā bahuvrīhiḥ . bahuvrīheḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_3: idam bhavati sūkṣmataravastraḥ iti . bhavati . yadā antareṇa tadvantam vastrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_4: vastraiḥ yugapat spardhā niṣpratidvandvaḥ tadā ātiśāyikaḥ . katham punaḥ anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_5: prakarṣeṇa anyasya prakarṣaḥ syāt . na eva anyasya prakarṣeṇa anyasya prakarṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4729_6: bhavitavyam . yathā eva ayam dravyeṣu yatate vastrāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:4730: me syuḥ iti evam guṇeṣu api yatate sūkṣmatarāṇi me syuḥ iti . na atra ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . guṇavacanāt iti ucyate . na ca samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4731: guṇavacanaḥ . samāsaḥ api guṇavacanaḥ . katham . ajahatsvārthā vṛttiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4732: atha jahatsvārthāyām tu doṣaḥ eva . jahatsvāṛthāyām api na doṣaḥ . bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4733: lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti . tatguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4734_0: bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . uttarapadārthātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:4734_1: . kim prayojanam . bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ . bahvāḍhyataraḥ bahusukumārataraḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4734_2: punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ bahuvrīheḥ vā ātiśāyikaḥ syāt ātiśāyikāntena vā bahuvrīhiḥ . svarakapoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4735: bahuvrīhiḥ syāt bahvāḍyataraḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta bahvāḍhyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . bahvāḍhyakataraḥ iti ca prāpnoti bahvāḍhyatarakaḥ iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4736_0: samānādhikaraṇādhikāre śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam uttarapadalopaḥ ca . samānādhikaraṇādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4736_1: śākapārthivādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam uttarapadalopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . śākabhojī
GS24pmbhasuu:4737: kutapavāsaḥ sauśrutaḥ kutapasauśrutraḥ . ajāpaṇyaḥ taulvaliḥ ajātaulvaliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4739: (P_2,1.71) KA_I,406.10-11 Ro_II,653 catuṣpāt jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kālākṣīgarbhiṇī svastimatī garbhiṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4741: mayūravyaṃsakādayaḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . paramaḥ mayūravyaṃsakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4742: (P_2,2.2) KA_I,407.2-9 Ro_II,655-656 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4743: grāmārdhaḥ , nagarārdhaḥ iti . ardhaśabdasya napuṃsakaliṅgasya idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4744: grahaṇam puṃliṅgaḥ ca ayam ardhaśabdaḥ . kva punaḥ ayam napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ kva puṃliṅgaḥ . samapravibhāge napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ , avayavavācī puṃliṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4745: iha kasmāt na bhavati : ardham pippalīnām iti . na vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4746_0: ardhapippalyaḥ iti . bhavati yadā khaṇḍasamuccayaḥ : ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalī
GS24pmbhasuu:4746_1: ca ardhapippalī ca ardhapippalyaḥ iti . yada tu etat vākyam bhavati ardham pippalīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4746_2: iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4747: . ekādkhikaraṇe iti vartate . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : ardharāśiḥ iti . bhavati . ekam etat adhikaraṇam yaḥ asau rāśiḥ nāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:4748_1: samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam api yathā syāt . dvitīyam bhikṣāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4748_2: . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:4748_3: tarhi prayojanam ekadeśisamāsena mukte ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api yathā syāt . bhikṣādvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4749_0: etat api na asti prayojanam . ayam api vibhāṣā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api . tau ubhau vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4749_1: bhaviṣyataḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4749_2: jñāpakam avayavavidhāne sāmānyavidhānābhāvasya . dvitīyādīnām vibhāṣāprakaraṇe vibhāṣāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4750_0: kriyate jñāpārtham . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . avayavavidhau sāmānyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4750_1: na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bhinatti chinatti . śnami kṛte śap
GS24pmbhasuu:4750_2: na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4750_3: śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam .prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:4750_4: śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . rudhādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4751_0: pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣthīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4751_1: ayam na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4751_2: . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yatra utsargāpavādam
GS24pmbhasuu:4751_3: vibhāṣā tatra apavādena mukte utsargaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:4752: prayojanam . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīp . prāṅmukhī prāṅmukhā pratyaṅmukhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4753: pratyaṅmukhā . ṅīpa mukte ṅīṣ na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4754_0: vakṣyati etat . dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam ṅībvidhāne hi anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4754_1: ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ardhapippalī ardhakośātakī . ekadeśisamāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:4755: unmattagaṅgam lohitagaṅgam . avyayībhāvena mukte bahuvrīhiḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4756: dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . iñā mukte aṇ na bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate upagoḥ apatyam aupagavaḥ . taddhitena mukte upagvapatyam iti na sidhyati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4757_1: vā iti ca . tatra ekaya vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati aparaya vṛttiviṣaye vibhāṣapavādaḥ . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:4757_2: api vai anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pūraṇena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4757_3: pratiṣedhāt . na etat pūraṇāntam . anā etat paryavapannam . etat api pūraṇāntam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4758_0: katha. pūraṇam nāma arthaḥ tam āha tīyaśabdaḥ . ataḥ pūraṇam . yaḥ asau pūraṇāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4758_1: svārthe bhāge an saḥ api pūraṇam eva . evam tarhi anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasāmarthyāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4760: anukaraṣaṇārthaḥ . anyatarasyām iti etat anukṛṣyate . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4761: anyatarasyām samāsaḥ yathā syāt . samāsena mukte vākyam api yatha syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4762: jīvikām prāptaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api yatha syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4763: . jīvikāprāptaḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam. ayam api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4764_0: dvitīyāsamāsaḥ api . tat ubhayam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi na ayam anukarṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4764_1: cakāraḥ . kim tarhi . atvam anena vidhīyate . prāptāpanne dvitīyāntena saha samasyete
GS24pmbhasuu:4764_2: atvam ca bhavati prāptapannayoḥ iti . prāptā jīvikām prāptajīvikā āpannā jīvikām
GS24pmbhasuu:4766_0: uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ sadharmaṇā anena anyaiḥ uttarapadārthapradhānaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4766_1: bhavitavyam . anyeṣu ca uttarapadārthapradhāneṣu yā eva asau antarvartinī vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4766_2: tasyāḥ samāse api śravaṇam bhavati : rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ iti . iha punaḥ vākye
GS24pmbhasuu:4767: ṣaṣṭhī samāse prathamā . kena etat evam bhavati . yaḥ asau māsajātayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4768_0: abhisambandhaḥ saḥ samāse nivartate . abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4768_1: sampannaḥ . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamā bhavati . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4770_0: (P_2,2.5.2) KA_I,409.13-410.6 Ro_II,662-666 kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4770_1: anirdeśaḥ . kālasya yena samāsaḥ saḥ aparimāṇī . tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4770_2: agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na hi jātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4771_0: māsaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . triṃśadrātrasya . tat yathā . droṇaḥ badarāṇām devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4771_1: iti . na devadattasya droṇaḥ parimāṇam . kasya tarhi . badarāṇām . siddham tu kālaparimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4771_2: yasya sa kālaḥ tena . siddham etat . katham . kālaparimāṇam yasya sa kālaḥ tena samasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4771_3: iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4772: kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ iti . kam punaḥ kālam
GS24pmbhasuu:4773: matvā bhavān āha kālasya yena samāsaḥ tasya aparimāṇitvāt anirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4774_0: yena mūrtīnām upacayāḥ ca apacayāḥ ca lakṣyante tam kālam āhuḥ . tasya eva kayā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:4774_1: kriyayā yuktasya ahaḥ iti ca bhavati rātriḥ iti ca . kayā kriyayā . ādityagatyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4774_2: tayā eva asakṛt āvṛttayā māsaḥ iti bhavati saṃvatsaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4775: ca . yadi evam jātasya māsaḥ parimāṇam . ekavacanadvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:4776: . ekavacanāntānām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . māsau jātasya māsāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4777: jātasya iti . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : dvimāsajātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:4778: trimāsajātaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekavacane tāvat uktam anabhidhānāt iti . dvigoḥ kim uktam . uttarapadena parimāṇina dvigoḥ samāsavacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4780_0: uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . yadi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4780_1: brāhmaṇamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti . anyapadārthapradhānaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4780_2: anyapadārthapradhānaḥ , avarṣā hemantaḥ iti hemantasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat
GS24pmbhasuu:4780_3: samāsasya api prāpnoti . pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . yadi pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_0: avyayam hi asya pūrvapadam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_1: ca nañsamāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . yadi api nañsamāsaḥ na paṭhyate nañ tu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4781_2: pāṭhena api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . yaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_0: tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā asaṅkhyatā va . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_1: tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā: samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_2: yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_3: śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_4: śakyam kartum . yat nañaḥ prāk samāsāt liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4782_5: bhavati svābhāvikam etat . atha vā āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4783: guṅavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4784: śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ , śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4785: kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4786: vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4787: atha vā punaḥ astu uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ . nanu ca uktam abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇamātrasya ānayanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4788: idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ : atha iha rājapuruṣam ānaya iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:4789: puruṣamātrasya ānayanam kasmāt na bhavati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . rājā viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena viśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhavati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4790: nañ viśeṣakaḥ prayujyate . tena nañviśiṣṭasya ānayanam bhaviṣyati . kaḥ punaḥ asau . nivṛttapadārthakaḥ . yadā punaḥ asya padārthaḥ nivartate kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4791: svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ āhosvit vācanikī . kim ca ataḥ . yadi svābhāvikī kim
GS24pmbhasuu:4792: nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti . atha vācanikī tat vaktavyam : nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati iti . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4793_0: kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti iti . nañ prayujyamānaḥ padārtham nivartayati katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4793_1: . kīlapratikīlavat . tat yathā kīlaḥ āhanyamānaḥ pratikīlam nirhanti . yadi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4793_2: nañaḥ māhātmyam syāt na jātu cit rājānaḥ hastyaśvam bibhṛyuḥ . na iti eva rājānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4793_3: brūyuḥ . evam tarhi svābhāvikī nivṛttiḥ nanu ca uktam kim nañ prayujyamānaḥ karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:4794: . tat yathā samandhakāre dravyāṇām samavasthitānām pradīpnimittam darśanam na ca teṣām pradīpaḥ nirvartakaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4795: nivṛttapadārthakaḥ kimartham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ prayujyate . evam yathā vijñayeta asya padārthaḥ nivartate iti . na iti hi ukte sandehaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4796: kasya padārthaḥ nivartate iti . tatra asandehārtham brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4797: prayujyate . evam vā etat . atha vā sarve ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_0: vartante brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti . tapaḥ śrutam ca yoniḥ ca iti etad
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_1: brāhmaṇakārakam . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ eva saḥ . tathā gauraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_2: śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇye guṇān kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_3: . samudāyeṣu ca vṛttāḥ śabdāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante. tad yathā . pūrve pañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_4: uttare pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kapilaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_5: ayam samudāye brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate jātihīne guṇahīne ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4798_6: . guṇahīne tāvat. abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam yaḥ tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . abrāhmaṇaḥ ayaṃ yaḥ gacchan
