GS24pmbhasuu:4798_7: bhakṣayati . jātihīne sandehāt durupadeśāt ca brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate . sandehāt tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:4799: kapilakeśam dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ paścāt upalabhate na ayaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tatra sandehāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4800: brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate jātikṛtā ca arthasya nivṛttiḥ . durupadeśāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:4801_0: durupadiṣṭam asya bhavati amuṣmin avakāśe brāhmaṇaḥ tam ānaya iti . sa tatra gatvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4801_1: yam paśyati tam adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tataḥ paścāt upalabhate na ayaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:4801_2: brāhmaṇaḥ abrāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . tatra durupadeśāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4802: brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ vartate jātikṛtā ca arthasya nivṛttiḥ . ātaḥ ca sandehāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4803: durupadeśāt vā . na hi ayam kālam māṣarāśivarṇam āpaṇe āsīnam dṛṣṭvā adhyavasyati brāhmaṇaḥ ayam iti . nirjñātam tasya bhavati . idam khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:4804_0: bhūyaḥ uttarapadārthaprādhānye sati saṅgṛhītam bhavati . kim . anekam iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4804_1: saṅgṛhītam . ekavacanam . katham punaḥ ekasya pratiṣedhena anekasya sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4804_2: syāt . prasajya ayam kriyāguṇau tataḥ paścāt nivṛttim karoti . tat yathā : āsaya
GS24pmbhasuu:4804_3: śāyaya bhojaya anekam iti . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra kriyāguṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:4804_4: prasajyete yatra khalu na prasajyete tatra katham : anekaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4805_0: api ekasya pratiṣedhena bahūnām sampratyayaḥ . tat yathā na naḥ ekam priyam na naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4805_1: ekam sukham iti . iha abrāhmaṇatvam abrāhmaṇatā paratvāt tvatalau prāpnutaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4805_2: kaḥ doṣaḥ . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . abrāhmaṇatvam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . abrāhmaṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4805_3: iti ca iṣyate . nañsamāse bhāvavacane uktam . kim uktam . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4808: guṇavacanena iti vaktavyam . akṛtā iti ucyamāne iha ca prasajyeta . īṣat gārgyaḥ iti . iha ca na syāt . īṣatkaḍāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4809: (P_2,2.8) KA_I,412.18-413.13 Ro_II,678-680 kṛdyogā ca . kṛdyogā ca ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam . idhmapravraścanaḥ palāśaśātanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4810: kimartham idam ucyate . pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4811: vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . kā punaḥ ṣaṣṭhīpratipadavidhānā
GS24pmbhasuu:4812: kā kṛdyogā . sarvā ṣaṣṭhī pratipadavidhānā śeṣalakṣaṇām varjayitvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4813: kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti yā ṣaṣṭhī sā kṛdyogā . tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4814: tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ ṣaṣthīguṇaiḥ ṣaṣṭhī samasyate iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4815_0: brāhmaṇavarṇaḥ candanagandhaḥ paṭahaśabdaḥ nadhīghoṣaḥ . na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4815_1: tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . ghṛtasya tīvraḥ candanasya mṛduḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4815_2: . kimartham idam ucyate . guṇena iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4816: na iti ucyate na punaḥ guṇavacanena iti ucyate . na evam śakyam . iha hi na syāt . kākasya kārṣṇyam kaṇṭakasya taikṣṇyam balākāyāḥ śauklyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4817_0: etat eva tasmin yoge udāharaṇam . yat vai brāhmaṇasya śuklāḥ vṛṣalasya kṛṣṇāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4817_1: asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4817_2: iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate dantāḥ . tasmāt guṇena na
GS24pmbhasuu:4818: iti vaktavyam . guṇena na iti ucyamāne tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4819: tatsthaiḥ ca guṇaiḥ iti ucyamāne na tu tadviśeṣaṇaiḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4821: pratipadavidhānā ca ṣaṣṭhī na samasyate iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4824: brāhmaṇasya śuklāḥ vṛṣalasya kṛṣṇāḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4825_0: asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4825_1: iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate dantāḥ . idam tarhi kākasya kārṣṇyam kaṇṭakasya taikṣṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4825_2: balākāyāḥ śauklyam iti . idam api udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4826: brāhmaṇasya śuklāḥ vṛṣalasya kṛṣṇāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam . asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4827_0: dravyam atra apekṣyate dantāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati vai kasya cit arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4827_1: prakaraṇāt vā apekṣyam nirjñātam tadā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti . sati kim udāharaṇam . brahmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4827_2: pakṣyan brāhmaṇasya pakṣyamāṇaḥ . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4828_0: pratiṣidhyate atra ṣaṣṭhī laprayoge na iti . yā ca śrūyate eṣā bāhyam artham apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:4828_1: bhavati . tatra asmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:4829_0: odanaḥ . idam tarhi caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya dviṣan . nanu ca atra api pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4829_1: . vakṣyati etat dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam iti . avyaye kim udāharaṇam . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4829_2: uccaiḥ vṛṣalasya nīcaiḥ iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4830_0: asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4830_1: iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate āsanam . idan tarhi brāhmaṇasya kṛṭvā vṛṣalasya kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:4830_2: iti . etat api na asti . pratiṣidhyate tatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:4831: avyayaprayoge na iti . yā ca śrūyate eṣā bāhyam artham apekṣya bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4832_0: tatra asmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4832_1: iti . dravyam atra apekṣyate kaṭaḥ . idam tarhi . purā sūryasya udetoḥ ādheyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4832_2: purā vatsānām apākartoḥ . nanu ca atra api pratiṣidhyate avyayam iti kṛtvā . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4832_3: etat . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ iti . samānādhikaraṇe kim udāharaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4832_4: . rājñaḥ pāṭaliputrakasya śukasya mārāvidasya pāṇineḥ sūtrakārasya . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4833: asāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . idam tarhi . sarpiṣaḥ pīyamānaḥ yajuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4834: kriyamāṇasya iti . nanu ca atra api asāmarthyāt eva na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . samānādhikaraṇam asamarthavat bhavati iti . adhātvabhihitam iti evam tat .

GS24pmbhasuu:4841_0: ktanirdeśe asamarthatvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . samāsaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4845: siddham . tasmāt ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi iti evam yā ṣaṣṭhī tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4846: saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ ityarthe ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . kamaṇi ca . karmaṇi iti evam yā ṣaṣṭhī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4848: abhisambadhyate vidhiḥ āhosvit pratiṣedhaḥ . vidhiḥ iti āha . kutaḥ etat .

GS24pmbhasuu:4851_1: . siddham etat . katham . kvāṅsvatidurgatayaḥ samasyante iti vaktavyam . ku . kubrāhmaṇaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4851_4: ūrīkṛtam . prādayaḥ ktārthe . prādayaḥ ktārthe samasyante iti vaktavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:4855_0: samasyante iti vaktavyam . pragataḥ ācāryaḥ prācāryaḥ prāntevāsī prapitāmahaḥ . atyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4855_1: krāntādyarthe dvitīyayā . atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayā samasyante iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4856: atimālaḥ . avādayaḥ kruṣṭādyarthe tṛtīyayā . avādayaḥ kruṣṭādyarthe tṛtīyayā samasyante iti vaktavyam . avakruṣṭaḥ kokilayā avakokilaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:4858: . nirādayaḥ krāntādyarthe pañcamyā . nirādayaḥ krāntādyarthe pañcamyā
GS24pmbhasuu:4859: samasyante iti vaktavyam . niṣkrāntaḥ kauśāmbyāḥ niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4860_0: . avyayam pravṛddhādibhiḥ . avyayam pravṛddhādibhiḥ samasyate iti vaktavyam . punaḥprvavṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:4860_1: barhiḥ bhavati punarṇavam punaḥsukham . ivena vibhaktyantalopaḥ pūrvpadaprakṛtisvaratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:4861: udāttavatā tiṅā gatimatā ca avyayam samasyate iti vaktavyam . anuvyacalat anuprāviśat yat pariyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4863: kārakaḥ vrajati . hārakaḥ vrajati . atiṅ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati . kārakaḥ vrajati . hārakaḥ vrajati iti . sup supā iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4864: ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . upapadam atiṅ iti tadarthapratiṣedhaḥ . upapadam atiṅ iti tadarthasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kasya . tiṅarthasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4865_0: kaḥ punaḥ tiṅarthaḥ . kriyā . kriyāpratiṣedhaḥ vā . atha vā vyaktam eva idam paṭhitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4865_1: upapadam akriyayā iti . atha akriyayā iti kim pratyudāhriyate . kārakaḥ gataḥ hārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_0: tarhi. dravyavāci . idam tarhi kārakasya gatiḥ kārakasya vrajyā . etat api dravyvāci
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_1: . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4866_2: atiṅ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4867: anayoḥ yogayoḥ nivṛttam sup supā iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4868: gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ samāsaḥ bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā na kartavyā bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate kena idānīm samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . samarthena .
GS24pmbhasuu:4869: yadi evam dhātūpasargayoḥ api samāsaḥ prāpnoti . pūrvam dhātuḥ upasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:4870: yujyate paścāt sādhanena iti . na etat asti . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_0: yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . sādhanam hi kriyām nirvartayati . tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_1: . abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya upasargeṇa viśeṣaḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāt upasargasamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_2: vipratiṣedhena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsāt upasargasamāsaḥ vipratiṣedhena . ṣaṣṭhīsamāsasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4871_3: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ rājapuruṣaḥ . upapadasamāsasya avakāśaḥ stamberamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4872: karṇejapaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4873: upapadasamāsaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāvād
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_0: upapadasamāsaḥ . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . na vā ṣaṣṭhīsamāsābhāvād
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_1: upapadasamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham . gatikārakopadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsavanacam
GS24pmbhasuu:4874_2: prāk subutpatteḥ iti vacanāt . atha vā vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:4875: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ . yadā na ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ tadā upapadasamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4876_0: anena eva yathā syāt tena mā bhūt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ tena vā syāt anena vā
GS24pmbhasuu:4876_1: . upapadasamāsaḥ nityasamāsaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ punaḥ vibhāṣā . nanu ca nityam yaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4876_2: saḥ nityasamāsaḥ . yasya vigrahaḥ na asti . na iti āha . nityādhikāre yaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4876_3: saḥ nityasamāsaḥ . na evam śakyam avyayībhāvasya hi anityasamāsatā prasajyeta . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4879: na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa api evakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:4880: niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . yathā evam vijñāyeta : amā eva avyayena iti . mā evam vijñāyi : amā avyayena eva
GS24pmbhasuu:4881_0: iti . asti ca idānīm anavyayam amśabdaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha . khaśayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4881_1: brāhmaṇakulam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . antaraṅgatvāt atra samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4881_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . amā eva yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4882: tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra eva yathā syāt . amā ca anyena ca yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra mā bhūt iti . agre bhojam agre bhuktvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4883: agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ samāsapratiṣedham codayiṣyati . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4885: (P_2,2.23) KA_I,418.24-419.8 Ro_II,698 śeṣaḥ iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . yeṣām padānām anuktaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . śeṣavacanam padataḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:4886_0: na abhāvāt . śeṣavacanam padataḥ cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt . na hi santi
GS24pmbhasuu:4886_1: tāni padāni yeṣām padānām anuktaḥ samāsaḥ . arthataḥ tarhi śeṣagrahaṇam . yeṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4886_2: anuktaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . arthataḥ cet aviśiṣṭam . arthataḥ cet aviśiṣṭam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4886_3: bhavati . kutaḥ . padataḥ . na hi santi te arthāḥ yeṣu anuktaḥ samāsaḥ . trikataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4886_4: tarhi śeṣagrahaṇam . yasya trikasya anuktaḥ samāsaḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . kasya ca anuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4888_0: anekam anyārthe iti iyati ucyamāne vakyārthe api bahuvrīhiḥ syāt . yathā me mātā
GS24pmbhasuu:4888_1: tathā me pitā susnātam bhoḥ iti . padagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4888_2: atha anyagrahaṇam kimartham . anekam padārthe iti iyati ucyamāne svapadārthe api
GS24pmbhasuu:4889: na etat asti prayojanam . tatpuruṣaḥ svapadārthe bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4890: bhavet ekasañjñādhikāre siddham . paraṅkāryatve tu na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4891: ārambhasāmarthyāt ca tatpuruṣaḥ paraṅkāryatvāt ca bahuvrīhiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4892: paraṅkāryatve ca na doṣaḥ . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . śeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4893: śeṣavacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra śeṣavacanāt doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4894: saṅkhyāsamānādhikaraṇanañsamāseṣu bahuvrīhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . atha ekasaṅjñādhikāre na arthaḥ anyagrahaṇena . ekasaṅjñādhikāre ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4895: akriyamāṇe hi anyagrahaṇe yathā eva tatpuruṣaḥ svapadārthe bahuvrīhim bādhate evam anyapadārthe api bādheta . atha anekagrahaṇam kimartham.
GS24pmbhasuu:4896: anyapadārthe iti iyati ucyamāne ekasya api padasya bahuvrīhiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4897: sarpiṣaḥ api syāt . madhunaḥ api syāt . gomūtrasya api syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:4898_0: prayojanam . sup supā iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam . bahūnām api samāsaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4898_1: syāt . susūkṣmajaṭakeśena sunatājinavāsasā . uttarārtham ca anekagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4898_2: cārthe dvandvaḥ anekam iti . iha api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4899: plakṣanyagrodhakhadirapalāśāḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4900: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bahūnām api samāsaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam uttarapade dvigum śāsti . tatpuruṣaḥ api tarhi bahūnām prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4901_0: grahaṇena tatpuruṣaḥ ucyate . tena bahūnām na bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4901_1: anekavacanam upasarjanārtham . anekagrahaṇam kriyate upasarjanārtham . prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:4902: upasarjanasañjñā yathā syāt . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . na vā ekavibhaktitvāt . na vā etat api prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4903_0: ekavibhaktitvāt . ekavibhakti ca apūrvnipāte iti upasarjanasañjñā bhaviṣyati . citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4903_1: śabalaguḥ iti . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citraguḥ tiṣṭhati . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragum
GS24pmbhasuu:4903_2: paśya . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citraguṇā kṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4904: citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragave dehi . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragoḥ ānaya .
GS24pmbhasuu:4905: citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragoḥ svam . citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ citragau nidhehi .
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_0: citrāḥ yasya gāvaḥ he citrago iti . yadi tarhi yataḥ kutaḥ cit eva kim cit padam
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_1: adhyāhṛtya ekavibhaktyā yogaḥ kriyate etat api ekavibhaktiyuktam bhavati iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:4906_2: prāpnoti . rājakumārī takṣakumārī . rājñaḥ yā kumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:4907_0: rājakumārī tiṣṭhati . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumārīm paśya . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryā
GS24pmbhasuu:4907_1: kṛtam . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryai dehi . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryāḥ ānaya
GS24pmbhasuu:4907_2: . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryāḥ svam . rājñaḥ yā kumārī rājakumāryām nidhehi . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4907_3: yā kumārī he rājakumāri iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4908: ekagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat ekavibhaktiyuktam ca anekavibhaktiyuktam ca tatra syāt ekagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4909: vibhaktiyuktam ca apūrvanipāte iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4910: (P_2,2.24.2) KA_I, 421.17-423.14 Ro_II,704-710 padārthābhidhāne anuprayogānupapattiḥ abhihitatvāt . padārthasya abhidhāne anuprayogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4911: anupapattiḥ . citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . abhihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4912: citraguśabdena abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā anabhihitatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anabhihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4913: citraguśabdena anabhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4914_0: katham anabhihitaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam padārthābhidhāne anuprayogānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4914_1: abhihitatvāt iti . sāmānyābhidhāne hi viśeṣānabhidhānam . sāmānye hi abhidhīyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4915: tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . citraguḥ . kaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4916: devadattaḥ iti. bhavet siddham yadā sāmānye vṛttiḥ . yadā tu khalu viśeṣe vṛttiḥ tadā na sidhyati . citrā gāvaḥ devadattasya citraguḥ devadattaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4917: . tat api siddham . katham . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca samāsaḥ ca . yadā vākyam tadā na samāsaḥ . yadā samāsaḥ tadā na vakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4918: yadā samāsaḥ tadā sāmānye vṛttiḥ . tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . citraguḥ . kaḥ . devadattaḥ iti. sāmānyasya eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:4919: anuprayogaḥ na prāpnoti . citragu tat . citragu kim cit . citragu sarvam iti . sāmānyam api yathā viśeṣaḥ tadvat . citragu iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4920: sarvam vā viśvam vā iti . tatra avaśyam sandehanivṛttyartham viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . atha vā vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidīyate . etat ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4921: yuktam yat vibhaktyarthaḥ abhidhīyate . tatra hi sarvapaścāt padam vartate asya iti . vibhaktyarthābhidhāne adravyasya liṅgasaṅkhyopacārānupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4923: bahuyavam bahuyavā bahuyavaḥ bahuyavau bahuhavāḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_1: dravyasya ye liṅgasaṅkhye tābhyām vibhaktyarthasya upacāraḥ anupapannaḥ . bahuyavam
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_2: bahuyavāḥ bahuyavaḥ bahuyavau bahuhavāḥ iti . katham hi anyasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:4924_3: anyasya upacāraḥ syāt . siddham tu yathā guṇavacaneṣu . siddham etat. katham . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:4925: guṇavacaneṣu uktam : guṇavacanānām śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti iti . tat yathā śuklam vastram śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau
GS24pmbhasuu:4926_0: kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:4926_1: vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau dravyam śritaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4926_2: tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4927: katham abhihitaḥ bhavati sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4928: arthagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . iha anekam anyapade iti iyatā siddham . katham punaḥ pade nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_0: kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_1: prayojanam kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ yathā abhidhīyeta sadravyaḥ saliṅgaḥ sasaṅkhyaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_2: . yadi tarhi kṛtsnaḥ padārthaḥ abhidhīyate laiṅgāḥ sāṅkhyāḥ ca vidhayaḥ na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4929_3: . uktam vā . kim uktam . liṅgeṣu tāvat . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4930_0: sāṅkhyeṣu api uktam karmādīnām anuktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā sāṅkhyāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:4930_1: . prathamā tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayikī na niyogataḥ anyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4931: ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4932: evam api vyatikaraḥ . ekasmin api dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ dvayoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:4933_0: ekavacanabahuvacane bahuṣu api ekavacanadvivacane . arthataḥ vyavasthā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4933_1: . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā . saṅkhyeam anyā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4933_2: prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam syāt . atha vā vakṣyati etat . tatra vacanagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4934: prathamā yathā syāt iti . evam api ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4935: vyabhicarati eva hi ayam samāsaḥ liṅgasaṅkhye . ṣaṣthyartham punaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4936: vyabhicarati . abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ antarbhūtaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ sampannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4937: . tatra prātipadikārthe prathamā iti prathamā bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:4938: idam bhavati : citragoḥ devadattasya . bhavati . bāhyam artham apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:4942: kim prayojanam . vyadhikaraṇānām mā bhūt iti . pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4943: . avyayānām ca . avyayānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . uccairmukhaḥ nīcairmukhaḥ . saptamyupamānapūrvapadasya uttarapadalopaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4944: saptamīpūrvasya upamānapūrvasya ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kaṇṭhesthaḥ kālaḥ asya kaṇṭhekālaḥ uṣṭramukham iva
GS24pmbhasuu:4945: mukham asya uṣṭramukhaḥ kharamukhaḥ . samudāyavikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:4946_0: samudāyaṣaṣṭhyāḥ vikāraṣaṣṭhyāḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4946_1: . keśānām samāhāraḥ cūḍā asya keśacūḍaḥ suvarṇasya vikāraḥ alaṅkāraḥ asya suvarṇālaṅkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4946_2: . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya vā . prādibhyaḥ dhātujasya bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4947_0: prapatitaparṇaḥ praparṇaḥ prapatitapalāśaḥ prapalāśaḥ . nañaḥ astyarthānām . nañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4947_1: astyarthānām bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ uttarapadasya ca vā lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avidyamānaputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4947_2: aputraḥ avidyamānabhāryaḥ abhāryaḥ . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . na vā anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4948: na vā vaktavyam . asamānādhikaraṇānām bahuvrīhiḥ kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:4949: pañcabhiḥ bhuktam asya iti . anabhidhānāt . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam . kriyamāṇe api vai parigaṇane yatra abhidhānam na asti na
GS24pmbhasuu:4950_0: bhavati tatra bahuvrīhiḥ . tat yathā pañca bhuktavantaḥ asya iti . atha etasmin sati
GS24pmbhasuu:4950_1: anabhidhāne yadi vṛttiparigaṇanam kriyate vartiparigaṇanam api kartavyam . tat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:4951: arthaniyame matvarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . matvarthe yaḥ saḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : kaṣṭam śritam anena iti . tathā ca uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4952: vacanārthaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā uttarasya yogasya vacanārthaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ : yat vṛttisūtre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4953_0: saṅkhyāvyayāsannādūrādhikasaṅkhyāḥ saṅkhyeye iti . aparaḥ āha : yat vārttike iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4953_1: . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ . karmavacanena aprathmāyāḥ bahuvrīhiḥ vaktavyaḥ . ūḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4954_0: paśuḥ rudrāya upahṛtapaśuḥ rudraḥ uddhṛtaḥ odanaḥ sthālyāḥ uddhṛtaudanā sthālī .
GS24pmbhasuu:4954_1: yadi karmavacanena iti ucyate kartṛvacanena katham . prāptam udakam grāmam prāptodakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4955: grāmaḥ . kartṛvacanena api . kartṛvacanena api iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4956: aprathamāyāḥ iti kimartham . vṛṣṭe deve gataḥ . aprathamāyāḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_0: iha kasmāt na bhavati . vṛṣṭe deve gatam paśya iti . bahiraṅgā atra aprathamā . subadhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_1: astikṣīrādivacanam . subadhikāre astikṣīrādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astikṣīrā
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_2: brāhmaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā avyayatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4957_3: . avyayatvāt . avyayaḥ ayam astiśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ asteḥ laṭ . katham avyayatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4958: upasargavibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātasañjñāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasñjñā . nipātaḥ avyayam iti avyayasañjñā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4960: kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti aha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . yadi evam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_0: . na hi anyat pṛṣṭena anyat ākhyāyate . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate : keṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_1: sabrahmacārī kiṃsbrahmacārī iti . prativacanam ca eva na upapadyate svare ca doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_2: bhavati . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta . kiṃsabrahmacārī iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_3: . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ sabrahmacārī kiṃsabrahmacārī iti . bhavet
GS24pmbhasuu:4961_4: prativacanam upapannam svare tu doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_0: kaḥ sabrahmacārī tava kiṃsabrahmacārī tvam iti . atha vā punaḥ astu evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_1: : ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti . nanu ca uktam kaṭhaḥ iti prativacanam na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . agnaukaravāṇinyāyena bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . kaḥ cit kam cit āha
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_3: . agnau karavāṇi iti . kuru iti kartari anujñāte karma api anujñātam bhavati . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_4: āha : agnau kariṣyate iti . kriyatām iti karmaṇi anujñāte kartā api anujñātaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_5: . yathā eva khalu api ke sabrahmacāriṇaḥ asya iti kaṭhāḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_6: gamyate . nūnam saḥ api kaṭha iti . evam kaṭhaḥ iti ukte sambandhāt etat gantavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_7: syāt . nūnam te api kaṭhāḥ iti . na khalu api te śakyāḥ samāsena pratinirdeṣṭum .
GS24pmbhasuu:4962_8: upasarjanam he te bhavanti . atha arthatṛtīyāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4963: . ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . kaḥ samāsārthaḥ . samāsārthaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4964_0: anyapadārthaḥ hi nāma saḥ bhavati . yeṣām padānām samāsaḥ tataḥ anyasya padasya arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4964_1: anyapadārthaḥ . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4964_2: evam api kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate . kim hi tayoḥ ardham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:4964_3: . astu tari evam vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam samāsārthaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4964_4: upapadyate iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avayavena vigrahaḥ samudāyaḥ samāsārthaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4966_0: saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti. dvayoḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:4966_1: tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ . nanu ca uktam . ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4966_2: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:4967: praṣṭavyaḥ . atha iha devadattasya bhrātā iti kaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ . tatra etat syāt . ekasmāt prādurbhāvaḥ iti . etat ca vārtam . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_0: sārthikanam ekapratiśraye uṣitānām prātaḥ utthāya pratiṣṭhamānānām na kaḥ cit parasparam
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_1: sambandhaḥ bhavati . evañjātīyakam bhrātṛtvam nāma . atra cet yuktaḥ ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_2: dṛśyate iha api yuktaḥ dṛśyatām . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_3: ānayanam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_4: ca uktam anusasāra pāṇḍavam . saṅkarṣaṇadvitīyasya balam kṛṣṇasya vardhatām iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_5: dvayoḥ dvivacanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam tīyantaḥ śabdaḥ asti eva pūraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:4968_6: . asti sahāyavācī . tat yaḥ sahāyavācī tasya idam grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_0: asidvitīyaḥ asisahāyaḥ iti gamyate . evam api ardhatṛtīyāḥ iti ekasmin ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_1: iti ekavacanam prāpnoti . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti . tat yathā śatam yūtham
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_2: vanam iti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam anayoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_3: ardhatṛtīyāḥ ānīyantām iti ukte ardhasya ānayanam na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_4: . bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānam api . tat yathā . śuklavāsasam ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_5: ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4969_6: astu ayam eva vigrahaḥ ardham tṛtīyam eṣām iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4970: ekavacanam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4971: saṅkhyeyam anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra ekavacanam syāt saṅkhyeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:4972_0: aviśeṣitam syāt . iha tarhi ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti ayam droṇaśabdaḥ samudāye pravṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4972_1: avayave na upapadyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāyeṣu api śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4972_2: api vartante. tad yathā . pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare
GS24pmbhasuu:4973: pañcālāḥ tailam bhuktam ghṛtaṃ bhuktam śuklaḥ nīlaḥ kapilaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4974_0: evam ayam samudāye droṇaśabdaḥ pravṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartati . kāmam tarhi anena
GS24pmbhasuu:4974_1: eva hetunā yadā dvau droṇau ardhārḍhakam ca kartavyam ardhatṛtīyāḥ droṇāḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:4974_2: kartavyam . samudāyeṣu api hi śabdāḥ pravṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante. keṣu avayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:4975: samudāyam na vyabhicarati . kam ca samudāyam na vyabhicarati . ardhdroṇaḥ droṇam . ardhāḍhakam punaḥ vyabhicarati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4976_0: (P_2,2.25) KA_I,427.7-428.16 Ro_II,719-724 dvitrāḥ tricaturāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4976_1: . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . dvau vā trayaḥ vā iti . bhavet yadā bahūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:4976_2: ānayanam tadā bahuvacanam upapannam yadā tu
GS24pmbhasuu:4977: khalu dvau ānīyete tadā na sidhyati . tadā api sidhyati . katham . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ : anirjñāte arthe bahuvacanam prayoktavyam iti . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:4978: kati bhavataḥ putrāḥ . kati bhavataḥ bhāryāḥ iti . aparaḥ āha : dvau vā iti ukte trayaḥ vā iti gamyate . trayaḥ vā iti ukte dvau vā iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:4979: sā eṣā pañcādhiṣṭhānā vāk . atra yuktam bahuvacanam . atha dvidaśāḥ tridaśāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4980: dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti . saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyāprasiddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:4981: saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ . na hi sujantā saṅkhyā asti . evam tarhi evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . dvau daśatau dvidaśāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4982: evam api atkārāntatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ . na hi atkārāntā saṅkhyā asti . astu tarhi ayam eva vigrahaḥ dviḥ daśa dviśaśāḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:4983: saṅkhyāsamāse sujantatvāt saṅkhyā iti aprasiddhiḥ iti . na vā asujantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:4984_0: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . asujantatvāt . sujantā iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:4984_1: sujantam paśyāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vākye suc dṛśyate samāse tu na dṛśyate . sujabhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_0: kim kāraṇam . ahihitārthatvāt . abhihitaḥ sujarthaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā samāse suc
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_1: na bhaviṣyati .kim ca bhoḥ sujarthe iti samāsaḥ ucyate . na khalu sujarthe iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_2: gamyate tu sujarthaḥ . katham . yāvatā saṅkhyeyaḥ yaḥ saṅkhyayā saṅkhyāyate saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_3: kriyābhyāvṛttyarthaḥ . saḥ ca uktaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā samāse suc na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_4: aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt . aśiṣyaḥ saṅkhyottarapadaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_5: . kim kāraṇam . saṅkhyeyavābhidhyāyitvāt . saṅkhyeyam vārthaḥ ca abhidīyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_6: anyapadārthe iti eva siddham . bhavet siddham adhikaviṃśāḥ adhikatriṃśāḥ iti yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4985_7: etat vicāryate . viśatyādayaḥ daśadarthe vā syuḥ parimāṇini vā iti . idam tu na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:4986: yatra niyogataḥ saṅkhyeye eva vartate . atha upadaśāḥ iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4987: . bahuvrīhiḥ iti āha . kaḥ asya vigrahaḥ . daśānām samīpe upadaśāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4988_0: kasya punaḥ sāmīpyam arthaḥ . upasya . yadi evam na anyapadārthaḥ bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:4988_1: prathānirdiṣṭam saṅkhyāgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . matvarthe vā pūrvasya vidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:4988_2: atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:4988_3: atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:4989: (P_2,2.26, 28) KA_I,428.19-429.16 Ro_II,725-727 diksamāsasahayogayoḥ ca antarālapradhānābhidhānāt . diksamāsasahayogayoḥ ca aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4990: . kim kāraṇam . antarālapradhānābhidhānāt . diksamāse sahayoge ca
GS24pmbhasuu:4991: antarālam pradhānam ca abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:4992_0: yadi evam dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . adya
GS24pmbhasuu:4992_1: punaḥ iyam sā eva dakṣiṇā sā eva pūrvā iti kṛtvā samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4993: bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . nanu ca bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4994: dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ pūrvaśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:4995: bhāṣitapuṃskam . ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā pūrvā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:4996_0: dikśabdau . dakṣiṇaḥ pūrvaḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4996_1: syuḥ . katham yāni digapadiṣṭāni kāryāṇi . yadā diśaḥ vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:4996_2: tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4997: ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ diśam yaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:4998: vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati . puṃvadbhāvaḥ tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:4999: dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti evamartham . evam ca kṛtvā dik diksamāsasahayogayoḥ ca antarālapradhānābhidhānāt iti eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_0: dakṣiṇapūrvā dik samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_1: . sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre puṃvadbhāvena parihṛtam . matvarthe vā pūrvasya vidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_2: . atha vā matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kababhāvārtham vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_3: . atha va kap mā bhūt iti (P_2,2.27) KA_I,429.18-430.6 Ro_II,727-728 tṛtīyāsaptamyanteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_4: ca kriyābhidhānāt . tṛtīyāsaptamyanteṣu ca kriyābhidhānāt aśiṣyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_5: kāraṇam . kriyābhidhānāt . kriyā abhidhīyate . tatra anyapadārthe iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_6: . na vā ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham . na vā aśiṣyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekaśeṣapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_7: idam vaktavyam . pūrvadīrghārtham ca pūrvadīrghārtham ca idam vaktavyam . keśākeśi
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_8: . syāt etat prayojanam yadi niyogataḥ asya anena eva dīrghatvam syāt . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:5000_9: anyeṣām api dṛśyate iti dīrghatvam na prayojanam bhavati . matvarthe vā pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5001: atha va matvarthe pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . amatvarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5002: kababhāvārtham vā . atha va kap mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5003_0: (P_2,2.29.1) KA_I,430.8-25 Ro_II,729-730 cārthe iti ucyate caḥ ca avyayam . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:5003_1: samāsasya avyayasañjñā prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pāṭhena avyayasañjñā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5003_2: na ca samāsaḥ tatra paṭhyate . pāṭhena api avyayasañjñāyām satyām abhideheyavat liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5004_0: arthaḥ abhidhīyate na tasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ asti . na idam vācanikam aliṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5004_1: asaṅkhyatā va . kim tarhi . svābhāvikam etat . tat yathā : samānam īhamānānām adhīyānānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5004_2: ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na
GS24pmbhasuu:5005_0: . na ca idānīm kaḥ cit arthavān iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5005_1: cit anarthakaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ . tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:5005_2: yat prāk samāsāt cārthasya liṅgasaṅkhyābhyām yogaḥ na asti samāse ca bhavati svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:5006: liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . tat yathā śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5007_0: kambalaḥ , śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5007_1: guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . evam iha api yat asau
GS24pmbhasuu:5007_2: dravyam śritaḥ bhavati samāsaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat samāsasya api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5007_3: . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . yājñikaḥ ca ayam vaiyākaraṇaḥ ca . kaṭhaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5008: mīmāṃsakaḥ ca iti . śeṣaḥ iti vartate . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi śeṣaḥ iti vartate upāsnātam sthūlasiktam tūṣṇīṅgaṅgam mahāhradam droṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5009: cet aśakaḥ gantum mā tvā tāptām kṛtākṛte iti etat na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . anyat hi kṛtam anyat akṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5010_0: (P_2,2.29.2) KA_I,431.1-434.14 Ro_II,731-741 cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5010_1: aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5010_2: . ahaḥ ahaḥ nayamānaḥ gām aśvam puruṣam paśum vaivasvataḥ na tṛpyati surāyāḥ iva
GS24pmbhasuu:5010_3: durmadī indraḥ tvaṣṭā varuṇaḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ iti . siddham tu yugapadadhikaraṇavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5011_0: dvandvavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . yugapadadhikaraṇavacane dvandvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5011_1: iti vaktavyam . tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin lakṣaṇe puṃvadbhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5012: samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ . vipratiṣiddheṣu yugapadadhikaraṇavacatāyāḥ anupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5013_0: śītoṣṇe sukhaduḥkhe jananamaraṇe . kim kāraṇam . sukhapratighātena hi duḥkham duḥkapratighātena
GS24pmbhasuu:5013_1: ca sukham . yat tāvat ucyate tatra puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ iti . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5014_0: na bhavati . darśanīyāyāḥ mātā darśanīyāmātā iti . atha matam etat prāk samāsāt yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5014_1: sāmānādhikaraṇyam tatra puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti iha api na doṣaḥ bhavati . yad api
GS24pmbhasuu:5014_2: ucyate vipratiṣiddheṣu ca anupapattiḥ iti . sarve eva hi śabdāḥ vipratiṣiddhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5014_3: iha api plakṣanyagrodhau iti plakṣaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ plakṣārtham sampratyāyayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5015_0: nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyamānaḥ nyagrodhārtham sampratyāyayati plakṣārtham nivartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5015_1: . atra cet yuktā yugapat adhikaraṇvacanatā dṛśyate iha api yuktā dṛśyatām . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5016: arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam prāpnoti . ataḥ kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:5017_1: . yatha eva hi śabdānām paurvāparyam tadvat arthānām api bhavitavyam . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5018: cet dvivacanabahuvacanānupapattiḥ . śabdapaurvāparyaprayogāt arthapaurvāparyābhidhānam iti cet dvivacanabahuvacanānupapattiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:5019: plakṣanyagrodhau plakṣanyagrodhāḥ iti . plakṣaśabdaḥ sārthakaḥ nivṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5020_0: nyagrodhaśabdaḥ upasthitaḥ ekārthaḥ tasya ekārthatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . vigrahe
GS24pmbhasuu:5020_1: tu yugapadvacanam jñāpakam yugapadvacanasya . vigrahe khalu api yugapadvacanatā dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5020_2: : dyavā ha kṣamā . dyavā cit asmai
GS24pmbhasuu:5021: pṛthivī namete iti . kim etat . yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatāyāḥ upodbalakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5022: vigrahe kila nāma yugapadadhikaraṇavacanatā syāt kim punaḥ samāse .
GS24pmbhasuu:5023: samudāyāt siddham . samudāyāt siddham etat . kim etat samudāyāt siddham iti . dvivacanabahuvacanaprasiddhiḥ iti coditam . tasya ayam parihāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_0: samudāyāt siddham iti cet na ekārthatvāt samudāyasya . samudāyāt siddham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_1: tat na . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt samudāyasya . ekārthāḥ hi samudāyāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_2: tat yathā śatam yūtham vanam iti . na aikārthyam . na ayam ekārthaḥ . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_3: dvyarthaḥ bahvarthaḥ ca . plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_4: plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_5: . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_6: bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti cet na bahutvābhāvāt . tayoḥ anekārthatvāt bahuvacanaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5024_7: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5025: bahutvābhāvāt . na atra bahutvam asti . kim ucyate bahutvābhāvāt iti yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api dvyarthaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api dvyarthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5026: . yābhyām eva atra ekaḥ dvyarthaḥ tābhyām eva aparaḥ api . yadi evam anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ . anyavācakena śabdena anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5027: vacanam na upapadyate . anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ iti cet plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt svaśabdena abhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5028: anyavācakena anyasya vacanānupapattiḥ iti cet ucyate tat na . kim kāraṇam . plakṣasya nyagrodhatvāt nyagrodhasya plakṣatvāt svaśabdena abhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5029: plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ . katham punaḥ plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ syāt yāvatā kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5030: . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham . kāraṇāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ iti cet evam ucyate : tat na tulyakāraṇatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5031: tulyam hi kāraṇam . yadi tāvat prakṣarati iti plakṣaḥ syān nyagrodhe api etat bhavati . tathā yadi nyak rohati iti nyagrodhaḥ plakṣe api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5032: bhavati . darśanam vai hetuḥ na ca nyagrodhe plakṣaśabdaḥ dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5033: darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam . darśanam hetuḥ iti cet tulyam etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5034: . plakṣe api nyagrodhaśabdaḥ dṛśyatām . tulyam hi kāraṇam . na vai loke
GS24pmbhasuu:5035_0: eṣaḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati . na hi plakṣaḥ ānīyatām iti ukte nyragrodhaḥ ānīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5035_1: tadviṣayam ca . tadviṣayam ca etat draṣṭavyam plakṣasya nyagrodhatvam . kiṃviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5036_0: niyataviṣayāḥ nāma śabdāḥ syuḥ . bāḍham yuktam . anyatra api tadviṣayadarśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5036_1: anyatra api hi niyataviṣayāḥ śabdāḥ dṛśyante . tat yathā : samāne rakte varṇe gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5036_2: lohitaḥ iti bhavati āsvaḥ śoṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5037: samāne ca kāle varṇe gauḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ hemaḥ iti . samāne ca śukle varṇe gauḥ śvetaḥ iti bhavati aśvaḥ karkaḥ iti . yadi tarhi plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5038_0: api nyagraodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5038_1: . ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya prayogaḥ na upapadyate . plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5038_2: nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ iti cet anuktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5038_3: plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ . ekena uktatvāt aparasya prayogaḥ anupapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5038_4: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . anuktatvāt plakṣeṇa nyagrodhasya nyagrodhaprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5039: . anuktaḥ plakṣeṇa nyagrodhārthaḥ iti kṛtvā nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5040: katham anuktaḥ yāvatā idānīm eva uktam plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣaḥ iti . sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na pṛthagbhūtau
GS24pmbhasuu:5041: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sahabhūtau etau anyonyasya artham āhatuḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5042: pṛthagbhūtau . abhidhānam punaḥ svābhāvikam . svābhāvikam abhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5043: atha vā iha kau cit prāthamakalpikau plakṣanyagrodhau kau cit kriyayā vā guṇena va plakṣaḥ iva ayam plakṣaḥ , nyagrodhaḥ iva ayam nyagrodhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5044: tatra plakṣau iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt : kim imau plakṣau āhosvit plakṣanyagrodhau iti . tatra asandehārtham nyagrodhaśabdaḥ prayujyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5045: iyam yugapadadhikaraṇavacanata nāma duḥkhā ca durupapādā ca . yat ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:5046: asyā nibandhanam uktam dyāvā ha kṣāmā iti tat api chāndasam . tatra supām supaḥ bhavanti iti eva siddham . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu
GS24pmbhasuu:5047: . nanu ca uktam cārthe dvandvavacane asamāse api cārthasampratyayāt aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha ce dvandve iti iyatā siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5048: katham punaḥ ce nāma vṛttiḥ syāt . śabdaḥ hi eṣaḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:5049: kāryam vijñāsyate . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat arthagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam evam yathā vijñāyeta cena kṛtaḥ artaḥ cārthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5050: kaḥ punaḥ cena kṛtaḥ arthaḥ . samuccayaḥ anvācayaḥ itaretarayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5051_0: samāhāraḥ iti . samuccayaḥ . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat nyagrodhaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5051_1: anvācayaḥ . plakṣaḥ ca iti ukte gamyate etat sāpaekṣaḥ ayam prayujyate iti . itaretarayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5051_2: . plakṣaḥ ca nyagrodhaḥ ca iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:5052: gamyate etat plakṣaḥ api nyagrodhasahāyaḥ nyagrodhaḥ api plakṣasahāyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5053: . samāhāre api kriyate plakṣanyagrodham iti . tatra ayam api arthaḥ dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . samāhārasya ekatvāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5055: (P_2,2.29.3) KA_I,434.15-435.3 Ro_II,742-743 ekādaśa dvādaśa iti kaḥ ayam samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5056: samāsaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5057: vacanaprasaṅgaḥ . ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5058: vacanam prāpnoti . ekaviṃśatiḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ . siddham tu adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā samānādhikaraṇādhikāre adhikalopaḥ ca . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5059_0: samānādhikaraṇādhikāre vaktavyam adhikāntā saṅkhya saṅkhyayā saha samasyate adhikaśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5059_1: ca lopaḥ bhavati iti . ekādhikā viṃśatiḥ ekaviṃśatiḥ dvyadhikā viṃśatiḥ dvāviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5060: na sidhyati . yat hi tat saṅkhyā pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti dvandve iti tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dvandve iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5061_0: śatasahasram iti . astu tarhi dvandvaḥ . nanu ca uktam ekādīnām daśādibhiḥ dvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5061_1: iti cet viṃśatyādiṣu vacanaprasaṅgaḥ iti. na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvaḥ dvandvaḥ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5061_2: ekavat bhavati . yadā tarhi ekavacanam tadā napuṃsakaliṅgam prāpnoti . liṅgam aśiṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5061_3: lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya (P_2,2.30) KA_I,435.5-16 Ro_II,743-744 kimartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5062_1: kriyate paraprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . na vā aniṣṭadarśanāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5062_2: . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭadarśanāt . na hi kim cit aniṣṭam dṛśyate . na hi kaḥ cit rājapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5062_3: iti prayoktavye puruṣarājaḥ iti prayuṅkte . yadi ca aniṣṭam drśyete tataḥ yatnārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5062_4: syāt . atha yatra dve ṣaṣṭhyante bhavataḥ kasmāt tatra pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:5063: rājñaḥ puruṣasya rājapuruṣasya iti . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5064_0: pradhānasya apūrvanipātaḥ . ṣaṣṭhyantayoḥ samāse arthābhedāt pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5064_1: na bhaviṣyati . evam na ca idam akṛtam bhavati upasarjanam pūrvam iti arthaḥ ca abhinnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5064_2: iti kṛtvā pradhānasya pūrvanipātaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5066: taranirdeśaḥ āhosvit atantram . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tantram dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5067_0: . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ prāpnoti . atha atantram mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5067_1: pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi. prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat na sidhyati . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5068: astu tāvat tantram . nanu ca uktam dvayoḥ niyamaḥ bahuṣu aniyamaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5069_0: tatra śaṅkhadundubhivīṅānām iti na sidhyati . dundubhiśabdasya api pūrvnipātaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5069_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat etat alpāctaram iti tat alpāc iti vakṣyāmi . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5070_0: mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ pṛthak nadanti saṃsadi. prāsāde dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5070_1: na sidhyati iti . atantre taranirdeśe śaṅkhatūṇavayoḥ mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ . atantre
GS24pmbhasuu:5071: mṛdaṅgena samāsaḥ kariṣyate . śaṅkhaḥ ca tūṇavaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau .
GS24pmbhasuu:5072_0: mṛdaṅgaḥ ca śaṇkhatūṇavau ca mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhatūṇavāḥ . rāmaḥ ca keśavaḥ ca rāmakeśavau
GS24pmbhasuu:5072_1: dhanapatiḥ ca rāmakeśavau ca dhanapatirāmakeśavāḥ teṣām dhanapatirāmakeśavānām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5072_2: . atha yatra bahūnām pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ kim tatra ekasya niyamaḥ bhavati ahosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:5072_3: aviśeṣeṇa . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ aniyamaḥ śeṣeṣu . anekaprāptau ekasya niyamaḥ
