GS24pmbhasuu:5076: abhyarhitam . abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . mātāpitarau śraddhāmedhe . laghvakṣaram . laghvakṣaram pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_0: kuśakāśam śaraśīryam . aparaḥ āha : sarvatra eva abhyarhitam pūrvam nipatati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_1: vaktavyam . laghvakṣarāt api iti . śraddhātapasī dīkṣātapasī . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_2: . varṇānām ānupūrvyeṇa pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5077_3: . bhrātuḥ ca jyāyasaḥ . bhrātuḥ ca jyāyasaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5078: saṅkhyāyāḥ alpīyasaḥ . saṅkhyāyāḥ alpīyasaḥ pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5079: ekādaśa dvādaśa . dharmādiṣu ubhayam . dharmādiṣu ubhayam pūrvam nipatati iti vaktavyam . dharmārthau arthadharmau kāmārthau arthakāmau guṇavṛddhī vṛddhiguṇau ādyantau antādī
GS24pmbhasuu:5080: (P_2,2.35) KA_I,437.9-17 Ro_II,748 bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . bahuvrīhau sarvanāmasaṅkhyayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5081: viśvadevaḥ viśvayasāḥ dviputraḥ dvibhāryaḥ . atha yatra saṅkhyāsarvanāmnoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5082: eva bahurvīhiḥ kasya tatra pūrvanipātena bhavitavyam . paratvāt saṅkhyāyāḥ : dvyanyāya tryanyāya . vā priyasya . vā priyasya pūrvanipātaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5083: priyaguḍaḥ guḍapriyaḥ . saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte gaḍvādibhyaḥ paravacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5084: saptamyāḥ pūrvanipāte gaḍvādibhyaḥ parā saptamībhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5086_1: paravacanam . niṣṭhāyāḥ pūrvanipāte jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ parā niṣṭhā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5086_2: vaktavyam . śārṅgajagdhī palāṇḍubhakṣitī māsajātā saṃvatsarajātā sukhajātā duḥkhajātā
GS24pmbhasuu:5086_3: . na vā uttarapadasya antodāttavacanam jñāpakam parabhāvasya . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5087_0: kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya antodāttavacanam jñāpakam parabhāvasya . yat ayam jātikālasukhādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5087_1: parasyāḥ niṣṭhāyāḥ uttarapadasya antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ parā atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5087_2: niṣṭhā bhavati iti . pratiṣedhe tu pūrvanipātaprasaṅgaḥ tasmāt rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5087_3: . pratiṣedhe tu pūrvanipātaḥ prāpnoti . akṛtamitapratipannāḥ iti . tasmāt rājadantādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5087_4: pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . atra api pratiṣedhavacanam jñāpakam parā niṣṭhā
GS24pmbhasuu:5087_5: bhavati iti . praharaṇārthebhyaḥ ca . praharaṇārthebhyaḥ ca pare
GS24pmbhasuu:5088: niṣṭhāsaptamyau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . asyudyataḥ musalodyataḥ asipāṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5089_0: daṇḍapāṇiḥ . dvandve ghi ajādyantam vipratiṣedhena . dvandve ghi iti asmāt ajādyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:5089_1: iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dvandve ghi iti asya avakāśaḥ paṭuguptau . ajādyadantam
GS24pmbhasuu:5089_2: iti asya avakāśaḥ uṣṭrakharau . iha ubhayam prāpnoti indrāgnī . ajādyadantam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5090: ubhābhyām alpāctaram . ubhābhyām alpāctaram iti etat bhavati . dvandve ghi iti asya avakāśaḥ paṭuguptau . alpāctaram iti asya avakāśaḥ vāgdṛṣadau .
GS24pmbhasuu:5091: iha ubhayam prāpnoti vāgagnī . alpāctaram iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ajādyadantam iti asya avakāśaḥ uṣṭrakharau . alpāctaram iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:5092: avakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti vāgindrau . alpāctaram iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5094: (P_2,2.38) KA_I,438.22-24 Ro_II,750 kaḍārādayaḥ iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . gaḍulaśāṇḍilyaḥ śāṇḍilyagaḍulaḥ khaṇḍavātsyaḥ vatsyakaṇḍaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5095: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt kaḍārādayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5098: kim idam anabhihitam nāma . uktam nirdiṣṭam abhihitam iti anarthāntaram .
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_0: yāvat brūyāt anukte anirdiṣṭe iti tāvat anabhihite iti . anabhihitavacanam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5099_1: anyatra api vihitasya abhāvāt abhihite . anabhihitavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_0: anyatra api abhihite vihitam na bhavati . kva anyatra . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_1: uktatvāt matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati . gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ . yañañbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5100_2: uktatvāt apatyārthasya nyāyyotpattiḥ na bhavati . saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadamiti . samāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:5101: dvirvacanam na bhavati . yat tāvat ucyate citraguḥ śabalguḥ bahuvrīhiṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:5102: uktatvāt matvarthasya matvarthīyaḥ na bhavati iti . astinā sāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate . na ca atra astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_0: yat api ucyate gargāḥ vatsāḥ vidāḥ urvāḥ yañañbhyām uktatvāt apatyārthasya nyāyyotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5103_1: na bhavati iti . samarthānām prathamāt vā iti vartate . na ca etat samarthānām prathamam
GS24pmbhasuu:5104_0: yat api ucyate saptaparṇaḥ aṣṭāpadam iti samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na
GS24pmbhasuu:5104_1: bhavati iti . yat atra vīpsāyuktam na adaḥ prayujyate . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi parvaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5104_2: sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau aṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:5105: padāni iti . śnambahujakakṣu tarhi . śnam : bhinatti chinatti . śnamā uktatvāt kartṛtvasya kartari śap na bhavati . bahuc : bahukṛtam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5106: bahubhinnam iti . bahucā uktatvāt īṣadasmāpteḥ kalpabādayaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5107_0: iti . akac : uccakaiḥ , nīcakaiḥ iti . akacā uktatvāt kutsādīnām kādayaḥ na bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5107_1: . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ apavādāḥ te apavādatvāt bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . śnambahujakakṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5108_0: samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam bhavati . nānādeśatvāt na prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5108_1: punaḥ iha akartavyaḥ anabhihitādhikāraḥ kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyaḥ na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5108_2: . iha akartavyaḥ kriyate . eṣaḥ eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5109: nyāyyaḥ pakṣaḥ yat abhihite vihitam na syāt . anabhitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_0: tasmāt anabhihitavacanam . anabhihitaḥ tu vibhaktyarthaḥ . kaḥ punaḥ vibhaktyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_1: . ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu anabhihiteṣu karmādayaḥ bhihitāḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:5110_2: nimittatvāya mā bhūvan iti . tasmāt anabhihitavacanam . tasmāt anabhihitādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5111: evam vijñeyam ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ iti . abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5112: yaḥ hi manyate karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ teṣu abhihiteṣu sāmarthyāt me vibhaktīnām utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati iti prathamā tasya na prāpnoti . kva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5113: vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ .kiṃ kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5114: na kva cit prātipadikena anuktaḥ prātipadikārthaḥ ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5115: vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:5116: . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_0: . anabhihitādhikāram ca tvam karoṣi parigaṇanam ca . na kva cit tiṅā ekatvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_1: anabhidhānam ucyate ca prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca iha anabhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5117_2: vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . atra api abhidhānam asti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_0: . vakṣyati etat : astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5118_1: . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te karmādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5119: prathamā te prāpnoti . kva . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5120: kṛtvā bhīṣādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi prāpnoti . prathamā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_0: tat yathā . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti . karoteḥ utpadyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_1: ktena abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na bhavati . kā tarhi . prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:5121_2: bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi mama
GS24pmbhasuu:5122: anabhihitādhikāraḥ asti na api parigaṇanam . sāmarthyāt me vibhaktīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5123: utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca sāmarthyam . kim . karmaviśeṣaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5124: atha vā kaṭaḥ api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_0: atha vā kaṭaḥ eva karma tat sāmānādhikaraṇyāt bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_1: asti khalvapi viśeṣaḥ kaṭaṃ karoti bhīṣmamudāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti ca kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5125_2: kaṭo bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5126_0: karoteḥ utpadyamānaḥ ktaḥ anavayavena sarvam karma abhidhatte . kaṭaśabdāt punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5126_1: utpadyamānayā dvitīyayā yat kaṭastham karma tat śakyamabhidhātum na hi karmaviśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5126_2: . tava eva tu khalu eṣaḥ doṣaḥ yasya te ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5127: vibhaktyarthāḥ abhihite prathamābhāvaḥ iti . prathamā te na prāpnoti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:5128: . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . prātipadikena uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_0: iti . karmādiṣu api vai vibhaktyartheṣu avaśyam ekatvādayaḥ nimittatvena upādeyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_1: . karmaṇaḥ evatve karmaṇaḥ dvitve karmaṇaḥ bahutve iti . na ca ekatvādīnām ekatvādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_2: santi . atha santi mama api santi . teṣu anabhihiteṣu prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_3: vā ubhayavacanāḥ hyete . dravyam ca āhuḥ guṇam ca . yatsthaḥ asau guṇaḥ tasya anuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_4: ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā bhaviṣyati . atha vā saṅkhyā nāma iyam parapradhānā
GS24pmbhasuu:5129_5: . saṃkhyeyam anayā viśeṣyam . yadi ca atra prathamā na syāt saṅkhyeyam aviśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5130: . atha vā vakṣyati tatra vacanagrahaṇasya prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5131: prathamā yathā syāt iti . atha vā samayāt bhaviṣyati . yadi sāmayakī na
GS24pmbhasuu:5132_0: niyogataḥ anyāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti . karmādīnām abhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5132_1: śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . evam api vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti . ekasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5132_2: api dvivacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ . dvayoḥ api ekavavacanabahuvacane prāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5135: tiṅkṛttaddhitasamāsaiḥ parisaṅkhyānam . tiṅkṛttaddhitasamāsaiḥ parisaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tiṅ . kriyate kaṭaḥ . kṛt . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5136_0: taddhita . aupagavaḥ kāpaṭavaḥ . samāsa . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:5136_1: vibhaktivacanam . utsarge hi prātipadikasāmānādhikaraṇye vibhaktiḥ vaktavyā . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:5136_2: . kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanam darśanīyam iti . kaṭaśabdāt utpadyamānayā
GS24pmbhasuu:5136_3: dvitīyayā abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā bhīṣmādibhyaḥ dvitīyā na prāpnoti . kā tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5136_4: syāt . ṣaṣṭhī . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . anyāḥ api na prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5136_5: . kim kāraṇam . karmādīn āmabhāvāt . samayaśca kṛtaḥ ne
GS24pmbhasuu:5137: kevalā prakṛtiḥ proktavyā na kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ iti . na cānyā utpadyamānā
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_0: etam abhisambandham utsahante vaktum iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . atha vā kaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5138_1: api karma bhīṣmādayaḥ api . tatra karmaṇi iti eva siddham . atha vā kaṭaḥ eva karma
GS24pmbhasuu:5141: anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktyabhāvaprasaṅgaḥ . dvayoḥ kriyayoḥ kārake
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_0: anyatareṇa abhihite vibhaktiḥ na prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste , śayane āste iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_1: . kim kāraṇam . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam iti kṛtvā saptamī na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5142_2: . na vā anyatareṇa anabhidhānāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5143: kim kāraṇam . anyatareṇa anabhidhānāt . anyatareṇa atra anabhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5144_0: sadipratyayena bhidhānam āsipratyayena anabhidhānam . yataḥ anabhidhānam tadāśrayā
GS24pmbhasuu:5144_1: saptamī bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ na khalu etat sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca anabhihitāśrayā
GS24pmbhasuu:5145_0: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . anabhihite hi vidhānam . anabhihite hi saptamī vidhīyate na abhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:5145_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum yatra anyā ca anyā ca kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5145_2: yatra tu khalu sā eva kriyā tatra katham . āsane āste . śayane śete iti . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5145_3: anyatvam asti . kutaḥ . kālabhedāt sādhanabhedāt ca . ekasya atra āseḥ āsiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5145_4: sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5146: sādhanam āhosvit guṇaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dravyam sādhanam na etat anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:5147: bhavati abhihitāt . atha hi guṇaḥ sādhanam bhavati etat anyat abhihitāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5148_0: anyaḥ hi sadiguṇaḥ anyaḥ ca āsiguṇaḥ . kiṃ punaḥ sādhanam nyāyyam . guṇaḥ iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:5148_1: . katham jñāyate . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kva devadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai
GS24pmbhasuu:5148_2: ācaṣṭe . asau vṛkṣe iti . katarasmin . yaḥ tiṣṭhati iti . saḥ vṛkṣaḥ adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5149: abhisambadhyamānaḥ kartā sampadyate . dravye punaḥ sādhane sati yat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:5150: karma eva syāt yat karaṇam karaṇam eva yat adhikaraṇam adhikaraṇam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_1: anavakāśatvāt . anabhihitavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . prathamāvidhānasya anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_2: . anavakāśā prathamā . sā vacanāt bhaviṣyati. sāvakāśā prathamā . kaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_3: akārakam . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet na astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5151_4: prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti . avakāśaḥ akārakam iti cet tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_0: . kim kāraṇam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_1: . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate. vipratiṣedhāt vā prathamābhāvaḥ. atha vā dvitīyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_2: kriyantām prathamā vā iti prathamā bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . dvitīyādīnām avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_3: kaṭam karoti bhīṣmam udāram śobhanamdarśanīyam iti . prathamāyāḥ avakāśaḥ akārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_4: vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ bhīṣmaḥ udāraḥ śobhanaḥ darśanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5152_5: iti . prathamā bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5153: paratvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5154: kṛtprayoge tu param vidhānam ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpratiṣedhārtham . kṛtprayoge tu paratvā tṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatpratiṣedhārtham anabhihitādhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5155: . kartavyaḥ kaṭaḥ iti . saḥ katham kartavyaḥ . yadi ekatvādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ . atha hi karmādayaḥ vibhaktyarthāḥ na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_1: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . samayā grāmam nikaṣā grāmam . hāyoge . hā devadattam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5157_4: kartavyam . abhitaḥ grāmam paritaḥ grāmam . samayā grāmam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5158: nikaṣā grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . dhik jālmam dhik vṛṣalam . aparaḥ āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:5159: ubhasarvatasoḥ kāryā dhiguparyādiṣu triṣu dvitīyā āmreḍitānteṣu tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate . ubhaya sarva iti etābhyām tasantābhyām dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5160: vaktavyā . ubhayataḥ grāmam sarvataḥ grāmam . dhigyoge . dhik jālmam dhik
GS24pmbhasuu:5161: vṛṣalam . uparyādiṣu triṣu āmreḍitānteṣu dvitīyā vaktavyā . upari upari grāmam . adhi adhi grāmam . adhaḥ adhaḥ grāmam . tataḥ anyatra api dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5162: . na devadattam pratibhāti kim cit . bubhukṣitam na pratibhāti kim cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:5163_0: (P_2,3.3) KA_I,444.13-22 Ro_II,771-772 kimartham idam ucyate . tṛtīyā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5163_1: . atha dvitīyā siddhā . siddhā karmaṇi iti eva . tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . supām
GS24pmbhasuu:5163_2: supaḥ bhavanti iti eva . asati etasmin supām supaḥ bhavanti iti tṛtīyārthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5163_3: ārambhaḥ . yavāgvā agnihotraṃ juhoti . evam tarhi tṛtīyā api siddhā . katham . kartṛkaraṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5163_4: iti eva . ayam agnihotraśabdaḥ asti eva jyotiṣi vartate . tadyathā . agnihotram prajvalayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5163_5: iti . asti haviṣi vartate . tat yathā . agnihotram juhoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5164: . juhotiḥ ca asti eva prakṣepaṇe vartate asti prīṇātyarthe vartate . tat yathā tāvat yavāgūśabdāt tṛtīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ jyotiṣi vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_0: juhotiḥ ca prīṇātyarthe . tat yathā . yavāgvā agnihotram juhoti . agniṃ prīṇāti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_1: yadā yavāgūśabdāt dvitīyā tadā agnihotraśabdaḥ haviṣi vartate juhotiḥ ca prakṣepaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5165_2: . tat yathā . yavāgūm agnihotram juhoti . yavāgūm haviḥ agnau prakṣipati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_0: (P_2,3.4) KA_I,444.24-445.10 Ro_II,772-774 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kim te bābhravaśālaṅkāyanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_1: antareṇa gatena iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha vā yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_2: api tāvat ayam antareṇaśabdaḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ ca anipātaḥ ca ayaṃ tu khalu antarāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_3: adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ nipātaḥ eva . tasya asya kaḥ anyaḥ dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5166_4: anyat ataḥ nipātāt . tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena arthaḥ iti gauḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5167_0: eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ . antarāntareṇayuktānām apradhānavacanam . antarāntareṇayuktānāmapradhānagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5167_1: vaktavyam . apradhāne dvīiyā bhavati iti vaktavyam . antarā tvām ca mām ca kamaṇḍaluḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5167_2: iti . kamaṇḍaloḥ dvitīyā mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ etābhyām kamaṇḍaloḥ yogaḥ . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_0: ca mām ca antarā tat kamaṇḍaloḥ sthānam . tatt arhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kamaṇḍaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_1: dvitīyā kasmāt na bhavati . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_2: bhaviṣyati (P_2,3.5) KA_I,445.13-446.4 Ro_II,774-777 atyantasaṃyoge karmavat lādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5168_3: . atyantasaṃyoge kālādhvānau karmavat bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5169: kim prayojanam . lādyartham . lādibhiḥ abhidhānam yathā syāt . āsyate māsaḥ . śayyate krośaḥ . atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_0: syāt . āsyate māsam . śayyate krośam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve laḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_1: yathā syāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prākṛtameva etat karma yathā kaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_2: karoti śakaṭam karoti iti . evam manyate . yatra kaḥ citkriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ upajāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5170_3: tat nyāyyam karma iti . na ca iha kaḥ cit kriyākṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ upajāyate . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:5171_0: ādityam paśyati . himavantam śṛṇoti . grāmam gacchati . tasmāt prākṛtameva etat karma
GS24pmbhasuu:5171_1: yathā kaṭam karoti śakaṭam karoti iti . yadi tarhi prākṛtam eva etat karma akarmakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5171_2: bhāve laḥ bhavati iti bhāve laḥ na prāpnoti. āsyate māsam devadattena iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5171_3: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . akarmakāṇām iti ucyate na ca ke cit kālabhāvādhvabhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5172: . kva cit ye akarmakāḥ iti . atha vā yena karmaṇā sakarmakāḥ ca akarmakāḥ ca bhavanti tena akarmakāṇām . na ca etena karmaṇā kaḥ cid api akarmakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_0: atha vā yat karma bhavati na ca bhavati tena karmakāṇām . na ca etat karma kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_1: api na bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam sūtram vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5173_2: . yatra akriyayā atyantasaṃyogaḥ tadartham . krośam kuṭilā nadī . krośam ramaṇīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5175: sādhanāpavarge mā bhūt . māsam adhītaḥ anuvāko na ca anena gṛhītaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5176: (P_2,3.7) KA_I,446.9-13 Ro_II,777-778 kriyāmadhye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . adya devadattaḥ bhuktvā dvyahāt bhoktā dvyahe bhoktā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5177: kārakamadhye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt : ihasthaḥ ayam iṣvāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5178: krośāt lakṣyam vidhyati krośe lakṣyam vidhyati . yam ca vidhyati yataḥ ca vidhyati ubhayoḥ tanmadhyam bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5179: na antareṇa sādhanam kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ bhavati . kriyāmadhyam cet kārakamadhyam api bhavati tatra kārakamadhye iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5180: (P_2,3.8) KA_I,446.15-447.5 Ro_II,778-779 karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam saptamīpañcamyoḥ pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5181: . karmapravacanīyayukte pratyādibhiḥ ca lakṣaṇādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vṛkṣam prati vidyotate vidyut . vṛkṣam pari . vṛkṣamanu .
GS24pmbhasuu:5182: sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātaram prati . mātaram pari . mātaram anu . kim prayojanam . saptamīpañcamyoḥ pratiṣedhārtham . saptamīpañcamyau mā bhūtām
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_0: iti . sādhunipuṇābhyām arcāyām saptamī iti saptamī . pañcamī apāṅparibhiḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_1: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ aprateḥ iti na vaktavyam bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5183_2: na vaktavyam . uktaṃ vā . kim uktam . ekatra tāvat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5184: aprateḥ iti . itaratra api yadi api tāvat ayam pariḥ dṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjane
GS24pmbhasuu:5185_0: ca avarjane ca ayaṃ khalu apaśabdaḥ adṛṣṭāpacāraḥ varjanārthaḥ eva . tasya kaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5185_1: dvitīyaḥ sahāyaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ varjanārthāt . tat yathā . asya goḥ dvitīyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5185_2: arthaḥ iti gauḥ eva ānīyate na aśvaḥ na gadarbhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_0: yasya ca aiśvaryam īśvaratā īśvarabhāvaḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt iti . āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_1: yasya svasya īśvaraḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_2: ca īśvaravacanam iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet avacanāt siddham . yasya ca īśvaravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_3: iti kartṛnirdeśaḥ cet antareṇa vacanam siddham . adhi brahmadatte pañcālāḥ . ādhṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5187_4: te tasmin bhavanti . satyam evam etat . nityam parigrahītavyam parigrahītradhīnam
GS24pmbhasuu:5188: prathamānupapattiḥ tu . prathamā na upapadyate . kutaḥ . pañcālebhyaḥ . kā tarhi syāt . ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyau . svāmīśvarādhipati iti . na tatra adhiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_0: paṭhyate . yadi api na paṭhyate adhiḥ īśvaravācī . na tatra paryāyavacanānām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_1: . katham jñāyate . yat ayam kasya cit paryāyavacanasya grahaṇam karoti : adhipatidāyāda
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_2: iti . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5189_3: tarhi prāpnoti karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . saptamyā uktatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_0: abhisambandhasya dvitīyā na bhaviṣyati . bhavet yaḥ adheḥ brahamadattasya ca abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_1: saḥ saptamyā uktaḥ syāt . yaḥ tu khalu adheḥ pañcālānām ca abhisambandhaḥ tatra dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5190_2: prāpnoti . svavacanāt siddham . astu yasya svasya īśvaraḥ tasmāt karmapravacanīyayuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5191: vacanam siddham . adhi brahmadattaḥ pañcāleṣu . ādhṛtaḥ sa teṣu bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5192: satyam evam etat . nityam parigrahītā parigrahītavyādhīnaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5193: prathamānupapattiḥ tu . prathamā na upapadyate . kutaḥ . brahmadattāt . kā tarhi syāt . ṣaṣṭhīsaptamyau . svāmīśvarādhipati iti . na tatra adhiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_0: paṭhyate . yadi api na paṭhyate adhiḥ īśvaravācī . na tatra paryāyavacanānām grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_1: . katham jñāyate . yat ayam kasya cit paryāyavacanasya grahaṇam karoti . adhipatidāyāda
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_2: iti . ṣaṣṭhī tarhi prāpnoti . śeṣalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati . dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5194_3: tarhi prāpnoti karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīyā iti . saptamyā uktatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_0: abhisambandhasya dvitīyā na bhaviṣyati . bhavet yaḥ dheḥ pañcālānām ca abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_1: saḥ saptamyā uktaḥ syāt yaḥ tu khalu adheḥ brahmadattasya ca abhisaṃbandhaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5195_2: dvitīyā prāpnoti . evaṃ tarhi svavacanāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_0: adhiḥ svam prati karmapravacanīyasaṃjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . evam api yadā brahmadatte
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_1: adhikaraṇe saptamī tadā pañcālebhyaḥ dvitīyā prāpnoti karmapravacanīyayukte dvitīya
GS24pmbhasuu:5196_2: iti . upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti prathamā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5198: adhvani arthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api mā bhūt . panthānam gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_0: vīvadham gacchat i iti . āsthitapratiṣedhaḥ ca . āsthitapratiṣedhaḥ ca ayam vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_1: . yaḥ hi utpathena panthānam gacchati pathe gacchati iti eva tatra bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5199_2: kim artham punaḥ idam ucyate . caturthī yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5200: . atha dvitīyā siddhā . siddhā karmaṇi iti eva . caturthī api siddhā . |
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_0: katham . sampradāne iti eva . na sidhyati . karmaṇā yam abhipraiti saḥ saṃpradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_1: iti ucyate . kriyayā ca asau grāmam abhipraiti . kayā kriyayā . gamikriyayā . kriyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5201_2: api tatra codyate . ceṣṭāyām anadhvani striyam gacchati ajām nayati iti atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_0: gacchati ajām nayati iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . siddham tu asamprāptavacanāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_1: etat . katham . asamprāpte karmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . adhvanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5202_2: ca anapavādaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā anadhvani iti etat api na vaktavyam bhavati . samprāptam
GS24pmbhasuu:5204_1: . caturthīvidhāne tādarthye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yūpāya dāru kuṇḍalāya hiraṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5204_2: . kim idam tādarthyam iti . tadarthasya bhāvaḥ tādarthyam . tadartham punaḥ kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:5205_0: arthaśabdena saha samāsaḥ . katham ca atra caturthī . anena eva . yadi evam itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5205_1: bhavati . kā itaretarāśrayatā . nirdeśottarakālam caturthyā bhavitavyam caturthyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5206: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5207_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati arthaśabdena yoge caturthī iti yat ayam carturthī
GS24pmbhasuu:5207_1: tadarthārtha iti caturthyantasya arthaśabdena saha samāsam śāsti . na khalu api avaśyaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:5208: bhavati . kim tarhi . ṣaṣṭhyantasya api bhavati . tat yathā . guroḥ idam gurvartham iti . yadi tādarthye upasaṅkhyānam kriyate na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_0: sampradānagrahaṇena . yaḥ api hi upādhyāyāya gauḥ dīyate upādhyāyārthaḥ saḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_1: . tatra tādarthye iti eva siddham . avaśyam saṃpradānagrahaṇam kartavyam yā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_2: lakṣaṇena sampradānasañjñā tadartham . chātrāya rucitam . chātrāya svaditam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_3: tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5209_4: tādarthye caturthī iti yat ayam caturthī tadarthārtha iti caturthyantasya tadarthena
GS24pmbhasuu:5210: śāsti . kḷpi sampadyamāne . kḷpi sampadyamāne caturthī vaktavyā . mūtrāya kalpate yavāgūḥ . uccārāya kalpate yavānnam iti . utpātena jñāpyamāne .
GS24pmbhasuu:5211_0: utpātena jñāpyamāne caturthī vaktavyā . vātāya kapilā vidyut ātapāya atilohinī pītā
GS24pmbhasuu:5211_1: bhavati sasyāya durbhikṣāya sitā bhavet . māṃsaudanāya vyāharati mṛgaḥ . hitayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_0: (P_2,3.16) KA_I,450.5-14 Ro_II,787-788 svastiyoge caturthī kuśalārthaiḥ āśiṣi vāvidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_1: . svastiyoge caturthī kuśalārthaiḥ āśiṣi vāvidhānāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svastiyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_2: caturthyāḥ avakāśaḥ svasti jālmāya svasti vṛṣalāya . kuśalārthaiḥ āśiṣi vāvidhānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_3: avakāśaḥ anye kuśalārthāḥ . kuśalam devattāya kuśalam devadattasya . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_4: prāpnoti . svasti gobhyaḥ svasti brāhmaṇebhyaḥ iti . caturthī bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5213_5: . alamiti paryāptyarthagrahaṇam . alamiti paryāptyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:5214: aparaḥ āha : alam iti paryāptyarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5215: . alam mallaḥ mallāya . prabhuḥmallaḥ mallāya . prabhavati mallaḥ mallāya
GS24pmbhasuu:5217_0: (P_2,3.17) KA_I,450.16-451.3 Ro_II,788-789 aprāṇiṣu iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5217_1: : na tvā śvānam manye , na tvā śune manye iti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5217_2: . manyakarmaṇi anādare vibhāṣā . tataḥ aprāṇiṣu . aprāṇiṣu ca vibhāṣā iti . iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:5218: manye , na tvā śukam manye iti . yat etat aprāṇiṣu iti etat anāvādiṣu iti vakṣyāmi . ime ca nāvādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . na tvā nāvam manye yāvat tīrṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5219_0: na nāvyam . na tvā annam manye yāvat bhuktam na śrāddham . atra yeṣu prāṇiṣu na iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5219_1: te nāvādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . manyakarmaṇi prakṛṣyakutsitagrahaṇam . manyakarmaṇi prakṛṣyakutsitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5220: iha mā bhūt : tvām tṛṇam manye iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5221: (P_2,3.18) KA_I,452.2-15 Ro_II,789-791 tṛtīyāvidhāne prakṛtyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tṛtīyāvidhāne prakṛtyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5222: tṛtīyāvidhāne prakṛtyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . prakṛtyā abhirūpaḥ prakṛtyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5223: darśanīyaḥ . prāyeṇa yājñikāḥ prāyeṇa vaiyākaraṇāḥ . māṭharaḥ asmi gotreṇa. gārgyaḥ asmi gotreṇa . samena dhāvati . viṣameṇa dhāvati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5224: dvidroṇena dhānyam krīṇāti . tridroṇena dhānyam krīṇāti . pañcakena paśūn krīṇāti . sāhasreṇa aśvān krīṇāti. tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5225_0: kartṛkaraṇayoḥ tṛtīyā iti eva siddham . iha tāvat prakṛtyā abhirūpaḥ prakṛtyā darśanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5225_1: iti prakṛtikṛtam tasya ābhirūpyam . prāyeṇa yājñikāḥ prāyeṇa vaiyākaraṇāḥ iti . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5225_2: tatra prāyaḥ yena te adhīyate . māṭharaḥ asmi gotreṇa. gārgyaḥ asmi gotreṇa iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5225_3: etena aham sañjñāye . samena dhāvati . viṣameṇa dhāvati . idam atra prayoktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5226: samena pathā dhāvati viṣameṇa pathā dhāvatīti . dvidroṇena dhānyam krīṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_0: . tridroṇena dhānyam krīṇāti . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . dvidroṇārtham dvidroṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5227_1: dvidroṇena hiraṇyena dhānyam krīṇāti iti . pañcakena paśūn krīṇāti iti . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5228: pañcakena paśūn krīṇāti iti . sāhasreṇa aśvān krīṇāti iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:5229: sahasraparimāṇam sāhasram . sāhasreṇa hiraṇyena aśvān krīṇāti iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:5230: (P_2,3.19) KA_I,452.17-453.7 Ro_II,791-793 kim udāharaṇam . tilaiḥ saha māṣān vapati iti . na etat asti . tilaiḥ miśrīkṛtya māṣāḥ upyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:5231: tatra karaṇe iti eva siddham . idam tarhi . putreṇa saha āgataḥ devadattaḥ iti . apradhāne kartari tṛtīyā yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_0: pradhāne kartari lādayaḥ bhavanti iti pradhānakartā ktena abhidhīyate yaḥ ca apradhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_1: siddhā tatra kartari iti eva tṛtīyā . idam tarhi . putreṇa saha āgamanam devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_2: iti . ṣaṣṭhī atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . putreṇa saha sthūlaḥ . putreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5232_3: saha piṅgalaḥ iti . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:5233: udāharaṇam tilaiḥ saha māṣān vapati iti . nanu ca uktam tilaiḥ miśrīkṛtya māṣāḥ upyante . tatra karaṇe iti eva siddham iti . bhavet siddham yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:5234: tilaiḥ miśrīkṛtya upyeran . yadā tu khalu kasya cin māṣabījāvāpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5235_0: upasthitaḥ tadartham ca kṣetram upārjitam tatra anyat api kiṃ cid upyate yadi bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5235_1: bhaviṣyati iti tadā na sidhyati . sahayukte apradhānavacanam anarthakam upapadavibhakteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5235_2: kārakavibhaktibalīyastvāt anyatra api . sahayukte apradhānavacanam anarthakam . kiṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:5236: upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktibalīyastvāt . anyatra api kārakavibhaktirbalīyasī iti prathamā bhaviṣyati . kva anyatra . gāḥ svāmī vrajati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5237_0: (P_2,3.20) KA_I,453.9-14 Ro_II,793-794 iha kasmāt na bhavati . akṣi kāṇam asya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5237_1: . aṅgāt vikṛtāt tadvikārataḥ cet aṅginaḥ vacanam . aṅgāt vikṛtāt tṛtīyā vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:5237_2: tena eva cet vikāreṇa aṅgī dyotyate iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5238: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aṅgaśabdaḥ ayam samudāyaśabdaḥ yena iti ca karaṇe eṣā tṛtīyā . yena avayavena samudāyaḥ aṅgī dyotyate tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5239: bhavitavyam na ca etena avayavena samudāyaḥ dyotyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_1: itthambhūtalakṣaṇe tatsthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . api bhavānkamaṇḍalupāṇim chātrama
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_2: drākṣīt iti . na vā itthambhūtasya lakṣaṇena apṛthagbhāvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_3: kāraṇam . itthambhūtasya lakṣaṇena apṛthagbhāvāt . yatra itthambhūtasya pṛthagbhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_4: lakṣaṇam tatra bhavitavyam . na ca atra itthambhūtasya pṛthagbhūtam lakṣaṇam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5240_5: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . tathā hi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5241: prādhānyena lakṣaṇam pratinirdiśati . itthambhūtasya lakṣaṇam itthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇam tasmin nitthaṃbhūtalakṣaṇe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_0: vipratiṣedhena . sañjñaḥ anyatarasyām karmaṇi iti etasmāt kṛprayoge ṣaṣṭhī bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5243_1: vipratiṣedhena . sañjñaḥ anyatarasyām iti asya avakāśaḥ . mātaram sañjānīte . mātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:5244: idhmapravraścanaḥ palāśaśātanaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . mātuḥ sañjñātā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5245: pituḥ sañjñātā iti . ṣaṣṭhī bhavati vipratiṣedhena . upapadavibhakteḥ ca upapadavibhaktiḥ . upapadavibhakteḥ ca upapadavibhaktiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena |
GS24pmbhasuu:5247_0: svāmīśvarādhipatidāyādasākṣipratibhūprasūtaiḥ ca iti asya avakāśaḥ . goṣu svāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5247_1: gavāṃ svāmī . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . anyaḥ goṣu svāmī . anyaḥ gavāṃ svāmī iti . svāmīśvarādhipati
GS24pmbhasuu:5247_2: iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . na hi atra gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5248: . evam tarhi tulyārthaḥ atulopamābhyām tṛtīyā anyatarasyām iti asya avakāśaḥ . tulyaḥ devadattasya . tulyaḥ devadattena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5249: svāmīśvarādhipati iti asya vakāśaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tulyaḥ gobhiḥ svāmī . tulyaḥ gavāṃ svāmī iti . tulyārthaḥ ratulopamābhyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5251: (P_2,3.23) KA_I,454.18-455.2 Ro_II,797 nimittakāraṇahetuṣu sarvāsām prāyadarśanam . nimittakāraṇahetuṣu sarvā vibhaktayaḥ prāyeṇa dṛśyante iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_0: vaktavyam . kim nimittam vasati . kena nimittena vasati . kasmai nimittāya vasati
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_1: . kasmāt nimittāt vasati . kasya nimittasya vasati . kasmin nimitte vasati . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_2: kāraṇam vasati . kena kāraṇena vasati . kasmai kāraṇāya vasati . kasmāt kāraṇāt vasati
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_3: . kasya kāraṇasya vasati . kasmin kāraṇe vasati . kaḥ hetuḥ vasati . kam hetum vasati
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_4: . kena hetunā vasati . kasmai hetave vasati . kasmāt hetoḥ vasati . kasya hetoḥ vasati
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_5: . kasmin hetau vasati (P_2,3.28) KA_I,455.4-456. 5 Ro_II,797-800 pañcamīvidhāne lyablope
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_6: karmaṇi upasaṅkhyānam . pañcamīvidhāne lyablope karmaṇi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5252_7: prāsādam āruhya prekṣate . prāsādātprekṣate . adhikaraṇe ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_0: adhikaraṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āsanāt prekṣate . śayanāt prekṣate . praśnākhyānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5253_1: ca . praśnākhyānayoḥ ca pañcamī vaktavyā . kutaḥ bhavān . pāṭaliputrāt . yataḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5254: tatra pañcamī vaktavyā . gavīdhumataḥ sāvakāśyaīm catvāri yojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:5255: kārtikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī māse . tadyuktāt kāle saptamī . tadyuktāt kāle saptamī vaktavyā . kārtikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī māse . adhvanaḥ prathamā ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5256_0: adhvanaḥ prathamā ca saptamī ca vaktayvā . gavīdhumataḥ sāvakāśyaīm catvāri yojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5256_1: caturṣu yojaneṣu . tat tarhi idaṃ bahu vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . apādāne iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5257: śayanāt prekṣate iti . apakrāmati tat tasmāt darśanam . yadi apakrāmati kim na atyantāya apakrāmati . santatatvāt . atha vā anyānyaprādurbhāvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_0: praśnākhyānayoḥ ca pañcamī vaktavyā iti . idam atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_1: . kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati . pāṭaliputrāt āgacchami iti . yataḥ ca adhvakālanirmāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5258_2: tatra pañcamī vaktavyā iti . idam atra prayoktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5259: sat na prayujyate gavīdhumataḥ niḥsṛtya sāṅkāśyam catvāri yojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:5260: kārtikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī māse iti . idam atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5261_0: kārttikyāḥ prabhṛti āgrahāyaṇī māsa iti . tadyuktāt kāle saptamī vaktavyā iti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5261_1: atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate . kārttikyāḥ āgrahāyaṇī gate māse iti . adhvanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5261_2: prathamā ca saptamī ca iti . idam atra prayoktavyam sat na prayujyate . gavīdhumato
GS24pmbhasuu:5261_3: niḥsṛtya yadā catvāri yojanāni gatāni bhavanti tataḥ sāṅkāśyam . caturṣu yojaneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5264: dikśabdaiḥ yoge iti eva siddham . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5266: (P_2,3.30) KA_I,456.10-15 Ro_II,801 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . ṣaṣṭhī ataspratyayena iti ucyamāne iha eva syāt . dakṣiṇato grāmasya uttarato
GS24pmbhasuu:5267: grāmasya iti . iha na syāt . upari grāmasya upariṣṭāt grāmasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5268: arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe ataspratyayena ca siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5269: prāk grāmāt pratyak grāmāt . añcūttarapadasya api etat prayojanam uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5271: (P_2,3.32) KA_I,456.16-457.15 Ro_II,801-803 pṛthagādiṣu pañcamīvidhānam . pṛthagādiṣu pañcamīvidheyā . pṛthak devadattāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_0: kimartham na prakṛtam pañcamīgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . apādāne pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:5272_1: iti. anadhikārāt . anadhikāraḥ saḥ . adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_0: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . dakṣiṇena grāmam , dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_1: anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasāmarthyāt pañcamī bhaviṣyati . asti anyat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_2: prayojanam . kim . yasyām na aprāptāyām tṛtīyā ārabhyate sā yathā syāt . kasyām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5273_3: na aprāptāyām . antataḥ ṣaṣṭhyām . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5274: apādāne pañcamī iti . nanu ca uktam anadhikāraḥ saḥ adhikāre hi dvitīyāṣaṣṭhīviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ iti . evam tarhi sambandham anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5276: ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena anyārādibhiḥ yoge pañcamī . enapā dvitīyā anyārādibhiryoge pañcamī . pṛthagvinānānābhiḥ tṛtīyā anyatarasyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:5277_0: pañcamīgrahaṇam anuvartate anyārādibhiḥ yoge iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5277_1: adhikārāḥ . tat. yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:5278: vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya . anyasyā vibhakteḥ vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5279_0: cakārasya anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtāyaḥ pañcamyāḥ dvitīyāṣaṣṭhyau bādhike
GS24pmbhasuu:5279_1: bhaviṣyataḥ yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5279_2: etat . anuvartante ca nāma vidhayaḥ . na ca anuvartanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5280: eva bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5281_2: vaktavyaḥ . dūrād grāmasya na vā tatra api darśanāt apratiṣedhaḥ . na vā tatra api
GS24pmbhasuu:5282: pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . tatra api pañcamī dṛśyate . dūrāt āvasathāt mūtram dūrāt pādāvasecanam dūrāt ca bhāvyam dasyubhyaḥ dūrāt ca kupitāt guroḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5283: (P_2,3.36) KA_I,458.2-29 Ro_II,804-806 saptamīvidhāne ktasya inviṣayasya karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam . saptamīvidhāne ktasya inviṣayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5284: karmaṇi upsaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . adhītī vyākaraṇe . parigaṇitī yājñikye .
GS24pmbhasuu:5285: āmnātī cchandasi . sādhvasādhuprayoge ca . sādhvasādhuprayoge ca saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:5286_0: vaktavyā . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātari . asādhuḥ pitari . kārakārhāṇām ca kārakatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5286_1: . kārakārhāṇām ca kārakatve saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu bhuñjāneṣu daridrāḥ āsate
GS24pmbhasuu:5287: akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve . akārakārhāṇām cākārakatve saptamī vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5288: mūrkheṣu āsīneṣu vṛddhāḥ bhuñjate . vṛṣaleṣu āsīneṣu brāhmaṇāḥ taranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5289_0: tadviparyāse ca . tadviparyāse ca saptamī vaktavyā . ṛddheṣu āsīneṣu mūrkhāḥ bhuñjate
GS24pmbhasuu:5289_1: . brāhmaṇeṣu āsīneṣu vṛṣalāḥ taranti . nimittāt karmasaṃyoge . nimittātkarmasaṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:5289_2: saptamī vaktavyā . carmaṇi dvīpinam hanti . dantayoḥ hanti kuñjaram . keṣeṣu camarīm
GS24pmbhasuu:5290_1: upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5291_0: huteṣu āgataḥ . goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:5291_1: sidhyati . lakṣaṇam hi nāma tat bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt ca asau
GS24pmbhasuu:5291_2: katham cit agniṣu hūyamāneṣu prasthitaḥ huteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5292_0: āgataḥ goṣu duhyamānāsu prasthitaḥ dugdhāsu āgataḥ . siddham tu bhāvapravṛttau yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5292_1: bhāvārambhavacanāt . siddhametat . katham . yasya bhāvapravṛttau dvitīyaḥ bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5293: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5294_0: bhāvalakṣaṇe saptamīvidhāne abhāvalakṣaṇe upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5294_1: khalu avaśyam tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati yena punaḥ punaḥ lakṣyate . sakṛt api yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5294_2: nimittatvāya kalpate tat api lakṣaṇam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5295: tat yathā . api bhavān kamaṇḍalupāṇim chātram adrākṣīt iti . sakṛt asau kamaṇḍalupāṇiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ chātraḥ . tasya tat eva lakṣaṇam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5296: (P_2,3.42) KA_I,459.12-16 Ro_II,807 iha kasmāt na bhavati . kṛṣṇā gavām sampannakṣīratamā iti . vibhakte iti ucyate . na ca etat vibhaktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5297: vibhaktametat . gobhyaḥ kṛṣṇā vibhajyate . vibhaktam eva yat nityam tatra bhavitavyam . na ca etat nityam vibhaktam . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5298: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . vibhaktagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5299: vibhaktam ca avibhaktam ca tatra syāt vibhāktagrahaṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5300: (P_2,3.43) KA_I,459.18-19 Ro_II,808 apratyādibhiḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . sādhuḥ devadattaḥ mātaram pari . mātaram anu .

GS24pmbhasuu:5301_1: nityam pratibaddhaḥ . kutaḥ etat . sinotiḥ ayam badhnātyarthe vartate . baddhaḥ iva

GS24pmbhasuu:5303: adya maghā iti . adhikaraṇe iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5304_0: (P_2,3.46.1) KA_I,461.2-22 Ro_II,809-814 prātipadikagrahaṇam kimartham . uccaiḥ nīcaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5304_1: iti āpi yathā syāt . kim punaḥ atra prathamayā prārthyate . padatvam . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5304_2: .ṣaṣṭhyā atra padatvam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . grāmaḥ ucaiḥ te svam
GS24pmbhasuu:5304_3: . grāmaḥ uccaiḥ tava svam . sapūrvāyāḥ prathamāyāḥ vibhāṣā iti eṣaḥ vidhiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5304_4: syāt . atha liṅgagrahaṇam kimartham . strī pumān napuṃsakam iti ata api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5305_0: prayojanam . eṣaḥ eva atra prātipadikārthaḥ . idam tarhi . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5305_1: . atha parimāṇagrahaṇam kimartham . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti atra api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5305_2: . atha vacanagrahaṇam kimartham . iha samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5306_0: arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:5306_1: dṛṣṭānte yatra etāni samuditāni bhavanti tatra eva syāt . droṇaḥ khārī āḍhakam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5306_2: . iha na syāt . kumārī vṛkṣaḥ kuṇḍam iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_0: prayojanam . pratyekam api vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vṛddhiguṇasañjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_1: pratyekam bhavataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5307_2: . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . atha mātragrahaṇam kimartham . etanmātre eva prathamā yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5308_0: mā bhūt iti . kaṭam karoti . na etat asti prayojanam . karmādiṣu dvitīyādyāḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5308_1: tāḥ karmādiviśiṣṭe bādhikāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na karmādiviśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:5309_0: sambodhane prathamām śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5309_1: prayojanam . kim . sā āmantritam iti vakṣyāmi iti . yat tarhi yogavibhāgam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5309_2: . itarathā hi sambodhane āmantritam iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5310: idam tarhi ukteṣu api ekatvādiṣu prathamā yathā syāt . ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5311: iti . vacanagrahaṇasya api etat prayojanam uktam . anyatarat śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:5312: Ro_II,814-818 prātipadikārthaliṅgaparimāṇavacanamātre prathamālakṣaṇe padasāmānādhikaraṇye upasaṅkhyānam adhikatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_1: kartavyam . vīraḥ puruṣaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . adhikatvāt . vyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_2: prātipadikārthaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti . katham vyatiriktiḥ . puruṣe vīratvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_3: . na vā vākyārthatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . vākyārthatvāt . yat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_4: ādhikyam vākyārthaḥ saḥ . atha vā abhihite prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇam kariyṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_6: vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_7: aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate . abhihitānabhihite
GS24pmbhasuu:5313_8: prathamābhāvaḥ . abhihitānabhhite prathamā prāpnoti . kva . prāsāde āste .
GS24pmbhasuu:5314: śayane āste . sadipratyayena abhihitam adhikaraṇam iti kṛtvā prathamā
GS24pmbhasuu:5315: prāpnoti . evam tarhi tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe prathamā iti etat lakṣaṇaṃ kariṣyate . tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamāvidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5316: tiṅsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet tiṅaḥ aprayoge prathamā vidheyā . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣa iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kim uktam . astiḥ bhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5317: aprayujyamānaḥ api asti iti . vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ . asti iti gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5318_0: śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ tayoḥ apavādatvāt . śatṛśānacoḥ ca nimittabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5318_1: tiṅaḥ abhāvaḥ . kva . pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . tayoḥ apavādatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5319: bādhakau . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_0: abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate
GS24pmbhasuu:5320_1: . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit tiṅādeśo bhavati . apavādau tāvat śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:5321: śatṛśānacoḥ dvaitam bhavati . aprathamā vā vidhinā āśrīyate prathamā vā
GS24pmbhasuu:5322: pratiṣedhena iti . vibhaktiniyame ca api dvaitam bhavati . vibhaktiniyamaḥ vā syāt arthaniyamaḥ vā iti . tat yadā tāvat arthaniyamaḥ aprathamā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5323: vidhinā āśrīyate tadā eṣa doṣaḥ bhavati . yadā hi vibhaktiniyamaḥ yadi eva aprathamā vidhinā āśrīyate atha api prathamā pratiṣedhena na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_0: (P_2,3.50) KA_I,463.9-464.27 Ro_II,819-825 śeṣe iti ucyate. kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . karmādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5324_1: ye anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ . yadi evam śeṣaḥ na prakalpate . na hi karmādibhyaḥ anye
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_0: puruṣaḥ iti rājā kartā puruṣaḥ sampradānam . vṛkṣasya śākhā iti vṛkṣaḥ śākhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_1: adhikaraṇam . tathā yat etat svam nāma caturbhiḥ etat prakāraiḥ bhavati krayaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5325_2: apaharaṇāt yāñcāyāḥ vinimayāt iti . atra ca sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5326: karmādayaḥ santi. evam tarhi karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5327: alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati . samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5329_0: . pratyayāḥ niyatāḥ arthāḥ aniyatāḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5329_1: ṣaṣṭhīniyamārtham . śeṣe eva ṣaṣṭhī bhavati na anyatra iti . arthāvadhāraṇāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5329_2: atha vā arthāḥ niyatāḥ pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ te śeṣe api prāpnuvanti . tatra śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5330: śeṣaniyamārtham . śeṣe ṣaṣṭhī eva bhavati na anyā iti . arthaniyame śeṣagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . arthāḥ niyatāḥ pratyayāḥ aniyatāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5331: tataḥ vakṣyāmi ṣaṣṭhī bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . yatra ṣaṣṭhī ca anyā ca prāpnoti ṣaṣṭhī eva tatra bhavati iti . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5332: cet viśeṣyasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī śeṣe iti cet viśeṣyasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5333: vaktavyaḥ . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti atra rājā viśeṣaṇam puruṣaḥ viśeṣyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5334_0: tatra prātipadikārthaḥ vyatiriktaḥ iti kṛtvā prathamā na prāpnoti . tatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5334_1: syāt . tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tatra prathamāvidhiḥ . tatra ṣaṣṭhīm pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:5334_2: prathamā vidheyā . rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti . uktam pūrveṇa . kimuktam . na vā vākyārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5335_0: kutaḥ nu khalu etat puruṣe yat ādikhyam saḥ vākyārthaḥ iti na punaḥ rājani yat ādhikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5335_1: saḥ vākyārthaḥ syāt . antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5335_2: . na punaḥ antareṇa rājaśabdaprayogam puruṣe saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . asti kāraṇam yena
GS24pmbhasuu:5335_3: etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . rājaśabdāt hi bhavān ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati. aṅga hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5336: gaṃsyate saḥ arthaḥ . nanu ca na etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdakṛtena nāma arthena bhavitavyam . arthakṛtena nāma śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:5337_0: bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām : artharūpam eva etat evañjātīyakam yena atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5337_1: antareṇa api puruṣaśabdaprayogam rājani saḥ arthaḥ gamyate . kim punaḥ tat . svāmitvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5337_2: . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ tat . svakṛtam . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:5338_0: prātipadikārthānām kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ upajāyante tatkṛtāḥ ca ākhyāḥ prādurbhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5338_1: karma karaṇam apādānaṃ sampradānam adhikaraṇam iti . tāḥ ca punaḥ vibhaktīnām utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:5338_2: kadā cit nimittatvena upādīyante kadā cit na .
GS24pmbhasuu:5339_0: kadā ca vibhaktīnām utpattau nimittatvena upādīyante . yadā vyabhicaranti prātipadikārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5339_1: . yadā hi na vyabhicaranti ākhyābhūtāḥ eva tadā bhavanti karma karaṇam apādānam sampradānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5340: rājani svakṛtam svāmitvam tatra ṣaṣṭhī evam puruṣe api svāmikṛtam svatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5341_0: . tatra ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . rājaśabdāt utpadyamānayā ṣaṣṭhyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5341_1: kṛtvā puruṣaśabdāt ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati puruṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5341_2: rājā iti . bhavati . rājaśabdāt tu tadā prathamā . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5341_3: rājñaḥ puruṣasya iti . bhavati . bāhyam artham abhisamīkṣya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5343: karmādiṣu akarmakavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . akarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ bhavati . bhāve laḥ yathā syāt . mātuḥ smaryate . pituḥ smaryate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5344: atha vatkaraṇam kimartham . svāśrayam api yathā syāt . mātā smaryate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5345: pitā smaryate iti . karmābhidhāne hi liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . karmābhidhāne hi sati liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ syāt . mātuḥ smṛtam . mātroḥ smṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5346: māṭṝṇām smṛtam iti . mātuḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat smṛtaśabdasya api prāpnoti . ṣaṣṭhīprasaṇgaḥ ca . ṣaṣṭhī ca prāpnoti . kutaḥ . smṛtaśabdāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5347_0: mātuḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti . aparaḥ āha : ṣaṣṭhīprasaṅgaḥ ca . ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5347_1: ca prasaṅktavyā . kutaḥ . mātṛśabdāt . smṛtaśabdena bhihitam karma iti kṛtvā ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:5347_2: na prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5348_0: avivakṣite karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī bhavati . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5348_1: gaṃsyate . śeṣe iti vartate . śeṣaḥ ca kaḥ . karmādīnām avivakṣā śeṣaḥ . yadā karma
GS24pmbhasuu:5348_2: vivakṣitam bhavati tadā ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5349: tat yathā . smarāmi aham mātaram . smarāmi aham pitaram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5351: iha api yathā syāt . cauram santāpayati . vṛṣalam santāpayati . atha kimartham bhāvavacanānām iti ucyate yāvatā rujārthāḥ bhāvavacanāḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5352: bhavanti . bhāvakartṛkāt yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . nadī kūlāni rujati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5353: (P_2,3.60) KA_I,466.2-3 Ro_II,828-829 kim udāharaṇam . gām ghnanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5354: gām pradīvyanti . gām sabhāsadbhyaḥ upaharanti . na etat asti . pūrveṇa api etat siddham . idam tarhi . gāmasya tadahaḥ sabhāyām dīvyeyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5355: (P_2,3.61) KA_I,466.5-6 Ro_II,829 haviṣaḥ aprasthitasya . haviṣaḥ aprasthitasya iti vaktavyam . indrāgnibhyām chāgam haviḥ vapām medaḥ prasthitam preṣya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5357: ṣaṣṭhyarthe caturthī vaktavyā . yā kharveṇa pibati tasyai kharvaḥ tisraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5358_0: rātrīḥ . tasyāḥ iti prāpte . yaḥ tataḥ jāyate saḥ bhiśastaḥ yām araṇye tasyai stenaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5358_1: yām parācīm tasyai hrītamukhī apagagalbhaḥ yā snāti tasyai apsu mārukaḥ yā abhyaṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:5358_2: tasyai duścarmā yā pralikhate tasyai khalatiḥ apamārī yā āṅkte tasyai kāṇaḥ yā dataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5358_3: dhāvate tasyai śyāvadan yā nakhani nikṛntate tasyai kunakhṝ yā kṛṇatti tasyai klībaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5359: udbandhukaḥ yā parṇena pibati tasyai unmādukaḥ jāyate . ahalyāyai jāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5360: manāyyai tantuḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yogavibhāgāt siddham . caturthī . tataḥ arthe bahulam chandasi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_0: (P_2,3.65) KA_I,466.19-468.4 Ro_II,831-836 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_1: pacati odanam devadattaḥ iti . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhāne kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam lapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_2: . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ ṣaṣṭhīvidhāne kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . lapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_3: . pratiṣidhyate tatra ṣaṣthī laprayoge na iti . tasya karmakartrartham tarhi kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_4: kartavyam . kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . anyasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5361_5: mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ hi dvaye
GS24pmbhasuu:5362: pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ ca kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtprayoge iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5363: tiṅprayoge pratiṣidhyate . na brūmaḥ ihārtham tasya karmakartrartham kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . uttarārtham . avyayaprayoge na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5364: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ kṛtaḥ avyayasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5365: yathā syāt . akṛtaḥ avyayasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . uccaiḥ kaṭānām sraṣṭā iti . tasya karmakartrartham iti cet pratiṣedhe api
GS24pmbhasuu:5366: tadantakarmakartṛtvāt siddham . kṛtaḥ ete kartṛkarmaṇī na avyayasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5367: adhikaraṇam atra avyayam . idam tarhi prayojanam . ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedham vakṣyati . saḥ kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5368: . kṛtoḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . āścaryam idam vṛttam odanasya ca nāma pākaḥ brāhmaṇānām ca prādurbhāvaḥ iti . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:5369: kṛdgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . ubhayaprāptau iti na evam vijñāyate ubhayoḥ prāptiḥ ubhayaprāptiḥ ubhayaprāptau iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5370: ubhayoḥ prāptiḥ yasmin kṛti saḥ ayam ubhayaprāptiḥ kṛt ubhayaprāptau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5371: atha vā kṛtaḥ ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra yathā syāt . taddhitasya ye kartṛkarmaṇī tatra mā bhūt iti . kṛtapūrvī kaṭam . bhuktapūrvī odanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5372: . nanu ca vākyena eva anena na bhavitavyam . dvitīyayā tāvat na
GS24pmbhasuu:5373: bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . ktena abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5374_0: inipratyayena ca api na utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asamārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5374_1: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yat tāvat ucyate dvitīyayā tāvat na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5374_2: . kim kāraṇam . ktena abhihitam karma iti kṛtvā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5375: yaḥ asau kṛtakaṭayoḥ abhisaṃbandhaḥ saḥ utpanne pratyaye nivartate . asti ca karoteḥ kaṭena sāmarthyam iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5376_0: inipratyayena ca api na utpattavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asamārthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5376_1: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati vākyam ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5376_2: ca . yadā vākyam na tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5376_3: avaśyaṃ viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . kṛtapūrvī . kim . kaṭam . bhuktapūrvī
GS24pmbhasuu:5376_4: . kim . odanam iti . atha vā idam prayojanam kartṛbhūtapūrvamātrāt api ṣaṣṭhīyathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5379: pratiṣedhe akādiprayoge apratiṣedhaḥ . ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5380: pratiṣedhe akādiprayoge pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . bhedikā devadattasya kāṣṭhānām . cikīrṣā viṣṇumitrasya kaṭasya . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5381: akākārayoḥ prayoge pratiṣedhaḥ na iti vaktavyam . śeṣe vibhāṣā . śobhanā khalu pāṇineḥ sūtrasya kṛtiḥ . śobhanā khalu pāṇininā sūtrasya kṛtiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5382: śobhanā khalu dākṣāyaṇasya saṅgrahasya kṛtiḥ . śobhanā khalu dākṣāyeṇa

GS24pmbhasuu:5385: kartavyam : chāttrasya hasitam , naṭasya bhuktam , mayūrasya nṛttam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5386: kokilasya vyāhṛtam iti . śeṣavijñānāt siddham . śeṣalakṣaṇā atra ṣaṣṭhī

GS24pmbhasuu:5388_0: katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avivakṣā syāt yadā chātraḥ hasati , naṭaḥ bhuṅkte , mayūraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5388_1: nṛtyati , kokilaḥ vyāharati . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā : alomikā eḍakā
GS24pmbhasuu:5388_2: , anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5389: samudraḥ kuṇḍikā . vindhyaḥ vardhitakam iti . yadi evam uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:5390: cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . idam aheḥ sṛptam , iha ahinā sṛptam , iha ahiḥ sṛptaḥ , iha aheḥ sṛptam , grāmasya pārśve grāmasya madhye iti . iṣyate eva cātuḥśabdyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5391_0: (P_2,3.69) KA_I,469.2-470.6 Ro_II,838-840 lādeśe salliḍgrahaṇam kikinoḥ pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5391_1: . lādeśe salliḍgagrahaṇam kartavyam . salliṭoḥ prayoge na iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5392: kikinoḥ api prayoge pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . |
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_0: papiḥ somaṃ dadiḥ gāḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . tayoḥ alādeśatvāt . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_1: tau lādeśau . atha tau lādeśau syātām syāt pratiṣedhaḥ . bāḍham syāt . lādeśau tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_2: bhaviṣyataḥ . tat katham . ādṛgamahanajanaḥ kikinau liṭ ca iti liḍvat iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_3: . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5393_4: api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ . abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_0: brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti . evam iha api aliṭam liṭ iti āha . liḍvat iti vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5394_1: . ukāraprayoge na iti vaktavyam . kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ . odanam bubhukṣuḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5395: nirdiśyate . katham . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . u uka ūka la ūka loka iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5396: ukapratiṣedhe kameḥ bhāṣāyām apratiṣedhaḥ . ukapratiṣedhe kameḥ bhāṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5397: pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . dasyāḥ kāmukaḥ . vṛṣalyāḥ kāmukaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_0: avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . avyayapratiṣedhe tosunkasunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_1: na bhavati iti vaktavyam . purā sūryasya udetoḥ ādheyaḥ . purā vatsānām apākartoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_2: . purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ virapśin . śānaṃścānaśśatṝṛṇām upasaṅkhyānam . śānaṃścānaśśatṝṛṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5398_3: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . somam pavamānaḥ . naḍam āghnānaḥ . adhīyan pārāyaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5399: pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . tṛn iti evam bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:5400: . tṛn iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva saṃniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛ iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā tṛnaḥ nakārāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5401: yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya dviṣan atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5402: . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vā iti vaktavyam . tat ca avaśyaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:5403: vaktavyam pratyayagrhaṇe sati pratiṣedhārtham . tat eva pratyāhāragrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5405: (P_2,3.70) KA_I,470.8-13 Ro_II,840-841 akasya bhaviṣyati . akasya bhaviṣyati iti vaktavyam . yavān lāvakaḥ vrajati . odanam bhojakaḥ vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:5406: . saktūnpāyakaḥ vrajati . inaḥ ādhamarṇye ca . tataḥ inaḥ ādhamarṇye ca bhaviṣyati ca iti vaktavyam . śatam dāyī . sahasram dāyī . grāmam gāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:5408_0: karmaṇi mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante ṭatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5408_1: kṛtyaiḥ abhihitatvāt karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī na bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhavyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5408_2: karmaṇaḥ anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam . bhavyādīnām karma kṛtyaiḥ anabhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:5409_0: bhavyādīnam karmaṇaḥ anabhidhānāt kṛtyānām kartṛgrahaṇam kriyate . kim ucyate bhavyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5409_1: karma kṛtyaiḥ anabhitam iti . na iha api anabhihitaṃ bhavati . ākraṣṭavyā grāṃam
GS24pmbhasuu:5409_2: śākhā iti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5410: . kṛtyānām . kṛtyānām prayoge ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati iti . kim udāharaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5411: grāmam ākraṣṭavyā śākhā . tataḥ kartari vā iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_0: geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti . ubhayaprāptau iti vartate . nanu ca ubhayaprāptiḥ eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5412_1: . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām iti ca geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti ca bhavati . ubhayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5413: yugapatprasaṅgaḥ atra ca yadā karmaṇi na tadā kartari yadā kartari na tadā karmaṇi iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_0: pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_1: . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpattiḥ bhavati . kim idam pratyadhikaraṇam iti . adhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_2: adhikaraṇam prati pratyadhikaraṇam saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca . saṅkhyayā bahvarthayā
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_3: ca asya sāmānādhikaraṇyam . pratyadhikaraṇam vacanotpatteḥ saṅkhyāsāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5415_4: ca bahuṣu bahuvacanam iti bahuvacanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5416: iṣyate ca ekavacanam syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti dvigoḥ ekavacanavidhānam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5417: kim tarhi iti . tatra anuprayogasya ekavacanābhāvaḥ advigutvāt . tatra anuprayogasya ekavacanam na prāpnoti : pañcapūlī iyam iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5418: advigutvāt . dvigoḥ ekavacanm iti ucyate . na ca atra anuprayogaḥ dvigusañjñaḥ . siddham tu dvigvarthasya ekavadvacanāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5419: katham . dvigvarthaḥ ekavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5420: na vaktavyam . na idam pāṛibhāṣikasya vacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5421: anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam . ekasya arthasya vacanam ekavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_0: ekaśeṣapratiṣedhaḥ ca . ekaśeṣasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlī
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_1: ca pañcapūlī ca pañcapūlyaḥ . na vā anyasya anekatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5422_2: . anyasya anekatvāt . na etat dvigoḥ anekatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_0: kasya tarhi . dvigvarthasamudāyasya . samāhāragrahaṇam ca taddhitārthapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_1: . samāhāragrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam . taddhitārthapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5423_2: taddhitārthe yaḥ dviguḥ tasya mā bhūt iti . pañcakapālau pañcakapālāḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5424: pañcakapālaśabdaḥ pratyekam parisamāpyate āhosvit samudāye vartate . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pratyekam parisamāpyate purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca.
GS24pmbhasuu:5425: atha samudāye vartate . na vā samāhāraikatvāt . na vā etat samāhāraikatvāt api sidhyati . evam tarhi pratyekam parisamāpyate . purastāt eva coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:5426: parihṛtam ca. aparaḥ āha : na vā samāhāraikatvāt . na vā yogārambheṇa eva arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāhāraikatvāt . ekaḥ ayam samāhāraḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5428_0: vaktavyam . tūryāṅgāṇāṃ tūryāṅgaiḥ . senāṅgānām senāṅgaiḥ iti . kim prayojanam .

GS24pmbhasuu:5428_2: kariṣyate . dvandvaḥ ca prāṇyaṅgānām . tataḥ tūryāṅgāṇām . tataḥ senāṅgānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5428_3: saḥ tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . pratyekam aṅgaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate

GS24pmbhasuu:5442: kutaḥ aniravasitānām . āryāvartāt aniravasitānām . kaḥ punaḥ āryāvartaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5444_0: evam tarhi āryanivāsāt aniravasitānām . kaḥ punaḥ āryanivāsaḥ . grāmaḥ ghoṣaḥ nagaram
GS24pmbhasuu:5444_1: saṃvāhaḥ iti . evam api ye ete mahāntaḥ saṃstyāyāḥ teṣu abhyantarāḥ caṇḍālāḥ mṛtapāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5444_2: ca vasanti tatra caṇḍālamṛtapāḥ iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi yājñāt karmaṇaḥ aniravasitānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5444_3: . evam api takṣāyaskāram rajakatantuvāyam iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi pātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5445: aniravasitānām . yaiḥ bhukte pātram saṃskāreṇa śudhyati te aniravasitāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5446: yaiḥ bhukte saṃskāreṇa api na śudhyati te niravasitāḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5452_1: syāt . kva mā bhūt . badarāmalake tiṣṭhataḥ . kim punaḥ anena yā prāptiḥ sā niyamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5452_2: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anena yā
GS24pmbhasuu:5453_0: prāptiḥ sā niyamyate plakṣanyagrodhau jātiḥ aprāṇinām iti nityaḥ dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5453_1: prāpnoti . atha aviśeṣeṇa na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathāu astu . paśuśakunidvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:5454: paśuśakunidvandve yeṣām ca virodhaḥ śāśvatikaḥ iti etat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . paśuśakunidvandvasya avakāśaḥ mahājorabhram
GS24pmbhasuu:5455_0: mahājorabhrāḥ haṃsacakravākam haṃsacakravākāḥ . yeṣām ca virodhaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5455_1: śramaṇabrāhmaṇam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kākolūkam śvaśṛgālam iti . yeṣām ca virodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5455_2: iti etat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5456_0: prayojanam yeṣām ca virodhaḥ śāśvatikaḥ teṣām dvandve ekavacanam yathā syāt . anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:5456_1: yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . aśvavaḍavayoḥ pūrvaliṅgatvāt paśudvandvanapuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5458: vibhāṣā paśudvandvanapuṃsakam . yadā na paśudvandvanapuṃsakam saḥ avakāśaḥ . aśvavaḍavau . paśudvandvanapuṃsakasya avakāśaḥ anye paśudvandvāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5459: mahājorabhram mahājorabhrāḥ . paśudvandvanapuṃsakaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . aśvavaḍavam . paśudvandvanapuṃsakam bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5460: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5461: pratipadavidhānāt siddham . pratipadam atra napuṃsakam vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5463: ekavadbhāvaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāhāraikatvāt . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5464_0: samāhāraḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5464_1: jñāsyāmi . iha nityaḥ vidhiḥ iha vibhāṣā iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5465: bhavati iti yat ayam tiṣyapunarvasvoḥ nakṣatradvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanam nityam iti āha . idam tarhi prayojanam . saḥ napuṃsakam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5466: vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5467: liṅgasya . na tarhi idānīm idam vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . pūrvatra nityārtham uttaratra vyabhicārārtham vibhāṣā vṛkṣamṛga iti .
