GS24pmbhasuu:5468_1: pāṇipādāḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . ayam dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ ārabhyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5469: . evam tarhi avyayasya saṅkhayā avyayībhāvaḥ api ārabhyate bahuvrīhiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:5470: . tat yadā tāvat ekavacanam tadā avyayībhāvaḥ anuprayujyate ekārthasya ekārthaḥ iti . yadā bahuvacanam tadā bahuvrīhiḥ anuprayujyate bahvarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5473: sañjñāyām kanthośīnareṣu iti vakṣyati . tat atatpuruṣasya nañsamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5474: karmadhārayasya vā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na hi sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5475: kanthāntaḥ uśīnareṣu atatpuruṣaḥ nañsamāsaḥ karmadhārayaḥ vā asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5476: uttarārtham tarhi . upajñopakramam tadādyācikhyāsāyām iti vakṣyati . tat atatpuruṣasya nañsamāsasya karmadhārayasya vā mā bhūt iti . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:5477_0: asti prayojanam . na hi tadādyācikhyāsāyām upajñopakramāntaḥ atatpuruṣaḥ nañsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5477_1: karmadhārayaḥ vā asti . uttarārtham eva tarhi . chāyā bāhulye iti vakṣyati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5477_2: atatpuruṣasya nañsamāsasya karmadhārayasya vā mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5477_3: . na hi chāyāntaḥ bāhulye atatpuruṣaḥ nañsamāsaḥ karmadhārayaḥ vā asti . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5477_4: eva tarhi . sabhā rājāmanuṣyapūrvā aśālā ca iti vakṣyati . tat atatpuruṣasya nañsamāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5478_0: karmadhārayasya vā mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . na hi sabhāntaḥ aśālāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5478_1: atatpuruṣaḥ nañsamāsaḥ karmadhārayaḥ vā asti . idam tarhi . vibhāṣā senāsurā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5479: karmadhārayasya vā mā bhūt iti . dṛḍhasenaḥ rājā . anañ iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5480: asenā . akarmadhārayaḥ iti kimartham . paramsenā uttamasenā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5482: dvandvaḥ ayam ubhayapadārthapradhānaḥ . tatra kadā cit pūrvapadasya yat liṅgam tat samāsasya api syāt kadā cit uttarapadasya . iṣyate ca parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5483: yat liṅgam tat samāsasya syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti paravat liṅgam dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ iti . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5484: tatpuruṣaḥ ca kaḥ prayojayati . yaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhānaḥ ekadeśisamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5485: ardhapippalī iti . yaḥ hi uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ daivakṛtam tasya paravat
GS24pmbhasuu:5486_0: liṅgam . paravat liṅgam dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ iti cet prāptāpannālampūrvagatisamāseṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5486_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . paravat liṅgam dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ iti cet prāptāpannālampūrvagatisamāseṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5486_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prāptaḥ jīvikām praptajīvikaḥ āpannaḥ jīvikām apannajīvikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5487: alampūrvaḥ . alam jīvikāyāḥ alamjīvikaḥ . gatisamāsa . niṣkauśāmbiḥ nirvārāṇasiḥ . pūrvapadasya ca . pūrvapadasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5488: mayūrīkukkuṭau . yadi punaḥ yathājātīyakam parasya liṅgam tathājātīyakam
GS24pmbhasuu:5489: samāsāt anyat atidiśyeta . samāsāt anyat liṅgam iti cet aśvavaḍavayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5490_0: ṭāblugvacanam . samāsāt anyat liṅgam iti cet aśvavaḍavayoḥ ṭāpaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5490_1: aśvavaḍavau . nipātanāt siddham . nipātanāt siddham etat . kim nipātanam . āśvavaḍavapūrvāpara
GS24pmbhasuu:5490_2: iti . upasarjanahrasvatvam vā . atha vā upasarjanasya iti hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5491: kukkuṭamayūryau . astu . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau . paravat liṅgam iti śabdaśabdārthau atidiśyete . tatra aupadeśikasya hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5492_0: ātideśikasya śravaṇam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . dattā ca kārīṣagandhyā ca dattākārīṣagandhye
GS24pmbhasuu:5492_1: dattā ca gārgyāyaṇī dattāgārgyāyaṇyau . dvau ṣyaṅau dvau ṣphau ca prāpnutaḥ . stām
GS24pmbhasuu:5493: idam tarhi . dattā ca yuvatiḥ ca dattāyuvatī . dvau tiśabdau prāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5494: tasmāt na etat śakyam vaktum śabdaśabdārthau atidiśyete iti . nanu ca uktam samāsāt anyat liṅgam iti cet aśvavaḍavayoḥ ṭāblugvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5495: parihṛtam etat : nipātanāt siddham iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5496: eva paravat iti . katham tarhi . parasya iva paravat iti . yathājātīyakam parasya liṅgam tathājātīyakam samāsasya atidiśyate . atha pūrvapadasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:5497: pratiṣidhyate prāptādiṣu katham . prāptādiṣu ca ekadeśigrahaṇāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5498: dvandvaikadeśinoḥ iti vakṣyāmi . tat ekadeśigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ekadeśisamāsaḥ na ārapsyate . katham ardhapippalī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5499: samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . ardham ca sā pippalī ca ardhapippalī
GS24pmbhasuu:5500: iti . na sidhyati . paratvāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ prāpnoti . adya punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_0: ekadeśisamāsaḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsam bādhate . iṣyate ca ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_1: tat yathā . apūpārdham mayā bhakṣitam . grāmārdham mayā labdham iti . evam pippalyardham
GS24pmbhasuu:5501_2: iti bhavitavyam . katham ardhapippalī iti . samānādhikaraṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5502: (P_2,4.29) KA_I,479.19-21 Ro_II,862 anuvākādayaḥ puṃsi . anuvākādayaḥ puṃsi bhāṣyante iti vaktavyam . anuvākaḥ śamyuvākaḥ sūktavākaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5503: (P_2,4.30) KA_I,479.22-480.12 Ro_II,8663-864 puṇyasudinābhyām ahnaḥ napuṃsakatvam vaktavyam . puṇyāham sudināham . pathaḥ saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5504: pathaḥ saṅkhyāvyayādeḥ iti vaktavyam . dvipatham tripatham catuṣpatham
GS24pmbhasuu:5505: utpatham vipatham . dviguḥ ca . dviguḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . pañcagavam daśagavam . akārāntottarapadaḥ dviguḥ striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5506: bhāṣyate iti vaktavyam . pañcapūlī daśapūlī . vā ābantaḥ . vā ābantaḥ striyām bhāṣyate iti vaktavyam . pañcakhaṭvam pañcakhaṭvī daśakhaṭvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5507: daśakhaṭvī . anaḥ nalopaḥ ca vā ca striyām bhāṣyate iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5508: pañcatakṣam pañcatakṣī daśatakṣam daśatakṣī . pātrādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dvipātram pañcapātram .
GS24pmbhasuu:5510: ardharcam ardharcaḥ kārṣāpaṇam kārṣāpaṇaḥ gomayam gomayaḥ sāram sāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5511: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahuvacananirdeśāt ādyarthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5512_1: samānādhikaraṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . devadattam bhojaya imam ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5513: devadattam bhojaya imam ca yajña dattam bhojaya iti . anvādeśaḥ ca kathitānukathanamātram . anvādeśaḥ ca kathitānukathanamātram draṣṭavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5514: tat dveṣyam vijānīyāt : idamā kathitam idamā yadā anukathyate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā ācaṣṭe : anvādeśaḥ ca kathitānukathanamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:5517: kriyate na tṛtīyādiṣu iti eva ucyeta . tatra ṭāyām osi ca enena bhavitavyam . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . tatra idrūpalope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5518: kevalam idamaḥ anudāttatvam vaktavyam . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5519: ādeśavacanam sākackārtham . ādeśavacanam sākackārtham kriyate . sākackasya api ādeśaḥ yathā syāt . imakābhyām chātrābhyām rātriḥ adhītā atho ābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5520: api adhītam . atha kimartham śitkaraṇam . śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5521: śitkaraṇam kriyate sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5522: : imakābhyām chātrābhyām rātriḥ adhītā atho* ābhyām api adhītam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_0: akriyamāṇe hi śitkaraṇe alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_1: na vā antyasya vikāravacanānarthakyāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . antyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_2: vikāravacanānarthakyāt . akārasya akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_3: api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati arthavat tu ādeśapratiṣedhāṛtham . arthavat tu
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_4: asya akāravacanam . kaḥ arthaḥ . ādeśapratiṣedhāṛtham . ye anye akārasya ādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_5: tadbādhanārtham . tat yathā . maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti : makārasya makāravacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_6: na asti iti kṛtvā anusvārādayaḥ bādhyante . tasmāt śitkaraṇam . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_7: . na kartavyaḥ . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . a* a iti . anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5523_8: bhaviṣyati . atha vā vicitrāḥ taddhitavṛttayaḥ . na anvādeśe akac utpatsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5525: ucyate . udāttau mā bhūtām iti . na etat asti prayojanam . litsvare kṛte nighāte etadaḥ anudāttatvena siddham . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5526: anudāttatvam kriyatām litsvaraḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt litsvaraḥ . nityatvāt anudāttatvam . kṛte api litsvare prāptnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:5527: . tatra nityatvāt anudāttatve kṛte liti pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā yathāprāptaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ prasajyeta . tat yathā goṣpadapram
GS24pmbhasuu:5528: vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti ūlope kṛte pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā yathāprāptaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . tasmāt tratasoḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5530: (P_2,4.34) KA_I,482.10-24 Ro_II,868-869 kasya ayam enaḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5531: etadaḥ prāpnoti . idamaḥ api tu iṣyate . tat idamaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5532: na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . idamaḥ anvādeśe aś
GS24pmbhasuu:5533: anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau iti . yadi tat anuvartate etadaḥ tratasoḥ tratasau ca anudāttau iti idamaḥ ca iti idamaḥ api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5534_0: sambandham anuvartiṣyate . idamaḥ anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau . etadaḥ tratasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5534_1: tratasau ca anudāttau idamaḥ anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau aś bhavati . tataḥ dvitīyāṭaussu
GS24pmbhasuu:5534_2: enaḥ idamaḥ etadaḥ ca . tṛtīyādau iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5534_3: . tat yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5534_4: kariṣyate . idamaḥ anvādeśe aś anudāttaḥ tṛtīyādau iti etadaḥ tratasoḥ tratasau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5534_5: anudāttau . tataḥ dvitīyāṭaussu enaḥ idamaḥ etadaḥ ca . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_0: tat apekṣiṣyāmahe . enat iti napuṃsakaikavacane . enat iti napuṃsakaikavacanekartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_1: . kuṇḍam ānaya prakṣālaya enat parivartaya enat . yadi enat kriyate enaḥ na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_2: . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : atho enam atho ene atho enān iti ṭyadādyatvena siddham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5535_3: evam enaśritakaḥ na sidhyati . enacchritakaḥ iti pāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:5536_1: tasmin vidhānam . jagdhyādiṣu ārdhadhātukāśrayatvāt sati tasmin ārdhadhātuke jagdhyādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5536_2: bhavitavyam kim ataḥ yat sati bhavitavyam . tatra utsargalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5536_3: utsargalakṣaṇam kāryam prāpnoti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhavyam praveyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5536_4: ākhyeyam . ṇyati avasthite aniṣṭe pratyaye ādeśaḥ syāt . ṇyataḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5536_5: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5537: . sāmānyena hi āśrīyamāṇe viśeṣaḥ na āśritaḥ bhavati . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye jagdhyādiṣu kṛteṣu yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5538_0: tataḥ bhaviṣyati . sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti cet uvarṇākārāntebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5538_1: ṇyadvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti cet uvarṇākārāntebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5539_0: ārdhadhātukasāmānye guṇe kṛti yi pratyayasāmānya ca vāntādeśe halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5539_1: . iha ca ditsyam dhitsyam ārdhadhātukasāmānye akāralope kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5540: paurvāparyābhāt ca sāmānyena jagdhyādīnām anupapattiḥ . na hi sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5541: paurvāparyam asti . siddham tu sārvadhātuke pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5542_0: katham . aviśeṣeṇa jagdhyādīn uktvā sārvadhātuke na iti pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5542_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam jagdhyādiṣu ārdhadhātukāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5543: parihṛtam etat sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5544: sāmānyāśrayatvāt viśeṣasya anāśrayaḥ iti cet uvarṇākārāntebhyaḥ ṇyadvidhiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . vakṣyati tatra ajgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5545: prayojanam ajantabhūtapūrvamātrāt api yathā syāt iti . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5546: paurvāparyābhāt ca sāmānyena anupapattiḥ iti . arthasiddhiḥ eva eṣā yat sāmānyena paurvāparyam na asti . asati paurvāparye viṣayasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:5547: vijñāsyate . ārdhadhātukaviṣaye iti . atha vā ārdhadhātukāsu iti vakṣyāmi . kāsu ārdhadhātukāsu . uktiṣu yuktiṣu rūḍhiṣu pratītiṣu śrutiṣu sañjñāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_0: (P_2,4.36) KA_I,484.11-21 Ro_II,873 lyabgrahaṇam kimartham na ti kiti iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_1: . lyapi kṛte na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . lyap kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5548_2: atra kartavyam . paratvāt lyap . antaraṅgaḥ ādeśaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat lyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5549: ācāryaḥ antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ lyap bādhate iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . lyabadeśe upadeśivadvacanam anādiṣṭārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_0: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . jagdhiḥ vidhiḥ lyapi
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_1: yat tat akasmāt siddham asti kiti iti vidhānāt . hiprabhṛtīn tu sadā bahiraṅgaḥ lyaP
GS24pmbhasuu:5550_2: bharati iti kṛtam tat u viddhi . eṣaḥ eva arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5551: jagdhau siddhe antaraṅgatvāt ti kiti iti lyap ucyate . jñāpayati antaraṅgāṇām lyapā bhavati bādhanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5553: ghasḷbhāve aci upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prātti iti praghasaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5555_0: āhosvit adantaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vyañjanāntaḥ vadhau vyañjanānte uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5555_1: uktam . vadhyādeśe vṛddhitatvapratiṣedhaḥ iḍvidhiḥ ca iti . atha adantaḥ na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5555_2: bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:5556: (P_2,4.45) KA_I,485.7-9 Ro_II,874 iṇvat ikaḥ . iṇvat ikaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5557: vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . adhyagāt adhyagātām .
GS24pmbhasuu:5558: (P_2,4.46) KA_I,484.11 Ro_II,875 iṇvat ikaḥ iti eva . adhigamayati adhigamayataḥ aghigamayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5559: (P_2,4.47) KA_I,484.13 Ro_II,875 iṇvat ikaḥ iti eva . aghijigamiṣati adhijigamiśataḥ adhijigamiṣanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5561: gāṅi anubandhakaraṇam viśeṣaṇāṛtham . gāṅi anubandhakaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5562: viśeṣaṇāṛtham . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . gāṅkuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅit iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5563: gākuṭādibhyaḥ añṇit ṅit iti iyati ucyamāne iṇādeśasya api prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:5564: jñāpakam vā sānubandhakasya ādeśavacane itkāryābhāvasya . atha vā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5565_0: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ sānubandhakasya ādeśe itkāryam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:5565_1: prayojanam . prayojanam cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam na bhavati . laṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5566: . pacamānaḥ yajamānaḥ iti . ṭitaḥ iti etvam na bhavati . yuvoḥ anākau .
GS24pmbhasuu:5567: yuvoḥ anākau ca prayojanam . nandanaḥ kārakaḥ nandanā kārikā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5568: ugillakṣaṇau ṅībnumau na bhavataḥ . meḥ ca ananubandhakasya amvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5569: meḥ ca ananubandhakasya amvaktavyaḥ . acinavam akaravam asunavam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5570: atyalpam idam ucyate . tiptibmipām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5571: veda vettha . asya jñāpakasya santi doṣāḥ santi prayojanāni . doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena jñāpakena . katham yāni prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:5572: . na etāni santi . iha tāvat . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ iti . ñitkaraṇasāmarthyāt vibhāṣā ātmanepadam bhaviṣyati . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau iti . vakṣyati etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:5573: prakṛtānām ātmanepadānām etvam bhavati iti . yuvoḥ anākau iti . vakṣyati etat . siddham tu yuvoḥ ananunāsikatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5574: (P_2,4.54.1) KA_I,486.23-487.18 Ro_II,877-879 kim ayam kaśādiḥ āhośvit khayādiḥ . cakṣiṅaḥ kśāñkhyāñau . cakiṅaḥ khyāñ kaśādiḥ khayādiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5575: khaśādiḥ vā . atha vā khaśādiḥ bhaviṣyati . kena idānīm kaśādiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5576: . cartvena . atha khayādiḥ katham . asiddhe śasya yavacanam vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5577_0: asiddhe śasya vibhāṣā yatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam sauprakhye vuñvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5577_1: . sauprakhyaḥ iti yopadhalakṣaṇaḥ vuñvidhiḥ na bhavati . sauprakhyīyaḥ . vṛddhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5578_0: ākhyātaḥ iti niṣṭhānatvam na bhavati . ruvidhiḥ puṅkhyāne . puṅkhyānam iti ruvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5578_1: na bhavati . ṇatvam paryākhyāte . paryākhyānam iti ṇatvam na bhavati . sasthānatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5578_2: namaḥ khyātre . namaḥ khyātre iti sasthānatvam na bhavati.
GS24pmbhasuu:5579: (P_2,4.54.2) KA_I,487.19-488.6 Ro_II,879 varjane pratiṣedhaḥ . varjane pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . avasañcakṣyāḥ parisañcakṣyāḥ . asanayoḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:5580: asanayoḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nṛcakṣāḥ rakṣaḥ . vicakṣaṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5581: bahulam taṇi . bahulam taṇi iti vaktavyam . kim idam taṇi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5584: . gātra . gātram paśya . vicakṣaṇa . vicakṣaṇaḥ . ajira . ajire tiṣṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_0: upasaṅkhyānam . ghañapoḥ pratiṣedhe kyapaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_1: syāt . samajanam samajyā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . api iti eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_2: . katham . api iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_3: sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . apaḥ akātāt prabhṛti ā kyapaḥ pakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_4: saṃvītiḥ na sidhyati . evam tarhi na arthaḥ uapsaṅkhyānena na api ghañnapoḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5586_5: . idam asti . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ vā liṭi iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . ajeḥ vī bhavati vā vyavasthitavibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5587: iti . tena iha ca bhaviṣyati : pravetā pravetum pravītaḥ rathaḥ , saṃvītiḥ iti . iha ca na bhaviṣyati : samājaḥ , udājaḥ , samajaḥ , udajaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:5588_0: samajanam udajanam , samajyā iti . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5588_1: : prājitā iti . kim ca bhoḥ iṣyate etat rūpam . bāḍham iṣyate . evam hi kaḥ cit vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5588_2: āha . kaḥ asya rathasya pravetā iti . sūtaḥ āha . āyuṣman aham prājitā iti . vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5588_3: āha . apaśabdaḥ iti . sūtaḥ āha . prāpitjñaḥ devānām priyaḥ na tu iṣṭajñaḥ . iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5589: iti . vaiyākaraṇaḥ āha . āho khalu anena durutena bādhyāmahe iti . sūtaḥ āha . na khalu veñaḥ sūtaḥ . suvateḥ eva sūtaḥ . yadi suvateḥ kutsā
GS24pmbhasuu:5590: prayoktavyā . duḥsūtena iti vaktavyam . na tarhi idānīm idam vā yau iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . na iyam vibhāṣā . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5591: ādeśaḥ ayam vidhīyate . vā iti ayam ādeśaḥ bhavati ajeḥ yau parataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5594: yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam . aṇiñoḥ luki tadrājāt yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . baudhiḥ pitā baudhīḥ putraḥ audumbariḥ pitā
GS24pmbhasuu:5595: audumbariḥ putraḥ . aparaḥ āha : aṇiñoḥ luki kṣatriyagotramātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5596: yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti . jābāliḥ pitā jābāliḥ putraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5598: kartavyam iti . kim prayojanam . idam api siddham bhavati . bhāṇḍijaṅghiḥ pitā bhāṇḍijaṅghiḥ putraḥ kārṇakharakiḥ pitā kārṇakharakiḥ putraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5599: (P_2,4.62) KA_I,490.2-492.26 Ro_II,882-893 tadrājādīnām luki samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ . tadrājādīnām luki samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5600: priyaḥ āṅgaḥ eṣām te ime priyāṅgāḥ . priyaḥ vāṅgaḥ eṣām te ime priyavāṅgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5601: iti . kim ucyate samāsabahutve pratiṣedhaḥ iti yāvatā tena eva cet kṛtam bahutvam iti ucyate na ca atra tena eva kṛtam bahutvam . bhavati vai kim
GS24pmbhasuu:5602: cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam tena eva cet
GS24pmbhasuu:5603: bahutvam iti samāsabahutve vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . abahutve ca lugvacanam . abahutve ca luk vaktavyaḥ . atikrāntaḥ aṅgān atyaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_0: bahuvacane parataḥ yaḥ tadrājaḥ iti evam kṛtvā codyate . atha kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_1: na bahuvacane iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . bahuvacane iti ucyate na ca atra bahuvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_2: paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5604_3: pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5605: paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ daśagārgyaḥ iti . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ iti . iha ca luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5606: gargebhyaḥ āgatam gargarūpyam gargamayam iti . iha ca atrayaḥ iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu pratyayārthabahutve lugvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5607: siddham etat . katham . pratyayārthabahutve luk vaktavyaḥ . yadi pratyayārthabahutve luk ucyate astriyām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:5608: āṅgyaḥ striyaḥ , vāṅgyaḥ striyaḥ iti . yasya punaḥ bahuvacane parataḥ luk ucyate tasya īkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yasya api bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_0: parataḥ luk ucyate tena api astriyām iti vaktavyam āmbaṣṭhyāḥ striyaḥ sauvīryāḥ striyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_1: iti evamartham . atra api cāpā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavhadānam . ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_2: pūvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . dvandve abahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5609_3: lugvacanam . dvandve abahuṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . gargavatsavājāḥ iti . gotrasya bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5610: bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5611_0: bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5611_1: baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5611_2: ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5611_3: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:5612: baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ baidayoḥ vā bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_0: yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . añantam yat bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_1: yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_2: kāśyapāḥ iti . na vā sarveṣām dvandve bahvarthatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_3: . sarveṣām dvandve bahvarthatvāt . sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni . katham . yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_4: adhikaraṇavivakṣāyām dvandvaḥ bhavati . tataḥ ayam āha yasya bahuvacane parataḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:5613_5: . yadi sarvāṇi dvandve bahvarthāni aham api idam acodyam codye
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_0: . dvandve abahuṣu lugvacanam iti . mama api sarvatra bahuvacanam param bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_1: luke kṛte na prāpnoti . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_2: pratiṣedhaḥ . na lumatā āṅgasya iti vakṣyāmi . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5614_3: hi doṣaḥ syāt . pañcabhiḥ gārgībhiḥ krītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5615: paṭaḥ pañcagārgyaḥ daśagārgyaḥ iti . iṣtam eva etat saṅgṛhītam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5616: pañcagargaḥ daśagargaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . tathā idam aparam acodyam codye . gargarūpyam gargamayam . atra api bahuvacane iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5617: katham . samarthāt taddhitaḥ utpadyate . sāmarthyam ca subantena . tataḥ ayam āha yasya prtayayārthabahutve luk . yadi samarthāt taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5618: utpadyate aham api idam acodyam codye . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5619_0: bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk iti . katham . yasya api bahuvacane parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5619_1: luk tena api atra aluk vaktavyaḥ . tasya api hi atra bahuvacanam param bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5619_2: na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti evam aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_0: . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_1: bhavanti tathā idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_2: . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5620_3: bidāḥ atra api aluk prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5621: punaḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5622_0: aluk ucyate na ca tat samarthānām prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5622_1: artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharadvājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā
GS24pmbhasuu:5622_2: bhṛgvaṅgirasikā kutsakuśikā iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5622_3: tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . etasya eva dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5622_4: na anyasya iti . yat api ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5623: lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ iti . mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5624: añantam yatbahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5625_0: na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5625_1: . laukikasya tatra gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca etat laukikam gotram . yasya bahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5625_2: parataḥ luk samāsabahutve tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ tena eva cet kṛtam bahutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5625_3: iti vā vaktavyam . yasya pratyayārthabahutve luk tena astriyām iti vaktavyam . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5625_4: bahuvacane parataḥ luk tasya ayam adhikaḥ doṣaḥ atraḥ iti udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5626: prāpnoti . tasmāt pratyayārthabahutve luk iti eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ jyāyān . atha iha katham bhavitavyam . gārgī ca bātsyaḥ ca iti . yadi tāvat astri
GS24pmbhasuu:5627: vidhinā āśrīyate asti atra astrī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam lukā . atha strī pratiṣedhena āśrīyate asti atra strī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5628: kim punaḥ atra arthasatattvam . devāḥ etat jñātum arhanti . atha yaḥ lopyalopinām samāsaḥ tatra katham bhavitavyam . ubhayam hi dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5629: śaradvat śunakadarbhāt bhruguvat sāgrāyaṇeṣu na udāttasvaritodayam agārgyakāśyapagālavānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5630_0: (P_2,4.64) KA_I,493.2-8 Ro_II,893 yañādīnām ekadvayoḥ vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5630_1: . yañādīnām ekadvayoḥ vā tatpuruṣe ṣaṣṭhyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gārgyasya kulam
GS24pmbhasuu:5631: gārgyayoḥ kulam gārgyakulam gargakulam vā . baidasya kulam baidakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_0: bidakulam vā . baidayoḥ kulam baidakulam bidakulam vā . yañādīnām iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:5632_1: āṅgasya kulam āṅgakulam. āṅgayoḥ kulam āṅgakulam . ekadvayoḥ iti kimartham . gargāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:5633: gārgyasya samīpam upagārgyam . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ iti kim . śobhanagārgyaḥ paramagārgyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5634_0: (P_2,4.66) KA_I,493.10-16 Ro_II,893-894 kim ayam samuccayaḥ . prākṣu bharateṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5634_1: iti . āhosvit bharataviśeṣaṇam prāggrahaṇam . prāñcaḥ ye bharatāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5635: na hi anyatra bharatā santi . atha prāggrahaṇam bharataviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5636: prāggrahaṇam anarthakam . na hi aprāñcaḥ bharatāḥ santi . evam tarhi samuccayaḥ . nanu ca uktam bharatagrahaṇam anarthakam . na hi anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5637_0: bharatā santi iti . na anarthakam. jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5637_1: anyatra prāggrahaṇe bharatagrahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5639: (P_2,4.67) KA_I,493.18-20 Ro_II,894 gopavanādipratiṣedhaḥ prāk haritādibhyaḥ . gopavanādipratiṣedhaḥ prāk haritādibhyaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5641: (P_2,4.69) KA_I,494.2-6 Ro_II,894-895 kimartham advandve iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5642: dvandve mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . iṣyate eva dvandve :
GS24pmbhasuu:5643: bhraṣṭakakapiṣṭhalāḥ bhrāṣṭakikāpiṣthalayaḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:5644: advandve iti dvandvādhikāranivṛttyartham . advandve iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5645: dvandvādhikāranivṛttyartham . dvandvādhikāraḥ nivartate . tasmin nivṛtte aviśeṣeṇa dvandve ca advandve ca bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5646: (P_2,4.70) KA_I,494.8-495.2 Ro_II,895-896 āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ prakṛtinipātanam . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ prakṛtinipātanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5647: agastikauṇḍinac iti etau prakṛtyādeśau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . lukpratiṣedhe vṛddhyartham . lukpratiṣedhe vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5648: . pratyayāntanipātane hi vṛddhyabhāvaḥ . pratyayāntanipātane hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:5649_0: vṛddhyabhāvaḥ syāt . āgastīyāḥ kauṇḍinyāḥ iti . yadi prakrṭinipātanam kriyate kena
GS24pmbhasuu:5649_1: idānīm pratyayasya lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . adhikārāt pratyayalopaḥ . adhikārāt pratyayalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5650: kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ bahuṣu luk bhavati . tataḥ agastikuṇḍinac iti etau prakṛtyādeśau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5651: āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . evam api pratyayāntayoḥ eva prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5652_0: pratyayāntāt hi bhavān ṣaṣṭhīm uccārayati . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5652_1: . yathā hi paribhāṣitam pratyayasya lukślulupaḥ bhavanti iti pratyayasya eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5653: (P_2,4.74) KA_I,495.4-15 Ro_II,896-897 ūtaḥ aci .ūtaḥ aci iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sanīsrasaḥ danīdhvasaḥ iti . atha ūtaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5654_0: ucyamāne iha kasmāt na bhavati . yoyūyaḥ rorūvaḥ . vihitaviśeṣaṇam ūkārāntagrahaṇan
GS24pmbhasuu:5654_1: . ūkārāntāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iṣṭam eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5654_2: saṅgṛhītam . sanīsraṃsaḥ danīdhvaṃsaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5656: grahaṇam . gāpoḥ grahaṇe iṇpibatyoḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . iṇaḥ yaḥ gāśabdaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:5722: . ṭilope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5723_0: antaraṅgatvāt ḍāraurasaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt ḍāraurassu kṛteṣu anudāttatvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:5723_1: ṭilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ṭilopena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi svare
GS24pmbhasuu:5724: svare vipratiṣedhaḥ . idam iha sampradhāryam . anudāttatvam kriyatām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt anudāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5726_0: tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yat pit vacanam . yat apit vacanam tatra na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5726_1: . tatra api siddham . katham idam adya lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam pratyayasvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5726_2: apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate .

GS24pmbhasuu:5727_1: utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat kadā cit pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādam lasārvadhātukanudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5728: tatra anudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau
GS24pmbhasuu:5729: avidyamānodāttatve anudātte udāttaḥ lupyate . pratyayasvarāpavādaḥ lasārvadhātukānudāttam . tena tatra na prasaktaḥ pratyayasvaraḥ kadā cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:5730: pratyayasvaraḥ tu tāseḥ vṛttisanniyogaśiṣṭaḥ . tena ca api asau udāttaḥ lopsyate . tathā na doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:5735_1: . kva anyatra . loke . tat yathā . bahuṣu āsīneṣu kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . katamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5735_2: devadattaḥ . kataraḥ yajñadattaḥ iti . saḥ tasmai ācaṣṭe . yaḥ aśve yaḥ pīṭhe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5735_3: ukte nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt adhyavasyati ayam devadattaḥ ayam yajñdatta
GS24pmbhasuu:5735_4: iti . na idānīm aśvasya pīṭhasya vā devadattaḥ iti sañjñā bhavati . kim punaḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:5735_5: kaḥ vā nimittī . nirjñātaḥ arthaḥ nimittam anirjñātārthaḥ nimittī . iha ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5736: dhātūpadeśe prātipadikopadeśe ca . te nirjñātāḥ nimittatvena upādīyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:5737: pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt vā siddham . atha vā pradhāne kāryasampratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . kim ca pradhānam . pratyayaḥ . tat yathā . bahuṣu yātsu kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5738: cit kam cit pṛcchati . kaḥ yāti iti . saḥ āha rājā iti . rājā iti ukte
GS24pmbhasuu:5739: pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt yaḥ pṛcchati yaḥ ca ācaṣṭe ubhayoḥ sampratyayaḥ bhavati . kiṅkṛtam punaḥ prādhānyam . arthakṛtam . yathā punaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:5740: arthakṛtam prādhānyam śabdasya idānīm kiṅkṛtam prādhānyam . śabdasya apūrvopadeśaḥ prādhānyam . yasya apūrvopadeśaḥ saḥ pradhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5741_0: prakṛtyupapadopādhayaḥ ca upadiṣṭāḥ . kva . dhātūpadeśe prātipadikopadeśe ca . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5741_1: eva nimittasya nimittikāryārthatvāt atha api pradhāne kāryasampratyayāt prakṛtyupapadopādhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5741_2: na bhavati vikārāgamānām tu prāpnoti . hanaḥ ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . eteṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:5742: prādhānyam . nimittinaḥ ca ete . vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_0: vikārāgameṣu ca paravijñānāt pratyayasañjñā na bhaviṣyati . pratyayaḥ paraḥ bahvati
GS24pmbhasuu:5743_1: iti ucyate . na ca vikārāgamāḥ pare sambhavanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samāne apūrvopadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:5744: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ca tadyuktatvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣtam vikārāgamayuktam pañcamīnirdṣṭāt ca pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:5745: pratyayavidhiḥ tu na upapapdyate . kva . yatra vikārāgamāḥ vidhīyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:5746: hanaḥ ta ca . tarpujatunoḥ ṣuk . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5747: vikārāgamayuktatvāt apañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt ca . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5748: siddham . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha tāvat hanaḥ te iti . dhātoḥ iti vartate. iha trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5749: prātipadikāt iti vartate . yadi evam hanaḥ ta ca dhātoḥ kyap bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5750: dhātumātrāt kyap prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:5751: dhātumātrāt kyap bhavati iti yat ayam etistuśasvṛdṛjuṣaḥ kyap iti parigaṇanam karoti . atha vā hantim eva atra dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5752: abhisambhantsyāmaḥ . hanaḥ taḥ bhavati . dhātoḥ kyap bhavati . kasmāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5753: hanteḥ iti . arthāśrayatvāt vā . atha vā arthāśrayaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ . yaḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati saḥ pratyayaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5754: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . pratyayaḥ iti mahatī sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_0: tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_1: pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ . yadi pratyāyayiti iti pratyayaḥ avikādīnām pratyayasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:5755_2: na prāpnoti . na hi te kim cit pratyāyayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5756: evam tarhi pratyāyyate pratyayaḥ iti . evam api sanādīnām na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5757_0: evam tari ubhayasādhanaḥ ayam kartṛsādhanaḥ karmasādhanaḥ ca . evam api kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5757_1: samāne apūrvopadeśe trāpuṣam jātuṣam iti atra akāraḥ tam artham sampratyāyayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:5757_2: punaḥ ṣakāraḥ iti . anyatra api akāreṇa tasya arthasya vacanāt manyāmahe akāraḥ tam
GS24pmbhasuu:5757_3: artham sampratyāyayatina ṣakāraḥ iti . kva anyatra . bilvādibhyaḥ aṇ . bailvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5758_0: (P_3,1.2) KA_II,3.15-6.2 Ro_III,12-19 kimartham idam ucyate . paraḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5758_1: pūrvaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati pūrvam āha tam : vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:5758_2: supaḥ bahuc purastāt tu iti . madhye tarhi mā
GS24pmbhasuu:5759: bhūt iti . madhye api yam icchati āha tam : avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_0: ṭeḥ iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa vacanam paraḥ eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_1: iti nā arthaḥ paravacanena . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām deśaḥ niyamyate te eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_2: niyatadeśāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ idānīm aniyatadeśaḥ saḥ kadā cit pūrvaḥ kadā cit paraḥ kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_3: cit madhye syāt . tat yathā mātuḥ vatsaḥ kadā cit agrataḥ kadā cit pṛṣṭhataḥ kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_4: cit pārśvataḥ bhavati . paraḥ eva yathā syāt iti evamartham paravacanam . paravacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5760_5: anarthakam pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya . paragrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5761: pañcamīnirdiṣṭatvāt parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . sataḥ tatra parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5762: kāryam ucyate . iha idānīm kasya sataḥ parasya kāryam bhavitum arhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5763: iha api sataḥ eva. katham . paratvam svābhāvikam . atha vācanike paratve
GS24pmbhasuu:5764: sati arthaḥ syāt paragrahaṇena . vācanike ca na arthaḥ . etat hi tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5765_0: parasya kāryam yat asau paraḥ syāt . atha vā yat asya parasya sataḥ sañjñā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5765_1: yatra tarhi pañcamī na asti tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva ca pañcamī na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5765_2: . yatra vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante . kva ca vikārāgamāḥ śiṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5766: . hanaḥ ta ca . trapujatunoḥ ṣuk iti . vikārāgameṣu ca uktam . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5767: pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ tu . tasmāt tatra pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5768: atyantāparadṛṣṭānām vā parabhūtalopārtham . atyantāparadṛṣṭānām tarhi parabhūtalopārtham paragrahaṇam kartavyam . ye ete atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5769_0: kvibādayaḥ lupyante teṣām parabhūtānām lopaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5769_1: kim punaḥ atyantāparadṛṣṭānām parabhūtalopavacane prayojanam . kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5769_2: yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5770: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ parabhūtāḥ lupyante iti yat ayam teṣu kādīn anubandhān āsajati . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5771: anubandhāsañjane etat prayojanam kiti ṇiti iti kāryāṇi yathā syuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_0: yadi ca atra atyantāparadṛṣṭāḥ parabhūtāḥ lupyantetataḥ anubandhāsañjanam arthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_1: bhavati . prayoganiyamārtham vā . prayoganiyamārtham tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_2: . parabhūtānām prayogaḥ yathā syāt . aparabhūtānām mā bhūt iti . asti punaḥ kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_3: aniṣṭam yadarthaḥ niyamaḥ syāt . asti iti āha . prakṛteḥ arthābhidhāne pratyayādarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_4: . prakṛteḥ arthābhidhāne apratyayikāḥ dṛśyante . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_5: babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . bābhravyaḥ māṇḍavyaḥ lāmakāyanaḥ iti prayoktavye babhruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5772_6: maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti prayujyate . dvayasajādīnām ca kevaladṛṣṭatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5773: . dvayasajādīnām ca kevalānām prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . dvayasajādayaḥ vai vṛttijasadṛśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5774_0: avṛttijāḥ yathā bahuḥ tathā . vāvacane ca anutpattyartham . vāvacane ca anutpattyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5774_1: paragrahaṇam kartavyam . vā vacanena anutpattiḥ yathā syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:5775_0: labhyā . kriyamāṇe paragrahaṇe vāvacanena vā paraḥ iti etat abhisambadhyate . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:5775_1: punaḥ paragrahaṇe vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_0: vāvacane ca uktam . kim uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_1: prayoganiyamārtham eva tarhi paragrahaṇam kartavyam . atha etasmin prayoganiyame
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_2: sati kim ayam pratyayahiyamaḥ . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ aprakṛtiparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5776_3: na iti . āhosvit prakṛtiniyamaḥ pratyayaparā eva prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā apratyayā na
GS24pmbhasuu:5777: viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame prkṛtiniyamābhāvaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame sati prkṛtiniyamaḥ na prāpnoti . apratyayikāyāḥ prakṛteḥ prayogaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5778_0: . kva saḥ devadattaḥ kva saḥ yajñdattaḥ babhruḥ maṇḍuḥ lamakaḥ iti . astu tarhi prakṛtiniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5778_1: . prakṛtiniyame pratyayāniyamaḥ . prakṛtiniyame sati pratyayasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5778_2: . kim asya dvayasam . kim asya mātram . kā adya tithī iti . aprakṛtikasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5778_3: prayogaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat . katham . ubhayaniyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5778_4: . ubhayaniyamaḥ ayam . prakṛtiparaḥ eva pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ pratyayaparā eva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5779: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5780: paragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . antareṇa api paragrahaṇam syāt ayam paraḥ . paraḥ eva yathā syāt iti evamartham paragrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5782: ādyudāttaḥ yathā syāt . antodāttaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5783: yam icchati antodāttam karoti tatra cakāram anubandham āha ca citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ iti . madhyodāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . madyodāttam yam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:5784_0: tatra repham anubandham karoti āha ca upottamam riti iti . anudāttaḥ tarhi mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:5784_1: iti . anudāttam api yam icchati tatra pakāram anubandham karoti āha ca anudāttau
GS24pmbhasuu:5784_2: suppitau iti . svaritaḥ tarhi mā bhūt iti . svaritam api yam icchati karoti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5784_3: takāram anubandham āha ca tit svaritam iti . yaḥ idānīm ataḥ anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5784_4: saḥ antareṇa api vacanam ādyudāttaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5785_0: bhaviṣyati iti na arthaḥ ādyudāttavacanena . evam api yeṣām eva pratyayānām svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5785_1: niyamyate te eva niyatasvarāḥ syuḥ . yaḥ idānīm aniyatasvaraḥ saḥ kadā cit ādyudāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5785_2: kadā cit antodāttaḥ kadā cit madhyodāttaḥ kadā cit anudāttaḥ kacā cit svaritaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5785_3: . ādyudāttaḥ eva yathā syāt iti evam artham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5786_1: ādyudāttatvam ucyate anudāttatvam ca na yatra eva anyaḥ svaraḥ tatra eva ayam ucyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:5786_2: . ñniti ādiḥ nityam pratyayasya ca . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam suppitau
GS24pmbhasuu:5787_0: arthaḥ dviḥ ādyudāttagrahaṇam dviḥ ca anudāttagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5787_1: anuvartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : ādyudāttatvasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyoge prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5789: prayojanam yasya sañjñākaraṇam tasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . asanniyoge hi yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam tadantasya ca anudāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_0: akriyamāṇe hi pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_1: grahaṇam bhavati iti tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam prasajyeta tadantasya ca anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_2: . atha kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve anudāttatve ca kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_3: eva tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam na bhavati tadantasya ca anudāttatvam . utpannaḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_4: pratyayāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na utpadyamānaḥ . tat yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_5: ghaṭāśrayāṇām kāryāṇām nimittam bhavati na kriyamāṇaḥ . na vā prakṛteḥ ādyudāttavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_6: jñāpakam tadādeḥ agrahaṇasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam ñniti ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5790_7: nityam iti prakṛteḥ ādyudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na tadādeḥ ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5791_0: prāpnoti . prakṛtisvarasya ca vidhānasāmarthyāt pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . yat ayam dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5791_1: antaḥ prātipadikasya antaḥ iti prakṛteḥ antodāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5791_2: na tadantasya anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yatra hi anudāttaḥpratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_0: ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_1: yathā syuḥ iti . na vā āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . na vā etat api prayojanam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_2: . kim kāraṇam . āgamasya anudāttavacanāt . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_3: . ke punaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttatvam prayojayanti . iṭ . lavitā . iṭ tāvat na prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5793_4: . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādyudāttatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5794: paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityam ādyudāttatvam . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:5795: prāpnoti . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api ādyudāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:5796: prāpnoti . anityaḥ iṭ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte ādyudāttatve prapnoti anyathāsvarasya akṛte . svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5797: . ādyudāttatvam api anityam . anyasya kṛte iṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte .
GS24pmbhasuu:5798: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . antaraṅgam tarhi ādyudāttatvam . kā antaraṅgatā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5799: utpattisanniyogena ādyudāttatvam ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya iḍāgamaḥ . ādyudāttatvam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:5800: antaraṅgam yāvatā pratyaye āśrīyamāṇe prakṛtiḥ api āśritā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5801: antaraṅgam eva ādyudāttatvam . katham . idānīm eva hi uktam na pratyayasvaravidhau tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . sīyuṭ tarhi prayojayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5802: avacane hi sīyuḍādeḥ ādyudāttatvam . akriyamāṇe hi āgamānudāttatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5803_0: kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve sīyuḍādeḥ liṅaḥ ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5803_1: prasajyeta . laviṣīya paviṣīya . tat tarhi vaktavyam āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5804: anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam vakṣyati etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5805: udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum : yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5806: apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5807: iti . śakyam idam labdhum . yadi eva vacanāt atha api jñāpakāt āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti . āgamaiḥ tu vyavahitatvāt ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5808: āgamāḥ avidyamānavat bhavanti iti vakṣyāmi . yadi āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5809: bhavanti iti ucyate lavitā avādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:5810: . evam api lavitā udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_0: ṣāṣṭhike svare iti vakṣyāmi . evam api śikṣitaḥ niṣṭhā ca dvyac anāt it eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_1: prāpnoti . pratyayasvaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . tat tarhi vaktavyam avidyamānavat bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_2: iti . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati āgamāḥ avidyamānavat bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_3: yat ayam yāsuṭ parasamaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit ca iti āha . na etat asti jñāpakam . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_4: etat . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_5: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena
GS24pmbhasuu:5811_6: siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:5812_0: ādyudāttasya tarhi lopārtham pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatvam ucyate . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:5812_1: ādyudāttatve kṛte udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati : sraughnī māthurī . atra hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5812_2: paratvāt lopaḥ pratyaysvaram bādheta . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5812_3: . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ lopaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5813_0: svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . avaśyam ca eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:5813_1: hi ñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ . anāśrīyamāṇāyām asyām paribhāṣāyām kriyamāṇe api pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:5813_2: ādyudāttatveñinnitkitsu atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt . autsī kaṃsikī ātreyī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5814: atra hi paratvāt lopaḥ ñinnitkitsvarān bādheta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5815_0: ñinnitkitsvarāḥ pratyaysvarāpavādāḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ bhiniviśate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5815_1: pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5815_2: utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . na tāvat atra kadā cit pratyayādyudāttatvam bhavati . apavādān
GS24pmbhasuu:5815_3: ñinnitkitsvarān pratīkṣate kaṃsikyām bhūyān apahāraḥ . anyasya atra udāttatvam anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5815_4: lopaḥ . ādeḥ udāttatvam antyasya lopaḥ . idam tarhi ātreyī iti . atra hi paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5815_5: lopaḥ kitsvaram bādheta . tasmāt eṣā paribhāṣā āśrayitavyā . etasyām ca satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5817: (P_3,1.3.3) KA_II,9.15-10.20 Ro_III,27-30 pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ . pratyayādyudāttatvāt dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5818: . pratyayādyudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttā prakṛtiḥ . samatvam simatvam . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ yatra anudāttaḥ pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5819_0: pacati paṭhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gopāyati dhapāyati . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5819_1: bhavati vipratiṣedhena. pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi . pitsvarāt titsvaraḥ ṭāpi bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5819_2: vipratiṣedhena . pitsvarasya avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . titsvarasya avakāśaḥ . kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:5820: kāryā hāryā . titsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5821: . citsvaraḥ cāpi pitsvarāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5822: calanaḥ copanaḥ . pitsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āmbaṣṭhyā sauvīryā . citsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā ādyutāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5823: pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5824: ādyutāttasya pratyayasañjñāsanniyogāt . pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte satiśiṣṭatvāt dhātusvaraḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:5825_0: ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya titsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . ṭāpi svaritenaikādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5825_1: . ṭāpi svaritena ekādeśaḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . svaritatvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:5826_0: paratvāt svaritatvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5826_1: . . svaritatvam api nityam . kṛte api ekādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam svaritatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5826_2: . anyasya kṛte ekādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5826_3: anityaḥ bhavati . ekādeśaḥ api anityaḥ . anyathāsvarasya kṛte svaritatve prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5826_4: anyathāsvarasya akṛte svarabhinnasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5826_5: tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya svaritatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5827_0: svaritatvam api antaraṅgam . katham . vakṣyati etat . padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5827_1: iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ paratvāt svaritatvam . svaritatve kṛte āntaryataḥ svaridānudāttayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5828: ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ pitsvarasya citsvarasya ca . kim kāraṇam . cāpi citkaraṇāt . cāpi citkaraṇasāmarthyāt antodāttatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5829_0: (P_3,1.5) KA_II,10.22-11.9 Ro_III,30-31 gupādiṣu anubandhakaraṇam kimartham . gupādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:5829_1: anubandhakaraṇam ātmanepadārtham . gupādiṣu anubandhāḥ kriyante ātmanepadam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:5830: ātmanepadam na eva prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . sanā vyavahitatvāt . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . pūrvavat sanaḥ iti ucyate . na ce etebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5831_0: prāk sanaḥ ātmanepadam na api parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . evam tarhi anubandhakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5831_1: bhaviṣyati . atha vā avayave kṛtam liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhaviṣyati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:5831_2: yathā goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati . yadi avayave kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:5831_3: liṅgam samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati jugupsayati mīmāṃsayati iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5831_4: . avayave kṛtam liṅgam kasya samudāyasya viśeṣakam bhavati . yam samudāyam yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5832: avayavaḥ na vyabhicarati . sanam ca na vhabhicarati . ṇicam punaḥ vyabhicarati . tat yathā tat yathā goḥ sakthani karṇe vā kṛtam liṅgam goḥ viśeṣakam bhavati na gomaṇḍalasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:5833: (P_3,1.6) KA_II,11.11-25 Ro_III,31-32 abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5834_0: mīmāṃsate . nanu ce ittve kṛte dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ utpattisanniyogena
GS24pmbhasuu:5834_1: dīrghatvam ucyamānam ittvam pratīkṣate . atha katham abhyāsam pratīkṣate . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5835: pratīkṣate . na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_0: abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādāḥ utsargān na bādhante iti evam dīrghatvam ucyamānam ittvam
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_1: na bādhiṣyate . atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ ī ca abhyāsasya iti vakṣyāmi . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:5836_2: halādiśeṣāpavādaḥ īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ī ca acaḥ iti vakṣyāmi . atha vā mānbadhadānśanbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5837: abhyāsasya iti vakṣyāmi . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam abhyāsadīrghatve avarṇasya dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5838: parihṛtam etat na vā abhyāsavikāreṣu apavādasya utsargābādhakatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5839: atha vā na evam vijñāyate dīrghaḥ ca abhyāsasya iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:5840: dīrghaḥ ca ābhyāsasya iti . kim idam ābhyāsasya iti . abhyāsavikāraḥ ābhyāsaḥ tasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5842: prakartum aicchat prācikīrṣat . sopasargāt mā bhūt . karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5843: anarthakam . karmaṇaḥ samānakartṛkāt icchāyām vā sambhavati iti eva dhātoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . soparsargam vai karma . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5844: sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:5845: sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ . anupasargam hi karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:5846: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam anupasargam karma iti . sopasargasya hi karmatve dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5847: sopasargam karma iti kriyamāṇe api tasya dhātugrahaṇe sanaḥ avidhiḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5848: kim kāraṇam . akarmatvāt . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:5849: bhūt . subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt ca sanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5850_0: aprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kyajādīnām apavādatvāt . subantāt kyajādayaḥ vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5850_1: . te apavādatvāt bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anabhidhānāt vā . atha vā anabhidhānāt subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5850_2: utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hi subantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5851: utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5852_0: na bhaviṣyati . iyam tāvat agatikā gatiḥ yat ucyate anabhidhānāt iti . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5852_1: subantāt ca aprasaṅgaḥ kyajādīnām apavādatvāt iti . bhavet kasmāt cit aprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5852_2: syāt ātmecchāyām . parecchāyām tu prāpnoti : rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5852_3: idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5852_4: . na ca subantasya samānaḥ kartā asti . evam api bhavet kasmāt cit aprasaṅgaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5853: iha tu prāpnoti : āsitum icchati śayitum icchati . icchāyām arthe san
GS24pmbhasuu:5854_0: vidhīyate icchārtheṣu ca tumun . tatra tumunā uktatatvāt tasya arthasya san na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5854_1: . evam api iha prāpnoti : āsanam icchati śayanam icchati iti . iha yaḥ viśeṣaḥ upādhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5854_2: vā upādīyate dyotye tasmin tena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5855_0: . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ gamyate āsitum icchati śayitum icchati svayam tām kriyām kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:5855_1: icchati iti na asau iha gamyate āsanam icchati śayanam icchati iti . anyasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:5855_2: āsanam icchati iti eṣaḥ api arthaḥ gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5856: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate adyotye tasmin tena
GS24pmbhasuu:5857_0: bhavitavyam iti kriyamāṇe api tasya dhātugrahaṇe iha prasajyeta : saṅgatam icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:5857_1: devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam ca icchābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5857_2: pratyayavidhānāt . karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . icchābhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:5857_3: pratyayavidhānāt . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate . akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5857_4: vā anabhidhānam . icchāyām abhidheyāyām san vidhīyate . na ca akarmaṇaḥ asamānakartṛkāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5857_5: vā utpadyamānena sanā icchāyā abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5858: na bhaviṣyati . aṅgaparimāṇārtham tu . aṅgaparimāṇārtham tarhi anyatarat
GS24pmbhasuu:5859: kartavyam karmagrahaṇam dhātugrahaṇam vā . aṅgaparimāṇam jñāsyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5860: kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . dhātugrahaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . aṅgaparimāṇam ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5861: vijñātam bhavati . api ca dhātoḥ vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5862: ārdhadhātukasañjñaḥ bhavati iti sanaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5863_0: yat ca api etat uktam karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam sopasargam karma
GS24pmbhasuu:5863_1: iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam karma sopasargasya hi karmatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5863_2: dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5864: svapakṣaḥ anena varṇitaḥ . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam kim nyāyyam karma iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5865_0: etat ca atra yuktam yat sopasargam karma syāt . nanu ca uktam sopasargasya hi karmatve
GS24pmbhasuu:5865_1: dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . karmaṇaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:5865_2: eṣā dhātusamānādhikaraṇā pañcamī . karmaṇaḥ dhātoḥ iti . kim tarhi . avayavayogā
GS24pmbhasuu:5865_3: eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . karmaṇaḥ yaḥ dhātuḥ avayavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5866: yadi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhīkevalāt utpattiḥ na prāpnoti . cikīrṣati jihīrṣati iti . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ dhātuḥ avayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5867: bhavati . kāmam tarhi anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ . mahāntam putram icchati . karmaṇaḥ yat subantam avayayaḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5868_0: asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5868_1: . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ . vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5868_2: . tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ . iha hi dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ avṛttipakṣaḥ ca . svabhāvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5869: pratyayaḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye nitye pratyaye prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:5870: vāvacanena kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ . na ca sañjñāyāḥ bhāvābhāvau iṣyete . tasmāt na arthaḥ vāvacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5871: (P_3,1.7.2) KA_II,14.8-15.4 Ro_III,39-42 tumunantāt vā tasya ca lugvacanam . tumunantāt vā san vaktavyaḥ tasya ca tumunaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5872_0: kartum icchati cikīrṣati . liṅuttamāt vā . liṅuttamāt vā san vaktavyaḥ tasya ca liṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5872_1: luk vaktavyaḥ . kuryām iti icchati cikīrṣati . āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5873: aśmā luluṭhiṣate . kūlam pipatiṣati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5874: evam manyate . cetanāvataḥ etat bhavati icchā iti . kūlam ca acetanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5875: acetanagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . āśaṅkāyām iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5876: . śvā mumūrṣati . na vā tulyakāraṇatvāt icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5877: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tulyakāraṇatvāt . tulyam hi kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5878_0: cetanāvati devadatte kūle ca acetane . kim kāraṇam . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5878_1: . icchayāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ bhavati . yaḥ api asu kaṭam cikīrṣuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5878_2: na asau āghoṣayati . kaṭam kariṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5879: kim tarhi . sannaddham rajjukīlakpūlapāṇim dṛṣṭvā tataḥ icchā gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5880_0: kūlasya api pipatiṣataḥ loṣṭāḥ śīryante bhidā jāyante deśāt deśāntaram upasaṅkrāmati
GS24pmbhasuu:5880_1: . śvānaḥ khalu api mumūrṣavaḥ ekāntaśīlāḥ śūnākṣāḥ ca bhavanti . upamānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:5881: luluṭhiṣate iva luluṭhiṣate . pipatiṣati iva pipatiṣati . na tiṅantena upamānam asti . evam tarhi icchā iva icchā . sarvasya vā cetanāvattvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5882_0: atha vā sarvam cetanāvat . evam hi āha . kaṃsakāḥ sarpanti . śirīṣaḥ adhaḥ svapiti
GS24pmbhasuu:5882_1: . suvarcalā ādityam anu paryeti . āskanda kapilaka iti ukte tṛṇam āskandati . ayaskāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:5882_2: ayaḥ saṅkrāmati . ṛṣiḥ paṭhati śrṇota grāvāṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5883: (P_3,1.7.3) KA_II,15. 5-23 Ro_III,42-45 ime iṣavaḥ bahavaḥ paṭhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:5884_0: tatra na jñāyate kasya ayam arthe san vidhīyate iti . iṣeḥ chatvabhāvinaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5884_1: evam kartum anvicchati kartum anveṣaṇā atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi yasya striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5884_2: icchā iti etat rūpam nipātyate . kasya ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:5885_0: nipātyate . kāntikarmaṇaḥ . atha iha grāmam gantum icchati iti kasya kim karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:5885_1: iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . yadi evam grāmam gantum icchati grāmāya gantum icchati iti gatyarthakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:5885_2: dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ gamiḥ karma .
GS24pmbhasuu:5885_3: evam api iṣyate grāmaḥ gantum iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5886: parasādhane utpadyamānena lena grāmasya abhidhānam na prāpnoti . evam tarhi gameḥ grāmaḥ karma iṣeḥ ubhe karmaṇī . atha sanantāt sanā
GS24pmbhasuu:5887: bhavitavyam : cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati iti . na bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5888: kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya aparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5889: prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : eṣitum icchati eṣiṣiṣati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_0: ekasya atra iṣeḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_1: sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . iha api tarhi ekasya iṣeḥ karotiviṣiṣṭaḥ iṣiḥ sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_2: vartamānakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . aparasya bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_3: yena eva khalu api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati cikīrṣitum icchati jihīrṣitum icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:5890_4: iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt sanantāt sanaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5891: bruvatā iṣisanaḥ iti vaktavyam . bhavati hi jugupsiṣate mīmāṃsiṣate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5892: śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ matubarthikaḥ sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5895_0: svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5895_1: prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena . pratyayasvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5895_2: eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . asya cvau kyaci ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5895_3: iti . kye ca iti ucyamāne api kākaḥ śyenāyate atra api prasayjeta . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5895_4: . tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_0: arthaḥ . naḥ kye iti . atha ātmangrahaṇam kimartham . ātmecchāyām yathā syāt . parecchāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_1: mā bhūt iti . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . kriyamāṇe api ātmagrahaṇe parecchāyām prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_2: . kim kāraṇam . ātmanaḥ iti iyam kartari ṣaṣṭhī . icchā iti akāraḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:5897_3: eva ātmanaḥ icchā atha api parasya ātmecchā eva asau bhavati . na ātmagrahaṇena icchā
GS24pmbhasuu:5898: . kim tarhi . subantam abhisambadhyate . ātmanaḥ yat subantam iti . yadi ātmagrahaṇam kriyate chandasi parecchāyām na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5899: aghāyavaḥ vidan . tasmāt na arthaḥ ātmagrahaṇena . iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:5900: rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . chandasi api tarhi na prāpnoti . ma tvā vṛkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5901: aghāyavaḥ vidan . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . katham punaḥ antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5902: padasya prayogam parecchā gamyate . te ca eva vṛkāḥ evamātmakaḥ hiṃsrāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_0: kaḥ ca ātmanaḥ agham eṣitum arhati . ataḥ antareṇa api atra tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_1: parecchā gamyate . yathā eva tarhi chandasi aghaśabdāt parecchāyām khyac bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5903_2: evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . agham icchati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_0: tasmāt ātmagrahaṇam kartavyam . chandasi katham . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_1: chandasi aghaśabdāt parecchāyām kyac iti yat ayam aśvāghasyāt iti kyaci pratkṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_2: ītvabādhanārtham ākāram śāsti . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ yatha
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_3: syāt . prātipadikāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_4: subantāt utpattau satyām prātipadikāt vā ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_5: padasañjñā siddhā bhavati . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_6: nanu ca prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā katham . ārabhyate naḥ kye
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_7: iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam subantāt utpattau satyām niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5904_8: utpattau satyām vidhyartham bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5905_0: syāt . dhātoḥ mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ san vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5905_1: saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca san
GS24pmbhasuu:5905_2: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . parecchā . na parecchāyām sanā
GS24pmbhasuu:5906: bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . samānakartṛkāt iti ucyate . yāvat ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:5907: ātmagrahaṇam tāvat tatra samānakartṛkagrahaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5908_0: subantāt utpattiḥ yatha syāt . vākyāt māt bhūt iti . mahāntam putram icchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5908_1: . na vā bhavati mahāputrīyati iti . bhavati yadā etat vākyam bhavati . mahān putraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5909: yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam putram icchati iti tadā na bhavitavyam tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5911: subgrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . subantam hi etat vākyam . na etat subantam . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5912: atha yat atra subantam tasmāt utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_0: samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena . samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_1: vṛttiḥ na bhavati . kva sarvatra . samāsavidhau pratyayavidhau . samāsavidhau tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_2: . ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ . mahat kaṣṭam śritaḥ iti . pratyayavidhau . ṛddhasya upagoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_3: apatyam . mahāntam putram icchati . iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samānādhikaraṇānām sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_4: vṛttiḥ na bhavati . ayogāt ekena . na hi ekena padena yogaḥ bhavati . iha tāvat ṛddhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_5: rājñaḥ puruṣaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhyantena subantena sāmarthye sati samāsaḥ vidhīyate . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_6: ca atra ṣaṣthyantam na tasya subantena sāmarthyam . yasya ca sāmarthyam na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_7: . vākyam tat . ṛddhasya upagoḥ apatyam iti ca . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt apatyena yoge pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5913_8: vidhīyate . yat ca atra ṣaṣṭḥīsamartham na tasya apatatyena yogaḥ yasya ca aptatyena
GS24pmbhasuu:5914: na tat ṣaṣṭhyantam . vākyam tat . samānādhikaraṇānām iti ucyate . atha vyadhikaraṇānām katham . rājñaḥ putram icchati iti . evam tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5915: paṭhitavyam . saviśeṣaṇānām sarvatra avṛttiḥ ayogāt ekena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5916: dvitīyānupapattiḥ tu . dvitīyā tu na upapadyate . mahāntam putram icchati
GS24pmbhasuu:5917: iti . kim kāraṇam . na putraḥ iṣikarma . yadi putraḥ na iṣikarma na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_0: avaśyam dvitīyā eva . kim tarhi . sarvāḥ dvitīyādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . mahatā putreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_1: kṛtam . mahate putrāya dehi . mahaḥ putrāt ānaya . mahataḥ putrasya svam . mahati
GS24pmbhasuu:5918_2: putre nidhehi . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum na
GS24pmbhasuu:5919_0: putraḥ iṣikarma iti . putra eva iṣikarma . tatsāmānādhikaraṇyāt dvitīyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5919_1: . vṛttiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5919_2: na prayujyate iti vaktavyam . yadi saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5919_3: na prayujyate iti ucyate muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti atra vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . amuṇḍādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5919_4: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam saviśeṣaṇānām vṛttiḥ na vṛttasya vā viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5919_5: na prayujyate amuṇḍādīnām iti . na vaktavyam . vṛttiḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:5920: bhavati mahāntam putram icchati iti . agamakatvāt . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:5921_0: mahāntam putram icchati iti na asau jātu cit pratyayāntena gamyate mahāntam putrīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5921_1: iti . etasmāt hetoḥ brūmaḥ agamakatvāt iti . na brūmaḥ apaśabdaḥ syāt iti . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:5921_2: ca gamakatvam bhavati tatra vṛttiḥ . tat yathā muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5922_0: (P_3,1.8.3) KA_II,18.16-19.17 Ro_III,50-55 atha asya kyajantasya kāni sādhanāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5922_1: . bhāvaḥ kartā ca . atha karma . na asti karma . nanu ca ayam iṣiḥ sakarmakaḥ yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5922_2: ayam arthe kyac vidhīyate . abhihitam tat karma antarbhūtam dhātvarthaḥ sampannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5922_3: . na ca idānīm anyat karma asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5923: yena sakarmakaḥ syāt . katham tarhi ayam sakarmakaḥ bhavati aputram putram iva ācarati putrīyati māṇavakam iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . dve hi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:5924: karmaṇī upamānakarma upameyakarma ca . upamānakarma antarbhūtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5925_0: upameyena karmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti atra dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:5925_1: kartārau upamānakartā ca upameyakartā ca. upamānakartā antarbhūtaḥ . upemeyakartrā
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_0: sakarmakaḥ bhavati . muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atra api dve karmaṇī sāmānyakarma
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_1: viśeṣakarma ca . sāmānyakarma antarbhūtam . viśeṣakarmaṇā sakarmakaḥ bhavati . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_2: ca vṛttyā eva atra na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_3: . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na atra ubhau karotiyuktau muṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_4: māṇavakaḥ ca . na hi māṇavakaḥ kriyate . yadā ca ubhau karotiyuktau bhavataḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_5: tadā vṛttiḥ . tat yathā balīvardam karoti muṇḍam ca enam karoti iti . kāmam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:5926_6: anena eva hetunā kyac api kartavyaḥ māṇavakam muṇḍam icchati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5927: na ubhau iṣiyuktau iti . na kartavyaḥ . ubhau atra iṣiyuktau muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ ca . katham . na hi asau mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5928: māṇavakastham asau mauṇḍyam icchati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti muṇḍayati
GS24pmbhasuu:5929: māṇavakam iti . atra api hi ubhau karotiyukta muṇḍaḥ māṇavakaḥ ca . na hi asau mauṇḍyamātreṇa santoṣam karoti . māṇavakastham asu mauṇḍyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5930_0: nirvartayati . evam tarhi muṇḍādayaḥ guaṇavacanāḥ . guṇavacanāḥ ca sāpekṣāḥ . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5930_1: sāpekṣāṇām api vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva muṇḍādayaḥ . na na eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:5930_2: arthāḥ ādiśyante kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . atha vā na idam ubhayam yugapat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:5930_3: vākyam ca pratyayaḥ ca . yadā vākyam na
GS24pmbhasuu:5931: tadā pratyayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ sāmānyena tadā vṛttiḥ . tatra avśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . muṇḍayati . kam . māṇavakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5932: muṇḍaviśiṣṭena vā karotina tam āptum icchati . atha vā uktam etat . na atra vyāpāraḥ anugantavyaḥ iti . gamaktvāt iha vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5933: muṇḍayati māṇavakam iti . atha iha kyacā bhavitavyam . iṣṭaḥ putraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5934: iṣyate putraḥ iti . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ na bhavitavyam it . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5935: svaśabdena uktatvāt iti . apare āhuḥ : bhavitavyam iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5936: dhātvarthe ayam kyac vidhīyate . saḥ ca dhātvarthaḥ kena cit eva śabdena nirdeṣṭavyaḥ iti . ihabhavantaḥ tu āhuḥ na bhavitavyam iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5937: iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam pratyayāntena ca . yaḥ ca iha arthaḥ vākyena gamyate iṣṭaḥ putraḥ iṣyate putraḥ iti na asau jātu cit
GS24pmbhasuu:5940: kyaci māntāvyayānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha māt bhūt . idam icchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5941: kim icchati . uccaiḥ icchati . nīcaiḥ icchati . gosamānākṣaranāntāt iti eke . gām icchati gavyati . samānākṣarāt . dadhīyati madhati kartrīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_0: svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_1: prayojanam . dhātusvareṇa api etat siddham . kakārasya tarhi itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5944_2: āditaḥ cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5945: kāmyacaḥ citkaraṇānarthakyam kasya idarthābhāvāt . kāmyacaḥ citkaraṇam anarthakam . kakārasya tarhi itsañjñā kasmāt na bhavati . idarthābhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5946: itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lopaḥ eva itkāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5947: akāryam lopaḥ . iha hi śabdasya kāryārthaḥ vā bhavati upadeśaḥ śravaṇārthaḥ vā . karyam ca iha na asti . kārye asati yadi śravaṇam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:5948: syāt upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ syāt . idam tarhi itkāryam . agnicitkamyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:5949: kiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5950: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_0: pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_1: tarhi . upayaṭkāmyati . kiti iti samprasāraṇam yathā syāt .. etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_2: . yajādibhiḥ atra kitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . yajādīnām yaḥ kit iti . kaḥ ca yajādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:5951_3: kit . yajādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . atha api katham cit itkāryam syāt . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:5952: dvicakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac ckāmyat ca iti . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . na ca atra samprasāraṇam dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5953: (P_3,1.10) KA_II,20.17-19 Ro_III.57 adhikaraṇāt ca . adhikaraṇāt ca iti vaktavyam . prāsādayati kuṭyām kuṭīyati prāsāde iti atra api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5955: vidhīyate . tena yatra eva salopaḥ tatra eva syāt . payāyate . iha na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5956: . api kākaḥ śyenāyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5957: anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ salopaḥ . yatra ca sakāram paśyasi iti . tat yatha . kaḥ cit uktaḥ grāme bhikṣām cara devadattam ca ānaya iti . saḥ grāme bhikṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:5958_0: carati . yadi devadattam paśyati tam api ānayati . salopaḥ vā . salopaḥ vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5958_1: . payāyate payasyate . ojopsarasoḥ nityam . ojopsarasoḥ nityam salopaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5959: apraḥ āha salopaḥ apsarasaḥ eva . payasyate iti eva bhavitavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5960: katham ojāyamānam yaḥ ahim jaghana iti . chāndasaḥ prayogaḥ . chandasi ca dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_0: (P_3,1.11.2) KA_II,21.8-18 Ro_III,58-59 ācāre galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā . ācāre
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_1: galbhaklībahoḍebhyaḥ kvip vā vaktavyaḥ . avagalbhate avagalbhāyate . klība . viklībate
GS24pmbhasuu:5961_2: viklībāyate . klība . hoḍa . vihoḍate vihoḍāyate . kim prayojanam . kriyāvacanatā
GS24pmbhasuu:5962: prayojanam . dhātavaḥ eva galbhādayaḥ . na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5963: kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . avagalbhā viklībā vihoḍā . a pratyayāt iti akāraḥ yathā syāt . mā bhūt evam . guroḥ ca halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5964: iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . avagalbhām cakre . viklībām cakre .
GS24pmbhasuu:5965: vihoḍām cakre . kāspratyayāt ām amantre iti ām yathā syāt . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_0: sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ ācāre kvip vaktavyaḥ aśvati gardabhati iti evamartham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_1: tarhi idānīm galbhādyanukramaṇam kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . ātmanepadārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:5966_2: anubandhān āsaṅkṣyāmi iti . galbha klība hoḍa .
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_0: (P_3,1.12.1) KA_II,21.20-22 Ro_III,60 halaḥ lopasanniyogena ayam kyaṅ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_1: tena yatra eva halaḥ lopaḥ tatra eva prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . pradhānaśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5967_2: kyaṅ . anvācayaśiṣṭaḥ halaḥ lopaḥ . yatra ca halam
GS24pmbhasuu:5969_1: abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . kva divā bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . cvipratiṣedhānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5969_2: ca bhavatyarthe kyaṅvacanāt . cvipratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5970_0: bhavatyarthe kyaṅvacanāt . bhavatyarthe hi kyaṅ vidhīyate . bhavatiyoge cvividhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:5970_1: . bhavatinā yoge cviḥ vidhīyate . tatra cvinā uktatvāt tasya arthasya kyaṅ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:5971: paṭapaṭāyate . ḍāc api hi bhavatinā yoge vidhīyate . bhavatyarthe kyaṣ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5972_0: ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt . ḍāci vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . kim vacanaprāmāṇyam . lohitādiḍājbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5972_1: kyaṣ iti . iha kim cit akriyamāṇam codyate kim cit kriyamāṇam pratyākhyāyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5973: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam iha kasmāt na bhavati kva divā
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_0: bhṛśāḥ bhavanti iti . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_1: ivayuktam va yat kim cit iha dṛśyate tatra anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_2: tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:5974_3: asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:5975: acveḥ iti cvipratiṣedhāt anyasmin acvyante cvisadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5976: kim ca ataḥ anyat advyantam cvisadṛsam . abhūtatadbhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5977_0: (P_3,1.12.3) KA_II,22.18-23.20 Ro_III,61-64 iha kāḥ cit prakṛtayaḥ sopasargāḥ paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:5977_1: : abhimanas , sumanas , unmanas , durmanas . tatra vicāryate : bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5978: abhibhavatau subhavatau udbhavatau durbhavatau iti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam vā . abhimanasśabdāt sumanasśabdāt unmanasśabdāt durmanasśabdāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:5979: yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayatum . nanu tena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:5980_0: prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam bhavitavyam yāvatā prāk prakṛteḥ paṭhyante . yadi hi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5980_1: syāt prāk bhavateḥ paṭhyeran . na ime śakyāḥ prāk bhavateḥ paṭhitum . evam viśiṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:5981: prasajyeta . tasmāt na evam śakyam kartum . na cet evam jāyate vicāraṇā .
GS24pmbhasuu:5982: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare doṣaḥ . bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare
GS24pmbhasuu:5983_0: doṣaḥ bhavati . abhimanāyate . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ prasajyate . astu tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:5983_1: . sopasargāt iti cet aṭi doṣaḥ . sopasargāt iti cet aṭi doṣaḥ bhavati . svamanayata
GS24pmbhasuu:5983_2: iti . atyalpam idam ucyate : aṭi doṣaḥ bhavati iti . aḍlyavdvirvacaneṣu iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:5983_3: . aṭi : udāhṛtam lyapi : sumanāyya . dvirvacane : abhimimanāyiṣate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5984_0: avaśyam saṅgrāmayateḥ sopasargāt utpattiḥ vaktavyā asaṅgrāmayata śūraḥ iti evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:5984_1: . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . saṅgrāmayateḥ eva sopasargāt na anyasmāt sopasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:5984_2: iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati . evam tarhi bhṛśādiṣu upasargasya
GS24pmbhasuu:5984_3: parāṅgavadbhāvam vakṣyāmi . yadi parāṅgavadbhāvaḥ ucyate aḍlyavdvirvacanāni na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:5984_4: . svaravidhau iti vakṣyāmi . evam ca kṛtvā astu pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:5985: bhṛśādiṣu upasargaḥ pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam iti cet svare doṣaḥ iti . svare parāṅgavadbhāvena parihṛtam . ayam tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe sati doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5986_0: kyaṅā uktatvāt tasya arthasya upasargasya prayogaḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:5986_1: aprayogaḥ iti . tat yathā . api kākaḥ śyenāyate iti kyaṅā uktatvāt ācārārthasya āṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5986_2: prayogaḥ na bhavati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5987: ekena atra viśiṣṭe pratyayārthe pratyayaḥ utpadyate iha punaḥ anekena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5988: tatra manāyate iti ukte sandehaḥ syāt abhibhavatau subhavatau durbhavatau iti . tatra asandehārtham upasargaḥ prayujyate . yatra tarhi ekena .
GS24pmbhasuu:5989: utpucchayate . atra api anekena . pucchāt udasane pucchāt vyasane pucchāt paryasane iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5990: (P_3,1.13.1) KA_II,23.22-24.19 Ro_III,64-66 kimarthaḥ kakāraḥ . kṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:5991: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_0: pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . lohitādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_1: prātipadikāni . sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva sāmānyagrahaṇena arthaḥ . naḥ kye
GS24pmbhasuu:5992_2: iti . na ayam nāntāt vidhīyate . iha tarhi . yasya halaḥ kyasya vibhāṣā iti . na
