GS24pmbhasuu:5992_3: ayam halantāt vidhīyate . iha tarhi . āpatyayasya ca taddhite anāti kyacvyoḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_0: vidhīyate . iha tarhi . kyāt chandasi iti . yāt chandasi iti etāvat vaktavyam caraṇyūḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_1: turaṇyuḥ bhuraṇyuḥ iti evamartham . idam tarhi prayojanam . yat tat akṛtyakāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_2: dīrghatvam tatra kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . tat iha api yathā syāt . lohitāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_3: kim punaḥ kāraṇam tatra kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . uruyā dhṛṣṇuyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_4: . yadi kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate itryam iti pituḥ rīṅbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . rīṅbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:5993_5: kṅidgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate katham asūyā vasūyā ca yamāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:5994: . asūyateḥ asūyā vasūyateḥ vasūyā . atha vā chāndasam etat . dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ ca chandasi bhavati iti . yadi chāndasatvam hetuḥ na arthaḥ kṅidgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:5995: anuvartamānena . kasmāt na bhavati uruyā dhṛṣṇuyā iti . chāndasatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:5996: atha vā astu atra dīrghatvam . chāndasam hrasvatvam bhaviṣyati . tat yathā upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti . atha kimarthaḥ ṣakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:5997: . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . vā kyaṣaḥ iti . vā yāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:5998: hi ucyamāne ataḥ api prasajyeta . na etat asi prayojanam . parasmaipadam iti ucyate . na ca ataḥ parasmaipadam na api ātmanepadam paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:5999: sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . kyāt chandasi iti . yāt chandasi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6000: evam vaktavyam caraṇyūḥ turaṇyuḥ bhuraṇyuḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6002: lohitaḍājbhyaḥ kyaṣ vaktavyaḥ . lohitāyati lohitāyate paṭapaṭāyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6003: paṭapaṭāyate . atha anyāni lohitādīni . bhṛśādiṣu itarāṇi . bhṛśādiṣu itarāṇi paṭhitavyāni . kim prayojanam . ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam yathā syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6004: (P_3,1.14) KA_II,215.2-11 Ro_III,67-68 kaṣṭāya iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6005: kaṣṭaśabdāt caturthīsamarthāt kramaṇe anārjave kyṅ nipātyate . kaṣṭāya karmaṇe krāmati kaṣṭāyate . atyalpam idam ucyate : kaṣṭāya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6006: sattrakakṣakaṣṭagahanebhyaḥ kaṇvacikīrṣāyām . sattrakakṣakaṣṭagahanebhyaḥ kaṇvacikīrṣāyām iti vaktavyam . sattrāyate . sattra. kakaṣa. kakṣāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6007: kaṣṭa . kaṣṭāyate . kaṣṭa . gahana . gahanāyate . aparaḥ āha:.
GS24pmbhasuu:6008: sattrādibhyaḥ caturthyantebhyaḥ kramaṇe anārjave kyaṅ vaktavyaḥ . etāni eva udāharaṇāni . sattrādibhyaḥ iti kimartham . kuṭilāya krāmati anuvākāya
GS24pmbhasuu:6009: . caturthyantebhyaḥ iti kimartham . ajaḥ kaṣṭam krāmati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na etat pratyayāntanipātanam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6010: tādarthye eṣā caturthī . kaṣṭāya yat prātipadikam . kaṣṭārthe yat prātipadikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6011_0: (P_3,1.15) KA_II,25.13-20 Ro_III,68 romanthe iti ucyate . kaḥ romanthaḥ nāma . udgīrṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6011_1: vā avagīrṇasya vā manthaḥ romanthaḥ iti . yadi evam hanucalane iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6012_0: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati . kīṭaḥ romatham vartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6012_1: iti . anabhidhānāt . tapasaḥ parasmaipadam ca . tapasaḥ parasmaipadam ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6012_2: . tapaḥ carati tapasyati . katham tapasyate lokajigīṣuḥ agneḥ . chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6013: (P_3,1.16) KA_II,25.22 Ro_III,69 phenāt ca iti vaktavyam . phenāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6015: aṭāyate . aṭṭā . aṭṭāyate . śīkā . śīkāyate . koṭā . koṭāyate . poṭā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6016: poṭāyate . soṭā . soṭāyate . pruṣṭā . pruṣṭayate . pluṣṭā . pluṣṭāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6017: sudinadurdinābhyām ca . sudinadurdinābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . sudināyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6018: durdināyate . nīhārāt ca . nīhārāt ca iti vaktavyam . nīhārāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6019_0: (P_3,1.18) KA_II,26.10-14 Ro_III,69 kartṛvedanāyām iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6019_1: sukham vedayate prasādhakaḥ devadattasya . kartṛvedanāyām iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6019_2: . kim kāraṇam . kartuḥ iti iyam kartari ṣaṣṭhī . vedanāyām iti ca anaḥ bhāve . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6019_3: yadi eva ātmanaḥ vedayate atha api parasya kartṛvedanā eva asau bhavati . na kartṛgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6020: abhisambadhyate . kim tarhi . sukhādīni abhisambadhyante . kartuḥ yāni sukhādīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:6022: namasaḥ kyaci dvitīyā na upapadyate . namasyati devān . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6023: namaḥśabdena yoge caturthī vidhīyate . sā prāpnoti . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham . namaḥśabdena yoge caturthī vidhīyate namasyatiśabdaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6024: nanu ca namasyatiśabde namaḥśabdaḥ asti . tena yoge prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . arthavataḥ namaḥsābdasya grahaṇam . na ca namasyatiśabde
GS24pmbhasuu:6025: namaḥśabdaḥ arthavān . atha vā upapadavibhakteḥ kārakavibhaktiḥ balīyasī iti dvitīyā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6026_1: pratyayārthanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . namasaḥ pūjāyām . varivasaḥ paricaryāyām . citraṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6026_2: āścarye . bhāṇḍāt samācayane . cīvarāt arjane paridhāne vā . pucchāt udasane vysasane
GS24pmbhasuu:6027_0: kriyāvacanatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati kriyāvacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6027_1: kyajādayaḥ iti yat ayam sanādyantāḥ dhātavaḥ iti dhātusañjñām śāsti . dhātusañjñāvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6027_2: etat prayojanam : dhātoḥ iti tavyadādīnām utpattiḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca atra kriyāvacanatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6028: dhātusañjñāvacanam anarthakam syāt . satyām api dhātusañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6029: tavyadādayaḥ na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_0: sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt satyām api dhātusañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_1: tavyadādayaḥ na syuḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ kriyāvacanāḥ kyajādayaḥ iti tataḥ sanādyantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_2: dhātavaḥ iti dhātusañjñām śāsti . nanu ca idam prayojanam syāt . parasādhane utpattim
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_3: vakṣyāmi iti . na parasādhane utpattyā bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . sādhanam iti sambandhiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_4: ayam sambandhiśabdāḥ ca punaḥ evamātmakāḥ yat uta sambandhinam ākṣipanti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6030_5: . mātari vartitatvyam , pitari śuśrūṣitavyam iti . na ca ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6031: svasyām mātari svasmin vā pitari iti , sambandhāt ca etat gamyate yā yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_0: mātā yaḥ ca yasya pitā iti . evam iha api sambandhāt etat gantavyam yasya dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_1: yat sādhanam iti . atha vā dhātavaḥ eva kyajādayaḥ . na ca eva hi arthāḥ ādiśyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_2: . kriyāvacanatā ca gamyate . kaḥ khalu api pacādīnām kriyāvacanatve yatnam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6032_3: . yena eva khalu api hetunā pacādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6033_0: kriyāvacanāḥ tena eva kyajādayaḥ api . evamartham ācāryaḥ citrayati . kva cit arthān
GS24pmbhasuu:6033_1: ādiśati kva cit na . evam api arthādeśanam kartavyam . katham ime abudhāḥ budhyeran
GS24pmbhasuu:6033_2: iti . atha vā śakyam ādeśanam akartum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6034: karaṇe iti vartate . karaṇam ca karoteḥ karotiḥ ca kriyāsāmānye vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6035: (P_3,1.21) KA_II,27.25-28.11 Ro_III,72-74 imau halikalī staḥ ikārāntau
GS24pmbhasuu:6036_0: . asti halaśabdaḥ kalaśabdaḥ ca akārāntaḥ . kayoḥ idam grahaṇam . yau ikārāntau tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6036_1: atvam nipātyate . kim prayojanam . halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam sanvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6036_2: . halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam kriyate sanvadbhāvaḥ mā bhūt iti . ajahalat acakalat .
GS24pmbhasuu:6037: prayojanam . ikāralope kṛte aglopinām na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6038: vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ . tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām aglopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_0: paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_1: . anityaḥ lopaḥ . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti anyasya akṛtāyām . śabdāntarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_2: ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . vṛddhiḥ api anityā . anyasya kṛte lope prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_3: anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6039_4: paratvāt vṛddhiḥ vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ . tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati . atve punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6040: vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api paratvāt vṛddhiḥ vṛddhau kṛtāyām api ak eva lupyate . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate halikalyoḥ atvanipātanam sanvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6041_0: (P_3,1.22.1) KA_II,28.13-18 Ro_III.74-75 samabhihāraḥ iti kaḥ ayam śabdaḥ . samabhipūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6041_1: harateḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ ghañ . samabhiharaṇam samabhihāraḥ . tat yatha puṣpābhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6041_2: phalābhihāraḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . bahvyaḥ hi tāḥ sumanasaḥ . tatra yuktaḥ samabhihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6041_3: . iha punaḥ ekā kriyā . yadi api ekā sāmānyakriyā avayavakriyāḥ tu bahvyaḥ adhiśrayaṇodakāsecanataṇḍulāvapanaidhkopakarṣaṇkriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6042: kārtsnyena karoti kaḥ cit akārtsnyena . yaḥ kārtsnyena karoti saḥ ucyate pāpacyate iti . punaḥ punaḥ vā pacati pāpacyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6043: (P_3,1.22.2) KA_II,28.19-29.12 Ro_III,75-76 atha dhātugrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt prāṭati bhṛśam iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6044_0: yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam karmagrahaṇāt sanvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6044_1: dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . sopasargam karma iti cet karmaviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya anupasargam
GS24pmbhasuu:6045: dhātvadhikāre api sanaḥ avidhānam akarmatvāt iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:6046: kriyāsamabhihāragrahaṇāt yaṅvidhau dhātugrahaṇānarthakyam . sopasargaḥ kriyāsamabhihāraḥ iti cet kriyāsamabhihāraviśeṣakatvāt upasargasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_0: dhātvadhikāre api yaṅaḥ avidhānam akriyāsamabhihāratvāt iti . atha ekājjhalādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6048_1: kimartham . iha mā bhūt : jāgarti bhṛśam . īkṣate bhṛśam . ekājjhalādigrahaṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_0: tatra tāvat uktam karmasamānakartṛkagrahaṇānarthakyam ca icchābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6049_1: . akarmaṇaḥ hi asamānakartṛkāt vā anabhidhānam iti . iha api ekājjhalādigrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6050: ahalādeḥ hi anabhidhānam iti . tat ca avaśyam anabhidānam āśrayitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6051_0: kriyamāṇe api hi ekājjhalādigrahaṇe yatra ekācaḥ halādeḥ ca utpadyamānena yaṅā arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6051_1: abhidhānam na bhavati na bhavati tatra utpattiḥ . tat yathā . bhṛśam śobhate . bhṛśam
GS24pmbhasuu:6051_2: rocate . yatra ca anekācaḥ ahalādeḥ vo utpadyamānena yaṅā arthasya abhidhānam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6051_3: bhavati tatra utpattiḥ tat yathā . aṭāṭyate arāryate aśāśyate sosūcyate sosūtryate
GS24pmbhasuu:6053: ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prorṇonūyate . atyalpam idam ucyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:6054: ūrṇoteḥ iti . sūcisūtrimūtryaṭyartyaśyūrṇugrahaṇam yaṅvidhau anekājahalādyartham . sūcisūtrimūtryaṭyartyaśyūrṇotīnām grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6055_0: . kim prayojanam . yaṅvidhau anekājahalādyartham . sosūcyate sosūtryate momūtryate
GS24pmbhasuu:6055_1: aṭāṭyate arāryate aśāśyate prorṇonūyate . vācyaḥ ūrṇorṇuvadbhāvaḥ yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6055_2: . āmaḥ ca pratiṣedhārtham ekācaḥ ca iḍupagrahāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_1: loḍvidhānam . kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ bhavati yaṅaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kriyāsamabhihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_2: yaṅ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ dhātuḥ yaḥ ekāc halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate adhātusambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_3: : lolūyate . loṭaḥ avakāśaḥ dhātuḥ yaḥ anekāc ahalādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate dhātusambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_4: : saḥ bhavān jāgṛhi jāgṛhi iti eva ayam jāgarti . saḥ bhavān īhasva īhasva iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_5: ayam īhate . dhātuḥ yaḥ ekāc halādiḥ kriyāsamabhihāre vartate dhātusambandhaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_6: tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti : saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . loṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_7: vipratiṣedhena . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : saḥ bhavān lolūyasva lolūyasva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6056_8: eva ayam lolūyate . bhavati ca . na vā nānārthatvāt . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi lavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6057: kriyāviśeṣe svārthe yaṅ . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6058: nānārthatvāt . kā nānārthatā . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi lavidhānam . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ hi loṭ vidhīyate . kriyāviśeṣe svārthe yaṅ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt yaṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:6059: bhavitavyam . na tarhi idam idānīm bhavati . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti . bhavati ca . vibhāṣā yaṅ . yadā na yaṅ tadā loṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6060: (P_3,1.24) KA_II,30.9-14 Ro_III,78-79 uttarayoḥ vigraheṇa viśeṣāsampratyayāt nityagrahaṇānarthakyam . uttarayoḥ yogayoḥ vigraheṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6061_0: viśeṣāsampratyayāt nityagrahaṇānarthakyam . na hi kuṭilam krāmati iti caṅkramyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6061_1: iti gamyate . athe etebhyaḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅā bhavitavyam . kriyāsamabhihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:6061_2: ca na etebhyaḥ . kriyāsamabhihāre ca na etebhyaḥ yaṅā bhavitavyam . bhṛśam japati
GS24pmbhasuu:6061_3: brāhmaṇaḥ . bhṛśam samidaḥ dahati iti eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:6062: (P_3,1.25) KA_II,30.17-31.5 Ro_III,79-80 satyāpa iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6063: satyasya kṛñi āpuk ca . satyasya kṛñi āpuk ca nipātyate ṇic ca . satyam karoti satyāpayati . atyalpam idam ucyate . ṇividau arthavedasatyānām apuk
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_0: ca . ṇividau arthavedasatyānām apuk ca iti vaktavyam . arthāpayati vedāpayati satyāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_1: . yadi āpuk kriyate ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi puk kariṣyate . evam api ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6064_2: prāpnoti . evam tarhi āk kariṣyate . evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi ak kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6065: puk na prāpnoti . evam tarhi apuṭ kariṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu āpuk eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6066: . nanu ca uktam . ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti iti . āpugvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu puk eva . nanu ca uktam evam api ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6067: prāpnoti iti . pugvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu āk eva . nanu ca uktam evam api ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti iti . āgvacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6069: hetumati abhidheye ṇic bhavati iti . āhosvit hetumati yaḥ dhātuḥ vartate iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6070: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā hetumati iti ucyate . yadi hi prakṛtarthaviśeṣaṇam syāt hetumataḥ iti evam brūyāt . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6071: bhavanti iha hi viṣayasaptamyaḥ api . tat yathā . pramāṇe yat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:6072: vartate striyām yat prātipadikam vartate iti . evam iha api hetumati abhidheye ṇic bhavati hetumati yaḥ dhātuḥ vartate iti jāyate vicāraṇā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6073: ata uttaram paṭhati . hetumati iti kārakopādānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6074: pratyayārthaparigrahārtham yathā tanūkaraṇe takṣaḥ . hetumati iti kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6075_0: upādīyate . kim prayojanam . pratyayārthaparigrahārtham . evam sati pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6075_1: suparigṛhītaḥ bhavati . yathā tanūkaraṇe takṣaḥ iti tanūkaraṇam upādīyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_0: prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam hi tat tatra vijñāyate . tanūkaraṇakriyāyām takṣaḥ iti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_1: prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam . kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha hi uktaḥ karoti preṣitaḥ karoti iti ṇic prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6076_2: . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe punaḥ sati na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6077: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yatra na antareṇa śabdam arthasya gatiḥ bhavati tatra śabdaḥ prayujyate . yatra hi antareṇa api śabdam arthasya gatiḥ bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:6078: tatra śabdaḥ prayujyate . iha tarhi pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti ubhayoḥ kartroḥ lena abhidhānam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_0: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇe punaḥ sati na doṣaḥ . pradhānakartari lādayaḥ bhavanti iti pradhānakartā
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_1: lena abhidhīyate . yaḥ ca apradhānam siddha tatra kartari iti eva tṛtīyā . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_2: gamitaḥ grāmam devadattaḥ yajñadattanea iti avyatiriktaḥ gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_3: kartari iti kartari ktaḥ prāpnoti . iha ca vyatibhedayante vyaticchedayante iti avyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_4: hiṃsārthaḥ iti kṛtvā na gatihiṃsārthebhyaḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_5: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam . yadi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_6: iti prayojye kartari karmasañjñā prāpnoti . bhavati hi tasya tasmin īpsā . iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_7: grāmam gamayati grāmāya gamayati iti vyatiriktaḥ gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthakarmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_8: dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ . iha ca edhodakasya upaskārayati iti vyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6079_9: karotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā kṛñaḥ pratiyatne iti ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6080: . iha ca bhedikā devadattasya yajñadattasya kāṣṭhānām iti prayojye kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6081: ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti . iha ca abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayati iti vyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_0: sunotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā upasargāt sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6082_1: . yat tāvat ucyate pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti prayojye kartari karmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6083: gatibuddhipratyavasānārthaśabdakarmākarmakāṇām aṇi iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . eteṣām eva aṇyantānām yaḥ kartā saḥ ṇau karmasañjñaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6084: na anyeṣām iti . yat api ucyate iha ca grāmam gamayati grāmāya gamayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6085: iti vyatiriktaḥ gatyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā gatyarthakarmaṇi dvitīyācaturthyau na prāpnutaḥ iti . na asau evam preṣyate gaccha grāmam iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6086: sādhanaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām preṣyate . grāmam gaccha . grāmāya gaccha iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6087: . yat api ucyate iha ca edhodakasya upaskārayati iti vyatiriktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6088: karotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā kṛñaḥ pratiyatne iti ṣaṣṭhī na prāpnoti iti . na asau evam preṣyate upaskuruṣva edhodakasya iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6089_0: sādhanaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām preṣyate . edhodakasya upaskuruṣva iti . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6089_1: iha ca bhedikā devadattasya yajñadattasya kāṣṭhānām iti prayojye kartari ṣaṣṭhī na
GS24pmbhasuu:6090: prayojanam kartṛbhūtapūrvamātre api ṣaṣṭhī yathā syāt iti . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6091_0: iha ca abhiṣāvayati pariṣāvayati iti vyatiriktaḥ sunotyarthaḥ iti kṛtvā upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6091_1: sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti iti . na asau evam preṣyate sunu abhi iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6092: abhiṣunu iti . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena
GS24pmbhasuu:6093_0: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam yāvatā vyaktam arthāntaram gamyate pacati pācayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6093_1: iti ca . bāḍham yuktam . iha paceḥ kaḥ pradhānārthaḥ . yā asau taṇḍulānām viklittiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6093_2: . atha idānīm tadabhisandhipūrvakam preṣaṇam adhyeṣaṇam vā . yuktam yat sarvam pacyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_0: bikṣādiṣu darśanāt . hetunirdeśaḥ ca nimittamātram draṣṭavyam . yāvat brūyāt nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_1: kāraṇam iti tāvt hetuḥ iti . kim prayojanam . bikṣādiṣu darśanāt . bhikṣādiṣu hi
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_2: ṇic dṛśyate . bhikṣāḥ vāsayanti .kāriṣaḥ agniḥ adhyāpayati iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_3: pāribhāṣike hetau na sidhyati . evam manyate . cetanāvataḥ etat bhavati preṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_4: adhyeṣaṇam ca iti . bhikṣāḥ ca acetanāḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam saḥ eva vāsam
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_5: prayojayati yaḥ āha uṣyatām iti . tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ yaḥ tatsamarthāni ācarati saḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_6: vāsam prayojayati . bhikṣāḥ ca api pracurāḥ vyañjanavatyaḥ labhyamānāḥ vāsam prayojayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6095_7: . tathā kārīṣaḥ agniḥ nirvāte ekānte suprajvalitaḥ adhyayanam prayojayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6096: (P_3,1.26.3) KA_II,33.9-20 Ro_III,88-89 iha kaḥ cit kam cit āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:6097: pṛcchatu mā bhavān . anuyuṅktām mā bhavān iti . atra ṇic kasmāt na bhavati . akartṛtvāt . na hi asau samprati pṛcchati . tūṣṇīm āste . kim ca bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6098: vartamānakālāyāḥ eva kriyāyāḥ kartrā bhavitavyam na bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6099: . bhūtabhaviṣyatkālāyāḥ api bhavitavyam . abhisambandhaḥ tatra kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_0: imām kriyām akārṣīt . imām kriyām kariṣyati iti . iha punaḥ na kaḥ cit abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_1: kriyate na ca asau samprati pṛcchati . tūṣṇīm āste . yadi tarhi kartā na asti katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_2: tarhi kartṛpratyayena loṭā abhidhīyate . atham katham asmin apṛcchati ayam pracchiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6100_3: vartate . abhisambandhaḥ tatra kriyate . imām kriyām kuru iti . kartrā api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6101: katham . kartā ca asyāḥ kriyāyāḥ bhava iti . evam na ca kartā kartṛpratyayena ca loṭā abhidhīyate . atha api katham cit kartā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6102: evam api na doṣaḥ . loṭā uktatvāt preṣaṇasya ṇic na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6103: vidhīyante hi eteṣu artheṣu praiṣādiṣu loḍādayaḥ . yatra ca dvitīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6104: prayojyaḥ arthaḥ bhavati bhavati tatra ṇic . tat yathā āsaya śāyaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6106: kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ vaktavyā . ekānte tūṣṇīm āsīnaḥ ucyate pañcabhiḥ halaiḥ kṛṣati iti . tatra bhavitavyam . pañcabhiḥ halaiḥ karṣayati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6107_0: kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ nānākriyāṇām kṛṣyarthatvāt . kṛṣyādiṣu ca anutpattiḥ siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:6107_1: . kutaḥ . nānākriyāṇām kṛṣyarthatvāt . nānākriyāḥ kṛṣeḥ arthāḥ . na avaśyam kṛṣiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6107_2: vilekhane eva vartate . kim tarhi. pratividhāne api vartate . yat asau bhaktabījabalīvardaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6108: kṛṣyarthaḥ . ātaḥ ca pratividhāne vartate . yadahaḥ eva asau na pratividhatte tadahaḥ tat karma na pravartate . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6109_0: yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . puṣyamitraḥ yajate . yājakāḥ yājayanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6109_1: tatra bhavitavyam . puṣyamitraḥ yājayate . yājakāḥ yajanti iti . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6109_2: nānākriyāṇām yajyarthatvāt . yajyādiṣu ca aviparyāsaḥ siddhaḥ . kutaḥ . nānākriyāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:6109_3: yajyarthatvāt . nānākriyāḥ yajeḥ arthāḥ . na avaśyam yajiḥ haviṣprakṣepaṇe eva vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6110: tyāge api vartate . aho yajate iti ucyate yaḥ suṣṭhu tyāgam karoti . tam ca puṣyamitraḥ karoti . yājakāḥ prayojayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6111_0: (P_3,1.26.5) KA_II,34.8-13 Ro_III,91-92 tat karoti iti upasaṅkhyānam sūtrayatyādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6111_1: . tat karoti iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . sūtrayatyādyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6111_2: sūtram karoti . sūtrayati . iha vyākaraṇasya sūtram karoti . vyākaraṇam sūtrayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6111_3: iti . vākye ṣaṣṭhī utpanne ca pratyaye dvitīyā . kena etat evam bhavati . yaḥ asau
GS24pmbhasuu:6111_4: sūtravyākaraṇayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ saḥ utpanne pratyaye nivartate . asti ca karoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6111_5: vyākaraṇena sāmarthyam iti kṛtvā dvitīyā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6112_0: (P_3,1.26.6) KA_II,34.14-36.21 Ro_III,92-97 ākhyānāt kṛtaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti kṛlluk
GS24pmbhasuu:6112_1: prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam . ākhyānāt kṛdantāt tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6113: kārakam bhavati iti vaktavyam . kaṃsavadham ācaṣṭe kaṃsam ghātayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6114: balibandham ācaṣṭe balim bandhayati . ākhyānāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6115: ākhyānaśabdāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ākhyānam ācaṣṭe . kim punaḥ yāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_0: etāni sañjñābhūtāni ākhyānāni tataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam āhosvit kriyānvākhyānamātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6116_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi sañjñābhūtebhyaḥ iha na prāpnoti . rājāgamanam ācaṣṭe ṛajānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6117: doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . dṛśyarthānām ca pravṛttau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6118: dṛśyarthānām ca pravṛttau kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6119: mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe mṛgān ramayati iti . dṛśyarthānām iti kimartham . yadā hi grāme mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe mṛgaramaṇam ācaṣṭe iti eva tadā bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_0: āṅlopaḥ ca kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādāyām . kālātyantasaṃyoge maryādayām kṛdantāt ṇic
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_1: vaktayaḥ tat ācaṣṭe iti etasmin arthe āṅlopaḥ ca kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_2: ca kārakam bhavati iti . ārātrimvivāsam ācaṣṭe rātrim vivāsayati iti . citrīkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_3: prāpi . citrīkaraṇe prāpyarthe kṛdantāt ṇic vaktayaḥ kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_4: ca kārakam bhavati iti . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam sambhāvayate
GS24pmbhasuu:6120_5: sūryam udgamayati . nakṣatrayoge jñi . nakṣatrayoge jānātyarthe kṛdantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6121: ṇic vaktayaḥ kṛlluk prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ prakṛtivat ca kārakam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6122: . puṣyayogam jānāti puṣyeṇa yojayati . maghābhiḥ yojayati . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:6123: vaktavyam . na vā sāmānyakṛtatvāt hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6124: kim kāraṇam . sāmānyakṛtatvāt . sāmānyena eva atra ṇic bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6125: hetumati iti . kim kāraṇam . hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam . hetutaḥ hi aviśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6126: bhavati . tulyā hi hetutā devadatte ca āditye ca . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6127_0: svatantraprayojakaḥ hetusañjñaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . na ca asau ādityam prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6127_1: . svatantraprayojakatvāt aprayojakaḥ iti cet muktasaṃśayena tulyam . yam bhavān svatrantraprayojakam
GS24pmbhasuu:6128: pācayati odanam devadattaḥ yajñadattena iti tena etat tulyam . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6129_0: pravṛttiḥ hi ubhayatra anapekṣya . pravṛttiḥ hi ubhayatra anapekṣya eva kim cit bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6129_1: devadatte ca āditye ca . na iha kaḥ cit paraḥ anugrahītavyaḥ iti pravartate . sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:6129_2: ime svabhūtyartham pravartante . ye tāvat ete guruśuśrūṣavaḥ te api svabhūtyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6130: pāralaukikam ca naḥ bhaviṣyati iha ca naḥ prītaḥ guruḥ adhyāpayiṣyati iti . tathā yat etat dāsakarmakaram nāma ete api svabhūtyartham eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6131_0: pravartantebhaktam celam ca lapsyāmahe paribhāṣāḥ ca na naḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6131_1: ye ete śilpinaḥ nāme te api svabhūtyartham eva pravartante vetanam ca lapsyāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:6131_2: mitrāṇi ca naḥ bhaviṣyanti iti . evam eteṣu sarveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6132_0: svabhūtyartham pravartamāneṣu kurvataḥ prayojakaḥ iti cet tulyam . yadi kaḥ cit kurvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6132_1: prayojakaḥ nāma bhavati tena etat tulyam . yadi tarhi sarve ime svabhūtyartham pravartantekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6132_2: prayojyārthaḥ . yat abhiprāyeṣu sajjante . īdṛśau vadhrau kuru . īdṛśau paṭukau kuru
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_0: abhiprāye sajjate . eṣaḥ tasya abhiprāyaḥ . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_1: sambhāvayeya iti . tam ca asya abhiprāyam ādityaḥ nirvartayati . bhavet iha vartamānakālatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_2: yuktā . ujjayinyāḥ prasthitaḥ māhiṣmatyām suryodgamanam sambhāvayate sūryam udgamayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_3: iti tatrasthasya hi tasya ādityaḥ udeti . iha tu katham vartamānakālatām kaṃsam ghātayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6133_4: balim bandhayati iti cirahate kaṃse cirabaddhe ca balau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6134_0: atra api yuktā . katham . ye tāvat ete śobhikāḥ nāma ete pratyakṣam kaṃsam ghātayanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6134_1: pratyakṣam ca balim bandhayanti iti . citreṣu katham . citreṣu api udgūrṇāḥ nipatitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6135_0: granthikeṣu katham yatra śabdagaḍumātram lakṣyate . te api hi teṣām utpattiprabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:6135_1: ā vināśāt ṛddhīḥ vyācakṣāṇāḥ sataḥ buddhiviṣayān prakāśayanti . ātaḥ ca sataḥ vyāmiśrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6136_0: bhavanti ke cit vāsudevabhaktāḥ . varṇānyatvam khalu api puṣyanti . ke cit raktamukhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6136_1: bhavanti ke cit kālamukhāḥ . traikālyam khalu api loke lakṣyate . gaccha hanyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6136_2: kaṃsaḥ . gaccha ghāniṣyate kaṃsaḥ . kim gatena hataḥ kaṃsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6137: (P_3,1.27) KA_II,37.2-38.11 Ro_III,97-101 kimarthaḥ kakāraḥ . kṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6138: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate . dhātoḥ ca vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6139_0: pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ ārdhadhātukasañjñām labhate . na ca ayam dhātoḥ vidhīyate . kaṇḍvādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:6139_1: hi prātipadikāni . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam . kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . avacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_0: nityaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_1: . tatra dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . kaṇḍvau kaṇḍvaḥ . aci śnudhātubhruvām
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_2: yvoḥ iyaṅuvaṅau iti uvaṅadeśaḥ prasajyeta . iha ca kaṇḍvā kaṇḍve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6140_3: pratiṣedhaḥ prasajyeta . tuk ca pratiṣedhyaḥ . valguḥ mantuḥ iti . hrasvasya piti
GS24pmbhasuu:6141: tuk prāpnoti . hrasvayalopau ca vaktavyau . hrasvayalopau ca vaktavyau
GS24pmbhasuu:6142: syātām . valguḥ mantuḥ iti . kimartham idam na hrasvaḥ eva ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6143: antaraṅgatvāt akṛdyakāre iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . yalopaḥ . yalopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . kaṇḍūḥ valguḥ mantuḥ iti . kimartham idam na vali iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6144: siddham . vali iti ucyate . na ca atra valim paśyāmaḥ . nanu cal kvip
GS24pmbhasuu:6145: valādiḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:6146_0: . kviblopaḥ kriyatām vali lopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kviblopaḥ . nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6146_1: khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6146_2: ca kvilope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6147: pratyayalakṣaṇam . atha kriyamāṇe api vāvacane yadā yagantāt kvip tadā ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6148: doṣāḥ kasmāt na bhavanti . na etebhyaḥ tadā kvip drakṣyate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6149: anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti ucyate . na ca etebhyaḥ tadā kvip dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6150: yathā eva tarhi kriyamāṇe vāvacane anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti evam atra kvip na bhavati evam akriyamāṇe api na bhaviṣyati . avaśyam etebhyaḥ tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_0: kvip eṣitavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . etāni rūpāṇi yathā syuḥ iti . tat tarhi vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_1: kartavyam . na kartavyam . ubhayam kaṇḍvādīni dhātavaḥ ca prātipadikāni ca . ātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6151_2: ca ubhayam . kaṇḍūyati iti kriyām kurvāṇe prayujyate asti me kaṇḍūḥ iti vedanāmātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6152: dhātuprakaraṇāt dhātuḥ kasya āsañjanāt api . āha ca ayam imam dīrgham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6155: vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api vai ṇakāre vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6156_0: ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6156_1: vṛddhipratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇam sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6157: ṇeḥ aniṭi iti . ṇiṅi ṇitkaraṇasya sāvakāśatvāt vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ṅitkaraṇam api tarhi sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_0: sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6158_1: eva . śakyaḥ atra sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ anyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra ṅakārānurodhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_0: avaśayam atra ātmanepadārthaḥ ṅakāraḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktavyaḥ ṅitaḥ iti ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_1: yathā syāt . evam ubhayoḥ sāvakaśayoḥ pratiṣedhabalīyastvāt pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6159_2: . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na kameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6160_0: vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam na kamyamicamām iti mitsañjñāyā pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:6160_1: śāsti . mitpratiṣedhasya ca arthavattvāt . mitpratiṣedhasya ca arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6161_0: ṇiṅantasya ṇici yā vṛddhiḥ tasyāḥ hrasvatvam mā bhūt iti . nanu etasyāḥ api kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6161_1: ca iti pratiṣedhena bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . uktam etat kṅiti pratiṣedhe tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6161_2: iti . evam tarhi na ṇiṅantasya ṇici yā
GS24pmbhasuu:6162: vṛddhiḥ tasyāḥ hrasvatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṇiṅā vyavahitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_0: lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . ṇiṅi eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_1: mā bhūt iti . ṇiṅi ca na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6163_2: iti . na eva vā punaḥ ṇiṅantasya ṇici
GS24pmbhasuu:6164: vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṇiṅā vyavahitatvāt . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_0: yat tat ciṇṇamuloḥ dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti dīrghatvam tat kameḥ ṇiṅi mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_1: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam tatra dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti ucyate . na hrasvaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_2: iti eva ucyeta . yathāprāptam ca api kameḥ hrasvatvam eva . tatra ayam api arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6165_3: . hrasvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . mitām
GS24pmbhasuu:6166: aśami aśāmi śamam śamam śāmam śāmam . vṛddhyā siddham . na sidhyati . na sidhyati . na udāttopadeśasya māntasya anācameḥ iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6167: prāpnoti . ciṇkṛtoḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ṇici . idam tarhi . ajani ajāni janam janam jānam jānam . janivadhyoḥ ca iti vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6168_0: saḥ api ciṇkṛtoḥ eva . ṇijvyavahiteṣu tarhi yaṅlope ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6168_1: . śamayantam prayojitavān aśami aśāmi śamam śamam śāmam śāmam . śaṃśamayateḥ aśaṃsami
GS24pmbhasuu:6169: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ciṇṇamulpare ṇau mitām aṅgānām hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra ṇiḥ ciṇṇamulparaḥ na tasmin mit aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6170: yasmin ca mit aṅgam na asau ṇiḥ ṇamulparaḥ . ṇilope kṛte ciṇṇamulparaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_0: sthānivadbhāvāt na ciṇṇamulparaḥ . atha dīrghaḥ anyatarasyām iti ucyamāne yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_1: sthānivadbhāvaḥ katham eva etat sidhyati . etat idānīm dīrghagrahaṇasya prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6171_2: . dīrghavidhim prati ajādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6172_0: sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadā khalu api āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:6172_1: vā bhavanti tadā ṇici ṇiṅ na bhavati . tadartham ca mitpratiṣedhaḥ syāt . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6172_2: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6175: āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6176_0: . āhosvit āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6176_1: iti . kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇā āhosvit anyatarasmin pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6176_2: . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite
GS24pmbhasuu:6177_0: iti tadā aviśeṣeṇa sarvam āyādiprakaraṇam anukramya āyādayaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6177_1: ucyate . yadā api āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6177_2: bhavati iti tadā ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6178: gupūdhūpavicchipaṇipanibhyaḥ āyaḥ ārdhadhātuke vā . ṛteḥ īyaṅ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:6179_0: vā . kameḥ ṇiṅ ārdhadhātuke vā iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:6179_1: āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . āyādibhyaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6179_2: ārdhadhātukam āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam iti ca ubhayathā aniṣṭam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6179_3: yadi vijñāyate āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin avasthite vā āyādīnām nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6180: iti guptiḥ jugopa iti ca iṣṭam na sidhyati idam ca aniṣṭam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6181: gopām cakāra gopā iti ca . idam tāvat iṣṭam siddham bhavati . gopāyām cakāra gopāya iti . atha vijñāyate āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6182: avasthite vā āyādīnām utpattiḥ bhavati iti guptiḥ jugopa iti ca iṣṭam siddham bhavati . idam ca aniṣṭam na prāpnoti . gopāyām cakāra gopāya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6183: . idam tu iṣṭam na sidhyati . gopayām cakāra gopāya iti . idam tāvat iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6184: sidhyati . gopayām cakāra iti . katham . astu atra āyādiprakṛteḥ yat ārdhadhātukam liṭ . tasmin avasthite vā āyādayaḥ . ām madhye patiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6185: yathā vikaraṇāḥ tadvat . idam tarhi iṣṭam na sidhyati gopāyā iti . siddham tu sārvadhātuke nityavacanāt anāśritya vāvidhānam . siddham etat . katham.
GS24pmbhasuu:6186: aviśeṣeṇa āyādīnām vāvidhānam uktvā sārvadhātuke nityam iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6187: syādibalīyastvam tu vipratiṣedhena tulyanimittatvāt . syādibhiḥ tu āyādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . tulyanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6188: . tulyam nimittam syādīnām āyādīnām ca . syādīnām avakāśaḥ kariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6189: hariṣyati . āyādīnām avakāśaḥ gopāyati dhūpāyati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6190: gopāyiṣyati dhūpāyiṣyati iti . paratvāt syādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na vā āyādividhānasya anavakāśatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6191_0: āyādividhānasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ ucyante ca . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6191_1: . nanu ca idānīm eva avakāśaḥ prakḷptaḥ gopāyati dhūpāyati iti . atra api śap syādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6191_2: bhavati . yadi api atra api bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:6192_0: tu atra asti viśeṣaḥ sati vā śapi asati vā . anyat idānīm etat ucyate na asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6192_1: iti . yat tu tat uktam āyādīnām syādibhiḥ avyāptaḥ avakāśaḥ it sa na asti avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6192_2: . avaśyam khalu api atra śap syādiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . gopāyantī dhūpāyantī
GS24pmbhasuu:6192_3: iti : śapśyanoḥ nityam iti num yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6193_0: iti . yadi tarhi anavakāśāḥ āyādayaḥ āyādibhiḥ syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6193_1: punaḥ ayam sūtrebhedena parihāraḥ yadi punaḥ śapi nityam iti ucyeta . sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6193_2: sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam āyādibhyaḥ yat ārdhadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_0: ubhayathā aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātuke iti na eṣā parasaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_1: . kā tarhi . viṣayasaptamī . ārdhadhātukaviṣaye iti . tatra ārdhadhātukaviṣaye āyādiprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6194_2: āyādiṣu kṛteṣu yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6196: sanādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānīm tadantānām bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6197_0: tadantavidhinā . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sanādiṣu antagrahaṇe uktam . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6197_1: padasañjñāyām antagrahaṇam anyatra sañjñāvidhau pratyayagrahaṇe tadantavidhipratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6197_2: iti . idam ca api pratyayagrahaṇam . ayam ca api sañjñāvidhiḥ . kimartham punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:6197_3: ucyate na bhūvādayaḥ dhātavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . pāṭhena dhātusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6197_4: kriyate na ca ime tatra paṭhyante . katham tarhi anyeṣām apaṭhyamānānām dhātusañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6198_0: asteḥ bhūḥ . bruvaḥ vaciḥ . cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ iti . yadi api ete tatra na paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6198_1: prakṛtayaḥ tu eṣām tatra paṭhyante . tatra sthānivadbhāvāt siddham . ime api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6198_2: yadi api tatra na paṭhyante yeṣām tu arthāḥ ādiśyante te tatra paṭhyante . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6198_3: sthānivadbhāvāt siddham . na sidhyati . ādeśaḥ sthānivat bhavati iti ucyate . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6198_4: ca ime ādeśāḥ . ime api ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6199: . katham . ādiśyate yaḥ saḥ ādeśaḥ . ime ca api ādiśyante . evam api ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ sthānivat bhavanti iti ucyate . na ce ime
GS24pmbhasuu:6200_0: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ . ṣaṣṭhīgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate apavāde utsargakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6200_1: prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti ke api aṇkṛtam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6200_2: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na apavāde utsargakṛtam bhavati iti yat ayam śyanādīn
GS24pmbhasuu:6200_3: kān cit śitaḥ karoti . śnam śnā śnuḥ iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:6202_0: tatra na jñāyate kaḥ utsargaḥ kaḥ apavādaḥ iti . tatra vaktyam : ayam utsargaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6202_1: apavādaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ . yak utsargaḥ . apavādaḥ śabdādiḥ syādayaḥ ca . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:6203_0: apavādvipratiṣedhāt śabādibhiḥ syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . śabādīnām avakāśaḥ pacati
GS24pmbhasuu:6203_1: yajati . syādīnām avakāśaḥ pakṣyate yakṣyate . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pakṣyati yakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6203_2: . paratvāt śabādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . apavādaḥ nāma anekalakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6203_3: nāma bhavati yatra anekalakṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yak vidhīyate kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6204: kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yakam kartari śabādayaḥ bādheran . evam tarhi yakśapau utsargau . apavādāḥ śyanādaya syādayaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6205: apavādavipratiṣedhāt śyanādibādhanam . apavādvipratiṣedhāt śyanādibhiḥ syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . śyanādīnām avakāśaḥ dīvyati sīvyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_0: syādīnām avakāśaḥ pakṣyati yakṣyati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . deviṣyati seviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_1: . paratvāt śyanādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_2: . śap ca syādibhiḥ bādhyate . tatra divādibhyaḥ syādiviṣaye śap eva na asti kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_3: śyanādayaḥ . tat tarhi śapaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6206_4: . kva prakṛtam . kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6207: divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6208: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6209: sārvadhātuke yak syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari śap syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . divādibhyaḥ śyan syatāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:6210: lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lāvasthāyām eva syādayaḥ . sārvadhātuke śyanādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6212: sip utsargaḥ chandasi kartavyaḥ . sanādyante neṣatvādyarthaḥ . sanādyante ca kartavyaḥ . kim prajojanam . neṣatvādyarthaḥ . indraḥ naḥ tena neṣatu .
GS24pmbhasuu:6213: gā vaḥ neṣṭāt . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham . prakṛtyantaratvāt siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6214: . prkṛtyantaram neṣatiḥ . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti darśanāt . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6217: svarārthaḥ . anudāttau suppitau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6218_0: pitkaraṇānarthakyam ca anackatvāt . pitkaraṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anackatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6218_1: . anackaḥ ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena pakāreṇa anubandhena . iṭi kṛte sāckaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6218_2: bhaviṣyati . iṭaḥ anudāttārtham iti cet āgamānudāttatvāt siddham . āgamānudāttatvena
GS24pmbhasuu:6219: . evam tarhi sap ayam kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . yat eva yāsiṣīṣṭhāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_0: ekājlakṣaṇaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . kva ayam akāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_1: . lopaḥ asya bhaviṣyati ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_2: arthaḥ svarārthena pakāreṇa anubandhena . evam api kartavyaḥ eva . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_3: . anudāttasya lopaḥ yathā syāt . udāttasya mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6220_4: prasajyeta . siP bahulam chandasi ṇit . sip bahulam chandasi ṇit vaktavyaḥ . savitā
GS24pmbhasuu:6222_0: (P_3,1.35) KA_II,44.11-18 Ro_III,114-115 kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kāsgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6222_1: cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . cakāsām cakāra . na kartavyam . cakāspratayayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6222_2: iti vakṣyāmi . cakāsgrahaṇe kāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kāsām cakre . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:6222_3: ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam kāsgrahaṇe cakāsaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6222_4: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . cakāsśabde kāsśabdaḥ asti . tatra kāspratyayāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6223: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . arthavataḥ kāsśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca cakāsśabde kāsśabdaḥ arthavān . evam tarhi kāsi anekācaḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6224: kim prayojanam . culumpādyartham . culumpām cakāra daridrām cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_0: (P_3,1.36.1) KA_II,44.20-46.9 Ro_III,115-119 gurumataḥ āmvidhāne liṇnimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_1: . gurumataḥ āmvidhāne liṇnimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iyeṣa uvoṣa . guṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_2: ijādeḥ ca gurumataḥ anṛcchaḥ iti ām prāpnoti . gurumadvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6225_3: . gurumadvacanam kimartham iti cet ṇali uttame yajādipratiṣedhāṛtham . gurumadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6226: cet ṇali uttame yajādīnām mā bhūt iti . iyaja aham uvapa aham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6227: upadeśavacanāt siddham . upadeśe gurumataḥ iti vaktavyam . yadi upadeśagrahaṇam kriyate uccheḥ ām vaktavyaḥ . vyucchām cakāra iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_0: ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ uccheḥ āmbhāvasya . yat ayam anṛcchaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_1: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tugnimittā yasya gurumattā bhavati tasmāt ām iti . sa tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_2: jñāpakārthaḥ ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nanu ca avaśyam prāptyarthaḥ api vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_3: . na arthaḥ prāptyarthena . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇavacanam jñāpakam na ṛccheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_4: liṭi ām bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . artyartham etat syāt . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_5: ṛccheḥ liṭi guṇaḥ ucyamānaḥ artyarthaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt . ṛcchiḥ liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_6: na asti iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate . tat yathā . tiṣṭhateḥ it jighrateḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_7: iti caṅi tiṣṭhatijighratī na staḥ iti kṛtvā prakṛtyartham vijñāyate . kim punaḥ arteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6228_8: guṇavacane prayojanam . āratuḥ āruḥ etat rūpam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_0: kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . dvirvacane kṛte savarṇadīrghatve ca yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_1: grahaṇam ṝkārāntānām liṭi guṇaḥ bhavati iti guṇe kṛte raparate aratuḥ aruḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_2: rūpam prasajyeta . atha abhyāsagrahaṇena grahaṇam uḥ attvam raparatvam halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_3: ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ atuḥ uḥ iti vacanam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_4: śrūyeta . guṇa punaḥ sati guṇe kṛte raparatve ca dvirvacanam ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_5: . tataḥ siddham bhavati yathā āṭatuḥ āṭuḥ iti . kim punaḥ savarṇadīrghatvam tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6229_6: bhavati na punaḥ uḥ attvam . paratvāt uḥ attvena bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_0: antaraṅgatvāt . antaraṅgam savarṇadīrghatvam . bahiraṅgam uḥ attvam . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_1: . varṇau āśritya savarṇadīrghatvam . aṅgasya uḥ attvam . uḥ attvam api antaraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_2: . katham . vakṣyati etat . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ iti . ubhayoḥ antaraṅgayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6230_3: paratvāt uḥ attvam . uḥ attve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:6231: raparatvam halādiśeṣaḥ ataḥ ādeḥ iti dīrghatvam parasya rūpasya yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6232: . siddham bhavati āratuḥ āruḥ iti . atha api katham cit arteḥ liṭi guṇena arthaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ṛcchatyṝtām iti ṛkāraḥ api nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6233: katham . ayam . ṛcchati ṛ ṛtām ṛcchatyṝtām iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6234: cakratuḥ cakruḥ iti . saṃyogādigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6235: saṃyogādeḥ eva akevalasya na anyasya akevalasya iti . tat etat antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6236_0: arteḥ liṭi guṇavacanam rūpam siddham antareṇa ca ṛcchigrahaṇam arteḥ liṭi guṇaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6236_1: . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ ṛcchipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ uccheḥ vā ām vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6237: kasmāt na bhavati iyeṣa uvoṣa . uktam vā .kim uktam . sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6239: ūrṇoteḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . prorṇunāva . na vaktavyam . vācyaḥ ūrṇoḥ ṇuvadbhāvaḥ . yaṅprasiddhiḥ prayojanam . āmaḥ ca pratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6240: ekācaḥ ca iḍupagrahāt . atha vā ukāraḥ api atra nirdiśyate . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6241: avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . anṛccha u anṛccho dayāyāsaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6242: (P_3,1.38) KA_II,46.17-21 Ro_III,120 videḥ ām kit . videḥ ām kit
GS24pmbhasuu:6243_0: vaktavyaḥ . vidām cakāra . na vaktavyaḥ . vidiḥ akārāntaḥ . yadi akārāntaḥ vetti
GS24pmbhasuu:6243_1: iti guṇaḥ na sidhyati . liṭsanniyogena . evam api viveda iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6243_2: āmsanniyogena . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti . videḥ ām kit nipātanāt vā aguṇatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6244: (P_3,1.39) KA_II,46.23-47.2 Ro_III,120-121 śluvadatideśe kim prayojanam . śluvadatideśe prayojanam dvitvettve . bibharām cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:6246: anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6247: bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam astibhūpratiṣedhārtham . kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6248: astibhūpratiṣedhārtham . astibhuvoḥ anuprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6250: anuprayogavacanam kriyate . ātmanepadam yathā syāt . ucyamāne api etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:6251: avaśyam ātmanepadārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . astibhūpratiṣedhārthena ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:6252: na arthaḥ . iṣṭaḥ sarvānuprayogaḥ . sarveṣām eva kṛbhvastīnām anuprayogaḥ iṣyate . kim iṣyate eva āhosvit prāpnoti api . iṣyate ca prāpnoti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6253: katham . kṛñ iti na etat dhātugrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6254: kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . kṛbhvastiyoge iti ataḥ prabhṛti ā kṛñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6255: ñakārāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam arthābhāvāt . sarvānuprayogaḥ iti cet aśiṣyam kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam . kim kāraṇam . arthābhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_0: āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_1: . idam tarhi prayojanam . kṛbhvastīnām eva anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt pacādīnām mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_2: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya . arthābhāvāt ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6256_3: siddham . kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ . kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ pacādayaḥ . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6257: eva viśeṣavācinoḥ eva va prayogaḥ bhavati . tatra viśeṣavācinaḥ utpattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6258: sāmānyavācinaḥ anuprayokṣyante . liṭparārtham vā . liṭparārtham tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . liṭparasya eva anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6259: anyaparasya mā bhūt iti . kimparasya punaḥ prāpnoti . laṭparasya . na laṭparasya anuprayogeṇa bhūtakālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt . niṣṭhāparasya tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6260: naniṣṭhāparasya anuprayogeṇa puruṣopagrahau viśeiṣitau syātām . luṅparasya tarhi . na luṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ bhūtakālaḥ viśeṣitaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6261: laṅparasya tarhi . na laṅparasya anuprayogeṇa anadyatanaḥ parokṣaḥ kālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6262: viśeṣitaḥ syāt . ayam tarhi bhūte parokṣe anadyatane laṅ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_0: haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti . tatparasya mā bhūt iti . atat api na asti prayojanam . ekasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_1: ākṛteḥ caritaḥ prayogaḥ dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca na bhavati . tat yathā goṣu svāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_2: aśveṣu ca iti . na ca bhavati goṣu ca aśvānām ca svāmī iti . arthasamāpteḥ vā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_3: na syāt arthasamāpteḥ tarhi anuprayogaḥ na syāt . āmantena parisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6263_4: kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . idānīm eva uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6264: āmantam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . viparyāsanivṛttyartham vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6265: viparyāsanivṛttyartham tarhi kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . īhām cakre . cakre īhām iti mā bhūt . vyavahitnivṛttyartham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6266: vyavahitnivṛttyartham ca kṛñaḥ anuprayogavacanam kriyate . anv eva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6267: anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . īhām cakre . vyavahitasya mā bhūt . īhām devadattaḥ cakre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6268_0: (P_3,1.43) KA_II,49.2-50.28 Ro_III,125-130 kva ayam cliḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6268_1: . sijādayaḥ ādeśāḥ ucyante . yad na kva cit śrūyate kimarthaḥ tarhi cluḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6268_2: kriyate . na sic utsargaḥ eva kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6269_0: tasya ksādayaḥ apavādāḥ bhaviṣyanti . ata uttaram paṭhati . clyutsargaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6269_1: . cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ . mantra
GS24pmbhasuu:6269_2: ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ leḥ iti . tatra avarataḥ trayāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:6270: grahaṇam kartavyam syāt . caṅaṅoḥ sicaḥ ca . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6271: clisampratyayārthaḥ . ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane clisampratyayārthaḥ cliḥ utsargaḥ kriyate . cleḥ aniṭaḥ ksaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . ghasḷbhāve ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_0: ghasḷbhāve ca clav eva kṛte lṛditaḥ iti aṅ siddhaḥ bhavati . atha citkaraṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_1: . cleḥ citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇāṛtham . cleḥ citkaraṇam kriyate viśeṣaṇārtham . kva viśeṣaṇārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_2: arthaḥ . cleḥ sic iti . leḥ sic iti ucyamāne liṅliṭoḥ api prasajyeta . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6272_3: prayojanam . luṅi iti ucyate . na ca luṅi liṅliṭau bhavataḥ . atha iditkaraṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_0: sāmānyagrahaṇārtham . kva sāmānyagrahaṇārthena arthaḥ . mantre ghasahvaraṇaśavṛdahādvṛckṛgamijanibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_1: leḥ iti āmaḥ iti ca . ikāre ca idānīm sāmānyagrahaṇārthe kriyamāṇe avaśyam sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_2: cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ cakāreṇa . atra eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_3: yat tāvat ucyate clyutsargaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ iti . kriyamāṇe api vai clyutsarge
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_4: tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni bhavanti . clu luṅi cleḥ sic leḥ iti . yat etat leḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_5: tat parārtham bhaviṣyati . katham . yat etat gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6274_6: iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam etat leḥ iti vakṣyāmi . yadi leḥ iti ucyate dheṭaḥ cātuḥśabdyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6275: adadhat adhāt adhāsīt . adadhāt iti api prāpnoti . na caṅaḥ luki
GS24pmbhasuu:6276: dvirvacanena bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . caṅi iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6277: caṅam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . bahuvacane tarhi cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6278: adadhan adhuḥ adhāsiṣuḥ . adhān iti api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ātaḥ iti jusbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . sijgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_0: sijgrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . yadi nivartate abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_1: prāpnoti . evam tarhi luk sijapavādaḥ vijñāsyate . yadi luk sijapavādaḥ vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6279_2: mā hi dātām mā hi dhātām iti atra ādiḥ sicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6280: anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt na etat śakyam vaktum luk sijapavādaḥ iti . na cet ucyate abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:6281_0: jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt ātaḥ iti atra sijgrahaṇam anuvartyam . tasmin ca anuvartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:6281_1: dheṭaḥ cātuḥśabdyam prāpnoti . tasmāt gātisthāghupābhūbhyaḥ sicaḥ parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6281_2: iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe tāni eva trīṇi grahaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6281_3: bhavanti cli luṅi cleḥ sic leḥ iti . yat api ucyate ksavidhāne ca aniḍvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6282: clisampratyayārthaḥ iti . dhātum eva atra aniṭvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . dhātoḥ aniṭaḥ iti . katham punaḥ dhātuḥ nāma aniṭ syāt . dhātuḥ eva aniṭ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6283_0: . animittam vā iṭaḥ aniṭaḥ na vā tasmāt iṭ asti saḥ ayam aniṭ iti . atha dhātau viśeṣyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6283_1: kva yaḥ aniṭ iti viśeṣayiṣyasi . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6283_2: bhūyiṣṭhebhyaḥ prāpnoti . bhūyiṣṭhāḥ hi śalantāḥ igupadhāḥ niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6283_3: vijñāyate liṭi yaḥ aniṭ iti na kutaḥ cit prāpnoti . sarve his śalantāḥ igupadhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6283_4: liṭi seṭaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dhātau viśeṣyamāṇe etayoḥ viśeṣayoḥ viśeṣayiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6284: sāmānyena iṭaḥ vidhipratiṣedhau . kva sāmanyena . valādau ārdhadhātuke .
GS24pmbhasuu:6285: yat api ucyate ghasḷbhāve ca iti . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6286: anavasthiteṣu pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye ghasḷbhāve kṛte lṛditaḥ iti aṅ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6288: viśeṣaṇārthaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . sici vṛddhiḥ parasmaipadeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6289: iti . sau vṛddhiḥ iti ucyamāne agniḥ vāyuḥ iti atra api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam . parasmaipadeṣu iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6290_0: parasmaipadam paśyāmaḥ . svarārthaḥ tarhi . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6290_1: yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . anackaḥ ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_0: bhaviṣyati . tatra pratyayādyudāttatvena iṭaḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_1: . āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sicaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_2: citkaraṇānarthakyam sthānivatvāt . sicaḥ citkaraṇam narthayam . kim kāraṇam . sthānivatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_3: . sthānivadbhāvāt cit bhaviṣyati . arthavat tu citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_4: . arthavat tu citkaraṇam . kaḥ arthaḥ . citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_5: . na aprāpte pratyayasvare āgamānudāttatvam ārabhyate . tat yathā eva pratyayasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_6: bādhate evam sthānivadbhāvāt api yā prāptiḥ tām api bādheta . tasmāt citkaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_7: tasmāt cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . atha iditkaraṇam kimartham . iditkaraṇam nakāralopābhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_8: . iditkaraṇam kriyate nakāralopaḥ mā bhūt iti . amaṃsta amaṃsthāḥ . aniditām halaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6291_9: upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti . na vā hanteḥ sicaḥ kitkaraṇam nakāralopābhāvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:6292: na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam hanaḥ sic iti hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6293: sicaḥ kittvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na sijantasya nakārlopaḥ bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6294: . sici eva nalopaḥ yathā syāt . parasmin nimitte mā bhūt iti . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ sici vā nalope sati parasmin vā nimitte . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6295_0: sici nalope sati nalopasya asiddhatvāt akāralopaḥ na bhavati . parasmin punaḥ nimitte
GS24pmbhasuu:6295_1: nalope sati akāralopaḥ prāpnoti . samānāśrayam asiddham vyāśrayam ca idam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:6295_2: ca parasmin api nimitte nalope sati akāralopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6296_0: bhaviṣyati . katham . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti ṭat etat hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6296_1: sicaḥ kitkaraṇam jñāpakam eva na sijantasya nalopaḥ bhavati iti . idittvāt vā sthānivattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6296_2: . atha api anena iditā arthaḥ syāt . ayam ādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt idit bhaviṣyati.
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_0: (P_3,1.44.2) KA_II,52.9-53.5 Ro_III,133-135 spṛśamṛśakṛṣatṛpadṛpaḥ sic vā . spṛśmṛśakṛṣatṛpadṛpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_1: sic vā iti vaktavyam . spṛśa . aspṛkṣat asprākṣīt . spṛśa . mṛśa . amṛkṣat amrākṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_2: . mṛśa . kṛṣa . akṛkṣat akrākṣīt . kṛṣa . tṛpa . atṛpat atrāpsīt . tṛpa . dṛpa .
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_3: adṛpat adrapsīt kim prayojanam . sic yathā syāta . atha ksaḥ siddhaḥ . siddhaḥ śalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_4: igupadhāt aniṭaḥ iti . sic api siddhaḥ . katham . cleḥ citkaraṇam pratyākhyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_5: . tatra clau eva jhallakṣaṇe amāgame kṛte vihatanimittatvāt ksaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_6: yadi evam antyasaya sijādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . siddham tu sicaḥ yāditvāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6297_7: . katham . yādiḥ sic kariṣyate . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_0: luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . caṅaṅoḥ katham . caṅaṅoḥ praśliṣṭanirdeśāt siddham . caṅaṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_1: api praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam : ca aṅ caṅ a aṅ aṅ . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_2: bhaviṣyati . ciṇaḥ katham . ciṇaḥ anittvāt siddham . ciṇaḥ anittvāt siddham . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_3: idam anittvāt . antyasya ayam sthāne bhavan na pratyayaḥ syāt . asatyāyām pratyayasañjñayām
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_4: itsañjñā na. asatyām itsañjñāyām lopaḥ na . asati lope anekāl . yadā anekāl tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_5: sarvādeśaḥ . yadā sarvādeśaḥ tadā prayayaḥ . yadā pratyayaḥ tadā itsañjñā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_6: itsañjñā tadā lopaḥ . evam ca tatra vārttikakārasya nirṇayaḥ saprayojanam citkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6298_7: iti . api ca traiśabdyam na prakalpate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6299: aspṛkṣat asprākṣīt aspārkṣīt iti na sidhyati . sici punaḥ sati vibhāṣā sic . sici api jhallakṣaṇaḥ amāgamaḥ vibhāṣā . yasya khalu api amā nimittam na
GS24pmbhasuu:6300: vihanyate saḥ syāt eva . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate spṛśmṛśakṛṣatṛpadṛpaḥ sic vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6303: guṇanimittatvāt . ksavidhāne igupadhābhāvaḥ . kim kāraṇam . cleḥ guṇanimittatvāt . cliḥ guṇanimittam . tatra clau eva guṇe kṛte igupadhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6304: iti ksaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā ksasya anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ guṇasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ksasya anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśaḥ ksaḥ guṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6305_0: bādhiṣyate . aniḍvacanam aviśeṣaṇam cleḥ nityādiṣṭatvāt . aniḍvacanam aviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6305_1: . kim kāraṇam . cleḥ nityādiṣṭatvāt . nityādiṣṭaḥ cliḥ na kva cit śrūyate . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6305_2: cleḥ aniṭaḥ iti ksaḥ na prāpnoti . na vā ksasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6306_0: sijapavādatvāt tasya ca aniḍāśrayatvāt aniṭi prasiddhe ksaviddhiḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6306_1: . kim kāraṇam . ksasya sijapavādatvāt . sijapavādaḥ ksaḥ . saḥ ca aniḍāśrayaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6306_2: ca apavādaviṣaye upasargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6307: utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit sic bhavati . apavādam ksam pratīkṣate . ksasya sijapavādatvāt tasya ca aniḍāśrayatvāt aniṭtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6308: prasiddham . aniṭi prasiddhe ksaviddhiḥ . aniṭi prasiddhe ksaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6309: . sic idānīm kva bhaviṣyati . śeṣe sijvidhānam . śeṣe sijvidhānam bhaviṣyati . akoṣīt amoṣīt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6311: niyamārtham . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane eva ksaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt :
GS24pmbhasuu:6312_0: upāśliṣat jatu ca kāṣṭham ca . samāśliṣat brāhmaṇakulam iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:6312_1: . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane niyamānupapattiḥ vidheyabhāvāt . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane niyamasya anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6312_2: . kim kāraṇam . vidheyabhāvāt . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6312_3: iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_0: . puṣādipāṭhāt aṅ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārthaḥ ksaḥ vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_1: astu niyamaḥ vā iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ syāt na niyamaḥ . kim ca syāt yadi ayam niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_2: na syāt . ātmanepadeṣu āliṅgane ca ksaḥ prasajyeta . yathā eva ca ksaḥ aṅam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:6313_3: evam ciṇam api bādheta . upāśleṣi kanyā devadattena iti . siddham tu śliṣaḥ āliṅgane
GS24pmbhasuu:6314: katham . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane aciṇviṣaye ksaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . aṅvidhāne ca śliṣaḥ anāliṅgane . aṅvidhāne ca śliṣaḥ anāliṅgane iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6315: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6316: śliṣaḥ āliṅgane niyamānupapattiḥ vidheyabhāvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6317: yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . śliṣaḥ . śliṣaḥ ksaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam . puṣādipāṭhāt aṅ prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6318: tataḥ āliṅgane . āliṅgane ca śliṣaḥ ksaḥ bhavati . idam idānīm kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6319: niyamārtham . śliṣaḥ āliṅgane eva . kva mā bhūt . upāśliṣat jatu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6320: kāṣṭham ca . samāśliṣat brāhmaṇakulam iti . yat api ucyate yathā eva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6321: ksaḥ aṅam bādhate evam ciṇam api bādheta iti . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_0: vidhīn bādhante na uttarān iti evam ksaḥ aṅam bādhiṣyate . ciṇam na bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6322_1: atha vā tatra vakṣyati : ciṇgrahaṇasya prayojanam ciṇ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:6323_0: (P_3,1.48) KA_II,55.2-16 Ro_III,138-139 ṇiśridrusruṣu kameḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ṇiśridrusruṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6323_1: kameḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nākam iṣṭamukham yānti suyuktaiḥ vaḍavārathaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6323_2: atha patkāṣīṇaḥ yānti ye acīkamatabhāṣiṇaḥ . karmakartari ca . karmakartari ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6324: kartavyam . kārayati kaṭam devadattaḥ . acīkarata kaṭaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6325_0: ucchrayayati kaṭam devadattaḥ . audaśiśriyata kaṭaḥ svayam eva . na vā karmaṇi avidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6325_1: kartṛtvāt ca karmakartuḥ siddham . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . karmaṇi avidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6325_2: . na hi kaḥ cit karmaṇi vidhīyate yaḥ caṅam bādheta . kartṛtvāt ca karmakartuḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:6326_0: kartṛtvam iti kṛtvā caṅ bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ayam karmaṇi vidhīyate . ciṇ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6326_1: iti . pratiṣidhyete tatra yakciṇau . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6327: udapupucchata gauḥ svayam eva . atra api yathā bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti tathā bhavitavyam pratiṣedhena . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñām
GS24pmbhasuu:6331: . kim ucyate ātmanepadārtham iti . na punaḥ parasmaipadārtham api syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6332: puṣāditvāt . puṣādipāṭhāt parasmaipadeṣu aṅ bhaviṣyati . karmakartari ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6333: karmakartari ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . paryāsthetām kuṇḍale svayam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6334: . atra api na vā karmaṇi avidhānāt kartṛtvāt ca karmakartuḥ siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6335: (P_3,1.58) KA_II,56.2-6 Ro_III,140 idam lucigrahaṇam gluñcigrahaṇam ca kriyate . anyatarat śakyam akartum . katham . yadi tāvat glucigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6336: kriyate gluñcigrahaṇam na kariṣyate . tena eva siddham nyaglucat nyaglocīt . idam idānīm gluñceḥ rūpam nyagluñcīt . atha gluñcigrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6337: gluceḥ grahaṇam na kariṣyate . tena eva siddham nyaglucat nyagluñcīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6339: (P_3,1.60) KA_II,56.8-9 Ro_III,141 ayam taśabdaḥ asti eva ātmanepadam asti parasmaipadam asti ekavacanam asti bahuvacanam . kasya idam grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6340: . yaḥ padeḥ asti . kaḥ ca padeḥ asti . padiḥ ayam ātmanepadī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6341_0: (P_3,1.66) KA_II,56.11-13 Ro_III,141 ciṇ iti vartamāne punaḥ ciṇgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6341_1: . na iti evam tat abhūt . vidhyartham idam . atha vā vā iti evam tat abhūt . nityārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6341_2: idam . atha vā ciṇ iti vartamāne punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6342: ciṇgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam . ciṇ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6345: dvivacanabahuvacanāni udāhriyante . pacyete* odanau , pacyante odanāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6346: . bhāve punaḥ ekavacanam eva : āsyate bhavatā , āsyate bhavadbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6347_0: āsyate bhavadbhiḥ iti . kena etat evam bhavati . karma anekam . tasya anekatvāt dvivacanabahuvacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6347_1: bhavanti . bhāvaḥ punaḥ ekaḥ eva . katham tarhi iha dvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6348: . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati bhāvaḥ tasya bhedāt dvivacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti . iha api tarhi yāvantaḥ tām kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_0: kurvanti sarve te tasyāḥ āśrayā bhavanti . tadbhedāt dvivacanabahuvacanāni prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_1: . evam tarhi idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . kim abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate . pākau
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_2: pākāḥ iti . yadi tāvat pākaviśeṣān abhisamīkṣya yaḥ ca odanasya pākaḥ yaḥ ca guḍasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6349_3: yaḥ ca tilānām bahavaḥ te śabdāḥ sarūpāḥ ca . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam ekaśeṣaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6350: tadā bhāve bahuvacanam śrūyate . tat yathā : uṣṭṛāsikā āsyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:6351: hataśāyikāḥ śayyante iti . atha kālaviśeṣān abhisamīkṣya yaḥ ca adyatanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6352: pākaḥ yaḥ hyastanaḥ yaḥ śvastanaḥ te api bahavaḥ śabdāḥ sarūpāḥ ca . tatra yuktam bahuvacanam ekaśeṣaḥ ca . tiṅabhihite ca api tadā bhāve asārūpyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6353: ekaśeṣaḥ na bhavati . āsi āsyate , āsiṣyate . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya ca . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat
GS24pmbhasuu:6354: bhavati . kim idam dravyavat iti . dravyam kriyayā samavāyam gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6355_0: kam samavāyam . dravyam kriyābhinirvṛttau sādhanatvam upaiti . tadvat ca asya bhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6355_1: kṛdabhihitasya bhavati . pākaḥ vartate iti . kriyāvat na bhavati . kim idam kriyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:6355_2: iti . kriyā kriyayā samavāyam na gacchati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6356: pacati paṭhati iti . tadvac ca asya kṛtabhihitasya na bhavati . pākaḥ vartate iti . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6357: tiṅabhihitasya ca . tiṅabhihitena bhāvena kālapuruṣopagrahāḥ abhivyajyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6358: . kṛdabhihitena punaḥ na vyajyante . asti khalu api viśeṣaḥ kṛdabhihitasya bhāvasya tiṅabhihitasya ca . tiṅabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ kartrā samprayujyate.
GS24pmbhasuu:6359: kṛdabhihitaḥ punaḥ na samprayujyate . yāvatā kim cit sāmānyam kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:6360: viśeṣaḥ yuktam yat ayam api viśeṣaḥ syāt liṅgakṛtaḥ saṅkhyākṛtaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_0: bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ vā syuḥ vikaraṇārthāḥ vā iti . katham ca sārvadhātukārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6362_1: syuḥ katham vā vikaraṇārthāḥ . bhāvakarmavācini sārvadhātuke yak bhavati kartṛvācini
GS24pmbhasuu:6363: sārvadhātukārthāḥ . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yag bhavati sārvadhātuke kartari śap
GS24pmbhasuu:6364: bhavati sārvadhātuke iti vikaraṇārthāḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6365_0: bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamānupapattiḥ atadarthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6365_1: . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamasya anupapattiḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6366: ekatvādayaḥ eva vibhaktyarthāḥ . kim tarhi bhāvakarmakartāraḥ api . santu tarhi vikaraṇārthāḥ . vikaraṇārthāḥ iti cet kṛtā abhihite vikaraṇābhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6367: vikaraṇārthāḥ iti cet kṛtā abhihite vikaraṇaḥ na prāpnoti . dhārayaḥ pārayaḥ iti . kim ucyate kṛtā abhihite . na lena api abhidhānam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6368: aśakyam lena abhidhānam āśrayitum . pakṣāntaram idam āsthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6369: bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ vā syuḥ vikaraṇārthāḥ vā iti . yadi ca lena api abhidhānam syāt na idam pakṣāntaram syāt . katham aśakyam yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:6370: bhavān eva āha laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6371_0: laḥ karmaṇaḥ bhāvāt ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yasmin tarhi le vikaraṇāḥ na śrūyante kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6371_1: tatra bhāvakarmakartṝn abhidhāsyati . kva ca na śrūyante . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6371_2: ca . atra api ukte kartṛtve luk bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6372_0: yasmin tarhi le vikaraṇāḥ na eva utpadyante kaḥ tatra bhāvakarmakartṝn abhidhāsyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6372_1: . kva ca na eva utpadyante . liṅliṭoḥ . tasmāt na etat śakyam vaktum . na lena abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6373_0: vikaraṇābhāvaḥ eva . evam tarhi idam syāt . yadā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ laḥ tadā kartari vikaraṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6373_1: . yadā kartari laḥ tadā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ vikaraṇāḥ . idam asya yadi eva svābhāvikam
GS24pmbhasuu:6373_2: atha api vācanikam : prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārtham saha brūtaḥ iti . na ca asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6373_3: sambhavaḥ yat ekasyāḥ prakṛteḥ dvayoḥ nānārthayoḥ yugapat anusahāyībhāvaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6374: ekapakṣībhūtam idam bhavati : sārvadhātukārthāḥ eva iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6375: bhāvakarmakartāraḥ sārvadhātukārthāḥ cet ekadvibahuṣu niyamānupapattiḥ atadarthatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6376_0: eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām . prasiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6376_1: niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā . atha vā prakṛtān
GS24pmbhasuu:6376_2: arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6377: ekatvādayaḥ . ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na dvayoḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6379: (P_3,1.67.3) KA_II,58.24-60.11 Ro_III,149-153 bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yagvidhāne karmakartari upasaṅkhyānam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yagvidhāne karmakartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6380: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacyate svayam eva . paṭhyate svayam eva . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vipratiṣedhāt hi śapaḥ balīyastvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6381_0: vipratiṣedhāt hi śapaḥ balīyastvam prāpnoti . śapaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacati paṭhati . yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6381_1: avakāśaḥ . pacyate odanaḥ devadattena . paṭhyate vidyā devadattena . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6381_2: prāpnoti . pacyate svayam eva . paṭhyate svayam eva . paratvāt śap prāpnoti . yogavibhāgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6381_3: siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ciṇ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . sārvadhātuke yak bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6381_4: . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca yak bhavati bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . yathā eva tarhi karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:6381_5: kartari yak bhavati evam bhāve kartari prāpnoti . eti jīvantam ānandaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6382: na asya kim cit rujati rogaḥ iti . dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ciṇ bhāve . tataḥ karmaṇi . karmaṇi ca ciṇ bhavati . tataḥ sārvadhātuke yak
GS24pmbhasuu:6383: bhavati bhāve ca karmaṇi ca . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca yak bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6384: karmaṇi iti anuvartate . bhāve iti nivṛttam . tataḥ śap . śap ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6385: kartari iti eva . karmaṇi iti api nivṛttam . evam api upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6386_0: kartavyam . vipratiṣedhāt hi śyanaḥ balīyastvam prāpnoti . śyanaḥ avakāśaḥ . dīvyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6386_1: sīvyati . yakaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacyate odanaḥ devadattena . paṭhyate vidyā devadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:6386_2: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dīvyate svayam eva . sīvyate svayam eva . paratvāt śyan
GS24pmbhasuu:6386_3: prāpnoti . nanu ca etat api yogavibhāgāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6387: siddham . na sidhyati . anantarā yā praptiḥ sā yogavibhāgena śakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6388: bādhitum . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6389_0: parā prāptiḥ apratiṣiddhā . tayā prāpnoti . nanu ca iyam prāptiḥ parām prāptim bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:6389_1: . na utsahate pratiṣiddhā satī bādhitum . evam tarhi śabādeśāḥ śyanādayaḥ kariṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6389_2: . śap ca syādibhiḥ bādhyate . tatra divādibhyaḥ yagviṣaye śap eva na asti kutaḥ śyanādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6390: grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6391: kartari śap iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6392: . divādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī śap iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6393: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam . na ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6394_0: pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ . prakṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6394_1: ca anuvartate . atha vā bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvṛttyā eva siddhe sati anivṛttiḥ yakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6394_2: bhāvāya .iha sārvadhātuke yak iti antareṇa bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvṛttim siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6394_3: saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6395: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti anuvartayati tasya etat prayojanam . karmakartari api yathā syāt . kartari iti ca yogavibhāgaḥ śyanaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhāvacanāya
GS24pmbhasuu:6396_0: . kartari iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ śyanaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedham mā vocam iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6396_1: vā karmavadbhāvavacanasāmarthyāt yak bhaviṣyati . asti anyat karmavadbhāvavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:6396_2: prayojanam . kim . ātmanepadam yathā syāt . vacanāt ātmanepadam bhaviṣyati . ciṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:6396_3: tarhi yathā syāt . ciṇ api vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6397_0: . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ tarhi yathā syāt . na ekam prayojanam yogārambham prayojayati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6397_1: karmavadbhāvavacanasāmarthyāt yak bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6397_2: bhavati karmakartari yak iti yat ayam na
GS24pmbhasuu:6398: duhasnnunamām yakciṇau iti yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6400: āyasyati prayasyati . anupasargāt iti śakyam akartum . katham āyasyati prayasyati . saṃyasaḥ ca iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . sampūrvāt yasaḥ na anyapūrvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6403: sārvadhātukam apit iti ṅittvam . ṅiti iti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6404: bhinatti chinatti iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6405: sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ aṅgasya guṇaḥ ucyate yasmāt ca pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgasañjñam bhavati . yasmāt ca atra pratyayavidhiḥ na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6406: pratyaye parataḥ . yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ārdhadhātukasañjñā mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6407_0: valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . etat api na asti prayojanam . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6407_1: aṅgasya iṭ ucyate . yasmāt ca pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgasañjñam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6407_2: . yasmāt ca atra pratyayavidhiḥ na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6408_0: pratyaye parataḥ . yat ca pratyaye parataḥ na tasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:6408_1: paṭhati . śnami śitkaraṇam pvādihrasvārtham . śnami śitkaraṇam kriyate pvādīnām śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6408_2: hrasvatvam yathā syāt . pṛṇasi mṛṇasi iti . na vā dhātvanyatvāt . na vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_0: dhātvantaram pṛṇimṛṇī . yatra bhūmyām vṛṇase . na eṣaḥ śnam . śnaḥ etat hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_1: . yadi śnaḥ hrasvatvam svaraḥ na sidhyati . vṛṇase . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_2: bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt śnam eṣaḥ . yadi śnam snasoḥ allopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_3: iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate . anupadhātvāt na bhaviṣyati . na saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6409_4: śakhyaḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . aṅktaḥ añjanti . tasmāt śnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6410: . svaraḥ katham . bahulam pit sārvadhātukam chandasi . sārvadhātukasya bhalulam chandasi pittvam vaktavyam . pitaḥ ca apittvam dṛśyate apitaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6411_0: pittvam . pitaḥ tāvat apittvam . mātaram pramiṇīmi janitrīm . apitaḥ pittvam . śṛṇota
GS24pmbhasuu:6411_1: grāvāṇaḥ . tat tarhi hrasvatvam vaktavyam . avaśyam chandasi hrasvatvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6411_2: upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti evamartham . viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6412: . śnāt nalopaḥ iti . nāt nalopaḥ iti ucyamāne yajñānām yatnānām iti atra api prasajyeta . dīrghatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6413: dīrghatvam kriyatām nalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt na lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6414: syāt . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api śakāre iha kasmāt na bhavati . viśnānām praśnānām iti . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_0: pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate na tanādibhyaḥ iti eva ucyate . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_1: bhūvan iti . kāni . anunāsikalopādīni . daivaraktāḥ kiṃsukāḥ . anunāsikābhāvāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_2: anunāsikalopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi tanādikāryam mā bhūt tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6416_3: iti . nanu ca bhavati eva atra hrasvāt aṅgāt iti . tena eva yathā syāt . anena mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6417: viśeṣaḥ tena vā sati anena vā . tena sati sijlopasya asiddhatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . anena punaḥ sati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6418: anena api sati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham . vibhāṣā luk . yadā na luk
GS24pmbhasuu:6419_0: tadā tena lopaḥ . tatra sijlopasya asiddhatvāt ciṇvadbhāvaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . tanāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6419_1: kṛñaḥ siddham sijlope ca na duṣyati . ciṇvadbhāve atra doṣaḥ syāt . saḥ api proktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6419_2: vibhāṣayā (P_3,1.80) KA_II,62.10-22 Ro_III,156-157 kva ayam akāraḥ śrūyate . na kva
GS24pmbhasuu:6419_3: cit śrūyate . lopaḥ asya bhavati ataḥ lopaḥ ārdhadhātuke iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6419_4: kimartham atvam ucyate na lopaḥ eva ucyate . na evam śakyam . lope hi sati guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6419_5: prasajyeta . nanu ca lope api sati na
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_0: dhātulope ārdhadhātuke iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . ārdhadhātukanimitte lope saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . na ca eṣaḥ ārdhadhātukanimittaḥ lopaḥ . api ca pratyākhyāyate saḥ yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6420_2: . tasmin pratyākhyāte guṇaḥ syāt eva . tasmāt atvam vaktavyam . atha kimartham numanuṣaktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6421: dhivikṛvyoḥ iti eva ucyate . dhivikṛvyoḥ iti ucyamāne atve kṛte aniṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:6422: deśe num prasajyeta . idam iha sampradhāryam . atvam kriyatām num iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6449_0: liṅgavyatyayaḥ . madhoḥ gṛhṇāti . madhoḥ tṛptāḥ iva āsate . madhunaḥ iti prāpte .

GS24pmbhasuu:6461: tulyakriyaḥ iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra api hi karmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ kartā . na tulyakriyagrahaṇena samānakriyatvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6462: . kim tarhi . yasmin karmaṇi kartṛbhūte api tadvat kriya lakṣyate yathā karmaṇi saḥ karmaṇā tulyakriyaḥ kartā karmavat bhavati iti .
