GS24pmbhasuu:6466: bhinatti . tathā karma dṛṣṭaḥ cet samānadhātau . karma dṛṣṭaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:6467: samānadhātau iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pacati odanam devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6468: rādhyati odhanaḥ svayam eva . tathā karmasthabhāvakānam karmasthakriyāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:6469: ca . karmasthabhāvakānam karmasthakriyāṇām vā kartā karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . kartṛsthabhāvakānām kartṛsthakriyāṇām vā kartā karmavat mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_0: bhūt iti . yat tāvat ucyate akarmakasya kartā karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_1: . na vaktavyam . vakṣyati etat . sakarmakāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ anyonyam āśliṣyataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_2: . yat api ucyate karma dṛṣṭaḥ cet samānadhātau iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6470_3: dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ katurḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6471_0: ayam karmavadbhāvaḥ atidiśyate . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam yasya dhātoḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6471_1: karma tasya cet kartā syāt iti . tat yathā dhātoḥ karmaṇi aṇ bhavati iti . tatra

GS24pmbhasuu:6473: karmasthabhāvakānam karmasthakriyāṇām vā kartā karmavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . kartṛsthabhāvakānām kartṛsthakriyāṇām vā kartā karmavat mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6474: bhūt iti . na vaktavyam . karmasthayā kriyayā ayam kartāram upamimīte . na ca kartṛsthabhāvakānām kartṛsthakriyāṇām vā karmaṇi kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ asti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6512: bhūṣākarmakiratisanām ca anyatra ātmanepadāt . bhūṣākarmakiratisanām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ anyatra ātmanepadāt . bhūṣayate kanyā svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6513_0: abubhūṣata kanyā svayam eva . maṇḍayate kanyā svayam eva . amamaṇḍata kanyā svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6513_1: eva . kirati . avakirate hastī svayam eva . avākīrṣṭa hastī svayam eva . san . cikīrṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:6513_2: kaṭaḥ svayam eva . acikīrṣiṣṭa kaṭaḥ svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6515: (P_3,1.89) KA_II,70.9-15 Ro_III,176-177 yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām upasaṅkhyānam . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe hetumaṇṇiśribrūñām
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_0: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṇi . kārayate kaṭaḥ svayam eva . acīkarata kaṭaḥ svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_1: eva . ṇi . śri . ucchrayate daṇḍaḥ svayam eva . udaśiśriyata daṇḍaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6516_2: śri . brūñ . brūte kathā svayam eva . avocata kathā svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6517: eva . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti . yakciṇoḥ pratiṣedhe ṇiśrigranthibrūñātmanepadākarmakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6518: (P_3,1.90) KA_II,70.17-71.23 Ro_III,177-179 kuṣirajoḥ śyanvidhāne sārvadhātukavacanam .kuṣirajoḥ śyanvidhāne sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6519: . avacane hi liṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi sārvadhātukagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6520: liṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ syāt . cukuṣe pādaḥ svayam eva . rarañje vastram svayam eva . koṣiṣīṣṭa pādaḥ svayam eva . raṅkṣīṣṭa vastram svayam
GS24pmbhasuu:6521: eva . kriyamāṇe api sārvadhātukagrahaṇe iha prāpnoti . kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6522: pādāḥ . śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti . koṣiṣyate pādaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6523: raṅkṣyate vastram svayam eva . akoṣi pādaḥ svayam eva . arañji vastram svayam eva . yat tāvat ucyate sārvadhātukagrahaṇam kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6524: prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . sārvadhātuke yak iti . yadi tat anuvartate pūrvasmin yoge kim samuccayaḥ . le ca sārvadhātuke ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6525_0: āhosvit lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ kati iha
GS24pmbhasuu:6525_1: bhindānāḥ kuśūlāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam liṅliṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6525_2: na sidhyati . bibhide kuśūlaḥ svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6526: bhitsīṣṭa kuśūlaḥ svayam eva iti . astu lagrahaṇam sārvadhātukaviśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6527: nanu ca uktam liṅliṭoḥ na sidhyati iti . liṅliḍgrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6528: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . kās pratyayāt ām amantre liṭi liṅi āśiṣi āṅ iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam kati iha kuṣṇāṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6529: pādāḥ iti prāpnoti . atra api laviśiṣṭam sārvadhātukagrahaṇam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6530: yat api ucyate śyanā ca syādīnām bādhanam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6531: yakpratiṣedhasambandhena śyanaṃ vakṣyāmi . na duhasnunamām yakciṇau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6532_0: tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām yakciṇau na bhavataḥ . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca iti . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6532_1: eva tarhi yakaḥ viṣaye śyan bhavati evam ciṇaḥ api viṣaye prāpnoti . akoṣi pādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6532_2: svayam eva . arañji vastram svayam eva iti . evam tarhi dvitīyaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6533: tataḥ yak . yak ca na bhavati duhasnunamām . tataḥ kuṣirajoḥ prācām yak na bhavati . tataḥ śyan parasmaipadam ca . atha vā anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6534: syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ . cli luṅi . cleḥ sic bhavati . kartari śap syatāsī
GS24pmbhasuu:6535: lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati . kuṣirajoḥ prācām śyan parasmaipadam ca syatāsī lṛluṭoḥ cli luṅi cleḥ sic bhavati iti . atha vā antaraṅgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6536: syādayaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . lakārāvasthāyām eva syādayaḥ . sārvadhātuke śyan .
GS24pmbhasuu:6538: dhātvadhikāraḥ . kim prāk lādeśāt āhosvit ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6539_0: dhātuvadhikāraḥ prāk lādeśāt . prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . lādeśe hi vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6539_1: aprasiddhiḥ . anuvartamāne hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāre vyavahitavtā aprasiddhiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6539_2: . kim ca syāt . ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ . ādye yoge vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6540_0: idam iha sampradhāryam . vikaraṇāḥ kriyantām āḍeśāḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6540_1: ādeśāḥ . nityāḥ vikaraṇāḥ . kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu prāpnuvanti akṛteṣu api prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6541: vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt ādeśāḥ na prāpnuvanti . anavakāśaḥ tarhi ādeśāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6542: sāvakāśāḥ ādeśāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . ye ete lugvikaraṇāḥ śluvikaraṇāḥ ca liṅliṭau ca . na syāt etvam ṭeḥ ṭitām yat vidhatte . yat ca ṭitsañjñānām
GS24pmbhasuu:6543: etvam vidhatte tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . eśaḥ śittvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6544: ekāraḥ ca śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ iti takārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6545: etve kṛte dvayoḥ ekārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . nivṛtte punaḥ lādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6546: dhātvadhikāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ekārasya ekārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa api śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6547: yat ca loṭaḥ vidhatte . tat ca vikaraṇaiḥ vyavahitatvāt na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . loṭaḥ laṅvat eḥ uḥ seḥ hi apit ca vā chandasi iti . yat ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:6548: uktam laṅliṅoḥ tat ca na syāt . kim punaḥ tat . nityam ṅitaḥ itaḥ ca tasthasthamipām tāmtamtāmaḥ liṅaḥ sīyuṭ yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu udāttaḥ ṅit
GS24pmbhasuu:6549: ca iti . tasmāt prāk lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6550: dhātvadhikāraḥ akāraḥ śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . śit sarvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6551: sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . anuvartamāne punaḥ lādeśe dhātvadhikāre tasmāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6552_0: uttarasya ādeḥ iti thakārasya atve kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:6552_1: syāt . peca yūyam . cakra yūyam iti . nanu ca nivṛtte api lādeśe dhātvadhikāre alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6552_2: antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya akārvacanane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6553: asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . vakṣyati etat tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_0: akārasya akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham iti . ārdhadhātukasañjñāyām dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6554_1: kartavyam dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : vṛkṣtvam vṛkṣatā
GS24pmbhasuu:6555: nanu ca uktam ādye yoge na vyavāye tiṅaḥ syuḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6556: ānupūrvyāt siddham etat . na atra akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu vikaraṇāḥ prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6557_0: kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātuke vikaraṇāḥ ucyante . na ca akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu sārvadhātukatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6557_1: bhavati . ye tarhi na etasmin viśeṣe vidhīyante . ke punaḥ te . syādayaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6557_2: api vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya iti . yadi evam vindati
GS24pmbhasuu:6558_0: dhātunā atra vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ vidinā ca ānataryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya lasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6558_1: videḥ anantarasya iti . iha tarhi ajakṣiṣyan ajāgairṣyan iti abhyastāt jheḥ jus bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6558_2: iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . atra api dhātunā
GS24pmbhasuu:6559: vihitam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ abhyastena ānantaryam . dhātoḥ vihitasya abhastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6560: anantarasya iti . ātaḥ iti atra katham viśeṣayiṣyasi . yadi tāvat dhātugrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam alunan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6561: atra api prāpnoti . atha ākāragrahaṇam vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam apiban iti atra api prāpnoti . astu tarhi dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6562_0: vihitaviśeṣaṇam ākāragrahaṇam ānantaryaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam alunan iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6562_1: api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . na atra lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6562_2: . kim kāraṇam . ītvena bādhyate . na atra ītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6563: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antibhāvena bādhyate . na atra antibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6564: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena bādhyate . na atra jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6565: . kim kāraṇam . lopena bādhyate . lopaḥ ītvena ītvam antibhāvena antibhāvaḥ jusbhāvena jusbhāvaḥ lopena iti cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:6566: . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi avyavasthākāriṇā śāstreṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6567_0: śāstreṇa nāma vyavasthākāriṇā bhavitavyam . na ca atra halādinā muhūrtam api śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6567_1: avasthātum . tāvati eva antibhāvena bhavitavyam . antibhāve kṛte lopaḥ . lopena vyavasthā
GS24pmbhasuu:6567_2: bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate eśaḥ śittvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6569_0: (P_3,1.91.2) KA_II,74.5-75.9 Ro_III,183-185 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:6569_1: prayojanam prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ . prātipadikapratiṣedhaḥ prayojanam . dhātoḥ tavyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6569_2: yathā syuḥ . prātipadikāt mā bhūvan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6570: na etat asti prayojanam . sādhane tāvyādayaḥ vidhīyante sādhanam ca kriyāyāḥ . kriyābhāvāt sādhanābhāvaḥ . sādhanābhāvāt asati api
GS24pmbhasuu:6571: dhātvadhikāre prātipadikāt tavyādayaḥ na bhaviṣyanti . svapādiṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:6572_0: svapādiṣu tarhi prayojanam . svapiti . supati iti mā bhūt . aṅgasañjñā ca . aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6572_1: ca prayojanam . yasmāt pratyayavidhiḥ tadādi pratyaye aṅgam iti dhātoḥ aṅgasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6572_2: siddhā bhavati . kṛtsañjñā ca . kṛtsañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātuvihitasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6573: upapadasañjñā ca. upapadasañjñā ca prayojanam . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre saptamīnirdiṣṭam upapadasñjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6574: siddhā bhavati . kṛdupapadasañjñe tāvan na prayojanam . adhikārāt api ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6575_0: siddhe . svapādiṣu tarhi aṅgasañjñā ca prayojanam . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam yaṅvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:6575_1: dhātvadhikārāt . dhātugrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . yaṅvidhau dhātvadhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6576: anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam anuvartyam . anadhikāre hi aṅgasañjñābhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6577: anadhikāre hi sati aṅgasañjñāyāḥ abhāvaḥ syāt . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6578_0: yad tat anuvartate cūrṇacurādibhyaḥ ṇic bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt ṇic prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6578_1: . hetumadvacanam tu jñāpakam anyatrābhāvasya . yat ayam hetumati ca iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6578_2: ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt ṇic bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6579_0: iha tarhi kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati dhātoḥ ca iti dhātumātrāt yak prāpnoti . kaṇḍvādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6579_1: ca vyapadeśivadvacanāt . yat ayam kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ yak bhavati iti āha tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6579_2: ācāryaḥ na dhātumātrāt yak bhavati iti . atha vā kaṇḍvādibhyaḥ dhātugrahaṇena abhisambhantsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_0: tatra upapadam saptamī iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva saptamī śrūyate tatra eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_1: : stamberamaḥ karṇejapaḥ . yatra vā etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saptamyām janeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_2: ḍaḥ iti . iha na syāt . kumbhakāraḥ nagarakāraḥ . sthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_3: ca saptamī śrūyate ya ca na śrūyate yatra ca etena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_4: ca anyena saptamīsthamātre siddham bhavati . atha tatragrahaṇam kimartham . tatragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_5: viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . tatra etasmin dhātvadhikāre yat saptamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:6581_6: tat upapadasañjñam bhavati iti upapadasañjñā siddhā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_1: upapadasañjñāyām samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . samartham upapadam pratyayasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_2: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . āhara kumbham . karoti kaṭam iti . kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_3: mahāntam kumbham karoti iti atra api prāpnoti . na vā bhavitavyam mahākumbhakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_4: iti . bhavaitavyam yadā etat vākyam bhavati . mahān kumbhaḥ mahākumbhaḥ mahākumbham
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_5: karoti iti mahākumbhakāraḥ . yadā tu etat vākyam bhavati mahāntam kumbham karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_6: iti tadā na bhavitavyam . tadā ca prāpnoti . tadā mā bhūt iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6582_7: samarthagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . dhātoḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_0: . dhātoḥ karmaṇi aṇ bhavati . tatra sambandhāt etat gantavyam . yasya dhātoḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_1: karma iti . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api samarthagrahaṇe mahāntam kumbham karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_2: iti atra api prāpnoti iti . upapadam iti mahatīiham sañjñā kriyate . sañjñā ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_3: yataḥ na laghīyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . laghvartham hi sañjñākaraṇam . tatra mahatyāḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_4: karaṇe etat prayojanam anvarthasañjñā yathā vijñāyeta : upoccāri padam upapadam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_5: yat ca atra upoccāri na tat padam yat ca padam na tat upoccāri . yāvatā ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_6: padagandhaḥ asti padavidhiḥ ayam bhavati . padavidhiḥ ca samarthānām bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_7: asāmārthyān na bhaviṣyati . atha cvyante upapade kim aṇā bhavitavyam . akumbham kumbham
GS24pmbhasuu:6583_8: karoti kumbhīkaroti mṛdam iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtivivakṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6584: tat sāpekṣam . sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : icchāmi aham kāśakaṭīkāram iti . iṣṭam eva etat gonardīyasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:6585: nimittopādanam ca . nimittopādanam ca kartavyam . nimittam upapadam pratyayasya iti vaktavyam . anupādāne hi anupapade pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6586_0: akriyamāṇe hi nimittopādāne anupapade api prasajyeta . nirdeśaḥ idānīm kimarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6586_1: syāt . nirdeśaḥ sañjñākaraṇārthaḥ . yadā upapade pratyayaḥ tadā upapadasañjñām vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:6586_2: iti . tat tarhi nimittopādanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . tatravacanam upapadasanniyogārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6587: tat upapadasanniyogārtham bhaviṣyati . karmaṇi aṇ vidhīyate tatra cet pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . nanu ca anyat tatragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6588: kim . tatragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti . adhikārāt api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6589: (P_3,1.93) KA_II,77.2-17 Ro_III,190-192 atiṅ iti kimartham . pacati karoti . atiṅ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati pacati karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6590_0: dhātoḥ parasya kṛtsañjñā . prāk ca lādeśāt dhātvadhikāraḥ . evam api sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6590_1: kṛtsañjña prāpnoti . yathā atiṅ iti ucyamāne yāvatā sthānivadbhāvaḥ katham eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6590_2: sidhyati . pratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt atha vā tiṅbhāvinaḥ lakārasya kṛtsañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6590_3: . kim ca syāt yati atra kṛtsañjñā syāt . kṛtprātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6590_4: . prātipadikāt iti svādyutpattiḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6591: vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅoktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā uktārthatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_0: bhaviṣyanti . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_1: . na ca tiṅantasya strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_2: apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_3: . atha api katham cit yogaḥ syāt . evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_4: na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_5: . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . iha tarhi pacati paṭhati iti . hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_6: piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk prāpnoti . dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api cikīrṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:6592_7: iti atra prāpnoti . atra api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na
GS24pmbhasuu:6593: asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6595: striyām abhidheyāyām vā asrūpaḥ na bhavati iti āhosvit strīpratyayeṣu iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6596_0: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi striyām abhidheyāyām iti lavyā lavitavyā atra vā asarūpaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6596_1: prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate strīpratyayeṣu iti vyāvakrośī vayatikruṣṭiḥ iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6596_2: . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6597: abhidheyāyām na api strīpratyayeṣu iti . katham tarhi strīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6598: svarayiṣyate . tatra svaritena adhikāragatiḥ bhavati iti striyām iti adhikṛtya ye pratayāḥ vihitāḥ teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6600: ucyate . asarūpasya vāvacanam utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6601: asarūpasya vāvacanam kriyate utsargasya bādhakaviṣaye anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . tavyattavyānīyaraḥ utsargāḥ . teṣām ajantāt yat apavādaḥ . ceyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:6602_0: cetavyam iti api yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ajantāt yat vidhīyate . halantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6602_1: ṇyat vidhīyate . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6603: evam tarhi ṇvultṛcau utsargau . tayoḥ pacādibhyaḥ ac apavādaḥ . pacati iti pacaḥ . paktā pācakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6604: vakṣyati etat . ac api sarvadhātubhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi ṇvultṛjacaḥ utsargāḥ teṣām igupadhāt kaḥ apavādaḥ . vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6605: vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti api yathā syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite . tatra utpattiḥ vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:6606: prāpnoti yathā taddhite . astu . yadā vikṣipaḥ vilikhaḥ iti etat na tadā vikṣeptā vikṣepakaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyati . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6607_0: tat tu na labhyam . kim kāraṇam . yathā taddhite iti ucyate . tadditeṣu ca sarvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6607_1: eva utsargāpavādam vibhāṣā . utpadyate vā na vā . siddham tu asarūpasya bādhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6607_2: vāvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . asarūpasya bādhakasya vāvacanāt . asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6608: . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6609_0: tatra utpattivāprasaṅgaḥ yathā taddhite iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti kāraṇam yena taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:6609_1: vibhāṣā utpattiḥ bhavati . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtiḥ tatra prakṛtyarthe vartate . anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:6609_2: śabdena pratyayārthaḥ abhidhīyate . iha punaḥ na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prakṛtyarthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:6609_3: na ca anyaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tam artham abhidadhīta iti kṛtvā anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6609_4: . atha vā samayaḥ kṛtaḥ . na kevalā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā na ca kevalaḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6610: . etasmāt samayāt anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yaḥ eva tasya samayasya kartā saḥ eva idam api āha . yadi asau tatra pramāṇam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:6611_0: pramāṇam bhavitum arhati . pramāṇam asau tatra ca iha ca . sāmarthyam tu iha draṣṭavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6611_1: prayoge . na ca anutpattau sāmarthyam asti . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6611_2: tarhi taddhiteṣu anutpattau sāmarthyam bhavati . anyena pratyayena sāmarthyam . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:6611_3: . ṣaṣṭhyā . atha vā rūpavattām āśritya vāvidhiḥ ucyate . na ca anutpattiḥ rūpavatī
GS24pmbhasuu:6611_4: . tena anutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6611_5: na punaḥ utsargaḥ iti . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ yat apavādaḥ vibhāṣā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6612: utsargaḥ vā . api ca sāpekṣaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate vā asarūpaḥ iti . na ca utsargavelāyām kim cit apekṣyam asti . apavādavelāyām punaḥ utsargaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6613: apekṣyate . tena yaḥ rūpavān anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ punaḥ asau . apavādaḥ . yadi yaḥ rūpavān
GS24pmbhasuu:6614: anyapūrvakaḥ bādhakaḥ prāpnoti saḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate kvibādiṣu samāveśaḥ na prāpnoti . grāmaṇīḥ grāmaṇāyaḥ iti . na hi ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6615: rūpavantaḥ . ete api rūpavantaḥ . kasyām avasthāyām . upadeśāvasthāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:6616: yadi evam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti . karmaṇi aṇ ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti kaviṣaye aṇ api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6617_0: siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . siddham etat . katham . anubandhasya anekāntatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6617_1: . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . atha vā prayoge asarūpāṇām vāvidhiḥ nyāyyaḥ . prayoge cet
GS24pmbhasuu:6618: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hyaḥ apacat iti atra luṅ api prāpnoti . śvaḥ paktā iti atra lṛṭ api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_0: lādeśeṣu vā asarūpaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam haśaśvatoḥ laṅ ca iti āha . atha vā prayoge
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_1: asarūpāṇām vāvidhau na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6619_2: . kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe ca ete
GS24pmbhasuu:6620: sarūpāḥ . nanu ca uktam anubandhabhinneṣu vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat . katham . siddham anubandhasya anekāntatvāt . atha ekānte doṣaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_0: . ekānte ca na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anubandhakṛtam asārūpyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_1: iti yat ayam dadādidadhātyoḥ vibhāṣā śam śāsti . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_2: bhavati iti ucyate . apavādaḥ nāma anubandhabhinnaḥ vā bhavati rūpānyatvena vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_3: tena anena avaśyam kim cit tyājyam kim cit tu saṅgrahītavyam . tat yat anubandhakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_4: asārūpyam tat na āśrayiṣyāmaḥ yat tu rūpānyatvena asārūpyam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6621_5: vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca asarūpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_0: tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ asarūpaḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_1: prayoge ca prāk ca prayogāt . atha vā asarūpaḥ bādhakaḥ vā bādhakaḥ bhavati iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6622_2: . na ca evam kaḥ cit api sarūpaḥ . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ : kvat cit ye asarūpāḥ . anubandhabhinnāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6623: (P_3,1.94.3) KA_II,80.15-26 Ro_III,199-200 atha katham idam vijñāyate astriyām iti . kim striyām na bhavati āhosvit prāk striyāḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6624: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . striyām pratiṣedhe ktalyuṭtumunkhalartheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6625: vibhāṣāprasaṅgaḥ . striyām pratiṣedhe ktalyuṭtumunkhalartheṣu vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kta . hasitam chātrasys śobhanam . ghañ api prāpnoti . lyuṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6626: hasanam chātrasys śobhanam . ghañ api prāpnoti . tumun . icchati bhoktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:6627_0: liṅloṭau api prāpnutaḥ . khalarthaḥ . īṣatpānaḥ somaḥ bhavatā . khal api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6627_1: . evam tarhi striyāḥ prāk iti vakṣyāmi . striyāḥ prāk iti cet ktvāyām vāvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6627_2: striyāḥ prāk iti cet ktvāyām vāvacanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6628: āsitvā bhuṅkte . āsyate bhoktum iti api yathā syāt . kālādiṣu tumuni .
GS24pmbhasuu:6629: kālādiṣu tumuni vāvacanam kartavyam . kālaḥ bhoktum . kālaḥ bhojanasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6631: (P_3,1.94.4) KA_II,81.1-6 Ro_III,200 arhe tṛjvidhānam . arhe tṛc vidheyaḥ . ime arhe kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante . te viśeṣavihitāḥ sāmānyavihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:6632_0: tṛcam bādheran . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante kartari tṛc . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6632_1: prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāvakarmaṇoḥ kṛtyāḥ kartari tṛcam bādheran . evam tarhi arhe kṛtyatṛjvidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6632_2: . arhe kṛtyatṛcaḥ vidheyāḥ . ayam arhe liṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:6633: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitān kṛtyatṛcaḥ bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_0: kṛtyasañjñāyām prāk ṇvulaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā mā
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_1: bhūt . arhe kṛtyatrjvacanam tu jñāpakam prāṅṇvulavanānarthyasya . yat ayam arhe kṛtyatṛcaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_2: ca iti tṛjgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ prāk ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6635_3: . evam api ṇvulaḥ kṛtyasañjñā prāpnoti . yogāpekṣam jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6637: kelimaraḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacelimāḥ māṣāḥ . paktavyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_0: bhidelimāḥ saralāḥ . bhettavyāḥ . vaseḥ tavyat kartari ṇit ca . vaseḥ tavyat kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_1: vaktavyaḥ . ṇit ca asau bhavati iti vaktavyam . vasati iti vāstavyaḥ . taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6638_2: vā . taddhitaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vāstuni bhavaḥ vāstavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6640: ajantāt yathā syāt . halantāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6641: halantāt ṇyat vidhīyate . saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi ṇyat yatam bādhate evam tavyādīn api bādheta . ajgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_0: ajantāt yat vidhīyate halantāt ṇyat . etāvantaḥ ca dhātavaḥ yat uta ajantāḥ halantāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_1: ca . ucyante ca tavyādayaḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . na etat asti prayojanam . vāsarūpeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_2: tavyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . idam tarhi prayojanam . ajantabhūtapūrvamātrāt api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_3: syāt . lavyam pavyam ārdhadhātukasāmānye guṇe kṛte yi pratyayasāmānye ca vāntādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_4: kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti . tathā ditsyam dhitsyam . ārdhadhātukasāmānye akāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:6642_5: kṛte halantāt iti ṇyat prāpnoti . ajgrahaṇasāmarthyāt yat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6645: yati jāteḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . janyam vatsena . atyalpam idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6646: . takiśasicatiyatijanīnām upasaṅkhyānam iti vaktavyam . taki takyam : śasi śasyam . yati yatyam : jani : janyam . hanaḥ vā vadha ca . hanaḥ vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:6647_0: vaktavyaḥ vadha iti ayam ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vadhyaḥ ghātyaḥ . taddhitaḥ vā . taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6647_1: vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . vadham arhati vadhyaḥ . yadi taddhitaḥ samāsaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6647_2: : asivadhyaḥ , musalavadhyaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ sati sādhanam kṛtā iti vā pādahārakādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6647_3: iti samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi punaḥ asivadhaśabdāt utpattiḥ syāt . asivadham
GS24pmbhasuu:6648: na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt . asivadhyaḥ evam svaraḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6650: (P_3,1.100) KA_II,83.2-4 Ro_III,203 anupasargāt careḥ āṅi ca agurau .
GS24pmbhasuu:6651: anupasargāt careḥ iti atra āṅi ca agurau iti vaktavyam . ācaryaḥ deśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6653: (P_3,1.103) KA_II,83.6-7 Ro_III,203 svāmini antodāttatvam ca . svāmini antodāttatvam ca vaktavyam . āryaḥ svāmī .
GS24pmbhasuu:6655: pratyudāhriyate . ajaraḥ kambalaḥ . ajaritā kambalaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam kartṛsādhanaḥ pratyudāhriyate . na bhāvasādhanaḥ pratyudāhāryaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6656_0: evam tarhi ajaryam kartari . ajaryam kartari iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6656_1: . na vaktavyam . gatyarthānām ktaḥ kartari vidhīyate . tena yogāt ajaryam kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6656_2: bhaviṣyati . gatyarthānām vai ktaḥ karmaṇi api vidhīyate . tena yogāt ajaryam karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:6656_3: api prāpnoti . jīryatiḥ akarmakaḥ bhāve tarhi prāpnoti . saṅgatagrahaṇam idānīm kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6657: kartṛviśeṣaṇam saṅgatagrahaṇam . saṅgatam cet kartṛ bhavati iti . tat yathā hṛṣeḥ lomasu iti lomāni cet kartṝṇi bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6658: (P_3,1.106) KA_II,83.18-84.2 vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam . vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pravādyam apavādyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6659_0: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . anupasarge iti vartate . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:6659_1: anupasarge iti vartate . na etat anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante iti . eṣaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6659_2: nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6661: karmaṇi mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatiḥ ayam akarmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6662_0: akarmakāḥ api vai dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ bhavanti . tena anubhavyam āmantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6662_1: iti atra api prāpnoti . etat api na asti prayojanam . anupasarge iti vartate . uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6663: hanaḥ ta ca bhāve yathā syāt . śvahatyā vartate . kva mā bhūt . śvaghātyaḥ vṛṣālaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6664: (P_3,1.108) KA_II,84.10-13 Ro_III,206 hanaḥ taḥ cit striyām chandasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6665: hanaḥ taḥ ca iti atra cit striyām chandasi vaktavyaḥ . tām bhrūṇahatyām nigṛhya anucaraṇam . asyai tvām bhrūṇahatyāyai caturtham pratigṛhāṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:6666: striyām iti kimartham . āghnate dasyuhatyāya . chandasi iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6668_0: (P_3,1.109) KA_II,84.15-85.5 Ro_III,206-207 kyap iti vartamāne punaḥ kyabgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6668_1: kimartham . kyap eva yathā syāt . anyat yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:6668_2: prāpnoti . ṇyat . oḥ āvaśyake ṇyataḥ stoteḥ kyap pūrvavipratiṣiddham iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6668_3: . saḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . atha vā hanaḥ taḥ cit striyām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:6668_4: coditaḥ . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . kyabvidhau vṛñgrahaṇam . kyabvidhau vṛñgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6668_5: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . vāryāḥ ṛtvijaḥ iti . añjeḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_0: sañjñāyām . sañjñāyām añjeḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ājyam . yadi kyap vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_1: na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṇyat eṣaḥ . yadi ṇyat upadhālopaḥ na prāpnoti . tasmāt kyap
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_2: eṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti iti . āṅpūrvasya eṣaḥ prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6669_3: . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:6670_0: (P_3,1.111) KA_II,85.7-10 Ro_III,207-208 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na i ca khanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6670_1: iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : kheyam . ādguṇena siddham . na sidhyati . ṣatvatukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6670_2: asiddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt tuk prasajyeta . na etat asti . padāntapadādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6671: padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ . tasmāt i ca khanaḥ iti eva vaktavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:6772_1: iti etat rūpam syāt . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . astu atra samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6772_2: . samprasāraṇe kṛte ākāralopaḥ . tasya sthānivadbhāvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6772_3: pūrvatve kṛte prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . ākāralopaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:6772_4: pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ākāralopaḥ . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6772_5: pūrvatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi vārṇāt āṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati iti ākāralopaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6772_6: . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . ākāralopaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6773: nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ākāralope prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6774: ākāralopaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:6775: . anityaḥ ākāralopaḥ . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . antaraṅgam hi pūrvatvam bhādhate . yasya lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6776: anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ākāralopasya nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ākāralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6777_0: . ākāralope kṛte samprasāraṇam . samprasāraṇe kṛte yaṇādeśe siddham rūpam āhvaḥ prahvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6777_1: iti . evam api na sidhyati . yaḥ anādiṣṭād acaḥ pūrvaḥ tasya vidhim prati sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6777_2: . ādiṣṭāt ca eṣaḥ acaḥ pūrvaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi ākāralopasya asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6778: ākāralopasya asiddhatvāt uvaṅādeśaḥ na syāt . juhuvatuḥ jhuhuvuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6779: asti atra viśeṣaḥ . akṛte atra āttve pūrvatvam bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam āttvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6780_0: paratvāt pūrvatvam . na sidhyati . antaraṅgatvāt āttvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi idam

GS24pmbhasuu:6781: prāpnoti akṛte api . āttvam api nityam . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . anityam āttvam . na hi samprasāraṇe kṛte prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:6848: pāṇilekhā iti . jāyāghnaḥ tilakālakaḥ patighnī pāṇirekhā iti . jāyāghnaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ patighnī vrṣalī iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate lakṣaṇavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6849: kartari iti siddham jāyāghnaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ patighnī vrṣalī iti . jāyāghnaḥ tilakālakaḥ patighnī pāṇilekhā iti na sidhyati . astu lakṣaṇe kartari iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6850: . katham jāyāghnaḥ , brāhmaṇaḥ patighnī vrṣalī iti . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6851: jāyāghnaḥ asmin asti iti saḥ ayam jāyāghnaḥ . patighnīvṛṣalī iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:6852: sidhyati . astu tarhi lakṣaṇavati kartari iti . katham jāyāghnaḥ tilakālakaḥ patighnī pāṇilekhā iti . amanuṣyakartṛke iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6854_0: iha mā bhūt . nagaraghātaḥ hastī . yadi apraṇikartṛke iti ucyate śaśaghnī śakuniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6854_1: iti na sidhyati . astu tarhi amanuṣyakartṛke iti eva . katham nagaraghātaḥ hastī
GS24pmbhasuu:6854_2: . kṛtyalyuṭaḥ bahulam iti evam atra aṇ bhaviṣyati .

GS24pmbhasuu:6867_1: alakṣaṇam iti . khit iti vyākhyāsyāmaḥ . nañaḥ tu svarasiddhyartham ikārāditvam iṣṇucaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6868: kṛtyokeṣṇuccārvādayaḥ ca iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . ayam api iṭi kṛte ṣatve ca iṣṇuc bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6869_0: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha vā asiddham khalu api ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6869_1: . ṣatvasya asiddhatvāt isnuc eva bhavati . iṣṇucaḥ ikārāditvam udāttatvāt kṛtam bhuvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6870_0: (P_3,2.58) KA_II,106.13-19 Ro_III,241-242 kimarthaḥ nakāraḥ . ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6870_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . ekācaḥ ayam vidhīyate . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena
GS24pmbhasuu:6871: dhātusvareṇa eva siddham . yaḥ tarhi anekāc . dadhṛk iti . vakṣyati etat dhṛṣeḥ dvirvacanam antodāttatvam ca nipātyate iti . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:6872: kva viśeṣanārthena arthaḥ . kvinpratyayasya kuḥ iti . kvipratyayasya kuḥ iti ucyamāne sandehaḥ syāt . kviḥ vā eṣaḥ pratyayaḥ kvip vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6873: sandehamātram etat bhavati . sarvasandeheṣu ca idam upatiṣṭhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6874: vyākhyānataḥ viśeṣapratipattiḥ . na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6876: (P_3,2.59) KA_II,106.21-23 Ro_III,242 dadhṛk iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6877: dhṛṣeḥ dvirvacanam antodāttatvam ca . dhṛṣeḥ dvirvacanam antodāttatvam ca nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6879_0: ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . nakāreṇa api eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6879_1: svaraḥ siddhaḥ . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . kañkvarap
GS24pmbhasuu:6879_2: iti . kankvarap iti ucyāmāne yācitikā atra api prasajyeta ..
GS24pmbhasuu:6881: upasaṅkhyānam . dṛśeḥ samānānyayoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sadṛk sadṛśaḥ anyādṛk anyādṛśaḥ . kṛdarthānupapattiḥ tu . kṛdarthaḥ tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:6882_0: upapadyate . dṛśeḥ kartari prāpnoti . ivārthe tu taddhitaḥ . ivārthe ayam taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6882_1: draṣṭavyaḥ . saḥ iva ayam tādṛk . anya iva ayam anyādṛk . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6882_2: kṛdarthaḥ . karmakartā ayam . tam iva imam paśyanti janāḥ . saḥ ayam saḥ iva dṛśyamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6883: anyam iva imam paśyanti janāḥ . saḥ ayam anyaḥ iva dṛśyamānaḥ anyam iva ātmānam paśyati . anyādṛk iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6885: sadādiṣu subgrahaṇam kartavyam . hotā vediṣat . atithiḥ curoṇasat . na tarhi idānīm upasarge api iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6886_0: jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . anyatra subgrahaṇe upasargagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6886_1: na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . vadaḥ supi anupasargagrahaṇam coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:6887: (P_3,2.68-69) KA_II,108.2-6 Ro_III,244 kimartham idam ucyate na adaḥ ananne iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . chandasi iti etat anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6888: bhāṣārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . pūrvasmin eva yoge chandograhaṇam nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6889: tat ca avaśyam nivartyam amāt iti evamartham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . adaḥ ananne kravyegrahaṇam vāsarūpanivṛttyartham . adaḥ ananne kravyegrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6892: śvetavahādīnāṃ ḍas vaktavyaḥ . śvetavāḥ indraḥ . padasya ca . padasya ca iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śvetavāhau śvetavāhaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6893: rvartham . ruḥ yathā syāt . kriyate rvartham nipātanam . avayāḥ śvetavāḥ puroḍāḥ ca iti . ātaḥ ca rvartham . ukthaśasśabdasya sāmānyena ruḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6894: . na tasya nipātanam kriyate . tat na vaktavyam . avaśyam tat vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6895: dīrghārtham . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham atra dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6896_0: atvasantasya ca adhātoḥ iti . yatra tena na sidhyati tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6896_1: . sambuddhau . he śvetavāḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm ḍas vaktavyaḥ . vaktavyaḥ ca . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6898: ucyete na kvip siddhaḥ anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti kaḥ ca ātaḥ anupasarge kaḥ iti . na sidhyati . viśeṣvihitaḥ kaḥ sāmānyavihitam kvipam bādhate.
GS24pmbhasuu:6899_0: vāsarūpeṇa kvip api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi śaṃsthaḥ śaṃsthāḥ . uktam etat . śami
GS24pmbhasuu:6899_1: sañjñāyām dhātugrahaṇam kṛñaḥ hetvādiṣu ṭapratiṣedhārtham iti . saḥ yathā eva ac
GS24pmbhasuu:6899_2: ṭam bādhate evam kakvipau api bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:6900_0: (P_3,2.78) KA_II,109.5-10 Ro_III,247 supi iti vartamāne punaḥ subgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:6900_1: . anupasarge iti evam tat abhūt . idam submātre yathā syāt . pratyāsāriṇyaḥ udāsāriṇyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6900_2: . ṇinvidhau sādhukāriṇi upasaṅkhyānam . ṇinvidhau sādhukāriṇi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6900_3: . sādhukārī sādhudāyī . brahmaṇi vadaḥ . brahmaṇi vadaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6903: aśrāddhabhojī . kim yaḥ aśrāddham bhuṅkte saḥ aśrāddhabhojī . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6904: . yadā asau aśrāddham na bhuṅkte tadā asya vratalopaḥ syāt . tat yathā :
GS24pmbhasuu:6905_0: sthāyī yadā na tiṣthati tadā asya vratalopaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi ṇinyantena samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6905_1: bhaviṣyati : na śrāddhabhojī aśrāddhabhojī . na evam śakyam . svare hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6906_0: aśrāddhabhojī iti ca iṣyate . evam tarhi nañaḥ eva ayam bhujipratiṣedhavācinaḥ śrāddhaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:6906_1: asamarthasamāsaḥ : na bhojī śrāddhasya iti . saḥ tarhi asamarthasamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6907: atha vā etarhi bahūni prayojanāni . kāni . asūryampaśyāni mukhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:6908: apūrvageyāḥ ślokāḥ . aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ . suṭ anapuṃsakasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6910_0: paramāne mā bhūt . kriyamāṇe api ātmagrahaṇe paramāne prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ātmanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6910_1: iti iyam kartari ṣaṣṭhī mānaḥ iti akāraḥ bhāve . saḥ yadi eva ātmānam manyate atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6910_2: api param ātmanaḥ eva asau mānaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6911: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ātmanaḥ iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī . katham . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti . nanu ca kartari api vai etena eva vidhīyate . tatra kutaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:6912: karmaṇi bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kartari iti . evam tarhi karmakartari ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6913: karmakartari ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6914_0: ātmanaḥ iti karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī . katham . kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti iti . nanu ca uktam kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6914_1: api vai etena eva vidhīyate . tatra kutaḥ etat karmaṇi bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:6915: . evam api karmakartṛgrahaṇam kartavyam karmāpadiṣṭaḥ yak yathā syāt śyan
GS24pmbhasuu:6916: mā bhūt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ yakaḥ vā śyanaḥ vā . yaki sati antodāttatvena bhavitayam śyani sati ādyudāttatvena . śyani api sati
GS24pmbhasuu:6917_0: antodāttatvena eva bhavitavyam . katham . khaśaḥ svaraḥ śyanaḥ svaram bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6917_1: . sati śiṣṭatvāt śyanaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sati śiṣṭaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:6917_2: vikaraṇasvaraḥ sārvadhātukasvaram na bādhate iti yat ayam tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6918: lasārvadhātuke etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha . aviśeṣeṇa jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6919: (P_3,2.84) KA_II,111.2-112.4 Ro_III,250-254 bhūte iti ucyate . kasmin bhūte . kāle . na vai kālādhikāraḥ asti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6920: dhātau bhūte . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . na ca śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6921: bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānatāyām sambhavaḥ asti . śabde asambhavāt arthe
GS24pmbhasuu:6922: kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthaḥ . kriyā . kriyāyām bhūtāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:6923_0: yadi evam niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6923_1: aprasiddhiḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . bhūtakālena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . nirdeśottarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:6923_2: ca bhūtakālatā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:6924: avyayanirdeśāt siddham . avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6925: avartamāne abhaviṣyati iti . saḥ tarhi avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhūteśabdaḥ na bhavateḥ niṣṭhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6926: katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avayayasañjñā . atha api bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6927: niṣṭhā evam api avayayam eva . katham na vyeti iti avyayam . kva punaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:6928: vyeti . etau kālaviśeṣau vartamānabhaviṣyantau . svabhāvataḥ bhūte eva
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_0: vartate . yadi tatri na vyeti iti avyayam . na vā tadvidhānasya anyatra abhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_1: na vā bhūtādhikāreṇa arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tadvidhānasya anyatra abhāvāt . ye api
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_2: ete itaḥ uttaram pratyayāḥ śiṣyante ete api etau kālaviśeṣau na viyanti vartamānabhaviṣyantau
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_3: . svabhāvataḥ eva te bhūte eva vartante . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhūtādhikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_4: prayojanam kumāraghātī śīrṣaghātī ākhuhā biḍālaḥ sutvānaḥ sunavantaḥ suṣupuṣaḥ anehāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_5: agnim ādadhānasya . kumāraghātī śīrṣaghātī iti bhaviṣyadvartamānārthaḥ bhūtanivṛttyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6929_6: . ākhuhā biḍālaḥ iti bhaviṣyadvartamānārthaḥ . itarathā hi brahmādiṣu niyamaḥ triṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6930: yajñasaṃyoge ṅvanipaḥ triṣu kāleṣu śatā apavādaḥ mā bhūt . suṣupuṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6931_0: najiṅ sarvakālapavādaḥ mā bhūt . anehāḥ iti vartamānakālaḥ eva . anyatra anāhantā
GS24pmbhasuu:6931_1: . ādadhānasya . kānacaḥ cānaś tācchīlādiṣu sarvakālāpavādaḥ mā bhūt . agnim ādadhānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6933: kvip vidhīyate . na kvip ca anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:6934: brahmādiṣu hanteḥ kvibvacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6935: brahmādiṣu eva hanteḥ kvip yathā syāt . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:6936_0: .upapadaviśeṣe etasmin ca viśeṣe . atha brahmādiṣu hanteḥ ṇininā bhavitavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:6936_1: bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . ubhayataḥ niyamāt . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ ayam . brahmādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:6936_2: eva hanteḥ kvip bhavati . kvip eva ca brahmādiṣu iti . tathā ca uttarasya niyamāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6936_3: . evam ca kṛtvā uttarasya yogasya vacanārthaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . bahulam chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:6938: (P_3,2.93) KA_II,112.17-18 Ro_III,255 karmaṇi kutsite . karmaṇi kutsite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dhānyavikrāyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6939: (P_3,2.101) KA_II,112.20-21 Ro_III,256 anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam , iha api yathā syāt . ākhā utkhā parikhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:6940: (P_3,2.102.1) KA_II,113.2-22 Ro_III,256-257 niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . niṣṭhāyām itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6941: . kā itaretarāśrayatā . satoḥ ktaktavatvoḥ sañjñayā bhavitavyam sañjñayā ca ktaktavatū bhāvyete . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6942: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam . dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam kartavyam . ktaktavtū bhūte . ktaktavatū niṣṭhā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6943: yadi punaḥ iha eva niṣṭhāsañjñā api ucyeta : ktaktavtū bhūte . tataḥ niṣṭhā . niṣṭhāsañjñau ca ktaktavtū bhavataḥ iti . kim kṛtam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6944: dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . evam api tau iti vaktavyam syāt . vakṣyati hi etat . tau sat iti vacanam asaṃsargārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6945: . asaṃsaktayoḥ bhūtena kālena niṣṭhāsañjñā yathā syāt . ñimidā minnaḥ ñikṣvidā kṣvinnaḥ . yadi punaḥ adṛṣṭaśrutau eva ktaktavatū gṛhītvā
GS24pmbhasuu:6946: niṣṭhāsañjñā ucyeta . na evam śakyam . dṛṣṭaśrutayoḥ na syāt . ñimidā minnaḥ . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam dviḥ vā ktaktavtugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6947: kartavyam itaretarāśrayam vā bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6948_0: itaretarāśrayamātram etat bhavati . sarvāṇi ca itaretarāśrayāṇi ekatvena parihṛtāni
GS24pmbhasuu:6948_1: siddham tu nityaśabdatvāt iti . na idam tulyam anyaiḥ itaretarāśrayaiḥ . na hi sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6948_2: nityā . evam tarhi bhāvinī sañjñā vijñāsyate . tat yathā : kaḥ cit kam cit tantuvāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6948_3: āha : asya sūtrasya śāṭakam vaya iti . saḥ paśyati . yadi śāṭakaḥ na vātavyaḥ atha
GS24pmbhasuu:6948_4: vātavyaḥ na śāṭakaḥ . śāṭakaḥ vātavyaḥ iti vipratiṣiddham. bhāvinī khalu asya sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:6948_5: abhipretā . saḥ manye vātavyaḥ yasmin ute śāṭakaḥ iti etat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6949: evam iha api tau bhūte kāle bhavataḥ yayoḥ abhinirvṛtayoḥ niṣṭhā iti eṣā sañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6951: ādikarmaṇi niṣṭhā vaktavyā . prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:6952: na sidhyati . yat vā bhavantyarthe . yat vā bhavantyarthe bhāṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6953_0: prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ . prakaroti kaṭam devadattaḥ iti . nyāyyā tu ādyapavargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6953_1: . nyāyyā tu eṣā bhūtakālatā . kutaḥ . ādyapavargāt . ādiḥ atra apavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:6953_2: nāma nyāyyaḥ bhūtakālaḥ yatra kim cit apavṛktam
GS24pmbhasuu:6954_0: dṛśyate . vā ca adyatanyām . vā ca adyatanyām bhāṣyate . prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6954_1: . prākārṣīt kaṭam devadattaḥ iti . kim śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ nyāyyā
GS24pmbhasuu:6954_2: eṣā bhūtakālatā . na avaśyam prayogāt eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6955_0: kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā anumānagamyā aśakyā piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:6955_1: garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . sā asau yena yena śabdena abhisambadhyate tāvati tāvati parisampāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6955_2: . tat yathā . kaḥ cit pāṭaliputram jigamiṣuḥ ekam ahaḥ gatvā āha idam adya gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:6955_3: iti . na ca tāvatā asya vrajikriyā parisamāptā bhavati . yat tu gatam tat abhisamīkṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:6955_4: etat prayujyate idam adya gatam iti . evam iha api yat kṛtam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:6956: abhisamīkṣya etat prayujyate prakṛtaḥ kaṭam devadattaḥ iti . yadā hi veṇikāntaḥ kaṭaḥ abhisamīkṣitaḥ bhavati prakaroti kaṭam iti eva tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:6958: (P_3,2.106-107.1) KA_II,114.19-115.2 Ro_III,260 kimartham kānackvasoḥ vāvacanam kriyate . kānackvasoḥ vāvacanam chandasi tiṅaḥ darśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6959: kānackvasoḥ vāvacanam kriyate chandasi tiṅaḥ darśanāt . chandasi tiṅ api
GS24pmbhasuu:6960: dṛśyate . aham sūram ubhayataḥ dadarśa . aham dyāvāpṛthivī ātatāna . na vā anena vihitasya ādeśavacanāt . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6961: anena vihitasya ādeśavacanāt . astu anena vihitasya ādeśaḥ . kena idānīm chandasi vihitasya liṭaḥ śravaṇam bhaviṣyati . chandasi luṅlaṅliṭaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:6962: anena . tat etat vāvacanam tiṣṭhatu tāvat sānnyāsikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6963_0: (P_3,2.106-107.2) KA_II,115.3-8 Ro_III,260-261 atha kitkaraṇam kimartham na asaṃyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6963_1: liṭ kit iti eva siddham . kitkararaṇam saṃyogārtham . kitkararaṇam kriyate saṃyogārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:6963_2: . saṃyogāntāḥ prayojayanti . vṛtrasya yat badbadhānasya rodasī . tvam arṇavān badbadhānāṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:6963_3: aramṇāḥ . añjeḥ ājivān iti . chāndasau kānackvasū . liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:6963_4: api bhavati tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅittvāt lupadhālopaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:6964_0: ṝkārāntaguṇapratiṣedhārtham vā . ṝkārāntaguṇapratiṣedhārtham tarhi kitkaraṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6964_1: . ayam liṭi ṝkārāntānām pratiṣedhaviṣaye guṇaḥ ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva iha pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:6965: teruḥ evam iha api syāt titīrvān tirirāṇaḥ . punaḥ kitkaraṇā pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6967: liṭ . bhāṣāyām sadādibhyaḥ vā liṭ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . tadviṣaye luṅaḥ anivṛttyartham . tasya liṭaḥ viṣaye luṅaḥ anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:6968: upasedivān kautsaḥ pāṇinim . upāsadat . anadyatanaparokṣayoḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6969: anadyatanaparokṣayoḥ ca vā liṭ vaktavyaḥ . upasedivān kautsaḥ pāṇinim .
GS24pmbhasuu:6970: upāsīdat . upasasāda . apavādavipratiṣedhāt hi tayoḥ bhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6971_0: apavādavipratiṣedhāt hi tau syātām . kau . laṅliṭau . tasya kvasuḥ aparokṣe nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:6971_1: . tasya liṭaḥ bhāṣāyām kvasuḥ aparokṣe nityam iti vaktavyam . aparokṣagrahaṇena na
GS24pmbhasuu:6971_2: arthaḥ . tasya kvasuḥ nityam iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:6972: kena idānīm liṭaḥ parokṣe śravaṇam bhaviṣyati . parokṣe liṭ iti anena .
GS24pmbhasuu:6973_0: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . anuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate . bhāṣāyām sadādibhyaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:6973_1: liṭ bhavati liṭaḥ ca kvasuḥ bhavati . tataḥ luṅ . luṅ bhavati bhūte kāle . bhāṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:6973_2: sadādibhyaḥ vā liṭ bhavati liṭaḥ ca kvasuḥ bhavati . tataḥ anadyatane laṅ . anadyatane
GS24pmbhasuu:6973_3: bhūte kāle laṅ bhavati bhāṣāyām sadādibhyaḥ vā liṭ bhavati liṭaḥ ca kvasuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6973_4: . parokṣe liṭ bhavati . bhāṣāyām sadādibhyaḥ vā liṭ bhavati liṭaḥ ca kvasuḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:6974: tatra ayam api arthaḥ . tasya kvasuḥ aparokṣe nityam iti etat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:6976: nipātanam kriyate . upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham . upeyuṣi nipātanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6977: iḍartham . iṭ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhaḥ atra iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:6978: vasvekākādghasām iti . dvirvacane kṛte anekāctvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . dvirvacanam kriyatām iṭ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6979: paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:6980: prāpnoti . iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api dvirvacane ekādeśe ca prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . na atra ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:6981: iti dīrghatvena bādhate . tat etat upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6982: upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham iti cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ . upeyuṣi nipātanam iḍartham iti cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . upeyuṣā upeyuṣe upeyuṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6983: upeyuṣi iti . ekādiṣṭasya īybhāvārtham tu . ekādiṣṭasya īybhāvārtham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:6984_0: nipātanam kriyate . ekādiṣṭasya īy iti etat rūpam nipātyate . nanu ca uktam na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:6984_1: ekādeśaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . dīrghaḥ iṇaḥ kiti iti dīrghatvena bādhate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:6984_2: tat hi na suṣṭhu ucyate . na hi dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:6985: ekādeśam bādhate . kaḥ tarhi bādhate . yaṇādeśaḥ . saḥ ca kva bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:6986: yatra asya nimittam asti . yatra hi nimittam na asti niṣpratidvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6987_0: tatra ekādeśaḥ . vyañjane yaṇādeśārtham vā . atha vā vyañjane eva yaṇādeśaḥ nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:6987_1: . yaṇādeśe kṛte ekācaḥ iti iṭ siddhaḥ bhavati . aparaḥ āha : na upeyivān nipātyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6988: dvirvacanam kriyatām iṭ iti iṭ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:6989: dvirvacanāt iṭ syāt bibhidvān cicchidvān . anyeṣām ekācām dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:6990: nityam iti āhuḥ . anyeṣām ekācām nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte api iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:6991: prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . asya punaḥ iṭ ca nityaḥ dvivracanam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:6992_0: asya punaḥ iṭ ca eva nityaḥ dvivracanam ca . dvirvacane ca kṛte ekāc bhavati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:6992_1: . ekādeśe kṛte . tasmāt iṭ bādhate dvitvam . tasmāt iṭ dvirvacanam bādhate . anūcānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6993: anūktavān anūcānaḥ . anūktam iti eva anyatra . na upeyivān nipātyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:6994: dvirvacanād iṭ bhaviṣyati paratvāt . anyeṣām ekācām dvirvacanam nityam iti āhuḥ . asya punaḥ iṭ ca nityaḥ dvivracanam ca . na vihanyate hi asya .
GS24pmbhasuu:6995: dvirvacane ca ekāctvāt . tasmāt iṭ bādhate dvitvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:6996_1: aviśeṣavacanāt . luṅlṛṭoḥ apavādaḥ prāpnoti . agāma ghoṣān . apāma payaḥ . aśayiṣmahi
GS24pmbhasuu:6996_2: pūtīkatṛṇeṣu gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān . pāsyāmaḥ payaḥ . śayiṣyāmahe pūtīkatṛṇeṣu . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:6996_3: kāraṇam . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣavacanāt . bhūtabhaviṣyatoḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhīyete
GS24pmbhasuu:6996_4: luṅlṛṭau . tayoḥ viśeṣavihitau lanluṭau apavādau prāpnutaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:6996_5: anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:6997: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt . na atra apavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:6998_0: nimittam asti . kim kāraṇam . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane hi tau vidhīyete
GS24pmbhasuu:6998_1: laṅluṭau . na ca atra anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kim tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:6998_2: bhaviṣyatkālasāmānyam ca . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum gamiṣyāmaḥ ghoṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:6999_0: pūtīkatṛṇeṣu iti yatra etat na jñāyate kim kadā iti . iha tu katham agāma ghoṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:6999_1: apāma payaḥ aśayiṣmahi pūtīkatṛṇeṣu yatra etat nirjñātam bhavati amuṣmin ahani gatam
GS24pmbhasuu:6999_2: iti . atra api na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7000_0: anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam iti eva . katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avivakṣā syāt . sataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7000_1: api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā . asataḥ ca vivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7002: (P_3,2.110.2) KA_II,118.15-20 Ro_III,268 vaseḥ luṅ rātriśeṣe . vaseḥ luṅ rātriśeṣe vaktavyaḥ . nyāyye pratyutthāne pratyutthitam kaḥ cit kam
GS24pmbhasuu:7003: cit pṛcchati . kva bhavān uṣitaḥ iti . saḥ āha . amutra avātsam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7004: amutra avasam iti prāpnoti . jāgaraṇasantatau . jāgaraṇasantatau iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi muhūrtamātram api svapiti tatra amutra avasam iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7005_0: (P_3,2.111) KA_II,118.22-119.7 Ro_III,268-269 anadyatane iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ adya
GS24pmbhasuu:7005_1: hyaḥ abhukṣmahi iti . anadyatane iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānādyatane
GS24pmbhasuu:7005_2: anadyatane iti . kim prayojanam . adya hyaḥ abhukṣmahi iti . adya ca hyaḥ ca abhukṣmahi
GS24pmbhasuu:7006: vyāmiśre luṅ eva yathā syāt . yadi evam adyatane api laṅ prāpnoti . na hi adyatane adyatanaḥ vidyate . adyatane api adyatanaḥ vidyate . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7007: vyapadeśivadbhāvena . parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye .
GS24pmbhasuu:7008: parokṣe ca lokavijñāte prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye laṅ vaktavyaḥ . aruṇat yavanaḥ sāketam . aruṇat yavanaḥ madhamikām . parokṣe iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7009: udagāt ādityaḥ . lokavijñate iti kimartham . cakāra kaṭam devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7010: prayoktuḥ darśanaviṣaye iti kimartham . jaghāna kaṃsam kila vāsudevaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7011_0: (P_3,2.114) KA_II,119.9-17 Ro_III,269-270 kim udāharaṇam . tatra saktūn pāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7011_1: . abhijānāsi devadatta tatra saktūn apibāma . bhavet pūrvam param ākāṅkṣati iti sākāṅkṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:7012: param api sākāṅkṣam . katham asti asmin ākāṅkṣā iti ataḥ sākāṅkṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7013: vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe sarvatra . vibhāṣā sākāṅkṣe sarvatra iti vaktavyam . kva sarvatra . yadi ca ayadi ca . yadi tāvat . abhijānāsi devadatta yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7014_0: kaśmīrān gamiṣyāmaḥ yat kaśmīrān agacchāma yat tatra odanam bhokṣyāmahe yat tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7014_1: odanam abhuñjmahi . abhijānāsi devadatta kaśmīrān gamiṣyāmaḥ kaśmīrān agacchāma tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7016_0: kim parokṣam nāma . param akṣṇaḥ parokṣam . akṣi punaḥ kim . aśnoteḥ ayam auṇādikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7016_1: karaṇasādhanaḥ si pratyayaḥ . anute anena iti akṣi . yadi evam parākṣam iti prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7016_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . parobhāvaḥ parasya akṣe parokṣe liṭi dṛśyatām . paraśabdasya akṣaśabde
GS24pmbhasuu:7017: utvam vā ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ .atha vā paraśabdāt uttarasya akṣiśabdasya utvam vaktavyam . siddham vā asmāt nipātanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7019_0: kāle . na vai kālādhikāraḥ asti . evam tarhi dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātau parokṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7019_1: . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . na ca śabdasya pratyakṣaparokṣatāyām sambhavaḥ asti . śabde
GS24pmbhasuu:7019_2: asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . parokṣe dhātau parokṣe dhātvarthe iti . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7019_3: punaḥ dhātvarthaḥ . kriyā . kriyāyām parokṣāyām . yadi evam hyaḥ apacat iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7019_4: api liṭ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . kriyā nāma iyam atyantāparidṛṣṭā anumānagamyā aśakyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7019_5: piṇḍībhūtā nidarśayitum yathā garbhaḥ nirluṭhitaḥ . evam tarhi sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7020_0: sādhaneṣu ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ . yadi sāvad guṇasamudāyaḥ sādhanam sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7020_1: api anumānagamyam . atha anyat guṇebhyaḥ sādhanam bhavati prtayakṣaparokṣatāyām sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7020_2: . atha yadā anena rathyāyām taṇḍulodakam dṛṣṭam katham tatra bhavitavyam . yadi tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7020_3: sādhaneṣu parokṣeṣu papāca iti bhavitavyam . bhavanti hi tasya sādhanāni parokṣāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7021: kriyākṛtāḥ viśeṣāḥ cītkārāḥ phūtkārāḥ ca teṣu parokṣeṣu evam api papāca iti bhavitavyam . kathañjātīyakam punaḥ parokṣam nāma . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7022: . varṣaśatavṛttam parokṣam iti . apare āhuḥ . kaṭāntaritam parokṣam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7023: apare āhūḥ . dvyahavṛttam tryahvṛttam ca iti . sarvathā uttamaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7024: sidhyati . suptamattoyoḥ iti vaktavyam . suptaḥ aham kila vilalāpa .
GS24pmbhasuu:7025: mattaḥ aham kila vilalāpa . suptaḥ nu aham kila vilalāpa . mattaḥ nu aham
GS24pmbhasuu:7026: kila vilalāpa . atha vā bhavati vai kaḥ cit jāgarat api vartamānakālam na upalabhate . tat yathā vaiyākaraṇānām śākaṭāyanaḥ rathamārge āsīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7027: śakaṭasāṛtham yāntam na upalabhate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam jāgarat api vartamānakālam na upalabhate . manasā saṃyuktāni indriyāṇi upalabdhau kāraṇāni bhavanti . manasaḥ asānnidhyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7029_0: ca . parokṣe liṭ iti atra atyantāapahnave ca iti vaktavyam . no khaṇḍikān jagāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7029_1: no kaliṅgān jagāma . na kārisomam prapau . na dārvajasya pratijagrāha . kaḥ me manuṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7030: parokṣe liṭi dṛśyatām . utvam vā ādeḥ parāt akṣṇaḥ . siddham vā asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7032: (P_3,2.118) KA_II,121.2-122.3 Ro_III,275-278 sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā adyatane . sma purā bhūtamātre na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7033_0: . kim ayam smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ aviśeṣeṇa bhūtamātre bhavati . tatra vaktavyam smalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7033_1: purālakṣaṇaḥ ca adyatane na bhavataḥ iti . āhosvit smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7033_2: bhūtamātre bhavataḥ iti . tatra smādyartham na sma purā adyatane iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7033_3: kim ca ataḥ . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa kim kṛtam bhavati na sma purā adyatane
GS24pmbhasuu:7033_4: iti bruvatā kātyāyanena iha . smādividhiḥ purāntaḥ yadi aviśeṣeṇa bhavati kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7034_0: vārttikakāraḥ pratiṣedhena karoti na sma purā adyatane iti . anuvṛttiḥ anadyatanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7034_1: lāt sme iti tatra na asti nañkāryam . laṭ sme iti atra anadyatane iti etat anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7034_2: . aparokṣānadyatanaḥ nanau ca nanvoḥ ca nivṛttau na purā adyatane iti bhavet etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7035: syāt na purā adyatane iti . tatra ca api laṅgrahaṇam . tatra ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:7036_0: laṅgrahaṇam jñapakam na purālakṣaṇaḥ adyatane bhavati iti . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣād
GS24pmbhasuu:7036_1: sma purā hetū . atha buddhiḥ aviśeṣeṇa sma purā hetū iti . tatra ca api śrṇu bhūyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7036_2: . aparokṣe ce iti eṣaḥ prāk purisaṃśabdanāt avinivṛttaḥ sarvatra anadyatanaḥ . tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7036_3: sati nañā kim iha kāryam . smādau aparokṣe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7037_0: iti akāryam iti śakyam etat api viddhi . śakyam hi nivartayitum parokṣe iti lāt sme
GS24pmbhasuu:7037_1: iti atra . syāt eṣā tava buddhiḥ . smalakṣaṇe api evam eva siddham iti . laṭ sme
GS24pmbhasuu:7037_2: iti bhavet na arthaḥ . tasmāt kāryam parārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7038: evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ smalakṣaṇaḥ purālakṣaṇaḥ ca anadyatane bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7040: aśiṣyam kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . nanau pṛṣṭaprativacane iti aśiṣyaḥ laṭ . kim kāraṇam . kriyāsamāpteḥ vivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7041_0: vivakṣitā . eṣaḥ nāma nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyāyāḥ asamāptiḥ bhavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7041_1: tatra vartamāne laṭ iti eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti eva laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau
GS24pmbhasuu:7041_2: api prāpnutaḥ . iṣyete śatṛśānacau : nanu mām kurvantam paśya . nanu mām kurvāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7041_3: paśya iti (P_3,2.122) KA_II,122.12-22 Ro_III,278-279 haśaśvadbhyām purā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7042: haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot . iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra .
GS24pmbhasuu:7043: purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā
GS24pmbhasuu:7044_0: ayāsīt . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . rathena ha śaśvat purā yāti . rathena ha śaśvat purā
GS24pmbhasuu:7044_1: ayāsīt . purālakṣaṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . smaḥ sarvebhyaḥ vipratiṣedhena . smalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7045_0: haśaśvallakṣaṇāt purālakṣaṇāt ca . haśaśvallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . iti ha akarot .
GS24pmbhasuu:7045_1: iha ha cakāra . śaśvat akarot . śaśvat cakāra . purālakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . rathena
GS24pmbhasuu:7045_2: ayam purā yāti . rathena ayam purā ayāsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7046: smalakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . dharmeṇa sma kuravaḥ yudhyante . iha sarvam prāpnoti . na ha sma vai purā śaśvat aparaśuvṛkṇam dahati . smalakṣaṇaḥ laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7047_0: (P_3,2.123) KA_II,123.2-124.13 Ro_III,279-285 pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī
GS24pmbhasuu:7047_1: avartamānatvāt . pravṛttasya avirāme śiṣyā bhavantī . iha adhīmahe . iha vasāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7047_2: . iha puṣyamitram yājayāmaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . avartamānatvāt . nityapravṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:7047_3: ca kālāvibhāgāt . nityapravṛtte ca śāsitavyā bhavantī . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sravanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7047_4: nadyaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . kālāvibhāgāt . iha bhūtabhaviṣyatpratidvandvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7047_5: vartamānaḥ kālaḥ . na ca atra bhūtabhaviṣyantau kālau staḥ . nyāyyā tu ārambhānapavargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7048: ārambhānapavargāt . ārambhaḥ atra anapavṛktaḥ . eṣaḥ nām nyāyyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7049: vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra ārambhaḥ anapavṛktaḥ . asti ca muktasaṃśaye virāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7050: . yam khalu api bhavān muktasaṃśayam vartamānam kālam nyāyyam manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7051_0: bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti tena etat tulyam . saḥ api hi avaśyam bhuñjānaḥ hasati vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7051_1: jalpati vā pānīyam vā pibati . yadi atra yuktā vartamānakālatā dṛśyate iha api yuktā
GS24pmbhasuu:7051_2: dṛśyatām . santi ca kālavibhāgāḥ . santi khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7052_0: kālavibhāgāḥ . tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ . tasthuḥ parvatāḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7052_1: śakyante ete śabdāḥ prayoktum iti ataḥ santi kālavibhāgāḥ . na avaśyam prayogāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7052_2: . iha bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānānām rājñām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāḥ tiṣṭhateḥ adhikaraṇam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7052_3: tāvat tiṣṭhanti parvatāḥ iti . samprati ye rājānaḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vartamānāsu
GS24pmbhasuu:7052_4: . sthāsyanti parvatāḥ iti . itaḥ uttaram ye rājānaḥ bhaviṣyanti teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7053_0: tasthuḥ parvatāḥ iti . ye rājānaḥ babhūvuḥ teṣām yāḥ kriyāḥ tāsu vbhūtāsu . aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7053_1: āha : na asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . api ca atra ślokān udāharanti : na vartate cakram
GS24pmbhasuu:7053_2: . iṣuḥ na pātyate . na syandante saritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7054_0: sāgarāya . kūṭasthaḥ ayam lokaḥ na viceṣṭā asti . yaḥ hi evam paśyati saḥ api anandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7054_1: . mīmāṃsakaḥ manyamānaḥ yuvā medhāvisammataḥ kākam sma iha anupṛcchati : kim te patitalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7054_2: . anāgate na patasi atikrānte ca kāka
GS24pmbhasuu:7055: na . yadi samprati patasi sarvaḥ lokaḥ patati ayam . himavān api gacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:7056: . anāgatam atikrāntam vartamānam iti trayam . sarvatra gatiḥ na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7057: gacchati iti kim ucyate . kriyāpravṛttau yaḥ hetuḥ tadartham yat viceṣṭitam tat samīkṣya prayuñjīta gacchati iti avicārayan . apraḥ āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:7058: asti vartamānaḥ kālaḥ iti . ādityagativat na upalabhyate . api ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7059: ślokam udāharanti . bisasya vālāḥ iva dahyamānāḥ na lakṣyate vikṛtiḥ sannipāte . asti iti tām vedayante tribhabhāvāḥ . sūkṣmaḥ hi bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7061_1: adeśānupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena ayogāt adeśayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7061_2: nupapattiḥ yathā anyatra . tat yathā anyatra api lasya aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7061_3: yogaḥ na bhavati . kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ iti . yogaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7061_4: cet anyatra api yogaḥ syāt . atha matam etat bhavati yogaḥ iti anyatra api yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7062_0: kva anyatra . laṅi . apacat odanam devadattaḥ iti . na kva cit yogaḥ iti kṛtvā ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7062_1: sarvatra yogena bhavitavyam kva cit ayogaḥ iti kṛtvā sarvatra ayogena . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7062_2: . samānam īhamānānām ca adhīyānānām ca ke cit arthaiḥ yujyante apare na . na ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7062_3: kaḥ cit arthavān iti ataḥ sarvaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7063: arthavadbhiḥ śakyam bhavitum kaḥ cit anarthakaḥ iti sarvaiḥ anarthakaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7064: tatra kim asmābhiḥ śakyam kartum . yat loṭaḥ aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7065_0: yogaḥ bhavati laṅaḥ na svābhāvikam etat . atha vā ādeśe sāmānādhikaraṇyam dṛṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7065_1: anumānāt gantavyam prakṛteḥ api sāmānādhikaraṇyam bhavati iti . tat yathā dhūmam
GS24pmbhasuu:7065_2: dṛṣṭvā agniḥ atra iti gamyate triviṣṭabdhakam dṛṣṭvā parivrājakaḥ iti . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7066: abhisambandhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati triviṣṭabdhakaparivrājakayoḥ ca . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti agniḥ atra parivrājakaḥ atra iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7067: bhavati vai pratyakṣāt api anumānabalīyastvam . tat yathā alātacakram
GS24pmbhasuu:7068: pratyakṣam dṛśyate anumānāt ca gamyate na etat asti iti . kasya cit khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:7069: api sakṛt kṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ atyantāya kṛtaḥ bhavati . tat yathā vṛkṣaparṇayoḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ idam parṇam iti . saḥ tadvideśastham api dṛṣṭvā jānāti vṛkṣasya idam parṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7070: (P_3,2.124.2) KA_II,125.21-127.24 Ro_III,292 kim punaḥ ayam paryudāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7071: : yat anyat prathamāsamānādhikaraṇāt iti , āhosvit prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7072: prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_0: laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti cet pratyayottarapadayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7073_1: kartavyam . kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7074: .prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe na iti . prasajyapratiṣedheuttarapade ādeśānupapattiḥ . prasajyapratiṣedheuttarapade ādeśayoḥ anupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7075: kurvatī ca asau bhaktiḥ ca kurvadbhaktiḥ pacabhaktiḥ kurvāṇabhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ iti . ye ca api ete samānādhikaraṇavṛttayaḥ taddhitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7076: tatra ca śatṛśānacau na prāpnutaḥ . kurvattaraḥ pacattaraḥ kurvāṇataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7077_0: pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ kurvāṇarūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7077_1: kurvāṇakalpaḥ pacamānakalpaḥ iti . siddham tu pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7077_2: . siddham etat . katham pratyayottarapadayoḥ ca śatṛśānacau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7077_3: . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . tatra pratyayasya ādeśanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7077_4: aprasiddhiḥ . ādeśanimittaḥ pratyayaḥ pratyayanimittaḥ ca ādeśaḥ . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7078: praklpante . uttarapadasya ca subantanimittatvāt śatṛśānacoḥ aprasiddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7080_0: uttarapadanimittaḥ sup subantanimittam ca uttarapadam . tat etat itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7080_1: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na praklpante . na vā lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7081: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam . lakāraḥ kṛt kṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:7084: tiṅādeśaḥ kriyatām subutpattiḥ iti paratvāt subutpattiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_0: tasmāt uttarapadaprasiddhiḥ . tasmāt uttarapadam prasiddham . uttarapade prasiddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_1: uttarapade iti śatṛśānacau bhaviṣyataḥ . iha api tarhi tiṅādeśāt subutpattiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_2: pacati paṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . nityaḥ atra tiṅādeśaḥ . utpanne api supi
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_3: prāpnoti anutpanne api prāpnoti . nityatvāt tiṅādeśe kṛte subutpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_4: . iha api tarhi nityatvāt tiṅādeśaḥ syāt kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_5: iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . śatṛśānacau tiṅapavādau tau ca nimittavantau . na ca apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7085_6: utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargaḥ . prakalpya
GS24pmbhasuu:7086: . na tāvat atra kadā cit tiṅ bhavati . apavādau śatṛśānacau pratīkṣate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7087: tat etat kva siddham bhavati . yatra sāmānyāt utpattiḥ . yatra hi viśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7088_0: ataḥ iñ iti itaretarāśrayam eva tatra bhavati . vīkṣamāṇasya apatyam vaikṣamāṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7088_1: iti . iha ca śatṛśānacau prāpnutaḥ . pacatitarām jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:7089: tat etat katham kṛtvā siddham bhavati . śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā . yadi śatṛśānacau yadi laṭaḥ vā bhavataḥ vyavasthitavibhāṣā ca . tena iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7090_0: bhaviṣyataḥ kaurvataḥ pācataḥ kurvadbhaktiḥ pacadbhaktiḥ pacamānabhaktiḥ kurvattaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7090_1: pacattaraḥ pacamānataraḥ kurvadrūpaḥ pacadrūpaḥ pacamānarūpaḥ kurvatkalpaḥ pacatkalpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7090_2: pacamānakalpaḥ pacan paṭhan iti ca laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau . iha ca na bhaviṣyataḥ pacatitarām
GS24pmbhasuu:7090_3: jalpatitarām pacatirūpam jalpatirūpam pacatikalpam jalpatikalpam pacati paṭhati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7091: śatṛśānacau . tat tarhi vāvacanam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . nanvoḥ vibhāṣā iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7092: vartamāne laṭa iti laṭ api vibhāṣā prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7093: nanvoḥ vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme vibhāṣā . vartamāne laṭ puri luṅ ca asme
GS24pmbhasuu:7094_0: vibhāṣā . laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau vibhāṣā . puri luṅ ca asme iti nivṛttam . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7094_1: aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . nityāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7095: kva tarhi idānīm vibhāṣā . prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe . pacan pacati pacamānaḥ pacate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7096: (P_3,2.126) KA_II,127.26-128.23 Ro_III,292-294 lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ guṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7097: tiṣṭhan mūtrayati . gacchan bhakṣayati . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa acayoge . kartuḥ ca lakṣaṇayoḥ paryāyeṇa acayoge upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7098: yaḥ adhīyānaḥ āste saḥ devadatttaḥ . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte saḥ devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7099: acayoge iti kimartham . yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7100: tattvānvākhyāne ca . tattvānvākhyāne ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śayānā vardhate dūrvā . āsīnam vardhate bisam iti . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7101: sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iti vaktavyam . san brāhmaṇaḥ asti brāhmaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7102: vidyate brāhmaṇaḥ vidyamānaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti . iṅjuhotyoḥ vāvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7103_0: iṅjuhotyoḥ vā iti vaktavyam . adhīte adhīyānaḥ . juhoti juhvat . māṅi ākrośe . māṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:7103_1: ākrośe iti vaktavyam . mā pacan . mā pacamānaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7103_2: . lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ iti eva siddham . iha tāvat tiṣṭhan mūtrayati iti . tiṣṭhatikriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7104: gacchan bhakṣayati iti . gacchatikriyā bhakṣayatikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . yaḥ adhīyānaḥ āste saḥ devadatttaḥ iti . adhyayanakriyā āsanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7105: . yaḥ āsīnaḥ adhīte saḥ devadattaḥ iti . āsikriyā adhyayanakriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . idam tarhi prayojanam . acayoge iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7106_0: . yaḥ āste ca adhīte ca saḥ caitraḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . na etat kriyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7106_1: lakṣaṇam . kim tarhi . kartṛlakṣaṇam etat . śayānā vardhate dūrvā iti . śetikriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7106_2: vṛddhikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . āsīnam vardhate bisam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7107: . āsikriyā vṛddhikriyāyāḥ lakṣaṇam . sadādayaḥ ca bahulam iṅjuhotyoḥ vā māṅi ākrośe iti vaktavyam eva.
GS24pmbhasuu:7108_1: pratinirdiśyete . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau śatṛśānacau anuvartiṣyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:7108_2: kva prakṛtau . laṭaḥ śatṛsānacau aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:7108_3: . tau sat iti vacanam asaṃsargārtham ṭau grahaṇam kriyate asaṃsargārtham . asaṃsaktayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7108_4: etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ śatṛśānacoḥ sañjñā yathā syāt . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ nivarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:7109_0: yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ nivartante ayam tu khalu vartamānaḥ kālaḥ avaśyam uttarārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7109_1: anuvartyaḥ . tasmin anuvartamāne vartamānakālavihitayoḥ eva śatṛśānacoḥ satsñjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7109_2: syāt . bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ na syāt . kim punaḥ bhūtabhaviṣyakālavihitayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7109_3: satsñjñāvacane prayojanam . pūraṇaguṇasuhitasat iti . brāhmaṇasya pakṣyan . brāhmaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7110: taugrahaṇe katham eva asaṃsaktayoḥ etaiḥ viśeṣaiḥ sañjñā labhyā . labhyā iti āha . katham . tau iti śabdataḥ sat iti yoge kriyamāṇe tau grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7111: yogāṅgam jāyate . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . tau . tau etau śatṛśānacau dhātumātrāt parasya pratyayasya bhavataḥ . tataḥ sat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7112: satsñjñau bhavatau śatṛśānacau . iha api tarhi prāpnutaḥ . kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . avadhāraṇam lṛṭi vidhānam . lṛtaḥ sat vā iti etat niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7113: bhaviṣyati . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt parasya na anyasya iti . kaimarthyakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7114: . nityau śatṛśānacau prāptau . tau vibhāṣā vidheyau . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7115: astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7116_0: yogavibhāgataḥ ca vihitam sat . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭaḥ sat . lṛṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7116_1: satsañjñau bhavataḥ . kimartham idam . niyamārtham . lṛṭaḥ eva dhātumātrāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7116_2: na anyasya iti . tataḥ vā . vā ca lṛṭaḥ śatṛśānacau satsañjñau bhavataḥ . tatra ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7116_3: api arthaḥ . sadvidhiḥ nityam aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7117: (P_3,2.127.2) KA_II,129.24-130.19 Ro_III,296-297 atha yau etau uttarau śatānau kim etau lādeśau āhosvit alādeśau . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7118: uttarayoḥ lādeśe vāvacanam . uttarayoḥ lādeśe vā iti vaktavyam . pavamānaḥ yajamānaḥ . pavate yajate iti api yathā syāt . sādhanābhidhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7119_0: sādhanābhidhānam ca prāpnoti . laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7119_1: api prāpnutaḥ . svaraḥ . svaraḥ ca sādhyaḥ . kati iha pavamānāḥ . adupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam
GS24pmbhasuu:7119_2: anudāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . upagrahapratiṣedhaḥ ca . upagrahasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7120: kati iha nighnānāḥ . taṅānau ātmanepadam iti ātmanepadasañjñā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_0: stām tarhi alādeśau . alādeśe ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhaḥ . alādeśe ṣaṣṭhīpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_1: . somam pavamānaḥ . naḍam āghnānaḥ . adhīyan pārāyaṇam . laprayoge na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_2: na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . tṛn iti eva bhaviṣyati . katham . tṛn iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_3: . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam . kva sanniviṣṭāṇām pratyāhāraḥ . laṭaḥ śatṛ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_4: ataḥ ārabhya ā tṛnaḥ nakārāt . yadi pratyāhāragrahaṇam caurasya dviṣan vṛṣalasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_5: dviṣan atra api prāpnoti . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vāvacanam . dviṣaḥ śatuḥ vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7121_6: . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam pratyayagrahaṇe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7122: pratiṣedhārtham . tat eva pratyāhāragrahaṇe sati vidhyartham bhaviṣyati.
GS24pmbhasuu:7124: anupasargasya . tṛnvidhau ṛtvikṣu ca anupasargasya iti vaktavyam . hotā potā . anupasargasya iti kimartham . praśāstā pratihartā . nayateḥ ṣuk ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7125: . nayateḥ ṣuk vaktavyaḥ . tṛn ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyañ. neṣṭā . na vā dhātvanyatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . dhātvanyatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7126: dhātvantaram neṣatiḥ . katham jñāyate . neṣatu neṣṭāt iti darśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7127_0: neṣatu neṣṭāt iti prayogaḥ dṛśyate . indraḥ naḥ tena neṣatu . gāḥ vaḥ neṣṭāt . tviṣeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7127_1: devatāyām akāraḥ ca upadhāyāḥ aniṭvam ca . tviṣeḥ devatāyām tṛn vaktavyaḥ akāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7127_2: ca upadhāyāḥ aniṭvam ca iti . tvaṣṭā . kim punaḥ idam tviṣeḥ eva aniṭvam . na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7127_3: āha . yat ca anukrāntam yat ca anukraṃsyate sarvasya eṣaḥ śeṣaḥ aniṭvam iti . kṣadeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7127_4: ca yukte . kṣadeḥ ca yukte tṛn vaktavyaḥ . kṣattā . chandasi tṛc ca . chandasi tṛc
GS24pmbhasuu:7127_5: ca tṛn ca vaktavyaḥ . kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṅgrahītṛbhyaḥ . kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṅgrahītṛbhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7129_0: īkārpratiṣedhaḥ . snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sthāsnuḥ iti . ghumāsthāgāpājahātisām
GS24pmbhasuu:7129_1: hali iti īttvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi na kit kariṣyate . akiti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7130: jiṣṇuḥ iti . bhuvaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . bhuvaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7131: kim ca anyat . guṇapratiṣedhaḥ ca . bhūṣṇuḥ iti . astu tarhi kit. nanu ca uktam snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7132: sthādaṃśibhyām snuḥ chandasi . sthādaṃśibhyām snuḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7133_0: sthāsnu jaṅgamam . daṅkṣṇavaḥ paśavaḥ iti . saḥ idānīm sthaḥ aviśeṣeṇa vidhāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7133_1: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam astu. nanu ca uktam snoḥ kittve sthaḥ īkārpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7133_2: vaktavyaḥ iti . evam tarhi git kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7134: sthoḥ gittvāt na sthaḥ īkāraḥ . sthoḥ gittvāt sthaḥ īkāraḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7135_0: kim kāraṇam . kṅitoḥ īttvaśāsanāt . kṅitoḥ īttvam śiṣyate . iha tarhi jiṣṇuḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7135_1: guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smāryaḥ . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smartavyaḥ . giti kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:7135_2: ṅiti iti . tat gakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . kakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7136: kkṅiti ca iti . iha tarhi bhūṣṇuḥ iti śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7137: prāpnoti . śryuko aniṭtvam gakoḥ itoḥ . śryukaḥ aniṭtvam gakārakakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7138: iti vaktavyam . tat gakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāsaḥ eva . kakāre gakāraḥ cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . śryukaḥ kkiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7139: yadi evam cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . śryukaḥ kkiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7140: sthoḥ gittvāt na sthaḥ īkāraḥ kṅitoḥ īttvaśāsanāt . guṇābhāvaḥ triṣu smāryaḥ . śryuko aniṭtvam gakoḥ itoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7142_0: ghinuṇi hi sati śaminau śaminaḥ taminau taminaḥ ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7142_1: iti num prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalgrahaṇam tatra codayiṣyati . iha tarhi :
GS24pmbhasuu:7143: ugitaḥ ghādiṣu nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvaḥ bhavati iti anyaratasyām hrasvatvam prasajyeta . iṣyate eva hrasvatvam . ghinuṇ akarmakāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7144: ghinuṇ akarmakāṇām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sampṛṇakti śākam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7145: uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7147_0: vidhīyate na ṇvulā eva siddham . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ nindādibhyaḥ ṇvulaḥ vā vuñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7147_1: vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . vuñm anekācaḥ . vuñm anekācaḥ prayojayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7147_2: asūyakaḥ . atha ye atra ekācaḥ paṭhyante teṣām grahaṇam kimartham na teṣām ṇvulā
