GS24pmbhasuu:7147_3: eva siddham . na sidhyati . ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn
GS24pmbhasuu:7148: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:7149_0: vāsarūpanyāyena ṇvul api bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . nindādibhyaḥ vuñvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7149_1: anyebhyaḥ ṇvulaḥ pratiṣedhārtham . nindādibhyaḥ vuñvacanam kriyate jñāpakārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7149_2: kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tacchīlādiṣu vāsarūpanyāyena anyebhyaḥ ṇvul
GS24pmbhasuu:7150: atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . tacchīlādiṣu sarve eva tṛjāsayaḥ vāsarūpeṇa na bhavanti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7151_1: ca halādeḥ iti siddhatvāt . padigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anudāttetaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7151_2: halādeḥ iti eva atra yuc siddhaḥ . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7152_0: ayam padeḥ ukañ vidhīyate laṣapadapadsthābhūvṛṣahanakamagamaśṝbhyaḥ ukañ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7152_1: viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam yucam bādheta . vāsarūpanyāyena yuc api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7152_2: asarūpanivṛttyartham tu . asarūpanivṛttyartham tarhi padigrahaṇam kriyate . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7152_3: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tācchīlikeṣu tācchilikāḥ vāsarūpeṇa na bhavanti iti . yadi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7153: dīpagrahaṇam anarthakam . ayam dīpeḥ raḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7154: namikampismyajasahiṃsadīpaḥ raḥ iti . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7155: yucam bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat dīpagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati yucaḥ reṇa samāveśaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:7156: prayojanam . kamrā kanyā kamanā kanyā iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7157: (P_3,2.158) KA_II,134.11-16 Ro_III,303-304 kimartham āluc ucyate na luś eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : spṛhayāluḥ gṛhayāluḥ . śapi kṛte ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7158: dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ālucam
GS24pmbhasuu:7159: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyebhyaḥ api ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . āluci śīṅgrahaṇam codayiṣyati . tat na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7160: bhavati . āluci śīṅgrahaṇam . āluci śīṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . śayāluḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7161_0: (P_3,2.171) KA_II,134.18-135.12 Ro_III,304-305 kimartham kikinoḥ kittvam ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:7161_1: asaṃyogāt liṭ kit iti eva siddham . kikinoḥ kittvam ṝkāraguṇapratiṣedhāṛtham . kikinoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7162: ṝkāraguṇapratiṣedhāṛtham . ayam ṝkārārāntānām liṭi guṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate ṛcchatyṝtrām iti . saḥ yathā iha bhavati ātastaratuḥ atastaruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7163: iti evam iha api prasajyeta mitrāvaruṇau taturiḥ dūre hi adhvā jaguriḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7164: . saḥ punaḥ kittve bādhyate . utsargaḥ chandasi sadādibhyaḥ darśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7165_0: utsargaḥ chandasi kikinau vaktavyau . kim prayojanam . sadādibhyaḥ darśanāt . sadādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7165_1: hi kikinau dṛśyete . sadimaniraminamivicīnām sediḥ meniḥ remiḥ . nemiḥ cakram iva
GS24pmbhasuu:7165_2: abhavat . vivicim ratnadhātamam . bhāṣāyām dhāñkṛsṛjaninimibhyaḥ . bhāṣāyām dhāñkṛsṛjaninimibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7166: dhāñ . dadhiḥ . dhāñ . kṛ . cakriḥ . kṛ . sṛ . sasriḥ . sṛ . jani . jajñiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7168: sāsahivāvahicācalipāpatīnām nipātanam kartavyam . vṛṣā sahamānam sāsahiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7169: vāvahiḥ cācaliḥ pāpatiḥ . aparaḥ āha : sahivahicalipatibhyaḥ yaṅantebhyaḥ kikinau vaktavyau . etāni eva udāharaṇāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:7170: (P_3,2.174) KA_II,135.14 Ro_III,305 bhiyaḥ krukan api vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7173: na kvip anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti eva siddham . kvibvidhiḥ anupapadārthaḥ . anupapadārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . paceḥ pak . bhideḥ bhit . chideḥ chit .
GS24pmbhasuu:7174: atha yaḥ atra sopasargaḥ tasya grahaṇam kimartham na tena eva siddham . na sidhyati . iha ke cit ā kveḥ iti sūtram paṭhanti ke cit prāk kveḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7175_0: tatra ye ā kveḥ iti paṭhanti taiḥ kvip api ākṣiptaḥ bhavati . tatra tacchīlādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7175_1: artheṣu kivp yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7175_2: tacchīlādiṣu bhaviṣyati anyatra ca . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7176_0: ayam tacchīlādiṣu tṛn vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:7176_1: . vāsarūpanyāyena ṇvul api bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . idānīm eva hi uktam tacchīlādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7176_2: vartheṣu vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . kvip ca api tṛjādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7178: vacipracchyāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇām dīrghatvam ca vaktavyam kvip ca . vaci
GS24pmbhasuu:7179: . vāk . vaci . pracchi . śabdaprāṭ pracchi . āyatastu . āyatastūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7180: āyatastu . kaṭapru . kaṭaprūḥ . kaṭapru . ju . jūḥ . ju . śri . śrīḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7181: aparaḥ āha : vacipracchyoḥ asamprasāraṇam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt samprasāraṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7182: bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7183_0: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt samprasāraṇam . antaraṅgam dīrghatvam . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7183_1: . pratyayotpattisanniyogena dīrghatvam ucyate utpanne pratyaye samprasāraṇam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7183_2: antaraṅgatvāt dīrghatve kṛte samprasāraṇam . prasāraṇaparapūrvatve kṛte kāryakṛtatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7184_0: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt samprasāraṇam na bhaviṣyati iti . dyutigamijuhotīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7184_1: dve ca . dyutigamijuhotīnām dve ca iti vaktavyam . didyut. dyuti . gami . jagat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7185: juhūḥ . dṛṇāteḥ hrasvaḥ ca dve ca kvip ca iti vaktavyam . dadṛt . juhūḥ juhoteḥ hvayateḥ vā . dadṛt dṛṇāteḥ dīryateḥ vā . jūḥ jvarateḥ jīryateḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7186: . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam ca . dhāyateḥ samprasāraṇam ca kvip ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7188_2: . kim prayojanam dhātuvidhitukpratiṣedhārtham . dhātuvidheḥ tukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7189: . mitradruḥ mitadrū mitadravaḥ . aci śnudhātubhruvām iti uvaṅādeśaḥ mā bhūt . iha ca mitadrvā mitadrve na ūṅdhātvoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7190: tugvidhiḥ . mitadruḥ . hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk bhavati iti tuk mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7191_0: (P_3,2.188) KA_II,137.4-8 Ro_III,308 śīlitaḥ rakṣitaḥ kṣāntaḥ ākruṣṭaḥ juṣṭaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7191_1: api ruṣṭaḥ ca ruṣitaḥ ca ubhau abhivyāhṛtaḥ iti api hṛṣṭatuṣṭau tathā kāntaḥ tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7191_2: ubhau saṃyotodyatau . kaṣṭam bhaviṣyati iti āhuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7192: amṛtāḥ pūrvavat smṛtāḥ . na mriyante amṛtāḥ . (3.3.1) KA_II,138.2 -
GS24pmbhasuu:7193_0: 22 Ro_III.309-312 bahulavacanam kimartham . bāhulakam prakṛteḥ tanudṛṣṭeḥ . tanvībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7193_1: prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante . na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . prāyasamuccayād api teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:7193_2: . prāyeṇa khalu api te samuccitāḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7194: sarve samuccitāḥ . kāryasaśeṣavidheḥ ca tat uktam . kāryāṇi khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7195: saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7196_0: tanvībhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uṇādayaḥ dṛśyante na sarvābhyaḥ dṛśyante . kim ca kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7196_1: prāyeṇa samuccitāḥ na sarve samuccitāḥ . kim ca kāraṇam kāryāṇi saśeṣāṇi kṛtāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:7196_2: sarvāṇi lakṣaṇena parisamāptāni . naigamarūḍibhavam hi susādhu . naigamāḥ ca rūḍhibhavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7197: nāma ca dhātujam āha nirukte . nāma khalu api dhātujam . evam āhuḥ nairuktāḥ . vyākaraṇe śakaṭasya ca tokam . vaiyākaraṇānām ca śākaṭāyanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7198: āha dhātujam nāma iti . atha yasya viśeṣapadārthaḥ na samuttitaḥ katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7199: tatra bhavitavyam . yat na viśeṣapadārthasamuttam pratyayataḥ prakṛteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7200_0: tat ūhyam . prakṛtim dṛṣṭvā pratyayaḥ ūhitavyaḥ pratyayam ca dṛṣṭvā prakṛtiḥ ūhitavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7200_1: . sañjñāsu dhāturūpāṇi pratyayāḥ ca tataḥ pare kāryāt vidyāt anubandham . etat śāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:7202: upasaṅkhyānam . bhaviṣyati iti anadyatane upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śvaḥ grāmam gamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . lṛṭā ayam nirdeśaḥ kṛiyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7203: lṛṭ ca anadyatane luṭā bādhyate . tena lṛṭaḥ eva viṣaye ete pratyayāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7204: . luṭaḥ viṣaye na syuḥ . itaretarāśrayam ca . itaretarāśrayam ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7205: kā itaretarāśrayatā . bhaviṣyatkālena śabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7206: nirdeśottarakālam ca bhbhaviṣyatkālatā . tat etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7207: . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . uktam vā . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7208: aparam api uktam avyayanirdeśāt siddham iti. avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7209: kariṣyate . avartamāne abhūte iti . saḥ tarhi avyayavatā śabdena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatiśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7210: lṛṭ . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avayayasañjñā . atha api bhavateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7211: lṛṭ evam api avayayam eva . katham na vyeti iti avyayam . kva punaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7212: vyeti . etau kālaviśeṣau bhūtavartamānau . svabhāvataḥ bhaviṣyati eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7213_0: vartate . yadi tatri na vyeti iti avyayam . na vā tadvidhānasya anyatra abhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7213_1: na vā bhaviṣyadādhikāreṇa arthaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tadvidhānasya anyatra abhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7213_2: ye api ete itaḥ uttaram pratyayāḥ śiṣyante ete api etau kālaviśeṣau na viyanti bhūtavartamānau
GS24pmbhasuu:7213_3: . svabhāvataḥ eva te bhaviṣyati eva vartante . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . bhaviṣyadadhikārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7216: pūrvavipratiṣiddham . yāvatpurādiṣu laḍvidhiḥ bhavati luṭaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . yāvatpurānipātayoḥ laṭ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7217_0: yāvat bhuṅkte . purā bhuṅkte . luṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . śvaḥ kartā . śvaḥ adhyetā . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7217_1: prāpnoti . yāvat śvaḥ bhuṅkte . purā śvaḥ bhuṅkte . laṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7217_2: saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . anadyatane luṭ iti atra yāvatpurānipātayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7218: (P_3,3.7) KA_II,140.6-8 Ro_III,314 kimartham idam ucyate na lipsyamānasiddhiḥ api lipsā eva tatra kiṃvṛtte lipsāyām iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7219: akiṃvṛttārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dadāti saḥ svargam
GS24pmbhasuu:7220: lokam gacchati . yaḥ bhavatām odanam dāsyati saḥ svargam lokam gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7221_0: (P_3,3.10) KA_II,140.10-141.6 Ro_III,314-316 kimartham kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7221_1: ṇvul vidhīyate na aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ ṇvul saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7221_2: ca bhaviṣyati . ṇvuli sakarmakagrahaṇam coditam . akaramakārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7221_3: āsakaḥ vrajati . śāyakaḥ vrajati . pratyākhyātam tat na vā dhātumātrāt darśanāt ṇvulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7221_4: iti . evam tarhi tṛjādiṣu vartamānakālopādānam coditam . avartamānakālārthaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7222: . tat api pratyākhyātam na vā kālamātre darśanāt anyeṣām iti . idam tarhi prayojanam. akenoḥ bhaviṣyadādhamrṇyayoḥ iti atra ṣaṣṭhyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7223: uktaḥ . saḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . yaḥ eva asau
GS24pmbhasuu:7224: aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ yadā bhaviṣyati bhaviṣyati tadā asya pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7225: . iha mā bhūt : aṅga yajatām . lapsyante asya yājakāḥ . ye enam yājayayiṣyanti iti . na eṣaḥ bhaviṣyatkālaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7226_0: katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti . yaḥ tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:7226_1: dhātusambandhaḥ . ime asya yājakāḥ . ime asya lāvakāḥ iti . eṣaḥ api bhūtakālaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7226_2: katham tarhi bhaviṣyatkālatā gamyate . sambandhāt . saḥ ca tāvat taiḥ ayājitaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7226_3: . tasya ca tāvat taiḥ yavāḥ alūnāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_0: . ucyate ca . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām tumun vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_1: . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam ṇvulam bādheta . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_2: bhāve tumun vidhīyate kartari ṇvul . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bhāve vihitaḥ tumun
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_3: kartari vihitam ṇvulam bādheta . lṛṭ tarhi bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_4: uttaram paṭhati . ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam tṛjādipratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_5: ṇvulaḥ kriyārthopapadasya punarvidhānam kriyate jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7227_6: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7229_0: (P_3,3.11) KA_II,141.8-20 Ro_III,316-317 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa bhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:7229_1: pratyayāḥ ye vihitāḥ te kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyanti . bhāvavacanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7230: ayam ārambhaḥ . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . bhāvavacanāḥ ca api tṛjādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7231_0: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . yathāvihitāḥ iti tu vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7231_1: . iha yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7232: kriyārthāyām yathā syuḥ . vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7233_0: na vaktavyam . iha bhāve pratyayāḥ bhavanti iti iyaṭa siddham . saḥ ayam evam siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7233_1: sati yat vacanagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam vācakāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7233_2: ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhāve pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7233_3: tena eva viśeṣeṇa kriyāyām upapde kriyārthāyām bhavanti tataḥ amī vācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7234: vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amīvācakāḥ kṛtāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7235_0: (P_3,3.12) KA_II,141.22-142.13 Ro_III,317-318 kimartham idam ucyate na aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7235_1: karmaṇi aṇ vihitaḥ saḥ kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām anyatra ca bhaviṣyati . aṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7235_2: punarvacanam apavādaviṣaye anivṛttyartham . aṇaḥ punarvacanam kriyate apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7235_3: anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . godāyaḥ vrajati . kambaladāyaḥ vrajati iti . kim ucyate apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_0: iti na punaḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhyartham syāt . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_1: upapde kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ na bhavanti iti . aṇ ca api tṛjādiḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_2: tarhi ubhayam anena kriyate . apavādaviṣaye cānivṛttiḥ utsargaviṣaye pratipadavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_3: . katham punaḥ ekena yatnena ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha . katham . karmagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_4: . katham punaḥ antareṇa karmagrahaṇam karmaṇi aṇ labhyaḥ . vacanagrahaṇam prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7236_5: anuvartate . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . aparyāyeṇa iti tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7237: vaktavyam . kadā cit hi karmaṇi syāt kadā cit kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:7238: kriyārthāyām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . aṇ karmaṇi ca . kim ca anyat . kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7239: iti . evam api pratyekam upapadasañjñā na prāpnoti . cena eva sanniyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7240: kariṣyate . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti pratyekam upapadasañjña
GS24pmbhasuu:7243: lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7244_0: kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . pratipadavidhiḥ yathā syāt . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7244_1: abhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhatvāt . aviśeṣeṇa vidhāne lṛṭaḥ abhāvaḥ syāt . kariṣyāmi iti vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:7244_2: . hariṣyāmi iti vrajati iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7245_0: pratiṣiddhatvāt . idānīm eva hi uktam kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām vāsarūpeṇa tṛjādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7245_1: na bhavanti iti . lṛṭ ca api tṛjādiḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . sādhīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7245_2: tu khalu śeṣagrahaṇena kriyārthopapadāt lṛṭ nirbhajyate . kim kāraṇam . akriyārthopapadatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_0: śeṣe iti ucyate . śeṣaḥ ca kaḥ . yat anyat kriyāyāḥ kriyārthāyāḥ . evam tarhi lṛṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_1: śeṣavacanam kriyāyām pratipadavidhyartham . lṛṭi śeṣavacanam kriyate kriyāyām pratipadavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_2: yathā syāt . lṛṭ śeṣe ca . kariṣyati hariṣyati iti . kva ca . kriyāyām upapade kriyārthāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_3: iti . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha lṛṭ bhavati iti iyatā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_4: . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat śeṣagrahaṇam karoti tasya etat prayojanam yogāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_5: yathā upajāyeta . sati ca yogāṅge yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . lṛṭ bhavati kriyāyām upapade
GS24pmbhasuu:7246_6: kriyārthāyām iti . tataḥ śeṣe . śeṣe ca lṛṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:7248_1: sadvidhiḥ aprathamāsamānādhikaraṇe nityam iti vaktavyam . pakṣyantam paśya . pakṣyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7249: vibhāṣā . prathamāsamānādhikaraṇe . pākṣyan pakṣyati . pakṣyamāṇaḥ pakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7251: anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau bhavataḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhyāsyamānena . śvaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇena . tataḥ luṭ . luṭ bhavati anadyatane . śvaḥ kartā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_0: śvaḥ adhyetā . kena vihitasya anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau ucyete . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_1: bhavati anadyatane lṛṭ iti yat ayam anadyatane lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau śāsti . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7252_2: saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7254_1: paridevane śvastanībhaviṣyantyāḥ arthe iti vaktavyam . iyam nu kadā gantā yā evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7255: adhyetā yaḥ evam anabhiyuktaḥ iti . kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7256: kālaprakarṣāt tu upamānam . gantā iva iyam gantā . na iyam gamiṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7257: adhyetā iva ayam adhyetā . na vai tiṅantena upamānam asti . evam tarhi anadyatane iva anadyatane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7258: (P_3,3.16) KA_II,144.2-3 Ro_III,321 spṛśaḥ upatāpe . spṛśaḥ upatāpe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . kambalasparśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7260: atīsāraḥ vyādhiḥ . visāraḥ matsyaḥ . bale . śālasāraḥ khadirasāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7262_0: bhāve sarvaliṅganirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . bhūtau bhavane bhāve iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7262_1: sarvaliṅge bhāṅe ete pratyayāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . puṃliṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_0: ten puṃliṅge eva ekavacane ca ete prratyayāḥ syuḥ . strīnapuṃsakayoḥ dvivacanabahuvacnayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_1: ca na syuḥ . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva ca nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7263_2: tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:7264: taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:7265: ca . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit ca liṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7266: tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam satuṣam sapalālam āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7267: tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7268: evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_0: . na hi atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit ca liṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_1: . atha vā kṛbhvastayaḥ kriyāsāmānyavācinaḥ kriyāviśeṣavācinaḥ pacādayaḥ . yat ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_2: atra pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati na tat bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . yat ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_3: bhavati na tat pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . kim ca pacateḥ bhavatiḥ bhavati . sāmānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_4: . kim ca bhavateḥ pacatiḥ bhavati . viśeṣaḥ . tat yathā upādhyāyasya śiṣyaḥ mātulasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_5: bhāgineyam gatvā āha . upādhyāyam bhavān abhivādayatām iti . saḥ gatvā mātulam abhivādayate
GS24pmbhasuu:7269_6: . tathā mātulasya bhāgineyaḥ upādhyāyasya śiṣyam gatvā āha . mātulam bhavān abhivādayatām
GS24pmbhasuu:7270: abhivādayate . evam iha api pacateḥ bhavatau yat tat nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7272_0: kārakagrahaṇam anādeśe svārthavijñānāt . kārakagrahaṇam anādeśe svārthavijñānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7272_1: anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti . tat yathā . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7272_2: kan iti . evam ime api pratyayāḥ svārthe syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan kārake yathā syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_0: ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_1: atriprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamārthaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . akartari sañjñāyām eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_2: asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit sañjñābhūtaḥ bhāvaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_3: āvāhaḥ , vivāhaḥ iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7273_4: . iha ca asti vidheyam . akartari ca kārake sañjñāyām ghañ vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7274_0: iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . tat eva tarhi prayojanam svārthe mā
GS24pmbhasuu:7274_1: bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ svārthe bhāve ghañ iti iti . anyaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7274_2: bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena idānīm ābhyantare
GS24pmbhasuu:7275: bhāve syāt . kaḥ punaḥ etayoḥ bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ bhāṣye
GS24pmbhasuu:7276: . etat api na asti prayojanam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca asnyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:7277: vijñayate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7278: ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7279: evam iha api akartari iti kartṛpratiṣedhāt anyasmin akartari kartṛsadṛśe kāryam vijñasyate . kim ca anyat akartṛ kartṛsadṛśam . kārakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7280: uttarārtham tarhi kārakagrahaṇam kartavyam . parimāṇākhyāyām sarvebhyaḥ kārake yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ . deve sṛtī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7281: ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye avacane hi strīpratyayānām api avādavijñānam iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7282: atra api akartari iti eva anuvartiṣyate . sañjñāgrahaṇānarthakyam ca sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt . sañjñāgrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7283: sarvatra ghañaḥ darśanāt . asañjñāyām api hi ghañ dṛśyate . kaḥ bhavatā dāyaḥ dattaḥ . kaḥ bhavatā lābhaḥ labdhaḥ iti . yadi sañjñāgrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7284: kriyate atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . kṛtaḥ kaṭaḥ iti atra kāraḥ kaṭa iti prāpnoti . atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7285: atiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . abhidhānalakṣaṇatvāt pratyayasya siddham . abhidhānalakṣaṇāḥ kṛttaddhitasamādāḥ . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_0: sarvebhyaḥ dhātubhyaḥ ghañ yathā syāt ajapoḥ api viṣaye . ekaḥ taṇḍulaniścāyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7287_1: dvau śūrpaniṣpāvau . sarvagrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇākhyāyam iti siddhatvāt . sarvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7288_0: parimāṇākhyāyam iti siddhatvāt . parimāṇākhyāyam iti eva ghañ siddhaḥ ajapoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:7288_1: viṣaye . na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7288_2: pākaḥ dvau pākau trayaḥ pākāḥ iti . pūrveṇa api etat siddham . na sidhyati . sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7288_3: iti pūrvaḥ yogaḥ . na ca eṣā sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7289: . pratyākhyāyate sañjñāgrahaṇam . atha api kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7290_0: ajau api sañjñāyām eva . yathājātīyakaḥ utsargaḥ tathājātīyakena apavādena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7290_1: . uttarārtham tarhi . iṅaḥ ca sarvebhyaḥ api yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam iṅ ekaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7291: upetya adhīyate tasmāt adhyāyaḥ . adhīyate tasmin adhyāyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7292: adhyāyanyāyāyodyāvasaṃhārāvāyāḥ ca iti etat nipātanam na kartavyam bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyate nyāse eva . uttarāṛtham eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_0: vaktavyam . karmavyatihāre ṇac striyām iti sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_1: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham . pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:7293_2: grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7294: strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca iti . uttarārtham tarhi abhividhau
GS24pmbhasuu:7295: bhāve inuṇ sarvebhyaḥ yathā syāt . sāṃrāviṇam . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake
GS24pmbhasuu:7296: ktādinivṛttyartham . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham . na tu lyuṭ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7297: idam tarhi prayojanam . prakṛtyāśrayaḥ yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7298_0: syāt . arthāśrayaḥ yaḥ apavādaḥ tasya bādhanam mā bhūt . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī
GS24pmbhasuu:7298_1: iti . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . avacane hi strīpratyayānām api apavādavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7298_2: iti codayiṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7299: (P_3,3.20.2) KA_II,147.7-16 Ro_III,329-330 ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye . ghañanukramaṇam ajabviṣaye iti vaktavyam . avacane hi strīpratyayānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7300: api apavādavijñānam . anucyamāne hi etasmin strīpratyayānām api apavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7301: ayam vijñayeta . ekā tilocchritiḥ dve sṛtī iti . dārajārau kartari ṇiluk
GS24pmbhasuu:7302: ca . dārajārau kartari vaktavyau ṇiluk ca vaktavyaḥ . dārayanti iti dārāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7303: . jarayanti iti jārāḥ . karaṇe vā . karaṇe vā vaktavyau . dīryate taiḥ dārāḥ . jīryanti taiḥ jārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7304: (P_3,3.21) KA_II,147.18-23 Ro_III,330 iṅaḥ ca iti apādāne striyām upasaṅkhyānam tadantāt ca vā ṅīṣ . iṅaḥ ca iti atra apādāne striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7305: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam tadantāt ca vā ṅīṣ vaktavyaḥ . upetya adhīyate tasyāḥ uapādhyāyī upādhyāyā . śṝ vāyuvarṇanivṛteṣu . śṝ iti etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7306: vāyuvarṇanivṛteṣu ghañ vaktavyaḥ . śāraḥ vāyuḥ . śāraḥ varṇaḥ . gauḥ iva akṛtanīśāraḥ prāyeṇa śiśire kṛśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7307: (P_3,3.36) KA_II,148.2-9 Ro_III,331 sami muṣṭau iti anarthakam vacanam parimāṇākhyāyām iti siddhatvāt . sami muṣṭau iti etat vacanam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7308: kim kāraṇam . parimāṇākhyāyām iti siddhatvāt . parimāṇākhyāyām iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7309: siddham . aparimāṇārtham tu . aparimāṇārtham tu ayam ārambhaḥ . mallasya saṅgrāhaḥ muṣṭikasya saṅgāhaḥ iti . udgrābhinigrābhau ca chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7310: srugudyamananipātanayoḥ . udgrābhaḥ nibrābhaḥ iti imau śabdau chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:7311: vaktavyau srugudyamananipātanayoḥ . udgrābham ca nigrābham ca brahma devāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7314_0: karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam vyatipākārtham . karmavyatihāre strīgrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7314_1: vyatipākārtham . iha mā bhūt . vyatipākaḥ vartate iti . atha kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7314_2: . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhanārtham . pṛthak grahaṇam kriyate bādhakabādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7314_3: . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham kim prayojanam . vyāvacorīvyāvacarcyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7315: vyāvacarcī vartate . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu doṣaḥ . tatra vyatīkṣādiṣu doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7316: bhavati . vyatīkṣā vartate . vyatīhā vartate . siddham tu prakṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7317: strīgrahaṇe ṇajgrahaṇam ṇijgrahaṇam ca . siddham etat . katham . prakṛte eva strīgrahaṇe ayam yogaḥ kartavyaḥ . striyām ktin . tataḥ karmavyatihāre ṇac . tataḥ ṇicaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7319_0: abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . abhividhau bhāvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7319_1: kriyate napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge ktādayaḥ mā bhūvan iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7319_2: kimartham pṛthak grahaṇam . pṛthak grahaṇam bādhakabādhārtham . pṛthak grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7319_3: bādhakabādhārtham : ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . na tu lyuṭaḥ . lyuṭaḥ tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7321: (P_3,3.56) KA_II,149.14-150.2 Ro_III,333-334 ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam . ajvidhau bhayasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bhayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7322_0: atyalpam idam ucyate : bhayasya iti . bhayādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7322_1: : bhayam varṣam . kim prayojanam . napuṃsake ktādinivṛttyartham . napuṃsakaliṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:7322_2: ktādayaḥ mā bhūvan iti . kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7323: kalpādibhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kalpaḥ arthaḥ mantraḥ . javasavau chandasi . javasavau chandasi vaktavyau . ūrvoḥ astu me javaḥ . ayam me pañcaudanaḥ savaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7325: ap vidhīyate na acā eva siddham . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7326_0: apaḥ vā acaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . na sidhyati . hastādāne ceḥ ghañ
GS24pmbhasuu:7326_1: prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . abvidhau niścigrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7326_2: steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt . abvidhau niścigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7326_3: . steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhāt steyasya ghañvidhau pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . niṣpūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7327: asteyārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7328_0: asteyārtham iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . asteyārtham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7328_1: . na niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ asteye ap iṣyate . kim tarhi ghañ eva iṣyate . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7328_2: siddhe sati yat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ apam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:7329: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ yat tat antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitṛkāṇām iti tat niṣpūrvāt cinoteḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7332: vaśiraṇyoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saḥ vaśam saindhavam . dhanañjayaḥ raṇe raṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7333: . ghañarthe kavidhānam sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . ghañarthe kaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sthāsnāpāvyadhihaniyudhyartham . sthā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7334: pratiṣṭhante asmin dhānyāni iti prasthaḥ . prasthe himavataḥ śrṅge . sthā
GS24pmbhasuu:7335: . snā . prasnānti tasmin iti prasnaḥ . snā . pā . prapibanti asyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7336: prapā . pā . vyadhi . āvidhyanti tena āvidham . vyadhi . hani . vighnanti tasmin manāṃsi vighnaḥ . hani . yudhi . āyudhyante tena āyudham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7337: (P_3,3.83) KA_II,151.2-11 Ro_III,336 kasmāt ayam kaḥ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7338_0: hanteḥ iti āha . tat hantigrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7338_1: . kva prakṛtam . hanaḥ ca vadhaḥ . tat vai anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7338_2: anuvartayitum . na etāni nipātanāni . hanteḥ ete ādeśāḥ . yadi ādeśāḥ ghanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7338_3: na sidhyati . ghanaḥ . santu tarhi nipātanāni . nanu ca uktam tat vai anekena nipātanena
GS24pmbhasuu:7339_0: śakyam anuvartayitum iti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā punaḥ santu ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7339_1: . nanu ca uktam svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akārāntaḥ ādeśaḥ . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7339_2: yadā iṣīkayā stambaḥ hanyate katham tatra bhavitavyam . ke cid tāvat āhuḥ . stambaghnā
GS24pmbhasuu:7339_3: iti bhavitavyam . apare āhuḥ : stambahetiḥ iti bhavitavyam . ūtiyūtijūtisātihetikīrtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7339_4: ca iti nipātanam iti . apare āhuḥ . stambahananīiti bhavitavyam iti . vakṣyati etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7339_5: . ajabbhyām strīīkhalanāḥ . striyāḥ khalanau vipratiṣedhena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7341_0: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7341_1: . praśnaḥ iti . evan tarhi āṅit kariṣyate . aṅiti guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi aṅit guṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7342_0: sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam yajādibhyaḥ nasya ṅittve
GS24pmbhasuu:7342_1: samprasāraṇapratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7342_2: . praśne ca āsannakāle iti (P_3,3.94) KA_II,151.21-152.6 Ro_III,337 striyām ktin
GS24pmbhasuu:7343: striyām ktin iti atra ābādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . āptiḥ rāddhiḥ dīptiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7344_0: niṣṭhāyām vā seṭaḥ akāravacanāt siddham . atha vā niṣṭhāyām seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7344_1: iti vaktavyam . yadi niṣṭhāyām seṭaḥ akāraḥ bhavati iti ucyate sraṃsā dhvaṃsā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7344_2: na sidhyati . srastiḥ dhvastiḥ iti prāpnoti . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam trayaḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7344_3: ābādayaḥ āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7345: . yadi parigaṇanam bhedaḥ bhavati . atha udāharaṇamātram na asti bhedaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7347: (P_3,3.95) KA_II,152.8-20 Ro_III,338 sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ . sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaḥ ktin prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva aṅam bādhate evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7348_0: ṇvuliñau api bādheta . kām tvam sthāyikām asthāḥ . kām sthāyim . siddham tu aṅvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7348_1: sthādipratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . aṅvidhāne eva sthādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7349: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7350: sthādibhyaḥ sarvāpavādaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam striyām ktin aṅam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7351_0: ṇvuliñau na bādhiṣyate . śrutijiṣistubhyaḥ karaṇe . śrutijiṣistubhyaḥ karaṇe ktin
GS24pmbhasuu:7351_1: vaktavyaḥ . śrūyate anayā śrutiḥ . ijyate anayā iṣṭiḥ . iṣyate anayā iṣṭiḥ . stūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7351_2: anayā stutiḥ . glājyāhābhyaḥ niḥ . glājyāhābhyaḥ niḥ vaktavyaḥ . glāniḥ jyāniḥ hāniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7353: kyabvidhiḥ adhikaraṇe ca iti vaktavyam . samajanti tasyām samajyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7354: (P_3,3.100) KA_II,153.2-3 Ro_III,339 kṛñaḥ śa ca iti vāvacanam ktinartham . kṛñaḥ śa ca iti vāvacanam kartavyam ktin api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7356: (P_3,3.102) KA_II,153.5-7 Ro_III,339 kim nipātyate . iṣeḥ śe yagabhāvaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate icchā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7357: icchāparicaryāparisaryāmṛgayāṭāṭyānām nipātanam kartavyam . jāgarteḥ akāraḥ vā . jāgarya jāgarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7358_0: (P_3,3.104) KA_II,153.9-18 Ro_III,340 bhidā vidāraṇe . bhidā vidāraṇe iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7358_1: . bhittiḥ anyā . chidhā dvaidhīkaraṇe . chidhā dvaidhīkaraṇe iti vaktavyam . chittiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7358_2: anyā . ārā śastryām . ārā śastryām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7359: ārtiḥ anyā . dhārā prapāte . dhārā prapāte iti vaktavyam . dhṛtiḥ anyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7360: guhā giryoṣadhyoḥ . guhā giryoṣadhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . gūḍhiḥ anyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7362_0: svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7362_1: prayojanam . udāttaḥ iti vartate bhūvīrāḥ udāttaḥ iti . yadi udāttaḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7362_2: vajayajoḥ bhāve kyap kimarthaḥ pakāraḥ . tugarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_0: hrasvasya piti kṛti tuk iti . udāttaḥ iti vartate . evam api kutaḥ etat tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_1: udāttatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ādeḥ iti . udāttaḥ iti anuvartanasāmarthyāt yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_2: aprāptaḥ svaraḥ tasya bhavati . kasya ca aprāptaḥ . antyasya . sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_3: tarhi . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena arthaḥ . yuvoḥ anākau iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7363_4: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . siddham tu yuvoḥ anunāsikavacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_0: (P_3,3.107.2) KA_II,154.8-13 Ro_III,341 yucprakaraṇe ghaṭṭivandividhibhyaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7364_1: . yucprakaraṇe ghaṭṭivandividhibhyaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ghaṭṭanā vandanā
GS24pmbhasuu:7365: . iṣeḥ anicchārthasya . iṣeḥ anicchārthasya iti vaktavyam . anviṣyate anveṣaṇā . pareḥ vā . pareḥ vā iti vaktavyam . anyām parīṣṭim cara . anyām paryeṣaṇām cara .
GS24pmbhasuu:7366_1: ṇvul vaktavyaḥ . kā nāma āsikā anyeṣu īhamāneṣu . kā nām śāyikā anyeṣu adhīyāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_0: pratyayau dhātunirdeśe vaktavyau . paceḥ brūhi . pacateḥ brūhi . varṇāt kāraḥ . varṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7367_1: kārapratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akāraḥ ikāraḥ . rāt iphaḥ . rāt iphaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rephaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7368: matvarthīyaḥ . iṇ ajādibhyaḥ . iṇ ajādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ājiḥ ātiḥ ādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7369: iñ vapādibhyaḥ . iñ vapādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vāpiḥ vāsiḥ vādiḥ . ik kṛṣyādibhyaḥ . ik kṛṣyādibhyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛṣiḥ kiriḥ giriḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7370: sampadādibhyaḥ kvip . sampadādibhyaḥ kvip vaktavyaḥ . sampat vipat pratipat āpat pariṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:7371_0: (P_3,3.113) KA_II,155.12-13 Ro_III,343 kṛtaḥ bahulam iti vaktavyam pādahārakādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7371_1: . pādābhyām hriyate pādahārakaḥ . gale copyate galecopakaḥ . śvaḥ agnīn ādhāsyamānena
GS24pmbhasuu:7372: (P_3,3.119) KA_II,155.15-17 Ro_III,343 gocarādīnām agrahaṇam prāyavacanāt yathā kaṣaḥ nikaṣaḥ iti . gocarādīnām grahaṇam śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:7373: . ghañ kasmāt na bhavati . prāyavacanāt yathā kaṣaḥ nikaṣaḥ iti prāyavacanāt ghañ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7374: (P_3,3.121) KA_II,155.19-21 Ro_III,344 ghañvidhau avahārādhārāvāyānām upasaṅkhyānam . ghañvidhau avahārādhārāvāyānām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7375: avahriyante asmin avahāraḥ . ādhriyante asmin ādhāraḥ . etya etasmin vayanti āvāyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7376: (P_3,3.123) KA_II,156.2-7 Ro_III,344 kimartham idam ucyate na halaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7377: iti eva siddham . anudake it vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . udakodañcanaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7378: udaṅkaḥ anudakagrahaṇānarthakyam ca prāyavacanāt yathā godohanaḥ prasādhanaḥ iti . udaṅkaḥ anudakagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . ghañ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:7379: bhavati . prāyavacanāt yathā godohanaḥ prasādhanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7380: (P_3,3.125) KA_II,156.9-10 Ro_III,344 ḍaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ākhaḥ . ḍaraḥ vaktavyaḥ . ākharaḥ . ikaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ākhanikaḥ . ikavakaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7383: ajabbhyām strīkhalanāḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . ajapoḥ avakāśaḥ cayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7384: lavaḥ . strīpratyayānām avakāśaḥ kṛtiḥ hṛtiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_0: citiḥ stutiḥ . khalaḥ avakāśaḥ īṣadbhedaḥ subhedaḥ . ajapoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_1: prāpnoti . īṣaccayaḥ sucayaḥ īṣallavaḥ sulavaḥ . anasya avakāśaḥ idhmapravraścanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_2: . ajapoḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . palāśacayanaḥ avilavanaḥ . strīkhalanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7385_3: bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . striyāḥ khalanau vipratiṣedhena . striyāḥ khalanau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7386: strīpratyayānām avakāśaḥ kṛtiḥ hṛtiḥ . khalaḥ avakāśaḥ īṣadbhedaḥ subhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7387: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . īṣadbhedā subhedā . anasya avakāśaḥ idhmapravraścanaḥ . strīpratyayānām saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7390_0: . khal kartṛkaraṇayoḥ cvyarthayoḥ iti vaktavyam . anāḍhyena bhavatā īṣadāḍhyena śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7390_1: bhavitum īṣadāḍhyambhavam bhavatā . durāḍhyambhavam svāḍhyambhavam . kartṛkarmagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7391: kartṛkarmagrahaṇam ca upapadasañjñārtham draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:7392: abhidheyayoḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe : kartṛkarmagrahaṇam ca upapadasañjñārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7393_0: (P_3,3.130) KA_II,157.9-12 Ro_III,346 bhāṣāyām śāsiyudhidṛśidhṛṣibhyaḥ yuc . bhāṣāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7393_1: śāsiyudhidṛśidhṛṣibhyaḥ yuc vaktavyaḥ . duḥśāsanaḥ duryodhanaḥ durdarśanaḥ durdharṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7396_0: vartamānasāmīpye vartmānāḥ vā iti iyati ucyamāne vartamāne ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ vartamānasāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:7396_1: dhātumātrāt syuḥ . vatkaraṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7396_2: yena viśeṣeṇa vartamāne pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena eva viśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:7397_0: bhavanti tataḥ amīvartamānavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt vā syuḥ pratyayamātram
GS24pmbhasuu:7397_1: vā syāt na amīvartamānavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ . iha vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavat vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7397_2: uktvā loṭ eva udāhriyate . yadi punaḥ vā laṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . ataḥ uttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:7397_3: paṭhati . vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavadvacanam śatrādyartham . vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7397_4: kriyate śatrādyartham . śatrādyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi pacan .
GS24pmbhasuu:7398_0: eṣaḥ asmi pacamānaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . laḍādeśau śatṛśānacau . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7398_1: vā laṭ bhavati iti eva siddham . yau tarhi alaḍādeśau . eṣaḥ asmi pavamānaḥ . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7398_2: asmi yajamānaḥ . yau ca api laḍādeśau tau api
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_0: prayojayataḥ . vartamānavihitasya laṭaḥ śatṛśānacau ucyete . aviśeṣeṇa vihitaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7399_1: ayam yogaḥ . śatrādyartham iti khalu api ucyate . bahavaḥ ca śatrādayaḥ . eṣaḥ asmi
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_0: āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadatideśe laṅliṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . āśaṃsāyām bhūtavadatideśe laṅliṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā apavādasya nimittābhāvāt anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_2: . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . apavādasya nimittābhāvāt . na atra apavādasya nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:7401_3: asti . katham . anadyatane hi tayoḥ vidhānam . anadyatane hi tau vidhīyete laṅliṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:7402: anadyatanaḥ kālaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bhūtakālasāmānyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7403_1: aprāptiḥ . āśaṃsā sambhāvanam iti aviśiṣṭau etau arthau . āśaṃsāsambhāvanayoḥ aviśeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7403_2: tadvidhānasya aprāptiḥ . āśaṃsāyām ye vidhīyante te sambhāvane api prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7403_3: ye ca sambhāvane vidhīyante te āśaṃsāyām api prāpnuvanti . kim tarhi ucyate aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7403_4: iti . na sādhīyaḥ prāptiḥ bhavati . iṣṭā vyavasthā na prakalpeta . na sarve sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7404: . na vā sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_0: sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ . sambhāvanāvayavātmikā āśaṃsā . āśaṃsā nāma pradhāritaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7405_1: arthaḥ abhinītaḥ ca anabhinītaḥ ca . sambhāvanam nāma pradhāritaḥ arthaḥ abhinītaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7406: sambhāvanasya . atha vā arthāsandehaḥ eva punaḥ asya . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_0: alamarthatvāt sambhāvanasya . sambhāvane ālamarthyam gamyate āsaṃśāyām punaḥ anālamarthyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_1: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sambhāvane api anālamarthyam gamyate iti yat ayam sambhāvane
GS24pmbhasuu:7407_2: alam iti āha . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate na vā sambhāvanāvayavatvāt āśaṃsāyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7408_0: (P_3,3.133.1) KA_II,159.16-201.2 Ro_III,350 kṣipravacane lṛaḥ āśaṃsāvacane liṅ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7408_1: . kṣipravacane lṛaḥ āśaṃsāvacane liṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṣipravacane lṛṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7409_0: upādhyāyaḥ cet āgataḥ kṣipram adhyeṣyāmahe . āśaṃsāvacabe liṅ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7409_1: . upādhyāyaḥ cet āgataḥ āśaṃse yuktaḥ adhīyīya . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . upādhyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7409_2: cet āgataḥ āśaṃse kṣipram adhīyīya . liṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7410: (P_3,3.133.2) KA_II,159.21-160.9 Ro_III,350-351 aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ śiṣyaḥ aniṣpannatvāt . aniṣpanne niṣpannaśabdaḥ śiṣyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_0: śāsitavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aniṣpannatvāt . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ niṣpannāḥ śālayaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_1: bhavitavyam sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . siddham tu bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_2: etat . katham . bhaviṣyatpratiṣedhāt . yat lokaḥ bhaviṣyadvācinaḥ śabdasya prayogam
GS24pmbhasuu:7411_3: na mṛṣyati . kaḥ cit āha . devaḥ cet vṛṣṭaḥ sampatsyante śālayaḥ iti . saḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7412: sampannāḥ śālayaḥ iti evam brūhi . hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_0: hetubhūtakālasamprekṣitatvāt vā punaḥ siddham etat . hetubhūtakālam varṣam varṣākālā
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_1: ca kriyā . yadi tarhi niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante . kāni . bhojanādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_2: . anyat idānīm etat ucyate kim niṣpannakāryāṇi na kriyante iti . yat tu tat niṣpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7413_3: arthaḥ na niṣpannaḥ iti . saḥ niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam khalu api koṣṭhagateṣu api
GS24pmbhasuu:7414: avahananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi . evam iha api niṣpannaḥ arthaḥ . avaśyam tu jananādīni pratīkṣyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7415: (P_3,3.133.3) KA_II,160.10-161.2 Ro_III,351-352 astyarthānām bhavantyarthe sarvāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . astyarthānām bhavantyarthe sarvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7416_0: vibhaktayaḥ . kūpaḥ asti . kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . kūpaḥ bhavitā . kūpaḥ abhūt . kūpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7416_1: āsīt . kūpaḥ babhūva iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate bhavantyāḥ eṣaḥ arthaḥ iti . kartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7416_2: vidyamānatvāt . kartā atra vidyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate kartā atra vidyate iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7416_3: . kūpaḥ anena kadā cit dṛṣṭaḥ . na ca asya
GS24pmbhasuu:7417: kam cid api apāyam paśyati . saḥ tu tatra buddhyā nityām sattām
GS24pmbhasuu:7418: adhyavasyati . kūpaḥ asti iti . siddham tu yathāsvam kālasamuccāraṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7419: siddham etat . katham . yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāleṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7420: prayujyante iti . katham punaḥ jñāyate yathāsvam etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāleṣu prayujyante iti . avātvāt . yat na vā bhāṣyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:7421: asiddhaviparyāsaḥ ca . asiddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ . na hi kaḥ cit kūpaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7422: iti prayoktavye kūpaḥ abhūt iti prayuṅkte . kim punaḥ kāraṇam . na vā bhāṣyante asiddhaḥ ca viparyāsaḥ . iha kim cit indriyakarma kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7423: buddhikarma . indriyakarma samāsādanam buddhikarmavyavasāyaḥ . evam hi kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7424: cit pāṭaliputram jigamiṣuḥ āha . yaḥ ayam adhvā gantavyaḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7425: etasmin kūpaḥ bhaviṣyati . samāsādya atikramya uṣitvā kūpaḥ āsīt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7426: samāsādya atikramya uṣitvā vismṛtya kūpaḥ babhūva iti . tat yadā indriyakarma tadā etāḥ vibhaktayaḥ . yadā hi buddhikarma tadā vartamānā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7428_0: pratiṣedhau ucyete na adyatanavat iti eva ucyeta . na anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7428_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . na anadyatanavatpratiṣedhe laṅluṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . adyatanavadvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7428_2: hi vidhānam adyatanavadvacane hi sati vidhiḥ iyam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7428_3: laḍvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . tatra laḍvidhiḥ prasajyeta . luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7429_0: luṅlṛṭoḥ ca ayathākālam prayogaḥ prasajyeta . luṅaḥ api viṣaye lṛṭ syāt lṛṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7429_1: viṣaye luṅ syāt . adya punaḥ ayam dvau pratiṣedhau uktvā tūṣṇīm āste . yathāprāptem
GS24pmbhasuu:7431: na na anadyatanavat iti eva siddham . bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane avarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7432: iti akriyāprabandhārtham . akriyāprabandhārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kim ucyate akriyāprabandhaḥ . na punaḥ kriyāprabandhārthaḥ api syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7433: kriyāprabandhārtham iti cet vacanānarthakyam . kriyāprabandhārtham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7434_0: vacanam anarthakam . siddham kriyāprabandhe pūrveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7434_1: anahorātrāṇām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . yaḥ ayam triṃśadrātraḥ āgāmī tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7435: ahorātrapratiṣedhārtham iti cet na aniṣṭatvāt . ahorātrapratiṣedhārtham iti cet tat na aniṣṭatvāt . kim kāraṇam . aniṣṭatvāt . atra api na
GS24pmbhasuu:7436_0: anadyatanavat iti eva iṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam : bhaviṣyati iti vakṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7436_1: . iha ma bhūt . yaḥ ayam adhvā gataḥ ā pāṭaliputrāt tasya yat avaram sāketāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7436_2: . na aniṣṭatvāt . atra api na anadyatanavat iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7437: iṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam maryādāvacane iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . yaḥ ayam adhvā aparimāṇaḥ gantavyaḥ tasya yat avaram sāketāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7438: atra api na anadyatanavat iti eva iṣyate . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate bhaviṣyati maryādāvacane avarasmin iti akriyāprabandhārtham . kriyāprabandhārtham iti cet vacanānarthakyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7440: pratiṣedhaḥ . anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yaḥ ayam triṃśadrātraḥ āgāmītasya yaḥ avaraḥ ardhamāsaḥ . taiḥ ca vibhāge .
GS24pmbhasuu:7441: taiḥ ca vibhāge iti vaktavyam : yaḥ ayam māsaḥ āgāmītasya yaḥ avaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7442: pañcadaśarātraḥ iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt : ahorātrāṇām eva ahorātraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7443: vibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:7444: anahorātrāṇām iti tadvibhāge pratiṣedhaḥ . taiḥ ca vibhāge iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7447: (P_3,3.139) KA_II,163.2-5 Ro_III,357 sādhanātipattau iti api vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . abhokṣyata bhavān māṃsena yadi matsamīpe āsiṣyata iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7448: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na antareṇa sādhanam kriyāyāḥ pravṛttiḥ asti iti sādhanātipattiḥ cet kriyātipattiḥ api bhavati . tatra kriyātipattau iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7449: (P_3,3.140) KA_II,163.7-8 Ro_III,357 bhūte lṛṅ utāpyādiṣu . bhūte lṛṅ utāpyādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ . uta adhyāiṣyata . api adhyaiṣyata .
GS24pmbhasuu:7451: utāpibhyām . vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām iti vaktavyam . vā ā utāpyoḥ iti hi ucyamāne sandehaḥ syāt : prāk vā utāpibhyām saha vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7452: tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe vibhāṣā garhāprabhṛtau prāk utāpibhyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7453: (P_3,3.142) KA_II,163.15-20 Ro_III,358 garhāyām laḍvidhānānarthakyam kriyāsamāptivivakṣitatvāt . garhāyām laḍvidhiḥ narthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7454: kriyāsamāptivivakṣitatvāt . kriyāyāḥ atra asamāptiḥ gamyate . eṣaḥ ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7455_0: nyāyyaḥ vartamānaḥ kālaḥ yatra kriyā aparisamāptā bhavati . tatra vartamāne laṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7455_1: eva siddham . yadi vartamāne laṭ iti evam atra laṭ bhavati śatṛśānacau prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7455_2: . iṣyete ca śatṛśānacau : api mām yājayantam
GS24pmbhasuu:7457: (P_3,3.145) KA_II,164.2-8 Ro_III,358-359 kiṃvṛttasya anadhikārāt uttaratra akiṃvṛttagrahaṇānarthakyam . kiṃvṛttasya anadhikārāt uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:7458: akiṃvṛttagrahaṇam anarthakam . nivṛttam kiṃvṛtte iti . tasmin nivṛtte aviśeṣeṇa kiṃvṛtte akiṃvṛtte ca bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7459: upapadasañjñām vakṣyāmi iti . upapadasañjñāvacane kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7460: upapadam atiṅ iti samāsaḥ yathā syāt . atiṅ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7461: yadā tarhi lṛṭaḥ satsañjñau tadā upapadasañjñā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7462: bhaviṣyadadhikāravihitasya lṛṭaḥ satsñjñau ucyete aviśeṣavihitaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7464: upasaṅkhyānam . jātuyadoḥ liṅvidhāne yadāyadyoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7465: yadā bhavadvidhaḥ kṣatriyam yājayet . yadi bhavadvidhaḥ kṣatriyam yājayet
GS24pmbhasuu:7466_1: . citrīkaraṇe yadipratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . arthānyatvāt . na hi yadau
GS24pmbhasuu:7466_2: upapade citrīkaraṇam gamyate . kim tarhi . sambhāvanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7468: hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ vā iti vaktavyam . anena cet yāyāt na śakaṭam paryābhavet . anena cet yāsyati na śakaṭam paryābhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7469: bhaviṣyadadhikāre . bhaviṣyadadhikāre iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7470_0: varṣati iti dhāvati . hanti iti palayate . atha idānīm śatṛśānacau atra kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:7470_1: bhavataḥ . devatrātaḥ galaḥ grāhaḥ itiyoge ca sadvidhiḥ . mithaḥ te na vibhāṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7470_2: . gavākṣaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ (P_3,3.157) KA_II,165.7-8 Ro_III,361 kāmapravedanam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7471: kāmapravedanam cet gamyate iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . icchan kaṭam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7473: vidhiḥ nāma preṣaṇam . adhīṣṭam nām satkārpūrvikā vyāpāraṇā . atha nimantraṇāmantraṇayoḥ kaḥ viśeṣaḥ . sannihitena nimantraṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7474_0: asannihitena ca āmantraṇam . na eṣaḥ asti viśeṣaḥ . asannihitena api nimantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7474_1: bhavati sannihitena ca āmantraṇam . evam tarhi yat niyogataḥ kartavyam tat nimantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7474_2: . kim punaḥ tat . havyam kavyam vā . brāhmaṇena siddham bhujyatām iti ukte adharmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7476: vijñāyate . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti āhosvit nimantraṇādiṣu gamyamāneṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7477: iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7478_0: nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7478_1: . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyā abhihitatvāt . prakṛtyā abhihitaḥ saḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7478_2: na prāpnoti dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt . dvivacanabahuvanayoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7479: prasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ nimantraṇam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . astu tarhi nimantraṇādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7480: gamyamāneṣu . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . devadattaḥ bhavantam āmantrayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7481: devadattaḥ bhavantam nimantrayate iti . siddham tu dvitīyākāṅkṣasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7482: prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7483_0: dvitīyākāṅkṣasya dhātoḥ prakṛte pratyayārthe pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke
GS24pmbhasuu:7483_1: ca prakṛtāḥ arthāḥ . bhāvakarmakartāraḥ . bhavet siddham prāpnotu bhavān āmantraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7483_2: anubhavatu bhavān amantraṇam iti yatra dvitīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7484: ākāṅkyate . idam tu na sidhyati āmantrayai nimantrayai iti . atra api dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkyate . kaḥ . nimantriḥ eva . āmantrayai āmantraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7485: nimantrayai nimantraṇam . katham punaḥ nimnatriḥ nimantraṇam ākāṅkṣet .
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_0: dṛṣṭaḥ ca bhāvena bhāvayogaḥ . tat yathā iṣiḥ iṣiṇā yujyate strītvam ca strītvena
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_1: . yāvatā atra dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate asti tarhi nimantraṇādīnām arthe iti . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7486_2: uktam nimantraṇādīīnām arthe iti cet āmantrayai nimantrayai bhavantam iti pratyayānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7487: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ asau dvitīyaḥ ākāṅkṣyate saḥ eva mama pratyayārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ dvivacanabahuvanāprasiddhiḥ ca ekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7488: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . supām karmādayaḥ api arthāḥ saṅkhyā ca eva tathā tiṅām . supām saṅkhyā ca eva arthaḥ karmādayaḥ ca . tathā tiṅām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7489: prasiddhaḥ niyamaḥ tatra . prasiddhaḥ tatra niyamaḥ . niyamaḥ prakṛteṣu vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7490: . atha vā prakṛtān arthān apekṣya niyamaḥ . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . ekatvādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7491: ekasmin eva ekavacanam na dvayoḥ na bahuṣu . dvayoḥ eva dvivacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7492: naikasmin na bahuṣu . bahuṣu eva bahuvacanam na ekasmin na dvayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7493: (P_3,3.163) KA_II,166.24-167.7 Ro_III,365-366 kimartham praiṣādiṣu artheṣu kṛtyāḥ vidhīyante na aviśeṣeṇa vihitāḥ kṛtyāḥ te praiṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7494: bhaviṣyanti anyatra ca . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vidhānam niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7495: niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ yathā syuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7496_0: praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam niyamārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7496_1: vacanam niyamārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam prāpnoti . na hi praiṣādiṣu eva kṛtyāḥ iṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7497: busopendhyam tṛṇopendhyam ghanghātyam . vidhyartham tu striyāḥ prāk iti vacanāt . vidhyartham tu praiṣādiṣu kṛtyānām vacanam . ayam praiṣādiṣu loṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:7498: vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitān kṛtyān bādheta . vāsarūpeṇa kṛtyāḥ api bhaviṣyanti . na syuḥ . kim kāraṇam . striyāḥ prāk iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7501_0: kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . kāle bhuṅkte . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7501_1: . praiṣādiṣu iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam praiṣādigrahaṇam anuvartyam . prathamānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7501_2: iti hi ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharati prajāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7502_1: lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7502_2: yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām iti . kim prayojanam . lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . lādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:7502_3: hisvau mā bhūtām iti . kim ca syāt yadi lādeśau hisvau syātām . tiṅantam padam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7502_4: padasañjñā na syāt . māt bhūt evam . subantam padam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7503_0: padasañjñā bhaviṣyati . katham svādyutpattiḥ . lakārasya kṛttvāt prātipadikatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7503_1: tadāśrayam pratyayavidhānam . lakāraḥ kṛt . tasya kṛttvāt kṛt prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7503_2: . prātipadikāśrayā svādyutpattiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yadi svādyutpattiḥ supām śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7503_3: prāpnoti . avyayāt iti subluk bhaviṣyati . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7503_4: ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātam avyayam iti avyayasañjñā . iha tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7503_5: saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam lunāti tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti nighātaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_0: parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam hiḥ parasmaipadānām yathā syāt svaḥ ātmanepadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_1: . vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt iti . na vā tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam jñāpakam padādeśasya . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_2: vā hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . tadhvamoḥ ādeśavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_3: jñāpakam padādeśasya yat ayam vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ padādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_4: hisvau iti . tatra padādeśe pittvāṭoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra padādeśe pittvasya āṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_5: ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pittvasya tāvat . saḥ bhavān lunīhi lunīhi iti eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7504_6: lunāti . āṭaḥ khalu api . saḥ aham lunīhi lunīhi iti evam lunāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7505: . pittvasya tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . pitpratiṣedhe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7506_0: iha seḥ hi bhavati . tataḥ apit ca . apit ca bhavati yāvān hiḥ nāma . āṭaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:7506_1: na vaktavyaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam : āṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:7506_2: kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7506_3: api āṭi prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . āṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7507_0: anyasya kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte api prāpnoti . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan
GS24pmbhasuu:7507_1: vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ādeśaḥ api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte āṭi prāpnoti anyasya akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:7507_2: . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7507_3: āḍāgamaḥ . āṭi kṛte sāṭkasya ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi saḥ aham bhuṅkṣva bhuṅkṣva
GS24pmbhasuu:7507_4: iti evam bhunajai iti śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti akāralopaḥ na prāpnoti . samasaṅkhyārthatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_0: aparihṛtam eva. siddham tu loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya kriyāsamabhihāre dvirvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_1: . siddham etat . katham . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya kriyāsamabhihāre dve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_2: iti vaktavyam . kena vihitasya kriyāsamabhihāre loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_3: ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ iti yat ayam kriyāsamabhihāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_4: loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacanasya dvirvacanam śāsti . kutaḥ nu khalu etat jñāpakāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_5: loṭ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ saḥ yadā kriyāsamabhihāre bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_6: tadā asya dvirvacanam bhavati iti . loḍmadhyamapuruṣaikavacane eva khalu api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_7: syāt . imau ca anyau hisvau sarveṣām puruṣāṇām sarveṣām vacanānām iṣyete . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_8: ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam hisvoḥ parasmaipadātmanepadagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7508_9: lādeśapratiṣedhārtham . samasaṅkhyārtham ca iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7509: kriyāsamabhihāre loṭ bhavati . tataḥ loṭaḥ hisvau bhavataḥ . loṭ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7510: anuvartate . loṭaḥ yau hisvau iti . katham vā ca tadhvamoḥ iti . vā ca tadhvambhāvinaḥ loṭaḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7512: anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . hisvāntam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7513_0: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . yathāvidhi iti vakṣyāmi iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7513_1: prayojanam . samuccaye sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyati . tatra antareṇa vacanam yathāvidhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7515: anuprayogaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . hisvāntam avyaktapadārthakam . tena aparisamāptaḥ arthaḥ iti kṛtvā anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7516: bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya iti vakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7517: etat api na asti prayojanam . sāmānyavacanasya anuprayogaḥ astu
GS24pmbhasuu:7518: viśeṣavacanasya iti sāmānyavacanasya anuprayogaḥ bhaviṣyati laghutvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7519: (P_3,4.8) KA_II,171.2-6 Ro_III,374 upasaṃvādāśaṅkayoḥ vacanānarthakyam liṅarthatvāt . upasaṃvādāśaṅkayoḥ vacanam narthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7520: liṅarthatvāt . liṅarthe leṭ iti eva siddham . kaḥ punaḥ liṅarthaḥ . ke cit tāvat āhuḥ . hetuhetumatoḥ liṅ iti . apare āhuḥ : vaktavyaḥ eva etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:7521: viśeṣe liṅ . prayujyate hi loke yadi me bhavān idam kuryāt aham api te idam dadyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:7522: (P_3,4.9) KA_II,171.9-17 Ro_III,375 tumarthe iti ucyate . kaḥ tumarthaḥ . kartā . yadi evam na arthaḥ tumarthagrahaṇena . yena eva khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:7523_0: api hetunā kartari tumun bhavati tena eva hetunā sayādayaḥ api bhaviṣyanti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7523_1: tarhi siddhe sati yat tumarthagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ asti anyaḥ kartuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7523_2: tumunaḥ arthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ asau . bhāvaḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat bhāve tumun bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7524: jñāpakāt ayam kartuḥ apakṛṣyate . na ca anyasmin arthe ādiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7525_0: anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti svārthe bhaviṣyati tat yathā guptijkidbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7525_1: san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . saḥ asau svārthe bhavan bhāve bhaviṣyati . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:7527: (P_3,4.19) KA_171.19-172.4 Ro_III,375-376 kimartham meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate na udīcām meṅaḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7528_0: ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . udīcām meṅaḥ iti vyatihāragrahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7528_1: bhavati . kim kāraṇam . tadviṣayaḥ hi saḥ . vaytihāraviṣayaḥ eva mayatiḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7528_2: siddhe sati yat meṅaḥ sānubandhakasya āttvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7528_3: ācāryaḥ na anubandhakṛtam anejantatvam bhavati iti .kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7528_4: . tatra asarūpasarvādeśadāppratiṣedhe pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anākārāntatvāt iti uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7529: tat na vaktavyam bhavati . kimartham punaḥ idam ucyate na samānakartṛkayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7530: pūrvakāle iti eva siddham . apūrvakālārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . pūrvam hi asau
GS24pmbhasuu:7532: (P_3,4.21.1) KA_II,172.6-13 Ro_III,376-377 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:7533_0: pūrvam bhuṅkte paścāt vrajati . svaśabdena uktatvāt na bhavati . na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:7533_1: idam bhavati : pūrvam bhuktvā tataḥ vrajati iti . na etat kriyāpaurvakālyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7533_2: tarhi . kartṛpaurvakālyam . pūrvam hi asau bhuktvā anyebhyaḥ bhoktṛbhyaḥ tataḥ paścāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7533_3: vrajati anyebhyaḥ vrajitṛbhyaḥ . iha kasmāt na bhavati : āsyate bhoktum iti . kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7533_4: kasmāt na bhavati . kim āseḥ āhosvit bhujeḥ . bhujeḥ kasmāt na bhavati . apūrvakālatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7533_5: . āseḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . yasmāt atra laṭ bhavati . etat atra praṣṭavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7534: laṭ atra katham bhavati iti . laṭ ca atra vāsarūpeṇa bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7535_0: (P_3,4.21.2) KA_II,172.14-173.10 Ro_III,377-378 samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7535_1: . samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu ktvā na prāpnoti . snātvā bhuktvā pītvā vrajati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7536: dvivacananirdeśāt . dvivacanena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . tena dvayoḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7537: paurvakālye syāt . bahūnām na syāt . siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7538: siddham etat . katham . kriyāpradhanatvāt . kriyāpradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7539_0: na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva nāma nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram
GS24pmbhasuu:7539_1: syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca . nāntarīyakatvāt atra dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7539_2: kriyate . avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit
GS24pmbhasuu:7540: vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat yathā kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam
GS24pmbhasuu:7541: satuṣam sapalālam āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya tuṣapalālāni utsṛjati . tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān saśakalān
GS24pmbhasuu:7542_0: sakaṇṭakān āharati nāntarīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān
GS24pmbhasuu:7542_1: utsṛjati . evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt dvivacanena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . na hi atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7542_2: nirdeśaḥ tantram . evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati . tat yathā . loke brāhmaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7543: sarvapūrvaḥ ānīyate . evam iha api sarvapūrvāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7544: anantyavacanāt tu siddham . samānakartṛkayoḥ anantyasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7545: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7546_0: samānakartṛkayoḥ iti bahuṣu aprāptiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat siddham tu kriyāpradhanatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7546_1: iti . nanu ca uktam evam api lokavijñānāt na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ sarveṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:7546_2: atra vrajikriyām prati paurvakālyam . snātvā vrajati bhuktvā vrajati pītvā vrajati
GS24pmbhasuu:7546_3: iti . evam ca kṛtvā prayogaḥ aniyataḥ bhavati . snātvā bhuktva pītvā vrajati . pītvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7549_0: upasaṅkhyānam apūrvakālatvāt . vyādāya svapiti iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:7549_1: punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . apūrvakālatvāt . pūrvam hi asau svapiti paścāt vyādadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:7549_2: . na vā svapnasya avakālatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . svapnasya avakālatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7549_3: . avarakālaḥ svapnaḥ . avaśyam asau vyādāya muhurtam api svapiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7550: (P_3,4.24) KA_II,173.18-25 Ro_III,379-381 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . ābhīkṣṇye iti vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7551: nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāpte ābhīkṣṇye
GS24pmbhasuu:7552: aniṣṭā vibhāṣā prāpnoti anyatra ca iṣṭā na sidhyati . atha aprāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:7553_0: agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ samāsapratiṣedhaḥ . agrādiṣu aprāptavidheḥ samāsapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7553_1: vaktavyaḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam etat amā eva avyayena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7553_2: atra evakārakaraṇasya prajojanam . amā eva avyayena yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7553_3: samāsaḥ yathā syāt . amā ca anyena ca yat tulyavidhānam upapadam tatra mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7555_0: nipātyate na khamuñ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . svādumi māntanipātanam īkārābhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7555_1: . svādumi māntanipātanam kriyate īkārābhāvārtham . īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . svādvīm kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7556: . cvyantasya ca makārāntārtham . cvyantasya ca makārāntatvam nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7557: asvādu svādu kṛtvā bhuṅkte . svāduṅkāram bhuṅkte .
GS24pmbhasuu:7559: samānādhikaraṇe . ā ca tumunaḥ pratyayāḥ samānādhikaraṇe vaktavyāḥ . kena
GS24pmbhasuu:7560_0: . anuprayogeṇa . kim prayojanam . svāduṅkāram yavāgūḥ bhujyate devadattena iti devadatte
GS24pmbhasuu:7560_1: tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ṇamulā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7560_2: bhujipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7560_3: . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7560_4: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā yavāgvām dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā anabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7560_5: karma iti . yadi punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7561: iha hi svāduṅkāram yavāgūm bhuṅkte devadattaḥ iti yavāgvām dvitīyā na syāt . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:7562: anabhihitam karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7563_0: yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7563_1: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ṇamulā anabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7563_2: kartā iti . atha anena ktvāyām arthaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_0: paktvā odanaḥ bhujyate devadattena iti . bāḍham arthaḥ . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_1: . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ktvayā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena anabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_2: kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_3: anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_4: tṛtīyā odane dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā anabhihitam karma iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_5: punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam . iha hi paktvā odanam bhuṅkte devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_6: iti odane dvitīyā na syāt . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca bhujipratyayena
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_7: anabhihitam karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_8: abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_9: bhaviṣyati dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ktvayā anabhihitaḥ kartā
GS24pmbhasuu:7564_10: iti . atha anena tumuni arthaḥ . bhoktum odanaḥ pacyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7565: devadattena . bāḍham arthaḥ . devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7566_0: na syāt . tumunā abhihitaḥ kartā iti . nanu ca pacipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7566_1: kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7566_2: ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:7567_0: anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā odane dvitīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7567_1: tumunā anabhihitam karma iti . yadi punaḥ ayam karmaṇi vijñāyeta ṇa evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7567_2: iha hi bhoktum odanam pacati devadattaḥ iti odane dvitīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7568_0: na syāt . kim kāraṇam . tumunā abhihitam karma iti . nanu ca pacipratyayena anabhihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:7568_1: karma iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati dvitīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7568_2: ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7568_3: dvitīyā devadatte tṛtīyā prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . tumunā anabhihitaḥ kartā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7569_0: atha anena iha arthaḥ paktvā odanam grāmaḥ gamyate devadattena . bāḍham arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7569_1: devadatte tṛtīyā yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ktvayā abhihitaḥ kartā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7569_2: . nanu ca gamipratyayena anabhihitaḥ kartā iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7569_3: tṛtīyā . yadi sati abhidhāne ca anabhidhāne ca kutaḥ cit anabhidhānam iti kṛtvā anabhihitāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7569_4: vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati tṛtīyā yat uktam odane dvitīyā prāpnoti iti saḥ doṣaḥ na jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7570: . tat tarhi vaktavyam ā ca tumunaḥ samānādhikaraṇe iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7571: avyayakṛtaḥ bhāve bhavanti iti bhāve bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . tumarthe iti vartate . tumarthaḥ ca kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7573: (P_3,4.32) KA_II,175.24-26 Ro_III,385 ūlopaścāsyānyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham goṣpadam vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti . prātiḥ pūraṇakarmā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7574: tasmāt eṣaḥ kaḥ . yadi kaḥ vibhatīnām śravaṇam prāpnoti . śrūyante eva atra vibhaktayaḥ . tat yathā ekena goṣpadapreṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:7575_0: (P_3,4.37) KA_II,176.2-14 Ro_III,386 hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam vacanam hiṃsārthebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7575_1: ṇamulvidhānāt . hanaḥ karaṇe anarthakam vacanam . kim kāraṇam . hiṃsārthebhyaḥ ṇamulvidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7576: tena eva siddham . arthavat tu ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . arthavat tu hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7577: ṇamulvacanam . kaḥ arthaḥ . ahiṃsārthasya vidhānāt . ahiṃsārthānām ṇamul yathā syāt . asti punaḥ ayam kva cit hantiḥ ahiṃsārthaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7578: syāt . asti iti āha . pāṇyupaghātam vedim hanti . nityasamāsārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:7579: nityasamāsārtham ca hiṃsārthāt api hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ eṣitavyaḥ . katham punaḥ icchatā api hiṃsārthāt hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ labhyaḥ . anena astu tena
GS24pmbhasuu:7580: vā iti tena syāt vipratiṣedhena . hanteḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vārttikena eva jñāpitaḥ . yat ayam nityasamāsārtham ca iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7581: hiṃsārthāt api hanteḥ anena vidhiḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7582_0: (P_3,4.41) KA_II,176.16-18 Ro_III,387 iha kasmāt na bhavati . grāme baddhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7582_1: evam vakṣyāmi . adhikaraṇe bandhaḥ sañjñāyām . tataḥ kartroḥ jīvapuruṣayoḥ naśivahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7583: caṇḍālikābanadham baddhaḥ . upamāne karmaṇi ca iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7584: (P_3,4.60) KA_II,176.20 Ro_III,387 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . tiraści iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7586: nādhāpratyaye iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva syāt dvidhākṛtya . iha na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7587: dvaidhaṅkṛtya . arthagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7588: nādhāpratyaye siddham bhavati yaḥ ca anyaḥ tena samānārthaḥ . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham iha mā bhūt hiruk kṛtvā pṛthak kṛtvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7589: (P_3,4.64) KA_II,177.5 Ro_III,388 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . anūci iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7591: kartari kṛdvacanam anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . kartari kṛtaḥ bhavanti iti ucyate anādeśe svāṛthavijñānāt . anirdiṣṭārthāḥ pratyayāḥ svārthe bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7592: . tat yathā . guptijkidbhyaḥ san yāvādibhyaḥ kan iti . evam ime api
GS24pmbhasuu:7593_0: pratyayāḥ svārthe syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan kartari yathā syuḥ iti evamartham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7593_1: ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam . yam icchati svārthe āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7593_2: iti . karmaṇi tarhi mā bhūvan iti . karmaṇi api yam icchati āha tam . dhaḥ karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7594: bhūvan iti . karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ api yam icchati āha tam . lyuṭ karaṇādhikaraṇayoḥ bhavati iti . sampradānāpādānayoḥ tarhi mā bhūvan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_0: sampradānāpādānayoḥ api yam icchati āha tam . dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ apādāne
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_1: iti . yaḥ idānīm anyaḥ pratyayaḥ śeṣaḥ saḥ antareṇa vacanam kartari eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7595_2: . tat eva tarhi prayojanam svārthe mā
GS24pmbhasuu:7596_0: bhūvan iti . nanu ca uktam yam icchati svārthe āha tam . bhāve ghañ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7596_1: anyaḥ saḥ bhāvaḥ bāhyaḥ prakṛtyarthāt . anena idānīm ābhyantare bhāve syuḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7596_2: mā bhūvan iti kartṛgrahaṇam . kaḥ punaḥ anayoḥ bhāvayoḥ viśeṣaḥ . uktaḥ bhāvabhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7597: . kim tarhi iti . tatra khyunādipratiṣedhaḥ nānāvākyatvāt . tatra khyunādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . khyunādayaḥ kartari mā bhūvan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7598_0: nanu ca karaṇe khunādayaḥ vidhīyante . te kartari na bhaviṣyanti . tena ca karaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7598_1: syuḥ anena ca kartari . nanu ca apavādatvāt khyunādayḥ bādhakāḥ syuḥ . na syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7598_2: kim kāraṇam . nānāvākyatvāt . nānāvākyam tat ca idam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:7599: samānavākye apavādaiḥ utsargāhḥ bādhyante . nānāvākyatvāt bādhanam na
GS24pmbhasuu:7600_0: prāpnoti . tadvat ca kṛtyeṣu evakārakaraṇam . evam ca kṛtvā kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7600_1: . tayoḥ eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ iti bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7600_2: tat ca bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7601: ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat ayam kartari ca ṛṣidevatayoḥ iti siddhe sati samāveśe samāveśārtham cakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:7602_0: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na bhavati samāveśaḥ iti . kimartham tarhi kṛtyeṣu evakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7602_1: kriyate . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe . evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe draṣṭavyam . tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7603: ca iti . kim prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7604: yat tāvat ucyate ṛṣidevatayoḥ tu kṛdbhiḥ samāveśavacanam jñāpakam asamāveśasya iti . na etat jñāpakasādhyam apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ apavādaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7605: bādhyante iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta apavādaiḥ utsargāḥ bādhyeran .
GS24pmbhasuu:7606: nanu ca uktam nānāvākyatvāt bādhanam na prāpnoti iti . na videśastham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_0: kṛtvā nānāvākyam bhavati . videśastham api sat ekavākyam bhavati . tat yathā dvitīye
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_1: adhyāye luk ucyate . tasya caturthaṣaṣṭhayoḥ aluk ucyate apavādaḥ . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_2: evakārakaraṇam ca cārthe iti . katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_3: evakāraḥ cārthe vartate . saḥ eṣaḥ evakāraḥ svārthe vartate . kim prayojanam . jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7607_4: . etat jñāpayati acāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñapane
GS24pmbhasuu:7608: prayojanam . tat ca bhavyādyartham . bhavyādiṣu samāveśaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_0: . geyaḥ māṇavakaḥ sāmnām . geyāni māṇavakena sāmāni iti . yadi etat jñapyate iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_1: api samāveśaḥ prāpnoti dāśagoghnau sampradāne bhīmādayaḥ apādāne iti . atra api siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_2: bhavati . yat ayam ādikarmaṇi ktaḥ kartari ca iti siddhe samāveśe samāveśam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:7609_3: tat jñapayati ācāryaḥ prāk amutaḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7611_0: pratyayaniyamaḥ : dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ vā niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7611_1: ca bhavati pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . āhosvit sañjñāniyamaḥ : dhātoḥ paraḥ akāraḥ akaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7611_2: vā svabhāvataḥ kartāram bruvan kṛtsañjñaḥ ca bhavati pratyayasañjñaḥ ca iti . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7612_0: . tatra pratyayaniyame aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra pratyayaniyame sati aniṣṭam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7612_1: . kāṣṭhabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ , balabhit abrāhmaṇaḥ . eṣaḥ api niyogataḥ kartāram bruvan
GS24pmbhasuu:7613: sañjñāniyame siddham . sañjñāniyame sati siddham bhavati . yadi sañjñāniyamaḥ vibhaktādiṣu doṣaḥ . vibhaktāḥ bhrātaraḥ pītāḥ gāvaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:7614: sidhyati . pratyayaniyame punaḥ sati parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7615: ktaḥ niyogataḥ kartāram āha . na ca imāḥ tatra parigaṇyante prakṛtayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7616: vibhaktādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt . vibhaktādiṣu ca pratyayaniyamasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . prakṛteḥ pratyayaparavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_0: parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ paraḥ ktaḥ svabhāvataḥ kartāram āha . na ca imāḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_1: parigaṇyante . na tarhi idānīm ayam sādhuḥ bhavati . bhavati sādhuḥ na tu kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_2: . katham tarhi idānīm atra kartṛtvam gamyate . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ : vibhaktam eṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:7617_3: asti vibhaktāḥ . pītam eṣām asti pitāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7618: atha vā uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . vibhaktadhanāḥ vibhaktāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7621_0: laḥ eṣu sādhaneṣu yathā syāt kartari ca karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7621_1: etat asti prayojanam . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam vidhīyate śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7621_2: . etāvān ca laḥ yat uta parasmaipadam ātmanepadam ca . saḥ ca ayam evam vihitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7621_3: ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . lagrahaṇam sakarmakanivṛttyartham . lagrahaṇam kriyate sakarmakanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7622: sakarmakāṇām bhāve laḥ mā bhūte iti . yadi punaḥ tatra eva akarmakagrahaṇam kriyeta . tatra akarmakagrahaṇam kartavyam . nanu ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7623_0: api kriyate bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti . parārtham etat bhaviṣyati . tayoḥ eva kṛtyaktakhalarthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7623_1: bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ . yāvat iha lagrahaṇam tāvat tatra akarmakagrahaṇam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7624: akarmakagrahaṇam . kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . iha lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari siddhaḥ bhavati . tatra punaḥ akarmakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7625_0: kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari na prāpnoti . tatra api akarmakagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe ānaḥ kartari
GS24pmbhasuu:7625_1: siddhaḥ bhavati . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti ataḥ anyat yat ātmanepadānukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7625_2: sarvam tat kartrartham . vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_0: kartari . vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari bhaviṣyati . tatra bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_1: astu kartari kṛt iti . kartari kṛt iti etat bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7626_2: tu . sarvebhyaḥ tu dhātubhyaḥ ānaḥ kartari prāpnoti . parasmaipadibhyaḥ api . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7627: yogaḥ niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ niyamārthaḥ vidhiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:7628: prakalpate . āste śete iti . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7629_0: āsīnaḥ śayānaḥ . tathā neḥ viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi niyamāṛthaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7629_1: na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:7629_2: . nanu ca uktam vidhiḥ na prakalpate iti . vidhiḥ ca prakḷptaḥ . katham . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_0: anuvartiṣyate . yadi anuvartate evam api anudāttaṅitaḥ eva bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_1: prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7630_2: . tataḥ bhāvakarmaṇoḥ . tataḥ kartari . kartari ca ātmanepadam bhavati anudāttaṅitaḥ
