GS24pmbhasuu:7631: tataḥ karmavyatihāre . kartari iti eva anuvartate . anudāttaṅitaḥ iti api
GS24pmbhasuu:7632: nivṛttam . yat api ucyate neḥ viśaḥ iti evamādi anukramaṇam yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7633_0: niyamārtham vidhiḥ na prakalpate . atha vidhyarthaḥ ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7633_1: . astu vidhyartham . nanu ca uktam ānasya niyamaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7633_2: . yathā eva atra aprāptāḥ taṅaḥ bhavanti evam ānaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:7634: bhaviṣyati . sarvatra aprasaṅgaḥ tu . sarveṣu tu sādhaneṣu ānaḥ na prāpnoti . vipratiṣedhāt vā ānaḥ kartari iti bhāvakarmaṇoḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7635: kartari eva syāt . iha punaḥ lagrahaṇe kriyamāṇe kartari kṛt iti etat astu
GS24pmbhasuu:7636: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akarmakebhyaḥ iti etat bhaviṣyat vipratiṣedhena . sarvaprasaṅgaḥ tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7637: lādeśaḥ sarveṣu sādhaneṣu prāpnoti . śatṛkvasūca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:7638: prāpnutaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śeṣāt parasmaipadam kartari iti evam tau
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_0: (P_3,4.77.1) KA_II,181.8-25 Ro_III,400-402 lādeśe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt ḷādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_1: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya lakārasya ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti : lunāti
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_2: labhate . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate : evañjātīyakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7640_3: lakārasya ādeśaḥ bhavati iti anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . arthavadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_0: arthavataḥ lakārasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ artahvat . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_1: cet na varṇagrahaṇeṣu . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_2: idam . na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_3: viśiṣtagrahaṇam . tasmāt viśiṣtasya lakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_4: dhātoḥ iti vartate . evam api śālā mālā mallaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_5: prātipadikāni . evam api nandanaḥ atra prāpnoti . itsañjñā atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7641_6: . iha api tarhi bādheta . pacati paṭhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_0: itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam liti pratyayāt pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_1: udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . liti iti ucyate . na ca atra litam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7642_2: . atha api katham cit vacanāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7643: anuvartanāt vā itsañjñkānām ādeśaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7644: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na lādeśe litkāryam bhavati iti yat ayam ṇalam litam karoti . atha api uṇādayaḥ vyutpādyante evam api no doṣaḥ . kriyate viśiṣṭagrahaṇam lasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7645: (P_3,4.77.2) KA_II,182.1-6 Ro_III,402 lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . lādeśaḥ varṇavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7646: lādeśasya avakāśaḥ pacatu paṭhatu . varṇavidheḥ avakāśaḥ dadhyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7647_0: madhvatra . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pacatu atra . paṭhatu atra . lādeśaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:7647_1: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7649: ānapratiṣedhaḥ . ṭitaḥ etve ātmanepadeṣu ānapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7650: pacamānaḥ yajamānaḥ . ṭitaḥ iti etvam prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7651: jñāpakam vā sānubandhakasya ādeśavacane itkāryābhāvasya iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7652: uktam . evam kila tat uktam syāt yadi evam vijñāyeta . ṭit ātmanepadam ṭidātmanepadam . ṭidātmanepadānām iti . tat ca na . ṭitaḥ lakārasya yāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_0: ātmanepadāni iti evam etat vijñāyate . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . ṭit ātmanepadam
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_1: ṭidātmanepadam . ṭidātmanepadānām iti vijñāyamāne akurvi atra api prasajyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_2: eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . saḥ ca avaśyam ṭhit kartavyaḥ ādiḥ mā bhūt iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_3: iṭaḥ at iti . iṭhaḥ at iti vakṣyāmi iti . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam paryavapādyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_4: mā bhūt . laviṣīṣṭa . iha tarhi iṣam ūrjam aham itaḥ ādi ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_5: na prāpnoti . tasmāt ṭit eṣaḥ . ādiḥ tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . saptadaśa ādeśāḥ sthāneyogatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7653_6: prayojayanti . tān ekaḥ na utsahate vihantum iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7654: kṛtvā ādiḥ na bhaviṣyati . paryavapādyasya kasmāt na bhavati . laviṣīṣṭa iti . asiddham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam antaraṅgalakṣaṇe iti . idam tarhi uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7655: prākṛtānām ātmanepadānām etvam bhavati iti . ke ca prakṛtāḥ . tādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7656: āne muk jñāpakam tu etve ṭittaṅām . iśisīricaḥ ḍārauraḥsu . ṭit aṭitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7658_0: (P_3,4.82.1) KA_II,183.3-184.2 Ro_III,405-407 ṇalaḥ śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . ṇal
GS24pmbhasuu:7658_1: śit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sarvādeśārtham . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7658_2: syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7659_0: anittvāt siddham iti . ṇakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7659_1: nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi coditaḥ . ṇakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti . ṇakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7659_2: atra kriyeta śakāraḥ vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7660: avaśyam atra ṇakāraḥ vṛddhyarthaḥ kartavyaḥ ṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7661: na arthaḥ vṛddhyarthena ṇakāreṇa . ṇittve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti gotaḥ ṇit . tataḥ al . al ca ṇit bhavati . tataḥ uttamaḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7662: evam tarhi lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham . kaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7663: nyāyyaḥ . śakāram asi coditaḥ . lakāram kariṣyāmi śakāram na kariṣyāmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7664: . lakāraḥ atra kriyeta śakāraḥ vā kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . avaśyam eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7665_0: svarārthaḥ lakāraḥ kartavyaḥ liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7665_1: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātusvare kṛte dvirvacanam . tatra āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7666_0: katham punaḥ ayam antodāttaḥ syāt yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7666_1: vyapadeśivadbhāvena antodāttaḥ evam ādyudāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7666_2: ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasajyeta . satyam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti dhātoḥ ādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7666_3: udāttaḥ bhavati iti . idam punaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7667_0: dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena antodāttaḥ . tatra āntaryataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7667_1: antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . etat api ādeśe na asti ādeśasya antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7667_2: udāttaḥ bhavati iti . prakṛtitaḥ anena svaraḥ labhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7668_0: . prakṛtiḥ ca asya yathā eva antodāttā evam ādyudāttā api . dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7668_1: ubhayoḥ antodāttatvam prasajyeta . anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti na asti yaugapadyena
GS24pmbhasuu:7669: tasmāt svarārthaḥ lakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . lakāraḥ kriyate . tasya anittvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7670: (P_3,4.82.2) KA_II,184.3-11 Ro_III,407-408 akārasya śitkaraṇam sarvādeśārtham . akāraḥ śitkartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . sarvādeśārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7671: śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta . nanu ca akārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7672: akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:7673: akāravacanam samasaṅkhyārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ yathā syāt . tasmāt śitkaraṇam . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7674: praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . a* a* a . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7675: (P_3,4.85) KA_II,184.14-24 Ro_III,408-409 laṅvadatideśe jusbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ . laṅvadatideśe jusbhāvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7676_0: yāntu vāntu . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . utvavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:7676_1: . utvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti . sāvakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:7676_2: ca utvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . pacatu paṭhatu . atra api ikāralopaḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7676_3: eva utvam ikāralopam bādhate evam jusbhāvam api bādhate . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7676_4: . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte ikāralope utvam ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7676_5: . jusbhāve punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_0: bādhante iti evam utvam ikāralopam bādhate jubhāvam na bādhate . evam tarhi vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_1: tatra laṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam . laṅ eva yaḥ laṅ tatra yathā syāt . laṅvadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:7677_2: yaḥ laṅ tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_0: (P_3,4.87,89) KA_II,185.3-9 Ro_III,409 hinyoḥ utvapratiṣedhaḥ . hinyoḥ ukārasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7678_1: vaktavyaḥ . lunīhi lunāni . eḥ uḥ iti utvam prāpnoti . na vā uccāraṇasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7679: uccāraṇasāmarthyāt atra utvam na bhaviṣyati . alaghīyaḥ ca eva hi ikāroccāraṇam ukāroccāraṇāt . ikāram ca uccārayati ukāram ca na uccārayati
GS24pmbhasuu:7680: . tasya etat prayojanam utvam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7682: . etaḥ aitve ādguṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacāva idam (pacāvedam) .
GS24pmbhasuu:7683: pacāma idam (pacāmedam) . ādguṇe kṛte eta ait iti aitvam prāpnoti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7686_1: sīyuṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinuyuḥ sunuyuḥ . liṅaḥ sīyuṭ iti sīyuṭ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7686_2: . na vā vākyāpakarṣāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . vākyāpakarṣāt . vākyāpakarṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7687: bādhiṣyate . suṭtithoḥ tu apakarṣavijñānam . suṭaḥ tithoḥ tu apakarṣaḥ vijñāyeta . kṛṣīṣṭa kṛṣīṣṭhāḥ . anādeḥ ca suḍvacanam . anādeḥ ca suṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:7688_0: vaktavyaḥ . kṛṣīyāstām kṛṣīyāsthām . takārathakārādeḥ liṅaḥ iti suṭ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7688_1: na vā tithoḥ pradhānabhāvāt tadviśeṣaṇam liṅgrahaṇam . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7689: pradhānam . tadviśeṣaṇam liṅgrahaṇam . na evam vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7690: takārathakārayoḥ liṅaḥ iti . katham tarhi . takārathakārayoḥ suṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7693: ucyate . yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham . piti vacanāni prayojayanti . atha kimartham udāttavacanam kriyate . udāttavacanam ca . kim . pidartham eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7694: āgamānudāttārtham vā . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti iti . asati anyasmin prayojane jñāpakam bhavati . uktam ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7695: yāsuṭaḥ ṅidvacanam pidartham udāttavacanam ca iti . śakyam anena vaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:7696: yāsuṭ parasmaipadeṣu bhavati apit ca liṅ bhavati iti . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7697: laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ āgamāḥ anudāttāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7699_0: ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham āhosvit prāpakam . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7699_1: prāpakam . yadi sijgrahaṇam anuvartate tataḥ niyamārtham . atha nivṛttam tataḥ prāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7699_2: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . jusi ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham iti cet sijluggrahaṇam . jusi
GS24pmbhasuu:7699_3: ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham iti cet sijluggrahaṇam kartavyam . ātaḥ sijlugantāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7699_4: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . akārṣuḥ ahārṣuḥ . astu tarhi prāpakam . prāpakam iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:7700: pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . prāpakam iti cet pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . abhūvan iti pratyayalakṣaṇena jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7701: evakārakaraṇam ca . evakārakaraṇam ca kartavyam . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:7702: iti . niyamāṛthaḥ punaḥ sati na arthaḥ evakāreṇa . nanu ca prāpake api sati siddhi vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7703: iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi evakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . yathā evam vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7704: laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva . mā evam vijñāyi laṅaḥ eva śākaṭāyanasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7705: kim ca syāt . luṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya na syāt . aduḥ apuḥ adhuḥ asthuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7706: laṅgrahaṇam ca . laṅgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . laṅaḥ śākaṭāyanasya eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7707_0: niyamārthe punaḥ sati na arthaḥ laṅgrahaṇena . ātaḥ ṅitaḥ iti vartate . na ca anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7707_1: ākārāt anantaraḥ ṅit asti anyat ataḥ laṅaḥ . astu tarhi niyamārthaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7707_2: jusi ākāragrahaṇam niyamārtham iti cet sijluggrahaṇam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tulyajātīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7707_3: niyamaḥ . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yaḥ dvābhyām anantaraḥ ātaḥ ca sicaḥ ca . atha tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7707_4: evakārakaraṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7708: uttarārtham . liṭ ca liṅ āśiṣi ārdhadhātukam eva yathā syāt . itarathā hi vacanāt ārdhadhātukasañjñā syāt tiṅgrahaṇena ca grahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7709: sārvadhātukasañjñā . atha tat laṅgrahaṇam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . laṅ eva yaḥ laṅ tatra yathā syāt . laṅvadbhāvena yaḥ laṅ tatra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7710_1: dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . dhātoḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasañjñā yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:7710_2: . vṛkṣatvam vṛkṣatā iti . kriyamāṇe ca api dhātugrahaṇe svādipratiṣedhaḥ . svādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:7710_3: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . lūbhyām lūbhiḥ iti . anukrāntāpekṣam śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7710_4: .evam api agnikāmpyati vāyukāmyati iti prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7710_5: . na kartavyam . ā tṛtīyādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ dhātvadhikāraḥ prakṛtaḥ anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7711: iti . evam api śrīkāmyati bhūkāmyati iti prāpnoti . tadvidhānāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7712: vihitaviśeṣaṇam dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . dhātoḥ eṣaḥ vihitaḥ . saṅkīrtya dhātoḥ iti evam yaḥ vihitaḥ iti.
GS24pmbhasuu:7713_1: ṅyāpprātipadikāt yathā syuḥ . dhātoḥ mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7714: bhaviṣyanti . tiṅantāt tarhi mā bhūvan iti . ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_0: vidhīyante . te ca atra tiṅā uktāḥ ekatvādayaḥ iti kṛtvā uktārthatvān na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_1: . ṭābādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . striyām ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_2: strītvena yogaḥ asti . aṇādayaḥ tarhi tiṅantāt mā bhūvan iti . apatyādiṣv artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_3: aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . na ca tiṅantasya apatyādibhiḥ yogaḥ asti . atha api katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_4: cit yogaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na tiṅantāt aṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_5: bhavanti iti yat ayam kva cit taddhitavidhau tiṅgrahaṇam karoti . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau
GS24pmbhasuu:7715_6: tiṅaḥ ca iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7716_1: aṅgabhapadasañjñārtham . aṅgabhapadasañjñāḥ ṅyāpprātipadikasya yathā syuḥ iti . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:7716_2: punaḥ iha aṅgabhapadasañjñārthena ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇena arthaḥ . ṭābādiṣu . na
GS24pmbhasuu:7717: grahaṇavadbhyaḥ ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . ugitaḥ ṅīp bhavati ataḥ ṭāp bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7718_0: iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7718_1: . atha api kaḥ cit agrahaṇaḥ evam api adoṣaḥ . striyām ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:7719: tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . aṇādiṣu tarhi . aṇādayaḥ api grahaṇavadbhyaḥ ṭābādayaḥ vidhīyante . gargādibhyaḥ yañ naḍādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7720: phak iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . atha api kaḥ cit agrahaṇaḥ evam api adoṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7721: apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat tat śabdasvarūpam apatyādiṣu artheṣu vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7722: svārthikeṣu tarhi . svārthikāḥ api grahaṇavadbhyaḥ vidhīyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:7723: yāvādibhyaḥ kan prajñāidbhyaḥ aṇ iti . yat tat śabdasvarūpam gṛhyate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . yaḥ tarhi agrahaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7724: śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇataraḥ iti . atra api na yāvat śuklaḥ tāvat śuklataraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7725: prakṛṣṭaḥ śuklaḥ śuklataraḥ . yat tat śabdasvarūpam prakṛṣṭe vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti . svādiṣu tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:7726: ekatvādiṣu artheṣu svādayaḥ vidhīyante . yat tat śabdasvarūpam ekatvādiṣu artheṣu vartate tasmāt tadutpattiḥ . tasya etāḥ sañjñāḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7727: katham punaḥ iha ucyamānāḥ svādayaḥ ekatvādiṣu artheṣu śakyā vijñātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:7728: ekavākyatvāt . ekam vākyam tat ca idam ca . yadi ekam vākyam tat ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:7729: ca kimartham nānādeśastham kriyate . kauśalamātram etat ācāryaḥ darśayati yat ekam vākyam sat nānādeśastham karoti . anyat api saṅgrahīṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7730_0: yacchayoḥ ca lugartham . yacchayoḥ tarhi lugartham ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7730_1: . kaṃsīyaparaśavyayoḥ yañañau luk ca iti ṅyāpprātipadikāt parasya luk yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7730_2: . akriyamāṇe hi ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇe prakṛteḥ api luk
GS24pmbhasuu:7731: prasajyeta . etat api na asti prayojanam . yathā paribhāṣitam pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7732: lukślulupaḥ bhavanti iti pratyayasya bhaviṣyati . evam api ukārasakārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7733_0: prasajyeta . kameḥ saḥ kaṃsaḥ parān śrṇāti iti paraśuḥ iti . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7734_0: vṛddhāt avṛddhāt avarṇānṭāt anudāttādeḥ dvyacaḥ iti etāni prātipadikaviśeṣaṇāni yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7734_1: syuḥ iti . atha akriyamāṇe ṅyāpprātipadikagrahaṇe kasya etāni viśeṣaṇāni syuḥ . samarthaviśeṣaṇāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7734_2: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . udīcām vṛddhāt agotrāt iha ca prasajyeta jñānām brāhmaṇānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7734_3: iti . etat hi samartham vṛddham . iha ca na syāt jñayoḥ brāhmaṇayoḥ apatyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7735_0: avṛddha . prācām avṛddhāt phin bahulam iha ca prasajyeta jñayoḥ brāhmaṇayoḥ apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7735_1: iti . etat hi samartham avṛddham . iha ca na syāt jñānām brāhmaṇānām apatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7736: avarṇa . ata iñ bhavati iha eva syāt dakṣasya apatyam dākṣiḥ iti . etat hi samartham akārāntam . iha ca na syāt dakṣayoḥ apatyam dakṣāṇām apatyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7737: . etat hs samartham anavarṇāntam . avarṇa . svara . anudāttādeḥ añ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7738: iti iha ca prasajyeta vācaḥ vikāraḥ tvacaḥ vikāraḥ iti . etat hs samartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7739: anudāttādi . iha ca na syāt sarveṣām vikāraḥ iti . etat hs samartham
GS24pmbhasuu:7740_0: udāttādi . svara . dvyajlakṣaṇa dvjacaḥ ṭhan iti iha ca prasajyeta vācā tarati tvacā
GS24pmbhasuu:7740_1: tarati iti . etat hi samartham dvyac . iha ca na syāt ghaṭena tarati iti . etat hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7740_2: samartham samartham advyac . asti punaḥ samarthaviśeṣaṇe sati kim cit iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:7741: eva . asti iti āha . kim . sāmnā tarati vemnā tarati iti . etat hi samartham api ṅyāpprātipadikam api .
GS24pmbhasuu:7742_0: (P_4,1.1.2) KA_II,191.12-195.23 Ro_III,428-438 atha ṅyābgrahaṇam kimartham na prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7742_1: iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . apratyayaḥ iti prātipadikasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7742_2: . yadi eṣaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇe hetuḥ tyūgrahaṇam api kartavyam . tau api hi pratyayau .
GS24pmbhasuu:7743_0: . taddhitaḥ prātipadikam iti prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . ūgrahaṇe ca api vārttam
GS24pmbhasuu:7743_1: . uvarṇāntāt ūṅ vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7743_2: bhaviṣyati . yadi eṣaḥ ūṅaḥ agrahaṇe hetuḥ ābgrahaṇam api na kartavyam . āp api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7743_3: akārāntāt vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt prātipadikasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:7743_4: bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi anakārāntāt . kruñcā uṣṇihā devaviśā iti . atra api akārāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7743_5: vṛttiḥ lakṣyate . kruñcān ālabheta . uṣṇihakakubhau . devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam
GS24pmbhasuu:7744_0: ca iti . iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat auttarapadikam hrasvatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7744_1: iha khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:7744_2: satyām vyañjanāntāt vā iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7745: iha tāvat uṣṇihakakubhau iti . āpaḥ eva etat auttarapadikam hrasvatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7746: . sañjñācchandasoḥ iti evam tat . na ca eṣā sañjñā na api idam chandaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7747: yat api ucyate iha khalu api devaviśam ca manuṣyaviśam ca iti . na asti viśeṣaḥ akārāntāt utpattau satyām vyañjanāntāt vā iti . svare viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7748: yadi atra vyañjanāntāt utpattiḥ syāt devaviśam iti evam svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7749: . devaviśam iti ca iṣyate . tasmāt kaḥ eṣaḥ evamviṣayaḥ . idam tarhi pādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7750: anyatarasyām ṭāp ṛci iti . ṛci iti ucyate . tatra chāndasatvāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7751: . ṛci iti na idam chandaḥ vivakṣitam kāṭhakam kāpālakam amudakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7752: paippalādakam vā . kim tarhi . pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam etat . ṛk cet pratyayārthaḥ bhavati iti . etat api na asti prayojanam padaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7753: pādaśabdasamānārthaḥ akārāntaḥ chandasi dṛśyate . tasyāḥ saptākṣaram ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:7754: padam eakaḥ pādaḥ iti arthaḥ . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi ḍāp
GS24pmbhasuu:7755_0: ubhābhyām anyatarasyām iti . bahurājā bahurāje bahurājāḥ . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7755_1: prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇāt . ṅyābgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7756_0: . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7756_1: . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyate ābgrahaṇam vā . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:7757: prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam sarvanāmasvarasamāsataddhitavidhilugalugartham . sarvanāmavidhiḥ prayojanam . sarvanāmnaḥ suṭ iha eva syāt teṣām yeṣām . tāsām yāsām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7758_0: atra na syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . avarṇāntāt ṭāp vidhīyate . tatra ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7758_1: . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt suṭ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sarvanāmnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7758_2: tṛtīyā ca iha eva syāt bhavatā hetunā bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7759: hetoḥ iti . bhavatyā hetunā bhavatyāḥ hetoḥ iti atra na syāt . sarvanāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_0: svara . kuśūlakūpakumbhaśālam bile iha eva syāt kuśūlabilam . kuśūlībilam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_1: na syāt . svara . samāsa . dvitīyā śritādibhiḥ saha samasyate iha eva syāt kaṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:7760_2: śritaḥ kaṣṭaśritaḥ . kaṣṭam śritā kaṣṭaśritā iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:7761: syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . śritaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ . tatra ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte antādivadbhāvāt bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:7762_0: pūrvasadṛśa iti iha eva syāt pitrā sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ . pitrā sadṛśī pitṛsadṛśī
GS24pmbhasuu:7762_1: iti atra na syāt . samāsaḥ . taddhitavidhi . acittahiastidhenoḥ ṭhak iha eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7762_2: hastinām samūhaḥ hāstikam . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam
GS24pmbhasuu:7763: iti atra na syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena etat siddham . idam tarhi . pramāṇe dvayasac yathā iha bhavati hastidvayasam
GS24pmbhasuu:7764: hastimātram evam hastinīdvayasam hastinīmātram iti api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7765: taddhitavidhi . luk . na indsiddhabadhnātiṣu ca iha eva syāt sthaṇḍilaśāyī
GS24pmbhasuu:7766_0: . sthaṇḍilaśāyinī iti atra na syāt . luk . aluk . śayavāsavāsiṣu akālāt iha eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7766_1: grāmevāsī . grāmevāsinī iti atra na syāt . mānini ca vidhipratiṣedhāṛtham . mānini
GS24pmbhasuu:7767: vidhyartham tāvat . kyaṅmāninoḥ ca iha eva syāt darśanīyamānī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7768: darśanīyamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratiṣedhārtham api . vakyāti śvāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini . tasmin kriyamāṇe iha eva syāt dīrghamukhamānī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7769: dīrghamukhamāninī iti atra na syāt . pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:7770_0: pratyayagrahaṇopacāreṣu ca prayojanam . tṛjakābhyām kartari iha eva syāt apām sraṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:7770_1: . apām sraṣṭrī iti atra na syāt . upacāra : ataḥ kṛkamikaṃsakumbha itha eva syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7770_2: ayaskumbhaḥ . ayaskumbhī iti atra na syāt . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:7771: etasyām ca satyām na arthaḥ ṅyābgrahaṇena . atiprasaṅgaḥ upapadavidhau .
GS24pmbhasuu:7772: upapadavidhau atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . dviṣatparayoḥ tāpeḥ yathā iha bhavati dviṣantapaḥ iti evam dviṣatītapaḥ iti atra api syāt . yañiñoḥ phaki .
GS24pmbhasuu:7773_0: yañiñoḥ phaki atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yathā iha bhavati gārgyāyaṇaḥ dākṣāyaṇaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7773_1: gārgeyaḥ dākṣeyaḥ iti atra api syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ḍhak atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:7774_0: bhavati . rājāhasakhibhyaḥ ṭat yathā iha bhavati madrarājaḥ kaśmīrarājaḥ evam madrarājñī
GS24pmbhasuu:7774_1: kaśmīrarājñī iti atra api syāt . na vā bhavati madrarājī iti . bhavati yadā samāsāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7775_0: samāsāntaḥ prasajyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca . tatra madrajī
GS24pmbhasuu:7775_1: iti etat rūpam syāt . madrarājñī iti ca iṣyate . mahadāttve priyādiṣu . mahadāttve
GS24pmbhasuu:7775_2: priyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āt mahataḥ samānādhikaraṇajātīyayoḥ iti yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7775_3: bhavati mahān priyaḥ asya mahāpriyaḥ evam mahatī priyā asya mahatīpriyaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7775_4: api syāt . kim ucyate priyādiṣu iti . yatra puṃvadbhāvaḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tu
GS24pmbhasuu:7776_0: pratiṣidhyate bhavitavyam eva tatra āttvena . ñnitsvare . ñnitsvare atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7776_1: bhavati . ñniti ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati yathā iha bhavati dākṣiḥ ahicumbukāyaniḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7776_2: dākṣī ahicumbukāyanī iti atra api syāt . rājñaḥ svare brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ . rājñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7777_0: rājā ca brāhmaṇakumārayoḥ iti yathā iha bhavati rājakumāraḥ rājabrāhmaṇaḥ evam rājakumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:7777_1: rājabrāhmaṇī iti atra api syāt . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu ca . samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7777_2: ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadabhūmni yathā iha bhavati bahugomān
GS24pmbhasuu:7777_3: bahuyavamān evam bahugomatī bahuyavamatī iti atra api syāt . kim ucyate samāsasaṅghātagrahaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7778: yat avayavagrahaṇam prayojanam eva tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ . kumbhaśālam bile kuśūlībilam iti yathā . vibhaktau ca uktam . kim uktam . na vā vibhaktau
GS24pmbhasuu:7779: liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt iti . ete asyāḥ paribhāṣāḥ doṣāḥ etāni ca prayojanāni syuḥ . ete doṣāḥ samāḥ bhūyāṃsaḥ vā . tasmāt na arthaḥ anayā paribhāṣayā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7780: na hi doṣāḥ santi iti paribhāṣā na kartavyā lakṣaṇam vā na praṇeyam . na hi bhikṣukāḥ santi iti sthālyaḥ na āśrīyante na ca mṛgāḥ santi iti yavā na
GS24pmbhasuu:7781: upyante . na hi doṣāṇām lakṣaṇam asti iti . tasmāt yāni etasyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7782: paribhāṣayāḥ prayojanāni tadartham eṣā kartavyā pratividheyam ca doṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:7783: taddhitavidhānāṛtham tu . taddhitavidhānāṛtham tu ṅyābgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7784: ṅyābantāt taddhitotpattiḥ yathā syāt . kālitarā hariṇitarā khaṭvātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7785_0: mālātarā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitabalīyastvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7785_1: vipratiṣedhāt hi taddhitotpattiḥ prāpnoti . tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ . tatra samāsānteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7785_2: doṣaḥ bhavati . bahugomatkā bahuyavamatkā . samāsāntāḥ api ṅyābantāt syuḥ . tyūṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7786_0: tyūṅoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam . yuvatikā brahmabandhukā iti . ūṅgrahaṇena tāvat na
GS24pmbhasuu:7786_1: arthaḥ . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ ukārāntāt utpattau satyām ūṅantāt vā . idam tarhi yuvatitarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7786_2: brahmabandhutarā iti . tadantasya ca pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitānutpattiḥ . tadantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7787_0: pratyayārthena ayogāt taddhitotpattiḥ na prāpnoti . kālitarā hariṅitarā khaṭvātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7787_1: mālātarā . kim kāraṇam . ṅyāpantam etat strīpradhānam . na ca strītvasya prakarṣāpakarṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:7787_2: staḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na hi kim cit ucyate evañjātīyakāt utpattavyam evañjātīyakāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7788: tamabiṣṭhanau tiṅaḥ ca iti . yasya ca prakarṣaḥ asti tasya prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7789: pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati . asti ca apradhānasya guṇasya prakarṣaḥ . iha khalu api śuklataraḥ kṛṣṇataraḥ iti dravyam pradhānam guṇasya ca prakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:7790: pratyayaḥ utpadyate . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham tu striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7791_0: prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe ṭābādayaḥ iti . prātipadikaviśeṣaṇam strīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7791_1: . svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam vijñayate striyām abhidheyāyām iti na api strīsamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_0: yat striyām prātipadikam vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_1: iti . nanu ca uktam tatra samāsānteṣu doṣaḥ iti . samāsāntāḥ api svārthikāḥ . ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_2: svārthikayoḥ paratvāt samāsāntāḥ bhaviṣyanti . katham kālikā iti . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_3: kāt pūrvsasya iti ittvam bhaviṣyati . katham hariṇikā iti . hariṇaśabdaḥ prakṛtyantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:7792_4: asti . katham lohinikā iti vakṣyati etat : lohitā liṅgabādhanam vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7793_0: (P_4,1.3.1) KA_II,195.25-198.19 Ro_III,439-452 striyām iti ucyate . kā strī nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7793_1: . lokatataḥ ete śabdāḥ prasiddhāḥ strīpumān napuṃsakam iti . yat loke dṛṣṭvā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7793_2: avasīyate iyam strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam iti sā strīsaḥ pumān tat napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7793_3: iti . kim punaḥ loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7794: iyam strī ayam pumān idam napuṃsakam iti . liṅgam . kim punaḥ tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7795: stanakeśavatī strī syāt . lomaśaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ . ubhayoḥ antaram yat ca tadabhāve napuṃsakam . liṅgāt strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse ṭāP prasajyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7796: . liṅgāt strīpuṃsayoḥ jñāne bhrūkuṃse ṭāp prāpnoti . yat hi loke dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī iti asti tat bhrūkuṃse . natvam kharakuṭīḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_0: . iha cañcāḥ paśya vadhrikāḥ paśya kharakuṭīḥ paśya iti tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_1: natvam prāpnoti . yat hi dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate ayam pumān iti asti tat vadhrikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_2: . khaṭvāvṛkṣau na sidhyataḥ . khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ ca liṅgam na sidhyati . yat hi loke
GS24pmbhasuu:7797_3: dṛṣṭvā etat avasīyate iyam strī ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7798: pumān iti na tat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ asti . kim tarhi tayoḥ liṅgam nyāyyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7799: nāpuṃsakam bhavet tasmin . napuṃsakam khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam nyāyyam . kim idam nāpuṃsakam iti . napuṃsake bhavam nāpuṃsakam . tadabhāve napuṃsakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7800_0: tadabhāve strīpuṃsaliṅgābhāve napuṃsakaliṅgam nyāyyam . asat tu mṛgatṛṣṇāvat . asat
GS24pmbhasuu:7800_1: tu khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . katham punaḥ asat nāma liṅgam śakyam draṣṭum
GS24pmbhasuu:7800_2: . mṛgatṛṣṇāvat . tat yathā mṛgāḥ tṛṣitāḥ apām dhārāḥ paśyanti . na ca tāḥ santi .
GS24pmbhasuu:7800_3: gandharvnagaram yathā . yathā gandharvanagarāṇi dūrataḥ dṛśyante upasṛtya ca na upalabhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:7801: khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ liṅgam draṣṭavyam . ādityagativat sat na . atha va yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7802: ādityasya gatiḥ satī na upalabhyate tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . vastrāntarhitavat ca tat . yathā vastrāntarhitāni dravyāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:7803: na upalabhyante tadvat khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . vastrāntarhitāni dravyāṇi vastrāpāye upalabhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:7804: khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ punaḥ ye api ete rathkārāḥ vāśīvṛkṣādanahastāḥ mūlāt prabhṛti ā agrāt vṛkṣān takṣṇuvanti te api tayoḥ liṅgam na upalabhante .
GS24pmbhasuu:7805_0: kena etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . ṣaḍbhiḥ prakāraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7805_1: satām bhāvānām anupalabdhiḥ bhavati . sannikarṣāt ativiprakarṣāt mūrtyantaravyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_0: . ataḥ atra kaḥ cit hetuḥ draṣṭavyaḥ yena khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_1: . kena etat avasīyate khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate iti . tayoḥ tu tatkṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_2: dṛṣṭvā . strīkṛtam śabdam dṛṣṭvā strī iti avasīyate puṃskṛtam dṛṣṭvā pumān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7806_3: yathā ākāśena jyotiṣaḥ . tat yathā ākāśam dṛṣṭva jyotiḥ atra iti gamyate . jyotirnimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:7807: anyonysaṃśrayam tu etat . anyonysaṃśrayam tu etat bhavati . strīkṛtaḥ śabdaḥ śabdakṛtam ca strītvam . etat itaretarāśrayam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7808: itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . pratyakṣeṇa virudhyate . pratyakṣeṇa khalu api saḥ virudhyate yaḥ āha khaṭvāvṛkṣayoḥ sat liṅgam na upalabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7809: iti . tatra svendriyavirodhaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . na ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:7810_0: svendriyavirodhinā bhavitavyam . taṭe ca sarvaliṅgāni dṛṣṭvā kaḥ adhyavasāyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7810_1: taṭe ca khalu api sarvāṇi liṅgāni dṛṣṭvā taṭaḥ taṭaī taṭam iti kaḥ adhyavasātum arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:7810_2: iyam strīayam pumān idam napuṃsakam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7811: tasmāt na vaiyākaraṇaiḥ śakyam laukikam liṅgam āsthātum . avaśyam ca kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_0: cit svakṛtāntaḥ āstheyaḥ . kaḥ asau svakṛtāntaḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_1: svakṛtāntataḥ . saṃstyānaprasavau liṅgam āstheyau . kim idam saṃstyānaprasavau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_2: . saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ : strī . sūteḥ sap prasave pumān iti . nanu ca loke api
GS24pmbhasuu:7812_3: styāyateḥ eva strī sūteḥ ca pumān .
GS24pmbhasuu:7813_0: adhikaraṇasādhanā loke strī : styāyati asyām garbhaḥ iti . kartṛsādhanaḥ ca pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:7813_1: : sūte pumān iti . iha punaḥ ubhayam bhāvasādhanam : styānam strī pravṛttiḥ ca pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:7813_2: . kasya punaḥ styānam strī pravṛttiḥ vā pumān . guṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7814_0: . keṣām . śabsasparśarūparasagandhānām . sarvāḥ ca punaḥ mūrtayaḥ evamātmikāḥ saṃstyānaprasavaguṇāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7814_1: śabsasparśarūparasagandhavatyaḥ . yatra alpīyāṃsaḥ guṇāḥ tatra avarataḥ trayaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_0: rasagandhau na sarvatra . pravṛttiḥ khalu api nityā . na hi iha kaḥ cit svasmin ātmani
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_1: muhūrtam api avatiṣṭhate . vardhate vā yāvat anena vardhitavyam apāyena vā yujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_2: . tat ca ubhayam sarvatra . yadi ubhayam sarvatra kutaḥ vyavasthā . vivakṣātaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_3: saṃstyānavivakṣāyām strī prasavavivakṣāyām pumān ubhayoḥ avivakṣāyām napūmsakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_4: tasya uktau lokataḥ nāma . tasya uktau ca vacane lokataḥ nāma etat bhavati strī pumān
GS24pmbhasuu:7815_5: napuṃsakam iti . guṇaḥ vā lupi yuktavat . vadhrikādiṣu bhūyān parihāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7816: lupi yuktavat vyaktivacane iti evam atra guṇaḥ bhavati . na ca etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7817_0: mantavyam svamanīṣikayā ucyate iti . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7817_1: liṅgasya iti . punaḥ paṭhiṣyati ekārthe śabdānyatvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgānyatvam avayavānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7817_2: ca iti . saṃstyāne styāyateḥ ḍraṭ strīsūteḥ saP prasave pumān . tasya uktau lokataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7819: vijñāyate . striyām abhidheyāyām ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti iti āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:7820: strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . striyām iti stryarthābhidhāne cet ṭābādayaḥ dvivacanabahuvacanānekapratyayānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7821: . striyām iti stryarthābhidhāne cet ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:7822: dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . kumāryau kumāryaḥ kiśoryau kiśoryaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7823: kim kāraṇam . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ strītvam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_0: eva prāpnoti . anekapratyayānupapattiḥ ca . anekaḥ ca pratyayaḥ na upapadyate . gārgyāyaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:7824_1: kārīṣagandhyā kālitarā iti . kim kāraṇam . ekatvāt strītvasya . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7825: dvitīyasya prayogeṇa na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . stryarthasya ca prātipadikārthatvāt striyām iti liṅgānupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7826: stryarthasya ca prātipadikārthatvāt striyām iti adhikāraḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_0: astu tarhi strīsamānādhikaraṇāt prātipadikāt iti . strīsamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet bhūtādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_1: atiprasaṅgaḥ . strīsamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet bhūtādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:7827_2: iyam brāhmaṇī . kāraṇam iyam brāhmaṇī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7828: āvapanam iyam uṣṭrikā iti . stryarthābhidhāne punaḥ ṭābādiṣu satsu iha tāvat bhūtam iyam brāhmaṇī iti na atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:7829_0: pautanyam . kāraṇam iyam brāhmaṇī iti na atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . prādhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7829_1: . āvapanam iyam uṣṭrikā iti na atra strītvam vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . sambhavanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7830: ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pañca brāhmaṇyaḥ daśa
GS24pmbhasuu:7831_0: brāhmaṇyaḥ . stryarthābhidhāne punaḥ ṭābādiṣu satsu na atra strītvam vivakṣitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7831_1: kim tarhi bhedaḥ vivakṣitaḥ saṅkhyā . iha ca strī : īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . na hi tena
GS24pmbhasuu:7831_2: eva tasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam asti . siddham tu striyāḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:7833_0: svārthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ . na evam vijñāyate striyām abhidheyāyām iti na api strīsamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7833_1: iti . katham tarhi . striyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt ṭābādayaḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7833_2: kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7834: astu striyām abhidheyāyām iti . nanu ca uktam striyām iti stryarthābhidhāne cet ṭābādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7835: . stryarthasya ca prātipadikārthatvāt striyām iti liṅgānupapattiḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate dvivacanabahuvacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7836: guṇavacanasya ca āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanabhāvāt . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:7837: āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . tat yathā śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ śuklau kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7838: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7839: evam iha api yat adaḥ dravyam śritam bhavati strītvam tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat strītvasya api bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7840_0: anekapratyayānupapattiḥ iti . bhāvasya ca bhāvayuktatvāt . bhāvaḥ bhāvena yujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7840_1: . tat yatha iṣiḥ iṣiṇā nimantriḥ ca nimantriṇā . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7840_2: anyatvam sādhanabhedāt kālabhedāt ca . uktam tatra ekasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7841_0: bāhyam sādhanam sarvakālaḥ ca pratyayaḥ aparasya ābhyantaram sādhanam vartamānakālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7841_1: ca pratyayaḥ iti . iha punaḥ ekam strītvam . atha ekam upalabhyate . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7841_2: yadi ekam upalabhyate dvitīyam api upalabhyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:7842_0: . atha ekam api anumānagamyam dvtīyam api anumānāt gamyatām . kasya tāvat bhavān
GS24pmbhasuu:7842_1: evam guṇam nyāyyam manyate strītvam nāma . dravyasya . dravye ca bhavataḥ kaḥ sampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7842_2: . yadi tāvat guaṇasamudāyaḥ dravyam kā gatiḥ ye ete bhāvāḥ kṛdabhihitāḥ taddhitābhihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7842_3: ca . cikīrṣā gotā iti . atha matam etat kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7842_4: strītvam api strītvena abhihitam dravyavat bhaviṣyati . kva ca tāvat doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7843: dṛṣṭasya hi doṣasya susukhaḥ parihāraḥ gārgyāyaṇī kārīṣagandhyā kālitarā iti . iha tāvat gārgyāyaṇī iti ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ṅīṣ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7844_0: kārīṣagandhyā iti vacanāt cāp bhaviṣyati . kālitarā iti na yāvat kālī tāvat kālitarā
GS24pmbhasuu:7844_1: . kim tarhi . prakṛṣṭā kālī kālitarā . yat śabdarūpam prakarṣe vartate tasya anuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7844_2: strītvam iti kṛtvā ṭāp bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate iha ca strī īkāraḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7844_3: iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . striyām akuntikurubhyaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7845_0: (P_4,1.3.3) KA_II,200.23-201.6 Ro_III,458 strīviṣaye ṅyāpoḥ aprasiddhiḥ akārāntādarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7845_1: . strīviṣaye ṅyāpoḥ aprasiddhiḥ . khaṭvā mālā . kim kāraṇam . akārāntādarśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7845_2: na hi akārāntatā dṛśyate . nanu ca iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7846: dṛśyate . atikhaṭvaḥ atimālaḥ iti . na eṣā akārāntatā . āpaḥ eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:7847: hrasvatvam . sarveṣām tu svaravarṇānupūrvījñānārthaḥ upadeśaḥ . sarveṣām eva tu prātipadikānām svaravarṇānupūrvījñānārthaḥ upadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7848: śaśaḥ . ṣaṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . palāśaḥ . palāṣaḥ iti mā bhūt . mañcakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7849: mañjakaḥ iti mā bhūt . tasmāt siddham . tasmāt siddham etat bhavati . atha vā iyam akārāntatā dṛśyate . pañcabhiḥ khaṭvābhiḥ krītaḥ paṭaḥ pañcakhaṭvaḥ daśakhaṭvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7850: (P_4,1.4) KA_II,201.8-17 Ro_III,459-461 śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā . śūdrā ca amahatpūrvā iti vaktavyam . śūdrā . amahatpūrvā iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7851: mahāśūdrī . jātiḥ . jātiḥ iti vaktavyam . yā hi mathatī śūdrā mahāśūdrā sā
GS24pmbhasuu:7852_0: bhavati . śūdrāśabdaḥ ajādiṣu paṭhyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat mahatpūrvāt syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7852_1: . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:7852_2: prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7852_3: iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:7853_0: prayojanam . bhavatī , atibhavatī mahatī , atimahatī : atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7853_1: bhavati . jātiḥ iti ca vakṣyāmi . yadi etat jñāpyate pañcājī daśājī atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7853_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ajādibhiḥ striyam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . adjādīnām yā strī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7855: ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti āhosvit ugitantāt prātipadikāt iti . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7856: yadi vijñāyate ugitaḥ prātipadikāt iti siddham : bhavatī mahatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7857: atibhavatī , atimahatī iti na sidhyati . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7858_0: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . atha vijñāyate ugitantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7858_1: prātipadikāt iti siddham atibhavatī atimahatī . bhavatī mahatī iti na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7858_2: vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ aprātipadikena . ubhayathā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7858_3: nirgomatī niryavamatī iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7858_4: tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat ugitaḥ prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7858_5: iti . katham atibhavatī atimahatī iti . tadantavidhinā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:7859_0: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . na etat prātipadikagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7859_1: . prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ etat grahaṇam . atha vā punaḥ astu ugitantāt prātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7859_2: iti . katham bhavatī mahatī iti vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7860_0: prātipadikāprātipadikayoḥ etat grahaṇam . yat api ucyate ubhayathā ca nirgomatī niryavamatī
GS24pmbhasuu:7860_1: iti na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7861: pratyayāpratyayayoḥ etat grahaṇam . katham . varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit prātipadikam api ugit .
GS24pmbhasuu:7863: dhātoḥ ugitaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ukhāsrāt brāhmaṇī parṇadhvat
GS24pmbhasuu:7864: brāhmaṇī . añcateḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . añcateḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7865: prācī pratīcī . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt siddham adhātoḥ . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt adhātoḥ siddham . añcatigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7866: añcateḥ eva ugitaḥ dhātoḥ na anyasya ugitaḥ dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7867: (P_4,1.7) KA_II,202.20-203.16 Ro_III,464-466 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7868_0: niḥśūnī atiyūnī iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . evam api maghonī atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7868_1: prāpnoti . maghavanśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam . vanaḥ na haśaḥ . vanaḥ ra ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7868_2: iti atra haśantāt na bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sahayudhvā brāhmaṇī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7868_3: . yadi na haśaḥ iti ucyate śarvarī iti na sidhyati . vihitaviśeṣaṇam haśgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7868_4: . haśantāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . evam api prertvarī iti na sidhyati . katham ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:7869: ṅībrau api tarhi chāndasatvāt eva bhaviṣyataḥ . bahulam chandasi ṅībrau
GS24pmbhasuu:7870: vaktavyau . yajvarīḥ iṣaḥ yajvanīḥ iṣaḥ . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam pratiṣiddhatvāt . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7871: kartavyam . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7872_0: pratiṣiddhatvāt . anaḥ bahuvrīheḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:7872_1: vā upadhālopinaḥ vāvacanam . anaḥ bahuvrīhipratiṣedhe vā upadhālopinaḥ vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7872_2: . anyathā kṛtvā coditam anyathā kṛtvā parihāraḥ . yathā upasaṅkhyānam coditam tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7873_0: bhavitavyam . yathā parihāraḥ tathā vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . yathā upasaṅkhyānam coditam
GS24pmbhasuu:7873_1: evam api vibhāṣayā bhavitavyam . . na hi atra ṅīp durlabhaḥ . siddhaḥ atra ṅīp anaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7874_0: ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyamānaḥ anyena sati na syāt iti evamartham upasaṅkhyānam codyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7874_1: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ṅīpsanniyogena raḥ ucyate . iha mā bhūt suparvā cāruparvā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7874_2: . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . vakṣyati ḍāp ubhābhyām anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:7875: anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇasya prayojanam . ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau api yathā syātām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7877: ṅīp anantaraḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . atha idānīm ṅīpi pratiṣiddhe ṣaṭsañjñānām ante lupte ṭābutpattiḥ kasmāt na syāt . ataḥ iti prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7878: asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . idam api tatra parigaṇyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7879_0: . pratyāhārāt cāpā siddham . sup iti na idam pratyayagrahaṇam . kim tarhi . pratyāhāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7879_1: . kva sanniviṣṭānām pratyāhāraḥ . prathamaikavacanāt prabhṛti ā cāpaḥ pakārāt . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:7879_2: pratyāhāragrahaṇam doṣaḥ tu ittve . ittve doṣaḥ bhavati . bahucarmikā . pratyayasthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7880: na prāpnoti . tasmāt na ubhau . tasmāt ṣaṭsañjñakebhyaḥ ubhau na bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . striyām iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7883: ucyate . ubhābhyām yogābhyām ḍāp yathā syāt manantāt anantāt ca bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7884_0: . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam ubhayam anuvartate . atha anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7884_1: kimartham . anyatarasyām ḍāp yathā syāt . ḍāpā mukte pratiṣedhaḥ api yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7884_2: . na etat asti prayojanam . iha ḍāp api
GS24pmbhasuu:7885_0: ucyate pratiṣedhaḥ api . tau ubhau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7885_1: ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅīp api yathā syāt . siddhaḥ atra ṅīp anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7886: śakyam akartum . bāḍham śakyam . katham . iha ḍāp api ucyate pratiṣedhaḥ api ṅīp api . tat sarvam vacanāt bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam vijñātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:7887: akriyamāṇe hi tatra anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ ṅīp ḍāppratiṣedhau bādheta . ḍāppratiṣedhau api anavakāśau . tau vacanāt bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7888_0: sāvakāśau ḍāppratiṣedhau . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . suparvā cāruparvā iti . tasmāt tat anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7888_1: kartavyam . idam tu khalu anyatarasyāṅgrahaṇam śakyam akartum . idam api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7889: ḍāppratiṣedhābhyām mukte ṅībrau yathā syātām iti . ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7891_0: bhavitavyam . bahavaḥ śvānaḥ asyām rathyāyām bahavaḥ śvānaḥ asyām śālāyām iti . bahśūkā
GS24pmbhasuu:7891_1: bahuyūkā iti bhavitavyam .kā rūpasiddhiḥ . ḍāp ṭilopaḥ prasāraṇam prasāraṇaparapūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7891_2: nadṛtaḥ ca iti kap . kapā tāvat na
GS24pmbhasuu:7892: bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:7893: vijñāyate . na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . prasāraṇena api na
GS24pmbhasuu:7894: bhavitavyam . vakṣyati etat . śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7895: anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . parapūrvatvena api na bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7896: vakṣyati etat . samprasāraṇapūrvatve samānāṅgagrahaṇam asamānāṅgapratiṣedhāttham iti . tasmāt bahuśvā bahuyuvā iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7897: (P_4,1.14) KA_II,205.7-207.4 Ro_III,471-477 anupasarjanāt iti kimartham . bahukurucarā mathurā priyakurucarā mathurā . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:7898: prayojanam . kurucaraśabdāt prayayaḥ vidhīyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat bahukurucaraśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_0: tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_1: prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt . anupasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_2: . prātipadikena tadantavidhipratiṣedhāt grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_3: . jñāpakam tu pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7899_4: tadantāpratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7900: bhavatī atibhavatī mahatī atimahatī iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7901_0: . na etat asti prayojanam . uktam etat varṇaḥ api ugit pratyayaḥ api ugit prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:7901_1: api ugit iti . idam tarhi . bahudhīvarī bahupīvarī iti . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7901_2: . atra api uktam ravidhāne bahuvrīheḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7902: pratiṣiddhatvāt iti . idam tarhi atidhīvarī atipīvarī . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā āpiśalam adhīte iti . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ vā punaḥ ayam draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7903_0: pūrvasūtre apradhānasya upasarjanam iti sañjñā kriyate . yāvat brūyāt pradhānāt utpattavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7903_1: apradhānāt na iti tāvat anupasarjanāt iti . kim prayojanam . āpiśalam adhīte iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7903_2: . āpiśalam adhīte brāhmaṇī āpiśalā brāhmaṇī . aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ mā bhūt iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_0: ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . aṇantam hi etat anupasarjanam . na anupasarjanagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_1: aṇantam viśeṣyate . aṇantāt anupasarjanāt iti . kim tarhi . aṇ eva viśeṣyate . aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_2: yaḥ anupasarjanam iti . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ . jātiśabdebhyaḥ tu atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_3: bhavati . kuntī gāndhārī siddham tu jāteḥ anupasarjanatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:7904_4: . anupasarjanāt iti ucyate . na ca jātiḥ upasarjanam . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_0: striyām iti vartate . tena aṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . striyām yaḥ aṇ vihitaḥ iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_1: api kāśakṛtsninā proktam māmāṃsā kāśakṛtsnīm kāśakṛtsnīm adhīte kāśakṛtsnā brāhmaṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_2: atra prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhetryām abhidheyāyām aṇaḥ īkāreṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_3: yaḥ ca atra adhetryām abhidheyāyām aṇ uktaḥ luptaḥ saḥ yaḥ ca śrūyate utpannaḥ tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_4: īkāraḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam tadantavidhiḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_5: syāt . kumbhakārī nagarakārī . atra hi pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7905_6: grahaṇam bhavati iti avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:7906: grahaṇam bhavati iti saṅghātāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kṛdgrahaṇe iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7907_0: . na ca etat kṛdgrahaṇam . kṛdakṛdgrahaṇam etat . kṛt api ayam aṇ taddhitaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:7907_1: evam tarhi īkārāntena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi evam labhyeta kṛtam syāt tat tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:7907_2: labhyam . kim kāraṇam . atra hi gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7908: bhavati . samāse kṛte avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . avayavāt utpattau kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7909_0: satyām doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ na sidhyati . avyayavasya vṛddhisvarau syātām . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7909_1: anupasarjanādhikāraḥ . anupasarjanādhikāre jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne suparṇyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:7910: suparṇyāḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . suparṇī . na vā samāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7911_0: anupasarjanatvāt jātivācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyena ṅīṣvidhānam . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7911_1: . kim kāraṇam . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt . samāsaḥ atra anupasarjanam . saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:7911_2: jātivācakaḥ . samāsasya anupasarjanatvāt tasya ca jātivācakatvāt ca śabdasya sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:7912: ayopadhāt iti . katham kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ . bahuvrīhiḥ iti kṛtvā coditam tatpuruṣaḥ iti kṛtvā parihāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7913: (P_4,1.15.1) KA_II,208.2-17 Ro_III,478-479 ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam . ḍhagrahaṇe sānubandhakasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7914_0: kārikeyī hārikeyī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi na sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7914_1: . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:7915: prayojanāni . tavyagrahaṇe tavyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . divgrahaṇe divugrahaṇam mā bhūt . nanu ca iyam api kartavyā tadanubandhakagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:7916: atadanubandhakasya ne iti . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:7917: yadgrahaṇe ṇyadgrahaṇam mā bhūt . aṅgrahaṇe caṅgrahaṇam mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_0: ajgrahaṇe ṇyajgrahaṇam mā bhūt . tat dve ete paribhāṣe kartavye . na kartavye . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7918_1: jñāpayati bhavataḥ ete paribhāṣe yat ayam vāmadevāt ḍyaḍḍyau iti yayatau ḍitau karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7919: kartavyam . na kartavyam . ananubandhakaḥ ḍhaśabdaḥ striyām na asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:7920: kṛtvā sānubandhakasya grahaṇam vijñāsyate . nanu ca ayam asti śilāyāḥ ḍhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7921: iti . na eṣaḥ striyām vartate . ayam tarhi sabhāyāḥ ḍhaḥ chandasi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7922: eṣaḥ api na striyām vartate . kim kāraṇam . tatra sādhuḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:7923: katham strī nāma sabhāyām sādhvī syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_0: (P_4,1.15.2) KA_II,208.18-209.5 Ro_III,479-480 añgrahaṇam anarthakam tadantāt hi
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_1: ṅīnvidhānam . añgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tadantāt hi ṅīnvidhānam . tadantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_2: hi añantāt ṅīn vidhīyate . śārṅgaravādyañaḥ ṅīn iti . na ca asti viśeṣaḥ añantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7924_3: ṅīnaḥ vā ṅīpaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . na vā jātyadhikārāt . na vā anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:7925: jātyadhikārāt . jāteḥ iti tatra anuvartate . ajātyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_0: autsī audapānī . tat ca avaśyam jātigrahaṇam anuvartyam . anadhikāre hi puṃyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_1: ākhyāyām ṅīnprasaṅgaḥ . ananuvartamāne hi jātigrahaṇe puṃyogāt ākhyāyām ṅīn prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7926_2: : baidasya strī baidī . yadi tarhi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:7927: nibandhanam asti idam eva kartavyam . tat na kartavyam . tat api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:7928: kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi tasmin baidasya bhaginī baidī paratvāt jātilakṣaṇaḥ ṅīṣ ṅīpam bādheta . ṅīni punaḥ sati paratvāt ṅīn ṅīṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:7931_0: khyunaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āḍhyaṅkaraṇī subhagaṅkaraṇī . atyalpam idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7932: straiṇī pauṃsnī . īkak : śāktīkī yāṣṭīkī . khyun : āḍhyaṅkaraṇī subhagaṅkaraṇī . taruṇa taluna : taruṇī talunī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7934: yañaḥ pratiṣedhārtham . iha mā bhūt dvaipyā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam vijñāyate kañkvarapaḥ yañaḥ ca iti . katham tarhai kañkvarapaḥ ayañaḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7936: taddhitavacanam ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkārārtham . taddhitavacanam kriyate ṣitaḥ prātipadikāt īkāraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7937: ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt eva atra īkāraḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7938_0: ṣitkaraṇasāmarthyāt aprātipadikāt īkāraḥ bhavati evam prātipadikāt iti asya anuvartanasāmārthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7938_1: aṣitaḥ api prātipadikāt īkāraḥ syāt . asti anyat prātipadikānuvṛttau prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7940: prācām eva syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham prācām pūrveṇa . idam tarhi prayojanam sarveṣām yathā syāt . āvaṭyāyanī . cāpam bādhitvā ṣphaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7942: (P_4,1.18.2) KA_II,210.5-24 Ro_III,482-483-484 lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam . lohitādiṣu śākalyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7943_0: śākalyāyanī . yadi punaḥ ayam śakalaśabdaḥ lohitādiṣu paṭhyeta . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7943_1: iha hi śākalyasya chātrāḥ śākalāḥ kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ na syāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:7943_2: . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . kaṇvaśabdāt śakalaśabdaḥ pūrvaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ . katāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7944: paṭhitavyaḥ . pūrvottarau tadantādī . pūrvottarau gaṇau tadantādī
GS24pmbhasuu:7945: draṣṭavyau . ye kaṇvādayaḥ te śakalādayaḥ . ye kataparyantāḥ te
GS24pmbhasuu:7946_0: śakalaparyantāḥ . kim prayojanam . ṣphāṇau tatra praoyjanam . tatra evam sati ṣphāṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:7946_1: siddhau bhavataḥ . kaṇvāt tu śakalaḥ pūrvaḥ . katāt uttaraḥ iṣyate . pūrvottarau
GS24pmbhasuu:7947: (P_4,1.19) KA_II,210.26-211.3 Ro_III,484 kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam . kauravyamāṇḍūkayoḥ āsureḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7948: āsurāyaṇī . chaḥ ca . chaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . āsurīyaḥ kalpaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7949: (P_4,1.20) KA_II,211.4-14 Ro_III,484-486 vayasi acarame iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . vadhūṭī ciraṇṭī iti . iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:7950: uttānaśayā lohitapādikā dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . na etāni vayovācīni .
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_0: katham tarhi vayaḥ gamyate . sambandhāt . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_1: tatra na bhavati iha api na prāpnoti . kumārī iti . atra api sambandhāt vayaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:7951_2: . kaḥ asu sambandhaḥ . yaḥ asu puṃsā asamprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7952: . sambandhāt eva atra vayaḥ gamyate . iha punaḥ sambandhasambandhāt . iha tāvat uttānaśayā iti . yadā kartṛtvam viśeṣitam bhavati tataḥ uttarakālam
GS24pmbhasuu:7953: vayaḥ gamyate . yadi lohitapādikā iti . yadā bahuvrīhyarthaḥ viśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7954_0: tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . dvivarṣā trivarṣā iti . yadā dviguarthaḥ viśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7954_1: tataḥ uttarakālam vayaḥ gamyate . yadi tarhi yatra sambandhāt eva vayaḥ gamyate tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:7954_2: bhavati iha api tari prapnoti . kanyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7955: nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam. kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7956: (P_4,1.22) KA_II,211.16-19 Ro_III,486 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_0: tatra ekaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi . parimāṇāntāt taddhitaluki ṅīp
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_1: bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . parimāṇāntāt eva taddhitaluki ṅīp bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7957_2: na anyataḥ iti . tataḥ vistācitakambalyebhyaḥ na iti . taddhitaluki iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:7958: (P_4,1.25) KA_II,211.21-212.12 Ro_III,486-488 ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre . ūdhasaḥ nakāraḥ liṅgādhikāre kartavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7959_0: mahodhāḥ parjanyaḥ iti . na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . na vā liṅgādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7959_1: nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt . samāsāntādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:7959_2: strīgrahaṇam kartavyam . itarathā hi kabvidhiprasaṅgaḥ . itarathā hi kabvidhiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:7959_3: . kasyām punaḥ avasthāyām kap prāpnoti . prāk ṅīṣutpatteḥ . prāk tāvat na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:7959_4: . kim kāraṇam . na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā . lutkpanne tarhi ṅīṣi prāpnoti . utpanne ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:7959_5: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nadyantānām yaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti evam tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:7960: na ca eṣaḥ nadyantānām bahuvrīhiḥ . prāk eva tarhi prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam na hi ṅīṣ vibhāṣā iti . yadi api na ṅīṣ vibhāṣā kap tu vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7961: kapaḥ avakāśaḥ anyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ . ayavakaḥ avrīhikaḥ . ṅīṣaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7962_0: vibhāṣā kap . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kuṇḍodhnī ghaṭodhnī . kapprasaṅge lubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:7962_1: prāpnoti . paratvāt kap syāt . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate na vā samāsāntādhikāre strīgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7963: (P_4,1.27.1) KA_II,212.14-213.2 Ro_III,488-489 dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ . dāmahāyanāntāt saṅkhyādeḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:7964: uddāmā vaḍavā iti . tatpuruṣavijñānāt vā siddham . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7965: . tatpuruṣaḥ ca ayam . utkrāntā dāmnaḥ utdāmā . bhavet siddham yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:7966: tatpuruṣaḥ . yadā tu khalu bahuvrīhiḥ tadā na sidhyati . utkrāntam dāma asyāḥ iti . nanu ca cetanāvataḥ etat bhavati utkramaṇam vā apakramaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:7967: dāma ca acetanam . acetaneṣu api cetanāvatupacāraḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7968_0: srastāni asyāḥ bandhanāni . srasyante asyāḥ bandhanāni iti . tat tarhi saṅkhyādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7968_1: iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:7969: yadi tat anuvartate avyayādeḥ api vartate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . saṅkhyādeḥ iti anuvartate . avyayādeḥ iti nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7970: ekadeśaḥ anuvartate ekadeśaḥ na . ekayoganirdiṣṭānām api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7971: bhavati . tat yathā tasya pādamūle pīlvādikarṇādibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau .
GS24pmbhasuu:7972: pakṣāt tiḥ iti atra mūle iti anuvartate pāka iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7973: (P_4,1.27.2) KA_II,213.3-6 Ro_III,489 atha iha katham bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7974_0: dvau hāyanau asyāḥ śālāyāḥ . dvihāyanā trihāyanā iti . hāyanaḥ vayasi smṛtaḥ . vayovācinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7974_1: hāyanaśabdasya grahaṇam . na ca eṣaḥ vayovācī . atha ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati . ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:7976: aṇantāt iti evam siddham . niyamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . māmakaśabdāt sañjñācchandasoḥ eva . kva mā bhūt . māmikā buddhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7977: (P_4,1.31) KA_II,213.12-13 Ro_III,490 ajasādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . rātrim rātrim smariṣyantaḥ . rātrim rātrim ajānataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7978: sarvām rātrim saha uṣitvā . vṛttyām ekāntarātrim .
GS24pmbhasuu:7980_0: garbhabhartṛsaṃyoge . antarvat pativat iti garbhabhartṛsaṃyoge iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:7980_1: mā bhūt . prathate tvayā patimatī pṛthivī iti . atha antaḥśabdasya agarbhasaṃyoge
GS24pmbhasuu:7981: asti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vākyam eva pratyudāhriyate na punaḥ matup .
GS24pmbhasuu:7982: astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate . na ca atra astisāmānādhikaraṇyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:7983: iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . antarvatnī iti . evam tarhi antarvatpativatoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:7984: tu matubvatve nipātanāt . antarvat iti matup nipātyate . vatvam siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:7985: pativat iti vatvam nipātyate . matup siddhaḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:7986: . garbhiṇyām jīvapatyām ca . etasmin viṣaye . vā ca chandasi nuk bhavet .
GS24pmbhasuu:7987: vā ca chandasi nuk vaktavyaḥ . sā antarvatī devān upait . sā antarvatnī devān upait . pativatī taruṇavatsā . pativatnī taruṇavatsā .
GS24pmbhasuu:7989: tatra idam na sidhyati . iyam asti patnī . kva tarhi syāt . patnīsaṃyājaḥ iti yatra yajñasaṃyogaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . patiśabdaḥ ayam aiśvaryavācī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7990: sarveṇa ca gṛhasthena pañca mahāyajñāḥ nivartyāḥ . yat ca adaḥ sāyam prātaḥ homacarupuroḍāśān nirvapati tasya asau īṣṭe . evam api tuṣajakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:7991: patnī iti na sidhyati . upamānāt siddham . patnī iva patnī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7992: (P_4,1.34) KA_II,214.16-215.2 Ro_III,492-493 patyuḥ sapūrvāt upasarjanasamāse upasaṅknhyānam . patyuḥ sapūrvāt upasarjanasamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:7993: upasaṅknhyānam kartavyam . vṛddhapatiḥ vṛddhapatnī sthūlapatiḥ sthūlapatnī
GS24pmbhasuu:7994: . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . āśāpatiḥ āsāpatnī .
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_0: siddham tu patyuḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt . siddham etat . katham . patyuḥ prātipadikaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7995_1: . na evam vijñāyate . asti asmāt patiśabdāt pūrvaḥ saḥ ayam sapūrvaḥ . sapūrvāt patiśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:7996: asti asmin prātipadike pūrvaḥ tat idam sapūrvam . sapūrvāt prātipadikāt patyantāt anupasarjanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:7997: (P_4,1.36.1) KA_II,215.4-216.2 Ro_III,493-495 pūtakratvādīnām puṃyogaprakaraṇe vacanam . pūtakratvādayaḥ puṃyogaprakaraṇe vaktavyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:7998: pūtakratoḥ strī pūtakratāyī . yayā hi pūtāḥ kratavaḥ pūtakratuḥ sā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_1: vacane liṅgaluki tatkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ . liṅgasannigoyena sarvatra āgamādeśānām vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:7999_2: liṅgaluki tatkṛtam prāpnoti . pañcendrāṇyaḥ devatāḥ asya pañcendraḥ pañcāgniḥ daśāgniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8000_0: anyatra api na avaśyam iha eva . kva anyatra . pañcabhiḥ dhīvarībhiḥ krītaḥ pañcadhīvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8000_1: daśadhīvā iti . liṅgagrahaṇe na arthaḥ . sarvatra āgamādeśānām vacane luki tatkṛtaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8001: bhavati . pañcamena gṛhṇāti pañcakaḥ . na etat asti . maṭ ayam parādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8002: sa ṭataḥ grahaṇena grahīṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . ṣaṣṭhena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ iti . siddham tu āgamādeśānām aṅgataḥ strīprakaraṇe vacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8003: siddham etat . katham . āgamādeśāḥ ye iha strīprakaraṇe ucyante te
GS24pmbhasuu:8004_0: aṅgādhikāre vaktavyāḥ . strīprakaraṇagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . siddham tu āgamādeśānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8004_1: aṅgataḥ vacanāt iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . ṣaṣṭhena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8004_2: . liṅgaluki vā prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam . atha vā liṅgaluki eva prakṛtipratyāpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8005: luki vā prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8006: ṣaṣṭhena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ iti . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ . luki prakṛtipratyāpattivacanam iti eva jyāyaḥ . idam api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8007_0: pañcabhiḥ paṭvībhiḥ krītaḥ pañcapaṭuḥ daśapaṭuḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8007_1: . sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayoḥ api abhāvaḥ . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8007_2: idam karma kartavyam . devadattāpāye yajñadattaḥ api na karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8009: asitapalitayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktayaḥ . asitā palitā . chandasi knam eke .
GS24pmbhasuu:8010: chandasi knam eke icchanti : asiknī asi oṣadhe . paliknīḥ it yuvatayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8011: bhavanti . varṇāt ṅībvidhāne piśaṅgāt upasaṅkhyānam . varṇāt ṅībvidhāne piśaṅgāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . piśaṅgī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8012: (P_4,1.42) KA_II,216.13-18 Ro_III,496-497 nīlāt oṣadhau . nīlāt oṣadhau iti vaktavyam . nīlī oṣadhiḥ . prāṇini ca . prāṇini ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8013: vaktavyam . nīlī gauḥ nīlī vaḍavā . vā sañjñāyām . vā sañjñāyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8016: kaḥ guṇaḥ nāma . sattve niviśate apaiti pṛthagjātiṣu dṛśyate ādheyaḥ ca akriyājaḥ ca saḥ asattvaprakṛtiḥ guṇaḥ . aparaḥ āha : upaiti anyat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8017: jahāti anyat . dṛṣṭaḥ dravyāntareṣu api . vācakaḥ sarvaliṅgānām dravyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8018: anyaḥ guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ . guṇavacanāt ṅīP ādyudāttārtham . guṇavacanāt ṅīp vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ādyudāttārtham . ādyudāttāḥ prayojayanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8020: (P_4,1.48) KA_II,217.12-220.11 Ro_III,500-509 gopālikādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : gopālikā paśupālikā . kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8021: praṣṭḥī pracarī . katham punaḥ ayam praṣṭhaśabdaḥ akārāntaḥ striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8022: vartate . tasya idam iti anena abhisambandhena . yathā eva hi asau tatkṛtān snānodvartanapariṣekān labhate evam praṣṭhaśabdam api labhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_0: yadi evam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam . puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitasya luk
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_1: vaktavyaḥ . tasya idam iti prāpnoti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : prāṣthyaḥ imāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_2: prācaryaḥ imāḥ iti . bhavati ca . vibhāṣā luk vaktavyaḥ . yadā luk tadā praṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8023_3: yadā na luk tadā prāṣṭhī . yadi evam na arthaḥ lukā . vibhāṣā taddhitotpattiḥ . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:8024: prāṣṭhī . yadā na taddhitotpattiḥ tadā praṣṭhī . evam api luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_0: na hi antareṇa taddhitasya lukam parārthe śabdaḥ vartate . yadi punaḥ tasyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_1: praṣṭhaśabdaḥ varteta . katham punaḥ tasyām apratiṣṭhamānāyām praṣṭhaśabdaḥ varteta
GS24pmbhasuu:8025_2: . yathā eva hi asau akurvatī kim cit pāpam tatkṛtān
GS24pmbhasuu:8026: vadhabandanaparikleśān labhate evam praṣṭhaśabdam api labhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8027: subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntānupapattiḥ . subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntatā na upapadyate . subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt ṭāp .
GS24pmbhasuu:8028: ṭapi utpanne samāsaḥ . sthāśabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra puṃyogāt ākhyāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_0: akārāntāt iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . siddham tu striyāḥ puṃśabdena abhidhānāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_1: etat . katham . striyāḥ puṃśabdena abhidhānāt . strī puṃśabdena abhidhīyate . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_2: ca uktam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām taddhitalugvacanam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_3: jñāpayati na ataḥ taddhitotpattiḥ bhavati iti yat ayam puṃyogāt ākhyāyām īkāram śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_4: . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . ye anīkārāḥ strīpratyayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_5: tadartham etat syāt . yat tarhi ākhyāgrahaṇam karoti . na hi taddhitāntam ākhyā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8029_6: . atha vā punaḥ astu tasya idam iti anena abhisambandhena . nanu ca uktam puṃyogāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8030: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na avaśyam ayam eva abhisambandhaḥ bhavati tasya idam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_0: . ayam api abhisambandhaḥ asti saḥ ayam iti . katham punaḥ atasmin saḥ iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_1: . caturbhiḥ prakāraiḥ atasmin saḥ iti etat bhavati tātsthyāt tāddharmyāt tatsāmīpyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_2: tatsāhacaryāt iti . tātsthyāt tāvat . mañcāḥ hasanti . giriḥ dahyate . tāddharmyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_3: . jaṭinam yāntam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . brahmadatte yāni kāryāṇi jaṭini api tāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_4: kriyante iti ataḥ jaṭi brahmadattaḥ iti ucyate . tatsāmīpyāt . gaṅgāyām ghoṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8031_5: kūpe gargakulam . tatsāhacaryāt . kuntān praveśaya . yaṣṭīḥ praveśaya iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8032: astu tasyām eva praṣṭhaśabdaḥ . nanu ca uktam subantasamāsavacanāt ca akārāntānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_0: samāsavacanam . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha samāsaḥ bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_1: kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam ktāt alpākhyāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_2: abhraviliptīsūpavilipti . subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt ṭāp . ṭapi utpanne
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_3: samāsaḥ . viliptāśabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra ktāt alpākhyāyām akārāntāt iti ṅīṣ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_4: . jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne . jāteḥ ṅīṣvidhāne prayojanam . vyāghrī kacchapī . subantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_5: samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt ṭāp . ṭapi utpanne samāsaḥ . ghrāśabdaḥ samasyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_6: tatra jāteḥ astrīviṣayāt ayopadhāt akārāntāt iti ṅīṣ na prāpnoti . samāsāntasya ṇatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8033_7: . samāsāntasya ṇatve prayojanam . vakṣyati prātipadikāntasya ṇatve
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_0: samāsāntagrahaṇam asamāsāntapratiṣedhārtham iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe māṣavāpiṇī vrīhivāpiṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_1: subantānām samāsaḥ . tatra antaraṅgatvāt nakārāntatvāt ṅīp . ṅīpi utpanne samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8034_2: . vāpinī śabdaḥ samasyeta . tatra samāsāntasya iti ṇatvam na prāpnoti . kṛdantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8035: kṛdantāt taddhite vṛddhisvarau ca prayojanam : sāṅkuṭinam vyāvakrośī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8036: atra avayavāt utpattiḥ prasajyeta . gatikārakopapadānām kṛdbhiḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:8037: samāsaḥ bhavati iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . satyām api etasyām paribhāṣāyām avayavāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8038_0: tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti . kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8038_1: iti saṅghātāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā asti na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8038_2: prayojanam bhavati . etayā eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . aprātipadikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8038_3: . kṛttvāt prātipadikasañjñā bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm prātipadikasañjñāyām api
GS24pmbhasuu:8038_4: etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha . iha hi mūlakena upadaṃśam bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:8039: vākye api luk prasajyeta . svare ca doṣaḥ syāt . prakārakaḥ prakaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_0: gatikārakopapadāt kṛdantam uttarapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dve atra prātipadikasañjñe : avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_2: avayavasya yā prātipadikasañjñā tadāśrayaḥ svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi sāṅkuṭinam
GS24pmbhasuu:8040_3: vyāvakrośī iti dve atra prātipadikasañjñe avayavasya api samudāyasya api . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8041_0: prātipadikasañjñā tadāśrayāvayavāt utpattiḥ prasajyeta . avayavāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8041_1: kaḥ doṣaḥ . kaumbhakāreyaḥ na sidhyati . avayavasya vṛddhisvarau syātām . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8041_2: prayojanam eva etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ . ubhābhyām nu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:8042: sidhyati . avadātāyām tu ṅīpprasaṅgaḥ . avadātāyām tu ṅīp prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8043: avadātā brāhmaṇī . varṇāt anudāttāt topadhāt taḥ naḥ iti . na eṣaḥ varṇavācī . kim tarhi viśuddhavācī . ātaḥ ca viśuddhavācī . evam hi āha
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_0: trīṇi yasya avadātāni vidyā yoniḥ ca karma ca etat śivam vijānīhi brāhmaṇāgryasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_1: lakṣaṇam iti . sūryāt devatāyām cāp vaktavyaḥ . sūryasya strī sūryā . devatāyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8044_2: kimartham . sūrī (P_4,1.49) KA_II,220.14-221.4 Ro_III,510-511 himāraṇyayoḥ mahattve
GS24pmbhasuu:8045: himāraṇyayoḥ mahattve iti vaktavyam . mahat himam himānī . mahat araṇyam araṇyānī . yavāt doṣe . yavāt doṣe iti vaktavyam . duṣṭaḥ yavaḥ yavānī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8046: yavanāt lipyām . yavanāt lipyām iti vaktavyam . yavanānī lipiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8047: upādhyāyamātulābhyām vā . upādhyāyamātulābhyām vā iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8048: upādhyāyī upādhyāyānī . mātulī mātulānī . mudgalāt chandasi lit ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8049: mudgalāt chandasi lit ca iti vaktavyam . rathīḥ abhūt mudgalānī . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca iti vaktavyam . ācāryānī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8050: āryakṣatriyābhyām vā . āryakṣatriyābhyām vā iti vaktavyam . āryā āryāṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8053: gavāt krītā . aśvena krītā . karaṇapūrvāt iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8054: eṣaḥ api hi krītaśabdaḥ karaṇapūrvaḥ . vibhaktyā vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:8055: bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi vibhaktiḥ api vavadhāyikā bhaviṣyati manasākrītī iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi na evam vijñāyate . karaṇam pūrvam asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8056_0: krītaśabdāt saḥ ayam karaṇapūrvaḥ tasmāt karaṇapūrvāt krītaśabdāt anupasarjanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8056_1: . katham tarhi . karaṇam asmin prātipadike pūrvam tat idam karaṇapūrvam tasmāt karaṇapūrvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8057: (P_4,1.52) KA_II,221.14-222.6 Ro_III,512-513 antodātte jātapratiṣedhaḥ . antodātte jātasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dantajātā stanajātā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8058: pāṇigṛhītyādīnām viśeṣe . pāṇigṛhītyādīnām viśeṣe iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8059: pāṇingṛhītī iti bhāryā . yasya yathā katham cit pāṇiḥ gṛhyate pāṇigṛhītā sā bhavati . bahulam taṇi . bahulam taṇi iti vaktavyam . kim idam taṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8062: antodāttāt abahunañsukālasukhādipūrvāt iti vaktavyam . bahu . bahukṛtā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8063: nañ . akṛtā . su . sukṛtā . kāla . māsajātā saṃvatsarajātā . sukhādi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8064: sukhajātā duḥkhajātā . jātipūrvāt vā . atha vā jātipūrvāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_0: (P_4,1.54.1) KA_II,222.8-18 Ro_III,513-513 svāṅgāt ca upasarjanāt iti ucyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_1: svāṅgam nāma . adravam mūrtimat svāṅgam prāṇistham avikārajam atatstham tatra dṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_2: ca tasya cet tat tathā yutam . aprāṇinaḥ api svāṅgam . adravam iti kimartham . bahulohitā
GS24pmbhasuu:8065_3: . na etat asti . bahvacaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi bahukaphā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8066: . bahubuddhiḥ bahumanāḥ . na etat asti . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_0: bahujñānā . prāṇistham iti kimartham . ślakṣṇamukhā śālā . avikārajam iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_1: . bahugaḍuḥ bahupaṭikā . na etat asti . iha tāvat bahugaḍuḥ iti ataḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8067_2: . bahupaṭikā iti bahvacaḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8068: idam tarhi bahuśophā . atatstham tatra dṛṣṭam ca . aprāṇistham prāṇini dṛṣṭam ca svāṅgasañjñam bhavati . dīrghakeśī rathyā iti . tasya cet tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8069: tathā yutam aprāṇinaḥ api svāṅgasañjñam bhavati . dīrghanāsikī arcā tuṅganāsikī arcā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_1: . iha mā bhūt . śikhā . upasarjanagrahaṇam anarthakam bahuvrīhyadhikārāt . upasarjanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8070_2: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhyadhikārāt . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:8071: bahuvrīheḥ ca antodāttāt iti . bahvajartham tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_0: kartavyam . bahvacaḥ na iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati . tat bahvajgrahaṇam upasarjanaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8072_1: yathā vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ upasarjanāt na iti . atha akriyamāṇe upasarjanagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8073_0: bahurvīheḥ iti vartate . bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit abahvac
GS24pmbhasuu:8073_1: bahuvrīhiḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha : svaḍā svaḍī iti . bahvajartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8073_2: iti cet svāṅgagrahaṇāt siddham . svāṅgagrahaṇam kriyate . tat bahvajgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8073_3: . svāṅgāt bahvacaḥ na iti . evam tarhi antodādāttāt iti vartate . antodāttārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8074_0: antodāttārtham iti cet sahādikṛtatvāt siddham . yat ayam sahanañvidyamānapūrvāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8074_1: iti pratṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ antodāttāt api bhavati iti . svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8075_0: svāṅgasamudāyapratiṣedhārtham tarhi upasarjanagrahaṇam kartavyam . śvāṅgāt yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8075_1: syāt . svāṅgasamudāyāt mā bhūt . kalyāṇapāṇipādā . atha kriyamāṇe api upasarjanagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8075_2: kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . svāṅgam hi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8076_0: upasarjanam . na svāṅgasamudāyaḥ svāṅgagrahaṇena gṛhyate yathā janapadasamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8076_1: janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate . kāśikosalīyā iti janapadatadavadhyoḥ iti vuñ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8077: asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti vartate . tena svāṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8078: asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param yat svāṅgam tadantāt bahuvrīheḥ iti . yat ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8079_0: asvāṅgapūrvapadāt param na tadantaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ yadantaḥ ca bahuvrīhiḥ na tat asvāṅgapūrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8079_1: param svāṅgam . nanu ca tat pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiviśeṣaṇam . na iti āha . pūrvapadaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8080: pūrvam padam pūrvapadam asvāṅgam pūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadam asvāṅgapūrvapadāt iti . yadi evam pūrvasmin yoge bahuvrīhiḥ aviśeṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8081: bhavati . bahuvrīhiḥ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham . ktāt iti vartate . tena bahuvrīhim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asvāṅgāt pūrvapadāt param yat ktāntam tadantāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8082: bahuvrīheḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8083: upasarjanamātrāt yathā syāt . niṣkeśī yūkā . atikeśī mālā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8084: (P_4,1.55.1) KA_II,223.25-224.5 Ro_III,517 nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca . nāsikādīnām vibhāṣāyām pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8086_0: kabaramaṇiviṣaśarebhyaḥ nityam iti vaktavyam . kabarapucchī maṇipucchī viṣapucchī
GS24pmbhasuu:8086_1: śarapucchī . upamānāt pakṣāt ca . upamānāt pakṣāt ca pucchāt ca iti vaktavyam . ulūkapakṣī
GS24pmbhasuu:8089_0: sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ samukhā amukhā vidyamānmukhā
GS24pmbhasuu:8089_1: iti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . sanāsikā anāsikā vidyamānanāsikā iti . sahanañvidyamānapūrvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8090: vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam vidhiḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8091_0: pratiṣedhaḥ . vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8091_1: iva karpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva bahvajlakṣaṇam saṃyogopadhalakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8092: sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇam api bādheta . kā tarhi gatiḥ . iha tāvat nāsikodara iti bahvajlakṣaṇaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8093: sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bhādante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā bahvajlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8094_0: sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇam na bādhiṣyate . oṣṭhajaṅghādantakarṇaśrṅgāt ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8094_1: saṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇaḥ ca . madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8094_2: pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam iyam vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:8095: saṃyogalakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate . sahanañvidyamānapūrvalakṣaṇam na bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8096_1: dikpūrvapadāt ṅīṣaḥ anudāttatvam vaktavyam . prāṅmukhī pratyaṅmukḥī . ṅībvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8097_0: ṅībvidhāne hi sati anyatra api ṅīṣviṣayān ṅīp prasajyeta . prāggulphā pratyaglalāṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:8097_1: . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti . yadi api ete viśeṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8097_2: anuvarteran asaṃyogopadhāt bahvacaḥ na iti evam api dikpūrvapadāt ṅīpā mukte ṅīṣ
