GS24pmbhasuu:8097_3: prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat yatrotsargāpavādam vibhāṣā tatra apavādena
GS24pmbhasuu:8098: atha vā ṅīṣaḥ ādeśaḥ ṅīp kariṣyate . tat tarhi ṅīṣaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8099_0: na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anyataḥ ṅīṣ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8099_1: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . dikpūrvapadāt iti eṣā pañcamī ṅīṣ iti prathamāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8100: uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8101: prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8104: sakṛtākhyātanirgrāhyā gotram ca caraṇaiḥ saha . aparaḥ āha :

GS24pmbhasuu:8109_0: astrīviṣayam iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām ākṛtau yat astrīviṣayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8109_1: iti droṇī kuṭī pātrī iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate kva cit yat astrīviṣayam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8109_2: mālā balākā atra api prāpnoti . astu kva cit yat astrīviṣayam iti . katham mālā balākā
GS24pmbhasuu:8111: . ibhyā kṣatriyā . atyalpam idam ucyate ayopadhāt iti . akopadhāt iti api
GS24pmbhasuu:8112: vaktavyam iha api yathā : syāt . caṭakā mūṣikā iti . yadi akopadhāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8113: ucyate kākī kokī śukī iti na sidhyati . astu tarhi ayopadhāt iti eva .

GS24pmbhasuu:8130: arajjvādīnām . ūṅprakaraṇe aprāṇijāteḥ ca arajjvādīnām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8131: alābūḥ karkandhūḥ . aprāṇijāteḥ iti kimartham . kṛkavākuḥ . arajjvādīnām iti kimartham . rajjuḥ hanuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8132: (P_4,1.70) KA_II,227.21 Ro_III,526 sahitasahhābhyām ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8135: kadrukamaṇḍavlvoḥ iti . kadrukamaṇḍaluguggulumadhujatupatayālūṇām iti vaktavyam : kadrūḥ , kamaṇḍalūḥ , guggulūḥ , madhūḥ , jatūḥ , patayālūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8136: (P_4,1.74) KA_II,228.2-6 Ro_III,526 ṣāt ca yañaḥ cāp . ṣāt ca yañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8137: cāp vaktavyaḥ . śārkarākṣyā pautimāṣyā . tatra ayam api arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8138: gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . saḥ na paṭhitavyaḥ bhavati . yadi na paṭhyate gaukṣīputraḥ iti samprasāraṇam na prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8139: saṅgṛhītam . gaukṣyāputraḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8142: ṅīṣ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti etasmāt ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ataḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_0: iti etasya avakāśaḥ bahurājñī bahutakṣṇī . ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_1: . vibhāṣā ṅīp . yadā na ṅīp saḥ avakāśaḥ . ṅīpprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . ūdhasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_2: ṅīṣ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_3: . anaḥ upadhālopinaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra ūdhasaḥ ṅīṣ bhavati iti etat anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8143_4: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8144: . āvaṭyāt yañaḥ cāpaḥ avakāśaḥ udīcām . āvaṭyā . ṣphasya avakāśaḥ anyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8145: yañantāni . gārgyāyaṇī vātsyāyanī . āvaṭyaśabdāt prācām ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8146: āvaṭyāyanī . ṣphaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . āvaṭyagrahaṇena na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8147: . yañaḥ ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . śārkarākṣyāyaṇī pautimāṣyāyaṇī . yañgrahaṇena na arthaḥ . ṣphaḥ cāpaḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8148: gaukakṣyaśabdaḥ krauḍyādiṣu paṭhyate . idam api siddham bhavati gaukakṣyāyaṇī . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8149: prācām ṣphaḥ taddhitaḥ sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yatra ṣphaḥ ca anyaḥ ca prāpnoti ṣphaḥ eva tatra bhavati iti . tataḥ lohitāidkatantebhyaḥ sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8150: . kva sarvatra . prācām ca udīcām ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8151: (P_4,1.78.1) KA_II,229.2-22 Ro_III,528-530 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8152_0: dākṣī plākṣī iti . atiśāyikena ayam tamaśabdena nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saḥ ca triprabhṛtiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8152_1: vartate . triprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . yadi evam prakarṣe cet tamam kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:8152_2: upottamam guru āmvidhiḥ kena te na syāt prakarṣe yadi ayam tamaḥ . prakarṣe cet tamam
GS24pmbhasuu:8152_3: kṛtvā dākṣyāḥ na upottamam guru iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_0: ucyate āmvidhiḥ kena tava na syāt . avyayaghāt iti prāpnoti . prakarṣe yadi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_1: tamaḥ . yadi ayam tamaḥ prakarṣe vartate . udgatasya prakarṣaḥ ayam . gataśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_2: atra lupyate .udgatasya ayam prakarṣaḥ . gataśabdasya atra lopaḥ bhavati . nāvyayārthaprakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8153_3: asti . dhātvarthaḥ atra prakṛṣyate . nāvyayasya arthasya prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8154: udgataḥ apekṣate kim cit . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . anudgatam apekṣya udgataḥ iti etat bhavati . trayāṇām dvau kila udgatau . trayāṇām kila dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:8155: udgatau bhavataḥ . catuṣprabhṛtikartavyaḥ vārāhyāyām na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8156: catuṣprabhṛtiṣu ṣyaṅ vaktavyaḥ vārāhyāyām na sidhyati . vārāhyāyām na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . catuṣprabhṛtīnām abhāvāt . bhidyate asya svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8157_0: tena vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . bhidyate khalu asya svaraḥ tena ātiśāyikena śabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:8157_1: uttamasya . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na lakṣyate . vidhiḥ ca āmaḥ na kva cit api lakṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8157_2: śabdāntaram idam vidhyāt dṛṣṭam abhyantaram triṣu . evam tarhi anyaḥ ayam ātiśāyikena
GS24pmbhasuu:8158_0: (P_4,1.78.2) KA_II,229.23-233.1 Ro_III, 530-538 kim punaḥ ayam aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8158_1: aṇiñbhyām paraḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam . ṣyaṅi anādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:8158_2: yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ audameghāḥ . dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ . dviḥ ca aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:8158_3: vidheyaḥ . audameghyāyāḥ chātrāḥ audameghāḥ . audameghyānām saṅghaḥ audameghaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8159: astu tarhi ādeśaḥ . ādeśe nalopavacanam . yadi ādeśaḥ nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8160_0: auḍulomyā śāralomyā iti . ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8160_1: vā ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ṣyaṅaḥ lopanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8160_2: . lopanimittaḥ ṣyaṅ . na akṛte lope ṣyaṅ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gurūpottamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8160_3: iti ucyate na ca akṛte lope gurūpottamam bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu paraḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:8160_4: ca uktam ṣyaṅi anādeśe yalopavacanam dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8161_0: yalopavacanam iti adoṣaḥ eṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvāt yajādau taddhite . yajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:8161_1: taddhite puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati bhasya aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . ayam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8161_2: doṣaḥ dviḥ aṇvidhiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8162: siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau . ubhayam idam uktam ādeśaḥ paraḥ iti ca . kim atra nyāyyam . adeśaḥ iti etat nyāyyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8163: kutaḥ etat . evam ca eva hi kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram paṭhitam ṣaṣṭhyā ca nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ . ataḥ eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ nirdoṣaḥ . nanu ca parasmin api sati ye
GS24pmbhasuu:8164: doṣāḥ te parihṛtāḥ . puṃvadbhāvena yalopaḥ parihṛtaḥ . sa ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8165: aḍe bhavati . tatra audamegheyaḥ na sidhyati . anubandhau tvayā kāryau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8166: yasya ādeśaḥ anubandhau tena kartavyau . ekaḥ sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthaḥ aparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8167_0: sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthaḥ . kva sāmānyagrahaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . yaṅaḥ cāp iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8167_1: sāmānyagrahaṇāvighātārthena kva arthaḥ . atra eva . kim prayojanam . cāpartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8167_2: cāp yathā syāt . tava katham cāp . ṭābvidhiḥ mama . ṭāpā mama siddham . nanu ca mama
GS24pmbhasuu:8167_3: api ṭāpā siddham . na sidhyati . aṇaḥ iti iñaḥ iti ca īkāraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_0: aṇantāt akārāntāt iñantāt ikārāntāt iti . katham tarhi . aṇ yaḥ akāraḥ iñ yaḥ ikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_1: iti . svarārthaḥ tarhi tvayā cāp vaktavyaḥ . ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt citaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_2: antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt iti . tava api tarhi ṣyaṅā uktatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_3: strītvasya ṭāp na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti ete . ukte api hi strītve bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_4: ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svāṛthikāḥ ṭābādayaḥ iti . mama api tarhi sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_5: ādeśaḥ itkāryam na iti . tena ñit na bhaviṣyati . asthānivattve doṣaḥ te vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8168_6: atra na sidhyati . asthānivattve doṣaḥ . vṛddhiḥ te na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8169_0: auḍulomyā śāralomyā . na ca idānīm ardhajaratīyam labhyam vṛddhiḥ me bhaviṣyati svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8169_1: na iti . tat yathā ardham jaratyāḥ kāmayate ardham na iti . tvayā api atra viśeṣārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8169_2: kartavyam syāt viśeṣaṇam . tvayā api atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_0: viśeṣārthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣyaṅaḥ samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_1: iti . akriyā eva viśeṣaḥ atra sānubandhaḥ viśeṣavān . akriyā eva mama viśeṣaḥ sānubandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8170_2: tu viśeṣavān . pāśyāyām te katham na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8171_0: pāśyāputraḥ iti atra kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ me syāt viśeṣaṇam . ekaḥ mama viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8171_1: . tvayā punaḥ dvau kartavyau . atha ekasmin api sati kaḥ kariṣyate . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8171_2: . anyasmin sūtrabhedaḥ syāt . yadi etābhyām anyaḥ kriyate sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8171_3: . ṣiti liṅgam prasajyeta . atha ṣit kriyate ṣitaḥ iti īkāraḥ prāpnoti . ṅiti cekrīyite
GS24pmbhasuu:8171_4: doṣaḥ . atha ṅit kriyate cekrīyite doṣaḥ bhavati . lolūyāputraḥ lolūyāpatiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8172: vyavadhānāt na duṣyati . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na doṣaḥ bhavati . yaḥ anantaraḥ na dhātuḥ saḥ . dhātoḥ iti vartate yaḥ ca atra anantaraḥ na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_0: dhātuḥ . yaḥ dhātuḥ saḥ ananantaraḥ . yaḥ ca dhātuḥ sa asau anantaraḥ . na cet ubhayataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_1: sāmyam ubhayatra prasajyeta . na cet ubhayataḥ sāmyam ubhayatra prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_2: yaṅā dhātuḥ viśeṣyeta . yaṅā viśeṣyeta yadi iha dhātuḥ yaṅ dhātunā vā yadi tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_3: etat . yadi eva yaṅā dhātuḥ viśeṣyate yadi atha api dhātunā yaṅ tulyam etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8173_4: . ubhau pradhānam yadi na atra doṣaḥ . atha ubhau pradhānam bhavataḥ na atra doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8174: tathā prasāryeta tu vākpatiḥ te . tathā sati vākpatiḥ vākputraḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8175: prasāraṇam prāpnoti . dhātuprakaraṇasya iha na sthānam iti niścayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8176: dhātuprakaraṇasya iha sthānam na asti iti kṛtvā eṣaḥ niścayaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8177: avaśyam āttvārtham dhātugrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . gobhyām gobhiḥ naubhyām naubhiḥ . āttvārtham yadi kartavyam tatra eva tat kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8178: upadeśe yat ejantam tasya ced āttvam iṣyate uddeśaḥ ṛūḍhiśabdānām . tena goḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi upadeśe iti ucyate uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_0: gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham . gotrāvayavāt iti ucyate . agotrārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_1: gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham iti cet tat aniṣṭam . gotrāvayavāt agotrārtham iti cet tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8180_2: aniṣṭam prāpnoti . iha api prāpnoti āhicchatrī kānyakubjī . evam tarhi gotrāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8181: vacanānarthakyam . gotrāt iti cet vacanam anarthakam . siddham gotre purveṇa eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . gurūpottamayoḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_0: agurūpottamāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām avayavatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_1: sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . agurūpottamāṛtham iti cet sarveṣām avayavatvāt sarvatra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8182_2: : aṣṭāśītiḥ sahasrāṇi ūrdhvaretasām ṛṣīṇām babhūvuḥ . tatra agastyāṣṭamaiḥ ṛṣibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8183: tatrabhavatām yat apatyam tāni gotrāṇi . ataḥ anye gotrāvayavāḥ . tatra utpattiḥ prāpnoti . tat ca aniṣṭam . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8184: katham yebhyaḥ agurūpottamebhyaḥ iṣyate . siddham tu rauḍhyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8185: upasaṅkhyānāt . siddham etat . katham . rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8186: rauḍhyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ke punaḥ rauḍhyādayaḥ . ye krauḍyādayaḥ . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti siddham tu kulākhyebhyaḥ loke
GS24pmbhasuu:8187: gotrābhimatābhyaḥ iti . siddham etat . katham . kulākhyāḥ loke gotrāvayavāḥ iti ucyante . atha vā gotrāvayavaḥ kaḥ bhavatum arhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8188: gotrāt avayutaḥ . kaḥ ca gotrāt avayutaḥ . yaḥ anantaraḥ . daivadattyā yājñadattyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8190: samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt : upagoḥ apatyam . asamarthāt mā bhūt iti :
GS24pmbhasuu:8191: kambalaḥ upagoḥ apatyam devadattasya iti . samarthavacanam anarthakam . na hi asamarthena arthābhidhānam . samarthavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8192_0: na hi asamarthena arthābhidhānam . na hi asamarthāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8192_1: syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha prathamavacanam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8193: prathamāt pratyayotpattiḥ yathā syāt . aprathamāt mā bhūt . upagoḥ apatyam iti apatyaśabdāt . prathamavacanam anarthakam . na hi aprathamena
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_0: arthābhidhānam . prathamavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . na hi aprathamena arthābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_1: . na hi aprathamāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthābhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8194_2: utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati . atha vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathāt syāt . upagoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8195: vāvacane ca uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam . vāvacanānarthakyam ca tatra nityatvāt sanaḥ iti . iha api vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8196: tatra nityatvāt pratyayasya . iha dvau pakṣau vṛttipakṣaḥ ca avṛttipakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8197_0: ca . svabhāvtaḥ ca etat bhavati vākyam ca vṛttiḥ ca . tatra svābhāvike vṛttiviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:8197_1: nitye pratyaye prāpte vāvacanen kim anyat śakyam abhisambandhum anyat ataḥ sañjñāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8198: tasmāt na arthaḥ vāvacanena . atha etat samarthagrahaṇam na eva kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8199: . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam . samarthāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8200: asamarthāt mā bhūt . kim punaḥ samartham . arthābhidhāne yat samartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8201: kim punaḥ tat . kṛtavarṇānupūrvīkam padam . sautthitiḥ vaikṣamāṇiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8202: atha tat vāvacanam na eva kartavyam . kartavyam ca . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8203: nityāḥ śabdāḥ . nityeṣu śabdeṣu vākyasya anena sādhutvam anvākhyāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8204: (P_4,1.83.1) KA_II,235.2-8 Ro_III,544-545 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi tatra kaḥ cit dīvyacchabdaḥ paṭhyate . kaḥ tarhi . dīvyatiśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8205: katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . prāk dīvyateḥ iti . saḥ tarhi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8206_0: nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ prāk dīvyateḥ iti . na kartavyaḥ . dīvyatiśabde dīvyacchabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8206_1: asti . tasmāt eṣā pañcamī . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vikṛtanirdeśaḥ kriyate . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8206_2: ācāryaḥ . bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā : ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8206_3: jñāpane prayojanam . ekadeśavikrṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na kartavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8206_4: . atha vā prākśabdaḥ ayam dikśabdaḥ . dikśabdaiḥ ca yoge pañcamī bhavati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8209: sakṛdvihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . na etat asti prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8210: adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8211: adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇ prāpnoti . ataḥ iñ aṇ ca iti aṇ api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8214_0: prāgvacane katham idam vijñāyate . prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ āhosvit prāk dīvyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8214_1: ye arthāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8214_2: eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . atha vijñāyate prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8214_3: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ iñ aṇam bhādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:8215: prāk dīvyataḥ ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8216: prādhānyena artham pratinirdiśati . itarathā bahvyaḥ prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante
GS24pmbhasuu:8217: . tataḥ yām kām cit evam nimittatvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ astu prāk dīvyataḥ yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8218_0: . na vā kva cit vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8218_1: yat ayam vāvacanam karoti pīlāyāḥ vā udaśvitaḥ anyatarasyām iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8218_2: na apavādaviṣaye aṇ bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate na arthaḥ prāgvacanena . adhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8219: adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8220: parihṛtam etat na vā kva cit vāvacanāt iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam iyān avadhiḥ gṛhyate . na prāk ṭhakaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati artheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8221: ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prakṛtiviśeṣāt upadyamānaḥ iñ aṇam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:8222: (P_4,1.85.1) KA_II,236.10-237.8 Ro_III,547-549 vāṅmatipitṛmatām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . vāṅmatipitṛmatām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8223: . vāk . vācyaḥ . vāk . mati . mātyaḥ . mati . pitṛmat . paitṛmatyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8224_0: pṛthivyāḥ ñāñau . pṛthivyāḥ ñāñau vaktavyau . pārthivā pārthivī . devasya yañañau
GS24pmbhasuu:8224_1: . devasya yañañau vaktavyau . daivyam daivam .bahiṣaḥ ṭilopaḥ ca yañ ca . bahiṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8224_2: ṭilopaḥ ca yañ ca vaktavyaḥ . bahirbhavaḥ bāhyaḥ . īkak ca . īkak ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8224_3: bāhīkaḥ . īkañ chandasi . īkañ chandasi vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8225: . bāhīkam astu bhadram vaḥ . sthāmnaḥ akāraḥ . sthāmnaḥ akāraḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8226_0: aśvatthāmaḥ . lomnaḥ apatyeṣu bahuṣu . lomnaḥ apatyeṣu bahuṣu akāraḥ vaktavyaḥ .uḍulomāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8226_1: śaralomāḥ . bahuṣu iti kimartham . auḍalomiḥ śāralomiḥ . sarvatra goḥ ajādiprasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:8226_2: yat . sarvatra goḥ ajādiprasaṅge yat vaktavyaḥ . gavi bhavam gavyam . goḥ idam gavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8226_3: . goḥ svam gavyam . gauḥ devatā asya sthālīpākasya gavyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8227: (P_4,1.85.2) KA_II,237.9-17 Ro_III,549 ṇyādayaḥ arthaviśeṣalakṣaṇāt aṇapavādāt pūrvavipratiṣeddham . ṇyādayaḥ arthaviśeṣalakṣaṇāt aṇapavādāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8228: bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . ditiḥ devatā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8229_0: daityaḥ . athaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya aṇapavādasya avakāśaḥ . duleḥ apatyam dauleyaḥ bāleyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8229_1: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . diteḥ apatyam daityaḥ . aparasya athaviśeṣalakṣaṇasya aṇapavādasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8230_0: āpūpikam śāṣkulikam . ṇyādīnām avakāśaḥ . bārhaspatyam prājāpatyam . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8230_1: prāpnoti . vanaspatīnām samūhaḥ vānaspatyam . ṇyādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8230_2: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācīparaśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8233_0: añprakaraṇe grīṣmāt acchandasi iti vaktavyam . graiṣmam . acchandasi iti kim . triṣṭup
GS24pmbhasuu:8233_1: graiṣmī . yadi acchandasi iti ucyate graiṣmau etau māsau atra na prāpnoti . acchandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8233_2: iti ucyate . na etat chandaḥ samīkṣitam kāṭhakam kāpālakam maudakam pappalādakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8233_3: vā . kim tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam eta . na cet chandaḥ pratyayārthaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8235: na nañ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : pauṃsnam . puṃs iti sakārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8236_0: nakāraśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ . na sidhyati . saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ iti lopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8236_1: . evam tarhi na eva arthaḥ nañā na api snañā . añ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate nakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8236_2: ca āgamaḥ vaktavyaḥ . atha nakārāgame sati kim pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate āhosvit parādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8236_3: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi pūrvāntaḥ straiṇāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti . straiṇānām saṅghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8237: añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ prāpnoti . atha parādiḥ pauṃsam saḥ eva doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8238: saṃyogāntalopaḥ prāpnoti . astu pūrvāntaḥ . katham straiṇāḥ straiṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8239_0: saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam . na ca idam laukikam gotram
GS24pmbhasuu:8239_1: . īkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam . straiṇī pauṃsī iti eva bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8239_2: . evam hi saunāgāḥ paṭhanti nañsnañīkakkhuṃstaruṇatalunānām upasaṅkhyānam iti . ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8240: . nugvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet iha nugvacanāt na syāt straiṇam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8241: iha tu khalu paūmsam iti nugvacanāt eva prāpnoti . tasmāt nañsnañau vaktavyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8242: (P_4,1.87.2) KA_II,238.14-25 Ro_III,552 atha imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt āhosvit prāk vateḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . nañsnañau bhavanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8243_0: cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ . nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8243_1: . strīvat puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ima nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8243_2: iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim bādheyātām . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8243_3: . na vaktavyam vateḥ prāk iti vakṣyāmi . vateḥ prāk iti cet bhāve upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8243_4: vateḥ prāk iti cet bhāve upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strībhāvaḥ straiṇam pumbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8244: pauṃsnam iti . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8245: nañsnañau bhavanāt iti cet vatyarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8246: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8248_0: (4.1.88.1) P II.239.2 - 8 R III.553 iha kasmāt na bhavati traividyaḥ pāñcanadaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8248_1: iti . iha tāvat traividyaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate tisraḥ vidyāḥ adhīte traividyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8248_2: iti . katham tarhi . tryavayavā vidyā trividyā . trividyām adhīte traividyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8248_3: . iha api pāñcanadaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate pañcasu nadīṣu bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8249: pañcānām nadīnām samāhāraḥ pañcanadam . pañcanade bhavaḥ pāñcanadaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8250_0: ṣāṭkulaḥ iti na evam vijñāyate ṣaṭsu kuleṣu bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8250_1: ṣaṇṇām kulam ṣaṭkulam ṣaṭkule bhavaḥ ṣāṭkulaḥ iti . ajādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8251: (P_4,1.88.2) KA_II,239.9-240.6 Ro_III,554-556 dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam . dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8252: dvigunimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasya luk bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8253: . pañcakapālasya idam khaṇḍam pāñcakapālam iti . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8254_0: kim prayojanam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ . pancakapālyām saṃskrtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8254_1: iti api vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . atha kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8254_2: katham idam vijñāyate . tasya nimittam tannimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:8255: tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8256_0: iti kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe atra prāpnoti pañcakapālasya idam khaṇḍam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8256_1: . atha vijñāyate saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8256_2: bhavati . yatha na doṣaḥ tathā astu . saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8256_3: iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . yat ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api
GS24pmbhasuu:8256_4: iti . tat tarhi tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:8257_0: kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . dvigoḥ taddhitasya luk bhavati . kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8257_1: . nimittam . yasmin dviguḥ iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye .
GS24pmbhasuu:8257_2: idam tarhi vaktavyam arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8258: sādhyam . pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālyām saṃskṛtaḥ pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8259: daśakapālaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8260_0: aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:8260_1: avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati . evam pañcasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtaḥ iti vigṛhya pañcakapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8261: vigṛhya vākyam eva . traiśabdyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8262: (P_4,1.89.1) KA_II,240.8-241.3 Ro_III,556-557 gotre aluk aci iti cet itaretarāśrayatvāt aprasiddhiḥ . gotre aluk aci iti cet itaretarāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8263: aprasiddhiḥ . kā itaretarāśrayatā . alugnimittaḥ ajādiḥ ajādinimittaḥ ca aluk . tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante .
GS24pmbhasuu:8264_0: vipratiṣedhāt tu lukaḥ chavidhānam . vipratiṣedhāt tu lukaḥ chaḥ bhaviṣyati . lukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8264_1: avakāśaḥ gargāḥ vatsāḥ bidāḥ urvāḥ . chasya avakāśaḥ śālīyaḥ mālīyaḥ gārgīyaḥ vātsīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8264_2: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . gargāṇām chātrāḥ gārgīyāḥ vātsīyaḥ . chaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8265: vipratiṣedhaḥ . bhūmni ca luk prāptaḥ bāhye ca arthe vidhīyate ajādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8266_0: bahiraṅgam antaraṅgāt . vipratiṣedhāt ayuktam syāt . bhūmni prāptasya lukaḥ yat ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:8266_1: taddhite alukam śāsti etat bravīti kūrvan samānakālau aluk luk ca . yat ayam bhūmni
GS24pmbhasuu:8266_2: prāptasya lukaḥ ajādau taddhite alukam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:8267: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samānakālau etau aluglukau iti . yadi vā lukaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8268: prasaṅge bhavati aluk chaḥ tathā prasiddhaḥ asya . yadi vā lukaḥ prasaṅge bhavati aluk bhavati tathā asya chaḥ prasiddhaḥ asya . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8269: abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . luk vā alukaḥ prasaṅgam pratīkṣate che
GS24pmbhasuu:8270: aluk asya tathā . luk vā punaḥ alukaḥ prasaṅgam yadi pratīkṣate tathā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8271: che aluk siddhaḥ bhavati . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8273: bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk . gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8274_0: bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ . bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8274_1: baidau . kimartham idam na aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti ucyate . na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8274_2: ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8274_3: pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni . ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni
GS24pmbhasuu:8275: baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ . baidayoḥ bidāḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8276: yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8277: yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8278_0: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate gotrasya bahuṣu lopinaḥ bahuvacanāntasya pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:8278_1: dvyekayoḥ aluk vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . aci iti eva aluk siddhaḥ . aci iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8278_2: ucyate . na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:8279: . nanu ca uktam varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam iti . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā ca idam api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_0: atha vā aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi . yadi aviśeṣeṇa alukam uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_1: hali na iti ucyate bidānām apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ bidāḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_2: . punaḥ asya yuvabahutve vartamānasya luk bhaviṣyati . punaḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_3: . samarthānām prathamasya gotrapratyayāntasya aluk ucyate . na ca etat samarthānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_4: prathamam gotrapratyayāntam . kim tarhi . dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntam . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_5: ca etat evam vijñeyam atribharavājikā vasiṣṭhakaśyapikā bhṛgvaṅgirasikākutsakuśikikā
GS24pmbhasuu:8280_6: iti evamartham . gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam vā niyamārtham . atha vā gargabhārgavikāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8281: etasya eva dvitīyam artham upasaṅkrāntasya aluk bhavati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8282: yat api ucyate ekavacanadvivacanāntasya pravṛttau bahuṣu lopaḥ yūni vaktavyaḥ . añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti ucyamānaḥ luk na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8283: mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ bahuṣu yañ yaḥ bahuṣu iti . añantam yad bahuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8284_0: yañantam yat bahuṣu iti bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8284_1: syāt . kāśyapapratikṛtayaḥ kāśyapāḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . laukikasya tatra gotrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8284_2: grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram . yadi añantam yad
GS24pmbhasuu:8285_0: bahuṣu yañantam yat bahuṣu iti evam ucyate bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ baidaḥ baidau
GS24pmbhasuu:8285_1: atra api prāpnoti . aluk atra likam bādhiṣyati . aluki ca kṛte punaḥ lukaḥ nimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:8285_2: na asti iti kṛtvā punaḥ luk na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8286: uktam vā . kim uktam . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8287: āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ . saḥ ca astriyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:8288: ekagotragrahaṇānarthakyam ca . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham iti . tatra bidānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8289: bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau . baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidā iti aviravikanyāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:8290: (P_4,1.90.1) KA_II,242.15-23 Ro_III,562-563 yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8291: ayatheṣṭam prāpnoti . aniṣṭe pratyaye avasthite luk . aniṣṭapratyayasya śravaṇam prasjyeta . siddham tu aviśeṣeṇa lugvacanam hali ca pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8292: siddham etat . katham . aviśeṣeṇa lukam uktvā hali na iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8293: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8294: yūni luk aci iti cet pratyayasya ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ.
GS24pmbhasuu:8295: aci iti na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi . viṣayasaptamī . ajādau viṣaye iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8296: . tatra aci viṣaye luke kṛte yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8298: yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam sauvīragotrebhyaḥ ṇaṭhakchāḥ . ṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:8299: phāṇṭāhṛteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ . phāṇṭahṛtasya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8300: phāṇṭāhṛtāḥ . ṇa . ṭhak . bhāgavitteḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ bhāgavittikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8301_0: bhāgavittikasya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ bhāgavittāḥ . ṭhak . tailāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ tailāyanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8301_1: . tailāyanīya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ tailāyanīyāḥ . iñṇyau sarvatra . iñṇyau sarvatra prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8302_0: aupagavīyāḥ . vṛddhavadatideśe sati iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8302_1: pratyākhyāyate asau atideśaḥ . katham yāni prayojanāni . tāni jñāpakena siddhāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8303_0: śvaśurasya apatyam śvaśuryaḥ . śvaśuryasya apatyam śvāśuriḥ . śvāśureḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8303_1: śvāśurāḥ . yat . kha . kulasya apatyam kulīnaḥ . kulīnasya apatyam kaulīniḥ . kaulīneḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8303_2: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ kaulīnāḥ . kha . cha . svasuḥ apatyam svasrīyaḥ . svasrīyasya apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8303_3: svāsrīyiḥ . svāsrīyeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ svāsrīyāḥ . etāni api hi na santi prayojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8304: śvaśuryaḥ kulīnaḥ svasrīyaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . uktam etat aṇiñoḥ luki abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt yuvapratyayasya upasaṅkhyānam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8305: abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti ucyate . na ca etat abrāhmaṇagotramātram .
GS24pmbhasuu:8306: abrāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti na ayam paryudāsaḥ yat anyat brāhmaṇagotramātrāt iti . kim tarhi prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ brāhmaṇagotramātrāt na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8307: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam māyuriḥ kāpotiḥ kāpiñjaliḥ iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8308: evam tarhi aṇṇyau sarvatra prayojanam . aṇ . glucukāyaneḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ glaucukāyanaḥ . glaucukāyanasya yūnaḥ chātrāḥ glaucukāyanāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8309: ṇyaḥ ca kāpiñjalādyartham . kāpiñjaleḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ kāpiñjalādyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8311: (P_4,1.90.3) KA_II,243.20-244.27 Ro_III,565-569 prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ . prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūnaḥ vṛddhavadatideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8312: kartavyaḥ . yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam . gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam . gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8313_0: gārgyāyaṇakaḥ . gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ yathā syāt . yadi vṛddhavadatideśaḥ kriyate aupagaveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8313_1: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ iti iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat
GS24pmbhasuu:8313_2: iti anena anutpattiḥ atidiśyeta . katham punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena anutpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8313_3: śakyā atideṣṭum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam samarthayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:8313_4: . tat yathā : uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8314: iti . evam iha api yuvā vṛddhavat bhavati vṛddhavat na bhavati iti evam vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe . yatha gotre yuvapratyayaḥ na bhavati evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8315: prāgdīvyatodhikāre yūni api na bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8316: ucyate atha vā etarhi yūni luk iti etat na kriyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti . phakphiñvartī yuvā vā vṛddhavat bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8317_0: vakṣyāmi . yadā tarhi na vṛddhavat tadā gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8317_1: kim cit gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8317_2: . yadi punaḥ yuvā vṛddhavat iti anena arthaḥ atidiśyeta . prāgdīvyatodhikāreyūnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8317_3: vṛddhavat arthaḥ bhavati iti . tat vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_0: kariṣyate . katham tarhi phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti . phakphiñvartī yuvārthaḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_1: vṛddhavat bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . yadā tarhi na vṛddhavat tadā gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_2: gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_3: gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi rājanyāt vuñ manuṣyāt ca jñāpakam laukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_4: param . yat ayam vuñvidhau rājanyamanuṣyayoḥ grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_5: laukikam param gotragrahaṇam iti . yuvā ca loke gotram iti upacaryate . kiṅgotraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_6: asi māṇavakaḥ . gārgyāyaṇaḥ . kiṅgotraḥ asi māṇavakaḥ . vātsyāyanaḥ . yadi etat jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8318_7: aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ gotrāśrayaḥ iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . sāmuhikeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8319_0: gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ gotrāśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8319_1: vuñ na prāpnoti . vuñvidhau jñāpakam . vuñvidhau jñāpakam śālaṅkeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8319_2: śālaṅkāḥ iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham aupagaveḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8319_3: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ .gotreṇa iñam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . gotre yaḥ iñ vihitaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8320: (P_4,1.92.1) KA_II,245.2-15 Ro_III,569-570 tasya idam iti apatye api .
GS24pmbhasuu:8321: tasya idam iti apatye api aṇ siddhaḥ . tasyedaṃviśeṣāḥ hi ete apatyam samūhaḥ vikāraḥ tasya nivāsaḥ iti . kim artham tarhi idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_0: bādhanārtham kṛtam bhavet . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . katham punaḥ aśaiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_1: śaiṣikam bādheta . utsargaḥ śeṣaḥ eva asau . yaḥ hi utsargaḥ saḥ api śeṣaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_2: atha etasmin bādhakabādhane sati kim prayojanam . vṛddhāni asya prayojanam . vṛddhāni
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_3: prayojayanti . bhānoḥ apatyam bhānavaḥ . śyāmagoḥ apatyam śyāmagavaḥ . katham punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_4: icchatā api apavādaḥ prāpnuvan śakyaḥ bādhitum . tasyagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . kim idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_5: bhavān adhyāruhya tasyagrahaṇasya eva prayojanam āha na punaḥ sarvasya eva yogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_6: . avaśyam uttarātham arthanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . samarthavibhaktiḥ api tarhi avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_7: uttarārtham pratinirdeṣṭavyā . evam tarhi yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt . itarathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8322_8: hi tasya apatyam ataḥ iñ bhavati iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8323_0: (P_4,1.92.2) KA_II,245.16-246.27 Ro_III,571-573 puṃliṅgena ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8323_1: ekavacanāntena ca . tena puṃliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ syāt ekavacanāntāt ca . strīnapuṃsakaliṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8323_2: dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt ca idam na syāt . taddhitārthanirdeśe liṅgavacanam apramāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8324: taddhitārthanirdeśe liṅgavacanam apramāṇam . kim kāraṇam . tasya avivakṣitatvāt . na atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . katham punaḥ tena eva ca nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:8325: nirdeśaḥ kriyate tat ca atantram syāt . tatkārī ca bhavān taddveṣī ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8326: nāntarīyakatvāt atra puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena ca.
GS24pmbhasuu:8327_0: avaśyam kayā cit vibhaktyā kena cit vacanena nirdeśaḥ kartavya iti . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8327_1: kaḥ cit annārthī śālikalāpam sapalālam satuṣam āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8328: tathā kaḥ cit māṃsārthī matsyān sakaṇṭakān saśakalān āharati nāntayīyakatvāt . saḥ yāvat ādeyam tāvat ādāya śakalakaṇṭakān utsṛjati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8329_0: evam iha api nāntarīyakatvāt puṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kriyate ekavacanāntena ca. na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8329_1: atra nirdeśaḥ tantram . sarvanāmanirdeśe viśeṣāsampratyayaḥ sāmānyanirdeśāt . sarvanāmanirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:8330_0: sāmānyanirdeśāt . sarvanāmnā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate . saranāma ca sāmānyavāci . tena
GS24pmbhasuu:8330_1: sāmānyavācinaḥ eva utpattiḥ syāt . viśeṣavācinaḥ na syāt . sāmānyacodanāḥ tu viśeṣeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8331: avatiṣṭhante . tat yathā : gauḥ anūbadhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti ākṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:8332: coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni kriyante . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . asambhavāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8333: . ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye
GS24pmbhasuu:8334_0: ārambhaṇādīni kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt sāmānyavācinaḥ utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:8334_1: viśeṣavācinaḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . apatyābhidhāne strīpuṃliṅgasya aprasiddhiḥ napuṃsakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8334_2: . apatyābhidhāne strīpuṃliṅgasya aprasiddhiḥ . kim kāraṇam . napuṃsakaliṅgatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8334_3: apatyam napuṃsakaliṅgam tena napuṃsakaliṅgasya eva abhidhānam syāt . strīpuṃliṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8335: nanu ca idam purastāt eva coditam parihṛtam ca . utpattiḥ tatra codyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8336: iha punaḥ utpannena abhidhānam codyate . siddham tu prajanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8337: vivakṣitatvāt . siddham etat . katham . prajanasya vivakṣitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8338_0: prajanaḥ atra vivakṣitaḥ saḥ ca sarvaliṅgaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam samānāyām pravṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:8338_1: apatyam napuṃsakaliṅgam prajanaḥ sarvaliṅgaḥ . ekārthe śabdānyatvāt dṛṣṭam liṅgānyatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8339: dṛśyate . tat yathā puṣyaḥ tārakāḥ nakṣatram . geham kuṭī maṭhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8340_0: avayavānyatvāt ca . avayavānyatvāt ca liṅgānyatvam dṛśyate . tat yathā kuṭī kuṭīraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8340_1: śamī śamīraḥ śuṇḍā śuṇḍāraḥ . avayavānyatvāt kila liṅgānyatvam syāt kim punaḥ yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8342: utpādayitāram prati apatyayogāt tasya ca vivakṣitatvāt ekavacanam gotre .
GS24pmbhasuu:8343: utpādayitā utpādayitā apatyena yujyate . tasya ca vivakṣitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8344: utpādayituḥ saḥ ca abhisambandhaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . utpādayitāram prati apatyayogāt tasya ca abhisambandhasya vivakṣitatvāt utpādayituḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8345: utpādayituḥ apatyābhidhāne anekaḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca ekaḥ eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti ekavacanam gotre .
GS24pmbhasuu:8346: evamartham idam ucyate . katham punaḥ jñāyate utpādayitā utpādayitā apatyena yujyate iti . evam hi dṛśyate loke . pitāmahasya utsaṅge dārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8347: āsīnam kaḥ cit pṛcchati kasya ayam iti . saḥ āha devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8348_0: yajñadattasya vā iti . utpādayitāram vyapadiśati na ātmānam . asti prayojanam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8348_1: . kim tarhi iti . tatra pratyayāntāt gotre pratiṣedhaḥ gotre niyatatvāt . tatra pratyayāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8349: aupagavasya apatyam iti . kim kāraṇam . gotre niyatatvāt . gotre hi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8350: niyamaḥ kriyate . tena yaḥ ca asau yathājātīyakaḥ ca gotrapratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ ekaḥ syāt . kaḥ ca prāpnoti . yaḥ pratyayāntāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8351: paramaprakṛteḥ ca utpattiḥ . paramaprakṛteḥ ca utpattiḥ vaktavyā . ayogāt hi na prāpnoti . etayoḥ ca eva parihāraḥ paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ yūni ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8352: antarhite aprāptiḥ iti tasya ca yathā tatpratyayāntam . yathā tat eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8353_0: vikārāvayavapratyayāntam dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca vikāram saṅkrāmati evam iha api tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8353_1: eva apatyapratyayāntam dvitīyam ca tṛtīyam ca apatyam saṅkramiṣyati . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8353_2: aupagavasya apatyam aupagavaḥ yatra saḥ eva anantaraḥ iṣyate saḥ eva gotre . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8354_0: apatyam gārgyaḥ iti . atra hi anyaḥ anantaraḥ iṣyate anyaḥ gotre . striyām ca aniyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8354_1: . striyām ca yuvatyām niyamaḥ na prāpnoti . aupagavī māṇavakī . niyamāt hi strī paryudasyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8354_2: ekaḥ gotre gotrāt yūni astriyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_0: katarasmin pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . utpādayitari apatyayukte . utpādayitari tāvat apatyayukte
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_1: na doṣaḥ . utpādayitari hi apatyayukte na sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8355_2: na upapadyate . asati niyame na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarveṣu tarhi apatyayukteṣu ayam doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8356: sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . tatra niyamaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . sati niyame eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . utpādayitari ca apatyayukte striyā yuvatyā abhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8357: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gotrasañjñā yuvasañām bādhate . gotrāt yūni ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_0: astriyām pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . yūni ca antarhite aprāptiḥ . yūni ca antarhite niyamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_1: aprāptiḥ . gārgyāyaṇasya apatyam iti . katarasmin pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_2: . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu tāvat na doṣaḥ . sarveṣu hi apatyayukteṣu sarvataḥ utpattyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_3: bhavativyam . tatra niyamaḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . sati niyame na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . utpādayitari
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_4: tarhi apatyayukte ayam doṣaḥ . utpādayitari hi apatyayukte paramaprakṛteḥ anantarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_5: gotrāt ca ayogāt na prāpnoti . yūnaḥ ca na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . gotrāt iti niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8358_6: . santu tarhi katham punaḥ jñāyate sarve
GS24pmbhasuu:8359: apatyayuktāḥ iti . evam hi yājñikāḥ paṭhanti . daśapuruṣānūkam yasya gṛhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8360_0: śūdrāḥ na vidyeran saḥ somam pibet iti . yadi ca sarve apatyayuktāḥ bhavanti tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8360_1: etat upapannam bhavati . katham yat uktam pitāmahasya utsaṅge dārakam āsīnam kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8360_2: cit pṛcchati kasya ayam iti . saḥ āha devadattasya yajñadattasya vā iti . utpādayitāram
GS24pmbhasuu:8360_3: vyapadiśati na ātmānam iti . utpattiḥ tasya vivakṣitā . sarveṣām na idam apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8360_4: . devadattaḥ tu asya utpādayitā iti . atha sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu kim anena kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8360_5: ekaḥ gotre iti . sarveṣām apatyayogāt pratyayāntāt gotre pratiṣedhārtham ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_0: gotre . sarveṣām apatyayogāt pratyayāntāt gotre pratiṣedhārtham ekaḥ gotre iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_1: . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . na tu jñāyate kaḥ ekaḥ bhavati yaḥ vā paramaprakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8361_2: yaḥ vā anantarāt iti . niyamānupapattiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8362_0: niyamaḥ ca na upapadyate . kim kāraṇam . na hi ekasmin apatye anekapratyayaprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8362_1: . na hi ekasmin apatye anekapratyayaḥ prāpnoti . kim tarhi . apatyāntare śabdāntarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8362_2: pratyayāntaraprāptiḥ . apatyāntare apatyāntara śabdāntarāt śabdāntarāt pratyayāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:8363: . phakantāt iñ iñantāt phak iti phagiñoḥ dāśatayī pratyayamālā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8364_0: katarasmin pakṣe ayam doṣaḥ . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:8364_1: na doṣaḥ . sarveṣu hi apatyayukteṣu sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavativyam . tatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8364_2: upapannaḥ bhavati . sati niyame na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . utpādayitari tarhi apatyayukte ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8365: na sarvataḥ utpattyā bhavativyam . tatra niyamaḥ na upapadyate . asati niyame eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . utpādayitari ca apatyayukte na doṣaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8366: apatyam samudāyaḥ cet niyamaḥ atra samīkṣitaḥ . tasmin subahavaḥ prāptāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8367: niyamaḥ asya bhaviṣyati . apatyam iti sarvam upagvādipitṛkam apatyam samīkṣitam . tasmin subahavaḥ pratyayāḥ prāptāḥ . niyamaḥ asya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8368: ekaḥ gotre iti . yat api ucyate striyām ca aniyamaḥ iti evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8369: gotrāt yūni pratyayaḥ bhavati . striyām na iti . evam api striyāḥ yuvatyāḥ abhidhānam na prāpnoti . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi . gotrāt yūni pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8370: bhavati . striyām luk . evam api aupagavī māṇavikā anupasarjanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8371: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam aṇ yaḥ anupasarjanam iti . aṇantāt anupasarjanāt iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8372: kāśakṛtsnina proktā mīmāṃsā kāśakṛtsnī . tām adhīte kāśakṛtsnā brāhmaṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8373_0: aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . adhyetryām abhidheyāyām aṇaḥ īkāreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8373_1: bhavitavyam . yaḥ ca atra adhyetryām abhidheyāyām aṇ luptaḥ saḥ yaḥ ca śrūyate utpannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8373_2: tasmāt īkāraḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8374_0: iha tarhi aupagavī māṇavikā bhāryā asya aupagavībhāryaḥ jātilakṣaṇaḥ puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8374_1: na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . vṛddhinimittasya iti evam bhaviṣyati . yaḥ tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:8374_2: vṛddhinimittaḥ . glucukāyanī māṇavikā bhāryā asya glucukāyanībhāryaḥ . tasmāt striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8374_3: yuvatyāḥ yuvasañjñā eva paryudasitavyā . tasyām ca paryudastāyām gotrapratyayāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:8375: vartate . iha utpādayitari apatyayukte pratyayāntāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8376: paramaprakṛteḥ ca utpattiḥ vaktavyā . sarveṣu apatyayukteṣu pratyayāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8377: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8378: . sañjñākāribhyaḥ vā pratyayotpattiḥ . atha vā sañjñākāribhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8379_0: pratyayotpattiḥ vaktavyā . yadi sañjñākāribhyaḥ pratyayotpattiḥ ucyate katham gārgyāyaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8379_1: vātsyāyanaḥ iti . gotrāt yūni ca . gotrāt yūni iti etat vaktavyam . tat ca jātyādinivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8381: jātyādibhyaḥ utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti . jātiḥ na vartate . saṅkhyā na vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8382: . sarvanāma na vartate . jātiḥ na vartate . kākasya apatyam kurarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8383: apatyam iti . saṅkhyā na vartate . navānām apatyam daśānām apatyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8384_0: sarvanāma na vartate . sarveṣām apatyam viśveṣām apatyam iti . yat tāvat ucyate jātiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8384_1: na vartate . kākasya apatyam kurarasya apatyam iti . yena eva hetunā ekaḥ kākaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:8384_2: eva hetunā dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca kākaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8385: yat api ucyate saṅkhyā na vartate . navānām apatyam daśānām apatyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8386: saṅkhyeyam apekṣya saṅkhyā pravartate . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati iti asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8387: sarvanāma na vartate . sarveṣām apatyam viśveṣām apatyam iti . nirdeśyam apekṣya sarvanāma vartate . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8388_0: iti asāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate yena eva hetunā ekaḥ kākaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:8388_1: eva hetunā dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca kākaḥ bhaviṣyati iti . na etat vivadāmahe kākaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:8388_2: kākaḥ iti . kim tarhi . yena eva hetunā etat vākyam bhavati kākasya apatyam kurarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8388_3: apatyam iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . yad api ucyate saṅkhyeyam apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:8388_4: saṅkhyā pravartate . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam ca asamartham bhavati iti . bhavati vai
GS24pmbhasuu:8388_5: kasya cit arthāt prakaraṇāt vā apekṣyam nirjñātam . yadā nirjñātam tadā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8389: yad api ucyate nirdeśyam apekṣya sarvanāma vartate . tat sāpekṣam sāpekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_0: ca asamartham bhavati iti . bhavati vai kasya cit arthāt prakaraṇāt vā apekṣyam nirjñātam
GS24pmbhasuu:8390_1: . yadā nirjñātam tadā vṛttiḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi anabhidhānāt jātyādibhyaḥ utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8391_0: anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam . kriyamāṇe api hi sañjñākārigrahaṇe yatra jātyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8391_1: utpadyamānena pratyayena arthasya abhidhānam bhavati bhavati tatra utpattiḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8391_2: yathā . kutaḥ carati māyūriḥ kena kāpiñjaliḥ kṛśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8392: āheyena ca daṣṭasya pāñciḥ sutamasaḥ mataḥ . tādāyaniḥ , yādāyaniḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8393: kaimāyaniḥ iti . tat etat ananyārtham sañjñākārigrahaṇam vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8394: pratyayāntāt va pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8395: gotragrahaṇam na kariṣyate . ekaḥ apatye pratyayaḥ bhavati iti eva . yadi ca idānīm pratyayāntāt api pratyayaḥ syāt na ekaḥ apatye pratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8396: yadi gotragrahaṇam na kriyate katham gārgyāyaṇaḥ vātsyāyanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8397: vaktavyam eva etat gotrāt yūni astriyām iti . atha api gotragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8398: kriyate evam api na doṣaḥ . na ekagrahaṇena pratyayaḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8399: ekaḥ gotre pratyayaḥ bhavati iti . kim tarhi . prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:8400: ekā prakṛtiḥ gotre pratyayam utpādayati . yadi ca idānīm pratyayāntāt api pratyayaḥ syāt na ekā prakṛtiḥ gotre pratyayam utpādayet . atha vā asthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_0: ayam yatnaḥ kriyate . na hi idam lokāt bhidyate . loke sañkhyām pravartamānām upacaranti
GS24pmbhasuu:8401_1: ekaḥ iti vā prathamaḥ iti vā . yāvat brūyāt prathamaḥ apatye pratyayam utpādayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8402_0: (P_4,1.95) KA_II,252.2-10 Ro_III,590-591 iñaḥ vṛddhāvṛddhābhyām phiñphinau vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8402_1: . iñaḥ vṛddhāvṛddhābhyām phiñphinau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . iñaḥ avakāśaḥ dākṣiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8403: yādāyaniḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti tāpasāyaniḥ sāmmitikāyaniḥ . phinaḥ avakāśaḥ tvacāyaniḥ srucāyaniḥ . iñaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8404_0: glucukāyaniḥ mulucukāyaniḥ . phiñphinau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . iha kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8404_1: dākṣiḥ plākṣiḥ . bahulavacanāt . tadrājaḥ ca . tadrājaḥ ca iñaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8404_2: . tadrājasaya avakāśaḥ aikṣvakaḥ . iñaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti pāñcālaḥ vaidehaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8405: (P_4,1.96) KA_II,252.12-21 Ro_III,591-592 bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣām darśanam gotrabhāve laukike tataḥ anyatra teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_0: bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣām darśanam gotrabhāve laukike tataḥ anyatra teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_1: vaktavyaḥ . bāhoḥ apatyam bāhiḥ . yaḥ hi bāhuḥ nāma bāhavaḥ tasya bhavati . naḍasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8406_2: apatyam nāḍāyanaḥ . yaḥ hi naḍaḥ nāma nāḍiḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8408: sambandhiśabdapratyayānām ca tatsadṛśāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śvaśurasya apatyam śvaśuryaḥ . yaḥ hi śvaśuraḥ nāma śvāśuriḥ tasya bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8409: pratyayagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . sambandhiśabdānām tatsadṛśāt pratiṣedhaḥ iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . mātṛpitṛbhyām svasā . mātṛṣvasā . anyā mātṛsvasā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8411: sudhātṛvyāsayoḥ iti vaktavyam : saudhātakiḥ , vayāsakiḥ śukaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate . sudhātṛvyāsavaruḍaniṣādacaṇḍālabimbānām iti vaktavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8412: saudhātakiḥ , vaiyāsikaḥ śukaḥ , vāruḍakiḥ , naiṣādakiḥ , cāṇḍālakiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8413: baimbakiḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtyantarāṇi etāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:8415: svarārthaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ undāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8416_0: atha ñakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . ñakāraḥ vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:8416_1: kakāreṇa ubhayam siddham . avaśyam atra viśeṣaṇāṛthaḥ anyaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8416_2: . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . vrātacphañoḥ astriyām iti . phakaḥ iti hi ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8416_3: nāḍāyanaḥ atra api prasajyeta . atha api phañaḥ iti ucyate evam api āśvāyanaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8416_4: api prasajyeta . tasmāt cakāraḥ eva kartavyaḥ antodāttatvam api yathā syāt . cakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:8416_5: ca idānīm viśeṣaṇārthe kriyamāṇe avaśyam vṛddhyarthaḥ anyaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8417_0: eva kartavyaḥ sūtrabhedaḥ mā bhūt iti . atha kriyamāne api vai cakāre antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8417_1: na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . paratvāt ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . citkaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8418: ñitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . asti anyat ñitkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8419: prayojanam . kim . vṛddhyarthaḥ ñakāraḥ . citkaraṇe api tarhi anyat prayojanam asti . kim . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ cakāraḥ . śakyaḥ atra viśeṣaṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8420: anyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra cakārānurodhāt antodāttatvam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8421_0: vṛddhyarthaḥ api tarhi anyaḥ śakyaḥ anubandhaḥ āsaṅktum . tatra ñakārānurodhāt ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8421_1: prāpnoti . evam tarhi svare yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti . citaḥ . citaḥ antaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8421_2: udāttaḥ bhavati . tataḥ taddhitasya . taddhitasya ca citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8421_3: iti . kimartham idam . paratvāt ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8421_4: . tataḥ kitaḥ . kitaḥ taddhitasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8422: svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena yāvatā cphañantāt ñyaḥ vidhīyate . tatra ñniti iti ādyudāttatvena bhavitavyam . na etat asti . bahuṣu lope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_0: (P_4,1.98.2) KA_II,254.4-14 Ro_III,594-595 iha ke cit dvyekayoḥ phyañam vidadhati
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_1: bahuṣu ca phakam ke cit cphañantāt ñyam . kim atra nyāyyam . ñyavacanam eva nyāyyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8424_2: . dvyekayoḥ hi phyañi sati bahuṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8425_0: phaki krauñjāyanānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ kauñjāyanyaḥ kauñjāyanyau kena yaśabdaḥ śrūyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8425_1: . dvyekayoḥ iti ucyamānaḥ na prāpnoti . iha kauñjāyanasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8425_2: kauñjāyanāḥ kena ya śabdaḥ na śrūyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8426: dvyekayoḥ iti ucyamānaḥ prāpnoti . tat etat katham kṛtvā ñyavacanam jyāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8427: bhavati . yadi tat na asti . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8428: . āpatyāt jīvavañśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ saḥ ca astriyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_0: ekogotragrahaṇānarthakyam ca bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham iti . sati hi tasmin dvyekayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8429_1: api phyañi sati bahuṣu ca phaki na doṣaḥ bhavati . tatra kauñjāyanānām apatyam māṇavakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8430: bhaviṣyati . kauñjāyanyaḥ kauñjāyanyau . kauñjāyanasya apatyam bahavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8431: māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya kuñjaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . kauñjāyanāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_0: tatra idam sidhyati kauśikaḥ viśvāmitraḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . viśvāmitraḥ tapaḥ tepe
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_1: na anṛṣhiḥ syām iti . tatrabhavān ṛṣiḥ sampannaḥ . saḥ punaḥ tapaḥ tepe na anṛṣheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_2: putraḥ syām iti . tatrabhavān gādhiḥ api ṛṣiḥ sampannaḥ . saḥ punaḥ tapaḥ tepe na
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_3: anṛṣheḥ pautraḥ syām iti . tatrabhavān kuśikaḥ api ṛṣiḥ sampannaḥ . tat etat ṛṣyānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_4: bhavati . tatra anṛṣyānantarye iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8433_5: vijñāyate ṛṣyānantarye na bhavati iti . katham tarhi . ṛṣau anantare na
GS24pmbhasuu:8434: iti . yadi evam . anṛṣyānantaryavacanam anarthakam sañjñāgotrādhikārāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8436_0: sañjñāgotre iti vartate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat anantere syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8436_1: pratiṣedhena . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat anṛṣyānantarye iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8437: anṛṣayaḥ paṭhante teṣām anantare api vṛttiḥ bhavati . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:8438: prayojanam . nānāndraḥ pautraḥ dauhitraḥ iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8439_0: (P_4,1.108) KA_II,255.2-4 Ro_III,596-597 kimartham idam ucyate na gargādibhyaḥ yañ
GS24pmbhasuu:8439_1: iti eva siddham . luk striyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . yadi punaḥ tatra eva ucyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:8441_0: vidhīyate na yathāvihitam eva ucyeta . śivādibhyaḥ yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8441_1: iñ prasajyeta . iñ ato yathāvihitaḥ . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . punarvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8441_2: idānīm kimartham syāt . ye tasya bādhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8442: tadbādhanārtham . saḥ vai na asti yaḥ tam bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt yaḥ vihitaḥ na ca prāpnoti saḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ ca asau
GS24pmbhasuu:8443: . aṇ eva . uttarārtham tarhi : avṛddhābhyaḥ nadīmānuṣībhyaḥ tannāmikābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8444: iti . atra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne ḍhak prasjyeta . ḍhak ataḥ yathāvihitaḥ . punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . ye tasya bādhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8445: tadbādhanārtham . saḥ vai na asti yaḥ tam bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt yaḥ vihitaḥ na ca prāpnoti saḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ ca asau
GS24pmbhasuu:8446: . aṇ eva . uttarārtham eva tarhi : ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurubhyaḥ ca iti . atra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne iñ prasjyeta . iñ ataḥ yathāvihitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8447: punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8448: saḥ vai na asti yaḥ tam bādheta . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt yaḥ vihitaḥ na ca prāpnoti saḥ bhaviṣyati . kaḥ ca asau . aṇ eva . uttarārtham eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8449: : mātuḥ ut saṅkhyāsambhadrapūrvāyāḥ , kanyāyāḥ kanīna ca iti . atra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne ḍhak prasjyeta . ḍhak ataḥ yathāvihitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8450: punarvacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . mātuḥ ukāram vakṣyāmi kanyāyāḥ kanīnabhāvam iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam brūyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_0: strībhyaḥ ḍhak , mātuḥ ukāraḥ , kanyāyāḥ ca kanīnabhāvaḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_1: : ayam ṛṣṭiṣeṇaśabdaḥ śivādiṣu paṭhyate . tatra yathāvihitam iti iyati ucyamāne iñ
GS24pmbhasuu:8451_2: prasajyeta . tam paratvāt senāntāt ṇyaḥ bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8452: tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt iñ prasajyeta . punaraṇgrahaṇāt aṇ eva bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8453_1: . ṛṣistryaṇaḥ ḍhagḍhrakau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ṛṣyaṇaḥ avakāśaḥ : vāsiṣṭhaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8453_2: vaiśvāmitraḥ . ḍhakaḥ avakāśaḥ : duli dauleyaḥ, bali bāleyaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8454: makandikā mākandikaḥ . ḍhrakaḥ avakāśaḥ : kāṇikeraḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8456: dvyacaḥ ḍhakaḥ ḍhragḍhañau . dvyacaḥ ḍhak bhavati iti etasmāt ḍhragḍhañau
GS24pmbhasuu:8457: bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . dvyacaḥ ḍhak bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:8458: dātteyaḥ , gaupteyaḥ . ḍhrakaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : naṭī nāṭeraḥ , dāsī dāseraḥ . ḍhañaḥ avakāśaḥ : kāmaṇḍaleyaḥ , bhādrabāheyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8459: ḍhakaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : jambū jāmbeyaḥ . ḍhragḍhañau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . na vā ṛṣyaṇaḥ punarvacanam anyanivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8460: na vā eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam ṛṣyaṇaḥ ḍhakaḥ ca . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8461: ṛṣyaṇaḥ punarvacanam anyanivṛttyartham . siddhaḥ atra aṇ utsargeṇa eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:8462: tasya punarvacane etat prayojanam ye anye tadapavādāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . saḥ yathā eva tadapavādam iñam bādhate evam ḍhakam api
GS24pmbhasuu:8463_0: bādheta . tasmāt ṛṣibhyaḥ aṇvidhāne atryādipratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt ṛṣibhyaḥ aṇvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8463_1: atryādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante
GS24pmbhasuu:8463_2: iti evam ayam ṛṣyaṇ iñam bādhiṣyate ḍhakam na bādhiṣyate . ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8464: ca. kim kāraṇam . ḍhakaḥ punarvacanam anyanivṛttyartham . siddhaḥ atra ḍhak strībhyaḥ ḍhak iti eva . tasya punarvacane etat prayojanam ye anye
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_0: tadapavādāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . saḥ yathā eva tadapavādam tannāmikāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8465_1: bādhate evam ḍhagḍhrañau api bādheta . tasmāt tannāmikāṇi advyacaḥ . tasmāt tannāmikāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_0: madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam ḍhak tannāmikāṇam tadapavādam
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_1: bādhiṣyate ḍhragḍhañau na bādhiṣyate . ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurvaṇaḥ senāntāt ṇyaḥ . ṛṣyandhakavṛṣṇikurvaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_2: senāntāt ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ṛṣyaṇaḥ avakāśaḥ : vāsiṣṭhaḥ, vaiśvāmitraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_3: . ṇyasya avakāśaḥ : pāṛiṣeṇyaḥ, vāriṣeṇyaḥ . jātasenaḥ nām ṛṣiḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8466_4: . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . andhakāṇaḥ avakāśaḥ : śvāphalkaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:8467_0: śvaitrakaḥ . ṇyasya saḥ eva . ugrasenaḥ nāma andhakaḥ . tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8467_1: ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena : augrasenyaḥ . vṛṣṇyaṇaḥ avakāśaḥ : vāsudevaḥ , bāladevaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8467_2: . ṇyasya saḥ eva . vṣvaksenaḥ nāma vṛṣṇiḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8467_3: vipratiṣedhena : vaiṣvaksenyaḥ . kurvaṇaḥ avakāśaḥ : nākulaḥ , sāhadevaḥ . ṇyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8468: tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena : bhaimasenyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8469: senāntāt ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena jātograviṣvagbhīmebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8471: kriyate na saṅkhyāsambhadrapūrvasya iti eva ucyeta . strīliṅgaḥ yaḥ mātṛśabdaḥ tasmāt yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : sammimīte sammātā, sammātuḥ apatyam sāmmātraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8473: kaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . apatyam iti vartate . yadi ca kanyā na apatyam atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8474_0: apatyam na kanyā . kanyā ca apatyam ca iti vipratiṣiddham . na etat vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8474_1: . katham . kanyāśabdaḥ ayam puṃsā abhisambandhapūrvake samprayoge nivartate . yā
GS24pmbhasuu:8474_2: ca idānīm prāk abhisambandhāt puṃsā saha samprayogam gacchati tasyām kanyāśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8474_3: vartate eva . kanyāyāḥ kanyoktāyāḥ kanyābhimatāyāḥ sudarśanāyāḥ yat apatyam saḥ kānīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8476: strīgrahaṇeṣu vicāryate . strīpratyayagrahaṇam vā syāt strīśabdagrahaṇam vā stryarthagrahaṇam vā . kim ca ataḥ . yadi śabdagrahaṇam arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8477: vā iḍaviḍ aiḍadviḍ pṛth pārthaḥ uśij āuśijaḥ śarat śāradasaḥ atra api prāpnoti . atha pratyayagrahaṇam laikhābhreyaḥ vaimātreyaḥ iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8478: . astu pratyayagrahaṇam . katham laikhābhreyaḥ vaimātreyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8479: śubhrādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . vaḍavāyāḥ vṛṣe vācye . vaḍavāyāḥ vṛṣe vācye
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_0: caṭakāyāḥ pulṃliṅgena nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . iha api yathā syāt . caṭakasya apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8482_1: cāṭakairaḥ . yadi pulṃlingnirdeśaḥ kriyate caṭakāyā apatyam cāṭakairaḥ iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8483: grahaṇam bhavati iti evam bhaviṣyati . striyām apatye luk . striyām apatye luk vaktavyaḥ . caṭakāyāḥ apatyam strī caṭakā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8485: siddhatvāt . āragvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . rakā siddhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8486: godhā ākārāntā rak ca pratyayaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ārakam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyebhyaḥ api ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:8487: prayojanam . mauṇḍāraḥ jāṇḍāraḥ pāṇḍāraḥ iti etat siddham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8488: (P_4,1.131) KA_II,259.8 Ro_III,604 kṣudrābhyaḥ iti ucyate . kā kṣudrā nāma . aniyatapuṃskā aṅgahīnā vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8489: (P_4,1.133) KA_II,259.10-11 Ro_III,605 kena vihite pitṛṣvasuḥ ḍhaki lopaḥ iti ucyate . etat eva jñāpayati bhavati pitṛṣvasuḥ ḍhak iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8491: (P_4,1.134)) KA_II,259.13-15 Ro_III,605 ḍhaki lopaḥ iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati mātṛṣvasrīyaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . evam vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8492: pitṛṣvasuḥ chaṇ ḍhaki lopaḥ . tataḥ mātṛṣvasuḥ ca . pitṛṣvasuḥ yat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8493: tat mātṛṣvasuḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ tat . chaṇ ḍhaki lopaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8495: rājñaḥ apatye jātigrahaṇam kartavyam . rājanyaḥ nāma jātiḥ . kva mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8497: (P_4,1.145) KA_II,260.2-6 Ro_III,606 vyanvacanam anarthakam pratyayārthābhāvāt . vyanvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8498: pratyayārthābhāvāt . kim idam pratyayārthābhāvāt iti . apatyārthābhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8499: apatyam iti vartate anapatye ca api sapatne bhrātṛvyaśabdaḥ vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8500: pāpmanā bhrātṛvyeṇa iti . astu tāvat apatyam sapatnaḥ ca tatra bhrātṛvyaḥ iti . katham pāpmanā bhrātṛvyeṇa iti . upamānāt siddham . bhrātṛvyaḥ iva bhrātṛvyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8502_0: vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . gotrastriyāḥ pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8502_1: ṇitkaraṇānarthakyam vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . gotrastriyāḥ pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8502_2: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . vṛddham eva etat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8503: kartavyaḥ . yat lugantam avṛddham tatra vṛddhiḥ yathāt syāt . vātaṇḍaḥ jālmaḥ . lugartham iti cet na lukpratiṣedhāt . lugartham iti cet tat na .
GS24pmbhasuu:8504: kim kāraṇam . lukpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra luk gotre aluk aci iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_0: vyavahitatvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . īkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_1: apratiṣedhaḥ iti cet na puṃvadbhāvāt . vyavahitatvāt apratiṣedhaḥ iti cet tat na
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_2: . kim kāraṇam . puṃvadbhāvāt . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhavati bhasya taddhite aḍhe puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_3: bhavati iti . phinartham tu . phinartham tu ṇakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . yat phinantam avṛddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8505_4: tatra vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . glaucukāyanaḥ jālmaḥ . puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8506: puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham ca ṇakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . gārgā bhāryā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8507: gārgābhāryaḥ . vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8508: gotrāt yūni astriyām iti vacanāt aprayojanam . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti vacanāt aprayojanam etat bhavati . na asti gārgā . avaṃśyatvāt vā striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_0: prayojanam . avaṃśyatvāt vā striyāḥ prayojanam etat bhavati . na strī vaṃśyā . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8509_1: gārgā strī . aparaḥ āha : dvau eva vaṃśau mātṛvaṃśaḥ pitṛvaṃśaḥ ca . yāvatā mātṛvaṃśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8510_0: (P_4,1.148) KA_II,261.8-10 Ro_III,609 gotrastriyāḥ vṛddhāt ṭhak pheḥ cha ca phāṇṭāhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:8510_1: ime catvāraḥ yogāḥ . tatra trayaḥ kutsane trtayaḥ sauvīragotre . ādyaḥ yogaḥ kutsane
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_0: vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . phāṇṭāhṛtaḥ . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_1: ṇitkaraṇānarthakyam vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . phāṇṭāhṛteḥ pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8512_2: anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vṛddhatvāt prātipadikasya . vṛddham eva etat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8514_0: kartavyaḥ . phāṇṭāhṛtā bhāryā asya phāṇṭāhṛtabhāryaḥ . vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8514_1: yathā syāt iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti vacanāt aprayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8515_0: (P_4,1.151) KA_II,262.2-11 Ro_III,610-611 vāmarathasya kaṇvādivat svaravarjam . vāmarathasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8515_1: kaṇvādivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . svaram varjayitvā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8515_2: prayojanam . vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8516: ucyate pratyayāśrayam anatidiṣṭam bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . vāmarathāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_0: bahuṣu lopaḥ na prāpnoti . vāmarathānām saṅghaḥ . saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_1: iti aṇ na prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ yañvat iti ucyeta . evam api prakṛtyāśritam anatidiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_2: bhavati . tatro kaḥ doṣaḥ . vāmarathyasya chātrāḥ vāmarathāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_3: iti aṇ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi kaṇvādivat iti eva . katham vāmarathāḥ vāmarathānām
GS24pmbhasuu:8517_4: saṅghaḥ iti . yat ayam svaravarjam iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pratyayāśritam api
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_0: aṇvacanam . udīcām añvidhau takṣṇaḥ aṇ vaktavyaḥ . tākṣṇaḥ . yadi punaḥ ayam takṣanśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_1: śivādiṣu paṭhyeta . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyavidhiḥ . śivādiḥ iti cet ṇyaḥ vidheyaḥ . tākṣṇyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8520_2: iti . siddham tu udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8521: siddham etat . katham . udīcām vā ṇyavacanāt . udīcām vā ṇyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . ṇyena mukte yaḥ yataḥ prāpnoti saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8522: (P_4,1.155) KA_II,262.22-263.15 Ro_III,612-613 kim idam kausalyakārmāryayoḥ vikṛtayoḥ grahaṇam kriyate . evam vikṛtābhyām yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_0: syāt . atyalpam idam ucyate : kausalyakārmāryābhyām ca iti . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_1: yuṭ ca . phiñprakaraṇe dagukosalakarmāracchāgavṛṣaṇām yuṭ ca iti vaktavyam . dagu
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_2: dāgavyāyaniḥ kosala kausalyāyaniḥ karmāra karmāryāyaṇiḥ chāga chāgyāyaniḥ vṛṣa vārṣyāyaṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8523_3: . yadi yuṭ kriyate yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8524: idam iha sampradhāryam . yuṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8525: paratvāt ādeśaḥ . nityaḥ yuṭ . kṛte api ādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8526: . yuṭ api anityaḥ . anyasya kṛte ādeśe prāpnoti anyasya akṛte .
GS24pmbhasuu:8527: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi yuṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8528: kā antaraṅgatā . utpattisanniyogena yuṭ ucyate . utpanne pratyaye prakṛtipratyayau āśritya aṅgasya ādeśaḥ ucyate . ādeśaḥ api antaraṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8529: katham . vakṣyati etat āyanādiṣu upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_0: anavakāśaḥ tarhi yuṭ . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate dāgavyāyaniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_1: oḥ guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ eva . nanu ca uktam yuṭi kṛte anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8530_2: ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8531_0: siddham tu ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . ādiṣṭasya yuḍvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8531_1: yuṭ ca ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8531_2: kariṣyate . yuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:8532: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_0: (P_4,1.158) KA_II,263.17-264.10 Ro_III,613-614 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_1: . kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ ādeśaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_2: . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . kuṭi sati anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_3: kariṣyate . pūrvānte nalopavacanam . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate nalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cārmikāyaṇiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_4: vārmikāyaṇiḥ . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ na prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_5: sati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ sidhyati . astu tarhi parādiḥ eva . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:8533_6: ca uktam kuṭi sati anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8534: siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kuṭ ca ādiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8535: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_0: prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_1: ca uktam pūrvānte nalopavacanam iti . kriyate etat nyāse eva carmivarmiṇoḥ nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8536_2: ca iti . kāribhyaḥ iñaḥ agotrāt phiñ vipratiṣedhena . kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8537: kāribhyaḥ iñ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ āyaskāriḥ lauhakāriḥ . phiñaḥ avakāśaḥ tāpasāyaniḥ sāmmitikāyaniḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nāpitāyaniḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8539: (P_4,1.161) KA_II,264.12-21 Ro_III,614-615 yadi ṣuk pūrvāntaḥ kriyate mānuṣāḥ bahuṣu lopaḥ prāpnoti . mānuṣāṇām saṅghaḥ saṅghāṅkalakṣaṇeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8540: añyañiñām it aṇ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . yadi parādiḥ mānuṣī
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_0: añantāt īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi pūrvāntaḥ eva . katham mānuṣāḥ mānuṣāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_1: saṅghaḥ iti . ubhayatra laukikasya gotrasya grahaṇam na ca etat laukikam gotram .
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_2: iha tarhi mānuṣyakam iti halaḥ taddhitasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . parādau api eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8541_3: doṣaḥ . yat hi halaḥ taddhitasya iti halgrahaṇam na tat aṅgaviśeṣaṇam śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:8542: vṛkāt ṭeṇyaṇ vārkeṇī iti . tasmāt ubhābhyām eva vaktavyam prakṛtyā ake
GS24pmbhasuu:8544: (P_4,1.162) KA_II,264.23-265.8 Ro_III,616-617 pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyam tasya pautraprabhṛtisañjñākaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8545_0: pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñāyām yasya apatyavivakṣā tasya pautraprabhṛteḥ gotrasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8545_1: bhavati iti vaktavyam . gargaḥ api hi kam cit prati pautraḥ kuśikaḥ api . tatra mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8545_2: bhūt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_0: samarthānām prathamāt vā iti vartate . samarthānām prathamasya yat apatyam pautraprabhṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_1: iti vijñāyate . jīvadvaṃśyam ca kutsitam . jīvadvaṃśyam ca kutsitam gotrasañjñam
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_2: bhavati iti vaktavyam . gārgyaḥ tvam jālma. vātsyaḥ tvam jālma . kā punaḥ iha kutsā
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_3: . pitṛtaḥ loke vyapadeśavatā asvatantreṇa bhavitavyam . yaḥ idānīm pitṛmān svatantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8546_4: bhavati saḥ ucyate gārgyaḥ tvam asi jālma . na tvam pitṛtaḥ vyapadeśam arhasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_0: (P_4,1.163) KA_II,265.10-266.15 Ro_III,617-619 jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_1: ca . jīvati tu vaṃśye yuvā iti pautraprabhṛtyapekṣam ca iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8547_2: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pautraprabhṛti iti vartate . evam tarhi anvācaṣṭe
GS24pmbhasuu:8548_0: pautraprabhṛti iti vartate iti . kim etasya anvākhyāne prayojanam . tat ca daivadattyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8548_1: . devadattasya apatyam devadattiḥ iti . anantaram yat apatyam tasya yuvasañjñā mā
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_0: yuvasañjñā prāpnoti . etat api pautraprabhṛti bhavati . na pautraprabhṛti iti anena
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_1: apatyam abhisambadhyate : pautraprabhṛti yat apatyam iti . kim tarhi . vaṃśye abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8549_2: : pautraprabhṛtivaṃśye jīvati yat apatyam iti . evam api devadattasya dvau putra
GS24pmbhasuu:8550_0: bhrātari ca jyāyasi iti . evam tarhi apatyam eva abhisambadhyate na tu pautraprabhṛtisamānādhikaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8550_1: apatyam . na evam vijñāyate pautraprabhṛti yat apatyam iti . katham tarhi . pautraprabhṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8551: vṛddhasya ca pūjāyām . vṛddhasya ca pūjāyām yuvasañjñā vaktavyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8552: tatrabhavantaḥ gārgyāyaṇāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ vātsyāyanāḥ . kā punaḥ iha pūjā
GS24pmbhasuu:8553: . yuvatvam loke īpsitam pūjā iti upacaryate . tatrabhavantaḥ yuvatvena upacaryamāṇāḥ prītāḥ bhavanti . āpatyaḥ vā gotram . atha vā āpatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8554: gotrasañjñaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_0: paramaprakṛteḥ ca āpatyaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_1: yuvasañjñaḥ . āpatyāt jīvadvaṃśyāt svārthe dvitīyaḥ pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ yuvasañjñaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8555_2: ca bhavati iti vaktavyam . saḥ ca astriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8556: . saḥ ca astriyām iti vaktavyam . ekogotragrahaṇānarthakyam ca . evam ca kṛtvā ekogotragrahaṇam anarthakam bhavati . bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8557: bahuvacanalopiṣu ca siddham bhavati . tatra bidāṇām apatyam māṇavakaḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt dvyekayoḥ utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . baidaḥ baidau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8558: baidasya apatyam bahavaḥ māṇavakāḥ iti vigṛhya bidaśabdāt bahuṣu utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . bidāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8560_0: bhrātari iti vartate . sapiṇḍamātre yathā syāt . atha sthavirataragrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8560_1: . ubhayataḥ viśiṣṭe yathā syāt sthānataḥ vayastaḥ ca . atha jīvati iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8560_2: punaḥ jīvatigrahaṇam kimartham . jīvataḥ jīvati yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8561: syāt mṛte mā bhūt . mṛte hi mārgyaḥ mṛtaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8562_0: (P_4,1.165.2) KA_II,266.21-268.18 Ro_III,621-625 atha gotrayūnayoḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8562_1: utāho na . kim ca prāpnoti . bāḍham prāpnoti . na hi ayam ekasañjñādhikāraḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8562_2: ca ataḥ . gotrayoḥ samāveśe kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8563: tatkṛtam bhavet . gotrayoḥ samāveśe kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatkṛtam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8564: gotrāśrayāḥ vidhayaḥ yūni api prāpnuvanti . yāskāyanayaḥ lāhyāyanayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8565: yaskādibhyaḥ gotre iti luk prāpnoti . yaskādiṣu na doṣaḥ asti na yūni iti anuvartanāt . yaskādiṣu na doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . na yūni iti anuvartanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8566_0: na yūni iti tatra anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . na taulvalibhyaḥ iti . doṣaḥ atribidapañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8566_1: na yūni iti anuvartanāt . yadi na yūni iti anuvartate atrayaḥ bidāḥ pañcālāḥ māṇavakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8566_2: iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8567: sambandham anuvartiṣyate . na taulvalibhyaḥ . tadrājasya bahuṣu tena eva astriyām luk bhavati taulvalibhyaḥ yūni na . yaskādibhyaḥ gotre luk
GS24pmbhasuu:8568: bhavati yūni na . taulvalibhyaḥ iti nivṛttam . yañañoḥ ca atribhṛgukutsavasiṣṭhagotamāṅgirobhyaḥ ca luk bhavati . yūni na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8569: nivṛttam . iha tarhi kāṇvyayanasya chātrāḥ kāṇvyāyanīyāḥ . kaṇvādibhyaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . kaṇvādiṣu na doṣaḥ asti na yūni asti tataḥ param .
GS24pmbhasuu:8570: kaṇvādiṣu doṣaḥ na asti . kim kāraṇam . na yūni asti tataḥ param .
GS24pmbhasuu:8571: kaṇvādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ tadantāt prātipadikāt iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_0: kaṇvādibhyaḥ vihitaḥ na tadantam prātipadikam yadantam ca prātipadikam na asau kaṇvādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8572_1: . iha tarhi aupagavasya apatyam aupagaviḥ iti ekaḥ gotre iti etasmāt niyamāt pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8573_0: pratipadam atra pratyayāḥ vidhīyante gotrāt yūni astriyām iti . tadantāt tarhi anekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8573_1: pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . gotrāt yūni ca tat smaret . gotrāt yūni astriyām iti tat smaret
GS24pmbhasuu:8573_2: . kim . ekaḥ iti eva . gotre tarhi aluk uktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8574: saḥ yūni api prāpnoti . astu . punaḥ yūni luk bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8575: . phakphiñoḥ doṣaḥ syāt . śālaṅkeḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śālaṅkāḥ pailasya pailāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_0: . phakphiñoḥ anyatarasyām iti anyatarasyām śravaṇam prasajyeta . tasmāt yuvasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_1: gotrasañjñāyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tuḥ niyāmakaḥ . tuḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8576_2: . saḥ niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati : jīvati tu vaṃśye
GS24pmbhasuu:8577: apatyam yuvasañjñam eva bhavati iti . yadi tarhi yuvasañjñāyām gotrasañjñā na bhavati ye iṣyante yūni gotrāśrayāḥ vidhayaḥ te na sidhyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8578: gārgyāyaṇānām samūhaḥ gārgyāyaṇakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit gārgyāyaṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ . gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8579_0: evam tarhi rājanyāt vuñ manuṣyāt ca jñāpakam laukikam param . yat ayam vuñvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8579_1: rājanyamanuṣyayoḥ grahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ laukikam param gotragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8579_2: iti . yuvā ca loke gotram iti ucyate . kimgotraḥ asi māṇavaka . gārgyāyaṇaḥ . kimgotraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8579_3: asi māṇavaka . vātsyāyanaḥ . yadi etat jñāpyate aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8580: sāmūhikeṣu jñāpakam . yadi sāmūhikeṣu jñāpakam gārgyāyaṇānām kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_0: gārgyāyaṇakam gārgyāyaṇaḥ bhaktiḥ asya gārgyāyaṇakaḥ gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_1: . vuñvidhau jñāpakam . vuñvidhau etat jñāpakam . yadi vuñvidhau jñāpakam śālaṅkeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8581_2: yūnaḥ chātrāḥ śālaṅkāḥ iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8582: astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham aupagaveḥ yūnaḥ chātrāḥ aupagavīyāḥ . iñaḥ gotre iti aṇ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . gotreṇa iñam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8584_1: . kṣatriyāt ekarājāt iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . saṅghapratiṣedhārtham . saṅghāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8585_0: apatyam iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na hi antareṇa bahuṣu lukam pañcālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8585_1: iti etat bhavati . yaḥ tasmāt utpadyate yuvapratyayaḥ saḥ syāt . yuvapratyayaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:8585_2: tasya luk tasmin ca aluk bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi kṣaudrakāṇām apatyam mālavānām apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8585_3: iti . atra api kṣaudrakyaḥ mālakyaḥ iti na etat teṣām dāse vā bhavati karmakare vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8585_4: . kim tarhi teṣām eva kasmin cit . yāvatā teṣām eva kasmin cit tasmāt utpadyate yuvapratyayaḥ
