GS24pmbhasuu:8585_5: saḥ syāt . yuvapratyayaḥ cet tasya luk tasmin ca aluk bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8587: . iha mā bhūt . videhaḥ nāma brāhmaṇaḥ tasya apatyam vaidehiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8588: kṣatriyagrahaṇānarthakye ca uktam . kim uktam . ekam tāvat uktam :
GS24pmbhasuu:8589: bāhvādiprabhṛtiṣu yeṣām darśanam gotrabhāve laukike tataḥ anyatra teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ iti . aparam uktam : anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_0: (P_4,1.168.3) KA_II,269.9-13 Ro_III,626 kṣatriyasamānaśabdāt janapadāt tasya rājani
GS24pmbhasuu:8590_1: apatyavat . kṣatriyasamānaśabdāt janapadāt tasya rājani apatyavat pratyayāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8591: pūroḥ aṇ vaktavyaḥ . pauravaḥ . pāṇḍoḥ ḍyaṇ vaktavyaḥ . pāṇḍyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8593: . aṇaḥ ṇyaṅ ṇya iñ iti ete bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . aṇaḥ avakāśaḥ āṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8594: vāṅgaḥ . ñyaṅaḥ avakāśaḥ āmbaṣṭhyaḥ sauvīryaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8595_0: dārvyaḥ . ṇyasya avakāśaḥ nicakaḥ naicakyaḥ . aṇaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8595_1: . nīpaḥ naipyaḥ . iñaḥ avakāśaḥ ājamīḍhiḥ ājakrandiḥ . aṇaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8595_2: prāpnoti . budhaḥ baudhiḥ . ṇyaṅṇyeñaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . ñyaṅaḥ kurunādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8596: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ñyaṅaḥ avakāśaḥ āvantyaḥ kauntyaḥ . ṇyasya saḥ eva. naiśaḥ nāma janapadaḥ . tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . ṇyaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . naiśyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8597: (P_4,1.175) KA_II,270.2-4 Ro_III,627 kambojādibhyaḥ lugvacanam coḍādyartham . kambojādibhyaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8599: (P_4,1.177.1) KA_II,270.6-10 Ro_III,627-628 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8600_0: āmbaṣṭhyā sauvīryā . ataḥ iti ucyate . na ca eṣaḥ akāraḥ . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8600_1: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati ataḥ iti tadantāgrahaṇam avantyādibhyaḥ lugvacanāt . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8600_2: iti tadantasya agrahaṇam . kim kāraṇam . avantyādibhyaḥ lugvacanāt . yat ayam avantyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8600_3: lukam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:8603: parśūḥ rakṣāḥ asurī . yaudheyādipratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ pārśvādilukaḥ . yat ayam na prācyabhargādiyaudheyādibhyaḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8605: (P_4,2.1) KA_II,271.2-5 Ro_III,629 rāgāt iti kim . devadattena raktam vastram . raktādīnām arthābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt upādhyānarthakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8606: raktādīnām arthābhidhāne pratyayavidhānāt upādhigrahaṇam anarthakam . na hi arāgāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthasya abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utpattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8607_1: . ṭhakprakaraṇe śakalakardamābhyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śākalikam kārdamikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8607_2: . nīlyāḥ an . nīlyāḥ an vaktavyaḥ . nīlyā raktam nīlam . pītāt kan .pītāt kan vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8607_3: . pītena raktam pītakam . pītakaśabdaḥ vā prakṛtyantaram . tasmāt luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_0: haridrāmahārajanābhyām añ . haridrāmahārajanābhyām añ vaktavyaḥ . hāridram māhārajanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8608_1: . rāgāt iti ucyate . tatra idam na sidhyati . hāridrau kukkuṭasya pādau . kāṣāyau
GS24pmbhasuu:8609: haridrau iva haridrau . kāṣāyau iva kāṣāyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8611: yogaḥ him nāma bhavati yayoḥ sannikarṣaviprakarṣau staḥ . na ca kālanakṣatrayoḥ sannikarṣaviprakarṣau staḥ . nitye hi kālanakṣatre .
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_0: katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . nakṣatreṇa candramasaḥ yogāt tadyuktāt kāle pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_1: . nakṣatreṇa candramasaḥ yogāt tadyuktāt kāle pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . puṣyeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_2: yuktaḥ puṣyayuktaḥ , puṣyayuktaḥ candramāḥ asmin kāle : pauṣam ahaḥ , pauṣī rātriḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8612_3: . tatra uttarapadalopaḥ . tatra uttarapadalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . puṣyayuktaśabdāt hi pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8613: vidhīyate . liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ ca . liṅgavacanayoḥ ca anupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_0: candramasaḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat yuktavadbhāvena prāpnoti . kālayogāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_1: . astu nakṣtreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ iti eva . nan ca uktam ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . yogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8614_2: him nāma bhavati yayoḥ sannikarṣaviprakarṣau staḥ na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8615: kālanakṣatrayoḥ sannikarṣaviprakarṣau staḥ . nitye hi kālanakṣatre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8616_0: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . puṣyasamīpagate candramasi puṣyaśabdaḥ vartate . tena tatsañjñakena
GS24pmbhasuu:8616_1: kālaḥ viśeṣyate . tathā ca sampratyayaḥ . evam ca kṛtvā loke sampratyayaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8616_2: . puṣyasamīpagate candramasi vaktāraḥ bhavanti puṣyeṇa adya . maghābhiḥ adya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8617_0: (P_4,2.4) KA_II,272.19-273.2 Ro_III,632 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pauṣī rātriḥ pauṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:8617_1: ahaḥ . aviśeṣe iti ucyate . viśeṣaḥ ca atra gamyate . rātriḥ iti ukte ahaḥ na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8617_2: gamyate . ahaḥ iti ukte rātriḥ na iti gamyate . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . adya
GS24pmbhasuu:8617_3: puṣyaḥ iti . atra api hi viśeṣaḥ gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8618: adya iti ukte na hyaḥ na śvaḥ iti . yadi api atra viśeṣaḥ gamyate aviśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8619: api gamyate . adya iti ukte na jñāyate rātrau vā divā vā iti . yataḥ aviśeṣaḥ tadāśrayaḥ lup bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi yadi api viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8620: gamyate aviśeṣaḥ api tu gamyate . rātriḥ iti ukte na jñāyate kadā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8621_0: yataḥ aviśeṣaḥ tadāśrayaḥ lup prāpnoti . evam tarhi nakṣatreṇa yuktaḥ kālaḥ iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8621_1: . nakṣatreṇa yuktasya kālasya aviśeṣe . kaḥ punaḥ kālaḥ nakṣatreṇa yujyate . ahorātraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8621_2: (P_4,2.5) KA_II,273.4-5 Ro_III,632-633 iha kasmāt na yuktavadbhāvaḥ bhavati . śravaṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:8621_3: rātriḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8623: (P_4,2.7) KA_II,273.7-23 Ro_III,633-634 dṛṣṭam sāma kaleḥ ḍhak .
GS24pmbhasuu:8624_0: dṛṣṭam sāma iti atra kaleḥ ḍhak vaktavyaḥ . kalinā dṛṣṭam sāma kāleyam sāma gīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8624_1: . aparaḥ āha : sarvatra agnikalibhyām ḍhak . sarvatra agnikalibhyām ḍhak vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8624_2: . agninā dṛṣṭam sāma āgneyam . agnau bhavam āgneyam . agneḥ āgatam āgneyam . agneḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8625_0: āgneyam . kalinā dṛṣṭam sāma kāleyam . kaleḥ āgatam kāleyam . kalau bhavam kāleyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8625_1: . kaleḥ svam kāleyam . kaliḥ devatā asya kāleyaḥ caruḥ . dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:8625_2: aṇ ḍit dviḥ vā vidhīyate . dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca api aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:8626: ḍit dviḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . uśanasā dṛṣṭam sāma auśanasam auśanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8627_0: śatabhiṣaji jātaḥ śātabhiṣajaḥ śātabhiṣaḥ . tīyāt īkak . tīyāt īkak vaktavyaḥ . dvaitīyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8627_1: tārtīyikaḥ . na vidyāyāḥ . vidyāyāḥ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . dvitīyā vidyā tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8627_2: vidyā iti eva . gotrāt aṅkavat iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8628: aupagavakam . dṛṣṭe sāmani jāte ca api aṇ ḍit dviḥ vā vidhīyate . tīyāt īkak na vidyāyāḥ gotrāt aṅkavat iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8629: (P_4,2.9) KA_II,274.2-8 Ro_III,634 kimarthaḥ ḍakāraḥ . ḍiti iti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8630: yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . yasyetilopena api etat siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8631: evam tarhi siddhe sati yat yayatau ḍitau karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavataḥ ete paribhāṣe . ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8632_0: tadanubandhakagrahaṇe na atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8632_1: . avāmadevyam iti etat siddham bhavati . siddhe yasyetilopena kimartham yayatau ḍitau
GS24pmbhasuu:8632_2: . grahaṇam mā atadarthe bhūt vāmadevasya nañsvare .
GS24pmbhasuu:8634: tadekāntagrahaṇam . parivṛtaḥ rathaḥ iti atra tadekāntagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_0: . yena parivṛtaḥ rathaḥ rathaikāntaḥ cet saḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_1: : putraiḥ parivṛtaḥ rathaḥ . chātraiḥ parivṛtaḥ rathaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8635_2: . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati : putraiḥ parivṛtaḥ rathaḥ , chātraiḥ parivṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8636: (P_4,2.11) KA_II,274.16-17 Ro_III,635 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:8637: katham pāṇḍukambalī pāṇḍukambalinau pāṇḍukambalinaḥ iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena siddham . pāṇḍukambalaḥ asya asti iti pāṇḍukambalī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8638_0: (P_4,2.13) KA_II,274.19-275.5 Ro_III,635-636 kaumārāpūrvavacane iti ubhayataḥ striyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8638_1: apūrvatve . kaumārāpūrvavacane iti atra ubhayataḥ striyāḥ apūrvatve iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8638_2: . apūrvapatim kumārīm upapannaḥ kaumāraḥ bhartā . kumārī apūrvapatiḥ patim upapannā
GS24pmbhasuu:8639: kaumārāpūrvavacane kumāryāḥ aṇ vidhīyate apūrvatvam yadā tasyāḥ kumāryām bhavati iti vā . atha vā kumāryām bhavaḥ kaumāraḥ . yadi evam kaumārī
GS24pmbhasuu:8640: bhāryā iti na sidhyati . puṃyogāt stryabhidhānam . puṃyogāt stryabhidhānam bhaviṣyati . kaumārasya bhāryā kaumārī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8641: (P_4,2.21) KA_II,275.7-13 Ro_III,636-637 sā asmin paurṇamāsī iti sañjñāgrahaṇam . sā asmin paurṇamāsī iti sañjñāgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8642_0: asañjñāyām garīyān upsaṃyogaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi sañjñāgrahaṇe garīyān upsaṃyogaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8642_1: syāt . māsārdhamāsayoḥ iti vaktavyam syāt . iha mā bhūt . pauṣī paurṇamāsī asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8643: saṃvatsaraparvaṇi iti ca vaktavyam syāt . bhṛtakamāse mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8644: (P_4,2.25) KA_II,275.15-21 Ro_III,637-638 yasya iti lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ikāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt . atha yat kāyam haviḥ katham tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8645: sampraiṣaḥ kartavyaḥ . yadi tāvat kimaḥ kādeśaḥ kasmai anubrūhi iti bhavitavyam . atha na kimaḥ kāya anubrūhi iti bhavitavyam . yadi api kimaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8646_0: atha api na kimaḥ ubhayathā kasmai anubrūhi iti bhavitavyam . sarvasya hi sarvanāmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8646_1: kriyate . sarvaḥ ca prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiḥ ca kaḥ . aparaḥ āha : yadi eva kimaḥ atha
GS24pmbhasuu:8646_2: api na kimaḥ ubhayathā kāya anubrūhi iti bhavitavyam . sañjñopasarjanayoḥ hi sarvanāmasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:8648: apānnaptriyam haviḥ katham tasya sampraiṣaḥ kartavyaḥ . aponapāte anubrūhi . apānnapāte anubrūhi . aponaptrapānnaptṛbhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8649: pratyayasanniyogena ṛkārāntatvam ucyate . tena asati pratyaye na bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8650_2: tārṇabindavīyam . śatarudrāt gha ca . śatarudrāt ghapratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ chaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8653_0: bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā iti asmin arthe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8653_1: . āhosvit kālebhyaḥ bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8653_2: iti asmin arthe iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8654_0: kālebhyaḥ bhave pratyayamātraprasaṅgaḥ . yadi vijñāyate bhave ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8654_1: te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā iti asmin arthe iti pratyayamātram prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8654_2: . yaḥ kālebhyaḥ bhave tasya vidhāne prātipadikamātrāt prasaṅgaḥ . atha vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8655: vihitāḥ te bhavanti kālebhyaḥ sā asya devatā iti asmin arthe iti prātipadikamātrāt prāpnuvanti . siddham tu ubhayanirdeśāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8656: katham . ubhayanirdeśāt . ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . kālebhyaḥ bhavavat kālebhyaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi ubhayanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8657: bhavavat iti vatinā nirdeśaḥ ayam . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa bhave pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ tena viśeṣeṇa sā
GS24pmbhasuu:8658: asya devatā iti asmin arthe bhavanti tataḥ amī bhavavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amī bhavavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8659_0: (P_4,2.35) KA_II,277.7-11 Ro_III,640 ṭhañprakaraṇe tat asmin vartate iti navayajñādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8659_1: upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhañprakaraṇe tat asmin vartate iti navayajñādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8659_2: kartavyam . navayajñaḥ vartate asmin kāle nāvayajñikaḥ . pākayajñikaḥ . pūrṇamāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8660: pūrṇamāsaḥ vartate asmin kāle paurṇamāsī tithiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8662_0: nipātyate . pitṛmātṛbhyām bhrātari vyaḍḍulacau . pitṛmātṛbhyām bhrātari vyaḍḍulacau
GS24pmbhasuu:8662_1: pratyayau nipātyete . pituḥ bhrātā pitṛvyaḥ . mātuḥ bhrātā mātulaḥ . mātāmahapitāmaheti
GS24pmbhasuu:8663: . mātṛpitṛbhyām pitari ḍāmahacpratyayaḥ nipātyate . mātuḥ pitā mātāmahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8664_0: pituḥ pitā pitāmahaḥ . mātari ṣit ca . ṣit ca vaktavyaḥ . mātāmahī pitāmahī . mahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8664_1: vā chandasi ānaṅaḥ avagrahadarśanāt . mahaḥ vā punaḥ eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati chandasi ānaṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_0: dṛśyate . pitā-mahaḥ iti . aveḥ dugdhe soḍhadūsamarīsacaḥ . aveḥ dugdhe soḍhadūsamarīsacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8665_1: iti ete pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ . avisoḍham avidūsam avimarīsam . tilāt niṣphalāt piñjapejau
GS24pmbhasuu:8666: vaktavyau . tilapiñjaḥ tilapejaḥ . piñjaḥ chandasi ḍit ca . piñjaḥ chandasi ḍit ca vaktavyaḥ . tilapiñjam daṇḍānatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8667: (P_4,2.38) KA_II,278.12-17 Ro_III,642 kimartham bhikṣādiṣu yuvatiśabdaḥ paṭhyate na tasya samūhaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8668: anudāttādilakṣaṇaḥ añ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati :
GS24pmbhasuu:8669: bhikṣādiṣu yuvatigrahaṇānarthakyam puṃvadbhāvasya siddhatvāt pratyayavidhau . bhikṣādiṣu yuvatigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8670: puṃvadbhāvasya siddhatvāt pratyayavidhau . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhaviṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8671: bhasa aḍhe taddhite puṃvat bhavati iti . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:8672: (P_4,2.39) KA_II,278.20-279.7 Ro_III,642-643 vṛddhāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8673_0: . vṛddhānām samūhaḥ vārdhakam . añaḥ vuñ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . añaḥ vuñ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:8673_1: . añaḥ avakāśaḥ kapota kāpotam . vuñaḥ avakāśaḥ glucukāyani glaucukāyanakam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8673_2: ubhayam prāpnoti aupagavakam kāpaṭavakam . vuñ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8673_3: tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . vakṣyati etat pūrvaḥ api vuñ
GS24pmbhasuu:8673_4: param añam bādhate iti . atha vā iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:8673_5: tat bhavati iti . ṭhak tu vipratiṣedhāt . ṭhak tu bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8674: vipratiṣedhena . ṭhakaḥ avakāśaḥ saktu sāktukam . añaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti āpūpikam śāṣkulikam maudikam . ṭhak bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8675: (P_4,2.40) KA_II,279.9 Ro_III,643 gaṇikāyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8678_0: vidhīyate na yañ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8678_1: yanaḥ vā yañaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat brāhmaṇādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8678_2: yanam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyebhyaḥ api ayam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:8678_3: prayojanam yanprakaraṇe pṛṣṭhāt upasaṅkhyānam iti codayiṣyati . tan na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8679: bhavati . yanprakaraṇe pṛṣṭhāt upasaṅkhyānam . yanprakaraṇe pṛṣṭhāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pṛṣṭhānām samūhaḥ pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8681_0: vaktavyam . gajatā sahāyatā . ahnaḥ khaḥ . ahnaḥ khaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ahnām samūhaḥ ahīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8681_1: . kratau . kratau iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . āhnāya dhūtapāpmānaḥ bhāskarāḥ jātamṛtyavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8682: . parśūnām samūhaḥ pārśvam . yadi saṇ kriyate itsañjñā na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ṇas vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8684: kimartham kaṇḍikādiṣu ulūkaśabdaḥ paṭhyate na anudāttadeḥ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8685: . na sidhyati . cāṣolūkayoḥ chandasi ādyudāttaḥ prayogaḥ dṛśyate . caṣeṇa kikidīvinā . yat ulūkaḥ vadati . na etayoḥ chandasi sāmūhikaḥ dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8686_0: yatra ca dṛśyate tatra etau anudāttādī . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam aulūkyaḥ gotram
GS24pmbhasuu:8686_1: . tatra gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ prāptaḥ . tadbādhanārtham . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8686_2: bahuvacanāntānām sāmūhikaḥ bahuṣu ca luk . tatra luki kṛte anudāttādeḥ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:8686_3: . na sidhyati . gotre aluk aci iti aluk prāpnoti . añsiddhiḥ anudāttādeḥ kaḥ arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8687: anudāttādeḥ iti eva añ siddhaḥ . kimartham kṣudramālavaśabdaḥ khaṇḍikādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8688: paṭhyate . gotrāśrayaḥ vuñ prāptaḥ tadbādhanārtham . gotrāt vuñ na ca tat gotram . gotrāt vuñ bhavati iti ucyate na ca kṣudramālavakaśabdaḥ gotram .
GS24pmbhasuu:8689: na ca gotrasamudāyaḥ gotragrahaṇena gṛhyate . tat yathā janapadasamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8690: janapadagrahaṇena na gṛhyate . kāśikosalīyāḥ iti vuñ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8691: tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . tadantāt na saḥ sarvataḥ . parigaṇiteṣu kāryeṣu tadantavidhiḥ . na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . jñāpakam syāt tadantatve .
GS24pmbhasuu:8692_0: evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . tathā ca āpiśaleḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8692_1: . evam ca kṛtvā āpiśaleḥ ācāryasya vidhiḥ upapannaḥ bhavati . dhenuḥ anañi kam utpādayati
GS24pmbhasuu:8692_2: . dhenūnām samūhaḥ dhainukam . anañi iti kim . adhenūnām samūhaḥ ādhenavam . senāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8692_3: niyamārtham vā . atha vā niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . kṣudrakamālavaśabdāt senāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8693: . kṣaudrakamālavakam anyat iti . yathā bādhyeta vā añ vuñā . atha vā jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvaḥ api vuñ param añam bādhate iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8694: gotrāt vuñ na ca tat gotram iti . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:8695: tadantāt na saḥ sarvataḥ iti . jñāpakam syāt tadantatve . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha tadantavidhiḥ iti . katham punaḥ etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8696: ubhayam śakyam jñāpayitum bhavati ca tadantavidhiḥ pūrvaḥ ca vuñ param añam bādhate iti . ubhayam jñāpyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8697: (P_4,2.45.2) KA_II,281.15-17 Ro_III,647 añprakaraṇe kṣudrakamālavāt senāsañjñāyām . añprakaraṇe kṣudrakamālavāt senāsañjñāyām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8698: kṣaudrakamālavī senā cet . kva mā bhūt . kṣaudrakamālavakam anyat .
GS24pmbhasuu:8699: (P_4,2.49) KA_II,281.19-25 Ro_III,647-648 pāśa tṛṇa dhūma vāta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8700: pṛthagvātādarśanāt asamūhaḥ . pṛthagvātādarśanāt ayuktaḥ ayam sāmūhikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8701: na hi pṛthak vātāḥ dṛśyante . na tarhi idānīm bhavati vātyā iti . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8702: . śīghratve tu . śīghraḥ vātaḥ vātyā . atha vā pṛthak vātāḥ api dṛśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:8703: tat yathā pūrvaḥ vātaḥ uttaraḥ vātaḥ sarvataḥ vātaḥ . vātāḥ vāntu diśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8705: (P_4,2.50-51) KA_II,282.3-4 Ro_III,648 khalādibhaḥ iniḥ . khalādibhaḥ iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . khalinī ūhinī kunduminī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8706_0: (P_4,2.52) KA_II,282.6-283.3 Ro_III,648-650 viṣayābhidhāne janapade luP bahuvacanaviṣayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8706_1: . viṣayābhidhāne janapade lup bahuvacanaviṣayāt vaktavyaḥ . aṅgānām viṣayaḥ aṅgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8707: gāndhāryādibhyaḥ vā . gāndhāryādibhyaḥ vā iti vaktavyam . gāndhāraḥ gāndhārayaḥ vāsātaḥ vasātayaḥ śaibaḥ śibayaḥ . rājanyādibhyaḥ vā vuñ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8708: rājanyādibhyaḥ vā vuñ vaktavyaḥ . rājanyāḥ rājanyakaḥ daivayātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8709: daivayātavakaḥ . bailvavanādibhyaḥ nityam . bailvavanādibhyaḥ nityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8710: vaktavyam . bailvavanakaḥ āmbarīṣaputrakaḥ ātmakāmeyakaḥ . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:8711: vaktavyam . na vā abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lubviṣayavivakṣāyām pratyayaḥ . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8712: abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt . yat abhidheyam saḥ nivāsaḥ ca viṣayaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8713_0: abhidheyasya nivāsaviṣayatvāt nivāsavivakṣāyām lup viṣayavivakṣāyām pratyayaḥ bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:8715: svārthe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . triṣṭup eva traiṣṭubham anuṣṭup eva ānuṣṭubham jagatī eva jāgatam .

GS24pmbhasuu:8716_1: yaḥ adhīte vetti api asau yaḥ tu vetti adhīte api asau . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:8718_0: kāni ukthāni . sāmāni . yadi evam sāmagamātre aukthikaḥ iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8718_1: . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . ukthārtham uktham . iha ukthāni adhīte aukthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8718_2: yajñam adhīte yājñikaḥ . yaḥ idānīm aukthikyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8719: yājñikam ca adhīte katham tatra bhavitavyam . aukthikaḥ yājñikaḥ iti eva bhavitavyam . katham . tasyedampratyayāt luk . tasyedampratyayāt luk .
GS24pmbhasuu:8720: tasyedampratyayasya ca . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . ukthāni adhīte aukthikyam adhīte aukthikaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8721_0: tatra dvayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:8721_1: . tat yathā aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati āvikam iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8721_2: ukthāni adhīte iti vigṛhya aukthikaḥ iti bhaviṣyati . aukthikyam adhīte iti vigṛhya

GS24pmbhasuu:8723: . vidyā lakṣaṇa golakṣaṇikaḥ āśvalakṣaṇikaḥ . lakṣaṇa . kalpa .

GS24pmbhasuu:8727: dvigoḥ ca laḥ ikan padottarapadāt śataṣaṣṭeḥ ṣikan pathaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:8732: sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . vasantasahacaritam adhyayanam vasante
GS24pmbhasuu:8734: (P_4,2.64) KA_II,284.24 Ro_III,654 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . prauktāt iti bhavitavyam . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:8738: anyatra abhidheyam anityam bhavati . pāṇinīyam iti vā bhavati pāṇinīyāḥ iti vā . anyatra abhidheyasya anityatvāt chandobrāhmaṇānām api anityatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8739: prāpnoti . iṣyate ca tadviṣayatā eva syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti chandobrāhmaṇānām tadviṣayavacanam . evamartham idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8740_0: asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yathādhikāram tadviṣayaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8740_1: yathādhikāram tadviṣayatā prāpnoti . adhīte veda iti vartate . tena adhyetṛveditroḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8740_2: eva tadviṣayatā syāt . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na syāt . yathā iha bhavati pāṇinīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8740_3: mahat suvihitam iti evam iha api syāt kaṭham mahat suvihitam iti . siddham tu proktādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:8741: tadviṣayavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . proktādhikāre eva tadviṣayatā
GS24pmbhasuu:8742: vaktavyā . tena proktam . chandobrāhmaṇāni adhyetṛveditroḥ eva iti . tat tarhi adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam kartavyam . nanu ca iha api kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8743: parārtham etad bhavati tat adhīte tat veda iti . evam tarhi yāvat iha chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam tāvat atra adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam . nanu ca tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8744_0: api kriyate . parārtham tat bhaviṣyati . purāṇprokteṣu brāhmaṇakalpeṣu śaunakādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8744_1: chandasi iti . iha vā chandobrāhmaṇagrahaṇam kriyate tatra vā adhyetṛveditṛgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8745_1: yājñavakyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yājñavalkāni brāhmaṇāni . saulabhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:8745_2: kim proktādhikāre tadviṣayatā kriyate iti ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8746: yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha . sarvathā yājñavakkyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iniḥ vā prokte tadviṣayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8747: atha vā iniḥ prokte tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . yadi iniḥ prokte
GS24pmbhasuu:8748: tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyate paiṅgī kalpaḥ atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8749_0: kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8749_1: draṣṭavyam . kāśyapakauśikābhyām eva iniḥ kalpe tadviṣayaḥ bhavati na anyebhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8749_2: . evam api chaṇādīnām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . taittirīyāḥ vāratantavīyāḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8749_3: punaḥ chaṇādayaḥ prokte tadviṣayāḥ bhavanti iti ucyeta . evam api paiṅgī kalpaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:8750: . kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam ca kalpe niyamārtham iti eva . evam api autsargikāṇām tadviṣayatā na prāpnoti . krauḍāḥ kāṅkatāḥ maudāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8751: paippalādāḥ . chaṇādayaḥ ca api autsargikān adhyetṛveditroḥ eva bādheran .
GS24pmbhasuu:8752: ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na bādheran . tittiriṇā proktāḥ ślokāḥ iti . asti tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . nanu ca uktam yājñavakyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8753_0: vakṣyati etat . yājñavakyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ tulyakālatvāt iti . tatra eva vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8753_1: . tadviṣayatā ca na bhavati iti . katham kāśyapinaḥ kauśikinaḥ iti . iniḥ prokte
GS24pmbhasuu:8753_2: tadviṣayaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne avaśyam kāśyapakauśikagrahaṇam kalpe niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8754: vidhyartham bhaviṣyati . katham pārāśariṇaḥ bhikṣavaḥ śailālinaḥ naṭāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8755: atra api tadviṣayatā ca iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8756_0: (P_4,2.67-70) KA_II,286.24-287.10 Ro_III,660-661 kim punaḥ ayam ekaḥ yogaḥ āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:8756_1: nānāyogāḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekaḥ yogaḥ uttareṣu arthādeśaneṣu deśe tannāmni deśe
GS24pmbhasuu:8756_2: tannāmni iti asya anuvṛttiḥ kartavyā . na hi ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8756_3: . yat ayam tat adhīte tat veda iti dviḥ tadgrahaṇam karoti . atha nānāyogāḥ oḥ añ
GS24pmbhasuu:8757_0: anukramaṇam yat eva sarvāntyam arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:8757_1: tathā astu . astu tāvat ekaḥ yogaḥ . nanu ca uktam uttareṣu arthādeśaneṣu deśe tannāmni
GS24pmbhasuu:8757_2: deśe tannāmni iti asya anuvṛttiḥ kartavyā . na hi ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8757_3: ekayoge api anuvṛttiḥ bhavati . katham jñāyate . yat ayam tat asya asti asmin iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8758: karoti . katham tat adhīte tat veda iti . pramādakṛtam ācāryasya śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8759_0: akartum . atha vā punaḥ santu nānāyogāḥ . nanu ca uktam oḥ añ iti evamādi anukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8759_1: yat eva sarvāntyam arthādeśanam tasya eva viṣaye syāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . goyūthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:8760: ekadaṇḍapraghaṭṭitam sarvam samam ghoṣam gacchati tadvat adhikārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8761_0: (P_4,2.71) KA_II,287.13-16 Ro_III,661 oḥ añvidheḥ nadyām matuP vipratiṣiddham . oḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8761_1: añvidheḥ nadyām matup bhavati vipratiṣedhena . oḥ añaḥ avakāśahḥ kannatu kānnavatam
GS24pmbhasuu:8762: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . ikṣumatī drumatī . matup bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:8764: yathā bahvajgrahaṇam aṅgaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . bahvacaḥ aṅgāt iti . atha akriyamāṇe aṅgagrahaṇe bahvajgrahaṇam kasya viśeṣaṇam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8765_0: matvantaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha api prasajyeta . mālāvatām ayam nivāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8765_1: mālāvatam . asti ca idānīm abahvac matvantaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:8765_2: : svavān , śvavān (P_4,2.85) KA_II,287.23-288.5 Ro_III,662 kimartham nadyām matup
GS24pmbhasuu:8766_0: vidhīyate na tat asya asti asmin iti matup iti eva siddham . nadyām matubvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8766_1: matvarthe aṇvidhānāt . nadyām matubvacanam kriyate matvarthe aṇvidhānāt . ayam matvarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:8766_2: aṇ vidhīyate . saḥ viśeṣavihitaḥ sāmānyavihitam matupam bādheta . nirvṛttādyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:8766_3: ca . nirvṛttādyartham ca nadyām matubvacanam kriyate . nirvṛttādyartheṣu matup yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8767: (P_4,2.87) KA_II,288.7 Ro_III,662 mahiṣāt ca iti vaktavyam . mahiṣmān
GS24pmbhasuu:8768_0: (P_4,2.91) KA_II,288.9-289.6 Ro_III,662-664 yadi punaḥ ayam kuṭ parādiḥ kriyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8768_1: kuṭi pratyayādeḥ ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt . kuṭi sati pratyayādeḥ iti ādeśasya anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8768_2: . kuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte
GS24pmbhasuu:8768_3: hrasvatvam . yadi pūrvāntaḥ hrasvatvam vaktavyam . kuñcakīyāḥ . parādau punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:8768_4: ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam siddham bhavati . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam kuṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:8768_5: kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya kuḍvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8769: siddham etat . katham . kuṭ ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8770: . na vaktavyam . sanniyogāt siddham . sanniyogḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kuṭ ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:8771: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam . pūrvānte hrasvatvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8772_0: . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . kruñcāḥ hrasvatvam ca iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8772_1: pūrvānte sati nipātanam kartavyam . parādau api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat hi tat ke aṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8772_2: hrasvatvam na tat kādimātre śakhyam vijñātum . iha api prasajyeta . nadīkalpaḥ parīvāhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8772_3: kumārīkāmyati iti . tasmāt ubhābhyām etat vaktavyam . kruñcāḥ hrasvatvam ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8773: (P_4,2.92) KA_II,290.2-291 8 Ro_III,664-670 śeṣe iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . apatyādibhyaḥ cāturarthparyantebhyaḥ ye anye arthāḥ saḥ śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8774: . kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam . śeṣe ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8775: aṇādayaḥ svārthe kasmāt na bhavanti iti . apatyādiṣu artheṣu aṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8776_0: vidhīyante . tena svārthe na bhaviṣyanti . ime api tarhi jātādiṣu artheṣu vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:8776_1: . tena svārthe na bhaviṣyanti . katham punaḥ iha ucyamānāḥ ghādayaḥ jātādiṣu śakyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8776_2: vijñātum . anuvartiṣyante tatra ghādayaḥ . yadi anuvartante ghādayaḥ yā yā parā prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8776_3: tasyāḥ tasyāḥ pūrve pūrve pratyayāḥ prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi jātādiṣu artheṣu ghādīn
GS24pmbhasuu:8777: ayuktā evam bahunaḥ apekṣā . apekṣamāṇaḥ ayam anantaram yogam apekṣeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:8778: bahunaḥ api apekṣā bhavati . tat yathā kaṣādiṣu yathāvidhi anuprayogaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8779: sāmānyakam saviśeṣakam sarvam apekṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu anuvṛttiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8780: nanu ca uktam yā yā parā prakṛtiḥ tasyāḥ tasyāḥ pūrve pūrve pratyayāḥ prāpnuvanti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8781: rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau . grāmāt yakhañau rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau .
GS24pmbhasuu:8782: kattryādibhyaḥ ḍhakañ rāṣṭrāvārapārāt ghakhau grāmāt yakhañau iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . śeṣavacanam ghādīnām apatyādiṣu aprasaṅgārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8783_0: śeṣavacanam kriyate śeṣe ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . apatyādiṣu mā bhūvan iti iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8783_1: ca prāpnuvanti . tasyedaṃvacanāt prasaṅgaḥ . tasyedaṃviśeṣāḥ hi ete apatyam samūhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8784_0: aṇādayaḥ kriyantām ghātayaḥ iti aṇādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . na vā paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8784_1: ghādīnām . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . paratvāt ghādīnām . vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:8784_2: param iti ucyate . pūrve ca aṇādayaḥ pare ghādayaḥ . pare aṇādayaḥ kariṣyante . sūtraviparyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8785: aṇapavādatvāt ca aṇviṣaye ghādiprasaṅgaḥ . aṇapavādatvāt ca ghādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:8786_0: aṇviṣaye ghādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na aṇviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:8786_1: ghādayaḥ bhavanti iti yat ayam pheḥ cha ca iti phyantam cham śāsti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8786_2: jñāpakam . phinartham etat syāt . sauvīreṣu iti vartate na ca phinantam sauvīragotram
GS24pmbhasuu:8786_3: asti . gotragrahaṇam sāmuhikeṣu jñāpakam daivayātavagrahaṇam vaiṣayikeṣu bhāstrāyaṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8788: avārapārāt vigṛhītāt api iti vaktavyam . avarīṇaḥ pārīṇaḥ avārapārīṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8789: viparītāt ca . viparītāt ca iti vaktavyam . pārāvārīṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8790: (P_4,2.95) KA_II,291.15-16 Ro_III,670 grāmāt ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8791: grāmeyakaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kattryādibhyaḥ ḍhakañ iti atra grāmāt iti anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8792: (P_4,2.96) KA_II,291.18-20 Ro_III,670-671 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:8793: katham kauleyakaḥ . kulasya apatyam . kukṣigrīvāt tu kan ḍhañaḥ . kulasya apatyam kauleyakaḥ iti bhaviṣyati . kukṣigrīvāt api ḍhañantāt kan bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8794: (P_4,2.99) KA_II,292.2 Ro_III,671 bāhlyurdipardibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:8871_1: vuñvidhānam . kuruyugandharebhyaḥ vāvacanāt manuṣyatatsthayoḥ vuñ iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8871_2: vipratiṣedhena kuruyugandharebhyaḥ vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ kauravaḥ kauravakaḥ yaugandharaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8871_3: yaugandharakaḥ . manuṣyatatsthayoḥ vuñ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ anye kacchādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8871_4: . kācchakaḥ manuṣyaḥ kācchakam asya īkṣitam jalpitam hasitam smitam . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8871_5: prāpnoti . kauravkaḥ manuṣyaḥ kauravakam asya īkṣitam jalpitam hasitam smitam . vuñ
GS24pmbhasuu:8872: vipratiṣedhaḥ . na hi kuruśabdasya anye kacchādayaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8873: kuruśabdasya yaḥ kaccādiṣu pāṭhaḥ saḥ anavakāśaḥ . na khalu api kuruśabdaḥ vibhāṣām prayojayati . anena vuñ kacchādipāṭhāt aṇ bhaviṣyati . sā eṣā yugandharārthā vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8875: pāṭhaḥ kriyate . sālvānām kacchādiṣu pāṭhaḥ aṇvidhānārthaḥ . sālvānām kacchādiṣu pāṭhaḥ aṇvidhānārthaḥ kriyate . aṇ yathā syāt . vuñ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8876: . na vā apadātiyogavāgrahaṇam avadhāraṇārtham . na vā etat prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8877: kim kāraṇam . apadātiyogavāgrahaṇam avadhāraṇārtham bhaviṣyati . apadātau eva sālvāt . goyavāgvoḥ eva ca sālvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8878: (P_4,2.137) KA_II,300.17-22 Ro_III,686 gartottarapadāt chavidheḥ janapadāt vuñ pūrvavipratiṣiddham . garttottarapadāt chavidheḥ janapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8879_0: vuñ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . garttottarapadāt chaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8879_1: śvāvidgarta śvāvidgartīyaḥ . vuñaḥ avakāśaḥ aṅgāḥ āṅgakaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8879_2: . traigartakaḥ . vuñ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8879_3: . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam eva avadhigrahaṇasya prayojanam janapadāt janapadāvadeḥ vuñ
GS24pmbhasuu:8879_4: yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8880: (P_4,2.138) KA_II,301.2-6 Ro_III,687 gahādiṣu pṛthivīmadhyasya madhyamabhāvaḥ . gahādiṣu pṛthivīmadhyasya madhyamabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8881: pṛthivīmadhye bhavaḥ madhyamīyaḥ . caraṇasambandhena nivāsalakṣaṇaḥ aṇ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8882: caraṇasambandhena nivāsalakṣaṇaḥ aṇ vaktavyaḥ . trayaḥ prācyāḥ trayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8884: (P_4,2.141) KA_II,301.8-12 Ro_III,687-688 īkāntāt api iti vaktavyam iha yathā syāt . aiṇīkīyaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8885: akekāntagrahaṇe kopadhagrahaṇam sausukādyartham . akekāntagrahaṇe kopadhagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . sausukādyartham . sausukīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8886: (P_4,3.1) KA_II,302.2-7 Ro_III,689 yuṣmadasmadbhyām pratyayavidhāne yogavibhāgaḥ . yuṣmadasmadbhyām pratyayavidhāne yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_0: yuṣmadasmadoḥ anyatarasyām chaḥ bhavati . yuṣmadīyaḥ asmadīyaḥ . tataḥ khañ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:8887_1: khañ ca bhavati yuṣmadasmadoḥ anyatarasyām . yauṣmakīṇaḥ āsmākīnaḥ . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8889_0: yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . tasmin aṇi yuṣmākāsmākau bhavataḥ . yauṣmākaḥ āsmākaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8889_1: tataḥ khañi . khañi ca yuṣmākāsmākau bhavataḥ . yauṣmākīṇaḥ āsmākīnaḥ . kimarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8890_0: tatra punaḥ khañgrahaṇam . tatra punaḥ khañgrahaṇam kartavyam . na hi antareṇa khañgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8890_1: yogāṅgam upajāyate . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:8890_2: khañi yuṣmākāsmākau bhavataḥ . tataḥ aṇi ca . aṇi cayuṣmākāsmākau bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8892: ekārthagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . ekārthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8893: kimartham na ekavacane iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8894: ekavacanābhāvāt . ekavacane iti ucyate . na ca atra ekavacanam paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8895: yadi punaḥ ekavacanaparatvena aṇkhañau viśeṣyeyātām . na evam śakyam . iha hi prasajyeyātām . yuṣmākam chātraḥ yauṣmākīṇaḥ . āsmākīnaḥ . iha ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:8896: syātām . tava chātrāḥ tāvakīnāḥ . māmakīnāḥ . tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam ekārthagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8897: ekavacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8900_0: ṭhañ . ardhāt yadvidhāne sapūrvāt ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . bāleyārdhikaḥ gautamārdhikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8900_1: dikpūrvapadāt yat ca . dikpūrvapadāt yat ca ṭhañ ca vaktavyaḥ . pūrvārdhyaḥ paurvārdhikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8900_2: dakṣiṇārdhyaḥ dākṣiṇārdhikaḥ uttarārdhyaḥ auttarārdhikaḥ . kimartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8901_0: dikpūrvapadāt ardhāt ubhayam ucyate . idam adya apūrvam kriyate : ardhāt yadvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8901_1: sapūrvāt ṭhañ iti . tat dveṣyam vijānīyāt : sarvam vikalpate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt
GS24pmbhasuu:8903_0: (P_4,3.15) KA_II,303.18-304.5 Ro_III,692-693 śvasaḥ tuṭi ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8903_1: . śvasaḥ tuṭi kṛte ādeśānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . tuṭi kṛte anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8903_2: ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte kapratiṣedhaḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:8904: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śauvastikam . tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam śvasaḥ tuṭi ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8905_0: siddham tu ādiṣṭasya tuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tuḍ ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8905_1: . atha vā cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . tuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:8906_0: (P_4,3.22) KA_II,304.7-14 Ro_III,693-694 hemantasya aṇi talopavacanānarthakyam hemnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8906_1: prakṛtyantaratvāt . hemantasya aṇi talopavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . hemnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8906_2: prakṛtyantaratvāt prakṛtyantaram hemanśabdaḥ . ātaḥ ca prakṛtyantaram . evam hi āha
GS24pmbhasuu:8906_3: . heman heman āganīganti karṇau . tasmāt etau heman na śuṣyataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8907: alopadarśanāt ca . alopaḥ khalu api dṛśyate . paṅktiḥ haimantī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8908: aparaḥ āha : hemantasya aṇvacanam aṇi ca talopavacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . hemnaḥ prakṛtyantaratvāt alopadarśanāt ca iti eva . tatra ṛtubhyaḥ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8909_0: (P_4,3.23.1) KA_II,304.16-19 Ro_III,694 ciraparutparāribhyaḥ tnaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ciratnam
GS24pmbhasuu:8909_1: paruttnam parāritnam . pragasya chandasi galopaḥ ca tnaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . pratnam ātmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8909_2: . agrādipaścāt ḍimuc smṛtaḥ . agrimam ādimam paścimam . antāt ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8911_0: nipātyate . sāyacirayoḥ makārāntatvam pratyayasanniyuktam . sāyacirayoḥ makārāntatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:8911_1: pratyayasanniyogena nipātyate . sāyantanam cirantanam . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8911_2: makārāntaḥ sāyaṃśabdaḥ . katham sāyāhnaḥ . sāyamaḥ ahne malopaḥ . sāyamaḥ ahne malopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8911_3: vaktavyaḥ . katham sāyatare . tare ca iti vaktavyam . katham sāyam sāye . vā saptamyām
GS24pmbhasuu:8911_4: iti vaktavyam . atha prāhṇapragayoḥ kim nipātyate . prāhṇapragyoḥ ekārāntatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8911_5: prāhṇapragyoḥ ekārāntatvam nipātyate . prāhṇetanam pragetanam . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8912: . saptamyāḥ alukā api siddham . bhavet siddham yadā saptamī . yadā tu anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:8913_0: vibhaktiḥ tadā na sidhyati . tuṭi uktam . kim uktam . tuṭi ādeśānupapattiḥ anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8913_1: iti . tuṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . pūrvānte
GS24pmbhasuu:8914_0: vaktavyaḥ . prātastanam punastanam . parādau punaḥ sati kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8914_1: iti visarjanīyaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . astu tarhi parādiḥ . nanu ca uktam tuṭi kṛte anāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8914_2: ādeśaḥ na prāpnoti iti . siddham tu ādiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8915: tuḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . tuḍ ādiṣṭasya iti vaktavyam . atha vā cena sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . tuṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8916_1: saptamīśravaṇāṛtham . pūrvāhṇāparāhṇābhyām subantatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8916_2: . saptamīśravaṇāṛtham . saptamyāḥ śravaṇam yathā syāt . pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8916_3: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati atra saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:8916_4: iti yat ayam ghakālataneṣu kālanāmnaḥ iti saptamyāḥ alukam śāsti . alugvacanam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8916_5: iti cet avyayāt saptamīprasaṅgaḥ . alugvacanam jñāpakam iti cet avyayāt saptamī prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:8916_6: . doṣātanam divātanam . astu avyayāt iti luk bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8917: iha api luk prāpnoti . pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam . aluk atra lukam
GS24pmbhasuu:8918: bādhiṣyate . iha api bādheta . doṣātanam divātanam . samānāśrayaḥ luk alukā bādhyate . kaḥ ca samānāśrayaḥ . yaḥ pratyayāśrayaḥ . atra ca prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:8919: eva pratyayotpatteḥ luk bhavati . na sidhyati . iha hi sati pratyaye lukā bhavitavyam . sati luki alukā bhavitavyam . tatra ca pratyayaḥ eva na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:8920_0: . kutaḥ luk bhaviṣyati . sā eṣā jñāpakena asatī vibhaktiḥ ākṛṣyate . sā yathā iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8920_1: bādhikā bhavati pūrvāhṇetanam aparāhṇetanam evam iha api syāt doṣātanam divātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8920_2: . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ alugvacanam jñāpakam bhavati atra saptamī iti . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8920_3: . bhavati subantāt utpattiḥ iti . kim punaḥ jñāpyam etat yāvatā samarthānām prathamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8920_4: vā iti vartate sāmarthyam ca subantena . jñāpyam iti āha . katham . ṅyāpprātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8921_0: tatra kutaḥ etat subantāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:8921_1: yat uktam vṛddhāvṛddhāvarṇasvaradvyajlakṣaṇe ca pratyayavidhau tatsampratyayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:8922_0: ṅyāpprātipadikam iti etat vijñāyate . yadi etat jñapyate katham dvipadaḥ āgatam dvipādrūpyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8922_1: praṣṭhauhaḥ āgatam praṣṭhvāḍrūpyam kīlālapaḥ āgatam kīlālapārūpyam papuṣaḥ āgatam
GS24pmbhasuu:8922_2: papivaḍrūpyam . padbhāvaḥ ūhākāralopaḥ prasāraṇam iti ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8922_3: luke kṛte na bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi sāmasu sādhuḥ sāmanyaḥ vemanyaḥ nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_0: nalopaḥ prāpnoti . luki kṛte bhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . luk
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_1: kriyatām nalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_2: sampradhāryam . nalopaḥ kriyatām taddhitotpattiḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_3: nalopaḥ . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt taddhitotpattiḥ bhaviṣyati . parigaṇiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:8923_4: kāryeṣu nalopaḥ asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . idam api tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8924: parigaṇyate . katham . subvidhiḥ iti sarvavibhaktyantaḥ samāsaḥ : supaḥ vidhiḥ subvidhiḥ , subantāt vidhiḥ subvidhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8926: nirdiśyante . jātādiṣu artheṣu ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . svārthe mā bhūvan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8927: . na etat asti prayojanam . śeṣe iti vartate . tena svārthe na bhaviṣyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:8928_0: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhat . tatrajātādiṣu vacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8928_1: . jātādiṣu eva ghādayaḥ yathā syuḥ . iha mā bhūvan . tatra āste tatra śete iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8928_2: yadi niyamaḥ kriyate dārṣadāḥ saktavaḥ aulūkhalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8929: yāvakaḥ iti na sidhyati . saṃskṛtam iti evam bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham dārṣadāḥ saktavaḥ iti . idam tu na sidhyati : aulūkhalaḥ yāvakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8930_0: saṃskṛtam hi nāma tat bhavati yat tataḥ eva apakṛṣya abhyavahriyate . na ca yāvakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8930_1: ulūkhalāt eva apakṛṣya abhyavahriyate . avaśyam randhanādīni pratīkṣyāṇi . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8930_2: na arthaḥ anena niyamena . kasmāt na bhavati : tatra āste tatra śete iti . anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8930_3: . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam . kriyamāṇeṣu api hi arthanirdeśeṣu yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_0: utpadyamānena pratyayena arthasya abhidhāna na bhavati na bhavati tatra pratyayotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_1: . tat yathā : aṅgulyā khanati vṛkṣamūlāt āgataḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm jātādayaḥ arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_2: nirdeṣṭavyāḥ . nirdeṣṭavyāḥ ca . kim prayojanam . apavādavidhānārtham . prāviṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_3: ṭhap . prāvṛṣi jātaḥ prāvṛṣakaḥ . kva mā bhūt . prāvṛṣi bhavaḥ prāveṣeṇyāḥ balāhakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8931_4: . yāni tu etāni nirapavādāni arthāpadeśāni tāni śakyāni akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_1: upasaṅkhyānam . lukprakaraṇe citrārevatīrohiṇībhyaḥ striyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8933_2: . citrāyām jātā citrā strī citrā . revatī revatī strī revatī . rohiṇī rohiṇī strī
GS24pmbhasuu:8934: phalgunyaṣāḍhābhyām ṭānau . phalgunyaṣāḍhābhyām ṭānau vaktavyau . phalgunī
GS24pmbhasuu:8935_0: . aṣāḍhāḥ upadadhāti . śraviṣṭhāṣāḍhābhyām chaṇ . śraviṣṭhāṣāḍhābhyām chaṇ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8935_1: . śrāviṣṭhīyāḥ āṣāḍhīyāḥ . na vā nakṣatrebhyaḥ balulam lugvacanāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8935_2: . kim kāraṇam . nakṣatrebhyaḥ balulam lugvacanāt . nakṣatrebhyaḥ balulam luk iti
GS24pmbhasuu:8935_3: evam atra luk bhaviṣyati (P_4,3.39) KA_II,308.10-23 Ro_III,703-704 prāyabhavagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8935_4: anarthakam tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt . prāyabhavagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8935_5: tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt . yaḥ hi rāṣṭre prāyeṇa bhavati tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8936: bhavaḥ asau bhavati . tatra tatra bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8937_0: anityabhavaḥ prāyabhavaḥ . anityabhavaḥ prāyabhavaḥ iti cet muktasaṃśayena tulyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8937_1: . yat bhavān muktasaṃśayam tatra bhave udāharaṇam nyāyyam manyate sraughnaḥ devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8937_2: iti tena etat tulyam . saḥ api hi avaśyam udakdeśādīni abhiniṣkrāmati . atha etat
GS24pmbhasuu:8937_3: bhavān prāyabhave udāharaṇam nyāyyam manyate tatra bhave kim udāharaṇam . yat tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:8938_0: sraughnāḥ prāsādāḥ sraughnāḥ prākārāḥ iti . evam tarhi tatra bhavati iti prakṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:8938_1: jīhvāmūlāṅguleḥ chaḥ vidhīyate . saḥ yathā dṛṣṭāpacare aṅgulīyam iti bhavati evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8938_2: prayabhave api bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8939: prāyabhavaḥ iti prakṛtya upajānūpakarṇopanīveḥ ṭhakam vakṣyati . saḥ prāyabhave eva yathā syāt . tatra bhave mā bhūt . upajānubhavam gaḍu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8940: atha idānīm tatra bhavaḥ iti prakṛtya śarīrāvayavāt yat vidhīyate . saḥ atra kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt . saḥ yathā eva anabhidhānāt yat na
GS24pmbhasuu:8941: bhavati evam ṭhak api na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_0: (P_4,3.42) KA_II,309.2-9 Ro_III,704-705 vikāre kośāt ḍhañ . vikāre kośāt ḍhañ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_1: . kośasya vikāraḥ kauśeyam . sambhūte hi arthānupapattiḥ . sambhūte iti hi ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_2: arthasya anupapattiḥ syāt . na hi adaḥ kośe sambhavati . kim tarhi . kośasya adaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_3: vikāraḥ . yadi vikāraḥ iti ucyate bhasmani api prāpnoti . bhasma api kośasya vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_4: . atha sambhūte iti ucyamāne krimau kasmāt na bhavati . krimiḥ api hi kośe sambhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_5: . anabhidhānāt . yathā eva tarhi anabhidhānāt krimau na bhavati evam bhasmani api
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_6: na bhaviṣyati . arthaḥ ca upapannaḥ bhavati (P_4,3.48) KA_II,309.11-13 Ro_III,705
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_7: ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . kālāt iti vartate. na ca kalāpī nāma kalaḥ asti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8942_8: doṣaḥ . sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . kalāpisahacaritaḥ kālaḥ kalāpī kālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8943_0: (P_4,3.53) KA_II,309.15-20 Ro_III,705-706 tatra iti vartamāne punaḥ tatragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8943_1: kimartham . tatraprakaraṇe tatra iti punarvacanam kālanivṛttyartham . tatraprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:8943_2: tatra iti punarvacanam kriyate kālanivṛttyartham . kālādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_0: adhikārāḥ nivartante . kaḥ vā abhisambandhaḥ yat tatragrahaṇam kālādhikāram nivartayet
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_1: . eṣaḥ abhisambandhaḥ . kālābhisambaddham tatragrahaṇam anuvartate . tatragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8944_2: ca tatragrahaṇasya nivartakam bhavati . tasmin nivṛtte kālādhikāraḥ api nivartate
GS24pmbhasuu:8945: (P_4,3.58) KA_II,310.2-6 Ro_III,706 ñyaprakaraṇe parimukhādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ñyaprakaraṇe parimukhādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8946: pārimukhyam pārihanavyam . avyayībhāvād vidhāne upakūlādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8947: . avyayībhāvād vidhāne upakūlādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . aupakūlaḥ aupamūlaḥ aupaśālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8949: samānasya tadādeḥ ca adhyātmādiṣu ca iṣyate . samānasya : sāmānikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8950: tadādeḥ : samānagrāmikaḥ samānadeśikaḥ . adhyātmādiṣu ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8951_0: ādhyātmikaḥ ādhidaivikaḥ ādhibhautikaḥ . ūrdhvandamāt ca dehāt ca . ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8951_1: . aurdhvandamikam aurdhvadehikam . lokottarapadasya ca . ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . aihalaukikam
GS24pmbhasuu:8951_2: pāralaukikam . mukhapārśvatasoḥ īyaḥ . mukha pārśva iti etābhyām tasantābhyām īyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8952: kuk janasya parasya ca .īyaḥ vaktavyaḥ . janakīyam parakīyam . īyaḥ kāryaḥ atha madhyasya . madhyīyaḥ . maṇmīyau ca pratyayau . maṇmīyau ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:8953: pratyayau vaktavyau . mādhyamaḥ madhyamīyaḥ . madhya [R: madhyaḥ] madhyam dinaṇ ca asmāt . madhyaśabdaḥ madhyaśabdam āpadyate dinaṇ ca asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8954: pratyayaḥ bhavati . mādhyandinaḥ udgāyati . sthāmnaḥ luk ajināt tathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:8955: sthāmnaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . aśvatthāmā . ajināntāt ca luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8956: ulājinaḥ siṃhājinaḥ vyāghrājinaḥ . bāhyaḥ daivyaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ gāmbhīryam ca ñyaḥ iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:8957_1: adhikāraḥ kriyate . bhavavyākhyānayoḥ yugapat adhikāraḥ apavādavidhānārthaḥ . bhavavyākhyānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8958_0: kriyate apavādavidhānārthaḥ . yugapad apavādān vakṣyāmi iti . kim ucyate apavādavidhānārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8958_1: iti na punaḥ nirdeśārthaḥ api syāt . kṛtanirdeśau hi tau . kṛtanirdeśau hi etau arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:8958_2: . ekaḥ tatra bhavaḥ iti aparaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8959: idam iti . atha vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇam kimartham . tatra vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇam bhavārtham . tatra vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:8960_0: kriyate bhavārtham . kim ucyate bhavārtham iti na punaḥ vyākhyānārtham api . vyākhyāne
GS24pmbhasuu:8960_1: hi avacanāt siddham . vyākhyāne hi sati antareṇa vacanam siddham . yat prati vyākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8960_2: iti etat bhavati tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:8961_0: . kim prati etat bhavati . vyākhyātavyanāma . yat ucyate bhavārtham iti tat na .
GS24pmbhasuu:8961_1: vyākhyānārtham api vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇam kriyate . iha mā bhūt . pāṭaliputrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8961_2: vyākhyānī sukosalā iti . atha kriaymāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:8962_0: vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ grahaṇe kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . avayaśaḥ hi ākhyānam vyākhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:8962_1: . pāṭaliputram ca api avayavaśaḥ vyācaṣṭe . īdṛśāḥ asya prākārāḥ iti . satyam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:8962_2: etat . kva cit tu kā cit prasṛtatarā gatiḥ bhavati . śabdagrantheṣu ca eṣā prasṛtatarā
GS24pmbhasuu:8962_3: gatiḥ bhavati . niruktam vyākhyāyate . vyākaraṇam vyākhyāyate iti ucyate . na kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8965: bhave mantreṣu luk vaktavyaḥ . agniṣṭome bhavaḥ mantraḥ agniṣṭomaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8966_0: rājasūyaḥ vājapeyaḥ . kalpe ca vyākhyāne . kalpe ca vyākhyāne luk vaktavyaḥ . agniṣṭomasya
GS24pmbhasuu:8966_1: vyākhyānaḥ kalpaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ . rājasūyaḥ vājapeyaḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:8966_2: tādarthyāt tācchabdyam . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8966_3: tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . agniṣṭomārthaḥ agniṣṭomaḥ . rājasūyaḥ vājapeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8968: yajñebhyaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ye eva sañjñībhūtakāḥ yajñāḥ tataḥ utpattiḥ syāt : āgniṣṭomikaḥ rājasūyikaḥ vājapeyikaḥ . yatra vā yajñaśabdaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8969_0: nāvayajñikaḥ pākayajñikaḥ . iha na syāt . pāñcaudanikaḥ sāptaudanikaḥ śātaudanikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8969_1: . kratugrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha yajñagrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:8969_2: kratubhyaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ye eva
GS24pmbhasuu:8970: sañjñībhūtakāḥ kratavaḥ tataḥ utpattiḥ syāt . āgniṣṭomikaḥ rājasūyikaḥ vājapeyikaḥ . iha na syāt . pāñcaudanikaḥ sāptaudanikaḥ śātaudanikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8971: yajñagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8972: (P_4,3.72) KA_II,312.22-24 Ro_III,711 nāmākhyātagrahaṇam saṅghātavigṛhītārtham . nāmākhyātagrahaṇam saṅghātavigṛhītārtham draṣṭavyam . nāmikaḥ ākhyātikaḥ nāmākhyātikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8973: (P_4,3.84) KA_II,313.2-13 Ro_III,712 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi asau vidūrāt prabhavati . kim tarhi. vālavāyāt prabhavati vidūre
GS24pmbhasuu:8974_0: saṃskriyate . evam tarhi . vālavāyaḥ vidūram ca . vālavāyaḥ vidūraśabdam āpadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8974_1: ñyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakṛtyantaram eva vā . atha vā prakṛtyantaram vidūraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8974_2: vālavāyasya . na vai tatra vālayvāyam vidūraḥ iti upācaranti . na vai tatra iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:8974_3: brūyāt jitvarīvat upācaret . tat yathā vāṇijaḥ vārāṇasīm jitvarīm iti upācaranti
GS24pmbhasuu:8975: vālavāyam viduraḥ iti upācaranti . vālavāyaḥ vidūram ca . prakṛtyantaram eva vā . na vai tatra iti cet brūyāt jitvarīvat upācaret .
GS24pmbhasuu:8977: cetanāvataḥ etat bhavati niṣkrāmaṇam vā apakramaṇam vā dvāram ca acetanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8978_0: . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ karatvyaḥ . abhiniṣkramaṇam dvāram iti . saḥ tarhi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:8978_1: nirdeśaḥ karatvyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . acetaneṣu api cetanāvat upacāraḥ dṛśyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:8978_2: yathā . ayam asya koṇaḥ abhiniḥsṛtaḥ . ayam abhipraviṣṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:8979: (P_4,3.87) KA_II,313.20-22 Ro_III,713 adhikṛtya kṛte granthe luP ākhyāyikābhyaḥ bahulam . adhikṛtya kṛte granthe iti atra ākhyāyikābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8980: bahulam lup vaktavyaḥ . vāsavadattā sumanottarā . na ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:8982: (P_4,3.88) KA_II,314.2-4 Ro_III,713 dvandve devāsurādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . dvandve devāsurādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . daivāsuram rākṣosuram daivāsurī rakṣosurī .
GS24pmbhasuu:8984: nivāsaḥ nāma yatra samprati uṣyate . abhijanaḥ nāma yatra pūrvaiḥ uṣitam .
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_0: vidhīyate na gotrakṣatriyākhyebhyaḥ bahulam vuñ iti eva siddham . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8986_1: vāsudevaśabdāt vunaḥ vā vuñaḥ vā . tat eva rūpam saḥ eva svaraḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:8987: iti . atha vā na eṣā kṣatriyākhyā . sañjñā eṣā tatrabhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:8989_0: sarvavacanam prakṛtinirhrāsārtham . sarvavacanam kriyate prakṛtinirhrāsārtham . prakṛtinirhrāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8989_1: yathā syāt . tat ca madravṛjyartham . tat ca madravṛjyartham draṣṭavyam . mādraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:8990: mādrau vā bhaktiḥ asya madrakaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . vārjyaḥ bhaktiḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8991: vārjyau vā bhaktiḥ asya vṛjikaḥ iti eva yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:8992_0: (P_4,3.101) KA_II,315.4-19 Ro_III,716-717 proktagrahaṇam anarthakam tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:8992_1: . proktagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . tatra adarśanāt . grāme grāme kāṭhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:8993: na ca tatra pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . granthe ca darśanāt . yatra ca dṛśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8994: granthaḥ saḥ . tatra kṛte granthe iti eva siddham . chandortham tarhi idam
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_0: vaktavyam . na hi chandāṃsi kriyante . nityāni chandāṃsi . chandortham iti cet tulayam
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_1: . chandortham iti cet tulayam etat bhavati . grāme grāme kāṭhakam kālāpakam ca procyate
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_2: . tatra adarśanāt . na ca tatra pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . granthe ca darśanāt . yatra ca
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_3: dṛśyate granthaḥ saḥ . tatra kṛte granthe iti eva siddham . nanu ca uktam na hi chandāṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:8995_4: kriyante . nityāni chandāṃsi iti . yadi api arthaḥ nityaḥ yā tu asau varṇānupūrvī
GS24pmbhasuu:8996_0: tadbhedāt ca etat bhavati . kāṭhakam kālāpakam maudakam paippalādakam iti . na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:8996_1: idānīm idam vaktavyam . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yat tena proktam na ca tena
GS24pmbhasuu:8996_2: kṛtam . mādhurī vṛttiḥ . yadi tarhi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:8997: nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam . tat na vaktavyam . tat api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:8998: vaktavyam . yat ten kṛtam na ca tena proktam . vārarucam kāvyam jālūkāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9001_0: pratyakṣakārigrahaṇam kartavyam antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9001_1: . na vaktavyam . kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam jñāpakam vaiśampāyanāntevāsiṣu pratyakṣakārigrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9001_2: . yat ayam kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:9002: antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9003: vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kaṭhaḥ kaṭhāntevāsī khāḍāyanaḥ . vaiśampāyanāntevāsī kalāpī . yadi ca antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ api syāt kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9004: anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na antevāsyantevāsibhyaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9005: . tataḥ kalāpikhāḍāyagrahaṇam karoti . chandograhaṇam ca itarathā hi atiprasaṅgaḥ . chandograhaṇam ca kartavyam . itarathā hi atiprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9006: itarathā hi atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt . iha api prasajyeta . tittiriṇā proktāḥ ślokāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9007_1: pratiṣedhaḥ tulyakālatvāt . purāṇaprokteṣu brāhmaṇakalpeṣu iti atra yājñavalkyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9008: yājñavalkāni brāhmaṇāni . saulabhāni iti . kim kāraṇam . tulyakālatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9010: (P_4,3.116) KA_II,316.18-317.4 Ro_III,319-320 kṛte granthe makṣikādibhyaḥ aṇ . kṛte granthe iti atra makṣikādibhyaḥ aṇ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9011: makṣikābhiḥ kṛtam mākṣikam . tadviśeṣebhyaḥ ca . tadviśeṣebhyaḥ ca aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:9012: vaktavyaḥ . saraghābhiḥ kṛtam sāragham . gārmutam pauttikam . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9013_0: kṛte granthe . tataḥ sañjñāyām . sañjñāyām ca tena kṛte iti etasmin arthe yathāvihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:9013_1: pratyayaḥ bhavati . saraghābhiḥ kṛtam sāragham . gārmutam pauttikam . tataḥ kulālādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9015: asannihite aprāptiḥ idamaḥ pratyakṣavācitvāt . tasya idam iti asannihite aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . idamaḥ pratyakṣavācitvāt . idam iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9016: pratyakṣe vartate . tena iha eva syāt . tasya idam iti . tasya adaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9017: tasya tat iti na syāt . siddham tu yadyogā ṣaṣṭhī tatra . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9018_0: katham . yadyogā ṣaṣṭhī pravartate tatra iti vaktavyam . anantarādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9018_1: . anantarādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasya anantaraḥ tasya samīpaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9018_2: yadyogā ṣaṣṭhī pravartate iti ataḥ anantarādiṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_0: vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu parigaṇanāt . siddham etat . katham . parigaṇanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9019_1: . sve grāmajanapadmanuṣyebhyaḥ . sve grāmajanapadmanuṣyebhyaḥ iti vaktavyam . sraughnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9020_0: janapada . manuṣya daivadattaḥ yājñadattaḥ . pattrāt vāhye . pattrāt vāhye iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9020_1: . āśvam āuṣṭram gārdabham . rathāt rathāṅge . rathāt rathāṅge iti vaktavyam . āśvaratham
GS24pmbhasuu:9020_2: auṣṭraratham gārdabharatham . vaheḥ tuḥ aṇ iṭ ca . vaheḥ trantāt aṇ valtavyaḥ iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:9020_3: ca vaktavyaḥ . saṃvoḍhuḥ svam sāṃvahitram . agnīdhaḥ śaraṇe rañ bha ca . agnīdhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9020_4: śaraṇe rañ vaktavyaḥ bhasañjñā ca vaktavyā . agnīdhaḥ śaraṇam āgnīdhram . samidhām
GS24pmbhasuu:9020_5: ādhāne ṣeṇyaṇ . samidhām ādhāne ṣeṇyaṇ vaktavyaḥ . samidhām ādhānaḥ mantraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9021: sāmidhenyaḥ mantraḥ . sāmidhenī ṛk . caraṇāt dharmāmnāyayoḥ . caraṇāt dharmāmnāyayoḥ iti vaktavyam . kaṭhānām dharmaḥ āmnāyaḥ vā kāṭhakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9022: kālāpakam maudukam paippalādakam iti . tat tarhi bahu vaktavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tasya idam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9023_0: asannihite aprāptiḥ iti . kim idam bhavān pratyayārtham eva upālambhate na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9023_1: prakṛtyartham api . yathā eva hi idam iti etat pratyakṣe vartate evam tat iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9023_2: parokṣe vartate . tena iha eva syāt . tasya idam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9024: asya amuṣya iti atra na syāt . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ atra bhaviṣyati . tasya ca asya ca amuṣya ta tasya iti bhavati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9025: ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat ca adaḥ ca idam ca idam iti eva . yat api ucyate anantarādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9027: (P_4,3.125) KA_II,319.15-16 Ro_III,723 vaire devāsurādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . vaire devāsurādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . daivāsuram rākṣosuram .
GS24pmbhasuu:9029: saṅghādiṣu ghoṣagrahaṇam kartavyaḥ . gārgaḥ ghoṣaḥ vātsaḥ ghoṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9031_0: vṛddhyarthaḥ . ñṇiti iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . saṅghādiṣu pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9031_1: vṛddhatvāt prātidikasya . saṅghādiṣu pratyayasya ṇitkaraṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9031_2: . vṛddhatvāt prātidikasya . vṛddham eva etat prātipadikam . liṅgapuṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9032: liṅgapuṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhārtham tu ṇakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . liṅgārtham . vaidī
GS24pmbhasuu:9037: ātharvaṇikasya ikalopaḥ ca . ātharvaṇikasya ikalopaḥ ca aṇ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9038_0: ātharvaṇaḥ dharmaḥ ātharvaṇaḥ āmnāyaḥ . idam ātharvaṇārtham ātharvaṇikārtham ca caturgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9038_1: kriyate . vasantādiṣu atharvanśabdaḥ ātharvaṇaśabdaḥ ca paṭhyate . ṣaṣthādhyāye prakṛtibhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9039: kriyate . idam caturtham ikalopārtham . dvirgrahaṇam śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:9040: katham . tena proktam iti prakṛtya ṛṣibhyaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ anuvākaḥ viśvāmitraḥ anuvākaḥ iti evamartham . tataḥ vaktavyam atharvaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9041: vā iti . ten siddham atharvā ātharvaṇaḥ iti ca . atha vasantādiṣu ātharvaṇaśabdaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ . tatra na eva arthaḥ prakṛtibhāvāṛthena na
GS24pmbhasuu:9042_0: api ikalopārthena . yadi vasantādiṣu ātharvaṇaśabdaḥ paṭhyate atharvāṇam adhīte ātharvaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9042_1: iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . tatra dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9043_0: aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya
GS24pmbhasuu:9043_1: avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati . evam ātharvaṇam adhīte iti vigṛhya ātharvaṇikaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9043_2: bhaviṣyati atharvāṇam adhīte iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . tatra abhisambandhamātram kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9043_3: ātharvaṇikānām iti . na ca idānīm anyat ātharvaṇikānām svam bhavitum arhati anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:9046_0: punaḥ tasyagrahaṇam kimartham . tasyaprakaraṇe tasyapunarvacanam śaiṣikanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9046_1: . tasyaprakaraṇe tasya iti punarvacanam kriyate śaiṣikanivṛttyartham . śaiṣikāḥ nivartyante
GS24pmbhasuu:9047: tasyedaṃvacanāt prasaṅgaḥ . tasyedaṃviśeṣāḥ hi ete apatyam samūhaḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9048: nivāsaḥ iti . kimartham idam ucyate . bādhanārtham kṛtam bhavet . ye tasya bādhakāḥ tadbādhanārtham . katham punaḥ aśaiṣikam śaiṣikam bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:9049_0: utsargaḥ śeṣaḥ eva asau . yaḥ hi utsargaḥ saḥ api śeṣaḥ eva . ke punaḥ śaiṣikāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:9049_1: vikārāvayavayoḥ prāpnuvanti yāvatā sarvam adya apavādaiḥ vyāptam . iha na kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:9049_2: ucyate . halasīrāt ṭhak iti . katham punaḥ icchatā api apavādaḥ prāpnuvan śakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9049_3: bādhitum . tasyagrahaṇasāmarthyāt kim idam bhavān adhyāruhya tasyagrahaṇasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9049_4: prayojanam āha na punaḥ sarvasya eva yogasya . avaśyam uttarārthaḥ arthanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9050_0: samarthavibhaktiḥ api tarhi avaśyam uttarārthā nirdeṣṭavyā . prakṛtā samarthavibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9050_1: anuvartate tasya idam iti . na vā sampratyayaḥ . na vā sampratyayaḥ iyatā sūtreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9050_2: śaiṣikāṇām nivṛtteḥ . na hi kākaḥ vāśyate iti eva adhikārāḥ nivartante . yadi khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:9051: iṣyante mahatā sūtreṇa nivṛttiḥ vaktavyā . avayave ca aprāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ anivṛttiḥ . avayave ca aprāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9052: anivṛttiḥ iṣṭā tatra ca nivṛttiḥ prāpnoti . pāṭaliputrakāḥ prāsādāḥ pāṭaliputrakāḥ prākārāḥ iti . aṇmayaṭoḥ ca vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9053: mayaḍutsargāt . aṇmayaṭoḥ ca vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . paṭhiṣyati hi vipratiṣedham : aṇaḥ vṛddhāt mayaṭ iti . saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9054: kim kāraṇam . mayaḍutsargāt . nivṛtteṣu hi śaiṣikeṣu vṛddhāt mayaṭ utsargaḥ . tasya aṇ apavādaḥ . utsargāpavādayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9055: anuvṛttau hi chotsargāpavādavipratiṣedhāt mayaṭ . anuvartamāneṣu hi śaiṣikeṣu vṛddhāt chaḥ utsagaḥ tasya aṇmayaṭau apavādau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9056_0: apavādavipratiṣedhāt mayaṭ bhaviṣyati . yat tāvat ucyate na vā sampratyayaḥ iyatā
GS24pmbhasuu:9056_1: sūtreṇa śaiṣikāṇām nivṛtteḥ iti . sampratyayaḥ eva . na hi atra aṇ durlabhaḥ . siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9056_2: atra aṇ tasya idam iti eva . saḥ ayam punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9057: tasyagrahaṇena tasya sāpavādasya aṇaḥ prasaṅgaḥ imam nirapavādakam aṇam pratipādayati . tatra ye tāvat dvitīyāḥ tān ayam apavādatvāt bādhiṣyate ye
GS24pmbhasuu:9058: tṛtīyāḥ tān paratvāt . ye caturthāḥ tatra ke cit purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam imam na bādhiṣyante ke cit madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:9059: apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti . etāvantaḥ ca ete syuḥ yat uta
GS24pmbhasuu:9060: dvitīyāḥ tṛtīyāḥ caturthāḥ vā . na pañcamāḥ santi na ṣaṣṭhāḥ . yat api ucyate avayave ca aprāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ anivṛttiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9061_0: prāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ nivṛttiḥ ucyate . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat aprāṇyoṣadhivṛkṣebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9061_1: nivṛttiḥ syāt . yat api ucyate aṇmayaṭoḥ ca vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ mayaḍutsargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9061_2: iti mā bhūt vipratiṣedhaḥ . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9061_3: aṇañam bādhiṣyate . mayaṭam na bādhiṣyate (P_4,3.135) KA_II,322.17-21 Ro_III,730-731
GS24pmbhasuu:9061_4: kimartham vikārāvayavayoḥ yugapadadhikāraḥ . vikārāvayavayoḥ uktam . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9062: bhavavyākhyānayoḥ yugapat adhikāraḥ apavādavidhānārthaḥ . kṛtanirdeśau hi tau iti . iha api vikārāvayavayoḥ yugapadadhikāraḥ apavādavidhānārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9063: kṛtanirdeśau hi tau tasya idam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9064_0: (P_4,3.136) KA_II,322.23-323.2 Ro_III,731 kimartham bilvādiṣu gavīdhukāśabdaḥ paṭhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9064_1: na kopadhāt aṇ iti eva siddham . bilvādiṣu gavīdhukāgrahaṇam mayaṭpratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9064_2: . bilvādiṣu gavīdhukāgrahaṇam kriyate mayaṭpratiṣedhārtham . mayaṭ ataḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_0: ādyudāttāt ṅīṣaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . anudāttādeḥ añaḥ vidhāne ādyudāttāt ṅīṣaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_1: kartavyam . kuvalī kauvalam badarī bādaram . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9066_2: nighāte kṛte anudāttādeḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . padasya hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9067_0: subantam ca padam . ṅyāpprātipadikāt ca pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . na vā samarthasya anudāttāditvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9067_1: . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . samarthasya anudāttāditvāt . samartham anudāttāditvena
GS24pmbhasuu:9068: . iha hi prasajyeta . vācaḥ vikāraḥ tvacaḥ vikāraḥ iti . etad hi samartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9069: anudāttādi . iha ca na syāt sarveṣām vikāraḥ iti . tasmāt na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9070_0: na cet evam upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati yāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:9070_1: eva dvitīyasya svarasya prādurbhāvaḥ tāvati eva pūrvasya nighātaḥ iti yat ayam bhikṣādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9070_2: garbhiṇīśabdasya pāṭham karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . bhikṣādiṣu garbhiṇīśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9070_3: pāṭhe etat prayojanam anudāttādilakṣaṇaḥ añ mā bhūt iti . yadi ca padasya nighātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9070_4: garbhaśabdaḥ ayam ādyudāttaḥ tasmāt in antāt yaḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti saḥ tāvat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9071: tasmin avasthite nighātaḥ . tatra kaḥ anudāttādilakṣaṇasya añaḥ prasaṅgaḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ yāvati eva dvitīyasya svarasya prādurbhāvaḥ tāvati
GS24pmbhasuu:9072: eva pūrvasya nighātaḥ iti . ataḥ bhikṣādiṣu garbhiṇīśabdam paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9073: padagrahaṇam parimāṇārtham . padagrahaṇam kriyate parimāṇārtham . vākyasya mā bhūt anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9074: (P_4,3.143) KA_II,324.2-7 Ro_III,733 kimartham etayoḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9075_0: mayaḍvaitayorvacanam apavādaviṣaye anivṛttyartham . mayaṭ vā etayoḥ iti ucyate apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:9075_1: anivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . bilvamayam bailvam . etayoḥ iti arthanirdeśaḥ . etayoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9075_2: arthanirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt : yogayoḥ vā pratyayayoḥ vā iti . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9075_3: ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe : etayoḥ iti arthanirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9077: vikārāvayavayoḥ vikārāvayavayuktatvāt mayaṭpratiṣedhārtham ñitaḥ ca tatpratyayāt añaḥ vidhānam . vikāraḥ vikāreṇa yujyate avayavena avayavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9078_0: vikārāvayavayoḥ vikārāvayavayuktatvāt mayaṭ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca añ eva syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9078_1: . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti mayaṭpratiṣedhārtham ñitaḥ ca tatpratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9078_2: añaḥ vidhānam . evamartham idam ucyate . na vā dṛṣṭaḥ hi avayave samudāyaśabdaḥ vikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:9078_3: ca prakṛtiśabdaḥ tasmāt mayaḍabhāvaḥ . na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9078_4: dṛṣṭaḥ hi avayave samudāyaśabdaḥ . tat yathā pūrve pañcālāḥ uttare pañcālāḥ tailam
GS24pmbhasuu:9078_5: bhuktam ghṛtam bhuktam . vikāre ca prakṛtiśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9079: śālīn bhuṅkte mudgaiḥ . śālīvikāram mudgavikāreṇa iti . tasmāt mayaṭ ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9080: na bhaviṣyati . na etat vivadāmahe . avayave samudāyaśabdaḥ asti na asti iti vikāre vā prakṛtiśabdaḥ iti . kim tarhi vikārāvayavaśabdaḥ api tu asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9081: . tataḥ utpattiḥ prāpnoti . vikārāvayavaśabdāt prasaṅgaḥ iti cet na tena
GS24pmbhasuu:9082: anabhidhānāt . vikārāvayavaśabdāt prasaṅgaḥ iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9083: tena anabhidhānāt . na hi vikārāvayavaśabdāt utpadyamānena pratyayena arthasya abhidhānam syāt . anabhidhānāt tataḥ utapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9084: tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam . abhidhāne hi anyataḥ api mayaṭprasaṅgaḥ . abhidhāne hi sati anyataḥ api mayaṭ prasajyeta :
GS24pmbhasuu:9085: bailvasya vikāraḥ iti . tasmāt tatpratyayāntāt lugvacanam . tasmāt tatpratyayāntāt luk vaktavyaḥ . yadi luk ucyate katham gaumayam bhasma
GS24pmbhasuu:9086_0: drauvayam mānam kāpitthaḥ rasaḥ iti . anyatra gomayāt druvayāt phalāt ca luk vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9086_1: . iha tarhi auṣṭrakī añantāt iti īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9086_2: auṣṭrikā iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9087_0: paṭhanti . vuñaḥ ca añ kṛtaprasaṅgaḥ iti . iha tarhi pālāśī samit iti anupasarjanalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9087_1: īkāraḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam añ yaḥ anuparsarjanam iti . añantāt anupasarjanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9087_2: iti evam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . kāśakṛtsninā proktā mīmāṃsā
GS24pmbhasuu:9087_3: kāśakṛtsnī tām adhīte kāśakṛtsnā brāhmaṇī iti . aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9087_4: astu na tena anabhibhānāt iti eva . iha tarhi kāpotaḥ rasaḥ it prāṇiśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9088: na upapadyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . atha yaḥ asau
GS24pmbhasuu:9089: ādyaḥ kapotaḥ salomakaḥ sapakṣaḥ na ca samprati praṇiti katham tatra prāṇiśabdaḥ vartate iti . atha matam etat prakṛtyanvayāḥ vikārāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9090: iti iha api na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9092: krīte ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti parimāṇāt vikārāvayavayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9093_0: āhosvit parimāṇāt krīte ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti vikārāvayavayoḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9093_1: ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate krīte ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ te bhavanti parimāṇāt vikārāvayavayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9093_2: iti pratyayamātram prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate parimāṇāt krīte ye pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9094_0: prakṛtimātrāt prāpnuvanti . tasmāt krītavat parimāṇāt aṅgam ca . aṅgam ca krītavat
GS24pmbhasuu:9094_1: iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . krītavat iti vatinirdeśaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9094_2: . yadi ca yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ yena viśeṣeṇa krīte pratyayāḥ vihitāḥ tābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9094_3: tena viśeṣeṇa vikārāvayavayoḥ bhavanti tataḥ amī krītavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ . atha hi prakṛtimātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9094_4: vā syuḥ pratyayamātram vā syāt na amī krītavat kṛtāḥ syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9096_0: aṇaḥ vṛddhāt mayaṭ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . aṇaḥ avakāśaḥ tittiḍīka taittiḍīkam
GS24pmbhasuu:9096_1: . mayaṭaḥ avakāśaḥ kāṣṭhamayam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . śākamayam . oḥ añaḥ anudāttādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9096_2: añaḥ ca mayaṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . oḥ añaḥ avakāśaḥ āraḍavam . mayaṭaḥ saḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9096_3: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dārumayam . anudāttādeḥ añ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ kauvalam
GS24pmbhasuu:9096_4: jaradvṛkṣa jāradvṛkṣam . mayaṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9097: āmramayam . mayaṭaḥ prāṇyañ vipratiṣedhena . mayaṭaḥ prāṇyañ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9098: vipratiṣedhena . prāṇyañaḥ avakāśaḥ gṛdhra gārdhram . mayaṭaḥ saḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9099_0: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cāṣam bhāsam . prāṇyañ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9099_1: apavādaḥ mayaṭ . na vā eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam añaḥ mayaṭaḥ ca . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9099_2: . anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ mayaṭ . anavakāśaḥ mayaṭ sāvakāśam añam bādhiṣyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9099_3: katham anavakāśaḥ . yadi anuvartante śaiṣikāḥ . atha nivṛttāḥ śaiṣikāḥ vṛddham ādyudāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:9099_4: mayaṭaḥ avakāśaḥ prāṇyañaḥ ca . ayam ca api ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam mayaṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9099_5: prāṇyañaḥ ca . kim kāraṇam . anavakāśatvāt apavādaḥ mayaṭ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9100_0: anavakāśaḥ mayaṭ . saḥ yathā eva oḥ añam anudāttādeḥ añam ca bādhate evam prāṇyañam
GS24pmbhasuu:9100_1: api bādheta . tasmāt mayaḍvidhāne prāṇipratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt mayaḍvidhāne prāṇibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9100_2: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān
GS24pmbhasuu:9100_3: vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam mayaṭ oḥ añam anudāttādeḥ añam ca bādhiṣyate . prāṇyañam
GS24pmbhasuu:9100_4: na bādhiṣyate . yadi etat asti madhye apavādāḥ purastāt apavādāḥ iti mā anuvṛtan
GS24pmbhasuu:9100_5: śaiṣikāḥ . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam aṇ añam bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9101: mayaṭam na bādhiṣyate . anudāttādeḥ añaḥ prāṇyañ vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9102: anudāttādeḥ añaḥ prāṇyañ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . anudāttādeḥ añ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9103_0: iti asya avakāśaḥ jaradvṛkṣa jāradvṛkṣam . prāṇyañaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9103_1: . kapota kāpotam . prāṇyañ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ tena vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9103_2: sati anena vā . sāpavādakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ . ayam punaḥ nirapavādakaḥ . yadi tena syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9103_3: iha na syāt . śvāvidhaḥ vikāraḥ śauvāvidham

GS24pmbhasuu:9106: ekāntadarśanāt prāpnoti . ekāntadarśanāt prasaṅgaḥ iti cet vṛkṣe lugvacanam . ekāntadarśanāt prasaṅgaḥ iti cet vṛkṣe luk vaktavyaḥ . vṛkṣaḥ api phalaikāntaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9107: (P_4,3.166) KA_II,327.20-328.3 Ro_III,741 lupprakaraṇe phalapākaśuṣām upasaṅkhyānam . lupprakaraṇe phalapākaśuṣām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9108: vrīhayaḥ yavāḥ māṣāḥ mudgāḥ tilāḥ . puṣpamūleṣu ca bahulam . puṣpamūleṣu ca bahulam lup vaktavyaḥ . mallikā karavīram bisam mṛṇālam . na ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9110_0: (P_4,4.1) KA_II,329.2-10 Ro_III,742 ṭhakprakaraṇe tat āha iti māśabdādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9110_1: . ṭhakprakaraṇe tat āha iti māśabdādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māśabdikaḥ naityaśabdikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9110_2: kāryaśabdikaḥ . āhau prabhūtādibhyaḥ . āhau prabhūtādibhyaḥ ṭhak vaktavyaḥ . prabhūtam
GS24pmbhasuu:9110_3: āha prābhūtikaḥ . pāryāptikaḥ . pṛcchatau susnātādibhyaḥ . pṛcchatau susnātādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9111: gacchatau paradārādibhyaḥ . gacchatau paradārādibhyaḥ ṭhak vaktavyaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:9114_0: cit ṣidartham . tatra na jñāyate keṣām sāṃhitikam ṣatvam keṣām ṣidartham iti . parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9114_1: kartavyam . ākarṣāt parpādeḥ bhastrādibhyaḥ kusīdsūtrāt ca āvasathāt kisarādeḥ ṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9115: (P_4,4.17) KA_II,329.17 Ro_III,743 vīvadhāt ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9118: vibhaṣā mā bhūt . na etat asti prayojanam . pūrvasmin eva yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:9119_0: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam nivṛttam . idam tarhi prayojanam . treḥ mamnityavacanam viṣayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9119_1: . nityam tryantam mabviṣayam eva yathā syāt . kevalasya prayogaḥ mā bhūt . asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9119_2: etat . kim tarhi iti. tatra yathādhikāram tadviṣayaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra yathādhikāram
GS24pmbhasuu:9120: prāpnoti . nirvṛtte it vartate . tena nirvṛtte eva tryantam mabviṣayam syāt . ye anye upacārāḥ tatra na syāt . kṛtrimam mahat suvihitam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9121: evam tarhi bhāve iti prakṛtya imap vaktavyaḥ kuṭṭimā bhūmiḥ sekimaḥ asiḥ iti evamartham . tataḥ vaktavyam treḥ . treḥ map bhavati . tataḥ nityam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9122: nityam tryantāt imap iti . kimartham idam . nityam tryantam imabviṣaye eva yathā syāt . kevalasya prayogaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9123: (P_4,4.23) KA_II,330.14-15 Ro_III,745 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:9124: katham cūrṇī cūrṇinau cūrṇinaḥ iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9125: (P_4,4.24) KA_II,330.17-331.2 Ro_III,745 lavaṇāt lugvacanānarthakyam rasavācivtāt . lavaṇāt lugvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . rasavācivtāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9126: . rasavācī eṣaḥ lavaṇaśabdaḥ . na eṣaḥ saṃsṛṣṭanimittaḥ . ātaḥ ca rasavācī
GS24pmbhasuu:9127: . asaṃsṛṣṭe ca darśanāt . asaṃsṛṣṭe api hi lavaṇaśabdaḥ vartate . tat yathā . lavaṇam kṣīram lavaṇam pānīyam iti . saṃsṛṣṭe ca adarśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9128: saṃsṛṣṭe api ca yadā na upalabhyate tadā āha . alavaṇaḥ sūpaḥ alavaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9130: (P_4,4.30) KA_II,331.4-13 Ro_III,746 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . yat asau alpam dattvā bahu gṛhṇāti tat garhyam . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9131: prayacchati garhāya iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . garhyārtham garhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9132_0: mesyāllopaḥ vā . mesyācchabdalopaḥ vā draṣṭavyaḥ . dviguṇam me syāt iti prayacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:9132_1: dvaiguṇikaḥ . traiguṇikaḥ . vṛddheḥ vṛdhuṣibhāvaḥ . vṛddheḥ vṛdhuṣibhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9133: (P_4,4.41) KA_II,331.15-16 Ro_III,746 adharmāt ca . adharmāt ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9136: nṛnarābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . nuḥ dharmyā nārī . narasya api nārī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9137_0: viśasituḥ iḍlopaḥ ca . viśasituḥ iḍlopaḥ ca añ ca vaktavyaḥ . viśasituḥ dharmyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9137_1: vaiśastram . vibhājayituḥ ṇilopaḥ ca . vibhājayituḥ ṇilopaḥ ca añ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9138_0: (P_4,4.55) KA_II,332.4-6 Ro_III,747 kim yasya mṛdaṅgaḥ śilpam saḥ mārdaṅgikaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9138_1: ca ataḥ . kumbhakāre prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . śilpam iva
GS24pmbhasuu:9140_0: (P_4,4.59) KA_II,332.8-15 Ro_III,748 kimartham idam ucyate . na kak eva ucyate kā
GS24pmbhasuu:9140_1: rūpasiddhiḥ : śāktīkaḥ yāṣṭīkaḥ iti . śaktiyaṣṭyoḥ īkāraḥ ante kaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9140_2: . na sidhyati . vibhāṣā ca eva hi śaktiyaṣṭyoḥ īkāraḥ api ca ke aṇaḥ iti hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9141_0: kā rūpasiddhiḥ . śāktīkaḥ yāṣṭīkaḥ iti . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9141_1: . yasya iti ca lopaḥ prāpnoti . ikāroccāraṇasāmārthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9142: savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9143: yasya iti lopam ca prati ikāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya tu nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9144: (P_4,4.60) KA_II,332.17-19 Ro_III,749 kim yasya asti matiḥ saḥ āstikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9145: . kim ca ataḥ . caure api prāpnoti . evam tarhi itilopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9146: asti iti asya matiḥ āstikaḥ . na asti iti asya matiḥ nāstikaḥ . diṣṭam iti asya matiḥ daiṣṭikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9148: śīlam saḥ chātraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . rājapuruṣe prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ. chatram iva chatram . guruḥ chatram .
GS24pmbhasuu:9149: guruṇā śiṣyaḥ chatravat chādyaḥ śiṣyeṇa ca guruḥ chatravat paripālyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9150: (P_4,4.65) KA_II,333.4-9 Ro_III,750 hitam bhakṣāḥ iti caturthīnirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9151: . hitam bhakṣāḥ iti caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . itarathā hi anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9152: itarathā hi nirdeśaḥ na bhavati . hitaśabdena ca yoge caturthī vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9153: sā prāpnoti . saḥ tarhi caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . evam vakṣyāmi . hitam bhakṣāḥ tasmai . tataḥ dīyate niyuktam . tat asmai iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_1: pratyayavidhānānarthakyam vihitatvāt . vahat iti abhidhāne rathaśakaṭahalasīrebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_2: pratyayavidhānam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vihitatvāt . vihitaḥ atra pratyayaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_3: idam iti . śabdabhedāt avidhānam . śabdabhedāt avidhiḥ saḥ bhavati . anyaḥ hi śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_4: ratham vahati anyaḥ hi rathasya voḍhā iti . śabdabhedāt avidhānam iti cet arthāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_5: pratyayavidhānasya arthasāmānyāt siddham . śabdabhedāt avidhānam iti cet arthāśrayaḥ
