GS24pmbhasuu:9154_6: pratyayavidhiḥ . saḥ eva artha ratham vahati saḥ eva rathasya voḍhā iti . tatra arthasāmānyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9154_7: siddham . idam tarhi prayojanam . yaḥ dvau rathau vahati saḥ dvirathyaḥ . yaḥ dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9155: voḍhā saḥ dvirathaḥ . tena sati luk bhavati . anena sati kasmāt na bhavati . prāk dīvyataḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9156: (P_4,4.82) KA_II,334.2-6 Ro_III,751-752 kim nipātyate . jananyāḥ janībhāvaḥ nipātyate yat ca pratyayaḥ . janyāḥ iti nipātanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9157: pañcamīnirdeśāt . janyāḥ iti nipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9158: pañcamīnirdeśāt . jananīśabdāt eṣā pañcamī . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9159: sarvakālaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . janīm vahanti janyāḥ . janīm voḍhāraḥ janyāḥ . janīm avākṣuḥ janyāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9160: (P_4,4.83) KA_II,334.8-13 Ro_III,752 vidhyati akaraṇena . vidhyati akaraṇena iti vaktavyam . itarathā ha atiprasaṅgaḥ . adhanuṣā iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9161: atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prasajyeta . śarkarābhiḥ vidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9162: kaṇṭakaiḥ vidhyati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati śarkarābhiḥ vidhyati kaṇṭakaiḥ vidhyati iti . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9164: ucyate . tatra dakṣiṇāgnau api prāpnoti . dakṣiṇāgniḥ api gṛhapatinā
GS24pmbhasuu:9165_0: saṃyujyate . evam tarhi gṛhapatinā saṃyukte iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca gṛhapatinā saṃyuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9165_1: . tatra prakarṣagatiḥ bhaviṣyati : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ gṛhapatinā saṃyuktaḥ iti . kaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9165_2: sādhīyaḥ . yasmin patnīsaṃyājyāḥ kriyante . atha vā gṛhapatiḥ nāma mantraḥ . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9165_3: yasmin ucyate . atha vā sañjñāyām iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9167: māsatanvoḥ anantarārthe vā iti vaktavyam . madhu asmin asiti madhu anantaram vā madhavyaḥ mādhavaḥ . lugakārekārarephāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9168: lugakārekārarephāḥ ca pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ . luk madhuḥ tapaḥ nabhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9169: akāraḥ iṣaḥ ūrjaḥ . ikāraḥ śuciḥ . rephaḥ ca śukraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9170_1: akṣarasamūhe chandasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . o śrāvaya iti caturakṣaram . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:9170_2: śrauṣaṭ iti caturakṣaram . ye yajāmahe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9171_0: pañcākṣaram . yaja iti dvyakṣaram . dvyakṣaraḥ vaṣaṭkāraḥ . eṣaḥ vai saptadaśākṣaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9171_1: chandasyaḥ prajñāpatiḥ yajñam anu vihitaḥ . chandasi bahubhirvasavyairupasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9171_2: . chandasi bahubhirvasavyairupasaṅkhyānam hastau pṛṇasva bahuviḥ vasavyaiḥ . agnirīśevasavyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9171_3: . agnirīśevasavyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9171_4: . na kartavyam . svārthavijñānāt siddham . svārthavijñānāt siddham etat . vasavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9172: (P_5,1.1) KA_II.336.2-23 Ro_IV.3-6 prāgvacanam kimartham . prāgvacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam prāgvacanam sakṛdvidhānārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9173_0: adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye aṇprasaṅgaḥ iti . iha api prāgvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9173_1: sakṛdvidhānārtham . sakṛt vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ vihitaḥ yathā syāt . yoge yoge tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9173_2: grahaṇam mā kārṣam iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9174: prayojanam . adhikārāt api etat siddham . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9175: anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ . adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9176: prāpnoti . ugavādibhyaḥ yat chaḥ ca iti chaḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt prāgvacanam kartavyam . atha kriymāṇe api prāgvacane katham idam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9177_0: . prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ āhosvit prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9177_1: vijñāyate prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti saḥ eva doṣaḥ apavādaviṣaye api chaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9177_2: iti . atha vijñāyate prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9178: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ yat cham
GS24pmbhasuu:9179: bādhiṣyate . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu. prāk krītāt ye arthāḥ iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi ayam prādhānyena artham pratinirdiśati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9180_0: itarathā hi bahvyaḥ tatra prakṛtayaḥ paṭhyante . tataḥ yām kām cit evam prakṛtim
GS24pmbhasuu:9180_1: avadhitvena upādadīta . atha vā punaḥ astu prāk krītāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:9180_2: ca uktam apavādaviṣaye api chaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na vā kva cit vāvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9180_3: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . kva cit vāvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9181: yat ayam kvac vāvacanam karoti vibhāṣā havirapūpādibhyaḥ iti tat jñāpayati na apavādaviṣaye chaḥ bhavati iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ prāgvacanena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9182_0: adhikārāt siddham . nanu ca uktam adhikārāt siddham iti cet apavādaviṣaye chaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9182_1: iti . parihṛtam etat ṇa vā kva cit vāvacanāt iti . atha kimartham iyān avadhiḥ gṛhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9182_2: na prāk ṭhañaḥ iti eva ucyeta . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ artheṣu ayam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9183: . samāne arthe prakṛtiviśeṣāt utpadyamānaḥ yat cham bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9185: sanaṅgūpānahau prayojanam . yaññyau bhavataḥ añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9186_0: kim prayojanam ṣanaṅgūpānahau prayojanam . yataḥ avakāśaḥ śaṅkavyam dāru picavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9186_1: kārpāsaḥ . añaḥ avakāśaḥ vārdhram vāratram . sanaṅguḥ nāma carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9186_2: ubhayam prāpnoti . sanaṅgavyam carma . ñyasya avakāśaḥ aupānahyam dāru . añaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9186_3: eva . upānat nāma carmavikāraḥ tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . aupānahyam carma . ḍhañ
GS24pmbhasuu:9187: añaḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ḍhañaḥ avakāśaḥ chādiṣeyam tṛṇam . añaḥ saḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9188: . chadiḥ nām carmavikāraḥ . tasmāt ubhayam prāpnoti . chādiṣeyam carma .
GS24pmbhasuu:9189: ḍhañ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . havirapūpādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ yat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9191: havirapūpādibhyaḥ vibhāṣāyāḥ avakāśaḥ āmikṣyam āmikṣīyam puroḍāśyam puroḍāśīyam . yataḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . caravyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9192: yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . annavikārebhyaḥ ca . annavikārebhyaḥ ca vibhāṣāyāḥ yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . annavikārebhyaḥ ca vibhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9193_0: avakāśaḥ suryāḥ surīyāḥ . yataḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . saktavyāḥ dhānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9193_1: iti . yat bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9194: vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9196_0: paṭhyate. tatra eva ucyate nābhi nabham ca iti . tatra codyate . nābheḥ nabhabhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:9196_1: pratyayānupapattiḥ prakṛtyabhāvāt . nābheḥ nabhabhāve pratyayānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9196_2: . prakṛtyabhāvāt . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam na ca nābhisañjñikāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9196_3: vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ asti . yat eva hi tanmaṇḍalacakrāṇām maṇḍalacakram tat nabhyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9196_4: ucyate . siddham tu śākhādiṣu vacanāt hrasvatvam ca . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9197: katham . śākhādiṣu nābhiśabdaḥ paṭhitavyaḥ hrasvatvam ca vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9198: nābhiḥ iva nabhyam iti . kaḥ punaḥ iha upamārthaḥ . yat tat akṣadhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9199_0: parivartanam vā . aparaḥ āha : yat tat añjanopāñjanam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9199_1: vaktavyam nābhi nabham ca iti . vaktavyam ca . kim prayojanam . yāni etāni aravanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9200: prakṛtiḥ asti . yāni ca api anaravanti cakrāṇi tadartham api idam vaktavyam . dṛśyate hi samudāyāt avayavasya pṛthaktvam . tat yathā vārkṣī
GS24pmbhasuu:9201: śākhā iti . guṇāntarayogāt ca vikāraśabdaḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā vaibhītakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9202: yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti . tatra avayavasamudāye vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9203: atha yaḥ nabhyārthaḥ vṛkṣaḥ katham tatra bhavitavyam . nabhyaḥ vṛkṣaḥ nabhyā śiṃśipā iti . nabhyāt tu lugvacanam . nabhyāt tu luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9204: saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9206: (P_5,1.3) KA_II.338.17-21 Ro_IV.10 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham aśītiśatam kambalyam iti . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9207: aparimāṇavistācitakambalebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki iti . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9208: sañjñāyām iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . kambalīyāḥ ūrṇāḥ . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:9209: asti prayojanam . parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāse prāpte tatra kambalagrahaṇam kriyate parimāṇārtham parimāṇam ca sañjñā eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9210: (P_5,1.4) KA_II.338.23-339.2 Ro_IV.10-11 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . uvarṇāntāt iti vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9211: nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:9212: havirapūpādibhyaḥ aprāpte vibhāṣā . prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . caravyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9213: (P_5,1.6) KA_II.339.4-5 Ro_IV.11 yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca . yatprakaraṇe rathāt ca upasaṅkhyānam . rathāya hitā rathyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9214: (P_5,1.7) KA_II.339.7-18 Ro_IV.11-12 vṛṣaśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ gṛhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9215: . vṛṣanśabdaḥ api nakārāntaḥ asti . tasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9216_0: vṛṣaśabdaḥ ca ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9216_1: . tathā brahmanśabdaḥ nakārāntaḥ gṛhyate . brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ ca akārāntaḥ asti . tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9217: vaktavyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti eva yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9218: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . samānārthau etau vṛṣaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9219: vṛṣanśabdaḥ ca brahmanśabdaḥ brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ ca . ātaḥ ca samānārthau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9220: evam hi āha . kutaḥ nu carasi brahman . kutaḥ nu carasi brāhmaṇa iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9221_0: tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9221_1: aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9221_2: āvikam iti . evam iha api vṛṣāya hitam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_0: vigṛhya vṛṣyam iti bhaviṣyati . vṛṣṇe hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . tathā brahmaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_1: hitam iti vigṛhya brahmaṇyam iti bhaviṣyati . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ hitam iti vigṛhya vākyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9222_2: eva bhaviṣyati . traiśabdyam ca iha sādhyam . tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9223: (P_5,1.9.1) KA_II.339.20-340.18 Ro_IV.12-14 bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ pūrvapadārthahitatvāt . bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9224: agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadārthahitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9225_0: uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ pūrvapadārthapradhāne ca pratyayaḥ iṣyate . pitṛbhogāya
GS24pmbhasuu:9225_1: hite prāpnoti pitre ca eva hite iṣyate . evam tarhi bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9225_2: . bhogīnar iti cet vāvacanam . bhogīnar iti yadi pratyayaḥ vidhīyate vāvacanam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9226: yathā syāt . rājācāryābhyām nityam . rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9227: rājabhogīnaḥ . ācāryāt aṇatvam ca . ācāryabhogīnaḥ . kim bhogīnarpratyayaḥ vidhīyate iti ataḥ rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:9228: sarvathā rājācāryābhyām nityam iti vaktavyam . iha ca grāmaṇibhogīnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9229: senānibhogīnaḥ iti uttarapade iti hrasvatvam na prāpnoti . iha ca abbhoginaḥ iti apaḥ bhi iti tatvam prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9230: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhogottarapadāt khavidhāne anirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9231: pūrvapadārthahitatvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam bhogaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā bhogavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_0: sasnāni ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ . tat yathā bhogavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_1: ucyate yaḥ samyak snānādīḥ kriyāḥ anubhavati . tat yaḥ kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9232_2: grahaṇam . yaḥ ca pitṛsthābhyaḥ kriyābhyaḥ hitaḥ sambandhāt asau pitre api hitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9233_0: dravyapadārthakasya api grahaṇam . yaḥ api hi pitṛdravyāya hitaḥ sambandhāt asau
GS24pmbhasuu:9233_1: pitre hitaḥ bhavati . atha vā bhogaśabdaḥ śarīravācī api drśyate . tat yathā ahiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9233_2: iva bhogaiḥ paryeti bāhum iti. ahiḥ iva śarīraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9234: iti gamyate . evam pitṛśarīrāya hitaḥ pitṛbhogīṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9235: (P_5,1.9.2) KA_II.340.19-341.6 Ro_IV.14-15 khavidhāne pañcajanāt upasaṅkhyānam . khavidhāne pañcajanāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9236: pañcajanāya hitaḥ pañcajanīnaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi pañcānām janāya hitaḥ pañcajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati . sarvajanāt ṭhañ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9237: sarvajanāt ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ khaḥ ca . sarvajanāya hitaḥ sārvajanikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9238: sārvajanīnaḥ . samānādhikaraṇe iti ca vaktavyam . yaḥ hi sarveṣām janāya hitaḥ sarvajanīyaḥ saḥ . mahājanāt nityam . mahājanāt nityam ṭhañ
GS24pmbhasuu:9239: vaktavyaḥ . mahājanāya hitaḥ māhājanikaḥ . tatpuruṣe iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9240: bahuvrīhau mā bhūt iti . mahān janaḥ asya mahājanaḥ mahājanāya hitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9241_0: mahājanīyaḥ . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi iti upādhiḥ kriyate ādyanyāse api upādhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9241_1: kartavyaḥ . ātmanviśvajane samānādhikaraṇe iti vaktavyam . yaḥ his viśveṣām janāya
GS24pmbhasuu:9241_2: hitaḥ viśvajanīyaḥ saḥ bhavati . atha matam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9242: anabhidhānāt ādyanyāse na bhaviṣyati iti iha api na arthaḥ upādhigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9244_0: (P_5,1.10) KA_II.341.8-13 Ro_IV. 15-16 sarvāt ṇasya vāvacanam . sarvāt ṇasya vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9244_1: vaktavyam . sārvaḥ sarvīyaḥ . puruṣāt vadhe . puruṣāt vadhe iti vaktavyam : pauruṣeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9244_2: vadhaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate : puruṣāt vadhe iti . puruṣāt vadhavikārasamūhatenakṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9244_3: iti vaktavyam : pauruṣeyaḥ vadhaḥ , pauruṣeyaḥ vikāraḥ , pauruṣeyaḥ samūhaḥ , tena
GS24pmbhasuu:9245: (P_5,1.12) KA_II.341.15-20 Ro_IV.16 tadartham iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ
GS24pmbhasuu:9246: . tadartham iti kṛtyanāmabhyaḥ ṭhañ vaktavyaḥ . indramahārtham aindramahiham gāṅgāmahiham kāśeruyajñikam . na vā prayojanena kṛtatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9247: na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prayojanena kṛtatvāt . yat hi indramahārtham indramahaḥ tasya prayojanam bhavati . tatra prayojanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9249_1: upadhyartham iti pratyayasya iha anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . upadhyabhāvāt . vikṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9249_2: prakṛtau abhidheyāyām pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca upadhisañjñikāyāḥ vikṛteḥ prakṛtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9250: rathāṅgam tat aupadheyam iti ucyate . siddham tu kṛdantasya svārthe añvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . kṛdantasya svārthe añ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9251_0: upadhīyate upadheyam . upadheyam eva aupadheyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9251_1: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam upadhyartham iti pratyayānupapattiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9251_2: na etat asti . ayam upadhiśabdaḥ asti eva karmasādhanaḥ . upadhīyate upadhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9251_3: . asti bhāvasādhanaḥ . upadhānam upadhiḥ iti . tat yaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9252: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vikṛteḥ prakṛtau iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9253_0: prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇam nivartiṣyate . tat ca avaśyam nivartyam ihārtham uttarātham
GS24pmbhasuu:9253_1: ca . ihārtham tāvat . bāleyāḥ taṇḍulāḥ . uttarārtham ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ . ārṣabhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9253_2: vatsaḥ iti . atha tadartham iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham
GS24pmbhasuu:9253_3: arthaḥ . tat asya tat asmin syāt iti tadarthe yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . prāsādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9254_0: iti . prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti . yadi tadartham iti anuvartate ṛṣabhopānahoḥ ñyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9254_1: ṛṣabhārthaḥ ghāsaḥ upānadarthaḥ tilakalkaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . evam tarhi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9255: balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . kim punaḥ bhavān vikāram matvā āha
GS24pmbhasuu:9256_0: balyṛṣabhayoḥ na sidhyati iti . yadi tāvat yaḥ prakṛtyupamardena bhavati saḥ vikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9256_1: vaibhītakaḥ yūpaḥ khādiram caṣālam iti na sidhyati . atha matam etat eva guṇāntarayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9256_2: vikāraḥ iti balyṛṣabhayoḥ api siddham bhavati . guṇantarayuktāḥ hi taṇḍulāḥ bāleyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9256_3: guṇāntarayuktaḥ ca vatsaḥ ārṣabhaḥ . aupadheyam tu na sidhyati . vacanāt svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9257_0: (P_5,1.16) KA_II.342.22-343.6 Ro_IV.19-21 syādgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9257_1: prāsādaḥ devadattasya prākāraḥ nagarasya iti . atha kriyamāṇe api syādgrahaṇe iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9257_2: kasmāt na bhavati . prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9258: prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti . śakyārthe liṅ iti vaktavyam . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9259: . idānīm eva hi uktam na hi upādheḥ upādhiḥ bhavati viśeṣaṇasya vā viśeṣaṇam iti . evam tarhi itikaraṇaḥ kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9260_0: . vivakṣā ca dvayī . asti eva prāyoktrī vivakṣā asti laukikī . prayoktā hi mṛdvyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9260_1: snigdhayā ślakṣṇayā jihvayā mṛdūn snigdhān ślakṣṇān śabdān prayuṅkte . laukikī vivakṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9260_2: yatra prāyasya sampratyayaḥ . prāyaḥ iti lokaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9261_0: vyapadiśyate . na ca prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt prākāraḥ nagarasya syāt iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9261_1: utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya sampratyayaḥ syāt . yadi evam na arthaḥ syādgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:9261_2: . na hi prāsādaḥ devadattasya syāt prākāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9262: nagarasya syāt iti atra utpadyamānena pratyayena prāyasya sampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9263_0: (P_5,1.19.1) KA_II.343.8-344.10 Ro_IV.22-25 kimartham saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9263_1: na saṅkhyā api parimāṇam eva tatra parimāṇaparyudāsena paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9263_2: tarhi siddhe sati yat saṅkhyayāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9264: parimāṇam iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9265_0: aparimāṇabistācitakambaelbhyaḥ na taddhitaluki iti dvābhyām śatābhyām krītā dviśatā
GS24pmbhasuu:9265_1: triśatā parimāṇaparyudāsena na bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate tat asya parimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9265_2: saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu iti viśeṣaṇam na prakalpate parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9266: parimāṇat iti saṅkhyāvihitasya pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9267: śatasya vikāraḥ śatyaḥ śatikaḥ . sāhasraḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyā saṅkhyā anyat parimāṇam iti . nyāyasiddham eva etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9268: . bhedamātram saṅkhyā āha . yat ca iṣīkāntam yat ca aparimāṇam sarvasya saṅkhyā bhedamātram bravīti . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ . sarvataḥ mānam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9269: ca ataḥ parimāṇam iti . prasthasya ca samānākṛteḥ na kutaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ gamyate na ca unmānataḥ na parimāṇataḥ na pramāṇataḥ . kim punaḥ unmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9270: kim parimāṇam kim pramāṇam . ūrdhvamānam kila unmānam . ūrdhvam yat mīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9271: tat unmānam . parimāṇam tu sarvataḥ . sarvataḥ mānam iti ca ataḥ parimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9272: . kuta etat . pariḥ sarvatobhāve vartate . āyāmaḥ tu pramāṇam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9273: āyāmavivakṣāyām pramāṇam iti etat bhavati . saṅkhyā bāhyā tu sarvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9274: ātaḥ ca sarvataḥ saṅkhyā bāhyā . bhedabhāvam bravīti eṣā na eṣā mānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9275_0: kutaḥ cana . evam ca kṛtvā saṅkhyāyāḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate . yat api ucyate tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9275_1: asya parimāṇam saṅkhyāyāḥ sañjñāsaṅghasūtrādhyayaneṣu iti viśeṣaṇam na prakalpate
GS24pmbhasuu:9275_2: iti . āha ayam parimāṇam yā saṅkhyā iti . na ca asti saṅkhyā parimāṇam . tatra vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9275_3: iyatī vivakṣā bhaviṣyati . yad api ucyate krītavat parimāṇat iti saṅkhyāvihitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9275_4: pratyayasya atideśaḥ na prakalpate iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti ca tatra vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9276_0: (P_5,1.19.2) KA_II.344.11-345.7 Ro_IV.25-27 kim punaḥ ime ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9276_1: āhosvit saha arheṇa . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9276_2: . ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9277: arhe ṭhagādayaḥ vidheyāḥ . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ . sāharaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9278: vasne vasanāt siddham . iha yaḥ śatam arhati śatam tasya vasnaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9279: tatra saḥ asya aṃśavasnabhṛtayaḥ iti eva siddham . vasne vacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9280: iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ . vasne vacanāt siddham iti cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9281: kālāyasūpikaḥ . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9282: arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ iti na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9283: santu tarhi sahārheṇa . ā arhāt cet bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ . ā arhāt cet
GS24pmbhasuu:9284: bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhojanam arhati . pānam arhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9285: kim ucyate bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ iti yadā chedādibhyaḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9286_0: avaśyam māṃsaudanikādyartham yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat arhati . tataḥ chedādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9286_1: nityam iti . tasmin kriyamāṇe bhojanādiṣu atrprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9286_2: . anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt bhojanādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati [R: bhaviṣyati]
GS24pmbhasuu:9287_0: na kariṣyate . katham māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ . asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9287_1: dīyate asmai iti ca evam etat siddham . atha vā punaḥ astu prāk arhāt . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9287_2: ṭhagādayaḥ prāk arhāt cet arhe tadvidhiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_0: parihṛtam etat vasne vacanāt siddham iti . nanu ca uktam vasne vacanāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_1: cet māṃsaudanikādiṣu aprāptiḥ . māṃsaudanikaḥ atithiḥ śvaitacchatrikaḥ kālāyasūpikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_2: . tathā guṇānām paripraśnaḥ bhavati . kim ayam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati . śatam arhati śatyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_3: śatikaḥ sāhasraḥ naiṣkikaḥ iti na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asmin dīyate asmai iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9288_4: ca evam etat siddham (P_5,1.20.1) KA_II.345.9-25 Ro_IV. 27-29 asamāse iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9289_0: paramaniṣkeṇa krītam paramanaiṣkikam . na etat asti . niṣkaśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9289_1: . tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat paramaniṣkaśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9290_0: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9290_1: jñāpakam pūrvatra tadantāpratiṣedhasya . niṣkādiṣu asamāsagrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9290_2: . kim jñāpyam . pūrvatra tadantvidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:9290_3: prayojanam . prāk vateḥ ṭhañ iti atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9291: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantividhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . na ca ṭhañvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9292: kā cit prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā arhāt agopucchasaṅkhyāparimāṇāt ṭhak . paramagopucchena krītam pāramagopucchikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9293: . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9294: vidhau pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ itaḥ uttaram tadantavidheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:9296: traipārāyaṇikaḥ . atra tadantavidhiḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9297: tadantagrahaṇam aluki . pūrvatra eva tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9298: khalayavamāṣatilavṛṣabrahmaṇaḥ ca iti . kṛṣṇatilebhyaḥ hitaḥ kṛṣṇatilyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9301: tadantagrahaṇam aluki . prāk vateḥ saṅkhyāpūrvapadānām tadantagrahaṇam aluki kartavyam . pāryāṇaturāyaṇacāndrāyaṇam vartayati dvaipārāyaṇikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9302: traipārāyaṇikaḥ . aluki iti kimartham . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam
GS24pmbhasuu:9303: dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9304: (P_5,1.21) KA_II.346.6-8 Ro_IV.30-31 śatapratiṣedhe anyaśatatve apratiṣedhaḥ . śatapratiṣedhe anyaśatatve pratiṣedhaḥ na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9305: vaktavyam. iha mā bhūt . śatena krītam śatyam śāṭakaśatam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9307: (P_5,1.22) KA_II.346.10-18 Ro_IV.31-32 ḍateḥ ca iti vaktavyam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:9308: yathā syāt . katibhiḥ krītam katikam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9309: tyantāyāḥ na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . tipratiṣedhāt ḍatigrahaṇam iti cet arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . arthavataḥ tiśabdasya grahaṇam na ca ḍateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9310: tiśabdaḥ arthavān . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . na hi kevalena
GS24pmbhasuu:9311: pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate . kena tarhi . saprakṛtikena . kva tarhi eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_0: paribhāṣā bhavati . yāni etāni śabdasaṅghātagrahaṇāni . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_1: vaktavyam . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham . nanu ca uktam na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:9312_2: . na hi kevalena pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9313: iti . kevalena api pratyayena arthaḥ gamyate . katham . uktam anvayavyatirekābhyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:9314: (P_5,1.23) KA_II.346.20-347.8 Ro_IV.32-33 kasya ayam iṭ vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_0: kanaḥ iti āha . tat kanaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . akriyamāṇe hi kanaḥ grahaṇe pratyayādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_1: pratyayaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati . asti anyat ṭitkaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_2: prayojanam . ṭitaḥ iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . akārāntaprakaraṇe īkāraḥ na ca eṣaḥ akārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_3: . evam api kutaḥ etat ṭitkaraṇasāmarthyāt ādiḥ bhaviṣyati na punaḥ akārāntaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_4: sati anakārāntāt api īkāraḥ syāt . tasmāt kaṇaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_5: . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ atiśadantāyāḥ kan iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_6: prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . vatoḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_7: prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9315_8: . na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyāḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9318: triṃśatkaḥ viṃśatkaḥ . katham ca atra kan bhavati . saṅkhyāyāḥ kan bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9319: iti . atiśadantāyāḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9320: jñāpayati bhavati atra kan iti yat ayam viṃśatikāt khaḥ iti pratyayāntanipātanam karoti . viṃśateḥ etat jñāpakam syāt . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:9321: yogāpekṣam jñāpakam . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . viṃśatitriṃśabhyām kan bhavati iti . tataḥ ḍvun asañjñāyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9322_0: (P_5,1.25) KA_II.347.16-20 Ro_IV.34 ṭithan ardhāt ca . ṭithan ardhāt ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9322_1: . ardhikaḥ ardhikī . kārṣāpaṇāt vā pratiḥ ca . kārṣāpaṇāt ṭiṭhan vaktavyaḥ vā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9322_2: pratiḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kārṣāpaṇikaḥ kārṣāpaṇikī pratikaḥ pratikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9323: (P_5,1.28) KA_II.347.22-349.4 Ro_IV.35-37 dvigoḥ luki uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam.
GS24pmbhasuu:9324: arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . iha api dvigoḥ luki tannimittagrahaṇam kartavyam . dvigoḥ nimittam yaḥ taddhitaḥ tasya luk
GS24pmbhasuu:9325: bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam
GS24pmbhasuu:9327: arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api . arthaviśeṣasya asampratyaye atannimittāt api vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . dvayoḥ śūrpayoḥ samāhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9328: dviśūrpī . dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam iti eva yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9329_0: atha kriyamāṇe api tannimittagrahaṇe katham idam vijñāyate . tasya nimittam tannimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:9329_1: tannimittāt iti āhosvit saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9329_2: kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate tasya nimittam tannimittam tannimittāt iti kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9330_0: . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam . triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9330_1: . traiśaurpikam . atha vijñāyate saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9330_2: iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . yatha na doṣaḥ tathā astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:9331_0: saḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam tannimittaḥ tannimittāt iti vijñāyate . kutaḥ etat . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9331_1: ayam āha arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . tat tarhi tannimittagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9331_2: kartavyam . na kartavyam . dvigoḥ iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . sambandhaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:9332: kim ca dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . nimittam . yasmin dviguḥ iti etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9333: kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . idam tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9334: arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . etat ca na vaktavyam . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam . dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9335: triśūrpam . dviśūrpeṇa krītam dvaiśaurpikam . traiśaurpikam iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ ekena vigrahaḥ aparasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9336_0: aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā . aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9336_1: . evam iha api dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam iti vigṛhya dviśūrpam iti bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9336_2: dviśūrpyā krītam iti vigṛhya vākyam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9337_0: bhaviṣyati . atha asañjñāyām iti kimartham . pāñcalohitikam pāñcakalāpikam . sañjñāpratiṣedhānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9337_1: ca tannimittatvāt lopasya . sañjñāpratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . tannimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9337_2: lopasya . na antareṇa taddhitam taddhitasya ca lukam dviguḥ sañjñā asti . yaḥ tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_0: na asu tannimittam syāt . evam tarhi idam syāt . pañcānām lohitānām samāhāraḥ pañcalohitī
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_1: pañcalohityā krītam . atra api pañcalohitam iti eva bhavitavyam . katham . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_2: hi etat arthaviśeṣāsampratyaye atannimittāt api iti . uktam saṅkhyātve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9338_3: tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . uktam saṅkhyātve adhyardhagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9339_0: prayojanam . kim uktam . adhyardhagrahaṇam ca samāsakanvidhyartham luki ca agrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9339_1: iti . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇānarthakyam . tasmāt iha adhyardhagrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_0: dvitribhyām iti yat ucyate dvaiyogyam etat draṣṭavyam . kim idam dvaiyogyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_1: dvayoḥ yogayoḥ bhavam dviyogam . dviyogasya bhāvaḥ dvaiyogyam iti . dveṣyam vijānīyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9342_2: : aviśeṣeṇa itaḥ uttaram dvitribhyām iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe : dvitribhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9343: tatra ca bahugrahaṇam . tatra ca bahugrahaṇam kartavyam . bahuniṣkam bahunaiṣkikam . bahubistam bahubaistikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9344: (P_5,1.33) KA_II.349.20-350.4 Ro_IV.38 khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_0: khāryāḥ īkan kevalāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam . khārīkam . kākiṇyāḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam .kākiṇyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9345_1: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . adhyardhakākiṇīkam dvikākiṇīkam . kevalāyāḥ ca . kevalāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9346_0: (P_5,1.35) KA_II.350.6-11 Ro_IV.38-39 śataśāṇābhyām vā . śataśāṇābhyām vā iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9346_1: . adhyardhaśatam adhyardhaśatyam pañcaśatam pañcaśatyam adhyardhaśāṇam adhyardhaśāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9347: . dvitripūrvāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . dviśāṇam triśāṇam dvaiśāṇam traiśāṇam dviśāṇyam triśāṇyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9348: (P_5,1.37) KA_II.350.13-351.6 Ro_IV.39-40 tena krītam iti karaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9349_0: tena krītam iti atra karaṇāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena krītam . yajñadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:9349_1: krītam iti . akartrekāntāt . akartrekāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . devadattena
GS24pmbhasuu:9350_0: saṅkhyaikavacanāt dvigoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9350_1: syāt . pañcabhiḥ krītam pañcakam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . ekavacanāntāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9350_2: iti vakṣyati . tasya ayam purastāt apakarṣaḥ . ekavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9351: . ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti . dvigoḥ ca . dvigoḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9352_0: dvābhyām śūrpābhyām krītam dviśūrpam triśūrpam iti . yadi ekavacanāntāt iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9352_1: mudgaiḥ krītam maudgikam māṣaiḥ krītam māṣikam iti na sidhyati . parimāṇasya saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9352_2: yat ekavacanam tadantāt iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi ekavacanāntāt iti vaktavyam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9353: na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati śūrpābhyām krītam . śūrpaiḥ krītam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9354: uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . yadi evam karaṇāt akartrekāntāt iti api na vaktavyam . kartuḥ kartrekāntāt vā kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9357: saṃyogaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati idam kṛtvā idam avāpyate iti . utpātaḥ nāma saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9358: bhavati yādṛcchikaḥ bhedaḥ vā chedaḥ vā padmam vā parṇam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9360: tasyanimittaprakaraṇe vātapittaśleṣmabhyaḥ śamakopanayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vātasya śamanam kopanam vā vātikam . paittikam ślaiṣmikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9361: sannipātāt ca . sannipātāt ca iti vaktavyam . sānnipātikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9363: yatprakaraṇe brahmavarcasāt ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . brahmavarcasasya nimittam brahmvarcasyaḥ . utpātaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9364: (P_5,1.47) KA_II.351.20-352.2 Ro_IV.41 tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9365: tad asmin dīyate asmai iti ca iti vaktavyam . pañca vṛddhiḥ vā āyaḥ vā lābhaḥ vā śulkaḥ vā upadā vā dīyate asmai pañcakaḥ . saptakaḥ . aṣṭakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9366: navakaḥ . daśakaḥ . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yat hi yasmai dīyate tasmin api tat dīyate . tat asmin dīyate iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9367: (P_5,1.48) KA_II.352.4-8 Ro_IV.41-42 ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam . ṭhanprakaraṇe anantāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dvitīyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9368_0: . tṛtīyakaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pūraṇāt iti ucyate . na ca etat pūraṇāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:9368_1: . anā etat paryavapannam . pūraṇam nāma arthaḥ . tam artham āha tīyaśabdaḥ . pūraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9368_2: saḥ asau bhavati . pūraṇantāt svārthe bhāge an . saḥ api pūraṇam bhavati eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9369: (P_5,1.52) KA_II.352.10-11 Ro_IV.42 tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca . tat pacati iti droṇāt aṇ ca iti vaktavyam . droṇam pacati . drauṇī . drauṇikī
GS24pmbhasuu:9370_0: (P_5,1.55) KA_II.352.13-15 Ro_IV.42-43 kulijāt ca iti siddhe lukkhagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9370_1: pūrvsamin trikabhāvāt . kulijāt ca iti eva siddham . na arthaḥ lukkhagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9371: pūrvasmin yoge sarvaḥ eṣaḥ trikaḥ nirdiśyate . dvyāḍhakī . dvyāḍhikī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9374: sañjñāyām svārthe pratyayaḥ utpādyaḥ . pañca eva pañcakāḥ śakunayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9375_0: trikāḥ śālaṅkāyanāḥ . saptakāḥ brahmavṛkṣāḥ . tataḥ parimāṇini . tataḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9375_1: parimāṇini iti vaktavyam . pañcakaḥ saṅghaḥ . daśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9375_2: upasaṅkhyānam . jīvitaparimāṇe ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_0: sāptatikaḥ . jīvitaparimāṇe ca iti anarthakam vacanam kālāt iti siddhatvāt . jīvitaparimāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_1: ca iti anarthakam vacanam . kim kāraṇam . kālāt iti siddhatvāt . kālāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_2: . iha yasya ṣaṣṭiḥ jīvitaparimāṇam ṣaṣtim asu bhūtaḥ bhavati . tatra tam adhīṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_3: bhṛtaḥ bhūtaḥ bhāvī iti eva siddham . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . iha vacane
GS24pmbhasuu:9376_4: hi lukprasaṅgaḥ . iha hi kriyamāṇe luk prasajyeta : dviṣāṣṭikaḥ . triṣāṣṭikaḥ . anena
GS24pmbhasuu:9377: bhavati . tena sati kasmāt na bhavati . ā arhāt iti ucyate . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_0: kim kāraṇam . na hi ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi saṅkhyāśabdāḥ ime . ime api kālaśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_1: . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_2: ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyam kālam bhūtaḥ . śobhanam kālam bhūtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9378_3: . atha matam etat . kāle dṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ kālaśabdaḥ kālam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:9379_0: atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . jīvitaparimāṇe tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . iha ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9379_1: kartavyam . vārṣaśatikaḥ . vārṣasahasrikaḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9379_2: na hi varṣaśataśabdaḥ saṅkhyā . kim tarhi saṅkhyeye
GS24pmbhasuu:9380: vartate varṣaśataśabdaḥ . evam tarhi anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate khāraśatādyartham . anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_0: khāraśatādyartham . khāraśatikaḥ rāśiḥ . khārasahastrikaḥ rāśiḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_1: . iha vacane hi lukprasaṅgaḥ iti . na brūmaḥ yatra kriyamāṇe doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_2: iti . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe na
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_3: doṣaḥ . param arhāt . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kālāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9381_4: eva siddham . nanu ca uktam na ime kālaśabdāḥ . kim tarhi . saṅkhyāśabdāḥ iti . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:9382: ime api kālaśabdāḥ . katham . saṅkhyā saṅkhyeye vartate . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9383: yadi tarhi yaḥ yaḥ kāle vartate saḥ saḥ kālaśabdaḥ ramaṇīyādiṣu atriprasaṅgaḥ bhavati iti . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9385: (P_5,1.57-58.2) KA_II.354.7-9 Ro_IV.46 stome ḍavidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . stome ḍaḥ vidheyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9386: pañcadaśādyarthaḥ . pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ . saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9387: (P_5,1.59) KA_II.355.2-357.8 Ro_IV.46-56 ime viṃśatyādayaḥ saprakṛtikāḥ sapratyayakāḥ nipātyante . tatra na jñāyate kā prakṛtiḥ kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9388_0: pratyayaḥ kaḥ pratyayārthaḥ iti . tatra vaktavyam iyam prakṛtiḥ ayam pratyayaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9388_1: pratyayārthaḥ iti . ime brūmaḥ dviśabdāt ayam daśadarthābhidāhinaḥ svārthe śaticpratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9388_2: nipātyate vinbhāvaḥ ca . dvau daśatau viṃśatiḥ . viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9389: viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsaḥ na upapadyate . viṃśatigavam iti . kim kāraṇam . dravyam anabhihitam . tasya anabhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9390_0: ṣaṣṭhyantam ca samāse pūrvam nipatati . tatra goviṃśatiḥ iti prāpnoti . na ca evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9390_1: bhavitavyam . bhavitavyam ca viṃśatigavam tu na sidhyati . iha ca triṃśatpūlī catvāriṃśatpūlī
GS24pmbhasuu:9391: vacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ . dvitvāt daśatoḥ dvayoḥ dvivacanam iti dvivacanam prāpnoti . evam tarhi parimāṇini viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9392: parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam . parimāṇini cet punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9393: svārthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . viṃśakaḥ saṅghaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9394_0: ṣaṣṭhī ca vidheyā . gavām viṃśatiḥ . dravyam abhihitam . tasya abhihitatvāt ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:9394_1: na prāpnoti . ekavacanam ca vidheyam . viṃśatiḥ gāvaḥ . gobhiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9395: anārambhaḥ vā prātipadikavijñānāt yathā sahasrādiṣu . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_0: viṃśatyādīnām nyāyyaḥ . katham sidhyati . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_1: . viṃśatyādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni yathā sahasrādiṣu . tat yathā sahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_2: ayutam arbudam iti na ca anugamaḥ kriyate bhavati ca abhidhānam . yathā sahasrādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9396_3: iti ucyate . atha sahasrādiṣu api katham bhavitavyam . sahasram gavām . sahasram
GS24pmbhasuu:9397: gosahasram iti . yāvatā atra api sandehaḥ na asūyā kartavyā yatra anugamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9398: kriyate . nanu ca uktam viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9399: parimāṇini cet punaḥ svārthe pratyayavidhānam . ṣaṣṭhīvacanavidhiḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9400: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samudāye viṃśatyādayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . kim vaktavyam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9401_0: . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saṅghaḥ iti vartate . saṅghaḥ samūhaḥ samudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9401_1: iti anarthāntaram . te ete viṃśatyādayaḥ samudāye santaḥ bhāvavacanāḥ bhavanti bhāvavacanāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9401_2: santaḥ guṇavacanāḥ bhavanti guṇavacanāḥ santaḥ aviśiṣṭāḥ bhavanti anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9402_0: kadā cit guṇaḥ guṇiviśeṣakaḥ bhavati . tat yathā śuklaḥ paṭaḥ iti . kadā cit guṇinā
GS24pmbhasuu:9402_1: guṇaḥ vyapadiśyate : paṭasya śuklaḥ iti . tat yadā tāvat ucyate viṃśatyādayaḥ daśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9402_2: cet samāsavacanānupapattiḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam tadā guṇaguṇinoḥ . vacanaparihāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9403: svārthe pratyayavidhānam iti saṃhanane vṛttaḥ saṃhanane vartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9404: saṅkhyāsaṃhanane vṛttaḥ dravyasaṃhanane vartiṣyate . atha ṣaṣṭhī tadā
GS24pmbhasuu:9405: guṇinā guṇaḥ viśeṣyate . vacanaparihāraḥ ubhayoḥ api . yadi tarhi ime
GS24pmbhasuu:9406_0: viṃśatyādayaḥ guṇavacanāḥ syuḥ sadharmabhiḥ anyaiḥ guṇavacanaiḥ bhavitavyam . anye
GS24pmbhasuu:9406_1: ca guṇavacanāḥ dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante . tat yathā . śuklam vastram .
GS24pmbhasuu:9406_2: śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9407: śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam śritaḥ guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api bhavati . viṃśatyādayaḥ punaḥ na anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9408: anye api vai guṇavacanāḥ na avaśyam dravyasya liṅgasaṅkhye anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9409: tat yathā . gāvaḥ dhanam . putrā apatyam . indrāgnī devatā . viśvedevāḥ devatā . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyai iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_0: atha atra ananuvṛttau hetuḥ śakyaḥ vaktum . bāḍham śakyaḥ vaktum . kāmam tarhi ucyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_1: . iha kadā cit guṇaḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ bhavati . tat yathā : pañca uḍupaśatāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_2: tīrṇāni . pañca phalakaśatāni tīrṇāni . aśvaiḥ yuddham . asibhiḥ yuddham iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_3: ca asayaḥ yudhyante . asiguṇāḥ puruṣāḥ yudhyante guṇaḥ tu khalu prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_4: . iha tāvat gāvaḥ dhanam iti dhinoteḥ dhanam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9410_5: . putrāḥ apatyam iti apatanāt apatyam ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9411: indrāgnī devatā . viśvedevāḥ devatā iti diveḥ aiśvaryakarmaṇaḥ devaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9412: tasmāt svārthe tal . ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . yāvantaḥ te vāśitām anuyanti sarve te dakṣiṇā samṛddhyā iti dakṣeḥ vṛddhikarmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9413: dakṣiṇā ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9414: bhaviṣyati . viṃśatyādiṣu ca api ekaḥ guṇaḥ . saḥ prādhānyena vivakṣitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9415: tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam bhaviṣyati . ayam tarhi viṃśatyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9416: bhāvavacaneṣu doṣaḥ . goviṃśatiḥ ānīyatām iti bhāvānayane codite dravyānanam na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9417: atha iha gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti katham ākṛtau coditāyām dravye ārambhaṇalambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīni kriyante iti . asambhavāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9418_0: ākṛtau ārambhaṇādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā ākṛtisahacarite dravye ārambhaṇādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:9418_1: kriyante . idam api evañjātīyakam eva . asambhavāt bhāvānayanasya dravyānayanam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9419_1: . chedādipathibhyaḥ nityagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vigrahadarśanāt . vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9419_2: dṛśyate . chedam arhati . panthānam gacchati iti . vikārārtham tarhi idam nityagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9419_3: kriyate . vikāreṇa vigrahaḥ mā bhūt iti . virāgaviraṅgam ca . panthaḥ ṇa nityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9419_4: . vikārārtham iti cet akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam . vikārārtham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:9420: akaṅādibhiḥ tulyam etat . yathā akaṅādibhiḥ vikāraiḥ vigrahaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9421: evam ābhyām api na bhaviṣyati . kim punaḥ iha akartavyam nityagrahaṇam kriyate āhosvit anyatra kartavyam na kriyate . iha akartavyam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9422: eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta sanniyogaśiṣṭānām anyatarāpāye ubhayoḥ api abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9423: . tat yathā . devadattayajñadattābhyām idam kartavyam iti . devadattāpāye yajñadattaḥ api na karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9425: iti upasaṅkhyānam . yajñartvigbhyāmtat karma arhati iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yjañakarma arhati yajñiyaḥ deśaḥ . ṛtvikkarma arhati ārtvijīnam brāhmaṇakulam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9426_0: (P_5,1.72) KA_II.358.2-10 Ro_IV.58-59 tat vartayati iti anirdeśaḥ tatra adarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9426_1: . tat vartayati iti anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . pārāyaṇam kaḥ vartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9426_2: . yaḥ parasya karoti . turāyaṇam kaḥ vartayati . yaḥ carupuroḍāśān nirvapati . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9427: pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . iṅyajyoḥ ca darśanāt . iṅyajyoḥ ca pratyayaḥ dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9428: yaḥ pārāyaṇam adhīte saḥ pārāyaṇikaḥ iti ucyate . yaḥ turāyaṇena yajate
GS24pmbhasuu:9429: saḥ taurāyaṇikaḥ iti ucyate . yaḥ ca eva adhīte yaḥ parasya karoti ubhau tau vartayataḥ . yaḥ ca yajate yaḥ ca yaḥ carupuroḍāśān nirvapati ubhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9430: tau vartayataḥ . ubhayatra kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9433: krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . krośaśatam gacchati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9434_0: krauśaśatikaḥ . yojanaśatam gacchati iti yaujanaśatikaḥ iti . tataḥ abhigamanam arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:9434_1: iti ca . tataḥ abhigamanam arhati iti ca krośaśatayojanaśatayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9434_2: . krośaśatāt abhigamanam arhati krauśaśatikaḥ bhikṣuḥ . yojanaśatāt abhigamanam arhati
GS24pmbhasuu:9436_2: . vāripathena gacchati vāripathikaḥ . vāripathena āhṛtam vāripathikam . vāri . jaṅgala
GS24pmbhasuu:9437: jaṅgalapathena gacchati jāṅgalapathikaḥ . jaṅgalapathena āhṛtam jāṅgalapathikam . jaṅgala . sthala . sthalapathena gacchati sthālapathikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9438: . sthalapathena āhṛtam sthālapathikam . sthala . kāntāra . kāntārapathena gacchati kāntārapathikaḥ . kāntārapathena āhṛtam kāntārapathikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9439: ajapathaśaṅkupathābhyām ca . ajapathaśaṅkupathābhyām ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9440: ajapathena gacchati ājapathikaḥ . ajapathena āhṛtam ājapathikam.
GS24pmbhasuu:9441: śaṅkupathena gacchati śāṅkupathikaḥ . śaṅkupathena āhṛtam śāṅkupathikam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9442: madhukamaricayoḥ aṇ sthalāt . madhukamaricayoḥ aṇ sthalāt vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9444: (P_5,1.80) KA_II.12-18 Ro_IV.60-61 adhīṣṭabhṛtayoḥ dvitīyānirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ tatra adarśanāt . adhīṣṭabhṛtayoḥ dvitīyānirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9445: kim kāraṇam . tatra adarśanāt . na hi asau māsam adhīṣyate . kim tarhi muhūrtam adhīṣṭaḥ māsam tat karma karoti . siddham tu caturthīnirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9446: siddham etat . katham . caturthīnirdeśāt . caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9447: tasmai adhīṣṭaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi caturthīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . tādarthyāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . māsārthaḥ muhūrtaḥ māsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9448_0: (P_5,1.84) KA_II.359.20-22 Ro_IV.61-62 avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9448_1: . avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt : yap
GS24pmbhasuu:9448_2: api anuvartate iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:9449: avayasi ṭhan ca iti anantarasya anukarṣaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9450_0: (P_5,1.90) KA_II.360.2-6 Ro_IV.62 ṣaṣṭike sañjñāgrahaṇam . ṣaṣṭike sañjñāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9450_1: kartavyam . mudgāḥ api hi ṣaṣṭirātreṇe pacyante . tatra mā bhūt iti . uktam vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9451_0: (P_5,1.94) KA_II.360.8-361.5 Ro_IV.62-64) tat asya brahmacaryam iti mahānāmnyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9451_1: upasaṅkhyānam . tat asya brahmacaryam iti mahānāmnyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9451_2: . mahānāmnīnām brahmacaryam māhānāmnikam . ādityavratikam . tat carati iti ca . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9451_3: carati iti ca mahānāmnyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . mahānāmnīḥ carati māhānāmnikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9452: . ādityavratikaḥ . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ nirdeśaḥ tat carati iti . mahānāmnyaḥ nāma ṛcaḥ . na ca tāḥ caryante . vratam tāsām caryate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9453: sāhacaryāt tācchabyam bhaviṣyati . mahānāmnīsahacaritam vratam mahānāmnyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9454: vratam iti . avāntaradīkṣādibhyaḥ ḍiniḥ . avāntaradīkṣādibhyaḥ ḍiniḥ vaktavyaḥ . avāntaradīkṣī . tilavratī . aṣṭācatvāriṃśataḥ ḍvun ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9455: aṣṭācatvāriṃśataḥ ḍvun ca ḍiniḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . aṣṭācatvāriṃśakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9456: aṣṭācatvāriṃśī . cāturmāsyānām yalopaḥ ca . cāturmāsyānām yalopaḥ ca ḍvun ca ḍiniḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . cāturmāsikaḥ . cāturmāsī . atha kim idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9457: cāturmāsyānām iti . caturmāsāt ṇyaḥ yajñe tatra bhave . caturmāsāt ṇyaḥ vaktavyaḥ yajñe tatra bhave iti etasmin arthe . caturṣu māseṣu bhavāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9458: cāturmāsyāni yajñāḥ . sañjñāyām aṇ . sañjñāyām aṇ vaktavyaḥ . caturṣu māseṣu bhavā cāturmāsī pauṇamāsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9459_0: (P_5,1.95) KA_II.361.7-12 Ro_IV.64 ākhyāgrahaṇam kimartham. tasya dakṣiṇā yajñebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9459_1: iti iyati ucyamāne ye ete sañjñībhūtakāḥ yajñāḥ tataḥ utapattiḥ syāt . agniṣṭomikyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9459_2: . rājasūyikaḥ . vājapeyikyaḥ . yatra vā yajñaśabdaḥ asti . nāvayajñikyaḥ . pākayajñikyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9459_3: . iha na syāt pāñcaudanikyaḥ . dāśaudanikyaḥ . ākhyāgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9459_4: bhavati . ye ca sañjñībhūtakāḥ yatra ca yajñaśabdaḥ asti yatra ca na asti tadākhyāmātrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9459_5: siccham bhavati (P_5,1.96) KA_II.361.14-22 Ro_IV.65-66 kāryagrahaṇam anarthakam tatrabhavena
GS24pmbhasuu:9460_0: tatrabhavena kṛtatvāt . yat hi māse kāryam māse bhavam tat bhavati . tatra tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9460_1: bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . kim idam bhavān kāryagrahaṇam eva pratyācaṣṭe na punaḥ dīyategrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9460_2: api . yathā eva hi yat māse kāryam tat māse bhavam bhavati evam yat api māse dīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9461: tatra tatra bhavaḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . na tat māse dīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9462: kim tarhi māse gate . evam tarhi aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9463: evam tarhi yogavibhāgottarakālam idam paṭhitavyam . tasya dakṣiṇā yajñākhyebhyaḥ . tatra ca dīyate . tataḥ kāryam bhavavat kālāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9464: (P_5,1.97) KA_II.362.2-11 Ro_IV.66 aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9465: trīṇi imāni aṇgrahaṇāni . vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ aṇ . samayaḥ tat asya prāptam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9466_0: ṛtoḥ aṇ . prayojanam . viśākhāṣāḍhāt aṇ manthadaṇḍayoḥ iti . tatra na jñāyate katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9466_1: aṇprakaraṇe agnipadādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aviśeṣāt sarvatra . vyuṣṭādibhyaḥ aṇ
GS24pmbhasuu:9466_2: bhavati iti uktvā agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . agnipade dīyate kāryam vā āgnipadam
GS24pmbhasuu:9466_3: . pailumūlam . samayaḥ tat asya prāptam . ṛtoḥ aṇ . agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9466_4: . upavastā prāptaḥ asya aupavastram . prāśitā prāptaḥ asya prāśitram . prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9467: viśākhāṣāḍhāt aṇ manthadaṇḍayoḥ .agnipadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . cūḍā prayojanam asya cauḍam . śraddhā prayojanam asya śrāddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9468_1: sapūrvapadāt upasaṅkhyānam . chaprakaraṇe viśipūripadiruhiprakṛteḥ anāt sapūrrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9470: aśvaprapadanīyam . ruhi . prāśādārohaṇīyam . svargādibhyaḥ yat ṣvargādibhyaḥ yat pratyayaḥ bhavati . svargyam . dhanyam . yaśasyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9471: āyuṣyam . puṇyāhavācanādibhyaḥ luk . puṇyāhavācanādibhyaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9473: (P_5,1.113) KA_II.362.23-363.2 Ro_IV.67 ekāgārāt nipātanānarthakyam ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ekāgārāt nipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9474: ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ṭhañ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9475: . caure iti vakṣyāmi iti . iha mā bhūt . ekāgāram prayojanam asya bhikṣoḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt ekāgārāt caure iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9476: (P_5,1.114) KA_II.363.4-9 Ro_IV.68-69 ākālāt nipātanānarthakyam ṭhañprakaraṇāt . ākālāt nipātanam narthakam . kim kāraṇam . ṭhañprakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9477_0: . ṭhañ prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . etasmin viśeṣe nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9477_1: kariṣyāmi samānakālasya ādyantavivakṣāyām iti . ākālāt ṭhan ca . ākālāt ṭhan ca vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9478: (P_5,1.115) KA_II.363.11-364.10 Ro_IV.69-75 idam ayuktam vartate . kim atra ayuktam . yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9479: katham ca tṛtīyāsamartham nāma kriyā syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarve ete śabdāḥ guṇasamudāyeṣu vartante . brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyaḥ . vaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_0: . ātaḥ ca guṇasamudāye evam hi āha . tapaḥ śrutam ca yoniḥ ca iti etad brāhmaṇakārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_1: . tapaḥśtrutābhyām yaḥ hīnaḥ jātibrāhmaṇaḥ eva saḥ . tathā gauraḥ śucyācāraḥ piṅgalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_2: kapilakeśaḥ iti etān api abhyantarān brāhmaṇe guṇan kurvanti . samudāyeṣu ca śabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_3: vṛttāḥ avayaveṣu api vartante . tat yathā : pūrve pañcālāḥ , uttare pañcālāḥ , tailam
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_4: bhuktam , ghṛtam bhuktam , śuklaḥ , nīlaḥ , kṛṣṇaḥ iti . evam ayam brāhmaṇaśabdaya
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_5: samudāye vṛttaḥ avayaveṣu api vartate . yadi tarhi tṛtīyāsamartham viśeṣyate pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_6: aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tṛtīyāsamarthāt kriyāvācinaḥ guṇatulye api
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_7: pratyayaḥ syāt . putreṇa tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ . putreṇa tulyaḥ piṅgalaḥ . astu tarhi pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9480_8: . yat tat tulyam kriyā cet sā
GS24pmbhasuu:9481: bhavati iti . evam api tṛtīyāsamartham aviśeṣitam bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tṛtīyāsamarthāt akriyāvācinaḥ kriyātulye api pratyayaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9482_0: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tat tulyam kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . tulayā ca sammitam
GS24pmbhasuu:9482_1: tulyam . yadi ca tṛtīyāsamartham api kriyā pratyayārthaḥ api kriyā tataḥ tulayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9482_2: bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham kriyā cet sā bhavati iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9482_3: . nanu ca uktam pratyayārthaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_0: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tṛtīyāsamarthāt kriyāvācinaḥ guṇatulye api pratyayaḥ syāt . putreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_1: tulyaḥ sthūlaḥ . putreṇa tulyaḥ piṅgalaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tat tṛtīyāsamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_2: kriyā cet sā bhavati iti ucyate . tulayā ca sammitam tulyam . yadi ca tṛtīyāsamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9483_3: api kriyā pratyayārthaḥ api kriyā tataḥ tulayam bhavati . kim punaḥ atra jyāyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_0: pratyayārthaviśeṣaṇam eva jyāyaḥ . kutaḥ etat . evam ca eva kṛtvā ācāryeṇa sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_1: paṭhitam . vatinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam kṛtam . api ca vateḥ avyayeṣu pāṭhaḥ na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9484_2: bhavati . kriyāyām ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam na yokṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9485_0: (P_5,1.116) KA_II.365.12-17 Ro_IV.75-77 kimartham idam ucyate na tena tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9485_1: cet vatiḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tṛtīyāsamarthāt tatra pratyayaḥ yadā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:9485_2: kartavyām kriyām anyaḥ karoti tadā pratyayaḥ utpādyate . na ca kā cid ivaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:9485_3: yoge tṛtīyā vidhīyate . nanu ca sapatamī api na vidhīyate . evam tarhi siddhe sati
GS24pmbhasuu:9485_4: yat ivaśabdena yoge saptamīsamarthāt vatim śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati ivaśabdena
GS24pmbhasuu:9485_5: yoge saptamī iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . deveṣu iva nāma . brāhmaṇeṣu iva
GS24pmbhasuu:9486_0: (P_5,1.117) KA_II.364.19-22 Ro_IV.77-79 kimartham idam ucyate na tena tulyam kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9486_1: cet vatiḥ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . tṛtīyāsamarthāt tatra pratyayaḥ yadā anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:9486_2: kartavyām kriyām anyaḥ karoti tadā pratyayaḥ utpādyate . iha punaḥ dvitīyāsamarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9487: niścitabalādhāne pratyayaḥ utpādyate . brāhmaṇavat bhavān vartate . etat vṛttam brāhmaṇaḥ arhati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9488_0: (P_5,1.118.1) KA_II.365.2-6 Ro_IV.79 arthagrahaṇam kimartham . na upasargāt chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:9488_1: dhātavu iti eva ucyeta . dhātuḥ vai śabdaḥ . śabde kāryasya asambhavāt arthe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:9489: kriyā . idam tarhi prayojanam . uttarapadalopaḥ yathā vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:9490: dhātukṛtaḥ arthaḥ dhātvarthaḥ iti . kaḥ punaḥ dhātukṛtaḥ arthaḥ . sādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9491: . kim prayojanam . sādhane ayam bhavan liṅgasaṅkhyābhyam yokṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9493_1: vatyupasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . strīvat . puṃvat iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9493_2: . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam vatim
GS24pmbhasuu:9494: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na vatyarthe nañsnañau bhavataḥ iti yat ayam striyāḥ puṃvat iti nirdeśam karoti . evam api strīvat iti na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9496: (P_5,1.119.1) KA_II.365.14-366.6 Ro_IV.81-82 strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam . strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9497: strībhāvaḥ strītvam strītā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . imau nañsnañau prāk bhavanāt iti ucyete . tau viśeṣavihitau sāmānyavihitam
GS24pmbhasuu:9498_0: vatim bādheyātām . vāvacanam ca . vāvacanam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam . nañsnañau
GS24pmbhasuu:9498_1: api yathā syātām . strībhāvaḥ straiṇam . pummbhāvaḥ pauṃsnam iti . apavādasamāveśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9498_2: vā siddham . apavādasamāveśāt vā siddham etat . tat yathā imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_0: bhaviṣyati . na eva īśvaraḥ ājñāpapayati na api dharmasūtrakārāḥ paṭhanti imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_1: apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati iti . kim tarhi ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9499_2: apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ bhavati . na ca etau atra abhyantarau . etau api atra abhyantarau
GS24pmbhasuu:9500_0: apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ bhavanti iti . etat ca eva na jānīmaḥ apavādasadeśāḥ apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9500_1: bhavanti iti . api ca kutaḥ etat etau api atra abhyantarau na punaḥ pūrvau vā syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:9500_2: parau vā . evam tarhi vakṣyati ā ca tvāt iti atra cakārakaraṇasya prayojanam . nañsnañbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:9503_0: abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9503_1: . iha api prāpnoti . abhiprāyaḥ devadattasya modakeṣu bhojane . ye naḥ bhāvāḥ te
GS24pmbhasuu:9503_2: naḥ bhāvāḥ putrāḥ putraiḥ ceṣṭante iti . siddham tu yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9504: guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tvatalau . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9505_0: katham . yasya guṇasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin guṇe vaktavye
GS24pmbhasuu:9505_1: pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca abhiprāyādīnām bhāvāt dravye devadattaśabdaḥ vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9505_2: . kim punaḥ dravyam ke punaḥ guṇāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9506: śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ guṇāḥ . tataḥ anyat dravyam . kim punaḥ anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:9507_0: śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam āhosvit ananyat . guṇasya ayam bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśam kurvan
GS24pmbhasuu:9507_1: khyāpayati anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam iti . ananyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9508: viśasitasya parṇaśate nyastasya na anyat śabdādibhyaḥ upalabhyate . anyat śabdādibhyaḥ dravyam tat tu anumānagamyam . tat yathā oṣadhivanaspatīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:9509: vṛddhihrāsau . jyotiṣām gatiḥ iti . kaḥ asau anumānaḥ . iha samāne varṣmaṇi pariṇāhe ca anyat tulāgram bhavati lohasya anyat kārpāsānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:9510: yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . tathā kaḥ cit spṛśan eva chinatti kaḥ cit lambamānaḥ api na chinatti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ tat dravyam . kaḥ cit ekena
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_0: eva prahāreṇa vyapavargam karoti kaḥ cit dvābhyām api an karoti . yatkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_1: tat dravyam . atha vā yasya guṇāntareṣu api prādurbhāvatsu tattvam na vihanyate tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_2: dravyam . kim punaḥ tattvam . tadbhāvaḥ tattvam . tat yathā āmalakādīnām phalānām
GS24pmbhasuu:9511_3: raktādayaḥ pītādayaḥ ca guṇāḥ prāduḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9512: . āmalakam badaram iti eva bhavati . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9513: guṇasandrāvaḥ dravyam iti . yadi tarhi ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe pratyayāḥ utapdyante kim iyatā sūtreṇa . etāvat vaktavyam : ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9514: . ṣaṣṭhīsamarthāt guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9515: atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇaśabdaḥ ayam bahvarthaḥ . asti eva sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇā rajjuḥ triguṇā rajjuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9516_0: asti dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā guṇavān ayam deśaḥ iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9516_1: ca vartante . asti aprādhānye vartate . tat yathā yaḥ yatra apradhānam bhavati saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9516_2: āha guṇabhūtāḥ vayam atra iti . asti ācāre vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9517: . tat yathā guṇavān ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ samyak ācāram karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9518: asti saṃskāre vartate . tat yathā saṃskṛtam annam guṇavat iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9519_0: atha vā sarvatra eva ayam guṇaśabdaḥ sameṣu avayaveṣu vartate . tat yathā dviguṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9519_1: adhyayanam triguṇam adhyayanam iti ucyate . carcāguṇān kramaguṇān ca apekṣya bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9519_2: na saṃhitāguṇān carcāguṇān ca . yadi evam guṇavat annam iti guṇaśabdaḥ na upapadyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9519_3: . na hi annasya sūpādayaḥ guṇāḥ samāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_0: bhavanti . na avaśyam varṣmataḥ parimāṇataḥ eva vā sāmyam bhavati . kim tarhi yuktitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_1: api . ātaḥ ca yuktitaḥ . yaḥ hi mudgaprasthe lavaṇaprastham prakṣipet na adaḥ yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_2: syāt . yadi tāvat adeḥ annam na adaḥ attavyam syāt . atha aniteḥ annam na adaḥ jagdvhā
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_3: prāṇyāt . śuklādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti . śuklatvam . śuklatā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_4: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam śuklādayaḥ eva udāhriyante na punaḥ vṛkṣādayaḥ api . vṛkṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9520_5: vṛkṣatā iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . ubhayavacanāḥ hi ete dravyam ca āhuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9521: guṇam ca . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ime api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9522_0: ubhayavacanāḥ . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9522_1: iti . yataḥ dravyavacanāḥ tataḥ vṛttiḥ bhaviṣyati . ḍitthādiṣu tarhi vartyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9523: ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam iti . atra api kaḥ cit prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca . tena kṛtām kriyām guṇam vā yaḥ kaḥ cit karoti saḥ ucyate ḍitthatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_0: te etat ḍāmbhiṭṭatvam te etat . evam ḍitthāḥ kurvanti . evam ḍāmbhiṭṭāḥ kurvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_1: . yaḥ tarhi prāthamakalpikaḥ ḍitthaḥ ḍāmbhiṭṭaḥ ca tasya vartyabhāvāt vṛttiḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9524_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9525: kāthañcitkaḥ prayogaḥ evam vṛttiḥ api bhaviṣyati . yat vā sarve bhāvāḥ svena bhāvena bhavanti saḥ teṣām bhāvaḥ tadabhidhāne . kim ebhiḥ tribhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9526: bhāvagrahaṇaiḥ kriyate . ekena śabdaḥ pratinirdiśyate dvābhyām arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9527: yat vā sarve śabdāḥ svena arthena bhavanti . saḥ teṣām arthaḥ iti tadabhidhāne vā tvatalau bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . na evam anyatra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9528: . na hi tena raktam rāgāt iti atra śabdena rakte pratyayāḥ utpadyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9529: śabde asambhavāt arthena rakte pratyayāḥ bhaviṣyanti . tat tarhi anyatarat
GS24pmbhasuu:9530: kartavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9531: tasya bhāvaḥ iti abhiprāyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9532: anabhidhānāt iti . anabhidhānāt abhiprāyādiṣu utapattiḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9533_1: tvataloḥ svarasiddhyartham . tvatalbhyām nañsamāsaḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣdhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9534_0: tvataloḥ svarasiddhiḥ yathā syāt . tvataloḥ avakāśaḥ bhāvasya vacanam pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9534_1: avacanam . brāhmaṇatvam . brāhmṇatā . nañsamāsasya avakāśaḥ pratiṣedhasya vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9535_0: ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . abrāhmaṇatvam . abrāhmaṇatā . nañsamāsaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9535_1: pūrvavipratiṣdhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . na atra
GS24pmbhasuu:9536: katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ pratiṣedham apekṣate . nañsamāsaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9537_0: kim kāraṇam . asāmarthyāt eva . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asamartham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9537_1: iti . yāvatā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ bhāvam apekṣate . pradhānam tadā brāhmaṇaśabdaḥ . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9537_2: ca pradhānasya sāpekṣasya api samāsaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . nañsamādāt anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9538: svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti vakṣyati . tatra vyavasthārtham idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_0: vaktavyam . vā chandasi . vā chandasi nañsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nirvīryatām vai yajamānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_1: āśāste apaśutām . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya . agotām anapatyatām . bhavet idam yuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_2: udāharaṇam . ayonitvāya . aśithilatvāya iti . idam tu ayuktam apaśutām iti . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_3: asau samāsabhāvam āśāste . kim tarhi . uttarapadābhāvam āśāste . na paśoḥ bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9539_4: iti . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9542_0: anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . tvatalau anukṛṣyete . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtau tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:9542_1: anuvartiṣyete . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam apavādasamāveśārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9542_2: . ā ca tvāt iti cakārakaraṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9543: apavādasamāveśārtham . imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ samāveśaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9544: na etat asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti evam imanicprabhṛtibhiḥ apavādaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9545_0: samāveśaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:9545_1: yathā syātām yataḥ ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti eva yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9546: yataḥ ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau
GS24pmbhasuu:9547: yathā syātām yatra ca ucyete . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā tvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9548: eva ā tvāt ye arthāḥ tatra tvatalau bhaviṣyataḥ yatra ca ucyete . idam tarhi prayojanam . ā tvāt yāḥ prakṛtayaḥ tābhyaḥ ca tvatalau yathā syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:9549: yasyāḥ ca prakṛteḥ atasmin viśeṣe anyaḥ pratyayaḥ utpadyate . kim kṛtam bhavati . strīpuṃsābhyām tvataloḥ upasaṅkhyānam coditam . tat na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9552: tvataloḥ iti āha . na etat asi prayojanam . iṣyete nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9553_0: tvatalau : abrāhmaṇatvam abrāhmaṇatā iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . na nañpūrvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9553_1: uttarasya pratiṣedhaḥ . na nañpūrvāt iti uttarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9554: parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ vidhīyate . na ca tatra kā cit nañpūrvā prakṛtiḥ gṛhyate . tadantavidhinā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9555_0: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . yatra tarhi tadantavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9555_1: asti . patyantapurohitādibhyaḥ yak iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt tatra eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:9555_2: brūyāt apatyantāt yak bhavati nañpūrvāt tatpuruṣāt iti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9556: nañpūrvāt bahuvrīheḥ bhavati iti . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete :
GS24pmbhasuu:9557_0: avidyamānāḥ pṛthavaḥ asya apṛthuḥ , apṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ apṛthutvam apṛthutā iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9557_1: tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ anyapūrvāt tatpuruṣāt bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9557_2: . na iṣyate . tvatalau eva iṣyete : paramaḥ pṛthuḥ paramapṛthuḥ , paramapṛthoḥ bhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9557_3: paramapṛthutvam paramapṛthutā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācārayaḥ uttaraḥ bhāvapratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9557_4: sāpekṣāt bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . nañsamāsāt anyaḥ bhāvavacanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9558: svarottarapadavṛddhyartham iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:9559: asti prayojanam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati sarve ete taddhitāḥ sāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9560: bhavanti iti yat ayam nañaḥ guṇapratiṣedhe sampādyarhahitālamarthāḥ taddhitāḥ iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:9561_0: (P_5,1.122) KA_II.370.14-19 Ro_IV.100-101 vāvacanam kimartham . vākyam api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9561_1: syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛṭā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam api bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9561_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam . tvatalau api yathā syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:9562_0: . etat api na asti prayojanam . ā ca tvāt iti etasmāt yatnāt tvatalau api bhaviṣyataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9562_1: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pṛthvādibhyaḥ vāvacanam aṇsamāveśārtham . pṛthvādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9564: (P_5,1.124) KA_II.370.21-371.2 Ro_IV.101 brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam . brāhmaṇādiṣu cāturvarṇyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9565: cāturvarṇyam . cāturvaidyam . cāturāśramyam . arhataḥ num ca . arhataḥ num ca ṣyañ ca vaktavyaḥ . arhataḥ bhāvaḥ ārhantyam ārhatī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9566: (P_5,1.125) KA_II.371.4-6 Ro_IV.101-102 kim idam nalope varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi varṇagrahaṇam steyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9567: nalope kṛte ayādeśaḥ prāpnoti . atha saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . siddhaḥ antyasya lopaḥ yasya iti eva . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9569: aṇprakaraṇe śrotriyasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam ghalopaḥ ca . śrotriyasya bhāvaḥ śrautram
GS24pmbhasuu:9571_0: tilādibhyaḥ khañ ca iti vaktavyam . tilyam . tailīnam . kimartham idam ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:9571_1: yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9571_2: . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ iti ucyate . na ca umābhaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:9571_3: dhānye . cameṣu yat paṭhyate tat dhānyam . na ca ete tatra paṭhyete . tat tarhi khañgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9571_4: kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . dhānyānām bhavane
GS24pmbhasuu:9572_0: khañ iti . yadi tat anuvartate vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat iti khañ
GS24pmbhasuu:9572_1: ca iti khañ api prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ
GS24pmbhasuu:9572_2: . vrīhiśālayoḥ ḍhak bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre
GS24pmbhasuu:9573_0: khañ . yavayavakaṣaṣṭikāt yat bhavati . dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre khañ bhavati . vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9573_1: tilamāṣomābhaṅgaṇubhyaḥ . bhavanekṣetregrahaṇam anuvartate . dhānyānām iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:9573_2: . atha vā maṇḍūkaplutayaḥ adhikārāḥ yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat
GS24pmbhasuu:9573_3: adhikārāḥ . atha vā anyavacanāt cakārākaraṇāt prakṛtāpavādaḥ vijñāyate yathā utsargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9574: prasaktasya apavādaḥ . anyasya pratyayasya vacanāt cakārasya ca anukarṣaṇārthasya akaraṇāt prakṛtasya khañaḥ ḍhagyatau bādhakau
GS24pmbhasuu:9575: bhaviṣyataḥ yathā utsargeṇa prasaktasya apavādaḥ bādhakaḥ bhavati . atha vā etat jñāpayati anuvartante ca nāma vidhayaḥ na ca anuvartanāt eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9576_0: bhavanti . kim tarhi . yatnāt bhavanti . atha vā yatā mukte dhānyānām bhavane kṣetre
GS24pmbhasuu:9576_1: khañ iti eva siddham . nanu ca uktam . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . umābhaṅgayoḥ adhānyatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9576_2: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dhinoteḥ dhānyam . ete ca api dhinutaḥ . atha vā śaṇasaptadaśāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9576_3: dhānyāni (P_5,2.6) KA_II.372.23-373.2 Ro_IV.105 sammukha iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9577: sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ . sammukha iti samasya antalopaḥ nipātyate . samamukhasya darśanaḥ sammukhīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9578: (P_5,2.9) KA_II.373.4-6 Ro_IV.105-106 ayānayam neyaḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9579_0: tatra na jñāyate kaḥ ayaḥ kaḥ anayaḥ iti . ayaḥ pradakṣiṇam . anayaḥ prasavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9579_1: pradakṣiṇaprasavyagaminām śārāṇām yasmin paraiḥ padānām asamāveśaḥ saḥ ayānayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9579_2: ayānayam neyaḥ ayānayīnaḥ śāraḥ (P_5,2.10) KA_II.373.8-15 Ro_IV.106-107 parovara
GS24pmbhasuu:9580: parovara iti parasotvavacanam . parovara iti parasya otvam nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9581: yadi evam parasyautvavacanam iti prāpnoti . śakandhunyāyena nirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9582: atha vā na evam vijñāyate parasya otvam nipātyate iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9583: parasya śabdarūpasya ādeḥ utvam nipātyate iti . parān ca avarān ca anubhavati parovarīṇaḥ . atha parampara iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9584: paraparatarāṇām paramparabhāvaḥ . paraparatarāṇām paramparabhāvaḥ nipātyate . parān ca paratarān ca anubhavati paramparīṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9585_0: (P_5,2.12) KA_II.373.17-374.9 Ro_IV.107-108 iha samāṃsamīnā gauḥ supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9585_1: iti subluk prāpnoti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam . samām
GS24pmbhasuu:9585_2: samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam bhaviṣyati . yat ayam yalopam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:9585_3: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na atra luk bhavati iti . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9586: iti cet uttarapadasya lugvacanam . samām samām vijāyate iti yalopavacanāt alugvijñānam iti cet uttarapadasya luk vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu pūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9587: yalopavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvapadasya yalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9588: anutpattau uttarapadasya ca vāvacanam . anutpattau pūrvapadasya uttarapadasya ca yalopaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . samām samām vijāyate . samāyām samāyām vijāyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9589_0: (P_5,2.14) KA_II.374.11-14 Ro_IV.108 āgavīnaḥ iti kim nipātyate . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a
GS24pmbhasuu:9589_1: tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ . goḥ āṅpūrvāt a tasya goḥ pratidānāt kāriṇi khaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9589_2: nipātyate . a tasya goḥ pratidānāt karmakārī āgavīnaḥ karmakaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9590_0: (P_5,2.20) KA_II.374.16-18 Ro_IV.109 kim yaḥ śālāyām adhṛṣṭaḥ saḥ śālīnaḥ kūpe vā
GS24pmbhasuu:9590_1: yat akāryam tat kaupīnam . na iti āha . uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śālāpraveśanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9592: (P_5,2.21) KA_II.374.20-21 Ro_IV.109-110 vrātena jīvati iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9593: kim vrātam nāma . nānājātīyāḥ aniyatavṛttayaḥ utsedhajīvinaḥ saṅghāḥ vrātāḥ . teṣām karma vrātam . vrātakarmaṇā jīvati iti vrātīnaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9594: (P_5,2.23) KA_II.375.2-6 Ro_IV.110 haiyaṅgavīnam iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9595: hyogodohasya hiyaṅgvādeśaḥ sañjñāyām tasya vikāre . hyogodohasya hiyaṅgvādeśaḥ nipātyate sañjñāyām viṣaye tasya vikāre iti etasmin arthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9596: hyogodohasya vikāraḥ haiyaṅgavīnam ghṛtam . sañjñāyām iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9597: hyogodohasya vikāraḥ udaśvit . atra mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9598: (P_5,2.25) KA_II.375.8-13 Ro_IV.110-111 mūle iti vaktavyam . pakṣasya mūlam pakṣatiḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . mūle iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9599: kva prakṛtam . tasya pākamūle pīlvādikarṇāidibhyaḥ kuṇabjāhacau iti . yadi tat anuvartate pāke api prāpnoti . mūle iti anuvartate . pāke iti nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:9600: . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ ekadeśaḥ anuvarteta ekadeśaḥ vā nivarteta . ekayoganirdiṣṭānām api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:9601: saṅkhyāvayādeḥ ṅīp . dāmahāyanāntāt ca . saṅkhyādeḥ iti anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9603: (P_5,2.27) KA_II.375.15-17 Ro_IV.111 iha nānā iti sahārthaḥ gamyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:9604: dvau hi pratiṣedhau prakṛtam artham gamayataḥ . na na saḥ saha eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9605: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtiviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9606: vi nañ iti etābhyām asahavācibhyām nānāñau bhavataḥ . kasmin arthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9609_0: bhavanti . na saha iti vartate . bhavet siddham viśāle śṛṅge viśaṅkaṭe śṛṅge iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9609_1: . iha khalu saṅkaṭam iti saṅgatārthaḥ gamyate . prakaṭam iti pragarārthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9609_2: . utkaṭam iti udgatārthaḥ gamyate . evam tarhi sādhane śālajādayaḥ bhavanti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9609_3: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . upasargebhyaḥ ime vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:9610_0: evamātmakāḥ yatra kaḥ cit kriyāvācai śabdaḥ prayujyate tatra kriyāviśeṣam āhuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9610_1: yatra hi na prayujyate sasādhanam tatra kriyām āhuḥ . te ete upasargebhyaḥ vidhīyamānāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9610_2: sasādhanāyām kriyāyām bhaviṣyanti . evam api bhavet siddham viśāle śṛṅge iti . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:9611: viśaṅkaṭaḥ iti . etat api siddham . katham . akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . viśāle asya staḥ viśālaḥ . viśaṅkaṭe asya staḥ viśaṅkaṭaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9612_1: upasaṅkhyānam . kaṭacprakaraṇe alābūtilomābhyaḥ rajasi abhidheye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9613: umākaṭaḥ . bhaṅgāyāḥ ca . bhaṅgāyāḥ ca iti vaktavyam . bhaṅgākaṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9614: goṣṭhādayaḥ sthānādiṣu paśunāmādibhyaḥ . goṣṭhādayaḥ pratyayāḥ sthānādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9615_0: artheṣu paśunāmādibhyaḥ vaktavyāḥ . gogoṣṭham . avigoṣṭham . kaṭac ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9615_1: avikaṭaḥ uṣṭrakaṭaḥ . paṭac ca vaktavyaḥ . avipaṭaḥ uṣṭrapaṭaḥ . goyugaśabdaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9616: tailaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iṅgudatailam . sarṣapatailam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9617: śākaṭaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ikṣuśākaṭam . mūlaśākaṭam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9618_0: śākinaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ikṣuśākinam mūlaśākinam . upamānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9618_1: . upamānāt vā siddham etat . gavām sthānam goṣṭham . yathā gavam tadvat uṣṭrāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:9618_2: . kaṭac vaktavyaḥ iti . yathā nānādravyāṇām saṅghātaḥ kaṭaḥ evam avayaḥ saṃhatāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9619: yathā paṭaḥ prastīrṇaḥ evam avayaḥ prastīrṇāḥ avipaṭaḥ . goyugaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . goḥ yugam goyugam . yathā goḥ tadvat uṣṭrasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:9620_0: uṣṭragoyugam . tailaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti . prakṛtyantaram tailaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9620_1: vikāre vartate . evam ca kṛtvā tilatailam iti api siddham bhavati . śākaṭaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9620_2: ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva . śākinaśabdaḥ ca pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9622: cikacicik iti ete ca prakṛtyādeśāḥ vaktavyāḥ . cikinaḥ . cipiṭaḥ . cikkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9623: . klinnasya cilpil laḥ ca asya cakṣuṣī . klinnasya cil pil iti etau prakṛtyādeśau vaktavyau laḥ ca pratyayaḥ asya cakṣuṣī iti etasmin arthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:9624_0: klinne asya cakṣuṣī cillaḥ . pillaḥ . cul ca vaktavyaḥ . cullaḥ . yadi asya iti ucyate

GS24pmbhasuu:9625: cille asya staḥ cillaḥ . pille asya staḥ pillaḥ iti .
