GS24pmbhasuu:9651_0: bahavaḥ avayavāḥ asyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ iti . avayave yā saṅkhyā iti ucyate . na ca kā
GS24pmbhasuu:9651_1: cit saṅkhyā asti yasyāḥ bahuśabdaḥ avayavaḥ syāt . nanu ca iyam asti saṅkhyā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9651_2: eva . na eṣā saṅkhyā . sañjñā eṣā . avayavavidhāne avayavini pratyayaḥ . avayavavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9651_3: avayavini pratyayaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . pañca avayavāḥ . daśa avayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9651_4: iti . atha avayavini iti ucyamāne avayavasvāmini kasmāt na bhavati . pañca paśvavayavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9652: avayavaśabdaḥ ayam guṇaśabdaḥ asya iti ca vartate . tena yam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:9653: avayavaḥ guṇaḥ tasmin avayavini pratyayena bhavitavyam . kam ca prati
GS24pmbhasuu:9654: avayavaḥ guṇaḥ . samudāyam . yadi evam avayavini iti api na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9655: avayaveṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9656: (P_5,2.44) KA_II.380.6-12 Ro_IV.122-123 kimartham udāttaḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9657: udāttaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . pratyayasvareṇa api eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9658_0: svaraḥ siddhaḥ . na sidhyati . citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:9658_1: . atha udāttaḥ iti ucyamāne kutaḥ etat ādeḥ udāttatvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ antasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9658_2: iti . udāttavacanasāmarthyāt yasya aprāptaḥ svaraḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca aprāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9658_3: . ādeḥ . antasya punaḥ citsvareṇa eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9659: (P_5,2.45) KA_II.380.12-381.5 Ro_IV.123-125 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9660: ekādaśa māṣāḥ adhikāḥ asmin kārṣāpaṇaśate iti . adhike samānajātau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9661: samānajātau adhike iṣyate . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ adhikāḥ asyām kārṣāpaṇatriṃsati iti . iṣṭam śatasahasrayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9662: śatasahasrayoḥ adhike iṣyate . atha ekādaśam śatasahasram iti kasya ādhikye bhavitavyam . yasya saṅkhyā tadādhikye ḍaḥ kartavyaḥ mataḥ mama .
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_0: yadi tāvat śatāni saṅkhyāyante śatādhikye bhavitavyam . atha sahasrāṇi saṅkhyāyante
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_1: sahasrādhikye bhavitavyam . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_2: anirdeśaḥ . ḍavidhāne parimāṇaśabdānām ādhikyasya adhikaraṇābhāvāt anirdeśaḥ . agamakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_3: nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na hi ekādaśānām śatam adhikaraṇam . siddham tu pañcamīnirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_4: . siddham etat . katham . pañcamīnirdeśāt . pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . tat asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_5: adhikam iti . saḥ tarhi pañcamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_6: vyāpake vaiṣayike vā adhikaraṇe sambhavaḥ na asti aupaśleṣikam adhikaraṇam vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9663_7: . ekādaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ upaśliṣṭāḥ asmin śate ekādaśam
GS24pmbhasuu:9665: (P_5,2.46) KA_II.381.7-16 Ro_IV.125-126 kimartham śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam . śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9666: adhikārtham . śadgrahaṇe antagrahaṇam kriyate . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9667: vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya grahaṇam bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:9668: ekatriṃśam śatam . iṣyate ca atra api syāt iti . tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti antagrahaṇam . evamartham idam ucyate . asti prayojanam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9669_0: . kim tarhi iti . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca . saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:9669_1: . gotriṃśat adhikarm asmin śate iti . viṃśateḥ ca . viṃśateḥ ca antagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9669_2: . iha api yathā syāt . ekaviṃśam śatam . cakārāt saṅkhyāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:9669_3: mā bhūt . goviṃśatiḥ adhikam asmin śate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9670: (P_5,2.47) KA_II.381.18-382.16 Ro_IV.126-129 nimāne guṇini . nimāne guṇini iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . guṇeṣu mā bhūt . bhūyasaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9671: bhūyasaḥ iti ca vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . bhūyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9672: utpattiḥ yathā syāt alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ utpattiḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9673: ekaḥ anyataraḥ . ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9674: dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . samānānām . samānānām ca iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9675: . iha mā bhūt . ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . tat tarhi bahu
GS24pmbhasuu:9676: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yat tāvat ucyate . guṇini iti vaktavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9677: na vaktavyam . guṇeṣu kasmāt na bhavati . asya iti vartate . yat uktam bhūyasaḥ iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . alpīyasaḥ vācikāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9678_0: utpattiḥ kasmāt na bhavati . anabhidhānāt . yat uktam ekaḥ cet anyataraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9678_1: iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati dvau yavānām trayaḥ udaśvitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9678_2: iti . tantram vibhaktinirdeśaḥ . yat api ucyate samānānām ca iti vaktavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9678_3: na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati ekaḥ yavānām adhyardhaḥ udaśvitaḥ iti . anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9678_4: . nimeye ca api dṛśyate . nimeye ca api pratyayaḥ dṛśyate . dvimayāḥ yavāḥ . trimayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9679: nimānam kim nimeyam yāvatā ubhayam tyajyate . satyam evam etat . kva cit tu kā cit prasṛtatarā gatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . samāne tyāge dhānyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9680: vikrīṇite yavān vikrīṇīte iti ucyate . na kaḥ cit āha kārṣāpaṇam vikrīṇite
GS24pmbhasuu:9681: iti . atha vā yena adhigamyate tat nimānam . yat adhimayate tat nimeyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:9687: saṅkhyāpūraṇe iti vacanāt iti . tat tarhi saṅkhyāgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . saṅkhyāyāḥ guṇasya nimāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9688: mayaṭ iti . evam tarhi na iyam vṛttiḥ upālabhyate . kim tarhi .

GS24pmbhasuu:9695: asya ādiḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . akiryamāṇe hi pratyayādhikārāt pratyayaḥ ayam vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . pratyayāntare hi svare doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9696_0: pratyayāntare hi sati svare doṣaḥ syāt . viṃśatitamaḥ . eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:9696_1: viṃśatitamaḥ iti ca iṣyate . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9696_2: prakṛtam ḍaḍgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tasya pūraṇe ḍaṭ iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9696_3: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca arthaḥ . nāntāt iti pañcamī ḍaṭ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9697: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . pratyayavidhiḥ ayam na ca pratyayavidhau pañcamyaḥ prakalpikāḥ bhavanti . na ayam pratyayavidhiḥ . vihitaḥ pratyayaḥ prakṛtaḥ ca anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9699: ca . caturaḥ chayatau vaktavyau ādyakṣaralopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . turīyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:9707: iha mā bhūt . ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ . asaṅkhyādeḥ iti śakyam avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:9708_0: kasmāt na bhavati ekaṣaṣṭaḥ . dviṣaṣṭaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭiśabdāt pratyayaḥ vidhīyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9708_1: prasaṅgaḥ yat ekaṣaṣṭiśabdāt syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . tadantavidhinā
GS24pmbhasuu:9708_2: prāpnoti . grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9709: tadantavidhiḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . ekaviṃśatitamaḥ . etat siddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9710: (P_5,2.59) KA_II.385.22-386.14 Ro_IV.137-140 chaprakaraṇe anekapadāt api . chaprakaraṇe anekapadāt api iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9711: asyavāmīyam , kayāśubhīyam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9712: aprātipadikatvāt . siddham tu prātipadikavijñānāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:9713: . prātipadikavijñānāt . katham prātipadikavijñānam . svam rūpam śabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9714: aśabdasañjñā iti vacanāt . svam rūpam śabdasya aśabdasañjñā bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9715: evam yaḥ asau āmnāye asyavāmaśabdaḥ paṭhyate saḥ asya padārthaḥ . kim punaḥ anye āmnāyaśabdāḥ anye ime . om iti āha . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9716_0: āmnāyaśabdānām anyabhāvyam svaravarṇānupūrvīdeśakālaniyatatvāt . svaraḥ niyataḥ āmnāye
GS24pmbhasuu:9716_1: asyavāmaśabdasya . varṇānupūrvī khalu api āmnāye niyatā asyavāmaśabdasya . deśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9716_2: khalu api āmnāye niyataḥ . śmaśāne na adhyeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9717: catuṣpathe na adhyeyam iti . kālaḥ khalu api āmnāye niyataḥ . na amāvāsyāyām na caturdaśāyām iti . padaikadeśasubalopadarśanāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9718: padaikadeśaḥ khalu api āmnāye dṛśyate . asyavāmīyam . nanu ca eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9719: sublopaḥ syāt . subalopadarśanāt ca . subalopaḥ khalu api dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9720: asyavāmīyam iti . yadi tarhi anye āmnāyaśabdāḥ anye ime matvarthaḥ na upapadyate . asyavāmaśabdaḥ asmin asti iti . na sañjñā sañjñinam
GS24pmbhasuu:9723: adhyāyānuvākābhyām vā luk vaktavyaḥ . stambhaḥ . stambhīyaḥ . gardabhāṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9725_1: kāmābhidhāne iti vaktavyam . ṣaṣthyarthe hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . ṣaṣthyarthe hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:9726: iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt na bhavati dhane kāmaḥ asya iti . anabhidhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9727: (P_5,2.72) KA_II.387.5-8 Ro_IV.141 kim yaḥ śītam karoti saḥ śītakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9728: yaḥ vā uṣṇam karoti sa uṣṇakaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . tuṣāre āditye ca prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9729: evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . śītam iva śītam . uṣṇam iva uṣṇam . yaḥ āśu kartavyān arthān cireṇa karoti saḥ ucyate śītakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9730: yaḥ punaḥ āśu kartavyān arthān āśu eva karoti saḥ ucyate uṣṇakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9731: (P_5,2.73) KA_II.387.10-13 Ro_IV.141-142 adhikam iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9732: adyārūḍhasya uttarapadalopaḥ ca kan ca pratyayaḥ . adhyārūḍham adhikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9733: . bhavet siddham adhyārūḍhaḥ droṇaḥ khāryām adhikaḥ droṇaḥ khāryām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9734: idam tu na sidhyati . adhyārūḍhā droṇena khārī . adhikā droṇena khārī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9735: . gatyarthānām hi ktaḥ kartari vidhīyate . gatyarthānām vai ktaḥ karmaṇi api vidhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9736_0: (P_5,2.75) KA_II.387.15-17 Ro_IV.142) kim yaḥ pārśvena anvicchati saḥ pārvśvakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9736_1: . kim ca ataḥ . rājapuruṣe prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9736_2: . pārśvam iva pārśvam . yaḥ ṛjunā upāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:9737: anveṣṭavyān arthān anṛjunā upāyena anvicchati saḥ ucyate pārśvakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_0: (P_5,2.76) KA_II.387.19-388.2 Ro_IV.142 kim yaḥ ayaḥśulena anvicchati saḥ āyaḥśūlikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_1: . kim ca ataḥ . śivabhāgavate prāpnoti . evam tarhi uttarapadalopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9738_2: . ayaḥśulam iva ayaḥśulam . yaḥ mṛdunā upāyena anveṣṭavyān arthān rabhasena upāyena
GS24pmbhasuu:9739_0: (P_5,2.77) KA_II.388.4-8 Ro_IV.143 tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9739_1: vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . tāvatitham grahaṇam iti luk vāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9739_2: . vibhāṣāprakaraṇāt . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā etat siddham . tāvatithena gṛhṇāti
GS24pmbhasuu:9740: tāvatithena gṛhṇāti iti upasaṅkhyānam kartavya luk ca vaktavyaḥ . ṣaṣthena gṛhṇāti ṣaṭkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9742: karabhe iti anirdeśaḥ . śṛṅkhalam asya bandhanam karabhe iti anirdeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9743: agamakaḥ nirdeśaḥ anirdeśaḥ . na hi tasya śṛṅkhalabandhanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9744: śṛṅkhalavatyā asau rajjvā badhyate . siddham tu tadvannirdeśāt luk ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9745: siddham etat . katham . tadvannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ luk ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9746: śṛṅkhalavat bandhanam iti . saḥ tarhi tadvannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha yat na antareṇa yasya pravṛttiḥ bhavati tat tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9747: nimittatvāya kalpate . na ca antareṇa śṛṅkhalam bandhanam pravartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9748: atha vā sāhacaryāt tācchabdyam bhaviṣyati . śṛṅkhalasahacaritam bandhanam śrṅkhalam bandhanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9749: (P_5,2.82) KA_II.388.19-20 Ro_IV.144 prāye sañjñāyām vaṭakebhyaḥ iniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9750: . prāye sañjñāyām vaṭakebhyaḥ iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . vaṭakinī paurṇamāsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9751_0: (P_5,2.84) KA_II.389.2-7 Ro_IV. 144-145 kim nipātyate . śrotriyan chandaḥ adhīte
GS24pmbhasuu:9751_1: iti vākyārthe padavacanam . chandaḥ adhīte iti asya vākyasya arthe śrotriyan iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9751_2: etat padam nipātyate . chandasaḥ vā śrtotrabhāvaḥ tat adhīte iti ghan ca . chandasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9752: nipātyate tat adhīte iti etasmin arthe ghan ca pratyayaḥ . chandaḥ adhīte śṛotriyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9754: iniṭhanoḥ samānakālagrahaṇam kartavyam . adya bhukte śraḥ śrāddhikaḥ iti mā bhūt . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9756: tribhiḥ sākṣāt dṛṣṭam bhavati yaḥ ca dadāti yasmai ca dīyate yaḥ ca upadraṣṭā . tatra sarvatra pratyayaḥ prāpnoti . sañjñāgrahaṇasāmarthyāt dhanikāntevāsinoḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9757: (P_5,2.92) KA_II.389.18-390.6 Ro_IV.146-147 kim nipātyate . kṣetriyaḥ śrotriyavat . kṣetriyaḥ śrotriyavat nipātyate . parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9758_0: etasya vākyasya arthe kṣetriyac iti etat padam nipātyate . parakṣetrāt vā tatra cikitsyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9758_1: iti paralopaḥ ghac ca . parakṣetrāt vā tatra cikitsyaḥ iti etasmin arthe paralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9758_2: nipātyate ghac ca . parakṣetre cikitsyaḥ kṣetriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_0: (P_5,2.94.1) KA_II.391.2-23 Ro_IV.147-153 kimartham imau arthau ubhau nirdiśyete
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_1: : asya asmin iti na yat yasya bhavati tasmin api tat bhavati yat ca yasmin bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9759_2: tat tasya api bhavati . na etayoḥ āvaśyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9760: samāveśaḥ . bhavanti hi devadattasya gāvaḥ na ca tāḥ tasmin ādhṛtāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9761_0: bhavanti . bhavanti ca parvate vṛkṣāḥ na ca te tasya bhavanti . atha astigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9761_1: kimartham . sattāyām arthe pratyayaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . na sattām
GS24pmbhasuu:9762: : sampratisattāyām yathā syāt , bhūtabhaviṣyatsattāyām mā bhūt : gāvaḥ asya āsan . gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:9763_0: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . bhavati na tu etasmin vākye . yadi etasmin vākye
GS24pmbhasuu:9763_1: syāt yathā iha asteḥ prayogaḥ na bhavati gomān yavamān iti evam iha api na syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9763_2: gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . sati api asteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_0: prayoge yathā iha bahuvacanam śrūyate gāvaḥ asya āsan gāvaḥ asya bhavitāraḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_1: iha api syāt . gomān āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . kā tarhi iyam vācoyuktiḥ . gomān
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_2: āsīt . gomān bhavitā iti . eṣā eṣā vācoyuktiḥ . na eṣā gavām sattā kathyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9764_3: tarhi . gomatsattā eṣā kathyate . asti atra vartamānakālaḥ astiḥ . katham tarhi bhūtabhaviṣyatsattā
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_0: dhātusambandhe pratyayāḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam . astiyuktāt yathā syāt . anantarādiyuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_1: mā bhūt iti . gāvaḥ asya anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya samīpe iti . atha kriyamāṇe api astrigrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_2: iha kasmāt na bhavati . gāvaḥ asya santi anantarāḥ . gāvaḥ asya santi samīpe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_3: . asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti . yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_4: tarhi kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe asāmarthyāt anantarādiṣu na bhavanti evam akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_5: api na bhaviṣyati . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . kriyamāṇe astrigrahaṇe na antareṇa tṛtīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_6: padasya prayogam antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante . akriyamāṇe punaḥ astrigrahaṇe antareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9765_7: api tṛtīyasya padasya prayogam antarādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:9766_0: (P_5,2.94.2) KA_II.391.24-392.19 Ro_IV.153-156 atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citraguḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9766_1: . śabalaguḥ iti . bahuvrīhyuktatvāt matvarthasya . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati . citrāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9766_2: gāvaḥ asya santi iti . kutaḥ kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:9767: bhavati . kim avayavāt āhosvit samudāyāt . avayavāt kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9768: asāmarthyāt . katham asāmarthyam . sāpekṣam asarmartham bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9769: samudāyāt tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . aprātipadikatvāt . nanu ca bhoḥ ākṛtau śāstrāṇi pravartante . tat yathā sup supā iti vartamāne anyasya ca anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9770: ca samāsaḥ bhavati . satyam evam etat . ākṛtiḥ tu pratyekam parisamāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9771: . yāvati etat parisamāpyate ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti tāvataḥ utpattyā bhavitavyam . avayave ca etat parisamāpyate na samudāye . atha iha kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9772_0: na bhavati . pañca gāvaḥ asya santi pañcaguḥ . daśaguḥ iti . pratyekam asāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9772_1: samudāyāt aprātipadikatvāt samāsāt samāsena uktatvāt . na etat sāram . ukte api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9772_2: pratyayārthe utpadyate dvigoḥ taddhitaḥ . tat yathā dvaimāturaḥ pāñcanāpitiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9772_3: . na eṣaḥ dviguḥ . kaḥ tarhi . bahuvrīhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9773_0: apavādatvāt dviguḥ prāpnoti . antaraṅgatvāt bahuvrīhiḥ bhaviṣyati . kā antaraṅgatā
GS24pmbhasuu:9773_1: . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate viśiṣṭe anyapadārthe taddhitārthe dviguḥ . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9773_2: ca asya taddhite astigrahaṇam kriyate . yadi tarhi atiprasaṅgāḥ santi bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:9774: yathā syāt anantarādiyuktāt mā bhūt iti . atha na santi taddhitavidhau api na arthaḥ astigrahaṇena . satyam evam etat . kriyate tu idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:9775: taddhitavidhau astigrahaṇam . tat vai kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham na upādhyartham . astimān iti matup yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9776: aprātipadikatvāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ astiśabdaḥ . na eṣa asteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9777: laṭ . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā . nipātaḥ avyayam iti avyayasañjñā . evam api na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9778: . kim kāraṇam . astisāmānādhikaraṇye matup vidhīyate . na ca asteḥ astinā sāmānādhikaraṇyam . tat etat kriyamāṇam api pratyayavidhyartham na
GS24pmbhasuu:9779: upādhyartham . tasmāt dvigoḥ taddhitasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ yadi tat na asti sarvatra matvarthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . sati hi tasmin tena eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_0: (P_5,2.94.3) KA_II.392.20-393.10 Ro_IV.156-159 atha matvarthīyāt matvarthīyena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_1: . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . arthagatyarthaḥ śabdaprayogaḥ . artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_2: iti śabdaḥ prayujyate . tatra ekena uktatvāt tasya arthasya dvitīyasya prayogeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:9780_3: na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9781_0: daṇḍimatī śālā . hastimatī upapatyakā iti . bhavati . arthāntare vṛttāt arthāntare
GS24pmbhasuu:9781_1: vṛttiḥ . ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe vartate saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9782: bhavitavyam : gomantaḥ asya santi . yavamantaḥ asya santi iti . na bhavitavyam . kim kāṛaṇam . yasya gomantaḥ santi gāvaḥ api tasya santi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9783_0: tatra uktaḥ gobhiḥ abhisambandhe pratyayaḥ iti kṛtvā taddhitaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na
GS24pmbhasuu:9783_1: tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : daṇḍimatī śālā . hastimatī upapatyakā iti . bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9784_0: ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe vartate saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:9784_1: . iha api saptamyarthe vā vṛttam ṣaṣṭhyarthe vartate ṣaṣṭhyarthe vā vṛttam saptamyarthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9785: gobhiḥ abhisambandhe pratyayaḥ anyathājātīyakaḥ tadvatā . yena eva khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:9786: api hetunā etat vākyam bhavati gomantaḥ asya santi , yavamantaḥ asya santi
GS24pmbhasuu:9787: iti tena eva hetunā vṛttiḥ api prāpnoti . tasmāt matvarthīyāt matubādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9788_0: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tam ca api bruvatā samānvṛttau sarūpaḥ iti vaktavyam . bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9788_1: hi daṇḍimatī śālā hastimatī upapatyakā iti . śaiṣikāt matubarthīyāt śaiṣikaḥ matubarthīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9788_2: sarūpaḥ pratyayaḥ na iṣṭaḥ . sanantāt na san iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9790: matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre bhavanti . evam bhavitum arhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9791: matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre cet atiprasaṅgaḥ . matupprabhṛtayaḥ sanmātre cet
GS24pmbhasuu:9792: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vrīhiḥ asya . yavaḥ asya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9793: tasmāt bhūmādigrahaṇam kartavyam . ke punaḥ bhūmādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9794: bhūmanindāpraśaṃsāsu nityayoge atiśāyane saṃsarge astivivakṣāyām bhavanti matubādayaḥ . bhūmni : gomān yavamān . nindāyām : kakudāvartī saṅkhādakī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9795_0: praśaṃsayām : rūpavān varṇavān . nityayoge : kṣīriṇaḥ vṛkṣāḥ , kaṇṭakinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9795_1: iti . atiśāyane : udariṇī kanyā . saṃsarge : daṇḍī chatrī . tat tarhi bhūmādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9795_2: kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9796: vrīhiḥ asya . yavaḥ asya iti . uktam vā. kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9797: itikaraṇaḥ khalu api kriyate . tataḥ cet vivakṣā . bhūmādiyuktasya eva ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9798: vivakṣā . gomān yavamān . bhūmādiyuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9799: cit yavaḥ na asti . saṅkhādakī kakudāvartinī . nindāuktasya eva sattā
GS24pmbhasuu:9800: kathyate . na hi kaḥ cit na saṅkhādakī . rūpavān varṇavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9801: praśaṃsāyuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit rūpam na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9802: kṣīriṇaḥ vṛkṣāḥ . kaṇṭakinaḥ vṛkṣāḥ iti . nityayuktasya eva sattā kathyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9803: . na hi kasya cit kṣiram na asti . udariṇī kanyā iti . atiśāyanayuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit udaram na asti . daṇḍī chatrī .
GS24pmbhasuu:9804: saṃsargayuktasya eva sattā kathyate . na hi kasya cit daṇḍaḥ na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9805: yāvatībhiḥ khalu api gobhiḥ vāhadohaprasavāḥ kalpante tāvatīṣu sattā kathyate . kasya cit tisṛbhiḥ kalpante kasya cit śatena api na prakalpante
GS24pmbhasuu:9806: . sanmātre ca ṛṣidarśanāt . sanmātre ca punaḥ ṛṣiḥ darśayati matupam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9809_0: . guṇavacanebhyaḥ matupaḥ luk vaktavyaḥ . śuklaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ iti . avyatirekāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9809_1: . na guṇaḥ guṇinam vyabhicarati iti . avyatirekāt siddham iti cet dṛṣṭaḥ vyatirekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9809_2: . dṛśyate vyatirekaḥ . tat yatha paṭasya śuklaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9810_0: tathā ca liṅgavacanasiddhiḥ . evam ca kṛtvā liṅgavacanāni siddhāni bhavanti . śuklam
GS24pmbhasuu:9810_1: vastram . śuklā śāṭī . śuklaḥ kambalaḥ . śuklau kambalau . śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9810_2: yat asau dravyam śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat guṇasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_0: (P_5,2.95) KA_II.394.17-22 Ro_IV.162-163 kimartham idam ucyate na tat asya asti asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_1: iti eva matup siddhaḥ . rasādibhyaḥ punarvacanam anyanirvṛttyartham . rasādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_2: punarvacanam kriyate anyeṣām matvarthīyānām pratiṣedhārtham . matup eva yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9811_3: . ye anye matvarthīyāḥ prāpnuvanti te mā bhūvan iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9812: dṛśyante hi anye rasādibhyaḥ matvarthīyāḥ . rasikaḥ naṭaḥ . urvaśī vai rūpiṇī apsarasām . sparśikaḥ vāyuḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9813_0: (P_5,2.96) KA_II.395.2-4 Ro_IV.163 iha kasmāt na bhavati : cikīrṣā asya asti , jihīrṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:9813_1: asya asti iti . prāṇyaṅgāt iti vaktavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9813_2: na bhavati : cikīrṣā asya asti , jihīrṣā asya asti iti . anabhidhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9815: tebhyaḥ lacā mukte iniṭhanau prapnutaḥ iniṭhanau ca na iṣyete . lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ . lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ ayam na
GS24pmbhasuu:9816: vibhāṣā . lac ca matup ca . katham punaḥ etat jñāyate lac anyatarasyām iti samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . picchādibhyaḥ tundādīnām nānāyogakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9817: jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat ayam picchādibhyaḥ tundādīnām nānāyogam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9818: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . yadi vibhāṣā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9819: nānāyogakaraṇam anarthakam syāt . tundādīni api picchādiṣu eva paṭhet . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat nānāyogakaraṇe prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:9820: tundādiṣu yāni anakārāntāni tebhyaḥ iniṭhanau yathā syātām . yāni tarhi akārāntāni teṣām pāṭhaḥ kimarthaḥ . jñāpakārthaḥ eva . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:9821_0: picchādibhyaḥ tundādīnām nānāyogakaraṇam jñāpakam asamāveśasya . yat ayam tundādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9821_1: picchādīnām nānāyogam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9821_2: . yadi vibhāṣā syāt nānāyogakaraṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9822: picchādīni api tundādiṣu eva paṭhet . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti hi anyat nānāyogakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . picchādiṣu yāni anakārāntāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9823: tebhyaḥ iniṭhanau yathā syātām . yāni tarhi akārāntāni teṣām pāṭhaḥ kimarthaḥ . jñāpakārthaḥ eva . vasya ca punarvacanam sarvavibhāṣārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9824_0: vasya khalu api punarvacanam kriyate sarvavibhāṣārtham . keśāt vaḥ anyatarasyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9824_1: . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ samuccayaḥ ayam na vibhāṣā iti . dyudrubhyām nityārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:9825: vibhāṣāmadhye ayam yogaḥ kriyate . vibhāṣāmadhye ye vidhayaḥ nityāḥ te bhavanti iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:9828: śākīpalālīdadrūṇām hrasvatvam ca iti vaktavyam . śākinam , palālinam ,

GS24pmbhasuu:9835: (P_5,2.102-103.2) KA_II.397.1-3 Ro_IV.167 aṇprakaraṇe jyotsnādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . aṇprakaraṇe jyotsnādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9837: (P_5,2.107.1) KA_II.397.5-7 Ro_IV.167 ayam madhuśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ asti rasavācī . ātaḥ ca rasavācī api . madhuni eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:9838: madhu idam madhuram iti prasajyate . tat yaḥ rasavācī tasya idam grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9839: . yadi hi dravyapadārthakasya grahaṇam syāt iha api prasajyeta . madhu asmin ghaṭe asti .

GS24pmbhasuu:9845: medhiraḥ . rathiraḥ . aparaḥ āha : vāprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api dṛśyate iti vaktavyam . bimbāvam . kurarāvam iṣṭakāvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9847: ḍrśyate . valacprakaraṇe anyebhyaḥ api ḍrśyate iti vaktavyam . bhrātṛvalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9849: (P_5,2.115) KA_II.398.2-11 Ro_IV.169-170 iniṭhanoḥ ekākṣarāt pratiṣedhaḥ . iniṭhanoḥ ekākṣarāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : svavān , khavān
GS24pmbhasuu:9850: . atyalpam idam ucyate . ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau smṛtau . ekākṣarāt : svavān , khavān . kṛtaḥ : kārakavān , hārakavān . jāteḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9851: vṛkṣavān , plakṣavān , vyāghravān , siṃhavān . saptamyām ca na tau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9852_0: daṇḍāḥ asyām śālāyām santi iti . yadi kṛtaḥ na iti ucyate kāryī kāryikaḥ iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9852_1: . tathā ca yadi jāteḥ na iti ucyate tuṇḍalī tuṇḍalikaḥ iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9852_2: na ayam samuccayaḥ kṛtaḥ ca jāteḥ ca iti . kim tarhi . jātiviśeṣaṇam kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9852_3: : kṛt yā jātiḥ iti . katham kārakavān ,
GS24pmbhasuu:9853: hārakavān . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi evam na arthaḥ anena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9854: katham svavān , vṛkṣavān , siṃhavān , vyāghravān daṇḍāḥ asyām śālāyām santi iti . anabhidhānāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_0: (P_5,2.116) KA_II.398.13-17 Ro_IV.170 śikhādibhyaḥ iniḥ vaktavyaḥ ikan yavakhadādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9855_1: . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . iniḥ eva śikhādibhyaḥ ikan eva yavkhadādibhyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9856: nivartakatvāt . śikhāyavakhadādibhyaḥ niyamasya avacanam . kim kāraṇam .

GS24pmbhasuu:9860_0: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam nivṛttam . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat nityagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:9860_1: ācāryaḥ prāk etasmāt yogāt vibhāṣā iti anuvartate . atha ataḥ iti anuvartate utāho
GS24pmbhasuu:9860_2: na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate ekagavikaḥ na sidhyati . samāsānte kṛte bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9861: atha nivṛttam iha api prāpnoti . goviṃśatiḥ asya asti iti . nivṛttam .

GS24pmbhasuu:9879: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . bāhubalī . ūrubalī . sarvādeḥ ca . sarvādeḥ ca iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . sarvadhanī . sarvabījī . sarvakeśī . arthāt ca asannihite
GS24pmbhasuu:9880: . arthāt ca asannihite iniḥ vaktavyaḥ . arthī . asannihite iti kimartham .

GS24pmbhasuu:9882: hiraṇyārthī . kimartham tadantāt iti ucyate na tadantavidhinā siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_0: grahaṇavatā prātipadikena tadantavidhiḥ pratiṣidhyate . evarm tarhi inantena saha
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_1: samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . dhānyena arthī dhānyārthī . saḥ hi samāsaḥ na prāpnoti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_2: punaḥ ayam arthayateḥ ṇiniḥ syāt . evam api kriyām eva kurvāṇe syāt . tūṣṇīm api
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_3: āsīnaḥ yaḥ tatsamarthāni ācarati saḥ abhiprāyeṇa gamyate arthyam anena iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_4: tarhi ayam arthaśabdaḥ asti eva dravyapadārthakaḥ . tat yathā arthavān ayam deśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_5: iti ucyate yasmin gāvaḥ sasyāni ca vartante . asti kriyāpadārthakaḥ bhāvasādhanaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9883_6: . arthanam arthaḥ iti . tat yaḥ kriyāpadārthakaḥ tasya idam grahaṇam . evam ca kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:9886_0: vibhaktitve prayojanam itpratiṣedhaḥ . idānīm . na vibhaktau tusmāḥ iti itpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9886_1: siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi evam kimaḥ at kva prepsyan dīpyase kva ardhamāsāḥ . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:9886_2: prāpnoti . tau ca uktam . kim uktam . vibhaktau tavargapratiṣedhaḥ ataddhite iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9886_3: . idamaḥ vibhaktisvaraḥ ca . idamaḥ vibhaktisvaraḥ ca prayojanam . itaḥ . iha . idamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9887: udāttā bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhavati . tyadādividhayaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:9888: tyadādividhayaḥ ca prayojanam . yataḥ . yatra . vibhaktau iti tyadādividhayaḥ siddhāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:9890: bahugrahaṇe saṅkhyāgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . bahau . bahoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9891: atha kimartham kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kriyate na sarvanāmnaḥ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:9892: . dvyātipratiṣedhāt kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . dvyātipratiṣedhāt kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kriyate . advyādibhyaḥ iti pratiṣedhe prāpte kimaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9893_0: (P_5,3.5.1) KA_II.403.2-15 Ro_IV.178-179 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9893_1: . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti . yadi na kva cit śrūyate kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:9893_2: uccāryate . anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe api nakāre sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9894_0: nalope kṛte ekāltvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . nalopaḥ kriyatām sarvādeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9894_1: kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nalopaḥ . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9895_0: asiddhaḥ na ca idam tatra parigaṇyate . evam tarhi ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na akṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:9895_1: sarvādeśe prātipadikasañjñā prāpnoti na ca akṛtāyām prātipadikasañjñāyām nalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9895_2: prāpnoti . tat ānupūrvyā siddham . na etat asti prayojanam . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9895_3: bhavanti iti akārasya akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa nakāram sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9895_4: bhaviṣyati . asti anyat akārasya akāravacane prayojanam . kim . ye anye akārādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9896_0: prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . tat yathā maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9896_1: anusvārādayaḥ na bhavanti . tasmāt nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse
GS24pmbhasuu:9896_2: eva .praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayama aa iti . saḥ anekālśit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:9897_0: (P_5,3.5.2) KA_II.403.16-24 Ro_IV.180 etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ . etadaḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9897_1: kartavyaḥ . etadaḥ eta it iti etau ādeśau bhavataḥ tataḥ an . an ca bhavati etadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9897_2: iti . kena vihitena thakāre etadaḥ ādeśaḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9898_0: . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . etadaḥ ca thamaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . etatprakāram
GS24pmbhasuu:9898_1: ittham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . etat jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9898_2: atra thamuḥ iti yat ayam thakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:9899_0: ādeśam śāsti . kutaḥ nu khalu etajjñāpakāt atra thamuḥ bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9899_1: eva asau aviśeṣavihitaḥ thakārādiḥ tasmin ādeśaḥ syāt . idamā thakārādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9900_0: (P_5,3.7, 10) KA_II.404.3-23 Ro_IV.180-182 idam vicāryate : ime tasilādayaḥ vibhaktyādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9900_1: vā syuḥ pare vā iti . katham ca ādeśaḥ syuḥ katham vā pare . yadi pañcamyāḥ saptamyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9900_2: iti ṣaṣṭhī tadā ādeśāḥ . atha pañcamī tataḥ pare . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9902_2: . yatastyaḥ . tatratyaḥ . yatratyaḥ . supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ iti subluk prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:9903: anudāttau suppitau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . svara . guṇa . kasmāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9904: kutaḥ . gheḥ ṅiti iti guṇaḥ prāpnoti . guṇa . dīrgha . tasmin . tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:9905: ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti . dīrgha . ettva. teṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:9906: tatra . bahuvacane jhali et iti ettvam prāpnoti . ettva . auttva . kasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:9907: . kutra . idudbhyām aut at ca gheḥ iti auttvam prāpnoti . auttva .
GS24pmbhasuu:9908: smāyādividhiḥ . tasmāt . tataḥ . tasmin . tatra . ṅasiṅyoḥ smātsminau it
GS24pmbhasuu:9909: smādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . pañcamīnirdeśāt siddham . santu pare . yadi pare samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tasmāt tasyati . yasmāt tasyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9910_0: pañcamyantasya taseḥ tasil bhavati iti tasil prāpnoti . anādeśe svārthavijñānāt samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9910_1: . anādeśe svārthavijñānāt samānaśabdāpratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9910_2: . tasil kasmāt na bhavati . svārthavijñānāt . pañcamyantāt parasya taseḥ svārthe
GS24pmbhasuu:9910_3: vartamānasya tasilā bhavitavyam . na ca atra pañcamyantāt paraḥ tasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9912: (P_5,3.8) KA_II.405.2-8 Ro_IV.182-183 kimartham taseḥ tasil ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9913: taseḥ tasilvacanam svarārtham . taseḥ tasilvacanam kriyate svarārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:9914: liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . nanu ca ayam tasil tasim bādhiṣyate . na sidhyati . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9915: tasilaḥ avakāśaḥ . tataḥ hīyate . tataḥ avarohati . taseḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9916_0: grāmataḥ āgacchati . nagarataḥ āgacchati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tataḥ āgacchati
GS24pmbhasuu:9916_1: . yataḥ āgacchati . paratvāt tasiḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate taseḥ tasilvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9917: (P_5,3.9) KA_II.405.10-12 Ro_IV.183 paryabhibhyām ca iti yat ucyate tat sarvobhayārthe draṣṭavyam . yāvat sarvataḥ tāvat paritaḥ . yāvat ubhayataḥ tāvat abhitaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9918: (P_5,3.14) KA_II.405.14-22 Ro_IV.183 iha kasmāt na bhavati . saḥ . tau
GS24pmbhasuu:9919: . te . bhavadādibhiḥ yoge iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ bhavadādayaḥ . bhavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9920: dīrghāyuḥ . devānāmpriyaḥ . āyuṣmān iti . saḥ bhavān . tatra bhavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9921: tataḥ bhavān . tam bhavantam . tatra bhavantam . tataḥ bhavantam . tena bhavatā . tatra bhavatā tataḥ bhavatā . tasmai bhavate . tatra bhavate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9922_0: tataḥ bhavate . tasmāt bhavataḥ . tatra bhavataḥ . tataḥ bhavataḥ . tasmin bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:9922_1: . tatra bhavati . tataḥ bhavati . saḥ dīrghāyuḥ . tatra dīrghāyuḥ . tataḥ dīrghāyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9922_2: . tam dīrghāyuṣam . tatra dīrghāyuṣam . tataḥ dīrghāyuṣam . saḥ devānāmpriyaḥ . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9922_3: devānāmpriyaḥ . tataḥ devānāmpriyaḥ . tam devānāmpriyam . tatra devānāmpriyam . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9922_4: devānāmpriyam . saḥ āyuṣmān . tatra āyuṣmān . tataḥ āyuṣmān . tam āyuṣmantam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:9923: (P_5,3.17) KA_II.406.2-3 Ro_IV.184 adhunā iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dhunā ca pratyayaḥ idamaḥ vā lopaḥ adhunā ca pratyayaḥ . asmin kāle adhuna .
GS24pmbhasuu:9924: (P_5,3.18) KA_II.406.5-10 Ro_IV.184 idānīm . idamaḥ tṛtīyādivibhaktiḥ udāttā bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prāpnoti . dānīm iti nipātanāt svarasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9925: . dānīm iti nipātanāt svarasiddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9926: uktam vā . kim uktam . ādau siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9928: vihitatvāt . tadaḥ dāvacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vihitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9929: vihitaḥ atra pratyayaḥ sarvaikānyakiṃyattadaḥ kāle dā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9931: tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :yogayoḥ vā pratyayayoḥ vā iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe : tayoḥ iti prātipadikanirdeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9932: (P_5,3.22) KA_II.407.2-408.2 Ro_IV.185-186 sadyaḥ iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9933_0: samānasya sabhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca ahani . samānasya sabhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9933_1: ahani abhidheye . samāne ahani sadyaḥ . parut parāri iti kim nipātyate . pūrvapūrvatayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9934: pūrvapūrvatayoḥ parabhāvaḥ nipātyate udārī ca pratyayau saṃvatsare abhidheye . pūrvasmin saṃvatsare parut . pūrvatare saṃvatsare parāri .
GS24pmbhasuu:9935: aiṣamaḥ iti kim nipātyate . idamaḥ samasaṇ . idamaḥ samasaṇ pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9936: nipātyate saṃvatsare abhidheye . asmin saṃvatsare aiṣamaḥ . paredyavi iti kim nipātyate . parasmāt edyavi ahani . parasmāt edyavi pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9937: nipātyate ahani abhidheye . parasmin ahani paredyavi . adya iti kim
GS24pmbhasuu:9938_0: nipātyate . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ dyaḥ ca . idamaḥ aśbhāvaḥ nipātyate dyaḥ ca pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9938_1: ahani abhidheye . asmin ahani adya . pūrvedyuḥ anyedyuḥ anyataredyuḥ itaredyuḥ aparedyuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9938_2: adharedyuḥ ubhayedyuḥ uttaredyuḥ iti kim nipātyate . pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9938_3: edyusuc pūrvānyānyatarerāparādharobhayottarebhyaḥ edyusuc pratyayaḥ nipātyate ahani
GS24pmbhasuu:9938_4: abhidheye . pūrvasmin ahani pūrvedyuḥ . anyasmin ahani anyedyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9939: anyatarasmin ahani anyataredyuḥ . itarasmin ahani itaredyuḥ . aparasmin ahani aparedyuḥ . adharasmin ahani adharedyuḥ . ubhayoḥ ahnoḥ ubhayedyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9940: uttarasmin ahani uttaredyuḥ . dyuḥ ca ubhayāt . ubhayaśabdāt dyuḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:9942: (P_5,3.27) KA_II.408.5 Ro_IV.187 iha kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvasmin deśe vasati iti . na eṣaḥ deśaḥ . deśaviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9943: (P_5,3.28) KA_II.408.7-22 Ro_IV.188-190 kimartham atasuc kriyate na tasuc eva kriyate . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . svarārthaḥ cakāraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:9944: kartavyaḥ bhavati . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:9945: dakṣiṇataḥ grāmasya . uttarataḥ grāmasya . dakṣiṇottaraśabdau akārāntau .
GS24pmbhasuu:9946: tasuśabdaḥ pratyayaḥ . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntau . yatu tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:9947: ākārāntau tadā na sidhyati . tadā api siddham . katham . puṃvadbhāvena .
GS24pmbhasuu:9948: katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tasilādiṣu ā kṛtvasucaḥ iti . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:9949: bhāṣitapuṃskasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ na ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . nanu ca bho
GS24pmbhasuu:9950: dakṣiṇaśabdaḥ uttaraśabdaḥ ca puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau yat
GS24pmbhasuu:9951_0: bhāṣitapuṃskam iti ucyate ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . dakṣiṇā uttarā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9951_1: dikśabdau . dakṣiṇaḥ uttaraḥ iti vyavasthāśabdau . yadi punaḥ dikśabdāḥ api vyavasthāśabdāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_0: diśaḥ yadā vyavasthām vakṣyanti . yadi tari yaḥ yaḥ diśi vartate saḥ saḥ dikśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_1: ramaṇīyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . ramaṇīyā dik śobhanā dik iti . atha matam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_2: diśi dṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ digdṛṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ dikśabdaḥ diśam yaḥ na vyabhicarati iti ramaṇīyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_3: atiprasaṅgaḥ na bhavati puṃvadbhāvaḥ tu prāpnoti . evam tarhi sarvanāmnaḥ vṛttimātre
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_4: puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ dakṣiṇottarapūrvāṇām iti evamartham . viśeṣaṇārtham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_5: . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . ṣaṣṭhī atasarthapratyayena iti . ṣaṣṭhī tasarthapratyayene
GS24pmbhasuu:9952_6: iti ucyamāne iha api syāt . tataḥ grāmāt . yataḥ grāmāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9953: (P_5,3.31) KA_II.409.2-4 Ro_IV.191 upari upariṣṭāt iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9954: ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca . ūrdhvasya upabhāvaḥ riliṣṭātilau ca pratyayau nipātyete . upari upariṣtāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9955: (P_5,3.32) KA_II.409.6-16 Ro_IV.191 paścāt iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:9956: aparasya paścabhāvaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . aparasya paścabhāvaḥ nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9957: ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . paścāt . dikpūrvapadasya ca . dikpūrvapadasya ca aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ ātiḥ ca pratayayaḥ . dakṣiṇapaścāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9958: uttarapaścāt . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse . ardhottarapadasya ca samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:9960: ardhe ca . ardhe ca parataḥ aparasya paścabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paścārdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9961: (P_5,3.35) KA_II.409.18-20 Ro_IV.191 apañcamyāḥ iti prāk asaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9962: apañcamyāḥ iti yat ucyate prāk asaḥ tat draṣṭavyam . dveṣyam vijānīyāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:9963: aviśeṣeṇa uttaram apañcamyāḥ iti . tat ācāryaḥ suhṛt bhūtvā anvācaṣṭe :
GS24pmbhasuu:9966: citaḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9967: prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena
GS24pmbhasuu:9968: . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . viśeṣaṇārthaḥ tarhi . kva viśeṣaṇārthena arthaḥ . anyārāditarartedikśabdāñcūūttarapadājāhiyukte
GS24pmbhasuu:9969_0: (P_5,3.42) KA_II.410.7-15 Ro_IV.192-193 vidhārthe iti ucyate . kaḥ vidhārthaḥ nāma
GS24pmbhasuu:9969_1: . vidhāyāḥ arthaḥ vidhārthaḥ . yadi evam ekā govidhā . ekā hastividhā . atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:9971_0: kaḥ punaḥ dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kim yat tat devadattaḥ kaṃsapātryām pāṇinā odanam
GS24pmbhasuu:9971_1: bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kārakapṛthaktvam etat . yat tarhi tat kālye bhuṅke sāyam
GS24pmbhasuu:9971_2: bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . kālapṛthaktvam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:9972: yat tarhi śītam bhuṅkte uṣṇam bhuṅkte iti . na iti āha . guṇapṛthaktvam etat . kaḥ tarhi dhātvarthapṛthagbhāvaḥ . kārakāṇām pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:9973: . yadi evam kriyāprakāre ayam bhavati . vidhayuktagatāḥ ca prakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:9974: bhavanti . evaṃvidham . evaṃyuktam . evaṅgatam . evamprakāram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:9975_0: (P_5,3.44) KA_II.410.17-20 Ro_IV.194 sahabhāve dhyamuñ . sahabhāve dhyamuñ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9975_1: . eikadhyam rāśim kuru . saḥ tarhi vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . adhikaraṇavicāle iti
GS24pmbhasuu:9975_2: ucyate na ca saḥ eva adhikaraṇavicālaḥ yat ekam anekam kriyate . yat api anekam ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:9977: . dhamuñantāt svārthe ḍaḥ dṛśyate saḥ ca vidheyaḥ . pathi dvaidhāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:9979_0: (P_5,3.47) KA_II.411.5-10 Ro_IV.195 pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam . pāśapi kutsitagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9979_1: kartavyam . vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ . yājñikapāśaḥ . yaḥ hi yāpayitavyaḥ yāpyaḥ tatra mā
GS24pmbhasuu:9979_2: bhūt iti . atha vaiyākaraṇaḥ śarīreṇa kṛśaḥ vyākaraṇena ca śobhanaḥ kartavyaḥ vaiyākaraṇapāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9979_3: iti . na kartavyaḥ katham . yasya bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tadguṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9979_4: vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam . na ca kārśyasya bhāvāt dravye vaiyākaraṇaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9981: na hi apūraṇaḥ tīyaśabdaḥ asti yatra doṣaḥ syāt . nanu ca ayam asti mukhatīyaḥ pārśvatīyaḥ iti . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:9982: na bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi pūraṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . prāk ekādaśabhyaḥ acchandasi iti pūraṇāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:9983_0: (P_5,3.52) KA_II.411.17-412.10 Ro_IV.19196-197 ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:9983_1: . ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayaḥ vidheyaḥ . ekākinau . ekākinaḥ iti . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9984_0: ekaśabdaḥ ayam saṅkhyāpadam saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . siddham tu saṅkhyādeśavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9984_1: . siddham etat . katham . dvibahvarthāyāḥ saṅkhyāyāḥ ekaśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9985: ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . asahāyaḥ ekākī . asahāyau ekākinau . asahāyāḥ ekākinaḥ . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_0: ekāt ākinici dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam ekaśabdaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_1: eva saṅkhyāpadam . tat yathā ekaḥ dvau bahavaḥ iti . asti anyārthe vartate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_2: yathā sadhamādaḥ dyumnaḥ ekāḥ tāḥ . anyāḥ iti arthaḥ . asti asahāyavācī . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:9986_3: . ekāgnayaḥ . ekahalāni . ekākibhiḥ kṣudrakaiḥ jitam iti . tat yaḥ asahāyavācī tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9988_0: kim idam atiśāyane iti . deśyāḥ sūtranibandhāḥ kriyante . yāvat brūyāt prakarṣe atiśaye
GS24pmbhasuu:9988_1: iti tāvat atiśāyane iti . kasya punaḥ prakarṣe pratyayaḥ utpadyate . ṅyāpprātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:9989: ṅyāpprātipadikam vai śabdaḥ na ca śabdasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . śabde asambhavāt arthe kāryam vijñāsyate . kaḥ punaḥ ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:9990: dravyam . na vai dravyasaya prakarṣe iṣyate . evam tarhi guṇaḥ . evam api guṇagrahaṇam kartavyam . dravyam api ṅyāpprātipadikārthaḥ guṇaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:9991_0: tatra kutaḥ etat guṇasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati na punaḥ dravyasya prakarṣe iti . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:9991_1: ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:9991_2: idānīm idam bhavati : adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān .
GS24pmbhasuu:9992: pāpīyān pratiprasthātā . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti . samānaguṇe eṣā spardhā
GS24pmbhasuu:9993_0: bhavati . adhvaryuḥ vai śreyān anyebhyaḥ praśasyebhyaḥ . pāpīyān pratiprasthātā anyebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9993_1: pāpebhyaḥ . andhānām kāṇatamaḥ iti kaṇiḥ ayam saukṣmye vartate . sarve ime kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:9994: adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . mahān sarṣapaḥ . mahān himavān iti . jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : vṛkṣaḥ ayam plakṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:9995: ayam iti . na tarhi idānīm idam bhavati : gotaraḥ . gotarā . aśvataraḥ iti . na eṣaḥ jāteḥ prakarṣaḥ . kasya tarhi . guṇasya . gauḥ ayam śakaṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_0: vahati . gotararḥ ayam yaḥ śakaṭam vahati sīram ca . gauḥ iyam yā samām samām vijāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_1: . gotarā iyam yā samām samām vijāyate strīvatsā ca . aśvaḥ ayam yaḥ catvāri yojanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_2: gacchati . aśvataraḥ ayam yaḥ aṣṭau yojanāni gacchati . tathā tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_3: kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate guṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_4: kartavyam iti . na kartavyam . yasya prakarṣaḥ asti tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_5: ca eva prakarṣaḥ na dravyasya . katham jñāyate . evam hi dṛśyate loke . iha samāne
GS24pmbhasuu:9996_6: āyāme vistāre paṭasya anyaḥ arghaḥ bhavati kāśikasya anyaḥ māthurasya . guṇāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:9997: prakṣālayanti . anyena śuddham dhautakam kurvanti anyena śaiphālikam
GS24pmbhasuu:9998: anyena mādhyamikam . yat api ucyate kriyamāṇe ca api guṇagrahaṇe samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:9999_0: samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete . vācakena khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:9999_1: utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:9999_2: adūraviprakarṣe iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10000: adūraviprakarṣe eva spardhā bhavati . na hi niṣkadhanaḥ śataniṣkadhanena spardhate . yat api ucyate jāteḥ na iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10001_0: jananena yā prāpyate sā jātiḥ na ca etasya arthasya prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:10001_1: ucyate tiṅaḥ ca iti atra kriyāgrahaṇam kartavyam sādhanaprakarṣe mā bhūt iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10001_2: kartavyam . sādhanam vai dravyam na ca dravyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10002: prakarṣāpakarṣau staḥ . kim punaḥ ekam śauklyam āhosvit nānā . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10003: . yadi ekam prakarṣaḥ na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10004: bhavati . atha nānā samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10005: . asti ekam śauklyam tat tu viśeṣavat . kiṅkṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10006_0: alpatvamahattvakṛtaḥ . atha vā punaḥ astu ekam nirviśeṣam ca . nanu ca uktam prakarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10006_1: na upapadyate . na hi tena eva tasya prakarṣaḥ bhavati iti . guṇāntareṇa pracchādāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10006_2: prakarṣaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu nānā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10007: nanu ca uktam samānaguṇagrahaṇam kartavyam śuklāt kṛṣṇe mā bhūt iti . na kartavyam . samānaguṇe eva spardhā bhavati . nahi āḍhyābhirūpau spardhete
GS24pmbhasuu:10008: . vācakena khalu api utpattavyam na ca śuklāt kṛṣṇe pratyayaḥ utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10010: bhavitavyam . dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt . śuklam atiśete śuklataraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10011: kṛṣṇam atiśete kṛṣṇataraḥ . yadi dvitīyāntāt atiśayyamānāt kālaḥ atiśete kālīm kālitaraḥ iti prāpnoti kālataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . tathā kālī atiśete
GS24pmbhasuu:10012_0: kālam kālataraḥ iti prāpnoti kālitarā iti ca iṣyate . tathā gārgyaḥ atiśete gargān
GS24pmbhasuu:10012_1: gargataraḥ iti prāpnoti gārgyataraḥ iti ca iṣyate . tathā gargāḥ atiśerate gārgyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10012_2: gārgyatarāḥ iti prāpnoti gargatarāḥ iti ca iṣyate . evam tarhi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_0: . kālī atiśete kālitarā . gārgyaḥ atiśete gārgyataraḥ . gargāḥ atiśerate gargatarāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_1: . yadi prathamāntāt svārthikaḥ kumāritarā kiśoritarā avyatiriktam vayaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_2: vayasi prathame iti ṅīp prāpnoti . tarapā uktatvāt strīpratyayaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_3: ṭāp api tarhi na prāpnoti . ukte api hi bhavanti ete ṭābādayaḥ . uktam etat svārthikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10013_4: ṭābādayaḥ iti . ṅīp api tarhi prāpnoti . evam tarhi guṇaḥ abhidhīyate . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:10014: na sidhyanti . śuklataram . śuklatarā . śuklataraḥ . śuklatarau .
GS24pmbhasuu:10015_0: śuklatarāḥ iti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni bhaviṣyanti . guṇavacanānām hi śabdānām
GS24pmbhasuu:10015_1: āśrayata liṅgavacanāni bhavanti . śuklam vastram , śuklā śāṭī śuklaḥ kambalaḥ , śuklau
GS24pmbhasuu:10015_2: kambalau śuklāḥ kambalāḥ iti . yat asau dravyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10016_0: śritaḥ bhavati guṇaḥ tasya yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat gu asya api bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10016_1: vā kriyā abhidhīyate . evam api liṅgavacanāni na sidhyanti . āśrayataḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10017_0: prāpnoti . yaḥ ca atiśete yaḥ ca atiśayyate ubhau tau tasya āśrayau bhavataḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10017_1: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . śetiḥ akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ api dhātavaḥ sopasargāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10017_2: bhavanti . karmāpadiṣṭāḥ vidhayaḥ karmasthabhāvakānām karmasthakriyāṇam vā bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10018: śetiḥ . atha yadi eva dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ prathamāntāt vā svārthikaḥ atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10019_0: api guṇaḥ abhidhīyate atha api kriyā kim gatam etat iyatā sūtreṇa āhosvit anyatarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:10019_1: pakṣe bhūyaḥ sūtram kartavyam . gatam iti āha . katham . yadā tāvat dvitīyāntāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_0: bahulam iti evam atra lyuṭ bhaviṣyati . yadā guṇaḥ abhidhīyate tadā nyāyasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_1: eva . yadā lapi kriyā tadā api nyāyasiddham eva . atha vā atiśāyayati iti atiśāyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_2: . kaḥ prayojyārthaḥ . guṇāḥ guṇinam prayojayanti guṇī vā guṇān prayojayati . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_3: punaḥ iha śetyarthaḥ . iha yaḥ yatra bhavati śete asau tatra . guṇāḥ ca guṇini śerate
GS24pmbhasuu:10020_4: . śetyarthaḥ kāritārthaḥ vā nirdeśaḥ ayam samīkṣitaḥ . śetyarthe na asti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10021: kāritārthe bravīmi te . guṇī vā guṇasaṃyogāt guṇaḥ vā guṇinā yadi abhivyajyeta saṃyogāt kāritārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10022: (P_5,3.55.3) KA_II.415.18-416.15 Ro_IV.209-211 iha asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi asya api sūkṣmāṇi vastrāṇi iti paratvāt ātiśāyikaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_0: atiśāyane bahuvrīhau uktam . kim uktam . pūrvpadātiśaye ātiśāyikāt bahuvrīhiḥ sūkṣmavastratarādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_1: . uttarapadātiśaye ātiśāyikaḥ bahuvrīheḥ bahvāḍhyatarādyarthaḥ iti . iha trīṇi śuklāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_2: vastrāṇi prakarṣāpakarṣayuktāni . tatra pūrvam apekṣya uttare dve tarabante . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_3: dvayoḥ tarabantayoḥ ekasmāt prakarṣayuktāt śuklataraśabdāt utpattiḥ prāpnoti śuklaśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10023_4: eva ca iṣyate . śuklatarasya śuklabhāvāt prakṛteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10024_0: pratyayavijñānam . śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti . tasmāt utpattiḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10024_1: na etat vivadāmahe śuklataraśabde śuklaśabdaḥ asti na asti iti . kim tarhi . śuklataraśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10025: tadantāt ca svārthe chandasi darśanam śreṣṭhamāya iti . tadantāt ātiśāyikāntāt ca svārthe chandasi ātiśāyikaḥ dṛśyate . devo vaḥ savita
GS24pmbhasuu:10026_0: prarpayatu śreṣṭhamāya karmaṇe . evam tarhi madhyamāt śuklaśabdāt pūrvaparāpekṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10026_1: utpattiḥ vaktavyā . madhyamaḥ ca śuklaśabdaḥ pūrvam apekṣya prakṛṣṭaḥ param apekṣya
GS24pmbhasuu:10026_2: nyūnaḥ na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . atha vā utpadyatām . luk bhaviṣyati . vācakena khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:10027: śuklataraśabdāt utpadyamānaḥ vācakaḥ syāt . na khalu api bahūnām prakarṣe tarapā bhavitavyam . kena tarhi . tamapā . pūrveṇa spardhamānaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10028_0: labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti na ca nyūnaḥ pravartate . apekṣya madhyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10028_1: pūrvam ādhikyam labhate sitaḥ . parasmin nyūnatām eti yathā amātyaḥ sthite nṛpe .
GS24pmbhasuu:10028_2: astu vā api taraḥ tasmāt . na apaśabdaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10029: vācakaḥ cet prayoktavyaḥ vācakaḥ cet prayujyatām .
GS24pmbhasuu:10031: tatra idam na sidhyati . dantoṣṭhasya dantāḥ snigdhatarāḥ . pāṇipādasya pādau sukumāratarau . asmākam ca devadattasya ca devadattaḥ abhirūpataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10032: iti . yadi punaḥ dvyarthopapade iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10033: vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam na kartavyam . iha api śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10034_0: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti dvyarthopapade iti eva siddham . na evañjātīyakā
GS24pmbhasuu:10034_1: dvyarthatā śakyā vijñātum . iha api prasjyeta . śaṅkāśyakānām pāṭaliputrakāṇām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10034_2: pāṭaliputrakāḥ abhirūpatamāḥ iti . avaśyam khalu api
GS24pmbhasuu:10035: vibhajyopapadagrahaṇam kartavyam yaḥ hi bahūnām vibhāgaḥ tadartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10036: śaṅkāśyakebhyaḥ ca pāṭaliputrakebhyaḥ ca māthurāḥ abhirūpatarāḥ iti . tat tarhi dvyarthopapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10037: dvivacanasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi anvarthagrahaṇam . ucyate vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10038: dvayoḥ arthayoḥ vacanam dvivacanam iti . evam api tarabīyasunoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10039: ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tarabīyasunoḥ ekadravyasya utkarṣāpakarṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam vaktavyam . parut bhavān paṭuḥ āsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10040: paṭutaraḥ ca aiṣamaḥ iti . siddham tu guṇapradhānatvāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10041: katham . guṇapradhānatvāt . guṇapradhānaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10042: guṇāntarayogāt ca anyatvam bhavati . tat yathā tam eva guṇāntarayuktam vaktāraḥ bhavanti anyaḥ bhavān saṃvṛttaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_0: na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_1: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta . ajādī guṇavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_2: eva iti . mā evam vijñāyi . ajādī eva guṇavacanāt iti . kim ca syāt na vyañjanādī
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_3: guṇavacanāt syātām (P_5,3.60) KA_II.417.14-418.4 Ro_IV.215-217 idam ayuktam vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_4: . kim atra ayuktam . ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti uktvā aguṇavacanānām api ajādyoḥ ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_5: ucyante . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:10044_6: ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ ādeśān śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10045: evam api tayoḥ iti vaktavyam syāt . tayoḥ parataḥ iti . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10046: vidhiḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . vyañjanādī hi na syātām upādhīnām ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10047: saṅkaraḥ syāt punarvidhānāt ajādyoḥ . nanu ca ete viśeṣāḥ anuvarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:10048_0: yadi api ete anuvarteran vyañjanādī tarhi na syātām . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10048_1: jñāpayati bhavataḥ etebhyaḥ aguṇavacanebhyaḥ api ajādī iti yat ayam ajādyoḥ parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10048_2: ādeśān śāsti . nanu ca uktam tayoḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10049: iti . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam ajādīgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10050_0: ajādī guṇavacanāt eva iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam saptamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10050_1: . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:10051_0: devadattasya gāva aśvā hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10051_1: . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10051_2: . evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat
GS24pmbhasuu:10054: ekavacanāntena ca . tena strīliṅgāt eva utpattiḥ syāt ekavacanāntāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10055_0: punnapuṃsakaliṅgāt dvivacanabahuvacanāntāt ca na syāt . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10055_1: . kim tarhi . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat . praśaṃsāyām yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10055_2: rūpap bhavati . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10055_3: anuvartante . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt tiṅprakṛteḥ ambhāvavacanam . prakṛteḥ liṅgavacanābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10055_4: tiṅprakṛteḥ rūpapaḥ ambhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10056: pacantirūpam iti . siddham tu kriyāpradhānatvāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10057: kriyāpradhānatvāt . kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam ekā ca kriyā . dravyapradhānam nāma . katham punaḥ jñayate kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10058: dravyapradhānam nāma iti . yat kriyām pṛṣṭaḥ tiṅā ācaṣṭe . kim devadattaḥ karoti . pacati iti . dravyam pṛṣṭaḥ kṛtā ācaṣṭe . kataraḥ devadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10059: yaḥ kārakaḥ hārakaḥ iti . yadi tarhi ekā kriyā dvivacanabahuvacanāni na
GS24pmbhasuu:10060: sidyanti . pacataḥ . pacanti iti . na etāni kriyāpekṣāṇi . kim tarhi sādhanāpekṣāṇi . iha api tarhi prāpnuvanti . pacatirūpam . pacatorūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10061: pacantirūpam iti . tiṅā uktatvāt tasya abhisambandhasya na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10062: ekavacanam api tarhi na prāpnoti . samayāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10063: dvivacanabahuvacanāni api tarhi samayāt prāpnuvanti . evam tarhi ekavacanam utsargaḥ kariṣyate . tasya dvibahvoḥ dvivacanabahuvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:10064: apavāvau bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api napuṃsakatvam vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10068: corarūpaḥ iti . siddham tu prakṛtyarthavaiśiṣṭyavacanāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10069_0: katham . prakṛtyarthasya vaiśiṣṭye iti vaktavyam . vṛṣalarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam palāṇḍunā
GS24pmbhasuu:10069_1: surām pibet . corarūpaḥ ayam . api ayam akṣṇoḥ añjanam haret . dasyurūpaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10072_0: paṭukalpau . paṭukalpāḥ iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ īṣadasamāptiḥ nāma . tasya ekatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10072_1: ekavacanam prāpnoti . prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād siddham . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10072_2: na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10073: etat . īṣadasamāptau yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt kalpabādayaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10074_0: . kasmin arthe . svārthe iti . svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante
GS24pmbhasuu:10074_1: . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10075_0: payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . siddham tu tatsambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10075_1: siddham etat . katham . tatsambandhe īṣadasamāptisambandhe uttarapadārthe pratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10075_2: bhavati iti vaktavyam sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:10076_0: īṣadasamāptaukriyāpradhānatvāt liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . parihṛtam etat prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇatvād
GS24pmbhasuu:10076_1: siddham iti . nanu ca uktam prakṛtyarthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10076_2: doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:10076_3: ayam ṇacaḥ striyām añ iti strīgrahaṇam karoti . yadi etat jñāpyate bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:10076_4: . bahutailam prasannā . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na api ativartante
GS24pmbhasuu:10077: kim punaḥ iha udāharaṇam . paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10078: nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10079: . idam tarhi . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti . dravyam api anirjñātam . idam tarhi . kṛtakalpam . bhuktakalpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10081: bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . ktāntāt pratyayavidhāneḥ anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . ktasya bhūtakālalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_0: bhūtakālalakṣaṇaḥ ktaḥ . kalpādīnām ca asamāptivacanāt . visamāptivacanāḥ ca kalpādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10082_1: . na ca asti sambhavaḥ yat bhūtakālaḥ ca syāt asamāptiḥ ca iti . siddham tu āśaṃsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10083: āśaṃsāyām bhūtavat ca iti evam atra ktaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:10084: udāharaṇam paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam nirjñātasya arthasya samāptiḥ vā bhavati visamāptiḥ vā guṇaḥ ca anirjñātaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10085_0: lokataḥ vyavahāram dṛṣṭvā guṇasya nirjñānam . tat yathā paṭuḥ ayam brāhmaṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10085_1: ucyate yaḥ laghunā upāyena athān sādhayati . paṭukalpaḥ ayam iti ucyati yaḥ na tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:10085_2: sādhayati . idam ca api udāharaṇam guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā . payaskalpā
GS24pmbhasuu:10086: dravyam api anirjñātam iti . lokataḥ dravyam api nirjñātam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10087: (P_5,3.68.1) KA_II.420.19-422.4 Ro_IV.226-229 vibhāṣāgrahaṇam kimartham . vibhāṣā bahuc yathā syāt . bahucā mukte vākyam api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10088: . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā mahāvibhāṣā . tayā vākyam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10089: idam tarhi prayojanam . kalpādayaḥ api yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . bahuc ucyate kalpādayaḥ api . tat ubhayam vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10090: . na evam śakyam . akriyamāṇe hi vibhāṣāgrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ bahuc kalpādīn
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_0: bādheta . kalpādayaḥ api anavakāśāḥ . te vacanāt bhaviṣyanti . sāvakāśāḥ kalpādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_1: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . tiṅantāni avakāśaḥ . atha subgrahaṇam kimartham . subantāt utpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_2: yathā syāt . prātipadikāt mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_3: subantāt utpattau satyām prātipadikāt vā . yadi evam iha api na arthaḥ subgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:10091_4: . supaḥ ātmanaḥ kyac iti . iha api na asti atra viśeṣaḥ subantāt utpattau satyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10092: prātipadikāt vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . subantāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā bhavati . prātipadikāt utpattau satyām padasañjñā na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10093: nanu ca prātipadikāt api utpattau satyām padasañjñā siddhā . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10094: ārabhyate naḥ kye iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam subantāt utpattau
GS24pmbhasuu:10095: niyamārtham . tat eva prātipadikāt utpattau satyām vidhyartham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10096: . idam tarhi prayojanam . subantāt utpattiḥ yathā syāt . tiṅantāt mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:10097_0: iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ṅyāpprātipadikāt iti vartate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:10097_1: . bahuci subgrahaṇāt pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānam . bahuci subgrahaṇam kriyate pūrvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10097_2: tiṅaḥ vidhiḥ yathā vijñāyeta . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10098_0: prayojanam . prakṛtam tiṅgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . atiśāyane tamabiṣṭhanau
GS24pmbhasuu:10098_1: . tiṅaḥ ca iti . evam tarhi bahuci subgrahaṇam pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . bahuci subgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10098_2: kriyate . kim kāraṇam . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ vidhānāt . pūrvatra tiṅaḥ ca iti anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10098_3: . tat iha api prāpnoti . nanu ca tiṅgrahaṇam nivarteta . avaśyam uttarārtham anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10099: avyayasarvanāmnām akac prāk ṭeḥ iti pacataki jalpataki iti evamartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10100: yadi subgrahaṇam kriyate svaraḥ na sidhyati . bahupaṭavaḥ evam svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10101: prasajyeta bahupaṭavaḥ iti ca iṣyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham iti . svaraḥ katham . svaraḥ prātipadikatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10102: subluki kṛte prātipadikatvāt svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . atha tugrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10103: . tugrahaṇam nityapūrvārtham . tugrahaṇam kriyate nityam pūrvaḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10104_0: . vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . na vibhāṣāgrahaṇena pūrvam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10104_1: . kim tarhi . bahuc abhisambadhyate : vibhāṣā bahuc bhavati iti . yadā ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10104_2: tadā pūrvaḥ bhavati . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10105: . prāk utpatteḥ yat liṅgam vacanam ca tat utpanne api pratyaye yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_0: . bahuguḍaḥ drākṣā . bahutailam prasannā . bahupayaḥ yavāgūḥ iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_1: prayojanam . svāṛthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_2: evam tarhi siddhe sati yat tugrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante
GS24pmbhasuu:10106_3: api liṅgavacanāni iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā , tailakalpā
GS24pmbhasuu:10107: payaskalpā yavāgūḥ iti etat siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10108: (P_5,3.68.2) KA_II.422.5-10 Ro_IV.229-230 tamādibhyaḥ kalpādayaḥ vipratiṣedhena . tamādibhyaḥ kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10109: tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam īṣadasamāpteḥ avacanam . paṭutaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10110: . paṭutamaḥ . kalpādīnām īṣadasamāpteḥ vacanam prakarṣasya avacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10111: paṭukalpaḥ . mṛdukalpaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . paṭukalpataraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10112: mṛdukalpataraḥ . kalpādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . yadi evam īṣadasamāpteḥ prakarṣe tamādiḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti prakṛteḥ eva ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10113: tamādiḥ īṣatpradhānāt . tamādiḥ īṣatpradhānāt api bhavati . asya prakarṣaḥ asti . tasya prakarṣe bhaviṣyati . kasya ca prakarṣaḥ asti. prakṛteḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:10114: (P_5,3.71-72.1) KA_II.422.16-21 Ro_IV.230 kim ayam subantasya prāk ṭeḥ bhavati āhosvit ṅyāpprātipadikasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10115: anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum . kim ca ataḥ . yadi subantasya yuṣmakābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10116_0: asmakābhiḥ yuṣmakāsu asmakāsu yuvakayoḥ āvakayoḥ iti na sidhyati . atha prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10116_1: tvayakā mayakā tvayaki mayaki iti atra api prāpnoti . astu subantasya . katham yuṣmakābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10118_0: (P_5,3.71-72.2) KA_II.422.22-423.2 Ro_IV.230-231 akacprakaraṇe tūṣṇīmaḥ kām . akacprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:10118_1: tūṣṇīmaḥ kām vaktavyaḥ . āsitavyam kila tūṣṇīkām etat paśyataḥ cintitam . śīle kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10120: (P_5,3.71-72.3) KA_II.423.3-8 Ro_IV.231 iha bhinatti chinatti iti śanami kṛte śap prāpnoti . bahukṛtam bahubhuktam bahupītam iti bahuci kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:10121: kalpādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . uccakaiḥ nīcakaiḥ akaci kṛte kādayaḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10122: . nanu ca śnambahujakacaḥ apavādāḥ te bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10123_0: śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargapratiṣedhaḥ . śnambahujakakṣu nānādeśatvāt utsargapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10123_1: vaktavyaḥ . samānadeśaiḥ apavādaiḥ utsargāṇām bādhanam bhavati . nānādeśatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:10123_2: prāpnoti (P_5,3.71-72.4) KA_II.423.9-24 Ro_IV.231-232 kavidheḥ tamādayaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10124: kavidheḥ avakāśaḥ kutsādīnām vacanam prakarṣasya avacanam . paṭukaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10125: mṛdukaḥ . tamādīnām avakāśaḥ prakarṣasya vacanam kutsādīnām avacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10126: paṭutaraḥ . paṭutamaḥ . ubhayavacane ubhayam prāpnoti . paṭutarakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10127: paṭutamakaḥ . tamādayaḥ bhavanti pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kadā cit chinnakatarādayaḥ . kadā cit chinnakatarādayaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10129: ekadeśipradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:10131: kanvidhyartham . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ ca samāsaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam . sañjñāyām kanvidhyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10132: sañjñāyām kan yathā syāt . navagrāmakam . navarāṣṭrakam . navanagarakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10133: kadā cit dvandvaḥ . kadā cit dvandvaḥ kavidheḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_0: iti svaśabdena uktatvāt tasya arthasya pratyayaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kutsitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_1: anukampāyām bhaviṣyati anukampitasya kutsāyām . atha vā svārtham abhidhāyaḥ śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_2: nirapekṣaḥ dravyam āha samavetam . samavetasya ca vacane liṅgam vacanam vibhaktim
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_3: ca . abhidhāya tān viśeṣān apekṣamāṇaḥ ca kṛtsnamātmānam priyakutsanādiṣu punaḥ pravartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_4: asau vibhaktyantaḥ katham punaḥ idam vijñāyate : kutsitādīnām arthe iti āhosvit kutsitādisamānādhikaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_5: iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ . kutsidādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_6: arthe cet liṅgavacanayoḥ anupapattiḥ . paṭukam . paṭukā . paṭukaḥ . paṭukau . paṭukāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_7: iti . ekaḥ ayam arthaḥ kutsitam nāma . tasya ekatvāt ekavacanam eva prāpnoti . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10136_8: tarhi kutsitādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti . kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10137: atiprasaṅgaḥ yathā ṭābādiṣu . kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:10138: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati yathā ṭābādiṣu . katham ca ṭābādiṣu . uktam tatra strīsamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet bhūtādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:10139: kutsidādisamānādhikaraṇāt iti cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . idam ghṛtakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10140_0: idam tailakam . idamśabdāt api prāpnoti . siddham tu yena kutsitādivacanam tadyuktāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10140_1: svārthe pratyayavidhānāt . siddham etat . katham . yena kutsitādayaḥ arthāḥ gamyante
GS24pmbhasuu:10141: vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam kutsidādīnām arthe cet liṅgavacanānupapattiḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10142: . na ayam pratyayārthaḥ . kim tarhi prakṛtyarthaviśeṣaṇam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10143: kutsitādiṣu yat prātipadikam vartate tasmāt kādayaḥ bhavanti . kasmin arthe . svārthe . svāṛthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:10144: (P_5,3.83.1) KA_II.425.2-12 Ro_IV.237 caturthyāt . caturthyāt lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bṛhaspatidattakaḥ . bṛhaspatikaḥ . prajāpatidattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10145: prajāpatikaḥ . anajādau ca . anajādau ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . devadattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10146: devakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ . yajñakaḥ . lopaḥ pūrvapadasya ca . pūrvapadasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . devadattakaḥ . dattakaḥ . yajñadattakaḥ . dattakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10147: apratyaye tathā eva iṣṭaḥ . devadattaḥ . dattaḥ . yajñadattaḥ . dattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10148: uvarṇāt laḥ ilasya ca . uvarṇāt ilasya ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhānudattakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10151: na ike kṛte ajādau iti eva siddham . ṭhaggrahaṇam ukaḥ dvitīyatve
GS24pmbhasuu:10152: kavidhānārtham . ṭhaggrahaṇam kriyate ukaḥ dvitīyatve kavidhiḥ yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10153_0: . vāyudattakaḥ . vāyukaḥ . pitṛdattakaḥ . pitṛkaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:10153_1: prasaṅgaḥ . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasajyeta . tat yatha mathitam paṇyam asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10153_2: māthitikaḥ iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati evam iha api na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10154: sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadādeḥ lopavacanam . dvitīyāt acaḥ lope kartavye sandhyakṣaradvitīyatve tadādeḥ lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . lahoḍaḥ . lahikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10156_0: (P_5,3.84) KA_II.426.2-15 Ro_IV.238-240 varuṇādīnām ca tṛtīyāt saḥ ca akṛtasandhīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10156_1: . varuṇādīnām ca tṛtīyāt lopaḥ ucyate . saḥ ca akṛtasandhīnām vaktavyaḥ . suparyāśīrdattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10157_0: suparilaḥ . iha ṣaḍaṅguliḥ ṣaḍikaḥ iti ajādilope kṛte padasañjñā na prāpnoti . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10157_1: kaḥ doṣaḥ . jaśtvam na syāt . ṣaḍike jaśtve uktam . kim uktam . siddham acaḥ sthānivatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10159: siddham ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadalopavacanāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10160: . ekākṣarapūrvapadānām uttarapadasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10161: prāpnoti . ṣaḍaṅguliḥ . ṣaḍikaḥ iti . ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham . ṣaṣaḥ ṭhājādivacanāt siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10162_0: (P_5,3.85-86) KA_II.426.18-21 Ro_IV.340 kimartham imau ubhau arthau nirdiśyete na
GS24pmbhasuu:10162_1: yat alpam hrasvam api tat bhavati yat ca hrasvam alpam api tat bhavati . na etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10162_2: āvaśyakaḥ samāveśaḥ . alpam ghṛtam . alpam tailam iti ucyate . na kaḥ cit āha hrasvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10162_3: ghṛtam . hrasvam tailam iti . tathā hrasvaḥ paṭaḥ . hrasvaḥ śāṭakaḥ iti ucyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:10163_1: . kuṭīśamīśuṇḍābhyaḥ pratyayasanniyogena puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kuṭī . kuṭīraḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10165: ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10168_0: pratiṣedhaḥ . vatsādibhyaḥ tanutve kārśye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛśaḥ vatsaḥ vatsataraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10168_1: iti mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . yasya guṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10168_2: hi bhāvāt dravye śabdaniveśaḥ tadabhidhāne tasmin guṇe vaktavye pratyayena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10168_3: . na ca kārśyasya sadbhāvāt dravye vatsaśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_1: upādhyānarthakyam . kimādīnām dvibahvarthe pratyayavidhānāt upādhigrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_2: . kim kāraṇam . bahirdhāraṇam nirdhāraṇam . yāvatā dvayoḥ ekasya eva bahirdhāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_3: bhavati . aparaḥ āha : bahūnām jatiparipraśne ḍatamac iti atra bahugrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_4: . kim kāraṇam . kim iti etat paripraśne vartate paripraśnaḥ ca anirjñāte anirjñātam
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_5: ca bahuṣu . dvyekayoḥ punaḥ nirjñātam . nirjñātatvāt dvyekayoḥ paripraśnaḥ na . paripraśnābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10169_6: kim eva na asti . kutaḥ pratyayaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:10194_3: tatra idam iti sadhīnar . tasmāt tatra idam iti sadhīnar pratyayaḥ vaktavyaḥ . rājani
GS24pmbhasuu:10194_4: idam rājādhīnam . yadi sadhīnar kriyate sakārasya itsañjñā na prāpnoti . iha ca śryadhīnaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10194_6: eva astu . nanu ca uktam adhyuttarapadāt pratyayavidhānānupapattiḥ vigrahābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10194_7: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . asti kāraṇam yena atra vigrahaḥ na bhavati . kim kāraṇam .

GS24pmbhasuu:10194_9: vunaḥ āmādayaḥ prāk mayaṭaḥ bṛhatījātyantāḥ samāsāntāḥ ca iti . evam tarhi na ayam

GS24pmbhasuu:10196_0: vigrahapūrvikā samāsavṛttiḥ . na ca adhinā vigrahaḥ dṛśyate . evam tarhi bahuvrīhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10196_1: bhaviṣyati . kim kṛtam bhavati . bhavati vai kaḥ cit asvapadavigrahaḥ api bahuvrīhiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10197: iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi mahadadhīnam iti āttvakapau prasajyeyātām .

GS24pmbhasuu:10199: (P_5,4.8) KA_II.432.2-5 Ro_IV.251 diggrahaṇam kimartham . astriyām iti iyati ucyamāne prācīnā brāhmaṇī avācīnā śikhā iti atra api prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:10200: diggrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha strīgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10201: yāvatā dikśabdaḥ strīviṣayaḥ eva . bhavati vai kaḥ cit dikśabdaḥ astrīviṣayaḥ api . tat yathā prāk prācīnam . pratyak pratīcīnam . ucak udīcīnam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10203_0: svārthikaḥ ayam svārthikāḥ ca prakṛtitaḥ liṅgavacanāni anuvartante . evam tarhi siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10203_1: sati yat strīgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svārthikāḥ ativartante api liṅgavacanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10203_2: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . guḍakalpā drākṣā . tailakalpā prasannā payaskalpā
GS24pmbhasuu:10204: (P_5,4.19) KA_II.432.12-433.10 Ro_IV.252-256 sakṛdādeśe abhyāvṛttigrahaṇam nivartyam . kim prayojanam . punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10205_0: abhyāvṛttiḥ . na ca ekasya punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ bhavati . atha kriyāgrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10205_1: āhosvit na . kim ca arthaḥ anuvṛttyā . bāḍham arthaḥ . iha mā bhūt : ekaḥ bhuṅkte
GS24pmbhasuu:10206: kriyāgrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ pākaḥ iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10207_0: kasmāt na bhavati . dvau pākau. trayaḥ pākāḥ . catvāraḥ pākāḥ . pañca pākāḥ . daśa
GS24pmbhasuu:10207_1: pākāḥ iti . na etat kriyāgaṇanam . kim tarhi . dravyagaṇanam etat . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10207_2: bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10208: dravyagaṇanāt na prāpnoti . sakṛt bhuktvā . sakṛt bhoktum iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ dviḥ bhuktvā dviḥ boktum triḥ bhuktvā triḥ bhoktum pañcakṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:10209_0: bhuktvā pañcakṛtvā bhoktum daśakṛtvā bhuktvā daśakṛtvā bhoktum iti dravyagaṇanān
GS24pmbhasuu:10209_1: na prāpnoti . yadi khalu api punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ dviḥ āvṛtte sakṛt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10209_2: syāt triḥ āvṛtte dviḥ iti . evam tarhi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_0: abhyāvṛttigrahaṇam na tu punaḥ punaḥ āvṛttiḥ abhyāvṛttiḥ . kim tarhi abhimukḥī pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10210_1: abhyāvṛttiḥ . pūrvā ca pare prati abhimukḥī pare ca pūrvām prati abhimukhyau . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:10211_0: iha kasmāt na bhavati . ekaḥ pākaḥ iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10211_1: dvau pākau. trayaḥ pākāḥ . catvāraḥ pākāḥ . pañca pākāḥ . daśa pākāḥ iti parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:10211_2: etat . na etat kriyāgaṇanam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:10212: dravyagaṇanam etat . katham . kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10213: nanu ca uktam iha api tarhi dravyagaṇanāt na prāpnoti . sakṛt bhuktvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10214_0: sakṛt bhoktum iti . pūrvayoḥ ca yogayoḥ dviḥ bhuktvā dviḥ boktum triḥ bhuktvā triḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10214_1: bhoktum pañcakṛtvā bhuktvā pañcakṛtvā bhoktum daśakṛtvā bhuktvā daśakṛtvā bhoktum
GS24pmbhasuu:10214_2: iti dravyagaṇanān na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:10233: . naḥ ca purāṇe prāt . naḥ ca purāṇe prāt vaktavyaḥ tnaptanakhāḥ ca pratyayāḥ vaktavyāḥ . praṇam . pratnam . pratanam . prīṇam .
