GS24pmbhasuu:10247: (P_5,4.44) KA_II.436.11-12 Ro_IV. 261 tasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . tasiprakaraṇe ādyādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10249_1: abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . sampadyante yavāḥ . sampadyante
GS24pmbhasuu:10250: vā abhūtatadbhāvagrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati . sampadyante asmin kṣetra
GS24pmbhasuu:10251_0: śālayaḥ iti . prakṛtivivakṣāgrahaṇam ca . prakṛtivivakṣāgrahaṇam ca kartavyam . samīpādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10251_1: upasaṅkhyānam . samīpādibhyaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . samīpī bhavati . abhyāśī
GS24pmbhasuu:10251_2: bhavati . antikī bhavati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi asamīpam samīpam
GS24pmbhasuu:10252: asamīpastham samīpastham bhavati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10255: . citaḥ antaḥ udāttatḥ bhavati iti udāttatvam yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10256: prayojanam . ekāc ayam . tatra na arthaḥ svarārthena cakāreṇa anubandhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10257_0: . pratyayasvareṇa eva siddham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ḍāci citkaraṇam viśeṣaṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10257_1: . ḍāci citkaraṇam kriyate viśeṣaṇārtham . kva viśeṣaṇāṛthena arthaḥ . lohitādiḍājbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10257_2: kyaṣ iti . ḍā iti hi ucyamāne iḍā ataḥ api prasajyeta . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10257_3: iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . nābhā pṛthivyāḥ nihitaḥ davidyutat
GS24pmbhasuu:10258: (P_5,4.67) KA_II.437.14 Ro_IV.263 bhadrāt ca iti vaktavyam . bhadrā karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10260: antaḥ yathā syāt . na eatat asti prayojanam . pratyayparatvena api etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10261_0: siddham . idam tarhi prayojanam . tadgrahaṇena grahaṇam yathā syāt . kāni punaḥ tadgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10261_2: prayojanam . pratirājam . uparājam . avyayībhāvaḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10261_3: iti napuṃsakaliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10261_4: liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam . na avyayībhāvāt ataḥ am tu apañcamyāḥ iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10262: dvigusañjñā ca prayojanam . pañcagavam . daśagavam . dviguḥ ca samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10263: napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati iti napuṃsakaliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10264: prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10265: . dvipurī . tripurī . dvigoḥ akārāntāt iti īkāraḥ yathā syāt . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:10266: asti prayojanam . puraśabdaḥ ayam akārāntaḥ . tena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10267_0: ātaḥ ca akārāntaḥ iti āha . kṣeme subhikṣe kṛtasañcayāni purāṇi vinayanti kopam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10267_1: . idam tarhi prayojanam . dvidhurī tridhurī . dvigoḥ akārāntāt iti ṅīp yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10268: vāktvacam . sraktvacam . dvandvaḥ ca samāsaḥ napuṃsakaliṅgaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10269: napuṃsakaliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya . idam tarhi prayojanam . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10270: kośaḥ ca niṣat ca kośaniṣadam . kośaniṣadinī . dvandvopatāpagarhyāt prāṇisthāt iniḥ iti iniḥ yathā syāt . dvandva . tatpuruṣa .
GS24pmbhasuu:10271: tatpuruṣasañjñā ca prayojanam . paramadhurā uttamadhurā . paravat liṅgam dvandvatatpuruṣayoḥ iti paravalliṅgatā yathā syāt . na etat asti prayjonam
GS24pmbhasuu:10272: . uttarapadārthapradhānaḥ tatpuruṣaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ardhadhurā
GS24pmbhasuu:10273: . etat api na asti prayojanam . liṅgam aśiṣyam lokāśrayatvāt liṅgasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10274: idam tarhi prayojanam . idam tarhi . nirdhuraḥ . avyayam tatpuruṣe prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt . tatpuruṣa . bahuvrīhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:10275: bahuvrīhisañjñā ca prayojanam . uccadhuraḥ . nīcadhuraḥ . bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā pūrvapadam bhavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10276: (P_5,4.69.1) KA_II.438.23-26 Ro_IV.265 idam vipratiṣiddham . kaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . parigaṇitābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ vidhīyate na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10277_0: tatra kā cit pūjanāntā prakṛtiḥ nirdiśyate . na etat vipratiṣiddham . na evam vijñāyate

GS24pmbhasuu:10287: (P_5,4.74) KA_II.439.19-440.5 Ro_IV.266-267 anakṣe iti katham idam vijñāyate . na cet akṣadhūrantaḥ samāsaḥ iti āhosvit na cet akṣaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10304: ahnaḥ ṭakhoḥ niyamavacanāt . ahnaḥ ṭakhoḥ eva iti etat niyamārtham

GS24pmbhasuu:10309: pratyayāntaram vidhīyate na ṣac prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . mūrdhnaḥ ca ṣavacanam . kim . anantodāttārtham iti eva . dvimūrdhaḥ . trimūrdhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10310_0: (P_5,4.116) KA_II.442.9-20 Ro_IV.271 api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam . api pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:10314: kharaṇāḥ . khuraṇāḥ . śitināḥ arcanāḥ ahināḥ iti naigamāḥ . śitināḥ arcanāḥ ahināḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:10319: bhūt . śobhanāḥ gandhāḥ asya sugandhaḥ āpaṇikaḥ iti . atha anulipte katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10320: bhavitavyam . yadi tāvat yat anugatam tat abhisamīkṣitam sugandhiḥ iti bhavitavyam . atha yat praviśīrṇam sugandhaḥ iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10321: (P_5,4.154) KA_II.443.14-444.11 Ro_IV.273-275 śeṣāt iti ucyate . kaḥ śeṣaḥ nāma . yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ ni vidhīyate saḥ śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10322: kimartham punaḥ śeṣagrahaṇam kriyate . yābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaḥ samāsāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10323_0: vidhīyate tābhyaḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ye pratipadam vidhīyante
GS24pmbhasuu:10323_1: te tatra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10323_2: ca samāsāntāḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā kap . yadā na kap saḥ avakāśaḥ . kapaḥ prasaṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:10324_0: . tasmāt śeṣagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim punaḥ idam śeṣagrahaṇam kabapekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10324_1: kap iti āhosvit samāsāntāpekṣam yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:10324_2: ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate kabapekṣam anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:10324_3: samāsāntāpekṣam anṛkkam bahvṛkkam sūktam iti na sidhyati . astu kabapekṣam . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10325: viśeṣe etat vaktavyam . anṛcaḥ māṇave bahvṛcaḥ caraṇaśākhāyām iti . idam tarhi ūdhasaḥ anaṅi strīgrahaṇam coditam . tasmin kriyamāṇe api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10326_0: evam tarhi na eva kabapekṣam śeṣagrahaṇam na api samāsāntāpekṣam . kim tarhi anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10326_1: yaḥ bahuvrīhyadhikāraḥ saḥ apekṣyate . anantare bahuvrīhyadhikāre yasmāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10326_2: samāsāntaḥ na vihitaḥ iti . katham anṛcaḥ bahvṛcaḥ iti . vaktavyam eva anṛcaḥ māṇave
GS24pmbhasuu:10328: (P_5,4.156) KA_II.444.13-17 Ro_IV.275-276 īyasaḥ upasarjanadīrghatvam ca . īyasaḥ upasarjanadīrghatvam ca vaktavyam . bahvyaḥ śreyasyaḥ asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10329: bahuśreyasī . vidyamānaśreyasī . puṃvadvacanāt siddham . puṃvadbhāvaḥ atra bhavati īyasaḥ bahuvrīhau puṃvadvacanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10330: (P_6,1.1.1) KA_III.1.1-3.23 Ro_IV.279-287 ekācaḥ iti kim ayam bahuvrīhiḥ . ekaḥ ac asmin saḥ ekāc . ekācaḥ iti . āhosvit tatpuruṣaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_0: samānādhikaraṇaḥ . ekaḥ ac ekāc . ekācaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi bahuvrīhiḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_1: papāca papāṭha . iyāya . āra iti na sidhyati . atha tatpuruṣaḥ samānādhikaraṇaḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10331_2: iyāya . āra iti . papāca papāṭha iti na sidhyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10332: ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ ayam . ekavarṇeṣu katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10333: ekavarṇeṣu vyapadeśivadvacanāt . vyapadeśivat ekasmin kāryam bhavati iti vaktavyam . evam ekavarṇeṣu dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10334_0: iti ucyate . tatra na jñāyate kasya ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ iti . vakṣyati liṭi dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10334_1: anabhyāsasya iti . tena dhātoḥ ekācaḥ iti vijñāyate . yadi dhātoḥ ekācaḥ siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10334_2: papāca papāṭha . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti na sidhyati . dhātoḥ iti na eṣā ekācsamānādhikaraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:10334_3: ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ ekācaḥ iti . kim tarhi avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ yaḥ ekāc avayavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10335_0: avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī iti cet siddham jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti . papāca papāṭha
GS24pmbhasuu:10335_1: iti na sidhyati . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena dhātoḥ ekāc avayavaḥ bhavati . ekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10335_2: dve prathamasya iti ucyate . tena yatra eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10336_0: prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca tatra dvirvacanam syāt . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10336_1: papāca papāṭha iti atra na syāt . prathamatve ca . prathamatve ca kim . vyapadeśivadvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10336_2: siddham iti eva . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10337: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam . ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham . ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham . avacanāt lokavijñānāt siddham iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:10338: yogavibhāgaḥ vā . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10339_0: kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ . ekājmātrasya dvirvacanārthaḥ . ekājmātrayta dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10339_1: yathā syāt . iyāya papāca . tataḥ prathamasya . prathamasya ekācaḥ dve bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10339_2: idam idānīm kimartham . niyamāṛtham . yatra prathamaḥ ca aprathamaḥ ca asti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10339_3: prathamasya ekācaḥ dvirvacanam yathā syāt . aprathamasya mā bhūt . jajāgāra puputrīyiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:10339_4: iti . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt avayavānām dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . ekācaḥ avayavaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10339_5: avayavānām dvirvacanam prāpnoti . nenijati iti atra nijśabdaḥ api ekāc
GS24pmbhasuu:10340: ijśabdaḥ api ekāc ikāraḥ api ekāc niśabdaḥ api . tatra nijśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ ca na santi . ijśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:10341: na sidhyati doṣāḥ ca na santi . ikārasya dvirvacane rūpam na sidhati doṣāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10342: ca na santi . niśabdasya dvirvacane rūpam siddham doṣāḥ tu santi . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra jusbhāvavacanam . tatra jusbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anenijuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10343_0: paryaveviṣuḥ . abhyastāt jheḥ jusbhāvaḥ bhavati iti jusbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10343_1: . svaraḥ ca . svaraḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijati . yat pariveviṣati iti . abhyastānām
GS24pmbhasuu:10344: iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ ca . adbhāvaḥ ca na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10345: nenijati . pariveviṣati iti . abhyastāt iti adbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10346: numpratiṣedhaḥ ca . numpratiṣedhaḥ ca na sidhyati . nenijat . pariveviṣat
GS24pmbhasuu:10347: . na abhyāstāt śatuḥ it numpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti jakāreṇavyavadhānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10348: śāstrahāniḥ ca . śāstrahāniḥ ca bhavati . samudāyaikācaḥ śāstram hīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10349: siddham tu tatsamudāyaikāctvāt śāstrāhāneḥ . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10350_0: tatsamudāyaikāctvāt . kim idam tatsamudāyaikāctvāt iti . tasya samudāyaḥ tatsamudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10350_1: . ekājbhāvaḥ ekāctvam . tatsamudāyasya ekāctvam tatsamudāyaikāctvam . tatsamudāyaikāctvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10350_2: . tatsamudāyaikācaḥ dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:10350_3: ahīnam bhavati . nanu ca samudāyaikācaḥ dvirvacane kriyamāṇe api avayavaikācaḥ śāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_0: na hīyate . kim kāraṇam . avayavātmakatvāt samudāyasya . avayavātmakaḥ samudāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_1: . abhyantaraḥ hi samudāye avayavaḥ . tat yathā vṛkṣaḥ pracalan sahāvayavaiḥ pracalati
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_2: . tatra bahuvrīhinirdeśe anackasya dvirvacanam anyapadārthatvāt . tatra bahuvrīhinirdeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_3: anackasya dvirvacanam prāpnoti āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyapadārthatvāt bahuvrīheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_4: . anyapadārthe bahuvrīhiḥ vartate . tena yat anyat acaḥ tasya dvirvacanam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_5: tat yathā citraguḥ ānīyatām iti ukte yasya tāḥ gāvaḥ santi saḥ ānīyate na gāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10351_6: siddham tu tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt pāṇineḥ yathā loke . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:10352_0: katham . tadguṇasaṃvijñānāt bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya yathā loke . loke śuklavāsasam
GS24pmbhasuu:10352_1: ānaya . lohitoṣṇīṣāḥ pracaranti iti . tadguṇaḥ ānīyate tadguṇāḥ ca pracaranti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:10352_2: iha api (P_6,1.1.2) KA_III.3.24-5.19 Ro_IV.287-293 atha yasya dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10353: ārabhyate kim tasya sthāne bhavati āhosvit dviḥprayogaḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10354: viśeṣaḥ . sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopavacanam samudāyādeśatvāt . sthāne dvirvacane ṇilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āṭiṭat . āśiśat . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10355_0: samudāyādeśatvāt . samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasamudāyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10355_1: naṣṭaḥ ṇiḥ bhavati iti ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:10355_2: . dvirvacanam kriyatām ṇilopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ṇilopaḥ . nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:10356_0: prāpnoti akṛte api . dvirvacanam api nityam . anyasya kṛte ṇilope prāpnoti anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10356_1: akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . nityam eva dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10356_2: . katham . rūpasya sthānivatvāt . yat ca sanyaṅantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10357: dvirvacane . yat ca sanyaṅantasya dvirvacane codyam tat iha api codyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10358: kim punaḥ tat . sanyaṅantasya cet aśeḥ sani aniṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10359_0: dīrghakutvaprasāraṇaṣatvam adhikasya dvirvacanāt . ābṛdhyoḥ ca abhyastavipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10359_1: . saṅāśraye ca samudāyasya samudāyādeśatvāt jhalāśraye ca avyapadeśaḥ āmiśratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10360: dvirvacanam . dviḥprayogaḥ iti cet ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvavacanam liṭi .
GS24pmbhasuu:10361: dviḥprayogaḥ iti cet ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvam liṭi vaktavyam . nematuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10362: nemuḥ . sehe . sehāte . sahire . anādeśādeḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10363: sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ ādeśādiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10364: dviḥprayoge api dvirvacane sati na doṣaḥ . vakṣyati tatra liḍgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10365: prayojanam . liṭi yaḥ ādeśādiḥ tadādeḥ na iti . iḍvacanam ca yaṅlope . iṭ ca yaṅlope vaktavyaḥ . bebhiditā . bebhiditum . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10366_0: iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10366_1: . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ bhavati yaḥ ekāc upadeśe anudāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10366_2: . dviḥprayoge api dvirvacane sati na doṣaḥ . ekājgrahaṇena aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10366_3: ekācaḥ aṅgāt iti . nanu ca ekaikam atra aṅgam . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10366_4: aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10367: iḍdīrghapratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭaḥ dīrghatvasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10368: jarīgṛhitā . jarīgṛhitum . grahaḥ aliṭi dīrghaḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10369_0: sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10369_1: naṣṭaḥ grahiḥ . dviḥprayoge api dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . grahiṇā aṅgam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10370_0: nanu ca ekaikam atra aṅgam . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tasya aṅgasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10370_1: . kutaḥ etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . padādividhipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10371: vaktavyaḥ . siṣeca . suṣvāpa . sātpadādyoḥ iti ṣatvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10372: sthāne punaḥ dvirvacane sati samudāyasya samudāyaḥ ādeśaḥ . tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ padādiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10373: dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . suptiṅbhyām padam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10374: . yasmāt suptiṅvidhiḥ tadādi subantam tiṅantam ca . nanu ca ekaikasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10375_0: [api atra (R)] suptiṅvidhiḥ . samudāye yā vākyaparisamāptiḥ tayā padasañjñā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10375_1: . kutaḥ etat . śāstrāhāneḥ . evam hi śāstram ahīnam bhavati . tau eva suptiṅau tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10375_2: parau sā eva ca prakṛtiḥ ādyā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10377: (P_6,1.2.1) KA_III.5.21-24 Ro_IV.294 dvitīyasya iti avacanam ajādeḥ iti karmadhārayāt pañcamī . dvitīyasya iti śakyam avaktum . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10378: ajādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī . ac ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam ajādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10379: ajādeḥ . kim tarhi karmadhārayāt pañcamī . ac ādiḥ ajādiḥ . ajādeḥ parasya iti . tatra antareṇa dvitīyagrahaṇam dvitīyasya eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10380: (P_6,1.2.2) KA_III.6.1-8.7 Ro_IV.294-301 dvitīyadvirvacane prathamanivṛttiḥ prāptatvāt . dvitīyadvirvacane prathamasya nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10381: vaktavyā . aṭiṭiṣati . aśiśiṣati iti . kim kāraṇam . prāptatvāt . prāpnoti ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti . nanu ca dvitīyadvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10382_0: prathamadvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānasya bādhakam syāt . asati
GS24pmbhasuu:10382_1: khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na vā prathamavijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10382_2: hi dvitīyāprāptiḥ advitīyatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . prathamavijñāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10383: . kim kāraṇam . advitīyatvāt . na hi idānīm prathamadvirvacane kṛte dvitīyaḥ dvitīyaḥ bhavati . kaḥ tarhi . tṛtīyaḥ . tat yathā dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10384: āsīnayoḥ tṛtīye upajāte na dvitīyaḥ dvitīyaḥ bhavati . kaḥ tarhi . tṛtīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10385: . na hi kim cit ucyate akṛte dvirvacane yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya bhavitavyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10386_0: . kim tarhi kṛte dvirvacane yaḥ dvitīyaḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . anārambhasamam evam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10386_1: . aṭeḥ prathamasya dvirvacanam syāt . halādiśeṣaḥ . dvitīyasya dvirvacanam . halādiśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10386_2: . trayāṇām akārāṇām pararūpatve aṭiṣati iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:10387: rūpam syāt . na anārambhasamam . aṭeḥ prathamasya dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10388: halādiśeṣaḥ . ittvam . dvitīyasya dvirvacanam . halādiśeṣaḥ . ittvam ḍvayoḥ ikārayoḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . abhyāsasya asavarṇe iti iyaṅādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10389_0: iyaṭiṣati iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . oṇeḥ ca uvaṇiṣati iti . na aniṣṭārthā śāstrapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10389_1: bhavitum arhati . yathā vā ādivikāre alaḥ antyavikārābhāvaḥ . yathā vā ādivividhau
GS24pmbhasuu:10389_2: alaḥ antyavidhiḥ na bhavati evam dvitīyadvirvacane prathamadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10389_3: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ na aprāpte alaḥ antyavidhau ādividhiḥ ārabhyate . saḥ tasya bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10390: bhaviṣyati . idam api evañjātīyakam . na aprāpte prathamadvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:10391: dvitīyadvirvacanamārabhyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10392_0: asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10392_1: . na etat asti . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10392_2: dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti . sati api dadhidānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10393: sambhave takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave
GS24pmbhasuu:10394: prathamadvirvacanasya dvitīyadvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10395: nivṛttau vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ vaktavyā . aṭiṭiṣati iti . yathā eva acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10396: nivṛttiḥ bhavati evam vyañjanasya api prāpnoti . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10397: nivṛttau vyañjanānivṛttiḥ aśāsanāt pūrvasya . tatra pūrvasya acaḥ nivṛttau vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ siddhā . kutaḥ . aśāsanāt pūrvasya . na iha vayam
GS24pmbhasuu:10398_0: pūrvasya pratiṣedham śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi dvitīyasya dvirvacanam ārabhāmahe . vyañjanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:10398_1: punaḥ naṭabhāryavat bhavanti . tat yathā . naṭānām striyaḥ raṅgam gatāḥ yaḥ yaḥ pṛcchati
GS24pmbhasuu:10398_2: kasya yūyam kasya yūyam iti tam tam tava tava iti āhuḥ . evam vyañjanāni yasya yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10399: bhajante . ndrādipratiṣedhāt ca . yat ayam na ndrāḥ saṃyogādayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10400: pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ pūrvanivṛttau vyañjanasya anivṛttiḥ iti . tatra dvitīyābhāve prathamādvirvacanam pratiṣiddhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10401: tatra dvitīyasya ekācaḥ abhāve prathamasya dvirvacanam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10402: āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ . kim kāraṇam . pratiṣiddhatvāt . ajādeḥ dvitīyasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10403_0: pratiṣedhāt . na eṣa doṣaḥ . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ . sati dvitīyadvirvacane prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10403_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe doṣaḥ . sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10403_2: iti cet halādiśeṣe doṣaḥ bhavati . halādiśeṣe sati ādye hali anādyasya lopaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10403_3: . iha eva syāt papāca . papāṭha iti . iha na syāt . āṭatuḥ . āṭuḥ iti . lokavat halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:10403_4: . lokavat halādiśeṣe siddham . tat yathā loke īśvaraḥ ājñāpayati grāmāt grāmāt manuṣyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10404: ānīyantām iti . yeṣu tatra grāmeṣu brāhmaṇāḥ na santi na tarhi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10405: tataḥ anyasya ānayanam bhavati . yathā tatra kva cit api brāhmaṇasya sattā
GS24pmbhasuu:10406: (R: sarvatra) abrāhmaṇasya nivarttikā bhavati evam iha api kva cit api hal ādyaḥ san sarvasya anādyasya halaḥ nivartakaḥ bhavati . kva cit anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10407_0: lopaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam . kva cit anyatra lopaḥ iti cet dvirvacanam api evam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10407_1: . kva cit api dvitīyaḥ san sarvasya prathamasya nivartakaḥ syāt . tasmāt astu sati
GS24pmbhasuu:10407_2: tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti eva. nanu ca uktam sati tasmin pratiṣedhaḥ iti cet halādiśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:10408: (P_6,1.3) KA_III.8.9-22 Ro_IV.301-302 kimartham idam ucyate . ndrādeḥ dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ tatra ndrāṇām pratiṣedhaḥ . ndrādeḥ ekācaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:10409: prāpnoti . tatra ndrāṇām saṃyogādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . īrṣyateḥ tṛtīyasya . īrṣyateḥ tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . ke cit tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:10410: āhuḥ ekācaḥ iti . īrṣyiṣiṣati . aparaḥ āha :vyañjanasya iti : īrṣyiyiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:10411: . kaṇḍvādīnām ca . kaṇḍvādīnām ca tṛtīyasya dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10412: kaṇḍūyiyiṣati . asūyiyiṣati . vā nāmadhātūnām . vā nāmadhātūnām tṛtīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10413: dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . aśvīyiyiṣati . aśiśvīyiṣati . aparaḥ āha yatheṣṭam vā . yatheṣṭam vā nāmadhātūnām iti . puputrīyiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10415: (P_6,1.4) KA_III.9.2-7 Ro_IV.302 pūrvaḥ abhyāsaḥ iti ucyate . kasya pūrvaḥ abhyāsasañjñaḥ bhavati . dve iti vartate . dvayoḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10416: saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya gṛhāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:10417: āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10418: hiraṇyam iti . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt dvitīyānirdiṣṭam prathamānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10419: evam iha api purastāt prathamānirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10420_1: sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . ādyudāttatve pṛthagaprasaṅgārtham . ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10420_2: saha bhūtayoḥ yathā syāt . ekaikasya mā bhūt iti . yasmin eva abhyastakārye adoṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10420_3: tat eva paṭhitam anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . na asti yaugapadyena sambhavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10420_4: paryāyaḥ tarhi prasajyeta . paryāyaḥ ca . pūrvasya tāvat pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10421_0: bhaviṣyati . parasya tarhi syāt . tatra ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na parasya bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10421_1: iti yat ayam bibhetyādīnām piti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam bhavati iti āha . evam vyavadhānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10421_2: na pūrvasya jñāpakāt na parasya ucyate ca idam abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10421_3: . tatra saḥ eva doṣaḥ paryāyaḥ prasajyeta . tasmāt sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10422: ubhegrahaṇam kriyate . tat sahārtham vijñāsyate . asti anyat ubhegrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . ubhegrahaṇam sañjñinirdeśārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10423_0: antareṇa api ubhegrahaṇam prakḷptaḥ sañjñinirdeśaḥ . katham . dve iti vartate . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:10423_1: tarhi prayojanam . yatra ubhe śabdarūpe śrūyete tatra abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10423_2: iha mā bhūt : īrtsanti , īpsanti , īrtsan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10424: īpsan , airtsan , aipsan . kim ca syāt . adbhāvaḥ numpratiṣedhaḥ jusbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10425: iti ete vidhayaḥ prasajyeran . adbhāve tāvat na doṣaḥ . saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti : at abhyastāt . tataḥ ātmanepadeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:10426: ātmanepadeṣu ca at bhavati . anataḥ iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10427: numpratiṣedhaḥ iti ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . numpratiṣedhaḥ kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10428: . paratvāt numpratiṣedhaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api numpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10429: prāpnoti akṛte api . ekādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . anyasya kṛte numpratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:10430: prāpnoti anyasya akṛte . śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10431: . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ekādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10432_0: vidhiviṣaye numpratiṣedhaḥ vidhiḥ ca numaḥ sarvanāmasthāne prāk tu sarvanāmasthānotpatteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10432_1: ekādeśaḥ . tatra nityatvāt ca antaraṅgatvāt ca ekādeśaḥ . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10433_0: jusbhāvaḥ iti ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . ekādeśe iti ucyate kena
GS24pmbhasuu:10433_1: ca atra ekādeśaḥ . antinā . na atra antibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . jusbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:10433_2: bādhyate . na atra jusbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10434: śapā vyavahitatvāt . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti vyavadhānam eva . kim puṇaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10435_0: nimittavān antiḥ ekādeśam tāvat pratīkṣate na punaḥ tāvati eva nimittam asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10435_1: antibhāvena bhāvyam . iha api tarhi tāvati eva nimittam asti iti antibhāvaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10435_2: . anenijuḥ . paryaveviṣuḥ iti . astu . antibhāve kṛte sthānivadbhāvāt jhigrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:10435_3: grahaṇāt jusbhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:10436: api nimittavān antiḥ ayam tasya jusbhāvaḥ apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:10437: utsargāḥ abhiniviśante . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10438: . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ pravartate . na tāvat atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10439_0: kadā cit api antibhāvaḥ bhavati . apavādam jusbhāvam pratīkṣate . na khalu api kva
GS24pmbhasuu:10439_1: cit abhyastānām jheḥ ca ānantaryam . sarvatra vikaraṇaiḥ vyavadhānam . tena anena
GS24pmbhasuu:10439_2: avaśyam vikaraṇanāśaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ kva cit lukā kva
GS24pmbhasuu:10440: cit ślunā kva cit ekādeśena . saḥ yathā ślulukau pratīkṣate evam ekādeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:10441: api pratīkṣate . evam tarhi idam iha vyapadeśyam sat ācāryaḥ na vyapadiśati . kim . sthānivadbhāvam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10442: vyavadhānāt na bhaviṣyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvasya vidhiḥ . pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ . tat etat asati
GS24pmbhasuu:10443: prayojane ubhegrahaṇam sahārtham vijñāsyate . katham kṛtvā ekaikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10444: abhyastasañjñā prāpnoti . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:10445: vṛddhiguṇasañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10446: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10447_0: arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . sati etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:10447_1: dṛṣṭānte yadi tatra pratyekam iti ucyate iha api sahagrahaṇam kartavyam . atha tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10447_2: antareṇa pratyekam iti vacanam pratyekam guṇvṛddhisañjñe bhavataḥ iha api na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10448_1: jakṣityādiṣu saptagrahaṇam kartavyam . sapta jakṣityādayaḥ abhyastasañjñakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10449: vevīteḥ abhyastasañjñā yathā syāt . vevyate . aparigaṇanam vā āgaṇāntatvāt

GS24pmbhasuu:10675_1: . na hi vacispaviyajādīnām grahādīnām ca antyaḥ yaṇ asti . evam tarhi anantyavikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:10675_2: antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti antyasasdeśaḥ yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10676: yaṇ tasya kāryam bhaviṣyati . na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ santi prayojanāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:10677: evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sarvasya yaṇaḥ samprasāraṇam bhavati iti yat ayam pyāyaḥ pībhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .

GS24pmbhasuu:10681: pūrvasya iti . ucyamāne api etasmin kutaḥ etat parasya bhaviṣyati na pūrvasya iti . ekayogakṣaṇam khalu api samprasāraṇam . tat yadi tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:10682: param abhinirvṛttam pūrvam api abhinirvṛttam eva . prasaktasya anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum na abhinirvṛttasya .

GS24pmbhasuu:10697_1: tasmin dvitīyā yā prāptiḥ sā pratiṣidhyate . atra ca vasiḥ kvasau aṅgam kvasantam
GS24pmbhasuu:10697_2: punaḥ vibhaktau . atha vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10698: anabhinirvṛttasya pratiṣedhena nivṛttiḥ śakyā kartum iti . atra ca yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:10699: vaseḥ na tadā kvasoḥ yadā ca kvasoḥ abhinirvṛttam tadā vaseḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10700_0: atha vā yasya aṅgasya prasāraṇaprāptiḥ iti anena kim kriyate . yāvat brūyāt asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:10700_1: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti . asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya vasausamprasāraṇasya antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10702: chandasi . ṛci treḥ samprasāraṇam vaktavyam . uttarapadādilopaḥ chandasi vaktavyaḥ . tṛcam sūktam . tṛcam sāma . chandasi iti kim . tryṛcāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:10703_0: rayeḥ matau bahulam . rayeḥ matau samprasāraṇam bahulam vaktavyam . ā revān etu naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10703_1: viśaḥ . na ca bhavati . rayiman puṣṭivardhanaḥ . kakṣyāyāḥ sañjñāyām . kakṣyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10704: kakṣīvantam yaḥ āśijaḥ . kaṇvaḥ kakṣīvān . sañjñāyām iti kim . kaṣyāvān hastī .
GS24pmbhasuu:10706: . anyatarasyām kiti veñaḥ na samprasāraṇam bhavati iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10707: katham . samprasāraṇe kṛte uvaṅādeśe ca dvirvacanam savarṇadīrghatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10708: tena siddham vavatuḥ, vavuḥ , ūvatuḥ, ūvuḥ . vayeḥ api nityam yakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ samprasāraṇasya ūyatuḥ , ūyuḥ . traiśabyam ca iha sādhyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10709: tat ca evam sati siddham bhavati . yadi evam vavau, vavitha iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:10710: sidhyati . lyapi ca iti anena cakāreṇa liṭ api anukṛṣyate . tasmin nitye prasāraṇapratiṣedhe prāpte iyam kiti vibhāṣā ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10712: ec yaḥ upadeśe iti āhosvit ejantantam yat upadeśe iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate : ec yaḥ upadeśe iti ḍhaukitā traukitā iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10713_0: atha vijñāyate : ejantantam yat upadeśe iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . nanu ca ejantantam
GS24pmbhasuu:10713_1: yat upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne atra api prāpnoti . etat api vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:10713_2: ejantam bhavati upadeśe . arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10713_3: api vijñāyamāne na doṣaḥ bhavati . aśiti iti ucyate na ca atra aśitam paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10713_4: nanu ca kakāraḥ eva atra aśit . na kakāre bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10714: tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:10715: vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā loke : abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10716: evam iha api aśiti iti śitpratiṣedhāt anyasmin aśiti śitsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat śitsadṛśam . pratyayaḥ . iha tarhi : glai :
GS24pmbhasuu:10717_0: glānīyam , mlai : mlānīyam , veñ : vānīyam , śo : niśāmīyam : paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10717_1: . nanu ca ejantantam yat upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10718: ejgrahaṇena grahaṇāt punaḥ āttvam bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ec yaḥ upadeśe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10719_0: api vijñāyamāne paratvāt āyādiṣu kṛteṣu sthānivadbhāvāt ejgrahaṇena grahaṇāt āttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10719_1: bhaviṣyati . na bhaviṣyati . analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ alvidhiḥ ca ayam . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10719_2: ejantantam yat upadeśe iti api vijñāyamāne hūtaḥ , hūtavān iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10719_3: . bhavatu eva atra āttvam . śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10719_4: . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam : āttvam kriyatām pūrvatvam iti . kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10720_0: paratvāt pūrvatvam . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . āttvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10720_1: iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āttvam . nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api āttve
GS24pmbhasuu:10720_2: prāpnoti akṛte api . āttvam api nityam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10721: kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam āttvam . na hi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:10722_0: samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . tena bādhyate . yasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10722_1: lakṣaṇantareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam . na ca samprasāraṇam eva āttvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10722_2: nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam pratīkṣyam . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_0: samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ āttvam na bhaviṣyati . atha api katham
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_1: cit āttvam anityam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . upadeśagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi na
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_2: kriyate cetā stotā iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_3: na paranimittakasya āttvam bhavati iti yat ayam krīṅjīṇām ṇau āttvam śāsti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_4: asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt . krīṅjīṇām ṇau eva iti . yat tarhi mīnātiminotidīṅām
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_5: lyapi ca iti atra ejgrahaṇam anuvartayati . iha tarhi glai glānīyam , mlai mlānīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_6: , veñ vānīyam , śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . atra api ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_7: jñāpayati na āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti yat ayam aśiti iti pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10723_8: yadi hi bādheran śiti api bādheran . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10724: astu ec yaḥ upadeśe iti . nanu ca uktam glai glānīyam , mlai mlānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10725_0: veñ vānīyam , śo niśāmīyam paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti iti . atra api śitpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10725_1: jñāpakaḥ na āyādayaḥ āttvam bādhante iti . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam . āttve eśi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:10725_2: kartavyam . jagle mamle . aśiti iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam

GS24pmbhasuu:10731_0: prāpnoti . pratyayavidhiḥ . pratyayavidhiḥ ca na sidhyati . suglaḥ sumlaḥ . ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10731_1: pratyayavidhiḥ na prāpnoti . aniṣṭasya pratyayasya śravaṇam prasajyeta . abhyāsarūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:10732: jagle mamle . ivarṇābhyāsatā prāpnoti . ayavāyāvām pratiṣedhaḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10733: ayavāyāvām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : glai : glānīyam , mlai : mlānīyam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10734: veñ : vānīyam , śo : niśāmīyam : paratvāt āyādayaḥ prāpnuvanti . astu tarhi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ śiti na iti . śiti pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10735: upasaṅkhyānam rarīdhvam trādhvam śiśīte . śiti pratiṣedhe ślulukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10736: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam . luk .
GS24pmbhasuu:10737_0: trādhvam naḥ devā nijuraḥ vṛkasya . śiśīte śṛṅge rakṣase vinikṣe . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10737_1: . iha tāvat divaḥ naḥ vṛṣṭim marutaḥ rarīdhvam iti . na etat rai iti asya rūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10737_2: kasya tarhi . rāteḥ dānakarmaṇaḥ . śiśīte śṛṅge iti na etat śyateḥ rūpam . kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10737_3: tarhi . śīṅaḥ . śyatyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ punaḥ śyateḥ arthaḥ . śyatiḥ niśāne
GS24pmbhasuu:10737_4: vartate . śīṅ api śyatyarthe vartate katham punaḥ anyaḥ nāma anyasya arthe vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10738: bhavanti iti . tat yathā . vapiḥ prakiraṇe dṛṣṭaḥ chedane ca api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10739: keśān vapati iti . īḍiḥ studicodanāyācñāsu dṛṣṭaḥ īraṇe ca api vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10740: agniḥ vai itaḥ vṛṣṭim īṭṭe . marutaḥ amutaḥ cyāvayanti . karotiḥ ayam abhūtaprādurbhāve dṛṣṭaḥ nirmalīkaraṇe ca api vartate . pṛṣṭham kuru .
GS24pmbhasuu:10741: pādau kuru . unmṛdāna iti gamyate . nikṣepaṇe ca api dṛśyate . kaṭe kuru .
GS24pmbhasuu:10742: ghaṭe kuru . aśmānam itaḥ kuru . sthāpaya iti gamyate . sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . śiti iti ucyate na ca atra śitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:10743: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . trādhvam iti luṅi eṣaḥ vyatyayena bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10744_0: aśiti ekādeśe pratiṣedhaḥ ādivattvāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:10744_1: bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam . yat api pratyayavidhiḥ iti . ācāryapravṛttiḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:10751_0: . na etat asti jñāpakam . niyamārtham etat syāt . rāyaḥ hali eva iti . yat tarhi

GS24pmbhasuu:10781: sanaḥ prabhṛti ā mahiṅaḥ ṅakārāt . kim prayojanam . kvippratiṣedhāṛtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10782: kvibantasya mā bhūt . rajjusṛḍbhyām , rajjusṛḍbhiḥ , devadṛgbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10783: devadṛgbhiḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyayavijñānāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10784_0: (P_6,1.60) KA_III.40.10-15 Ro_IV.365-366 śīrṣan chandasi prakṛtyantaram . śīrṣan
GS24pmbhasuu:10784_1: chandasi prakṛtyantaram draṣṭavyam . kim prayojanam . kim prayojanam . ādeśapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:10785_0: prakṛtyantaram yathā vijñāyeta . kim ca syāt . askārāntasya chandasi śravaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:10785_1: syāt . śiraḥ me śīryaśaḥ mukham (R: śīryate mukhe ) . idam te śiraḥ bhinadmi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10786_0: (P_6,1.61) KA_III.40.17-41.16 Ro_IV.366-368 ye ca taddhite śirasaḥ ādeśārtham . ye
GS24pmbhasuu:10786_1: ca taddhite iti atra śirasaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam .ādeśārtham . ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10786_2: yathā vijñāyeta . prakṛtyantaram mā vijñāyi . kim ca syāt . yakārādau taddhite askārāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10786_3: śravaṇam prasajyeta . śīrṣaṇyaḥ hi mukhyaḥ bhavati . śīrṣaṇyaḥ kharaḥ . vā keśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10787: vā keśeṣu śirasaḥ śīrṣanbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śīrṣaṇyāḥ keśāḥ , śirasyāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10788: aci śīrṣaḥ . aci parataḥ śirasaḥ śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hāstiśīrṣiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10789: sthaulyaśīrṣiḥ, pailuśīrṣiḥ . chandasi ca . chandasi ca śirasaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10790: śīrṣabhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dve śīrṣe . iha hāstiśīrṣyā pailuśīrṣyā iti śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . astu . naḥ taddhite iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10791: ṭilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ye ca abhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . yadi punaḥ ye aci taddhite iti ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10792: iñi śīrṣanbhāve kṛte ṭilopena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi sthūlaśirasaḥ idam sthaulaśīrṣam iti anaṇi iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:10793: tasmāt na evam śakyam . na cet evam śirasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10794: śīrṣanbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pākṣikaḥ eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:10795_0: ṣyaṅvidhau dvaitam bhavati . aṇiñoḥ vā ādeśaḥ ṣyaṅ aṇiñbhyām vā paraḥ iti . tat yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:10795_1: tāvad aṇiñoḥ ādeśaḥ tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi aṇiñbhyām paraḥ na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10796_0: aśasprabhṛtiṣu api dṛśyate . śalā doṣaṇī . kakut doṣaṇī . yācate mahādevaḥ . padādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10796_1: māṃspṛtsnūnām upasaṅkhyānam . padādiṣu māṃspṛtsnūnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māṃs
GS24pmbhasuu:10796_2: . yat nīkṣaṇam māṃspacanyāḥ . māṃsapacanyāḥ iti prāpte . māṃs . pṛt. pṛtsu martyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10797_0: . snu . na te divaḥ na pṛthivyaḥ adhi snuṣu . adhi sānuṣu iti prāpte . nas nāsikāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10797_1: yattaskṣudreṣu . yattaskṣudreṣu parataḥ nāsikāyāḥ nasbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yat . nasyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10797_2: . yat . tas . nastaḥ . tas. kṣudra . naḥkṣudraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10798_0: avarṇanagarayoḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ , nāsikyam nagaram
GS24pmbhasuu:10798_1: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha tāvat nāsikyaḥ varṇaḥ iti . parimukhādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10798_2: pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . nāsikyam nagaram iti . saṅkāśādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10800: iha mā bhūt : ṣoḍan , ṣaṇḍaḥ , ṣoḍikaḥ . atha ādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt : peṣṭā peṣṭum . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra satvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10801_0: satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya iti ṣatvam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi : laṣitā
GS24pmbhasuu:10801_1: laṣitum . idam ca api udārharaṇam : peṣṭā peṣṭum . nanu ca uktam astu atra satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10801_2: . satve kṛte iṇaḥ uttarasya ādeśasakārasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10802_0: ṣatvam bhaviṣyati iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi pekṣyati iti ṣatvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10802_1: ṣaḍhoḥ kaḥ si iti katvam na syāt . sādeśe subdhātuṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatīnām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10802_2: sādeśe subdhātuṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . subdhātu : ṣoḍīyati ṣaṇḍīyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10803: . ṣvaṣk : ṣvaṣkate . subdhātūnām tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . upadeśe iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10804: uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . yadi evam na arthaḥ dhātugrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati ṣoḍan , ṣaṇḍaḥ , ṣoḍikaḥ iti . upadeśe iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:10805: uddeśaḥ ca prātipadikānām na upadeśaḥ . ṣṭhiveḥ api dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ . yadi ṭhakāraḥ teṣṭhīvyate iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi thakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10806: . yadi thakāraḥ ṭuṣṭhyūṣati ṭeṣṭhīvyatie iti na sidhyati . evam tarhi dvau
GS24pmbhasuu:10807_0: imau ṣṭhivū . akasya dvitīyaḥ varṇaḥ ṭhakāraḥ aparasya thakāraḥ . yasya thakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10807_1: tasya satvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi dvau imau dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim kṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:10807_2: bhavati . pūrvasya satve kṛte pareṇa sannipāte ṣṭutvam bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10807_3: . iha hi śvaliṭ ṣṭhīvati madhuliṭ ṣvaṣkate ṣṭutvasya asiddhatvāt ḍaḥ si dhuṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10807_4: dhuṭ prasajyeta . evam tarhi yakārādī dviṣakārau ṣṭhivuṣvaṣkatī . kim yakāraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10808: luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ . atha kimartham ṣakāram upadiśya tasya sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10809: ādeśaḥ kriyate na sakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10810_0: aviśeṣeṇa ayam ṣakāram upadiśya sakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṣatvam nirvartayati
GS24pmbhasuu:10810_1: ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti . itarathā hi yeṣām ṣatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10811: paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ . yadi antareṇa pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:10812: katham . ajdantyaparāḥ sādayaḥ ṣopadeśāḥ smiṅsvadisvidisvañjisvapayaḥ ca sṛpisṛjistṛstyāsekṛsṛvarjam
GS24pmbhasuu:10813_0: (P_6,1.65) KA_III.43.12-18 Ro_IV.372 atha kimartham ṇakāram upadiśya tasya nakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10813_1: ādeśaḥ kriyate na nakāraḥ eva upadiśyeta . laghvartham iti āha . katham . aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:10813_2: ayam ṇakāram upadiśya nakāram ādeśam uktvā laghunā upāyena ṇatvam nirvartayati upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10814: . itarathā hi yeṣām ṇatvam iṣyate teṣām tatra grahaṇam kartavyam syāt . ke punaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ dhātavaḥ . paṭhitavyāḥ . kaḥ atra bhavataḥ puruṣakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10815: yadi antareṇa pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum tat ucyatām . antareṇa api pāṭham kim cit śakyate vaktum . katham . sarve nādayaḥ ṇopadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10818: upasaṅkhyānam . vyoḥ lope kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10819: . kaṇḍūyateḥ apratyayaḥ kaṇḍūḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vali iti ucyate na ca atra valādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca ayam kvip eva valādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10820: bhavati . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:10821_0: . kviblopaḥ kriyatām yalopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt kviblopaḥ nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10821_1: ca . nityaḥ khalu api kviblopaḥ . kṛte api yalope prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10821_2: paratvāt ca kviblopaḥ . kviblope kṛte valādyabhāvāt yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10822_0: bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:10822_1: pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā idam api bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10822_2: vyoḥ vali . tataḥ veḥ . vyantayoḥ ca vyoḥ lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ apṛktasya . apṛktasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10822_3: ca lopaḥ bhavati . veḥ iti eva (P_6,1.66.2) KA_III.44.8-45.2 Ro_IV.374-375 valopāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10822_4: ūḍbhāvavacanāt . valopasya aprasiddhiḥ . āsremāṇam , jīradānuḥ iti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10822_5: . ūḍbhāvavacanāt . cchvoḥ śūṭ anunāsike ca iti ūṭh prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10823: atiprasaṅgaḥ vraścādiṣu . vraścādiṣu ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . vraścanaḥ , vrīhiḥ , vraṇaḥ iti . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10824_0: upadeśasāmarthyāt vraścādiṣu lopaḥ na bhaviṣyati . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10824_1: cet samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu sāmarthyam . upadeśasāmarthyāt siddham iti cet asti
GS24pmbhasuu:10825: samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣeṣu kṛteṣu vakārasya śravaṇam yathā syāt . (R: vṛkṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10826: ) vṛkṇavān , (R vṛścati ) vivraściṣati iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10827: na vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10828_0: bahiraṅgāḥ samprasāraṇahalādiśeṣāḥ . antaraṅgaḥ lopaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:10828_1: . anārambhaḥ vā . anārambhaḥ vā punaḥ valopasya nyāyyaḥ . katham āsremāṇam , jīradānuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10829: varṇalopāt . āsremāṇam , jīradānuḥ iti chāndasāt varṇalopāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10830: yathā saṃsphānaḥ gayasphānaḥ . tat yathā saṃsphayanaḥ , saṃsphānaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10832_0: (P_6,1.67) KA_III.45.4-20 Ro_IV.375-376 darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : darviḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10832_1: , jāgṛviḥ . kim ucyate darvijāgṛvyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti yadā apṛktasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10832_2: ucyati . bhavati vai kim cit ācāryāḥ kriyamāṇam api codayanti . tat vā kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10833: vaktavyaḥ .veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ anunāsikaparatvāt . veḥ lope darvijāgṛvyoḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10834: lopaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . anunāsikaparatvāt . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam na ca atra anunāsikaparaḥ viśabdaḥ . śuddhaparaḥ ca atra viśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10835: . yadi anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam iti ucyate ghṛtaspṛk, dalaspṛk
GS24pmbhasuu:10836: , atra na prāpnoti . na hi etasmāt viśabdāt anunāsikam param paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10837_0: anunāsikaparatvāt iti na evam vijñāyate . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmāt saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10837_1: , anunāsikaparatvāt iti . katham tarhi . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ asmin saḥ ayam anunāsikaparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10837_2: , anunāsikaparatvāt iti . evam api priyadarvi , atra prāpnoti . asiddhaḥ atra anunāsikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10837_3: . evam api dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ivi divi dhivi . dhātvantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10837_4: arthavadgrahaṇāt . arthavataḥ viśabdasya grahaṇam . na dhātvantaḥ arthavān
GS24pmbhasuu:10838: . vasya vā anunāsikatvāt siddham . atha vā vakārasya eva idam anunāsikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10839: grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10840_0: (P_6,1.68) KA_III.46.2-47.12 Ro_IV.377-380 yadi punaḥ ayam apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10840_1: vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca grahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10840_2: bhavati . halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ yathā pacan iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10840_3: halantāt apṛktalopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ cet nalopābhāvaḥ . rājā takṣā . saṃyogāntalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10840_4: asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na prāpnoti yathā pacan iti . tat yathā pacan, yajan iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10840_5: saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ na bhavati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10841: . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddhaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ nalope iti yat ayam na
GS24pmbhasuu:10842: ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti sambuddhau pratiṣedham śāsti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10843: pacan, yajan . tulyajātīyasya jñāpakam bhavati . kaḥ ca tulyajātīyaḥ . yaḥ sambuddhau anantaraḥ . vasvādiṣu datvam saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10844: vasvādiṣu datvam na sidhyati . ukhāsrat , parṇadvhat . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10845_0: saṃyogādilopabalīyastvāt . saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān . yathā kūṭataṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:10845_1: iti . tat yathā kūṭataṭ , kāṣṭhataṭ iti atra saṃyogāntalopāt saṃyogādilopaḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:10845_2: bhavati . nanu ca datve kṛte na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10846_0: asiddham datvam . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . siddhakāṇḍe paṭhitam vasvādiṣu datvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10846_1: sau dīrghatve iti . tatra sau dīrghatvagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . vasvādiṣu datvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10846_2: eva . evam api apadāntatvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10847_0: atha sau api padam bhavati rājā takṣā nalope kṛte vibhakteḥ śravaṇam prāpnoti . sā
GS24pmbhasuu:10847_1: eṣā ubhayataspāśā rajjuḥ bhavati . rāttalopaḥ niyamavacanāt . rāt tasya lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10847_2: . abibhaḥ bhavān . ajāgaḥ bhavān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . niyamavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10847_3: . rāt sasya iti etasmāt niyamāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:10848: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . rāt sasya iti atra takāraḥ api nirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10849: yadi evam kīrtayateḥ apratyayaḥ kīḥ iti prāpnoti . kīrt iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10850: yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . roḥ uttvam ca . roḥ uttvam ca vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10851_0: abhinaḥ atra, acchinaḥ atra . saṃyogāntalopasya asiddhatvāt ataḥ ati iti uttrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:10851_1: na prāpnoti . na vā saṃyogāntalopasya uttve siddhatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:10852: saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati . yathā harivaḥ medinam iti . tat yathā harivaḥ medinam tvā iti atra saṃyogāntalopaḥ uttve siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10853: saḥ eva darhi doṣaḥ sā eṣā ubhayataspāśā . tasmāt aśakyaḥ apṛktalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10854: saṃyogāntalopaḥ vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate dvihalapṛktagrahaṇam tisyoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10856: (P_6,1.69.1) KA_III.47.14-48.27 Ro_IV.380-383 sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . sambuddhilope ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10857_0: vaktavyaḥ . he katarat, he katamat . kim ucyate ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10857_1: iti yadā apṛktasya iti anuvartate . apṛktādhikārasya nivṛttatvāt . nivṛttaḥ apṛktādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10857_2: . kim ḍatarādibhyaḥ pratiṣedham vakṣyāmi iti apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:10857_3: . tat ca amartham . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10858: apṛktādhikāraḥ nivartyaḥ . kimartham . amartham . amaḥ lopaḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10859: he kuṇḍa , he pīṭha . nivṛtte api apṛktādhikāre amaḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10860: na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī . mā bhūt sarvasya lopaḥ . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10861: bhavanti iti antyasya lope kṛte dvayoḥ akārayoḥ pararūpeṇa siddham rūpam syāt he kuṇḍa , he pīṭha iti . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt . tat tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:10862_0: labhyate . kim kāraṇam . atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti akārasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10862_1: prāpnoti . akāralope ca sati makāre ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti dīrghatve he kuṇḍām
GS24pmbhasuu:10862_2: , he pīṭhām iti etat rūpam prasajyeta . evam tarhi halaḥ lopaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10862_3: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . halṅyābbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10862_4: dīrghāt sutisi apṛktam hal iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:10863_0: arthaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . eṅ hrasvāt iti eṣā pañcamī hal iti asyāḥ prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10863_1: prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam api prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:10863_2: kṛte he pīṭhā iti etat rūpam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10864_0: . ami pūrvatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . ami iti ucyate na ca atra amam paśyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10864_1: . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti . atha vā idam iha sampradhāryam . sambuddhilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10864_2: kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10865: . paratvāt ekādeśaḥ . evam api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt sambuddhilopaḥ na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10866: ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . na ubhayataḥ āśrayaḥ kariṣyate . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10867: na evam vijñāyate . hrasvāt uttarasyāḥ sambuddheḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10868_0: katham tarhi . hrasvāt uttarasya halaḥ lopaḥ bhavati saḥ cet sambuddheḥ iti . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10868_1: tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim uktam . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10868_2: iti . evam api dalopaḥ sādhīyaḥ prāpnoti . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā duk ḍatarādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10868_3: iti vakṣyāmi ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā ḍit ayam śabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10869: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . dviḍakāraḥ nirdeśaḥ adḍ
GS24pmbhasuu:10870: ḍatarādibhyaḥ iti . evam api lopaḥ prāpnoti . vihitaviśeṣaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam . yasmāt hrasvāt sambuddhiḥ vihitā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10871_1: luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . apṛktalopasya avakāśaḥ gomān , yavamān . lukaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10871_2: trapu, jatu . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tat brāhmaṇakulam , yat brāhmaṇakulam . sambuddhilopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10871_3: avakāśaḥ he agne, he vāyo . lukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . he trapu , he
GS24pmbhasuu:10871_4: jatu . luk bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10872_0: vaktavyaḥ . na vā lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt yathā anaḍuhyate iti . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:10872_1: . kim kāraṇam . lopalukoḥ lugavadhāraṇāt . lopalukoḥ hi luk avadhāryate . luk lopayaṇayavāyāvekādeśebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10872_2: . yathā anaḍuhyate iti . tat yathā anaḍvān iva ācarati anaḍuhyate iti atra lopalukoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10873: (P_6,1.70) KA_III.49.12-19 Ro_IV.384 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:10874: katham agne trī te vajinā trī sadhasthā , ta tā piṇḍānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10875_0: pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . na sidhyati . numā vyavahitatvāt pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10875_1: na prāpnoti . chandasi napuṃsakasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ madhoḥ gṛhṇāti , mahoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10875_2: tṛptā iva āsate iti evamartham . tatra pūṃvadbhāvena numaḥ nivṛttiḥ . numi nivṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:10876_0: bhavet siddham agne trī te vajinā trī ṣadhasthā iti . idam tu na sidhyati ta tā piṇḍānām
GS24pmbhasuu:10876_1: iti . idam api siddham . katham . sāptamike pūrvasavarṇe kṛte punaḥ ṣāṣṭhikaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10876_2: . evam api jasi guṇaḥ prāpnoti . vakṣyati etat . jasādiṣu chandovāvacanam prāk ṇau
GS24pmbhasuu:10877_1: dvigusvaraḥ ca . tuki pūrvānte napuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvam dvigusvaraḥ ca na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10877_2: . ārāśastri chatram , dhānāśaṣkuli chatram . niṣkauśāmbi chatram , nirvārāṇasi chatram
GS24pmbhasuu:10877_3: . pañcāratni chatram , daśāratni chatram . tuke kṛte anantyatvāt ete vidhayaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10877_4: prāpnuvanti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10878: kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ tuk . antaraṅgāḥ ete vidhayaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . idam tarhi grāmaṇiputraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10879: senāniputraḥ iti hrasvatve kṛte tuk prāpnoti . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ . grāmaṇiputrādiṣu ca aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10880: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt eva . atha vā parādiḥ kariṣyate . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ . parādau saṃyogādeḥ iti atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10881_0: apacchāyāt . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ iti etvam prasajyeta . vilopavacanam ca . veḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10881_1: ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . agnicit , somasut . apṛktasya iti veḥ lopaḥ na prāpnoti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:10881_2: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . apṛktagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi na kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10882_0: darviḥ , jāgṛviḥ , atra api prāpnoti . anunāsikaparasya viśabdasya grahaṇam śuddhaparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10882_1: ca atra viśabdaḥ . evam api satukkasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:10882_2: iti evam na bhaviṣyati . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca . iṭpratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . parītat
GS24pmbhasuu:10883: prasajyeta . evam tarhi abhaktaḥ . abhakte svaraḥ . yadi abhaktaḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10884: svare doṣaḥ bhavati . dadhi chādayati , madhu chādayati . tiṅ atiṅaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10885_0: nighātaḥ na prāpnoti . nanu ca tuk eva atiṅ . na tukaḥ parasya nighātaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10885_1: . kim kāraṇam . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe . tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyukte
GS24pmbhasuu:10885_2: ivayukte vā anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10886_0: tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:10886_1: ānayati . na asau loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api atiṅ iti tiṅpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10887: kim ca anyat atiṅ tiṅsadṛśam . padam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10888: (P_6,1.72) KA_III.51.8-11 Ro_IV.387-388 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:10889: katham . adhikaraṇam nāma triprakāram vyāpakam aupaśleṣikam vaiṣayikam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10890_0: . śabdasya ca śabdena kaḥ anyaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavitum arhati anyat ataḥ upaśleṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10890_1: . ikaḥ yaṇ aci . aci upaśliṣṭasya iti . tatra antareṇa saṃhitāgrahaṇam saṃhitāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:10890_2: eva bhaviṣyati (P_6,1.74) KA_III.51.13-17 Ro_IV.388 atha kimartham āṅmāṅoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10891_1: . āṅmāṅoḥ sānubandhakayoḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅaḥ gatikarmapravacanīyasampratyayārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10891_2: māṅaḥ pratiṣedhasampratyayārthaḥ . iha mā bhūt . ā chāyā, āc chāyā . pramā chandaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10891_3: , pramāc chandaḥ (P_6,1.75-76) KA_III.51.20-22 Ro_IV.389 dīrghāt padāntāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:10892: viśvajanādīnām chandasi . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti atra viśvajanādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:10893: chandasi upasaṅkhyanam kartavyam . viśvajanasya chatram , viśvajanasya cchatram . na chāyām kuravaḥ aparām , nac chāyām kuravaḥ aparām .
GS24pmbhasuu:10894_0: (P_6,1.77.1) KA_III.52.2-53.6 Ro_IV.389-391 iggrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10894_1: agnicit atra , somasut atra . na etat asti prayojanam . jaśtvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10894_2: . jaśtvam na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . asiddham atra jaśtvam . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10894_3: yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10894_4: ca pūrvaḥ tasya prāpnoti pacati iti . evam tarhi dīrghasya yaṇ . dīrghasya yaṇ ādeśam
GS24pmbhasuu:10895: tat dīrghagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:10896_0: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . aci iti eṣā saptamī dīrghāt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10896_1: prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti . bhavet siddham kumārī atra , brahmabandhvartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10896_2: iti . idam tu na sidhyati . dadhi atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10897: madhu atra iti . hrasvaḥ iti prtavṛttam . hrasvagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:10898: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk iti . yadi tat anuvartate dīrghāt padāntāt vā iti hrasvāt api padāntāt vikalpena prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:10899: . sambandhavṛttyā . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk .
GS24pmbhasuu:10900: saṃhitāyām hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . che ca hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk .
GS24pmbhasuu:10901_0: āṅmāṅoḥ ca hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk . dīrghāt padāntāt vā hrasvyasya piti kṛti tuk
GS24pmbhasuu:10901_1: . tataḥ ikaḥ yaṇ aci . hrasvyasya iti vartate . piti kṛti tuk iti nivṛttam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:10901_2: tarhi prāpnoti cayanam , cāyakaḥ , lavaṇam , lāvakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10902: ayādayaḥ atra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . iha tarhi prāpnoti khaṭvā indraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10903: mālā indraḥ , khaṭvā elakā , mālā elakā . guṇavṛddhibādhyaḥ . guṇavṛddhī atra bādhike bhaviṣyataḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . ikaḥ aci yaṇ eva syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10904: yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . śākalam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10905: sinnityasamāsayoḥ śākalapratiṣedham codayiṣyati . sa na vaktavyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10907: . yaṇādeśaḥ plutapūrvasya ca iti vaktavyam . agnā3i* indram , agnā3y
GS24pmbhasuu:10908: indram , paṭā3u* udakam , paṭā3v udakam , agnā3i* āśā , agnā3y āśā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:10909_0: paṭā3u* āśā , paṭā3v āśā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ plutavikārau
GS24pmbhasuu:10909_1: ca imau . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutapragṛhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10909_2: aci iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10909_3: iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:10910: dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham . dīrghatvam śākalam ca mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . ārabhyate plutapūrvasya yaṇādeśaḥ tayoḥ yvau aci
GS24pmbhasuu:10911: saṃhitāyām iti . tat dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham bhaviṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . nanu ca tasmin api ucyamāne idam na vaktavyam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10912: . avaśyam idam vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau aplutavikārau tadartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10913: bho3i indram , bho3y indram , bho3i iha bho3y iha iti . yad tarhi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:10914: nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam . tat na vaktavyam . tat api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:10915_0: svarārtham vaktavyam . anena hi sati udāttasvaritayoḥ yaṇaḥ iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10915_1: . tena punaḥ sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10915_2: eva vaktavyam . idam na vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam idam api avaśyam vaktavyam yau
GS24pmbhasuu:10916: tadartham . bho3i indram , bho3y indram , bho3i iha bho3y iha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10917: chāndasam etat dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . yat tarhi na chāndasam
GS24pmbhasuu:10918_0: bho3y indram , bho3y iha iti sāma gāyati . eṣaḥ api chandasi dṛṣṭasya anuprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10918_1: kriyate . jaśtvam na siddham yaṇam atra paśya . yaḥ ca apadāntaḥ hal acaḥ ca pūrvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10919: sambandhavṛttyā . guṇavṛddhibādhyaḥ . nitye ca yaḥ śākalabhāksamāse tadartham etad bhagavān cakāra . sāmarthyayogāt na hi kim cit asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:10922: vāntādeśe sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . okāraukārayoḥ iti vaktavyam

GS24pmbhasuu:10925_0: kṣijyoḥ eva iti . tayoḥ tarhi śakyārthāt anyatra api prāpnoti . kṣeyam pāpam , jeyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10925_1: vṛṣalaḥ iti . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ vijñāsyate . kṣijyoḥ eva ecaḥ tayoḥ ca śakyārthe

GS24pmbhasuu:10943_0: dravyavat karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛtteḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10943_1: yathā dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . anayoḥ pūlayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10943_2: kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10944: na ca ucyate ekam iti ekam ca asau karoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . tat ca ekavākyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10945: . ekavākyabhāvāt dravyeṣu karmacodanāyām dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10946: bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10947_0: bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . yat tāvat ucyate ekavākyabhāvāt iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:10947_1: na . arthāt prakaraṇāt vā loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca arthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10947_2: prakaraṇāt vā . vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10948: dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ . ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . katham yat tat uktam vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10949: sthāninoḥ ekaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:10950: bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . iha tāvat jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca iti . stām dvau ūṭhau . na asti doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10951: . savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . iha bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ ram anyatarasyām iti . vakṣyati hi etat . bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10952: iti . yat ucyate arthāt prakaraṇāt vā iti tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:10953_0: ekavākyabhāvāt eva loke dvayoḥ ekasya abhinirvṛttiḥ bhavati . ātaḥ ca ekavākyabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10953_1: . aṅga hi bhavān grāmyam pāṃsulapādam aprakaraṇajñam āgatam bravītu anayoḥ pūlayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10953_2: kaṭam kuru . anayoḥ mitpiṇḍayoḥ ghaṭam kuru iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10954: ekam eva asau kariṣyati . katham yat uktam vyākaraṇe api hi anyatra dvayoḥ sthāninoḥ dvau ādeśau bhavataḥ . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10955: ubhau sābhyāsasya iti . iha tāvat radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti dve vākye . katham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10956: . tataḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ iti . iha ubhau sābhyāsasya iti ubhaugrahaṇasāmarthyāt dvau ādeśau bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10957: (P_6,1.84.2) KA_III.57.7-58.17 Ro_IV.399-402 tatra avayave śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ yathā loke ṭatra avayave śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10958: prāpnoti yathā loke . tat yathā loke . vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:10959_0: tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti sakṛt upanīya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:10959_1: punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ adbhiḥ aśabdābhiḥ upaspṛśet
GS24pmbhasuu:10959_2: iti sakṛt upaspṛśya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:10959_3: iha api khaṭvendre kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā mālendrādiṣu na syāt . siddham tu
GS24pmbhasuu:10959_4: dharmopadeśane anavayavavijñānāt yathā laukikavaidikeṣu . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10960: dharmopadeśane ca asmin śāstre anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate yathā laukikeṣu vaidikeṣu ca kṛtānteṣu . loke tāvat : brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10961: surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇamātram na hanyate surāmātram ca na pīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10962: yadi ca avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam ca brāhmaṇam ahatvā ekām ca surām apītvā anyatra kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10963: pratyuttheyaḥ iti pūrvavayomātram pratyutthīyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt ekam pūrvavayasam pratyutthāya anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10964: kāmacāraḥ syāt . tathā vede khalu api . vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10965: kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam vasante vasante ijyate . yadi avayavena śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ syāt sakṛt iṣṭvā punaḥ ijyā na pravarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:10966: . ubhayathā iha loke dṛśyate . avayavena api śāstrārthasampratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10967: anavayavena api . katham punaḥ idam ubhayam labhyam . labhyam iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:10968_0: katham . iha tāvat vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti . agnyādhānam yajñamukhaprtipattyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10968_1: . sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ pratipannam yajñam iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:10969: śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā garbhāṣṭame brāhmaṇaḥ upaneyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10970: upanayanam saṃskārārtham . sakṛt ca asau upanītaḥ saṃskṛtaḥ bhavati . ataḥ atra api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā triḥ hṛdayaṅgamābhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10971: adbhiḥ aśabdābhiḥ upaspṛśet iti . upasparśanam śaucārtham . sakṛt ca asau
GS24pmbhasuu:10972: upaspṛśya śuciḥ bhavati . ataḥ atra api avayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10973_0: . iha idānīm brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ . surā na peyā iti . brāhmaṇavadhe surāpāne ca
GS24pmbhasuu:10973_1: mahān doṣaḥ uktaḥ . saḥ brāhmaṇavadhamātre surāpānamātre ca prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:10973_2: anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā pūrvavayāḥ brāhmaṇaḥ pratyuttheyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:10974: uktaḥ pratyutthāne ca guṇaḥ . katham . ūrdhvam prāṇāḥ hi utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavire āyati . pratyutthānābhābhivādābhyām punaḥ tān pratipadyate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10975: saḥ ca prūrvavayomātre prasaktaḥ . ataḥ atra api anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate . tathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10976: iti ijyāyāḥ kim cit prayojanam uktam . kim . svarge loke apsarasaḥ enam jāyāḥ bhūtvā upaśerate iti . tat ca dvitīyasyāḥ tṛtīyasyāḥ ca ijyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10977: bhavitum arhati . ataḥ atra api anavayavena śāstrārthaḥ sampratīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10978: tathā śabdasya api jñāne prayoge prayojanam uktam . kim . ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10979: yadi ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyak jñātaḥ śāstrānvitaḥ suprayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk bhavati kimartham dvitīyaḥ tṛtīyaḥ ca prayujyate . na vai kāmānām
GS24pmbhasuu:10981: (P_6,1.84.3) KA_III.58.18-59.8 Ro_IV.402-403 atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . pūrvaparagrahaṇam parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:10982: pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate parasya ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . parasya ādeśaḥ mā
GS24pmbhasuu:10983: bhūt . āt guṇaḥ iti . katham ca prāpnoti . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:10984: pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya kāryam ucyate . tat yathā dvyantarupasargebhyaḥ apaḥ īt iti . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham tu .
GS24pmbhasuu:10985_0: ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭārtham ca pūrvaparagrahaṇam kriyate . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā pakalpeta
GS24pmbhasuu:10985_1: . anirdiṣṭe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe hi pūrvaparagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:10986_0: sthāneyogatvasya . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . āt iti eṣā pañcamī aci iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:10986_1: tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . tathā ca aci iti eṣā saptamī āt iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm
GS24pmbhasuu:10987_0: pūrvasya iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10987_1: na ubhe yugapat prakalpike bhavataḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . yat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:10987_2: : saptamīpañcamyoḥ ca bhāvāt ubhayatra ṣaṣṭhīprakḷptiḥ tatra ubhayakāryaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:10987_3: iti . saḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati (P_6,1.85.1) KA_III.59.10-60.6 Ro_IV. 404-406 kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:10988_0: antādivadvacanam āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt . antādivat iti ucyate āmiśrasya ādeśavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:10988_1: . āmiśrasya ayam ādeśaḥ ucyate . saḥ na eva pūrvagrahaṇena gṛhyate na api paragrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:10988_2: . tat yathā kṣīrodake sampṛkte āmiśratvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:10989_0: eva kṣīragrahaṇena gṛhyate na api udakagrahaṇena . iṣyate ca grahaṇam syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:10989_1: tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti antādivacvacanam . evamartham idam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:10989_2: . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . tatra yasya antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:10990: tannirdeśaḥ . tatra yasya antādivadbhāvaḥ iṣyate tannirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:10991: asya antavat bhavati asya ādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . siddham tu pūrvaparādhikārāt . siddham etat . katham . pūrvaparādhikārāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:10992: pūrvaparayoḥ iti vartate . pūrvasya kāryam prati antavat bhavati . parasya kāryam prati ādivat bhavati . atha yatra ubhayam āśrīyate kim tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:10993: pūrvasya antavat bhavati āhosvit parasya ādivat bhavati . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:10994_0: laukikaḥ ayam dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tat yathā loke yaḥ dvayoḥ tulyabalayoḥ preṣyaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:10994_1: saḥ tayoḥ paryāyeṇa kāryam karoti . yadā tu tam ubhau yugapat preṣayataḥ nānādikṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:10994_2: ca kārye bhavataḥ tatra yadi asau avirodhāṛthī
GS24pmbhasuu:10995: bhavati tataḥ ubhayoḥ na karoti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ubhayoḥ na karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11000: pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ekādeśaḥ pūrvapadasaya antavat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum bahucpūrvapadāt ṭhac bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:11001: ekādeśe bahvacpūrvapadam bhavati . tarayodaśānyikaḥ . pratyayaikādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau . pratyayaikādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau prayojanam . madhu pibanti .

GS24pmbhasuu:11009_2: nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛte api svaritatve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . anyathāsvarasya

GS24pmbhasuu:11011: varṇau āśritya ekādeśaḥ padasya svaritatvam . svaritatvam api antaraṅgam .

GS24pmbhasuu:11012_1: svaritatvam . svaritatve kṛte āntaryataḥ svaritānudāttayoḥ ekādeśaḥ svaritaḥ bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:11014: . kva tarhi syāt . yatra akādeśaḥ na bhavati . udaśvidudakam .

GS24pmbhasuu:11024: kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam kriyatām ekādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .

GS24pmbhasuu:11027: . kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11028_0: vipratiṣedhaḥ āśrayayitavyaḥ . ekādeśe hi a prasiddhiḥ uttarapadasya aparatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11028_1: yaḥ hi manyate astu atra ekādeśaḥ ekādeśe kṛte kṛdantaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11029: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadasya aparatvāt . na hi idānīm ekādeśe kṛte uttarapadam param bhavati . nanu ca antādivadbhāvena param .

GS24pmbhasuu:11039: trapuṇī iti , jatunī iti . suptiṅābvidhiṣu . suptiṅābvidhiṣu prayojanam .
