GS24pmbhasuu:11040_1: yathā śakyeta kartum subantam padam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11040_2: . vṛkṣaḥ tiṣṭhati . plakṣaḥ tiṣthati . sup . tiṅ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11041: pace, yaje iti . tiṅatiṅoḥ ekādeśaḥ tiṅaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum tiṅantam padam iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11042_0: pacati , yajati . tiṅ . āp . khaṭvā , mālā . abanāpoḥ ekādeśaḥ āpaḥ ādivat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11042_1: yathā śakyeta kartum ābantāt soḥ lopaḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11042_2: na bhavati . kruñcā , uṣṇihā , devadiśā . āṅgrahaṇe padavidhau . āṅgrahaṇe padavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11043: āṅanāṅoḥ ekādeśaḥ āṅaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum āṅaḥ yamahanaḥ iti ātmanepadam bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt . yatra ekādeśaḥ na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11044_0: āhate . āṭaḥ ca vṛddhividhau . āṭaḥ ca vṛddhividhau prayojanam . adya aihiṣṭa . kadā
GS24pmbhasuu:11044_1: aihiṣṭa . āṭaḥ adyaśabdasya ca ekādeśaḥ āṭaḥ ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:11044_2: āṭaḥ ca aci vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kva tarhi syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11045: yatra ekādeśaḥ na . aihiṣṭa , aikṣiṣṭa . kṛdantaprātipadikatve ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11046_0: kṛdantaprātipadikatve ca prayojanam . dhārayaḥ , pārayaḥ . kṛdakṛtoḥ ekādeśaḥ kṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11046_1: ādivat bhavati yathā śakyeta kartum kṛdantam prātipadikam iti . kva tarhi syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11048: . abhyāsādīnām hrasvatve na antādivat bhavati iti vaktavyam . ke punaḥ abhyāsādayaḥ . abhyāsohāmbārthanadīnapuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvāni
GS24pmbhasuu:11049: abhyāsahrasvatvam . upeyāja , upovāpa . ūheḥ hrasvavam . upohyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11050: prohyate , parohyate . ambārthanadīnapuṃsakopasarjanahrasvatvāni . amba atra , akka atra . kumāri idam , kiśori idam . ārāśastri idam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11051: dhānāśaṣkuli idam . niṣkauśāmbi idam , nirvārāṇasi idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11052_1: vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā etat vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11053_0: asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . varṇāśrayavidhau ca . varṇāśrayavidhau ca na antādivat
GS24pmbhasuu:11053_1: bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . prayojanam khaṭvābhiḥ juhāva asyai aśvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11053_2: iti . iha khaṭvābhiḥ , mālābhiḥ , ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti aisbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11054: taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat taparakaraṇe prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11055_0: . kim . kīlālapābhiḥ , śubhaṃyābhiḥ . juhāva . ātaḥ au ṇalaḥ iti autvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11055_1: . asyai aśvaḥ iti . eṅaḥ padāntāt ati iti pūrvatvam prāpnoti . na vā atādrūpyātideśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11055_2: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . atādrūpyātideśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11056: na iha tādrūpyam atidiśyate . rūpāśrayāḥ vai ete vidhayaḥ atādrūpyāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:11059: ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca . ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhatvam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11061: ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham tāvat . kosiñcat . yosiñcat . ekādeśe kṛte iṇaḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11062: utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca . adhītya , pretya . ekādeśe kṛte hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_0: iti tuk na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_1: . tatra utsargalakṣaṇāprasiddhiḥ utsargābhāvāt . tatra utsargalakṣaṇasya kāryasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_2: aprasiddhiḥ . adhītya , pretya iti . kim kāraṇam . utsargābhāvāt . hrasvasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_3: ucyate na ca atra hrasvam paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca atra api asiddhavacanāt siddham . asiddhavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_4: siddham iti cet na anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . asiddhavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_5: iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . anyasya asiddhavacanāt anyasya bhāvaḥ . na hi anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11063_6: asiddhavacanāt anyasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . na hi devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11064: hantari hate devadattasya prādurbhāvaḥ bhavati . tasmāt sthānivadvacanam asiddhatvam ca . tasmāt sthānivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ asiddhatvam ca . adhītya
GS24pmbhasuu:11065: , pretya iti sthānivadbhāvaḥ . kosiñcat , yosiñcat iti atra asiddhatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11067: kim kāraṇam . śāstrāsiddhatvāt . na anena kāryāsiddhatvam kriyate . kim tarhi . śāstrāsiddhatvam anena kriyate . ekādeśaśāstram tukśāstre asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11070: samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti vaktavyam . śakahūṣu , parivīṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:11071: samprasāraṇa . ṅi . vṛkṣe cchatram , vṛkṣe chatram . ṅi . iṭ . apace cchatram , apace chatram . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11072: ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt . samprasāraṇaṅīṭsu siddhaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11073_0: padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhavacanāt . padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11073_1: iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ . yadi padāntapadādyoḥ ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11073_2: susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi , supippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi , atra ṣatvam prāpnoti . tugvidhim
GS24pmbhasuu:11074: ekādeśaḥ asiddhaḥ . ṣatvam prati ekādeśamātram asiddham bhavati . yadi ṣatvam prati ekādeśamātram asiddham śakahūṣu , parivīṣu , atra ṣatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11075: prāpnoti . astu tarhi aviśeṣeṇa . katham susasyāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11076: supippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ kṛdhi iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11077: bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvam bhavati iti . yadi etat jñāpyate śakahūṣu , parivīṣu iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11078: ṣatvam na prāpnoti . tulyajātīyakasya jñāpakam . kim ca tuljyajātīyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11079_0: yaḥ kupvoḥ . yadi evam veñaḥ apratyaye parataḥ uḥ iti prāpnoti ut iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11079_1: yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā na evam vijñāyate . pūrvasya ca padādeḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11079_2: ca padāntasya iti . katham tarhi . parasya ca padādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11082: āt ekaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena . āt ekaḥ cet
GS24pmbhasuu:11083: guṇaḥ kena idānīm bhaviṣyati . khaṭvendraḥ , mālendraḥ , khaṭvodakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11084: mālodakam . sthāne antaratamaḥ hi saḥ . sthāne prāpyamāṇānām antaratamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_0: ādeśaḥ bhavati . aidautau api tarhi prapnutaḥ . aidautau na eci tau uktau . aidautau
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_1: na bhaviṣyataḥ . kim kāraṇam . eci hi aidautau ucyete . iha tarhi khaṭvarśyaḥ , mālarśyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11085_2: , ṛkāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāraḥ na ubhayāntaraḥ . ubhayoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ tena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11086: ubhayoḥ antaratamaḥ . ākāraḥ tarhi prāpnoti . ākāraḥ na ṛti dhātau saḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11087_0: ākāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . kim kāraṇam . ṛti dhātau ākāraḥ ucyate . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11087_1: . ṛkārādau dhātau eva na anyatra iti . plutaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11087_2: . viṣaye plutaḥ ucyate . yadā ca saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11088: viṣayaḥ bhavitavyam tadā plutena . āntaryāt trimātracaturmātrāḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . āntaryataḥ trimātracaturmātrāṇām sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:11089: trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ mā bhūvan iti . khaṭvā indraḥ khaṭvendraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11090: khaṭvā udakam khaṭvodakam . khaṭvā īṣā khaṭveṣā . khaṭvā ūḍhā khaṭvoḍhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11091: khaṭvā elakā khaṭvailakā . khaṭvā odanaḥ khaṭvaudanaḥ khaṭvā aitikāyanaḥ khaṭvaitikāyanaḥ . khaṭvā aupagavaḥ khaṭvaupagavaḥ . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:11092_0: guṇagrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra trimātracaturmātrāṇām sthāne trimātracaturmātrāḥ ādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11092_1: na bhavanti . taparatvāt ne te smṛtāḥ . tapare guṇavṛddhī . nanu ca bhoḥ taḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11092_2: yasmāt saḥ ayam taparaḥ . na iti āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:11093_0: tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ iti . yadi tāt api paraḥ taparaḥ ṝdoḥ ap iti iha eva syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11093_1: yavaḥ stavaḥ . lavaḥ pavaḥ iti atra na syāt . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11093_2: . kim dakāre prayojanam . atha kim takāre prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11096: dīrghatvabādhanārtham . guṇe ṅiśītām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ṅi . vṛkṣe indraḥ , plakṣe indraḥ . śī . ye indram , te indram . iṭ . apace indram ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11097: ayaje indram . kim prayojanam . dīrghatvabādhanārtham . savarṇadīrghatvam mā bhūt iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11098: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam savarṇadīrghatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:11099: (P_6,1.87.3) KA_III.68.11-14 Ro_IV.420 āt ekaḥ cet guṇaḥ kena . sthāne antaratamaḥ hi saḥ . aidautau na eci tau uktau . ṛkāraḥ na ubhayāntaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11100: ākāraḥ na ṛti dhātau saḥ . plutaḥ ca viṣaye smṛtaḥ . āntaryāt trimātracaturmātrāḥ . taparatvāt ne te smṛtāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11102_0: rūpagrahaṇam āhosvit dhātugrahaṇam . kim ca ataḥ . yadi rūpagrahaṇam siddham upaiti
GS24pmbhasuu:11102_1: , praiti . upaiṣi , praiṣi iti na sidhyati . atha dhātugrahaṇam siddham etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11102_2: . kim tarhi iti . iṇi ikārādau vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ . iṇi ikārādau vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11102_3: vaktavyaḥ . upetaḥ pretaḥ iti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11103_0: tataḥ etyedhatyoḥ . etyedhatyoḥ ca eci vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tata ūṭhi . ūṭhi ca vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11103_1: bhavati . evam api ā itaḥ etaḥ . upetaḥ , pretaḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . āṅi pararaūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:11103_2: atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:11104_0: iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . sā yathā eṅi pararūpam bādhate evam āṅi pararūpam bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:11104_1: . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:11104_2: eṅi pararūpam iyam vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate . āṅi pararūpe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11104_3: athavā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti iyam vṛddhiḥ eṅi pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:11105: (P_6,1.89.2) KA_III.69.7-21 Ro_IV.422-423 akṣāt ūhinyām . akṣāt ūhinyām vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . akṣauhiṇī . prāt ūhoḍhoḍhyeṣaiṣyeṣu . prāt ūha,
GS24pmbhasuu:11106: ūḍha, ūḍhi, eṣa, eṣya iti eteṣu vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . prauhaḥ , prauḍhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11107: pruḍhiḥ , praiṣaḥ , praiṣyaḥ . svāt īreriṇoḥ . svāt īra , īrin iti etayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11108_0: vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . svairaḥ , svairī . īringrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham svarī
GS24pmbhasuu:11108_1: iti . ininā etat matvarthīyena siddham . svairaḥ asya asti iti svairī . ṛte ca tṛtīyāsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:11109: sukhārtaḥ , duḥkhārtaḥ . ṛte iti kim . sukhetaḥ , duḥkhetaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11110: tṛtīyāgrahaṇam kim . paramartaḥ . samāse iti kim . sukhenartaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11111: pravatsatarakambalvasanānām ca ṛṇe . pravatsatarakambalvasanānām ca ṛṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11112: vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . prārṇam , vatsatarāṇam , vasanārṇam . ṛṇadaśābhyām ca .ṛṇadaśābhyām ca vṛddhiḥ vaktavyā . ṛṇārṇam , daśārṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11113: (P_6,1.90) KA_III.70.2-5 Ro_IV.423 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . vṛddheḥ anukarṣaṇārthaḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtā vṛddhiḥ anuvartiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11114_0: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ātaḥ aci vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11114_1: mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . pararūpam . usi omāṅkṣu āṭaḥ pararūpapratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:11115: (P_6,1.91.1) KA_III.70.7-14 Ro_IV.423-424 dhātau iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . prarṣabham vanam . upasargāt vṛddhividhau dhātugrahaṇe uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11116_0: kim uktam . gatyupasargasañjñāḥ kriyāyoge yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ tam prati iti vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11116_1: iti . kriyamāṇe api dhātugrahaṇe prarcchakaḥ iti prāpnoti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ prādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11116_2: tam prati iti vacanāt na bhavati . idam tarhi prayojanam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11116_3: eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11116_4: . ṛti akaḥ iti . ṛti hrasvāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ pūrvavipratiṣedhena iti codayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11119_0: . che tuk bhavati iti asmāt sambuddhiguṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . che tuk bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11119_1: iti asya avakāśaḥ . icchati , gacchati . sambuddhiguṇasya avakāśaḥ . agne, vāyo .
GS24pmbhasuu:11119_2: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . agnec chatram , agne chatram , vāyoc chatram , vāyo chatram
GS24pmbhasuu:11119_3: . sambuddhiguṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi vipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11119_4: vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāṛaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11121: sambuddhiguṇaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . antareṇa vipratiṣedham antareṇa api ca etām paribhāṣām siddham . katham . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:11122_0: . sambuddhilopaḥ kriyatām guṇaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt guṇaḥ . nityaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11122_1: sambuddhilopaḥ . kṛte api guṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . guṇaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api samubuddhilope
GS24pmbhasuu:11122_2: prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ guṇaḥ . na hi kṛte sambuddhilope prāpnoti . tāvati eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11122_3: chena ānantaryam . tatra tukā bhavitavyam . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate . che tukaḥ sambuddhiguṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11123: saṃvītaḥ , śūnaḥ . tukaḥ avakāśaḥ . agnicit , somasut . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . parivīṣu , śakahūṣu . ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ .kāraṇā , hāraṇā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11124: tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . prakārya gataḥ . prahārya gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_0: allopasya avakāśaḥ . cikīrṣitā , jihīrṣitā . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11125_1: . pracikīrṣya gataḥ , prajihīrṣya gataḥ . abhyāsaguṇādayaḥ ca tukaḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11127: tasthatuḥ , tasthuḥ . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . apacacchatuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11128: , apacacchuḥ . attvasya avakāśaḥ . cakratuḥ , cakruḥ . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . apacacchṛdatuḥ , apacacchṛduḥ . ittvasya avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11129: pipakṣati , yiyakṣati . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11131: bebhidyate . tukaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . cecchidyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11132_0: cocchupyate . yaṇadeśāt āt guṇaḥ . yaṇadeśāt āt guṇaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . yaṇadeśasya

GS24pmbhasuu:11163: otaḥ tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . acinavam , asunavam . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . gograhaṇam kariṣyate . ā gotaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11164: vaktavyam . gograhaṇe dyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam . gograhaṇe dyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11165: kartavyam . dyam gaccha . samāsāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ . samāsāt ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11166: vaktavyaḥ . citragum paśya . śabalagum paśya . nanu ca ā otaḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:11167: api samāsāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . hrasvatve kṛte na
GS24pmbhasuu:11168_0: bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ātvam kriyatām hrasvatvam iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11168_1: . paratvāt ātvam . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11169_0: antaraṅgam hrasvatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . nanu ca ā gotaḥ iti ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:11169_1: api samāsāt pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . katham . hrasvatve kṛte na bhaviṣyati . sthānivadbhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11169_2: prāpnoti . nanu ca ā otaḥ iti ucyamāne api sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:11169_3: . analvidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ . ā gotaḥ iti ucyamāne api na doṣaḥ . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11169_4: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ . goḥ pūrvaṇitvātvasvareṣu sthānivat na bhavati iti . saḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11169_5: tarhi doṣaḥ . gograhaṇe dyoḥ upasaṅkhyanam iti . sūtram ca bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11170: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam otaḥ tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11171: subadhikārāt siddham . supi iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . vā supi āpiśaleḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11172: iti . yadi anuvartate iha api vibhāṣā prāpnoti . subgrahaṇam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11173_0: vāgrahaṇam nivṛttam . katham punaḥ ekayoganirdiṣṭayoḥ ekadeśaḥ anuvartate ekadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11173_1: na . ekayoge ca ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ anyatra api . ekayognirdiṣṭānām api ekadeśānuvṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11173_2: bhavati . anyatra api . na avaśyam iha eva . kva anyatra . alugadhikāraḥ prāk ānaṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11174: . evam api ami upasaṅkhyānam vṛddhibalīyastvāt . ami upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gām paśya . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . vṛddhibalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11175_0: . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . na vā anavakāśatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11175_1: . anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśam ātvam vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśam ātvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11175_2: . dyām gaccha . dyoḥ ca sarvanāmasthāne vṛddhividhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11176: . dyoḥ ca sarvanāmasthāne vṛddhiḥ vidheyā . kim prayojanam . yat dyāvaḥ indra iti darśanāt . yat dyavaḥ indra te śataṃ śatam bhumīḥ uta syuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11177: yāvatā ca idānīm dyoḥ api sarvanāmasthāne vṛddhiḥ ucyate anavakāśam ātvam vṛddhim bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11179: nipāte upasaṅkhyānam . pararūpaprakaraṇe tu , nu, iti etayoḥ vakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:11180: nipāte upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tu vai tvai , nu vai nvai . vakārādau iti kimartham . tvāvat , nvāvat . nipāte iti kimartham . tu vāni , nu vāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:11181_0: na vā nipātaikatvāt . na vā kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . nipātaikatvāt . ekaḥ eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11181_1: nipātaḥ . tvai , nvai . eve ca aniyoge . eve ca aniyoge pararūpam vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11181_2: eva , iheva . adyeva . aniyoge iti kimartham . ihaiva bhava ma sma gāḥ . atraiva
GS24pmbhasuu:11181_3: tvam iha vayam suśevāḥ . śakandhvādiṣu ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11182: śakandhvādiṣu ca pararūpam vaktavyam . śaka-andhuḥ śakandhuḥ , kula-aṭā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11183: kulaṭā , sīma-antaḥ sīmantaḥ . keśeṣu iti vaktavyam . yaḥ hi sīmnaḥ antaḥ sīmāntaḥ saḥ bhavati . otvoṣṭhayoḥ samāse vā . otvoṣṭhayoḥ samāse vā
GS24pmbhasuu:11184: pararūpam vaktavyam . sthūlautuḥ , sthūlotuḥ . bimbauṣthī , bimboṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11185: emanādiṣu chandasi . emanādiṣu chandasi pararūpam vaktavyam . apam tveman sādayāmi apam todayan sādayāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11186: (P_6,1.95) KA_III.76.8-14 Ro_IV.435 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . eṅi iti anukṛṣyate . kim prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . adya ā ṛśyāt , adyārśyāt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11187_0: kadārśyāt . na etat asti prayojanam . adyarśyāt iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11187_1: paṭhanti . caḥ anarthakaḥ anadhikārāt eṅaḥ . usyomāṅkṣu āṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . usi pararūpe
GS24pmbhasuu:11187_2: omāṅoḥ ca āṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ausrīyat
GS24pmbhasuu:11188: , auḍhīyat , auṅkārīyat . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11189: uktam ātaḥ ca iti atra cakārasya prayojanam . vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11190: (P_6,1.96) KA_III.76.16-21 Ro_IV.436 apadāntāt iti kimartham . kā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11191: usrā , kosrā . apadāntāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati kā , usrā
GS24pmbhasuu:11192: , kosrā . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . bhindyā-us , bhindyuḥ , chindyā-us,
GS24pmbhasuu:11193_0: chindyuḥ . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11193_1: . uttarārtham tarhi apadāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . ataḥ guṇe apadāntāt yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11193_2: iha mā bhūt . daṇḍāgram , kṣupāgram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11195: itau anekājgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . śradartham . śrat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11196: (P_6,1.99) KA_III.77.5-9 Ro_IV.437 nityam āmreḍite ḍāci . nityam āmreḍite ḍāci pararūpam kartavyam . paṭapaṭāyati . akārantāt anukaraṇāt vā
GS24pmbhasuu:11197: . atha vā akārāntam etad udāharaṇam . bhavet siddham yadā akārāntam . yadā tu khalu acchabdāntam tadā na sidhyati . vicitrāḥ taddhitavṛttayaḥ . na ataḥ taddhitaḥ utpadyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11199: savarṇadīrghatve ṛti ṛ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam . hotṛ ṛkāraḥ , hotṝkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11200: . lṛti lṛvāvacanam . lṛti ḷ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam . hotṛ ḷkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11203: kayoḥ iha prathamyoḥ grahaṇam . kim vibhaktyoḥ āhosvit pratyayayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11204: vibhaktyoḥ iti āha . katham jñāyate . aci iti vartate na ca ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:11205: prathamau pratyayau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate . ajādī yau prathamau
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_0: ajādīnām vā yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_1: pratinirdiśati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti . atha vā supi iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_2: . atham kimartham pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ami pūrvatvam ca ucyate na prathamyoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_3: iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . prathamyoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti ucyamāne ami api dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_4: prāpnoti . vṛkṣam , plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat pūrvasmin yoge dīrghagrahaṇam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_5: uttaratra nivṛttam . evam api idam iha pūrvasavarṇagrahaṇam kriyate . tena ami api
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_6: pūrvasavarṇaḥ prasajyeta vṛkṣam , plakṣam . dvimātraḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11206_7: savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate kutaḥ vyavasthā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11207_0: yadi evam agnī vāyū trimātraḥ prāpnoti vṛkṣam , plakṣam dvimātraḥ . tasmāt savarṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11207_1: kartavyam . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe dīrghagrahaṇam anuvartate . tasmin anuvartamāne ami
GS24pmbhasuu:11207_2: pūrvaḥ iti api vaktavyam . atha kimartham pṛthak
GS24pmbhasuu:11208_0: ucyate na iha eka eva ucyeta . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ ami ca iti . yadi prathamayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11208_1: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ ami ca iti ucyate tana ami api dīrghaḥ prasajyeta . vṛkṣam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11208_2: plakṣam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghagrahaṇam nivartayiṣyate . evam api pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11208_3: prasajyeta . savarṇagrahaṇam na kariṣyate . yadi savarṇagrahaṇam na kriyate pūrvasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:11209: . yadi pūrvaḥ na dīrghaḥ atha dīrghaḥ na pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ dīrghaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham . tasmāt ubhayam ārabdhavyam pṛthak ca kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11210: (P_6,1.102.2) KA_III.78.20-80.21 Ro_IV.441-446 prathamayoḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ savarṇadīrghārthaḥ . prathamayoḥ iti yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11211: prathamayoḥ ekaḥ savarṇadīrghaḥ bhavati . tataḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11212: pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ bhavati ekaḥ prathamayoḥ iti . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ . savarṇadīrghatvam yathā syāt . ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11213: ekayoge hi sati jaśśahoḥ pararūpam prasajyeta . vṛkṣāḥ , plakṣāḥ , vṛkṣān
GS24pmbhasuu:11214_0: , plakṣān . nanu ca pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam pararūpam bādhiṣyate . na utsahate bādhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:11214_1: . kim kāraṇam . ādguṇayaṇādeśayoḥ apavādāḥ vṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvasavarṇādeśāḥ teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:11215: ādguṇayaṇādeśau utsargau . tayoḥ apavādāḥ vṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvasavarṇādeśāḥ teṣām sarveṣām pararūpam apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11216: tat sarvabādhakam . sarvabādhakatvāt prāpnoti . atha kriyamāṇe api
GS24pmbhasuu:11217: yogavibhāge yāvatā pararūpam apavādaḥ kasmāt eva na bādhate . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ . yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11219: yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11220: vṛkṣam , plakṣam . yathā eva hi yogavibhāgaḥ pararūpam bādhate evam ami pūrvatvam api bādheta . nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11221: natvasya ca abhāvaḥ . vṛkṣān , plakṣān . kim kāraṇam . ca tasmāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_0: anantaranirdeśāt . tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_1: tasmāt iti anena anantaraḥ yogaḥ pratinirdiśyate . iha mā bhūt . etān gāḥ paśya [R:
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_2: etān gāḥ caturaḥ balivardān paśya] iti . astu tarhi ekayogaḥ eva . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_3: ekayoge hi jaśśahoḥ pararūpaprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ijgrahaṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_4: pararūpābhāvasya . yat ayam na āt ici iti ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_5: na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ijgrahaṇasya idam prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_6: . iha mā bhūt . vṛkṣāḥ , plakṣāḥ , vṛkṣān , plakṣān . yadi ca jaśśasoḥ pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_7: syāt ijgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ pararūpam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11222_8: iti . tataḥ ijgrahaṇam karoti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11223: jñāpakam . uttarārtham etat syāt . dīrghāt jasi ca ici ca iti . yadi uttarārtham etat syāt atra eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11224: kriyamāṇam yadi uttarārtham na jñāpakam bhavati . evam tarhi yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11225: uttarārtham etat syāt na eva ayam ijdgrahaṇam kurvīta na api jasgrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11226: etāvat ayam brūyāt . dīrghāt śasi pūrvasavarṇaḥ bhavati iti . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dīrghāt śasi eva na anyatra iti . saḥ ayam evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11227_0: laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe yat ijgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na jaśśasoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11227_1: pararūpam bhavati iti . atha vā punaḥ astu yogavibhāgaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11227_2: anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ami api yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11227_3: kariṣyate . ami . ami yat uktam tat na bhavati iti . tataḥ pūrvaḥ . pūrvaḥ ca bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11228: nakārābhāvaḥ ca tasmāt iti anantaranirdeśāt iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati tasmāt iti anena anantaram yogam pratinirdeṣṭum . evam kila pratinirdiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11229: tasmāt pūrvasavarṇadīrghāt iti . tat ca na . evam pratinirdiśyate . tasmāt akaḥ savarṇāt iti . atha vā tasmāt prathamyoḥ dīrghāt iti . atha vā punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11230_0: astu ami ekayogaḥ . nanu ca uktam yogavibhāgaḥ anyaśāstranivṛttiyarthaḥ cet ami atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11230_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11230_2: pararūpam bādhiṣyate ami pūrvatvam na bādhiṣyate . yadi etat asti madhye apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_0: arthaḥ ekena api yogavibhāgena . purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_1: evam pararūpam savarṇadīrghatvam bādhiṣyate prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇadīrghatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_2: bādhiṣyate . atha vā saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi
GS24pmbhasuu:11231_3: supi ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi bahuvacane . bahuvacane ca ataḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati . ekāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11232: bahuvacane jhali iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . vṛṣāṇām , plakṣāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:11233_0: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:11233_1: . dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt dīrghatvam . nityam khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:11233_2: api dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt paratvāt ca dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:11234: evam tarhi ādgrahaṇam iha api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āt jaseḥ asuk iti . tena kṛte api dīrghatve nuṭ bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11235: prāpnoti . kīlālapām , śubhaṃyām . ātaḥ lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11236: idam iha sampradhāryam . lopaḥ kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11237_0: paratvāt nuṭ . evam tarhi hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti atra ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ātaḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11237_1: sambandham anuvartiṣyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapānām brāhmaṇakulānām .
GS24pmbhasuu:11238_0: (P_6,1.103) KA_III.80.23-81.19 Ro_IV.446-448 kim idam natvam puṃsām bahutve bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11238_1: āhosvit puṃśabdāt bahuṣu . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . natvam puṃsām bahutve cet puṃśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11238_2: iṣyate striyām . tat na sidhyati . bhrūkuṃsān paśya iti . napuṃsake tathā eva iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:11239: paṇḍakān paśya iti . strīśabdāt ca prasajyate . strīśabdāt ca prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:11240: cañcāḥ paśya , vadhrikāḥ paśya , kharakuṭīḥ paśya . astu tarhi puṃśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11241: bahuṣu . puṃśabāt iti cet iṣṭam sthūrāpatyam na sidhyati . sthūrān paśya iti . kuṇḍinyāḥ ararakāyāḥ . apatyam ca na sidhyati . kuṇḍinān paśya .
GS24pmbhasuu:11242: ararakān paśya . puṃsprādhānyāt prasidhyati . puṃspradhānā ete śabdāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11243: tataḥ natvam bhaviṣyati . puṃsprādhānye te eva syuḥ ye doṣāḥ pūrvacoditāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11244: . bhrūkuṃsān paśya . ṣaṇḍhān paśya . paṇḍakān paśya . cañcāḥ paśya .
GS24pmbhasuu:11245: vadhrikāḥ paśya . kharakuṭīḥ paśya iti . tasmāt yasmin pakṣe alpīyāṃsaḥ doṣāḥ tam āsthāya pratividheyam doṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:11246: (P_6,1.107) KA_III.81.21-22 Ro_IV.448 vā chandasi iti eva . yamīm ca yamyam ca . śamīm ca śamyam ca . garuīm ca gauryam ca . kiśorīm ca kiśoryam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11247: (P_6,1.108.1) KA_III.82.2 Ro_IV.448 vā chandasi iti eva . mitrāvaruṇau yajyamānaḥ . mitrāvaruṇau ijyamānaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_0: asamānāṅgasya mā bhūt iti . śakahvartham , parivyartham . siddham asamprasāraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_1: . siddham etat . katham . asamprasāraṇāt . vākyasya samprasāraṇasañjñā na varṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_2: . atha varṇasya samprasāraṇasañjñāyām doṣaḥ eva . varṇasya ca samprasāraṇasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_3: na doṣaḥ . katham . anyaḥ ayam samprasāraṇāsamprasāraṇayoḥ sthāne ekaḥ ādiśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11249_4: kāryakṛtatvāt vā . atha vā sakṛt kṛtam pūrvatvam iti kṛtvā punaḥ na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11250_0: brāhmaṇaḥ agnīn ādadhīta iti sakṛt ādhāya kṛtaḥ śāstrārthaḥ iti kṛtvā punaḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11250_1: na bhavati . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . yuktam yat tasya punaḥ pravṛttiḥ na bhavati . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11250_2: tu tadāśrayam prāpnoti na tat śakyam bādhitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_0: tat yathā vasante brāhmaṇaḥ agniṣṭomādibhiḥ kratubhiḥ yajeta iti agnyādhānanimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_1: vasante vasante ijyate . tasmāt pūrvoktaḥ eva parihāraḥ siddham asamprasāraṇāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_2: . yadi tarhi na idam samprasāraṇam hūtaḥ iti dīrghatvam na prāpnoti . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_3: vacanaprāmāṇyāt . anavakāśam dīrghatvam . tat vacanaprāmāṇyāt bhaviṣyati . antavattvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11251_4: vā . atha vā pūrvasya kāryam prati antavat bhavati iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11253: āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti etasmāt iyaṅ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ aikṣiṣṭa , aihiṣṭa . iyaṅaḥ avakāśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11254: adhīyāte , adhīyate . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : adhyaiyātām adhyaiyata .
GS24pmbhasuu:11255: iyaṅādeśaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11256: antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . varṇau āśritya āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11257: aṅgasya iyaṅ ādeśaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . āṭ kriyatām iyaṅādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iyaṅ . nityaḥ āṭ āgamaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11258: kṛte api iyaṅi prāpnoti akṛte api . iyaṅ api nityaḥ . kṛte api āṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:11259: prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ iyaṅ . na hi kṛte āti prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . antaraṅgā āṭaḥ vṛddhiḥ . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:11260_0: tat anityam . na ca atra āt eva iyaṅaḥ nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram āṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11260_1: vṛddhiḥ pratīkṣyā . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt iyaṅ ādeśaḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11260_2: āṅabhyāsayoḥ . āt guṇāt savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kva . āṅabhyāsayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11260_3: . āt guṇasya avakāśaḥ : khaṭvendraḥ , khaṭvodakam . savarṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11261: daṇḍāgram , kṣupāgram . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : adya , ā , ūḍhā : adyoḍhā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11262: kadā , ā , ūḍhā : kadoḍhā , upa , i , ijatuḥ : upejatuḥ , upa , u , upatuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11263_0: : upopatuḥ . savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . abhyāsārthena tāvat na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11263_1: . astu atra āt guṇaḥ ayavau ca halādiśeṣaḥ . punaḥ āt guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11263_2: upejatuḥ , upejatuḥ iti . idam tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:11264_0: sidhyati : upopatuḥ , upopuḥ iti . atra hi āt guṇe kṛte odantaḥ nipātaḥ iti pragṛhyasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:11264_1: , pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti pragṛhyāśrayaḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . padāntaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11265: padāntabhaktaḥ padāntagrahaṇena grāhīṣyate . evam tarhi etat eva atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:11266_0: asti odantaḥ nipātaḥ iti . kim kāraṇam . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11266_1: iti . iha api tarhi adyoḍhā , kadoḍhā iti bhavet rūpam siddham syāt . svare doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11266_2: tu . svare tu doṣaḥ bhavati . adyoḍhā* evam svaraḥ prasajyeta. adyoḍhā* iti ca iṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11266_3: . āṅi pararūpavacanam ca idānīm anarthakam syāt . na anarthakam . jñāpakārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11266_4: kim jñāpyam . āṅi pararūpavacanam tu jñāpakam antaraṅgabalīyastvāt . etat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11267: . antaraṅgam balīyaḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ iha antaraṅgam kim bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11268: yāvatā dve pade āśritya savarṇadīrghatvam bhavati āt guṇaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:11269_0: dhātūpasargayoḥ yat kāryam tat antaraṅgam . kutaḥ etat . pūrvam upasargasya dhātuna
GS24pmbhasuu:11269_1: yogaḥ bhavati na adya śabdena . kimartham tarhi adyaśabdaḥ prayujyate . adyaśabdaysa
GS24pmbhasuu:11269_2: api samudāyena yogaḥ bhavati . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . prayojanam pūrvasavarṇapūrvatvatahilopaṭenaṅeyyaṅisminṅiṇalautvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11270: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇāt varṇavikārāt . pūrvasavarṇaḥ prayojanam . agnī atra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11271: vāyū atra . pūrvasavarṇaḥ ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11273: śakahvartham , parivyartham . pūrvatvam ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . pūrvatvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . tahilopa
GS24pmbhasuu:11274: . akāri atra . ahāri atra . paca idam . tahilopau ca prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11275: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . tahilopau bhavataḥ antaraṅgataḥ . ṭena . vṛkṣeṇa atra , plakṣeṇa atra . inādeśaḥ ca prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11276: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam . inādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . ṅerya . vṛkṣāya atra , plakṣāya atra . ṅeḥ yādeśaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11277: prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ eṅaḥ padāntāt ati iti pararūpatvam . ṅeḥ yādeśaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . ṅismin . yasmin idam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11278: tasmin idam . sminbhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11279_0: savarṇadīrghatvam . sminbhāvaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . ṅiṇalautvam . agnau idam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11279_1: yayau atra . ṅiṇalautvam prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ savarṇadīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11279_2: . autvam bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na etāni santi
GS24pmbhasuu:11280: prayojanāni . vipratiṣedhena api etāni siddhāni . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11281_0: vṛkṣāḥ atra . plakṣāḥ atra . pūrvasavarṇaḥ ca prāpnoti bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ ca varṇavikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11281_1: roḥ aplutāt aplute iti uttvam . pūrvasavarṇaḥ bhavati antaraṅgataḥ . na ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11281_2: idam eva prayojanam . ādye yoge bahūni
GS24pmbhasuu:11282: prayojanāni santi yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . pratividheyam doṣeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:11283: (P_6,1.112) KA_III.84.25-85.3 Ro_IV.455-456 kim idam khyatyāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11284: sakhipatyoḥ vikṛtagrahaṇam . kim punaḥ kāraṇam sakhipatyoḥ vikṛtagrahaṇam kriyate na sakhipatibhyām iti eva ucyeta . na evam śakyam . garīyān ca eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11285: hi nirdeśaḥ syāt iha ca prasajyeta . atisakheḥ āgacchāmi . atisakheḥ svam . iha ca na syāt : sakhīyateḥ apratyayaḥ sakhyuḥ , patyuḥ . lunīyateḥ apratyayaḥ . lūnyuḥ , pūnyuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_0: (P_6,1.113) KA_III.85.5-24 Ro_IV.457-459 kimartham aplutāt aplute iti ucyate . plutāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_1: parasya plute vā parataḥ mā bhūt iti . plutāt parasya susrotā3 atra nu asi . plute
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_2: parataḥ tiṣṭhatu payaḥ ā3gnidatta . ataḥ ati iti ucyate . kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ plutāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_3: plute vā parataḥ . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt prāpnoti . atha aplutāt aplute
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_4: iti ucyamāne yāvatā asiddhaḥ plutaḥ kasmāt eva atra na prāpnoti . aplutabhāvinaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_5: aplutabhāvini iti evam etat vijñāyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhaḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_6: svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti plutasya prakṛtibhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11286_7: śāsti . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam aplutādaplutavacane akārahaśoḥ samānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:11287: aplutādaplutavacane akārahaśoḥ samānapade pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . payo3ṭ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11288: payo3da . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11289: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ pluraḥ . antaraṅgam uttvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . susrotā3 atra nu asi .
GS24pmbhasuu:11290: antaraṅgaḥ atra plutaḥ bahiraṅgam uttvam . kva punaḥ iha antaraṅgaḥ plutaḥ kva vā bahiraṅgam uttvam uttvam vā antaraṅgam plutaḥ vā bahiraṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11291: vākyāntasya vākyādau antaraṅgaḥ plutaḥ bahiraṅgam uttvam . samānavākye padāntasya padādau uttvam antaraṅgam bahiraṅgaḥ plutaḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11292_0: bahiraṅgatvam uttve hetuḥ vyapadiśyate na punaḥ asiddhatvam api . yathā eva hi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11292_1: bahiraṅgaḥ evam asiddhaḥ api . evam manyate . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ āśrayāt siddhaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11292_2: . atha vā yasyām na aprāptāyām paribhāṣāyām uttvam ārabhyate sā āśrayāt siddhā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11292_3: . kasyām ca na aprāptāyām asiddhaparibhāṣāyām . bahiraṅgaparibhāṣāyām punaḥ prāptāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_0: nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_1: . aci iti vartate . aci yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_2: cet atiprasaṅgaḥ nāntaḥpādam iti sarvapratiṣedhaḥ cet atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_3: api prāpnoti . anu agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat , prati agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat .
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_4: evam tarhi ati iti vartate . akārāśrayam yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . akārāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_5: iti cet uttvavacanam . akārāśrayam iti cet uttvam vaktavyam . kālaḥ aśvaḥ . śatadhāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11294_6: ayam maṇiḥ . ayavoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ca . ayavoḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . sujāte
GS24pmbhasuu:11295: śukram te anyat . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham . eṅaḥ ati iti vartate . eṅaḥ ati yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet uttvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11296: . eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet uttvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . agneḥ atra , vāyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11297_0: atra. ataḥ roḥ aplutāt aplute eṅaḥ ca iti uttvam prāpnoti . punaḥ eṅgrahaṇāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11297_1: . punaḥ eṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . tat tarhi kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:11297_2: . nanu ca uktam eṅprakaraṇāt siddham cet
GS24pmbhasuu:11298: uttvapratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . padāntābhisambaddham eṅgrahaṇam anuvartate na ca eṅaḥ padāntāt paraḥ ruḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11300_0: svarasiddhyartham . goḥ ak vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . gavāgre svarasiddhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11300_1: . gavāgre svarasiddhiḥ yathā syāt . gavāgram . avaṅādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ . avaṅādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:11300_2: hi svare doṣaḥ syāt . antodāttasya āntaryataḥ antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:11301: vyapadeśivadbhāvena . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena antodāttaḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11302: ādyudāttaḥ api . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11303: satyam evam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti . prātipadikasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11304: bhavati iti . idam punaḥ asti . prātipadikasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11305: saḥ asau lakṣaṇena antodāttaḥ . tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyeta . yadi punaḥ gameḥ ḍo vidhīyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11306: pratyayādyudāttatve kṛte āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . katham punaḥ ayam ādyudāttaḥ yadā ekāc . vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:11307: . yathā eva tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvena ādyudāttaḥ evam antodāttaḥ api .
GS24pmbhasuu:11308: tatra āntaryataḥ antodāttasya antodāttaḥ ādeśaḥ prasjyeta . satyam evam etat . na tu idam lakṣaṇam asti . pratyayasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11309_0: idam punaḥ asti . pratyayasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti . saḥ asau lakṣaṇena ādyudāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11309_1: . tatra āntaryataḥ ādyudāttasya ādyudāttaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati .etat api ādeśe na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11310: prakṛtitaḥ anena svaraḥ labhyaḥ . prakṛtiḥ ca asya yathā eva ādyudāttā
GS24pmbhasuu:11311_0: evam antodāttā api . evam tarhi ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11311_1: prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktayaḥ . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11311_2: eva nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtsvarasya bādhakaḥ evam samāsasvarasya api . gavāsthi , gavākṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:11312: (P_6,1.124) KA_III.87.20-22 Ro_IV.463 indrādau iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . gavendrayajñe vīhi iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11313: na evam vijñāyate indre aci iti . katham tarhi . aci bhavati . katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:11315: (P_6,1.125.1) KA_III.87.24-88.11 Ro_IV.464-465 nityagrahaṇam kimartham . vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . ma etat asti prayojanam . pūrvasmin eva yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:11316_0: vibhāṣāgrahaṇam nivṛttam . idam tarhi prayojanam . plutapragṛhyāṇam aci prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11316_1: eva yathā syāt . yat anyat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . śākalam
GS24pmbhasuu:11317: saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . atha ajgrahaṇam kimartham . aci prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . plutapragṛhyeṣu ajgrahaṇam anarthakam adhikārāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11318: plutapragṛhyeṣu ajgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . adhikārāt eva siddham . aci iti prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11319_0: tat tu tasmin prakṛtibhāvārtham . tat tu dvitīyam ajgrahaṇam kartavyam prakṛtibhāvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11319_1: . tasmin aci pūrvasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . jānu u asya rujati
GS24pmbhasuu:11319_2: . jānū asya rujati . jānv asya rujati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11321: prakṛtibhāvaḥ ucyate . svarasandhiḥ mā bhūt iti . ucyamāne api etasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:11322_0: svarsandhiḥ prāpnoti . plute kṛte na bhaviṣyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11322_1: prāpnoti . plutaprakṛtibhāvavacanam tu jñāpakam ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11322_2: . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti prakṛtibhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11323: śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ ekādeśāt plutaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11324_0: ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet śālendre atiprasaṅgaḥ . ekādeśāt plutaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11324_1: iti cet śālendre atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . śālāyām indraḥ śālendraḥ . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11324_2: . na vā atiprasaṅgaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ plutaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11326_0: (P_6,1.126) KA_III.89.2-5 Ro_IV.466 āṅaḥ anarthakasya . āṅaḥ anarthakasya iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11326_1: . iha mā bhūt . indraḥ bāhubhyām ātarat . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulagrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11326_2: na bhaviṣyati . āṅaḥ anunāsikaḥ chandasi bahulam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11328: prakṛtyā iti etat anukṛṣyate . kim prayojanam . svarasandhiḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11329_0: na etat asti prayojanam . hrasvavacanasārmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . bhavet dīrghāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:11329_1: hrasvavacanasārmarthyāt svarasandhiḥ na syāt . hrasvānām tu khalu svarasandhiḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11330_0: svarasandhiḥ na bhaviṣyati . na hrasvānām hrasvāḥ prāpnuvanti . na hi bhuktavān punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11330_1: bhuṅkte . na ca kṛtaśmaśruḥ punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . nanu ca punaḥpravṛttiḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:11330_2: dṛṣṭā . bhuktavān ca punaḥ bhuṅkte kṛtaśmaśruḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11331: punaḥ śmaśrūni kārayati . sāmarthyāt tatra punaḥpravṛttiḥ bhavati bhojanaviśeṣāt śilpiviśeṣāt vā . hrasvāṇām punaḥ hrasvavacane na kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:11332: prayojanam asti . akṛtakāri khalu api śāstram agnivat . tat yathā agniḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11333_0: yad adagdham tat dahati . hrasvāṇām api hrasvavacane etat prayojanam svarasandhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11333_1: mā bhūt iti . kṛtakāri khalu api śāstram parjanyavat . tat yathā parjanyaḥ yāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11333_2: ūnam pūrṇam ca sarvam abhivarṣayati . idam tarhi prayojanam . plutapragṛhyāḥ anukṛṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:11333_3: . ikaḥ asavarṇe śākalyasya hrasvaḥ ca plutaprgṛhyāḥ ca prakṛtyā . nityagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11335_1: śākalapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ayam te yoniḥ ṛtviyaḥ . prajām vindāma ṛtviyām . vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11336: nityagrahaṇena na arthaḥ . sitsamāsayoḥ śākalam na bhavati iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . vāpyām āsvaḥ , vāpyaśvaḥ , nadyām ātiḥ , nadyātiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11337: īṣā akṣādiṣu chandasi prakṛtibhāvamātram . īṣā akṣādiṣu chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11338: prakṛtibhāvamātram draṣṭavyam . īṣa akṣaḥ . ka īm are piśaṅgila . yathā aṅgadaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11339_0: (P_6,1.128.1) KA_III.90.5-9 Ro_IV.469 kimartham idam ucyate . ṛti akaḥ savarṇārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11339_1: . savarṇārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . hotṛ ṛśyaḥ . anigantārtham ca . khaṭva ṛśyaḥ , māla
GS24pmbhasuu:11339_2: ṛśyaḥ (P_6,1.128.2) KA_III.90.10-16 Ro_IV.469 ṛti hrasvāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11339_3: . ṛti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti etasmāt upasargāt vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:11339_4: hrasvaḥ bhavati iti etasya avakāśaḥ khaṭva ṛśyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11340: māla ṛśyaḥ . upasargāt vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam . yadā na hrasvatvam tadā avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . upārdhnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11341: prārdhnoti . upasargāt vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam tatra dhātugrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11342: prayojanam . upasargāt ṛti dhātau vṛddhiḥ eva yathā syāt . anyat yat prāpnoti tat mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11343_0: (P_6,1.129) KA_III.90.18-91.8 Ro_IV.469-470 upasthite iti ucyate . kim idam upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:11343_1: nāma . anārṣaḥ itikaraṇaḥ . suślokā3 iti suśloketi . atha vadvacanam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11343_3: . plutakāryam pratiṣidhyate . trimātratā na pratiṣidhyate . kim ca idānīm trimātratāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11344_0: yāvatā plutakārye pratiṣiddhe svarasandhinā bhavitavyam . plutapratiṣedhe hi pragṛhyaplutapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11344_1: anyena vihitatvāt . plutapratiṣedhe hi sati pragṛhyasya api plutasya trimātratāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11345_0: iti , vāyū3 iti . kim ca idānīm tasyāḥ api trimātratāyāḥ apratiṣedhe prayojanam yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:11345_1: plutakārye pratiṣiddhe svarasandhinā bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11346: plutapragṛhyasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ ucyate pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11347: (P_6,1.130) KA_III.91.10-14 Ro_IV.470 kimartham idam ucyate . ī3
GS24pmbhasuu:11348: cākravarmaṇasya iti anupasthitārtham . anupasthitārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11349: cinu hi3 idam . cinu hīdam . sunu hi3 idam . sunu hīdam . īkāragrahaṇena na arthaḥ . aviśeṣeṇa cākravarmaṇasya ācāryasya aplutavat bhavati iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11350: . idam api siddham bhavati . vaśa3 iyam , vaśeyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11351_0: (P_6,1.131) KA_III.91.16-20 Ro_IV.471 kimarthaḥ takāraḥ . taparaḥ tatkālasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11351_1: tatkalaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti prayojanam . āntaryataḥ ardhamātrikasya vyañjanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11351_2: mātrikaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . ūṭhi kṛte āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11351_3: . tadartham taparaḥ kṛtaḥ evamarthaḥ taparaḥ kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11352: (P_6,1.135.1) KA_III.91.22-94.2 Ro_IV.471-478 kātpūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . kāt pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . saṃskartā , saṃskartum . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11353_0: prayojanam . suṭ iti ādiliṅgaḥ ayam karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ . tatra antareṇa kātpūrvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11353_1: kāt pūrvaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:11354: akakārādau kātpūrvaḥ yathā syāt . sañcaskaratuḥ , sañcaskaruḥ . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham iti cet antareṇa api tat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11355: . suṭi kātpūrvavacanam akakārādau kātpūrvārtham iti cet antareṇa api kātpūrvagrahaṇam siddham . katham . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11356_0: dvirvacanam kriyatām suṭ iti suṭ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . tatra dvirvacanam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11356_1: iti asya avakāśaḥ bibhidatuḥ , bibhiduḥ . suṭaḥ avakāśaḥ saṃskartā , saṃskartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:11357: sañcaskaruḥ . suṭ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11358_0: iti cet dvirbhūte śabdāntarabhāvāt punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ . dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11358_1: iti cet dvirbhūte śabdāntarasya akṛtaḥ suṭ iti punaḥ suṭ syāt . dvirbhūte śabdāntarabhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11359: suṭi kṛte śabdāntarasya akṛtam dvirvacanam iti punaḥ dvirvacanam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11360_0: . tathā ca anavasthā . punaḥ suṭ punaḥ dvirvacanam iti cakrakam anavasthā prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:11360_1: . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi anavasthākāriṇā śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstrataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11360_2: hi nāma vyavasthāt . tatra suṭi kṛte dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11361: dvirvacanena avasthānam bhaviṣyati . aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam . aḍvyavāye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . samaskarot , samaskārṣīt . abhyāsavyavāye ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11362: abhyāsavyavāye ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sañcaskaratuḥ , sañcaskaruḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11363: kim ucyate abhyāsavyavāye iti yadā idānīm eva uktam dvirvacanāt suṭ vipratiṣedhena iti . avipratiṣedhaḥ vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11364: avipratiṣedhaḥ vā punaḥ suṭaḥ . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_0: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ suṭ . antaraṅgam dvirvacanam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_1: evamartham eva tarhi kātpūrvagrahaṇam kartavyam kāt pūrvaḥ yathā syāt . kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_2: api vai kātpūrvagrahaṇe atra na sidhyati . na hi ayam kātpūrvagrahaṇena śakyaḥ madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_3: praveśayitum . kim kāraṇam ādiliṅgaḥ ayam kriyate karotiḥ ca kakārādiḥ dṛṣṭaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_4: lpunaḥ ātideśikaḥ karotiḥ akakārādiḥ . pākṣikaḥ ayam doṣaḥ . katarasmin pakṣe . suḍvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_5: dvaitam bhavati . aviśeṣeṇa vā vihitasya suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11365_6: syāt viśeṣeṇa vā vidhiḥ iti . dvirvacanavidhau ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:11366: dvaitam bhavati . sthāne dvirvacanam syāt dviḥ prayogaḥ vā dvirvacanam iti . tat yadā dviḥ prayogaḥ dvirvacanam aviśeṣeṇa vihitasya ca suṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11367: kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham tadā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yadā hi sthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:11368: dvirvacanam tadā yadi aviśeṣeṇa vihitasya suṭaḥ kātpūrvagrahaṇam deśaprakḷptyartham atha api viśeṣavidhiḥ na tadā doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11369: dviḥprayoge ca api dvirvacane na doṣaḥ . samparibhyām iti na eṣā pañcamī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11370: kā tarhi . tṛtīyā . samparibhyām upasṛṣṭasya iti . vyavahitaḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:11371: upasṛṣṭaḥ bhavati . upadeśivadvacanam ca . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11372: kim prayojanam . liṭiguṇacaṅidīrghapratiṣedhārtham . liṭi guṇārtham caṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:11373: dīrghapratiṣedhārtham . liṭi guṇārtham tāvat . sañcaskaratuḥ , sañcaskaruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11374_0: . caṅi dīrghapratiṣedhārtham ca . samaciskarat . liṭi guṇārthena tāvat na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11374_1: . vakṣyati etat saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhāgrahaṇam kṛñartham iti . caṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:11374_2: dīrghapratiṣedhena api na arthaḥ . padam iti iyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11375: bhagavataḥ kṛtrimā sañjñā . yuktam iha draṣṭavyam . kim antaraṅgam kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11376: bahiraṅgam iti . dhātūpasargayoḥ kāryam yat tat antaraṅgam . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:11377: pūrvam hi dhātuḥ upasargeṇa yujyate paścāt sādhanena . na etat sāram .
GS24pmbhasuu:11378: pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . sādhanam hi kriyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11379: nirvartayati . tām upasargaḥ viśinaṣti . abhinirvṛttasya ca arthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11380: upasargeṇa viśeṣaḥ śakyam kartūm . satyam evam etat . yaḥ tu asau
GS24pmbhasuu:11381_0: dhātūpasargayoḥ abhisambandhaḥ tam abhyantaram kṛtvā dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11381_1: ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11381_2: iti tasya āsyate guruṇā iti akarmakaḥ upāsyate guruḥ iti kena sakarmakaḥ syāt . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11381_3: kṛtvā suṭ sarvataḥ antaraṅgatarakaḥ bhavati kātpūrvagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:11382_0: (P_6,1.135.2) KA_III.94.3-20 Ro_IV.478-480 yadi punaḥ ayam suṭ kāt pūrvāntaḥ kriyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:11382_1: . kāt pūrvāntaḥ iti cet ruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ . kāt pūrvāntaḥ iti cet kaḥ cit vidheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11382_2: kaḥ cit patiṣedhyaḥ . saṃskartā . samaḥ vidheyaḥ suṭaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . samaḥ tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11382_3: na vidheyaḥ . vakṣyati etat sampuṅkānām satvam ruvidhau hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11382_4: suṭaḥ ca api na pratiṣedhyaḥ . samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ : suṭi sakārādau
GS24pmbhasuu:11383: atha vā padādiḥ kariyṣyate . parādau iḍgrahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi parādiḥ iḍguṇau prāpnutaḥ . saṃskṛṣīṣṭa . ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ iti iṭ prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:11404: (P_6,1.147) KA_III.96.2-9 Ro_IV.482-483 āścaryam adbhute . āścaryam adbhute iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . āścaryam uccatā vṛkṣasya .

GS24pmbhasuu:11419: anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti eva siddham . katham . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ , kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:11422: . āgamasya vikārasya prakṛteḥ pratyayasya ca pṛthak svaranivṛttyartham ekavarjam padasvaraḥ . āgamasya . caturanaḍuhoḥ ām udāttaḥ . catvāraḥ ,

GS24pmbhasuu:11426_0: evamartham idam ucyate . na etat asti prayojanam . yaugapadyam tavai siddham . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11426_1: ayam tavai ca antaḥ ca yugapat iti siddhe yaugapadye yaugapadyam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11426_2: ācāryaḥ na yugapat svaraḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11427_0: paryāyaḥ tarhi prāpnoti . paryāyaḥ riktaśāsanāt . yat ayam rikte vibhāṣā iti siddhe
GS24pmbhasuu:11427_1: paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11427_2: tu etat . etat udātte jñāpakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11428: svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11429: asti . tasmāt na arthaḥ anena yogena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11431_0: yoge anudātte vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ ekasmin yugapat sambhavāt . anudātte vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11431_1: na upapadyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham je dīrghāt bahvacaḥ iti . saḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:11432_1: yat ubhayam syāt . katham sambhavaḥ yadā anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti ucyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11432_2: iha na asti . kim kāraṇam . na anena udāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11433: pratiṣidhyate . kim tarhi anudāttatvam anena kriyate asti ca sambhavaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11434: ubhayoḥ ca udāttatvam syāt anyeṣām ca anudāttatvam . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11435: adhikāraḥ vijñāyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11436_0: anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate . je dīrghāntasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11436_1: upasthitam idam bhavati anudāttam padam ekavarjam iti . antyāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:11447: paratvāt . atha vā na idam pāribhāṣikānudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi .

GS24pmbhasuu:11451: kartavyāḥ . putrakāmyati , gopāyati , ṛtīyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11452_0: prakṛtisvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . prakṛtisvare pratyayasvarābhāvaḥ . prakṛtisvare
GS24pmbhasuu:11452_1: pratyayasvarasya abhāvaḥ . kartavyam, taittirīyaḥ . siddham tu prakṛtisvarabalīyastvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11453: prakṛtisvarāt balīyastvāt pratyayasvarasya bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11455: Ro_IV.491-493 satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam ca . satiśiṣṭasvaraḥ balīyān bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat ca anekapratyayasamāsārtham . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11456_0: satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . anekapratyayārtham anekasamāsārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11456_1: ca . anekapratyayārtham tāvat . aupagavaḥ . prakṛtisvaram aṇsvaraḥ bādhate . aupagavatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11458: rājapuruṣaḥ , rājapuruṣaputraḥ , rājapuruṣaputrapuruṣaḥ . yadi satiśiṣṭasvarabalīyastvam ucyate syādisvaraḥ sārvadhātukasvaram bādheta .
GS24pmbhasuu:11459: sunutaḥ , cinutaḥ . syādisvarāprasaṅgaḥ ca tāseḥ parasya anudāttavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11460: syādisvarasya ca aprasaṅgaḥ . kutaḥ . tāseḥ parasya anudāttavacanāt . yat ayam tāseḥ parasya lasārvadhātukasya anudāttatvam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11461: ācāryaḥ satiśiṣṭaḥ api vikaraṇasvaraḥ lasārvadhātukasvaram na bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11462_0: śāstraparavipratiṣedhāniyamāt vā śabdavipratiṣedhāt siddham . atha vā śāstraparavipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:11462_1: na sarvam iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati iti kṛtvā śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ vijñāsyate . yadi

GS24pmbhasuu:11462_3: ṛtīyate . śabdavipratiṣedhaḥ nāma bhavati yatra ubhayoḥ yugapatprasaṅgaḥ na ca kāmyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11463_0: yugapatprasaṅgaḥ . vibhaktisvarāt nañsvaraḥ balīyān . vibhaktisvarāt nañsvaraḥ balīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:11463_1: iti vaktavyam . vibhaktisvarasya avakāśaḥ . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nañsvarasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11463_2: . abrāhmaṇaḥ , avṛṣalaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisraḥ . nañsvaraḥ bhavati . vibhaktinimittasvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11464: vibhaktinimittasvarāt ca nañsvaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11465: vibhaktinimittasvarasya avakāśaḥ . catvāraḥ , anaḍvāhaḥ . nañsvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . acatvāraḥ . ananaḍvāhaḥ . yat ca upapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:11466: kṛti nañ . yat ca upapadam kṛti nañ tasya svaraḥ balīyān iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11467: akaraṇiḥ hi te vṛṣala . sahanirdiṣṭasya ca . sahanirdiṣṭasya ca nañaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11470_0: grahaṇam kriyate na kṛṣātvataḥ iti eva ucyeta . yasya kṛṣeḥ vikaraṇe etat rūpam tasya

GS24pmbhasuu:11473: asti . iha api dāyaḥ , dhāyaḥ iti yukā vyavadhānam . evam api vihitaviṣeṣanam ākāragrahaṇam vijñāyeta . ākārāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:11475_0: (P_6,1.161.1) KA_III.101.14-102.2 Ro_IV.494-495 anudāttasya iti kimartham . prāsaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11475_1: vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ . udāttalope svaritodāttayoḥ abhāvāt anudāttagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11476: anudāttagrahaṇam anarthakam . ha hi kaḥ cit udāttaḥ udātte svarite vā lupyate . sarvaḥ anudātte eva . nan ca ayam udāttaḥ svarite lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11477: prāsaṅgam vahati prāsaṅgyaḥ iti . eṣaḥ api nighāte kṛte anudātte eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11478_0: lupyate . idam iha sampradhāryam . nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti . kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11478_1: . paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi ayam adya nighātasvaraḥ sarvasvarāṇām apavādaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11478_2: ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ bhiniviśate . pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11479_0: tataḥ utsargaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit thāthādisvaraḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11479_1: apavādam nighātam pratīkṣate . tatra nighātaḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti yadi api paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11479_2: lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodāttaḥ anudāttaḥ lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11481: antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit ādiḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . antaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:11483: śnamksayuṣmadasmadidaṅkiṃlopeṣu svaraḥ na sidhyati . śnam . vindate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11484: khindate . śnam . ksa . mā hi dhukṣātām . mā hi dhukṣāthām . ksa .
