GS24pmbhasuu:11486_0: indhīta dvayam iti antaḥ iti . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttapratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11486_1: liṅi siddham . vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam liṅi na iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11487: aviśeṣeṇa ikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttapratiṣedhāt liṅi siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11488: vidīndhikhidibhyaḥ ca lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam na iti eva . idam api siddham bhavati . vindate , khindate . ayaci katham . ayaci citkaraṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11491: udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit ādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11492_0: cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam . dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11492_1: . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte ca iti vaktavyam . bagrahaṇam ca kartavyam . bāntaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11492_2: pibiḥ ādyudāttaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . pibati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11493: san ca nit . san ca nit kartavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . cikīrṣati jihīrṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11494: niti iti ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . astu tarhi ādiḥ . ādau ūrṇapratyayadhātuṣu antodāttatvam . ādau ūrṇapratyayadhātuṣu antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11495: na sidhyati . ūrṇoti . ūrṇu . pratyayadhātu . gopāyati , dhūpāyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11496: ṛtīyate . antodāttavacanāt siddham . astu tarhi antodāttaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11497: nanu ca uktam dhātoḥ antaḥ iti cet anudātte ca bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11498: yat tāvat ucyate . anudātte ca grahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11499_0: . abhyastānām ādiḥ anudātte ca iti . bagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . pibau nipātanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11499_1: pibau ādyudāttanipātanam kriyate . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11499_2: . san ca nit kartavyaḥ iti . avaśyam sanaḥ viśeṣaṇārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:11500_0: sanyaṅoḥ iti . sayaṅoḥ iti iyati ucyamāne haṃsaḥ , vatsaḥ , atra api prāpnoti . arthavadgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11500_1: na anarthakasya iti evam na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . jugupsate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11500_2: mīmāṃsate iti . arthavān eṣaḥ . na vai kaḥ cit arthaḥ ādiśyate . yadi api kaḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:11500_3: arthaḥ na ādiśyate anirdiṣṭārthāḥ svārthe bhavanti iti antataḥ svārthe bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11500_4: . kaḥ ca asya svārthaḥ . prakṛtyarthaḥ . iha api prāpnoti . haṃsaḥ , vatsaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11501_0: uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . saḥ eṣaḥ ananyārthaḥ nakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:11501_1: kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . atha vā dhātoḥ iti vartate . dhātoḥ saśabdāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11501_2: dve bhavataḥ iti (P_6,1.163) KA_III.104.2-7 Ro_IV.500 citaḥ saprakṛteḥ bahvakajartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11502: citaḥ saprakṛteḥ iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . bahvakajartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11503: bahujartham akajartham ca . bahujartham tāvat . bahubhuktam , bahukṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11504: akajartham . sarvakaiḥ , viśvakaiḥ , uccakaiḥ , nīcakaiḥ , sarvake ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11505: viśvake . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11506: . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām puṣyakāḥ kālakāḥ eṣām kālakāḥ iti . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ , ghāṭaḥ iti . pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ca citvān citaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11507: (P_6,1.166) KA_III.104.9-22 Ro_IV.500-501 jasaḥ iti kimartham . tisṛkā
GS24pmbhasuu:11508_0: . tisṛbhyaḥ jasgrahaṇānarthakyam anyatra abhāvāt . tisṛbhyaḥ jasgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11508_1: . kim kāraṇam . anyatra abhāvāt . na hi anyat tisṛśabdāt antodāttatvam prayojayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11509: bahuvacanaviṣayaḥ eva tisṛśabdaḥ . tena ekavacanadvivacane na staḥ . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11510_0: . tatra ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ jhali upottamam iti anena svareṇa bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11510_1: tatra antareṇa jasaḥ grahaṇam jasaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11510_2: tisṛkā iti . nitsvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte anyasvare tisṛsvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11510_3: ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva anudāttau suppitau iti etam svaram bādhate evam nitsvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:11510_4: api bādheta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:11511_0: etasmin tisṛsvaraḥ ārabhyate . nitsvaraḥ punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā madhye
GS24pmbhasuu:11511_1: apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam tisṛsvaraḥ anudāttau suppitau iti svaram
GS24pmbhasuu:11511_2: bādhiṣyate nitsvaram na bādhiṣyate . upasamastārtham eke jasaḥ grahaṇam icchanti
GS24pmbhasuu:11513_0: vaktavyaḥ . catasraḥ paśya . caturaḥ śasi striyām apratiṣedhaḥ ādyudāttanipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11513_1: . caturaḥ śasi striyām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11513_2: svaraḥ kasmāt na bhavati ādyudāttanipātanāt . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11513_3: nipātanasvaraḥ śasi svarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11514: yathā eva nipātanasvaraḥ śasi svaram bādhate evam vibhaktisvaram api bādheta catasṛṇam iti . vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca halādigrahaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11515_0: vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca siddhaḥ . kutaḥ . halādigrahaṇāt . yat ayam ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11515_1: halādiḥ iti halādigrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na nipātanasvaraḥ vibhaktisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:11516: ādyudāttanipātane hi halādigrahaṇānarthakyam . ādyudāttanipātane hi sati
GS24pmbhasuu:11517: halādigrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . na hi anyat halādigrahaṇam prayojayati anyat ataḥ catasṛśabdāt . ṣaṭsañjñāḥ tāvat na prayojayanti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11518: bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . jaśśasī ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11519_0: lupyete . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ vibhaktayaḥ . triśabdaḥ ca api na prayojayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11519_1: kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11519_2: iti vacanāt jasi na bhaviṣyati . śasi bhavitavyam ekādeśe udāttena udāttaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11520: vibhaktayaḥ . tisṛśabdaḥ ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11521_0: bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11521_1: jasi na bhavitavyam . śasi bhavitavyam udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11521_2: vibhaktayaḥ . catuḥśabdaḥ tisṛśabdaḥ ca api na prayojayati . kim kāraṇam . bahuvacanaviṣayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11521_3: . tena dvivacanaikavacane na staḥ . asarvanāmasthānam iti vacanāt jasi na bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11521_4: . śasi bhavitavyam caturaḥ śasi iti . anyāḥ sarvāḥ halādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11522: vibhaktayaḥ . tatra catasṛśabdāt ekasmāt śas asarvanāmasthānam ajādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11523: vibhaktiḥ asti . yadi ca atra nipātanasvaraḥ syāt halādigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11524: anarthakam syāt . na eva vā punaḥ atra śasisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11525: yaṇādeśe kṛte śasaḥ pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā . avaśiṣṭasya tarhi prāpnoti . ṛkāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yaṇādeśe kṛte na
GS24pmbhasuu:11526: asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svaravidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti . na eṣaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11527: pratiṣedhaḥ . uktam etat pratiṣedhe svaradīrghayalopeṣu lopādādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:11529_0: (P_6,1.168.1) KA_III.106.9-18 Ro_IV.504-505 sau iti kim idam prathamaikavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11529_1: grahaṇam āhosvit saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . saptamībahuvacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11529_2: grahaṇam . katham jñāyate . yat ayam na gośvansāvavarṇa iti gośunoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:11530: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam syāt gośunoḥ pratiṣedhavacanam anarthakam syāt . nanu ca arthasiddhiḥ eva eṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11531_0: anugṛhītāḥ smaḥ yaiḥ asmābhiḥ prathamaikavacanam āsthāya gośunoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11531_1: bhavati . bhavet pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ doṣāḥ tu bhavanti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . svinā
GS24pmbhasuu:11532: svinkhinau na staḥ . uktam etat ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau
GS24pmbhasuu:11533: smṛtau . svavān , khavān iti eva bhavitavyam . iha tarhi yādbhyām , yābhiḥ iti na sidhyati . tasmāt saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11535: tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . sau ekācaḥ udāttatve tvanmadoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tvayā mayā . siddham tu yasmāt tṛtīyādiḥ tasya abhāvāt sau .
GS24pmbhasuu:11536: siddham etat . katham . yasmāt atra tṛtīyādiḥ vibhaktiḥ na tat sau asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11537: yadi api etat sau na asti prakṛtiḥ tu asya sau asti . prakṛteḥ ca anekāctvāt . yadi api tasya prakṛtiḥ asti sau anekāc tu sā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11539: yathā ekājgrahaṇam uttarapadaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . ekācaḥ uttarapadāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11540: . atha akriyamāṇe uttarapadagrahaṇe kasya ekājgrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11541: samāsaviśeṣaṇam . asti ca idānīm kaḥ cit ekāc samāsaḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11542: syāt . asti iti āha : śunaḥ ūrk : śvork , śvorjā , śvorje iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11544: . anyāni padādīni udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddhāni . ūṭhi upadhāgrahaṇam antyapratiṣedhārtham . ūṭhi upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11545: antyapratiṣedhārtham . antyasya mā bhūt . akṣadyuvā , akṣadyuve .
GS24pmbhasuu:11547_0: aṣṭasu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta . dīrghāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11547_1: aṣṭasu prakrameṣu brāhmaṇaḥ ādadhīta iti . ṣaṭsvaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:11547_2: ṣaṭsvare aṣṭanaḥ svaraḥ ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:11548: dīrghāt bādhate evam hrasvāt api bādheta . na dīrghāt ṣaṭsvaraḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11549_0: kim kāraṇam . āte kṛte ṣaṭsañjñābhāvāt . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11549_1: ṣaṭsañjñājñāpakam ākārāntasya nuḍartham . aṣṭanaḥ dīrghagrahaṇam kriyate jñāpakārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11550: bhavati ātve kṛte ṣaṭsañjñā iti . kim etasya jñapane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11551: ākārāntasya nuḍartham . ākārāntasya nuḍ siddhaḥ bhavati . aṣṭānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11552: nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati vibhāṣā ātvam iti yat ayam dīrghagrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11553: (P_6,1.173) KA_III.2-4 Ro_IV.508 nadyajādyudāttatve bṛhanmahatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . nadyajādyudāttatve bṛhanmahatoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11556_0: agnaye vāyave . udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham . udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11556_1: . kim prayojanam . nakārāntārtham . nakārāntāt api yathā syāt . vākpatnī citpatnī
GS24pmbhasuu:11556_2: . halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam ca samudāyādeśatvāt . halpūrvagrahaṇam ca anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11557: samudāyādeśatvāt . samudāyaḥ atra ādeśaḥ . svaritatve ca avacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11558: svaritatve ca halpūrvagrahaṇasya avacanāt manyāmahe halpūrvagrahaṇam anarthakam iti . yat tāvat ucyate udāttayaṇi halgrahaṇam nakārāntārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11559: iti kriyate nyāse eva . dvinakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:11560: ūṅdhātvoḥ iti . yat api ucyate halpūrvagrahaṇānarthakyam ca samudāyādeśatvāt iti . ayam asti kevalaḥ ādeśaḥ . bahutitavā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11562: matubudāttatve regrahaṇam kartavyam . ā revān etu naḥ viśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11563: tripratiṣedhaḥ ca . treḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . trivatīḥ yājyānuvākyāḥ bhavanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11564: (P_6,1.177) KA_III.109.2-21 Ro_IV.510-512 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11565: kiśorīṇām , kumārīṇām . hrasvāt iti vartate . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11566: agnīnām , vāyūnām . kim kāraṇam . dīrghatve kṛte hrasvābhāvāt . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam kriyatām svaraḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11567_0: paratvāt dīrghatvam . evam tarhi nāmsvare matau hrasvagrahaṇam . nāmsvare matau hrasvagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11567_1: kartavyam . matau hrasvāntāt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . āha ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11567_2: hrasvāntāt na ca nāmi hrasvāntaḥ asti . tatra bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate : hrasvāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:11568: sāmpratikābhāve bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāyate ayam ca asti sāmpratikaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11569: tisṛṇām , catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ halādiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11570: anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11571: evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ nām udāttaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11572: tataḥ halādiḥ . halādiḥ ca vibhaktiḥ udāttā bhavati ṣaṭtricaturbhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11573: idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . nanu ca atra api nṛ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11574: anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . jhalgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11575_0: jhalgrahaṇam tatra anuvartate . iha mā bhūt . nrā nre . udāttayaṇaḥ halpūrvāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11575_1: eṣaḥ svaraḥ atra svaraḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi nari . na ekam udāharam
GS24pmbhasuu:11575_2: hrasvagrahaṇam prayojayati . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt nām iti eva brūyāt . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11576: vijñāsyate . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11577: nām svarau matau hrasvagrahaṇam kartavyam iti . katham tarhi . nāmsvare matau hrasvāt iti vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11579_0: prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam āhosvit saptamībahuvacanasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11579_1: nirdeśaḥ . purastāt eṣaḥ nirṇayaḥ saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam iti . iha api tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11579_2: eva bhavitum arhati . yadi saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇam tābhyām brāhmaṇābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11580: vidhiḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi etat bhavati yat sau
GS24pmbhasuu:11581_0: rūpam . idam tarhi tebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ , yebhyaḥ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ . vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11581_1: bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ tu na prāpnoti . asti punaḥ kim cit sati iṣṭam saṅgṛhītam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11581_2: āhosvit doṣāntam eva . asti iti āha . iha yābhyaḥ brāhmaṇībhyaḥ , tābhyaḥ brāhmaṇībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11581_3: iti vidhiḥ ca sidddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca . asti tarhi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11581_4: . yadi prathamaikavacanasya grahaṇam tena iti svaraḥ puṃsi na sidhyati . na ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11581_5: puṃsi eva striyām puṃsi napuṃsake ca . tena brāhmaṇena tayā
GS24pmbhasuu:11582: brāhmaṇyā tena kuṇḍena iti . saptamībahuvacanasya grahaṇe api eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11583: tasmāt ubhābhyām eva pratiṣedhe yattatadoḥ ca grahaṇam kartavyam . na gośvansāvavarṇarāḍaṅkruṅkṛdbhyaḥ yattadoḥ ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11584: (P_6,1.185) KA_III.13-24 Ro_IV.514-515 titi pratyayagrahaṇam . titi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . ṝtaḥ it dhātoḥ . kirati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11585: girati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na eṣaḥ takāraḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . yadi dakāraḥ āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11586: bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yadi bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti ucyate adasaḥ aseḥ dāt u daḥ maḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11587: amūbhyām iti atra na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati ukāreṇa bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam iti yat ayam divaḥ ut iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11588_0: ukāram taparam karoti . evamartham eva tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam kartavyam atra mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:11588_1: iti . na eṣaḥ takāharaḥ . kaḥ tarhi . dakāraḥ . yadi dakāraḥ na jñāpakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11588_2: . evam tarhi taparaḥ tatkālasya iti dakāraḥ api cartvabhūtaḥ nirdiśyate . yadi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11588_3: cartvasya asiddhatvāt haśi ca iti uttvam prāpnoti . sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā asaṃhitayā
GS24pmbhasuu:11588_4: nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . aṇudit savarṇasya ca apratyayaḥ , ttaparaḥ tatkālasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11589: (P_6,1.186.1) KA_III.111.3-16 Ro_IV.515-517 adupadeśāt iti kim idam vijñāyate . akāraḥ yaḥ upadeśaḥ iti āhosvit akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11590_0: kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate akāraḥ yaḥ upadeśaḥ iti hataḥ , hathaḥ iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:11590_1: prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . nanu ca akārāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:11590_2: yat upadeśaḥ iti vijñāyamāne api atra api prāpnoti . etat api hi vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:11591: arthavatā vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ . yadi tarhi akārāntam yat upadeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11592: vijñāyate mā hi dhukṣātām , mā hi dhuṣāthām atra api prāpnoti . astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:11593: anudāttatve kṛte lope udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . na sidhyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . adnudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11594: paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam adya lasārvadhādukānudāttatvam pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ . na ca apavādaviṣaye utsargaḥ abhiniviśate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11595: pūrvam hi apavādāḥ abhiniviśante paścāt utsargāḥ . prakalpya vā apavādaviṣayam tataḥ utasrgaḥ abhiniviśate . tat na tāvat atra kadā cit
GS24pmbhasuu:11596: pratyayasvaraḥ bhavati . apavādaviṣayam lasārvadhātukānudāttatvam pratīkṣate . tatra ānudāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11597: paratvāt lopaḥ . yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ saḥ asau avidyamānodātte anudātte udāttaḥ lupyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11598_1: abhyastasijarthaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatve saptamīnirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . lasārvadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:11598_2: iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . abhyastasijarthaḥ . abhyastānām ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11599: sijantasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati lasārvadhātuke . lasārvadhātukam iti ucyamāne tasya eva ādyudāttatvam syāt . yadi saptamīnirdeśaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11600: tāsyādīnām eva anudāttatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . tāsiyādibhyaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī lasārvadhātuke iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11601_1: vipratiṣedhena . citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . citsvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11601_2: avakāśaḥ calanaḥ , copanaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ . āste śete . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11602_0: śayānaḥ . tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11602_1: . kim kāraṇam . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ . na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11602_2: ādeḥ anudāttatvam antasya udāttatvam . na avaśyam dvikāryayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11602_3: . kim tarhi. asambhavaḥ api . nanu ca atra api asti sambhavaḥ . ādeḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11603: asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . na eṣaḥ asti sambhavaḥ . vakṣyati etat svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . mukaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11604_0: mukaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pacamānaḥ , yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt adupadeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11604_1: lasārvadhātukam anudāttam bhavati iti anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . nanu ca ayam muk
GS24pmbhasuu:11604_2: adupadeśabhaktaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . na sidhyati . aṅgasya muk ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11605: vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam . saḥ asau saṅghātabhaktaḥ aśakyaḥ muk adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum . atha ayam adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11606_0: adupadeśagrahaṇena . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat katham . vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11606_1: etasya parihāram . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam . itaḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . idbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11607: . pacataḥ , paṭhataḥ . itaḥ ca anekāntatvāt . anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ . yadi anekāntāḥ anubandhāḥ adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11608_0: attaḥ , juhutaḥ iti . adupadeśāt iti anudāttatvam prāpnoti . tatra adiprabhṛtijuhotyādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11608_1: apratiṣedhaḥ sthānyādeśābhāvāt . tatra adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ juhotyādibhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11608_2: . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sthānyādeśābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11608_3: . na eva atra sthāninam na eva ādeśam paśyāmaḥ . anudāttaṅidgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:11608_4: yat ayam anudāttaṅidgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na luptavikaraṇebhyaḥ anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11608_5: bhavati iti . na etat asti jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11609: śnanartham etat syāt . vindāte , khindāte . yat tarhi ṅidgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11610: na hi śnamvikaraṇaḥ ṅit bhavati . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11611_0: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinutaḥ , sunutaḥ , lunītaḥ , punītaḥ . ṅitaḥ iti anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11611_1: prāpnoti . ṅitaḥ anudāttatve vikaraṇebhyaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11612_0: apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . anudāttatvam kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11612_1: . sarvasya upadeśaviśeṣaṇatvāt . sarvam upadeśagrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . upadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:11614: pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . sicaḥ ādyudāttatve aniṭaḥ pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . mā hi karṣam , mā hi kārṣam . aniṭaḥ iti kimartham . mā hi laviṣam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11615: (P_6,1.188) KA_III.113.14-17 Ro_IV.521 svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ vipratiṣedhena . svapādīnām vāvacanāt abhyastasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11616: bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svapādīnām vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ svapanti śvasanti . abhyastasvarasya avakāśaḥ dadati , dadhati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11619: bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ lopayaṇādeśārtham . anudātte ca iti bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . avidyamānodātte iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11620: lopayaṇādeśārtham . lopayaṇādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt . mā hi dadhāt . dadhāti atra .
GS24pmbhasuu:11622: sarvasvaraḥ anackasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt sarvake .
GS24pmbhasuu:11623: (P_6,1.191.2) KA_III.114.6-115.2 Ro_IV.522-525 bhyādigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . dadāti dadhāti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11624: abhyastasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . antataḥ ubhayam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11625: anavakāśāḥ khalu api vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca abhyastasvaraḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . mimīte . atha pratyayagrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11626: pratyayāt pūrvasya udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ pūrvasya mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11627_0: bibhayāni . na ca eva asti viśeṣaḥ pratyayāt vā pūrvasya udāttatve sati āṭaḥ vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11627_1: api ca pidbhaktaḥ pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . idam tarhi prayojanam . pratyayāt pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11627_2: udāttatvam yathā syāt . āṭaḥ eva mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . pidbhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11627_3: pidgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pratyayagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11627_4: ācāryaḥ svaravidhau saṅghātaḥ kāryī bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11628_0: citsvarāt tāsyādibhyaḥ anudāttatvam vipratiṣedhena iti uktam . tat upapannam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11628_1: . atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham na tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11628_2: . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat pūrvagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11628_3: saptamyaḥ tadantasaptamyaḥ bhavanti iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . upottamam
GS24pmbhasuu:11628_4: riti ridantasya . caṅi anyatarasyām caṅantasya . yadi etat jñāpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11629: caturaḥ śasi iti śasantasya api prāpnoti . śasgrahaṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . itarathā hi tatra eva ayam brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11630_0: ūḍidampadādyappumraidyubhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ ca iti . atha pidgrahaṇam kimartham . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11630_1: mā bhūt . jāgrati. na etat asti prayojanam . bhavati eva atra pūrveṇa . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11631: bhaviṣyati . lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvād vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ svarasandhim prati na sthānivat iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11633_0: yaki rapare upasaṅkhyānamkartavyam . stīryate svayam eva . upadeśavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11633_1: . upadeśe iti vaktavyam . upadeśavacane janādīnām . upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11633_2: na sidhyati . jayate svayam eva . jāyate svayam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:11634: yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ajantānām kartṛyaki vā
GS24pmbhasuu:11635: ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . cīyate svayam eva . ciyate svayam eva . jayate svayam eva . jāyate svayam eva . tataḥ upadeśe . upadeśe ca ajantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11636_0: kartṛyaki vā ādiḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . stīryate svayam eva . stīryate svayam eva . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11636_1: tarhi upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na hi antareṇa upadeśagrahaṇam yogāṅgam jāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11636_2: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11637: tāsyanudāttenṅidadupadeśāt lasārvadhātukam anudāttam ahnviṅoḥ iti . nanu ca uktam upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11638: na evam vijñāyate upadeśavacane janādīnām svaraḥ na sidhyati iti . katham tarhi . janādīnām api āttve upadeśavacanam kartavyam . tat tarhi tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11639: upadeśagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . anudāttopadeśavanatitanotyādīnām anunāsikalopaḥ jhali kṅiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11641: thali iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyeta . iṭ antaḥ vā iti ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta papaktha . na etat asti prayojanam . acaḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam yayātha iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11642_0: (P_6,1.204) KA_III.116.3-21 Ro_IV.527-528 kimartham idam ucyate na ñniti ādiḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:11642_1: iti eva siddham . ñniti iti ucyate na ca atra ñnitam paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11642_2: . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇapratiṣedhaḥ . aṅgādhikāroktasya saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11642_3: na lumatā aṅgasya iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati upamānasya ādyudāttavacanam jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11643_1: jñāpakārtham kriyate . kim jñāpyate . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anubandhalakṣaṇe svare
GS24pmbhasuu:11643_2: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . gargaḥ , vatsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11644_0: , vāmarajjuḥ : ñniti iti ādyudāttatvam mā bhūt iti . iha ca : atrayaḥ iti : taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11644_1: kitaḥ iti antodāttatvam na bhavati . yadi anubandhalakṣaṇe iti ucyate pathipriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11645_0: ādyudāttatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ jñāpayati svare pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11645_1: iti . evam api sarpiḥ āgaccha , sapta āgacchata iti : āmantritasya ca iti ādyudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11646: ma hi datām , ma hi dhatām : ādiḥ sicaḥ anyatarasyām iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ saptamīnirdiṣṭe svare
GS24pmbhasuu:11647: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api sarvastomaḥ , sarvapṛṣṭhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:11648: sarvasya supi iti ādyudāttatvam na prāpnoti . astu tarhi anubandhalakṣaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11649: iti eva . katham pathipriyaḥ , mathipriyaḥ . vaktavyam eva etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:11650: pathimathoḥ sarvanāmasthāne luki lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11651: (P_6,1.205) KA_III.116.23-117.12 Ro_IV.529-530 niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ . niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11652: dattābhyām , guptābhyām . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11653_0: kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ atra dīrghaḥ , antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11653_1: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . antareṇa pratiṣedham antareṇa ca etām paribhāṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:11653_2: siddham . katham . na evam vijñāyate na cet ākārāntā
GS24pmbhasuu:11654_0: niṣṭhā iti . katham tarhi . na cet ākārāt parā niṣṭhā iti . yadi evam nirdeśaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11654_1: eva na upapadyate . na hi eṣā ākārāt parā pañcamī yuktā . iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11654_2: , rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi na cet avarṇāt parā niṣṭhā iti . bhavet nirdeśaḥ upapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11654_3: . iha tu prāpnoti . āptaḥ , rāddhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11655: iha ca na prāpnoti . yataḥ , rataḥ . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11656: akāragrahaṇam . na cet akārārāntāt vihitā niṣṭhā iti . evam api dattaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11657_0: atra na prāpnoti iha ca prāpnoti . āptaḥ , rāddhaḥ iti . evam tarhi kāryiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11657_1: akāragrahaṇam . na cet ākārāraḥ kāryī bhavati . evam api adya aṣṭaḥ , kadā aṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11657_2: , atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11658: niṣṭhāyām yañi dīrghatve pratiṣedhaḥ , na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11659_0: (P_6,1.207) KA_III.117.14-19 Ro_IV.530 kim nipātyate . āśite kartari nipātanam upadhādīrhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11659_1: ādyudāttatvam ca . āśitaḥ iti ktaḥ kartari nipātyate upadhādīrhatvam . āśitavān āśitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11660: ādyudāttatvam anipātyam . adhikārāt siddham . upadhādīrhatvam anipātyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11661: āṅpūrvasya prayogaḥ . yadi evam avagrahaḥ prāpnoti . na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ . padkāraiḥ nāma lakṣaṇam anuvartyam . yathālakṣaṇam padam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11662_0: (P_6,1.208, 215) KA_III.117.22-118.3 Ro_IV.531 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:11662_1: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām upamānam , niṣṭhā ca dvyac
GS24pmbhasuu:11662_2: anāt iti nitye prāpte ārambhaḥ tata prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte . veṇuriktayoḥ aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:11663: prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . veṇuḥ iva veṇuḥ . riktaḥ nāma kaḥ cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:11665: riti pūrvam iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . matoḥ pūrvam āt
GS24pmbhasuu:11666: sañjñāyām striyām iti atra pūrvagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . evam tarhi upottamagrahaṇam uttarārtham . caṅi anyatarasyām upottamam iti eva . iha mā bhūt . mā hi sma dadhat .

GS24pmbhasuu:11667_1: ucyate . vatyāḥ iti iyati ucyamāne rājavatī , atra api prasajyeta . atha avatyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11667_2: iti ucyamāne kasmāt eva atra na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11668: asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ avatīśabdaḥ . kaḥ tarhi .

GS24pmbhasuu:11671: cusvaraḥ ataddhite iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . dādhīcaḥ , mādhūcaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11672: tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . pratyayasvaraḥ atra bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11673: bhaviṣyati . sthānāntaraprāptaḥ cusvaraḥ . pratyayasvarasya apavādaḥ anudāttau suppitau iti . anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11674: udāttanivṛttisvarasya cusvaraḥ . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta . na atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11675_0: kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt . na eṣaḥ udāttanivṛttisvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11675_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11675_2: dadhīcaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:11676: tṛtīyādilakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham ṣiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi . yena kena cit
GS24pmbhasuu:11677_0: lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedham . yadi vibhaktisvarasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11677_1: vṛkṣavān , plakṣavān atra na prāpnoti . matubgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva
GS24pmbhasuu:11677_2: prakṛtam . hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti . yadi tat anuvartate vetasvān iti atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11677_3: . matubgrahaṇam anuvartate ḍmatup ca eṣaḥ . yadi tari matubgrahaṇe ḍmatupaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11678: atra vatvam na prāpnoti . sāmānyagrahaṇam vatve iha punaḥ viśiṣṭasya grahaṇam . yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti dadhīcī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11679_0: udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:11679_1: kumārī iti . satiśiṣṭaḥ khalu api cusvaraḥ . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra asya
GS24pmbhasuu:11680: akāralope nakāralope ca . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate coḥ ataddhite iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11681_1: . samāsāntodāttatve vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : rājadṛṣat, brāhmaṇasamit
GS24pmbhasuu:11681_2: . halsvaraprāptau vā vyañjanam avidyamānavat . atha vā halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11681_3: avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11681_4: na halsvaraprāptau avidyamānavat iti eva ucyate svaraprāptau vyañjanam avidyamānavat
GS24pmbhasuu:11681_5: bhavati iti vā . dvirbaddham subaddham bhavati iti . yadi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11681_6: avidyamānavat iti ucyate dadhi , udāttāt anudāttasya svaritaḥ iti svaritatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11682_0: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11682_1: prayojanāni . prayojanam lidādyudāttāntodāttvidhayaḥ . liti pratyayāt pūrvam udāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:11682_2: bhavati iti iha eva syāt : bhaurikividham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11683_0: bhaulikividham . cikīrṣakaḥ , jihīrṣakaḥ iti atra na syāt . ñniti ādiḥ nityam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11683_1: iha eva syāt : ahicumbukāyaniḥ , āgniveśyaḥ . gārgyaḥ , kṛtiḥ iti atra na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11683_2: dhātoḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati iti iha eva syāt ūrṇoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11684: pacati iti atra na syāt . idam tāvat yat ucyate halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11685_0: avidyamānavat bhavati iti katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt . tat ca api bruvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:11685_1: udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam . tathā anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11685_2: tat vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11686_0: yadi punaḥ svaravidhau vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyeta . atha svaravidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11686_1: vyañjanam avidyamānavat bhavati iti ucyamāne anudāttādeḥ antodāttāt ca yat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11686_2: tat kim siddham bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca . bāḍham siddham . katham . svaravidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11687: : svareṇa vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ , svarasya vidhiḥ svaravidhiḥ iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . udaśvitvān ghoṣaḥ , vidyutvān balāhakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11688_0: hrasvanuḍbhyām matup iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . astu tarhi halsvaraprāptau vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11688_1: avidyamānavat bhavati iti . nanu ca uktam katham hi halaḥ nāma svaraprāptiḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11689_0: atra ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam ajgrahaṇam nivṛttam . tasmin nivṛtte halaḥ api svaraprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11689_1: bhavati . yat api ucyate udāttāt ca svaravidhau iti vaktavyam iti . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11689_2: . na idam pāribhāṣikasya anudāttasya grahaṇam . kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam . avidyamānodāttam
GS24pmbhasuu:11690: . yat api ucyate tat vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca na prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11691_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati siddham tat bhavati vyañjanādeḥ vyañjanāntāt ca iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:11691_1: ayam na uttarapade anudāttādau iti uktvā apṛthivīrudralkpūṣamanthiṣu iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:11691_2: śāsti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11691_3: bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā yat ayam yataḥ anāvaḥ iti nāvaḥ pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11693: bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt . sukṛt ācāryaḥ samāsāntodāttatve prāpte bahuvrīhisvaram apavādam śāsti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11694_0: prayojanam . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . nañsubhyām iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11694_1: . nañsubhyām eva bahuvrīheḥ antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati na anyasya iti . evam api kutat
GS24pmbhasuu:11694_2: etat pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ parasya iti . parasya śitiśāsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11694_3: . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . śiteḥ eva na anyataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11694_4: yat tāvat ucyate nañsubhyām niyamārtham iti kṣepe vidhiḥ nañaḥ asiddhaḥ . udarāśveṣuṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11695: etasmin prāpte tataḥ etat ucyate . yat api ucyate parasya śitiśāsanāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11696: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . parasya eṣaḥ niyamaḥ syāt . śiteḥ nityābahvac iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11697: . yadi pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram samāsāntodāttatvam bādhate capriyaḥ vāpriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11698: , atra api prāpnoti . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . antodāttatvam cavāpriye siddham . kutaḥ . sambhavāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11699: asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11700_0: tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave
GS24pmbhasuu:11700_1: dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:11700_2: samāsāntodāttatvam bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi prakṛtāt vidheḥ . bahuvrīhau prkṛtyā pūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:11700_3: prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti . kim ca prakṛtam . udāttaḥ iti ca vartate . evam api kāryapriyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11700_4: , hāryapriyaḥ , atra na prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11701: atha vā svaritagrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . tit svaritam iti . bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . antareṇa api bahuvrīhigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11702_0: siddham . tatpuruṣe kasmāt na bhavati . tatpuruṣe tulyārthatṛtīyāsaptamyupamānāvyayadvitīyākṛtyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11702_1: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvigau tarhi kasmāt na bhavati . igante dvigau
GS24pmbhasuu:11702_2: iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . dvandve tarhi prāpnoti . rājanyabahuvacanadvandve
GS24pmbhasuu:11702_3: andhakavṛṣṇiṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . avyayībhāve tarhi prāpnoti . paripratyupāpāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11702_4: varjyamānāhorātrāvayaveṣu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . evam api kutaḥ etat evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11703_0: tatpuruṣādiṣu iti na punaḥ evam niyamaḥ syāt eteṣām tatpuruṣādiṣu eva iti . iṣṭataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11703_1: ca avadhāraṇam . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam bhaviṣyati . eteṣām tarhi bahuvrīheḥ ca paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11703_2: prāpnoti . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca paryāyaḥ na prakalpate . yat ayam dvitribhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11703_3: pāddanmūrdhasu bahuvrīhau diṣṭivitasyoḥ ca iti siddhe paryāye paryāyam śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:11703_4: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na paryāyaḥ bhavati iti . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . udātte etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11704_0: syāt . svaritena samāviśet . svaritena samāveśaḥ prāpnoti . svarite api udāttaḥ asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11704_1: . bahuvrīhisvaram śāsti samāsāntavidheḥ sukṛt . nañsubhyām niyamārtham tu . parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11705: parasya niyamaḥ bhavet . antaḥ cavāpriye sambhavāt . prakṛtāt vidheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11706: bahuvrīhau ṛte siddham . iṣṭataḥ ca avadhāraṇam . dvipāddiṣṭeḥ vitasteḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11707: paryāyaḥ na prakalpate . udātte jñāpakam tu etat . svaritena samāviśet .
GS24pmbhasuu:11708_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . tatpuruṣe vibhaktiprakṛtisvaratve karmadhāraye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11708_2: . paramam kārakam paramakārakam paramena kārakeṇa paramakārakeṇa , parame kārake
GS24pmbhasuu:11708_3: paramakārake . siddham tu lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva grahaṇāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11708_4: etat . katham . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam yaḥ dvitīyātṛtīyāsaptamīsamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11708_5: tasya grahaṇam lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . avyaye parigaṇanam kartavyam . avyaye nañkunipātānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11708_6: . avyaye nañkunipātānām iti vaktavyam . nañ . abrāhmaṇaḥ , avṛṣalaḥ . nañ
GS24pmbhasuu:11709: . ku . kubrāhmaṇaḥ , kuvṛṣalaḥ . ku . nipāta . niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nirvārāṇasiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11710: . kva mā bhūt . snātvākālakaḥ , pītvāsthirakaḥ . ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11711: ktvāyām vā pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ , pītvāsthirakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11712: ubhayam na vaktavyam . nipātanāt siddham . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . avaśyam atra samāsārtham lyababhāvārtham ca nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11713: kartavyam . tena eva yatnena svaraḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11714: (P_6,2.11) KA_III.123.23-124.12 Ro_IV.544 sadṛśagrahaṇam anarthakam tṛtīyāsamāsavacanāt . sadṛśagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .

GS24pmbhasuu:11715_1: prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti eva siddham . ṣaṣṭhyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . pituḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11715_2: sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti . ṣaṣṭhyartham iti cet tṛtīyāsamāsavacanānarthakyam . ṣaṣṭhyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11716_0: tṛtīyāsamāsavacanam anarthakam syāt . kim kāraṇam . iha asmābhiḥ traiśabdyam sādhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11716_1: . pitrā sadṛśaḥ pituḥ sadṛśaḥ pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti . tatra dvayoḥ śabdayoḥ samānārthayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11717: aviravikanyāyena . tat yathā aveḥ māṃsam iti vigṛhya avikaśabdāt utpattiḥ bhavati , āvikam iti evam pituḥ sadṛśaḥ iti vigṛhya pitṛsadṛśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11718: bhaviṣyati pitrā sadṛśaḥ iti vigṛhya vākyam eva . avaśyam tṛtīyāsamāsaḥ vaktavyaḥ yatra ṣaṣṭhyarthaḥ na asti tadartham . bhojanasadṛśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11719: adhayayanasadṛśaḥ iti . yadi tarhi tasya nibandhanam asti tat eva vaktavyam idam na vaktavyam . idam api avaśyam vaktavyam yatra ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:11721: (P_6,2.29) KA_III.124.14-19 Ro_IV.545 igantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇguṇayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . igantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇguṇayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11722: pañcāratnyaḥ , daśāratanyaḥ . yaṇguṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11723: svaraḥ na prāpnoti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgau yaṇguṇau . antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11725: (P_6,2.33) KA_III.124.21-125.8 Ro_IV.545-546 paripratyupāpebhyaḥ vanam samāse vipratiṣedhena . paripratyupāpebhyaḥ vanam samāse iti etat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_0: vipratiṣedhena . paripratyupāpāḥ varjyamānāhorātāvayaveṣu iti asya avakāśaḥ paritrigartam,
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_1: parisauvīram . vanam samāse iti asya avakāśaḥ pravaṇe yaṣṭavyam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11726_2: parivanam apavanam . vanam samāse iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā vanasyāndodāttatvavacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11727: tadapavādanivṛttyartham . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11728_0: vanasyāndodāttatvavacanam tadapavādanivṛttyartham . siddham atra antodāttatvam utsargeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11728_1: eva . tasya punarvacane etat prayojanam . ye anye tadapavādāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11728_2: . saḥ yathā eva tadapavādam avyayasvaram bādhate evam idam api bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_0: pūrvapadatvāt sandehaḥ . ācāryopasarjane anekasya api pūrvapadatvāt sandehaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_1: . āpiśalapāṇinīyavyāḍīyagautamīyāḥ . ekam padam varjayitvā sarvāṇi pūrvapadāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:11730_2: tatra na jñāyate kasya pūrvapadasya prakṛtisvareṇa bhavitavyam iti . lokavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11731: amīṣām brāhmaṇānām pūrvam ānaya iti yaḥ sarvapūrvaḥ saḥ ānīyate evam iha api yat sarvapūrvapadam tasya prakṛtisvaratvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11733_0: uttarapade pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvam ucyate na karmadhāraye aniṣṭhā iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11733_1: . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . śreṇyādisamāse evat tat iha mā bhūt , mahāniraṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11735: kuruvṛjyoḥ gārhapate iti vaktavyam . kurugārhapatam , vṛjigāṛhapatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11736: kurugārhapatariktarurvasūtajaratyaślīladṛḍharūpāpārevaḍavātailikadrūḥpaṇyakamabalaḥ dāsībhārādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . devahūtiḥ , devanītiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11737: , vasunītiḥ , oṣadhiḥ , candramāḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11739: kurugārhapatariktarurvasūtajaratyaślīladṛḍharūpāpārevaḍavātailikadrūḥpaṇyakamabalaḥ iti . tataḥ dāsībhārāṇām ca iti . tatra bahuvacananirdeśāt dāsībhārādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:11740: iti vijñāsyate . paṇyakambalaḥ sañjñāyām . paṇyakambalaḥ sañjñāyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11741: vaktavyam . yaḥ paṇitavyaḥ kambalaḥ paṇyakambalaḥ eva asau bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11742: aparaḥ āha : paṇyakambalaḥ eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . paṇyagavaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11745: kāntārātītaḥ , yojanātītaḥ . ahīne dvitīyā anupasarge . ahīne dvitīyā anupasarge iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sukhaprāptaḥ , duḥkhaprāptaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11746: tat tarhi vaktavyam . yadi api etat ucyate atha vā etarhi ahīnagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11747: kariṣyate . iha api kāntārātītaḥ , yojanātītaḥ iti anupasarge iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:11749: . iha mā bhūt . abhyuddhṛtam , upasamāhṛtam . gateḥ anantaragrahaṇam anarthakam gatiḥ gatau anudāttavacanāt . gateḥ anantaragrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11750: . kim kāraṇam . gatiḥ gatau anudāttavacanāt . gatau parataḥ gateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11751: anudāttatvam ucyate . tat bādhakam bhaviṣyati . tatra yasya aprakṛtisvaratvam tasmāt antodāttaprasaṅgaḥ. tatra yasya gateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11752: aprakṛtisvaratvam tasmāt antodāttatvam prāpnoti antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti . prakṛtisvaravacanāt hi ananodāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11753: prakṛtisvaravacanasāmarthyāt hi antodāttatvam na bhaviṣyati . yadi hi syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11754_0: prakṛtisvaravacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . prakṛtisvaravacanam kimartham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:11754_1: ekagatyartham . prakṛtisvaravacanam kimartham iti cet ekagatyartham . yatra ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11754_2: gatiḥ tadartham etat syāt . prakṛtam , prahṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11755: . evamartham eva tarhi anantagrahaṇam kartavyam atra yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11756_0: kriyamāṇe api vai anantagrahaṇe atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . gatiḥ anantaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11756_1: pūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram bhavati iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra gatiḥ anantaraḥ na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:11756_2: pūrvapadam yaḥ ca pūrvapadam na asau anantaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11757: apūrvapadārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . apūrvapadasya api gateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11758: prakṛtisvaratvam yathā syāt . apūrvapadārtham iti cet kārake atiprasaṅgaḥ .apūrvapadārtham iti cet kārake atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . āgataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11759: dūrādāgataḥ . saḥ yathā eva gatipūrvapadasya bhavati evam
GS24pmbhasuu:11760: kārakapūrvapadasya api prāpnoti . siddham tu gateḥ antodāttāprasaṅgāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11761_0: siddham etat . katham .yat tat gateḥ antodāttāprasaṅgāt antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:11761_1: iti etat gateḥ na prasaṅktavyam . kim kṛtam bhavati . kṛtsvarāpavādaḥ ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11761_2: . tatra gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ prakṛtam , prahṛtam . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:11761_3: iti asya avakāśaḥ , dūrādgataḥ , dūrādyātaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āgataḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11762_0: dūrādāgataḥ . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11762_1: gateḥ tat prasaṅktavyam bhedaḥ prabhedaḥ iti evamartham . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11762_2: kariṣyate . antaḥ thāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām iti . tataḥ ktaḥ . ktāntam uttarapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:11762_3: antodāttam bhavati . atra kārakopapadagrahaṇam . anuvartate gatigrahaṇam nivṛttam
GS24pmbhasuu:11762_4: . atha vā upariṣṭād yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti sūpamānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_0: ktaḥ , sañjñāyām anācitādīnām , pravṛddhādīnām ca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi kārakāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_1: kārakāt ca ktāntam uttarapadam antodāttam bhavati . tataḥ dattaśrutayoḥ eva āśiṣi
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_2: kārakāt iti . evam ca kṛtvā na arthaḥ anantagrahaṇena . katham abhyuddhṛtam . ut
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_3: haratikriyam viśinaṣṭi . udā viśiṣṭam abhiḥ viśinaṣṭi . . tatra gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_4: ca prāpnoti gatiḥ gatau iti ca . gatiḥ anantaraḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ prakṛtam prahṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_5: . gatiḥ gatau iti asya avakāśaḥ abhi ut harati , upa sam ā dadhāti . iha ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_6: prāpnoti , abhyuddhṛtam , upasamāhṛtam . gatiḥ gatau iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11763_7: .evam tarhi siddhe sati yat anantaragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:11764: iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . avataptenakulasthitam te etat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11765: udakeviśīrṇam te etat . sagatikena sanakulena samāsaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11767: yathā takārādigrahṇam kṛdviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . takārādau niti kṛti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11768: atha akriyamāṇe kṛdgrahaṇe kasya takārādigrahṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11769_0: uttarapadaviśeṣaṇam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt prataritā prataritum . iha na
GS24pmbhasuu:11769_1: syāt prakartā prakartum . tādau niti kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam . tādau niti kṛdgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11769_2: anarthakam . kriyamāṇe api kṛdgrahaṇe aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum . takārādau uttarapade
GS24pmbhasuu:11769_3: niti kṛti iti . akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . nit yaḥ takārādiḥ tadante uttarapade iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11769_4: yāvatā kriyamāṇe api aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam akriyamāṇe eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11770: kṛdupadeśe vā tādyartham iḍartham .kṛdupadeśe tarhi tādyartham iḍartham
GS24pmbhasuu:11771: kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛdupadeśe yaḥ takārādiḥ iti evam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:11772: . kim prayojanam . iḍartham . iḍādau api siddham bhavati . pralavitā pralavitum .
GS24pmbhasuu:11773_1: . anigantaprakṛtisvaratve yaṇādeśe prakṛtisvarabhāvaḥ prāpnoti . pratyaṅ pratyañcau
GS24pmbhasuu:11773_2: pratyañcaḥ anigantavacanam idānīm kimartham syāt . anigantavacanam kimartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11773_3: cet ayaṇādiṣṭārtham . ayaṇādiṣṭārtham etat syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11773_4: na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11774: bhavati iti . yatra tarhi añcateḥ akāraḥ lupyate : pratīcaḥ pratīicā .
GS24pmbhasuu:11775: cusvaraḥ tatra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam eva iṣyate . vakṣyati hi etat :
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_0: coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti . yat tarhi nyadhyoḥ prakṛtisvaram śāsti . eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_1: hi yaṇādiṣṭārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . etat api ayaṇādiṣṭārtham eva syāt . yadā yaṇādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_2: . kadā ca yaṇādeśaḥ na . yādā śākalam . uktam vā . kim uktam . samāse śākalam na
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_3: bhavati iti . yatra tarhi añcateḥ akāraḥ lupyate . adhīcaḥ adhīcā . cusvaraḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_4: bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ayam eva iṣyate . vakṣyati he etat coḥ anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_5: iti . yat tarhi neḥ eva prakṛtisvaram śāsti . eṣaḥ hi yaṇādiṣṭārthaḥ ārambhaḥ . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_6: api ayaṇādiṣṭārtham eva syāt . katham . akṛte yaṇādeśa pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:11776_7: udāttasvaritoḥ yaṇaḥ svaritaḥ vā anudāttasya iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . nyaṅ
GS24pmbhasuu:11779: vapratyaye . cusvarāt anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . cusvarasya avakāśaḥ dadhīcaḥ paśya . dadhīcā dadhīce .
GS24pmbhasuu:11780: anigantaḥ añcatau vapratyaye iti asya avakāśaḥ parāṅ parāñcau parāñcaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11781_0: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . avācā , avāce . avakāśaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11781_1: na vā cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini pratiṣedhāt itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11781_2: . na vā etat vipratiṣedhena api sidhyati . katham tarhi sidhyati . cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini
GS24pmbhasuu:11781_3: pratiṣedhāt cursvaraḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvinaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11781_4: cusvaraḥ . akriyamāṇe hi pratiṣedhe sarvāpavādaḥ ayam cusvaraḥ . katham . pratyayasvarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11782_0: anudāttau suppitau iti asya udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ . udāttanivṛttisvarasya cusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11782_1: . saḥ yathā eva udāttanivṛttisvaram bādhate evam anigantasvaram api bādheta . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:11782_2: tāvat saṅkhyātaḥ sāmyam ayam api caturthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11784_0: kṛtsvarasya ayam . ubhayoḥ caturthayoḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . satiśiṣṭaḥ tarhi cusvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11784_1: . katham . cau iti ucyate . yatra asya etat rūpam . ajādau asarvanāmasthāne abhinirvṛtte
GS24pmbhasuu:11784_2: akāralope nakāralope ca . tasmāt suṣthu ucyate na vā cusvarasya pūrvapadaprakṛtisvarabhāvini
GS24pmbhasuu:11784_3: pratiṣedhāt itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ iti . vibhaktīṣatsvarāt kṛtsvaraḥ . vibhaktisvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11784_4: īṣatsvarāt ca kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . vibhaktisvarasya avakāśaḥ akṣaśauṇḍaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11784_5: , strīśauṇḍaḥ . kṛtsvarasya avakāśaḥ , idhmapravraścanaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti pūrvāhṇesphoṭakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11785: īṣatsvarasya avakāśaḥ , īṣatkaḍāraḥ , īṣatpiṅgalaḥ . kṛtsvarasya saḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:11786: iha ubhayam prāpnoti , īṣadbhedaḥ . kṛtsvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11787: citsvarāt hārisvaraḥ . citsvarāt hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11788: citsvarasya avakāśaḥ , calanaḥ , copanaḥ . hārisvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11789: yājñikāśvaḥ , vaiyākaraṇahasī . iha ubhayam prāpnoti , pitṛgavaḥ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11790: mātṛgavaḥ . hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṛtsvarāt ca . kṛtsvarāt ca hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kṛtsvarasya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11791: idhmapravraścanaḥ . hārisvarasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11792: akṣahṛtaḥ , vāḍavahṛtaḥ . hārisvaraḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na vā haraṇapratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ kṛtsvarābhādhakatavsya . na vā arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11793_0: vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . haraṇapratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ kṛtsvarābhādhakatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11793_1: . yat ayam aharaṇe iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na kṛtsvaraḥ hārisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:11794: jñāpakam . anaḥ bhāvakarmavacanaḥ iti etasmin prāpte tata etat ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11795: yadi evam sādhīyaḥ jñāpakam . kṛtsvarasya apavādaḥ anaḥ bhāvakarmavacanaḥ iti . bādhakam kila bādhate kim punaḥ tam . yuktasvaraḥ ca kṛtsvarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11797: aśvavallavaḥ . kṛtsvarasya saḥ eva. iha ubhayam prāpnoti , gosaṅkhyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11800_0: śabdārthaprakṛtau eva iti iyati ucyamāne pūrveṇa atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā niyamaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:11800_1: vijñāyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha na syāt . puṣphārī phalahārī . upamānagrahaṇe punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11800_2: kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha śabdārthagrahaṇam kimartham . upamānam prakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:11800_3: eva iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta . vṛkavañcī vṛkaprekṣī . śabdāṛthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11801_0: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha prakṛtigrahaṇam kimartham . śabdārthaprakṛtiḥ eva yaḥ nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:11801_1: tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . kokilabhivyāhārī . atha evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ . niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11801_2: . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakāram niyamāṛthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11801_3: bhaviṣyati . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyete : upamānam śabdārthaprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:11801_4: eva iti . mā evam vijñāyīta : upamānam eva śabdārthaprakṛtau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11802: śabdārthaprakṛtau hi upamānam ca anupamānam ca ādyudāttam iṣyate :
GS24pmbhasuu:11804_0: (P_6,2.82) KA_III.132.2-6 Ro_IV.562 je dīrghāt bahvacaḥ . je dīrghāntasya ādiḥ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11804_1: bhavati iti etasmāt anytāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . je dīrghāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11805: asya avakāśaḥ kuṭījaḥ , śamījaḥ . anytāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11806: upasarajaḥ , mandurajaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āmalakījaḥ , balabhījaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11807: anytāt pūrvam bahvacaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11808: (P_6,2.91) KA_III.132.8-10 Ro_IV.562 ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . ādyudāttaprakaraṇe divodāsādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11809: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . divodāsāya gāyata vadhryaśvāya dāśuṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:11811: guṇāt kārtsnye iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta paramaśuklaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11812_0: paramakṣṛṇa iti . sarvagrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha guṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11812_1: kimartham . sarvam kārtsnye iti iyati ucyamāne iha api prasajyeta sarvasauvarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11813_0: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha kārtsnyagrahaṇam kimartham . sarvam guṇe iti iyati ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:11813_1: iha api prasajyeta sarveṣām śvetaḥ sarvaśvetaḥ iti . katham ca atra samāsaḥ . ṣaṣṭhīsubantena
GS24pmbhasuu:11813_2: samasyate iti . guṇena na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . guṇāt tareṇa samāsaḥ taralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11814: taralopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . sarveṣām śvetataraḥ sarvaśvetaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11815: (P_6,2.105) KA_III.133.2-5 Ro_IV.563-564 ayuktaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ . na hi uttarapadam nāma vṛddhiḥ asti . katham tarhi nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11816: vṛddhimati uttarapade iti . saḥ tarhi tathā nirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . na evam vijñāyate . uttarapadam vṛddhiḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11817: uttarapadavṛddhau iti . katham tarhi . uttarapadasya vṛddhiḥ asmin saḥ ayam uttarapadavṛddhiḥ , uttarapadavṛddhau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11819: sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ .bahuvrīhau viśvasya antodāttāt sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11820_0: mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . bahuvrīhau viśvam sañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:11820_1: iti asya avakāśaḥ , viśvadevaḥ , viśvayaśāḥ . sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti asya
GS24pmbhasuu:11820_2: avakāśaḥ kulamitram , kulājinam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti viśvamitraḥ , viśvājinaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11820_3: sañjñāyām mitrājinayoḥ antaḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . antodāttaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11821: upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttaprakaraṇe marudvṛdhādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . marudvṛdhaḥ suvayāḥ upatasthe .
GS24pmbhasuu:11823: udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti etasmāt nañsubhyām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11824: . udarāśveṣuṣu kṣepe iti asya avakāśaḥ kuṇḍodaraḥ , ghaṭodaraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11825: nañsubhyām iti asya avakāśaḥ ayavaḥ , atilaḥ , amāṣaḥ , suyavaḥ , sutilaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11826: , sumāṣaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti , anudaraḥ , sūdaraḥ . nañsubhyām iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11827: (P_6,2.117) KA_III.133.22-134.3 Ro_IV.565 soḥ manasoḥ kapi . soḥ manasī alomoṣasī iti etasmāt kapi pūrvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11828: soḥ manasī alomoṣasī iti etasya avakāśaḥ suśarmāṇam adhi nāvam ruheyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11829: suśarmā asi supratiṣṭhānaḥ . susrotāḥ , supayāḥ , suvarcāḥ . kapi pūrvam iti asya avakāśaḥ ayavakaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti suśarmakaḥ , susrotakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11830: . kapi pūrvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11831_0: (P_6,2.121) KA_III.134.5-9 Ro_IV.565 pūrvādibhyaḥ kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam . pūrvādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11831_1: kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . paripratiupāpāḥ varyajānāhorātrāvayaveṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11831_2: iti asya avakāśaḥ paritrigatam , parisauvīram . kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11832: , atikūlam , anukūlam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti parikūlam , kūlādīnām ādyudāttatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11836: avyayayasvarāvakāśaḥ , niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nirvārāṇasiḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:11837: kucelam , kurājyam . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11838: (P_6,2.136) KA_III.19-21 Ro_IV.566 kuṇḍādyudāttatve tatsamudāyagrahaṇam . kuṇḍādyudāttatve tatsamudāyagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11839: vanasamudāyavācīcet kuṇḍaśabdaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11841: (P_6,2.139) KA_III.135.2-136.6 Ro_IV.566-570 gatikārakopapadāt iti kimartham . iha mā bhūt . paramam kārakam , paramakārakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11842_0: gatikārakopapadāt iti ucyamāne api tatra prāpnoti . etat hi kārakam . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:11842_1: . devadattasya kārakam , devadattakārakam . idam ca api udāharaṇam paramam kārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11842_2: , paramakārakam iti . na etat kārakam . kārakaviśeṣaṇam etat . yāvat brūyāt prakṛṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:11842_3: kārakam śobhanam kārakam iti tāvat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:11843: paramakārakam iti . atha kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11844: niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nivārāṇasiḥ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇānarthakyam anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11845: gatyādibhyaḥ prakṛtisvaratve kṛdgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11846: anyasya uttarapadasya abhāvāt . na hi anyat gatiyādibhyaḥ uttarapadam asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11847: anyat ataḥ kṛtaḥ . kim kāraṇam . dhātoḥ hi dvaye pratyayāḥ vidhīyante tiṅaḥ kṛtaḥ ca . tatra kṛtā saha samāsaḥ bhavati tiṅā ca na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11848: tatra antareṇa kṛdgrahaṇam kṛtaḥ eva bhaviṣyati . nanu ca idānīm eva udāhṛtam niṣkauśāmbiḥ , nirvārāṇasiḥ iti . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati
GS24pmbhasuu:11849: gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ na ca nisaḥ kauśāmbīśabdam prati kriyāyogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11850_0: kṛtprakṛtau vā gatitvāt adhikāṛtham kṛdgrahaṇam . kṛtprakṛtau tarhi gatitvāt adhikāṛtham
GS24pmbhasuu:11850_1: kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . kṛtprakṛtiḥ dhātuḥ . dhātum ca prati kriyāyogaḥ . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11850_2: tam prati iti iha eva syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11851: praṇīḥ , unnīḥ . iha na syāt . praṇāyakaḥ , unnāyakaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti na evam vijñāyate . yasya kriyā yatkriyā
GS24pmbhasuu:11852: yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti . katham tarhi yā
GS24pmbhasuu:11853: kriyā yatkriyā yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargsañjñe bhavataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11854: na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11855: kevalaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā kṛdadhikasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11856: nanu ca yayam tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ praṇīḥ iti . eṣaḥ api hi
GS24pmbhasuu:11857: kartṛviśiṣṭasya . ayam tarhi tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11858: tasmāt kṛdgrahaṇam kartavyam . yadi kṛdgrahaṇam kriyate āmante svaraḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:11859: prāpnoti . prapacatitarām , prajalpatitarām . asati punaḥ kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_0: kriyāpradhānam ākhyātam tasya atiśaye tarap utpadyate tarabantasya svārthe ām . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_1: yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam prati kriyāyogaḥ . na ca kaḥ cit kevalaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_2: śabdaḥ asti yaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ syāt . kevalaḥ tasya arthasya vācakaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_3: iti kṛtvā adhikasya bhaviṣyati . nanu ca yayam tasya eva arthasya vācakaḥ prabhavanam
GS24pmbhasuu:11860_4: iti . eṣaḥ api dravyaviśiṣṭasya . katham kṛdabhihitaḥ bhāvaḥ dravyavat bhavati kriyāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11863_0: udāttaḥ bhavati āhosvit uttarapadasya . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . ubhayam prakṛtam . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11863_1: anyatarat śakyam viśeṣayitum . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . antodāttatvam samāsasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11863_2: cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttatvam samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11863_3: . idametattadbhyaḥ prathamapūraṇayoḥ kriyāgaṇane kapi ca iti vaktavyam iha api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:11864: astu tarhi uttarapadasya . uttarapadāntodāttatve nañsubhyām samāsāntodāttatvam . uttarapadāntodāttatve nañsubhyām samāsāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11865_0: vaktavyam . anṛcaḥ , bahvṛcaḥ . aparaḥ āha : uttarapadāntodāttatve nañsubhyām samāsāntodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11865_1: vaktavyam . ajñakaḥ , asvakaḥ . kapi pūrvam iti asya apavādaḥ hrasvānte antyāt pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11866: pūrvaḥ udāttabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā utsargeṇa antodāttatvam prāpnoti . na vā kapi pūrvavacanam jñāpakam uttarapadānantodāttatvasya . na vā eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11867: doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . yat ayam kapi pūrvam iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11868: na uttarapadasya antaḥ udāttatḥ bhavati iti . prakaraṇāt ca samāsāntodāttatvam . prakṛtam samāsagrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11869: cau samāsasya iti . nanu ca uktam antodāttatvam samāsasya iti cet kapi upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uttarapadagrahaṇam api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11870: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . uttarapadādiḥ iti . tatra evam abhisambandhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11871: kariṣyate . nañsubhyām samāsasya antaḥ udāttaḥ bhavati . idametattadbhyaḥ prathamapūraṇayoḥ kriyāgaṇane uttarapadasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11873: pratiṣedhaḥ . kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ anāśiṣi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11874: anāhataḥ nadati devadattaḥ . siddham tu ubhayaniyamāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:11875: katham . ubhayaniyamāt . ubhayataḥ niyamaḥ āśrayiṣyate . kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ eva āśiṣi. āśiṣi eva kārakāt dattaśrutayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11879: atideśaḥ kriyate na nañsubahubhyaḥ iti eva ucyeta . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_0: uttarapadabhūmni iti vakṣyati . tat bahoḥ eva yathā syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_1: . na etat asti prayojanam . ekayoge api hi sati yasya uttarapadabhūmā asti tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_2: bhaviṣyati . kasya ca asti . bahoḥ eva . idam tarhi prayojanam . na guṇādayaḥ avyavāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_3: iti vakṣyati . tat bahoḥ eva yathā syāt . nañsubhyām mā bhūt iti . etat api na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_4: prayojanam . ekayoge api sati yasya guṇādayaḥ avayavā santi tasya kasya ca santi
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_5: . bahoḥ eva . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadādyudāttārtham . bahoḥ nañvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11880_6: atideśaḥ kriayte uttarapadādyudāttārtham . uttarapadasya ādyudāttatvam yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11883: mukhasya antodāttatvāt . mukhasya antodāttatvāt upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . mukhāntodāttatvasya avakāśaḥ gauramukhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11884: , ślakṣṇamukhaḥ . upasargāt svāṅgam iti asya avakāśaḥ prasphik , prodaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11885_0: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . pramukhaḥ . upasargāt svāṅgam iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11885_1: . kaḥ punaḥ viśeṣaḥ tena vā sati anena vā . sāpavādakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ ayam punaḥ nirapavādakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11886_0: (P_6,2.185-186) KA_III.138.14-18 Ro_IV.576 kimartham idam ucyate na upasargāt svāṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:11886_1: dhruvam iti eva siddham . abheḥ mukham apāt ca adhruvārtham . adhruvārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11886_2: . abhuvrīhyartham vā . atha vā bahuvrīheḥ iti vartate . abhuvrīhyarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11887: (P_6,2.187) KA_III.138.20-139.2 Ro_IV.576 sphigapūtagrahaṇam kimartham na upasargāt svāṅgam dhruvam iti eva siddham . sphigapūtagrahaṇam ca . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11889_0: (P_6,2.191) KA_III.139.4-6 Ro_IV.576 ateḥ dhātulope . ateḥ dhātulope iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11889_1: . akṛtpade iti hi ucyamāne iha ca prasajyeta śobhanaḥ gārgyaḥ atigārgyaḥ , iha ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11891: mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam āhosvit nakārāntagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11892: . dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam cet nakārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11893_0: dvitribhyām mūrdhani akārāntagrahaṇam cet nakārāntasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11893_1: dvimūrdhā trimūrdhā . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam . nakārānte akārāntasya . nakārānte
GS24pmbhasuu:11894: trimūrdhaḥ . udāttalopāt siddham . astu tarhi nakārāntagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11895: antodāttatve kṛte lopaḥ udāttanivṛttisvareṇa siddham . idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11896: paratvāt lopaḥ . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . antodāttatvam kriyatām samāsāntaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt antodāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11897: nityaḥ samāsāntaḥ . kṛte api antodāttatve prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:11898_0: antodāttatvam api nityam . kṛte api samāsānte prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam antodāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:11898_1: . na hi kṛte samāsānte prāpnoti . paratvāt lopena bhavitavyam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11899: na ca samāsāntaḥ eva antodāttatvasya nimittam hanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram lopaḥ pratīkṣyaḥ . ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt antodāttatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11900: antodāttatve kṛte samāsāntaḥ , ṭilopaḥ . ṭilope kṛte udāttanivṛttisvareṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:11901_0: siddham . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum . nan u anena asandigdhena nakārāntasya grahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:11901_1: bhavitavyam yāvatā mūrdhasu iti ucyate . yadi hi akārāntasya grahaṇam syāt mūrdheṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11902: vicāraṇā . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ . vibhāṣā samāsāntaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11904: parādiḥ ca parāntaḥ ca pūrvāntaḥ ca dṛśyate .pūrvādayaḥ ca vidyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:11905: vyatayaḥ bahulam smṛtaḥ . antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnām chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:11906: upasaṅkhyānam . antodāttaprakaraṇe tricakrādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : tricakreṇa tribandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena .
GS24pmbhasuu:11907: (P_6,3.1.2) KA_III.141.12-142.9 Ro_IV.582-584 ekavat ca aluk bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . stokābhyām muktaḥ , stokebhyaḥ muktaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11908: vigṛhya stokānmuktaḥ iti eva yathā syāt . ekavadvcanam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11909_0: ekavadbhāvaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . dvibahvoḥ aluk kasmāt na bhavati . dvibahuṣu asamāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11909_1: . dvivacanabahuvacanānām asamāsaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi anucyamānaṃ gaṃsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11909_2: . uktam vā . kim uktam . anabhidhānāt iti . tat ca avaśyam anabhidhānam āśrayitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11910_0: . ekavadvacane hi goṣucare atiprasaṅgaḥ syāt : goṣucaraḥ . varṣābhyaḥ ca je . varṣābhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11910_1: ca je atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . varṣāsujaḥ . apaḥ yoniyanmatiṣu ca . apaḥ yoniyanmatiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:11910_2: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . je care ca . je care ca atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . yoni
GS24pmbhasuu:11910_3: . apsuyoniḥ . yat . apsavyam mati . apsumatiḥ . je . apsujaḥ . care . apsucaraḥ gahvareṣṭhāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11912: pañcamī draṣṭavyā . brāhmaṇāni śaṃsati iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsī . atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra pañcamyarthaḥ . brāhmaṇebhyaḥ gṛhītvā , āhṛtya āhṛtya śaṃsati iti brāhmaṇācchaṃsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11913: (P_6,3.3) KA_III.142.18-22 Ro_IV.585 añjasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . añjasaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . añjasākṛtam . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ vikṛtākṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11914: iti ca . puṃsānujaḥ januṣāndhaḥ vikṛtākṣaḥ iti ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11916_0: (P_6,3.5) KA_III.143.2-8 Ro_IV. 585-586 ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe . ātmanaḥ ca pūraṇe upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11916_1: kartavyam . ātmanāpañcamaḥ , ātmanādaśamaḥ . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā tṛtīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:11917: atha vā yuktaḥ eva atra tṛtīyārthaḥ . ātmanā kṛtam tat tasya yena asau
GS24pmbhasuu:11918: pañcamaḥ . katham janārdanaḥ tu ātmacaturthaḥ eva iti . bahuvrīḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11920: (P_6,3.7-8) KA_III.143.11-18 Ro_IV.586-587 ātmanebhāṣaparasmaibhāṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ātmanebhāṣaparasmaibhāṣayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11921_0: ātmanebhāṣaḥ , parasmaibhāṣaḥ . tat katham kartavyam . yadi vyākaraṇe bhavā vaiyākaraṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:11921_1: , vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā vaiyākaraṇakhyāyām iti . atha hi vaiyākaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:11921_2: ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . yadi api vyākaraṇe bhavā vaiyākaraṇī
GS24pmbhasuu:11921_3: , vaiyākaraṇī ākhyā vaiyākaraṇākhyā evam api na arthaḥ upasaṅkhyānena . vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11922: asti vacane prayojanam . kim . ātmanepadam . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam , śeṣāt kartari parasmaipadam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11923: (P_6,3.9) KA_III.143.20-144.17 Ro_IV.587-588 hṛddyubhyām ṅeḥ upasaṅkhyānam . hṛddyubhyām ṅeḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . hṛdispṛk ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11924_0: divispṛk . anyārthe ca . anyārthe ca eṣā saptamī draṣṭavyā . hṛdayam spṛśati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11924_1: hṛdispṛk . divam śprśati iti divispṛk . haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam . haladantādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:11925: . na kartavyam . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena . luk kriyatām avādeśaḥ iti avādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . avādeśe kṛte halantāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:11926_0: . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ . lukaḥ avādeśaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:11926_1: iti cet bhūmipāśe atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . bhūmyām pāśaḥ , bhūmipāśaḥ . akaḥ ataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11926_2: vā sandhyakṣarārtham . evam tarhi aviśeṣeṇa saptamyāḥ alukam uktvā akaḥ ataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11926_3: vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . akaḥ ataḥ iti eva bhavati na anyataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11926_4: . tena sandhyakṣarāṇām siddham bhavati . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11927: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam haladantādhikāre goḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:11928: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11929: gaviṣṭhiraśabdaḥ vidādiṣu paṭhyate . asakṛt khalu api nipātanam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11931: (P_6,3.10) KA_III.144.19-145.13 Ro_IV.589-591 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham ca aprāpte . yadi sañjñāyām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:11932: vartate tataḥ prāpte . atha nivṛttam tataḥ aprāpte . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_0: kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ . kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_1: atiprasaṅgaḥ bhavati . iha api prāpnoti . avikaṭe uraṇaḥ dātavyaḥ avikaṭoraṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_2: astu tarhi aprāpte . aprāpte samāsavidhānam . yadi aprāpte samāsaḥ vidheyaḥ . prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_3: punaḥ sati sañjñāyām iti eva samāsaḥ siddhaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_4: bhavati atra samāsaḥ iti yat ayam kāranāmni saptamyāḥ alukam śāsti . yadi api tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_5: jñāpakāt samāsaḥ syāt svaraḥ tu na sidhyati . yat hi tat saptamīpūrvapadam prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_6: bhavati iti lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam tat . na eva atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_7: anena svareṇa bhavitavyam . kim tarhi saptamīhāriṇau dharmye aharaṇe iti anena atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_8: svareṇa bhavitavyam .kim ca bhoḥ sañjñāḥ api loke kriyante na lokaḥ sañjñāsu pramāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11933_9: . loke ca kāranāma sañjñā . nanu ca uktam kāranāmni vāvacanārtham cet ajādau atiprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11934: . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . kāranāmni ca prācām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11935: tataḥ halādau . halādau ca kāranāmni saptamyāḥ aluk bhavati . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . halādau eva kāranāmni na anyatra . kva mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:11937: (P_6,3.11) KA_III.145.15-16 Ro_IV.591 gurau antāt ca . gurau antāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:11939: (P_6,3.13) KA_III.145.18-146.2 Ro_IV.591-592 svāṅgagrahaṇam anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate siddham hastebandhaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11940: hastabandhaḥ . cakrebhandaḥ , cakrabandhaḥ iti na sidhyati . atha nivṛttam siddham cakrebhandaḥ , cakrabandhaḥ . hastebandhaḥ , hastabandhaḥ iti na
GS24pmbhasuu:11941: sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11942: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra uttarapadādhikare tatpuruṣed kṛti
GS24pmbhasuu:11943: bahulam iti prāpte na insiddhabadhnātiṣu iti pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . tasmin nitye prāpte iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate . evam api na jñāyate kasmin viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:11944: vibhāṣā kasmin viṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ iti . ghañantasya idam bandhaśabdasya
GS24pmbhasuu:11945: grahaṇam pratiṣedhe punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam . ghañante vibhāṣā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_0: akarmadhāraye . tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam iti atra akarmadhāraye iti vaktavyam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_1: mā bhūt . parame kārake paramakārake iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . bahulavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11948_2: na bhaviṣyati . atha kimartham lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate na tatpuruṣe kṛti bahulam
GS24pmbhasuu:11949: lugaluganukramaṇam bahulavacanasya akṛtsnatvāt . lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate akṛtsnam bahulavacanam iti . yadi akṛtsnam yat anena kṛtam akṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:11950_0: tat . evam tarhi na brūmaḥ akṛtsnam iti . kṛtsnam ca kārakam ca sādhakam ca nirvartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:11950_1: ca . yat ca anena kṛtam suktṛtam tat . kimartham tarhi lugaluganukramaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11950_2: . udāharaṇabhūyastvāt . te khalu api vidhayaḥ suparigṛhītāḥ bhavanti yeṣu lakṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11950_3: prapañcaḥ ca . kevalam lakṣaṇam kevalaḥ prapañcaḥ vā na tathā kārakam bhavati . avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11951: idam vaktavyam bahulam anyatarasyām ubhayathā vā ekeṣām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11952: sarvavedapāṛiṣadam hi idam śāstram . tatra na ekaḥ panthāḥ śakya āsthātum
GS24pmbhasuu:11956: āmuṣyaputrikā . āmuṣyakulikā iti ca vaktavyam . āmuṣyakulikā .

GS24pmbhasuu:11959: śunolāṅgūlaḥ . divaḥ ca dāse . divaḥ ca dāse upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
