GS24pmbhasuu:11962: syāt , vyatikaraḥ mā bhūt . atha eṣām vyatikareṇa bhavitavyam . bāḍham bhavitavyam . hotuḥputraḥ , pituḥantevāsī .
GS24pmbhasuu:11963_0: (P_6,3.25.1) KA_III.147.14-18 Ro_IV.595 kva ayam nakāraḥ śrūyate . na kva cit śrūyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11963_1: . lopaḥ asya bhavati nalopaḥ prātipadikasya iti . yadi na śrūyate kimartham uccāryate
GS24pmbhasuu:11963_2: . raparatvam mā bhūt iti . kriyamāṇe api vai
GS24pmbhasuu:11964: nakāre raparatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nalope kṛte eṣaḥ api hi uḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11965: sthāne aṇ śiṣyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uḥ sthāne aṇ prasajymānaḥ eva raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11966: bhavati iti ucyate na ca ayam uḥ sthāne aṇ eva śiṣyate . kim tarhi aṇ ca anaṇ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:11968: vijñāyate : ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti āhosvit dvandve ṛkārasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11969: kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:11970_0: ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pitāputrau . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11970_1: . kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ bhavati . ṛkārāntānām dvandve na jñāyate kasya ānaṅā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:11970_2: iti . astu tarhi dvande ṛkārasya iti . aviśeṣeṇa pitṛpitāmahādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11971: bhavati . pitṛpitāmahau iti . astu tarhi ṛkārāntānām yaḥ dvandvaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11972: nanu ca uktam ṛkārāntānām dvandve putre upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11973_0: . putragrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . putre anyatarasyām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11973_1: yadi tat anuvartate vibhāṣā svasṛpatyoḥ putre ca iti putre api vibhāṣā prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:11974_0: ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11974_1: putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe . vibhāṣā svasṛpatyoḥ putre anyatarasyām ṣaṣṭhyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11975: putragrahaṇam anuvartate . ṣaṣṭhyāḥ ākrośe iti nivṛttam . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:11976_0: kāryī ca anirdiṣṭaḥ iti . kāryī ca nirdiṣṭaḥ . katham . uttarapade iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:11976_1: ṅit ca ayam kriyate . saḥ antareṇa api kāryinirdeśam ṛkārāntasya eva bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:11976_2: putre tarhi kāryī anirdiṣṭaḥ . putre ca kāryī nirdiṣṭaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11977: katham . ṛkāragrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ vidyāyonisambandhebhyaḥ . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:11978: arthaḥ . putre iti eṣā saptamī ṛtaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11981: pratiṣedhaḥ . devatādvandve ubhayatra vāyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11982: vāyvagnī , agnivāyū . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca . brahmaprajāpatyādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . brahmaprajāpatī , śivavaiśravaṇau , skandviśākhau
GS24pmbhasuu:11983: . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . dvandve iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:11984: punaḥ dvandragrahaṇasya etat prayojanam lokavedayoḥ yaḥ dvandvaḥ tatra yathā syāt . kaḥ ca lokavedayoḥ dvandvaḥ . vede ye sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ na ca ete sahanirvāpanirdiṣṭāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11985: (P_6,3.28) KA_III.149.4-5 Ro_IV.598 id vṛddhau viṣṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . id vṛddhau viṣṇoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . āgnāvaiṣṇavam carum nirvapet .
GS24pmbhasuu:11987: pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ ṛkārasya arārau nipātyete . mātarapitarau bhojayataḥ . mātarapitarau ānaya . a mā gantām pitarāmātarā ca a mā somaḥ amṛtatvaya
GS24pmbhasuu:11990_0: idam vijñāyate . samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam āhosvit kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam
GS24pmbhasuu:11990_1: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam iti garbhibhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11991: na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate kva cit bhāṣitapuṃskam iti droṇībhāryaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:11992_0: kuṭībhāryaḥ , pātrībhāryaḥ atra api prāpnoti . astu samānāyām ākṛtau yat bhāṣitapuṃskam
GS24pmbhasuu:11992_1: iti . katham garbhibhāryaḥ , prajātabhāryaḥ , prasūtabhāraḥ iti . kartavyaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:11992_2: yatnaḥ . atha kimartham ūṅaḥ pṛthak pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate na yatra eva anyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11992_3: tatra eva ayam ucyeta . na kopadhāyāḥ iti uktvā tataḥ ūṅaḥ ca iti ucyeta . tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:11992_4: api ayam arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . na evam śakyam . paṭhiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:11993: puṃvat karmadhāraye pratiṣiddhārtham iti . saḥ puṃvadbhāvaḥ yathā iha bhavati : kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā iti evam iha api syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:11994: brahmabandhūḥ vṛndārikā brahmabandūvṛndārikā iti . atha pṛthak pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:11995_0: api ucyamāne yāvatā saḥ pratiṣiddhārthaḥ ārambhaḥ kasmāt eva atra na bhavati . pṛthakpratiṣedhavacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:11995_1: . atha vā anūṅ iti tatra anuvartiṣyate . atha vā na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:11996: ayam yat anyat anūṅ iti . saḥ ca pratiṣedhāṛthaḥ ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:11998_0: puṃvadbhāve strīgrhaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam āhosvit strīśabdgrahaṇam āhosvit stryarthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:11998_1: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . puṃvadbhāve strīgrahaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam cet tatra puṃvat
GS24pmbhasuu:11999_0: . puṃvadbhāve strīgrahaṇam strīpratyayagrahaṇam cet tatra puṃvat iti uttarapade tatpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:11999_1: ayam vijñāyeta . kasya . strīpratyayasya pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ucyate strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12000_0: api kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12000_1: atidiśyeta . anārambhāt puṃsi . na hi kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat
GS24pmbhasuu:12000_2: samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya atidiśyeta . tatra kim anyat śakyam vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:12000_3: anyat ataḥ strīpratyayapratiṣedhāt . katham punaḥ puṃvat iti anena strīpratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_0: pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_1: samarthayitum . tat yathā . uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti . mātṛvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_2: asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi . evam iha api puṃvat bhavati puṃvat na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_3: vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe . yathā puṃsaḥ strīpratyayaḥ na bhavati evam samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_4: uttarapade bhāṣitapuṃskasya na bhavati iti . prātipadikasya ca pratyāpattiḥ . prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12001_5: ca pratyāpattiḥ vaktavyā . enī bhāryā asya , etabhāryaḥ , śyetabhāryaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12002_0: puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12002_1: . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena naśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . striyām iti ucyamānaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12003_0: paṭvībhārā asya paṭubhāryaḥ . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate . strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12003_1: . tasya sthānivabhāvāt yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti . kimartham idam ubhayam ucyate na prātipadikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12004: api coditaḥ syāt . purastāt idam ācāryeṇa dṛṣṭam sthānivatprasaṅgaḥ ca iti tat paṭhitam . tataḥ uttarakālam idam dṛṣṭam prātipadikasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12005: pratyāpattiḥ iti . tat api paṭhitam . na ca idānīm ācāryāḥ sūtrāṇi kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12006: nivartayanti . vataṇḍyādiṣu puṃvadvacanam . vataṇḍyādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ke punaḥ vataṇḍyādayaḥ . lugalugastrīviṣayadvistrīpratyayāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12007: luk . gārgyaḥ vṛndārikā gargavṛndārikā . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12008: strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ na śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi luk ucyate . luk . aluk .
GS24pmbhasuu:12009: vataṇḍī vṛndārikā vātaṇḍyavṛndārikā . puṃvadbhāvena kim kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12010_0: strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt luk striyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12010_1: vataṇḍāt iti yakārasya luk prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ ayam īkāre eva luk ucyeta . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:12010_2: īkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12010_3: . strī , ī strī , striyām . īkāravidhau vai apratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kriyate vataṇḍa
GS24pmbhasuu:12010_4: iti . śārṅgaravādau sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ vai sapratyayakasya pāṭhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12010_5: kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt ca luk prāpnoti . aluk . astrīviṣaya kauṇḍīvṛsī vṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:12011: strīpratyayasya nivṛttiḥ . arthaḥ anivṛttaḥ strītvam . tasya anivṛttatvāt kena yaśabdaḥ śrūyeta . astriyām iti hi ñyaḥ vidhīyate . astrīviṣaya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12012: dvistrīpratyaya . gārgyāyaṇī vṛndārikā gārgyavṛndārikā . atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅaḥ samānādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12013: uttarapade puṃvadbhāvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . yaḥ ca atra bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ na asau uttarapade yaḥ ca uttarapade na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12014_0: . astu tarhi strīśabdagrahaṇam . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ iti cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12014_1: aviśeṣāt . strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ iti cet sarvasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12014_2: prāpnoti . asya api prāpnoti , aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12014_3: kālikāvṛndārikāḥ . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām
GS24pmbhasuu:12016_0: kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12016_1: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12017: prasaṅgaḥ . katham ca nāma na upādīyate yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12018: bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ ca . hyarthe ca ayam caḥ paṭhitaḥ . sarvaḥ hi śabdaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskāt paraḥ śakyaḥ kartum . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12020: upapadyate . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ vipratiṣedham puṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12021_0: khidghādikeṣu iti . saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . dvikāryayogaḥ hi nāma vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12021_1: na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . śabdasya hrasvatvam arthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12021_2: ca sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . sarvasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12021_3: asya api prāpnoti , aṅgārakāḥ nāma śakunayaḥ . teṣām kālikāḥ striyaḥ . kālikāvṛndārikāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12021_4: . aṅgārakavṛndārikāḥ prāpnuvanti . kṣemavṛddhayaḥ kṣatriyāḥ . teṣām tanukeśyaḥ striyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12023_0: kacchapasya ḍulī . ṛśyasya rohit . aśvasya vaḍavā . puruṣasya yoṣit . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12023_1: . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate evañjātīyakasya strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12023_2: bhavati iti . katham ca nāma na upādīyate yāvatā bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti ucyate . bhāṣitapuṃskānupapattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12023_3: hi bhavati . na hi arthen paurvāparyam asti . ayam tāvat adoṣaḥ yat ucyate arthātideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12024: vipratiṣedhānupapattiḥ iti . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12025: kim tarhi . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asambhavaḥ . puṃvadbhāvaḥ abhinirvartamānaḥ hrasvatvasya nimittam vihanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12026: hrasvatvam abhinirvartamānam puṃvadbhāvam bādhate . sati asambhave yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12027: vipratiṣedhaḥ . ayam tarhi doṣaḥ sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . tasmāt astu saḥ eva madhyamaḥ pakṣaḥ . nanu ca uktam strīśabdasya puṃśabdātideśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12028: cet sarvaprasaṅgaḥ aviśeṣāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . samāsanirdeśaḥ ayam :
GS24pmbhasuu:12029: bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ yasmin saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskādanūṅ iti . yadi evam luk
GS24pmbhasuu:12030_0: prāpnoti . nipātanāt na bhaviṣyati . atha vā aluk prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvartiṣyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12030_1: punaḥ anūṅ iti anyena strīpratyayagrahaṇam śakyam vijñātum . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12031_0: nañyuktam ivayuktam ca anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12031_1: . tat yathā abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte brāhmaṇasadṛśaḥ ānīyate . na asau loṣṭam ānīya
GS24pmbhasuu:12031_2: kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anūṅ iti ūṅpratiṣedhāt anyasmin ūṅsadṛśe kāryam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12031_3: . kim ca anyat anūṅ ūṅsadṛśam . strīpratyayaḥ . evam api iḍabiḍ vṛndārikā , aiḍabiḍvṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:12032: pṛth vṛndārikā , pārthavṛndārikā , darat vṛndārikā , dāradavṛndārikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12033: uśik vṛndārikā , auśijavṛndārikā , atra puṃvadbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12036_0: bhavitavyam . paṭvīmṛdvyau bhārye asya paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ , āhosvit paṭumṛdubhāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12036_1: iti . paṭvīmṛdubhāryaḥ iti bhavitavyam . puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . bhāṣitapuṃskāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12036_2: iti ucyate . nanu ca bhoḥ paṭuśabdaḥ mṛduśabdaḥ puṃsi bhāṣyete . samānāyām ākṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:12036_3: yat bhāṣitapuṃskam ākṛtyantare ca etau bhāṣitapuṃskau . samānāyām ākṛtau api etau
GS24pmbhasuu:12036_4: bhāṣitapuṃskau . katham . ārabhyate matublopaḥ . evam tarhi bhāṣitapuṃskāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12037: anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade kṛtaḥ tasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ yasya ca akṛtaḥ na asau bhāṣitapuṃskāt anūṅ samānādhikaraṇe uttarapade .
GS24pmbhasuu:12038_1: pradhānapūraṇīgrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . kalyāṇī pañcamī asya pakṣasya kalyāṇapañcamīkaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12039: bhavitavyam kalyāṇī pañcamī āsām rātrīṇām iti . kalyāṇīpañcamāḥ rātrayaḥ iti bhavitavyam . rātrayaḥ atra pradhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12040_0: (P_6,3.35) KA_III.154.6-155.24 Ro_IV.610-614 iha ke cit tasilādayaḥ ā kṛtvasucaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12040_1: paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ na iṣyate ke cit ca anyatra paṭhyante yeṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12040_2: iṣyate . tatra kim nyāyyam . parigaṇanam kartavyam . tasilādī tratasau . tratasau
GS24pmbhasuu:12040_3: tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām śālāyām vasati . tatra vasati . tasyāḥ , tataḥ , yasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12041: yataḥ . taratamapau . taratamapau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyatarā darśanīyatamā . caraḍjātīyarau . caraḍjātīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau .
GS24pmbhasuu:12042: paṭucarī , paṭujātīyā . kalpabdeśīyarau . kalpabdeśīyarau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . darśanīyakalpā , darśanīyadeśīyā . rūpappāśapau .
GS24pmbhasuu:12044: thamthālau . thamthālau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . kayā ākṛtyā katham , yayā yathā . dārhilau . dārhilau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . tasyām velāyām , tadā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12045: tarhi . tilthyanau . tilthyanau tasilādī draṣṭavyau . vṛkī vṛkatiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12046: ajathyā yūthiḥ . śasi bahvalpārthasya . śasi bahvalpārthasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12047_0: vaktavyaḥ . bahvībhyaḥ dehi . bahuśaḥ dehi . alpaśaḥ . tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya . tvataloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12047_1: guṇavacanasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paṭvyāḥ bhāvaḥ paṭutvam , paṭutā . guṇavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12047_2: iti kimartham . kaṭhyāḥ bhāvaḥ kaṭhītvam , kaṭhītā . bhasya aḍhe taddhite . bhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12048: puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam . aḍhe iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12049: . śyaineyaḥ , rauhiṇeyaḥ . yadi aḍhe iti ucyate , agnāyī devatā asya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12050: āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ , atra na prāpnoti . iha ca prāpnoti , kauṇḍinyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12051: sāpatnaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ anapatye iti ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:12052_0: syāt . gārgyāyaṇyāḥ apatyam māṇavakaḥ gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . astu tarhi aḍhe iti eva . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12052_1: kauṇḍinyaḥ , sāpatnaḥ iti . kauṇḍinye nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . āgastyakauṇḍinyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12054: katham agnāyī devatā asya sthālīpākasya , āgneyaḥ sthālīpākaḥ iti . astu tarhi anapatye iti . katham gārgaḥ jālmaḥ . gārgāgneyau na saṃvadete .
GS24pmbhasuu:12055: kartavyaḥ atra yatnaḥ . ṭhakchasoḥ ca . ṭhakchasoḥ ca puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12056_0: vaktavyaḥ . bhavatyāḥ chātrāḥ , bhāvatkāḥ , bhavadīyāḥ . ṭhaggrahaṇam kimartham na
GS24pmbhasuu:12056_1: ike kṛte ajādau iti . na evam śakyam . ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthitikādivat prasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12056_2: ajādilakṣaṇe hi māthikādivat prasajyeta . tat yatha mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12056_3: iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ na bhavati evam iha api na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12058_0: māningrahaṇam astryartham asamānādhikaraṇārtham ca . māningrahaṇam kriyate astryartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12058_1: asamānādhikaraṇārtham ca . astryartham tāvat . darśanīyām manyate devadattaḥ yajñadattām
GS24pmbhasuu:12059: asamānādhikaraṇārtham . darśanīyām manyate devadattā yajñadattām darśanīyamāninī iyam asyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12060_0: (P_6,3.37) KA_III.156.8-17 Ro_IV.615-616 kim idam evamādi anukramaṇam ādyasya yogasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12060_1: viṣaye āhosvit puṃvadbhāvamātrasya . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ādyasya yogasya viṣaye mādhyamkīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12061: vidhīḥ api atra na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_0: . na hi etat bhavati bhāṣitapūṃśkāt anūṅ . idam tarhi vilepikāyāḥ dharmyam vailepikam
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_1: . vidhiḥ ca siddhaḥ bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ ca na prāpnoti . atha puṃvabhāvamātrasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_2: viṣaye hastinīnām samūhaḥ hāstikam , jātilakṣaṇaḥ puṃvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_3: . evam tarhi na kopadhāyāḥ iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ puṃvabhāvamātrasya uttaram evamādi anukramaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_4: ādyasya yogasya viṣaye . na kopadhapratiṣedhe taddhitavugrahaṇam . na kopadhapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_5: taddhitavugrahaṇam kartavyam . taddhitasya yaḥ kakāraḥ voḥ ca yaḥ kakāraḥ tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12062_6: kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . pākabhāryaḥ , bhekabhāryaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12063: (P_6,3.40) KA_III.156.19-157.2 Ro_IV.616 svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini .
GS24pmbhasuu:12064: svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . dīrghamukhamānī
GS24pmbhasuu:12065: , ślakṣṇamukhamāninī . yadi amānini iti ucyate dīrghamukhamāninī ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12066: ślakṣṇamukhamānininī iti na sidhyati . prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12068_0: puṃvat karmadhāraye pratiṣiddhārtham . pratiṣiddhāṛthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . na kopadhāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12068_1: iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . kārikā vṛndārikā kārakavṛndārikā kārakajātīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12069_0: tatra api puṃvat bhavati . dattā vṛndārikā dattavṛndārikā dattajātīyā dattadeśīyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12069_1: . pañcamī vṛndārikā pañcamavṛndārikā pañcamajātīyā pañcamadeśīyā . vṛddhinimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12069_2: iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12071: svāṅgāt ca ītaḥ amānini iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_1: . jāteḥ ca iti uktam . tatra api puṃvat bhavati . kaṭhī vṛndārikā kaṭhavṛndārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_3: aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadvacanam . kukkuṭyādīnām aṇḍādiṣu puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kukkuṭyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_4: aṇḍam kukkuṭāṇḍam , mṛgyāḥ padam mṛgapadam , kākyāḥ śāvaḥ kākaśāvaḥ . na vā astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_5: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt . na atra strīpūrvapadam
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_6: vivakṣitam . kim tarhi . astrīpūrvapadam . ubhayoḥ aṇḍam ubhayoḥ padam ubhayoḥ śāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_7: . yadi api tāvat atra etat śakyate vaktum iha tu katham . mṛgyāḥ kṣīram mṛghakṣīram
GS24pmbhasuu:12072_8: iti . atra api na vā astrīpūrvapadavivakṣitatvāt iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12073: katham punaḥ sataḥ nāma avāvivakṣā syāt . sataḥ api avivakṣā bhavati . tat yathā . alomikā eḍakā . anudarā kanyā iti . asataḥ ca vivakṣā bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12076_0: vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena . agneḥ īttvāt varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:12076_1: agneḥ īttvasya avakāśaḥ , agnīṣomau . varuṇasya vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ , vāyuvāruṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12076_2: iha ubhayam prāpnoti , āgnivāruṇīm anaḍvāhīm ālabheta . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12077_0: vipratiṣedhaḥ . dvikāryayogaḥ hi vipratiṣedhaḥ na ca atra ekaḥ dvikāryayuktaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12077_1: . agneḥ īttvam varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ . na avaśyam dvikārayogaḥ eva vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12077_2: tarhi . asambhavaḥ api . saḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12078: asti asambhavaḥ . kaḥ asau asambhavaḥ . agneḥ īttvam abhinirvartamanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12079: varuṇasya vṛddhim bādhate . varuṇasya vṛddhiḥ abhinirvartamanā agneḥ īttvam bādhate . eṣaḥ asambhavaḥ . sati asambhave yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12080: pūṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam khidghādiṣu . pūṃvadbhāvāt hrasvatvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12082: mṛdubhāryaḥ . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ , kālimmanyaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12083: hariṇimmanyaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti , kālimmanyā , hariṇimmanyā . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ , nartakitarā , nartakitamā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12084: pūṃvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ , darśanīyatarā , darśanīyatamā . iha ubhayam prāpnoti , paṭvitarā , paṭvitamā . ke hrasvaḥ bhavati iti asya avakāśaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12085: nartakika . pūṃvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ , dāradikā . iha ubhayam prāpnoti ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12086: paṭvikā , mṛdvikā . hrasvatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm hrasvatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt puṃvadbhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12087: sakṛt gatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12089_0: anekācaḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne khaṭvātarā mālātarā , atra api prasajyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12089_1: etat asti prayojanam . bhāṣitapuṃskāt iti vartate . evam api dattātarā guptātarā
GS24pmbhasuu:12089_2: , atra api prāpnoti . ītaḥ iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītaraḥ , senāṇītaraḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12089_3: api prāpnoti . striyām iti vartate . evam api grāmaṇītarā , senāṇītarā atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12090: vartate . śeṣaprakḷptyartham tarhi ṅīgrahaṇam kartavyam , nadyāḥ śeṣasya anyatarasyām iti . kaḥ śeṣaḥ . āṅīca yā nadī ṅyantam ca yat ekāc .
GS24pmbhasuu:12091: antareṇa api ṅīgrahaṇam kḷptaḥ śeṣaḥ . katham . ītaḥ iti vartate . anīt ca yā nadī , īdantam ca yat ekāc . śeṣagrahaṇam ca api śakyam akartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:12092_0: katham . aviśeṣeṇa ghādiṣu nadyāḥ anyatarasyām hrasvatvam utsargaḥ . tasya anekācaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12092_1: nityam hrasvatvam apavādaḥ . tasmin nitye prāpte ugitaḥ vibhāṣā ārabhyate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:12092_2: evam lakṣmitarā tantritarā iti na sidhyati . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12092_3: iṣṭam eva etad saṅgṛhītam . lakṣmītarā tantrītarā iti eva bhavitavyam . evam hi saunāgāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12092_4: paṭhanti . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvatve kṛnnadyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12093: (P_6,3.46.1) KA_III.160.2-161.5 Ro_IV.622-627 iha kasmāt na bhavati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12094: amahān mahān sampannaḥ mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ iti . anyaprakṛtiḥ tu amahān
GS24pmbhasuu:12095: mahatprakṛtau mahān mahati eva . anyaḥ mahān . anyaḥ mahān bhūtaprakṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:12096: vartate . mahān mahati eva . tasmāt āttvam na syāt . tasmāt āttvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:12097_0: bhaviṣyati . puṃvattvam tu katham bhavet atra . puṃvadbhāvaḥ api tarhi na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12097_1: . amahatī mahatī sampannā mahadbhūtā brāhmaṇī . evam tarhi amahati mahān hi vṛttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12097_2: tadvācī ca atra bhūtaśabdaḥ ayam . amahati hi mahacchabdaḥ vartate tadvācī ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12098: mahadvācī . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvat . tasmāt sidhyati puṃvadbhāvaḥ . yadi evam āttvam api prāpnoti . mahadbhūtaḥ candramāḥ . nivartyam āttvam tu
GS24pmbhasuu:12099_0: manyante . āttvam api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yaḥ tu mahataḥ pratipadam samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12099_1: uktaḥ tadāśrayam hi āttvam kartavyam manyante na lakṣaṇena lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12099_2: evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti pratipadam yaḥ samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12099_3: vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam . lakṣaṇoktaḥ ca ayam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . mahān
GS24pmbhasuu:12100: śeṣavacanāt tu yaḥ asau pratyārambhāt kṛtaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ tasmāt sidhyati tasmin . yasmāt śeṣaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ iti siddhe anekam anyapadārthe iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:12101_0: tena pratipadam bhavati . pradhānataḥ vā yataḥ vṛttiḥ . atha vā gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye
GS24pmbhasuu:12101_1: kāryasampratyayaḥ . tat yathā gauḥ anubandhyaḥ ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12101_2: . katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati , gām ānaya iti . arthāśraye
GS24pmbhasuu:12101_3: etat evam . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati . śabdāśraye ca vṛddhyāttve
GS24pmbhasuu:12102: (P_6,3.46.2) KA_III.161.6-15 Ro_IV.627-628 mahadāttve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam puṃvadvacanam ca asamānādhikaraṇārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12103_0: mahadāttve ghāsakaraviśiṣṭeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam puṃvadbhāvaḥ ca asamānādhikaraṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12103_1: kartavyaḥ . mahatyāḥ ghāsaḥ mahāghāsaḥ , mahatyāḥ karaḥ mahākaraḥ , mahatyāḥ viśiṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12104: aṣṭanaḥ kapāle haviṣi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭākapālam carum nirvapet
GS24pmbhasuu:12105: . haviṣi iti kimartham . aṣṭakapālam brāhmaṇasya . gavi ca yukte . gavi ca yukte upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭāgavena śakaṭena . yukte iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12107: (P_6,3.47) KA_III.161.17-18 Ro_IV.629 prāk śatāt iti vaktavyam iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:12110: catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām vibhāṣā yathā syāt , dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca treḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12111: na etat asti prayojanam . prakṛtam dvyaṣṭangrahaṇamanuvartiṣyate . yadi tat anuvartate treḥ trayaḥ dvyaṣṭanoḥ ca iti dvyaṣṭanoḥ api dtrayaḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12112: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . maṇḍūkagatayaḥ adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ . atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12113: . dvyaṣṭanaḥ saṅkhyayām abahuvrīhyaśītyoḥ treḥ trayaḥ . tataḥ vibhāṣā catvāriṃśatprabhṛtau sarveṣām iti . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam tat apekṣiṣyāmahe .
GS24pmbhasuu:12114: (P_6,3.50) KA_III.162.5-17 Ro_IV.629-631 yaṇgrahaṇam idam pratyayagrahaṇam . tatra pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12115: bhavati iti yadaṇante prāpnoti . yadaṇgrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam lekhagrahaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12116: yadaṇgrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt . yat ayam lekhagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yadaṇante bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12117: aparaḥ āha : atyalpam idam ucyate . sarvatra eva uttarapadādhikāre
GS24pmbhasuu:12118_0: pratyayagrahaṇe rūpagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . kutaḥ . lekhagrahaṇāt eva . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12118_1: . kumārī gauritarā . ghādiṣu nadyāḥ hrasvaḥ bhavati iti hrasvatvam prasajyeta . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:12118_2: etat jñāpyate khiti anavyayasya iti khiti eva anantarasya anavyayasya hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12119: na asti iti kṛtvā khidante bhaviṣyati . nanu ca ayam asti stanandhayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12120_0: . atra api śapā vyavadhānam . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12120_1: sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . atha vā etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12120_2: khiti anantarasya na bhavati iti yat ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12121: anavyayasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na hi khiti anantaram avyayam asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12122_1: . padādeśe antodāttanipātanam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . padopahatārtham . pādena
GS24pmbhasuu:12123: . tṛtīyā karmaṇi iti prakṛtisvaratve pūrvapadāntodāttatvam yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12124: upadeśivadvacanam ca svarasiddhyartham . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12125: kim prayojanam . svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām antodāttanipātane kṛte samāsasvareṇa bādhanam yathā syāt . padājiḥ , padātiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12126: (P_6,3.53) KA_III.163.6-7 Ro_IV.632 padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12127: . padbhāve ike caratau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pādābhyām carati padikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12128: (P_6,3.56) KA_III.163.9 Ro_IV.632 niṣke ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12131: vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt . lohitodaḥ , kṣīrodaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12133: udakasthānam . ucyamāne api etasmin atra prapnoti . etat api ekahalādi .
GS24pmbhasuu:12134: kim kāraṇam . ekaikavarṇavartitvāt vācaḥ uccaritapradhvaṃsitvāt ca varṇānām . ekaikavarṇavartinī vāk . na dvau varṇau yugapat uccārayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12135_0: tat yathā gauḥ iti ukte yāvat gakāre vāk vartate tāvat na aukāre na visarjanīye .
GS24pmbhasuu:12135_1: yāvat auakāre na tāvat gakāre na visarjanīye . yāvat visarjanīye na tāvat gakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:12136: . uccaritaḥ varṇaḥ pradhvastaḥ ca . atha aparaḥ prayujyate . na varṇaḥ varṇasya sahāyaḥ . evam tarhi ekahalādau iti ucyate sarvaḥ ca ekahalādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12137: tatra prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ ekahalādiḥ iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yatra ekam halam uccārya ac ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12138_0: (P_6,3.61) KA_III.164.4-19 Ro_IV.634-635 ikaḥ hrasvatvam uttarapadamātre . ikaḥ hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12138_1: uttarapadamātre vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt , alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12139_0: sarvānte hi lokavijñānam . lokavijñānāt hi yat eva sarvāntam padam tasmin pūrvapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12139_1: hrasvatvam syāt . atha vā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . alābūḥ ca karkandhūḥ ca , alābukarkandhvau
GS24pmbhasuu:12140_1: iti . yadi evam dṛnbhvāḥ pūrvanipātaḥ prāpnoti . rājadantādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12141_0: dṛnbhvāḥ phalam dṛnbhuphalam , karkandhūḥ ca dṛnbhuphalam ca karkandhudṛnbhuphalam
GS24pmbhasuu:12141_1: , alābūḥ ca karkandhudṛnbhuphalam ca alābukarkandhudṛnbhuphalam iti . evam api phalena
GS24pmbhasuu:12141_2: akṛtaḥ abhisambandhaḥ bhavati . pratyekam phalaśabdaḥ parisamāpyate . iyaṅuvaṅavyayapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12142: . iyaṅuvaṅbhāinām avyayānām ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śrīkulam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12144: abhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrukuṃsaḥ , bhrukuṭiḥ . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:12145: akāraḥ bhrūkaṃsādīnām iti vaktavyam . bhrakuṃsaḥ , bhrakuṭiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12147: ekatvam , ekatā . na etat asti prayojanam . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12148: . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . tāsilādiṣu ā kṛtvasucaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12149: ekasyāḥ āgatam ekarūpyam , ekamayam . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekatvam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12150: ekatā . nanu ca uktam puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12151: uktam etat tvataloḥ guṇavacanasya iti . atha uttarapade kim udāharaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12152_0: ekaśāṭī . na etat asti . puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham . katham puṃvadbhāvaḥ . samānādhikaraṇalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12152_1: . idam tarhi prayojanam . ekasyāḥ kṣīram ekaṣīram . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ekaśāṭī
GS24pmbhasuu:12153: puṃvadbhāvena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . na kopadhāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12154: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat kopadhapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:12156_1: khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ . kālimmanyā , hariṇimmanyā . kim kāraṇam . anajantatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12156_2: mumi kṛte anajantatvāt hrasvatvam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12157: siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . hrasvāntasya mum bhavati iti vaktavyam . sanniyogāt vā . atha vā sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12158: kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . mum ca . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12159: ca. yat ca anyat prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . hrasvatvam . sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12160_0: . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam khiti hrasvāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12160_1: anajantatvāt iti . parihṛtam etat siddham tu hrasvāntasya mumvacanāt iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12161: prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ikaḥ hrasvaḥ aṅyaḥ gālavasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12162: tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ . khiti iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:12163_0: saptamī hrasvaḥ iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12163_1: iti . atha vā khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti ucyate . khiti hrasvabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12163_2: bhūtapūrvagatiḥ vijñāsyate . ajantam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . atha vā kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:12163_3: yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . khiti hrasvaḥ bhavati iti upasthitam idam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12164: tatra vacanāt anajantasya api bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . vāṅmanyaḥ iti . na etat asti . ikaḥ iti vartate . evam api khaṭvammanyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12165: , atra na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ābgrahaṇam api prakṛtam anuvartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12166: kva prakṛtam . ṅyāpoḥ sañjñācchandasoḥ bahulam iti . evam api kīlālapammanyaḥ , śubhaṃyammanyaḥ atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt pūrvoktau eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12168: (P_6,3.68.1) KA_III.166.5-167.3 Ro_IV.638-639 amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe kim prayojanam . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12169: ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśāḥ . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe ātvapūrvasavarṇaguṇeyaṅuvaṅādeśāḥ prayojanam . ātvam prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12170: gāmmanyaḥ . pūrvasavarṇaḥ prayojanam . strīmmanyaḥ . guṇaḥ prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12171_0: narammanyaḥ . iyaṅuvaṅau prayojanam . śriyammanyaḥ , bhruvammanyaḥ . amaḥ pratyayavadanudeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12172: aprathamātvāt . prathamayoḥ iti ucyate na ca atra prathamām paśyāmaḥ . kim ca bhoḥ ātvam prathamayoḥ iti ucyate . na khalu prathamayoḥ iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12173: prathamayoḥ iti tu vijñāyate . katham . amśasoḥ iti ucyate . te evam vijñāsyāmaḥ . śassahacaritaḥ yaḥ amśabdaḥ . kaḥ ca śassahacaritaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12174: prathamā eva . nanu ca pratyayavadanudeśāt bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyātideśe [R: hi] viśeṣānatideśaḥ . sāmanye hi atidiśyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12175: viśeṣaḥ na atidiṣṭaḥ bhavati . tat yathā . brahmaṇavat asmin kṣatriye
GS24pmbhasuu:12176_0: vartitavyam iti sāmānyam yat brāhmaṇakāryam tat kṣatriye atidiśyate . yat viśiṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:12176_1: māṭhare kauṇḍinye vā na tat atidiśyate . evam iha api sāmānyam yat pratyayakāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:12176_2: tat atidiśyate yat viśiṣṭam dvitīyaikavacane bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12177: prathamayoḥ iti na tat atidiśyate . siddham tu dvitīyaikavacanavadvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12178: . siddham etat . katham . dvitīyaikavacanavat bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12179: ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā . atha vā ekaśeṣanirdeśaḥ ayam . am ca am ca am . icaḥ ekācaḥ am bhavati ampratyayavat ca asmin kāryam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12180: (P_6,3.68.2) KA_III.167.4-14 Ro_IV.639-640 atha iha katham bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12181: . śriyam ātmānam manyate brāhmaṇakulam . śriyammanyam āhosvit śrimanyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12182: iti . śriyammanyam iti bhavitavyam . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti luk kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:12183_0: bhavati . na aprāpte luki am ārabhyate . saḥ yathā eva supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12183_1: iti etam bādhate evam svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etam ami lukam bādheta . na bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12183_2: kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati . na ca aprāpte supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12183_3: iti etasmin etat ārabhyate . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:12184_0: atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante iti evam supaḥ dhātuprātipadikayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12184_1: iti etam bādhate . svamoḥ napuṃsakāt iti etam na bādhiṣyate . evam tarhi asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12184_2: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti asiddhatvāt bahiraṅgalakṣaṇasya amaḥ antaraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:12184_3: na bhaviṣyati . na eṣā paribhāṣā uttarapadādhikāre śakyā vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12185: dviṣantapaḥ , parantapaḥ . saṃyogāntalopaḥ na syāt . tasmāt śrimanyam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12188: astusatyāgadasya kāre upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . astuṅkāraḥ , satyaṅkāraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12189: agadaṅkāraḥ . bhakṣasya chandasi . bhakṣasya chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12190: kartavyam . tasya te bhakṣaṅkārasya . chandasi iti kim . bhakṣakārasya tat matam iti . dhenoḥ bhavyāyām . dhenoḥ bhavyāyām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12191: dhenumbhavyā . lokasya pṛṇe . lokasya pṛṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12192: lokamprṇasya dhanvinaḥ . itye anabhyāśasya . itye anabhyāśasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . anabhyāśamityaḥ . bhrāṣṭrāgnyoḥ indhe .
GS24pmbhasuu:12194: agnimindhaḥ . gile agilasya . gile agilasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12195: timiṅgilaḥ . agilasya iti kimartham . gilagilaḥ . gilagile ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12196: vaktavyam . timiṅgilagilaḥ . uṣṇabhadrayoḥ karaṇe . uṣṇabhadrayoḥ karaṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . uṣṇaṅkaraṇam , bhadraṅkaraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12198: sūtograrājabhojakulamerubhyaḥ duhituḥ putraṭ vā bhavati iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12199: sūtaputrī , sūtaduhitā , ugraputrī , ugraduhitā , rajaputrī , rājaduhitā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12200: bhojaputrī , bhojaduhitā , kulaputrī , kuladuhitā , meruputrī , meruduhitā
GS24pmbhasuu:12201_0: (P_6,3.72) KA_III.168.16-20 Ro_IV.642-643 kim iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:12201_1: . katham ca prāpte katham vā aprāpte . khiti iti vā nitye prāpte anyatra vā aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:12202: prāpte nityaḥ vidhiḥ . rātrimmanyaḥ . aprāpte vibhāṣā . rātryaṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12204_0: (P_6,3.73) KA_III.168.22-169.8 Ro_IV.642-643 kimartham nañaḥ sānubandhakasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12204_1: kriyate na nasya iti eva ucyeta . nasya iti ucyamāne karṇaputraḥ , varṇaputraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12204_2: atra api prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12205: . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . evam api praśnaputraḥ , viśnaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12206: ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12207_0: evam api vāmanaputraḥ , pāmanaputraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti . tasmāt sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12207_1: grahaṇam kartavyam . nañaḥ nalope avakṣepe tiṅi upasaṅkhyānam . nañaḥ nalope avakṣepe
GS24pmbhasuu:12208: apacasi vai tvam jālma . akaroṣi vai tvam jālma .
GS24pmbhasuu:12209: (P_6,3.74) KA_III.169.10-16 Ro_IV.644 kimartham tasmāt iti ucyate na nuṭ aci iti eva ucyeta . nuṭ aci iti ucyamāne nañaḥ eva nuṭ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:12210: evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . tatra ayam api arthaḥ . tadoḥ saḥ sau
GS24pmbhasuu:12211_0: anantyayoḥ iti tadoḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam . tatra hi tavargānirdeśe etat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12211_1: iha mā bhūt . aneṣaḥ karoti iti . yāvatā pūrvāntaḥ saḥ api adoṣaḥ bhavati . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12211_2: śakyam . anuṣṇaḥ iti nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ prasajyeta . nugvacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12212: tasmāt parādiḥ kartavyaḥ . parādau ca kriyamāṇe tasmāt iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12213: (P_6,3.76) KA_III.169.18-170.4 Ro_IV.644-645 kimartham āduk ucyate na aduk eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : ekānnaviṃśatiḥ , ekānnaśatam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12214: savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . evam tarhi aduṭ kariṣyate . aduṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:12215_0: ānunāsikyam hi na syāt . yat hi tat yaraḥ anunāsike anunāsikaḥ va iti padāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12215_1: iti evam tat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam padāntasya iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . budhnaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12215_2: , bradhnaḥ , badhnāti . evam tarhi anuṭ kariṣyate . anuṭ ca aśakyaḥ kartum . vibhāṣayā
GS24pmbhasuu:12215_3: ānunāsikyam . tena idam eva rūpam syāt ekānnaviṃśatiḥ . idam na syāt . ekānnaviṃśatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12216: nanu ca uktam ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12217_0: akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12217_1: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12217_2: saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate . yasya tu vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12218: nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12220_0: sahasya halopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sādeśe hi svare doṣaḥ . sādeśe hi [sati] svare doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12220_1: syāt . āntaryataḥ udāttānudāttayoḥ [sthāne] svaritaḥ ādeśaḥ prasajyeta . [saputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12220_2: , sabhāryaḥ .] saḥ tarhi lopaḥ vaktatvyaḥ . na vaktatvyaḥ . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12220_3: . saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12221: . saḥ yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram bādhate evam samāsasvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:12223: (P_6,3.79) KA_III.170.14-17 Ro_IV.646 granthānte vacanānarthakyam avyayībhāvena kṛtatvāt . granthānte vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12224_0: avyayībhāvena kṛtatvāt . avyayībhāve ca akāle iti eva siddham . yaḥ tarhi kālottarapadaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12224_1: granthāntaḥ tadartham idam vaktavyam . sakāṣṭham jyotiṣam adhīte . sakalam , samuhūrtam
GS24pmbhasuu:12224_3: aviśeṣāt . upasarjanasya vāvacane sarvaprasaṅgaḥ . sarvasya upasarjanasya sādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12225: sahakṛtvā . kim kāraṇam . aviśeṣāt . na hi kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ upādīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12226: evañjātīyakasya sādeśaḥ bhavati iti . anupādīyamāne viśeṣe sarvaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12227: . siddham tu bahuvrīhinirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham . bahuvrīhinirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12229: sahakṛtvapriyaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . bahuvrīhau yat uttarapadam iti evam vijñāsyate . nanu etat api bahuvrīhau uttarapadam . evam tarhi bahuvrīhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12230: yat upasarjanam iti evam vijñāsyate . bahuvrīhau ca yat upasarjanam bahuvrīhim prati ca yat upasarjanam . saḥ tarhi bahuvrīhinirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12231_0: kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . iha kaḥ cit pradhānānām eva samāsaḥ kaḥ cit upasarjanānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12231_1: eva kaḥ cit pradhānopasarjanānām . tat yaḥ upasarjanānām eva samāsaḥ tat upasarjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12231_2: . atha vā akāraḥ matvarthīyaḥ . tat yathā tundaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12232: ghāṭaḥ iti . atha vā matublopaḥ atra draṣṭavyaḥ . tat yathā puṣyakāḥ eṣām te ime puṣyakāḥ . kālakāḥ eṣām te ime kālakāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12234: prakṛtyā āśiṣi agavādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sagave savatsāya sahalāya iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:12235_1: vrate karmaṇi careḥ ṇiniḥ vratalopaḥ ca . brahmaṇi upapade samānapūrve vrate karmaṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:12235_2: careḥ ṇiniḥ pratyayaḥ vratalopaḥ ca nipātyate . samāne brahmaṇi vratam catarti iti
