GS24pmbhasuu:12235_4: . dṛgdṛśavatuṣu dṛkṣe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sadṛkṣāsaḥ pratisadṛkṣāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12236: (P_6,3.93, 116) KA_III.172.2-11 Ro_IV.649-650 kimartham añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇam kriyate . iha mā bhūt . samañcanam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12237_0: upanahanam . na etat asti prayojanam . uttarapade iti vartate na ca antareṇa kvipam
GS24pmbhasuu:12237_1: añcatinahyādayaḥ uttarapadāni bhavanti . tatra antareṇa kvibgrahaṇam kvibante eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12237_2: bhaviṣyati . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇanārthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12237_3: yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . añcatinahyādiṣu kvibgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12237_4: . yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe . algrahaṇeṣu etat bhavati na ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:12238: algrahaṇam . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat kvibgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:12239: ācāryaḥ anyatra dhātugrahaṇe tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:12240: prayojanam . ataḥ kṛkami iti atra , ayaskṛt ayaskāra iti api siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12241_1: . adrisadhryoḥ antodāttatvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . kṛtsvaranivṛttyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12243_0: tatra chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12243_1: . viśvācī , ghṛtācī . yadi chandasi striyām pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate katham sā kadrīcī
GS24pmbhasuu:12243_2: . evam tarhi chandasi striyām bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12244: (P_6,3.97) KA_III.173.2-5 Ro_IV.651 samāpaḥ īttvapratiṣedhaḥ . samāpaḥ īttvapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . samāpam nāma devayajanam . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:12245: īttvam anavarṇāt iti vaktavyam . samīpam , antarīpam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12247_0: (P_6,3.98) KA_III.173.7-8 Ro_IV.651 dīrghoccāraṇam kimartham na udanoḥ deśe iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12247_1: ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : anūpaḥ . savarṇadīrghatven siddham . na sidhyati . avagrahe
GS24pmbhasuu:12247_2: doṣaḥ syāt (P_6,3.99) KA_III.173.11-13 Ro_IV.651 aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12248_0: . tatra idam na sidhyati . anyasya idam anyadīyam . anyasya kārakam anyatkārakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12248_1: . evam tarhi aviśeṣeṇa anyasya duk chakārakayoḥ iti uktvā tataḥ vakṣyāmi aṣaṣṭhyatṛtīyasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12250: kadbhāve trau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kutsitāḥ trayaḥ kattrayaḥ . ke vā trayaḥ . na bibhṛyuḥ kattrayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12251_0: (P_6,3.109.1) KA_III.173.19-174.15 Ro_IV.652-654 pṛṣodarādīni iti ucyate . kāni pṛṣodarādīni
GS24pmbhasuu:12251_1: . pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . kāni punaḥ pṛṣodaraprakārāṇi . yeṣu lopāgamavikārāḥ śrūyante
GS24pmbhasuu:12251_2: na ca ucyante . atha yathā iti kim idam . prakāravacane thāl . atha kim idam upadiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:12252: uccāritāni . kutaḥ etat . diśiḥ uccāraṇakriyaḥ . uccārya hi varṇān āha updiṣṭāḥ ime varṇāḥ iti . kaiḥ punaḥ upadiṣṭāḥ . śiṣṭaiḥ . ke punaḥ śiṣṭāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12253_0: . vaiyākaraṇāḥ . kutaḥ etat . śāstrapūrvikā hi śiṣṭiḥ vaiyākaraṇāḥ ca śāstrajñāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12253_1: . yadi tarhi śāstrapūrvikā śiṣṭiḥ śiṣṭipūrvakam ca śāstram tat itaretarāśrayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12253_2: . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi nivāsataḥ ācārataḥ ca . saḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12253_3: ācāraḥ āryāvartte eva . kaḥ punaḥ āryāvarttaḥ . prāk ādarśāt [R adarśanāt] pratyak
GS24pmbhasuu:12254: himavantam uttareṇa pāriyātram . etasmin āryanivāse ye brāhmaṇāḥ kumbhīdhānyāḥ alolupāḥ agṛhyamāṇakāraṇāḥ kim cit antareṇa kasyāḥ cit
GS24pmbhasuu:12255_0: vidyāyāḥ pāragāḥ tatrabhavantaḥ śiṣṭāḥ . yadi tarhi śiṣṭāḥ śabdeṣu pramāṇam kim aṣṭādhyāyyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12255_1: kriyate . śiṣṭajñānārthā aṣṭādhyāyī . katham punaḥ aṣṭādhyāyyā śiṣṭāḥ śakyāḥ vijñātum
GS24pmbhasuu:12256: paśyati anadhīyānam ye atra vihitāḥ śabdāḥ tān prayuñjānam . saḥ paśyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12257_0: nūnam asya daivānugrahaḥ svabhāvaḥ vā yaḥ ayam na ca aṣṭādhyāyīm adhīte ye ca asyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12257_1: vihitāḥ śabdāḥ tān prayuṅkte . nūnam ayam anyān api jānāti . evam eṣā śiṣṭajñānārthā
GS24pmbhasuu:12258: (P_6,3.109.2) KA_III.174.16-175.7 Ro_IV.654-655 dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā . dikśabdebhyaḥ tīrasya tārabhāvaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12259: dakṣiṇatīram , dakṣiṇatāram . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam valabhāvaḥ ca uttarapadasya iñi . vācaḥ vāde ḍatvam vaktavyam valabhāvaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12260_0: uttarapadasya iñi vaktavyaḥ . vāgvādasya apatyam vāḍvaliḥ . ṣaṣaḥ utvam datṛdaśasu
GS24pmbhasuu:12260_1: uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca . ṣaṣaḥ utvam vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12260_2: . ṣoḍaśan , ṣoḍaśa . dhāsu vā . dhāsu vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12261: vaktavyam uttarapadādeḥ ṣṭutvam ca vaktavyam . ṣoḍhā ṣaḍḍhā kuru . atha kimartham bahuvacananirdeśaḥ kriyate na punaḥ dhāyām iti eva ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12262_0: nānādhikaraṇavācī yaḥ dhāśabdaḥ tasya grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . iha mā bhūt . ṣaṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12262_1: dadhāti iti ṣaḍdhā iti . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu . duraḥ dāśanāśadabhadhyeṣu utvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12263_0: dūṇāśaḥ , dūḍabhaḥ , dūḍhyaḥ . svaro rohatau chandasi . svaro rohatau chandasi utvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12263_1: vaktavyam . ehi tvam jāye svo rohāva . pīvopavasanādīnām chandasi lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12265: tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti pūrvasya eva bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12266: na hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam . iha kasmāt na bhavati karaṇīyam , haraṇīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12267: . na evam vijñāyate ḍhroḥ lopaḥ ḍhralopaḥ , ḍhralope iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:12268: ḍhroḥ lopaḥ asmin saḥ ayam ḍhralopaḥ , ḍhralope iti . yadi evam na arthaḥ pūrvagrahaṇena . bhavati hi ḍhralopena ānantaryam . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12269: . uttarapade iti vartate . tena ānantaryamātre yathā syāt . audumbariḥ rājā . punaḥ rūpāṇi kalpayet .
GS24pmbhasuu:12270: (P_6,3.112) KA_III.175.16-176.4 Ro_IV.656-657 varṇagrahaṇam kimartham na sahivahoḥ ot asya iti eva ucyeta . vṛddhau api kṛtāyām yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12271_0: udavoḍhām , udavoḍham , udavoḍha iti . atha avarṇagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:12271_1: . ūḍhaḥ , ūḍhavān iti . na etat asti prayojanam . bhavatu atra ottvam . śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12271_2: kasmāt na bhavati . pūrvatvam asya bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:12272: paratvāt ottvam . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . ottvam kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ottvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12273_0: nityam samprasāraṇam . kṛte api ottve prāpnoti akṛte api . ottvam api nityam . kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12273_1: api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api . anityam ottvam . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12273_2: . antaraṅgam pūrvatvam . yasya ca lakṣaṇāntareṇa nimittam vihanyate na tat anityam
GS24pmbhasuu:12273_3: . na ca samprasāraṇam eva ottvasya nimittam vihanti . avaśyam lakṣaṇāntaram pūrvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12274: ubhayoḥ nityayoḥ paratvāt ottvam . ottve kṛte samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12275: samprasāraṇapūrvatvam . tatra kāryakṛtatvāt punaḥ ottvam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12276: (P_6,3.121) KA_III.176.6 Ro_IV.658 apīlvādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . rucivaham , cāruvaham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12277: (P_6,3.122) KA_III.176.8-13 Ro_IV.658 amnuṣyādiṣu iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prasevaḥ , prahāraḥ , prasāraḥ . sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime .
GS24pmbhasuu:12278: sādakārayoḥ kṛtrime iti vaktavyam . iha eva yathā syāt . prāsādaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12279: prākāraḥ . iha mā bhūt . eṣaḥ asya prasādaḥ . eṣaḥ asya prakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12280: prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā . prativeśādīnām vibhāṣā dīrghatvam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12282: (P_6,3.124) KA_III.176.15-20 Ro_IV.658-659 katham idam vijñāyate . dā iti etasmin takārādau , āhosvit dā iti etasmin takārānte iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12283_0: . yadi vijñāyate takārādau iti nīttā vittā , atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate takārānte
GS24pmbhasuu:12283_1: iti sudattam pratidattam atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12284: cartve kṛte bhaviṣyati . asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12285: . āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu takārānte iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12286: katham sudattam pratidattam . na etat takārāntam . thakārāntam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:12287_0: (P_6,3.138) KA_III.177.5-10 Ro_IV.659 iha anye ācāryāḥ cau pratyaṅgasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:12287_1: āhuḥ . tat iha api sādhyam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na pratyaṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:12287_2: bhavati iti yat ayam cau dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_0: (P_6,3.139) KA_III.177.2-3 Ro_IV.659-660 ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_1: . ikaḥ hrasvāt samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ikaḥ hrasvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_2: grāmaṇikulam , senānikulam . samprasāraṇadīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ . vibhāṣā hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_3: . yadā na hrasvatvam saḥ avakāśaḥ . hrasvaprasaṅge ubhayam prāpnoti . kārīṣagandhīputraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_4: , kaumudagandhīputraḥ samprasāraṇadīrghatvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_5: dīrghatve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_6: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti (P_6,4.1.1) KA_III.178.2-10 Ro_IV.661-662 ā kutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12289_7: ayam adhikāraḥ . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ . yadi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12290_0: aṅgādhikāraḥ guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam . prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12290_1: punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati pratyayalakṣaṇena siddham . astu tarhi prāk abhyāsavikārebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12291_0: aṅgādhikāraḥ vavraśca vakārasya samprasāraṇam prāpnoti . ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12291_1: punaḥ aṅgādhikāre sati uḥ adatvasya sthānivadbhāvān na samprasāraṇe samprasāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12291_2: iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . saḥ ca idānīm aparihāraḥ bhavati yat tat uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12291_3: aṅgānyatvāt ca siddham iti . astu tarhi ā saptamādhyāyaparisamāpteḥ aṅgādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12291_4: . nanu ca uktam guṇaḥ yaṅlukoḥ iti yaṅluggrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kriyate nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12293: sthānṣaṣṭhī , aṅgasya sthāne iti . evam bhavitum arhati . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ . aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:12294: cet pañcamyantasya ca adhikāraḥ kartavyaḥ . aṅgāt iti api vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12295_0: anucyamāne hi ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati iti ataḥ iti pañcamī aṅgasya iti sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:12295_1: . tatra aśakyam vivibhaktikatvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum . tatra kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12296: bhavati iti iha api prasajyeta : brāhmaṇabhissā , odanabhissaṭā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12297: avayavaṣaṣṭhyādīnām ca aprasiddhiḥ . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ ca na sidhyanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12298_0: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ iti śāseḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12298_1: ūt upadhāyāḥ gohaḥ iti goheḥ ca antyasya syāt upadhāmātrasya ca . siddham tu parasparam
GS24pmbhasuu:12298_2: prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñābhāvāt siddham etat . katham . parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe
GS24pmbhasuu:12299: aṅgasañjñām prati pratyayasañjñā pratyayasañjñām prati aṅgasañjñā . kim ataḥ yat parasparam prati aṅgapratyayasaṅjñe bhavataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12300: sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ ca . sambandhaṣaṣthīnirdeśaḥ ca ayam kṛtaḥ bhavati . aṅgasya yaḥ bhis-śabdaḥ iti . kim ca aṅgasya bhis-śabdaḥ . nimittam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12301_0: yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . evam api avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12301_1: aviśeṣitāḥ bhavanti . avayavaṣaṣṭhyādayaḥ api sambandhe eva . evam api sthānam aviśeṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:12301_2: bhavati . sthānam api sambandhaḥ eva . evam api na jñāyate kva sthānaṣaṣṭhī kva viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:12301_3: iti . yatra ṣaṣṭhī anyayogam na apekṣate sā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . yatra hi anyayogam apekṣate
GS24pmbhasuu:12302_0: (P_6,4.1.3) KA_III.179.11-180.23 Ro_IV.665-669 kāni punaḥ aṅgādhikārasya prayojanani
GS24pmbhasuu:12302_1: . aṅgādhikārasya prayojanam samprasāraṇadīrghatve . halaḥ uttarasya samprasāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12303: hūtaḥ , jīnaḥ , saṃvītaḥ , śūnaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . nirutam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12304: durutam . nāmsanoḥ ca . nāmsanoḥ ca dīrghatve prayojanam . nāmi dīrghaḥ bhavati . agnīnām , vāyūnām . aṅgasya iti kimartham . krimiṇām paśya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12305: pāmanām paśya . sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . cicīṣati , tuṣṭūṣati . aṅgasya iti kimartham . dadhi sanoti . madhu sanoti . liṅi etve . liṅi etve prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12306: . gleyāt , mleyāt . aṅgasya iti kimartham . niryāyāt , nirvāyāt . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve . ataḥ bhisaḥ aistve prayojanam . vṛkṣaiḥ , plakṣaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12307: aṅgasya iti kimartham . brāhmaṇabhissā , odanabhissaṭā . luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau .
GS24pmbhasuu:12308: luṅādiṣu aḍāṭau prayojanam . akārṣīt , aihiṣṭa . aṅgasya iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12311_0: iyaṅuvaṅau prayojanam . śriyau śriyaḥ , bhruvau bhruvaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12311_1: śryartham , bhrvartham . yuṣmadasmadoḥ prayojanam . sāmaḥ ākam . yuṣmākam asmākam
GS24pmbhasuu:12312: tātaṅ prayojanam . jīvatāt bhavān . aṅgasya iti kimartham . paca hi tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12313: tvam . jalpa tu tāvat tvam . āmi nuṭ prayojanam . kumārīṇam , kiśorīṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:12314: aṅgasya iti kimartham . kumārī , ām iti āha . kiśorī , ām iti āha . āne muk prayojanam . pacamānaḥ , yajamānaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . prāṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12315: ke hrasvaḥ prayojanam . kiśorikā , kumārikā . aṅgasya iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12316: kumārī kāyati kumārīkaḥ . yi dīrghaḥ prayojanam . cīyate , stūyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12317: aṅgasya iti kimartham . dadhiyānam , madhuyānam . bhi tatvam prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12318: adbhiḥ , adbhyaḥ . aṅgasya iti kimartham . abbhāraḥ , abbhakṣaḥ . na etāni santi prayojanāni . katham . arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12319_0: arthavadgrahaṇapratyayagrahaṇābhyām etāni siddhāni . kva cit arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12319_1: iti evam bhaviṣyati kva cit pratyayāpratyayoḥ grahaṇe pratyayasya eva grahaṇam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12319_2: iti . atha vā pratyaye iti prakṛtya aṅgakāryam adhyeṣye . yadi pratyaye iti prakṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:12319_3: aṅgakāryam adhīṣe prākarot , upaihiṣṭa , upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau prāpnutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12320: . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12321: grahaṇam . siddham etat . katham . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti evam upasargāt pūrvam aḍāṭau na
GS24pmbhasuu:12323: (P_6,4.2) KA_III.180.25-181.10 Ro_IV.669-670 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:12324_0: tṛtīyaḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya aprāptiḥ . aṇprakaraṇāt ṛkārasya dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12324_1: . aṇaḥ iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . ḍhralope pūrvasya dīrghaḥ aṇaḥ iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:12324_2: ikaḥ kāśe iti anena iggrahaṇena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . iggrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12324_3: ca aṇviśeṣaṇatvāt aṇviśeṣaṇam iggrahaṇam . aṇaḥ ikaḥ iti . yadi tarhi aṇviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12324_4: iggrahaṇam cau dīrghaḥ bhavati iti iha na prāpnoti : avācā , avāce . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12325: aṇgrahaṇam anuvartate iggrahaṇam nivṛttam . evam api kartṝcā kartṝce ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12326: atra na prāpnoti . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . atha vā ubhayam nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12327: kasmāt na bhavati tṛtīyaḥ . nipātanāt . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12330: grahaṇam kriyate na āmi dīrghaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kena idānim sanakārake
GS24pmbhasuu:12331_0: bhaviṣyati . nuṭ ayam āmbhaktaḥ āmgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati : nāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:12331_1: dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghatve
GS24pmbhasuu:12331_2: na nuṭ syāt . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12332: dīrghatvam kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . nityam dīrghatvam . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . nityatvāt dīrghatve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12333_0: hrasvāśrayaḥ nuṭ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi āha ayam hrasvāntāt nuṭ iti na ca hrasvāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12333_1: asti . tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanāt yatra tat na asti . na idam vacanāt labhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12333_2: . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:12334: yatra dīrghatvam pratiṣidhyate . tisṛṇām , catasṛṇām iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:12335: prayojanam . iha tāvat catasṛṇām iti ṣaṭcaturbhyaḥ ca iti evam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12336: . tisṛṇām iti trigrahaṇam api tatra prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12337: treḥ trayaḥ iti . idam tarhi tvam nṛṇam nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ . na ekam udāharaṇam hrasvagrahaṇam prayojayati . tatra vacanāt bhūtapūrvagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12338_0: vijñāsyate . hrasvāntam yat bhūtapūrvam iti . uttarāṛtham tarhi sanakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12338_1: kartavyam . nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām . nopadhāyāḥ nāmi yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : carmaṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:12338_2: , varmaṇām iti . nāmi dīrghaḥ āmi cet syāt kṛte dīrghe na nuṭ bhavet . vacanāt yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12338_3: tat na asti . nopadhāyāḥ ca carmaṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:12339: (P_6,4.12-13) KA_III.182.7-183.18 Ro_IV.673-677 hanaḥ kvau upadhādīrghatvaprasaṅgaḥ . hanaḥ kvau upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12340: anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti iti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12341_0: vṛtrahaṇau vṛtrahaṇaḥ iti . niyamavacanāt siddham . inhanpūṣāryamṇām śau sau ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12341_1: etasmāt niyamavacanāt dīrghatvam na bhaviṣyati . niyamavacanāt siddham iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12342_0: niyamavacanāt siddham iti cet sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamavacanāt anyatra niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12342_1: na prāpnoti . kva anyatra . vṛtrahaṇi bhrūṇahani . evam tarhi dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12342_2: inprabhṛtīnām tam viniyamya suṭi iti suvidvān .
GS24pmbhasuu:12343: dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha inprabhṛtīnām tam sarvanāmasthāne viniyamya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12344: inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne dīrghaḥ bhavati . kimartham idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12345_0: niyamāṛtham . inhanpūṣāryamṇām sarvanāmasthāne eva na anyatra . śau niyamam punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12345_1: eva vidadhyāt . tataḥ śau . śau eva sarvanāmasthāne na anyatra . tataḥ sau . sau
GS24pmbhasuu:12345_2: eva sarvanāmasthāne na anyatra . bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet . tathā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:12345_3: bhrūṇahani iti na doṣaḥ bhavati . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam kuru
GS24pmbhasuu:12345_4: vā api asamīkṣya . atha vā nivṛtte sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe aviśeṣeṇa śau niyamam
GS24pmbhasuu:12346_0: inhanpūṣāryamṇām śau eva . tataḥ sau . sau eva . iha api tarhi niyamāt na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12346_1: : indraḥ vṛtrahāyate . dīrghavidheḥ upadhāniyamāt me hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:12346_2: doṣaḥ . upadhālakṣaṇadīrghatvasya niyamaḥ na ca etat upadhālakṣaṇam dīrghatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12346_3: suṭi api vā prakṛte anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtapratiṣedhe . atha vā anuvartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12346_4: sarvanāmasthānagrahaṇe anavakāśaḥ śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtasya api dīrghatvasya niyāmakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12347: katham . yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi na etat tena na tatra bhavet viniyamyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12348: . yasya hi śiḥ sarvanāmasthānam na tasya suṭ . yasya suṭ sarvanāmasthānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12349_0: na tasya śiḥ . tatra sarvanāmasthānaprakaraṇe niyamyam na asti iti kṛtvā aviśeṣeṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:12349_1: śau niyamaḥ vijñāsyate . dīrghavidhiḥ yaḥ iha inprabhṛtīnām tam viniyamya suṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12349_2: suvidvān . śau niyamam punaḥ eva vidadhyāt . bhrūṇahani iti tathā asya na duṣyet
GS24pmbhasuu:12349_3: . śāsti nivartya suṭi iti aviśeṣe śau niyamam kuru vā api asamīkṣya . dīrghavidheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12349_4: upadhāniyamāt me hanta yi dīrghavidhau ca na doṣaḥ . suṭi api vā prakṛte anavakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12349_5: śau niyamaḥ aprakṛtapratiṣedhe . yasya hi śau niyamaḥ suṭi na etat tena na tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12350_0: (P_6,4.14) KA_III.183.20-184.11 Ro_IV.677-679 atvasantasya dīrghatve pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12350_1: . atvasantasya dīrghatve pitaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . gomān , yavamān . kim punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12350_2: kāraṇam na sidhyati . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12350_3: pitaḥ na prāpnoti ananubandhakagrahaṇe iti ucyate . sānubandhakasya idam grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12350_4: . evam tarhi tadanubandhakagrahaṇe atadanubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti evam pitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12351: na prāpnoti . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12352: pakāralope kṛte na atubantam bhavati atvantam eva . yathā eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12353_0: pakāralope kṛte na atubantam evam ukāralope api kṛte na atvantam . nanu ca bhūtapūrvagatyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12353_1: bhaviṣyati atvantam . yathā eva tarhi bhūtapūrvagatyā atvantam evam atubantam api
GS24pmbhasuu:12353_2: . evam tarhi āśrīyamāṇe bhūtapūrvagatiḥ atvantam ca āsrīyate na atubantam . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12353_3: . iha hi vyākaraṇe sarveṣu eva sānubandhakagrahaṇeṣu rūpam āśrīyate : yatra asya
GS24pmbhasuu:12354: rūpanirgrahaḥ ca na antareṇa laukikam prayogam . tasmin ca laukike prayoge sānubandhakānām prayogaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā dvitīyaḥ prayogaḥ upāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12355_0: kaḥ asau . upadeśaḥ nāma . upadeśe ca etat atubantam na atvantam . yadi punaḥ atśabdam
GS24pmbhasuu:12355_1: gṛhītvā dīrghatvam ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : jagat , janagat
GS24pmbhasuu:12355_2: . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:12355_3: prāpnoti : kṛtavān , bhuktavān iti . kva tarhi syāt . pacan , yajan . na vai atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12355_4: iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣtam ca na sidhyati . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12357_0: . gameḥ dīrghatve iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . iṅgameḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt : sañjigaṃsate
GS24pmbhasuu:12357_1: vatsaḥ mātrā iti . agrahaṇe hi anādeśasya api dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi iṅgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12358_0: prasajyeta . sañjigaṃsate vatsaḥ mātrā iti . na vā chandasi anādeśasya api dīrghatvadarśanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12358_1: iṅgrahaṇānarthakyam . na vā iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . chandasi anādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12358_2: api dīrghatvadarśanāt . chandasi anādeśasya api gameḥ dīrghatvam dṛśyate . svargam
GS24pmbhasuu:12358_3: lokam sañjigāṃsat . chandasi anādeśasya api dīrghatvadarśanāt iṅgrahaṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12359_0: chandasi anādeśasya api gameḥ dīrghatvam bhavati evam bhāṣāyām api prāpnoti . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12359_1: iṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ sani . ajantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12359_2: sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . tataḥ hanigamyoḥ . hanigamyoḥ ca sani dīrghaḥ bhavati . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12362_0: uta aho na . kim ca ataḥ . sani dīrghe upadhādhikāraḥ cet vyañjanapratiṣedhaḥ . sani
GS24pmbhasuu:12362_1: dīrghe upadhādhikāraḥ cet vyañjanapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ , cicīṣati tuṣṭūṣati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12363: anadhikāre uktam . kim uktam . hanigamidīrgheṣu ajgrahaṇam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12364: (P_6,4.19.1) KA_III.185.9-16 Ro_IV.681-683 atha , ūṭ ādiḥ kasmān na bhavati . ādiḥ ṭit bhavati iti prāpnoti . kasya punaḥ ādiḥ . vakārasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12365: astu . vakārakasya kā pratipattiḥ . lopaḥ vyoḥ vali iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12366: na evam śakyam . jvaratvarasrivyavimavām upadhāyāḥ ca iti dvau ūṭau syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:12367: . evam tarhi na eṣaḥ ṭit . kaḥ tarhi . ṭhit . yadi tarhi ṭhit , dhautaḥ paṭaḥ iti etyedhatyūṭsu iti vṛddhiḥ na prāpnoti . cartve kṛte bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12368: asiddham cartvam . tasya asiddhatvāt na prāpnoti . āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati . asati anyasmin āśrayāt siddhatvam syāt asti ca anyaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12369: vāhaḥ uṭ iti . eṣaḥ api ṭhit kariṣyate . tatra ubhayoḥ cartve kṛte āśrayāt siddhatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12370_0: (P_6,4.19.2) KA_III.185.17-186.15 Ro_IV.683-686 atha kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate uta
GS24pmbhasuu:12370_1: aho na . kim ca ataḥ . śūṭtve kṅidadhikāraḥ cet chaḥ ṣatvam . śūṭtve kṅidadhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12370_2: cet chaḥ ṣatvam vaktavyam . praṣṭā , praṣṭum ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12371: praṣṭavyam . tukprasaṅgaḥ ca . tuk ca prāpnoti . nivṛtte api kṅidgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12372: avaśyam atra tugabhāvārthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . antaraṅgatvāt hi tuk
GS24pmbhasuu:12373_0: prāpnoti . cchvoḥ iti sannipātagrahaṇam vijñāyate . nanu evam api antyasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12373_1: . sannipātagrahaṇasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . evam api aṅgasya prāpnoti . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12373_2: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam aṅgasya na bhaviṣyati . yadi evam utpucchayateḥ apratyayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12373_3: utpuṭ iti prāpnoti , utput iti ca iṣyate . tathā vāñchateḥ apratyayaḥ vān , vāṃśau
GS24pmbhasuu:12373_4: vāṃśaḥ iti na sidhyati . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte . tatra tu etāvān viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12374_0: anuvartamāne kṅidgrahaṇe chaḥ ṣatvam vaktavyam tatra ca api sannipātagrahaṇam vijñeyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12374_1: . nivṛtte divaḥ ūḍbhāvaḥ . nivṛtte divaḥ ūḍbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . dyubhyām , dyubhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12374_2: astu . katham dyubhyām , dyubhiḥ iti . ūṭhi kṛte divaḥ ut iti uttvam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12374_3: na sidhyati . āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ prāpnoti . tadartham taparaḥ kṛtaḥ . evamartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12374_4: taparaḥ kriyate . kva punaḥ kṅidgrahaṇam prakṛtam . anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:12375_0: iti . yadi tat anuvartate ajjhanagamām sani kvijhaloḥ ca iti kvijhaloḥ api dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12375_1: prāpnoti . jhali tāvat na doṣaḥ . sanam jhalgrahaṇena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau
GS24pmbhasuu:12375_2: iti . kvau api ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena kvau dīrghatvam bhavati iti yat
GS24pmbhasuu:12375_3: ayam kvibvacipracchyāyatastukaṭaprujuśrīṇām dīrghaḥ asamprasāram ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12378: asiddhavacane uktam . kim uktam . tatra tāvat uktam ṣatvatukoḥ asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12379_0: . iha api asiddhavacanam ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham utsargalakṣaṇabhāvārtham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12379_1: . ādeśalakṣaṇapratiṣedhāṛtham tāvat . āgahi jahi gataḥ , gatavān . anunāsikalope
GS24pmbhasuu:12379_2: jabhāve ca kṛte ataḥ lopaḥ , ataḥ heḥ iti ca prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12380: edhi śādhi . astiśāstyoḥ ettvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ jhallakṣaṇam dhitvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:12381: prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . atha atragrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12382: atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham . viṣayaḥ pratinirdiśyate . atra etasmin ābhācchāstre ābhācchāstram asiddham yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt : abhāji,
GS24pmbhasuu:12385: yogasya prayojanāni . prayojanam śaittvam dhitve . śābhāvaḥ ettvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12386: dhitve prayojanam . edhi śādhi . astiśāstyoḥ ettvaśābhāvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12387: jhallakṣaṇam dhitvam na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . śābhāvaḥ tāvat na
GS24pmbhasuu:12388: prayojayati . evam vakṣyāmi . śās hau śā hau iti . yatvabhūtaḥ sakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12389: tatra sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . atha vā , ā hau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12390_0: vakṣyāmi . evam api sakārasya prāpnoti . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate . upadhāyāḥ ātve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12390_1: sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ . atha vā na hau iti vakṣyāmi . tatra ettve
GS24pmbhasuu:12390_2: pratiṣiddhe sāt dhitvam dhi ca iti sakārasya lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12391: . ettvam api lopāpavādaḥ vijñāsyate na ca sakārasya lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12392_0: hilopaḥ uttve . hilopaḥ uttve prayojanam . kuru iti atra hilope kṛte sārvadhātukapare
GS24pmbhasuu:12392_1: ukāre iti uttvam na prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12392_2: . vakṣyati tatra sārvadhātukagrahaṇasya prayojanam sārvadhātuke bhūtapūrvamātre yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12392_3: styāt uttvam . tāstilopeṇyaṇādeśāḥ aḍāḍvidhau . talopaḥ astilopaḥ iṇaḥ ca yaṇādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12393: akāri , aihī iti . talope kṛte luṅi iti aḍāṭau na klprāpnutaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12394: asiddhatvāt bhavataḥ . astilopaḥ iṇaḥ ca yaṇādeśaḥ prayojanam . āsan ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12395: āyan iti . iṇastyoḥ yaṇlopayoḥ kṛtayoḥ anajāditvāt āṭ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12396: asiddhatvāt bhavati . astilopaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati lopāt āṭ balīyān iti yat ayam śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti taparakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12397_0: karoti . iṇyaṇādeśaḥ ca api na prayojayati . yaṇādeśe yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . iṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12397_1: yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ eḥ anekācaḥ . eḥ ca anekācaḥ iṇaḥ yaṇ bhavati . tataḥ asaṃyogapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12397_2: yaṇ bhavati . eḥ anekācaḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12398: sarveṣām eva parihāraḥ . upadeśaḥ iti vartate . tatra upadeśāvasthāyām eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12399: aḍāṭau bhavataḥ . atha vā ārdhadhātuke iti vartate . atha vā luṅlaṅlṛṅkṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12400: aṭ iti dvilakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ : luṅādiṣu lakārādiṣu iti . sarvathā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12401: aijyata , aupyata iti na sidhyati . vakṣyati etat ajādīnām aṭā siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12402: . anunāsikalopaḥ hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca . anunāsikalopaḥ hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca prayojanam . āgahi jahi gataḥ , gatavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:12403: anunāsikalope kṛte jabhāve ca ataḥ heḥ ataḥ lopaḥ iti ca lopaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12404: asiddhatvāt na bhavati . anunāsikalopaḥ tāvat na prayojayati . allope upadeśe iti vartate . yadi upadeśe iti vartate dhinutaḥ , kṛṇutaḥ atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:12405: prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na upadeśagrahaṇena prakṛtiḥ abhisambadhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12406: kim tarhi . ārdhadhātukam abhisambadhyate : ārdhadhātukopadeśe yat akārāntam iti . jabhāvaḥ ca na prayojayati . hilope yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12407: . ataḥ heḥ . tataḥ utaḥ ca . utaḥ ca heḥ luk bhavati iti . tataḥ pratyayāt . pratyayāt iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . atha kimartham anunāsikalopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12408: hilopāllopayoḥ jabhāvaḥ ca iti ucyate na anunāsikalopajabhāvau allopahilopayoḥ iti eva ucyate . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12409: anunāsikalopaḥ hilope prayojayati . maṇḍūki tābhiḥ āgahi . rohitaḥ ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12410_0: a gahi . marudbhiḥ agne agahi . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope . samprasāraṇam avarṇalope
GS24pmbhasuu:12410_1: prayojanam . madhonaḥ paśya . maghonā , maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12410_2: prāpnoti . asiddhatvāt na bhavati . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:12411: prayojanam . vakṣyati etat : maghavanśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12412: rebhāvaḥ āllope . rebhāvaḥ āllope prayojanam . kim svit garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ . rebhāve kṛte ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12413: asiddhatvāt bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . chāndasaḥ rebhāvaḥ liṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12414: ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati . tatra sārvadhātukam apit ṅit bhavati iti ṅitvam . śnābhyastayoḥ ātaḥ iti ākāralopaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12415_0: (P_6,4.22.3) KA_III.189.14-190.9 Ro_IV.693-695 yadi tarhi ayam yogaḥ na ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12415_1: , ut tu kṛñaḥ katham oḥ vinivṛttau . iha kurvaḥ kurmaḥ kuryāt iti ukāralope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12415_2: sārvadhātukapare ukāre iti uttvam na prāpnoti . ṇeḥ api ca iṭi katham vinivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12415_3: . iha ca kārayateḥ kāriṣyate ṇeḥ aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ na prāpnoti . abruvataḥ tava yogam
GS24pmbhasuu:12415_4: imam syāt luk ca ciṇaḥ nu
GS24pmbhasuu:12416_0: katham na tarasya . iha ca , akāritarām ahāritarām iti ciṇaḥ uttarasya tarasya luk
GS24pmbhasuu:12416_1: na syāt . cam bhagavān kṛtavān tu tadartham tena bhavet iṭi ṇeḥ nivṛttiḥ . iha syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12416_2: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ upadeśe ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat iṭ ca kim ca . ṇilopaḥ ca . mvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12416_3: api ye ca tathā api anuvṛttau . iha api kurvaḥ kurmaḥ kuryāt iti mvoḥ ye ca iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:12416_4: api anuvartiṣyate . ciṇluki ca kṅitaḥ eva luk syāt . ciṇluki api prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:12417: kṅidgrahaṇam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . gamahanakhanaghasām lopaḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:12418: anaṅi iti . tat vai saptamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca iha arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12419_0: ciṇaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī kṅiti iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm lprakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12419_1: iti . ut tu kṛñaḥ katham oḥ vinivṛttau . ṇeḥ api ca iṭi katham vinivṛttiḥ . abruvataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12419_2: tava yogam imam syāt luk ca ciṇaḥ nu katham na tarasya . cam bhagavān kṛtavān tu
GS24pmbhasuu:12420: nivṛttiḥ . mvoḥ api ye ca tathā api anuvṛttau . ciṇluki ca kṅitaḥ eva luk syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12422: yoge siddham vasusamprasāraṇam ajvidhau . vasusamprasāraṇam ajvidhau siddham vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . papuṣaḥ paśya . tasthuṣaḥ paśya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12423: ninyuṣaḥ paśya . cicyuṣaḥ paśya . luluvuṣaḥ paśya . pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12424: vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte aci iti ākāralopādīni yathā syuḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyanti . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt asiddhatvāt ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12425_0: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam ca eva hi vasusamprasāraṇam asiddham ca . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12425_1: paśuṣaḥ na vājān cākhāyitā cākhāyitum . āttvam yalopāllopayoḥ siddham vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12426: paśuṣaḥ iti ātttvasya asiddhatvāt ātaḥ dhātoḥ iti ākāralopaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12427: cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti āttvasya asiddhatvāt yasya halaḥ iti yalopaḥ prāpnoti . samānāśrayavacanāt siddham . samānāśrayam asiddham bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12428_0: vyāśrayam ca etat . iha tāvat papuṣaḥ paśya , tasthuṣaḥ paśya , ninyuṣaḥ paśya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12428_1: cicyuṣaḥ paśya , luluvuṣaḥ paśya , pupuvuṣaḥ paśya iti . vasau ākāralopādīni vasantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12428_2: vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . paśuṣaḥ iti viṭi āttvam viḍantasya vibhaktau ākāralopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12428_3: . cākhāyitā cākhāyitum iti yaṅi āttvam yaṅantasya ca ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:12428_4: vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . atragrahaṇasāmarthyāt . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:12429: atragrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam . kim uktam . atragrahaṇam viṣayārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_0: . adhikārāt api etat siddham . iha papuṣaḥ , cicyuṣaḥ , luluvuṣaḥ , dvau hetū vypadiṣṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_1: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam asiddhatvam ca iti . tatra bhavaet asiddhatvam pratyuktam bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_2: tu na eva pratyuktam . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ bahiraṅgam antaraṅgam iti ca pratidvandvibhāvinau
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_3: etau arthau katham . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati ca bahiraṅge antaraṅgam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_4: ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam asti . na anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_5: antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva bahiraṅgam antaraṅgasya . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12430_6: ca ayādeśe lyapi . hrasvayalopāllopāḥ ca ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12431: lyapi siddhāḥ vaktavyāḥ . praśamayya gataḥ , pratamayya gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12432: prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12433: pragadayya gataḥ . hrasvayalopāllopānām asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ parihāraḥ samānāśrayavacanāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12434: iti . katham . ṇau ete vidhayaḥ ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ . vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_0: vugyuṭau uvaṅyaṇoḥ siddhau vaktavyau . babhūvatuḥ , babhūvuḥ : vukaḥ asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_1: uvaṅādeśaḥ prāpnoti . upadidīye , upadidīyāte : yuṭaḥ asiddhatvāt yaṇādeśaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_2: . vukaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ . vukam na vakṣyāmi . evam vakṣyāmi : bhuvaḥ luṅliṭoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_3: ūt upadhāyāḥ iti . atra uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12435_4: api kutaḥ nu khalu etat uvaṅādeśe kṛte yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12436: sāmpratikī yā upadhā tasyāḥ syāt bhakārasya . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . oḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham babhūvatuḥ , babhūvuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12437: . idam tu na sidhyati : babhūva babhūvitha iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_0: guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ uvarṇābhāvāt . na atra guṇavṛddhī prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_1: kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhāt . katham kittvam . indhibhavatibhyām ca iti . tat vai vayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_2: kittvam pratyācakṣmahe vukā . iha tu kittvena vuk pratyākhyāyate . kim punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_3: nyāyyam . vugvacanam eva nyāyyam . sati api hi kittve syātām eva atra guṇavṛddhī
GS24pmbhasuu:12438_4: . kim kāraṇam . iglakṣaṇayoḥ guṇavṛddhyoḥ saḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na ca eṣā iglakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_0: arthaḥ vukā na api kittvena . stām atra guṇavṛddhī . guṇavṛddhyoḥ kṛtayoḥ avāvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_1: ca kṛtayoḥ yā upadhā tasyāḥ ūttvam bhaviṣyati . katham . oḥ iti atra avarṇam api
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_2: pratinirdiśyate . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapaḥ paśya . śubhaṃyaḥ paśya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_3: . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi prāpnoti . kīlālapau kīlālapāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_4: evam tarhi vyoḥ iti vartate . tena uvarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . oḥ vyoḥ iti . iha idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_5: oḥ iti anuvartate . vyoḥ iti nivṛttam . yuṭaḥ ca api na vaktavyam . yuḍvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_6: na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat yuḍvacane prayojanam . kim . dvayoḥ yakārayoḥ śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12439_7: yathā syāt . na vyañjanaparasya anekasya ekasya vā yakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_0: (P_6,4.22.5) KA_III.192.9-193.19 Ro_IV.701-705 kim punaḥ prāk bhāt asiddhatvam āhosvit
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_1: saha tena . kutaḥ punaḥ ayam sandehaḥ . āṅā ayam nirdeśaḥ kriyate āṅ ca punaḥ sandeham
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_2: janayati . tat yathā : ā pāṭaliputrāt vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ iti sandehaḥ : kim prāk pāṭaliputrāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12441_3: saha tena iti . evam iha api sandehaḥ : prāk bhāt saha tena iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12442_0: viśeṣaḥ . prāk bhāt iti cet sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam . prāk bhāt iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:12442_1: sunāmaghonābhūguṇeṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . śunaḥ paśya . śunā śune . samprasāraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:12442_2: kṛte allopaḥ anaḥ iti prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12443: bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12444: katham . na astri atra viśeṣaḥ allopena vā nivṛttau satyām pūrvatvena vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12445_0: ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . allopena nivṛttau satyām udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prasajyeta . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12445_1: atra udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na gośvansāvavarṇa iti pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12446: pratiṣedhaḥ . kasya tarhi . tṛtīyādisvarasya . yatra tarhi tṛtīyādisvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12447: na asti . śunaḥ paśya iti . evam tarhi na vayam lakṣaṇasya pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:12448: śiṣmaḥ . kim tarhi yena kena cit lakṣaṇena prāptasya vibhaktisvarasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12449_0: pratiṣedhaḥ . yatra tarhi vibhaktisvaraḥ na asti . bahuśunī iti . yadi punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12449_1: udāttanivṛttisvarasya api pratiṣedhaḥ vijñāyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasjyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_0: jñāpayati na udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ śuni avatarati iti yat ayam śvanśabdam gaurādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_1: paṭhati . antodāttārtham yatnam karoti . siddham hi syāt ṅīpā eva . maghonaḥ paśya
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_2: . maghonā maghone . samprasāraṇe kṛte yasya iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:12450_3: tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12451: katham . vakṣyati etat maghavan-śabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12452: bhūguṇaḥ . bhūyān . bhūbhāve kṛte oḥ guṇaḥ prāpnoti . yasya punaḥ saha
GS24pmbhasuu:12453_0: tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt tasya na bhaviṣyati . yasya api prāk bhāt asiddhatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12453_1: tasya api eṣaḥ na doṣaḥ . katham . dīrghoccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . asti dīrghoccāraṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12454: nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam . bahoḥ nañvat uttarapadabhūmni iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12455: . atha vā punaḥ astu saha tena iti . ā bhāt iti cet susamprasāraṇayalopaprasthādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ . papuṣaḥ paśya . tasthuṣaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12456: ninyuṣaḥ , cicyuṣaḥ , luluvuṣaḥ , pupuvuṣaḥ iti . vasoḥ samprasāraṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12457: aci iti ākāralopādīni na sidhyanti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat samānāśrayavacanāt siddham iti . katham . vasau ākāralopādīni vasantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_0: vibhaktau samprasāraṇam . yalopaḥ . saurī balākā . yaḥ asau aṇi akāraḥ lupyate tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_1: asiddhatvāt īti yalopaḥ na prāpnoti . atra api eṣaḥ eva parihāraḥ . samānāśrayavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_2: siddham iti . katham . aṇi akāralopaḥ aṇantasya īti lopaḥ . prasthādiṣu . preyān
GS24pmbhasuu:12458_3: , stheyān . prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12459: yathā eva prasthādīnām asiddhatvāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ na prāpnoti evam ṭilopaḥ api na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12461_0: saśakārasya grahaṇam kriyate na nāt nalopaḥ iti eva ucyeta . nāt nalopaḥ iti iyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12461_1: ucyamāne nanditā nandakaḥ iti atra api prasajyeta . evam tarhi evam vakṣyāmi nāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12461_2: nalopaḥ aniditām . tataḥ halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12462: aniditām iti . na evam śakyam . iha na syāt : hinasti . tasmāt na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12463_0: śakyam . na cet evam nanditā nandakaḥ iti prāpnoti . evam tarhi kṅiti iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:12463_1: . evam api hinasti iti atra na prāpnoti . na eṣā parasaptamī . kā tarhi . satsaptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:12463_2: . kṅiti sati . evam tarhi naśabdaḥ eva atra kṅittvena
GS24pmbhasuu:12464_0: viśeṣyate kṅit cet naśabdaḥ bhavati iti . evam api yajñānām , yatnānām iti atra na
GS24pmbhasuu:12464_1: prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12464_2: kriyatām nalopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12465: paratvāt nalopaḥ . tasmāt saśakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api saśakāragrahaṇe iha kasmāt na bhavati viśnānām , praśnānām iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12466: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12467_0: (P_6,4.24) KA_III.194.10-195.4 Ro_IV.707-709 aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12467_1: upasaṅkhyānam . aniditām nalope laṅgikampyoḥ upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12468: vikapitaḥ . upatapaśarīravikārayoḥ iti kimartham . vilaṅgitaḥ , vikampitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12469: . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi . bṛheḥ aci aniṭi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . nibarhayati nibarhakaḥ . aci iti kimartham . nibṛṃhyate . aniṭi iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12470: nibṛṃhitā nibṛṃhitum . tat tu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12471: bṛhiḥ prakṛtyantaram . katham jñāyate . aci iti lopaḥ ucyate . anajādau api dṛśyate : nibṛhyate . aniṭi iti ucyate . iṭau api dṛśyate : nibarhitum
GS24pmbhasuu:12472: . ajādau iti ucyate . ajādau api na dṛśyate : nibṛṃhayati nibṛṃhakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12473: rañjeḥ ṇau mṛgamaraṇe upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . rajayati mṛgān .
GS24pmbhasuu:12474: mṛgamaraṇe iti kimartham . rañjayati vastrāṇi . ghinuṇi ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12475: kartavyam . rāgī . ghinuṇi nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam . tyajaraja iti . aśakyam dhātunirdeśe nipātanam tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12476: : daśahanaḥ karaṇe : daṃṣṭrā . na etat dhātunipātanam . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:12477: pratyayāntasya etat rūpam . tasmin ca asya pratyaye lopaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12478: daṃśasañjasvañjām śapi iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12479: rajakaḥ , rajananam , rajaḥ iti . rajakarajanarajaḥsu kittvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12480: kitaḥ eva ete auṇādikāḥ . tat yathā rucakaḥ , bhuvanam , śiraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12481: (P_6,4.34) KA_III.195.8-196.2 Ro_IV.709-711 śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau .
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_0: śāsaḥ ittve āśāsaḥ kvau upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . āśīḥ iti . kim punaḥ idam niyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_1: āhosvit vidhyartham . katham ca niyamārtham syāt katham vā vidhyartham . yadi tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_2: śāsimātrasya grahaṇam tataḥ niyamārtham . athi hi yasmāt śāsaḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_3: tataḥ vidhyartham . yadi api śāsimātrasya grahaṇam evam api vidhyartham eva . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_4: . aṅhaloḥ iti ucyate na ca atra halādim paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca kvip eva halādiḥ . kvipaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_5: lope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . kviblopaḥ kriyatām
GS24pmbhasuu:12482_6: aṅhaloḥ itttvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt aṅhaloḥ itttvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12483: . nityaḥ kviblopaḥ . kṛte api aṅhaloḥ itttve prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:12484_0: nityatvāt kviblope kṛte halādyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . evam tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:12484_1: bhaviṣyati . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . yadi vā kāni cit varṇāśrayāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:12484_2: api pratyayalakṣaṇena bhavanti tathā ca idam api
GS24pmbhasuu:12485: bhaviṣyati . atha vā evam vakṣyāmi . śāsaḥ it aṅhaloḥ . tataḥ kvau . kvau ca śāsaḥ it bhavati . āryaśīḥ , mitraśīḥ . tataḥ āṅaḥ . āṅpūrvāt ca kvau
GS24pmbhasuu:12486: śāsaḥ it bhavati . āśīḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12487: āṅpūrvāt śāsaḥ kvau eva . kva mā bhūt . āśāsyate , āśāsyamānaḥ iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa śāsaḥ it bhavati iti uktvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12488: tataḥ aṅi iti vakṣyāmi . tat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . aṅi eva ajādau na anyasmin ajādau iti . iha api tarhi niyamāt ittvam prāpnoti . āśāsyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12489: āśāsyamānaḥ iti . yasmāt śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ tasya grahaṇam na ca etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12490: śāseḥ aṅ vihitaḥ . katham āśīḥ iti . nipātanāt siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12492_0: (P_6,4.37) KA_III.196.5-8 Ro_IV.711 anudāttopadeśe anunāsikalopaḥ lyapi ca . anudāttopadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12492_1: anunāsikalopaḥ lyapi ca iti vaktavyam . pramatya pratatya . tataḥ vā amaḥ . vā amaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12492_2: iti vaktavyam . prayatya prayamya praratya praramya praṇatya praṇamya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12493: (P_6,4.40) KA_III.196.10-12 Ro_IV.712 gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . parītat sahakaṇṭhikā . saṃyat , sanut iti . ūṅ ca gamādīnām iti vaktavyam . agregūḥ , bhrūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12494: (P_6,4.42.1) KA_III.196.14-22 Ro_IV.712-713 atha kim ayam samuccayaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12495: sani ca jhalādau ca iti , āhosvit sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam , sani jhalādau iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi samuccayaḥ sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12496: sisaniṣati jijaniṣate cikhaniṣati . atha sanviśeṣaṇam jhalgrahaṇam jātaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12497: jātavān iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat samuccayaḥ . nanu ca uktam sani ajhalādau api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_0: . prakṛtam jhalgrahaṇam anuvartate . tena sanam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . sani jhalādau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_1: . atha vā punaḥ astu sanviśeṣaṇam . katham jātaḥ , jātavān iti . prakṛtam jhali kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_2: iti anuvartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . janasanakhanām
GS24pmbhasuu:12498_3: anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali kṅiti . tataḥ sani . sani ca janasanakhanām
GS24pmbhasuu:12499: anunāsikasya ākāraḥ bhavati jhali iti eva . tasmāt na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:12500_0: (P_6,4.42.2) KA_III.197.1-198.12 Ro_IV.713-716 sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12500_1: . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopāt āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12501: āttvasya avakāśaḥ anye janādayaḥ . sanoteḥ anunāsikasya ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12502: sātaḥ sātavān iti . āttvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12503: vipratiṣedhaḥ . na hi sanoteḥ anunāsikalopasya anye tanotyādayaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12504: . sanoteḥ yaḥ tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ saḥ anavakāśaḥ . na khalu api āttvasya anye janādayaḥ avakāśaḥ . sanoteḥ yat āttve grahaṇam tat anavakāśam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12505_0: tasya anavakāśatvāt ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam tarhi tanotyādiṣu pāṭhaḥ tāvat sāvakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12505_1: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anyāni tanotyādikāryāṇi . tanādibhyaḥ tathāsoḥ iti . āttve api grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12505_2: sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . sani ca ye
GS24pmbhasuu:12506: vibhāṣā ca . ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . evam api ayuktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_0: vipratiṣedhaḥ . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ pūrvatra asiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_1: uttarasya iti . ekasya nāma abhāve vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt kim punaḥ yatra ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_2: na asti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_3: . katham anucyamām gaṃsyate ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12507_4: yat ayam ghumāśthāgāpājahātisām hali iti halgrahaṇam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12508: . halgrahaṇasya etat prayojanam halādau īttvam yathā syāt iha mā bhūt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12509: godaḥ , kambaladaḥ iti . yadi ca atra vipratiṣedhaḥ na syāt halgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . astu atra īttvam . īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12510: . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ . tataḥ halgrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12511: . na etat asti jñāpakam . vyavasthārtham etat syāt . halādau īttvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12512_0: syāt ajādau mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . iyaṅādeśaḥ prasajyeta . nanu ca asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12512_1: eva iyaṅādeśaḥ na bhaviṣyati . na śakyam īttvam iyaṅādeśe asiddham vijñātum . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12512_2: hi doṣaḥ syāt : dhiyau dhiyaḥ piyau piyaḥ iti . na etat īttvam . kim tarhi . dhyāpyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12512_3: samprasāraṇam etat . samānāśrayam khalu api asiddham bhavati vyāśram ca etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12513: vibhaktau iyaṅādeśaḥ . vyavasthārtham eva tarhi halgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12514_0: kutaḥ hi etat īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ na punaḥ lopasya asiddhatvāt īttvam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12514_1: . tatra cakrakam avyavasthā prasajyeta . na asti cakrakaprasaṅgaḥ . na hi avyavasthākāriṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:12514_2: śāstreṇa bhavitavyam . śāstrataḥ nāma vyavasthā . tatra īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12515_0: bhaviṣyati . na khalu api tasmin tat eva asiddham bhavati . vyavasthārtham eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12515_1: halgrahaṇam kartavyam . halādau īttvam yathā syāt ajādau mā bhūt iti . kutaḥ hi etat
GS24pmbhasuu:12515_2: īttvasya asiddhatvāt lopaḥ lopena avasthānam bhaviṣyati na punaḥ lopasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12516: tat eva khalu api tasmin asiddham bhavati . katham . paṭhiṣyati hi ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12517_0: ciṇaḥ luki tagrahaṇānarthakyam saṅghātasya apratyayatvāt talopasya ca asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12517_1: iti . ciṇaḥ luk ciṇaḥ luki eva asiddhaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi yadi vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12517_2: etat syāt na eva ayam halgrahaṇam kurvīta . aviśeṣeṇa ayam īttvam uktvā tasya ajādau
GS24pmbhasuu:12517_3: lopam apavādam vidadhīta . idam asti . ātaḥ lopaḥ iṭi ca iti . tataḥ ghumāśthāgāpājahātisām
GS24pmbhasuu:12517_4: . lopaḥ bhavati iṭi ca ajādau kṅiti . kimartham punaḥ idam . īttvam vakṣyāmi tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12518: tataḥ īt . īt ca bhavati ghvādīnām . tataḥ eḥ liṅi . vā anyasya saṃyogādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12519: . na lyapi . mayateḥ it anyatarasyām . tataḥ yati . yati ca īt bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12520: saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat halgrahaṇam karoti garīyāṃsam yatnam ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati iha vipratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12522: akartum . katham . sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca ātttvam ca vibhāṣā iti . aparaḥ āha : sarvaḥ eva ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum . katham . iha lopaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:12523: prakṛtaḥ āttvam api prakṛtam vibhāṣāgrahaṇam api prakṛtam . tatra kevalam abhisambandhamātram kartavyam : sanaḥ ktici lopaḥ ca āttvam ca vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12524: (P_6,4.46) KA_III.198.20-199.15 Ro_IV.717-721 kāni punaḥ ārdhadhātukādhikārasya prayojanāni . ataḥ lopaḥ yalopaḥ ca ṇilopaḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12525: prayojanam āllopaḥ īttvam etvam ca ciṇvadbhāvaḥ ca sīyuṭi . ataḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12526: cikīrṣitā cikīrṣitum . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . cikīrṣati . na etat asti prayojanam . astu atra sanaḥ akāralopaḥ . śapaḥ akārasya śravaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12527: bhaviṣyati . śapaḥ eva tarhi mā bhūt . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12528_0: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anena śabakārasya lopaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam adiprabhṛtibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12528_1: śapaḥ lukam śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . kāryāṛtham etat syāt . vittaḥ , mṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12528_2: iti . yat tarhi ākārāntebhyaḥ lukam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12529: idam tarhi prayojanam . vṛkṣasya plakṣasya . ataḥ lopaḥ . prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12530: yalopaḥ api prayojanam . bebhiditā cecchiditā . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . bebhidyate cecchidyate . ṇilopaḥ . pācyate yājyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12531: āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . pācayati yājayati . āllopaḥ . yayatuḥ yayuḥ . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . yānti vānti . īttvam . dīyate , dhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12532: āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . adātām adhātām . etvam . sneyāt , mleyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12533: āradhadhātuke iti kimartham . snāyāt . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ ca sīyuṭi .
GS24pmbhasuu:12534_0: ciṇvadbhāve sīyuṭi kim udāharaṇam . kāriṣīṣṭa hāriṣīṣṭa . āradhadhātuke iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12534_1: . kriyeta hriyeta . na etat udāharaṇam . yakā vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:12534_2: tarhi udāharaṇam : prasnuvīta . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:12535: udāharaṇam : kriyeta hriyeta . nanu ca uktam yakā vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:12536: bhaviṣyati iti . yakaḥ eva tarhi mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . vṛddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12538: (P_6,4.47) KA_III.199.17-200.11 Ro_IV.721-723 ayam ram rephasya sthāne kasmāt na bhavati . mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti anena acām antyāt paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12539: kriyate . rephasya tarhi śravaṇam kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12540: ṣaṣṭhyuccāraṇasāmarthyāt . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti bhrasjaḥ ropadhayoḥ lopaḥ āgamaḥ ram vidhīyate iti . bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12541_0: . bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . bhrasjādeśasya avakāśaḥ : bharṣṭā
GS24pmbhasuu:12541_1: bhraṣṭā . samprasāraṇasya avakāśaḥ : bhṛjjati . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : bhṛṣṭaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12541_2: bhṛṣṭavān . samprasāraṇam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12542_0: raseḥ vā ṛvacanāt siddham . rasoḥ vā ṛ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi . rasoḥ vā ṛvacane sici
GS24pmbhasuu:12542_1: vṛddheḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ . rasoḥ vā ṛvacane sici vṛddheḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛddhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12542_2: kṛtāyām idam eva rūpam syāt : abhrākṣīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12543_0: idam na syāt : abhārkṣīt . sarvathā vayam pūrvavipratiṣedhāt na mucyāmahe sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:12543_1: ca bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam bhrasjādeśāt samprasāraṇam vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12543_2: iti . idam iha sampradhāryam . bhrasjādeśaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12544: nityatvāt samprasāraṇam . kṛte api bhrasjādeśe prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:12545: bhrasjādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . kṛte api samprasāraṇe prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:12546_0: prāpnoti . katham . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tasya ca upadhāyāḥ ca kṛte api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12546_1: . anityaḥ bhrasjādeśaḥ . na hi kṛte samprasāraṇe prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . na hi varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12547: evam api anityaḥ . katham . upadeśaḥ iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12549_2: . ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ : kāryate hāryate . iyaṅādeśasya avakāśaḥ : śriyau śriyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12549_3: iha ubhayam prāpnoti : āṭiṭat , āśiśat . nanu ca atra yaṇādeśena bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12550: idam tarhi : atatakṣat , ararakṣat . yaṇādeśasya avakāśaḥ : ninyatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12551: ninyuḥ . ṇilopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : āṭiṭat , āśiśat .
GS24pmbhasuu:12552_0: vṛddeḥ avakāśaḥ : sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ . ṇilopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12552_1: kārayateḥ kārakaḥ , hārayateḥ hārakaḥ . guṇasya avakāśaḥ : cetā stotā . ṇilopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12552_2: avakāśaḥ : āṭiṭat , āśiśat . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12553: kāraṇā hāraṇā . dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ : cīyate , stūyate . ṇilopasya avakāśaḥ : kāraṇā hāraṇā . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : kāryate hāryati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12554: ṇilopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12555: na vaktavyaḥ . santu atra ete vidhayaḥ . eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12556: sthānivadbhāvāt ṇigrahaṇena grahaṇāt ṇilopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na evam śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12557: iyaṅādeśe hi doṣaḥ syāt . antyasya lopaḥ prasajyeta . allopasya iyaṅyaṇoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ : priyam ācaṣṭe prāpayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12558: allopasya avakāśaḥ : cikīrṣitā cikīrṣitum . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12559: cikīrṣakaḥ , jihīrṣakaḥ . guṇasya allopasya ca na asti sampradhāraṇā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12560: dīrghatvasya avakāśaḥ : api kākaḥ śyenāyate . allopasya saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : cikīrṣyate jihīrṣyate . allopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12561: . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12563: varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ . yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:12564_0: dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śucyitā śucyitum . asti tarjo saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12564_1: . yadi saṅghātagrahaṇam antyasya lopaḥ prāpnoti . siddhaḥ antyasya pūrveṇa eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12564_2: tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt sarvasya bhaviṣyati . evam api tena atiprasaktam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12564_3: niyamaḥ vijñāyeta . yasya halaḥ eva na anyataḥ . kva mā bhūt . lolūyitā popūyitā
GS24pmbhasuu:12565_0: . vidheyam na asti iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . antyasya lopaḥ prāptaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12565_1: saḥ sarvasya vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyama astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12565_2: bhaviṣyati na niyamaḥ . evam api antyasya prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12566: kim kāraṇam . na hi lopaḥ sarvāpahārī . nanu ca saṅghātagrahaṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12567: sarvasya bhaviṣyati . saṅghātagrahaṇam cet kyasya vibhāṣāyām doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12568_0: saṅghātagrahaṇam cet kyasya vibhāṣāyām doṣaḥ bhavati . samidhitā samidhyitā . yadā
GS24pmbhasuu:12568_1: lopaḥ tadā sarvasya lopaḥ . yadā alopaḥ tadā sarvasya alopaḥ prāpnoti . ādeḥ paravacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12568_2: siddham . halaḥ iti pañcamī . tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti yakārasya eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12569_0: astu varṇagrahaṇam . nanu ca uktam yalope varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12569_1: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti hi vartate . na vā aṅgāt iti pañcamī asti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12569_2: tarhi aṅgasya iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī vijñāsyate . aṅgasya yaḥ yakāraḥ . kim ca aṅgasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12569_3: yakāraḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:12570: (P_6,4.51) KA_III.202.4-9 Ro_IV.728 atha aniṭi iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12571_0: kārayitā kārayitum . aniṭi iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati kārayitā kārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:12571_1: . niṣṭhāyām seṭi iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . niṣṭhāyām eva seṭi ṇeḥ lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12571_2: na ayatra . kva mā bhūt . kārayitā kārayitum . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12571_3: . idam asti . niṣṭhāyām seṭi . janita mantra . śamitā yajñe . tataḥ ay . ayādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12571_4: bhavati ṇeḥ seṭi . tata āmantālvāyetnviṣṇuṣu ay bhavati iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12572_0: (P_6,4.52.1) KA_III.202.11-203.6 Ro_IV.728-730 atha seḍgrahaṇam kimartham . niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12572_1: seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam kriyate aniṭi pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12572_2: yathā syāt iti . sañjñapitaḥ paśuḥ iti . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12572_3: iti cet tat siddham aniḍabhāvāt . niṣṭhāyām seḍgrahaṇam aniṭi pratiṣedhārtham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12572_4: cet antareṇa api seḍgrahaṇam tat siddham . katham . aniḍabhāvāt . nanu ca yasya vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:12572_5: iti jñapeḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ . ekācaḥ hi pratiṣedhaḥ . ekācaḥ hi saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12573: pratiṣedhaḥ jñapiḥ ca anekāc . iḍbhāvārtham tu tannimittatvāt lopasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12574: iḍbhāvārtham tarhi seḍgrahaṇam kriyate . katham punaḥ seṭi iti anena iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12575: śakyaḥ bhāvayitum . tannimittatvāt lopasya . na atra akṛte iṭi ṇilopena bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . seṭi iti ucyate . avacane hi ṇilope
GS24pmbhasuu:12576_0: iṭpratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi seḍgrahaṇe ṇilope kṛte ekācaḥ iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12576_1: prasajyeta . kāritam , hāritam . evam tarhi na arthaḥ seḍgrahaṇena na api sūtreṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:12577: idam asti . niṣṭhāyām na iṭ bhavati . tataḥ ṇeḥ . ṇyantasya niṣṭhāyām na
GS24pmbhasuu:12578: iṭ bhavati . kāritam , hāritam . tataḥ vṛttam . vṛttam iti ca nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12579: kim nipātyate . ṇeḥ niṣṭhāyām lopaḥ nipātyate . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12580: niyamārtham . atra eva ṇeḥ niṣṭhāyām lopaḥ bhavati na anyatra . kva mā bhūt . kāritam , hāritam . iha api tarhi prāpnoti : vartitam annam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12581: vartitā bhikṣā iti . tataḥ adhyayane . adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12582_1: . vṛdhiramiśṛdhīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kim kāraṇam . sārvadhātukatvāt . vardhantu
GS24pmbhasuu:12582_2: tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me . vardhayantu iti evam prāpte . bṛhaspatiḥ tvā sumne ramṇātu
GS24pmbhasuu:12583: agne śardha mahate saubhagāya . śardhaya iti evam prāpte . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vṛdhiramiśṛdhīnām ārdhadhātukatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12584: katham ārdhadhātukatvam . anye api hi dhātupratyayāḥ ubhayathā chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:12586: (P_6,4.55) KA_III.203.14-20 Ro_IV.731-732 kim punaḥ ayam ktnuḥ āhosvit itnuḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ktnau iṭi ṇeḥ guṇavacanam . ktnau iṭi ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12587_0: guṇaḥ vaktavtyaḥ . gadayitnuḥ , stanayitnuḥ . astu tarhi itnuḥ . itnau pratyayāntarakaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12587_1: . yadi tarhi itnuḥ pratyayāntaram kartavyam . ayādeśe ca upasaṅkhyānam . ayādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:12587_2: ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ubhayam kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12589_0: cet vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam . lyapi laghupūrvasya iti cet vyañjanānteṣu upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12589_1: kartavyam . praśamayya gataḥ . pratamayya gataḥ . allope ca gurupūrvāt pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12590: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pracikīrṣya gataḥ . lyapi laghupūrvāt iti vacanāt siddham . lyapi laghupūrvāt iti vaktavyam . evam api hrasvayalopāllopānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12591: asiddhatvāt lyapi laghupūrvāt iti ayādeśaḥ na prāpnoti . praśamayya gataḥ . pratamayya gataḥ . prabebhidayya gataḥ . pracecchidayya gataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12592: pragadayya gataḥ . prastanayya gataḥ . hrasvādiṣu ca uktam . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12593: samānāśrayatvāt siddham iti . katham . ṇau ete vidhayaḥ . ṇeḥ lyapi ayādeśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12594_0: (P_6,4.57) KA_III.204.11-15 Ro_IV. 734 iṅādeśasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . adhyāpya
GS24pmbhasuu:12594_1: gataḥ . āpaḥ sānubandhakanirdeśāt iṅi siddham . āpaḥ sānubandhakanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12594_2: . tena iṅādeśasya na bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi sānubandhakanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12594_3: . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12596_0: idam vijñāyate . bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti , āhosvit bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12596_1: ye syādayaḥ iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti sīyuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12596_2: viśeṣitaḥ syasictāsayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ . atha vijñāyate bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ ye syādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12596_3: iti syasictāsayaḥ viśeṣitāḥ sīyuṭ aviśeṣitaḥ . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat
GS24pmbhasuu:12596_4: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . syasictāsayaḥ ca viśeṣitāḥ . nanu ca uktam sīyuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12596_5: viśeṣitaḥ syasictāsayaḥ aviśeṣitāḥ iti . syasictāsayaḥ ca viśeṣitāḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12597: bhāvakarmaṇoḥ yak bhavati iti atra syādayaḥ api anuvartiṣyante . atha vā punaḥ astu bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ ye syādayaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:12598: syasictāsayaḥ viśeṣitāḥ sīyuṭ aviśeṣitaḥ iti . sīyuṭ ca viśeṣitaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:12599: . bhāvakarmavācini parataḥ sīyuṭ na asti iti kṛtva bhāvakarmavācini sīyuṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:12601_0: (P_6,4.62.2) KA_III.205.13-206.7 Ro_IV. 736-738 atha iṭ ca iti ucyate . kasya ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:12601_1: iṭ bhavati . aṅgasya iti vartate . yadi evam āditaḥ iṭ prāpnoti aḍāḍvat . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12601_2: aḍāṭau ṭittvāt āditaḥ bhavataḥ tadvat . evam tarhi syādīnām eva bhaviṣyanti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12601_3: api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . nanu ca bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:12602_0: eṣā saptamī : bhāve ca arthe karmaṇi ca iti . evam tarhi bhāvakarmaṇoḥ iti eṣā saptamī
GS24pmbhasuu:12602_1: syādiṣu iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12602_2: evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi arthena
GS24pmbhasuu:12603: paurvāparyam asti . arthe asambhavāt tadvācini śabde kāryam vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12604: evam api sīyuṭaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi saptame yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12605: ārdhadhātukasya iṭ . yāvān iṭ nāma saḥ sarvaḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12606_0: tataḥ valādeḥ . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iṭ bhavati iti . yadi evam syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12606_1: iṭ bhavati ciṇvadbhāvaḥ aviśeṣitaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12606_2: iṭ bhavati ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat iti kva cit eva ciṇvadbhāvaḥ syāt . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12606_3: syādīn apekṣiṣyāmahe syasicsīyuṭtāsiṣu iṭ bhavati ajjhanagrahadṛśām vā ciṇvat syādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:12607: atha ke punaḥ imam iṭam prayojayanti . ye anudāttāḥ . atha ye udāttāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12608: teṣām katham . siddham tena eva paratvāt . udāttebhyaḥ api vā anena eva iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:12609: eṣitavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . kārayateḥ kāriṣyate , hārayateḥ hāriṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12610_0: iṭaḥ asiddhatvāt aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ yathā syāt . katham punaḥ icchatā api bhavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:12610_1: udāttebhyaḥ anena eva iṭ labhyaḥ na punaḥ anena astu tena vā iti tena eva syāt vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12610_2: . nanu ca nityaḥ ayam kṛte api tasmin prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . na tu asmin kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12610_3: api saḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . avalāditvāt . tasmāt anena eva bhaviṣyati iṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12611_0: (P_6,4.62.3) KA_III.206.8-17 Ro_IV. 739 kāni punaḥ asya yogasya prayojanāni . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12611_1: ciṇvat yuk ca hanteḥ ca ghatvam dīrghaḥ ca uktaḥ yaḥ mitām vā ciṇi iti . vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12611_2: prayojanam . ceṣyate cāyiṣyate . yuk ca prayojanam . glāsyate , glāyiṣyate . hanteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12611_3: ca ghatvam prayojanam haniṣyate ghāniṣyate . dīrghaḥ ca uktaḥ yaḥ mitām vā ciṇi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12611_4: saḥ ca prayojanam . śamiṣyate śāmiṣyate tamiṣyate tāmiṣyate . iṭ ca asiddhaḥ tena
GS24pmbhasuu:12611_5: me lupyate ṇiḥ nityaḥ ca ayam valnimittaḥ vighātī . iṭaḥ asiddhatvāt ṇeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12612: aniṭi iti ṇilopaḥ yathā syāt . katham punaḥ ayam nityaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12613_0: kṛtākṛtaprasaṅgitvāt . kṛte api tasmin iṭi sāptamike ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12613_1: punaḥ ayam bhavati . asmin tu vihite valāditvasya nimittasya vihatatvāt sāptamikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12613_2: na bhavati (P_6,4.62.4) KA_III.206.18-22 Ro_IV. 740 atha upadeśagrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12613_3: . ciṇvadbhāve upadeśavacanam ṛkāraguṇabalīyastvāt . ciṇvadbhāve upadeśavacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12613_4: ṛkāraguṇasya balīyastvāt . kāriṣyate . paratvāt guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anajantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12615_0: (P_6,4.62.5) KA_III.206.23-207.7 Ro_IV. 740-741 vadhibhāvāt sīyuṭi ciṇvadbhāvaḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:12615_1: . vadhibhāvāt sīyuṭi ciṇvadbhāvaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . vadhibhāvasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12616_0: . ciṇvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ : ghāniṣyate , aghāniṣyata . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : ghāniṣīṣṭa
GS24pmbhasuu:12616_1: ghāniṣīyāstām ghāniṣīran . ciṇvadbhāvaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm ciṇvadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:12616_2: kṛte punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vadhibhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:12616_3: yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . haniṇiṅādeśapratiṣedhaḥ ca . haniṇiṅādeśānām
GS24pmbhasuu:12616_4: ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . haniṣyate , ghāniṣyate , eṣyate , āyiṣyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12617_0: adhyeṣyate , adhyāyiṣyate . luṅi iti haniṇiṅādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti . aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12617_1: aṅgaśāstrātideśāt siddham . āṅgam yat kāryam tat pratinirdiśyate na ca haniṇiṅādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12619: iḍgrahaṇam akṅidartham . iḍgrahaṇam kriyate akṅiti lopaḥ yathā syāt :
GS24pmbhasuu:12620: papitha tasthitha iti . sārvadhātuke ca ādi iti ārdhadhātukādhikārāt upasaṅkhyānam . sārvadhātuke ca ādi iti ārdhadhātukādhikārāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:12621: kartavyam . iṣam ūrjam aham itaḥ ādi . nanu ca kṅiti iti vartamāne yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12622_0: eva iḍgrahaṇam akṅidartham evam ārdhadhātuke iti api vartamāne iḍgrahaṇam sārvadhātukārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12622_1: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi kṅitā ac viśeṣyate : aci bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12622_2: katarasmin . kṅiti iti . kim tarhi acā kṅit viśeṣyate : kṅiti bhavati . katarasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:12622_3: . aci iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam acā kṅit viśeṣyate . yathā iṭ api ajgrahaṇena viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12622_4: . asti ca idānīm kva cit iṭ anajādiḥ yadarthaḥ vidhiḥ syāt . asti iti āha : dāsīya
GS24pmbhasuu:12623: tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . ārdhadhātukagrahaṇāt siddham . katham . ārdhadhātukatvam . ubhayathā chandasi iti vacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12624: anye api dhātupratyayāḥ ubhayathā chandasi dṛśyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:12625: (P_6,4.66) KA_III.207.23-208.5 Ro_IV.743-744 īttve vakārapratiṣedhaḥ ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ iti darśanāt . īttve vakāre pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12626: kim prayojanam . ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ iti darśanāt . iha mā bhūt : ghṛtam ghṛtapāvānaḥ pibata . vasām vasapāvānaḥ pibata iti . yadi tarhi vakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:12627: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate katham dīvarī pīvarī iti . dhīvarī pīvarī iti ca uktam . kim uktam . na etat īttvam . kim tarhi . dhyāpyoḥ etat samprasāraṇam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12628: . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktayaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . vanip eṣaḥ bhaviṣyati na kvanip iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12630: āṭaḥ prāpnoti . aṭaḥ api iṣyate . tat tarhi aṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . luṅlaṅlṅkṣu aṭ udāttaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12631: iti . yadi tat anuvartate āṭ ajādīnām aṭ ca iti aṭ api prāpnoti . astu .
GS24pmbhasuu:12632: aṭi kṛte punaḥ āṭi bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi aṭi kṛte punaḥ āṭ prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12633_0: akārṣīt , ahārṣīt . aḍvacanāt na bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi aḍvacanāt na syāt : aihiṣṭa
GS24pmbhasuu:12633_1: , aikṣiṣta . āḍvacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi āḍvacanāt prāpnoti : akārṣīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12633_2: ahārṣīt . akṛte aṭi yaḥ ajādiḥ iti evam etat vijñāsyate . kim vaktavyam etat . na
GS24pmbhasuu:12634_0: ajvacanasāmarthyāt . yadi kṛte aṭi yaḥ ajādiḥ tatra syāt ajgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12634_1: . atha vā upadeśe iti vartate . atha vā ārdhadhātuke iti vartate . atha vā luṅlaṅlṅkṣu

GS24pmbhasuu:12634_4: siddham . na arthaḥ āṭā . evam tarhi vṛddhyartham āṭ vaktavyaḥ . vṛddhyartham iti

GS24pmbhasuu:12638: . na kartavyam . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . aṭaḥ aci vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tataḥ upasargāt ṛti vṛddhiḥ bhavati . tataḥ dhātau . dhātau iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12639: iha tarhi : āṭīt , āśīt iti ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti .

GS24pmbhasuu:12641: vaktavyaḥ . araik u kṛṣṇāḥ . tritaḥ enam āyunak . surucaḥ ven āvaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:12653: unnyaḥ , uddhyau , uddhyaḥ . ubhayakṛtam: grāmaṇyau , grāmaṇyaḥ , senānyau

GS24pmbhasuu:12658: upasarjanasya api viśeṣaṇam bhaviṣyati . asti anyat dhātoḥ iti anuvartanasya prayojanam . kim . ivarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . na etat asti

GS24pmbhasuu:12667: iha tarhi : yātaḥ , vātaḥ iti . aci iti vartate . iha tarhi : yānti ,

GS24pmbhasuu:12669: oḥ iti vartate . evam api suvanti , ruvanti iti atra prāpnoti . anekācaḥ iti vartate . evam api asuvan , aruvan iti atra prāpnoti . etat api aṭaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12731_2: kariṣyataḥ . kṛñaḥ uttve ukārāntanirdeśāt syāntasya apratiṣedhaḥ . kṛñaḥ uttve ukārāntanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12732: syāntasya apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . uttvam kasmāt na bhavati . ukārāntanirdeśāt . aśakyaḥ karotau ukārāntanirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12733: tantram āśrayitum . iha samparibhyām bhūṣaṇasamavāyayoḥ krotau iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12734_0: syāt : saṃskaroti . saṃskartā saṃsakrtum iti atra na syāt . na brūmaḥ asmāt ukārāntanirdeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12734_1: yaḥ ayam karoti iti . kim tarhi . ukāraprakaraṇāt ukārāntam aṅgam abhisambadhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12734_2: . utaḥ iti vartate . yadi evam na arthaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12734_3: sañcaskaratuḥ , sañcaskaruḥ iti . utaḥ iti vartate . uttarārtham tarhi sārvadhātukagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12735: śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti . śnam sārvadhātuke eva . asteḥ api ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:12736: bhūbhāvena bhavitavyam . uttarārtham eva tarhi . śnābhyastayoḥ ātaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12737: śnā sārvadhātuke eva . abhyastam api ākārāntam ārdhadhātuke na asti . nanu ca idam asti : apsu yāyāvaraḥ pravapeta piṇḍān iti . na etat ākārāntam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12738: yakārāntam etat . uttarārtham eva tarhi . ī hali aghoḥ iti . tatra api śnābhyastayoḥ iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham eva tarhi . id daridrasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12739: . vakṣyati etat : daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12740: iti . ataḥ api uttarārtham . bhiyaḥ anyatarasyām . abhyastasya iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12741_0: ataḥ api uttarārtham eva . jahāteḥ ca . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12741_1: . ā ca hau . hau iti ucyate . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham . lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12741_2: yi . abhyastasya iti eva . ataḥ api uttarārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12742: ghavsoḥ et hau abhyāsalopaḥ ca iti . hau iti ucyate . tat eva tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:12743: prayojanam . śnasoḥ allopaḥ iti . nanu ca uktam śnam sārvadhātuke eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:12744: asteḥ api ārdhadhātuke bhūbhāvena bhavitavyam iti . anuprayoge tu bhuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12745: astyabādhanam smaranti kartuḥ vacanāt manīṣiṇaḥ . anuprayoge tu bhuvā
GS24pmbhasuu:12746: asteḥ abādhanam iṣyate : īhām āsa , īhām āsatuḥ , īhām āsuḥ iti . kim ca syāt yadi atra lopaḥ syāt . lope dvirvacanāsiddhiḥ . lope kṛte anackatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12747: dvirvacanam syāt . sthānivadbhādāt bhaviṣyati . sthānivat iti cet kṛte bhavet dvitve . kṛte dvitve lopaḥ prāpnoti . asti tarhi parasya lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12748: abhyāsasya yaḥ akāraḥ tasya dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na evam sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12749: kasmāt pratyaṅgatvāt bhavet hi pararūpam . na evam sidhyati . kasmāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12750: pratyaṅgatvāt pararūpam prāpnoti . tasmin ca kṛte lopaḥ . pararūpe ca kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:12751: lopaḥ prāpnoti . dīrghatvam bādhakam bhavet tatra . ataḥ ādeḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12752: dīrghatvam bādhakam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sārvadhātuke bhūtapūrvamātre api yathā syāt : kuru iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12754: kimartham . iha mā bhūt : āstām , āsan . na etat asti prayojanam . āṭaḥ asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:12756: daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau . saḥ ca siddhaḥ pratyayavidhau . kim prayojanam . daridrāti iti daridraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12757: ākārāntalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ mā bhūt iti . na daridrāyake lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12758: daridrāṇe ca na iṣyate . didaridrāsasti iti eke didaridriṣati iti vā . vā adyatanyām . adyatanyām vā iti vaktavyam . adaridrīt , adaridrāsīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12759: (P_6,4.120.1) KA_III.217.20-218.20 Ro_IV.767-768 ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvavacanam liṭi . ṇakāraṣakārādeśādeḥ ettvam liṭi vaktavyam . nematuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12760_0: nemuḥ , sehe, sehāte , sehire . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anādeśādeḥ iti lpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12760_1: prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . liṭā atra ādeśādim viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12760_2: . liṭi yaḥ ādeśādiḥ tadādeḥ na iti . asti anyat liḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:12760_3: iha mā bhūt : paktā paktum . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:12761: prayojanam . kṅiti iti vartate . evam api pakvaḥ pakvavān iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12762: prāpnoti . abhyāsalopasanniyogena ettvam ucyate na ca atra abhyāsalopasam paśyāmaḥ . evam api pāpacyate atra prāpnoti . dīrghatvam atra bādhakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12763: bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte abhyāsavikāre ettam arabhyate . tat yatha anyān
GS24pmbhasuu:12764: abhyāsavikārān bādhate evam dīrghatvam api bādheta . satyam evam etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:12765: abhyāsavikāreṣu tu jyeṣṭhamadhyamakanīyāṃsaḥ prakārāḥ bhavanti . tatra hrasvahalādiśeṣau utsargau . tayoḥ dīrghatvam apavādaḥ ettvam ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12766: apavādavipratiṣedhāt dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi babhaṇatuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12767: babhaṇuḥ iti abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt ettvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12768_0: phalibhajigrahaṇam tu jñāpakam abhyāsādeśasiddhatvasya . yat ayam phalibhajyoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12768_1: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ siddhaḥ abhyāsādeśaḥ ettve iti . yadi evam prathamatṛtīyādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:12769: prathamatṛtīyādīnām tarhi ādeśāditvāt ettvam na prāpnoti . pecatuḥ , pecuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12770: , debhatuḥ , debhuḥ . na vā śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ rūpābhede
GS24pmbhasuu:12771_0: ettvavijñānasya . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ jñāpakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12771_1: rūpābhede ettvavijñānasya . yat ayam śasidadyoḥ pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12771_2: rūpābhedena yaḥ ādeśādayaḥ na teṣām pratiṣedhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12773_0: dambhaḥ ettvam vaktavyam . debhatuḥ , debhuḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . nalopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12773_1: asiddhatvāt . asiddhaḥ nalopaḥ . tasya asiddhatvāt ettvam na prāpnoti . naśimanyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12774_0: vaktavyam . chandasi amipacyoḥ api . chandasi amipacyoḥ api iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12774_1: . aneśam menakā iti etat vyemānam liṅi peciran . yaj āyeje vap āvepe dambhaḥ ettvam
GS24pmbhasuu:12775: ettvam na sidhyati . śnasoḥ attve takāreṇa jñāpyate tu ettvaśāsanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12778: thalgrahaṇam akṅidartham . thalgrahaṇam kriyate akṅidartham . akṅiti ettvam yathā syāt . pecitha śekitha . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12779: seḍgrahaṇam eve atra akṅidartham bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12780_0: samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta . thali ca seṭi kṅiti ca seṭi iti . kim prayojanam . peciva
GS24pmbhasuu:12780_1: pecima. tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam iti vakṣyati . tat na vaktavyam bhavati . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:12780_2: kasmāt na bhavati : lulavitha . guṇasya pratiṣedhāt . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12780_3: pecitha śekitha . guṇasya yaḥ akāraḥ iti evam etat vijñāsyate . evam api śaśaritha
GS24pmbhasuu:12781: guṇasya eṣaḥ akāraḥ . katham . vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati iti rephaśirāḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ abhinirvartate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12782: jñāpayati ne evañjātīyakānām ettvam bhavati iti yat ayam tṝphalabhajatrapaḥ ca iti tṝgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12783_1: sthāninirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . ekahalmadhye iti vartate . yadi evam tresatuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12783_2: , tresuḥ , ra śabdasya ettvam prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:12784_0: . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti akārasya bhaviṣyati . anarthake alaḥ antyavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12784_1: na iti evam na prāpnoti . na etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ santi prayojanāni . atha vā ataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12786: akāreṇa tapareṇa avarṇam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . asya ātaḥ iti . iha idānīm asya

GS24pmbhasuu:12791_0: pādaḥ upadhāhrasvatvam vaktavyam . dvipadaḥ paśya . ādeśe hi sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ .
