GS24pmbhasuu:12809_1: . śvādīnām prasāraṇe nakārāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . anakārāntapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12809_2: anakārāntasya mā bhūt . mabhavā maghavate . tathā prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12809_3: api grahaṇam bhavati iti yathā iha bhavati , yūnaḥ paśye iti evam yuvatīḥ lpaśya
GS24pmbhasuu:12809_4: iti atra api syāt iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12810: nakārāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12811: arvaṇas tṛ maghonaḥ ca na śiṣyam chāndasam hi tat iti . yat api ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12812_0: prātipadikagrahaṇe liṅgaviśiṣṭasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti yathā iha bhavati , yūnaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12813: liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt iti . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:12817: ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam allopārtham āhosvit niyamārtham . katha ca allopārtham syāt katham vā niyamārtham . yadi aviśeṣeṇa allopaṭilopayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12818: saḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ tataḥ allopārtham . atha hi aṇi ṭilopasya eva prakṛtibhāvaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham . ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam allopārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12819_0: ṣapūrvādīnām punarvacanam kriyate allopārtham . aviśeṣeṇa allopaṭilopayoḥ saḥ prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12819_1: . avadhāraṇe hi anyatra prakṛtibhāve upadhālopaprasaṅgaḥ . avadhāraṇe hi sati anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:12820: . yadi tāvat evam niyamaḥ syāt ṣapūrvādīnām eva aṇi iti bhavet iha niyamāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12821: na syāt sāmanaḥ , vaimanaḥ iti . tākṣaṇyaḥ iti prāpnoti . atha api evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12822: niyamaḥ syāt ṣapūrvādīnām aṇi eva iti evam api bhavet iha niyamāt na syāt tākṣaṇyaḥ iti , sāmanaḥ , vaimanaḥ iti tu prāpnoti . atha api ubhayataḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12854_1: śyām iti api prakṛtam na iti api . tatra abhisambandhamātram kartavyam : yasya ītyādau
GS24pmbhasuu:12855: iyaṅuvaṅbhyām lopaḥ vipratiṣedhena . iyaṅuvaṅbhyām lopaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12856: vipratiṣedhena . iyaṅuvaṅoḥ avakāśaḥ śriyau śriyaḥ , bhruvau bhruvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12857: lopasya avakāśaḥ kāmaṇḍaleyaḥ , mādrabāheyaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti :
GS24pmbhasuu:12858_0: vatsapreyaḥ , laikhābhreyaḥ . lopaḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . guṇavṛddhī ca . guṇavṛddhī

GS24pmbhasuu:12858_2: saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti : cayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12859_0: , cāyakaḥ , lavanam , lāvakaḥ . guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . na vā iyaṅuvaṅādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12859_1: anyaviṣaye vacanāt . na vā arthaḥ vipratiṣedhena . kim kāraṇam . iyaṅuvaṅādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12859_2: anyaviṣaye vacanāt . iyaṅuvaṅādeśaḥ anyaviṣaye ārabhyate . kiṃviṣaye . yaṇādiviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:12859_3: . saḥ yathā yaṇādeśam bādhate evam guṇavṛddhī bādheta . tasmāt tatra guṇavṛddhiviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:12859_4: pratiṣedhaḥ . tasmāt tatra guṇavṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12862_1: . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgānyatvam bhavati . siddham tu sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:12863_0: pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ yalopavidhim prati na sthānivat bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12863_1: evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . śabdānyatvāt . anyaḥ hi śūryaśabdaḥ anyaḥ sauryaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12863_2: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti bhaviṣyati . upadhāgrahaṇānarthakyam

GS24pmbhasuu:12864_1: prāk bhāt asiddhatvam . atha hi saha tena asiddhatvam asiddhatvāt lopasya na antyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12864_2: yakāraḥ bhavati . yadi api saha tena asiddhatvam evam api na doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate

GS24pmbhasuu:12864_4: sūryādīnām yakāraḥ iti . evam api sūryacarī , atra prāpnoti . tasmāt upadhāgrahaṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:12868: taiṣam , pauṣam . antikasya tasi kādilopaḥ ādyudāttatvam ca . antikasya tasi kādilopaḥ vaktavyaḥ ādyudāttatvam ca vaktavyam . antitaḥ na dūrāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12869: tame tādeḥ ca . tame tādeḥ ca kādeḥ ca lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . agne tvam naḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12873: iha kasmāt na bhavati bilvakebhyaḥ . bhasya iti vartate . evam api bilvakāya , atra prāpnoti . taddhitasya iti vartate . evam api bilvakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12874: vikāraḥ avayavaḥ vā bailvakaḥ , atra prāpnoti . taddhite taddhitasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12875: vartate . evam api bilvakīyāyām bhavaḥ bailvakaḥ , bailvakasya kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:12876: bailvakīyam , atra prāpnoti . na saḥ bilvakāt . bilvakādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:12880: kutaḥ . antyasya vacanānarthakyāt . antyasya lopavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sarvasya bhaviṣyati . atha vā luk prakṛtaḥ . saḥ anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12881: aśakyaḥ luk anuvartayitum . kim kāraṇam . vijayiṣṭhakariṣthayoḥ guṇadarśanāt . vijayiṣṭhakariṣthayoḥ guṇaḥ dṛśyate . vijayiṣṭhaḥ . āsutim kariṣṭhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12883: . ṇau prātipadikasya iṣṭhavadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12885: etayati . śyetayati . rabhāvārtham . pṛthum ācaṣṭe , prathayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12886: mradayati . ṭilopārtham . paṭum ācaṣṭe paṭayati . yaṇādiparārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12887: sthūlam ācaṣṭe sthavayati . davayati . kim punaḥ idam parigaṇanam āhosvit udāharaṇamātram . udāharaṇamātram iti āha . prādayaḥ api hi iṣyante :
GS24pmbhasuu:12888: priyam ācaṣṭe prāpayati . bhāradvājīyāḥ paṭhanti : ṇau iṣṭhavat prātipadikasya puṃvadbhāvarabhāvaṭilopayaṇādiparaprādivinmatorlukkanvidhyartham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12889: (P_6,4.159) KA_III.230.12-13 Ro_IV.795 kim ayam yiśabdaḥ āhosvit yakāraḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi lopaḥ api anuvartate tatao yiśabdaḥ . atha nivṛttam tataḥ yakāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12891: īyasaḥ āttvam ucyate na lopaḥ prakṛtaḥ saḥ anuvarteta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:12892_0: jyāyān . akṛtyakāre iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat jyāt parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12892_1: īyasaḥ āttvam śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:12893: prayojanam . pibateḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ . saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12894: atha kimartham jyāt parasya īyasaḥ dīrghaḥ ucyate na akāraḥ eva ucyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:12895: kā rūpasiddhiḥ : jyāyān . āntaryataḥ dīrghasya dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat dīrgham karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā :
GS24pmbhasuu:12896: paribhāṣā bhāvyamānena savarṇānām grahaṇam na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12898: halādeḥ aṅgasya iti āhosvit halādeḥ ṛkārasya iti . yuktam punaḥ idam
GS24pmbhasuu:12899_0: vicārayitum . nanu anena asandigdhena aṅgaviśeṣaṇena bhavitavyam . katham hi ṛkārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12899_1: nāma hal ādiḥ syāt anyasya anyaḥ . ayam ādiśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12899_2: ṛgādiḥ , ardharcādiḥ , ślokādiḥ iti . asti sāmīpye vartate . tat yathā . dadhibhojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12900: . ghṛtabhojanam ārogyasya ādiḥ . ghṛtabhojanasamīpe . yāvatā sāmīpye api
GS24pmbhasuu:12901: vartate jāyate vicāraṇā : halsamīpasya ṛkārasya halādeḥ aṅgasya iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate halādeḥ aṅgasya iti aprathīyān , atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:12902: . atha vijñāyate halādeḥ ṛkārasya iti anṛcīyān , atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12903: ubhayathā svṛcīyān iti atra prāpnoti . astu tāvat halādeḥ aṅgasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12904: katham aprathīyān . taddhitāntena samāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . na prathīyān aprathīyān iti . bhavet siddham yadā taddhitāntena samāsaḥ . yadā tu khalu
GS24pmbhasuu:12905_0: samāsāt taddhitotpattiḥ tadā na sidhyati . na eva samāsāt taddhitotpattyā bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12905_1: . kim kāraṇam . bahuvrīhiṇā uktatvāt matvarthasya . bhavet yadā bahuvrīhiḥ tadā na
GS24pmbhasuu:12905_2: syāt . yadā tu khalu tatpuruṣaḥ tadā prāpnoti . na pṛthuḥ apṛthuḥ . ayam api apṛthuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12905_3: . ayam api apṛthuḥ . ayam anayoḥ aprathīyān iti . na samāsāt ajādibhyām bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12906: guṇavacanāt iti ucyate na ca samāsaḥ guṇavacanaḥ iti . yadā tarhi samāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12907_0: vinmatupau vinmatubantāt ajādī tadā prāpnutaḥ . avidyamānāḥ pṛthavaḥ apṛthavaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12907_1: apṛthavaḥ asya santi apṛthumān . ayam apṛthumān . ayam apṛthumān . ayam anayoḥ aprathīyān
GS24pmbhasuu:12907_2: iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . apṛthavaḥ eva na
GS24pmbhasuu:12908: santi kutaḥ yasya apṛthavaḥ iti . iha kasmāt na bhavati : mātayati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12909: bhrātayati . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12910: ṭilopaḥ kriyatām rabhāvaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt rabhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12911: yadi punaḥ avaśiṣṭasya rabhāvaḥ ucyeta . na evam śakyam . iha api prasajyeta : kṛtam ācaṣṭe , kṛtayati iti . evam tarhi parigaṇanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12913_0: (P_6,4.163) KA_III.231.25-233.5 Ro_IV.799-804 prakṛtyā ekāc iti kim iṣṭheymeyassu
GS24pmbhasuu:12913_1: āhosvit aviśeṣeṇa . kim ca ataḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa svī khī śauvam adhunā iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:12913_2: prāpnoti . svikhinau eva na staḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12914: uktam etat . ekākṣarāt kṛtaḥ jāteḥ saptamyām ca na tau smṛtau . svavān khavān iti eva bhavitavyam . śauvam iti paratvāt aijāgame kṛte ṭilopena
GS24pmbhasuu:12915: bhavitavyam . adhunā iti saprakṛtikasya sapratyayakasya sthāne nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12916: kriyate . iha tarhi prāpnoti : dravyam . yasya īti ādau prakṛtibhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12917: yasya īti yasya lopaprāptiḥ tasya prakṛtibhāvaḥ na ca etāni yasya īti ādau
GS24pmbhasuu:12918: . evam api śriye hitaḥ śrīyaḥ , jñā devatā asya sthālīpākasya jñaḥ sthālīyāpākaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . tasmāt iṣṭheymeyassu prakṛtibhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12919: atha iṣṭheymeyassu prakṛtibhāve kim udāharaṇam . preyān preṣthaḥ . na etat asti . prādīnām asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi śreyān , śreṣṭhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12920: prakṛtyā ekāc iṣṭheymeyassu cet ekācaḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt avacanāt prakṛtibhāvaḥ . prakṛtyā ekāc iṣṭheymeyassu cet tat na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12921: ekācaḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt antareṇa api vacanam prakṛtibhāvaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12922: vinmatoḥ tu lugartham . vinmatoḥ tu lugartham prakṛtibhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12924_0: srucīyān , srugvattamaḥ , sruciṣṭhaḥ . nanu ca vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12924_1: katham anyasya ucyamānasya anyasya bādhakam syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12924_2: bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12925_0: yathā eva khalu api vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhate eva naḥ taddhite iti etam api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:12925_1: . yataraḥ naḥ brahmīyān . brahmavattaraḥ iti . yat tāvat ucyate katham anyasya ucyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12925_2: anyasya bādhakam syāt iti . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ . yadi tarhi vinmatoḥ luk
GS24pmbhasuu:12925_3: na ucyeta kim iha syāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12926: ṭilopaḥ iti āha . ṭilopaḥ cet na aprāpte ṭilope vinmatoḥ luk ārabhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12927: saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt iti . sati api sambhave
GS24pmbhasuu:12928: bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12929: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12930_0: yat api ucyate yathā eva khalu api vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhate eva naḥ taddhite
GS24pmbhasuu:12930_1: iti etam api bādheta iti . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12930_2: . na aprāpte ṭilope vinmatoḥ luk ārabhyate . naḥ taddhite iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:12930_3: ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12931_0: apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhiṣyate . naḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12931_1: taddhite iti etam na bādhiṣyate . yadi tarhi vinmatoḥ luk ṭilopam bādhate payiṣthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12931_2: iti na sidhyati . payasiṣthaḥ iti prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12933: rājanyamanuṣyayuvānaḥ ake prakṛtyā bhavanti iti vaktavyam . rājanyakam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12936: hitanāmnaḥ . mapūrvāt pratiṣedhe vā hitanāmnaḥ iti vaktavyam . samānaḥ haitanāmaḥ , samānaḥ haitanāmanaḥ iti ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:12937_0: (P_6,4.171) KA_III.233.14-234.3 Ro_IV.805 atha kim idam brāhmasya ajātau anaḥ lopārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12937_1: vacanam āhosvit niyamārtham . katha ca lopātham syāt katham va niyamārtham . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:12937_2: tāvat apatye iti vartate tataḥ niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_0: atha nivṛttam tataḥ lopārtham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati brāhmasya ajātau lopārtham vacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_1: . brāhmasya ajātau lopārtham vacanam kriyate . apatye iti nivṛttam . tatra aprāptavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_2: prāptapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra aprāptasya ṭilopasya vidhāne prāptasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_3: . brāhmaṇaḥ . na vā paryudāsasāmarthyāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . paryudāsasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_4: paryudāsaḥ atra bhaviṣyati . asti anyat paryudāse prayojanam . kim . yā jātiḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_5: na apatyam . brāhmī oṣadhiḥ iti . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_6: ca na sidhyati . evam tarhi anuvartate apatye iti na tu apatye iti anena nipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_7: abhisambadhyate : brāhmaḥ iti nipātyate apatye ajātau iti . kim tarhi . pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12938_8: abhisambadhyate : brāhmaḥ iti nipātyate . apatye jātau na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12939_0: (P_6,4.172) KA_III.234.5-8 Ro_IV.806 kimartham idam ucyate na naḥ taddhite iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:12939_1: siddham . na sidhyati . an aṇi iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ prasajyeta . aṇi iti ucyate ṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12939_2: ca ayam . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat nipātanam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ tācchīlike
GS24pmbhasuu:12940: kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . caurī tāpasī iti aṇantāt iti īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12943_0: nipātyate . yakārādau taddhite tatvam nipātyate . bhrauṇahatye tatvanipātanānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12943_1: sāmānyena kṛtatvāt . bhrauṇahatye tatvanipātanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sāmānyena
GS24pmbhasuu:12943_2: kṛtatvāt . sāmānyena eva atra tatvam bhaviṣyati . hanaḥ taḥ aciṇṇamuloḥ iti . jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12944_0: tatvapratiṣedhasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na taddhite tatvam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12944_1: . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . bhrauṇaghnaḥ , vārtraghnaḥ iti atra tatvam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12945: . aikṣvākasya svarabhedāt nipātanam pṛthaktvena kartavyam . aikṣvākaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:12946_0: aikṣvākaḥ . ekaśrutyā nirdeśāt siddham .ekaśrutiḥ svarasarvanāma yathā napuṃsakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12946_1: liṅgasarvanāma . atha maitreye kim nipātyate . maitreye ḍhañi yādilopanipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12946_2: maitreye ḍhañi yādilopaḥ nipātyate . idam mitrayuśabdasya catuḥ grahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12946_3: . gṛṣṭyādiṣu pratyayavidhyartham pāṭhaḥ kriyate . dvitīye adhyāye yaskādiṣu lugartham
GS24pmbhasuu:12947_0: saptame adhyāye iyādeśārtham . idam caturtham yādilopārtham . dvirgrahaṇam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12947_1: akartum . bidādiṣu pratyayavidhyartham pāṭhaḥ kartavyaḥ . tatra na eva arthaḥ lukā
GS24pmbhasuu:12947_2: na api yādilopena . iyādeśena eva siddham . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12948_0: . iha hi maitreyakaḥ saṅghaḥ iti saṅghātalakṣaṇeṣu añyañiñām aṇ iti aṇ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:12948_1: . hiraṇmaye kim nipātyate . hiraṇmaye yalopavacanam . hiraṇmaye yalopaḥ nipātyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12948_2: . atha hiraṇyaye kim nipātyate . hiraṇyayasya chandasi malopavacanāt siddham . hiraṇyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:12949: hiraṇyayī naḥ nayatu . hiraṇyayāḥ panthānaḥ āsan . hiraṇyayam āsanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12950_0: (P_7,1.1.1) KA_III,236.1-16 Ro_V,1-3 yuvoḥ anākau iti ucyate kayoḥ yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12950_1: . pratyayayoḥ . katham punaḥ aṅgasya iti anuvartamāne pratyayayoḥ syātām . yuśabdavuśabdāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:12950_2: etat vibhaktau aṅgam bhavati . yadi yuśabdavuśabdāntasya aṅgasya anākau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12951: prāpnutaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12952: yatra tarhi vibhaktiḥ na asti . nandanā kārikā iti . atra api pratyayalakṣaṇena vibhaktiḥ . yatra tarhi pratyayalakṣaṇam na asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12953: nandanapriyaḥ kārakapriyaḥ iti . mā bhūtām yā asau sāmāsikī vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12954: tasyām yā asau samāsāt vibhaktiḥ tasyām bhaviṣyataḥ . na vai tasyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12955_0: yuśabdavuśabdāntam aṅgam bhavati . bhavet yaḥ yuśabdavuśabdābhyām aṅgam viśeṣayet
GS24pmbhasuu:12955_1: tasya ānantyayoḥ na syātām . vayam khalu aṅgena yuśabdavuśabdau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12955_2: aṅgasya yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ yatratatrasthayoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12956_0: yatra tarhi samāsāt vibhaktiḥ na asti . nandanadadhi kārakadadhi . evam tarhi na
GS24pmbhasuu:12956_1: ca aparam nimittam sañjñā ca pratyayalakṣaṇena . na ca iha param nimittam āśrīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:12956_2: : asmin parataḥ yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ iti . kim tarhi aṅgasya yuvoḥ anākau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12957: pratyayalakṣaṇena . atha vā tayoḥ eva yat aṅgam tannimittatvena āśrayiṣyāmaḥ . katham . aṅgasya iti sambandhasāmānye ṣaṣṭhī vijñāsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12958: aṅgasya yau yuvū . kim ca aṅgasya yuvū . nimittam . yayoḥ yuvoḥ aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kayoḥ ca etat bhavati . pratyayayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12959_0: (P_7,1.1.2) KA_III,236.17-238.13 Ro_V,3-7 yuvoḥ anākau iti cet dhātupratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12959_1: yuvoḥ anākau iti cet dhātupratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yutvā yutaḥ yutavān yutiḥ . bhujyvādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:12960: vaktavyaḥ . bhujyuḥ kaṃyuḥ śaṃyuḥ iti . anunāsikaparatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:12961_0: anunāsikaparayoḥ yuvoḥ grahaṇam na ca etau anunāsikaparau . yadi anunāsikaparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12961_1: grahaṇam nandanaḥ kārakaḥ atra na prāpnutaḥ na hi etābhyām yuśabdavuśabdābhyām anunāsikam
GS24pmbhasuu:12961_2: param paśyāmaḥ . anunāsikaparatvāt iti na evam vijñāyate anunāsikaḥ paraḥ ābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:12961_3: tau imau anunāsikaparau anunāsikaparatvāt iti . katham tarhi . anunāsikaḥ paraḥ anayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12961_4: tau imau anunāsikaparau anunāsikaparatvāt iti . yadi anunāsikaparayoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:12962: itsañjñā prāpnoti . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra ṅībnumoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:12963: ṅībnumaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nandanaḥ kārakaḥ . nandanā kārikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12964: ugillakṣaṇau ṅībnumau prāpnutaḥ . dhātvantasya ca . dhātvantasya ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . divu sivu . ṣiṭṭitkaraṇam tu jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12965: ugitkāryābhāvasya . yat ayam yuśabdavuśabdau ṣiṭṭitau karoti śilpini ṣvun ṭyuṭyulau tuṭ ca iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na yuvoḥ ugitkāryam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:12966: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam ṣiṭṭitkaraṇe etat prayojanam ṣiṭṭitaḥ iti ikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12967: yathā syāt . yadi ca atra ugitkāryam syāt ṣiṭṭitkaraṇam anarthakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12968: paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na yuvoḥ ugitkāryam bhavati iti tataḥ yuśabdavuśabdau ṣiṭṭitau karoti . na vā ṣitkaraṇam ṅīṣvidhānārtham . na etat asti jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:12969_0: . asti hi anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ṣitkaraṇam kriyate ṅīṣvidhānārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:12969_1: . ṣitaḥ iti ṅīṣ yathā syāt . ṭitkaraṇam anupasarjanārtham . ṭitkaraṇe api anyat prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:12970: īkāraḥ yathā syāt . ṭitaḥ anupasarjanāt bhavati ugitaḥ upasarjanāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:12971: anupasarjanāt ca . evam tarhi vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ balīyastvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12972: vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ balīyastvam bhaviṣyati . ṭāpaḥ avakāśaḥ khaṭvā mālā
GS24pmbhasuu:12973: . ṅīpaḥ avakāśaḥ gomatī yavamatī . iha ubhayam prāpnoti nandanā kārikā .
GS24pmbhasuu:12974: ṭāp bhavati vipratiṣedhena . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param iti ucyate pūrvaḥ ca ṭāp paraḥ ṅīp . ṅīpaḥ paraḥ ṭāp kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12975_0: sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi ugitaḥ ṅīp bhavati iti atra api ataḥ ṭāp
GS24pmbhasuu:12975_1: iti anuvartiṣyate . evam api akārāntāt ugitaḥ iha eva syāt nandanā kārikā . gomatī
GS24pmbhasuu:12975_2: yavamatī iti atra na syāt . evam tarhi sambandhānuvṛttiḥ kariṣyate . ajādyataḥ ṭāp
GS24pmbhasuu:12976_0: ugitaḥ ca ṅīp bhavati ataḥ ṭāp . vanaḥ ra ca vanaḥ ṅīp bhavati ugitaḥ ataḥ ṭāp .
GS24pmbhasuu:12976_1: pādaḥ anyatarasyām ṅīp bhavati ugitaḥ ataḥ ṭāp . tataḥ ṛci . ṛci ca ṭāp bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:12976_2: prakṛtam anuvartate . sidhyati evam yadi vārttikakāraḥ paṭhati vipratiṣedhāt tu ṭāpaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12977: etat ca saṅgṛhītam bhavati . katham . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ . vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . dhātvantasya ca arthavadgrahaṇāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:12978: arthavatoḥ yuvoḥ grahaṇam na ca dhātvantaḥ arthavān .
GS24pmbhasuu:12980: numvidhau jhalgrahaṇam kartavyam . jhalantasya ugitaḥ iṣyate : ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ jhalaḥ iti . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12982: grahaṇam bhavati iti yathā iha bhavati gomān yavamān evam gomatī yavamatī iti atra api syāt .na vā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭāgrahaṇāt . na vā vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12983: . kim kāraṇam . vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇam na iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:12984: kartavyā . kaḥ punaḥ atra viśeṣaḥ eṣā vā paribhāṣā kriyeta jhalgrahaṇam vā iti . avaśyam eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . bahūni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12985_0: prayojanāni . kāni . prayojanam śunaḥ svare . yathā iha bhavati śunā śunaḥ evam śunyā
GS24pmbhasuu:12985_1: śunyāḥ iti atra api syāt . yūnaḥ samprasāraṇe . yūnaḥ samprasāraṇe prayojanam . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12985_2: iha bhavati yūnaḥ paśya iti evam yuvatīḥ paśya iti atra api syāt . ugidacām numvidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:12985_3: . ugidacām numvidhau prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati gomān yavamān evam gomatī yavamatī
GS24pmbhasuu:12985_4: iti atra api syāt . anaḍuhaḥ ca āmvidhau . anaḍuhaḥ ca āmvidhau prayojanam . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:12985_5: iha bhavati anaḍvān iti evam anaḍuhī iti atra api syāt . na vā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12986: anaḍvāhī iti . bhavati anyena yatnena . ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:12988: pathimathoḥ āttve prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati panthāḥ manthāḥ evam
GS24pmbhasuu:12989_0: pathī mathī iti atra api prāpnoti . na kevalaḥ pathiśabdaḥ striyām vartate . upasamastaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12989_1: tarhi vartate . supathī iti . puṃsaḥ asuṅvidhau . puṃsaḥ asuṅvidhau prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:12989_2: yathā iha bhavati pumān evam puṃsī iti atra api
GS24pmbhasuu:12990: syāt . na kevalaḥ puṃśabdaḥ striyām vartate . upasamastaḥ tarhi vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12991: supuṃsī iti . sakhyuḥ ṇittvānaṅau . sakhyuḥ ṇittvānaṅau prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati sakhā sakhāyau sakhāyaḥ evam sakhī sakhyau sakhyaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:12992: api prāpnoti . bhavadbhagavadaghavatām odbhāve . bhavadbhagavadaghavatām odbhāve prayojanam . yathā iha bhavati bhoḥ bhagoḥ aghoḥ iti evam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:12993: bhagavati aghavati iti atra api syāt . etāni asyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:12994: prayojanāni yadartham eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . etasyām ca satyām na arthaḥ jhalgrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:12996: jhalgrahaṇam kartavyam numpratiṣedhaḥ vā vaktavyaḥ . ubhayam na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:12997: . upariṣṭāt jhalgrahaṇam kriyate tat purastāt apakrakṣyate . evam api sūtraviparyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:12998: ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ . yujeḥ asamāse . tataḥ napuṃsakasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:12999: napuṃsakasya num bhavati . jhalaḥ iti ubhayoḥ śeṣaḥ . tataḥ acaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13000_0: ajantasya ca napuṃsakaliṅgasya num bhavati . yadi api tāvat etat ugitkāryam parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13000_1: idam aparam prāpnoti : śātanitarā pātanitarā . ugitaḥ nadyāḥ ghādiṣu hrasvaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13001: nityam ca iṣyate . ugitaḥ yā nadī evam etat vijñāyate . ugitaḥ eṣā nadī .
GS24pmbhasuu:13002: ugitaḥ yā parā . atra ca eva doṣaḥ bhavati ugitaḥ hi eṣā parā nadī aiṣumatitarāyām ca prāpnoti . ugitaḥ parā yā vihitā . ugitaḥ eṣā vihitā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13003: ugitaḥ iti evam yā vihitā . evam api bhogavatitarāyām doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13004_0: bhogavatitarā bhogavatītarā . tasmāt ugitaḥ yā nadī ugitaḥ yā vihitā iti evam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:13004_1: vijñāsyate . evam vijñāyamāne śātanitarāyām doṣaḥ eva . siddham tu yuvoḥ anunāsikatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13004_2: siddham etat . katham . yakāravakārayoḥ eva idam
GS24pmbhasuu:13005: anunāsikayoḥ grahaṇam . santi hi yaṇaḥ sānunāsikāḥ niranunāsikāḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:13006: (P_7,1.2) KA_III,240.17-241.21 Ro_V,11.2-13.2 āyanādiṣu upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham . āyanādiṣu upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13007: . upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13008: svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādiṣu iṣṭaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13010_0: pratyayasañjñāsanniyogena ādyudāttatve kṛte āntaryataḥ ādeśāḥ asvarakāṇām asvarakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13010_1: syuḥ . na vā kva cit citkaraṇāt upadeśivadvacanānarthakyam na vā vaktavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13010_2: kāraṇam . kva cit citkaraṇāt . yat ayam kva cit ghādīn citaḥ karoti agrāt yat ghacchau
GS24pmbhasuu:13010_3: ca tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti . katham kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13010_4: jñāpakam . citkaraṇe etat prayojanam citaḥ iti antodāttatvam yathā syāt iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:13010_5: ca upadeśāvasthāyām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti tataḥ citkaraṇam arthavat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_0: tatra uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ . tatra uṇādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . śaṅkhaḥ śāṇḍhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_1: . dhātoḥ vā īyaṅvacanāt . atha vā yat ayam ṛteḥ īyaṅ iti dhātoḥ īyaṅ śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_2: ācāryaḥ na dhātupratyayānām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti . yadi hi syuḥ ṛteḥ chaṅ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_3: eva brūyāt . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na ca ṛteḥ chaṅā sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_4: . chaṅi sati valādilakṣaṇaḥ iṭ prasajyeta . iṭi kṛte anāditvāt ādeśaḥ na syāt . idam
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_5: iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām ādeśaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_6: . nityaḥ ādeśaḥ . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ ādeśaḥ na hi kṛte iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_7: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anāditvāt . antaraṅgaḥ tarhi ādeśaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_8: eva hi uktam āyanādiṣu upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham iti . tat etat ṛteḥ īyaṅvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13011_9: jñāpakam eva na dhātupratyayānām āyanādayaḥ bhavanti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13012: prātipadikavijñānāt ca pāṇineḥ siddham prātipadikavijñānāt ca bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya siddham . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:13013_1: dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ujjhitā ujjhitum iti . pratyayādhikārāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13013_2: . pratyayagrahaṇam prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . āyaneyīnīyiyaḥ phaḍakhachaghām
GS24pmbhasuu:13014: iti . pratyayādhikārāt siddham iti cet anādeḥ ādeśavacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13015: pratyayādhikārāt siddham iti cet anādeḥ ādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ . api naḥ śvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13016: vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai . evam tarhi pratyayagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13017: anuvartate ādigrahaṇam nivṛttam . katham punaḥ samāsanirdiṣṭānām ekadeśaḥ anuvartate ekadeśaḥ vā nivartate . asamāsanirdeśāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13018: asamāsanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . pratyayasya ādīnām iti . saḥ tarhi asamāsanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13019: avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . pratyaya ādīnām iti . tatra śayāntai iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13020: anakārāntatvāt aṅgasya ādbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ . tatra etasmin pratyayagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13021_0: anuvartamāne ādigrahaṇe nivṛtte śayāntai iti anakārāntatvāt aṅgasya ādbhāvaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13021_1: tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . siddham anānantaryāt anakārāntena adbhāvanivṛttiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13021_2: siddham etat . katham . anānantaryāt anakārāntena adbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13021_3: kṛtvā coditam katham kṛtvā parihāraḥ . anakārāntagrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam iti kṛtvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13021_4: coditam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam iti kṛtvā parihāraḥ . yadi anakārāntagrahaṇam jhakāraviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13021_5: śerate atra na prāpnoti . tatra ruṭi sanniyogavacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13022: siddham . tatra ruṭi sanniyogaḥ kariṣyate . kaḥ eṣaḥ yatnaḥ codyate sanniyogaḥ nāma . cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . ruṭ ca . kim ca . yat ca anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:13023: prāpnoti . kim ca anyat prāpnoti . adbhāvaḥ . saḥ tarhi cakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13024: . na kartavyaḥ . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . śīṅaḥ . śīṅaḥ uttarasya jhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13025: at bhavati . tataḥ ruṭ . ruṭ ca bhavati śīṅaḥ iti . evam api paryāyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13026_0: prasajyeta . evam tarhi acśabdasya ruṭam vakṣyāmi . tat acśabdagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13026_1: . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . at abhyastāt iti . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:13027: śīṅaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī at iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhī prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13029_0: ruṭi dṛśiguṇaḥ prāpnoti . adṛśran asya ketavaḥ iti . tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13029_1: . parasmin iti kṅiti ca iti pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api adṛśram asya ketavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13029_2: iti atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13030_0: pūrvānte śīṅaḥ guṇavidhiḥ pūrvānte śīṅaḥ guṇaḥ vidheyaḥ : śerate . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13030_1: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ruṭi dṛśiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ iti . pūrvānte api
GS24pmbhasuu:13030_2: eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . ayam dṛśiguṇaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate saḥ yathā eva kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:13030_3: ca iti etam pratiṣedham bādhate evam anupadhāyāḥ api prasajyeta . tasmāt ubhābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13030_4: dṛśeḥ akpratyayāntaram vaktavyam pitaram ca dṛśeyam mātaram ca dṛśeyam iti evam artham
GS24pmbhasuu:13030_5: . jhādeśāt āṭ leṭi jhādeśāt āṭ leṭi bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:13031: jhādeśasya avakāśaḥ . lunate lunatām alunata . āṭaḥ avakāśaḥ . patāti didyut . udadhim cyāvayāti . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . api naḥ śvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13032: vijaniṣyamāṇāḥ patibhiḥ saha śayāntai . āṭ leṭi bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:13033_0: saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā nityatvāt āṭaḥ . na vā vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13033_1: kim kāraṇam . nityatvāt āṭaḥ . nitaḥ āḍāgamaḥ . saḥ katham nityaḥ . yadi anakārāntagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13033_2: jhakāraviśeṣaṇam . atha hi pratyayaviśeṣaṇam jhādeśaḥ api nityaḥ . antaraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13034: antaraṅgaḥ khalu api āḍāgamaḥ . katham antaraṅgaḥ . yadi prāk lādeśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13035: dhātvadhikāraḥ . atha hi lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartate ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13036: samānāśrayam . yadi eva anakārāntagrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam atha api
GS24pmbhasuu:13037: lādeśe dhātvadhikāraḥ anuvartate ubhayathā api pūrvavipratiṣedhena na arthaḥ . katham . bahulam chandasi iti evam atra śapaḥ luk na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13039_0: (P_7,1.7-10) KA_III,244.7-12 Ro_V,17.11-17 idam bahulam chandasi iti dviḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13039_1: . ekam śakyam akartum . katham . yadi tāvat pūrvam kriyate param na kariṣyate . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13039_2: bhisaḥ ais iti atra bahulam chandasi iti etat
GS24pmbhasuu:13040: anuvartiṣyate . atha param kriyate pūrvam na kariṣyate . bahulam chandasi iti atra ruṭ api anuvartiṣyate . aparaḥ āha : ubhe bahulagrahaṇe ekam
GS24pmbhasuu:13041: chandograhaṇam śakyam akartum . katham . idam asti . vetteḥ vibhāṣā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13042: tataḥ chandasi . chandasi ca vibhāṣā . tataḥ ataḥ bhisaḥ ais bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13044_0: (P_7,1.9) KA_III,244.14-21 Ro_V,18.2-9 iha vṛkṣaiḥ plakṣaiḥ iti paratvāt ettvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13044_1: . aisbhāvaḥ idānīm kva bhaviṣyati . kṛte ettve bhautapūrvyāt . kṛte ettve bhūtapūrvamakārāntam
GS24pmbhasuu:13044_2: iti ais bhaviṣyati . ais tu nityaḥ tathā sati . evam sati nityaḥ aisbhāvaḥ kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:13044_3: ettve prāpnoti akṛte api prāpnoti . nityatvāt aistve kṛte vihatanimittatvāt ettvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13045: bhaviṣyati . ettvam bhisi paratvāt cet ataḥ ais kva bhaviṣyati . kṛte ettve bhautapūrvyāt ais tu nityaḥ tathā sati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13046: (P_7,1.11) KA_III,245.2-3 Ro_V,18.11-13 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete .
GS24pmbhasuu:13047: ubhau śakyau avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi . idamadasoḥ kāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13048: tanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . idamadasoḥ kāt eva na anyataḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13050: na nādeśaḥ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : vṛkṣeṇa plakṣeṇa . ettve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . katham . idam asti . bahuvacane jhali et osi ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:13051: tataḥ āṅi ca . āṅi ca parataḥ ataḥ ettvam bhavati . vṛkṣeṇa plakṣeṇa .
GS24pmbhasuu:13052_0: tataḥ āpaḥ sambuddhau ca . āpaḥ āṅi ca osi ca iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi anena
GS24pmbhasuu:13052_1: iti idrūpalopaḥ prasajyeta . jhali lopaḥ kariṣyate . na śakyaḥ jhali lopaḥ kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:13052_2: . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt . ayā viṣṭā iti . evam tarhi anlopāpavādaḥ vijñāsyate . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13052_3: . evam vakṣyāmi . an ne ca api ca iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13053: tat nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13054: lupanirdiṣṭaḥ nakāraḥ . yadi evam na upadhāyāḥ iti dīrghatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13055: sautraḥ nirdeśaḥ . atha vā napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . atha kimartham āt
GS24pmbhasuu:13056: ucyate na at eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ vṛkṣāt : plakṣāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13057_0: savarṇadīrghatvena siddham . na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe pararūpam iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13057_1: . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13057_2: bādhyate savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13057_3: anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . pararūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:13057_4: prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13058_0: (P_7,1.13) KA_III,245.22-246.4 Ro_V,20.5-10 kim idam caturthyekavacanasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13058_1: āhosvit saptamyekavacanasya grahaṇam . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . caturthyekavacanasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13058_2: grahaṇam . katham jñāyate . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13059_0: caturthyekavacanasya grahaṇam syāt . ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ . evam tarhi vyākhyānataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13059_1: viśeṣapratipattiḥ na hi sandehāt alakṣaṇam iti iha caturthyekavacanays agrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13061: upasaṅkhyānam aśaḥ ekādiṣṭāt smāyādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . atha u atra asmai . atha u atra asmāt . atha u atra asmin iti . ekādeśe kṛte ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13062: iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekādeśaḥ tāvat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13063_0: na punaḥ smāyādayaḥ . na paratvāt smāyādibhiḥ bhavitavyam . na bhavitavyam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13063_1: kāraṇam . nityatvāt ekādeśaḥ . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ . kṛteṣu api smāyādiṣu prāpnoti akṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13063_2: api . nityatvāt ekādeśe kṛte ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . kim ucyate aśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13063_3: iti na iha api kartavyam atra asmai . atra asmāt . atra asmin iti . ekādeśe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:13063_4: ataḥ iti smāyādayaḥ na prāpnuvanti . ānupūrvyā siddham etat . na atra akṛteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13064_0: smāyādiṣu halādiḥ vibhaktiḥ asti halādau cet rūpalopaḥ na ca akṛtae idrūpalope ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13064_1: prāpnoti . tat ānupūryā siddham . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13067: (P_7,1.17,20) KA_III,246.23-247.3 Ro_V,21.18-21 kimartham śībhāvaḥ śibhāvaḥ ca ucyate na śibhāvaḥ eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : te ye ke .
GS24pmbhasuu:13068_0: ādguṇena siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi trapuṇī jatunī dīrghaśravaṇam na syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13068_1: . evam tarhi śībhavaḥ eva ucyatām . na evam śakyam . iha hi kuṇḍāni vanāni iti hrasvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13068_2: śravaṇam na syāt . tasmāt śībhāvaḥ śibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13071: sāmānyagrahaṇārthaḥ . au , iti ucyamāne prathamādvivacanasya eva syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13072: atha api auṭ iti ucyate evam api dvitīyādvivacanasya eva syāt . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti . ṅitkāryam tu prāpnoti . khaṭve māle .
GS24pmbhasuu:13073_0: yāṭ āpaḥ iti yāṭ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate ṅakāraḥ it asya saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13073_1: ayam ṅit ṅiti iti . katham tarhi . ṅaḥ eva it ṅit ṅiti iti . evam sati varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13073_2: idam bhavati varṇagrahaṇeṣu ca etat bhavati yasmin vidhiḥ tadādau algrahaṇe iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13073_3: na doṣaḥ bhavati . atha vā varṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13074_0: idam bhavati na ca etat varṇagrahaṇeṣu bhavati : ananubandhakagrahaṇe na sānubandhakasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13074_1: iti . atha vā pūrvasūtranirdeśaḥ ayam pūrvasūtreṣu ca ye anubandhāḥ na taiḥ iha itkāryāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:13074_2: kriyante . aukāraḥ ayam śīvidhau ṅit gṛhītaḥ ṅit ca asmākam na asti kaḥ ayam prakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13075: āsañjane asmin ṅitkāryam te śyām prasaktam saḥ doṣaḥ . ṅittve vidyāt varṇanirdeśamātram varṇe yat syāt tat ca vidyāt tadādau . varṇaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13076: tena ṅittve api adoṣaḥ nirdeśaḥ ayam pūrvasūtreṇa vā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13077: (P_7,1.21) KA_III,247.18-248.18 Ro_V,23.8-25.13 auśaghau . auśaghau iti vaktavyam . kim idam aghau iti . anuttarapade iti . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13078: iha mā bhūt . aṣṭaputraḥ aṣṭabhāryaḥ iti . astu luk tatra . astu atra auśtvam luk bhaviṣyati . ṣaḍbhyaḥ api evam prasajyate . iha api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13079_0: prāpnoti . aṣṭau tiṣṭhanti . aṣṭau paśya iti . apavādaḥ . apavādatvāt atra auśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13079_1: lukam bādhiṣyate . iha api tarhi bādheta . aṣṭaputraḥ aṣṭabhāryaḥ . yasya viṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:13079_2: . yasya lukaḥ viṣaye auśtvam tasya apavādaḥ . yaḥ vā tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13080: anantaraḥ . atha vā anantarasya lukaḥ bādhakam bhaviṣyati . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13081_0: anantarasya vidhiḥ vā bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . atha iha kasmāt na bhavati auśtvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13081_1: . aṣṭa tiṣṭhanti . aṣṭa paśya iti . ātvam yatra tu tatra auśtvam . yatra eva ātvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13081_2: tatra eva auśtvena bhavitavyam . kutaḥ etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13082: tathā hi asya grahaḥ kṛtaḥ . tathā hi asya ātvabhūtasya grahaṇam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13083: aṣṭābhyaḥ iti . nanu ca nityam ātvam . etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhāṣātvam iti yat ayam ātvabhūtasya grahaṇam karoti . aṣṭābhyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13084: itarathā hi aṣṭanaḥ iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13086_0: ca svamoḥ luk tyadādibhyaḥ ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . tat brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:13086_1: iti . kṛte hi atve na luk bhavet . atve kṛte luk na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:13086_2: : atvam kriyatām luk iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13087_0: paratvāt atvam . nityaḥ luk . kṛte api atve prāpnoti akṛte api . anityaḥ luk na hi
GS24pmbhasuu:13087_1: kṛte atve prāpnoti . ataḥ am iti ambhāvena bhavitavyam . tasmāt tyadādibhyaḥ ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13087_2: vaktavyam . idam vicāryate : śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13087_3: syāt arthagrahaṇam vā iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13088_0: viśeṣaḥ . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13088_1: . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13088_2: vaktavyaḥ . bahutrapuḥ bahutrapū bahutrapavaḥ iti . astu tarhi arthagrahaṇam . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:13088_3: arthagrahaṇam priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena iti anaṅ na prāpnoti . astu tarhi śabdagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13089: eva . nanu ca uktam śiśīlugnumbidhiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam cet anyapadārthe pratiṣedhaḥ iti . siddham tu prakṛtārthaviśeṣaṇatvāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13090_0: katham . prakṛtasya arthaḥ viśeṣyate . kim ca prakṛtam . aṅgam . aṅgasya śiśīlugnumaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13090_1: bhavanti napuṃsake vartamānasya . katham priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena . asthyādiṣu śabdagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13090_2: . asthyādiṣu napuṃsakagrahaṇam śabdagrahaṇam draṣṭavyam . yuktam punaḥ idam vicārayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:13090_3: . nanu anena asandigdhena arthagrahaṇena bhavitavyam na hi napuṃsakam nāma śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13091: . kim tarhi ucyate asthyādiṣu śabdagrahaṇam iti . atra api arthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13092: eva . atra etāvān sandehaḥ kva prakṛtasya arthaḥ viśeṣyate kva gṛhyamāṇasya iti . śiśīlugnumvidhiṣu prakṛtasya arthaḥ viśeṣyate asthyādiṣu gṛhyamāṇasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:13093: (P_7,1.25) KA_III,249.20-250.5 Ro_V,28.8-29.5 adbhāve pūrvasavarṇapratiṣedhaḥ . adbhāve pūrvasavarṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13094_0: katarat tiṣṭhati , katarat paśya . siddham anunāsikopadhatvāt . siddham etat . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13094_1: . anunāsikopadhaḥ acśabdaḥ kariṣyate . dukkaraṇāt vā . atha vā dugḍatarādīnām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13094_2: vakṣyati . ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā ḍid acchabdaḥ kariṣyate . saḥ tarhi ḍakāraḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13096_0: (P_7,1.26) KA_III,250.7-250.18 Ro_V,29.7-30.8 itarāt chandasi pratiṣedhaḥ ekatarāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13096_1: sarvatra . itarāt chandasi pratiṣedhaḥ ekatarāt sarvatra iti vaktavyam . ekataram
GS24pmbhasuu:13099_0: napuṃsakādeśānām avakāśaḥ . trapu , trapuṇī , trapūṇi . yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13099_1: avakāśaḥ . tvam brāhmaṇaḥ , aham brāhmaṇaḥ , yuvām brāhmaṇau , āvām brāhmaṇau , yūyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13099_2: brāhmaṇāḥ vayam brāhmaṇāḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . tvam brāhmaṇakulam , aham brāhmaṇakulam
GS24pmbhasuu:13099_3: , yuvām brāhmaṇakule āvām brāhmaṇakule , yūyam brāhmaṇakulāni , vayam brāhmaṇakulāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13100_0: yuṣmadasmadoḥ vibhaktyādeśāḥ bhavanti vipratiṣedhena . atha idānīm yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13100_1: vibhaktyādeśeṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt śiśīlugnumvidhayaḥ kasmāt na bhavanti . sakṛdgatau
GS24pmbhasuu:13103: sarvādeśārthaḥ . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13104_0: prayojanam . akriyamāṇe api śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya akāre
GS24pmbhasuu:13104_1: kṛte trayāṇām akārāṇām ataḥ guṇe pararūpatve siddham rūpam syāt : tava svam , mama
GS24pmbhasuu:13104_2: svam . yadi etat labhyeta kṛtam syāt . tat tu na
GS24pmbhasuu:13105_0: labhyam . kim kāraṇam . atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti akārasya prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13105_1: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . ṅasaḥ ādeśe śitkaraṇānarthakyam akārasya akāravacanānarthakyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13105_2: . ṅasaḥ ādeśe śitkaraṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . akārasya akāravacanānarthakyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13106_0: akārasya akāravacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13106_1: . arthavattvādeśe lopārtham . arthavattvakārasya akāravacanam . kaḥ arthaḥ . ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:13106_2: lopārtham . yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ādeśe saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13107_0: vijñāyate . nanu ca ādeśaḥ yā vibhaktiḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate . ādeśaḥ eṣā vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13107_1: . katham . sarve sarvapadādeśā dākṣīputrasya pāṇineḥ ekadeśavikāre hi nityatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:13107_2: upapadyate . tasmāt śitkaraṇam . tasmāt śakāraḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13108: praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . a , a , a , iti . saḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti sarvasya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13110: kayoḥ idam prathamayoḥ grahaṇam kim vibhaktyoḥ āhosvit pratyayayoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13111_0: vibhaktyoḥ iti āha . katham jñāyate . anyatra api hi prathamayoḥ grahaṇe vibhaktyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13111_1: grahaṇam vijñāyate na pratyayayoḥ . kva anyatra . prathamayoḥ pūrvasavarṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13111_2: asti kāraṇam yena tatra vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13112_0: . kim kāraṇam . aci iti tatra vartate na ca ajādī prathamau staḥ . nanu ca evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13112_1: ajādī yau prathamau ajādīnām vā yau prathamau iti . yat tarhi tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:13112_2: iti anukrāntam pūrvasavarṇam pratinirdiśati tajjñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13113_0: jñāpayati vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti yat ayam śasaḥ na iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na eṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13113_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . natvam etat vidhīyate . siddham atra natvam tasmāt śasaḥ naḥ puṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:13113_2: iti . yatra tena na sidhyati tadartham . kva ca tena na sidhyati . striyām napuṃsake
GS24pmbhasuu:13113_3: ca . yuṣmān brāhmaṇī paśya , asmān brāhmaṇī paśya , yuṣmān brāhmaṇakulāni paśya ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13113_4: asmān brāhmaṇakulāni paśya iti . yat tarhi yuṣmadasmadoḥ anādeśe dvitīyāyām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13113_5: āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ vibhaktyoḥ grahaṇam iti (P_7,1.30) KA_III,252.8-14 Ro_V,33.10-34.6
GS24pmbhasuu:13114: āhosvit abhyamśabdaḥ . kutaḥ sandehaḥ . samānaḥ nirdeśaḥ . kim ca ataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13115_0: yadi tāvat bhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca antyasya etvam prāpnoti . atha abhyamśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13115_1: śeṣe lopaḥ ca ṭilopaḥ udāttnivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:13115_2: tāvat abhyamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca antyasya . nanu ca uktam ettvam prāpnoti iti . na
GS24pmbhasuu:13116: avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti na bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu abhamśabdaḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ca ṭilopaḥ . nanu ca uktam udāttanivṛttisvaraḥ prāpnoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13117: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ uktam etat ādau siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13118_0: (P_7,1.33) KA_III,252.16-253.21 Ro_V,34.8-38.4 kimartham āmaḥ sasakārasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13118_1: kriyate na āmaḥ ākam iti eva ucyeta . kena idānīm sasakārasya bhaviṣyati . āmaḥ suṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:13119: ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . sāmgrahaṇam yathāgṛhītasya ādeśavacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13120: sāmgrahaṇam kriyate . nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam sasakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13121_0: na prāpnoti . iṣyate ca syāt iti tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti sāmaḥ ākam
GS24pmbhasuu:13121_1: . evamartham idam ucyate . na vā dviparyantānām akāravacanāt āmi sakārābhāvaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:13121_2: vā etat prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13122: dviparyantānām akāravacanāt . dviparyantānām hi tyadādīnam atvam ucyate tena āmi sakāraḥ na bhaviṣyati . suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tu ādeśe lopavijñānāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13123_0: suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tu vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ādeśe lopavijñānāt . yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13123_1: ādeśe saḥ vijñāyate . na vā ṭilopavacanāt ādeśe ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . na vā suṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13124: ṭilopavacanāt . ādeśe yaḥ saḥ śeṣe lopaḥ ṭilopaḥ saḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . ṭāp mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13125: vaktavyaḥ . na vā liṅgābhāvāt ṭilopavacanānarthakyam . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13126_0: kim kāraṇam . liṅgābhāvāt . aliṅge yuṣmadasmadī . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13126_1: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ striyām puṃsi napuṃsake vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13126_2: . asti kāraṇam yena etat evam bhavati . kim kāraṇam . yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13126_3: tadasānnidhyāt . aṅga hi bhavān tam uccārayatu gaṃsyate saḥ viśeṣaḥ . nanu ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:13126_4: etena evam bhavitavyam . na hi śabdanimittakena nāma arthena bhavitavyam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13126_5: artha nimittakena nāma śabdena bhavitavyam . tat etat evam dṛśyatām : artharūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:13127: evañjātīyakam yena atra viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti . avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam . yaḥ hi manyate yaḥ asau viśeṣavācī śabdaḥ tadasānnidhyāt atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13128: viśeṣaḥ na gamyate iti iha api tasya viśeṣaḥ na gamyate : dṛṣat samit iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13129: . tasmāt suṭpratiṣedhaḥ tasmāt suṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ sasakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13130: vā kartavyam . atha kriyamāṇe api sasakāragrahaṇe kasmāt eva atra suṭ na
GS24pmbhasuu:13131: bhavati . sasakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt bhāvinaḥ suṭaḥ ādeśaḥ vijñāyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13132_0: (P_7,1.34) KA_III,253.23-254.4 Ro_V,39.2-8 iha papau, tasthau iti trīṇi kāryāṇi yugapat
GS24pmbhasuu:13132_1: prāpnuvanti : dvirvacanam ekādeśaḥ autvam iti . tat yadi sarvataḥ autvam labhyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13132_2: kṛtam syāt . atha api dvirvacanam labhyeta evam api kṛtam syāt . tat tu na labhyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13133: ekādeśaḥ dvirvacanam bādhate . paratvāt autvam . nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ autvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13134: bādheta . kam punaḥ bhavān autvasya avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ ekādeśaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13135: . anavakāśam autvam ekādeśam bādhiṣyate . autve kṛte dvirvacanam ekādeśaḥ iti yadi api paratvāt ekādeśaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13136: (P_7,1.36) KA_III,254.6-13 Ro_V,40.2-41.1 videḥ vasoḥ kittvam . videḥ vasoḥ kittvam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . vasugrahaṇeṣu liḍādeśasya api
GS24pmbhasuu:13137: grahaṇam yathā syāt . kim ca kāraṇam na syāt . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi sānubandhakasya grahaṇam na iti evam liḍādeśasya na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13138: sānubandhakaḥ hi saḥ kriyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam saḥ sānubandhakaḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13139: . ayam ṝkārāntānām liṭi guṅaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣayaḥ ārabhyate saḥ punaḥ kitkaraṇāt bādhyate . ātistīrvān , nipupūrvān iti . saḥ tarhi asya
GS24pmbhasuu:13140: evamarthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13141: dvisakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ : videḥ śaturvasussamāse anañpūrve ktvaḥ lyap .
GS24pmbhasuu:13142_1: upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām lyap bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13142_2: . anādiṣṭārtham . akṛteṣu ādeśeṣu lyap yathā syāt . ke punaḥ ādeśāḥ upadeśivadvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13143: hitvam . dattvam . dattvā , pradāya . dattvam . āttvam . khātvā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13144: prakhanya . āttvam . itvam . sthitvā , prasthāya . itvam . īttvam . pītvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13145: , prapāya . īttvam . dīrghatvam . śāntvā , praśamya . dīrghatvam . śatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13146: . pṛṣṭvā , āpṛcchya . śatvam . ūṭh . dyūtvā , pradīvya . ūṭh . iṭ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13147: devitvā , pradīvya . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ādeśāḥ tāvat bhavanti na punaḥ lyap
GS24pmbhasuu:13148: . na paratvāt lyapā bhavitavyam . santi ca eva atra ke cit pare ādeśāḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:13149_0: ca bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgaḥ lyap . antaraṅgāḥ ādeśāḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:13149_1: antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13149_2: jñāpayati antaraṅgān api vidhīn bahiraṅgaḥ lyap bādhate iti yat ayam adaḥ jagdhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13149_3: lyapti kiti iti ti kiti iti eva siddhe lyabgrahaṇam karoti . snātvākālakādiṣu ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13149_4: pratiṣedhaḥ snātvākālakādiṣu ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . snātvākālakaḥ , pītvāsthirakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13149_5: , bhuktvāsuhitakaḥ iti . tadantanirdeśāt siddham . tadantanirdeśāt siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13150: ktvāntasya lyapā bhavitavyam na ca etat ktvāntam . samāsanipātanāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13151_0: atha vā avaśyam atra samāsārtham nipātanam kartavyam tena eva yatnena lyap api na
GS24pmbhasuu:13151_1: bhaviṣyati . anañaḥ vā parasya . atha vā anañaḥ parasya lyapā bhavitavyam na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13151_2: anañam paśyāmaḥ . nanu ca dhātuḥ eva anañ . na dhātoḥ parasya bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13151_3: . nañivayuktam anyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hi arthagatiḥ . nañyuktam iva yuktam vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13151_4: anyasmin tatsadṛśe kāryam vijñāsyate . kutaḥ etat . tathā hi arthaḥ gamyate . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:13151_5: yathā . abrāhmaṇam ānaya iti ukte grāhmaṇasadṛśam puruṣam ānayati na asau
GS24pmbhasuu:13152_0: loṣṭam ānīya kṛtī bhavati . evam iha api anañ iti nañpratiṣedhāt anyasmāt anañau
GS24pmbhasuu:13152_1: nañsadṛśāt kāryam vijñāsyate . kim ca anyat anañ nañsadṛśam . padam iti āha . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:13152_2: vā pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13153: evam dhātuḥ api ktvāgrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . nanu ca iyam api paribhāṣā asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13154: : kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api grahaṇam bhavati iti sā api iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13155_0: upatiṣṭhate . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha na syāt : prakṛtya prahṛtya . kva tarhi syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13155_1: . paramakṛtvā , uttamakṛtvā . na vai atra iṣyate . aniṣṭam ca prāpnoti iṣṭam ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:13155_2: sidhyati . gatikārakapūrvasya eva iṣyate . kutaḥ na khalu etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13155_3: sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13155_4: gatikārakapūrvasya iti ca iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13155_5: grahaṇam bhavati iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe gatikārakapūrvasya api iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13156: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati iyam iha paribhāṣā bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe iti yat ayam anañ iti pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13157: katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ayam hi nañ na gatiḥ na ca kārakam tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat nañpūrvasya syāt . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ iyam iha paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:13158: bhavati pratyayagrahaṇe iti iyam na bhavati kṛdgrahaṇe iti tataḥ anañ iti pratiṣedham śāsti . kim nañaḥ pratiṣedhena na gatiḥ na ca kārakam yāvatā
GS24pmbhasuu:13159: nañi pūrve tu lyabbhāvaḥ na bhaviṣyati . pratiṣedhāt tu jānīmaḥ tatpūrvam na iha gṛhyate pratyaygrahaṇe yāvat tāvat bhavitum arhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13160_0: (P_7,1.39) KA_III,256.13-257.2 Ro_V,47-49 supām ca supaḥ bhavanti iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13160_1: yuktā mātā āsīt bhuri dakṣiṇāyāḥ dakṣiṇāyām iti prāpte . tiṅām ca tiṅaḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:13160_2: iti vaktavyam . caṣālam ye , aśvayūpāya takṣati takṣanti
GS24pmbhasuu:13161_0: iti prāpte . luki kim udāharaṇam . ārdre carman , lohite carman . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13161_1: pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . idam tarhi . yat sthavīyasaḥ āvasan uta sapta sākam
GS24pmbhasuu:13161_2: . nanu ca etat api pūrvasavarṇena eva siddham . na sidhyati . yadi atra pūrvasavarṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13161_3: syāt tyadādyatvam prasajyeta . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ārdre carman , lohite carman
GS24pmbhasuu:13162_0: pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . yadi atra pūrvasavarṇaḥ syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13162_1: āntaryataḥ dakāraḥ prasajyeta . astu . saṃyogāntalopena siddham . iyāḍiyājīkārāṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:13162_2: upasaṅkhyānam . iyāḍiyājīkārāṇām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . dārviyā parijman . iyā
GS24pmbhasuu:13163: . īkāra . dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam . āṅayājayārām ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13164: kartavyam . āṅ , pra bāhavā . ayāc . svapnayā sacase janam . ayāc . ayār .
GS24pmbhasuu:13166_0: (P_7,1.40) KA_III,257.4-18 Ro_V,49.4-50.3 kimarthaḥ śakāraḥ . śit sarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13166_1: yathā syāt . akriyamāṇe hi śakāre alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13167: . amaḥ maś na makārasya . makārasya makāravacane prayojanam na asti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13168: kṛtvā tatra antareṇa śakāram sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . vacanāt anyabādhanam . asti anyat makārasya makāravacane prayojanam . ye anye makārādeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13169_0: prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham . tat yathā . maḥ rāji samaḥ kvau iti makārasya makāravacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13169_1: anusvārādayaḥ bādhyante . evam tarhi dvimakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate . dvimakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13169_2: īṭ apṛkte . yadi dvimakārakaḥ apṛktāśrayaḥ īṭ na prāpnoti . vadhīm vṛtram marutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13169_3: indriyeṇa . yakārādau na duṣyati . kim yakāraḥ na śrūyate . luptanirdiṣṭaḥ yakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13170: makārasya vacanāt anyabādhanam dvimakāraḥ īṭ apṛkte yakārādau na duṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13171_0: (P_7,1.50) KA_III,257.20-258.11 Ro_V,50.5-51.2 iha : ye pūrvāsaḥ , ye uparāsaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:13171_1: āt jaseḥ asuk iti asuki kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13171_2: jasi pūrvāntaḥ kariṣyate . yadi pūrvāntaḥ kriyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ : brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13172: na sidhyati . ataḥ guṇe iti pararūpatvam prāpnoti . akāroccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi prāpnuvan vidhiḥ uccāraṇasāmarthyāt bādhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13173: savarṇadīrghatvam api na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati
GS24pmbhasuu:13174: upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam na asau bādhyate . pararūpam ca prati akāroccāraṇam anarthakam savarṇadīrghatvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13175_0: punaḥ nimittam eva . atha vā asuṭ kariṣyate . evam api ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13175_1: asuṭi kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . nirdiśyamānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13175_2: ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam asya na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13176: yaḥ tarhi nirdiśyate tasya kasmāt na bhavati . asuṭā vyavahitatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13177_0: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam ye pūrvāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13177_1: ye uparāsaḥ asuki kṛte jasaḥ grahaṇena grahaṇāt śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13177_2: . idam iha sampradhāryam . śībhāvaḥ kriyatām asuk iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13177_3: asuk . atha idānīm asuki kṛte punaḥ prasaṅgavijñānāt śībhāvaḥ kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13180: aśvavṛṣayoḥ maithunecchāyām iti vaktavyam . aśvasyati vaḍavā , vṛṣasyati gauḥ . maithunecchāyām iti kimartham . aśvīyati , vṛṣīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13181: kṣīralavaṇayoḥ lālasāyām . kṣīrlavaṇayoḥ lālasāyām iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13182: kṣīrasyati māṇavakaḥ , lavaṇasyati uṣṭraḥ iti . aparaḥ āha :
GS24pmbhasuu:13183: sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ lālasāyām iti vaktavyam dadhyasyati madhvasyati iti evamartham . aparaḥ āha: suk vaktavyaḥ : dadhisyati madusyati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13185_0: (P_7,1.52-54) KA_III,258.24-260.11 Ro_V,51.16-54.14 ime bahavaḥ āmśabdāḥ : kāspratyayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13185_1: ām amantre liṭi . ṅasosām . kimettiṅavyayaghāt āmu adravyaprakarṣe . ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13186_0: ṣaṣṭhībahuvacanasya grahaṇam . atha asya kasmāt na bhavati kāspratyayāt ām amantre
GS24pmbhasuu:13186_1: liṭi iti . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi na sānubandhakasya iti . saḥ tarhi asya evamarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13186_2: anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ iha asya grahaṇam mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13187_0: nanu ca avaśyam makārasya itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13187_1: itsañjñāparitrāṇārthena . itkāryābhāvāt atra itsañjñā na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:13187_2: mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt paraḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13188_0: syāt . pratyayāntāt ayam vidhīyate tatra na asti viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13188_1: vā paratve pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā . yaḥ tarhi na pratyayāntāt ijādeśaḥ ca gurumataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13188_2: anṛcchaḥ iti . atra api āskāsoḥ āmvacanam jñāpakam na ayam acām antyāt paraḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13188_3: iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13189: viśeṣaḥ āmi acām antyāt pare sati asati vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . asati āmi dvirvacanena bhavitavyam sati na bhavitavyam . sati api bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13190: katham . āmaḥ tanmadhyapatitatvāt dhātugrahaṇena grahaṇāt . tat etat kāsāsoḥ āmvacanam jñāpakam eva na ayam acām antyāt paraḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13191: atha api katham cit kāryam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13192: āmaḥ amantre iti . yadi evam āmā antre iti prāpnoti . śakandhunyāyena nirdeśaḥ . atha vā astu asya grahaṇam kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha kārayāñcakāra ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13193: harayāñcakāra , cikīrṣāñcakāra , jihīrṣāñcakāra , hrasvandyāpaḥ nuṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13194_0: nuṭ prasajyeta . lopāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ na bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . lopāyādeśau
GS24pmbhasuu:13194_1: kriyetām nuṭ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . nityau lopāyādeśau . kṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:13194_2: nuṭi prāpnutaḥ akṛte api . tatra nityatvāt lopāyādeśayoḥ kṛtayoḥ vihatanimittatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13194_3: nuṭ na bhaviṣyati . atha asya kasmāt na bhavati kimettiṅavyayaghāt āmu adravyaprakarṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:13195: ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi na sānubandhakasya iti . saḥ tarhi evamarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13196: anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ . nanu ca avaśyam ugitkāryārthaḥ anubandhaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13197_0: . na arthaḥ ugitkāryārthena anubandhena . liṅgavibhaktiprakaraṇe sarvam ugitkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:13197_1: na ca āmaḥ liṅgavibhaktī staḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ . makārasya tarhi itsañjñāparitrāṇārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13198: na bhaviṣyati . idam asti itkāryam mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti acām antyāt paraḥ yathā syāt . na etat asti . ghāntāt ayam vidhīyate tatra na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13199_0: viśeṣaḥ mit acaḥ antyāt paraḥ iti vā paratve pratyayaḥ paraḥ iti vā paratve . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:13199_1: api katham cit itkāryam syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva . atha vā astu
GS24pmbhasuu:13199_2: asya grahaṇam kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha pacatitarām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13200: jalpatitarām , hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti nuṭ prasajyeta . lope kṛte na
GS24pmbhasuu:13201: bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . lopaḥ kriyatām nuṭ iti kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13202_0: kartavyam . paratvāt nuṭ . evam tarhi hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti atra yasya iti lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13202_1: anuvartiṣyate . atha asya kasmāt na bhavati ṅeḥ ām nadyāmnībhyaḥ iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13203: yasyām iti hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti nuṭ prasajyeta . āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ atra bādhakāḥ bhaviṣyanti . idam iha sampradhāryam . āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ kriyantām nuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:13204: iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt āḍyāṭsyāṭaḥ . atha idānīm āḍyāṭsyāṭsu
GS24pmbhasuu:13205: kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt nuṭ kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13207: (P_7,1.56) KA_III,260.13-16 Ro_V,55.2-5 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum .
GS24pmbhasuu:13208_0: katham śrīṇām udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām , api tatra sūtagrāmaṇīnām . iha tāvat śrīṇām
GS24pmbhasuu:13208_1: udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām vibhāṣā āmi nadīsañjñā sā chandasi vyavasthitavibhāṣā bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13208_2: . api tatra sūtagrāmaṇīnām iti sūtāḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13209: grāmaṇyaḥ ca sūtagrāmaṇi tatra hrasvanadyāpaḥ nuṭ iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13210: (P_7,1.58) KA_III,261.2-17 Ro_V,55.9-56.13 atha dhātoḥ iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13212_0: numvidhau upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . upadeśāvasthāyām num bhavati iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13212_1: . kim prayojanam . pratyayavidhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām numi kṛte iṣṭaḥ pratyayavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13212_2: yathā syāt . kuṇḍā , huṇḍā iti . itarathā hi anakāre pratyayaḥ . akriyamāṇe hi upadeśivadbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:13213_0: prāpnoti saḥ tāvat syāt tasmin avasthite num . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13213_1: . tatra ayatheṣṭam prasajyeta . aniṣṭe pratyaye avasthite num . aniṣṭasya pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13214_0: dhātugrahaṇasāmarthyāt vā tadupadeśe numvidhānam dhātugrahaṇasāmarthyāt vā tadupadeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:13214_1: dhātūpadeśe num bhaviṣyati . nanu ca anyat dhātugrahaṇasya prayojanam uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13214_2: . abhaitsīt , acchaitsīt iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13215: prayojanam . prayojanam nāma tat vaktavyam yat niyogataḥ syāt . yat ca atra ikāreṇa kriyate akāreṇa api tat śakyam kartum .
GS24pmbhasuu:13216: (P_7,1.59) KA_III,261.19-262.3 Ro_V,57.2-58.6 śe tṛmpādīnām . śe tṛmpādīnām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tṛmpati , tṛmphati . kimartham idam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13217: na numanuṣaktāḥ eva ete paṭhyante . luptanakāratvāt . lupyate atra nakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13218_0: aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti . yadi punaḥ ime iditaḥ paṭhyeran . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13218_1: . iha hi lopaḥ na syāt . tṛpitaḥ , dṛpitaḥ iti . yadi punaḥ ime mucādiṣu paṭhyeran
GS24pmbhasuu:13218_2: . na doṣaḥ syāt . atha vā na evam vijñāyate iditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13219: num dhātoḥ iti . katham tarhi . iditaḥ num . tataḥ dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13220: (P_7,1.62) KA_III,262.5-7 Ro_V,58.8-59.2 imau dvau pratiṣedhau ucyete
GS24pmbhasuu:13221: . ubhau śakyau avaktum . katham . evam vakṣyāmi . iṭi liṭi radheḥ num bhavati iti . tanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . liṭi eva iḍādau na anyasmin iḍādau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13222: (P_7,1.65) KA_III,262.9-12 Ro_V,59.4-8 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:13223: ālabhyate . astu . aniditām halaḥ upadhāyāḥ kṅiti iti lopaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13224_0: iha tarhi ālambhyā gauḥ poḥ adupadhāt iti yati avasthite num . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13224_1: ālambhyā* eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . ālambhyā* iti ca iṣyate . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:13225_0: (P_7,1.68) KA_III,262.14-22 Ro_V,59.10-61.2 atha kevalagrahaṇam kimartham na na sudurbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13225_1: iti eva ucyeta . suduroḥ kevalagrahaṇam anyopasargapratiṣedhārtham . suduroḥ kevalagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13225_2: kriyate anyopasṛṣṭāt mā bhūt iti . prasulambham . na eṣaḥ asti prayogaḥ . idam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13226: supralambham . preṇa vyavahitatvāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13227: atisulambham . karmapravacanīyasañjñā atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati suḥ pūjāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13228: atiḥ atikramaṇe ca iti . yadā tarhi na atikramaṇam na pūjā . idam ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:13229: udāharaṇam . supralambham . nanu ca uktam preṇa vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:13230: bhaviṣyati iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sudurbhyām iti na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi . tṛtīyā . sudurbhyām upasṛṣṭasya iti . vyavahitaḥ ca api upasṛṣṭaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13232: ciṇṇamuloḥ anupasargasya iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prālambhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13233: pralambham pralambham . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . iha upasargāt iti api prakṛtam na iti api tatra abhisambandhamātram kartavyam : vibhāṣā ciṇṇamuloḥ upasargāt na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13234: (P_7,1.70) KA_III,263.7-13 Ro_V,61-62 adhātoḥ iti kimartham . ukhāsrat
GS24pmbhasuu:13235: , parṇadhvat . adhātoḥ iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati khāsrat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13236: parṇadhvat iti . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt siddham adhātoḥ . ugiti añcatigrahaṇāt adhātoḥ siddham . añcatigrahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13237: añcateḥ eva ugitaḥ dhātoḥ na anyasya ugitaḥ dhātoḥ iti . idam tarhi prayojanam adhātubhūtapūrvasya api yathā syāt . gomantam icchati gomatyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13239_0: (P_7,1.72) KA_III,263.15-265.16 Ro_V,62-66 jhalacaḥ numvidhau ugitpratiṣedhaḥ . jhalacaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13239_1: numvidhau ugillakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . gomanti brāhmaṇakulāni , śreyāṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:13240: ugillakṣaṇam bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānam anyasya bādhakam syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13241_0: asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat ubhayam syāt . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13241_1: ca syāt yadi atra ugillakṣaṇaḥ api syāt . dvayoḥ nakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13241_2: na vyañjanaparasya ekasya vā aneakasya vā śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ asti . nanu ca pratijñābhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13242: pratijñābhedaḥ kariṣyati . nanu ca śrutikṛtaḥ api bhedaḥ asti . iha tāvat śreyāṃsi , bhūyāṃsi iti parasya anusvāre kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13243_0: tathā kurvanti , kṛṣanti iti parasya anusvāraparasavarṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ pūrvasya ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13243_1: prāpnoti . atha ekasmin api numi ṇatvam kasmāt na bhavati . anusvārībhūtaḥ ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13243_2: atikrāmati . kṛte tarhi parasavarṇe kasmāt na bhavati . asiddhe ca parasavarṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13243_3: vipratiṣedhāt siddham . vipratiṣedhāt siddham etat . jhallakṣaṇaḥ kriyatām ugillakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13243_4: iti jhallakṣaṇaḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . jhallakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . sarpīṃṣi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13244: . ugillakṣaṇasya avakāśaḥ . gomān , yavamān . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13245_0: gomanti brāhmaṇakulāni , yavamanti brāhmaṇakulāni , śreyāṃsi , bhūyāṃsi iti . jhallakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13245_1: bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . nanu ca punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt ugillakṣaṇaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13246: amādibhiḥ tulyam . punaḥ prasaṅgaḥ iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13247: tat yathā . yuṣmadasmadoḥ amādiṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt śaśīlugnumaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:13248: bhavanti . evam jhallakṣaṇe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgāt ugillakṣaṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_0: . yat api ucyate asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_1: ubhayam syāt iti sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat yathā . dadhi brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_2: dīyatām takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_3: bhavati . evam iha api sati api sambhave jhallakṣaṇaḥ ugillakṣaṇam bādhiṣyate . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_4: vā astu atra ugillakṣaṇaḥ api . nanu ca uktam cvayoḥ nakārayoḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_5: iti . parihṛtam etat na vyañjanaparasya ekasya vā anekasya vā śravaṇam prati viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_6: asti . nanu ca uktam pratijñābhedaḥ bhavati iti . śrutibhede asati pratijñābhedaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_7: kim kariṣyati . nanu ca śrutikṛtaḥ api bhedaḥ uktaḥ iha tāvat śreyāṃsi , bhūyāṃsi
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_8: iti parasya anusvāre kṛte pūrvasya śravaṇam prasajyeta kurvanti , kṛṣanti iti parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_9: anusvāraparasavarṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ pūrvasya ṇatvam prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayogavāhānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13249_10: aviśeṣeṇa upadeśaḥ coditaḥ . tatra iha tāvat śreyāṃsi , bhūyāṃsi iti parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13250: anusvāre kṛte tasya jhalgrahaṇena grahaṇāt pūrvasya anusvāraḥ bhaviṣyati kurvanti , kṛṣanti iti parasya anusvāraparasavarṇayoḥ kṛtayoḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13251: jhalgrahaṇena grahaṇāt pūrvasya anusvāraparasavarṇau bhaviṣyataḥ . na eva vā punaḥ atra ugillakṣaṇaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . midacaḥ antyāt paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13252_0: iti ucyate na ca dvayoḥ mitoḥ acām antyāt paratve sambhavaḥ asti . katham tarhi imau
GS24pmbhasuu:13252_1: dvau mitau acām antyāt parau staḥ . bahvanaḍvāṃhi brāhmaṇakulāni iti . vinimittau
GS24pmbhasuu:13252_2: etau . tatra bahūrji pratiṣedhaḥ . tatra bahūrji pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bahūrji
GS24pmbhasuu:13252_3: brāhmaṇakulāni iti . antyāt pūrvam numam eke . antyāt pūrvam numam eke icchanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13253: bahūrjau eva . kim ca ataḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa kāṣṭhatakṃṣi iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13254: atha bahūrjau eva kāṣṭhataṅkṣi iti bhavitavyam . evam tarhi bahūrjau eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13255: bahūrñji . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . acaḥ iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:13256: pañcamī . acaḥ uttaraḥ yaḥ jhal tadantasya napuṃsakasya numā bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13257: yaḥ ca atra acaḥ uttaraḥ na asau jhal na api tadantam napuṃsakam yadantam ca napuṃsakam na asau acaḥ uttaraḥ . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13258_0: kāṣṭhataṅkṣi iti . atra yaḥ acaḥ uttaraḥ jhal na tadantam napuṃsakam yadantam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13258_1: napuṃsakam na asau acaḥ uttaraḥ . na etat asti . jhaljātiḥ pratinirdiśyate . acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13258_2: uttarā yā jhaljātiḥ iti . yadi pañcamī kuṇḍāni ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13259_0: vanāni iti atra na prāpnoti . eva tarhi ikaḥ aci vibhaktau iti atra acaḥ sarvanāmasthāne
GS24pmbhasuu:13259_1: iti etat anuvartiṣyate . evam api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . sarvanāmasthāne iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13259_2: eṣā saptamī acaḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmin iti nirdiṣṭe pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13260: (P_7,1.73) KA_III,265.18-267.12 Ro_V,66-69 ajgrahaṇam kimartham . ikaḥ aci vyañjane mā bhūt . ikaḥ aci iti ucyate vyañjanādau mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13261: trapubhyām , trapubhiḥ . astu lopaḥ . astu atra num . nalopaḥ prātipadikāntasya iti nalopaḥ bhaviṣyati . svaraḥ katham pañcatrapubhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13262: pañcatrapubhyaḥ . igante dvigau iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti . svaraḥ vai śrūyamāṇe api . śrūyamāṇe api numi svaraḥ bhavati . pañcatrapuṇā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13263: pañcatrapuṇaḥ iti . lupte kim na bhaviṣyati . lupte idānīm kim na bhaviṣyati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam śrūyamāne api numi svaraḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13264: saṅghātabhaktaḥ asau na utsahate avayavasya igantatām vihantum iti kṛtvā tataḥ śrūyamāṇe api numi svaraḥ bhavati . idam tarhi . atirābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13265_0: atirābhiḥ . numi kṛte rāyaḥ hali iti ātvam na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13265_1: num kriyatām ātvam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt ātvam . iha tarhi priyatisṛbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13265_2: priyatisṛbhiḥ numi kṛte tisṛbhāvaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13266: . idam iha sampradhāryam . num kriyatām tisṛbhāvaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13267: . paratvāt tisṛbhāvaḥ . atha idānīm tisṛbhāve kṛte punaḥprasaṅgāt num
GS24pmbhasuu:13268_0: kasmāt na bhavati . sakṛdgatau vipratiṣedhe yat bādhitam tat bādhitam eva iti . ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13268_1: uttaram paṭhati . ikaḥ aci vibhaktau ajgrahaṇam numnuṭoḥ vipratiṣedhārtham . ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13268_2: aci vibhaktau ajgrahaṇam kriyate numaḥ nuṭ vipratiṣedhena yathā syāt . trapūṇām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13269_0: nityanimittaḥ num . kṛte api nuṭi prāpnoti akṛte api . nityanimittatvāt numi kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:13269_1: nuṭaḥ abhāvaḥ syāt . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe api vā ajgrahaṇe avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13269_2: atra nuḍarthaḥ yatnaḥ kartavyaḥ . pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13269_3: nuṭi kṛte num mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13270: . trapūṇām , jatūnām . itarathā hi numaḥ nityanimittatvāt nuḍabhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13271: nāmi iti dīrghatvam na syāt . mā bhūt evam . nopadhāyāḥ iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13272: bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi śucīnām inhanpūṣāryamṇām śau sau ca iti asmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13273: niyamāt na prāpnoti dīrghatvam . arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam na bhaviṣyati . na eṣā paribhāṣā iha śakyā vijñātum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13274: vāgmi iti . evam tarhi lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13275: uttarārtham ca . uttarārtham tarhi ajgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13276: asthidadhisakthyakṣṇām anaṅ udāttaḥ ajādau yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13277: asthibhyām , asthibhiḥ iti . yadi uttarārtham syāt tatra eva ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13278: ajgrahaṇam kurvīta . iha kriyamāṇe yadi kim cit prayojanam asti tat ucyatām . iha api kriyamāṇe prayojanam asti . kim . ajādau yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_0: iha mā bhūt . trapu , jatu . etat api na asti prayojanam . vibhaktau iti ucyate na
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_1: ca atra vibhaktim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā aṅgasya iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_2: pratiṣedhaḥ . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ajgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_3: bhavati iha kaḥ cit anyaḥ api prakāraḥ pratyayalakṣaṇam nāma iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_4: prayojanam . he trapu , he trapo . atra guṇaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iti . ikaḥ aci vyañjane
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_5: mā bhūt astu lopaḥ svaraḥ katham . svaraḥ vai śrūyamāṇe api lupte kim na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13279_6: . rāyātvam tisṛbhāvaḥ ca vyavadhānāt numā api nuṭ vācyaḥ uttarārtham tu iha kim cit
GS24pmbhasuu:13281: atidiśyate . numpratiṣedhaḥ . katham punaḥ puṃvat iti anena numpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13282: śakyaḥ vijñātum . vatinirdeśaḥ ayam kāmacāraḥ ca vatinirdeśe vākyaśeṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:13283: samarthayitum . tat yathā : uśīnaravat madreṣu yavāḥ . santi na santi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13284_0: . mātṛvat asyāḥ kalāḥ . santi na santi iti . evam iha api puṃvat bhavati puṃvat na
GS24pmbhasuu:13284_1: bhavati iti vākyaśeṣam samarthayiṣyāmahe . yathā puṃsaḥ na num bhavati evam tṛtīyādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13284_2: bhāṣitapuṃskasya api na bhavati iti . kim ucyate numpratiṣedhaḥ iti na punaḥ anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:13284_3: api puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat tṛtīyādiṣu vibhaktiṣu ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13284_4: atidiśyeta . anārambhāt puṃsi . na hi kim cit puṃsaḥ pratipadam kāryam ucyate yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13284_5: tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu bhāṣitapuṃskasya atidiśyeta . num prakṛtaḥ tatra kim anyat śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13285_0: vijñātum anyat ataḥ numpratiṣedhāt . puṃvat iti numpratiṣedhaḥ cet guṇanābhāvanuḍauttvapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13285_1: . puṃvat iti njumpratiṣedhaḥ cet guṇanābhāvanuḍauttvānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13285_2: guṇa . grāmaṇye brāhmaṇakulāya . guṇa . nābhāva . grāmaṇyā brāhmaṇakulena . nābhāva
GS24pmbhasuu:13286: . grāmaṇyām brāhmaṇakulānām . nuṭ . auttvam . grāmaṇyām brāhmaṇakule .
GS24pmbhasuu:13287: hrasvatvam apratiṣiddham hrasvāśrayāḥ ca ete vidhayaḥ prāpnuvanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13288: hrasvābhāvārtham ca . kim ca . numpratiṣedhārtham ca . katham punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13289: aprakṛtasya asaṃśabditasya hrasvatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum .
GS24pmbhasuu:13290: arthātideśāt siddham . na evam vijñāyate bhāṣyate pumān anena śabdena saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskasya śabdasya puṃśabdaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13291: katham tarhi . bhāṣyate pumān asmin arthe saḥ ayam bhāṣitapuṃskaḥ bhāṣitapuṃskasya arthasya puṃvadarthaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13292_0: taddhitalukpratiṣedhaḥ ca . taddhitalukaḥ ca pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . pīluḥ vṛkṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13292_1: , pīlu phalam . pīlunā , pilunaḥ iti . na vā samānāyām ākṛtau bhāṣitapuṃskavijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13292_2: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . samānāyām ākṛtau bhāṣitapuṃskavijñānāt . samānāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13293: etat bhāṣitapuṃskam . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . etat api arthanirdeśāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13294_0: (P_7,1.77) KA_III,268.16-24 Ro_V,72.9-73.8 kim udāharaṇam . akṣī te indra piṅgale
GS24pmbhasuu:13294_1: . na etat asti . pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham . idam tarhi . akṣībhyām te nāsikābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13294_2: . idam ca api udāharaṇam . akṣī te indra
GS24pmbhasuu:13295_0: piṅgale . nanu ca uktam pūrvasavarṇena api etat siddham iti . na sidhyati . numā
GS24pmbhasuu:13295_1: vyavahitatvāt pūrvasavarṇaḥ na prāpnoti . chandasi napuṃsakasya puṃvadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13295_2: madhoḥ gṛbhṇāmi , madhoḥ tṛptāḥ iva asataḥ iti evamartham . puṃvadbhāvena numaḥ nivṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13295_3: numi nivṛtte pūrvasavarṇena eva siddham . svarārthaḥ tarhi īkāraḥ vaktavyaḥ . udāttasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13296_0: napuṃsakasvaraḥ mā bhūt iti . nanu ca puṃvadbhāvātideśāt eva svaraḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13296_1: aśakyaḥ puṃvadbhāvātideśaḥ svare tantram āśrayitum . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt : madhu asmin
GS24pmbhasuu:13296_2: asti madhuḥ māsaḥ iti . saḥ tarhi puṃvadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13297: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . prakṛtam puṃvat iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13298_0: (P_7,1.78) KA_III,269.2-8 Ro_V,74.2-8 kasya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ . numaḥ iti āha . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:13298_1: numaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . iditaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13298_2: num dhātoḥ iti tat vā anekagrahaṇena vyavacchinnam aśakyam anuvartayitum . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13298_3: sarvanāmasthāne iti varate sarvanāmasthāne yat prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . tat vai
GS24pmbhasuu:13298_4: bahutarakeṇa grahaṇena vyavacchinnam aśakyam anuvartayitum . atha idānīm vyavahitam
GS24pmbhasuu:13298_5: api śakyate anuvartayitum num eva anuvartya iha ihārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13299: uttarārtham ca . iha ca eva pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iha ca āt śīnadyoḥ num iti numgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13300: (P_7,1.80) KA_III,269.10-14 Ro_V,74.10-75.4 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13301_0: adatī , ghnatī , lunatī , punatī . lope kṛte avarṇābhāvāt . kim tarhi asmin yoge
GS24pmbhasuu:13301_1: udāharaṇam . yātī , yāntī . atra api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13301_2: antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . na ubhayataḥ āśrayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13302: avarṇāntāt śatuḥ num bhavati iti . katham tarhi . avarṇāt num bhavati tat cet avarṇam śatuḥ anantaram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13304: vibhāṣā mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhaḥ atra pūrveṇa eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13305: tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . tat etat nityagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13307: (P_7,1.82) KA_III,269.21-270.17 Ro_V,75.14-76.14 anaḍuhaḥ sau āmpratiṣedhaḥ numaḥ anavakāśatvāt . anaḍuhaḥ sau āmpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13308: kim kāraṇam . numaḥ anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśaḥ num āmam bādhate . na vā avarṇopadhasya numvacanāt . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13310_0: tadarthagrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13310_1: āt śīnadyoḥ num iti . yadi tat anuvartate anaḍuhi yāvanti avarṇāni sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13310_2: num prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mit acaḥ antyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13311: paraḥ iti anena yat sarvāntyam avarṇam tasmāt paraḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13312: punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham . atha vā punaḥprsaṅgāt numi kṛte ām
GS24pmbhasuu:13313: bhaviṣyati . yathāttvādiṣu dvirvacanam . tat yathā jagle , mamle , ījatuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13314: , ījuḥ iti āttvādiṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt dvirvacanam bhavati evam atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13315_0: api numi kṛte ām bhaviṣyati . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . vipratiṣedhe punaḥprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13315_1: vipratiṣedhaḥ ca dvayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ bhavati . iha punaḥ anavakāśaḥ num āmam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:13315_2: . evam tarhi vṛttāntāt eṣaḥ parihāraḥ prasthitaḥ . kasmāt vṛttāntāt . idam ayam codyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13316: āmpratiṣedhaḥ numaḥ anavakāśatvāt iti . tasya parihāraḥ na vā avarṇopadhasya numvacanāt iti . tataḥ ayam codyaḥ bhavati yatra tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13317: avarṇaprakaraṇam na asti tatra taḥ āmā numaḥ bādhanam prāpnoti bahvanḍvāṃhi brāhmaṇakulāni iti . tataḥ uttarakālam idam paṭhitam punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13318_0: (P_7,1.84) KA_III,270.19-271.3 Ro_V,77.2-11 divaḥ auttve dhātupratiṣedhaḥ . divaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13318_1: auttve dhātoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akṣadyūḥ iti . adhātvadhikārāt siddham . adhātoḥ
