GS24pmbhasuu:13319: ugidacām sarvanāmasthāne adhātoḥ iti . adhātvadhikārāt siddham iti cet napuṃsake doṣaḥ . adhātvadhikārāt siddham iti cet napuṃsake doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13320: . kāṣṭhataṅkṣi , kūṭataṅkṣi . napuṃsakasya jhal acaḥ adhātoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . ananubandhakagrahaṇe hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:13321: sānubandhakasya iti . atha vā sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13323: ākāraprakaraṇāt . itaḥ advacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13324: ākāraprakaraṇāt . āt iti vartate . ṣapūrvārtham tu . ṣapūrvārtham tarhi at
GS24pmbhasuu:13326: (P_7,1.89) KA_III,271.10-20 Ro_V,78.-79 asuṅi upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . asuṅi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13327: . upadeśāvasthāyām eva asuṅ bhavati iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13328: svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām asuṅi kṛte iṣṭaḥ svaraḥ yathā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13329: paramapumān iti . akriyamāṇe hi upadeśivadbhāve samāsāntodāttatve asuṅ āntaryataḥ asvarakasya asvarakaḥ syāt . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13330: samāsāntodāttatvam tāvat bhavati na punaḥ asuṅ . na paratvāt asuṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:13331: bhavitavyam . bahirṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇaḥ asuṅ . antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13332: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ samāsasvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13333_0: saḥ yathā eva hi nipātanasvaraḥ samāsasvaram bādhate evam prakṛtisvaram api bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:13333_1: . pumān . tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate asuṅi upadeśivadvacanam svarasiddhyartham bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13333_2: iti (P_7,1.90) KA_III,271.22-272.22 Ro_V,79.7-81.7 kim idam gotaḥ parasya sarvanāmasthānasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13333_3: ṅittvam ucyate āhosvit sarvanāmasthāne parataḥ ṅitkāryam atidiśyate . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13333_4: viśeṣaḥ . gotaḥ sarvanāmasthāne ṅitkāryātideśaḥ . gotaḥ sarvanāmasthāne ṅitkāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:13335: sarvanāmasthānasya ṇidvacane hi asampratyayaḥ syāt . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13336_0: ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13336_1: tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ ayam : gotaḥ ṅidvat bhavati iti . saḥ tarhi vatinirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13336_2: na hi antareṇa vatim atideśaḥ gamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13337: antareṇa api vatim atideśaḥ gamyate . tat yathā : eṣaḥ brahmadattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13338_0: abrahmadattam brahmadattaḥ iti āha . te manyāmahe : brahmadattavat ayam bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13338_1: . evam iha api aṇitam ṇit iti āha ṇidvat iti gamyate . atha vā punaḥ astu gotaḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13339_0: sarvanāmasthāne ṇittvavacane hi asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13339_1: . gotaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī sarvanāmasthāne iti saptamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13339_2: iti uttarasya iti . atha taparakaraṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13340: iha mā bhūt . citraguḥ śabalaguḥ iti . na etat asti . hrasvatve kṛte na
GS24pmbhasuu:13341: bhaviṣyati . sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13343: kim kāraṇam . sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13344: goḥ pūrvaṇittvātvasvareṣu sthānivadbhāvaḥ na bhavati iti . saḥ ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13345_0: pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi sambuddhijasoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ . yaḥ hi manyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13345_1: taparakaraṇasāmarthyāt atra na bhaviṣyati iti sambuddhijasoḥ tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13345_2: syāt : he citrago citragavaḥ iti . atha idānīm sati
GS24pmbhasuu:13346: api sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedha guṇe kṛte kasmāt eva atra na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13347: lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu ca idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāvapratiṣedhe etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:13348: na hi idānīm kva cit api sthānivat syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13350_0: iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . tṛjvat striyām vibhaktau cet kroṣṭrībhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13350_1: na sidhyati . tṛjvat striyām vibhaktau cet kroṣṭrībhaktiḥ iti na sidhyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13350_2: tarhi īkāre tṛjvadbhāvam vakṣyāmi . tat īkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13351: praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam . strī , ī strī striyām iti . īkāre tannimittaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13352: . īkāre cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . tannimittaḥ saḥ . tṛjvadbhāvanimittaḥ saḥ īkāraḥ . na akṛte tṛjvadbhāve īkāraḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13353: ṛnnebhyaḥ ṅīp iti ucyate īkāre ca tṛjvadbhāvaḥ . tat idam itaretarāśrayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13354_0: bhavati . itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante . evam tarhi gaurādiṣu pāṭhāt īkāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13354_1: bhaviṣyati . gaurādiṣu na paṭhyate . na hi kim cit tunantam gaurādiṣu paṭhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13354_2: evam tarhi etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati atra īkāraḥ iti yat ayam īkāre tṛjvadbhāvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13354_3: śāsti . tena eva bhāvanam cet syāt aniṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13355: api prasajyate . yadi api na asti viśeṣaḥ ṅīpaḥ vā ṅīṣaḥ vā ṅīn api tu
GS24pmbhasuu:13356_0: prāpnoti . iha ca na prāpnoti . pañcabhiḥ kroṣṭrībhiḥ krītaiḥ rathaiḥ pañcakroṣṭṛbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13356_1: rathaiḥ iti . evam tarhi na ca aparam nimittam sañjñā ca pratyayalakṣaṇena . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13356_2: aparam nimittam āśrīyate : asmin parataḥ kroṣṭuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13357: tṛjvat bhavati iti . kim tarhi aṅgasya kroṣṭuḥ tṛjvat bhavati . aṅgasañjñā ca bhavati pratyayalakṣaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:13359: śāstrātideśaḥ : tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyate . āhosvit rūpātideśaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:13360_0: tṛcaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13360_1: cet yathā ciṇi tadvat . tṛjvat iti śāstrātideśaḥ cet yathā ciṇi tadvat prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13360_2: katham ca ciṇi . uktam aṅgasya iti tu prakaraṇāt āṇgaśāstrātideśāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13360_3: āṅgam yat kāryam tat atidiśyate . evam iha api anaṅguṇadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni raparatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13360_4: anatidiṣṭam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra raparavacanam . tatra raparatvam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13361: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . guṇe atidiṣṭe raparatvam api atidiṣṭam bhavati . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13362: kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam yatra kāryam tatra draṣṭavyam . ṛtaḥ ṅisarvanāmasthānayoḥ guṅaḥ bhavati . upasthitam idam bhavati uḥ aṇ raparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13363: iti . evam tarhi ayam anyaḥ doṣaḥ jāyate . āhatya tṛcaḥ yat śāstram tat atidiśyeta anāhatya vā iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi āhatya dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_0: atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha anāhatya anaṅguṇaraparatvāni atidiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_1: dīrghatvam anatidiṣṭam . astu āhatya . nanu ca uktam dīrghatvam atidiṣṭam anaṅguṇaraparatvāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_2: anatidiṣṭāni iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dīrghatve atidiṣṭe anaṅguṇaraparatvāni api atidiṣṭāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_3: bhavanti . katham . upadhāyāḥ iti vartate na ca akṛteṣu eteṣu dīrghabhāvini upadhā
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_4: bhavati . kutaḥ nu khalu etat eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_5: na punaḥ kroṣṭoḥ yaḥ antaratamaḥ guṇaḥ tasmin kṛte avādeśe ca yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_6: bhaviṣyati . na ekam udāharaṇam yogārambham prayojayati iti . tatra tṛjvadvacanasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13364_7: eteṣu vidhiṣu kṛteṣu yā upadhā tasyāḥ dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . atha vā kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13365: naḥ etena āhatya anāhatya vā iti . āhatya anāhatya ca tṛcaḥ yat śāstram
GS24pmbhasuu:13366: tat atidiśyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpātideśaḥ . atha etasmin rūpātideśe
GS24pmbhasuu:13367: sati kim prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate āhosvit kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:13368: kim ca ataḥ . yadi prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate ṛkāraḥ ekaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13369: atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni . atha kṛteṣu ādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13370_0: ṛkāraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni atidiṣṭāni . ubhayathā ca svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13370_1: anatidiṣṭaḥ na hi svaraḥ rūpavān . astu prāk ādeśebhyaḥ yat rūpam tat atidiśyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13370_2: . nanu ca uktam ṛkāraḥ atidiṣṭaḥ anaṅguṇaraparatvadīrghatvāni anatidiṣṭāni iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13370_3: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ṛkāre atidiṣṭe svāśrayāḥ atra ete vidhayaḥ bhaviṣyanti . yat api
GS24pmbhasuu:13371: ubhayathā ca svaraḥ anatidiṣṭaḥ na hi svaraḥ rūpavān iti sacakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt svaraḥ bhaviṣyati . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:13372_0: sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . sarvasya tunantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13372_1: tṛśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu rūpātideśāt . siddham etat . katham . rūpātideśāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13372_2: . rūpātideśaḥ ayam . nanu ca evam eva kṛtvā codyate rūpātideśaḥ iti cet sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13372_3: iti . siddham tu pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadāditadantavijñānāt . siddham etat
GS24pmbhasuu:13373_0: pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ vihitaḥ tadādeḥ tadantasya ca grahaṇam bhavati iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13373_1: tunantasya tṛjantaḥ ādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api kim cit eva tṛjantam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13373_2: idam api prāpnoti paktā iti . āntaratamyāt ca siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13374: . kroṣṭoḥ yat antaratamam tat bhaviṣyati . kim punaḥ tat . kruśeḥ yaḥ tṛc
GS24pmbhasuu:13375: vihitaḥ tadantam . tṛjvadvacanam anarthakam tṛjviṣaye tṛcaḥ mṛgavācitvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13376_0: tṛjviṣaye etat tṛjantam mṛgavāci . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . tunaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13376_1: sarvanāmasthāne nivṛttiḥ yathā syāt . tunaḥ nivṛttyartham iti cet siddham yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13377_0: cet tat antareṇa vacanam siddham yathā anyatra api aviśeṣavihitāḥ śabdāḥ niyataviṣayāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13377_1: dṛśyante . kva anyatra . tat yathā . gharatiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ ghṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13377_2: , ghṛṇā , gharmaḥ iti evaṃviṣayaḥ . raśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ rāśiḥ , raśmiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13377_3: , raśanā iti evaṃviṣayaḥ luśiḥ asmai aviśeṣeṇa upadiṣṭaḥ saḥ loṣṭaḥ iti evaṃviṣayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13377_4: . idam tarhi prayojanam vibhāṣā vakṣyāmi iti . vibhāṣā tṛtīyādiṣu aci iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13378_0: vāvacanānarthakyam ca svabhāvasiddhatvāt . vāvacanam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13378_1: . svabhāvasiddhatvāt . svabhāvataḥ eva tṛtīyādiṣu ajādiṣu vibhaktiṣu tṛjantam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13380: guṇavṛddhyauttvatṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . tatra guṇasya avakāśaḥ . agnaye , vāyave . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapuṇī , jatunī .
GS24pmbhasuu:13381: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . trapuṇe , jatune . vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . sakhāyai .
GS24pmbhasuu:13382: sakhāyaḥ . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atisakhīni brāhmaṇakulāni iti . auttvasya avakāśaḥ . agnau , vāyau . numaḥ saḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13383: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . trapuṇi , jatuni iti . tṛjvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13384: kroṣṭunā . numaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kṛśakṛoṣṭune arṇyāya .
GS24pmbhasuu:13385: hitakroṣṭune vṛṣalakulāya . num bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . iṣṭavācī paraśabdaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13386_0: vipratiṣedhe param yat iṣṭam tat bhavati iti . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ nuṭ . numaciratṛjvadbhāvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13386_1: nuṭ pūrvavipratiṣedhena vaktavyaḥ . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapūṇi , jatūni . nuṭaḥ avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13386_2: . agnīnām , vāyūnām . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . trapūṇām , jatūnām . aci rādeśasya avakāśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13386_3: . tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva . iha ubhayam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13387_0: tisṛṇām , catasṛṇām . tṛjvadbhāvasya avakāśaḥ . kroṣṭrā , kroṣṭunā . nuṭaḥ saḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:13387_1: . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . kroṣṭūnām . nuṭ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . saḥ tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13387_2: pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vā nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt . na vā etat vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:13388: catasṛṇām iti . katham tarhi sidhyati . nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13389_0: nuḍviṣaye rapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ . itarathā hi sarvāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13389_1: rādeśaḥ . saḥ yathā eva guṇapūrvasavarṇau bādhate eva nuṭam api bādheta . tasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13390: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na
GS24pmbhasuu:13391: rādeśaḥ nuṭam bādhate iti yat ayam na tisṛcatasṛ , iti pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:13393: (P_7,1.98) KA_III,276.24-25 Ro_V,92.12-13 ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā . ām anaḍuhaḥ striyām vā iti vaktavyam . anaḍuhī , anaḍvāhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:13394_0: (P_7,1.100-102) KA_III,277.4-8 Ro_V,93.4-8 ittvottvābhyām guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:13394_1: . ittvottvayoḥ avakāśaḥ . āstīrṇam , nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ . guṇavṛddhyoḥ avakāśaḥ . cayanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13395: iha ubhayam prāpnoti . āstaraṇam , āstārakaḥ , niparaṇam , nipārakaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13396: guṇavṛddhī bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . ayuktaḥ ayam vipratiṣedhaḥ yaḥ ayam guṇasya ittvottayoḥ ca . katham . nityaḥ guṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13398: . sici vṛddhau okārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . udavoḍhām , udavoḍham ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13399_0: udavoḍha iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:13399_1: . ottvam kriyatām vṛddhiḥ iti . vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati vipratiṣedhena . okārāt vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13400: okārāt vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena iti cet ottvasya abhāvaḥ . udavoḍhām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13401: udavoḍham . udavoḍha iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam tatra varṇagrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13402_0: prayojanam vṛddhau api kṛtāyām ottvam yathā syāt . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13402_1: yathā prasāraṇādiṣu dvirvacanam . atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt atra vṛddhau kṛtāyām ottvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13402_2: bhaviṣyati . sauḍhāmitrau bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt siddham . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13403: (P_7,2.2) KA_III,278.17-279.3 Ro_V,95.10-96.3 antagrahaṇam kimartham na ataḥ rlaḥ iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm tadantasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13404: tadantavidhinā . idam tarhi prayojanam . ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva avayavavācī . tat yathā . vastrāntaḥ , vasanāntaḥ . asti sāmīpye vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13405_0: tat yathā . udakāntam gataḥ . udakasamīpam gataḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ sāmīpye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:13405_1: tasya idam grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . aṅgāntau yau rephalakārau tayoḥ samīpe yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13405_2: akāraḥ tasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13408: samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ca halantasya ca acaḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam . ajgrahaṇāt eva atra samuccayaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13409_0: vadivrajyoḥ ca acaḥ ca iti . asti anyat ajgrahaṇe prayojanam vadivrajiviśeṣaṇam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13409_1: vijñāyeta . vadivrajyoḥ ecaḥ iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt vadivrajyoḥ ataḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13409_2: evam brūyāt . atha vā etat api na brūyāt . ataḥ iti vartate . idam tarhi prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13410: ajantasya mā bhūt . kasya punaḥ ajantasya prāpnoti . akārasya . acikīrṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:13411: , ajihīrṣīt . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . ākārasya tarhi prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13412: ayāsīt , avāsīt . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā vṛddhau asatyām vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13413_0: sandhyakṣarasya tarhi prāpnoti . na vai sandhyakṣaram antyam asti . nanu ca idam
GS24pmbhasuu:13413_1: asti ḍhalope kṛte udavoḍhām , udavoḍham , udavoḍha iti . asiddhaḥ ḍhalopaḥ tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13413_2: asiddhatvāt na etat antyam bhavati . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13414: halgrahaṇam iṭi pratiṣedhārtham . halgrahaṇam kriyate iṭi pratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13415: . na iṭi iti pratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . alāvīt , apāvīt . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . na vā etat
GS24pmbhasuu:13416: prayojanam asti . kim kāraṇam . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat vṛddhividhānam tat pratiṣidhyate . kutaḥ etat . anantarasya vidhiḥ vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13417: bhavati pratiṣedhaḥ vā iti . tat ca anantyārtham . tat ca anantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:13418: vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham vijñāyate . katham punaḥ anantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:13419: vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham śakyam vijñātum . antyasya vacanānarthakyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13420_0: antyasya vṛddhividhāne prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā anantaram vṛddhividhānam anantyārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13420_1: vijñāyate . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . ataḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:13421_0: yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . acikīrṣīt , ajihīrṣīt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:13421_1: siddham vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt . ataḥ vibhāṣārtham iti cet tat antareṇa api halgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13422: vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān bhavati iti . idam iha sampradhāryam . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13423: kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api . anityaḥ lopaḥ na hi kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti . paratvāt sagiḍbhyām bhavitavyam . na atra sagiṭau
GS24pmbhasuu:13424: prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekācaḥ tau vali iti vā . ekācaḥ sagiṭau ucyete
GS24pmbhasuu:13425_0: atha vā vali iti tatra anuvartate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekācaḥ tau valī iti vā . dardrāteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13425_1: mā bhūt iti . daridrāteḥ na sagiḍbhyām bhavitavyam . uktam etat daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke
GS24pmbhasuu:13425_2: lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau iti . yaḥ ca idānīm pratyayavidhau siddhaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13425_3: asau sagiḍvidhau . evamartham eva tarhi ekājgrahaṇam anuvartyam atra sagiṭau mā bhūtām
GS24pmbhasuu:13426: lopaḥ vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . kam punaḥ bhavān vṛddheḥ avakāśam matvā āha nityaḥ lopaḥ iti . anavakāśā vṛddhiḥ lopam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśā vṛddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13427_0: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ : akaṇīt , akāṇīt . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13427_1: syāt . bhavet yaḥ atā aṅgam viśeṣayet tasya anantyasya na syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅgena
GS24pmbhasuu:13427_2: akāram viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . tatra anantyaḥ vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ antyasya lopaḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13427_3: . evam vṛddheḥ lopabalīyastvāt . atha vā ārabhyate pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ ṇyallopau iyaṅyaṇguṇavṛddhidīrghatvebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13428: anantyārthā vṛddhiḥ halantasya yathā syāt ajantasya mā bhūt . apipaṭhiṣīt
GS24pmbhasuu:13429: . etat api na asti prayojanam . katham . halādeḥ iti na eṣā bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī : hal ādiḥ yasya saḥ ayam halādiḥ halādeḥ iti . kā tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13430_0: karmadhārayāt pañcamī . hal ādiḥ halādiḥ halādeḥ parasya iti . yadi karmadhārayāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13430_1: pañcamī acakāsīt atra prāpnoti . sicā anantaryam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . halādeḥ parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13430_2: sici anantarasya iti . yadi sicā ānantaryam viśeṣyate akaṇīt , akāṇīt atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13430_3: . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . acakāsīt . yena na avyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13430_4: tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam . varṇena ekena .
GS24pmbhasuu:13431: saṅgātena punaḥ vyavadhānam bhavati na ca bhavati . yadi sicā ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:13432: viśeṣyate astu bahuvrīheḥ ṣaṣṭhī . kasmāt na bhavati . apipaṭhiṣīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13433: vyavahitatvāt . evam tarhi atidūram eva idam halgrahaṇam anusṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13435: (P_7,2.5) KA_III,281.10-19 Ro_V,101.4-102.7 kimartham jāgarteḥ vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . sici vṛddhiḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13436_0: prayojanam . jāgarteḥ guṇaḥ ucyate vṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca saḥ bādhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13436_1: bhaviṣyati . guṇe tarhi kṛte raparatve ca halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti . na iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:13436_2: iti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . iyam tarhi pratiṣedhottarakālā vṛddhiḥ ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13437: kakṣyayā kakṣyā nimātavyā . sici vṛddhiḥ ca prāpnoti guṇāḥ ca . guṇaḥ bhavati . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca halantalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na iṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:13438: iti ca tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati . pratiṣedhottarakālam ataḥ halādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13439: laghoḥ iti vibhāṣā vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na ca kim cit . ataḥ rlāntasya iti ca vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti na ca kim cit .
GS24pmbhasuu:13440_0: (P_7,2.8.1) KA_III,281.21-282.14 Ro_V,103-105 kimartham purastāt pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13440_1: na vidhyuttarakālaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyeta . tat yathā anyatra api vidhyuttarakālāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13440_2: pratiṣedhāḥ bhavanti . kva anyatra . kartari karmavyatihāre na gatihiṃsārthebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13440_3: iti . devatādvandve ca na indrasya parasya . tatra ayam api arthaḥ dviḥ iḍgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13441: prakṛtam anuvartate . na evam śakyam . iḍartham sārvadhātukagrahaṇam liṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13442: salope sannihitam tat vicchidyeta . yadi punaḥ na vṛdbhyaḥ caturbhyaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13443_0: atra eva ucyeta . kim kṛtam bhavati . vidhyuttarakālāḥ ca eva pratiṣedhaḥ kṛataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13443_1: bhavati dviḥ ca iḍgrahaṇam na kartavyam iḍartham ca sārvadhātukagrahaṇam liṅaḥ salope
GS24pmbhasuu:13444: arthaḥ dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ na kartavyaḥ iti etasmāt niyamāt iṭ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13445: kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratiṣedhārthaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13446: yadi eṣaḥ yogaḥ pratiṣedhārthaḥ yaḥ etasmāt yogāt iṭ pariprāpyate niyamāt saḥ na sidhyati : peciva , pecima , śekiva, śekima . evam tarhi kṛsṛbhṛ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13447: iti eteṣām grahaṇam niyamārtham bhaviṣyati studruśrusruvām pratiṣedhārtham vṛṅvṛñoḥ jñāpakārtham . evam api sāmānyavihitasya eva iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13448_0: vijñāyeta viśeṣavihitaḥ ca ayam thali iti . purastāt punaḥ pratiṣedhe sati anārabhyāpavādaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13448_1: ayam bhavati tena yāvān iṇ nāma tasya sarvasya eva pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13448_2: yadi khalu api eṣaḥ abhiprāyaḥ tat na kriyate iti purastāt api pratiṣedhe sati tat
GS24pmbhasuu:13448_3: na kariṣyate . katham . idam asti na iṭ vaśi kṛti iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . ārdhadhātukasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13449: iṭ iti anuvartate na iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13450: (P_7,2.8.2) KA_III,282.15-283.4 Ro_V,105-107 atha kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . bibhidiva , bibhidima iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13451: prayojanam . kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti etasmāt niyamāt atra iṭ bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13452_0: prakṛtilakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13452_1: . ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ . katham jñāyate . vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇāt . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam
GS24pmbhasuu:13452_2: . imau vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca . tataḥ kim . tulyajātīye
GS24pmbhasuu:13453: eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya api niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt . rudivaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13454: rudimaḥ . etat api na asti prayojanam . upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13455: ārdhadhātukasya . yat etat anukrāntam etat ārdhadhātukasya draṣṭavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13456: tataḥ iṭ valādeḥ iti . tatra etāvat draṣṭavyam yadi kim cit tatra anyat api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇasya prayojanam asti . atha na kim cit iha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13457: kṛdgrahaṇam kriyeta tatra vā ārdhadhātukagrahaṇam kaḥ nu atra viśeṣaḥ . na iṭ varam anādau kṛti . varam anādau kṛti iṭpratiṣedham prayojayati . īśitā
GS24pmbhasuu:13458: , īśitum , īśvaraḥ . va . ra . dīpitā , dīpitum , dīpraḥ . ra . ma .
GS24pmbhasuu:13459: bhasitā , bhasitum , bhasma . ma . na . yatitā , yatitum , yatnaḥ . atha anye ye vaśādayaḥ tatra katham . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:13461: titutreṣu agrahādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nigṛhitiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13463_1: jāgartyartham . ekājgrahaṇam kriyate jāgarteḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . jāgaritā
GS24pmbhasuu:13463_2: , jāgaritum . na etat asti prayojanam . upadeśe anudāttāt iti ucyate jāgartiḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13464: jāgartyartham ekājgrahaṇam kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . uttarārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13465: śryukaḥ kiti iti iṭpratiṣedham vakṣyati saḥ jāgarteḥ mā bhūt . jāgaritaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13466: jāgaritavān iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . jāgarteḥ guṇaḥ ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13467: vṛddhiviṣaye pratiṣedhaviṣaye ca saḥ bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . tatra guṇe kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:13468_0: raparatve ca kṛte anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati . nanu ca upadeśādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13468_1: prāpnoti . upadeśagrahaṇam nivartayiṣyate . yadi nivartyate stīrtvā , pūrtvā , ittvottvayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13468_2: kṛtayoḥ raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyā
GS24pmbhasuu:13468_3: siddham etat . na atra akṛte iṭpratiṣedhe ittvottve prāpnutaḥ . kim kāraṇam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:13468_4: ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhāt . idam tarhi . ātistīrṣati , nipupūrṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13469_0: ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve cxa anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:13469_1: evam śryukaḥ kiti iti . iṭ sani vā iti evam bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . āstīrṇam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13469_2: nipūrtāḥ piṇḍāḥ . ittvottvayoḥ kṛtayoḥ raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:13469_3: prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . iṭ sani vā iti sani vibhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13470: vadhyartham ekājgrahaṇam kartavyam . vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13471: vadhiṣīṣṭa iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . kriyamāṇe api vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13472: ekājgrahaṇe vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . vadhiṣīṣṭa iti . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13473: vadhaḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ sannipāte ekāctvāt prakṛteḥ ca anudāttatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13474: sannipāte ca eva hi vadhiḥ ekāc śrūyate prakṛtiḥ ca asya anudāttā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam evam vijñāyate upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13475: yaṅlopārtham . yaṅlope mā bhūt iti . bebhiditā , bebhiditum , cecchiditā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13476: cecchiditum . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet kṛñādibhyaḥ liṭi niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13477_0: pratiṣedhasya . ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam anudāttaviśeṣaṇam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:13477_1: kṛñādibhyaḥ liṭi niyamasya anupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13477_2: . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13477_3: . asati iṭpratiṣedhe niyamaḥ na upapadyate . asati niyame kaḥ doṣaḥ . tatra pacādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13477_4: iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecima , śekima . sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13478: sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bibhitsati , cicchitsati . dvirvacane kṛte upadeśe anudāttāt ekācaḥ śrūyamāṇāt iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13479_0: iha ca nīttaḥ tatve kṛte anackatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānupūrvyā
GS24pmbhasuu:13479_1: siddham etat . na atra akṛte iṭpratiṣedhe tatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ti kiti
GS24pmbhasuu:13479_2: iti ucyate . yat api ucyate ekācaḥ upadeśe anudāttāt iti upadeśavacanam anudāttaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13479_3: cet kṛñādibhyaḥ liṭi niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya iti mā bhūt niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13479_4: . nanu ca uktam tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam tatra thalgrahaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13479_5: prayojanam samuccayaḥ yathā vijñāyeta thali ca seṭi kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:13480: ca seṭi iti . yat api ucyate sanaḥ ca iṭpratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13482: upadeśe anudāttāt upadeśe ekācaḥ iti . yaṅlope ca tadantadvirvacanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13483: sanyaṅantasya sthāne dvirvacanam tatra sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya naṣṭaḥ saḥ bhavati yaḥ saḥ ekājupadeśe anudāttaḥ . atha api dviḥprayogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13484: dvirvacanam evam api na doṣaḥ . na hi asya bhidyupadeśe upadeśaḥ . atha api bhidyupadeśe upadeśaḥ evam api na doṣaḥ . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:13485_0: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca lope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13485_1: eva . na sidhyati . pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvavidhiḥ . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13485_2: pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ . kaḥ punaḥ upadeśaḥ nyāyyaḥ . yaḥ kṛtsnaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13485_3: ca kṛtsnaḥ . yaḥ ubhayoḥ . yadi tarhi yaḥ ubhayoḥ saḥ kṛtsnaḥ saḥ ca nyāyyaḥ vadhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13486: āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ādyudāttanipātanam kariṣyate saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13487: nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvarasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . evam api upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . yathā eva hi saḥ nipātanasvaraḥ prakṛtisvaram
GS24pmbhasuu:13488: bādhate evam pratyayasvaram api bādheta : āvadhiṣīṣṭa iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13489: . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye vadhibhāve kṛte satiśiṣṭatvāt pratyayasvaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13490_0: bhaviṣyati . atha ke punaḥ anudāttāḥ . ādantāḥ , adaridrāḥ . ivarṇāntāḥ ca aśviśriḍīśīdīdhīvevīṅaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13490_1: . uvarṇāntāḥ yuruṇukṣukṣṇusnūrṇuvarjam . ṛdantāḥ ca ajāgṛvṛṅvṛñaḥ . śakiḥ kavargāntānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13495: (P_7,2.13) KA_III,286.4-7 Ro_V,115.4-7 kṛñaḥ asuṭaḥ . kṛñaḥ asuṭaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13496_0: vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . sañcaskariva , sañcaskarima . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na
GS24pmbhasuu:13496_1: vaktavyam . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anugantatvāt iṭpratiṣedhaḥ na bhaviṣyati . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13496_2: api upadeśādhikārāt prāpnoti . tasmāt asuṭaḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13498_0: prasāraṇe kṛte prasāraṇapūrvatve ca ugantāt iti eva siddham . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati
GS24pmbhasuu:13498_1: . śvigrahaṇam idantatvāt upadeśasya . śvigrahaṇam kriyate idantatvāt upadeśasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:13498_2: upadeśaḥ ugantāt iti ucyate śvayatiḥ ca upadeśaḥ idantaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13499_0: (P_7,2.15) KA_III,286.15-18 Ro_V,117 yasya vibhāṣā avideḥ . yasya vibhāṣā avideḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13499_1: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . viditaḥ , viditavān iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na

GS24pmbhasuu:13501_1: vibhāṣā bhāvādikarmaṇoḥ iti eva ucyate . kena idānīm kartari pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13501_2: . yasya vibhāṣā iti anena . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat yogavibhāgam karoti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13501_3: ācāryaḥ yadupādheḥ vibhāṣā tadupādheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13501_4: . yasya vibhāṣā avideḥ iti uktam tat na vaktavyam bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:13507_0: (P_7,2.20) KA_III,287.17-288.5 Ro_V,119.16-120.10 dṛḍhanipātanam kimartham na dṛheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13507_1: na iṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . dṛḍhanipātanam nakārahakāralopārtham parasya ca ḍatvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13507_2: . dṛḍhanipātanam kriyate nakārahakāralopārtham . nakārahakāralopaḥ yathā syāt . parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13507_3: ca ḍhatvārtham . parasya ca ḍhatvam yathā syāt . aniḍvacane hi rabhāvāprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13508: draḍhīyān . kim kāraṇam . alaghutvāt . nalopavacanam ca . nalopaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . iha ca paridraḍhayya gataḥ lyapi laghupūrvasya iti ayādeśaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:13509: syāt . iha ca pāridṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ ṣyaṅ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13511: nipātyate na paripūrvāt vṛheḥ na iṭ bhavati iti eva ucyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13512: parivṛḍhanipātanam ca . kim . nakārahakāralopārtham parasya ca ḍhatvārtham aniḍvacane hi rabhāvāprasiddhiḥ alaghutvāt nalopavacanam ca iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13513_0: parivraḍhīyān iti raḥ ṛtaḥ halādeḥ laghoḥ iti rabhāvaḥ na syāt . iha ca parivraḍhayya
GS24pmbhasuu:13513_1: gataḥ iti lyapi laghupūrvasya iti ayādeśaḥ na syāt . iha ca pārivṛḍhī kanyā iti gurūpottamalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13515_0: ucyate na viśabdane curādiṇicā bhavitavyam . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat ayam aviśabdane
GS24pmbhasuu:13515_1: iti āha tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ viśabdane ghuṣeḥ vibhāṣā ṇic bhavati iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13515_2: jñāpane prayojanam . mahīpālavacaḥ śrutvā jughuṣuḥ puṣyamāṇavāḥ . eṣaḥ prayogaḥ upapannaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13515_3: bhavati (P_7,2.26) KA_III,288.21-289.17 Ro_V,122.2-123.10 kim idam adhyayanābhidhāyikāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13515_4: niṣṭhāyām nipātanam kriyate āhosvit adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13516_0: nipātanam kriyate siddham vṛttaḥ guṇaḥ vṛttam pārāyaṇam vṛttam guṇasya vṛttam pārāyaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13516_1: iti na sidhyati . atha vijñāyate adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti na doṣaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13516_2: . yathā na doṣaḥ tathā astu . adhyayane cet vṛtiḥ vartate iti api vai vijñāyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:13516_3: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . vṛtiḥ ayam akarmakaḥ . akarmakāḥ ca api ṇyantāḥ sakarmakāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13516_4: bhavanti . akarmkaḥ ca atra vṛtiḥ . katham punaḥ jñāyate akarmakaḥ atra vṛtiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13517_0: akarmakāṇām bhāve ktaḥ bhavati iti evam atra bhāve ktaḥ bhavati . tatra uditaḥ ktvi
GS24pmbhasuu:13517_1: vibhāṣā yasya vibhāṣā iti iṭpratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha ṇigrahaṇam kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13518: avadhāraṇapratiṣedhārtham . vṛttanipātane ṇigrahaṇam kriyate aṇyantasya avadhāraṇam mā bhūt iti . kaimarthakyāt niyamaḥ bhavati . vidheyam na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13519: iti kṛtvā . iha ca asti vidheyam . kim . ṇyadhikāt vṛteḥ iṭpratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13520_0: vidheyaḥ . tatra apūrvaḥ vidhiḥ astu niyamaḥ astu iti apūrvaḥ eva vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13520_1: na niyamaḥ . kutaḥ nu khalu etat adhikārthe ārambhe sati ṇyadhikasya bhaviṣyati na
GS24pmbhasuu:13520_2: punaḥ sanadhikasya vā syāt yaṅadhikasya vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13521: tasmāt ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . atha kimartham nipātanam kriyate . nipātanam ṇilpeḍguṇapratiṣedhārtham . nipātanam kriyate ṇilpārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13523: (P_7,2.27) KA_III,289.19-290.5 Ro_V,124.2-12 dāntaśāntayoḥ kim nipātyate . dāntaśāntayoḥ upadhādīrghatvam ca . kim ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:13524_0: ṇilopeṭpratiṣedhau ca . upadhādīrghatvam anipātyam . vṛddhyā siddham . na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13524_1: . mitām hrasvaḥ iti hrasvatvena bhavitavyam . evam tarhi anunāsikasya kvijhaloḥ kṅiti
GS24pmbhasuu:13524_2: iti evam atra dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13524_3: . ṇilope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13524_4: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . atha spaṣṭacchannayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13526_0: (P_7,2.28) KA_III,290.7-14 Ro_V,124.14-22 ghuṣisvanoḥ vāvacanam iṭpratiṣedhāt vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:13526_1: . ghuṣisvanoḥ vāvacanam iṭpratiṣedhāt bhavati vipratiṣedhena . ghuṣeḥ iṭpratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13527: ghuṣṭā rajjuḥ , ghuṣṭaḥ mārgaḥ . vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ sampūrvāt viśabdanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13528: . saṅghuṣṭam vākyam , saṅghuṣitam vākyam . sampūrvāt aviśabdane ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13529: prāpnoti . saṅghuṣṭā rajjuḥ , saṅghuṣitā rajjuḥ . vāvacanam bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svanaḥ iṭpratiṣedhasya avakāśaḥ anāṅpūrvāt mano'bhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13530_0: . svāntam manaḥ . vāvacanasya avakāśaḥ aṅpūrvāt amano'bhidhānam . āsvāntaḥ devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13530_1: , āsvanitaḥ devadattaḥ . āṅpūrvāt mano'bhidhāne ubhayam prāpnoti . āsvāntam manaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13532: vaktavyam . hṛṣṭāni lomāni , hṛṣitāni lomāni , hṛṣṭam lomabhiḥ , hṛṣitam lomabhiḥ , hṛṣṭāḥ keśāḥ , hṛṣitāḥ keśāḥ , hṛṣṭam keśaiḥ , hṛṣitam keśaiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13533: vismitapratīghātayoḥ iti vaktavyam . hṛṣṭaḥ devadattaḥ , hṛṣitaḥ devadattaḥ , hṛṣṭāḥ dantāḥ , hṛṣitāḥ dantāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13534: (P_7,2.30) KA_III,290.21-22 Ro_V,125.8-9 apacitaḥ iti kim nipātyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13535: cāyaḥ cibhāvaḥ nipātyate . apacitaḥ . ktini nityam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13537_1: valādigrahaṇam ārdhadhātukaviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:13537_2: akriyamāṇe ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe kasya valādigrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam syāt . aṅgasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13538: tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgasya valādeḥ āditaḥ iṭ prasajyeta āḍāḍvat . tat yathā āḍāṭau aṅgasya āditaḥ bhavataḥ tadvat . kriyamāṇe api ārdhadhātukagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13539: aniṣṭam śakyam vijñātum . valādeḥ ārdhadhātukasya yat aṅgam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13540: akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam . aṅgasya yaḥ valādiḥ iti . kim ca aṅgasya valādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13541: nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati . kasmin ca etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13542: pratyaye . yāvatā kriyamāṇe ca aniṣṭam vijñāyate akriyamāṇe ca iṣṭam tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13543: akriyamāṇe eva iṣṭam vijñāsyāmaḥ . idam tarhi prayojanam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13544: āste, śete . etat api na asti prayojanam . rudādibhyaḥ sārvadhātuke iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13545: etanniyamārtham bhaviṣyati . rudādibhyaḥ eva sārvadhātukaḥ iṭ bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:13546_0: anyebhyaḥ iti . evam api vṛkṣatvam , vṛkṣatā atra prāpnoti . evam tarhi vihitaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13546_1: dhātugrahaṇam . dhātoḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ . nanu dhātoḥ eva ayam vihitaḥ . na ca ayam dhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13546_2: iti evam vihitaḥ . kva punaḥ dhātugrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13547_0: prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ it dhātoḥ iti . tat vai ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam pañcamīnirdiṣṭena ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13547_1: vihitaḥ śakyate viśeṣayitum . atha idānīm ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena ca api vihitaḥ śakyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13548_1: kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13549_0: prasnavitavyam , prakramitā , prakramitum , prakramitavyam . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13549_1: . na vaktavyam . aviśeṣeṇa snukramoḥ iḍāgamam uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:13549_3: ca tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . tatparapare tāvat :
GS24pmbhasuu:13551: ekādeśe . prasnoṣyante , prakraṃsyante . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena vyapavargaḥ . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13552: evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhim prati sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ . tatparaparasīyuṭoḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13553: vaktavyaḥ . siddham tu snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭpratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13554: siddham etat . katham . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya na iṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13555: iti vaktavyam . yadi snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti ucyate prasnavitā iva ācarati prasnavitrīyate atra na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13556: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇam atra ātmanepadam . kramoḥ ca . kramoḥ ca ātmanepadena
GS24pmbhasuu:13557: samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . atha kimartham krameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13558: pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate na snukramibhyām iti eva ucyeta . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti na iti vakṣyatgi tat krameḥ eva syāt snoḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13560: kṛti . kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . prakrantā
GS24pmbhasuu:13561: , upakrantā . tat tarhi idam bahu vaktavyam . snoḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭ na bhavati iti vaktavyam . krameḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13562: kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti iti vaktavyam . sūtram ca bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13563: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam snukramoḥ anātmanepadanimitte cet
GS24pmbhasuu:13564_0: kṛti upasaṅkhyānam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . snukramī eva ātmanepadanimittatvena viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13564_1: . na cet snukramī ātmanepadasya nimitte iti . katham punaḥ dhātuḥ nāma ātmanepadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13565: dhātuḥ eva nimittam . āha hi bhagavān anudāttaṅitaḥ ātmanepadam śeṣāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13566: kartari parasmaipadam iti . yatra tarhi dhātuḥ na āśrīyate bhāvakarmaṇoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13567_0: iti . atra api dhātuḥ eva āśrīyate . bhāvakarmavṛttāt dhātoḥ iti . katham prakramitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13567_1: . sati ātmanepade nimittaśabdaḥ vartate . katham prakrantā , upakrantā . tasmāt asati
GS24pmbhasuu:13567_2: api . katham prakramitavyam . tasmāt sati eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:13568: katham prakrantā , upakrantā . vaktavyam eva etat kartari ca ātmanepadaviṣayāt kṛti iti . atha vā kṛti iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13569: (P_7,2.37) KA_III,293.11-294.26 Ro_V,131.5-135.9 graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam . graheḥ dīrghatve iḍgrahaṇam kartavyam . iṭaḥ dīrghaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13570: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13571: ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti . evam api kartavyam eva . agrahaṇe hi asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . akriyamāṇe hi iḍgrahaṇe asampratyayaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13572: kim kāraṇam . ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya ādeśāḥ ucyante na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13573: ṣaṣṭhīm paśyāmaḥ . kriyamāṇe ca api iḍgrahaṇe . ciṇvadiṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_0: ciṅvaditaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . grāhiṣyate . yaṅlope ca . yaṅlope ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_1: vaktavyaḥ . jarīgṛhitā , jarīgṛhitum , jarīgṛhitavyam . yadi punaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_2: vijñāyeta . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet vipratiṣiddham . iṭ dīrghaḥ iti cet vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_3: bhavati . yadi iṭ na dīrghaḥ . atha dīrghaḥ na iṭ . iṭ dīrghaḥ ca iti vipratiṣiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_4: . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne dīrghatvābhāvaḥ . pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_5: dīrghatvasya abhāvaḥ . vuvūrṣate , vivariṣate , vavarīṣate . atra api iṭ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_6: iti anuvartiṣyate . yat tarhi videśastham pratiṣidhya punarvidhānam tat na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13574_7: . jṝvraścyoḥ ktvi . śryukaḥ kiti iti anena pratiṣiddhe dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13575: na prāpnoti . jaritvā , jarītvā . īṭaḥ vidhiḥ iṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13576: yathāprāptaḥ iṭ dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13577: na bhavati jarītvā na ktvā seṭ iti kittvapratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca agrhīt iti iṭaḥ īṭi iti sijlopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca agrahīt na iṭi iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13578: vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam . hmyantānām iti evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13579_0: bhaviṣyati . atra api na iṭ iti eva anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13579_1: adhākṣīt iti evamartham . tathā agrahīdhvam , agrahīḍhvam vibhāṣā iṭaḥ iti mūrdhanyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13579_2: na prāpnoti . tasmāt na evam śakyam vaktum iṭaḥ grahaṇe īṭaḥ grahaṇam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13579_3: iti . bhavati cet pratiṣiddhasya ca punarvidhāne dīrghābhāvaḥ iti eva . tasmāt aśakyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13579_4: iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñātum . na cet vijñāyate iṭaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13580_0: ārdhadhātukasya iti vartate . grahaḥ parasya ārdhadhātukasya dīrghatvam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:13580_1: . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . grahaṇam , grahaṇīyam . valādeḥ iti vartate . evam api
GS24pmbhasuu:13580_2: grahītā , grahītum atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . evam api grāhakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13580_3: atra prāpnoti . kim ca iṭpratīghātena khalu api dīrghatvam ucyamānam iṭam bādhate
GS24pmbhasuu:13581: na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ārdhadhātukasya iṭ valādeḥ iti . nanu ca uktam evam api kartavyam eva agrahaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:13582_0: asampratyayaḥ ṣaṣṭhyanirdeśāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . grhaḥ iti eṣā pañcamī iṭ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13582_1: prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati tasmāt iti uttarasya iti . evam ca kṛtvā saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13582_2: api adoṣaḥ bhavati yat uktam ciṇvadiṭaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13583_0: katham . prakṛtasya iṭaḥ idam dīrghatvam na ca ciṇvadiṭ prakṛtaḥ . yaṅlope katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13583_1: . yaṅlope ca uktam iṭi sarvatra . kva sarvatra . yadi eva prakṛtasya iṭaḥ dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13583_2: atha api iṭ dīrghaḥ āgamāntaram vijñāyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13584: yaṅlope ca uktam . kim uktam . tadantadvirvacanāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13585_0: (P_7,2.44) KA_III,295.2-296.6 Ro_V,136.2-139.5 atha vā iti vartamāne punaḥ vāvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13585_1: kimartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . punaḥ vāvacanam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13585_2: liṅsicoḥ nivṛttyartham . atha kimartham sūtisūyatyoḥ pṛthaggrahaṇam kriyate . suvateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13585_3: mā bhūt . atha kimartham dhūñaḥ sānubandhakasya grahaṇam kriyate . dhuvateḥ mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:13585_4: iti . kim punaḥ iyam prāpte vibhāṣā āhosvit aprāpte . katham ca prāpte katham vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13586: yadi svaratiḥ udāttaḥ tataḥ prāpte . atha anudāttaḥ tataḥ aprāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:13587: svaratiḥ udāttaḥ . svaratiḥ udāttaḥ paṭhyate . kimartham tarhi vāvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13588_0: vāvacanam nivṛttyartham . vāvacanam kriyate nivṛttyartham . anudātte hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13588_1: pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . anudātte hi sati kiti vibhāṣā prasajyeta . svṛtvā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13588_2: pratiṣidhya punaḥ vidhānāt . pratiṣidhya kila ayam punaḥ vidhīyate . saḥ yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:13589_0: evam śryukaḥ kiti iti etam api bādheta . yadi tarhi udāttaḥ svaratiḥ paṭhiṣyati vipratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:13589_1: svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye vipratiṣedhena iti saḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ na upapadyate . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13589_2: kāraṇam . saḥ vidhiḥ ayam pratiṣedhaḥ vidhipratiṣedhayoḥ ca ayuktaḥ vipratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13589_3: . saḥ api vidhiḥ na mṛdūnām iva kārpāsānām kṛtaḥ pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate . saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13590: ekājlakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhate evam imam api bādhiṣyate . atha vā yena
GS24pmbhasuu:13591_0: na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte valādilakṣaṇe iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13591_1: syalakṣaṇe punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā madhye apavādāḥ pūrvān vidhīn bādhante
GS24pmbhasuu:13591_2: iti evam iyam vibhāṣā valādilakṣaṇam iṭam bādhiṣyate syalakṣaṇam na bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13591_3: atha vā punaḥ astu anudāttaḥ . nanu ca uktam anudātte hi kiti vāprasaṅgaḥ pratiṣidhya
GS24pmbhasuu:13591_4: punaḥ vidhānāt iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13592_0: ekājlakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate śryukaḥ kiti iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:13592_1: ca aprāpte ca . atha vā śryukaḥ kiti iti eṣaḥ yogaḥ udāttārthaḥ ca yebhyaḥ ca anudāttebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13593: atha vā śryukaḥ kiti iti iha anuvartiṣyate . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13594: jñāpayati na iyam vibhāṣā uglakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhasya viṣaye bhavati iti yat ayam sanīvantardhabhrasjadambhuśrisvṛyūrṇubharajñapisanām iti svṛgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13595_0: (P_7,2.47) KA_III,296.8-13 Ro_V,139.7-12 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:13595_1: . iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . nityaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . na etat asti prayojanam . siddhā
GS24pmbhasuu:13596_0: ārambhasāmarthyāt nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na atra pūrveṇa vibhāṣā prāpnoti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:13596_1: kāraṇam . yasya vibhāṣā iti pratiṣedhāt . tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt vibhaṣā labhyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13598: pratiṣedhaḥ . iṣeḥ takāre śyanpratyayāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . iha mā bhūt . preṣitā , preṣitum , preṣitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13599: (P_7,2.52) KA_III,296.19-21 Ro_V,140.5-7 iṭ iti vartamāne punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kimartham . punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam nityārtham . iṭ iti vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:13600: punaḥ iḍgrahaṇam kriyate nityārtham . nityārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13602: cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam . gameḥ iṭ parasmaipadeṣu cet kṛti upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13603_0: kartavyam . jigamiṣitā , jigamiṣitum , jigamiṣitavyam . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13603_1: . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa gameḥ iḍāgamam uktvā ātmanepadapare na iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13603_2: ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe uktam . kim uktam . ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13604: . iha api ātmanepadaparapratiṣedhe tatparaparasīyuḍekādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . taparapare tāvat . saṅjigaṃsiṣyate . sīyuṭi . saṅgaṃsīṣṭa .
GS24pmbhasuu:13605: ekādeśe . saṅgaṃsyante . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13606: siddham tu gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya iṭpratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . gameḥ ātmanepadena samānapadastheṇa na bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13609: kim . kṛti upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : vivṛtsitā vivṛtsitum , vivṛtsitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13610: . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . na kartavyam . aviśeṣeṇa vṛtādibhyaḥ iṭpratiṣedham uktvā ātmanepadaparaḥ iṭ bhavati iti vakṣyāmi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13613: taparapare tāvat . vivartiṣiṣyate . sīyuṭi . vartiṣīṣṭa . ekādeśe .
GS24pmbhasuu:13614_0: vartiṣyante , vardhiṣyante . siddham tu vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapadasthasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13614_1: iḍvacanāt . siddham etat . katham . vṛtādīnām ātmanepadena samānapdasthasya iṭ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13614_2: iti vaktavyam catustāsikḷpigrahaṇānarthakyam ca . caturgrahaṇam ca anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13615: sarvebhyaḥ hi vṛtādibhyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ iṣyate . tāsigrahaṇam ca anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:13616: . kim kāraṇam . nivṛttatvāt sakārasya . nivṛttam sakārādau iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13617: tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm akriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇena api na arthaḥ eṣaḥ api hi vṛtādiḥ pañcamaḥ . bhavet kḷpigrahaṇam na kartavyam tāsgrahaṇam tu
GS24pmbhasuu:13618_0: kartavyam . yat hi tat sakārādau iti na tat śakyam nivartayitum tṛci api hi prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13618_1: . vartitā , vardhitā . tāsgrahaṇe ca idānīm kriyamāṇe kḷpigrahaṇam api kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13618_2: anyebhyaḥ api vṛtādibhyaḥ tāsau mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13619_0: bhavet tāsgrahaṇam kartavyam kḷpigrahaṇam tu na eva kartavyam . anyebhyaḥ api vṛtādibhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13619_1: tāsau kasmāt na bhavati . parasmaipadeṣu iti vartate kḷpeḥ eva ca tāsparasmaipadaparaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13619_2: na anyebhyaḥ vṛtādibhyaḥ . yadi evam tāsgrahaṇena api na arthaḥ . tṛci kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:13620: (P_7,2.62) KA_III,298.14-299.4 Ro_V,143.2-144.5 tāsau atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ pratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ akāravattvāt . tāsau atvatpratiṣedhe ghaseḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13621: pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . jaghasitha . kim kāraṇam . akāravattvāt . saḥ api hi akāravān . siddham tu halādigrahaṇāt . siddham etat . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13622_0: halādigrahaṇam kartavyam . tat ca avaśyam kartavyam . aṭhyaśī prayojayataḥ . āthyaśī
GS24pmbhasuu:13622_1: tāvat na prayojayataḥ . kim kāraṇam . tāsau aniṭaḥ iti ucyate seṭau ca imau tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:13622_2: . añjvaśū tarhi prayojayataḥ . añjvaśū ca api na prayojayataḥ . kim kāraṇam . tāsau
GS24pmbhasuu:13623: etau . adiḥ tarhi prayojayati . āditha . kriyamāṇe api vai halādigrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . jaghasitha . eṣaḥ api halādiḥ . tasya ca abhāvāt tāsau .
GS24pmbhasuu:13624: tāsau aniṭaḥ iti ucyate na ca ghasiḥ tāsau asti . nanu ca yaḥ tāsau na asti aniṭ api asau tāsau bhavati . na evam vijñāyate yaḥ tāsau aniṭ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13625: katham tarhi . yaḥ tāsau asti aniṭ ca iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13626: katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate . saptamyarthe api vai vatiḥ bhavati . tat yathā . mathurāyām iva mathurāvat . pāṭaliputre iva pāṭaliputravat . evam tāsau iva tāsvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13627: (P_7,2.63) KA_III,299.6-19 Ro_V,145.2-146.3 kimartham idam ucyate na acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ nityam iti eva siddham . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_0: ayam ārambhaḥ . ṛtaḥ eva bhāradvājasya na anyataḥ bhāradvājasya iti . kva mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_1: . yayitha , vavitha iti . ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_2: . ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya iti niyamānupapattiḥ . kim kāraṇam . aprāptatvāt pratiṣedhasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_3: . guṇe kṛte raparatve ca anajantatvāt pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . asati niyame kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_4: doṣaḥ . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iḍvacanam . tatra pacādibhyaḥ iṭ vaktavyaḥ . pecitha ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_5: śekitha iti . yadiḥ punaḥ ayam bhāradvājaḥ purastāt apakṛṣyeta . acaḥ tāsvat thali
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_6: aniṭaḥ nityam bhāradvājasya . upadeśe atvataḥ bhāradvājasya . tataḥ ṛtaḥ bhāradvājasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13628_7: iti nivṛttam . sidhyate evam ayam tu bhāradvājaḥ svasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13629: matāt pracyāvitaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ tāsvat thali aniṭaḥ nityam upadeśe . tataḥ atvataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13632: kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti eva siddham . evam tarhi niyamārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13633: ayam ārambhaḥ . nigamaḥ eva yathā syāt . kva mā bhūt . vavaritha .
GS24pmbhasuu:13635_0: vasvekājādghasāṃvacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . vasau ekājāt ghasām
GS24pmbhasuu:13635_1: eva . kva mā bhūt . bibhidvān . kim ucyate niyamārtham iti na punaḥ vidhyarthaḥ api
GS24pmbhasuu:13635_2: syāt . pratiṣedhaḥ api hi atra prāpnoti na iṭ vaśi kṛti iti . kṛt ca eva hi ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:13635_3: vaśādiḥ ca . evam tarhi kṛsṛbhṛvṛstudruśrusruvaḥ liṭi iti etasmāt niyamāt atra iṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:13635_4: bhaviṣyati . na atra tena pariprāpaṇam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13635_5: pratiṣedhasya saḥ pratyārambhaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ ca ayam pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13636: ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ . katham jñāyate . vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇāt . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . imau vṛṅvṛñau udāttau tayoḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13637_0: na prāpnoti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ ubhayoḥ saḥ pratyārambhaḥ iti tataḥ vṛṅvṛñoḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13637_1: karoti . na khalu api kaḥ cit ubhayavān pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtilakṣaṇaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13637_2: ca . tulyajātīye asati yathā eva prakṛtilakṣaṇasaya niyāmakaḥ bhavati evam pratyayalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13637_3: api niyāmakaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha yāvatā vasau ekājbhyaḥ iṭā bhavitavyam kaḥ nu atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13638: viśeṣaḥ niyamārthe vā sati vidhyarthe vā . na khalu kaḥ cit viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13639: āhopuruṣikāmātram tu bhavān āha vidhyartham iti . vayam tu brūmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13642: . iha mā bhūt . bibhidvān , cicchidvān iti . kriyamāṇe api vā ekājgrahaṇe atra prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api hi ekāc . evam tarhi kṛte dvirvacane yaḥ ekāc .
GS24pmbhasuu:13643: kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13644_0: ekājgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . na hi kaḥ cit akṛte cirvacane enakāc asti yadartham ekājgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13644_1: kriyate . nanu ca ayam asti jāgartiḥ . gāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . yat tarhi ākāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13644_2: karoti na hi kaḥ cit akṛte dvirvacane ākārāntaḥ anekāc asti . nanu ca ayam asti daridrātiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13645_0: bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam . uktam etat daridrāteḥ ārdhadhātuke lopaḥ siddhaḥ ca pratyayavidhau
GS24pmbhasuu:13645_1: iti . yaḥ ca idānīm pratyayavidhau siddhaḥ siddhaḥ asau iḍvidhau . evam api bhūtapūrvagatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13645_2: vijñāyeta . ākārāntaḥ yaḥ bhūtapūrvaḥ iti . ekājgrahaṇam eva tarhi jñāpakam . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:13646: jāgartyartham etat syāt . na ekam udāharaṇam ekājgrahaṇam prayojayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13647: yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt jāgarteḥ na iti eva bhrūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13649_0: na ekāc iti eva siddham . ghasigrahaṇam anackatvāt . ghasigrahaṇam kriyate lope kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:13649_1: anackatvāt iṭ na prāpnoti . idam iha sampradhāryam . iṭ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13649_2: kartavyam . paratvāt iḍāgamaḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ . kṛte api iṭi prāpnoti akṛte api .
GS24pmbhasuu:13649_3: iṭ api nityaḥ . kṛte api lope prāpnoti akṛte api
GS24pmbhasuu:13650_0: . anityaḥ iṭ na hi kṛte lope prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . anackatvāt . evam tarhi dvirvacane
GS24pmbhasuu:13650_1: kṛte abhyāse yaḥ akāraḥ tadāśrayaḥ iṭ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . dvitvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13650_2: lopasya paratvāt . dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13651: dvirvacanam na prāpnoti . ghasigrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13652: katham . vacanāt iṭ bhaviṣyati . iṭi kṛte dvirvacanam kriyatām lopaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13653: yadi api paratvāt lopaḥ sthānivadbhāvāt dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13654: (P_7,2.68) KA_III,301.13-14 Ro_V,151.5-6 dṛśeḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13655: dadṛśvān , dadṛśivān . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . dṛśeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13656_0: (P_7,2.70) KA_III,301,16-20 Ro_V,151.8-12 svarateḥ veṭtvāt ṛtaḥ sye vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:13656_1: . svaratilakṣaṇāt vāvacanāt ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . svaratilakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13657: . ṛtaḥ sye iti asya avakāśaḥ . kariṣyate , hariṣyate . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . svariṣyati , asvariṣyat . ṛtaḥ sye iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:13659: ayaṃsīt , vyaraṃsīt , anaṃsīt , ayāsīt , avāsīt . na etat asti . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā . idam tarhi . ayaṃsiṣṭām , ayaṃsiṣuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13660: vyaraṃsiṣṭām , vyaraṃsiṣuḥ , anaṃsiṣṭām , anaṃsiṣuḥ , ayāsiṣṭām , ayāsiṣuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13661: , avāsiṣṭām , avāsiṣuḥ . idam ca api udāharaṇam . ayaṃsīt , vyaraṃsīt ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13662: anaṃsīt , ayāsīt , avāsīt . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ sati vā iṭi asati vā iti . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra iṭ na syāt vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13663: . iṭi punaḥ sati na iṭi iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13664: hmyantānām iti evam bhaviṣyati . atra api na iṭi iti anuvartate . tat ca avaśyam iḍgrahaṇam anuvartyam adhākṣīt iti evamartham . ākārāntāḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:13665: padapūrvāḥ ekavacane udāharaṇam . mā hi yāsīt . yadi atra iṭ na syāt anudāttasya īṭaḥ śravaṇam prasajyeta . iṭi punaḥ sati uktam etat arthavat
GS24pmbhasuu:13666: tu sicaḥ citkaraṇasāmarthyāt hi iṭaḥ udāttatvam iti tatra ekādeśaḥ udāttena udāttaḥ iti udāttatvam siddham bhavati .

GS24pmbhasuu:13675_2: , yajamānaḥ . mukā vyavahitatvāt anudāttatvam na prāpnoti . evam tarhi parādiḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13675_3: . parādau dīrghaprasaṅgaḥ . yadi parādiḥ kriyate ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13676_0: . tiṅi iti evam tat . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:13676_1: ca uktam muki svare doṣaḥ iti . parihṛtam etat adupadeśabhaktaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:13676_2: grāhiṣyate . nanu ca uktam aṅgasya muk ucyate vikaraṇāntam ca aṅgam saḥ ayam saṅghātabhaktaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13676_3: aśakyaḥ adupadeśagrahaṇena grahītum iti . atha ayam adbhaktaḥ syāt gṛhyeta adupadeśagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:13676_4: . bāḍham gṛhyeta . adbhaktaḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . tat katham . ataḥ yā iyaḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13677_0: ca ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam tatra aśakyam vivibhaktitvāt ataḥ iti pañcamyā aṅgam viśeṣayitum
GS24pmbhasuu:13677_1: . tat prakṛtam iha anuvartiṣyate . evam api ṣaṣṭhyabhāvāt na prāpnoti . ānaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13677_2: eṣā saptamī ataḥ iti pañcamyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13679: Ro_V,157.2-159.3 aṣṭanjanādipathimathyātveṣu āntaratamyāt anunāsikaprasaṅgaḥ . aṣṭanjanādipathimathyātveṣu āntaratamyāt anunāsikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13680: prāpnoti . aṣṭābhiḥ , aṣṭābhyaḥ , jātaḥ , jātavān , panthāḥ , manthāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13681: siddham anaṇtvāt . siddham etat . katham . anaṇtvāt . katham anaṇtvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13682: aṇsavarṇān gṛhṇāti iti ucyate na ca akāraḥ aṇ . uccāraṇasāmarthyāt vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13683: atha vā śuddhoccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . na etau staḥ parihārau .
GS24pmbhasuu:13684: yat tāvat ucyate anaṇtvāt iti na brūmaḥ aṇsavarṇān gṛhṇāti iti . katham tarhi taparaḥ tatkālasya iti . yat api ucyate uccāraṇasāmarthyāt vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13685_0: asti anyat uccāraṇe prayojanam . kim . uttarārtham . rāyaḥ hali iti . evam tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13685_1: na imau pṛthakparihārau . ekapariharaḥ ayam . siddham anaṇtvāt uccāraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13685_2: vā iti . iha tāvat aṣṭābhiḥ , aṣṭābhyaḥ iti anaṇtvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13686: siddham . jātaḥ , jātavān , panthāḥ , manthāḥ uccāraṇsāmarthyāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13687: yadi evam pṛthakparihārayoḥ api na doṣaḥ . yaḥ yatra parihāraḥ saḥ tatra bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13688_0: (P_7,2.86) KA_III,304.17-18 Ro_V,159.5-6 anādeśagrahaṇam śakyam akartum . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13688_1: hali iti anuvartate na ca ādeśaḥ halādiḥ asti . tat etat anādeśagrahaṇam tiṣṭhatu
GS24pmbhasuu:13688_2: tāvat sānnyāsikam (P_7,2.89) KA_III,304-21 Ro_V,159.8-9 ajgrahaṇam śakyam akartum
GS24pmbhasuu:13689: katham . aviśeṣeṇa yatvam utsargaḥ tasya halādau ātvam apavādaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13691: katham . aviśeṣeṇa lopaḥ utsargaḥ tasya ajādau yatvam apavādaḥ halādau ātvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13692: (P_7,2.91) KA_III,305.5-13 Ro_V,160.5-162.2 parigrahaṇam śakyam akartum . māntasya iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13693: antaśabdasya ubhayārthatvāt . katham . ayam antaśabdaḥ asti eva saha tena
GS24pmbhasuu:13694_0: vartate . tat yathā . maryādāntam devadattasya kṣetram . saha maryādayā iti gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13694_1: . asti prāk tasmāt vartate . tat yathā . nadyantam devadattasya kṣetram iti . prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:13694_2: nadyāḥ iti gamyate . tat yaḥ saha tena vartate tasya idam grahaṇam yathā vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13694_3: . na etat asti prayojanam sarvatra eva antaśabdaḥ saha tena vartate . atha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:13695: devadattasya kṣetram iti . nadyāḥ kṣetratve sambhaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā prāk nadyāḥ iti gamyate . avadhidyotanārtham tarhi parigrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13696: māntasya iti iyati ucyamāne yatra eva mānte yuṣmadasmadī tatra eva ādeśāḥ syuḥ . kva ca mānte yuṣmadasmadī . yuṣmān ācaṣṭe , asmān ācaṣṭe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13698: (P_7,2.98.1) KA_III,305.15-306.5 Ro_V,163-164 kimartham idam ucyate na tvamau ekavacane iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13699: ekavacanābhāvāt . ekavacane iti ucyate na ca atra ekavacanam paśyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13700: pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā aṅgasya iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13701: evam tarhi idam iha sampradhāryam . luk kriyatām ādeśau iti kim atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13702_0: kartavyam . paratvāt ādeśau . nityaḥ luk . kṛtayoḥ api ādeśayoḥ prāpnoti akṛtayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13702_1: api . antaraṅgau ādeśau . evam tarhi siddhe sati yatpratyayottarapadayoḥ tvamau śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:13703: vidhīn bādhitvā bahiraṅgaḥ luk bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13704_0: . gomān priyaḥ asya gomatpriyaḥ , yavamatpriyaḥ gomān iva ācarati gomatyate , yavamatyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13704_1: antaraṅgān api numādīn bahiraṅgaḥ luk bādhate iti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13704_2: anyat etasya vacane prayojanam . kim . ye anye ekavacanādeśāḥ prāpnuvanti tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13705: tava putraḥ tvatputraḥ , mama putraḥ matputraḥ , tubhyam hitam tvaddhitam
GS24pmbhasuu:13706: , mahyam hitam maddhitam iti . yat tarhi maparyantagrahaṇam anuvartayati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13707: yati atra anye ekavacanādeśāḥ syuḥ mapartyantānuvṛttiḥ anarthikā syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13710: tricaturoḥ striyām tisṛcatasṛ . yadi api samāsaḥ puṃsi napuṃsake vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13711: vartate tricaturau ca striyām vartete bhavati eva tisṛcatasṛbhāvaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13712: priyāḥ tisraḥ brāhmaṇyaḥ asya brāhmaṇasya priyatisā , priyatisrau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13713: priyatisraḥ , priyacatasā , priyacatasrau , priyacatasraḥ , priyāḥ tisraḥ brāhmaṇyaḥ asya brāhmaṇakulasya priyatisṛ, priyatisṛṇī , priyatisṝṇi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13714_0: priyacatasṛ , priyacatasṛṇī , priyacatasṝṇi . yadā hi samāsaḥ striyām vartate tricaturau
GS24pmbhasuu:13714_1: ca puṃsi napuṃsake vā tadā ma bhūtām iti . priyāḥ trayaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13715: priyacatvāḥ , priyacatvārau , priyacatvāraḥ . priyāṇi trīṇi brāhmaṇakulāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13716: asyāḥ brāhmaṇyāḥ priyatriḥ , priyatrī , priyatrayaḥ , priyacatvāḥ priyacatvārau priyacatvāraḥ . yuvāvau dvivacane . yadi api samāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13717: ekārthaḥ vā bhavati bahvarthaḥ vā bhavati dvyarthe ca yuṣmadasmadī bhavataḥ eva yuvāvau . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . yūyavayau jasi tvāhau

GS24pmbhasuu:13724_1: vā ekārthe ca yuṣmadasmadī bhavataḥ eva tvamau . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . tān

GS24pmbhasuu:13726: atimām , atikrāntān tvām atitvān atimān , atitvayā , atimayā , atitvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13727: , atimābhyām , atitvabhyam , atimabhyam , atitvat , atimat , atitvābhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13728: atimābhyām , atitvabhyam , atimabhyam , atitvat , atimat , atimābhyām ,
