GS24pmbhasuu:13731_0: . yadi evam yūyavayau jasi tvāhau sau tubhyamahyau ṅayi tavamamau ṅasi iti etebhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13731_1: vidhibhyaḥ paratvāt tvamau ekavacane iti prāpnoti . sāvakāsāḥ hi ete vidhayaḥ idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:13732: tvamau ekavacane iti asya avakāśaḥ . anyāni vacanāni . ekārthayoḥ yuṣmadasmadoḥ eteṣu vacaneṣu ubhayam prāpnoti . paratvāt tvamau ekavacane
GS24pmbhasuu:13733: iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . śeṣe iti vartate . kaḥ ca śeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13734: jasādibhiḥ avyāptam yat ekavacanam tasmin śeṣe . aśeṣatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13735: atha vā tamau ekavacane iti atra yūyavayau jasi tvāhau sau tubhyamahyau ṅayi tavamamau ṅasi iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13736: (P_7,2.99) KA_III,307.18-308.6 Ro_V,167.16-169.2 tisṛbhāve sañjñāyām kani upasaṅkhyānam . tisṛbhāve sañjñāyām kani upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13737_0: tisṛkā nāma grāmaḥ . catasari ādyudāttanipātanam ca . catasari ādyudāttanipātanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13737_1: kartavyam . tricaturoḥ striyām tisṛcatasṛ . kim prayojanam . catasraḥ paśya . śasi
GS24pmbhasuu:13737_2: svaraḥ mā bhūt iti . kim ca anyat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13738: upadeśivadvacanam ca . upadeśivadbhāvaḥ ca vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13739_0: svarasiddhyartham . upadeśāvasthāyām eva ādyudāttanipātane kṛte vibhaktisvareṇa bādhanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13739_1: yathā syāt : catasṛṇām iti . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13740: vibhaktisvarabhāvaḥ ca halādigrahaṇāt ādyudāttanipātane hi halādigrahaṇānarthakyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13742: upasaṅkhyānam guṇaparatvāt . aci rādeśe jasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13743: tisraḥ tiṣṭhanti , catasraḥ tiṣṭhanti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13744_0: guṇaparatvāt . paratvāt guṇaḥ prāpnoti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vā anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13744_1: rasya . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . anavakāśatvāt rasya . anavakāśaḥ rādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13744_2: guṇam bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ rādeśaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13745: tisraḥ paśya . catasraḥ paśya . na eṣaḥ asti avakāśaḥ . atra api pūrvasavarṇadīrghaḥ prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva pūrvasavarṇam bādhate evam
GS24pmbhasuu:13746: guṇam api bādhiṣyate . guṇaḥ api anavakāśaḥ . sāvakāśaḥ guṇaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . he kartaḥ . na eṣaḥ sarvanāmasthāne guṇaḥ . kaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13747: sambuddhiguṇaḥ . ayam tarhi . he mātaḥ . eṣaḥ api sambuddhiguṇaḥ eva . na atra sambuddhiguṇaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . ambārthanadyoḥ hrasvaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13748_0: hrasvatvena bhavitavyam . bhavet dīrghāṇām hrasvavacanasāmarthyāt na syāt hrasvānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13748_1: tu khalu hrasvatvam kriyatām sambuddhiguṇaḥ iti paratvāt sambuddhiguṇena bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13748_2: . atha api katham cit sāvakāsaḥ guṇaḥ syāt evam api na doṣaḥ . purastāt apavādāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13748_3: anantarān vidhīn bādhante iti evam ayam rādeśaḥ jasi guṇam bādhate sarvanāmasthānaguṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13749: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate aci rādeśe jasi upasaṅkhyānam guṇaparatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13750: (P_7,2.101) KA_III,309.2-12 Ro_V,172.2-173.4 numaḥ anaṅjarasau bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . trapuṇī , jatunī , tumburuṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:13751: anaṅaḥ avakāśaḥ . priyasakthnā brāhmaṇena . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dadhnā
GS24pmbhasuu:13752: , sakthnā . jarasaḥ avakāśaḥ . jarasā , jarase . numaḥ avakāśaḥ . kuṇḍāni
GS24pmbhasuu:13753: , vanāni . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . atijarāṃsi brāhmaṇakulāni . anaṅjarasau numaḥ bhavataḥ vipratiṣedhena . atha iha luk kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13754: atijarasam paśya iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam dvitīyaikavacanam eva udāhriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13755_0: na punaḥ prathamaikavacanam api . atijarasam tiṣṭhati iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . na
GS24pmbhasuu:13755_1: atra akṛte ambhāve jarasbhāvaḥ prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . aci iti ucyate . yadā ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13755_2: jarasbhāvaḥ kṛtaḥ tadā luk na bhaviṣyati sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13755_3: iti . yadi evam atijarasam , atijarasaiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti atijaram , atijaraiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13755_4: iti bhavitavyam . gonardīyaḥ āha . iṣṭam eva etat saṅgṛhītam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13756: atijaram atijaraiḥ iti bhavitavyam satyām etasyām paribhāṣāyām sannipātalakṣaṇaḥ vidhiḥ animittam tadvighātasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13757: (P_7,2.102) KA_III,309.15-310.25 Ro_V,174.2-178.6 tyadādīnām dviparyantānām akāravacanam . tyadādīnām dviparyantānām atvam vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13758: kim prayojanam . yuṣmadasmadantānām bhavadantānām vā mā bhūt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . tyadādīnām akāreṇa siddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13759: yuṣmadasmadoḥ , śeṣe lopasya lopena jñāyate prāk tataḥ at iti . yat ayam tyadādīnām atvena siddhe yuṣmadasmadoḥ śeṣe lopam śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13760: ācāryaḥ prāk tataḥ atvam bhavati iti . na sarveṣām iti . api vā upasamastārtham atvābhāvāt kṛtam bhavet . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13761_0: upasamastārtham etat syāt : atiyūyam , ativayam . upasamastānām hi tyadādīnām atvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13761_1: na iṣyate : atitat , atitadau , atitadaḥ . ṭilopaḥ ṭābabhāvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ iti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:13761_2: smṛtam . yaḥ tu śeṣe lopaḥ ṭilopaḥ saḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13762_0: vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . ṭāppratiṣedhārtham . ṭāp mā bhūt iti . saḥ tarhi ṭilopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13762_1: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . atha vā śeṣasaptamyā śeṣe lopaḥ vidhīyate . iha yuṣmadasmadoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13762_2: lopaḥ iti iyatā antyasya lopaḥ siddhaḥ . saḥ ayam evam siddhe sati yat śeṣagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13762_3: karoti tasya etat prayojanam avaśiṣṭasya lopaḥ yathā syāt iti . luptaśiṣṭe hi tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13762_4: āhuḥ kāryasiddhim manīṣiṇaḥ . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sarveṣām tyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:13762_5: atvam bhavati iti yat ayam kimaḥ kaḥ iti kādeśam śāsti . itarathā hi kimaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13763: at bhavati iti eva brūyāt . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ jñāpakārthaḥ bhavati na ca kimaḥ attvena sidhyati . attve hi sati antyasya prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13764: siddham antyasya pūrveṇa eva tatra ārambhasāmarthyāt ikārasya bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13765_0: kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantyārthe ārambhe sati ikārasya bhaviṣyati na punaḥ kakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13765_1: syāt . yat tarhi kimaḥ grahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi kaṭ at bhavati iti eva brūyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13766: tyadādīnām iti vartate na ca anyat kimaḥ tyadādiṣu kakāravat asti . evam api anaikāntikam jñāpakam . etāvat tu jñāpyate na sarveṣām tyadādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:13767_0: atvam bhavati iti tatra kutaḥ etat dviparyantānām bhaviṣyati na punaḥ yuṣmadasmadantānām
GS24pmbhasuu:13767_1: vā syāt bhavadantānām vā . kim ca avaśyam khalu api uttarārtham kimaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13767_2: . ku tihoḥ kva ati iti . kādeśaḥ khalu api avaśyam sākackārthaḥ vaktavyaḥ kaḥ kau
GS24pmbhasuu:13768: tasmāt dviparyantānām atvam vaktavyam . tyadādīnām akāreṇa siddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13769: yuṣmadasmadoḥ , śeṣe lopasya lopena jñāyate prāk tataḥ at iti . api vā upasamastārtham atvābhāvāt kṛtam bhavet , ṭilopaḥ ṭābabhāvārthaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13770: iti tat smṛtam . atha vā śeṣasaptamyā śeṣe lopaḥ vidhīyate , luptaśiṣṭe hi tasya āhuḥ kāryasiddhim manīṣiṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13771: (P_7,2.105) KA_III,310.27-28 Ro_V,178.8-9 kimartham kvādeśaḥ ucyate na ku tihāt si iti eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : kva . yaṇādeśena siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13774: ucyate . antyayoḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam . atvam antyayoḥ bādhakam bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13775: atvam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . dviśabdaḥ . satvam api sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13776_0: anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya satvam syāt . bhavet yaḥ takāradakārābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13776_1: aṅgam viśeṣayet tasya anantyayoḥ na syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅgena takāradakārau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13776_2: . evam api ubhayoḥ sāvakāsaśayoḥ paratvāt satvam prāpnoti . kim ca syāt yadi antyayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13776_3: satvam syāt . iha he saḥ iti eṅhrasvāt iti sambuddhilopaḥ na syāt . iha ca yā sā
GS24pmbhasuu:13776_4: ataḥ iti ṭāp na syāt . tasmāt anantyayoḥ iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . evam vakṣyāmi
GS24pmbhasuu:13777: tadoḥ saḥ sau . tataḥ adasaḥ . adasaḥ ca dakārasya saḥ bhavati iti . idam idānīm kimartham . niyamārtham . adasaḥ eva dakārasya na anyasya dakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13778: iti . yadi niyamaḥ kriyate dvīyateḥ apratyayaḥ dvaḥ iti prāpnoti svaḥ iti ca iṣyate . yathālakṣaṇam aprayukte .
GS24pmbhasuu:13780: autvam kim sulopaḥ vidhīyate . adasaḥ eva soḥ bhavet autvam kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:13781: sulopaḥ vidhīyate . hrasvāt lupyeta sambuddhiḥ . iha he asau iti eṅhrasvāt sambuddheḥ iti lopaḥ prasajyeta . na halaḥ . halaḥ lopaḥ sambuddhilopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13782_0: tat halgrahaṇam kartavyam . prakṛtam hi tat . prakṛtam halgrahaṇam . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13782_1: . halṅyābbhyaḥ dīrghāt sutisyapṛktam hal iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:13782_2: ca iha arthaḥ . hrasvāt iti eṣā pañcamī hal iti prathamāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhīm prakalpayiṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:13783: āpaḥ ettvam bhavet tasmin . iha he asau brāhmaṇi āṅi ca āpaḥ sambuddhau ca
GS24pmbhasuu:13784: iti ettvam prasajyeta . na jhali iti anuvartanāt . jhali iti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13785: anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . supi ca bahuvacane jhali et iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13786: pratyayasthāt ca kāt ittvam . iha ca asakau brāhmaṇī iti pratyaysthāt kāt pūrvasya iti īttvam prasajyeta . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . praśliṣṭanirdeśaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13787: ā , āp , āp iti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . kārike , hārike , iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13788: śībhāvaḥ ca prasajyate . iha ca śībhāvaḥ ca prāpnoti . asau brāhmaṇī .
GS24pmbhasuu:13789: āpaḥ uttarasya auṅaḥ śī bhavati iti śībhāvaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt soḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13791: (P_7,2.107.2) KA_III,312.14-313.4 Ro_V,182 sau autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackāt vā sāt utvam ca . sau autvapratiṣedhaḥ sākackāt vā vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13792: sāt ca parasya utvam vaktavyam . asakau , asukaḥ . uttarapadabhūtānām ādeśe upadeśavadvacanam . uttarapadabhūtānām tyadādīnām ādeśe
GS24pmbhasuu:13793_0: upadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paramāham , paramāyam , paramānena . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13793_1: . anādiṣṭārtham . akṛte ekādeśe ādeśāḥ yathā syuḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13793_2: tāvat bhavati na punaḥ ādeśāḥ . na paratvāt ādeśaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13794: bhavitavyam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgāḥ ādeśāḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ekādeśaḥ . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saḥ tarhi upadeśivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13795: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13796_0: tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśaḥ iti yat ayam na indrasya parasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:13796_1: śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . indre dvau acau . tatra ekaḥ yasya iti lopena apahriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13797: tatra kaḥ vṛddheḥ prasaṅgaḥ . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ pūrvapadottarapadayoḥ tāvat kāryam bhavati na ekādeśe iti tataḥ na indrasya parasya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13799: (P_7,2.107.3) KA_III,313.5-8 Ro_V,182-183 adasaḥ soḥ bhavet autvam kim sulopaḥ vidhīyate , hrasvāt lupyeta sambuddhiḥ na halaḥ prakṛtam hi tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13800: āpaḥ ettvam bhavet tasmin na jhali iti anuvartanāt , pratyayasthāt ca kāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13802: (P_7,2.114) KA_III,313.10-22 Ro_V,183.4-184.4 mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau kvipratiṣedhaḥ . mṛjeḥ vṛddhividhau kvyantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13804: tatpratyayavijñānāt siddham . atha vā dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānāt siddham . dhātupratyaye kāryam bhavati iti eṣā paribhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:13805: kartavyā . kāni etasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ prayojanāni . prayojanam sṛjidṛśimasjinaśihantigiratyartham . sṛji . rajjusṛḍbhyām , rajjusṛḍbhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13806: sṛji . dṛśi . devadṛgbhyām , devadṛgbhiḥ . dṛśi . masji . udakamagbhyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13807: udakamagbhiḥ . masji . naśi . pranaḍbhyām , pranaḍbhiḥ . naśi . hanti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13808_0: vārtraghnaḥ , bhrauṇaghnaḥ . hanti . girati . devagiraḥ . yadi svarūpagrahaṇe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13808_1: ucyate prasṛbbhyām , prasṛbbhiḥ , anudāttasya ca ṛdupasya anyatarasyām iti am prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13808_2: . evam tarhi iyam paribhāṣā kartavyā dhātoḥ kāryam ucyamānam tatpratyaye bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13808_3: iti . sā tarhi eṣā paribhāṣā kartavyā . na kartavyā . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13808_4: eṣā paribhāṣā iti yat ayam bhrauṇahatye tatvam śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13809: (P_7,2.115) KA_III,313.24-314.14 Ro_V,184.5-185.7 vṛddhau ajgrahaṇam go'rtham . vṛddhau ajgrahaṇam kriyate gotaḥ vṛdhiḥ yathā syāt . gauḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13810_0: na etat asti prayojanam . ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt eva atra vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:13810_1: yogavibhāgaḥ kimarthaḥ na ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhaḥ cāyakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13810_2: , lāvakaḥ , kārakaḥ . guṇe kṛte ayavaḥ raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13810_3: . yogavibhāgaḥ sakhivyañjanādyarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ kriyate sakhyarthaḥ vyañjanādyarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13811: sakhāyau , sakhāyaḥ . vyañjanādyarthaḥ . jaitram , yautram , cyautram .
GS24pmbhasuu:13812: yogavibhāge ca idānīm sakhivyañjanādyarthe kriyamāṇe ajgrahaṇam api kartavyam bhavati . kim prayojanam . gortham . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:13813: ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt eva atra vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti . asti anyat ṇitkaraṇasaya prayojanam . kim . gāvau , gāvaḥ . avādeśe kṛte ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13814: upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ yathā syāt . yat tu sau ṇitkaraṇam tat anavakāśam
GS24pmbhasuu:13815: tasya anavakāśatvāt eva vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva khalu api ṇitkaraṇasāmarthyāt anikaḥ api vṛddhiḥ prārthyate evam tatvam api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13816: . tatvam api hi ñṇiti iti ucyate . tasmāt ajgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13818_0: nanu ca kriyate eva . dvitīyam kartavyam yathā acāmādigrahaṇam ajviśeṣaṇam vijñāyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13818_1: . acām ādeḥ acaḥ iti . atha akriyamāṇe ajgrahaṇe kasya acāmādigrahaṇam viśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13818_2: syāt . igviśeṣaṇam iti āha . acām ādeḥ ikaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13819: . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt . aitkāyanaḥ , aupagavaḥ . iha na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13820: gārgyaḥ , vātsyaḥ iti . tat tarhi ajgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13821: prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . acaḥ ñṇiti iti . yadi tat anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:13822_0: ataḥ upadhāyāḥ acaḥ iti ajmātrasya upadhāyāḥ vṛddhiḥ prasajyeta . chedakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13822_1: akāreṇa tapareṇa acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . acaḥ ataḥ iti . iha idānīm acaḥ iti eva anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:13822_2: ataḥ iti nivṛttam . atha vā maṇḍūkagatayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13823: adhikārāḥ . yathā maṇḍūkāḥ utplutya utplutya gacchanti tadvat adhikārāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13824: atha vā ekayogaḥ kariṣyate . acaḥ ñṇiti ataḥ upadhāyāḥ . tataḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ iti . na ca ekayoge anuvṛttiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13825_1: . taddhiteṣu acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇāyāḥ vṛddheḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13826_0: . nanu ca acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate . katham anyasya ucyamānā
GS24pmbhasuu:13826_1: anyasya bādhikā syāt . asati khalu api sambhave bādhanam bhavati asti ca sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13826_2: yat ubhayam syāt . lokavijñānāt siddham . sati api sambhave bādhanam bhavati . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_0: takram kauṇḍinyāya iti sati api sambhave dadhidānasya takradānam nivartakam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_1: . evam iha api sati api sambhave acāmādivṛddhiḥ antyopadhalakṣaṇām vṛddhim bādhiṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_2: . viṣamaḥ upanyāsaḥ . na aprāpte dadhidāne takradānam ārabhyate tat prāpte ārabhyamāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13827_3: bādhakam bhaviṣyati . iha punaḥ aprāptāyām antyopadhalakṣaṇāyām vṛddhau acāmādivṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13828: ārabhyate . suśrut , sauśrutaḥ iti . puṣkarasadgrahaṇāt vā . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:13829: ayam anuśatikādiṣu puṣkarasacśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ acāmādivṛddhau antyopadhalakṣaṇā vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13830_1: tadādigrahaṇam kartavyam . devikādyādīnām iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . dāvikākulāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13830_2: śālayaḥ , śāṃśapāsthalāḥ devāḥ . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . anyatra tadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13830_3: tadantagrahaṇāt vā . anyatra hi tasya vā grahaṇam bhavati tadantasya vā na
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_0: ca idam tat na api tadantam . ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham . ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_1: . na evam vijñāyate devikādīnām aṅgānām acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_2: . ñṇiti aṅgasya acām ādeḥ ākāraḥ bhavati saḥ cet devikādīnām ādjyac bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_3: āntaratamyanivartakatvāt vā . atha vā na anena anantaratamā vṛddhiḥ nirvartyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_4: kim tarhi antaratamā anena nivartyate . siddhā atra vṛddhiḥ taddhiteṣu acām ādeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_5: iti eva tatra anena antaratamā vṛddhiḥ nivartyate . parihārāntaram eva idam matvā
GS24pmbhasuu:13831_6: paṭhitam katham ca idam parihārāntaram syāt . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13832_0: avaśyam ca etat evam vijñeyam adyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ iti . yadi na ādyajviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13832_1: devikādayaḥ syuḥ iha api prāpnoti : sudevikāyām bhavaḥ saudevikaḥ iti . atha atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13832_2: api ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt iti eva siddham parihārāntaram na bhavati . na brūmaḥ yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_0: kartavyam iti . kim tarhi . yatra kriyamāṇe na doṣaḥ tatra kartavyam . kva ca kriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_1: na doṣaḥ . sañjñāvidhau . vṛddhiḥ āt aic devikādīnām ākāraḥ iti . idhyati . sūtram
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_2: tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam devikādiṣu tadādigrahaṇam anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_3: tadgrahaṇāt tadantagrahaṇāt vā iti . parihṛtam etat ādyajviśeṣaṇatvāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_4: . nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt . nyagrodhe ca kevalagrahaṇāt manyāmahe ādyajviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_5: devikādayaḥ iti . tasya hi kevalagrahaṇasya etat prayojanam iha mā bhūt nyāgrodhamūlāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_6: śālayaḥ iti . yadi ca ādyajviśeṣaṇam devikādayaḥ tataḥ kevalagrahaṇam arthavat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13833_7: . tat etat katham kṛtvā jñāpakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13834: yadi nyagrodhaśabdaḥ avyutpannam prātipadikam bhavati . atha hi nyagrohati
GS24pmbhasuu:13835: iti nyagrodhaḥ tataḥ niyamārtham padāntaḥ iti kṛtvā na jñāpakam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13836: vahīnarasya idvacanam . vahīnarasya ittvam vaktavyam . vahīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ . kuṇaravāḍavaḥ tu āha . na eṣaḥ vahīnaraḥ . kaḥ tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:13837: vihīnaraḥ eṣaḥ . vihīnaḥ naraḥ kāmabhogābhyām vihīnaraḥ . vihīnarasya apatyam vaihīnariḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13838_0: (P_7,3.3) KA_III,317.8-318.24 Ro_V,192.4-194.11 yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam . yvābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13838_1: parasya avṛddhitvam siddham . kutaḥ . apavādau vṛddheḥ hi tau . apavādau hi vṛddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13838_2: tau aicau ucyete . nityau aicau tayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_0: vṛddhiḥ . atha vā nityau aicau . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnutaḥ akṛtāyām api . nityatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_1: aicoḥ kṛtayoḥ yadi api vṛddhiḥ tayoḥ eva . kimartham na iti śiṣyate . atha kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_2: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate . ecoḥ viṣayārtham pratiṣedhasanniyuktavacanam . ecoḥ viṣayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_3: pratiṣedhasanniyogena aicau ucyete . yatra yvābhyām parāvṛddhiḥ tatra adhyaśveḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_4: na tau . yatra yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam ucyate tatra aicau yathā syātām . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13839_5: mā bhūtām . ādhyaśviḥ , dādhyaśviḥ , mādhvaśviḥ iti . na etat asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13840_0: . acām ādeḥ yvābhyām hi tau . acām ādinā atra yvau viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . acām ādeḥ yau
GS24pmbhasuu:13840_1: yvau iti . katham dvyāśītike na tau . dvyāśītikaḥ iti atra kasmāt na tau bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13840_2: . yatra vṛddhiḥ acām ādeḥ tatra aicau atra ghoḥ hi sā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_0: tatra acām ādeḥ iti evam vṛddhiḥ tatra aicau ucyete . atra ghoḥ iti evam vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_1: . kim idam ghoḥ iti . uttarapadasya iti . uttarapadādhikāre api avaśyam aijāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_2: anuvartyaḥ pūrvatryalinde bhavaḥ pūrvatrayalindaḥ iti evamartham . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_3: . uttarapadena atra acām ādi viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ acām ādinā yvau . uttarapadasya acām
GS24pmbhasuu:13841_4: ādeḥ yau yvau iti . atha kasmāt padāntābhyām . atha kimartham padāntābhyām iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_0: bhavet yaṇaḥ . iṇaḥ yaṇādeśe mā bhūt. yataḥ chātrā , yātā iti . iha vaiyākaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_1: , sauvaśvaḥ iti śākalam prāpnoti yvoḥ ca sthānivadbhāvāt āyāvau prāpnutaḥ . śakalāyāvādeśeṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_2: ca uktam . kim uktam . śākale tāvat uktam sinnityasamāsayoḥ śākalapratiṣedhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_3: . āyāvoḥ kim uktam . acaḥ pūrvavijñānāt aicoḥ siddham iti . yvābhyām parasya avṛddhitvam
GS24pmbhasuu:13842_4: apavādau vṛddheḥ hi tau , nityau aicau tayoḥ vṛddhiḥ kimartham na iti śiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13843_0: yatra yvābhyām parāvṛddhiḥ tatra adhyaśveḥ yathā na tau , acām ādeḥ yvābhyām hi tau
GS24pmbhasuu:13843_1: katham dvyāśītike na tau . yatra vṛddhiḥ acām ādeḥ tatra aicau atra ghoḥ hi sā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13843_2: atha kasmāt padāntābhyām yathā iṇaḥ na bhavet yaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13845: iti anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate śauvam māṃsam ṭilope kṛte aijāgamaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam svādhyāyaśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13846_0: dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ prāpnoti . yatha
GS24pmbhasuu:13846_1: icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat anuvartate . katha śauvam māṃsam . ānupūrvyā siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13846_2: etat . na atra akṛte aijāgame ṭilopaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13847: . kim kāraṇam . prakṛtyā ekāc iti prakṛtibhāvena bhavitavyam . tat etat ānupūrvyā siddham bhavati . atha vā punaḥ astu nivṛttam . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:13848_0: svādhyāyaśabdaḥ dvārādiṣu paṭhyate tatra yāvantaḥ yaṇaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pūrvaḥ aijāgamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13848_1: prāpnoti iti . kaḥ punaḥ arhati svādhyāyaśabdam dvārādiṣu paṭhitum . evam kil paṭhyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:13848_2: svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ iti . tat ca na .
GS24pmbhasuu:13849: suṣṭhu vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ śobhanam vā adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ . atha api svam adhyayanam svādhyāyaḥ evam api na doṣaḥ . acām ādeḥ iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13851_0: paṭhyate tatra kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ yat tadādeḥ syāt . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:13851_1: . tadādividhinā prāpnoti . na eva tadādividhiḥ asti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:13851_2: śvādigrahaṇam jñāpakam anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādigrahaṇasya śauvahānādyartham . pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:13852: jñāpakārtham . kim jñāpyam . etat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra śvangrahaṇe tadādividhiḥ bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13853: śauvahānādyartham . śauvahānam nāma nagaram . śauvādaṃṣṭraḥ maṇiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13854_0: ikārādigrahaṇam ca śvāgaṇikādyartham . ikārādigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13854_1: . śvāgaṇikādyartham . śvagaṇena carati śvāgaṇikaḥ . tadantasya ca anyatra pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13857: avayavāt ṛtoḥ iti vakṣyati taduttarapadasya yathā syāt acām ādeḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13858: na etat asti prayojanam . avayavāt iti pañcamī tatra antareṇa api
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_0: uttarapadagrahaṇam uttarapadasya eva bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham tarhi susarvārdhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_1: janapadasya iti . susarvārdhāt iti pañcamī . diśaḥ amadrāṇām . diśaḥ iti pañcamī
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_2: . prācām grāmanagarāṇām . diśaḥ iti eva . saṅkhyāyāḥ saṃvatsarasaṅkhyasya ca . saṅkhyāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_3: iti pañcamī . varṣasya abhaviṣyati saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_4: iti . saṅkhyāyāḥ iti eva . idam tarhi prayojanam je proṣṭhapadānām uttarapadasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13859_5: yathā syāt pūrvapadasya mā bhūt . proṣṭhapadāsu jātaḥ proṣṭhapādaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13860_0: taddhiteṣu acām ādivṛddheḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena dvyāśītikādyartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13860_1: taddhiteṣu acām ādivṛddheḥ uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kim prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:13860_2: . dvyāśītikādyartham . acām ādivṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ . aitikāyanaḥ , aupagavaḥ . uttarapadavṛddheḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13861: dviṣāṣṭikaḥ , triṣāṣṭikaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . dvyāśītikaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13862: tryāśītikaḥ . uttarapadavṛddhiḥ bhavati vipratiṣedhena . kaḥ punaḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13863: viśeṣaḥ acām ādivṛddhau vā satyām uttarapadavṛddhau vā . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13864: . yadi atra acām ādivṛddhiḥ syāt aijāgamaḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_0: (P_7,3.14) KA_III,320.18-321.10 Ro_V,199.11-201.3 nagaragrahaṇam kimartham na prācām
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_1: grāmāṇām iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . anyaḥ grāmaḥ anyat nagaram . katham jñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_2: . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati . kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt . saḥ hi āha .
GS24pmbhasuu:13865_3: na grāmāt nagarāt iti . nanu ca bho
GS24pmbhasuu:13866: yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham jñāyate . lokataḥ . ye hi grāme
GS24pmbhasuu:13867_0: vidhayaḥ na iṣyante sādhīyaḥ te nagare na kriyante . tat yathā . abhakṣyaḥ grāmyakukkuṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13867_1: abhakṣyaḥ grāmyaśūkaraḥ iti ukte sutarām nāgaraḥ api na bhakṣyate . tathā grāme na
GS24pmbhasuu:13867_2: adhyeyam iti sādhīyaḥ nagare na adhīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13868: tasmāt yaḥ eva grāmaḥ tat nagaram . katham yat uktam evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit pṛcchati kutaḥ bhavān āgacchati grāmāt saḥ āha na grāmāt nagarāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13869: saṃstyāyaviśeṣam asau ācaṣṭe . saṃstyāyaviśeṣāḥ hi ete grāmaḥ ghoṣaḥ nagaram saṃvāhaḥ iti . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat grāmagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:13870: nagaragrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anyatra grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13871_0: viśiṣṭaliṅgaḥ nadīdeśaḥ agrāmāḥ iti atra nagarapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ saḥ na vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13871_1: bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate udīcyagrāmāt ca bahvacaḥ antodāttāt iti atra nagaragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13873: kartavyam . idam caturtham jñāpakārtham . tatra atinirbandhaḥ na lābhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13874: tasmāt yasmin eva grāmagrahaṇe nagaragrahaṇam na iṣyate tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13875: (P_7,3.15) KA_III,321.12-25 Ro_V,201.5-18 saṃvatsaragrahaṇam anarthakam parimāṇāntasya iti kṛtatvāt . saṃvatsaragrahaṇam anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13876_0: kim kāraṇam . parimāṇāntasya iti kṛtatvāt . parimāṇāntasya asañjñāśāṇayoḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:13876_1: siddham . jñāpakam tu kālaparimāṇānām vṛddhipratiṣedhasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13876_2: ācāryaḥ kālaparimāṇānām vṛddhiḥ na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13877: bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam . na asti atra viśeṣaḥ satyām vā
GS24pmbhasuu:13878: uttarapadavṛddhau asatyām vā . idam tarhi . dvasamikaḥ , traisamikaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13879_0: idam ca api prayojanam dvairātrikaḥ , trairātrikaḥ . nanu ca uktam na asti atra viśeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13879_1: satyām vā uttarapadavṛddhau asatyām vā iti . ayam asti viśeṣaḥ . yadi atra uttarapadavṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13879_2: syāt acām ādeḥ vṛddhiḥ na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:13880_0: aparaḥ āha : jñāpakam tu kālaparimāṇānām parimāṇāgrahaṇasya . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13880_1: ācāryaḥ kālaparimāṇānām parimāṇagrahaṇena grahaṇam na bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:13880_2: prayojanam . aparimāṇabistācitakambalyebhyaḥ na taddhitaluki dvivarṣā , trivarṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:13882_0: (P_7,3.28) KA_III,322.2-6 Ro_V,202.2-7 parasya vṛddhiḥ na iti anuvartate utāho na
GS24pmbhasuu:13882_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate pravāhaṇeyī bhāryā asya iti pravāhaṇeyībhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13882_2: iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam na doṣaḥ bhavati . yathā na
GS24pmbhasuu:13883: atha vā punaḥ astu anuvartate . nanu ca uktam pravāhaṇeyī bhāryā asya
GS24pmbhasuu:13884: pravāhaṇeyībhāryaḥ vṛddhinimittasya iti puṃvadbhāvapratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . mā bhūt evam . jāteḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13885: (P_7,3.31) KA_III,322.8-11 Ro_V,202.9-203.3 ayam yogaḥ śakyaḥ avaktum
GS24pmbhasuu:13887_0: yadā tāvat pūrvapadasya vṛddhiḥ tadā evam vigrahaḥ kariṣyate . na yathātathā , ayathātathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13887_1: . ayathātathābhāvaḥ āyathātathyam . yadā uttarapadasya vṛddhiḥ tadā evam vigrahaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13887_2: kariṣyate . yathātathābhāvaḥ yāthātathyam . na yāthātathyam ayāthātathyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13889: pratiṣedhaḥ . hanteḥ takāre taddhite pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vārtraghnam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13890: bhrauṇaghnam . uktam vā . kim uktam . dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye
GS24pmbhasuu:13892_0: (P_7,3.33) KA_III,322.18-323.4 Ro_V,203.10-204.2 kṛdgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:13892_1: . dadau , dadhau . na etat asti prayojanam . aciṇṇaloḥ iti vartate . yadi aciṇṇaloḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13892_2: iti vartate adāyi , adhāyi iti atra na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13893: vacanāt ciṇi bhaviṣyati . aciṇṇaloḥ iti vartate . evam api cauḍiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13894: bālākiḥ iti atra prāpnoti . lopaḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . idam iha sampradhāryam . lopaḥ kriyatām yuk iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt yuk .
GS24pmbhasuu:13895: evam tarhi acām ādeḥ iti vartate . yatra acām ādiḥ ākāraḥ tatra yuk iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13896: evam api jñā devatā asya sthālīpākasya jñaḥ sthālīpākaḥ , atra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13898: (P_7,3.34) KA_III,323.5-7 Ro_V,204.4-5 atyalpam idam ucyate : anācameḥ iti . avamikamicamīnām iti vaktavyam : vāmaḥ , kāmaḥ , ācāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13899: (P_7,3.37) KA_III,323.9-12 Ro_V,204.6-10 ṇicprakaraṇe dhūñprīñoḥ nugvacanam . ṇicprakaraṇe dhūñprīñoḥ nuk vaktavyaḥ . dhūnayati , prīṇayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13902_0: idam vicārayiṣyate ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam vā syāt varṇagrahaṇam vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13902_1: . tat yadā saṅghatagrahaṇam tadā sthagrahaṇam kartavyam iha api yathā syāt kārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:13902_2: , hārikā . yadā hi varṇagrahaṇam tadā kevalaḥ kakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13903: pratyayaḥ na asti iti kṛtvā vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha asupaḥ iti katham idam vijñāyate . asubvataḥ aṅgasya iti . āhosvit na cet supaḥ paraḥ āp iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13904: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate asubvataḥ aṅgasya iti bahucarmikā atra na prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate na cet supaḥ paraḥ āp iti na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13906: (P_7,3.44.2) KA_III,323.22-324.18 Ro_V,206-208 idam vicāryate : ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam vā syāt varṇagrahaṇam vā iti . kaḥ ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:13907: viśeṣaḥ . ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam cet etikāsu aprāptiḥ . ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam cet etikāsvu aprāptiḥ . etikāḥ caranti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13908: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . kārikā , hārikā . astu tarhi varṇagrahaṇam . varṇagrahaṇam cet vyavahitatvāt aprasiddhiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13909_0: varṇagrahaṇam cet vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . kārikā , hārikā . akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13909_1: na prāpnoti . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13909_2: iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . evam tarhi āha ayam pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13910: tatra vacanāt bhaviṣyati . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet rathakaṭyādiṣu atiprasaṅgaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet rathakaṭyādiṣu doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13911: rathakaṭyā , gargakāmyā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na avyavadhānam varṇena ekena .
GS24pmbhasuu:13912_0: saṅghātena punaḥ vyavadhānam bhavati na bhavati ca . atha vā punaḥ astu saṅghātagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13912_1: . nanu ca uktam ittve kagrahaṇam saṅghātagrahaṇam cet etikāsu aprāptiḥ iti . parihṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13912_2: etat vacanāt bhaviṣyati iti . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim . kārikā
GS24pmbhasuu:13912_3: , hārikā iti . atra api ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:13913: ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13914: jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakānām api ittvam iti yat ayam na yāsayoḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:13916: upasaṅkhyānam apratyayasthatvāt . mamaka(R: māmaka)narakayoḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . māmikā , narikā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13917_0: apratyayasthatvāt . tyaktyapoḥ ca pratiṣiddhatvāt . tyaktyapoḥ ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13917_1: . dākṣiṇātyikā , amātyikā . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . pratiṣiddhatvāt . udīcām
GS24pmbhasuu:13919: vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . yakām yakām adhīte , takām takām pacāmahe
GS24pmbhasuu:13920: iti . pratiṣedhe tyakanaḥ upasaṅkhyānam . pratiṣedhe tyakanaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . upatyakā , adhityakā . tat tarhi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13921: kartavyam . na kartavyam . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na evañjātīyakānām ittvam bhavati iti yat ayam mṛdaḥ tikan iti ittvabhūtam nirdeśam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13922: pāvakādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . pāvakādīnām chandasi upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13923: kartavyam . hiraṇyavarṇāḥ śrucayaḥ pāvakāḥ , ṛkṣakāḥ , alomakāḥ . chandasi iti kimartham . pāvikā , alomikā . āśiṣi ca . āśiṣi ca upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:13924: kartavyam . jīvatāt jīvakā , nandatāt nandakā , bhavatāt bhavakā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13925: uttarapadalope ca . uttarapadalope ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13926: devadattikā , devakā , yajñadattikā , yajñakā . kṣipakādīnām ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:13927: kṣipakādīnām ca upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . kṣipakā , dhruvakā , dhuvakā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13928_0: tārakā jyotiṣi . tārakā jyotiṣi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . tārakā . jyotiṣi iti kimartham
GS24pmbhasuu:13928_1: . tārikā dāsī . varṇakā tānave . varṇakā tāntave upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . varṇakā
GS24pmbhasuu:13928_2: . tāntave iti kimartham . varṇikā bhāgurī lokāyatasya . vartakā śakunau prācām .
GS24pmbhasuu:13929: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . vartakā śakuniḥ . śakunau iti kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:13930: vartikā bhāgurī lokāyatasya . prācām iti kimartham . vartikā . aṣṭakā pitṛdevatye . aṣṭakā pitṛdevatye upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aṣṭakā .
GS24pmbhasuu:13931: pitṛdevatye iti kimartham . aṣṭikā khārī . vā sūtakāputrakāvṛndārakāṇām .
GS24pmbhasuu:13932: vā sūtakāputrakāvṛndārakāṇām upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . sūtakā , sūtikā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13934_0: (P_7,3.46) KA_III,326.11-16 Ro_V,211.2-7 kimartham strīliṅganirdeśaḥ kriyate na yakapūrvasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13934_1: iti eva ucyeta . strīviṣayaḥ yaḥ ākāraḥ tasya sthāne yaḥ akāraḥ tasya pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13934_2: yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . śubham yāti iti śubhaṃyāḥ śubhaṃyikā , bhadraṃyikā . yakapūrve
GS24pmbhasuu:13934_3: dhātvantapratiṣedhaḥ yakapūrve dhātvantapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13936_0: (P_7,3.47) KA_III,326.18-327.3 Ro_V,211.9-212.3 eṣādve nañpūrve anudāharaṇe asupaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13936_1: iti pratiṣedhāt . atha bhastrāgrahaṇam kimartham na abhāṣitapuṃskāt iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13939: nañpūrvagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . uttarapadamātrasya idvacanāt . uttarapadamātrasya ittvam vaktavyam . nirbhastrakā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:13942: varṇagrahaṇam āhosvit saṅghātagrahaṇam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ . ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam cet
GS24pmbhasuu:13943: dhātvantasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . paṭhitā , paṭhitum . astu tarhi saṅghātagrahaṇam . saṅghātagrahaṇam cet aṇādimāthitikādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_0: saṅghātagrahaṇam cet uṇādimāthitikādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . uṇādīnām tāvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_1: kaṇṭhaḥ , vaṇṭhaḥ , śaṇṭhaḥ . iha ca mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ iti akāralope
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_2: kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti . varṅagrahaṇe punaḥ sati alvidhiḥ ayam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_3: . tasmāt viśiṣṭagrahaṇam . tasmāt viśiṣṭasya ṭhakārasya grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_4: . astu tāvat varṇagrahaṇam . nanu ca uktam ṭhādeśe varṇagrahaṇam cet dhātvantasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_5: pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti vartate . na vā aṅgāt iti pañcamī asti
GS24pmbhasuu:13944_6: . evam tarhi pratyayasthasya iti vartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13945_0: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ataḥ it āpi asupaḥ iti . tat vai pañcamīnirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena
GS24pmbhasuu:13945_1: ca iha arthaḥ . arthāt vibhaktivipariṇāmaḥ bhaviṣyati . tat yathā . uccāni devadattasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13945_2: gṛhāṇi āmantrayasva enam . devadattam iti gamyate . devadattasya gāvaḥ aśvāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13946: hiraṇyam . āḍhyaḥ vaidhaveyaḥ . devadattaḥ iti gamyate . purastāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt prathamānirdiṣṭam dvitīyānirdiṣṭam ca bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13947: evam iha api purastāt pañcamīnirdiṣṭam sat arthāt ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭam bhaviṣyati . evam api uṇādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13948: uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . evam api karmaṭhaḥ iti atra prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13949: . evam tarhi aṅgasya iti sambandhaṣaṣṭhī vijñāsyate . aṅgasya yaḥ ṭhakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13950: . kim ca aṅgasya ṭhakāraḥ . nimittam . yasmin aṅgam iti etat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13951: kasmin ca etat bhavati . pratyaye . atha vā punaḥ astu saṅghātagrahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13952: nanu ca uktam saṅghātagrahaṇam cet uṇādimāthitikādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ iti uṇādīnām tāvat pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ . parihṛtam etat uṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13953_0: avyutpannāni prātipadikāni iti . yat api ucyate iha ca mathitam paṇyam asya māthitikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13953_1: iti akāralope kṛte tāntāt iti kādeśaḥ prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . akāralopasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13954: pūrvavidhau sthānivadbhāvaḥ na ca ayam pūrvavidhiḥ . ayam api pūrvavidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13955: . pūrvasmāt api vidhiḥ pūrvavidhiḥ iti . atha api uṇādayaḥ vyutpādyante evam api na doṣaḥ . kriyate nyāse eva viśiṣṭagrahaṇam ṭhasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13956_0: (P_7,3.51) KA_III, 329.7-9 Ro_V,215.3-5 iha kasmāt na bhavati . āśiṣā tarati āśiṣikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13956_1: , uṣā tarati auṣikaḥ . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . atha iha
GS24pmbhasuu:13957: dauṣkaḥ iti bhavitavyam . katham . yadi varṇaikadeśāḥ varṇagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:13959_0: (P_7,3.54) KA_III,329.11-330.16 Ro_V,215.7-217.13 kim idam ñṇinnakāragrahaṇam hantiviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:13959_1: : ñṇinnakāraparasya hanteḥ yaḥ hakāraḥ iti . āhosvit hakāraviśeṣaṇam : ñṇinnakāraparasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13959_2: hakārasya saḥ cet hanteḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre
GS24pmbhasuu:13959_3: aprasiddhiḥ hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . ghnanti , ghnantu , aghnan
GS24pmbhasuu:13960: . astu tarhi hakāraviśeṣaṇam . hakārasya iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13961: hakārasya iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ . ghātayati ghātakaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13962: nakāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13963: prāpnoti . hananam icchati hananīyate hananīyateḥ ṇvul hananīyakaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13964: sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13965: nakāre aprasiddhiḥ . ghnanti , ghnantu . vacanāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13966: vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ . vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . hantā , hantum . nakāragrahaṇasāmarthyāt alope na
GS24pmbhasuu:13967: bhaviṣyati . asti anyat nakāragrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:13968: śrūyamāṇaviśeṣaṇam . yatra nakāraḥ śrūyate tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:13969: . hataḥ hathaḥ iti . siddham tu upadhālope iti vacanāt . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:13970: katham . upadhālope ca iti vaktavyam . sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13971_0: yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam hanteḥ tatparasya iti cet nakāre aprasiddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13971_1: iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu hakāraviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam hakārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13971_2: iti cet ñṇiti aprāptiḥ iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam iha api vacanāt prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:13972: yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . na ca kva cit dhātvavayavena avyavadhānam etena punaḥ saṅghātena vyavadhānam bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:13973: ca bhavati . yat api ucyate sthānivadbhāvāt ca acaḥ nakāre aprasiddhiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13974_0: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti cet alope pratiṣedhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13974_1: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate hakārasya nakāraḥ iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:13975: anānantaryam kva cit ca na sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . lope sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam alope na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13976: yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13978_0: abhyāsāt kutvam asupaḥ iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . hananam icchati hananīyati hananīyateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13978_1: san jihananīyiṣati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . hanteḥ abhyāsāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13978_2: ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ abhyāsaḥ . hanteḥ eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13979: aṅgasya yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate na ca eṣaḥ hanteḥ aṅgasya abhyāsaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13980: . hanteḥ aṅgasya eṣaḥ abhyāsaḥ . katham . ekācaḥ dve prathamasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13981: evam tarhi yasmin hantiḥ aṅgam tasmin yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt iti ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:13982: yasmin ca atra hantiḥ aṅgam na tasmin abhyāsaḥ yasmin ca abhyāsaḥ na tasmin hantiḥ aṅgam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:13984: prājīhayat dūtam . heḥ caṅi pratiṣedhānarthakyam aṅgānyatvāt . heḥ caṅi pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . aṅgānyatvāt . ṇyantam etat aṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:13985: anyat bhavati . lope kṛte na aṅgānyatvam . sthānivadbhāvāt aṅgānyatvam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:13986: . jñāpakam tu anytra ṇyadhikasya kutvavijñānārtham . evam tarhi jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:13987: ācāryaḥ anyatra ṇyadhikasya kutvam bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane
GS24pmbhasuu:13988: prayojanam . prajighāyayiṣati iti atra kutvam siddham bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:13990_0: . jigrahaṇe jyaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . jijyatuḥ , jijyuḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13990_1: vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti evam etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:13990_2: na bhaviṣyati . sā tarhi eṣā paribhaṣā kartavyā . avaśyam kartavyā adhyāpya gataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13992_0: aniṭaḥ kutvavacanāt . kvādyajivrajiyācirucīnām apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13992_1: apratiṣedhaḥ . kutvam kasmāt na bhavati . niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvavacanāt . niṣṭhāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13992_2: aniṭaḥ kutvam vakṣyāmi seṭaḥ ca ete niṣṭhāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:13993_0: yadi niṣṭhāyām aniṭaḥ kutvam ucyate katham śokaḥ samudraḥ iti . śucyubjyoḥ ghañi
GS24pmbhasuu:13993_1: kutvam . śucyubjyoḥ ghañi kutvam vaktavyam . katham arkaḥ . arceḥ kavidhānāt siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:13993_2: . na etat ghañantam . auṇādikaḥ eṣaḥ kaśabdaḥ tasmin āṣṭamikam kutvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:13994_0: (P_7,3.61) KA_III,332.4-10 Ro_V,221.2-8 bhujaḥ pāṇau . bhujaḥ pāṇau iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:13994_1: . katham nyubjaḥ upatāpe iti . nyubjeḥ kartṛtvāt apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13995_0: bhavati . kartṛtvāt . na etat ghañantam . kartṛpratyayaḥ eṣaḥ . nyubjati iti nyubjaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:13995_1: . adhikaraṇasādhanaḥ vai lakṣyate ghañ . nyubjitāḥ śerate asmin nyubjaḥ upatāpe iti
GS24pmbhasuu:13995_2: . eṣaḥ api hi kartṛsādhanaḥ eva . nyubjayati iti nyubjaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:13996_0: (P_7,3.66) KA_III,332.12-21 Ro_V,221.10-222.8 pravacigrahaṇam anarthakam vacaḥ aśabdasañjñābhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:13996_1: . pravacigrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . vaco'śabdasañjñābhāvāt . vaco'śabdasañjñāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:13996_2: pratiṣedhaḥ ucyate prapūrvaḥ ca vaciḥ aśabdasañjñāyām vartate . upasarganiyamārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:13996_3: tarhi idam vaktavyam . prapūrvasya eva vaceḥ aśabdasañjñāyām pratiṣedhaḥ yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:13997: syāt . iha mā bhūt . avivākyam iti . upasargapūrvaniyamārtham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:13998_0: avivākyasya viśeṣavacanat siddham . viśeṣe etat vaktavyam . avivākyam ahaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:13998_1: kva mā bhūt . avivācyam eva anyat iti . ṇyapratiṣedhe tyajeḥ upasaṅkhyānam . ṇyapratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:14000: bhojyam abhyavahārye iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . bhojyaḥ sūpaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14001: bhojyā yavāgūḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . bhakṣiḥ ayam kharaviśade vartate tena drave na prāpnoti . na avaśyam bhakṣiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14002: kharaviśade eva vartate . kim tarhi anyatra api vartate . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14004_0: (P_7,3.70) KA_III,333.8-10 Ro_V,223.2-4 vā iti śakyam avaktum . kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14004_1: . tat agniḥ agnaye dadāt . astu atra lopaḥ āṭaḥ śravaṇam bhaviṣyati tena ubhayam
GS24pmbhasuu:14004_2: sidhyati . dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe , dadāt ratnāni dāśuṣe .
GS24pmbhasuu:14005_0: (P_7,3.71) KA_III,333.12-20 Ro_V,223.6-224.1 [otaḥ śiti] . otaḥ śiti iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14005_1: . kim prayojanam . uttaratra śidgrahaṇābhāvāya . tatra ayam api arthaḥ ṣṭhivuklamvācamām
GS24pmbhasuu:14005_2: śiti iti śidgrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14006_0: nanu ca bhoḥ śyangrahaṇam api tarhi uttarārtham kartavyam . śamām aṣṭānām dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14006_1: śyani iti śyangrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . atra api astu śiti iti eva . yadi śiti
GS24pmbhasuu:14006_2: iti ucyate anu tvā indraḥ bhramatu madatu atra api prāpnoti . śamādibhiḥ atra śitam
GS24pmbhasuu:14007: kaḥ ca śamādīnām śit . śamādibhyaḥ yaḥ vihitaḥ . evam api tasyati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14008: yasyati atra prāpnoti . aṣṭānām iti vacanāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14010: dīrghatvam āṅi camaḥ iti vaktavyam . ācāmati . iha mā bhūt . uccamati ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14012_0: (P_7,3.77) KA_III,334.6-12 Ro_V,224.7-13 iṣeḥ chatvam ahali . iṣeḥ chatvam ahali
GS24pmbhasuu:14012_1: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . iṣṇāti , iṣyati . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14012_2: . aci iti vartate . evam api iṣāṇa iti atra prāpnoti . atha ahali iti ucyamāne kasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14012_3: eva atra chatvam na bhavati . na evam vijñāyate na hal ahal ahali iti . katham tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14012_4: . avidyamānaḥ hal asmin saḥ ayam ahal ahali iti . yadi evam aci iti api vartamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:14013: na hi acā śit viśeṣyate . śiti bhavati katarsmin aci iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14014: śitā ac viśeṣyate . aci bhavati katarsmin śiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14015_0: (P_7,3.78) KA_III,334.15-20 Ro_V,225.3-8 pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14015_1: vaktavyaḥ . pibati . laghūpadhaguṇaḥ prāpnoti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14015_2: na vaktavyaḥ . guṇaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . pibiḥ adantaḥ . adante iti cet uktam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:14015_3: uktam . dhātoḥ ante iti cet anudāttecabagrahaṇam iti . atha vā aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:14015_4: avidhiḥ niṣṭhitasya iti evam na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14017_0: jñājanoḥ jaḥ iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : jānāti , jāyate . ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi
GS24pmbhasuu:14017_1: iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat dīrghoccāraṇam karoti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:14017_2: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punarvṛttau avidhiḥ iti . kim etasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14017_3: jñāpane prayojanam . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14018_0: (P_7,3.83) KA_III,335.8-16 Ro_V,226 jusi guṇe yāsuṭpratiṣedhaḥ . jusi guṇe yāsuḍādau
GS24pmbhasuu:14018_1: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . cinuyuḥ , sunuyuḥ iti . na vaktavyaḥ . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14018_2: mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14019: mideḥ guṇaḥ ajusi ca iti . kim idam ajusi iti . ajādau usi ajusi iti . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . cakruḥ , jahruḥ iti . evam tarhi śiti iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14020: evam api ajuhavuḥ , abibhayuḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati na hi us śidbhūtapūrvaḥ . us śidbhūtapūrvaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:14021: asti iti kṛtvā usi yaḥ śidbhūtapūrvaḥ tasmin bhaviṣyati . atha vā kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14022: nyāse eva . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . na evam vijñāyate mideḥ guṇaḥ jusi ca iti . katham tarhi . mideḥ guṇaḥ u jusi iti . kim idam u jusi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14023: ukārādau jusi . atha vā aci iti vartate tena jusam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ . ajādau jusi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14025: jāgarakaḥ iti guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ciṇṇaloḥ pratiṣedhasāmarthyāt anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14026: guṇabhūtasya vṛddhipratiṣedhaḥ . yat ayam aciṇṇaloḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:14027_0: tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na guṇābhinirvṛttasya vṛddhiḥ bhavati iti . kim punaḥ ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:14027_1: paryudāsaḥ : yat anyat viciṇṇalṅidbhyaḥ iti . āhosvit prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ :
GS24pmbhasuu:14027_2: viciṇṇalṅitsu na iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14028: prasajyapratiṣedhe jusiguṇapratiṣedhaprasaṅgaḥ . prasajyapratiṣedhe jusiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ajāgaruḥ . uttame ca ṇali .
GS24pmbhasuu:14029_0: prasajyapratiṣedhe jusiguṇapratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ajāgaruḥ . na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14029_1: . na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anantarasya pratiṣedhāt . anantaram yat guṇavidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14029_2: tasya pratiṣedhaḥ . jusi pūrveṇa guṇavidhānam . jusi pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate jusi
GS24pmbhasuu:14030_0: na vā anantarasya pratiṣedhāt iti eva . ṇali ca pūrveṇa guṇaḥ vidhīyate sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14030_1: iti . atha vā punaḥ astu paryudāsaḥ . ataḥ anyatra vidhāne vau aguṇatvam . ataḥ anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14030_2: vidhāne vau aguṇatvam . na vā paryudāsasāmarthyāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14030_3: . paryudāsasāmarthyāt atra guṇaḥ na bhaviṣyati . asti anyat paryudāse prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14031: kvibartham paryudāsaḥ syāt . śuddhaparasya viśabdasya pratiṣedhe grahaṇam anunāsikaparaḥ ca kvau viśabdaḥ . vasvartham tarhi paryudāsaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14032: jāgṛvāṃsaḥ anu gman . katham punaḥ veḥ paryudāsaḥ ucyamānaḥ vasvarthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14033: śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt vasvartham iti vijñāsyate . vasvartham iti cet na sārvadhātukatvāt siddham . vasvartham iti cet na . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14034: sārvadhātukatvāt siddham . katham sārvadhātukasañjñā . chāndasaḥ kvasuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14035: liṭ ca chandasi sārvadhātukam api bhavati . tatra sārvadhātukam apin ṅit iti ṅittvāt paryudāsaḥ bhaviṣyati . atha vā vakārasya eva idam aśaktijena
GS24pmbhasuu:14037_0: (P_7,3.86) KA_III,337.5-338.12 Ro_V,229.5-232.4 saṃyoge gurusañjñāyām guṇaḥ bhettuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14037_1: na sidhyati . saṃyoge gurusañjñāyām bhettā , bhettum iti guṇaḥ na prāpnoti . vidhyapekṣam
GS24pmbhasuu:14037_2: laghoḥ ca asau . vidhyapekṣam laghugrahaṇam kṛtam laghoḥ ca asau vihitaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14038_0: kuṇḍitā , huṇḍitā atra kasmāt na bhavati . dhātoḥ numaḥ . dhātoḥ numvidhau uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14038_1: tatra dhātugrahaṇasya prayojanam dhātūpadeśāvasthāyām eva num bhavati iti . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14039_0: āścaryaḥ rāgaḥ , vicitraḥ rāgaḥ . syandiśranthyoḥ nipātanāt . yat ayam syandiśranthyoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14039_1: avṛddhyartham nipātanam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām vṛddhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14040: sidhyataḥ . anaṅlopaḥ . dadhnā , sakthnā . śidīrghatvam . kuṇḍāni , vanāni
GS24pmbhasuu:14041: . evam tarhi abhyastasya yat āha aci . yat ayam na abhyastasya aci piti
GS24pmbhasuu:14042_0: sārvadhātuke iti ajgrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:14042_1: guṇaḥ iti . laṅartham tat kṛtam bhavet . laṅartham etat syāt . anena ik . knusunoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14042_2: yat kṛtam kittvam jñāpakam syāt laghoḥ guṇe .
GS24pmbhasuu:14043: yat ayam trasigṛdhidhṛṣikṣipeḥ knuḥ ikaḥ jhal halantāt ca iti knusanau kitau karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati evañjātīyakānām guṇaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14044: saṃyoge gurusañjñāyām guṇaḥ bhettuḥ na sidhyati , vidhyapekṣam laghoḥ ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14045_0: asau katham kuṇḍiḥ na duṣyati . dhātoḥ numaḥ katham rañjeḥ syandiśranthyoḥ nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14045_1: , anaṅlopaśidīrghatve vidhyapekṣe na sidhyataḥ . abhyastasya yat āha aci laṅartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14045_2: tat kṛtam bhavet , knusunoḥ yat kṛtam kittvam jñāpakam syāt laghoḥ guṇe .
GS24pmbhasuu:14046: (P_7,3.87) KA_III,338.14-26 Ro_V,232.6-233.4 abhyastānām upadhāhrasvatvam aci paspaśāte , cākaśīmi , vāvaśatīḥ iti darśanāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14047: abhyastānām upadhāhrasvatvam aci vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . paspaśāte ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14048: cākaśīmi . vāvaśatīḥ iti prayogaḥ dṛśyate . kapotaḥ śaradam paspaśāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:14049: aham bhuvanam cākaśīmi . vāvaśatīḥ ut ājat iti . bahulam chandasi ānuṣak
GS24pmbhasuu:14050: jujoṣat iti darśanāt . bahulam chandasi vaktavyam upadhāhrasvatvam . kim prayojanam . ānuṣak jujoṣat iti darśanāt . yaḥ te ātityam ānuṣak jujoṣat .
GS24pmbhasuu:14051: yadi upadhāhrasvatvam ucyate , priyām mayūraḥ pratinarnṛtīti yadvat tvam naravara narnṛtīṣi hṛṣṭaḥ , atra guṇaḥ prāpnoti . tasmāt na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14052: upadhāhrasvatvena . kasmāt na bhavati . paspaśāte , cākaśīmi , vāvaśatīḥ iti . spaśikaśivaśayaḥ prakṛtyantarāṇi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14053: (P_7,3.88) KA_III,339.2-7 Ro_V,233.6-11 bhūsuvoḥ pratiṣedhe ekājgrahaṇam bobhavītyartham . bhūsuvoḥ pratiṣedhe ekājgrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14054: . kim prayojanam . bobhavītyartham . iha mā bhūt . bobhavīti . yadi ekājgrahaṇam kriyate abhūt atra na prāpnoti . kva tarhi syāt . mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14055: tasmāt na arthaḥ ekājgrahaṇena . kasmāt na bhavati . bobhavīti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14056: bobhūtu iti etat niyamārtham bhaviṣyati . atra eva yaṅlugantasya guṇaḥ na bhavati na anyatra iti . kva mā bhūt . bobhavīti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14058: tṛheḥ im bhavati iti eva ucyeta . tṛṇahigrahaṇam śnamimoḥ vyavasthārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14059: tṛṇahigrahaṇam śnami kṛte im yathā syāt . tṛhigrahaṇe hi imviṣaye
GS24pmbhasuu:14060: śnamabhāvaḥ anavakāśatvāt . tṛhigrahaṇe hi sati imviṣaye śnamaḥ abhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14061_0: syāt . kim kāraṇam . anavakāśatvāt . anavakāśaḥ im śnamam bādheta . idam ayuktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14061_1: vartate . kim atra ayuktam . tṛṇahigrahaṇam śnamimoḥ vyavasthārtham iti uktvā tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14062_0: anavakāśatvāt iti . tatra vaktavyam tṛṇahigrahaṇam śnamimoḥ bhāvāya tṛhigrahaṇe hi
GS24pmbhasuu:14062_1: imviṣeye śnamabhāvaḥ anavakāśatvāt iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . vyavasthārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14062_2: iti eva siddham na hi asataḥ vyavasthā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14063_0: (P_7,3.95) KA_III,339.20-22 Ro_V,234.14-235.1 sārvadhātuke iti vartamāne punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14063_1: kimartham . punaḥ sārvadhātukagrahaṇam apidartham . apidarthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . adhrigo
GS24pmbhasuu:14064: (P_7,3.103) KA_III,340.2-5 Ro_V,235.3-7 ataḥ dīrghāt bahuvacane ettvam vipratiṣedhena . ataḥ dīrghāt bahuvacane ettvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14065: ataḥ dīrghaḥ yañi supi ca iti asya avakāśaḥ . vṛkṣābhyām , plakṣābhyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:14066: bahuvacane jhali et iti asya avakāśaḥ . vṛkṣeṣu , plakṣeṣu . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . vṛkṣebhyaḥ , plakṣebhyaḥ . ettvam bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14067: (P_7,3.107) KA_III,340.7-16 Ro_V,235.9-236.3 ḍalakavatīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ambāḍe , ambāle , ambike . talhrasvatvam vā ṅisambuddhyoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14068: talhrasvatvam vā ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti vaktavyam . devata , devate . devatāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14069: , devate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . saḥ katham na
GS24pmbhasuu:14070: vaktavyaḥ bhavati . ambārtham dvyakṣaram yadi . yadi ambārtham dvyakṣaram
GS24pmbhasuu:14071: gṛhyate . tat tarhi hrasvatvam vaktavyam . avaśyam chandasi hrasvatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14072: vaktavyam upagāyantu mām patnayaḥ garbhiṇayaḥ yuvatayaḥ iti evam artham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14073: mātṝṇām mātac putrārtham arhate . mātṝṇām mātajādeśaḥ vaktavyaḥ putrārtham arhate . gārgīmāta , vātsīmāta .
GS24pmbhasuu:14074: (P_7,3.108) KA_III,340.18-341.2 Ro_V,236.5-12 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14075: nadi, kumāri , kiśori , brāhmaṇi , brahmabandhu . hrasvavacanasāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14076: asti anyat hrasvavacane prayojanam pṛthagvibhaktim mā uccīcaram iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14077: śakyam pṛthagvibhaktiḥ anuccārayitum . katham . evam ayam brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14078: ambārthānām hrasvaḥ nadīhrasvayoḥ guṇaḥ iti . yadi evam ucyate jasi ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14079: atra nadyāḥ api guṇaḥ prāpnoti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14080: ambārthanadyoḥ hrasvaḥ . tataḥ hrasvasya . hrasvasya ca hrasvaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14081: kimartham idam . guṇam vakṣyati tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ guṇaḥ . guṇaḥ ca bhavati hrasvasya iti . atha vā hrasvasya guṇaḥ iti atra ambārthanadyoḥ hrasvaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14083: prāk ṇau caṅi upadhāyāḥ . jasādiṣu chandasi vā iti vaktavyam . kim aviśeṣeṇa . na iti āha . prāk ṇau caṅyupadhāyāḥ . kim prayojanam . ambe,
GS24pmbhasuu:14084: darvi , śatakratvaḥ , paśve nṛbhyaḥ , kikidīvyā . ambe , amba , darvi ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14085: darve , śatakravaḥ śatakratavaḥ , paśve , paśave , kikidīvyā , kikidīvinā
GS24pmbhasuu:14087_0: ṅīsārvadhātuke pratiṣedhaḥ . gheḥ ṅiti guṇavidhāne ṅīsārvadhātuke pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14087_1: . paṭvī , mṛdvī , kurutaḥ iti . subadhikārāt siddham . sup iti vartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14087_2: . supi ca bahuvacane jhali et iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14089: atimālāya iti hrasvatve kṛte sthānivadbhāvāt yāṭ prāpnoti tasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . yāḍvidhāne atikhaṭvāya iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14090: apratiṣedhaḥ hrasvādeśatvāt . yāḍvidhāne atikhaṭvāya , atimālāya iti apratiṣedhaḥ . anarthakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ apratiṣedhaḥ . yāṭ kasmāt na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14091_0: . hrasvādeśatvāt . hrasvādeśaḥ ayam . uktam etat ṅyābgrahaṇe adīrghaḥ iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:14091_1: idānīm asati api sthānivadbhāve dīrghatve kṛte āp ca asau bhūtapūrvaḥ iti kṛtvā yāṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:14091_2: kasmāt na bhavati . lakṣaṇapratipadoktayoḥ pratipadoktasya eva iti . nanu ca idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:14091_3: sati api sthānivadbhāve etayā paribhāṣayā śakyam upasthātum . na iti āha . na ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14092: (P_7,3.116) KA_III,342.7-12 Ro_V,239.2-7 idudbhyām āmvidhānam auttvasya paratvāt . idudbhyām ām vidheyaḥ . śakaṭyām , paddhatyām ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14093: dhenvām iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . auttvasya paratvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14094_0: paratvāt auttvam prāpnoti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṅeḥ ām
GS24pmbhasuu:14094_1: nadyāmnībhyaḥ . tataḥ idudbhyām . idudbhyām uttarasya ṅeḥ ām bhavati iti . śakaṭyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14094_2: , paddhatyām , dhenvām iti . tataḥ aut at ca gheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14095: (P_7,3.118-119) KA_III,342.14-343.9 Ro_V,239.9-241.1 auttve yogavibhāgaḥ . auttve yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . aut . aut bhavati idudbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14096: . tataḥ at ca gheḥ . akāraḥ ca bhavati gheḥ iti . kimarthaḥ yogavibhāgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14097: sakhipatibhyām auttvārthaḥ . sakhipatibhyām auttvam yathā syāt . sakhyau ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14098: patyau . ekayoge hi aprāptiḥ attvasanniyogāt . ekayoge hi sati auttvasya aprāptiḥ . kim kāraṇam . attvasanniyogāt . attvasanniyogena auttvam ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14099: tena yatra eva auttvam syāt . na vā akārasya anvācayavacanāt yathā kyaṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:14100: salopaḥ . na vā artha auttve yogavibhāgena . kim kāraṇam . akārasya anvācayavacanāt . pradhānaśiṣṭam auttvam anvācayaśiṣṭam attvam yathā kyaṅi
GS24pmbhasuu:14101: salopaḥ . tat yathā . pradhānaśiṣṭaḥ kyaṅ prātipadikamātrāt bhavati yatra ca skāraḥ tatra lopaḥ . attve ṭāppratiṣedhaḥ . attve ṭāpaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14102: vaktavyaḥ . śakaṭau , paddhatau , dhenau . attve kṛte ṭāp prāpnoti . na vā sannipātalakṣaṇasya animittatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14104: tadvighātasya iti ṭāp na bhaviṣyati . ḍitkaraṇāt vā . atha vā ḍit āukāraḥ kariṣyate . au ḍit ca gheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14106: ucyate na āṅaḥ nā puṃsi iti eva ucyeta . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : trapuṇā , jatunā
GS24pmbhasuu:14107: . numā siddham . na evam śakyam . iha hi amunā brāhmaṇakulena iti mubhāvasya asiddhatvāt num na syāt . astriyām iti punaḥ ucyamāne na doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14108: bhavati . katham . vakṣyati etat na mu ṭādeśe .
GS24pmbhasuu:14110: na caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti eva ucyeta . caṅi upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne , alīlavat , apīpavat , ūkārasya eva hrasvatvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:14111: . na etat asti prayojanam . vṛddhiḥ atra bādhikā bhaviṣyati . vṛddhau tarhi kṛtāyām aukārasya eva hrasvatvam prasajyeta . na etat asti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14112_0: antaraṅgatvāt atra āvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . na hi idānīm hrasvabhāvinī upadhā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14112_1: . tasmāt ṇigrahaṇam kartavyam . atha caṅgrahaṇam kimartham na ṇau upadhāyāḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14112_2: siddham . ṇau upadhāyāḥ hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14113: kārayati , hārayati iti atra api prasajyeta . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14114: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na ṇau eva hrasvatvam bhavati iti yat ayam mitām hrasvatvam śāsti . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . acīkarat , ajīharat .
GS24pmbhasuu:14115: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi vacanāt prāpnoti . kārayati , hārayati
GS24pmbhasuu:14116_0: . tasmāt caṅgrahaṇam kartavyam . atha upadhāgrahaṇam kimartham . ṇau caṅi upadhāgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14116_1: antyapratiṣedhārtham . ṇau caṅi upadhāgrahaṇam kriyate antyasya hrastvatvam mā bhūt
GS24pmbhasuu:14116_2: . ṇau caṅi hrasvaḥ iti iyati ucyamāne ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14117: alīlavat , apīpavat , antyasya eva hrasvatvam prasajyeta . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14118: prayojanam . antaraṅgatvāt atra āvādeśaḥ bhavati . na hi idānīm
GS24pmbhasuu:14119: hrasvabhāvī antyaḥ asti . antyaḥ hrasvabhāvī na asti iti kṛtvā vacanāt anantyasya bhaviṣyati . iha api vacanāt prāpnoti . acakāṅkṣat , avavāñchat
GS24pmbhasuu:14120: . yena na avyavadhānam tena vyavahite api vacanaprāmāṇyāt . kena ca na
GS24pmbhasuu:14121: avyavadhānam . varṇena . etena punaḥ saṅghatena vayvadhānam bhavati na
GS24pmbhasuu:14122: bhavati ca . uttarārtham tarhi upadhāgrahaṇam kartavyam . lopaḥ pibateḥ ī
GS24pmbhasuu:14123_0: ca abhyāsasya upadhāyāḥ yathā syāt . apīpyat , apīpyatām , apīpyan . atha iha katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14123_1: bhavitavyam . mā bhavān aṭiṭat iti . āhosvit mā bhavān āṭiṭat iti . mā bhavān āṭiṭat
GS24pmbhasuu:14123_2: iti bhavitavyam . hrasvatvam kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14124: dvirvacane kṛte pareṇa rūpeṇa vyavahitam iti kṛtvā . idam iha sampradhāryam . dvirvacanam kriyatām hrasvatvam iti kim atra kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14125_0: paratvāt hrasvatvam . nityam dvirvacanam . kṛte hrasvatve prāpnoti akṛte api . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:14125_1: tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati dvirvacanāt hrasvatvam balīyaḥ iti yat ayam oṇim
GS24pmbhasuu:14125_2: ṛditam karoti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . ṛditkaraṇe etat prayojanam ṛditām na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14125_3: pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . yadi ca atra pūrvam dvirvacanam syāt ṛditkaraṇam anarthakam
GS24pmbhasuu:14126: vyavahitatvāt hrasvatvam na bhaviṣyati . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ dvirvacanāt hrasvatvam balīyaḥ iti tataḥ oṇim ṛditam karoti . tasmāt mā bhavān aṭiṭat iti eva bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14128: upasaṅkhyānāt . upadhāhrasvatve ṇeḥ ṇici upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:14129: vāditavantam prayojitavān avīvadadvīṇām parivādakena . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14130: na sidhyati . ṇicā vyavahitatvāt . ṇilope kṛte na asti vyavadhānam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14131: sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14132: caṅparanirhrāse na sthānivat iti . evam api aglopinām na iti pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14133_0: prāpnoti . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat na aglopai aṅgam bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam
GS24pmbhasuu:14133_1: . vṛddhiḥ kriyatām lopaḥ iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . nityaḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14133_2: . kṛtāyām api vṛddhau prāpnoti akṛtāyām api .
GS24pmbhasuu:14134: anityaḥ lopaḥ . anyasya kṛtāyām vṛddhau prāpnoti anyasya akṛtāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14135: śabdāntarasya ca prāpnuvan vidhiḥ anityaḥ bhavati . ubhayoḥ anityayoḥ paratvāt vṛddhiḥ . vṛddhau kṛtāyām lopaḥ tat na aglopi aṅgam bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14136_0: evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān iti yat ayam aglopinām
GS24pmbhasuu:14136_1: na iti pratiṣedham śāsti . na etat asti jñāpakam . asti anyat etasya vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14136_2: . kim . yatra vṛddhau api kṛtāyām eva lupyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14137: atyararājat . yat tarhi pratyāhāragrahaṇam karoti . itarathā hi alopinām
GS24pmbhasuu:14138: na iti brūyāt . evam vā vṛddheḥ lopaḥ balīyān iti . atha vā ārabhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14139: pūrvavipratiṣedhaḥ ṇyallopāviyaṅyaṇguṇavṛddhidīrghatvebhyaḥ pūrvavipratiṣiddham iti . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14141: aglopipratiṣedhaḥ ca anarthakaḥ . kim kāraṇam . sthānivadbhāvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14142_0: sthānivadbhāvāt atra hrasvatvam na bhaviṣyati . yatra tarhi sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14142_1: tadartham ayam yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kva sthānivadbhāvaḥ na asti . yaḥ halacoḥ ādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14142_2: . atyararājat . kim punaḥ kāraṇam halacoḥ ādeśaḥ na sthānivat iti ucyate . ajādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14143: ucyate na ca ayam acaḥ eva ādeśaḥ . kim tarhi acaḥ anyasya ca . aglopinām na iti api tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . aglopinām na iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14144: ucyate na ca atra ac eva lupyate . kim tarhi . ac ca anyaḥ ca . yaḥ atra ac lupyate tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . yathā eva tarhi yaḥ atra ac
GS24pmbhasuu:14145_0: lupyate tadāśrayaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ bhavati evam yaḥ atra ac lupyate tadāśrayaḥ sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14145_1: bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat aglopinām na iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:14146: bhavati iti . kim etasya jñāpane prayojanam . pūrvatra asiddhe na
GS24pmbhasuu:14147: sthānivat iti uktam tat na vaktavyam bhavati . yadi etat jñāpyate ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14148: ādīdhayateḥ ādīdhakaḥ , āvevayateḥ āvevakaḥ . yīvarṇayoḥ dīdhīvevyoḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14149_0: lopaḥ na prāpnoti . iha ca yat pralunīhi atra tiṅi ca udāttavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14149_1: na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yat tāvat ucyate ādīdhayateḥ ādīdhakaḥ , āvevayateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14149_2: āvevakaḥ , yīvarṇayoḥ iti lopaḥ na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14150: yīvarṇayoḥ iti atra varṇagrahaṇasāmarthyāt bhaviṣyati . yat api ucyate yat pralunīhi atra tiṅi ca udāttavati iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ na prāpnoti iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14151: bahiraṅgaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ antaraṅgaḥ svaraḥ asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge .
GS24pmbhasuu:14154: acakāṇat , acīkaṇat , ararāṇat , arīraṇat , aśaśrāṇat , aśīśraṇat ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14155: ababhāṇat , abībhaṇat , ajiheṭhat , ajīhiṭhat , alulopat , alūlupat .
GS24pmbhasuu:14157: avadigyāte , avadigyare digyādeśe kṛte dvirvacanam prāpnoti tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14158: sābhyāsasya iti vaktavyam . nanu ca dvirvacane kṛte sābhyāsasya digyādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14159: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . digyādeśasya paratvāt sābhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14160: ādeśavacanam . digyādeśaḥ kriyatām dvirvacanam iti paratvāt digyādeśena
GS24pmbhasuu:14161: bhavitavyam . tatra sābhyāsasya iti vaktavyam . evam tarhi digyādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14163: punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam . punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti cet amādibhiḥ tulyam etat bhavati . tat yathā . amādiṣu kṛteṣu punaḥprasaṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14164: śiśīlugnumaḥ na bhavanti . evam digyādeśe kṛte punaḥprasaṅgāt dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . atha vā vipratiṣedhe punaḥprasaṅgaḥ iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14165: vipratiṣedhaḥ ca dvayoḥ sāvakaśayoḥ . iha punaḥ anavakāśaḥ digyādeśaḥ dvirvacanam bādhiṣyate . yadi tarhi anavakāśāḥ vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti
GS24pmbhasuu:14166_0: , babhūva , bhūbhāvaḥ dvirvacanam bādheta . sāvakāśaḥ bhūbhāvaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14166_1: bhavitā , bhavitum . iha tarhi cakṣiṅaḥ khyāñ vā liṭi iti khyāñ dvirvacanam bādheta
GS24pmbhasuu:14166_2: . iha ca api babhūva iti yadi tāvat sthāne dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14167_0: bhūbhāvaḥ sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti atha dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam parasya bhūbhāve kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:14167_1: pūrvasya śravaṇam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ārdhadhātukīyāḥ sāmānyena bhavanti anavasthiteṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14167_2: pratyayeṣu . tatra ārdhadhātukasāmānye bhūbhāve kṛte yaḥ yataḥ pratyayaḥ prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14167_3: saḥ tataḥ bhaviṣyati (P_7,4.10) KA_III,347.17-348.7 Ro_V,252.7-254.3 saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne
GS24pmbhasuu:14167_4: saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kṛñartham . saṃyogādeḥ guṇavidhāne saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14168_0: syāt . sañcaskaratuḥ , sañcaskaruḥ . yadi saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam kriyate na arthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14168_1: saṃyogādigrahaṇena . iha api sasvaratuḥ , sasvaruḥ saṃyogopadhasya iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14168_2: . bhavet siddham sasvaratuḥ , sasvaruḥ iti idam tu na sidhyati sañcaskaratuḥ , sañcaskaruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14168_3: iti . kim kāraṇam . suṭaḥ bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . bahiraṅgam suṭ . antaraṅgaḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14168_4: . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . saṃyogādigrahaṇe tu kriyamāṇe saṃyogopadhagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14168_5: ananyārtham vijñāyate . ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇāt ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14169: ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇāñ ñṅiti vṛddhiḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . ṛtaḥ liṭi guṇasya avakāśaḥ . sasvaratuḥ , sasvaruḥ . ñṇiti vṛddheḥ avakāśaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14170: svārakaḥ , dhvārakaḥ . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . sasvāra , dadhvāra . ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ bhavati pūrvavipratiṣedhena . punaḥprasaṅgavijñānāt vā siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14171_0: atha vā punaḥprasaṅgāt guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti vṛddhiḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14171_1: . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . punaḥprasaṅgaḥ nāma saḥ bhavati yatra tena eva kṛte
GS24pmbhasuu:14171_2: prāpnoti tena eva ca akṛte . atra khalu guṇe kṛte raparatve ca ataḥ upadhāyāḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14171_3: vṛddhiḥ prāpnoti akṛte ca acaḥ ñṇiti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14172: tasmāt suṣṭhu ucyate liti guṇāt ñṇiti vṛddhiḥ vipratiṣedhena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14173: (P_7,4.12) KA_III,348.9-14 Ro_V,254.5-10 kimartham hrasvaḥ vā iti ucyate na guṇaḥ vā iti ucyeta . tatra ayam api arthaḥ guṇagrahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:14174_0: kartavyam bhavati . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . ṛtaḥ ca saṃyogādeḥ guṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14174_1: iti . ṛtaḥ hrasvatvam ittvapratiṣedhārtham . ṛtaḥ hrasvatvam ucyate ittvapratiṣedhārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:14174_2: . ittvam mā bhūt iti . guṇaḥ vā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14175: iyati ucyamāne guṇena mukte ittvam prasajyeta . hrasvaḥ vā iti ucyamāne hrasvena mukte yathāprāptaḥ guṇaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14177: taddhitagrahaṇam kṛnnivṛttyartham . ke aṇaḥ hrasvatve taddhitagrahaṇam kartavyam . kim prayojanam . kṛnnivṛttyartham . kṛti mā bhūt . rākā ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14178: dhākā iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni .
GS24pmbhasuu:14179: (P_7,4.23) KA_III,348.21-22 Ro_V,255.7-8 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14180: prohyate , upohyate . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt . evam api ā , ūhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14182_0: (P_7,4.24) KA_III,349.2-6 Ro_V,256.1-5 eteḥ liṅi upasargāt . eteḥ liṅi upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14182_1: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . īyāt . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14182_2: iti vartate . evam tarhi ācāryaḥ anvācaṣṭe upasargāt iti anuvartate iti . na etat
GS24pmbhasuu:14182_3: anvākhyeyam adhikārāḥ anuvartante iti . eṣaḥ eva nyāyaḥ yat uta adhikārāḥ anuvarteran
GS24pmbhasuu:14184: riṅ ṛtaḥ iti eva ucyate . kā rūpasiddhiḥ : mātrīyati , pitrīyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14185_0: akṛtsārvadhātukayoḥ iti dīrghatvam bhaviṣyati . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat dīrghoccāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14185_1: karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati eṣā paribhāṣā aṅgavṛtte punaḥ vṛttau avidhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14186: prayojanam . pibeḥ guṇapratiṣedhaḥ coditaḥ saḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14187: (P_7,4.30) KA_III,349.14-16 Ro_V,256.13-257.3 yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īṭ . yaṇprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īṭ vaktavyaḥ . jeghnīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14188: yadi īṭ abhyāsarūpam na sidhyati . evam tarhi yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām īk . evam api upadhālopaḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi yaṅprakaraṇe hanteḥ hiṃsāyām ghnī .
GS24pmbhasuu:14190: aputrasya iti . aputrādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : janīyantaḥ nvagravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ . chandasi pratiṣedhe dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14191: chandasi pratiṣedhe dīrghatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saṃsvedayuḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14192: mitrayuḥ . na vā aśvāghasya ādvacanam avadhāraṇārtham . na vā vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14193: kim kāraṇam . aśvāghasya ādvacanam avadhāraṇārtham bhaviṣyati aśvāghayoḥ eva chancasi dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati na anyasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14194: (P_7,4.41) KA_III,350.7-11 Ro_V,258.2-6 śyateḥ ittvam vrate nityam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14195: śyateḥ ittvam vrate nityam iti vaktavyam . saṃśitavrataḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . devatrātaḥ galaḥ grāhaḥ itiyoge ca sadvidhiḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14196: mithaḥ te na vibhāṣyante gavākṣaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14198: pradattam ca ādikarmaṇi , sudattam anudattam ca nidattam iti ca iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14199_0: kim punaḥ ayam takārāntaḥ āhosvit dakārāntaḥ uta dhakārāntaḥ atha vā thakārāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14199_1: . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tānte doṣaḥ dīrghatvam syāt . yadi takārāntaḥ dasti iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14199_2: prāpnoti . dānte doṣaḥ niṣṭhānatvam . atha dakārāntaḥ radābhyām niṣṭhātaḥ iti natvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14199_3: prāpnoti . dhānte doṣaḥ dhatvaprāptiḥ . atha dhāntaḥ jhaṣaḥ tathoḥ dhaḥ adhaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14200: . thānte adoṣaḥ tasmāt thāntaḥ . atha thakārāntaḥ na doṣaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14202_0: ākāragrahaṇam . acaḥ upasargāt tatve ākāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . alaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14202_1: antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti ākārasya bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14202_2: ādeḥ hi parasya . atra hi tasmāt iti uttarasya ādeḥ parasya iti dakārasya prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14202_3: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avarṇaprakaraṇāt siddham . asya iti vartate . kva prakṛtam . asya
GS24pmbhasuu:14202_4: dvau iti . yadi avarṇagrahaṇam anuvartate dadbhāve doṣaḥ bhavati . evam tarhi evam
GS24pmbhasuu:14203_0: vakṣyāmi daḥ adghoḥ iti . daḥ yaḥ ākāraḥ tasya at bhavati . tataḥ acaḥ upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14203_1: taḥ . asya iti eva . evam api sūtrabhedaḥ kṛtaḥ bhavati . na asau sūtrabhedaḥ . sūtrabhedam
GS24pmbhasuu:14203_2: kam upācaranti . yatra tat eva anyat sūtram kriyate bhūyaḥ vā . yat hi tat eva upasaṃhṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:14204_0: . atha vā dvitakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate saḥ anekāl śit sarvasya iti sarvasya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14204_1: . iha api tarhi prāpnoti . adbhiḥ , adbhyaḥ iti . acaḥ iti vartate . tat ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14204_2: ajgrahaṇam anuvartyam lavābhyām iti evamartham . atha vā tritakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ kariṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14204_3: ihārthau dvau uttarārthaḥ ca ekaḥ . dyateḥ ittvāt acaḥ taḥ . dyateḥ ittvāt acaḥ taḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14204_4: iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena . dyateḥ ittvasya avakāśaḥ . nirditam ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14205: nirditavān . acaḥ taḥ iti asya avakāśaḥ . prattam , avattam . iha ubhayam prāpnoti . nīttam , vīttam . acaḥ taḥ iti etat bhavati vipratiṣedhena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14206: (P_7,4.48) KA_III,351.24-352.3 Ro_V,261.6-10 apaḥ bhi māsaḥ chandasi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14207: apaḥ bhi iti atra māsaḥ chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam : mā adbhiḥ iṣṭvā
GS24pmbhasuu:14208: indraḥ vṛtrahā . atyalpam idam ucyate . svavassvatavasoḥ māsaḥ uṣasaḥ ca taḥ iṣyate : svavadbhiḥ , svatavadbhiḥ , samuṣadbhiḥ ajāyathāḥ , mā adbhiḥ iṣṭvā indraḥ vṛtrahā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14209: (P_7,4.54) KA_III,352.5-7 Ro_V,261.12-14 istvam sani rādhaḥ hiṃsāyām .
GS24pmbhasuu:14210: istvam sani rādhaḥ hiṃsāyām iti vaktavyam . pratiritsati . hiṃsāyām iti kimartham . ārirātsati
GS24pmbhasuu:14212: jñapeḥ īttvam anantyasya iti vaktavyam . jñīpsati . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14213: na vaktavyam . lopaḥ antyasya bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati . anavakāśāḥ vidhayaḥ bādhakāḥ bhavanti sāvakāśaḥ ca ṇilopaḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . kāraṇā , hāraṇā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14214: evam api īttvam antyasya lopasya bādhakam syāt . anavakāśāḥ hi vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14215_0: bādhakāḥ bhavanti īttvam api sāvakāśam . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:14215_1: antye anantyasya īttvam syāt . bhavet yaḥ acā āṅgam viśeṣayet tasya anantyasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:14215_2: syāt . vayam tu khalu aṅena acam viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14216: aṅgasya acaḥ yatratatrasthasya iti . evam api ubhayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ paratvāt īttvam prāpnoti . tasmāt anantyasya iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14218: abhyāsasya iti yat ucyate tat anaci draṣṭavyam . patāpataḥ , carācaraḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:14221_0: halām ādiḥ halādiḥ halādiḥ śiṣyate iti . āhosvit karmadhārayaḥ : hal ādiḥ halādiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14221_1: halādiḥ śiṣyate iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . halādiśeṣe ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaḥ iti cet ajādiṣu

GS24pmbhasuu:14302: sarvavacanam alontyanivṛttyartham . sarvagrahaṇam kriyate alontyanivṛttyartham . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ bhavanti iti antyasya
