GS24pmbhasuu:14303_1: nityavīpsayoḥ iti . nityavīpsayoḥ iti ucyate na ca antyasya dvirvacanena nityatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14303_2: vīpsā vā gamyate . iha tarhi pareḥ varjane iti antyasya api dvirvacanena varjyamānatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14303_3: gamyeta . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham ca . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham ca sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14303_4: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśaḥ yathā prakalpeta . anirdeśe hi ṣaṣṭhyarthāprasiddhiḥ . akriyamāṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:14303_5: sarvagrahaṇe ṣaṣṭhyarthasya aprasiddhiḥ syāt . kasya . sthāneyogatvasya . kva punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14304: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārthena arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena yāvatā sarvatra eva ṣaṣṭhī uccāryate . parervarjane prasamupodaḥpādapūraṇe uparyadhyadhasaḥsāmīpye
GS24pmbhasuu:14305_0: vākyāderāmantritasya iti . iha na kā cit ṣaṣṭhī nityavīpsayoḥ iti . nanu ca eṣā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14305_1: ṣaṣṭhī . na eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . kim tarhi . arthanirdeśaḥ eṣaḥ . nitye ca arthe vīpsāyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14305_2: ca iti . alontyanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ sarvagrahaṇena . idam tāvat ayam praṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14306: iti ucyate dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca
GS24pmbhasuu:14307_0: iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . dviśabdaḥ ayam ekāc tasya ekāctvāt tasyaparamāmreḍitam
GS24pmbhasuu:14307_1: anudāttamca iti etat na asti . paśyati tu ācāryaḥ na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14307_2: tataḥ tasya paramāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti āha . yadi tarhi na dviśabdaḥ ādeśaḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14307_3: ke tarhi idānīm dve bhavataḥ . dviśabdena yat ucyate . kim punaḥ tat . dviśabdaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14308: saṅkhyāyāḥ ca saṅkhyeyam arthaḥ . saṅkhyeye dve bhaviṣyataḥ . ke punaḥ te
GS24pmbhasuu:14309_0: . pade vākye mātre vā . tat yadā tāvat pade vākye vā tadā anekāltvāt sarvādeśaḥ siddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14309_1: . yadā mātre api tadā anekālśitsarvasya iti sarvādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadā tarhi ardhamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:14309_2: tadā sarvādeśaḥ na sidhyati . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na ca ardhamātre dviḥ ucyete . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:14310: sarvālpīyān svaravyavahāraḥ saḥ mātrayā bhavati na ardhamātrayā vyavahāraḥ asti . tena ardhamātre na bhaviṣyataḥ . evam api kutaḥ etat pade dve
GS24pmbhasuu:14311: bhaviṣyataḥ iti na punaḥ vākye syātām mātre vā . nityavīpsayoḥ dve bhavataḥ iti ucyate na ca vākyadvirvacanena mātrādvirvacanena vā nityatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14312: vīpsā vā gamyate . ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham eva tarhi sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14313: na vā padādhikārāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14314_0: padasya iti prakṛtya dvirvacanam vakṣyāmi . tat ca samāsataddhitavākyanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14314_1: . tat ca avaśyam padagrahaṇam kartavyam samāsanivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14316_0: . dvipadikā tripadikā . māṣaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ . vākyanivṛttyartham . grāme grāme pānīyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14316_1: . māṣam māṣam dehi . atha kriyamāṇe api vai padagrahaṇe samāsanivṛttyartham iti katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14316_2: idam vijñāyate . samasasya nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:14316_3: nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi viñāyate samāsasya nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14316_4: samāsanivṛttyartham iti siddham saptaparṇaḥ saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti saptaparṇābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14316_5: saptaparṇebhyaḥ iti atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate samāse
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_0: nivṛttyartham samāsanivṛttyartham iti saptaparṇaḥ saptaparṇau saptaparṇāḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_1: api prāpnoti . tathā taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . katham idam vijñāyate . taddhitasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_2: nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit taddhite nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_3: iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate taddhitasya nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_4: iti siddham dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ dvipadikābhyām tripadikābhyām māṣaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_5: iti atra prāpnoti . atha vijñāyate taddhite nivṛttyartham taddhitanivṛttyartham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14317_6: dvipadikāḥ tripadikāḥ iti atra api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14318: tathā vākyanivṛttyartham iti katham idam vijñāyate . vākyasya nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti . āhosvit vākye nivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14319: vākyanivṛttyartham iti . kim ca ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vākyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14320_0: nivṛttyartham vākyanivṛttyartham iti yadi vākyam vīpsāyuktam bhavitavyam eva dvirvacanena
GS24pmbhasuu:14320_1: . atha api avayavaḥ bhavatu eva . tat etat kriyamāṇe api padagrahaṇe ālūnaviśīrṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14320_2: bhavati . kim cit saṅgṛhītam kim cit asaṅgṛhītam
GS24pmbhasuu:14321: . sagatigrahaṇam ca . sagatigrahaṇam ca kartavyam . prapacati prapacati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14322: prakaroti prakaroti iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . na hi sagatikam
GS24pmbhasuu:14323: padam bhavati . samāsanivṛttyarthena tāvat na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena .
GS24pmbhasuu:14324: samāsena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . kim ca bhoḥ samāsaḥ vīpsāyām iti ucyate . na khalu vīpsāyām iti ucyate gamyate tu saḥ arthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14325: tatra uktaḥ samāsena iti kṛtvā dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca samāsena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14326_0: ekaikavicitāḥ anyonyasahāyāḥ iti . atha vā yat atra vīpsāyuktam na adaḥ prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14326_1: . kim punaḥ tat . parvaṇi parvaṇi sapta parṇāni asya . paṅktau paṅktau aṣṭau padāni
GS24pmbhasuu:14326_2: asya iti . taddhitanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . taddhitena ukatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14326_3: vīpsāyāḥ dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati taddhitaḥ khalu api vīpsāyām iti ucyate . yatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14326_4: ca taddhitena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra dvirvacanam . tat yathā . ekaikaśaḥ dadāti
GS24pmbhasuu:14327_0: vākyanivṛttyarthena ca api na arthaḥ padagrahaṇena . padadvirvacanena uktatvāt vīpsāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14327_1: vākyadvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati . yatra ca padadvirvacanena anuktā vīpsā bhavati tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14328: prapacati prapacati . prakaroti prakaroti . uttarārtham tarhi padagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14329_0: kartavyam . tasyaparamāmreḍitam anudāttamca iti vakṣyati tat padadvirvacane yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14329_1: syāt vākyadvirvacanemā bhūt . mahyam grahīṣyati mahyam grahīṣyati . mām abhivyāhariṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14329_2: mām abhvyāhariṣyati . katham ca atra dvirvacanam . chāndasatvāt . svaraḥ api tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14330_0: bhaviṣyati . uttarārtham eva tarhi padagrahaṇam kartavyam . padasya padāt iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14330_1: tat padagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . sarvagrahaṇam api tarhi uttarārtham . anudāttaṃsarvamapādādau
GS24pmbhasuu:14330_2: iti vakṣyati tat sarvagrahaṇam kartavyam bhavati . ubhayam kriyate tatra eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:14332_0: ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśārtham anyatarat kartavyam . ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭasya sthāne dvirvacanam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14332_1: syāt dviḥprayogaḥ mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt . ām pacasi devadattā3 āmaekāntaramāmantritamanantike
GS24pmbhasuu:14332_2: iti ekāntaratā na syāt . iha ca paunaḥpunyam paunaḥpunikam iti aprātipadikatvāt taddhitotpattiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14333_0: yadi tarhi sthāne dvirvacanam rājā rājā vāk vāk padasya iti nalopādīni na sidhyanti
GS24pmbhasuu:14333_1: . idam iha sampradhāryam . dvirvacanam kriyatām nalopādīni iti kim atra kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14334: siddhāsiddhayoḥ ca na asti sampradhāraṇā . evam tarhi pūrvatra asiddhīyam advirvacane iti vakṣyāmi . tat ca avaśyam vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14335_0: vibhāṣitāḥ prayojayanti . drogdhā drogdhā . droḍhā droḍhā iti . iha tarhi bisam bisam
GS24pmbhasuu:14335_1: musalam musalam ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14335_2: yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam etat vijñāyate . iha tarhi nṛbhiḥ nṛbhiḥ raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:14335_3: iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . samānapade iti ucyate samānam eva yat nityam na ca etat nityam
GS24pmbhasuu:14335_4: samānapadam eva . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14336: samānagrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yat samānam ca asamānam ca tatra syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14338_0: (P_8,1.1.3) KA_III,364.14-21 Ro_V,292-294 atha vā punaḥ astu dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14338_1: . nanu ca uktam ām pacasi pacasi devadattā3 āmaḥ ekāntaram āmantritam anantike iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14338_2: ekāntaratā na prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:14342: evam . samarthāt iti evam bhaviṣyati . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati bhavati evañjātīyakebhyaḥ taddhitotpattiḥ iti yat ayam kaskādiṣu kautaskutaśabdam paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14343: (P_8,1.4.1) KA_III,364.22-26 Ro_V,294-296 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14344: himavān khāṇḍavaḥ pāriyātraḥ samudraḥ iti . nitye dve bhavataḥ iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ayam nityaśabdaḥ asti eva kūṭastheṣu avicāliṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14345: bhāveṣu vartate . tat yathā : nityā dyauḥ nityā pṛthivī nityam ākāśam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14346: . asti ābhīkṣṇye vartate . tat yathā : nityaprahasitaḥ nityaprajalpitaḥ iti . tat yaḥ ābhīkṣṇye vartate tasya idam grahaṇam .

GS24pmbhasuu:14350: vīpsāyām abhidheyāyām iti . katham tarhi . kartṛviśeṣaṇam etat . vīpsati iti vīpsaḥ . vīpsaḥ cet kartā bhavati iti . kaḥ punaḥ vīpsārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14351_0: anavayavābhidhānam vīpsārthaḥ . anavayavena dravyāṇām abhidhānam eṣaḥ vīpsārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14351_1: . anavayavābhidhānam vīpsārthaḥ iti cet jātyākhyāyām dvirvacanaprasaṅgaḥ . anavayavābhidhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14351_2: vīpsārthaḥ iti cet jātyākhyāyām dvirvacanam prāpnoti . vrīhibhiḥ yavaiḥ vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14351_3: na vā ekārthatvāt jāteḥ na vā eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . kim kāraṇam . ekārthatvāt jāteḥ . ekārthaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14352_0: ekam artham pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti jātiśabdaḥ prayujyate . anekārthāśrayatvāt ca vīpsāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14352_1: . anekārthāśrayā ca punaḥ vīpsā . anekam artham sampratyāyayiṣyāmi iti vīpsā prayujyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14352_2: . ekārthatvāt jāteḥ anekārthāśrayatvāt ca vīpsāyāḥ jātyākhyāyām dvirvacanam na bhaviṣyati

GS24pmbhasuu:14353_2: anena nivṛttiḥ kriyate . nityavīpsayoḥ arthayoḥ dve eva śabdarūpe prayoktavye na
GS24pmbhasuu:14355: sarvagrahaṇam ca anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . sarvasya eva hi dvirvacanena arthaḥ gamyate na avayavasya . padagrahaṇam ca anarthakam padasya eva hi
GS24pmbhasuu:14357_0: (P_8,1.4.3) KA_III,365.22-366.11 Ro_V,300-302 kim punaḥ idam vīpsāyām sarvam abhidhīyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14357_1: āhosvit ekam . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . vīpsāyām sarvābhidhāne vacanāprasiddhiḥ . vīpsāyām

GS24pmbhasuu:14357_4: asarvadravyagatiḥ . ekābhidhāne sarvadravyagatiḥ na sidhyati . astu tarhi sarvam

GS24pmbhasuu:14360: bhavitavyam . pacati pacatitarām tiṣṭhati . āhosvit pacatitarām pacatitarām tiṣṭhati iti . pacati pacatitarām tiṣṭhatīti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14361: katham . dvirvacanam kriyatām ātiśāyikaḥ iti dvirvacanam bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14362_0: vipratiṣedhena . iha api tarhi ātiśāyikāt dvirvacanam syāt . ādyataram ādyataram
GS24pmbhasuu:14362_1: ānaya iti . asti atra viśeṣaḥ . antaraṅgaḥ ātiśāyikaḥ . kā antaraṅgatā . ṅyāpprātipadikāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14362_2: ātiśāyikaḥ padasya dvirvacanam . ātiśāyikaḥ api na antaraṅgaḥ . katham . samarthāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14362_3: taddhitaḥ asau utpadyate sāmarthyam ca subantena . atha vā spardhāyām ātiśāyikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14362_4: vidhīyate na ca antareṇa pratiyoginam spardhā gamyate . evam tarhi iha dvau arthau
GS24pmbhasuu:14363_0: nityavīpse ca atiśayaḥ ca na ca ekasya prayoktuḥ anekam artham yugapat vaktum sambhavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14363_1: asti . tat etat prayoktari adhīnam bhavati . etasmin ca prayoktari adhīne kva cit
GS24pmbhasuu:14363_2: kā cit prasṛtatarā gatiḥ bhavati . iha tāvat pacati pacatitarām tiṣṭhati iti eṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:14363_3: prasṛtatarā gatiḥ yat nityam uktvā atiśayaḥ ucyate . iha idānīm ādyataram ādyataram
GS24pmbhasuu:14363_4: ānaya iti eṣā prasṛtatarā gatiḥ yat atiśayam uktvā vīpsādvirvacanam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14364_0: (P_8,1.5) KA_III,366.24-367.5 Ro_V,304-305 pareḥ asamāse . pareḥ asamāse iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14364_1: . iha mā bhūt . paritrigartam vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14364_2: pareḥ varjane iti ucyate na ca atra pariḥ varjane vartate . kaḥ tarhi . samāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14364_3: parervarjane vāvacanam parervarvane vā iti vaktavyam . pari trigartebhyaḥ vṛṣṭaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14364_4: devaḥ . pari pari trigartebhyaḥ vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14365_0: (P_8,1.8) KA_III,367.6-13 Ro_V,305-306 asūyākutsanayoḥ kopabhartsanayoḥ ca ekārthatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14365_1: pṛthaktvanirdeśānarthakyam . asūyā kutsanam iti ekaḥ arthaḥ . kopaḥ bhartsanam iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14365_2: ekaḥ arthaḥ asūyākutsanayoḥ kopabhartsanayoḥ ca ekārthatvāt pṛthaktvanirdeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14365_3: . na hi anasūyan kutsayati na ca api akupitaḥ bhartsayate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14366: nanu ca bhoḥ akupitāḥ api dṛśyante dārakān bhartsayamānāḥ . antataḥ te tām
GS24pmbhasuu:14367: śarīrākṛtim kurvanti yā kupitasya bhavati . evam tarhi āha . sāmṛtaiḥ pāṇibhiḥ ghnanti guravaḥ na viṣokitaiḥ . lāḍanāśrayiṇaḥ doṣāḥ tāḍanāśrayiṇaḥ guṇāḥ . ekaṃ bahuvrīhivat
GS24pmbhasuu:14369: na bhavati . ekaḥ iti . ekasya dvirvacanasambandhena bahuvrīhivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14370: ucyate na ca atra dvirvacanam paśyāmaḥ . ekasya dvirvacanasambandhena iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14371_0: cet arthanirdeśaḥ . ekasya dvirvacanasambandhena iti cet arthanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14371_1: . dvirvacanam api hi atra kasmāt na bhavati . tasmāt vācyam asmin arthe dve bhavataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14371_2: bahuvrīhivat ca iti . na vā vīpsādhikārāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . vīpsādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14374: ekaikam . puṃvadbhāvaḥ . gatagatā . yadi evam sarvanāmasvarasamāsānteṣu

GS24pmbhasuu:14397_3: . ubhau imau āḍhyau katarā katarā anayoḥ āḍhyatā . sarve ime āḍhyāḥ katamā katamā

GS24pmbhasuu:14407: padādhikāraḥ prāk apadāntādhikārāt . apadāntasyamūrdhanyaḥ iti ataḥ prāk padādhikāraḥ . atha padāt iti adhikāraḥ ā kutaḥ . padāt prāk supi kutsanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14408_0: . padāt iti adhikāraḥ prāk supi kutsanāt . kutsane ca supy agotrādau iti ataḥ prāk
GS24pmbhasuu:14408_1: . yaṇekādeśasvaraḥ tu ūrdhvam padādhikārāt . yaṇekādeśasvaraḥ tu ūrdhvam padādhikārāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14408_2: kartavyaḥ . iha vacane hi apadāntasya aprāptiḥ . iha hi kriyamāṇe apadāntasya aprāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14408_3: syāt . udāttasvaritayor yaṇaḥsvaritaḥ anudāttasya iti iha eva syāt kumāryau kiśoryau
GS24pmbhasuu:14408_4: iha na syāt kumāryaḥ kiśoryaḥ . ekādeśe udāttenodāttaḥ iha eva syāt vṛkṣau plakṣau
GS24pmbhasuu:14408_5: iha na syāt vṛkṣāḥ plakṣāḥ . na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . na vā ūrdhvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14409: padādhikārāt kartavyaḥ yaṇekādeśasvaraḥ . kim kāraṇam . padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . padasya iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:14410: . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14411_0: pratyākhyāyate sthanaṣaṣṭhī . antagrahaṇāt vā nalope . atha vā yat ayam nalopaḥprātipadikāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14411_1: iti antagrahaṇam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī eṣā na sthānaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:14413_0: sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham . sarvagrahaṇam kriyate anādeḥ api anudāttatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14413_1: yathā syāt iti . tiṅatiṅaḥ iha eva syāt devadattaḥ : pacati iti iha na syāt : devadattaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14413_2: karoti iti . sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham iti cet luṭi pratiṣedhāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14413_3: sarvavacanam anādeḥ anudāttārtham iti cet tat na . kim kāraṇam . luṭi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14414: yat ayam luṭi pratiṣedham śāsti naluṭ iti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anādeḥ api anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi luḍantam
GS24pmbhasuu:14415: ādyudāttam asti . alo'ntyavidhiprasaṅgaḥ tu . alaḥ antyasya vidhayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14416: bhavanti iti antyasya vidhiḥ prāpnoti . yatra hi ādividhiḥ na asti alo'ntyavidhinā tatra bhavitavyam . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . tiṅatiṅaḥ iti iha
GS24pmbhasuu:14417: eva syāt devadattayajñadattau kurutaḥ iha na syāt devadattaḥ karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14418: lṛṭi pratiṣedhāt siddham . yat ayam lṛṭi pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ anantyasya api anudāttatvam bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14419_0: na hi lṛḍantam antodāttam asti . nanu ca idam asti bhokṣye iti . uktam vā . kim uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14419_1: . na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt iti . idam tarhi prayojanam yuṣmadasmadoḥṣaṣṭhīcaturthīdvitīyāsthayorvāmnāvau
GS24pmbhasuu:14419_2: iti vāmnau ādayaḥ savibhaktikasya yathā syuḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14420_0: padasya iti hi vartate vibhaktyantam ca padam tatra antareṇa sarvagrahaṇam savibhaktikasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14420_1: bhaviṣyati . bhavet siddham yatra vibhaktyantam padam yatra tu khalu vibhaktau padam
GS24pmbhasuu:14420_2: tatra na sidhyati . grāmaḥ vām dīyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14421_0: grāmaḥ nau dīyate . janapadaḥ vām dīyate . janapadaḥ nau dīyate . nanu ca sthagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14421_1: kriyate tena savibhaktikasya eva bhaviṣyati . astī anyat sthagrahaṇasya prayaojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14421_2: . kim . śrūyamāṇavibhakiviśeṣaṇam yathā vijñāyeta . yatra vibhaktiḥ śrūyate tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14421_3: yathā syāt iha mā bhūt iti yuṣmatputraḥ dadāti iti asmatputraḥ dadāti iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:14446_1: tiṅantam apūrvam iti . jātuviśeṣaṇam iti āha . katham jñāyate . yat ayam kiṃvṛttañcaciduttaram
GS24pmbhasuu:14446_2: iti āha . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . atra api apūrvam iti etat anuvartate na ca asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14446_3: sambhavaḥ yat kiṃvṛttam ca ciduttaram syāt tiṅantam ca apūrvam . atra api tiṅantaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14447_0: katham . kiṃvṛttāt ciduttarāt tiṅantam apūrvam iti . yat tarhi āhoutāhocānantaram
GS24pmbhasuu:14447_1: iti anantaragrahaṇam karoti . etasya api asti vacane prayojanam . kim . śeṣaprakḷptyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14447_2: etat syāt . śeṣevibhāṣā kaḥ ca śeṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14448: . sāntaram śeṣaḥ iti . antareṇa api anantaragrahaṇam prakḷptaḥ śeṣaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:14455: kartṛsāmānyāt siddham iti cet tadbhede kartṛbhede anyasmin kārakasāmānye prakṛtibhāvaḥ prāpnoti . āhara devadatta śālīn yajñadatta enān bhokṣyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:14480: syāt . yat kāṣṭhā pacati . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham pūrveṇa agatikasya . na sidhyati . malopābhisambaddham tat . yadi tat anuvarteta
GS24pmbhasuu:14481: iha api malopaḥ prasajyeta . dāruṇam pacati iti . uttarārtham ca apigrahaṇam kriyate . kutsane ca supi agotrādau agatiḥ api iti . pacati pūti iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:14499_1: udam prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi haratim prati kriyāyogaḥ . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . udam
GS24pmbhasuu:14500: udā viśiṣṭām abhiḥ viśinaṣṭi . tatra yatkriyāyuktāḥ iti bhavati eva saṅghātam prati kriyāyogaḥ . iha api tarhi mandrasādhanā kriyā āṅā
GS24pmbhasuu:14501_0: vyajyate . ā yāhi mandraiḥ iti . nanu pūrvam dhātuḥ upasargeṇa yujyate paścāt sādhanena
GS24pmbhasuu:14501_1: iti . na etat sāram . pūrvam dhātuḥ sādhanena yujyate paścāt upasargeṇa . kim kāraṇam

GS24pmbhasuu:14534_1: ayam pādonaḥ adhyāyaḥ asiddhaḥ iti ucyate yaḥ iha saptamīnirdeśāḥ pañcamīnirdeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14534_2: ca ucyante ṣaṣṭhīnirdeśāḥ ca ucyante te api asiddhāḥ syūḥ . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . jhalojhali
GS24pmbhasuu:14534_3: hrasvādaṅgāt saṃyogāntasyalopaḥ iti eteṣām nirdeśānām asiddhatvāt tasminnitinirdeṣṭepūrvasya

GS24pmbhasuu:14534_5: doṣaḥ . yadi api idam tatra asiddham tat tu iha siddham . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam

GS24pmbhasuu:14536: api paribhāṣā asti vipratiṣedhe param iti sā api iha upatiṣṭheta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . visphoryam avagoryam iti guṇāt dīrghatvam syāt vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:14537_0: . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . pūrvatrāsiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ abhāvāt uttarasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14537_1: pūrvatrāsiddhe na asti vipratiṣedhaḥ . kim kāraṇam . abhāvāt uttarasya . dvayoḥ hi

GS24pmbhasuu:14615_3: . plutiḥ tugvidhau che siddhā vakavyā . agna3i cchattram . paṭa3u cchattram . pluteḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14616: iti tuk na prāpnoti . kim ucyate che iti . yaḥ hi anyaḥ asiddhaḥ eva asau
GS24pmbhasuu:14617: bhavati . agnici3t somasu3t .ścutvam dhuṭtve . ścutvam dhuṭtve siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14618: vaktavyam . aṭ ścyotati . paṭ scyotati . ścutvasya asiddhatvāt ḍaḥsidhuṭ
GS24pmbhasuu:14620: abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ siddham vaktavyam . babhaṇatuḥ babhaṇuḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14621: abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt ettvam prāpnoti . ucicchiṣati . abhyāsādeśasya asiddhatvāt checa iti tuk prāpnoti . dvirvacane parasavarṇatvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14622: dvirvacane parasavarṇatvam siddham vaktavyam . sayṃyantā savṃvatsaraḥ talṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:14623_0: lokam yalṃ lokam iti parasavarṇasya asiddhatvāt yaraḥ iti dvirvacanam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14624: latva garaḥ garaḥ . galaḥ galaḥ . latva. ghatva . drogdhā drogdhā . droḍhā droḍhā . ghatva . natva. nunnaḥ nunnaḥ . nuttaḥ nuttaḥ . natva . rutva .
GS24pmbhasuu:14625: abhinaḥ abhinaḥ . abhinat abhinat . rutva ṣatva . mātuḥṣvasā mātuḥṣvasā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14626: mātuḥsvasā mātuḥsvasā pituḥṣvasā pituḥṣvasā . pituḥsvasā pituḥsvasā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14627: ṣatva . ṇatva . māṣavāpāṇi māṣavāpāṇi . māṣavāpāni māṣavāpāni . ṇatva .
GS24pmbhasuu:14628: anunāsika . nāṅnayanam nāṅnayanam . vāgnayanam vāgnayanam . anunāsika .
GS24pmbhasuu:14629: chatva . vākchayanam vākchayanam . vākśayanam vākśayanam . ubhayathā ca ayam doṣaḥ yadi api sthāne dvirvacanam atha api dviḥprayogaḥ . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14630: yadi tāvat sthāne dvirvacanam sampramugdhatvāt prakṛtipratyayasya latvādyabhāvaḥ . atha dviḥprayogaḥ asiddhatvāt latvādīni nivarteran .
GS24pmbhasuu:14631: (P_8,2.7.1) KA_III,394.5-9 Ro_V,375 antagrahaṇam kimartham . nalope antagrahaṇam padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . nalope antagrahaṇam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14632: kim kāraṇam . padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt . padādhikāraḥ viśeṣaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14633: katham . padasya iti na eṣā sthānaṣaṣṭhī . kā tarhi . viśeṣaṇaṣaṣṭhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:14635: ahnaḥ nalopapratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ahobhyām ahobhiḥ iti . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . ruḥ atra bādhakaḥ bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14636: asiddhaḥ ruḥ tasya asiddhatvāt nalopaḥ prāpnoti . anavakāśaḥ ruḥ nalopam
GS24pmbhasuu:14637: bādhiṣyate . sāvakāśaḥ ruḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ akāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14638: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na anantyasya ruḥ bhavati iti yat ayam ahangrahaṇam karoti . ahangrahaṇāt iti cet sambuddhyartham vacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14639_0: ahangrahaṇāt iti cet sambuddhyartham etat syāt . he ahaḥ iti . yat tarhi rutvam śāsti
GS24pmbhasuu:14639_1: . etat api sambuddhyartham eva syāt . he dīrghāhaḥ atra . yat tarhi rūparātrirathantareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14639_2: upasaṅkhyānam karoti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:14640: anantyasya ruḥ bhavati iti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . na hi asti viśeṣaḥ rūparātrirathantareṣu anantyasya rau vā re vā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14641: (P_8,2.8) KA_III,394.20-395.18 Ro_V,377-378 na ṅisambuddhyoḥ anuttarapade . na ṅisambuddhyoḥ anuttarapade iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14642_0: carmaṇi tilā asya carmatilaḥ iti . rājan vṛndāraka rājavṛndāraka iti . vā napuṃsakānām
GS24pmbhasuu:14642_1: . vā napuṃsakānām iti vaktavyam . he carma he carman . he varma he varman . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14642_2: anuttarapade iti vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ṅisambuddhyoḥ iti ucyate na ca atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14642_3: ṅisambuddhī paśyāmaḥ pratyayalakṣaṇena . na lumatā tasmin iti pratyayalakṣaṇasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14643_0: na kvacit ṅiḥ lopena lupyate sarvatra lumatā eva . yathā eva iha bhavati ārdre carman
GS24pmbhasuu:14643_1: lohite carman iti evam iha api syāt carmaṇi tilā asya carmatilaḥ iti . tasmāt upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14644_0: tāvat na arthaḥ . bhatvāt tu ṅau pratiṣedhānarthakyam . ṅau pratiṣedhaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14644_1: . kim kāraṇam . bhatvāt . bhasañjñā atra bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi bhasañjñā atra bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14644_2: rathantare sāman iti atra allopaḥ anaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14645: allopaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam ubhayasañjñāni api chandāṃsi dṛśyante tad yathā saḥ suṣṭubhā saḥ ṛkvatā gaṇena padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14646: jaśtvam na bhavati . evam iha api padatvāt allopaḥ na bhatvāt nalopaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:14647_0: bhaviṣyati . tasmāt na arthaḥ ṅigrahaṇena . sambuddhyarthena ca api na arthaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14647_1: . sambuddhyantānām asamāsaḥ . rājavṛndāraka iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14647_2: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . iha samānārthena vākyena bhavitavyam samāsena ca yaḥ ca iha
GS24pmbhasuu:14648: jātu cit samāsena gamyate . avayavasambodhanam vākyena gamyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14649: samudāyasambodhanam samāsena . vā napuṃsakānām iti etat vaktavyam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:14651_0: ādeśaḥ . niṣṭhāmatupoḥ ādeśaḥ anantyayoḥ api iti vaktavyam . bhinnavantau bhinnavantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14651_1: . vṛkṣavantau vṛkṣavantaḥ . na vaktavyam . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14652: (P_8,2.9) KA_III,396.1-5 Ro_V,378-379 nārmate pratiṣedhaḥ . nārmate pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . nṛmataḥ nārmataḥ iti . uktam vā . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14653: niṣṭhāmatupoḥ tāvat uktam na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt iti . nārmate api uktam na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14654: (P_8,2.11-12) KA_III,396.6-13 Ro_V,379 kim ayam ekayogaḥ āhosvit nānāyogau . kim ca ataḥ . yadi ekayogaḥ hīvatī kapīvatī atra na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14655: atha nānāyogau ikṣumatī drumatī atra api prāpnoti . yathā icchasi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14656_0: astu . astu tāvat ekayogaḥ . katham ahīvatī kapīvatī . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati
GS24pmbhasuu:14656_1: bhavati evañjātīyakānām vatvam iti yat ayam anto'vatyāḥ īvatyāḥ iti āha . atha vā
GS24pmbhasuu:14656_2: punaḥ astu nānāyogau . nanu ca uktam ikṣumatī drumatī atra api prāpnoti iti . yavādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14657_0: (P_8,2.15) KA_III,396.14-397.2 Ro_V,379-380 chandasi iraḥ iti ucyate tatra te viśvakarmāṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14657_1: te saptarṣimantam iti atra api prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . na evam vijñāyate chandasi
GS24pmbhasuu:14657_2: iraḥ iti . katham tarhi . chandasi īraḥ iti . evam api tviṣīmān patīmān iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14658: vihitaviśeṣaṇam īkāragrahaṅam . īkārāntāt yaḥ vihitaḥ iti . evam api sūram
GS24pmbhasuu:14659: te dyāvāpṛthivīmantam iti atra api prāpnoti . iha ca na prāpnoti trivatīḥ yājyānuvākyāḥ bhavanti iti . evam tarhi parigaṇanam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14660: triharyadhipatyagnire . trivatīḥ yājyānuvākyāḥ bhavanti . tri . hari .
GS24pmbhasuu:14661: harivaḥ medinam tvā . hari . adhipati . adhipativatīḥ juhoti . adhipati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14662: agni . caruḥ agnivān iva . agni . re . ā revan etu no viśa iti . yadi tarhi parigaṇanam kriyate sarasvatīvān bhāratīvān apūpavān dadhivān caruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14663: iti atra na prāpnoti . evam tarhi chandasi iraḥ bahulam iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14664: (P_8,2.16) KA_III,397.3-398.10 Ro_V,380-382 yadi punaḥ ayam nuṭ pūrvāntaḥ kriyeta . anaḥ nuki vināmaruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ . anaḥ nuki sati
GS24pmbhasuu:14665_0: vināmaḥ vidheyaḥ . akṣaṇvān . padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . ruḥ ca pratiṣedhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14665_1: . supathintaraḥ . naśchavyapraśān iti ruḥ prāpnoti . astu tarhi parādiḥ . parādau
GS24pmbhasuu:14665_2: vatvapratiṣedhaḥ avagrahaḥ ca . yadi parādiḥ vatvasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . akṣaṇvān
GS24pmbhasuu:14666: mādupadhāyāścamatorvo'yavādibhyaḥ iti vatvam prāpnoti . avagrahaḥ ca aniṣṭe deśe prāpnoti . akṣaṇvān . astu tarhi pūrvāntaḥ . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14667_0: anaḥ nuki vināmaruvidhipratiṣedhaḥ iti . bhatvāt siddham . bhasañjñā vaktavyā . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:14667_1: tarhi bhasañjñā allopo'naḥ iti allopaḥ prāpnoti . anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14667_2: chandasi . anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam chandasi vaktavyam . iha tarhi supathintaraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14667_3: nāntasya ṭiḥ taddhite lupyate iti lopaḥ prāpnoti . ghagrahaṇam ca . ghagrahaṇam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14667_4: kartavyam . tat tarhi idam bahu vaktavyam . nuk vaktavyaḥ . bhasañjñā ca vaktavyā
GS24pmbhasuu:14667_5: . anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve matubgrahaṇam chandasi vaktavyam . ghagrahaṇam ca kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14668: iti . na kartavyam . yat tāvat ucyate nuk vaktavyaḥ iti nukaḥ eṣaḥ parihāraḥ bhatvāt siddham iti . bhasañjñā vaktavyā iti kriyate nyāse eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14669: ayasmayādīni chandasi iti . yat api ucyate anaḥ tu prakṛtibhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:14670: matubgrahaṇam chandasi ghagrahaṇam ca kartavyam iti na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14671: ubhayasañjñāni api hi chandāṃsi dṛśyante . tat yathā . saḥ suṣṭubhā sa
GS24pmbhasuu:14672: ṛkvatā gaṇena . padatvāt kutvam bhatvāt jaśtvam na bhavati . evam iha api
GS24pmbhasuu:14673: padatvāt allopaṭilopau na bhatvāt vināmaruvidhipratiṣedhau bhaviṣyataḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14674: sidhyati . sūtram tarhi bhidyate . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14675: parādau vatvapratiṣedhaḥ avagrahaḥ ca iti . yat tāvat ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14676_0: vatvapratiṣedhaḥ iti nirdiśyamānasya ādeśāḥ bhavanti iti evam na bhaviṣyati . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14676_1: tarhi nirdiśyate tasya na prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . nuṭā vyavahitatvāt . asiddhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14676_2: nuṭ tasya asiddhatvāt bhaviṣyati . avagrahe api na lakṣaṇena padakārāḥ anuvartyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14678: (P_8,2.17) KA_III,398.11-15 Ro_V,382 īt rathinaḥ . rathinaḥ īt vaktavyaḥ . rathītaraḥ . bhūridāvnaḥ tuṭ . bhuridāvnaḥ tuṭ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14680: (P_8,2.18) KA_III,398.16-23 Ro_V,382-383 kṛpaṇādīnām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kṛpaṇaḥ kṛpāṇaḥ kṛpīṭam . vālamūlalaghvalamaḍgulīnām vā laḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14681: ram āpadyate iti vaktavyam . aśvavālaḥ aśvavāraḥ . mūladevaḥ mūradevaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14682: varuṇasya laghusyadaḥ varuṇasya raghusyadaḥ . alam bhaktāya aram bhaktāya
GS24pmbhasuu:14683: . subāhuḥ svaṅguliḥ subāhuḥ svaṅguriḥ . sañjñāchandasoḥ vā kapilakādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:14684: iti vaktavyam . kapirakaḥ kapilakaḥ . tilvirīkaḥ tilvilīkaḥ . romāṇi lomāni . pāṃsuram pāṃsulam . karma kalma . śukraḥ śuklaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14686: rephaviśeṣaṇam : ayatiparasya rephasya laḥ bhavati saḥ cet upasargasya bhavati iti . āhosvit upasargaviśeṣaṇam : ayatiparasya upasargasya yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14687: rephaḥ tasya laḥ bhavati iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . rephasya ayatau iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14688: cet pareḥ upasaṅkhyānam . rephasya ayatau iti cet pareḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14689: kartavyam . palyayate . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:14690: . plāyate palāyate . astu tarhi upasargaviśeṣaṇam . upasargasya iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:14691: ekādeśe aprasiddhiḥ . upasargasya iti cet ekādeśe aprasiddhiḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14692: plāyate palāyate . ekādeśe kṛte vyapavargābhāvāt na prāpnoti . antādivat bhāvena vyapavargaḥ . ubhayataḥ āśraye na antādivat . evam tarhi ekādeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14693: pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyapavargaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14694: pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti . doṣāḥ eva ete tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ tasya doṣaḥ saṃyogādilopalatvaṇatveṣu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14695_0: atha vā punaḥ astu rephaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam rephasya ayatau iti cet pareḥ upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14695_1: iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam kim plāyate palāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14695_2: iti . atra api akāreṇa vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . ekādeśe kṛte na asti vyavadhānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14695_3: . ekādeśaḥ pūrvavidhau sthānivat bhavati iti sthānivadbhāvāt vyavadhānam eva . pratiṣidhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14695_4: atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti . doṣāḥ eva ete tasyāḥ paribhāṣāyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14697: iha api yathā syāt . nigāryate nigālyate . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14698: aci iti ucyate na ca atra ajādim paśyāmaḥ . pratyayalakṣaṇena . varṇāśraye na asti pratyayalakṣaṇam . evam tarhi sthānivadbhāvāt bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14699: pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . girateḥ latve ṇau uktam . kim uktam . tasya doṣaḥ saṃyogādilopalatvaṇatveṣu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14700: (P_8,2.22.1) KA_III,400.3-4 Ro_V,385 yoge ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . pariyogaḥ paliyogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14701: (P_8,2.22.2) KA_III,400.5-24 Ro_V,385-387 saṅi latvasalopasaṃyogādilopakutvadīrghatvāni . saṅi iti prakṛtya
GS24pmbhasuu:14703: prayojanam girau giraḥ payaḥ dhāvati dviṣṭarām dṛṣatsthānam kāṣṭhaśaksthātā kruñcā dhuryaḥ iti . giṛau giraḥ iti atra acivibhāṣā iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14704: latvam prāpnoti . saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14705: uktam etat dhātoḥ svarūpagrahaṇe tatpratyaye kāryavijñānāt siddham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_0: payaḥ dhāvati iti atra dhica iti salopaḥ prāpnoti saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_1: api na asti prayojanam . vakṣyati etat dhisakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ iti . dviṣṭarām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_2: atra hrasvāt aṅgāt iti salopaḥ prāpnoti saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat api na
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_3: asti prayojanam . atra api sicaḥ iti eva anuvartiṣyate . dṛṣatsthānam iti atra jhalojhali
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_4: iti salopaḥ prāpnoti saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_5: atra api sicaḥ iti eva anuvartiṣyate . kāṣṭhaśaksthātā iti atra skoḥsaṃyogādyoranteca
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_6: iti kakāralopaḥ prāpnoti saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_7: . kāṣṭhaśak eva na asti kutaḥ yaḥ kāṣṭhaśaki tiṣṭhet . kruñcā iti atra coḥkuḥ jhali
GS24pmbhasuu:14706_8: iti kutvam prāpnoti saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14707: etat api na asti prayojanam . nipātanāt etat siddham . kim nipātanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14708_0: ṛtvigdadhṛksragdiguṣṇigañcuyujikruñcām iti . dhuryaḥ iti atra halica iti dīrghatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14708_1: prāpnoti saṅi iti vacanāt na bhavati . etat api na asti prayojanam . nabhakurchurām
GS24pmbhasuu:14710_0: pratiṣedhaḥ . saṃyogāntasya lope yaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dadhi atra madhu atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14710_1: iti . saṃyogādilope ca yaṇaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kākī artham vāsī artham . na
GS24pmbhasuu:14710_2: vā jhalaḥ lopāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14711: jhalaḥ lopāt . jhalaḥ lopaḥ saṃyogāntalopaḥ vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14712: bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt vā . atha vā bahiraṅgaḥ yaṇādeśaḥ antaraṅgaḥ lopaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14714_1: sagrahaṇam kartavyam . saṃyogāntalopaḥ sasya ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14714_2: . śreyān bhūyān jyāyān . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . paratvāt ruḥ prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14715_0: asiddhatvāt lopaḥ bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ruvidhānasya anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14715_1: . anavakāsaḥ ruḥ lopam bādheta . sāvakāśaḥ ruḥ . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . payaḥ śiraḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:14715_2: ca atra api jaśtvam prāpnoti . saḥ yathā eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14716: ruḥ jaśtvam bādhate evam lopam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14717_0: yena nāprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte jaśtve ruḥ ārabhyate lope punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14717_1: prāpte ca aprāpte ca . yogavibhāgāt siddham . atha vā yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:14718_0: saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ bhavati arāt . tataḥ sasya . sasya ca lopaḥ bhavati saṃyogāntasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14718_1: . kim artham punaḥ idam ucyate . pratiṣiddhārtham rubādhanārtham ca . atha vā yat
GS24pmbhasuu:14718_2: etat rāt sasya iti sagrahaṇam tat purastāt apakrakṣyate . saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ . tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14719: lopaḥ bhavati . tataḥ rāt . rāt sasya eva saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14720: atha vā rāt sasya iti atra saṃyogāntasya lopaḥ iti etat anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14721: (P_8,2.25) KA_III,402.3-403.24 Ro_V,389-391 dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14722_0: dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam . cakāddhi iti prayojanam . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:14722_1: mā bhūt . cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ . yadi tarhi sicaḥ lopaḥ iti ucyate . āśādhvam tu
GS24pmbhasuu:14722_2: katham te syāt . āśādhvam iti atra na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14723_0: jaśtvam sasya bhaviṣyati . jaśtvam atra sakārasya bhaviṣyati . sarvatra evam prasiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14723_1: syāt . sarvatra evam jaśtvena siddham syāt . iha api āyandhvam arandhvam iti jaśtvena
GS24pmbhasuu:14723_2: eva siddham . śrutiḥ ca api na bhidyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14724_0: śrutikṛtaḥ ca api na kaḥ cit bhedaḥ bhavati . luṅaḥ ca api na mūrdhanye grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14724_1: . tatra ayam api arthaḥ iṇaḥṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāndho'ṅgāt iti atra luṅgrahaṇam na kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14724_2: . iha api acyoḍḍhvam aploḍḍhvam iti ṣatve sicaḥ dhasya ṣṭutve ca kṛte jaśtvena siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14725: . idam eva rūpam syāt alaviḍḍhvam idam na syāt alavidhvam iti . tasmāt sicaḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . yadi tarhi sicaḥ grahaṇam kriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14726: ghasibhasyoḥ na sidhyet tu . ghasibhasyoḥ na sidhyati . sagdhiḥ ca me
GS24pmbhasuu:14727: sapītiḥ ca me, babdhām te harī dhānāḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam na tat . tasmāt dhica iti atra sicaḥ grahaṇam na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14728: katham cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ iti . evam tarhi sijgrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14729: katham sagdhiḥ ca me sapītiḥ ca me , babdham te harī dhānāḥ iti . iha tāvat sagdhiḥ iti na etat ghaseḥ rūpam . kim tarhi sagheḥ etat rūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14730_0: babdhām te harī dhānāḥ iti na etat bhaseḥ rūpam . kim tarhi bandheḥ etat rūpam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14730_1: chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ vā yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . atha vā chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14731: tubhyedam agne . tubhyam idam agne iti prāpte . āmbānām caruḥ . nāmbānām caruḥ iti prāpte . āvyādhinīḥ ugaṇāḥ . āvyādhinīḥ sugaṇāḥ iti prāpte .
GS24pmbhasuu:14732: iṣkartāram adhvarasya . niṣkartāram iti prāpte . śivā udrasya bheṣajī .
GS24pmbhasuu:14733_0: śivā rudrasya bheṣajīti prāpte . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . yat
GS24pmbhasuu:14733_1: etat rātsasya iti sakāragrahaṇam tat sicaḥ grahaṇam vijñāsyate . katham . rātsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14733_2: iti ucyate na ca anyaḥ rephāt paraḥ sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14734_0: asti anyat ataḥ sicaḥ . nanu ca ayam asti mātuḥ pituḥ iti . tasmāt sicaḥ grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14734_1: kartavyam . na kartavyam . kasmāt na bhavati cakāddhi palitam śiraḥ iti . iṣṭam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14734_2: etat saṅgṛhītam . cakādhi iti eva bhavitavyam . dhi sakāre sicaḥ lopaḥ . cakāddhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14734_3: iti prayojanam . āśādhvam tu katham te syāt . jaśtvam sasya bhaviṣyati . sarvatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14734_4: evam prasiddham syāt . śrutiḥ ca api
GS24pmbhasuu:14735: na bhidyate . luṅaḥ ca api na mūrdhanye grahaṇam . seṭi duṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14736: ghasibhasyoḥ na sidhyet tu . tasmāt sijgrahaṇam na tat . chāndasaḥ varṇalopaḥ vā yathā iṣkartāramadhvare . dāder dhātor ghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14737_0: (P_8,2.32.1) KA_III,403.25-404.2 Ro_V,392 iha dogdhā dogdhum iti ghatvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14737_1: ḍhatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat apavādaḥ vacanaprāmāṇyāt iti . atha
GS24pmbhasuu:14737_2: vā evam vakṣyāmi . haḥ ḍhaḥ adādeḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14738: haḥ ḍhaḥ bhavati adādeḥ . tataḥ dhātoḥ ghaḥ iti . dādeḥ iti anuvartate na iti nivṛttam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14739_0: (P_8,2.32.2) KA_III,404.3-8 Ro_V,392-393 dādeḥ iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14739_1: . adhok . kva tarhi syāt . mā sma dhok. na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dhātoḥ iti na eṣā dādisamānādhikaraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:14739_2: ṣaṣṭhī . dādeḥ dhātoḥ iti . kā tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14740: avayavayogā eṣā ṣaṣṭhī . dhātoḥ yaḥ dādiḥ avayavaḥ iti . sā ca avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14741: avayavayogā ṣaṣṭhī vijñeyā uttarārthā . kim prayojanam . ekācaḥ baśaḥ bhaṣ
GS24pmbhasuu:14742: jhaṣantasya sdhvoḥ iti iha api yathā syāt : gardabhayateḥ apratyayaḥ gardhap iti . yadi avayavayogā ṣaṣṭhī dogdhā dogdhum iti atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14743: . eṣaḥ api vyapadeśivadbhāvena dhātoḥ dādiḥ avayavaḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14744: (P_8,2.32.3) KA_III,404.9-11 Ro_V,393 hṛgrahoḥ bhaḥ chandasi hasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14745: hṛgrahoḥ chandasi hasya bhatvam vaktavyam . gardabhena sambharati . marut asya grabhītā . sāmidhenyaḥ jabhrire . udgrābham ca nigrābham ca brahma devāḥ avīvṛdhan .
GS24pmbhasuu:14746: (P_8,2.38.1) KA_III,404.12-24 Ro_V,393 kimarthaḥ cakāraḥ . sdhvoḥ iti etat anukṛṣyate . na etat asti prayojanam . siddham sdhvoḥ pūrveṇa eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:14747: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . abaśāditvāt . nanu ca jaśtve kṛte baśādiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14748: asiddham jaśtvam tasya asiddhatvāt na baśādiḥ . evam tarhi siddhakāṇḍe
GS24pmbhasuu:14749: paṭhitam abhyāsajaśtvacartvam ettvatukoḥ iti . ettvatukoḥ grahaṇam na
GS24pmbhasuu:14750: kariṣyate . abhyāsajaśtvacartvam siddham iti eva . evam api ajhaṣantatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14751: na prāpnoti . lope kṛte jhaṣantaḥ . sthānivadbhāvāt na jhaṣantaḥ . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . dadhaḥ tathoḥ anukarṣaṇānarthakyam sthānivatpratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14752: . dadhaḥ tathoḥ anukarṣaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14753_0: sthānivatpratiṣedhāt . pratiṣidhyate atra sthanivadbhāvaḥ pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:14753_1: iti . sa ca avaśyam pratiṣedhaḥ āśrayitavyaḥ . itarathā hi alope pratiṣedhaḥ . yaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14753_2: hi manyate anukarṣaṇasāmarthyāt me atra bhavati alope tena pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14753_3: syāt : dadhāti dadhāsi (P_8,2.38.2) KA_III,405.1-2 Ro_V,394 tathoḥ ca api grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14753_4: śakyam akartum . katham . jhali jhaṣantasya iti ucyate tathoḥ ca ayam jhali jhaṣantaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14754_0: (P_8,2.38.3) KA_III,405.3-7 Ro_V,394 atha api etat na asti pūrvatrāsiddhe na sthānivat
GS24pmbhasuu:14754_1: iti evam api na eva arthaḥ anukarṣaṇārthena cakāreṇa na api tathoḥ grahaṇena . ānantaryam
GS24pmbhasuu:14754_2: iha āśrīyate jhali jhaṣantasya iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14755_0: anānantaryam kva cit na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . lope sannipātakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14755_1: ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam anānantaryam alope na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14755_2: . yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat
GS24pmbhasuu:14757: (P_8,2.40) KA_III,405.8-12 Ro_V,394 adhaḥ iti kimartham . dhattaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14758_0: dhatthaḥ . adhaḥ iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati dhattaḥ dhatthaḥ iti . jaśtve
GS24pmbhasuu:14758_1: yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti dadhastathośca iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi jhalām jaśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14758_2: . jhalām jaśaḥ bhavanti dadhaḥ tathoḥ . tataḥ ante .
GS24pmbhasuu:14759: ante ca jhalām jaśaḥ bhavanti . tatra jaśtve kṛte ajhaṣantatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14761: caritam muditam . nanu ca radābhyām iti ucyamāne api atra prāpnoti . atra api rephadakārābhyām parā niṣṭhā . na rephadakārābhyām niṣṭhā viśeṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14762_0: kim tarhi . takāraḥ viśeṣyate . raphadakārābhyām uttarasya takārasya naḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14762_1: sa cet niṣṭhāyāḥ iti . atha pūrvagrahaṇam kimartham . niṣṭhādeśe pūrvagrahaṇam parasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14762_2: ādeśapratiṣedhārtham . niṣṭhādeśe pūrvagrahaṇam kriyate parasya ādeśaḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14762_3: . bhinnavadbhyām bhinnavadbhiḥ pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi parasya . pañcamīnirdiṣṭāt hi
GS24pmbhasuu:14763: (P_8,2.42.2) KA_III,406.11-407.7 Ro_V,396-397 vṛddhinimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ . vṛddhinimittāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14764_0: prayojanam kārtikṣaitiphaullayaḥ . kārtiḥ iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām radābhyām iti natvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14764_1: prāpnoti . kṣaitiḥ iti vṛddhau kṛtāyām kṣiyodīrghāt iti natvam prāpnoti . phaulliḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14765: ucyamānam na prāpnoti . atha ucyamāne api pratiṣedhe vṛddhinimittāt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:14766_0: katham idam vijñāyate . vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam vṛddhinimittāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14766_1: āhosvit vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt iti . kim ca
GS24pmbhasuu:14766_2: ataḥ . yadi vijñāyate vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:14767: vṛddhinimittāt iti kṣaitiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ kārtiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . atha vijñāyate vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ vṛddhinimittāt iti kārtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14768: saṅgṛhītaḥ kṣaitiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . ubhayathā ca phaulliḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat vṛddhiḥ eva nimittam vṛddhinimittam
GS24pmbhasuu:14769_0: vṛddhinimittāt iti . nanu ca uktam kṣaitiḥ saṅgrhītaḥ kārtiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ iti . kārtiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14769_1: ca saṅgṛhītaḥ . katham . vṛddhiḥ bhavati guṇaḥ bhavati iti rephaśirāḥ guṇavṛddhisañjñakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14769_2: abhinirvartate . atha vā punaḥ astu vṛddhiḥ nimittam asya saḥ ayam vṛddhinimittaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14770: kārtiḥ saṅgṛhītaḥ kṣaitiḥ asaṅgṛhītaḥ iti . kṣaitiḥ ca saṅgṛhītaḥ . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14771_0: . yat tat vṛddhiśāstram tasmin vṛddhiśabdaḥ vartate . saḥ tarhi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14771_1: . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14772: asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . evam ca kṛtvā latvam api siddham bhavati phaulliḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14773: (P_8,2.44) KA_III,407.8-18 Ro_V,397-398 ṛkāralvādibhyaḥ ktinniṣṭhāvat . ṛkāralvādibhyaḥ ktin niṣṭhāvat bhavati iti vaktavyam . kīrṇiḥ gīrṇiḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14774: lūniḥ dhūniḥ . dugvoḥ dīrghaḥ ca . dugvoḥ dīrghaḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14775: ādūnaḥ vigūnaḥ . pūñaḥ vināśe . pūñaḥ vināśe iti vaktavyam . pūnāḥ yavāḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14776: vināśe iti kimartham . pūtam dhānyam . sinoteḥ grāsakarmakartṛkasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14777: sinoteḥ grāsakarmakartṛkasya iti vaktavyam . sinaḥ grāsaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14778: grāsakarmakartṛkasya iti kimartham . sitā pāśena sūkarī .
GS24pmbhasuu:14780_0: akṣitam asi mā me kṣeṣṭhāḥ . dīrghāt iti śakyam akartum . kasmāt na bhavati akṣitam
GS24pmbhasuu:14780_1: asi mā me kṣeṣṭhāḥ iti . nirdeśāt eva idam abhivyaktam dīrghasya grahaṇam iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:14780_2: hrasvasya grahaṇam syāt kṣeḥ iti eva brūyāt . na atra nirdeśaḥ pramāṇaṃ śakyam kartum
GS24pmbhasuu:14780_3: . yathā eva atra aprāptā vibhaktiḥ evam iyaṅādeśaḥ api . na atra aprāptā vibhaktiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14780_4: . siddhā atra vibhaktiḥ prātipadikāt iti . katham prātipadikasañjñā . arthavat prātipadikam
GS24pmbhasuu:14780_5: iti . nanu ca adhātuḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ dhātuḥ dhātoḥ eṣaḥ anukaraṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14781_0: prakṛtivat anukaraṇam bhavati iti evam iyaṅādeśaḥ bhaviṣyati . yadi prakṛtivat anukaraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14781_1: bhavati iti ucyate svādyutpattiḥ na prāpnoti . evam tarhi ātideśikānām svāśrayāṇi
GS24pmbhasuu:14781_2: api na nivartante . atha api etat na asti ātideśikānām svāśrayāṇi api na nivartante
GS24pmbhasuu:14781_3: iti evam api na doṣaḥ . avaśyam atra sarvataḥ nairdeśikī vibhaktiḥ vaktavyā . tat
GS24pmbhasuu:14781_4: yathā . nerviśaḥ parivyavebhyaḥkriyaḥ viparābhyāñjeḥ iti . atha api etat na asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14782: anukaraṇam bhavati iti evam api na doṣaḥ . dhātoḥ ajādau yat rūpam tat anukriyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14783_0: (P_8,2.48) KA_III,408.11-409.2 Ro_V,400-401 añceḥ natve vyaktapratiṣedhaḥ . añceḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14783_1: natve vyaktasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vyaktam anṛtam kathayati iti . añjivijñānāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14783_2: siddham . na etat añceḥ rūpam . añjeḥ etat rūpam . añcatyarthaḥ vai gamyate . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14783_3: punaḥ añcatyarthaḥ . añcatiḥ prakāśane vartate . añcitam gacchati . prakāśayati ātmānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14784: na vai loke añcitam gacchati iti prakāśanam gamyate . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14785: samādhānam gamyate . samāhitaḥ bhūtvā gacchati iti . evam tarhi añcateḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14786: aṅkaḥ aṅkaḥ ca prakāśanam . aṅkitāḥ gāvaḥ iti ucyate anyābhyaḥ gobhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14787: prakāśyante . añcatyarthaḥ iti cet añjeḥ tadarthatvāt siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:14788: añcatyarthaḥ iti cet añjiḥ api añcatyarthe vartate . katham punaḥ anyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14789_0: nāma anyasya arthe vartate . katham añjiḥ añcatyarthe vartate . anekārthāḥ api dhātavaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14789_1: bhavanti . asti punaḥ kva cit anyatra api añjiḥ añcatyarthe vartate . asti iti āha
GS24pmbhasuu:14789_2: . añjeḥ añjanam añjanam ca prakāśanam . aṅkteṣiṇī iti ucyate yat tat sitam ca asitam
GS24pmbhasuu:14789_3: ca etat prakāśayati . tathā añjeḥ vyañjanam vyañjanam ca prakāśanam . yat tat snehena
GS24pmbhasuu:14789_4: madhureṇa ca jaḍīkṛtānām indriyāṇām svasmin ātmani vyavasthāpanam saḥ rāgaḥ tat vyañjanam
GS24pmbhasuu:14789_5: . anvartham khalu api nirvacanam . vyajyate anena iti vyañjanam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14790: (P_8,2.50) KA_III,409.3-6 Ro_V,401-402 avātābhidhāne . avātābhidhāne iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt . nirvāṇaḥ agniḥ vātena . nirvāṇaḥ pradīpaḥ vātena iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14791_0: (P_8,2.55.1) KA_III,409.7-16 Ro_V,402-403 anupasargāt iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14791_1: parikṛśam iti . kṛśeḥ kaḥ eṣaḥ vihitaḥ igupadhāt . na etat niṣṭhāntam . kim tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:14791_2: kṛśaḥ eṣaḥ igupadhāt kaḥ vihitaḥ . svare hi doṣaḥ bhavati parikṛśe . na evam śakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14791_3: . iha hi parikṛśaḥ iti svare doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14792: syāt . antasthāthaghañktājabitrakāṇām . iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:14793: padasya lopaḥ vihitaḥ iti matam . evam tarhi padasya lopaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14794: paryāgataḥ kārśyena parikṛśaḥ . jagatī anūnā bhavati hi rucirā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14796: upasaṅkhyānam . phaleḥ latve utpūrvasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam :
GS24pmbhasuu:14797: utphullaḥ anṛtam kathayati . atyalpam idam ucyate utpūrvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14798_0: utphullasamphullayoḥ iti vaktavyam : utphullaḥ , samphullaḥ . kṛśeḥ kaḥ eṣaḥ vihitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14798_1: igupadhāt . svare hi doṣaḥ bhavati parikṛśe . padasya lopaḥ vihitaḥ iti matam . jagati
GS24pmbhasuu:14799: (P_8,2.56) KA_III,410.1-11 Ro_V,403-404 kim ayam vidhiḥ āhosvit pratiṣedhaḥ . kim ca ataḥ . yadi tāvat vidhiḥ nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14800: na kartavyam . prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14801: radābhyānniṣṭhātonaḥpūrvasyacadaḥ iti . tat vā anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum . atha pratiṣedhaḥ hrīgrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14802: anarthakam na hi etasmāt vidhiḥ asti . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat vidhiḥ . nanu ca uktam nakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14803: prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . radābhyānniṣṭhātonaḥpūrvasyacadaḥ iti . tat vā anekena nipātanena vyavacchinnam na śakyam anuvartayitum iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14804_0: sambandham anuvartiṣyate . atha vā kriyate nyāse eva . dvinakārakaḥ nirdeśaḥ . nudavidondatrāghrāhrībhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14804_1: anyatarasyām n na dhyākhyāpṝmūrchimadām iti . atha vā punaḥ astu pratiṣedhaḥ . nanu
GS24pmbhasuu:14805: hrīgrahaṇam anarthakam na hi etasmāt vidhiḥ asti iti . na anarthakam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14806: etat eva jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati etasmāt vidhiḥ iti yat ayam hrīgrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14808: paṭhyante . tatra na jñāyate kasya nityam natvam kasya vibhāṣā kasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14809: pratiṣedhaḥ kasya iṭ iti . ataḥ uttaram paṭhati . yasya videḥ śnaśakau
GS24pmbhasuu:14810: taparatve tanavacane tad u vāpratiṣedhau . śnavikaraṇasya vibhāṣā śavikaraṇasya pratiṣedhaḥ . śyavikaraṇāt navidhiḥ chiditulyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14811: śyanvikaraṇāt videḥ navidhiḥ chidinā tulyaḥ . lugvikaraṇaḥ vali paryavapannaḥ . lugvikaraṇaḥ vidiḥ valādau paryavapannaḥ . eṣa evārthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14812: yayoḥ vidyoḥ śnaśau uktau tayoḥ natvasya vānañau . yayoḥ tu śya~llukau
GS24pmbhasuu:14813: tābhyām chidivac ca iṭ ca iṣyate . aparaḥ āha : vetteḥ tu viditaḥ niṣṭhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14814: vidyateḥ vinnaḥ iṣyate . vintteḥ vinnaḥ ca vittaḥ ca vittaḥ bhogeṣu vindateḥ . bhittaṃ śakalam
GS24pmbhasuu:14815_0: (P_8,2.59) KA_III,411.3-8 Ro_V,405-406 bhittam śakalam iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14815_1: bhittam bhinnam iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sarvatra eva atra bhidiḥ vidāraṇasāmānye vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:14815_2: tatra avaśyam viśeṣārthinā viśeṣaḥ anuprayoktavyaḥ . bhinnam kim bhittam iti . tatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14816: śakalasya anarthakaḥ prayogaḥ syāt . śakalena ca api abhihite na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14819_0: kvinaḥ kuḥ iti eva ucyeta . kvinaḥ kuḥ iti iyati ucyamāne vakārasya eva kutvam prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:14819_1: . nanu ca lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . anavakāśam kutvam lopam bādheta . sāvakāśam kutvam
GS24pmbhasuu:14819_2: . kaḥ avakāśaḥ . anantyaḥ . katham punaḥ sati antye anantyasya kutvam syāt . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14820: kutvam bhavati iti yat ayam kvinaḥ kuḥ iti kavarganirdeśam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14821: itarathā hi tadguṇam eva ayam nirdiśet . idam tarhi prayojanam yebhyaḥ kvinpratyayaḥ vidhīyate teṣām anyapratyayāntānām api padānte kutvam yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14822: syāt . mā naḥ asrāk . mā naḥ adrāk . kvinaḥ kuḥ iti vaktavye pratyayagrahaṇam kṛtam . kvinpratyayasya sarvatra padānte kutvam iṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14823: (P_8,2.68) KA_III,411.19-22 Ro_V,408 ruvidhau ahnaḥ rūparātrirathantareṣu upasaṅkhyānam . ruvidhau ahnaḥ rūparātrirathantareṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14824: upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . ahorūpam ahorātraḥ ahorathantaram sāma .
GS24pmbhasuu:14826_0: pratiṣedhaḥ aluki . asupi rādeśe upasarjanasamāse aluki pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . dīrghāhā
GS24pmbhasuu:14826_1: nidāghaḥ iti . siddham tu supi pratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . supi pratiṣedhāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14826_2: . prasajya ayam pratiṣedhaḥ supi na iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14827: iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . ahan dadāti . ahan bhuṅkte iti . luki ca uktam
GS24pmbhasuu:14828: . kim uktam . ahnaḥ ravidhau lumatā lupte pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14829_0: (P_8,2.70) KA_III,412.10-15 Ro_V,409 chandasi bhāṣāyām ca pracetasaḥ rājani upasaṅkhyānam
GS24pmbhasuu:14829_1: . chandasi bhāṣāyām ca pracetasaḥ rājani upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . pracetaḥ rājan
GS24pmbhasuu:14829_2: . pracetar rājan . aharādīnām patyādiṣu upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . aharpatiḥ ahaḥpatiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14830: (P_8,2.72) KA_III,412.16-413.10 Ro_V,409-410 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14831: papivān tasthivān iti . sasya iti vartate . evam api atra prāpnoti . lope kṛte na bhaviṣyati . anavakāśam datvam lopam bādheta . sāvakāśam datvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14832: kaḥ avakāśaḥ . papivadbhyām papivadbhiḥ iti . atra api ruḥ prāpnoti . tat yathā eva rum bādhate evam lopam api bādheta . na bādhate . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14833: yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte rau datvam ārabhyate lope punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . yadi tarhi sasya iti vartate anaḍudbhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14834: anaḍudbhiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . vacanāt anaḍuhi bhaviṣyati . yadi evam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14835: anaḍuhaḥ datve nakārapratiṣedhaḥ . anaḍuhaḥ datve nakārasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . anaḍvān . siddham tu pratipadavidhānāt numaḥ . siddham etat .
GS24pmbhasuu:14836_0: katham . numaḥ pratipadavidhānasāmarthyāt datvam na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi yat yat
GS24pmbhasuu:14836_1: anaḍuhaḥ prāptam tat tat numaḥ pratipadavidhānasāmarthyāt bādhyate rutvam api na
GS24pmbhasuu:14836_2: prāpnoti . anaḍvān tatra iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yam vidhim prati upadeśaḥ anarthakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14836_3: saḥ vidhiḥ bādhyate yasya tu vidheḥ nimittam eva na asau bādhyate . datvam ca prati
GS24pmbhasuu:14836_4: numaḥ pratipadavidhiḥ anarthakaḥ roḥ punaḥ nimittam eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:14837_0: (P_8,2.78.1) KA_III,413.11-19 Ro_V,411 kimartham idam ucyate na hali iti eva siddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14837_1: . na sidhyati . dhātoḥ iti tatra vartate tatra rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14837_2: . rephavakārāntasya dhātoḥ iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam pūrvasmin yoge rephavakārābhyām
GS24pmbhasuu:14837_3: dhātuḥ viśeṣyate . iha mā bhūt . agniḥ vāyuḥ iti . evam tarhi pūrvasmin yoge yat
GS24pmbhasuu:14837_4: dhātugrahaṇam tat uttaratra nivṛttam . evam api kurkuraḥ murmuraḥ iti atra api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14838: evam tarhi anuvartate tatra dhātugrahaṇam na tu rephavakārābhyām dhātuḥ viśeṣyate . kim tarhi . ik viśeṣyate . rephavakārāntasya ikaḥ dhātoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14839: evam api kurkurīyati murmurīyati iti atra prāpnoti . tasmāt dhātuḥ eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14840: viśeṣyaḥ dhātau ca viśeṣyamāṇe upadhāyām ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14841_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . upadhādīrghatve abhyāsajivṛicaturṇām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . riryatuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14842: caturyitā caturyitum . uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ ca . uṇādīnām ca pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14843: vaktavyaḥ . kiryoḥ giryoḥ iti . abhyāsapratiṣedhaḥ tāvat na vaktavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14844: hali iti ucyate na ca atra halādim paśyāmaḥ . yaṇādeśe kṛte prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14845: sthānivadbhāvāt na bhaviṣyati . pratiṣidhyate atra sthānivadbhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14846_0: dīrghavidhim prati na sthānivat iti . na eṣaḥ asti pratiṣedhaḥ . uktam etat pratiṣedhe
GS24pmbhasuu:14846_1: svaradirghayalopeṣu lopājādeśaḥ iti . jivripratiṣedhaḥ ca na vaktavyaḥ . uṇādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14846_2: avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . caturyitā caturyitum iti supi na iti vartate . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:14846_3: evam gīrbhyām gīrbhiḥ iti aprasiddhiḥ . na supaḥ vibhaktivipariṇāmāt gīrbhyām gīrbhiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14846_4: iti adoṣaḥ . uṇādipratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti parihṛtam etat uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni
GS24pmbhasuu:14847_0: (P_8,2.80.1) KA_III,414.8-19 Ro_V,412-413 adasaḥ anosreḥ . adasaḥ anosreḥ iti vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14847_1: . kim idam anosreḥ iti . anokārasya asakārasya arephakasya iti . anokārasya . adaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14848: arephakasya . adaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . avibhaktikaḥ nirdeśaḥ . adas , o , iti . okārāt paraḥ patiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14849: pūrvabhūtaḥ . tataḥ sakāraḥ . tataḥ rephaḥ iti . atha vā na evam vijñāyate adasaḥ asakārasya iti . katham tarhi . akāraḥ asya sakārasya saḥ ayam asiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14850: aseḥ iti . yadi evam amumuyaṅ iti na sidhyati adadryaṅ iti prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14851: adamuyaṅ iti bhavitavyam anantyavikāre antyasadeśasya kāryam bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14852: adasaḥ adreḥ pṛthak mutvam kecit icchanti latvavat . kecit antyasadeśasya . na iti eke . aseḥ hi dṛśyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14854: aprāptiḥ . tatra padādhikārāt apadāntasya na prāpnoti . amuyā amuyoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14855: siddham tu sakārapratiṣedhāt . siddham etat . katham . sakārapratiṣedhāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:14856: yat ayam aseḥ iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ apadāntasya api bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14858: dādgrahaṇam antyapratiṣedhārtham . dādgrahaṇam kriyate antyapratiṣedhārtham . alaḥ antyasya mā bhūt iti . amuyā amuyoḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14859: (P_8,2.81) KA_III,415.5-10 Ro_V,414 īttvam bahuvacanāntasya . īttvam bahuvacanāntasya iti vaktavyam . bahuvacane iti iyati ucyamāne iha eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14860: syāt . amībhiḥ amīṣu. iha na syāt . amī atra . amī āsate . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na idam pāribhāṣikasya bahuvacanasya grahaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14861: kim tarhi . anvarthagrahaṇam etat . bahūnām arthānām vacanam bahuvacanam bahuvacane iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14864: . padādhikāraḥ nivartyate . na hi kākaḥ vāśyate iti adhikārāḥ nivartante .
GS24pmbhasuu:14865: doṣaḥ khalu api syāt yadi vākyādhikāraḥ padādhikāram nivartayet . iṣyante eva uttaratra padakāryāṇi tāni na sidhyanti . naśchavyapraśān iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14866: padanivṛttyartham iti na evam vijñāyate padasya nivṛttyartham padanivṛttyartham iti . kim tarhi. pade nivṛttyartham padanivṛttyartham
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_0: iti . vākye yāvanti padāni teṣām sarveṣām ṭeḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti . iṣyate ca vākyapadayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_1: antyasya syāt iti tat ca antareṇa yatnam na sidhyati iti evamarthaḥ vākyādhikāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_2: . atha ṭigrahaṇam kimartham . ṭigrahaṇam alaḥ antyaniyame vyañjanāntārtham . ṭigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_3: kriyate alaḥ antyaniyame vyañjanāntasya api yathā syāt . agnici3t somasu3t . asti
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_4: prayojanam etat kim tarhi iti . sarvādeśaprasaṅgaḥ tu . sarvādeśaḥ tu ṭeḥ plutaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_5: prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam . acaḥ iti vacanāt antyasya na antyasya iti vacanāt acaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_6: ucyate ca plutaḥ saḥ sarvādeśaḥ prāpnoti . uktam vā . kim uktam . hrasvaḥ dīrghaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14867_7: plutaḥ iti yatra brūyāt acaḥ iti etat tatra upasthitam draṣṭavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14870: kuśalī asi tuṣajaka . atyalpam idam ucyate : asūdre iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14871: aśūdrastryasūyakeṣu . aśūdrastryasūyakeṣu iti vaktavyam . tatra śūdre udāhṛtam . striyām : gārgī aham , bhoḥ āyuṣmatī bhava gārgi . asūyake :
GS24pmbhasuu:14872: sthālī aham , bhoḥ āyuṣmān edhi sthāli3n . na eṣā mama sañjñā sthālī iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14873: kim tarhi daṇḍinyāyaḥ mama vivakṣitaḥ . saḥ vaktavyaḥ . sthālī aham bhoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14874: āyuṣmān edhi sthālin . na mama daṇḍinyāyaḥ vivakṣitaḥ . kim tarhi sañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:14875: mama eṣā . asūyakaḥ tvam asi jālma na tvam pratyabhivādam arhasi bhidyasva
GS24pmbhasuu:14878: bhorājanyaviśām vā iti vaktavyam . devadattaḥ aham bhoḥ āyuṣmān edhi devadatta bho3ḥ . devadatta bhoḥ . bhoḥ . rājanya . indravarmā aham bhoḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14881: (P_8,2.83.3) KA_III,416.23-417.5 Ro_V,417-418 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14882: devadatta kuśalī asi iti . iha kim cit ucyate kim cit pratyucyate .

GS24pmbhasuu:14883_1: bhavitavyam na ca atra pradhānastham ṭisañjñam . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti . ādheyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14883_2: agni3ḥ na ādheya3ḥ iti . na etat vicāryate
GS24pmbhasuu:14884: ādheyaḥ na ādheyaḥ agniḥ cet bhavati iti . kim tarhi . iha agnisādhanā kriyā vicāryate ādheyaḥ agniḥ na ādheyaḥ iti . yadi evam dvitīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14885: agniśabdasya prayogaḥ prāpnoti . uktārthānām aprayogaḥ iti na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14886_0: yadi evam ādheyaśabdasya api tarhi dvitīyasya prayogaḥ na prāpnoti uktārthānām aprayogaḥ

GS24pmbhasuu:14888: (P_8,2.84) KA_III,417.6-14 Ro_V,419 dūrāt hūte iti ucyate dūraśabdaḥ ca ayam anavasthitapadārthakaḥ . tat eva hi kam cit prati dūram kam cit
GS24pmbhasuu:14889: prati antikam bhavati . evam hi kaḥ cit kam cit āha . eṣaḥ pārśvataḥ karakaḥ tam ānaya iti . saḥ āha . utthāya gṛhāṇa dūram na śakṣyāmi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14890: aparaḥ āha : dūram mathurāyāḥ pāṭaliputram iti . saḥ āha . na dūram idam
GS24pmbhasuu:14891_0: antikam iti . evam eṣaḥ dūraśabdaḥ anavasthitapadārthakaḥ tasya anavasthitapadārthakatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14891_1: na jñāyate kasyām avasthāyām plutyā bhavitavyam iti . evam tarhi hvayatinā ayam nirdeśaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14891_2: kriyate . hvayatiprasaṅge yat dūram . kim punaḥ tat . tatra prākṛtāt prayatnāt prayatnaviśeṣe
GS24pmbhasuu:14891_3: upādīyamāne sandehaḥ bhavati śroṣyati na śroṣyati iti tat dūram iha avagamyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14893: haiheprayoge haihegrahaṇam haihayoḥ plutyartham . haiheprayoge ḥaihegrahaṇam kriyate haihayoḥ plutiḥ yathā syāt . devadatta hai3 .

GS24pmbhasuu:14895_1: prayogagrahaṇam kriyate arthavadgrahaṇe anarthakayoḥ api yathā syāt . devadatta hai3
GS24pmbhasuu:14896: kimartham . punaḥ haihegrahaṇam anantyārtham . punaḥ haihegrahaṇam kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14897: anantyayoḥ api yathā syāt . hai3 devadatta . he3 devadatta iti .

GS24pmbhasuu:14900: antyasya plutaḥ prāpnoti . de3vadatta . kim kāraṇam . anyena vihitatvāt .

GS24pmbhasuu:14930_3: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ubhayavivṛddhiprasaṅgāt iti na evam vijñāyate ubhayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14931: vivṛddhiḥ ubhayavivṛddhiḥ ubhayavivṛddhiprasaṅgāt iti . katham tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:14932_0: ubhayoḥ vivṛddhiḥ asmin saḥ ayam ubhayavivṛddhiḥ ubhayavivṛddhiprasaṅgāt iti . imau
GS24pmbhasuu:14932_1: aicau samāhāravarṇau mātrā avarṇasya mātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ iti tayoḥ plutaḥ ucyamāne
GS24pmbhasuu:14933: abhivardhamānaḥ garbhaḥ sarvāṅgaparipūrṇaḥ vardhate . asti prayojanam etat
GS24pmbhasuu:14934: . kim tarhi iti . tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ . tatra ayatheṣṭam prasajyeta .
GS24pmbhasuu:14935: caturmātraḥ plutaḥ prāpnoti . siddham tu idutoḥ dīrghavacanāt . siddham etat . katham . idutoḥ dīrghaḥ bhavati iti vaktavyam . tat etat katham
GS24pmbhasuu:14936: kṛtvā siddham bhavati . yadi samaḥ pravibhāgaḥ mātrā avarṇasya mātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:14937: ivarṇovarṇayoḥ . atha hi ardhamātrā avarṇasya adhyardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ ardhatṛtīyamātraḥ prāpnoti . atha hi adhyardhamātrā
GS24pmbhasuu:14938_0: avarṇasya ardhamātrā ivarṇovarṇayoḥ ardhacaturthamātraḥ prāpnoti . sūtram ca bhidyate
GS24pmbhasuu:14938_1: . yathānyāsam eva astu . nanu ca uktam tatra ayatheṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ iti . tatra sauryabhagavatā
GS24pmbhasuu:14938_2: uktam aniṣṭijñaḥ vāḍavaḥ paṭhati . iṣyate eva caturmātraḥ plutaḥ .

GS24pmbhasuu:14947_1: āha . tat idutoḥ grahaṇam kartavyam . na kartavyam . prkṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14947_2: . pūrvasya ardhasya aduttarasya idutau iti . tat vai prathamānirdiṣṭam ṣaṣṭhīnirdiṣṭena

GS24pmbhasuu:14949_0: na ikaḥ yaṇ aci iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . asiddhaḥ plutaḥ plutavikārau ca imau
GS24pmbhasuu:14949_1: . siddhaḥ plutaḥ svarasandhiṣu . katham jñāyate . yat ayam plutaḥ prakṛtyā iti plutasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14949_2: prakṛtibhāvam śāsti . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . sataḥ hi kāryiṇaḥ kāryeṇa bhavitavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14950: dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham . dīrghatvam śākalam ca mā bhūt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14951: agnā3yindram . paṭā3vudakam . etat api na asti prayojanam . ārabhyate plutapūrvasya yaṇādeśaḥ plutapurvasya dīrghaśākalapratiṣedhārtham iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14952: tat na vaktavyam bhavati . avaśyam tat vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau
GS24pmbhasuu:14953: aplutavikārau tadartham . bho3yindra . bho3yiha iti . yadi tarhi tasya
GS24pmbhasuu:14954: nibandhanam asti tat eva vaktavyam idam na vaktavyam . idam api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14956_0: udāttasvaritayoryaṇaḥsvarito'nudāttasya iti eṣaḥ svaraḥ prasajyeta . anena punaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14956_1: sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati . yadi tarhi asya nibandhanam asti idam eva vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14956_2: tat na vaktavyam . nanu ca uktam tat api avaśyam
GS24pmbhasuu:14957: vaktavyam yau plutapūrvau idutau aplutavikārau tadartham bho3yindra
GS24pmbhasuu:14958_0: bho3yiha iti . chāndasam etat dṛṣṭānuvidhiḥ chandasi bhavati . yat tarhi na chāndasam
GS24pmbhasuu:14958_1: . bho3yindram sāma gāyati . eṣaḥ api chandasi dṛṣṭasya anuprayogaḥ iti . kim nu yaṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:14958_2: bhavati iha na siddham yvau idutoḥ yat ayam vidadhāti . tau ca mama svarasandhiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:14958_3: siddhau śākaladīrghavidhī tu nivartyau .1. ik tu yadā bhavati plutapūrvaḥ tasya yaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14958_4: vidadhāti apavādam . tena tayoḥ ca na śākaladīrghau yaṇsvarabādhanam eva tu hetuḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14960: upasaṅkhyānam . matuvasaḥ rādeśe vanaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . yaḥ tvā āyantam vasunā prātaritvaḥ . ibhāṣā bhavadbhagavadaghavatām ot ca avasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14961: chandasi bhāṣāyām ca bhavat bhagavat aghavat iti eteṣām vibhāṣā ruḥ vaktavyaḥ ot ca avasya vaktavyaḥ . bhoḥ , bhavan . bhagoḥ , bhagavan .
GS24pmbhasuu:14963_0: (P_8,3.1.2) KA_III,424.6-10 Ro_V,431-432 sambuddhau iti ucyate tatra idam na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:14963_1: . bhoḥ brāhmaṇāḥ iti . tathā vibhaktau liṅgaviśiṣṭagrahaṇam na iti iha na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:14963_2: . bhoḥ brāhmaṇi . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . avyayam eṣaḥ bhoḥśabdaḥ na eṣā bhavataḥ pravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14963_3: . katham avyayatvam . vibhaktisvarapratirūpakāḥ ca nipātāḥ bhavanti iti nipātasañjñā
GS24pmbhasuu:14963_4: nipātaḥ avyayam iti avyayasañjñā (P_8,3.5-6, 12) KA_III,424.11-416.8 Ro_V,432-434
GS24pmbhasuu:14964_0: sampuṅkānām satvam vaktavyam . saṃskartā puṃskāmā kāṃs kān iti . ruvidhau hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14964_1: . ruvidhau hi sati aniṣṭam prasajyeta . iha tāvat saṃskartā iti vā śari iti prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:14964_2: . puṃskāmā iti idudupadhasya iti ṣatvam prasajyeta . kāṃs kān iti kupvoḥ hkaḥ prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:14964_3: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . kriyate nyāse eva . samaḥ suṭi iti dvisakārakaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14964_4: nirdeśaḥ : samaḥ suṭi sakāraḥ bhavati . tat prakṛtam uttaratra
GS24pmbhasuu:14965: anuvartiṣyate . yadi tat anuvartate naśchavyapraśān iti atra api prāpnoti . sambandham anuvartiṣyate . samaḥsuṭi . pumaḥ khayi ampare saḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:14966: naḥ chavi apraśān ruḥ bhavati pumaḥ khayi ampare sakāraḥ . ubhayatharkṣu dīrghādaṭisamānapāde nṝnpe svatavānpāyau ruḥ bhavati pumaḥ khayi ampare
GS24pmbhasuu:14967: sakāraḥ . kān āmreḍite sakāraḥ . pumaḥ khayi ampare iti nivṛttam . samaḥ vā lopam eke icchanti : saṃskartā saṃskartā .
GS24pmbhasuu:14969: ḍhalope apadāntagrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . śvaliṭ ḍhaukate .
GS24pmbhasuu:14970: guḍaliṭ ḍhaukate . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . jaśtvam atra bādhakam bhaviṣyati . jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra ḍhasya abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14971: apavādaprasaṅgaḥ . jaśbhāvāt iti cet uttaratra ḍhakārasya abhāvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14972: asiddhatvāt apavādaḥ ayam vijñāyate . kasya . jaśtvasya . tasmāt siddhavacanam . tasmāt siddhatvam vaktavyam . kasya . ṣṭutvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:14973: saṅgrahaṇam vā . saṅgrahaṇam vā kartavyam . saṅi ḍhaḥ iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14974: tattarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . ānantaryam iha āśrīyate ḍhakārasya ḍhakāre iti . kva cit ca sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14975: anānantaryam kva cit ca na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam . ṣṭutve sannipātakṛtam ānantaryam jaśtve na eva sannipātakṛtam na api śāstrakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:14976: . yatra kutaḥ cit eva ānantaryam tat āśrayiṣyāmaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14978: visarjanīyaḥ anuttarapade iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . nārkuṭaḥ nārpatyaḥ iti . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14980_0: asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . na eṣaḥ yuktaḥ parihāraḥ . antaraṅgam bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:14980_1: iti pratidvandvabhāvinau etau pakṣau . sati antaraṅge bahiraṅgam sati bahiraṅge antargam
GS24pmbhasuu:14980_2: . na ca atra antaraṅgabahiraṅgayoḥ yugapat samavasthānam asti . kim kāraṇam . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14980_3: . na ca anabhinirvṛtte bahiraṅge antaraṅgam prāpnoti . tatra nimittam eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14981_0: bahiraṅgam antaraṅgasya . animittam bahiraṅgam antaraṅgasya . kim kāraṇam . asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:14981_1: . katham asiddhatvam yāvatā pūrvatra asiddham iti asiddhā paribhāṣā . asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:14981_2: antaraṅge . katham . kāryakālam sañjñāparibhāṣam iti kharavasānayorvisarjanīyaḥ upasthitam
GS24pmbhasuu:14981_3: idam bhavati asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti . evam eṣā siddhā paribhāṣā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:14982_0: kutaḥ nu khalu etat dvayoḥ paribhāṣayoḥ sāvakāśayoḥ samavasthitayoḥ pūrvatra asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14982_1: iti ca asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti ca pūrvatrāsiddham iti etām upamṛdya asiddham
GS24pmbhasuu:14982_2: bahiraṅgam antaraṅge iti etayā vyavasthā bhaviṣyati na punaḥ asiddham bahiraṅgam
GS24pmbhasuu:14982_3: antaraṅge iti etām upamṛdya purvatrāsiddham iti etayā vyavasthā syāt . ataḥ kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:14982_4: ataḥ ayuktaḥ parihāraḥ na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:14983: (P_8,3.16) KA_III,426.20-22 Ro_V,439 kimartham idam ucyate na kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti eva siddham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14984: roḥ eva supi na anyasya supi . kva mā bhūt . gīrṣu dhūrṣu .
GS24pmbhasuu:14986_0: abhāvāt . aśgrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . anyatra abhāvāt . na hi anyatra ruḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:14986_1: asti anyat ataḥ aśaḥ . nanu ca ayam asti. chandaḥsu payaḥsu iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:14986_2: sukāraparaḥ eva udāhriyate na punaḥ ayam vṛkṣaḥ tatra plakṣaḥ tatra iti . asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:14987_0: bhaviṣyati . iha api tarhi visarjanīye kṛte na bhaviṣyati . chandaḥsu payaḥsviti
GS24pmbhasuu:14987_1: . sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . nanu ca iha api sthānivadbhāvāt prāpnoti . vṛkṣaḥ tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:14988: atha ayam alvidhiḥ syāt śakyam aśgrahaṇam avaktum . bāḍham śakyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:14989: alvidhiḥ tarhi bhaviṣyati . katham . idam asti rori iti . tataḥ vakṣyāmi kharavasānayoḥ visarjanīyaḥ raḥ . tataḥ roḥ supi visarjanīyaḥ raḥ iti eva
GS24pmbhasuu:14990: . uttarārtham tarhi aśgrahaṇam kartavyam halisarveṣām hali aśi iti yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:14991: syāt . iha mā bhūt : vṛkṣavayateḥ apratyayaḥ vṛkṣav karoti .
