GS24pmbhasuu:14997_1: vā iti vaktavyam . kiyhyaḥ kim hyaḥ . kivhvalayati kim hvalayati . kilhlādayati kim
GS24pmbhasuu:14997_2: hlādayati (P_8,3.28-32) KA_III,428.5-429.6 Ro_V,443-444 iha dhuḍādiṣu kecit
GS24pmbhasuu:14998: pūrvāntāḥ kecit parādayaḥ . yadi punaḥ sarve eva pūrvāntāḥ syuḥ sarve eva parādayaḥ . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . dhugādiṣu ṣṭutvaṇatvapratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:14999: dhugādiṣu satsu ṣṭutvaṇatvayoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ṣṭutvasya tāvat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15000: śvaliṭtsāye . madhuliṭtsāye . ṣṭunāṣṭuḥ iti ṣṭutvam prāpnoti . parādau punaḥ sati napadāntāṭṭoranām iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . ṇatvasya .
GS24pmbhasuu:15001: kurvannāste . kṛṣannāste . raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade it ṇatvam prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15002_0: parādau punaḥ sati padāntasya na iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . santu tarhi parādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15002_1: . parādau chatvaṣatvavidhipratiṣedhaḥ . yadi parādayaḥ chatvam vidheyam ṣatvam ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15003: . kṛṣañcchete . yat hi tat śaścho'ṭi iti jhayaḥ padāntāt iti evam tat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15004: kim punaḥ kāraṇam jhayaḥ padāntāt iti evam tat . iha mā bhūt . purā krūrasya visṛpaḥ virapśin iti . ṣatvam ca pratiṣedhyam . pratyaṅksiñca .
GS24pmbhasuu:15005: udaṅksiñca . ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . pūrvānte punaḥ sati
GS24pmbhasuu:15006: sātpadādyoḥ iti pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati . tasmāt santu yathānyāsam eva kecit pūrvāntāḥ kecit parādayaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15007: (P_8,3.32.1) KA_III,429.6-10 Ro_V,444 ayam tu khalu śi tuk chatvārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15008_0: niyogataḥ pūrvāntaḥ kartavyaḥ tatra kurvañcchete kṛṣañcchete iti raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade
GS24pmbhasuu:15008_1: iti ṇatvam prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . ścutve yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . idam asti kṣubhnādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15008_2: na ṇakāraḥ bhavati . tataḥ stoḥ ścunā . stoḥ ścunā sannipāte na ṇakāraḥ bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15008_3: tataḥ ścuḥ . ścuḥ ca bhavati stoḥ ścunā sannipāte .
GS24pmbhasuu:15010_0: ṅamuṭi padādigrahaṇam kartavyam . iha mā bhūt . daṇḍinā śakaṭinā iti . tat tarhi
GS24pmbhasuu:15010_1: vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . padāt iti vartate . evam api paramadaṇḍinā paramacchattriṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:15010_2: iti prāpnoti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . uktam etat uttarapadatve ca apadādividhau lumatā lupte
GS24pmbhasuu:15010_3: pratyayalakṣaṇam na bhavati iti . evam api padāt iti vaktavyam . yat hi tat prakṛtam
GS24pmbhasuu:15011: kutsanāt iti evam tat . evam tarhi ṅamaḥ eva ayam ṅamuṭ kriyate . katham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15012: padasya iti vartate ṅamaḥ iti ca na eṣā pañcamī . kā tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15013_0: sambandhaṣaṣṭhī . padāntasya ṅamaḥ ṅamuṭ bhavati hrasvāt uttarasya aci iti . yadi
GS24pmbhasuu:15013_1: ṅamaḥ eva ṅamuṭ kriyate kurvannāste kṛṣannāste raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade iti ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15014: pratiṣedhaḥ bhaviṣyati . padāntasya iti ucyate na eṣaḥ padāntaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15015_0: padāntabhaktaḥ padāntagrahaṇena grāhiṣyate . evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15015_1: uktam etat na vā padādhikārasya viśeṣaṇatvāt iti . evam tarhi pade iti vartate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15015_2: kva prakṛtam . uñi ca pade iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15016_0: (P_8,3.33) KA_III,430.1-6 Ro_V,446 kimartham mayaḥ uttarasya uñaḥ vaḥ vā iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15016_1: na ikaḥ yaṇaci iti eva siddham . na sidhyati . pragṛhyaḥ prakṛtyā iti prakṛtibhāvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15016_2: prāpnoti . yadi punaḥ tatra eva ucyeta ikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15017: yaṇaci mayaḥ uñaḥ vā iti . na evam śakyam . iha hi doṣaḥ syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15018: kimvāvapanam mahat . maḥ anusvāraḥ hali iti anusvāraḥ prasajyeta . vatve punaḥ sati asiddhatvāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15019: (P_8,3.34) KA_III,430.7-431.6 Ro_V,447-450 iha kasmāt na bhavati :
GS24pmbhasuu:15020: vṛkṣaḥ , plakṣaḥ iti . saṃhitāyām iti vartate . evam api atra prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15021_0: kim kāraṇam . paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ saṃhitā iti ucyate . saḥ yathā eva pareṇa paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15021_1: evam pūrveṇa api . evam tarhi anavakāśā avasānasañjñā saṃhitāsañjñām bādhiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15021_2: atha vā saṃhitāsañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāsyate : sādhīyaḥ yaḥ paraḥ sannikarṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15021_3: iti . kaḥ ca sādhīyaḥ . yaḥ pūrvaparayoḥ . yadi eva anavakāśā avasānasañjñā saṃhitāsañjñām
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_0: atha api saṃhitāsañjñāyām prakarṣagatiḥ vijñāyate ubhayathā doṣaḥ bhavati . iṣyante
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_1: itaḥ uttaram avasāne saṃhitākāryāṇi tāni na sidhyanti . aṇaḥ apragṛhyasya anunāsikaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_2: iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na sarvasya visarjanīyasya satvam bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_3: iti yat ayam kharavasānayorvisjanīyaḥ iti āha . itarathā kharavasānayoḥ saḥ bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_4: iti eva brūyāt . tat ca laghu bhavati visarjanīyasya saḥ iti etat ca na vaktavyaṃ
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_5: bhavati . avaśyam śarparevisarjanīyaḥ iti atra prakṛtinirdeśārtham visarjanīyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15022_6: kartavyam . atha idānīm etat api rasānnidhyārtham purastāt apakrakṣyate kharavasānayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15023: evam api kupvoḥ XkkaXppau ca iti evamādinā anukramaṇena vyavacchinnam
GS24pmbhasuu:15024_0: bhobhagoaghoapūrvasyayo'śi iti atra rugrahaṇam kartavyam syāt . evam api ekam visarjanīyagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15024_1: vyājaḥ bhavati . saḥ ayam evam laghīyasā nyāsena siddhe sati yat garīyāṃsam yatnam
GS24pmbhasuu:15024_2: ārabhate tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na sarvasya visarjanīyasya satvam bhavati iti . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15025: jñāpakam . etāvat jñāpyate na sarvasya vijanīyasya satvam bhavati iti tatra kutaḥ etat iha bhaviṣyati vṛkṣaḥ tatra plakṣaḥ tatra iti iha na
GS24pmbhasuu:15026_0: bhaviṣyati vṛkṣaḥ plakṣaḥ iti . evam tarhi ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na asya visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15026_1: satvam bhavati iti yat ayam śarpare visarjanīyaḥ iti āha . atha vā hali iti vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15026_2: . kva prakṛtam . hali sarveṣām iti . yadi tat anuvartate mayaḥ uñaḥ vaḥ vā hali ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15027: śamu naḥ . śamu yoḥ astu . evam tarhi visarjanīyasyasaḥ iti atra khari iti anuvartiṣyate . atha vā sambandham anuvartiṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15029: vāśarprakaraṇe kharpare lopaḥ vaktavyaḥ . vṛkṣāḥ sthātāraḥ . vṛkṣāḥ sthātāraḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15030_1: . sasya kupvoḥ visarjanīyajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyāḥ vaktavyāḥ . visarjanīyādeśe hi śarparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15030_2: eva ādeśaprasaṅgaḥ . visarjanīyādeśe hi sati śarparayoḥ eva kupvoḥ hkkahppau syātām
GS24pmbhasuu:15030_3: . adbhiḥ psātam . vāsaḥ kṣaumam . vacanāt na bhaviṣyataḥ . asti vacane prayojanam
GS24pmbhasuu:15030_4: . kim . puruṣaḥ tsarukaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . yat etat visarjanīyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15031: visarjanīyagrahaṇam etat uttaratra anuvartiṣyate tasmin ca śarpare visarjanīyaḥ asiddhaḥ . na asiddhaḥ . katham . adhikāraḥ nāma triprakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15032_0: . kaḥ cit ekadeśasthaḥ sarvam śāstram abhijvalayati yathā pradīpaḥ suprajvalitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15032_1: sarvam veśma abhijvalayati . aparaḥ yathā rajjvā ayasā vā baddham kāṣṭham anukṛṣyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15032_2: tadvat . aparaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti yoge yoge upatiṣṭhate
GS24pmbhasuu:15032_3: . tat yadā eṣaḥ pakṣaḥ adhikāraḥ pratiyogam tasya anirdeśārthaḥ iti tadā hi yat etat
GS24pmbhasuu:15032_4: visarjanīyasyasaḥ iti atra visarjanīyagrahaṇam etat uttaratra anuvṛttam sat anyat
GS24pmbhasuu:15033_0: tasmin ca śarpare visarjanīyaḥ siddhaḥ . evam ca krtvā śarparayoḥ eva kupvoḥ hkkahppau
GS24pmbhasuu:15033_1: syātām . adbhiḥ psātam . vāsaḥ kṣaumam iti . evam tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15033_2: śarpare visarjanīyaḥ . vā śari . tataḥ kupvoḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15034_0: kupvoḥ ca śarparayoḥ visarjanīyasya visarjanīyaḥ bhavati iti . kimartham idam . kupvoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15034_1: hkkahppau vakṣyati tadbādhanārtham . tataḥ hkkahppau bhavataḥ kupvoḥ iti eva . śarparayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15034_2: iti nivṛttam . atha vā śarparevisarjanīyaḥ iti etat kupvoḥ hkkahppau ca iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_0: (P_8,3.38) KA_III,432.8-23 Ro_V,453-454 saḥ apadādau anavyayasya . saḥ apadādau anavyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_1: iti vaktavyam . iha mā bhūt . prātaḥkalpam punaḥkalpam . roḥ kāmye niyamārtham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_2: roḥ kāmye iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam . niyamārtham . roḥ eva kāmye na anyasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_3: . payaskāmyati . kva mā bhūt . gīḥkāmyati pūḥkāmyati . upadhmānīyasya ca satvam vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_4: . kim prayojanam . ayam ubjiḥ upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate tasya satve kṛte jaśbhāve
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_5: ca abhyudgaḥ samudgaḥ iti etat rūpam yathā syāt . yadi upadhmānīyopadhaḥ paṭhyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15035_6: ubjijiṣati iti upadhmānīyasya dvirvacanam prāpnoti . dakāropadhe punaḥ sati nandrāḥsaṃyogādayaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15036_0: siddhaḥ bhavati . yadi dakāropadhaḥ paṭhyate kā rūpasiddhiḥ : ubjitā ubjitum iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15036_1: . asiddhe bhaḥ udjeḥ . idam asti stoḥścunāścuḥ . tataḥ vakṣyāmi . bhaḥ udjeḥ . udjeḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15036_2: ca ścunā sannipāte bhaḥ bhavati iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . nipātanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15036_3: etat siddham . kim nipātanam bhujanyubjaupāṇyupatāpayoḥ iti . iha api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15037: akutvaviṣaye nipātanam . atha vā na etat ubjeḥ rūpam . kim tarhi gameḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15038: dvyupasargāt ḍaḥ vidhīyate . abhyudgataḥ abhyudgaḥ . samudgataḥ samudgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15040: uktvā tataḥ iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate āhosvit iṇaḥ uttarasya visarjanīyasya eva ṣatvam vidhīyate . kim ca ataḥ . yadi aviśeṣeṇa satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15041: uktvā iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate niṣkṛtam , niṣpītam iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15042: satvasya asiddhatvāt ṣatvam na prāpnoti . atha iṇaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15043_0: visarjanīyasya eva ṣatvam vidhīyate satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15043_1: . yadi anuvartate satvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam namaspurasorgatyoḥ iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15044_0: ṣatvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate ṣatvam api prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15044_1: . atha nivṛttam idudupadhasya ca apratyasya iti atra ṣakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . tasmin
GS24pmbhasuu:15044_2: ca kriyamāṇe satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate satvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15044_3: api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam tirasaḥ anyatarasyām iti atra sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15044_4: . tasmin ca kriyamāṇe ṣatvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15044_5: ṣatvam api prāpnoti . atha nivṛttam dvistriścaturitikṛtvo'rthe isusoḥ sāmarthye nityaṃsamāse
GS24pmbhasuu:15045_0: tasmin ca kriyamāṇe satvam api anuvartate utāho na . kim ca ataḥ . yadi anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15046_0: kartavyam . yathā icchasi tathā astu . astu tāvat aviśeṣeṇa satvam uktvā iṇaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15046_1: sakārasya ṣatvam ucyate . nanu ca uktam niṣkṛtam , niṣpītam iti atra satvasya asiddhatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15046_2: ṣatvam na prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15047: ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na yoge yogaḥ asiddhaḥ . kim tarhi prakaraṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15048: prakaraṇam asiddham iti yat ayam upasargāt asamāse api ṇopadeśasya iti asamāsepigrahaṇam karoti . atha vā punaḥ astu iṇaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15049: visarjanīyasya ṣatvam vidhīyate . nanu ca uktam satvam api anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15050_0: utāho na kim ca ataḥ yadi anuvartate satvam api prāpnoti iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . sambandham
GS24pmbhasuu:15050_1: anuvartiṣyate . saḥ apadādau . iṇaḥṣaḥ . namaspurasoḥ gatyoḥ sakāraḥ iṇaḥ uttarasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15051: ṣakāraḥ namaspurasoḥ gatyoḥ sakāraḥ . tirasaḥ anyatarasyām sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15056_0: (P_8,3.41.1) KA_III,434.1-10 Ro_V,456-457 idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti cet pummuhusoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15056_1: pratiṣedhaḥ . idudupadhasya ca apratyayasya iti cet pummuhusoḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15056_2: . puṃskāmā muhuḥkāmaḥ iti . vṛddhibhūtānām ṣatvam vaktavyam . dauṣkulyam naiṣpuruṣyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15056_3: . plutānām tādau ca . plutānām tādau ca kupvoḥ ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15057: sarpi3ṣṭara . barhī3ṣṭara ni3ṣkula du3ṣpuruṣa . na vā bahiraṅgalakṣaṇatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15058: . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . bahirangalakṣaṇatvāt vṛddheḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15060: (P_8,3.41.2) KA_III,434.10-16 Ro_V,457-458 iha kasmāt na bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15061: pituḥ karoti . mātuḥ karoti . apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15062: prasajyeta . apratyayavisarjanīyasya iti ucyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam . lupyate atra pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ rātsasya iti . evam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15063: bhrātuṣputragrahaṇam jñāpakam ekādeśanimittāt ṣatvapratiṣedhasya . yat ayam kaskādiṣu bhrātuṣputraśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ na
GS24pmbhasuu:15065_0: (P_8,3.43) KA_III,434.17-18 Ro_V,458-460 dvistriścaturgrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā
GS24pmbhasuu:15065_1: bhūt . pañcakṛtvaḥ karoti . atha kṛtvorthagrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . catuṣkapālaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15066: astu etena vibhāṣā pūrveṇa nityaḥ vidhiḥ bhaviṣyati . na aprāpte pūrveṇa
GS24pmbhasuu:15067_0: iyam vibhāṣā ārabhyate sā yathā eva iha bādhikā bhavati catuḥ karoti catuṣkaroti
GS24pmbhasuu:15067_1: iti evam catuṣkapāle api bādhikā syāt . na atra pūrveṇa ṣatvam prāpnoti . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15068: pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ ca ayam . lupyate pratyayavisarjanīyaḥ rātsasya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15070: kasmāt na bhavati pañcakṛtvaḥ karoti iti . idudupadhasya iti vartate . na evam śakyam . akriyamāṇe dvistriścaturgrahaṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:15071_0: visarjanīyaḥ viśeṣyeta . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha eva syāt dviṣkaroti dviḥ karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15071_1: iha na syāt catuṣkaroti catuḥ karoti iti . dvistriścaturgrahaṇe punaḥ kriyamāṇe kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇe
GS24pmbhasuu:15072: dvistriścaturṇām kṛtro'rthe vartamānānām yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti . etat api na asti prayojanam . padasya iti vartate tat kṛtvo'rthagrahaṇena
GS24pmbhasuu:15073: viśeṣayiṣyaḥ . padasya kṛtvo'rthe vartamānasya yaḥ visarjanīyaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15074: kṛtvasujarthe ṣatvam bravīti . kasmāt catuṣkapāle mā . ṣatvam vibhāṣayā bhūt . nanu siddham tatra pūrveṇa . siddhe hi ayam vidhatte caturaḥ ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15075: tadā api krtvo'rthe . lupte kṛtvo'rthīye rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi . evam sati tu idānīm dviḥ triḥ catuḥ iti anena kim kāryam . anyaḥ hi na
GS24pmbhasuu:15076: idudupadhaḥ kṛtvo'rthe kaḥ cit api asti . akriyamāṇe grahaṇe visarjanīyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15077: tadā viśeṣyeta . caturaḥ na sidhyati tadā rephasya visarjanīyaḥ hi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15078: tasmin tu gṛhyamāṇe yuktam caturaḥ viśeṣaṇam bhavati . prakṛtam padam tadantam tasya api viśeṣaṇam nyāyyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15079: (P_8,3.45) KA_III,435.20-436.24 Ro_V,460-462 anuttarapadasthasya iti kimartham . paramasarpiḥkuṇḍikā . atha idānīm anena mukte pūrveṇa ṣatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15080_0: vibhāṣā kasmāt na bhavati isusoḥ sāmarthye iti . nānāpadārthayoḥ vartamānayoḥ khyāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15080_1: yadā yogaḥ . tasmin ṣatvam kāryam tat yuktam tat ca me na iha . vyapekṣāsāmarthye
GS24pmbhasuu:15081_0: kim punaḥ kāraṇam vyapekṣāsāmarthyam āśrīyate na punaḥ ekārthībhāvaḥ yathā anyatra
GS24pmbhasuu:15081_1: . aikārthye sāmarthye vākye ṣatvam na me prasajyeta . aikārthye sāmarthye sati vākye
GS24pmbhasuu:15081_2: ṣatvam na syāt : sarpiṣ karoti . sarpiḥ karoti iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_0: tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante . atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_1: na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . yadi kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhikasya ṣatvam na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_2: . kim kāraṇam . pratyayagrahaṇe yasmāt saḥ tadādeḥ grahaṇam bhavati iti . vākye api
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_3: tarhi na prāpnoti . paramasarpiṣkaroti paramasarpiḥ karoti iti . vākye ca me vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_4: pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta yat ayam anuttarapadasthasya iti pratiṣedham śāsti tat
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_5: jñāpayati ācāryaḥ bhavati vākye vibhāṣā iti . atha cet saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15082_6: vibhāṣā iyam . atha avyutpannam prātipadikam tataḥ nitye ṣatve prāpte iyam vibhāṣā
GS24pmbhasuu:15083: ārabhyate . siddham ca me samāse . ṣatvam . kimartham tarhi idam ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15084: pratiṣedhārthaḥ tu yatnaḥ ayam . anuttarapadasthasya iti pratiṣedham
GS24pmbhasuu:15085: vakṣyāmi iti . nānāpadārthayoḥ vartamānayoḥ khyāyate yadā yogaḥ . tasmin ṣatvam kāryam tat yuktam tat ca me na iha . aikārthye sāmarthye vākye
GS24pmbhasuu:15086: ṣatvam na me prasajyeta . tasmāt iha vyapekṣām sāmarthyam sādhu manyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:15087: atha cet kṛdantam etat tataḥ adhike na eva me bhavet prāptiḥ . vākye ca me
GS24pmbhasuu:15088: vibhāṣā pratiṣedhaḥ na prakalpeta . atha cet saṃvijñānam nitye ṣatve tataḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15089: vibhāṣā iyam . siddham ca me samāse pratiṣedhārthaḥ tu yatnaḥ ayam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15090: (P_8,3.55) KA_III,436.25-437.6 Ro_V,463 atha mūrdhanyagrahaṇam kimartham na apadāntasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . tatra ayam api
GS24pmbhasuu:15091_0: arthaḥ ṣakāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati prakṛtam anuvartate . kva prakṛtam . iṇaḥṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15091_1: iti . na evam śakyam . avaśyam mūrdhanyagrahaṇam kartavyam ihārtham uttarārtham ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15092: iṇaḥṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭāmdho'ṅgāt iti atra ṃūrdhanyagrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . uttarārtham ca . raṣābhyānnoṇaḥsamānapade iti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15093: ṇakāragrahaṇam na kartavyam bhavati . tatra ayam api arthaḥ padāntasya na
GS24pmbhasuu:15094: iti pratiṣedhaḥ na vaktavyaḥ bhavati . apadāntābhisambaddham mūrdhanyagrahaṇam anuvartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_0: (P_8,3.56) KA_III,438.1-19 Ro_V,464-465 sagrahaṇam kimartham na saheḥ sāḍaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_1: bhavati iti eva ucyeta . saheḥ sāḍaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ bhavati iti ucyamāne antyasya prasajyeta
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_2: . nanu ca antyasya mūrdhanyavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā sakārasya bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_3: . kutaḥ nu khalu etat anantyārthe ārambhe sakārasya bhaviṣyati . na punaḥ ākārasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_4: syāt . sthane antaratamaḥ bhavati iti sakārasya bhaviṣyati . bhavet prakṛtitaḥ antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:15095_5: satyām siddham syāt . ādeśataḥ tu antaratamanirvṛttau
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_0: satyām ākārasya prasajyeta . tasmāt sakāragrahaṇam kartavyam . uttarārtham ca sakāragrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_1: kriyate . ādeśapratyayayoḥ sakārasya yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . citam , stutam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_2: atha sahigrahaṇam kimartham na sāḍaḥ saḥ bhavati iti eva ucyeta . saheḥ eva sāḍrūpam
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_3: bhavati na anyasya . yadi evaṃ . sāḍaḥ ṣatve samānaśabdapratiṣedhaḥ . sāḍaḥ ṣatve
GS24pmbhasuu:15096_4: samānaśabdānām pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sāḍaḥ daṇḍaḥ. sāḍaḥ vṛścikaḥ iti . arthavadgrahaṇāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15097_0: arthavataḥ sāḍśabdasya grahaṇam na ca eṣaḥ arthavān . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15097_1: cet taddhitalope arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ . arthavadgrahaṇāt siddham iti cet taddhitalope
GS24pmbhasuu:15097_2: arthavattvāt pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . saha aḍena sāḍaḥ sāḍasya apatyam sāḍiḥ atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15098: ṣatvatukoḥ ekādeśasya asiddhatvāt na eṣaḥ sāḍśabdaḥ . evam api saha ḍena saḍaḥ saḍasya apatram sāḍiḥ atra prāpnoti . tasmāt sahigrahaṇam kartavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15100: numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye niṃseḥ pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ . niṃsse niṃssva iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15101_0: . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . numā eva vyavāye visarjanīyena eva vyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:15101_1: śarā eva vyavāye iti . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham anucyamānam gaṃsyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15101_2: pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti . tat yathā .
GS24pmbhasuu:15102: guṇavṛddhisañjñe pratyekam bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15103: samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām .
GS24pmbhasuu:15104_0: arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . evam tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15104_1: yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . numvyavāye . tataḥ visarjanīyavyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:15104_2: . tataḥ śarvyavāye . saḥ tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15106_0: (P_8,3.59.1) KA_III,439.10-18 Ro_V,466-467 ādeśapratyayayoḥ ṣatve sarakaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15106_1: . ādeśapratyayayoḥ ṣatve sarakaḥ pratiṣedaḥ vaktavyaḥ : kṛsaraḥ , dhūsaraḥ . atyalpam
GS24pmbhasuu:15106_2: idam ucyate : sarakaḥ iti . saragādīnām iti vaktavyam iha api yathā syāt : varsam
GS24pmbhasuu:15107: . na vaktavyam . uṇādayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni . na vai etat ṣatve śakyam vijñātum uṇadayaḥ avyutpannāni prātipadikāni iti . iha hi na syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15108: sarpiṣaḥ yajuṣaḥ iti . evam tarhi . bahulavacanāt siddham . bahulam pratyayasañjñā bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_0: avayavaṣaṣṭhī : ādeśasya yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . āhosvit samānādhikaraṇā
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_1: : ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_2: iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ . ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_3: cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bisam bisam . musalam musalam . samānādhikaraṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15110_4: ca aprāptiḥ . samānādhikaraṇānām ca ṣatvasya aprāptiḥ . eṣaḥ , akārṣīt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15111_0: astu tarhi samānādhikaraṇā . yadi samānādhikaraṇā siṣeca suṣvāpa , atra na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15111_1: . na dhātudvirvacane sthāne dvirvacanam śakyam āsthātum . iha api hi prasajyeta sarīsṛpyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15112_0: iha tarhi kariṣyati hariṣyati pratyayaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . astu
GS24pmbhasuu:15112_1: tarhi ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . iha tarhi akārṣīt pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15112_2: yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . mā bhūt evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15113_0: ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam bhaviṣyati . iha tarhi : joṣiṣat , mandiṣat iti pratyayasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15113_1: yaḥ sakāraḥ iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . eṣaḥ api iṭi kṛte pratyayasya sakāraḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15113_2: tarhi indraḥ mā vakṣat saḥ , saḥ devan yakṣat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_0: nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsānupapattiḥ . nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsaḥ na upapadyate ādeśapratyayayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_1: iti . yogavibhāgāt siddham . yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ādeśasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_2: tataḥ pratyayasakārasya ṣaḥ bhavati iti . sa tarhi yogavibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ . na kartavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_3: . katham . astu tāvat avayavaṣaṣṭhī . nanu ca uktam ādeśapratyayayoḥ iti avayavaṣaṣṭhī
GS24pmbhasuu:15114_4: cet dvirvacane pratiṣedhaḥ iti . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . dviḥprayogaḥ dvirvacanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15115_0: yat api ucyate samānādhikaraṇānām ca aprāptiḥ iti vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15115_1: . atha vā punaḥ astu samānādhikaraṇā . katham kariṣyati hariṣyati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_0: yat ayam sātpadādyoḥ iti sātpratiṣedham śāsti . atha vā punaḥ astu ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_1: pratyayasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti . katham indraḥ mā , vakṣat saḥ devān yakṣat . vyapadeśivadbhāvena
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_2: bhaviṣyati . saḥ tarhi vyapadeśivadbhāvaḥ vaktavyaḥ . na vaktavyaḥ . uktam vā . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_3: uktam . tatra vyapadeśivadvacanam ekācaḥ dve prathamārtham ṣatve ca ādeśasampratyayārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15116_4: avacanāt lokavijñanāt siddham iti . yat api nānāvibhaktīnām ca samāsānupapattiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15117_0: nānāvibhaktyoḥ eṣaḥ samāsaḥ iti yat ayam śāsivasighasīnāñca iti ghasigrahaṇam karoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15117_1: . katham kṛtvā jñāpakam . yadi hi ādeśasya yaḥ sakāraḥ iti evam syāt ghasigrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15118: ādeśaḥ yaḥ sakāraḥ tasya ṣatvam iti tataḥ ghasigrahaṇam karoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15120: astautiṇyantānām mā bhūt . sisikṣati . atha evakāraḥ kimarthaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15121: niyamārthaḥ . sthautiṇyantānām eva na anyeṣām iti . na etat asti
GS24pmbhasuu:15122_0: prayojanam . siddhe vidhiḥ ārabhyamāṇaḥ antareṇa evakārakaraṇam niyamārthaḥ bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15122_1: . iṣṭataḥ avadhāraṇārthaḥ tarhi . yathā evam vijñāyeta stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15122_2: mā evam vijñāyi stautiṇyoḥ ṣaṇi eva
GS24pmbhasuu:15123_0: iti . iha na syāt tuṣṭāva . atha ṣaṇi iti kimartham . seṣīvyate . kaḥ vinate anurodhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15123_1: . avinate niyamaḥ mā bhūt . suṣupsati iti . kaḥ sānubandhe anurodhaḥ . ṣaśabdamātre
GS24pmbhasuu:15124: suṣupiṣe iha iti . abhyāsāt iti kimartham . abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā syāt upasargāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15125_0: abhiṣiṣikṣati . na etat asti . asiddham upasargāt ṣatvam tasya asiddhatvāt niyamaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15125_1: na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam . sani yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15125_2: niyamaḥ yathā syāt yaṅi yaḥ abhyāsaḥ tasmāt yā prāptiḥ tatra niyamaḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15125_3: . soṣupyateḥ san soṣupiṣate . atha vā abhyāsāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15126_0: yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ yathā syāt dhātoḥ yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ niyamaḥ mā bhūt . adhīṣiṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:15126_1: . nanu ca ṣaṇi iti ucyate . ṣaṇi iti na eṣā parasaptamī śakyā vijñātum sanyaṅantam
GS24pmbhasuu:15126_2: hi dvirucyate . tasmāt eṣā satsaptamī ṣaṇi sati iti . satsaptamī cet prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15128_0: sthādiṣu abhyāsavacanam niyamārtham . niyamārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . sthādiṣu eva abhyāsasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15128_1: yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . abhisusūṣati . atha kimartham abhyāsena ca iti ucyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15128_2: . tadvyavāye ca aṣopadeśārtham . tadvyavāye abhyāsavyavāye ca aṣopadeśasya api yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15128_3: syāt . abhiṣiṣeṇayiṣati avarṇārtham ṣaṇi pratiṣedhārtham ca . avaṇārtham tavat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15131: upasaṅkhyānam aniṇantatvāt . upasargāt ṣatve nisaḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam . niḥṣuṇoti niḥṣiñcati . kim punaḥ kāraṇam na sidhyati . aniṇantatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15132: iṇantāt upasargāt ṣatvam ucyate na ca nis* iṇantaḥ . na vā varṇāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15133_0: ṣatvasya tadviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ dhātuḥ ca . na vā vaktavyam . kim kāraṇam . varṇāśrayatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15133_1: ṣatvasya . varṇāśrayam ṣatvam . tadviśeṣakaḥ upasargaḥ dhātuḥ ca . na evam vijñāyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15133_2: iṇantāt upasargāt iti . katham tarhi . iṇaḥ uttarasya sakārasya saḥ cet iṇ upasargasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15133_3: saḥ cet sakāraḥ sunotyādīnām iti . tatra śarvyavāye iti eva siddham . yadi evam dhātūpasargayoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15134: abhisambandhaḥ akṛtaḥ bhavati . tatra kaḥ doṣaḥ . iha api prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15135: vigatāḥ secakāḥ asmāt grāmāt visecakaḥ grāmaḥ . dhātūpasargayoḥ ca abhisambandhaḥ kṛtaḥ . katham . sunotyādibhiḥ atra upasargam
GS24pmbhasuu:15136: viśeṣayiṣyāmaḥ sunotyādīnām yaḥ upasargaḥ tasya yaḥ iṇ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15138_0: upasaṅkhyānam adhikatvāt . sunotyādīnām ṣatve ṇyantasya upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15138_1: abhiṣāvayati . kim kāraṇam . adhikatvāt . vyatiriktaḥ sunotyādiḥ iti kṛtvā upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15138_2: sunotyādīnām iti ṣatvam na prāpnoti . na vā avayavasya ananyatvāt . na vā vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15138_3: . kim kāraṇam . avayavasya ananyatvāt . avayavaḥ atra ananyaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15139_0: (P_8,3.65.3) KA_III,443.5-443.12 Ro_V,474-475 nāmadhātoḥ tu pratiṣedhaḥ . nāmadhātoḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15139_1: tu pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . sāvakam icchati abhisāvakīyati parisāvakīyati . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:15140: kim kāraṇam . anupasargatvāt . yatkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca atra sunotim prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi sāvakīyatim prati
GS24pmbhasuu:15141: . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti : abhiṣāvayati . atra api na sunotim prati kriyāyogaḥ . kim tarhi sāvayatim prati . sunotim prati atra kriyāyogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15142: katham . na asau evam preṣyate sunu abhi iti . kim tarhi .
GS24pmbhasuu:15143: upasargaviśiṣṭām asau kriyām preṣyate abhiṣuṇu iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15144: (P_8,3.67) KA_III,443.13-18 Ro_V,475 aprateḥ iti vartate utāho nivṛttam . nivṛttam iti āha . katham jñāyate . yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15145: . itarathā hi sadistambhyoḥ aprateḥ iti eva brūyāt . asti anyat yogavibhāgakaraṇe prayojanam . kim . avāccālambanāvidūrvayoḥ iti vakṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15146: tat stambheḥ eva yathā syāt sadeḥ mā bhūt iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15147: ekayoge api sati yasya ālambanāvidūrye staḥ tasya bhaviṣyati . kasya ca ālambanāvidūrye staḥ . stambheḥ eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:15148: (P_8,3.72) KA_III,443.19-23 Ro_V,475 atha yaḥ prāṇī aprāṇī ca katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15149: tatra bhavitavyam . anuṣyandete matsyodake iti . āhosvit anusyandete matsyodake iti . yadi tāvat aprāṇī vidhinā āśrīyate asti atra aprāṇī iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15150: kṛtvā bhavitavyam ṣatvena . atha prāṇī pratiṣedhena āśrīyate asti atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15151: prāṇī iti kṛtvā bhavitavyam pratiṣeedhena . kim punaḥ atra arthasatattvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15153: (P_8,3.74) KA_III,444.1-4 Ro_V,476 aniṣṭhāyām iti vartate utāho nivṛttam . nivṛttam iti āha . katham jñāyate . yogavibhāgakaraṇasāmarthyāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15154: . itarathā hi viparibhyām ca skandeḥ aniṣṭhāyām iti eva brūyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15156: iṇgrahaṇam ḍhatve kavarganivṛttyartham . iṇghrahaṇam kriyate kavargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15157: ḍhatvam mā bhūt iti . pakṣīdhvam yakṣīdhvam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15158: (P_8,3.79) KA_III,444.10-445.14 Ro_V,476-478 kim punaḥ idam iṇgrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam : iṇaḥ uttareṣām ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭām yaḥ dhakāraḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15159_0: āhosvit dhakāraviśeṣaṇam : iṇaḥ uttarasya dhakārasya saḥ cet ṣīdhvaṃluṅliṭām dhakāraḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15159_1: iti . kaḥ ca atra viśeṣaḥ . tatra pratyayaparatve iṭaḥ liṭi ḍhatvam parāditvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15159_2: tatra pratyayaparatve iṭaḥ liṭi ḍhatvam na
GS24pmbhasuu:15160_0: prāpnoti . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti . kim kāraṇam . parāditvāt . iṭ parādiḥ . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15160_1: bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . alaviḍhvam alavidhvam . astu tarhi dhakāraviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15160_2: . dhakāraparatve ṣīdhvami ananantaratvāt iṭaḥ vibhāṣābhāvaḥ . dhakāraparatve ṣīdhvami
GS24pmbhasuu:15161: iṭaḥ vibhāṣā na prāpnoti . laviṣīḍhvam laviṣīdhvam iti . vacanāt bhaviṣyati . asti vacane prayojanam . kim . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15162: iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt ṣyādimātre ḍhatvaprasaṅgaḥ . iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt ṣyādimātre ḍhatvam prāpnoti : pakṣīdhvam , yakṣīdhvam iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15163: na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . aṅgāt iti vakṣyāmi . aṅgagrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ . iha na prāpnoti : upadidīyidhve , upadidīyiḍhve . yaḥ hi atra aṅgāntyaḥ iṇ na
GS24pmbhasuu:15164_0: tasmāt uttaraḥ iṭ yasmāt ca uttaraḥ iṭ na asau aṅgāntyaḥ iṇ iti . yathā icchasi tathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15164_1: astu . astu tāvat pratyayaviśeṣaṇam . nanu ca uktam tatra pratyayaparatve iṭaḥ liṭi
GS24pmbhasuu:15165: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_0: alaviḍhvam alavidhvam iti . yat etasmin yoge liḍgrahaṇam tadanavakāśam tasya anavakāśatvāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_1: vacanāt bhaviṣyati . atha vā punaḥ astu dhakāraviśeṣaṇam iti . nanu ca uktam dhakāraparatve
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_2: ṣīdhvami ananantaratvāt iṭaḥ vibhāṣābhāvaḥ laviṣīḍhvam laviṣīdhvam iti . vacanāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_3: bhaviṣyati . nanu ca uktam asti vacane prayojanam . kim . luluviḍhve luluvidhve iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_4: . yat etasmin yoge ṣīdhvaṅgrahaṇam tat anavakāśam tasya anavakāśatvāt vacanāt bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_5: . yat api ucyate iṇgrahaṇasya ca aviśeṣaṇatvāt ṣyādimātre ḍhatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti aṅgāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_6: iti vakṣyāmi . nanu ca uktam aṅgagrahaṇāt ca doṣaḥ iti . pūrvasmin yoge yat aṅgagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15166_7: tat uttaratra nivṛttam . atha vā pūrvasmin yoge iṇgrahaṇam pratyayaviśeṣaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15168: (P_8,3.82) KA_III,445.15-23 Ro_V,478-479 agneḥ dīrghāt somasya . agneḥ dīrghāt somasya iti vaktavyam . agnīṣomau . itarathā hi aniṣṭaprasaṅgaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15169_0: itarathā hi aniṣṭam prasajyeta . agnisomau māṇavakau iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15169_1: na vaktavyam . gauṇamukhyayoḥ mukhye sampratiprattiḥ . tat yathā . gauḥ anubandhyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15169_2: ajaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ iti na bāhīkaḥ anubadhyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15170: katham tarhi bāhīke vṛddhyāttve bhavataḥ . gauḥ tiṣṭhati . gām ānaya iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15171: arthāśraye etat evam bhavati . yat hi śabdāśrayam śabdamātre tat bhavati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15173_0: (P_8,3.85) KA_III,446.1-6 Ro_V,480 sāntābhyām ca iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15173_1: . mātuḥṣvasā mātuḥsvasā . pituḥṣvasā pituḥsvaseti . mātuḥ pituḥ iti sāntagrahaṇānarthakyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15173_2: ekadeśavikṛtasya ananyatvāt . mātuḥ pituḥ iti sāntagrahaṇam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15174: ekadeśavikṛtam ananyavat bhavati iti sāntasya api bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15175: (P_8,3.87) KA_III,446.7-18 Ro_V,480-481 astigrahaṇam kimartham . iha mā bhūt . anusṛtam , visṛtam iti . na etat asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15176_0: yadkriyāyuktāḥ tam prati gatyupasargasañjñe bhavataḥ na ca etam sakāram prati kriyāyogaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15176_1: . iha api tarhi na prāpnoti abhiṣanti viṣanti iti na hi astiḥ kriyāvacanaḥ . kaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15176_2: punaḥ āha na astiḥ kriyāvacanaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15177_0: kriyāvacanaḥ astiḥ . ātaḥ ca kriyāvacanaḥ vyatyanuṣate kartarikarmavyatihāre iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15177_1: anena ātmanepadam bhavati . karmavyatihāraḥ ca kaḥ . kriyāvyatihāraḥ . prāduḥśabdāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15177_2: tarhi mā bhūt . prāduḥśabdaḥ ca niyataviṣayaḥ kṛbhvastiyoge eva vartate . upasargāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15177_3: tarhi syateḥ mā bhūt iti . iṣyate upasargāt syateḥ ṣatvam . ātaś ca iṣyate . evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15178_1: tarhi syateḥ mā bhūt iti . prāduḥśabdaḥ ca niyataviṣayaḥ kṛbhvastiyoge eva vartate
GS24pmbhasuu:15178_2: . idam tarhi prayojanam iha mā bhūt : anusūteḥ apratyayaḥ anusūḥ anusvaḥ apatyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15179_0: (P_8,3.88) KA_III,446.19-447.20 Ro_V,481-483 kimartham svapeḥ supibhūtasya grahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15179_1: kriyate . supeḥ ṣatvam svapeḥ mā bhūt . supeḥ ṣatvam ucyate tat svapeḥ mā bhūt iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15179_2: . susvapnaḥ visvapnak iti . visuṣvāpa iti kena na . visuṣvāpa iti atra kasmāt na
GS24pmbhasuu:15180: halādiśeṣe kṛte na eṣaḥ supiḥ bhavati . idam iha sampradhāryam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15181: halādiśeṣaḥ kriyatām samprasāraṇam iti kim atra kartavyam . paratvāt halādiśeṣaḥ . iṣṭam pūrvam prasāraṇam . iṣyate halādiśeṣāt pūrvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15182_0: samprasāraṇam . ātaḥ ca iṣyate . evam hi āha : abhyāsasamprasāraṇam halādiśeṣāt vipratiṣedhena
GS24pmbhasuu:15182_1: iti . evam tarhi sthādiṣu abhyāsasya iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . sthādīnām
GS24pmbhasuu:15183: uttaraḥ supiḥ . prāk sitasaṃśabdanāt saḥ niyamaḥ uttaraḥ ca supiḥ paṭhyate . evam tarhi arthavadgrahaṇe na anarthakasya iti evam etasya na bhaviṣyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15184: . anarthake viṣuṣupuḥ . yadi arthavataḥ grahaṇam viṣuṣupuḥ iti na sidhyati
GS24pmbhasuu:15185: . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . katham . supibhūtaḥ dviḥ ucyate . supibhutasya dvirvacanam . supeḥ ṣatvam svapeḥ mā bhūt . visuṣvāpa iti kena na .
GS24pmbhasuu:15186: halādiśeṣāt na supiḥ . iṣṭam pūrvam prasāraṇam . sthādīnām niyamaḥ na atra prāk sitāt uttaraḥ supiḥ . anarthake viṣuṣupuḥ supibhūtaḥ dviḥ ucyate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15187_1: gotraprakṛtau iti vaktavyam . gotre iti ucyamāne iha eva syāt . kāpiṣṭhaliḥ . iha
GS24pmbhasuu:15187_2: na syāt . kapiṣṭhalaḥ kāpiṣṭhalāyanaḥ . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na evam
GS24pmbhasuu:15188: nipātyate iti . katham tarhi . gotre yaḥ kapiṣṭhalaśabdaḥ tasya ṣatvam nipātyate yatra vā tatra vā iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15189_0: (P_8,3.97) KA_III,448.3-9 Ro_V,484 sthaḥ iti kim idam dhātugrahaṇam āhosvit rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15189_1: . kim ca ataḥ . yadi dhātugrahaṇam gosthānam iti atra prāpnoti . atha rūpagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15189_2: savyeṣṭhāḥ , parameṣṭhī , savyeṣṭhā sārathiḥ iti atra na prāpnoti . yathā icchasi
GS24pmbhasuu:15190: . katham gosthānam iti . savanādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . atha vā punaḥ astu rūpagrahaṇam . katham savyeṣṭhāḥ , parmeṣṭhī , savyeṣṭhā sārathiḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15192: (P_8,3.98) KA_III,448.10-11 Ro_V,485 avihitalakṣaṇaḥ mūrdhanyaḥ suṣāmādiṣu draṣṭavyaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15193: (P_8,3.101) KA_III,448.12-14 Ro_V,485 hrasvāt tādau tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15194: hrasvāt tādau tiṅi pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . bhindyustarām chindyustarām iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15195_0: (P_8,3.105) KA_III,448.15-18 Ro_V,485 stutastomayoḥ chandasi anarthakam vacanam pūrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15195_1: iti siddhatvāt . stutastomayoḥ chandasi vacanam anarthakam . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15195_2: iti siddhatvāt . pūrvapadāt iti eva siddham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15196: (P_8,3.108) KA_III,449.1-13 Ro_V,485-486 sanoteḥ anaḥ iti ca . kim .
GS24pmbhasuu:15197: vacanam anarthakam iti eva . kim kāraṇam . pūrvapadāt iti siddhatvāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15198: niyamārtham tarhi idam vaktavyam . sanoteḥ anakārasya eva yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt . gosanim iti . sanoteḥ anaḥ iti niyamārtham iti cet
GS24pmbhasuu:15199: savanādikṛtatvāt siddham . sanoteḥ anaḥ iti niyamārtham iti cet savanādiṣu pāṭhaḥ kariṣyate . sanartham tu . sanartham tu idam vaktavyam . sisaniṣati
GS24pmbhasuu:15200: . etat api na asti prayojanam . stautiṇyorevaṣaṇyabhyāsāt iti etasmāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15201: niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . ṇyartham tarhi idam vaktavyam . sisānayiṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15202: katham punaḥ aṇyantasya pratiṣedhe ṇyantaḥ śakyaḥ vijñātum . sāmarthyāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15203: aṇyantasya pratiṣedhavacane prayojanam na asti iti kṛtvā ṇyante vijñāsyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15204: . atha vā ayam asti aṇyantaḥ : sisaniṣateḥ apratyayaḥ sisanīḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15205: (P_8,3.110) KA_III,449.14-20 Ro_V,486 kimartham savādiṣu aśvasaniśabdaḥ paṭhyate . pūrvapadāt iti ṣatvam prāpnoti . tadbādhanārtham
GS24pmbhasuu:15206: . na etat asti prayojanam . iṇantāt iti tatra anuvartate aniṇantaḥ ca ayam
GS24pmbhasuu:15207_0: . na eva prāpnoti na arthaḥ pratiṣedhena . evam tarhi siddhe sati yat savanādiṣu
GS24pmbhasuu:15207_1: aśvasaniśabdam paṭhati tat jñāpayati ācāryaḥ aniṇantāt api ṣatvam bhavati iti . kim
GS24pmbhasuu:15207_2: etasya jñāpane prayojanam . jalāṣāham māṣaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15208: etat siddham bhavati . atha vā ekadeśavikṛtārthaḥ ayam ārambhaḥ . aśvaṣāḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15209: (P_8,3.112) KA_III,450.1-8 Ro_V,486-487 upasargāt iti yā prāptiḥ bhavitavyam tasyāḥ pratiṣedhena utāho na . na bhavitavyam . kim kāraṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15210: upasargāt ṣatvam pratiṣedhaviṣaye ārabhyate tat yathā eva padādilakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhate evam sicaḥ yaṅi iti etam api bādhate . na bādhate .
GS24pmbhasuu:15211: kim kāraṇam . yena na aprāpte tasya bādhanam bhavati na ca aprāpte
GS24pmbhasuu:15212: padādilakṣaṇe pratiṣedhe upasargāt ṣatvam ārabhyate sicaḥ yaṅi iti etasmin punaḥ prāpte ca aprāpte ca . atha vā purastāt apavādāḥ anantarān vidhīn
GS24pmbhasuu:15213: bādhante iti evam upasargāt ṣatvam padādilakṣaṇam pratiṣedham bādhiṣyate sicaḥ yaṅi iti etam na bādhiṣyate . tasmāt abhisesicyate iti bhavitavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15215: gṛhyate . yatra asya etat rūpam tatra yathā syāt . iha mā bhūt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15218: . stambhusivusahām caṅi upasargāt iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15219: upasargāt yā prāptiḥ tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ yathā syāt . abhyāsāt yā prāptiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15220: tasyāḥ pratiṣedhaḥ mā bhūt iti . paryasīṣahat .
GS24pmbhasuu:15221: (P_8,3.117) KA_III,450.17-21 Ro_V,487 sani kim udāharaṇam . susūṣati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15222: na etat asti prayojanam . stautiṇyoḥ eva ṣaṇi iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi . abhisusūṣati . etat api na asti prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15223: sthādiṣvabhyāsenacābhyāsasya iti etasmāt niyamāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam : abhisusūṣateḥ apratyayaḥ abhisusūḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15224: (P_8,3.118) KA_III,451.1-3 Ro_V,487 sadaḥ liṭi pratiṣedhe svañjeḥ upasaṅkhyanam . sadaḥ liṭi pratiṣedhe svañjeḥ upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15227_0: raṣābhyām ṇatve ṛkāragrahaṇam kartavyam . raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade ṛkārāt ca
GS24pmbhasuu:15227_1: iti vaktavyam . iha api yathā syāt : mātṝṇām , pitṝṇām iti . tat tarhi vaktavyam
GS24pmbhasuu:15227_2: . na vaktavyam . yaḥ asau ṛkāre rephaḥ tadāśrayam ṇatvam
GS24pmbhasuu:15228: bhaviṣyati . na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . na hi varṇaikadeśāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15229: varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante . ekadeśe nuḍādiṣu ca uktam . kim uktam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15230: agrahaṇam cet nuḍvidhilādeśavināmeṣu ṛkāragrahaṇam iti . tasmāt gṛhyante .
GS24pmbhasuu:15231: evam api na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . ananantaratvāt . yat tat rephāt param bhakteḥ tena vyavahitatvāt na prāpnoti . aḍvyavāye iti evam bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15232_0: na sidhyati . kim kāraṇam . varṇaikadeśāḥ ke varṇagrahaṇena gṛhyante . ye vyapavṛktāḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15232_1: api varṇāḥ bhavanti . yat ca atra rephāt param bhakteḥ na tat kva cit api vyapavṛktam
GS24pmbhasuu:15233: raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ samānapade . tataḥ vyavāye . vyavāye ca raṣābhyām naḥ ṇaḥ bhavati iti . tataḥ aṭkupvāṅnumbhiḥ iti . idam idānīm kimartham .
GS24pmbhasuu:15234_0: niyamārtham . etaiḥ eva akṣarasamāmnāyikaiḥ vyavāye na anyaiḥ iti . atha vā ācāryapravṛttiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15234_1: jñāpayati bhavati ṛkārāt ṇatvam iti yat ayam kṣubhnādiṣu nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15234_2: na etat asti jñāpakam . vṛddhyartham etat syāt . nārnamaniḥ iti . yat tarhi tatra
GS24pmbhasuu:15235: yat ca api nṛnamanaśabdam paṭhati . nanu ca uktam vṛddhyartham etat syāt
GS24pmbhasuu:15236: iti . bahiraṅgā vṛddhiḥ . antaraṅgam ṇatvam . asiddham bahiraṅgam antaraṅge . atha vā upariṣṭāt yogavibhāgaḥ kariṣyate . ṛtaḥ naḥ ṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15237: bhavati . tataḥ chandasi avagrahāt ṛtaḥ iti eva .
GS24pmbhasuu:15238_0: (P_8,4.2.1) KA_III,452.21-453.8 Ro_V,490-491 aḍvyavāye ṇatve anyavyavāye pratiṣedhaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15238_1: . aḍvyavāye ṇatve anyavyavāye pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . ādarśena akṣadarśena . na vā
GS24pmbhasuu:15238_2: anyena vyapetatvāt . na vā vaktavyaḥ . kim kāraṇam . anyena vyapetatvāt . anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:15238_3: atra vyavāyaḥ . yadi api atra anyena vyavāyaḥ aṭā api tu vyavāyaḥ asti tatra asti
GS24pmbhasuu:15238_4: aḍvyavāye iti prāpnoti . aṭā eva vyavāye bhavati . kim vaktavyam etat . na hi . katham
GS24pmbhasuu:15238_5: anucyamānam gaṃsyate . aḍgrahaṇasāmarthyāt . yadi hi yatra aṭā ca anyena
GS24pmbhasuu:15239: ca vyavāyaḥ tatra syāt aḍgrahaṇam anarthakam syāt . vyavāye naḥ ṇaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15240_0: bhavati iti eva brūyāt . asti anyat aḍgrahaṇasya prayojanam . kim . yaḥ anirdiṣṭaiḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15240_1: eva vyavāyaḥ tatra mā bhūt . kṛtsnam mṛtsnā iti . yadi etāvat prayojanam syāt śarvyavāye
GS24pmbhasuu:15242_0: anyatra . tatsamudāye vyavāyasamudāye ṇatvasya aprasiddhiḥ . arkeṇa argheṇa . yathā
GS24pmbhasuu:15242_1: anyatra api vyavāyasamudāye kāryam na bhavati . kva anyatra . numvisarjanīyaśarvyavāye'pi
GS24pmbhasuu:15242_2: niṃsse niṃssva iti . kim punaḥ kāraṇam anyatra api vyavāyasamudāye kāryam na bhavati
GS24pmbhasuu:15242_3: . pratyekam vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛṣṭā iti . tat yathā . guṇavṛddhisañjñe pratyekam
GS24pmbhasuu:15242_4: bhavataḥ . nanu ca ayam api asti dṛṣṭāntaḥ samudāye vākyaparisamāptiḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15243: . tat yathā . gargāḥ śatam daṇḍyantām iti . arthinaḥ ca rājānaḥ hiraṇyena bhavanti na ca pratyekam daṇḍayanti . yadi evam ekena vyavāye na prāpnoti
GS24pmbhasuu:15244: . kiriṇā ririṇā iti . ubhayathā api vākyaparisamāptiḥ dṛśyate . tat yathā . gargaiḥ saha na bhoktavyam iti pratyekam ca na sambhujyate samuditaiḥ ca .
GS24pmbhasuu:15245: (P_8,4.2.3) KA_III,453.18-454.7 Ro_V,491-492 kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ . kuvyavāye hādeśeṣu pratiṣedhaḥ vakavyaḥ . kim prayojanam .

GS24pmbhasuu:15345_2: na iha iti yat ayam śāt pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15347: na ṣṭau iti eva ucyeta . ānantaryamātre ṣṭutvam yathā syāt . peṣṭā leḍhā .
GS24pmbhasuu:15348: atha saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ kasmāt na bhavati . ācāryapravṛttiḥ jñāpayati na iha saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ bhavati iti yat ayam toḥṣi iti pratiṣedham śāsti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15349: (P_8,4.42) KA_III,463.16-18 Ro_V,507 anām iti kim . ṣaṇṇām bhavati kaśyapaḥ . atyalpam idam ucyate anām iti . anānnavatinagarīṇām ca iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15351: (P_8,4.45) KA_III,464.1-4 Ro_V,507 yaraḥ anunāsike pratyaye bhāṣāyām nityavacanam . yaraḥ anunāsike pratyaye bhāṣāyām nityam iti ca vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15354: dvirvacane yaṇaḥ mayaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim udāharaṇam . yadi yaṇaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15355: pañcamī mayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī ulkkā valmmīkam iti udaharaṇam . atha mayaḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15356: pañcamī yaṇaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī dadhyyatra madhvvatra iti udāharaṇam . śaraḥ khayaḥ . śaraḥ khayaḥ iti vaktavyam . kim udāharaṇam . yadi śaraḥ iti
GS24pmbhasuu:15357: pañcamī khayaḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī sththālī sththātā iti udāharaṇam . atha khayaḥ iti pañcamī śaraḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī vatssaḥ kṣṣīram apssarāḥ iti udāharaṇam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15358_0: avasāne ca . avasāne ca dve bhavataḥ iti vaktavyam . vākk vāk . tvakk tvak . srukk
GS24pmbhasuu:15358_1: sruk . tat tarhi vaktavyam . na vaktavyam . na ayam prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ . aci na
GS24pmbhasuu:15358_2: iti . kim tarhi paryudasaḥ ayam . yat anyat acaḥ iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15359: (P_8,4.48) KA_III,464.18-20 Ro_V,508 na ādini ākrośe putrasya iti tatpare ca . na ādini ākrośe putrasya iti atra tatpare ca iti vaktavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15361: (P_8,4.48) KA_III,464.21-22 Ro_V,508 vā hatajagdhapare ca . vā hatajagdhapare iti vaktavyam . putrahatī puttrahatī . putrajagdhī puttrajagdhī .
GS24pmbhasuu:15362: (P_8,4.48) KA_III,465.1-3 Ro_V,508 cayaḥ dvitīyāḥ śari pauṣkarasādeḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15363: cayaḥ dvitīyāḥ bhavanti śari parataḥ pauṣkarasādeḥ ācāryasya matena .
GS24pmbhasuu:15365: (P_8,4.61) KA_III,465.4-6 Ro_V,509 udaḥ pūrvatve skandeḥ chandasi upasaṅkhyānam . udaḥ pūrvatve skandeḥ chandasi upasaṅkhyānam kartavyam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15367: (P_8,4.61) KA_III,465.7 Ro_V,509 roge ca iti vaktavyam . utkandakaḥ rogaḥ .
GS24pmbhasuu:15369: tacchmaśruṇā iti prayojanam . chatvam ami iti vaktavyam . kim prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15372_0: jharaḥ jhari savarṇagrahaṇam samasaṅkhyapratiṣedhārtham . jharaḥ jhari savarṇagrahaṇam
GS24pmbhasuu:15372_1: kriyate samasaṅkhyapratiṣedhārtham . saṅkhyātānudeśaḥ mā bhūt iti . kim ca syāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15372_2: iha na syāt . śiṇḍhi piṇḍhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15374_0: akāraḥ ayam akṣarasamāmnāye vivṛtaḥ upadiṣṭaḥ tasya saṃvṛtatāpratyāpattiḥ kriyate
GS24pmbhasuu:15374_1: . kim punaḥ kāraṇam vivṛtaḥ upadiśyate . ādeśārtham savarṇārtham akāraḥ vivṛtaḥ smṛtaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15374_2: . ākārasya tathā hrasvaḥ tadartham pāṇineḥa a.
GS24pmbhasuu:15375: ādeśārtham tāvat . vṛkṣābhyām , devadattā3 . āntaryataḥ vivṛtasya vivṛtau
GS24pmbhasuu:15376: dīrghaplutau yathā syātām . savarṇārtham ca . akāraḥ savarṇagrahaṇena ākāram api yathā gṛhṇīyāt . ākārasya tathā hrasvaḥ . tathā ca atikhaṭvaḥ ,
GS24pmbhasuu:15377: atimālaḥ iti atra ākārasya hrasvaḥ ucyamānaḥ vivṛtaḥ prāpnoti saḥ saṃvṛtaḥ syāt iti evamarthā prayāpattiḥ . asti prayojanam etat . kim tarhi iti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15378: akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ . akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15379: pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ . khaṭvā mālā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ . yathā eva prakṛtitaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15380_0: savarṇagrahaṇam evam ādeśataḥ api bhavitavyam tatra āntaryataḥ hrasvasya hrasvaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15380_1: dīrghasya dīrghaḥ bhaviṣyati . ādeśasya ca anaṇtvāt na savarṇagrahaṇam . ādeśasya
GS24pmbhasuu:15380_2: ca anaṇtvāt savarṇānām grahaṇam na prāpnoti .
GS24pmbhasuu:15382: siddham etat . katham . taparanirdeśāt . taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . at a*
GS24pmbhasuu:15383: iti . aparaḥ āha : akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghapratiṣedhaḥ . akārasya pratyāpattau dīrghasya pratiṣedhaḥ vaktavyaḥ : khaṭvā mālā . na eṣaḥ doṣaḥ
GS24pmbhasuu:15384: . dīrghoccāraṇasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati . idam tarhi prayojanam .
GS24pmbhasuu:15385: vṛkṣābhyām plakṣābhyām . atra api dīrghavacanasāmarthyāt na bhaviṣyati .
GS24pmbhasuu:15386_0: idam tarhi . api kākaḥ śyenāyate . nanu ca atra api dīrghavacanasamarthyāt eva na
GS24pmbhasuu:15386_1: bhaviṣyati . asti anyat dīrghavacane prayojanam . kim . dadhīyati madhūyati . atra
GS24pmbhasuu:15386_2: eva ca eṣaḥ doṣaḥ ādeśasya ca anaṇtvāt savarṇānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15387: grahaṇam na prāpnoti . keṣām . udāttānudāttasvaritānunāsikānām . siddham tu taparanirdeśāt . siddham etat . katham . taparanirdeśāt .
GS24pmbhasuu:15388: taparanirdeśaḥ kartavyaḥ . at at iti . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā svarabhinnānām
GS24pmbhasuu:15389: bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ siddham . ekaśeṣanirdeśāt vā svarabhinnānam bhagavataḥ pāṇineḥ ācāryasya siddham . ekaśeṣanirdesaḥ ayam . a , a , a iti .
